40001001	Labeenang keɓe ka yuu zɔ̃ng ɓɔɔ zang yi Yeesɔ Kirisi kagn ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ Kirisi nwangnɛ zɔ̃ng Dawuda ɓɔɔ ɓi zɔ̃ng Ibirayi ɓɛɛ.
40001002	Ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, Ibirayi yi Ishaaku, Ishaaku naa yi Yakubu, a Yakubu naa yi Yahuda nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung.
40001003	Yahuda naa yi Periza nɛɛ Zera nɛɛ bii ɓeeso Tama, a Periza naa yi Heziron, Heziron naa yi Arama,
40001004	Arama naa yi Aminada, Aminada naa yi Nashong, a Nashong naa yi Salimo.
40001005	Salimo naa yi Buwaza nɛɛ bii ɓeeso Rahab, a Buwaza naa yi Obida nɛɛ bì'i ɓeeso Rut, Obida naa yi Jeesi,
40001006	a Jeesi naa yi kpanti Dawuda.
40001007	Sulemanu naa yi Rehobuwam, Rehobuwam naa yi Abiya, a Abiya naa yi Asa.
40001008	Asa naa yi Jehoshafa, Jehoshafa naa yi Joram, a Joram naa yi Yuziya.
40001009	Yuziya naa yi Jotang, Jotang naa yi Ahaza, a Ahaza naa yi Hezikiya.
40001010	Hezikiya naa yi Manase, Manase naa yi Among, a Among naa yi Josaya.
40001011	Josaya naa yi Jakoniya nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung, ka diki ɓɔɔ zang see ri zang daa nɛɛ mani ka Babila ɓɛɛ.
40001012	Ka knti ɓɔɔ zang daa tɔ nɛɛ ri ka Babila, Jakoniya naa yi Shalitiyel kati.
40001013	A Shalitiyel naa yi Zerubabe. Zerubabe naa yi Abiyu, Abiyu naa yi Eliyakim, a Eliyakim naa yi Azɔ.
40001014	Azɔ naa yi Zadokiya, Zadokiya naa yi Akimu, Akimu naa yi Aliyuda.
40001015	Aliyuda naa yi Eliyaza, Eliyaza naa yi Matan, a Matan naa yi Yakubu.
40001016	Yakubu naa yi Yusufu varɛ Marayamu. Marayamu kɔ nà'a Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kirisi, (ɓɔɔ Laa tɔɔ wu shong ɓɛɛ.)
40001017	Zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ bì'i Ibirayi, a, à ka bì'i Dawuda nandon, zɔ̃ng kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti. Ɓɔɔ ti naa gaayu nɛɛ bì'i Dawuda, à ka diki ɓɔɔ zang see zang Yahudawa jaafoo zang daa nɔng ka Babila, ti kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti. A ɓɔɔ gaayu ka diki ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri ka Babila, a nɔng ka bì'i Kirisi, ti kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti.
40001018	Wee naa ɓɔɔ zang yi Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Yusufu hangsɛ nyaa Marayamu geenang tɔ nandon, a ɓang bii kaa gngn nɛɛ wu kpang. A Marayamu zirɛ nɛɛ wu tuu jaa tɔ kaa nɛɛ bii Suru Kpanti Laa.
40001019	Ɓeevɛ Yusufu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, zi tɔ nɛɛ wu gee Marayamu takpang. Kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ wu bɛ̃ɛ wu kaa nɛɛ nwiiri.
40001020	Ɓɔɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ doo ka naa ɓɛɛ, zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ wu ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang tɔɔ, “Yusufu jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda, m'ɔɔ k'aa vɔrɔ soro ɓaaɓɛ Marayamu shinnang kpang. Jaa kɔ wu tuu ka yeti ɓee, a ɓi nɛɛ bii Suru Laa.
40001021	Naa yi jaa zang varɛ, m'ɔɔ ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ, (dìiri nung ɓiɓɛ, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ta yuu zang ɓɛɛ), ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ naa ta yuu zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.”
40001022	Vuu keɓe nandon nwang ka naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa tɔɔ,
40001023	“Jaa soro ɓɔɔ roo varɛ gn kpang, naa tuu jaa ditɔ, naa yi jaa zang varɛ, zang naa ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Imanuwe.” (Dìiri nung ɓiɓɛ ɓi, “Kpanti Laa nwàng kaa teteng ɓuru.”)
40001024	Ɓɔɔ Yusufu naa seepaa kaa nɛɛ hingro, a naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kɔɔ wu ɓɛɛ kati. Shing soro ɓiɓɛ Marayamu kati.
40001025	Yusufu ɓang bii nɛɛ Marayamu doo gbete kpang, a Marayamu naa yi jaa kaa zang varɛ, a Yusufu ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ
40002001	Zang yi Yeesɔ tɔ ka gari Bɛtalami ɓɔɔ ka tipi Yahudiya, ka diki ɓɔɔ Hiridu roo kpanti ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri zi naa ɓɔɔ sang nwang ɓɛɛ, ri seepaa kaa nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɔng, ri a ka gari Urushalima. A ri hɛ̃ɛ zang tɔɔ,
40002002	“Jaa ɓɔɔ zang yirɛ nɛɛ wu naa nwang kpanti zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ, ɓu kiya? Ruu zi sang ɓiɓɛ ka paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɔng ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu arɛ, ruu tɔɔ ruu naa bang wu.”
40002003	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Kpanti Hiridu tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔli nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima nandon.
40002004	A Hiridu kpalɛ Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang nyaa dannang Laa, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Labeenang nyaa dannang Laa tɔ̀ɔ, zang naa yi Kirisi (zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ) ɓu ka niya?”
40002005	A ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ka Bɛtalami ɓɔɔ ka tipi Yahudiya ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa b'ee nɔngkɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa beeyi tɔɔ,
40002006	‘Bɛtalami kɔ ka tipi Yahudiya ɓee, wu mɔkɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng gari bang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudiya kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓɔɔ n'aa gãng jìng ka zang mɛɛ Isirela naa nwang ditɔ nɛɛ yeti ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ.’”
40002007	A Hiridu ɓ'aa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri zili sang ɓɛɛ dang gbete, nɛɛ wu tãa diki ɓɔɔ sang nwang nyaa tìng shɔɔnang ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
40002008	A shong ri ka Bɛtalami, nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa kãa nɔng jaa keɓe tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ìi wu tɔ, nɔɔ naa kɔɔ m, tɔɔ n daa bang wu kaa jong.”
40002009	Ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Hiridu kɔɔ ri tɔ, a ri yi gbalang daanang ɓarɛ kati. Ɓɔɔ ri zi sang ɓɔɔ ri zi tìng shɔɔnang, ri tãa tìnang dɔli. Sang kaɓa daa ka tìng ɓarɛ sasak, a naa shii ka nɔng ɓɔɔ jaa kagn ɓɛɛ.
40002011	A ri a ka yeti gãa, ri naa zi jaa rɛ̃ɛting kaa nɛɛ niiɓɛ Marayamu. A ri tang nɛɛ gutu, ri bang wu. Ri puu nyaa duku ɓarɛ, ri see saka ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓ'aa nɛɛ zinariya, nɛɛ nung ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ nung ɓɔɔ zang ɓ'aa nɛɛ muru ɓɛɛ, ri a jaa. Ri tɔɔ, ri gbãayu kaa tɔ,
40002012	a ri sɔɔ gbalang ɓɔɔgn, ri daa gãa ɓarɛ kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kpanti Laa shaarɛ ri nyaa ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang, nɛɛ ri sɔ̀ɔ bii kpanti Hiridu takpang ɓɛɛ.
40002013	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zili sang kaɓa, ri daa tɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ naa nwang nyaa ka Yusufu ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang tɔɔ, “Seepaa mɔɔ tuu jaa nɛɛ niiɓɛ, mɔɔ yurɛ, mɔɔ daa nwang nɛɛ ri ka tipi Masar. N naa kɔɔ mɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yaa nɔng kaɓa ditɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ kpanti Hiridu naa kãa jaa keɓe ditɔ, nɛɛ tɔɔ wu nyɔ jaa vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.”
40002014	A Yusufu seepaa tuu jaa nɛɛ niiɓɛ, nɛɛ zìi, a daa nɔng ka tipi Masar.
40002015	Yusufu nwang ka tipi Masar sasak, kpanti Hiridu naa vɔ kati. Vuu keɓe nwang ka naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N naa ɓ'aa jaa mɛɛ nyaa nɛɛ tipi Masar.”
40002016	Ɓɔɔ Hiridu naa zirɛ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zili sang ri nwaarɛ wu tɔ naa weɓe, gnvɔ shàa wu dɔli. Shong zang nɛɛ zang daa nyɔkɔ wujɛ varɛ nandon ɓɔɔ saa ɓarɛ ɓa ziti gn kpang ɓɛɛ vɔrɔ, ka gari Bɛtalami nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ kiiri Bɛtalami nyaa naabm. Hiridu palɛ nɔngkɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ wu tãa nyaa diki ɓɔɔ sang nwang nyaating shɔɔnang ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri zili sang ɓɛɛ.
40002017	Vuu keɓe nwang, ka naa vuu ɓɔɔ Irimiya zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Irimiya kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
40002018	“Zang tãa nyaa vaa ka Rama. Rahila kaa nyaa vɔ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ vɔlɔ ɓɛɛ. Kasɛ nɛɛ zang bakɛ wu kpang.”
40002019	Hiridu naa vɔ tɔ, a zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa naa nwang nyaa ka Yusufu tɔkn, ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang ka Masar,
40002020	a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Seepaa ta mɔɔ tuu jaa nɛɛ niiɓɛ, mɔɔ daa nɔng tipi Isirela. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kãa yuu jaa keɓe nyɔnang, ri vɔlɔ tɔ.”
40002021	A Yusufu seepaa tuu jaa kaa nɛɛ niiɓɛ, daa kaa nɔng tipi Isirela.
40002022	Ɓɔɔ Yusufu naa tãa nyaa tɔɔ, Akeliyu jaa Hiridu kɔ roo kpanti ka nyaa tipi Yahudiya ka nɔng diiɓɛ, a kaa vɔrɔ Yahudiya daanang kati. Kpanti Laa ti naa kɔɔ wu ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang, nɛɛ wu daa ka tipi Galili.
40002023	A Yusufu daa nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Nazara ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe nwang ka naa ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang naa ɓaa wu nɛɛ yɔɔ Nazara.”
40003001	Ka diki kaɓa, Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima rǎng zang yee Laa ka waala Yahudiya, diki diki.
40003002	Kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ ta, n'ɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti roonang Laa a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
40003003	Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa rang yee ka yuu Yɔhana keɓe kɔ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang tãa yee zang ɓɔɔ kagn, rang yee Laa ka yeti waala tɔɔ, Nɔɔ palɛ Kpanti Laa gbalang ta, nɔɔ shiiri katɔ ɓororo.”
40003004	Yɔhana hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ shãngti vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Rakumi ɓɛɛ, a ti mã guruji ka sang ɓiɓɛ. Vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ɓi zɔɔrɔ nɛɛ mii warɛ.
40003005	A zang Urushalima nɛɛ zang Yahudiya, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka tipi ɓɔɔ ka nyaa rang Urudung dɔli, ri alɛ ka bii Yɔhana.
40003006	Ri kɔɔrɔ Laa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, a Yɔhana palɛ ri batizima ka mii rang Urudung.
40003007	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Yɔhana zi zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang Sadukiyawa, ɓɔɔ ri alɛ̀ gaagaa nɛɛ wu naa pàlɛ̀ ri batizima hn ɓɛɛ, hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Rɛɛ pudi keɓe, ɓu wi kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ y'uu jìng dannang ɓɔ̀'ɔ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ a kana naabm wiya?
40003008	Nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ tɔ, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang tɔ ɓɛɛ.
40003009	“N'ɔɔ shing danggn manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ naa wɔ jìng dannang kaɓa katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ Ibirayi ɓɛɛ kpang. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, Kpanti Laa zunung ɓɔɔ wu nwàngs'ɛ Ibirayi jaa nɛɛ tari kɔ ka tipi ɓee katɔ.
40003010	Kãntang keɓe, zang ɓ'aa nyaa kãasãng tɔ ka dimbang laa, laa piti ɓɔɔ ra jaa tɔ̃ɔ kpang, zang dɔngnɛ zang tasɛ ka yeti waa.
40003011	“N pàl'ɛ nɔɔ batizima m nɛɛ mii, ka ruu yeti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ a ka knti mɛɛ, ɓ'a m bannang katɔ, n daa naa ɓɔɔ n tu koodoo ɓiɓɛ kpang. Wukɔ naa palɛ nɔɔ batizima nɛɛ Suru Laa nɛɛ waa.
40003012	Vuu ɓɔɔ wu h'ãlɛ̀ vuu nɔng, kagn naa ɓiɓɛ, naa kòor'o dadong ɓiɓɛ ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu kpalɛ jìng vuu ɓiɓɛ ka bɔ̃nɔ, wu yaa gãrɛ ɓiɓɛ, wu dɔɔ nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40003013	Ka diki kaɓa, Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ Galili, a ka rang Urudung, nɛɛ Yɔhana wu naa palɛ wu batizima.
40003014	A Yɔhana kasɛ nɛɛ wu pàlɛ̀ Yeesɔ batizima kaa takpang. A hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ nɛɛ pàl'ɛ m batizima jong, mɔɔ nɛɛ nkɔ n pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ jong ya?”
40003015	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Pàlɛ̀ m gbã̀'agbãa, tɔ̀ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi, wu ɓee nyaa kati.” A Yɔhana naa kasɛ, palɛ Yeesɔ batizima kati.
40003016	Ɓɔɔ Yɔhana pàlɛ̀ wu batizima hn, Yeesɔ nwang kaa nɛɛ mii, a lapa tantɛ kaa puunang, a zi Suru Laa shooro kaa naa koro, naa nw'ang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
40003017	Ri ti tãa yee nɛɛ lapa tɔɔ, “Wee jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ wu gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
40004001	A Suru Laa t'uu Yeesɔ daa nɔng ka jìngti nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, Sheetang wu daa gãsɛ wu.
40004002	Yeesɔ seng nyaalaa tɔ ka jìngti diki laa ziti, a nyɔkɔ naa nyɔ wu kati.
40004003	A Sheetang arɛ naa gãsɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Jaa Kpanti Laa, risi tari keɓe ta, ri rì borodi.”
40004004	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu vuu shaanang kɔ lusu shɔnzang yuu gbete kpang, ɓi yee piti ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ kɔ lusu zang yuu.”
40004005	A Sheetang t'uu Yeesɔ daa nɛɛ wu ka Urushalima, a daa shing wu ka sɔ̃ngsɔ̃ng yuu Gãa Laa.
40004006	A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Jaa Kpanti Laa, shɛ̃ɛ ta ka tipi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, Laa kɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ruu ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ, ri naa ta mɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ ka gbalang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔ doo ɓaaɓɛ ka tari ɓɛɛ.”
40004007	A Yeesɔ ti kasɛ Sheetang nyaa tɔkn tɔɔ, “Ruu Kpanti Laa ti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu gãsɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti zang ɓɛɛ kpang.’”
40004008	A Sheetang tuu wu tɔkn daa nɛɛ wu ka yuu kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ beebang ɓɛɛ, a tusu wu koolaa ɓɔɔ ka bm bm nandon, nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ kagn piti.
40004009	A kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Naa mɔɔ tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng mɛɛ, mɔɔ dɔɔ m, n a mɔɔ veɓe katɔ nandon.”
40004010	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Daa nɛɛ kaaɓa, m'ɔɔ yàa m bii Sheetang. Ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Shɔnzang wu dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ wu ti bang wukɔ gbete.’”
40004011	A Sheetang daayi, yaa Yeesɔ kati. Zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ri arɛ, ri naa a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
40004012	Yeesɔ naa tãa nyaa tɔɔ, zang loo Yɔhana tɔ ka sãa a naa yupaa daa ka Galili.
40004013	Yaa Nazara, a daa nwang ka Kafanahu ɓɔɔ ka nyaa mii waapo ɓɔɔ ka tipi Zebuluna nɛɛ Nafitali ɓɛɛ.
40004014	Vuu keɓe, nwang ka naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ Ishaya ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Ishaya kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
40004015	“Zang tipi Zebuluna nɛɛ tipi Nafitali ɓɔɔ ka gbalang mii waapo ɓɔɔ zang ta rang Urudung ka dang ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ zang tipi Galili, ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.
40004016	Zang keɓe piti ri nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, a ri zi nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ bang tɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa vɔrɔ vɔrɔ diki diki, nɔng yakɛnang nwang nyaa tɔ ka ri.”
40004017	A Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung yee Laa rannang ka diki kaɓa kɔ. Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ ta, n'ɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kagn a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
40004018	Yeesɔ rakɛ kana ka nyaa mii waapo Galili, a zi zang ziti, Siman ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Anduru. Ri yi jaazìi nɛɛ jang ka mii waapo, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓarɛ zang jaazìi yinang ɓɛɛ.
40004019	A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dũng m ta, 'n tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa m zang nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
40004020	A ri yaa jang jaazìi ɓarɛ tantɛnang, ri dũng wu.
40004021	Nɛɛ tɔɔ wu daa ka tìng tɔkɔlɔng, ti zi zang ɓɔɔgn ziti tɔkn nɛɛ daa ɓarɛ. Yakubu nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Yɔhana, a ɓɔɔ daa ɓarɛ Zebedi ka yeti tonsi, ri palɛ jang jaazìi ɓarɛ. A Yeesɔ ɓaa Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana nyaa.
40004022	A ri tantɛ tonsi nɛɛ daa ɓarɛ yaanang ri dũng wu.
40004023	Yeesɔ ra ka tipi Galili nandon, tùs'u zang vuu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa. Ti rang zang yee ka yuu ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa tùs'u zang nɛɛ wukɔ kpanti ɓɛɛ. A ti masɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang yiki ri ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng nandon.
40004024	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyaa Yeesɔ baa nɔng ka tipi Siriya nandon. A zang atɛ wu zang kɔnang ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang ɓarɛ dang ri jìng dɔli ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mã katɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kàa katɔ ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ masɛ ri kaa nandon.
40004025	Zang dɔli ri a ka bii Yeesɔ nɛɛ Galili, nɛɛ Dekapoli, nɛɛ Urushalima, nɛɛ Yahudiya, a ri dũuru Yeesɔ ka knti nɛɛ zang nyaa rang Urudung ɓɔɔ dang ɓɛɛ nandon.
40005001	Yeesɔ zi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa, a vang kɔpɔ, daa nwang ka tipi. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri naa kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
40005002	A gaa ri yuu vuu tusunang kati, tɔɔ,
40005003	“Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi tɔ nɛɛ, vuu Suru Laa ɓi kagn naa ɓarɛ kpang, Laa naa a rikɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta wu, nɛɛ wukɔ kpanti ɓɛɛ.
40005004	Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri k'aa katɔ ɓɛɛ, Kpanti Laa naa àl'ɛ ri miiri ditɔ.
40005005	Tìnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu yuu kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa naa a ri vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, nɛɛ wu a ri ɓɛɛ.
40005006	Tìnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ katɔ gbãnggbãng nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kasɛ nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ gbete ɓɛɛ. Laa naa a ri gbalang ditɔ ri palɛ vuu keɓe.
40005007	Tìnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gn zang kɔng ri katɔ. Gn ɓarɛ naa kɔng Kpanti Laa ditɔ jong.
40005008	Tìnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ. Rikɔ naa zi Kpanti Laa.
40005009	Tìnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang naa ɓaa rikɔ nɛɛ wujɛ Laa.
40005010	Tìnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang dang ri jìng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa naa a rikɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta wu, nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ.
40005011	“Tìnang Tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ, naa zang dãa nɔɔ, zang dang nɔɔ jìng, a zang ti kɔɔ ruu shi kpang nɛɛ see ka yuu manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zang mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
40005012	Nɔɔ dɔɔ bii ta, n'ɔɔ ti tãa tìnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kpanti Laa shing nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn lapa ɓɛɛ. “Zang dàng zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ri a ka tìng manɛ jìng doo nɔngkɔ.
40005013	“Nɔkɔ tãa ka koo keɓe. Naa lanang tãa nɛɛ takpang, zang p'alɛ̀ bɛɛ wu ri tãa tɔkn viya? Zang p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ nɔng kpang. Zang vang ɓi kaatɔ, zang naalɛ nɛɛ doo.
40005014	“Nɔkɔ nɔng yakɛnang ka koo keɓe. Gãa ɓɔɔ zang mãa ka nɔng dɛɛrɛ, waasɛ bii ɓi jong kpang.
40005015	Zang ti mang waa zà'ang sɔɔ ɓi jong, zang zuu nɛɛ gãntang kpang. Zang shing ɓi ka yuu vuu kɔ jong, tɔɔ wu yakɛ zang nɔng kati.
40005016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ manɛ waasɛ̃ ka jìng zang, tɔ̀ɔ ri zi shoonang tɔ̃ɔ manɛ, ri dɔ̀ɔ Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ lapa kati.”
40005017	“N'ɔɔ tɔɔ kpang, nɛɛ n arɛ, nɛɛ n naa kɔ̃sɔ nyaa dannang Musa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔ̀ɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri t'us'u ɓee katɔ kpang. N arɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ n naa shingnɛ ri ɓee nyaa katɔ kɔ jong.
40005018	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, lapa nɛɛ tipi ri nɛɛ doogn, vuu gbete ka teteng rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi naa shaarɛ kpang. Ri naa ɓee nyaa ditɔ nandon.
40005019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, a ti tusu zang naa ɓɔɔ ri ɓa ɓɛɛ jong, wukɔ zang tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. A zang piti ɓɔɔ dũng ruu Laa keɓe, a ti tusu zang naa ri dũng jong, wukɔ zang bang ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa roo ɓɛɛ.
40005020	N kɔɔ nɔɔ naa tɔ̃ɔ manɛ ɓ'a ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang Farisawa kpang, nɔɔ naa nw'ang manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo kpanti ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.”
40005021	“Nɔɔ tãa naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ zang ka tìng tɔ. Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ nyɔ shɔnzang vɔrɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ, zang naa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu katɔ.’
40005022	A kãntang keɓe, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ tuu gnvɔ nɛɛ ɓeezung, zang naa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu katɔ. Naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ti kɔɔ ɓeezung nɛɛ ‘Rang waati keɓe,’ zang daa nɛɛ wu ka dabang kpanti. Naa zang ɓɔɔ ti ɓaa ɓeezung nɛɛ ‘Shoko,’ zang tasɛ wu ka waa.
40005023	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ mɔɔ a Laa vuu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu kagn, a mɔɔ naa kpaa danggn vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ lasɛ ɓaazung yeti nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ,
40005024	yaa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ a Kpanti Laa ka nɔngkɔ ka gbongkarɛ, mɔɔ daa gaa wu, wu yaa mɔɔ gbalang. Tɔɔ mɔɔ gbãayu, mɔɔ naa a Kpanti Laa vuu ɓaaɓɛ kati.
40005025	“Nɔɔ nɛɛ daa nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang, nɔɔ mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓàa mɔɔ nyaavaa pati ka gbalang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa mɔɔ nyaavaa nɛɛ daa tuu mɔɔ wu a zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang, zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang tuu mɔɔ a jaa doo kpanti ri loo mɔɔ ka sãa ɓɛɛ.
40005026	N kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, mɔɔ hàngs'ɛ nyaa saka shunang ka gbongkarɛ nandon tɔ̀ɔ, zang wu naa nwangsɛ mɔɔ.
40005027	“Nɔɔ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ zang tɔ. Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ ɓang bii nɛɛ soro zang ɓɔɔ kpang.’
40005028	A kãntang keɓe n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi zang soro, a suru bii daa wu nɛɛ wu, ɓang bii ɓi tɔ nɛɛ wu ka yeti ɓiɓɛ.
40005029	Jìng nakn ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ shing mɔɔ m'ɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang zɔ̃ng ta mɔɔ tasɛ. Nwang nɛɛ jìng dang gbete gbã̀'agbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ bii bang ɓaaɓɛ ka waa dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.
40005030	N'aa nakn ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ ti shing mɔɔ m'ɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, dɔng ta mɔɔ tasɛ. Nwang nɛɛ naa dang gbete kɔ gbã̀'agbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ bii bang ɓaaɓɛ ka waa dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.”
40005031	“Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kɔɔyi tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ hing soro ɓiɓɛ, wu a wu labeenang soro hinnang ka naa.
40005032	A n kɔɔ nɔɔ, naa soro zang roo nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn kpang, a varɛ ɓiɓɛ hing wu, varɛ ɓiɓɛ kɔ shing wu palɛ dũndũng. “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing soro ɓɔɔ zang hing katɔ, p'alɛ̀ ɓi doo dũndũng kɔ.
40005033	“Nɔɔ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ zang ka tìng ɓɛɛ tɔ. Laa tɔɔ, ‘M'ɔɔ tũng vuu nɛɛ sè'e kpang. Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a Kpanti Laa nyaa nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ wu ɓɛɛ katɔ.’
40005034	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ tũng vuu kpang tingkiring. N'ɔɔ ti tũng vuu nɛɛ lapa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ lapa keɓe, wukɔ nɔng nwannang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
40005035	N'ɔɔ ti tũng vuu nɛɛ tipi keɓe kpang kɔ doori, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tipi ɓi nɔng ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa tɛ̃ɛ doo kagn ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ ti tũng vuu nɛɛ Urushalima kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ Gãa bang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
40005036	N'ɔɔ ti tũng vuu nɛɛ yuu manɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zunung naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ risi suuyuu manɛ gbete wu rì puru kɔ vìiri kpang ɓɛɛ.
40005037	Yee ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rang piti wu di nyaa ka, ‘nn’ nɛɛ ‘kpang’ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Yee ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa ‘nn’ nɛɛ ‘kpang’ katɔ, a ɓi kaa nɛɛ bii Sheetang, zang shi kpang.”
40005038	“Nɔɔ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ zang ka tìng ɓɛɛ tɔ. Laa tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu l'ɔngs'ɔ jìng nɛɛ jìng. Zang wu ti l'ɔngs'ɔ tãri nɛɛ tãri kɔ doori.’
40005039	A n kɔɔ nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ lɔngsɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ doori kpang. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang nɛɛ nyɔ mɔɔ ka kashoo ɓɔɔ nakn, mɔɔ raa wu ɓɔɔ nagang jong.
40005040	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa vaa, nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ta fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓaaɓɛ, a wu nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zuu sɔ̀ɔr'ɔ nɛɛ mani piti.
40005041	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ, wu shing mɔɔ nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning, mɔɔ shing wu mɛli gbete, daa nɛɛ wu mɛli ziti.
40005042	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gàa vuu ka naa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ zãa wu kpang. Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ti ta vuu nyaa kɔpɔ ka naa ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ ti a wu.
40005043	“Nɔɔ ti tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ zang ka tìng ɓɛɛ tɔ. Laa tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ kàs'ɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ, n'ɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.’
40005044	A n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang katɔ. Nɔɔ ti gaa Kpanti Laa ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dang nɔɔ jìng ɓɛɛ,
40005045	tɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ nwang wujɛ Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa kati. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa shingnɛ laa ɓiɓɛ wu nwang ka yuu zang shi kpang nɛɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ piti ɓɛɛ. Ti a zang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ zang shi kpang mii lapa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40005046	Naa nɔɔ kàs'ɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu manɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ naa walɛ ɓu vi ka bii Kpanti Laa viya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, ri palɛ wu nɔngkɔ doori kpang ya?
40005047	Naa nɔɔ ti jee rɛɛ ɓaazung kɔ nyaa shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ ɓa rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kpanti Laa kpang, ri palɛ ɓu doo nɔngkɔ kpang ya?
40005048	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ doo naa ɓɔɔ Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa nwang ɓɛɛ kɔ.
40006001	“Nɔɔ gãng jìng ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ manɛ ning. N'ɔɔ p'alɛ̀ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔɔ zang ri zi nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ, Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa naa a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu 'a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ takpang.
40006002	“Mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ mɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang vuu, mɔɔ jèe vuukãng ka gbongkarɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang, ri palɛ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ nyaa gbabang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang dɔɔ ri kati ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang keɓe, ri ta vuu ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ a ri ɓɛɛ tɔ nandon.
40006003	A mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ, mɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang vuu, mɔɔ kàsɛ̀ naa nagang ɓaaɓɛ wu zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa nakn ɓaaɓɛ palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
40006004	Tɔ̀ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ a zang, zang ɓɔɔgn, ri zi kaa takpang. Tɔɔ Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ nwiiri, wu naa a mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ kati.”
40006005	“Nɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ nɔɔ gaa Laa, n'ɔɔ palɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri kasɛ Laa gaanang doo paa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ gbabang ɓee zɔɔ, nɛɛ tɔɔ zang zi ri kati. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang keɓe ri ta vuu ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ a ri tɔ nandon.
40006006	Mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ mɔɔ gaa Laa, tu ka yeti jaka ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ ku nyaa gãa, tɔɔ mɔɔ gaa Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang zi kpang ɓɛɛ. Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ wu naa a mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing mɔɔ kati.
40006007	“Mɔɔ nɛɛ gaa Laa, mɔɔ paasɛ ruu ɓɔɔ daa naa kpang keɓe gbete sasak naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kpanti Laa kpang paasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, Laa tãa ri, ka ruu yee ɓɔɔ ri paasɛ sasak ɓɛɛ.
40006008	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n'ɔɔ palɛ manɛ nɔngkɔ kpang. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gàa tɔɔsung nyaa puunang gn kpang, Daa manɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓi tɔ.
40006009	Nɔɔ gaa Laa naa weɓe: Daa ɓuru ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, zang wu dɔɔ nung tɔ̃ɔ ɓaaɓɛ ta.
40006010	Zang ri zirɛ, nɛɛ mɔkɔ kpanti. Zang ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ka koo keɓe, naa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
40006011	A ruu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lɛɛkɔ jong, lɛɛkɔ.
40006012	M'ɔɔ ti yàa ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ ruu yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
40006013	Mɔɔ yaa Sheetang wu gãsɛ ruu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa kaka ɓuru katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ta ruu ka tɔkɔ jong nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ.
40006014	“Naa nɔɔ yàa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ, Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa naa yà'a nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ doo nɔngkɔ.
40006015	A naa nɔɔ yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang, Daa manɛ yaa nɔɔ ɓɔɔ manɛ doo kpang kɔ.”
40006016	“Nɔɔ nɛɛ seng nyaalaa n'ɔɔ kãngtɛ nyaa tìng naa zang ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri risi nyaa tìng ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ tɔɔ zang zi kati nɛɛ ri seng nyaalaa. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang keɓe ri ta vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ bii zang ɓi tɔ nandon.
40006017	Mɔɔ nɛɛ seng nyaalaa, sɔɔ jìng katɔ, mɔɔ ti tũuru nung ka yuu,
40006018	tɔ̀ɔ ri zi nyaalaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ seng kaa takpang. Tɔɔ Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang zi kpang, wukɔ wu zi gbete. Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ, wu a mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing mɔɔ kati.
40006019	“N'ɔɔ kpalɛ vuu naa manɛ ka koolaa keɓe kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ tù'uru nɛɛ sisaa ri lasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Shɔngɓɔ ri ti lasɛ nyaa gãa, ri daa ɓɔɔyi ɓɛɛ.
40006020	Nɔɔ kp'al'ɛ vuu naa manɛ ka nɔng Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tù'uru nɛɛ sisaa ri lasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Shɔngɓɔ ri ti lasɛ nyaa gãa, ri ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
40006021	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang shing danggn ɓi doo ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kp'alɛ̀ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ kagn kɔ doori ɓɛɛ.
40006022	“Jìng kɔ waa zà'ang sɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii. Jìng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, bii ɓaaɓɛ yakɛ katɔ nandon.
40006023	A jìng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, bii ɓaaɓɛ nandon nwang ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ nwàng ka nɔng yakɛnang, a ɓeekpang mɔɔ doo ka nɔng tɔɔnang, nɔng tɔɔnang kaɓa bang dɔli.
40006024	“Zang gbete pàlɛ̀ zang ziti shoonang ka laa gbete kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ ruu zang gbete wu bɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ gbete. Ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ gbete wu risi ɓɔɔ gbete naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang wu ɓakɛ Laa dũnnang ɓi nɛɛ vuu naa kãanang kpang.
40006025	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu nwannang manɛ dɔli kpang nɛɛ n'ɔɔ walɛ vuu shaanang, nɛɛ mii ɓoonang, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa ka bii manɛ ka niya kpang. Suru bii ɓa vuu shaanang kpang ya? Bii shɔnzang ti ɓa fɔ̃ɔrɔ kpang ya?
40006026	Nɔɔ zi jaaning karɛ, ri ɓaa jìng vuu kpang, ri yee kpang, ri ti kpalɛ vuu ɓarɛ jong ka bɔ̃nɔ kpang, Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, a ri vuu shaanang katɔ. Nɔɔ ɓa jaaning kpang ya?
40006027	Zang gbete ɓu wi ka teteng manɛ, zunung diki gbete gisinang katɔ ka yuu diki nwannang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓiɓɛ wiya?
40006028	“A nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ naa ɓɔɔ mangwaa vuu ri bangkɛ ka waala ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ shoonang kpang, ri ti s'ee yuu ɓarɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ bii kpang.
40006029	N kɔɔ nɔɔ, kpanti Sulemanu nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shili katɔ nandon, shirɛ daa doo ɓarɛ gbete kpang.
40006030	Mangwaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi lɛɛkɔ, ɓuru waatɛ kaa tɔ, zang tasɛ ka waa ɓɛɛ. Kpanti Laa nɛɛ pàl'ɛ ri shinang katɔ naa weɓe, pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓa ri katɔ manɛ kpang ya? Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing gn ka bii Kpanti Laa rɛ̃rɛkɛ ɓɛɛ.
40006031	“N'ɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ, nɔɔ walɛ vuu shaanang ka niya, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓooyi, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãlɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
40006032	Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang kɔ, ri shing jìng ka vuu keɓe. A Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa zi tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ vuu keɓe katɔ piti.
40006033	Vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe, nɔɔ kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ Laa wukɔ Kpanti, nɔɔ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ, gisi nɔɔ vuu keɓe ditɔ jong nandon.
40006034	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n'ɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu diki ɓɔɔgn kpang. Vuu ɓi ka naa Laa kɔ gbete. Nɔɔ shing jìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ lɛɛkɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, vuu lɛɛkɔ ɓɔɔ kpãa nɔɔ, daa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing jìng ka rikɔ shɛ̃ɛning ɓɛɛ tɔ.
40007001	“N'ɔɔ jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, Kpanti Laa wu ti naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu kaa takpang kɔ doori.
40007002	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu, Kpanti Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ. Waka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã zang vuu nɛɛ mani, Laa naa mã nɔɔ manɛ, doo nɛɛ wukɔ.
40007003	“Ka ruu vi, mɔɔ shing jìng ka zũng laa ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓaazung kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, mɔɔ yee laa ɓ'aà ka laa waa bang ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓaaɓɛ kpang viya?
40007004	Mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓaazung ɓu ka biya, nɛɛ, ‘N kaaɓi n zɔ̃ng mɔɔ zũng laa tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓaaɓɛ,’ a mɔɔ yaa lawaa ɓɔɔ bang ka jìng ɓaaɓɛ, ka nɔngkɔ viya?
40007005	Mɔkɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓi, z'ɔ̃ng lawaa bang, ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓaaɓɛ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ zi nɔng kaa tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ sha zũng laa ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓaazung kati.
40007006	“N'ɔɔ a zaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang a Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri naa raa jìng ri yi nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ ti tàsɛ̀ gãnya vutu jasang palɛnang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ nàal'ɛ nɛɛ doo ɓɛɛ.
40007007	“Nɔɔ gaa ta ka naa Laa, a nɔɔ katɔ. Nɔɔ kãa ta, nɔɔ ti ìi katɔ. Nɔɔ ɓ'aa nyaa ta, Laa kasɛ nɔɔ nyaa katɔ.
40007008	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ gaa vuu ka naa ɓiɓɛ, walɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang piti ɓɔɔ kãayi ti ìi katɔ. Zang piti ɓɔɔ ɓ'aa wu nyaa, kasɛ wu nyaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40007009	“Zang ɓɔɔ naa jaa ɓiɓɛ gàa vuu shaanang ka naa ɓiɓɛ, ka teteng manɛ, tuu tari a wu wiya?
40007010	Naa jaa ɓiɓɛ ti gaa jaazìi, a wu sɔkɔ katɔ wiya?
40007011	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shi kpang, naa nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a wujɛ manɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ katɔ, Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, a zang ɓɔɔ ri gaa wu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang ya?
40007012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang ri palɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ palɛ ri doo nɔngkɔ. Ruu keɓe kɔ, Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri kɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
40007013	“Nɔɔ tu nɛɛ nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ntɔ̃rɔng ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ daa ka nɔng vɔrɔ, bang ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Gbalang ɓɔɔ zang daa nɔng vɔrɔ kaɓa nɛɛ mani, ti kpãa ɓi kpang. “Zang ɓɔɔ ri tu nɛɛ nyaa gãa keɓe dɔli.
40007014	Gbalang ɓɔɔ zang daa nɔng suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ mani, kpãa dɔli, nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ zang daa nɔng ɓi ti tɔ̃ntɔ̃rɔng. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ìi gbalang kaɓa, ri shang kpang.
40007015	“Nɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang see ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ri zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri a ka bii manɛ n'aa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ zang vuu kpang ɓɛɛ, a yeti ɓarɛ nwang naa zaa wusi ɓɔɔ jìng raa ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40007016	Nɔɔ zi ri n'ung ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang h'ã mangoro katɔ ka kɔkɔ gbantang ya? Zang ti hã jaa sìiri katɔ nɛɛ bii daapaajong ya?
40007017	Laa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ra jaa ɓi doo tɔ̃ɔ kɔ. Laa shi kpang, ti ra jaa ɓi doo shi kpang kɔ.
40007018	Laa tɔ̃ɔ, ra jaa shi kpang ɓi jong kpang. A ɓɔɔ shi kpang ti ra jaa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi doo kpang kɔ.
40007019	Laa piti ɓɔɔ ra jaa tɔ̃ɔ kpang, zang dɔngnɛ, zang tasɛ ka waa.
40007020	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ zi ri nung ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
40007021	“Wu zang piti ɓɔɔ ri ɓaarɛ m nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti, Kpanti,’ kɔ naa daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kpang, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ ri daayi.
40007022	Zang dɔli ri naa kɔɔ m ka diki ɓɔɔ, Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti, rùu kɔɔ zang ruu Laa wu nɛɛ nung ɓaaɓɛ kɔ kpang ya? Ruu ti nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ bii zang, a ɓɔɔ shoonang bang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn nɛɛ nung ɓaaɓɛ kɔ kpang ya?’
40007023	A n naa kɔɔ ri m dɔ̃ɔ gbete nɛɛ, ‘N zi nɔɔ m gn, gn kpang. Nɔɔ dita kaaɓa, zang shi kpang kiɓi.’
40007024	“Zang piti ɓɔɔ tãa ruu mɛɛ keɓe, a ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãayi, nwang naa zang zũnang ɓɔɔ mãa gãa ɓiɓɛ ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɛɛ.
40007025	Mii naa arɛ, kpaa gaagaa, a jasung ti naa rarɛ, zìiti gãa, zìiti gãa, gãa ɓiɓɛ watɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, loo doo ɓiɓɛ ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɛɛ.
40007026	A shɔnzang ɓɔɔ tãa ruu mɛɛ keɓe, a palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãa kpang, nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ zũng kpang ɓɔɔ mãa gãa ɓiɓɛ ka yuu seseele ɓɛɛ.
40007027	Mii naa arɛ, kpaa gaagaa, jasung ti naa rarɛ, zìiti gãa, zìiti gãa, gãa ɓiɓɛ ji gbusuk jinang ɓiɓɛ shing baabi dɔli.”
40007028	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa ruu keɓe kɔɔnang tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu tusunang ɓiɓɛ.
40007029	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tusu zang vuu naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu naa ɓɛɛ. Wu n'aa ɓɔ̀'ɔ, zang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ tusu ri labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.
40008001	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ naa shooro tɔ nɛɛ kɔpɔ, a zang dɔli ri dũuru wu ka knti.
40008002	A zang ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa katɔ, arɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ katɔ mɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ masɛ m katɔ.”
40008003	A Yeesɔ dìi naa, lee zang vuu bii kati. A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kas`'ɛ tɔ, vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ wu waa nyaa ta.” A vuu bii yàa yɔɔ nɔng kaa tantɛnang.
40008004	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Daayi, m'ɔɔ daa tusu zang ɓɔɔ d'ɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, bii ɓaaɓɛ. Mɔɔ ti dɔ̀ɔ Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɔɔ Musa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri zi kagn, nɛɛ vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ waa nyaa tɔ.”
40008005	Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛ Kafanahu tɔ, a yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ Yeesɔ wu yi wu naa jong bii.
40008006	A kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, zang shoonang mɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ, roo ka gãa, dang jìng dɔli.”
40008007	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N daa ditɔ, 'n daa masɛ wu.”
40008008	A yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja naa risi nyaa, kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, n daa naa ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tuu doo ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ a ka gãa mɛɛ kpang. Rang yee kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, bii valɛ zang shoonang mɛɛ katɔ.
40008009	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n nwang m ka naa zang ɓɛɛ. A zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri ti kagn naa mɛɛ kɔ doori. Naa n kɔɔ ɓɔɔ gbete, n tɔɔ ‘Dita,’ daa katɔ. Naa n ti kɔɔ ɓɔɔgn, nɛɛ, ‘Arɛ,’ ti a katɔ. Naa n ti kɔɔ zang shoonang mɛɛ, nɛɛ, ‘Palɛ veɓe’, ti palɛ katɔ.”
40008010	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa yee ɓɔɔ yɔɔ rang naa weɓe, mã naa ka danggn. A kɔɔ zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri dũuru wu tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, n zi zang Isirela ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bì'i Kpanti Laa gngn naa zang zanti keɓe kpang.
40008011	N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang zanti dɔli naa a nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɔng, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dii ɓɔɔ laa hãa nyaa kagn, naa nwàng nɛɛ rɛɛ Ibirayi nɛɛ Ishaaku, a ɓɔɔ Yakubu ka nɔng vuu shaanang, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.
40008012	A zang naa nwangsɛ kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn nɛɛ rikɔ naa daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ jong, zang tasɛ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri naa kaayi ri ti shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka, kpaaka ɓɛɛ.”
40008013	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja tɔɔ, “Dita, vuu keɓe nwang ditɔ, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing danggn ka bì'i Laa ɓɛɛ.” A bii valɛ zang shoonang yɔɔ ɓɔɔ roo kɔnang ka gãa ɓɛɛ, kaa tantɛnang ka laa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ rang yee nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
40008014	Yeesɔ naa a ka gãa Bituru, a zi Bituru ɓeekpeng ɓɔɔ yi soro Bituru roo tɔ ka latãng, bii zàa wu katɔ.
40008015	A Yeesɔ lee Bituru ɓeekpeng nɛɛ naa, a bii ɓɔɔ zàa wu, yaa wu nɔng kati. A Bituru ɓeekpeng seepaa, gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu kãa Yeesɔ vuu shaanang kati.
40008016	Ka diki kaɓa nɛɛ laarang, zang 'at'ɛ wu zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ, a nwàngsɛ̀ ri suru shi kpang ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A ti masɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ ri katɔ nandon.
40008017	Vuu kɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓee, ɓee ɓi kaa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Ishaya kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang kaɓa kɔ naa masɛ ruu, wu ti naa see kɔnang ɓuru.”
40008018	Yeesɔ zi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ri ta rang ri daa ka nyaa rang dang.
40008019	A zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa, arɛ naa kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ daa piti, n daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ning.”
40008020	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yeng roonang yaka jìngti kagn, a saara jaaning ti kagn, a nɔng ɓɔɔ naa Jaa Shɔnzang shing yuu ɓiɓɛ kagn, ɓi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ kagn kpang.”
40008021	A zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, yaa m ta, n daa gbãa daa mɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ.”
40008022	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Dũng m ta, mɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ Suru Laa gn kpang ka nɔngkɔ, ri gbãa zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ.”
40008023	Yeesɔ vang tɔ ka yeti tonsi, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, naa vang kaa jong nɛɛ wu.
40008024	Ri daa kana, a jasung bang naa seepaa rannang ka yuu waapo. A mii ɓɔɔ gɔnsɔ zɔɔ, kpalɛ ka bii tonsi. Tonsi nɛɛ wu ɔ̃ɔ katɔ. A Yeesɔ roo ɓi kaatɔ.
40008025	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri hingsi wu, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ta rùu jong Kpanti, rùu ɔ̃ɔ kana.”
40008026	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang kɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa rɛ̃rɛkɛ ɓee, nɔɔ k'aa vɔrɔ vi nɔngkɔ viya?” A seepaa mangkɛ jasung nɛɛ mii ɓɔɔ gɔnsɔ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a ri kàa kati.
40008027	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri mã naa ka danggn, ri tɔɔ, “Ɓi lɛɛ zang viya, jasung nɛɛ mii ɓɔɔ gɔnsɔ zɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɔngkɔ viya?”
40008028	Yeesɔ ta rang tɔ ka dang ka tipi zang Ganasara, a zang ziti ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ, a ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nɔng yusaa ɓɔɔ zang gb'ãlɛ̀ vɔrɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri raa jìng dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, shɔnzang gbete ɓɔɔ tɛɛ gbalang kaɓa kpang.
40008029	Ri sãa nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “R'uu ɓaaɓɛ hãa kagn nɛɛ rùu ya, Jaa Laa? Diki a gn kpang, mɔɔ arɛ, nɛɛ mɔɔ naa dang ruu jìng kaa naa talang ya?”
40008030	Ka laa kaɓa, gãnya ɓɔɔ ri shaa kagn nɔngkɔ nɛɛ dalɛ kà'a gaagaa.
40008031	A suru shi kpang ri gàa Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ mɔɔ nwangsɛ ruu katɔ, hing ruu ta, ruu daa ka bii gãnya kɔ ri shaa ɓa.”
40008032	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita.” A ri nwangkɛ, ri daa hãlɛ nyaa ka bii gãnya ɓɔɔ ri shaa ka dalɛ ɓɛɛ. A gãnya kɔ gaagaa ɓa, yuku nɛɛ nyaa gãnggãng kɔ soo nyaa katɔ ɓa, a ri daa ɔ̃ɔrɔ ka yeti mii waapo nandon, ri vɔlɔ kati.
40008033	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shaa gãnya, ri yuku, ri daa ka gari, ri daa kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ gãnya, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ nandon.
40008034	A zang gari ri nwangkɛ nandon, ri daa ka bii Yeesɔ. Ri daa zi wu tɔ, a ri bakɛ wu ri tɔɔ, “Dita, mɔɔ yaa ruu tipi ɓuru.”
40009001	Yeesɔ vang tonsi, a ta rang a ka gari ɓiɓɛ.
40009002	A zang atɛ wu, zang ɓɔɔ bii ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, zang ta ka laa. Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa ri shing danggn ka bii Kpanti Laa, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ bii ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ tɔɔ, “Jaa mɛɛ, m'ɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ kpang. N yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.”
40009003	A zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, rangkɛ kana naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe, rangkɛ ruu shi kpang ka yuu Kpanti Laa.”
40009004	Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ vuu shi kpang vi ka yeti manɛ nɔngkɔ viya?
40009005	Ɓɔɔ kpãa kpang ka teteng yee keɓe kiya? Ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ,’ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Seepaa ta, mɔɔ rarɛ wiya?’
40009006	N m'asɛ̀ yɔɔ keɓe ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zi kati nɛɛ, zang a Jaa Shɔnzang naa tɔ, ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ wu yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ.” A Yeesɔ kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ nɛɛ, “Seepaa ta, mɔɔ tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ta mɔɔ kagn, mɔɔ daa gãa.”
40009007	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ, seepaa a tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ta wu kagn daa gãa ɓiɓɛ kati.
40009008	Zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri zi naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri dɔɔ Kpanti Laa kati. Kaa ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ a zang naa vuu keɓe palɛnang ɓɛɛ.
40009009	Yeesɔ seepaa tɔ, daa kana gbalang, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Matiyu nwang tɔ ki yeti jaka saka tipi tanang. A Yeesɔ ɓaa wu nyaa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dũng m ta.” A Matiyu seepaa dũng Yeesɔ Kati.
40009010	Yeesɔ daa nwang tɔ ka nɔng vuu shaanang ka gãa Matiyu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang kpang ɓɛɛ, ri naa nwang nɛɛ wu.
40009011	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa ri zi naa weɓe, ri hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Maalang manɛ shaa vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang kpang ka ruu viya?”
40009012	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa naa weɓe, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔng ri kpang, ri daa bii zang ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang kɔnang ɓi kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔng ri katɔ kɔ ri daa shɛ̃ɛning.
40009013	Nɔɔ kãa dìiri yè'e Laa ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N kasɛ m ruu vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ m kpang, n kasɛ nɛɛ gn zɔɔ wu kɔng nɔɔ katɔ kɔ jong.’ N arɛ, nɛɛ n naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ kpang. N arɛ nɛɛ n naa ɓaa nyaa m ka zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40009014	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana naa arɛ hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Rùu seng nyaalaa nɛɛ zang Farisawa, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri sèng ɓarɛ kpang ka ruu viya?”
40009015	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ ɓeesang ri seng nyaalaa ka diki ɓɔɔ, sinyɛ ɓeevɛ dɔɔ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ yaa? Diki ɓɔɔ zang naa tuu sinyɛ ɓeevɛ kagn a doo naa, tɔɔ ri naa seng nyaalaa kati.
40009016	“Zang lù fɔ̃ɔrɔ gbaala ɓi jong nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, fɔ̃ɔrɔ shɔɔ naa lɔɔsɔ ɓɔɔ gbaala, yaa yeng kaa bang dɔli ɓɛɛ.
40009017	Zang ti tɛ̃ɛ sàa shɔɔ ɓi jong ka yeti zà'ang gbaala ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ koo ɓɛɛ kpang. N'aa zang tɛ̃ɛyi, sãa zà'ang katɔ. Sàa ti tɛ̃ɛ ɓi ka tipi. A naa zang tɛ̃ɛ sàa ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ka zà'ang ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kɔ doori, zà'ang lasɛ kpang, saa ti tɛ̃̀ɛ ka tipi kpang.”
40009018	Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa ka nyaa nɛɛ ri, yɔɔ zang bang Yahudawa arɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng ɓiɓɛ. A kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ soro kɔng vɔrɔ doo kãntang, arɛ mɔɔ daa ìi wu naa ɓaaɓɛ jong ka bii, tɔɔ wu gãntɛ jìng kati.”
40009019	A Yeesɔ seepaa, daa kaa nɛɛ wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
40009020	Yeesɔ daa kana gbalang, a jaa soro ɓɔɔ zìi kpaa wu daa s'aa kopi tu ziti, arɛ naa lee naa ka nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ knti.
40009021	Kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Naa n lee naa ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, kɔnang mɛɛ, waa nyaa katɔ.”
40009022	A Yeesɔ raa jìng kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ yaa danggn naa kpang man jaa, danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii Kpanti Laa masɛ mɔɔ tɔ.” A kɔnang yaa jaa soro bii kaa tantɛnang ka làa kaɓa.
40009023	Yeesɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ gãa yɔɔ zang bang tɔ, a zi zang ɓɔɔ ri jee leere nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyavɔ ri gòor'o nyaa kana.
40009024	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nwang ta ka biling. Jaa keɓe vɔ ɓi ka takpang, roo ɓi katɔ waati.” Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri laarɛ wu.
40009025	Zang nwangsɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng vɔrɔ tɔ ka biling nandon, a Yeesɔ daa ka yeti gãa, daa yi jaa ka naa, a jaa yupaa kati.
40009026	Nyaa vuu kɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓee, baa tipi kaɓa ka nandon.
40009027	Yeesɔ seepaa tɔ, daa kana gbalang, a zang jìng ringtang ziti ri dũuru wu ka knti. Ri ti mɛɛrɛ nyaa kana nɛɛ, “Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda gn ɓuru wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
40009028	A Yeesɔ naa hãa nyaa ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔgn, a ri naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi tɔ ka yeti manɛ, nɛɛ n zunung vuu keɓe palɛnang katɔ ya?” A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “M, rùu zi tɔ, mɔɔ zunung katɔ Kpanti.”
40009029	A Yeesɔ lee naa ka jìng ɓarɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Wu nwang ta ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ɓɛɛ.”
40009030	A jìng ɓarɛ ɓèlè kaa tɔkn. A Yeesɔ shaarɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang.”
40009031	A ri daayi, ri daa kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓiɓɛ ka tipi kaɓa nandon.
40009032	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ, ri seepaa daanang tɔ, a zang atɛ Yeesɔ zang nyaa nɔɔ katɔ, ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kati.
40009033	Yeesɔ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang tɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ naa rang yee kati. Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ ri zi naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe gngn ka tipi Isirela kpang.”
40009034	A zang Farisawa ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ɓi doo nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ kpanti suru shi kpang a wu kɔ.”
40009035	A Yeesɔ daarɛ ka gari bang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng piti. Tusu zang vuu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang Yahudawa, a ti rang zang ruu tɔ̃ɔ kpanti roonang Laa. A masɛ zɔ̃ng kɔnang ɓɔɔ yiki zang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ri nandon.
40009036	Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang nimbang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a gn ɓarɛ kɔng wu, ka ruu jìng ɓɔɔ ri dang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ yi ri naa ka bii kpang. Ri nwang naa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ jagang ɓarɛ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
40009037	A raa jìng kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Zee zũng tɔ dɔli, a zang yeenang ri haa kaa takpang.
40009038	Nɔɔ gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang jaa ɓɛɛ ta, wu shong zang zee yeenang ka jaa ɓiɓɛ.”
40010001	A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri kopi tu ziti ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri arɛ. A 'a ri naa suru shi kpang nwangsɛnang, nɛɛ zɔ̃ng kɔnang piti masɛnang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ zang ka bii nandon.
40010002	Zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shong ri, zang ɓaa nung ɓarɛ nɛɛ, Siman ɓɔɔ zang ti ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ tìng shɔɔnang, nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Anduru, a ɓɔɔ Yakubu jaa Zebedi nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Yɔhana,
40010003	nɛɛ Filibu, nɛɛ Baatolomi, nɛɛ Tooma, nɛɛ Matiyu ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ Yakubu jaa Alifaya, nɛɛ Tadayu,
40010004	nɛɛ Siman ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ tipi ɓarɛ wu gbãayu nɛɛ knti kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ Yahuda Isikariyoti ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ, ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu Yeesɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
40010005	A Yeesɔ shong zang kopi tu ziti keɓe kati. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ daa ka nɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. N'ɔɔ ti daa gari zang Samariya gbete kpang.
40010006	Nɔɔ daa ka bii zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri ning gbalang katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
40010007	Nɔɔ nɛɛ daa kana, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu Laa nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti roonang Laa a naabm tɔ.’
40010008	N'ɔɔ ti masɛ zang kɔnang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa ri katɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ ti wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔ katɔ paa. N'ɔɔ ti nwangsɛ suru shi kpang. Nɔɔ tà waati, nɔɔ 'a zang doo waati kɔ.
40010009	N'ɔɔ daa nɛɛ saka ka baajaa kpang.
40010010	N'ɔɔ ti tuu duku nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ nɛɛ koodoo, a ɓɔɔ labalang ka naa kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang sɔ̀ɔr'ɔ zang shoonang doo ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40010011	“Gari bang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa kagn piti, nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ nɔng shɔnzang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ daa nwang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔ̃sɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn ɓɛɛ wu a nɛɛ mani.
40010012	Nɔɔ nɛɛ daa kana yeti gãa, nɔɔ jee zang nyaa nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ nw'ang tɔ̃ɔ.’
40010013	Zang gãa ri nɛɛ ta nɔɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete, naa nw'ang ditɔ nɔngkɔ. A zang gãa nɛɛ ta nɔɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete kpang, naa nw'ang nɔngkɔ kpang.
40010014	Zang gãa nɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rang piti, nɔɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃sɔ kaa gari ɓɔɔgn, nɔɔ waa zũng tapuru ɓɔɔ ka doo manɛ. (nɔɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, Ruu ɓuru hãa ɓi tɔɔgn nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang, tɔɔ nɔɔ daayi.)
40010015	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, jìng dannang ɓarɛ naa ɓa ɓɔɔ zang gari Sɔɔdom nɛɛ Gomora katɔ.
40010016	“Kãntang keɓe, n shong nɔɔ naa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ka teteng zaa wusi. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ zũng katɔ naa sɔkɔ, a ɓɔɔ naa koro ɓɔɔ palɛ zang vuu ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.
40010017	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang naa yi nɔɔ ditɔ, zang daa nɛɛ nɔɔ ka tìng zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, ri ti naa nyɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ gbãa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓarɛ.
40010018	Zang ti naa gɔ̃ nɔɔ, zang daa nɔng ka tìng rɛɛ gɔmna nɛɛ rɛɛ Kpanti, ka ruu mɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti naa rǎng ri yee Laa ditɔ nɛɛ zang ɓarɛ nandon.
40010019	Zang nɛɛ daa tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa kasɛ zang nyaa, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kpanti Laa naa a nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ditɔ ka laa kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
40010020	Nɔkɔ daa rang yee kpang, ɓi Suru Daa manɛ kɔ daa rang nɛɛ nyaa manɛ.
40010021	“Shɔnzang ti naa a zang ɓeezung ditɔ, zang nyɔ vɔrɔ. Daa jaa ti naa a zang jaa ɓiɓɛ ditɔ zang nyɔ vɔrɔ. Wujɛ ri ti naa sh'ii varɛ ditɔ nɛɛ daa ɓarɛ, ri ti a zang daa ɓarɛ, zang nyɔ vɔrɔ.
40010022	Zang piti ri naa bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ditɔ, ka ruu nung mɛɛ. Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ mã danggn sasak, wukɔ naa wɔrɛ.
40010023	Zang nɛɛ dang nɔɔ jìng kana ka gari gbete, nɔɔ yurɛ n'ɔɔ daa ka gari ɓɔɔgn. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani Jaa Shɔnzang naa arɛ, bɛɛ nɔɔ hangsɛ nyaa shoonang manɛ palɛnang gn gari zang Yahudawa nandon kpang.
40010024	“Zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu, ɓa zang ɓɔɔ tusu wu vuu kpang. Zang shoonang ti ɓa dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ kpang.
40010025	A zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii zang, nɛɛ nwàng naa zang ɓɔɔ tusu wu vuu, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zang shoonang nɛɛ ti nw'ang tɔ naa dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Naa zang ɓàa zang bang gãa nɛɛ Bahazabu, kpanti suru shi kpang, zang naa ɓ'aa zang ɓɔɔ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ ɓi ka biya? (Ɓɔ̀'ɔ ɓarɛ naa ɓ'a ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓi katɔ.)
40010026	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ɓarɛ kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, a zang màkɛ̀ piti, Laa naa nwangsɛ ditɔ. Ruu ɓɔɔ zang ti kɔɔ nɛɛ nwiiri, zang naa tãa ditɔ nandon.
40010027	Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nwiiri, nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa nwangsɛ ka dalɛ. Ɓɔɔ n ti ɓɔɔlɔ nɔɔ nyaa katɔ, nɔɔ ti daa v'ang ka yuu gãa nɔɔ kɔɔ zang.
40010028	N'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ gãmpãng bii, a ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ suru bii kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ Kaa vɔrɔ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ nyɔ gãmpãng bii nɛɛ suru bii piti, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ waa ning ɓi jong kpang ɓɛɛ.
40010029	Zang màl'ɛ jaaning tɔkɔsisi wu ziti kɔpɔ gbete kpang ya? A naa Daa manɛ nɛɛ kasɛ katɔ kpang ɓɔɔ vɔ kagn ka teteng ɓarɛ gbete kpang.
40010030	Nɔɔ zi ta, Laa gã̀ suuyuu manɛ kɔ ka yuu ɓee, ɓi katɔ nandon.
40010031	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓa tɔkɔsisi ɓɔɔ dɔli katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40010032	“Naa zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ka tìng zang nɛɛ wu zang mɛɛ, n ti naa kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ ka tìng daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ wu zang mɛɛ.
40010033	A naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ laa nyaa mɛɛ ka nɔng zang, n ti naa laa nyaa ɓiɓɛ doo nɔngkɔ ka tìng Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.”
40010034	“N'ɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ n arɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ nwang ka nɛɛ zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka koo keɓe kpang. N à m zang basɛnang kɔ jong.
40010035	N arɛ, nɛɛ n naa, kpaa m yuu daa jaa kɔ jong nɛɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ, zang soro nɛɛ niiɓɛ. 'N ti kpaa shɔngkpeng ɓɔɔ soro yuu nɛɛ ɓeekpeng ɓɔɔ soro.
40010036	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti gãa zang, rikɔ naa raa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ wu kpang kaa jong.
40010037	“Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu diiɓɛ, kɔ niiɓɛ, ɓ'a ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ m katɔ, daa naa ɓɔɔ wu dũng m kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti kasɛ ruu jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ kɔ ɓɔɔ soro, ɓ'a ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ m, daa naa ɓɔɔ wu dũng m kpang.
40010038	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu dang jìng ka ruu mɛɛ kpang, daa naa ɓɔɔ wu dũng m kpang.
40010039	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu suru bii ɓiɓɛ, walɛ ɓi kpang. A zang ɓɔɔ malɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu nung mɛɛ, wukɔ naa wàl'ɛ jong.”
40010040	“Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ tà nɔɔ, ri ta ɓi nkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tà m, ta ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.
40010041	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta zang nyaa shoonang Làa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Laa, ti naa ta ɓi doo vuu ɓɔɔ Laa shing zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta zang tɔ̃ɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, ti naa ta ɓi doo vuu ɓɔɔ Laa shing zang tɔ̃ɔ kɔ.
40010042	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang piti ɓɔɔ a jaa gbete ka teteng wujɛ seseere keɓe mii valabm, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jaa keɓe mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ, zang kaɓa naa ta vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa shing wu ɓɛɛ katɔ.”
40011001	Yeesɔ hangsɛ zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ yee rannang tɔ, a seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, a daa ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili. Tusu zang vuu a ti rang zang yee Laa.
40011002	Yɔhana ɓɔɔ zang mã wu ka sãa, tãa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Kirisi palɛ, a shong zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka bii Yeesɔ,
40011003	nɛɛ ri daa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Ɓu mɔkɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ya, kɔ ruu gãng jìng ka zang ɓɔɔgn ya?”
40011004	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gbãayu ta, n'ɔɔ daa kɔɔ Yɔhana vuu kɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓee, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti zi ɓɛɛ.
40011005	Zang jìng ringtang ri zi nɔng kana, zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ ri ti ra kana, a kɔnang zang vuu bii ti yaa ri nɔng kana. Zang ɓɔɔ shoo gbooto ri ti tãa nɔng kana, n ti wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ ɓɛɛ paa kana. Zang ti rǎng zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang yee tɔ̃ɔ Laa kana.
40011006	Tìnang tãanang, ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ yaa danggn naa, ka ruu mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40011007	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana naa seepaa daanang tɔ, a Yeesɔ naa kɔɔ zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ruu Yɔhana kati. Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dàa ɓu vi zinang ka jìngti viya? Lagaa ɓɔɔ jasung zìiti ɓɛɛ ya?
40011008	Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, nɔɔ daa vi zinang viya? Nɔɔ daa zang ɓɔɔ hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ zinang ya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri nwalɛ ɓarɛ ka gãa rɛɛ kpanti.
40011009	A nɔɔ daa ɓu vi zinang viya? Nɔɔ daa ka ruu zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa zinang ya? N'ɔngkɔ̀, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔ, ti ɓa zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓi katɔ.
40011010	Wee yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang bee ruu ɓiɓɛ ka labeenang Laa kɔ. Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N shong zang shoonang mɛɛ ditɔ ka tìng ɓaaɓɛ, wu palɛ mɔɔ gbalang.’
40011011	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, ka teteng shɔnzang ɓɔɔ zang yiki ka koo keɓe, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima kagn kpang. A zang tɔkɔlɔng piti, ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti ɓa wu bannang katɔ.”
40011012	Zang yeti shi kpang gaa tɔɔsung Kpanti roonang Laa lasɛnang nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima rang yee Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri ti kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri ta ɓɛɛ doo kana kɔ sasak.
40011013	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa piti, nɛɛ Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, ri kɔɔ ruu Kpanti roonang Laa sasak, a à nɔng ka bii Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ.
40011014	Nɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu keɓe tanang katɔ, Yɔhana kɔ Iliya ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ naa a ɓɛɛ.
40011015	Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu tãayi.
40011016	“N gãsɛ zang koo jaa knti keɓe, ɓu nɛɛ viya? Ri nwang naa wujɛ ɓɔɔ tãa shoo kpang, ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka kasuwa, ri ɓa nyaa ka rɛɛ ɓeesang pìirinang ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
40011017	‘Rùu jee nɔɔ leere, a nɔɔ sɔ̀ dang kpang. Ruu ti ɓàa nyaavaa nɔɔ ti kaa nyavɔ kpang.’
40011018	Yɔhana arɛ seng nyaalaa, ɓoo sàa kpang, a zang tɔɔ, ‘Suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ.’
40011019	Jaa Shɔnzang àrɛ, shaa katɔ, ti ɓoo katɔ. Zang ti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ zi zang nyɔkɔ keɓe, zang ɓɔɔ ɓoo saa dɔli. Wusang zang saka tipi tanang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang kpang kɔ doori ɓɛɛ.’ Zũnang Laa tusu bii ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ shɔnzang palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
40011020	A Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung zang gari ɓɔɔ wu palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔli mangkɛnang kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
40011021	“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang gari Korazing nɛɛ Bɛsɛda. Naa vuu bang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn kɔ zang palɛ ka teteng manɛ ɓee, zang nɛɛ palɛ nɔngkɔ ka Taya nɛɛ Sidong, zang ɓarɛ nɛɛ kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ, ri nɛɛ yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ. Ri nɛɛ ti hãa sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ yeti lasɛnang tɔ. Ri nɛɛ ti tɛ̃ɛ pũngku tɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
40011022	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, gn zang Taya nɛɛ Sidong naa kɔng wu ɓa ɓɔɔ manɛ katɔ.
40011023	A ɓɔɔ manɛ, zang Kafanahu, zang naa tuu nɔɔ ditɔ ka lapa ya? Kpang. Zang naa tasɛ nɔɔ ka yeti waa bang kɔ jong. Zang nɛɛ palɛ vuu bang kɔ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓee, ka Sidong, zang Sidong ri nɛɛ doogn diki keɓe.
40011024	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, gn zang Sidong naa kɔng wu ɓa ɓɔɔ manɛ katɔ.”
40011025	Ka laa kaɓa, Yeesɔ naa risi nyaa gàa Laa tɔɔ, “N zãa mɔɔ tɔ Dada, Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ mãa lapa nɛɛ tipi ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ wàasɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang dɔli vuu keɓe, a mɔɔ naa tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang kɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
40011026	Nɔngkɔ Dada, mɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ kasɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.”
40011027	A Yeesɔ naa risi nyaa, kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ, a m vuu piti tɔ ka naa. Zang ɓɔɔ zi m Jaa Laa, kagn gbete kpang, ɓi Daa mɛɛ kɔ gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zi Daa mɛɛ kagn gbete kpang, ɓi nkɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ n zirɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɛɛ n tusu ri Daa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
40011028	“Nɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ, zang piti ɓɔɔ dang jìng, a ti rɛ̃rɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, n 'a nɔɔ ɔ̃sɔnang katɔ.
40011029	Nɔɔ yaa m ta n tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n tuu yuu kpang N ti lakɛ jìng kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ wàl'ɛ ɔ̃sɔnang katɔ.
40011030	Ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ n tɔɔ n'ɔɔ palɛ m, kpãa ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ n tɔɔ n'ɔɔ ti tuuyi, ti kpiti ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40012001	Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudawa, Yeesɔ sɔɔ gbalang ɓɔɔ tɛɛ ka yeti jaa zee. Nyɔkɔ nyɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri gaa tɔɔsung yuu zee lɔɔrɔnang, ri shaa kati.
40012002	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa ri zi naa weɓe, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Zirɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ ri palɛ shoonang ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang. Ri ta nyaa dannang tɔ.”
40012003	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Dawuda palɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nyɔ wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu gngn kpang ya?
40012004	Naa ɓɔɔ wu daa ka yeti Gãa Laa, a tuu borodi ɓɔɔ zang dang nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kɔ ri shaa shɛ̃ɛning, a shaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu kpang ya?”
40012005	A Yeesɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã̀ gngn ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa bee ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔ̀'ɔ Laa vuu ri palɛ shoonang ka yeti Gãa Laa, ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudawa kpang ya? A Kpanti Laa ti kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang, kpang.
40012006	N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Gãa Laa bannang katɔ, kagn nihn.
40012007	Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ zi ruu Laa ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N kasɛ m ruu gn shɔnzang kɔnang, wu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ m kpang.’ Nɔɔ nɛɛ dɔng zang tɔ̃ɔ keɓe ruu kpang.
40012008	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang kɔ kpanti diki ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudawa.”
40012009	A Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang Yahudawa.
40012010	A zang ɓɔɔ n'aa ɓiɓɛ ɓakɛ katɔ kagn nɔngkɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri kãa ruu nɛɛ Yeesɔ, hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang wu masɛ zang ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ya?”
40012011	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi ka teteng manɛ, naa mã mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, gbete kɔ nwani, a mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓiɓɛ shi ka yeti too ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang, yaa ka nɔngkɔ, zɔ̃ng kpang wiya?
40012012	Shɔnzang ɓa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ kpang ya? Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang.”
40012013	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ n'aa ɓakɛ katɔ tɔɔ, “Dìi n'aa ɓaaɓɛ ta.” A dìi n'aa ɓiɓɛ, a n'aa ɓiɓɛ nwang tɔ̃ɔ kaa tɔkn naa ɓɔɔ dang gbete.
40012014	A zang Farisawa ri nwangkɛ, ri daa tɔng zɔɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ ri naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
40012015	Yeesɔ zi tɔ naa weɓe, a seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daayi. zang dɔli ri dũuru wu ka knti, a masɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ ri katɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ nandon.
40012016	A shaarɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, ri daa kɔɔ zang nɛɛ wukɔ Jaa Laa kpang.
40012017	Vuu kɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓee, ɓee ɓi kaa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
40012018	“Wee zang shoonang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n zɔ̃ngnɛ, n ti kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ gbãnggbãng kɔ. N a wu suru mɛɛ ditɔ, wu tusu zang doo laa ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe piti, ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kati.
40012019	Naa gàa nyaa ɓi kpang. Ti naa sãlɛ nyaa ɓi kpang. Zang ti naa tãa yee ɓiɓɛ ɓi ka gbalang kpang.
40012020	Ti naa ka lagaa ɓɔɔ lang katɔ kpang. Ti naa ningsi waa zà'ang sɔɔ ɓɔɔ ning kana kpang. Wu ti yi tìng nɛɛ ruu Laa sasak, zang piti ri zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang nɛɛ mani.
40012021	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang naa shing gn ka nung ɓiɓɛ kɔ.”
40012022	A zang naa atɛ wu zang jìng ringtang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓɛɛ, a nyaa ti nɔɔ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ masɛ wu kati. A zang kaɓa gaayu yee rannang kaa nɛɛ nɔng zinang piti.
40012023	Zang piti ri mã naa ka danggn, ri tɔɔ “Zang keɓe ɓu Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda ka ya?”
40012024	Ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa ri tãa naa weɓe, ri tɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ “Yeesɔ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ɓi nɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ Bahazabu Kpanti suru shi kpang a wu ɓɛɛ.”
40012025	Yeesɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓi tɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa zang ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓarɛ gbete ri nɛɛ basɛ zɔɔ, ri shàarɛ̀ ɓarɛ tɔ. Zang gari nɛɛ basɛ zɔɔ tɔ, gari ɓarɛ shàarɛ̀ ɓi tɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gãa gbete nɛɛ basɛ zɔɔ tɔ ri naa nwang ɓi takpang kɔ doori.
40012026	Naa Sheetang nwangsɛ zang ɓiɓɛ, basɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi tɔ. Kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ nwang ɓu kaa biya?
40012027	Naa n nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Bahazabu kpanti suru shi kpang a m, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nɔɔ ri nwangsɛ ɓi kaa nɛɛ naa viya? Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nɔɔ ri palɛ, wukɔ tusu nɔɔ nɛɛ ruu manɛ ɓi nizang kpang.
40012028	A n nɛɛ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ Suru Laa, kpanti roonang Laa a bii manɛ tɔ.
40012029	“Zang daa biya ka gãa zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔli zang see vuu ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, zang mã wu katɔ ka gbongkarɛ kpang viya? Tɔɔ zang see vuu ka gãa ɓiɓɛ kati kpang viya?
40012030	“Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ n kpang, wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ n kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ti kpalɛ vuu nɛɛ n kpang, tantɛ ɓi katɔ jong.
40012031	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, vuu shi kpang nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ shi kpang piti, ɓɔɔ zang rangnɛ, Laa yaa zang gbalang ɓi katɔ. Naa zang rang yee ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka yuu Suru Kpanti Laa, Laa yaa zang gbalang ɓi kpang dondong.
40012032	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti rang yee shi kpang ka yuu Jaa Shɔnzang, Laa yaa wu gbalang ɓi katɔ. Naa zang ɓɔɔ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu suru Laa, Laa yaa wu gbalang ka koo keɓe nɛɛ koo ɓɔɔ naa a ka tìng ɓɛɛ kpang.
40012033	“L'aa nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ti naa ra jaa ɓi doo tɔ̃ɔ kɔ. Laa nɛɛ shi kpang, ti naa ra jaa ɓi doo shi kpang kɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang zi laa nung ɓi ka jaa ɓɔɔ wu ra ɓɛɛ.
40012034	Nɔkɔ shi kpang naa sɔkɔ pudi ɓi, nɔɔ palɛ biya, yee manɛ wu nwang ɓi kaa tɔ̃ɔ viya? Shɔnzang kɔɔ ɓi doo ruu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
40012035	Zang tɔ̃ɔ ti nwangsɛ ɓi doo vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Zang shi kpang ti nwangsɛ ɓi doo vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
40012036	N kɔɔ nɔɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi doo ka ruu yee shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ kɛɛm kɛɛm ɓɛɛ kɔ.
40012037	Laa naa yaa mɔɔ n'aa ɓi doo nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ mɔɔ rang ka koo keɓe kɔ. Laa ti naa dɔng mɔɔ ruu ɓi doo nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ mɔɔ rang ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
40012038	Ka teteng zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, ruu kàsɛ̀ nɛɛ mɔɔ tusu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ.”
40012039	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang yeti shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang ka koo jaa knti keɓe, kasɛ nɛɛ zang tusu ri vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. Zang tusu nɔɔ kpang. Zang tusu nɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang p'al'ɛ ka bii Yunana zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
40012040	Naa ɓɔɔ Yunana nwang ka yeti jaazìi nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zìi diki taati ɓɛɛ. Jaa Shɔnzang naa nw'ang doo nɔngkɔ ka tipi dii, nɛɛ laagɛ̃, nɛɛ zìi diki taati.
40012041	Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, zang Ninivi ri naa kɔɔ zang koo jaa knti keɓe ruu vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Ninivi ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ka diki ɓɔɔ Yunana rang ri yee Laa ɓɛɛ. N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Yunana katɔ, kagn nihn.
40012042	“Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, zang soro ɓɔɔ roo Kpanti ka tipi Sheeba, naa kɔɔ zang koo jaa knti ruu vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, a nɛɛ koolaa ɓɔɔgn kpala kpala, nɛɛ wu naa tãa zũnang kpanti Sulemanu ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa kpanti Sulemanu katɔ, kagn nihn.”
40012043	“Naa zang nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka bii zang tɔ, sɔɔrɔ nɔng ɓɔɔ mii kagn kpang. Kãarɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ wu ɔ̃sɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ìi kpang,
40012044	wu ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘N gbãayu ka gãa gbaala mɛɛ tɔkn.’ Ɓɔɔ wu gbãayu, naa ìi gãa waati, vuu kagn kpang. Zang kooro tɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ a zang ti kpalɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn tɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
40012045	Daayi, daa atɛ suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ ɓa wu shi kpang palɛnang katɔ manziti. A suru shi kpang manziti kaɓa, ri naa turɛ, ri nwang ka yeti zang kaɓa. Nwannang shɔnzang keɓe, naa ɓa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang lasɛnang ɓi kaatɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ zang koo jaa knti keɓe, naa nwang nɔngkɔ.”
40012046	Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a nà'a Yeesɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaanaa Yeesɔ ri shii ka biling. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri rang yee nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
40012047	A zang ɓɔɔgn kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Naa ɓaaɓɛ ri shii ka biling nɛɛ rɛɛ jaanaa ɓaaɓɛ. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ.”
40012048	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ “Ɓu wi naa mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa naa mɛɛ wiya?”
40012049	A tusu naa ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, tɔɔ, “Zirɛ, zang keɓe rikɔ nà'a mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaanaa mɛɛ.
40012050	Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ, wukɔ jaanaa mɛɛ, nɛɛ naa mɛɛ.”
40013001	Yeesɔ nwang kaa nɛɛ yeti gãa, ka diki kaɓa, a daa nwang ka nyaa mii waapo.
40013002	Zang dɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛyi daa nwang ka yeti tonsi. Zang dɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓi ti kaa nyaa gãnggãng.
40013003	A rang zang yee dɔli nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ kagn nwangnɛ, nɛɛ wu daa vang jìng vuu ka jaa ɓiɓɛ.
40013004	Vang jìng vuu kana, a jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka gbalang, a jaaning ri arɛ ri yakɛ.
40013005	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɔɔ zũng tapuru kagn dɔli kpang ɓɛɛ. A naa tantɛ takɛnang ka ruu ɓɔɔ zũng tapuru dɔli kpang ɓɛɛ.
40013006	A ɓɔɔ laa naa tuuyi ri tɔɔrɔ, ri waatɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔng ɓarɛ daa tipi dii kpang ɓɛɛ.
40013007	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka teteng kɔkɔ, a kɔkɔ naa bangkɛ mulu ri.
40013008	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ, a ri naa shing jìng. Ɓɔɔ jìng ɓiɓɛ laa maani, ɓɔɔ laa taati, a ɓɔɔ bmati tu kopi.
40013009	Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tãayi.”
40013010	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ rang zang yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ka ruu viya?”
40013011	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Laa a nɔkɔ n'aa ruu nizang ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ̃ ka yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi zinang tɔ, a zang a ri ɓarɛ kpang.
40013012	Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn, zang naa gisi wukɔ vuu ɓɔɔgn ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkn. Tɔɔ, vuu ɓiɓɛ wu shang kaa gaagaa. Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang, naa doo ɓɔɔ wu yiti ka naa tɔkɔlɔng, zang ti tarɛ, zang yaa wu naa waati.
40013013	N rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu, ri zi kaa takpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ti ɓaa shoo ri tãa kaa takpang, a ri ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kaa takpang ɓɛɛ.
40013014	Ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa rang nɛɛ nyaa Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ wu nw'ang kaa nizang ka bii zang keɓe. Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa Ishaya tɔɔ, ‘Ri tãa ɓi katɔ nɔngkɔ, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka takpang. Ri ti zirɛ, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kaa takpang.
40013015	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti zang keɓe rɛ̃rɛ takpang, shoo ɓarɛ ti huuru tɔ, ri tãa takpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ti mung jìng ɓarɛ tɔ, nɛ̀'ɛ nɔngkɔ kpang ri nɛɛ zi katɔ. Ri nɛɛ ti tãa tɔ nɛɛ shoo ɓarɛ, ri nɛɛ zi tɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ. Ri nɛɛ gbãayu tɔ ka bii mɛɛ, n nɛɛ masɛ ri tɔ.’
40013016	“A tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jìng manɛ zi vuu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Shoo manɛ ti tãa nɔng katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40013017	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang nyaa shoonang Laa, nɛɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ dɔli, ri gãng jìng nɛɛ ri zi vuu kɔ nɔɔ zi ɓee, ri zi kpang. Ri ti ɓaa shoo nɛɛ ri tãa vuu kɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓee, ri tãa kpang.
40013018	“Nɔɔ tãa dìiri nyaa vuu jeenang zang ɓɔɔ daa jìng vuu vannang ɓɛɛ ta.
40013019	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka gbalang, nwang ɓi kaa naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ tãa ruu Kpanti roonang Laa, a zi tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, Sheetang arɛ naa ta vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãa ɓɛɛ.
40013020	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɔɔ zũng tapuru kagn dɔli kpang, ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ tãa ruu Laa, a ta nɛɛ yeti gbete tantɛnang ɓɛɛ.
40013021	A zi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ruu kaɓa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mã danggn ka naa lapa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A jìng dannang, nɛɛ zang kpãanang naa seepaa ka ruu, ruu Kpanti Laa, a tantɛ ruu Laa yaanang.
40013022	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka teteng kɔkɔ, ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu Laa, a rɛ̃rɛnang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nɛɛ vuu naa kasɛnang, naa mulu ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ kati, a ruu bì'i naa nwàng ri vuu kaa takpang.
40013023	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ, ɓi ka zang ɓɔɔ tãa ruu Laa, a ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu Laa nwang ri vuu tɔ̃ɔ, a ri naa nwang ka naa jìng vuu ɓɔɔ raa jaa, laa maani, ɓɔɔ laa taati, a ɓɔɔ bmati tu kopi ɓɛɛ.”
40013024	Yeesɔ rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔgn tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa jìng zee tɔ̃ɔ ka jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
40013025	A zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ wu kpang, naa arɛ ɓaa zee lɔɔwɔ ka yeti jaa ɓiɓɛ, bɛɛ zang rooro katɔ, a daa kati.
40013026	A zee ɓɔɔ zang jaa ɓayi naa bangkɛ tasɛ yuu, a zee lɔɔwɔ tasɛ yuu kaa jong ka teteng ɓarɛ.
40013027	“A zang shoonang yɔɔ gãa ri naa arɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang gãa mɔɔ ɓ'aa wu jìng zee ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka jaa ɓaaɓɛ kpang ya? Zee lɔɔwɔ a ɓi kaa nɛɛ niya?’
40013028	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ n kpang kɔ palɛ vuu keɓe.’ A zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘Ruu dita, ruu daa ruku ya?’
40013029	A yɔɔ gãa kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Kpang, nɔɔ yaa ka nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa nɔɔ tɔɔ nɔɔ ruku zee lɔɔwɔ, nɔɔ daa ruku nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ning ɓɛɛ.
40013030	Nɔɔ yaa ri ka nɔngkɔ, ri bangkɛ nɛɛ zee ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbã̀'agbãa, diki ɓɔɔ zang yee zee wu a nɛɛ mani. N naa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yee ditɔ, nɛɛ, ri gaayu nɛɛ zee lɔɔwɔ kɔ kpalɛnang shɔɔnang. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri gɔɔ ka jɔɔ jɔɔ, ri d'ɔɔ kati. Ri ti kpalɛ zee ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kaa bɔ̃nɔ mɛɛ.’”
40013031	A ti rang ri nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔgn tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa, jìng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ masita, ɓɔɔ zang jaa tuuyi daa ɓaa ka jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
40013032	Jìng masita keɓe kɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka yeti zɔ̃ng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaarɛ nandon. A nɛɛ bang tɔ, ɓa vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ɓɛɛ katɔ nandon. Wu raa laa kati, jaaning ri ti naa kɔ̃ng saara ka nasãng ɓiɓɛ.”
40013033	Yeesɔ ti rang ri nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔgn tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ yisi ɓɛɛ. Zang soro ya tɔkɔlɔng nwɛɛtɛ nɛɛ zũng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ borodi nɛɛ mani, taasa bang bang taati, wu shingnɛ zũng wu puuyi ɓɛɛ.”
40013034	Yeesɔ rang zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ yee keɓe nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kɔ nandon. Kɔɔ ri ruu ɓɔɔ kagn nɛɛ nyaa waati gbete kpang. (Rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kɔ nandon.)
40013035	Vuu kɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓee, ɓi ka nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa rang yee nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “N naa rang zang yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang, n ti naa kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi gngn kpang, doo nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Laa gaa tɔɔsung koo keɓe mãanang ɓɛɛ.”
40013036	A Yeesɔ naa yaa zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a daa ka yeti gãa. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ naa arɛ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ ruu dìiri nyaa vuu jeenang zee lɔɔwɔ ɓɔɔ takɛ ka jaa ɓɛɛ ta.”
40013037	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa jìng zee tɔ̃ɔ, ɓi Jaa Shɔnzang.
40013038	Jaa ɓɔɔ zee ta kagn ɓi koolaa. Jìng zee ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri tà Laa, nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ. Zee lɔɔwɔ, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Sheetang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
40013039	Zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ wu kpang, ɓɔɔ ɓaa zee lɔɔwɔ, kaɓa, ɓi Sheetang. Diki zee yeenang, ɓi ka diki ɓɔɔ koolaa naa waa nyaa ɓɛɛ. Zang zee yeenang ɓi ti ka zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
40013040	“Naa ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zee lɔɔwɔ, zang d'ɔɔ ka waa, zang naa palɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang doo nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ koolaa keɓe naa waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
40013041	Jaa Shɔnzang naa shong zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ditɔ, nɛɛ ri kpalɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ shing zang vuu shi kpang palɛnang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu roo kpanti ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang nandon.
40013042	Ri vǎng ri ka yeti waa bang. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri naa kaayi, ri shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka, kpaaka ɓɛɛ.
40013043	A zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ, naa kɔlɔ ɓarɛ naa làa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Daa ɓarɛ roo kpanti ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu tãayi.”
40013044	“Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa vuu naa ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔli, ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ̃ ka tipi ka jaa, a zang ɓɔɔgn naa ìiyi, a setee ka nɔngkɔ. Tãa tìnang dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, daayi daa malɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ nandon, a naa hoo jaa kaɓa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.”
40013045	“Kpanti roonang Laa ti nwang naa zang vuu malɛnang ɓɔɔ kãa vuu tu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
40013046	A naa walɛ ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔli, a daayi, daa malɛ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ nandon, a naa hoo nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.”
40013047	Yeesɔ ti rang nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔgn tɔkn tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa jang jaazìi yinang ɓɔɔ zang vang ka mii waapo, raa jaazìi ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ.
40013048	Ɓɔɔ jang jaazìi naa yi nyaa, zang jaazìi yinang ri gɔ̃ ka nyaa dang gãnggãng. Ri nwang ka tipi, a ri shɛ̃ɛrɛ ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka yeti waka, a ri vang ɓɔɔ shi kpang kati.
40013049	Diki ɓɔɔ koolaa keɓe naa waa nyaa, nwang doo nɔngkɔ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ri naa arɛ, ri zɔ̃ngkɔ zang shi kpang ka teteng zang tɔ̃ɔ,
40013050	ri vang ri ka yeti waa bang, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang naa kaayi, zang, shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka, kpaaka ɓɛɛ.”
40013051	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi dìiri yee keɓe ɓu tɔ nandon ya?” A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn.”
40013052	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ zi labeenang Laa, a ti zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo kpanti, zang keɓe nwang naa zang gãa ɓɔɔ nwangsɛ vuu shɔɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ gbaala nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ wu tɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
40013053	Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa yee keɓe rannang tɔ, nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang, a seepaa daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn.
40013054	Daa shɛ̃ɛ gari ɓiɓɛ tɔ, a gaa zang tɔɔsung vuu tusunang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓarɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa yee ɓiɓɛ, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe, walɛ zũnang keɓe ka niya? Ɓu wi a wu naa ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu kɔ zang mã naa ka danggn nɛɛ mani wiya?
40013055	Wee wu jaa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ seere laa ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Wu Marayamu kɔ niiɓɛ kpang ya? Wu ti rɛɛ, Yakubu nɛɛ Yusufu, nɛɛ Siman nɛɛ Yahuda kɔ jaa niiɓɛ kpang ya?
40013056	Ɓu ti jaa niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ soro kɔ ri nwang nɛɛ ruu ka nihn piti kpang ya? Yɔɔ wàlɛ̀ vuu keɓe piti ɓi ka niya?”
40013057	A ri bɛ̃ɛ wu kati. Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang a zang nyaa shoonang Laa bannang ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn piti, ɓi zang gari ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ kɔ, a wu bannang ɓi kpang.”
40013058	Yeesɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn ka nɔng kaɓa dɔli kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing gn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
40014001	Ka diki kaɓa, Hiridu ɓɔɔ roo kpanti ka Galili tãa nyaa Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ sãlɛ nɔng,
40014002	a kɔɔ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Zang keɓe ɓi Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima kɔ hingsi jìng nɛɛ vɔrɔ tɔkn, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, walɛ naa a palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn keɓe.”
40014003	Hiridu kɔ kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang yi Yɔhana, zang mãrɛ. Zang loo ka sãa ka ruu Hirodiya, soro jaa niiɓɛ Filibu ɓɔɔ wu ta ɓɛɛ.
40014004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yɔhana kɔɔrɔ wu nɛɛ, “Dàa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing Hirodiya kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40014005	Hiridu nɛɛ wu nyɔ Yɔhana katɔ ka tipi tang, a kaa vɔrɔ zang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang tɔɔ, Yɔhana zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ.
40014006	Diki ɓɔɔ zang yi Hiridu kagn naa raa bii. A kpanti Hiridu gaarɛ zang nɛɛ zang naa shaa vuu shaanang. A Jaa Hirodiya ɓɔɔ soro sɔ dãng ka tìng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Dãng ɓɔɔ jaa sɔɔrɛ, daa Hiridu ka yeti dɔli,
40014007	a tñ̀ng jaa kaɓa Laa ka tìng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ piti, n a mɔɔ katɔ.”
40014008	A nà'a jaa dɔ̃lɔ jaa nyaa tɔɔ, jaa wu gàa yuu kporontong Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ. A jaa naa kɔɔ kpanti Hiridu tɔɔ, “A m yuu kporontong Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima, ka yeti pɛntɛng kãntang keɓe.”
40014009	Ɓɔɔ kpanti tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔli, a vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ takpang, ka ruu Laa ɓɔɔ wu tñ̀ng jaa ka shoo zang zanti ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri a jaa vuu ɓɔɔ jaa gàa ɓɛɛ ta.
40014010	A shong zang, nɛɛ zang daa dɔ̀ng wu yuu Yɔhana ɓɔɔ ka sãa ɓɛɛ.
40014011	A zang atɛ yuu kporontong Yɔhana, zang a jaa ka yeti pɛntɛng. A jaa daa a niiɓɛ kati.
40014012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana arɛ naa tuu bii vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, ri daa gbãa kati. A ri daa kɔɔ Yeesɔ kati.
40014013	Yeesɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ, a seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa vang tonsi, daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A zang dɔli ri tãa nyaa nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ daayi, ri seepaa nɛɛ gari ɓarɛ nɛɛ doo, ri dũuru wu.
40014014	Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛ nyaa dang gãnggãng tɔ, a zi zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri kɔng wu gn, a masɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ katɔ, ka teteng ɓarɛ kati.
40014015	Nɛɛ laarang ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ arɛ naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Laa ɓa tɔ, yaa zang naa ta, zang ɓu daa hoo vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ka gari, ka ruu ɓɔɔ gãa ka nihn kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40014016	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Ri daa biya? Nɔɔ a ri vuu ta, ri shaayi.”
40014017	Ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Borodi ɓuru, yaa ɓi ka maani nɛɛ jaazìi ziti kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.”
40014018	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ atɛ m ta nihn.”
40014019	A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ ri nwang ta ka yuu wisi. A see borodi maani nɛɛ jaazìi ziti kaɓa, a tuu jìng ka lapa. Zãa kpanti Laa, a shalɛ, basɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri alɛ zang nimbang kati.
40014020	Zang kaɓa, ri shaayi, buru ɓarɛ yirɛ, ri yaa knti. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ sà'ang kopi tu ziti.
40014021	Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu kaɓa, ri daa labang maani katɔ. zang gã zang soro nɛɛ wujɛ ɓi kagn kpang.
40014022	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ri shɛ̃ɛ ta yeti tonsi, ri ta waapo ri gbãayu ka knti ɓɔɔ ri a ɓɛɛ, ka tìng. Nɛɛ wu jee zang nimbang doo nyaa ka gbongkarɛ, ri daayi.
40014023	Jee zang nyaa tɔ, a naa vang ka kɔpɔ, nɛɛ wu daa gaa Laa. A laa hãa wu nyaa ka nɔngkɔ ka bm.
40014024	Ka laa kaɓa, knti tonsi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri vangnɛ ti bee ɓi tɔ nɛɛ nyaa dang gãnggãng. Jasung ti r'aarɛ̀ tonsi kana, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jasung raa jìng ka bii ɓarɛ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
40014025	A Yeesɔ ra ka yuu paa mii waapo nɛɛ yuu gãndi, a daa ka bii ɓarɛ.
40014026	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri zi naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ra ka yuu paa mii waapo naa weɓe, ri sengnɛ, ri kaa vɔrɔ. Ri kaa nyaa ka lapa, ri tɔɔ, “Raanang kaɓa.”
40014027	A Yeesɔ rang yee kaa tantɛnang nɛɛ ri, tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Ɓi nkɔ.”
40014028	Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, nɛɛ mɔkɔ, kɔɔ m ta, n ra ka yuu paa mii, n a ka bii ɓaaɓɛ.”
40014029	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “A ta!” A Bituru seepaa nɛɛ yeti tonsi, ra ka yuu paa mii, daa kana bii Yeesɔ.
40014030	A Bituru zi jasung, a kaa vɔrɔ, a gaa tɔɔsung ɔ̃nang ka mii. Kaa nyaa tɔɔ, “Ta m jong, Kpanti.”
40014031	A Yeesɔ dìi naa ɓiɓɛ kaa tantɛnang yi wu, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ka ruu vi, mɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ rɛ̃rɛkɛ viya? Mɔɔ yaa danggn naa ka ruu viya?”
40014032	Ri shɛ̃ɛ tɔ ka yeti tonsi, a jasung vɔ nyaa kati.
40014033	Zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti tonsi dɔ̀ɔ Yeesɔ kati. Ri tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ Jaa Laa kɔ nizang.”
40014034	Ri ta mii tɔ, ri a ka tipi Janesara.
40014035	Zang tipi Janesara ri zi Yeesɔ nung, a ri shongko nyaa ka bii zang doo laa kaɓa nandon. A zang atɛ Yeesɔ zang kɔnang ɓarɛ kaa nandon.
40014036	A ri gaa wu, nɛɛ wu yaa zang kɔnang jong, ri lee naa ka nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Zang ɓɔɔ ri lee naa ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ piti, kɔnang ɓarɛ yaa ri bii nandon.
40015001	A zang Farisawa ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri a ka bii Yeesɔ nɛɛ Urushalima. Ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ,
40015002	“Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ daa ɓuru dang ka ruu viya? Ka ruu vi, ri shaa vuu shaanang, ri sɔɔ n'aa ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa ɓuru tusu rùu kpang viya?”
40015003	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Ka ruu vi nɔɔ yaa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, nɛɛ nɔɔ dũng ka nyaa ɓɔɔ daa manɛ dangnɛ viya?
40015004	Kpanti Laa dang nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu shing jìng ka diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ, wu ti ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓarɛ. Nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ, zang wu nyɔ vɔrɔ ka tipi tang.’
40015005	A nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu kɔɔ niiɓɛ nɛɛ diiɓɛ nɛɛ, n a Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ a nɔɔ tɔ nandon.’
40015006	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ ‘Zang wu shing jìng ka diiɓɛ kpang.’ Nɔɔ yaa ruu Laa, ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ daa manɛ dang ɓɛɛ.
40015007	Nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, ruu ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ ka yuu manɛ nizang kɔ nwani.
40015008	‘Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa Ishaya tɔɔ, Zang keɓe ri dɔɔ m ka nyaa lapa waati, a yeti ɓarɛ ɓi kaa tɔɔ bii mɛɛ naabm kpang.
40015009	Ri dɔɔ m ɓarɛ waati. Ri tusu zang ɓarɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang dang ɓɛɛ, ɓi ruu Laa kpang.’”
40015010	A Yeesɔ naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta, nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
40015011	Ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ zang shaa ka yeti kɔ raa zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tìng Laa Kpang. Yee ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ yeti nyaa zang kɔ, shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tìng Laa.”
40015012	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ arɛ naa hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi ɓu tɔ nɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa ri tãa ruu kaɓa, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ katɔ ya?”
40015013	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Vuu piti ɓɔɔ wu Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa shɔrɛ kpang, zang naa ru ɓi ditɔ.
40015014	Nɔɔ yaa ri ka nɔngkɔ, ri ɓarɛ zang jìng ringtang ɓɔɔ tusu zang jìng ringtang gbalang ɓɛɛ. Naa zang jìng ringtang tɔɔ wu tusu zang ɓɔɔ doo jìng ringtang kɔ doori gbalang, ri d'aa gɔlɔ zɔɔ ɓarɛ ka too nandon.”
40015015	A Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nwangsɛ ruu dìiri yee kɔ mɔɔ rang nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓee ta.”
40015016	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi gn kpang naa rikɔ kɔ sasak ya?
40015017	Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ daa nɛɛ nyaa shɔnzang, sharɛ dà'a ɓi ka buru ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ wu daa nwang kaa nɛɛ dii kpang ya?
40015018	A vuu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ yeti nyaa shɔnzang, a ɓi nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ. Vuu keɓe kɔ raa zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tìng Laa.
40015019	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka yeti shɔnzang kɔ shing zang, zang rɛ̃rɛ vuu shi kpang. Zang nyɔ zang vɔrɔ, roonang nɛɛ soro zang ɓɔɔgn, roonang nɛɛ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang gee ka takpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ti ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ, zang zɛ̃ɛ zang nyaa, zang ti rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zang.
40015020	Vuu keɓe kɔ shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tìng Laa. A naa zang shaa vuu shaanang, zang sɔɔ naa ɓi naa ɓɔɔ daa manɛ tusu zang kpang, shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tìng Laa kpang.”
40015021	A Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daa ka tipi Taya nɛɛ Sidong.
40015022	A jaa soro Kà'ana ɓɔɔ nwang ka tipi kaɓa, a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Kaa nyaa kana nɛɛ, “Kpanti, Jaa Dawuda gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong. Suru shi kpang dang jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang soro jìng dɔli.”
40015023	A Yeesɔ ã̀a wu nyaa ɓi ka bii kpang. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, naa gaa Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Hing jaa soro keɓe ta, wu daayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ kaarɛ nyaa ka knti ɓuru ɓɛɛ.”
40015024	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang shong m ka ruu zang Yahudawa, ɓɔɔ naa mɛɛrɛ ɓɔɔ ning gbalang katɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.”
40015025	A jaa soro kaɓa, arɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, a gaa wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, yi m naa jong bii.”
40015026	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa zang tuu vuu shaanang wujɛ, zang a zaa, tɔ̃ɔ ya?”
40015027	A jaa soro kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Shi kpang nizang Kpanti. Zaa ri yakɛ kɔkɔlɔ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ shili nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ mã ri ɓɛɛ katɔ.”
40015028	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa soro, mɔɔ shing gn ka bii mɛɛ dɔli, N 'a mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.” A suru shi kpang yaa jaa ɓiɓɛ bii kaa tantɛnang, ka laa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ rang yee nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
40015029	Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, a naa sɔɔ nyaa dang gãnggãng mii waapo Galili, a daa vang kɔpɔ nwang ka nɔngkɔ.
40015030	A zang dɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri atɛ wu zang ɓɔɔ doo shãa katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kàa katɔ, nɛɛ zang jìng ringtang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ, nɛɛ zang kɔnang ɓɔɔ kaa gn gaagaa. Ri tɛ̃ɛ ri ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, a masɛ ri kati.
40015031	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bì'i Yeesɔ, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri zi zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ ri rang yee kana ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ, ri lakɛ, zang ɓɔɔ doo shãa katɔ, ri ti ra kana, a zang jìng ringtang ri ti zi nɔng. Ɓɔɔ zang nimbang ri zi naa weɓe, ri dɔ̀ɔ Là'a zang Isirela kati.
40015032	A Yeesɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nyaa, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang keɓe gn ɓarɛ kɔng m dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nwang tɔ nɛɛ n daa diki taati, vuu shaanang ɓarɛ takpang ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ, n tɔɔ, n jee ri nyaa nɛɛ nyɔkɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, doo nɛɛ daa kà'a ri ka gbalang ɓɛɛ.”
40015033	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Rùu walɛ borodi ka niya dɔli, ka waala keɓe, ruu a zang kɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓee wiya?”
40015034	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Borodi manɛ nɛya?” A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Yaa manziti nɛɛ jaazìi ɓɔɔ seseere wu dɔli kpang.”
40015035	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, nɛɛ ri nwalɛ ta ka tipi.
40015036	A tuu borodi manziti kaɓa nɛɛ jaazìi, a zãa Kpanti Laa. Shalɛ, a basɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri alɛ zang nimbang ta.
40015037	Zang keɓe piti, ri shaa vuu shaanang, buru ɓarɛ yirɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ ka sang manziti.
40015038	Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang kaɓa, ri labang dɛ̃ɛti. Zang g'ã zang soro nɛɛ wujɛ ɓi kagn kpang.
