40015039	Yeesɔ jee zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nyaa tɔ, a naa vang tonsi daa ka tipi Magadang.
40016001	Zang Farisawa nɛɛ Sadukiyawa, ri arɛ nɛɛ ri naa gãsɛ Yeesɔ. Ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Tusu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ ruu zi kagn nɛɛ mɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.”
40016002	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔng laarang nɛɛ raa bii tɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ tɔɔ, ɓuru nɔng naa nwang lɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, làa raa nɔng lɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40016003	Nɛɛ ti lɛɛ nɛɛ gãndi, nɔɔ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Mii a lɛɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, lapa raayi, a ti nwang lɛɛ ɓirɛnzing ɓɛɛ. Lapa nɛɛ risi bii tɔ, nɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ tɔ.’ A nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ palɛ ka koo keɓe kãntang kpang.
40016004	Nɔɔ zang yeti shi kpang koo jaa knti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi Laa Kpang ɓee, nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. N tùsù nɔɔ kpang, zang tusu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka bii Yunana zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A yaa ri daayi.”
40016005	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri ta mii waapo Galili tɔ, danggn ning ri a ri tuu borodi ka naa kpang.
40016006	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn kagn nɔɔ gãng jìng ka yisi (vuu ɓɔɔ puu zũng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ borodi nɛɛ mani) ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang Farisawa nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang Sadukiyawa ning.”
40016007	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri gaa tɔɔsung yee rangkɛnang kaa naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ nwiiri. Ri tɔɔ, “Rang rùu yee keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu a nɛɛ borodi ka naa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40016008	Yeesɔ ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ ri rang nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓi tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zang kɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa rɛ̃rɛkɛ ɓi. Nɔɔ rangkɛ ɓu ka ruu vi, ka naa manɛ nɛɛ, nɔɔ a nɛɛ borodi ka naa kpang viya?
40016009	Nɔɔ zi ɓu gn kpang ya? Nɔɔ kpaa danggn borodi maani ɓɔɔ zang labang maani ri shaayi, ri yaa knti kpang ya? Nɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɔɔ ri yaa knti sà'ang nɛya?
40016010	Nɔɔ ti kpaa danggn borodi manziti ɓɔɔ zang labang dɛ̃ɛti ri shaayi kpang ya? Ɓɔɔ ri yaa knti, nɔɔ kpalɛ sà'ang nɛya?
40016011	Ka ruu vi nɔɔ zi gn kpang, nɛɛ n rang yee m ka yuu borodi kpang viya? N kɔɔ m nɛɛ nɔɔ gãng jìng ka yisi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang Farisawa nɛɛ Sadukiyawa ning.”
40016012	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri naa zi kaa nɛɛ knti, nɛɛ Yeesɔ, kɔɔ ri ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri gãng jìng ka yisi ɓɔɔ puu zũng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ borodi nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɛɛ ri gãng jìng ɓarɛ ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa nɛɛ Sadukiyawa ri tusu zang ɓɛɛ.
40016013	Yeesɔ naa a tɔ ka tipi Kayisariya Filipi, a hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Zang kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n ɓu wiya?”
40016014	A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓ'aa Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓ'aa Iliya. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓ'aa Irimiya. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓ'aa zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.”
40016015	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “A nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ nɛɛ, nkɔ wiya?”
40016016	Siman Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ Kirisi, (zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ). Jaa Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40016017	Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Laa wu a mɔɔ tìnang tãanang ta, Siman Bituru jaa Yunana. vuu keɓe, wu shɔnzang tusu mɔɔ kpang. Ɓi Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa tùsù mɔɔ.
40016018	N kɔɔ mɔɔ, Mɔkɔ Bituru. Dìiri nung keɓe ɓi pɛ̃ngkɛ. N mãa gãa mɛɛ (zang ɓɔɔ ri naa shing gn ka bii mɛɛ) ka yuu pɛ̃ngkɛ keɓe kɔ. Vɔrɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu lasɛ kpang.
40016019	N ti naa tusu mɔkɔ naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tusu zang gbalang, zang zirɛ nɛɛ Laa kɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ka koo keɓe piti, zang bɛ̃ɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ doori ka lapa. Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ka koo keɓe, zang ti kasɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ doori ka lapa.”
40016020	A Yeesɔ shaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nyaa tɔɔ, ri kɔɔ zang gn kpang nɛɛ wukɔ Kirisi (zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ) kpang.
40016021	Yeesɔ gàa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔsung yee rannang ka diki kaɓa, nɛɛ wu daa Urushalima ditɔ. Wu daa dang jìng ditɔ gbãnggbãng, ka naa zang bang gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ Laa vuu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ. Ri naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kati. A Laa naa wisi wu paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.
40016022	A Bituru ɓaa wu nyaa dang gbete, a mangkɛ wu tɔɔ, “Laa wu kɔsɔ vuu keɓe katɔ Kpanti, vuu keɓe wu naa p'alɛ̀ mɔɔ nɔngkɔ kpang.”
40016023	Yeesɔ raa jìng kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Dita kaaɓa Sheetang! Mɔkɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ m gbalang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓ'aa vuu ɓɔɔ Laa rɛ̃rɛ kpang, mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓ'aa vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
40016024	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu dũng m, wu yaa yuu ɓiɓɛ kasɛnang ta, wu ta jìng dannang ɓɔɔ a ka ruu nung mɛɛ ɓɛɛ, wu tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu kagn, wu dũng m.
40016025	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ, naa loo ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. A zang piti ɓɔɔ loo yuu ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu mɛɛ, naa walɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong bɛɛ.
40016026	Naa shɔnzang walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon, a loo suru bii ɓiɓɛ, vuu koo keɓe nwǎng wu ɓu viya? Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang kɔ̃sɔ suru bii ɓiɓɛ nɔng kagn ya?
40016027	Jaa Shɔnzang naa a ditɔ nɛɛ bannang diiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa atɛ zang vuu, ka naa vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
40016028	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang dɔli ka teteng zang keɓe, ri vɔ kpang. Ri zi naa ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang naa a ka yeti bannang kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ ka gbongkarɛ.”
40017001	Diki mangbete naa ɓa tɔ, Yeesɔ daa kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ Bituru, a ɓɔɔ Yakubu nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Yɔhana kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ka kɔpɔ beebang.
40017002	A bii Yeesɔ risi kaa naa ɓɔɔgn ka jìng ɓarɛ. Waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ kɔlɔ kaa naa làa, a fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ti risi nwang ka puru shãashãa.
40017003	A ri zi Musa nɛɛ Iliya, ri rang yee kana nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
40017004	Bituru kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, wee ruu ka nihn ɓee wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, 'n wàa k'uutu ka nihn taati. Ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ gbete, ɓɔɔ Musa gbete, a ɓɔɔ Iliya ti gbete.”
40017005	Bituru rang yee doo naa nyaa, sãmbong ɓɔɔ puru shãashãa arɛ naa zuu ri kati. A ri tãa yee nɛɛ yeti sãmbong nɛɛ, “Wee Jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ gbãnggbãng kɔ. N tãa tìnang ɓiɓɛ dɔli. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ning.”
40017006	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri kaa vɔrɔ, a ri zuu nung ka dii.
40017007	A Yeesɔ arɛ naa lee ri naa ka bii, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ seepaa ta. Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang.”
40017008	Ri tuu jìng ka lapa, ri zi zang ɓɔɔ takpang, ri zi kaa Yeesɔ kɔ gbete.
40017009	Ri shooro doo naa nɛɛ kɔpɔ, Yeesɔ shaarɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, “N'ɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ vuu kɔ nɔɔ zi ɓee kpang, Kpanti Laa wu wisi Jaa Shɔnzang paa nɛɛ vɔrɔ ka gbongkarɛ.”
40017010	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ka ruu viya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, Iliya kɔ gaayu anang shɔɔnang tɔ̀ɔ Kirisi wu arɛ viya?”
40017011	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Iliya kɔ a shɔɔnang nizang, wu naa shĩ̀l'i vuu piti.
40017012	A n kɔɔ nɔɔ, Iliya a tɔ, ri zi wu nung kpang. Ri palɛ wu vuu piti ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri naa dang Jaa Shɔnzang jìng doo nɔngkɔ.”
40017013	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri zi kati, nɛɛ rang ri yee ɓi ka yuu Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ.
40017014	Ri a tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, a zang gbete naa a ka bii Yeesɔ, a tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ,
40017015	“Kpanti, gn jaa mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong. Kɔnang ɓɔɔ mã zang katɔ, dang wu jìng dɔli. Looro wu ka waa nɛɛ mii diki diki.
40017016	N à nɛɛ wu ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri masɛ wu kpang.”
40017017	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zang shi kpang koo jaa knti kɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang ɓee, nɔɔ nɛɛ n nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Nɔɔ nɛɛ 'n mã danggn nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Nɔɔ atɛ m jaa ta.”
40017018	A Yeesɔ mangkɛ suru shi kpang, a suru shii kpang nwangnɛ. A kɔnang yaa jaa bii kaa tantɛnang.
40017019	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, naa arɛ hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ nwiiri tɔɔ, “Rùu zunung nwangsɛnang ɓuru kpang ka ruu viya?”
40017020	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa rɛ̃rɛkɛ ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, naa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa nɛɛ kagn tɔkɔlɔng naa jìng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ masita, nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ kɔpɔ keɓe katɔ, nɛɛ ‘Wɔɔ ta nɛɛ nihn, mɔɔ daa kaaɓa,’ nɛɛ ti wɔɔ katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa nɔɔ yuu palɛnang kagn kpang.”
40017021	Ṣuru shi kpang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, nwang ɓi jong waati kpang, zang nwangsɛ ɓi nɛɛ Laa gaanang, nɛɛ nyaalaa sennang.]
40017022	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nandon ka Galili, a Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe Kati tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ naa tuu m ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ naa a zang.
40017023	Ri naa nyɔ m vɔrɔ. Laa naa wisi m paa ka lɛɛ ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.” Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔli.
40017024	Yeesɔ naa a tɔ Kafanahu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri talɛ saka gãa Laa, arɛ naa hɛ̃ɛ Bituru tɔɔ, “Maalang manɛ shu saka gãa Laa ɓi kpang ya?”
40017025	A Bituru kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Shu katɔ.” A Bituru naa yaa ri, a ka yeti gãa, a Yeesɔ kɔ naa gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang kaa shɔɔnang nɛɛ wu. Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi ɓu bɛ̀'ɛ ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ viya, Siman? Kpanti ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, ri ta saka tipi ɓu ka naa wiya? Ri ta ka naa wujɛ ɓarɛ ya, kɔ ka naa zang zanti?”
40017026	A Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ri ta ka naa zang zanti.” A Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wujɛ shu ɓarɛ kpang.
40017027	A ka ruu ɓɔɔ rùu nɛ̀'ɛ lasɛ ri yeti ɓɛɛ, dita ka mii waapo, mɔɔ daa loo galong. Tuu jaazìi ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaayu yinang mɔɔ puu nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Mɔɔ wàl'ɛ saka ɓɔɔ daa ɓɔ̀'ɔ gãa Laa shunang ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɛɛ piti ditɔ ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Tuu saka kaɓa, mɔɔ a ri, ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɛɛ.”
40018001	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri arɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi zang bang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti wiya?”
40018002	A Yeesɔ ɓaa jaa tɔkɔlɔng nyaa, a shing wu ka teteng ɓarɛ.
40018003	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, naa nɔɔ risi yuu manɛ, nɔɔ nwang naa wujɛ seseere kpang, nɔɔ naa daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kagn kpang.
40018004	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ a nwang kaa naa jaa tɔkɔlɔng keɓe, wukɔ zang bang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ.
40018005	Zang piti ɓɔɔ ta jaa tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ naa weɓe ka ruu nung mɛɛ, ta nkɔ.
40018006	“Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing jaa tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng wujɛ seseere ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ a ri yaa danggn shinnang, jìng dannang zang kaɓa ɓa ɓɔ̀ɔ zang nɛɛ mã̀ wu ree bang ka turu, zang tasɛ wu ka yeti sà'a mii waapo katɔ.
40018007	Jìng dannang kagn yuu koo keɓe, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, a ɓi katɔ, a jìng dannang kagn yuu shɔnzang ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe a nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
40018008	“N'aa ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ, mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, dɔng katɔ mɔɔ tasɛ. Nɛɛ ti doo ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ jong, mɔɔ ti dɔngnɛ mɔɔ tasɛ. Daa nɔng suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ naa dang gbete, nɛɛ doo dang gbete gbã̀'agbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ naa ziti ɓaaɓɛ, nɛɛ doo ziti ɓaaɓɛ nandon, ka waa ɓɔɔ wàa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
40018009	Jìng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, zɔ̃ng katɔ mɔɔ tasɛ. Daa nɔng suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ jìng dang gbete gbã̀'agbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ jìng ziti ɓaaɓɛ piti, ka nɔng waa bang ɓɛɛ.
40018010	“Nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, n'ɔɔ p'ɛ̃ɛrɛ̀ jaa tɔkɔlɔng gbete ka teteng wujɛ keɓe nɛɛ jìng gɔɔnang kpang. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ, ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ ɓi waa nyaating Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa diki diki.
40018011	Jaa Shɔnzang arɛ nɛɛ wu naa ta ɓi yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri ning katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40018012	“Nɔɔ zi ɓu bɛ̀'ɛ ka yeti manɛ viya? Naa shɔnzang mã mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ laa maani, a ɓɔɔ gbete ning ka teteng ɓarɛ, palɛ biya? Yaa ɓɔɔ laa dɛ̃ɛti tu kopi tu man dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa ka kɔpɔ ka nɔngkɔ ka gbongkarɛ, wu daa kãa ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ ning ɓɛɛ kpang ya?
40018013	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, nɛɛ ìi tɔ, tìnang ɓɔɔ wu tãa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ, ɓa ɓɔɔ wu tãa ka yuu ɓɔɔ laa dɛ̃ɛti tuu kopi tu mandɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ ning kpang kaɓa katɔ.
40018014	Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nwang doo nɔngkɔ. Kasɛ nɛɛ jaa tɔkɔlɔng gbete ka teteng wujɛ seseere keɓe, wu shaarɛ kpang.
40018015	“Ɓaazung nɛɛ palɛ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang, daa kabm ka gbongkarɛ, mɔɔ daa kɔɔ wu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ɓaa shoo tɔ ka nyaa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ ta yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ.
40018016	Nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓaaɓɛ kpang, mɔɔ ti daayi, m'ɔɔ daa ɓaa zang gbete kɔ zang ziti ɓɔɔgn nyaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ziti kɔ taati nɛɛ kɔɔ nyaa gbete ka yuu ruu, ruu keɓe ɓi nizang kɔ ɓɛɛ.
40018017	Nɛɛ ti tãa nyaa zang kaɓa kpang kɔ doori, tɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang Laa ɓɔɔ nimbang kati. Nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang Laa ɓɔɔ nimbang kpang kɔ doori, tɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ yaa wu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, kɔ zang ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi ɓɛɛ.
40018018	“N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ka koo keɓe, zang bɛ̃ɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ doori ka lapa. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang palɛ ka koo keɓe, zang ti kasɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ doori ka lapa.
40018019	“Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta, n'ɔɔ tãa tɔkn. Naa zang ziti ka teteng manɛ ri mã̀ zɔɔ naa ka yuu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri gaayi, Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa palɛ ri katɔ.
40018020	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ziti, kɔ zang taati ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn, ka ruu nung mɛɛ, n kagn teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.”
40018021	Bituru naa arɛ hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, naa manzung palɛ m vuu shi kpang diki diki, n yaa wu gbalang doo nɛya? Nung dakn manziti ya?”
40018022	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ mɔɔ, wu dakn manziti kpang, ɓi dakn laa taati tu kopi dakn manziti.
40018023	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi, nwang naa yɔɔ kpanti ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu zili saka ɓɔɔ wu alɛ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ nyaa kɔpɔ ɓɛɛ.
40018024	Gaa tɔɔsung saka ɓiɓɛ gãnang kana. A zang atɛ wu zang gbete ɓɔɔ ta saka ka naa ɓiɓɛ jaka labang kopi a naa walɛ saka ɓɔɔ wu sɔɔrɔ wu nɔng kaa takpang ɓɛɛ.
40018025	A yɔɔ kpanti kɔɔ zang nɛɛ, zang malɛ wu ta nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ vuu gãa ɓiɓɛ piti, tɔɔ zang sɔɔrɔ wu saka ɓiɓɛ nɔng.
40018026	A zang shoonang kaɓa tang ka tìng kpanti, a gaa wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang mɛɛ, n zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ, shii ka gbongkarɛ, n sɔ̀ɔr'ɔ mɔɔ saka ɓaaɓɛ ditɔ nandon.’
40018027	A zang shoonang kaɓa, gn ɓiɓɛ kɔng kpanti, a kpanti yàa wu saka ɓɔɔ wu ta nyaa k'ɔp'ɔ kati, nɛɛ wu dita.
40018028	“Zang shoonang kaɓa naa nwang tɔ ka biling, a naa ɓee yuu nɛɛ ɓeesang shoonang ɓɔɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ ta saka nyaa k'ɔp'ɔ jaka gbete ka naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Yi wu ka vɔ̃ɔrɔ tap, nɛɛ wu sɔɔrɔ wu saka ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu ta ɓɛɛ ta.
40018029	A ɓeesang shoonang kaɓa, tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, a bakɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘Shii ka gbongkarɛ, n sɔ̀ɔr'ɔ mɔɔ saka ɓaaɓɛ ditɔ nandon.’
40018030	A kasɛ kpang, a tuu ɓeesang daa loo ka sãa, nɛɛ wu sɔɔrɔ wu saka ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu ta nyaa kɔpɔ ka gbongkarɛ.
40018031	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ ɓeesang shoonang ɓɔɔgn ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ naa weɓe, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔli, a ri daa kɔɔ kpanti ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kaɓa palɛ nandon.
40018032	A kpanti ɓarɛ, ɓaa wu nyaa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Yɔɔ keɓe, yeti ɓaaɓɛ shi kpang. N yàa mɔɔ saka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ta nyaa k'ɔp'ɔ tɔ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaa m katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40018033	Ka ruu vi, gn ɓaasang shoonang kɔng mɔɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ gn ɓaaɓɛ kɔng m, mɔɔ yàa wu saka ɓɔɔ wu ta nyaa k'ɔp'ɔ ka naa ɓaaɓɛ kpang viya?’
40018034	A gnvɔ shaa kpanti, kpanti tuu wu a zang ɓɔɔ ri mã zang ka sãa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu sɔɔrɔ wu saka ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu ta nyaa k'ɔp'ɔ ka gbongkarɛ nandon.
40018035	N kɔɔ nɔɔ, Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, naa palɛ nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ gbete, gbete, nɔɔ nɛɛ yàa zɔɔ gbalang ka yeti manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40019001	Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa ruu keɓe kɔɔnang tɔ, a seepaa nɛɛ Galili daa ka tipi Yahudiya ɓɔɔ zang ta rang Urudung katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40019002	Zang dɔli dũuru wu ka knti. A masɛ ri ka nɔngkɔ.
40019003	A zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang Farisawa ri naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri gãsɛ wu katɔ. Ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ zang wu hing soro ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ (ɓɔɔ daa wu ɓi kpang) wu ɓɛɛ ya?”
40019004	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã gngn nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ mã̀a zang ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, mãa ri, zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro kpang ya?”
40019005	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang varɛ yaa niiɓɛ nɛɛ diiɓɛ, ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ ri ziti keɓe ri nwang kaa bii gbete.
40019006	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri tɔ̀'ɔ ziti kpang, ri kaa gbete. Vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa nɛɛ ɓakɛ tɔ, shɔnzang wu basɛ takpang.”
40019007	A zang Farisawa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “A Musa kɔɔ zang ka ruu vi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu hing soro ɓiɓɛ, wu a wu labeenang soro hinnang, tɔ̀ɔ, zang wu hing wu kati viya?”
40019008	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Musa a nɔɔ naa soro manɛ hinnang ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpãa nyaa vuu tusunang katɔ ɓɛɛ. A vuu keɓe wu nɔngkɔ ka tìng kpang.
40019009	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa shɔnzang hing soro ɓiɓɛ naa wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, roo nɛɛ zang varɛ ɓɔɔgn ɓɛɛ kpang, a shing soro ɓɔɔgn, zang keɓe palɛ ɓi dũndũng nɛɛ soro ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ.”
40019010	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nwannang zang varɛ nɛɛ ɓeeso, nɛɛ nwang nɔngkɔ, zang wu shing soro kpang gbã̀'agbãa.”
40019011	Yeesɔ naa risi nyaa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Wu shɔnzang piti zunung ruu keɓe tanang kpang, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa a ri naa kɔ ta shɛ̃ɛning.
40019012	Zang ɓɔɔgn, ri roo soro kpang, bii varɛ ɓarɛ vɔ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang yi ri nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔgn zang palɛ ri katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti bɛ̃ɛ soro roonang nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ, ka ruu kpanti roonang Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta ruu keɓe katɔ, wu tarɛ.”
40019013	A zang atɛ wu wujɛ seseere nɛɛ wu shing ri naa ka yuu tɔ̀ɔ wu ti gaa ri Laa. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri, mangkɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri atɛ wujɛ kati.
40019014	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ yaa wujɛ seseere ka nɔngkɔ ri a ka bii mɛɛ. N'ɔɔ nɔɔ ri gbalang kpang. Kpanti roonang Laa ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ.”
40019015	Shìng ri naa tɔ ka yuu, gaa ri Laa, a seepaa daa kati.
40019016	A zang ɓɔɔgn arɛ naa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ naa n palɛ, n walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓu viya?”
40019017	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ m ruu vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka ruu viya? Laa kɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbete. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa dang ɓɛɛ.”
40019018	A hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “'N dũng ɓu nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kìya?” Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang, m'ɔɔ roo nɛɛ soro zang kpang, m'ɔɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ shɔngɓɔ kpang, m'ɔɔ kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ sè'e ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ kpang.
40019019	Ɓaa shoo ka nyaa daaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ naaɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Mɔɔ ti kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwalɛ nɛɛ ri, doo naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.”
40019020	Yɔɔ jasang kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N palɛ vuu keɓe tɔ nandon, yàa m ɓu kaa viya?”
40019021	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓi ka bii ɓiɓɛ gbete kpang, ka tìng Laa, dita mɔɔ daa malɛ vuu naa ɓaaɓɛ nandon, mɔɔ basɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang saka vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ malɛ ɓɛɛ kati. Mɔɔ naa walɛ vuu naa ditɔ ka lapa. Tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ arɛ mɔɔ dũng m.”
40019022	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ yɔɔ jasang kaɓa tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔli, a daayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu naa ɓiɓɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
40019023	Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, daanang zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti, naa kpãa dɔli.
40019024	N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔkn, daanang zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti, kpãa nyaa ɓa ɓɔ̀ɔ vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ rakumi ɓ'u nɛɛ yeng shɔng fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ.”
40019025	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri tãa naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri tɔɔ, “A ɓu wi walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang wiya?”
40019026	Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Vuu keɓe shɔnzang zunung palɛnang kpang, a Laa zunung vuu piti palɛnang ɓi katɔ.”
40019027	Bituru hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “A wee ruu yaa vuu piti tɔ, ruu dũng mɔɔ ɓee, ruu naa walɛ ɓu kaa viya?”
40019028	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, ka diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang naa arɛ, naa nwang ka laa kpanti nɛɛ naa bannang ɓiɓɛ ka koo shɔɔ. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dñ̀ng knti mɛɛ, nɔɔ naa nw'ang ditɔ jong ka laa nwannang kopi tu ziti. Tɔ̀ɔ n'ɔɔ jɛ̃̀ɛ zɔ̃ng wujɛ Yakubu ɓɔɔ kopi tu ziti ruu kati.
40019029	Zang piti ɓɔɔ yaa gãa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓeezung, nɛɛ ɓeenaa, nɛɛ diiɓɛ, nɛɛ niiɓɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ tipi jaa lannang ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu mɛɛ, naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu yaa ɓɛɛ ditɔ dakn laa maani. Ti walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ katɔ.
40019030	A zang dɔli ka teteng zang kɔ ri ka tìng kãntang keɓe, kɔ naa waa nyaa knti. Zang kɔ ri ka knti kãntang keɓe, kɔ naa sɔɔ zang tìng kaa jong.”
40020001	“Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa yɔɔ jaa laa inabi ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ gãndi zãngzãng, nɛɛ wu daa kãa zang shoonang ɓɔɔ ri naa palɛ wu shoonang ka jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
40020002	Ri kà zɔɔ laa nɛɛ zang shoonang nɛɛ, wu naa shu ri saka ɓɔɔ zang shu zang ka ruu shoonang diki gbete ɓɛɛ. A dɔ̃ɔ ri ka jaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri dita, ri daa palɛ wu shoonang.
40020003	Làa naa yuu t'aà, ti daa ìi zang shoonang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ waati ka nyaa kasuwa,
40020004	a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ dita jong nɔɔ daa palɛ m shoonang ka jaa mɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ n a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ.’ A zang shoonang kaɓa ri daa kati.
40020005	A yɔɔ jaa kaɓa ti naa paarɛ zang shoonang kãanang nɛɛ laagɛ̃ a ɓɔɔ kaa naa ɓɔɔ laa kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. A ti palɛ doo naa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang kɔ.
40020006	Ti naa daa nɛɛ laarang tɔkn, a daa ìi zang shoonang ɓɔɔgn, ri shiiri tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ shiiri waati ka ruu vi, doo nɛɛ gãndi sasak viya?’
40020007	A zang shoonang ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa ruu nyaa shoonang palɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ.’ A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ dita jong nɔɔ daa palɛ shoonang ka jaa mɛɛ.’
40020008	Kaa nɛɛ làa nyaa vàa, yɔɔ jaa kɔɔ zang bang zang shoonang, ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Ɓaa zang shoonang nyaa ta, mɔɔ shu ri saka shoonang ɓarɛ. Gaayu nɛɛ zang doo knti kɔ shɔɔnang, tɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa ka nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri a tìng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.’
40020009	A zang shoonang ɓɔɔ ri gaayu jaa lannang nɛɛ laarang naa arɛ, zang shu ri saka ɓɔɔ zang shu zang ka ruu shoonang diki gbete ɓɛɛ.
40020010	A zang ɓɔɔ ri gaayu jaa lannang tìng shɔɔnang, naa arɛ, ri kɔɔ nɛɛ naa, saka ɓarɛ, naa ɓa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri a doo knti ɓi katɔ. Zang shu ri doo saka ɓɔɔ zang shu zang ka ruu shoonang diki gbete ɓɛɛ kɔ.
40020011	Ri ta saka shoonang ɓarɛ tɔ, a ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee nɛɛ yɔɔ jaa nɛɛ,
40020012	‘Zang ɓɔɔ ri a doo knti, ri palɛ shoonang diki bee kpang, mɔɔ shu rùu ɓɔɔ ruu dang jìng, laa ti nyɔ ruu sasak, saka nɛɛ ri nyaa kiiri, ka ruu viya?’
40020013	A yɔɔ jaa kasɛ zang gbete ɓarɛ nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Masang, n mulu mɔɔ katɔ kpang. Mɔkɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n shu mɔɔ saka ɓɔɔ zang a zang ka ruu shoonang diki gbete kpang ya?
40020014	Dita nɛɛ saka ɓaaɓɛ. Nkɔ tiisi n a zang doo knti, naa ɓɔɔ n a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
40020015	N daa naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ vuu mɛɛ kpang ya? Gnvɔ̃ shà'a mɔɔ ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ ya?’”
40020016	A Yeesɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang doo knti kɔ naa raa zang tìng. Zang tìng ri ti raa zang knti.”
40020017	Yeesɔ daa kana Urushalima, a ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti dang gbete, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ,
40020018	“Rùu daa kana Urushalima, zang ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ yuu mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ ka naa zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka gãa Kpanti Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ. Ri naa jɛ̃̀ɛ m ruu ɓɔɔ zang naa nyɔ m vɔrɔ kagn ɓɛɛ kati.
40020019	Tɔ̀ɔ, ri naa tuu m, ri a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ ri kpaa m, ri nyɔ m nɛɛ gbãa, tɔ̀ɔ ri daa ɓaa m naa ka laa. A Kpanti Laa naa wisi m paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
40020020	A soro Zebedi nɛɛ, wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ, naa tang ka tìng Yeesɔ, a gaa vuu ka naa ɓiɓɛ.
40020021	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ viya?” A nà'a rɛɛ Yakubu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N tɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ, wujɛ mɛɛ ziti keɓe, ɓɔɔ gbete wu nwang ka naa nakn ɓaaɓɛ, ɓɔɔ gbete wu ti nwang ka naa nagang ɓaaɓɛ, ka diki ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
40020022	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ rɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaa kpang. Nɔɔ naa zunung jìng dannang katɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ n naa dang ɓɛɛ ya?” A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu zunung katɔ.”
40020023	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dang jìng ɓi katɔ nɔngkɔ, a ɓɔɔ nwannang ka naa nakn, nɛɛ naa nagang mɛɛ, ɓi nkɔ a zang naa kpang. Nɔng nwannang keɓe, ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ palɛ ri ɓɛɛ.”
40020024	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ yaa kopi, tãa naa weɓe, gnvɔ shàa ri nɛɛ rɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana dɔli.
40020025	A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ “Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang, nɛɛ zang bang bang ɓarɛ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang zirɛ nɛɛ, rikɔ zang bang.
40020026	A ɓɔɔ manɛ ɓi nɔngkɔ kpang. Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang zang bang ka teteng manɛ piti, wukɔ wu nwang zang shoonang jong.
40020027	Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ti kasɛ nɛɛ wu naa nwang ka tìng, wukɔ wu nwang jaafoo manɛ jong.
40020028	Naa ɓɔɔ n ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n arɛ, nɛɛ zang shong m shoonang kpang, n arɛ nɛɛ n shong m zang kɔ jong, n ti malɛ bii mɛɛ ka ruu zang dɔli nɛɛ tɔɔ n ta yuu ɓarɛ.”
40020029	Yeesɔ ri seepaa daanang nɛɛ Gari Jeriko nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a zang dɔli ri dũng wu ka knti.
40020030	Zang jìng ringtang ziti ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nyaa gbalang, ri tãayi nɛɛ Yeesɔ tɛɛ kana, a ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Kpanti, Jaa Dawuda! gn ɓuru wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
40020031	A zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ ka knti, mangkɛ ri, nɛɛ ri vɔ̃ nyaa ta. Ri mɛɛ nyaa nabm tɔkn ka lapa nɛɛ, “Kpanti, Jaa Dawuda, gn ɓuru wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
40020032	A Yeesɔ shiiyi, ɓaa ri nyaa, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ viya?” A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ,
40020033	“Kpanti, ruu kasɛ mɔɔ pùu ruu jìng jong, ruu zi nɔng.”
40020034	Gn ɓarɛ kɔng Yeesɔ, a lee naa ka jìng ɓarɛ. Jìng ɓarɛ tantɛ kaa puunang, ri zi nɔng, a ri dũng Yeesɔ kati.
40021001	Ri a tɔ nɛɛ Urushalima naabm, a ri naa a ka Bɛtafaji ɓɔɔ ka doo kɔpɔ Zeetung ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ziti ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, shong ri ka tìng.
40021002	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita ka gari tɔkɔlɔng kɔ ka tìng manɛ ɓ'a, nɔɔ daa ìi seesaa ɓɔɔ zang mã ka laa ditɔ nɛɛ jaa ka doo. Nɔɔ kã̀l'ɛ, n'ɔɔ atɛ m ri.
40021003	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, Kpanti Yeesɔ kasɛ seesaa keɓe katɔ, nɛɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ ning. Yaa seesaa kaɓa ditɔ nɛɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ tantɛnang.”
40021004	Vuu keɓe nwang ka naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
40021005	Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ zang gari Sihiyona nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti manɛ a kana bii manɛ. Tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, vang seesaa, ka jaa seesaa.’”
40021006	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri daa palɛ kaa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
40021007	Ri daa atɛ seesaa kaa nɛɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ. Ri w'ɔɔr'ɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka dakn seesaa, a Yeesɔ vangnɛ nwang kagn.
40021008	Zang dɔli ri w'ɔɔr'ɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ, ka gbalang. A zang ɓɔɔ ri ti d'ɔl'ɔ nasãng laa nung manja ri w'ɔɔr'ɔ ka gbalang.
40021009	Zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri ka tìng Yeesɔ, a ɓɔɔ ri ti ka knti ɓiɓɛ, ri mɛɛrɛ nyaa kana nɛɛ, “Zang wu dɔɔ Jaa Dawuda ta. Laa wu a zang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ nung ɓiɓɛ tìnang tãanang. Zang wu ti dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ta.”
40021010	Yeesɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ Urushalima tɔ, zang zi naa gari ɓi takpang. Zang gari ri hɛ̃ɛ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Zang keɓe, ɓu wiya?”
40021011	A zang kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Wee ɓi Yeesɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ Nazara, ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
40021012	Yeesɔ daa ka yeti Gãa Laa, daa hing zang piti ɓɔɔ ri malɛ vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri hooro vuu, ka biling. A ti zìili teeburu zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ saka, nɛɛ nɔng nwannang zang ɓɔɔ ri malɛ ning koro kati.
40021013	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang bee ka labeenang Kpanti Laa nɛɛ Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Gãa mɛɛ, zang naa ɓaa ɓi nɛɛ Gãa Laa gaanang, a nɔɔ raayi nwang nɔɔ manɛ kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ ri waa kagn ɓɛɛ.’”
40021014	A zang jìng ringtang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ ri naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka yeti Gãa Laa, a masɛ ri kati.
40021015	Ɓɔɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ naa weɓe, nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wujɛ gɔɔ ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ, “Zang wu dɔɔ Jaa Dawuda,” gnvɔ shaa ri dɔli.
40021016	A ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wujɛ keɓe, ri kɔɔ ɓu tɔ ya?” Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, nɔɔ gã gngn ka yeti labeenang Laa kpang ya? Zang beeyi nɛɛ, ‘Laa kpɛ̃ɛrɛ wujɛ seseere naa ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ wu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.’”
40021017	A Yeesɔ yaa ri, nwang kaa nɛɛ yeti gari, daa roo ka Bɛtaniya.
40021018	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, Yeesɔ gbãayu kana gari tɔkn, a nyɔkɔ nyɔ wu kati.
40021019	A zi laa sìiri ka nyaa gbalang naabm, a daa ka doo ɓiɓɛ. A sìiri ra jaa ka laa kpang. zi gɔpɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A kù laa sìiri nyaa ka bii tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ra jaa takpang dondong.” A laa sìiri naa tantɛ kaa tɔɔrɔnang.
40021020	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri zi naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri tɔɔ, “Laa sìiri tɔɔrɔ bɛ̀'ɛ tantɛnang viya?”
40021021	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, naa nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, nɔɔ yaa danggn naa kpang, nɔɔ palɛ wu vuu kɔ n palɛ laa sìiri ɓee kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ kɔpɔ keɓe katɔ nɛɛ, ‘R'uu ta nɛɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ daa watɛ ka mii waapo.’ Ti palɛ katɔ nɔngkɔ.
40021022	Naa nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Kpanti Laa tɔ̃ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gàa wu piti, nɔɔ walɛ katɔ.”
40021023	A Yeesɔ naa daa tɔkn yeti Gãa Laa. Tusu zang vuu kana, a zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa, ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ walɛ naa vuu palɛnang keɓe ka niya? Ɓu wi, a mɔɔ naa vuu keɓe palɛnang wiya?”
40021024	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kaaɓi, n hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu jong gbete. Nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ m tɔ, n ti kɔɔ nɔɔ nɔng ɓɔɔ n walɛ naa vuu palɛnang keɓe kagn ɓɛɛ.”
40021025	A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi a Yɔhana naa Batizima ɓɔɔ wu pàl'ɛ zang wiya? Laa a wu ya, kɔ shɔnzang a wu?” A ri gaa tɔɔsung nyaa laanang ka naa ɓarɛ, ri tɔɔ, “Ruu kɔɔ wu ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Naa ruu kɔɔ wu nɛɛ Laa a wu, naa hɛ̃ɛ ruu nɛɛ, ‘A ka ruu vi, nɔɔ shing danggn ka ruu Yɔhana kpang viya?’
40021026	Naa ruu kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, ‘Shɔnzang a wu,’ ruu k'aa vɔrɔ zang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang piti shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ Yɔhana ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.”
40021027	A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu zi kpang.” Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N ti kɔɔ nɔɔ nɔng ɓɔɔ n walɛ naa vuu keɓe palɛnang kagn doo kpang kɔ.”
40021028	“Nɔɔ zi ɓu bɛɛ ka yeti manɛ viya? Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn, wujɛ ɓiɓɛ zang varɛ ziti. Daa kɔɔ ɓeejaa ɓɔɔ bang tɔɔ, ‘Jaa mɛɛ, daayi mɔɔ daa palɛ shoonang, lɛɛ ka jaa laa inabi.’
40021029	“A jaa kaɓa, kasɛ diiɓɛ nyaa tɔɔ ‘N daa m kpang.’ Làa nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ɓa tɔkɔlɔng, naa kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ, a daa kati.
40021030	A yɔɔ ti daa kɔɔ jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ gbete doo nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ wu daa palɛ shoonang ka jaa laa inabi. A jaa kaɓa, kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘N daa ditɔ dada,’ a naa daa kpang.”
40021031	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ka teteng wujɛ ziti kaɓa, zang gbete ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa ɓarɛ kasɛ, ɓu wiya?” A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang ɓɛɛ.” A Yeesɔ naa risi nyaa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ shing jìng ka varɛ kãanang, ri yee nɔɔ yuu daanang nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kana.
40021032	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yɔhana arɛ, nɛɛ wu naa tusu nɔɔ gbalang nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng ka varɛ kãanang kɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ jong. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti naa zi tɔɔ naa weɓe, nɔɔ ti kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ, nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.”
40021033	Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ tãa nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔgn ta. Yɔɔ ɓɔɔgn shɔlɔ laa inabi ka jaa ɓiɓɛ, a mang gbãng ɓee nyaa jaa nɔng kiiri kiiri. Ti palɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kãng mii jìng laa inabi kagn, nɛɛ putali ɓɔɔ zang shi kagn, zang gãng jìng ka jaa ɓɛɛ. A yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng ka jaa, a seepaa daa zanti ka koolaa ɓɔɔgn.
40021034	Diki jìng laa inabi hãnang naa raa bii, a yɔɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ. Shong ri ka bii zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri daa ta wu jìng laa.
40021035	“A zang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ yaa ri jaa, yiki zang shoonang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ jaa shongnɛ, a ri nyɔ ɓɔɔ gbete zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ, ri ti tuu ɓɔɔ gbete ri nyɔ ka tipi tang, a ri ti luku ɓɔɔ gbete nɛɛ tari.
40021036	Yɔɔ jaa ti naa shong zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔgn tɔkn ka bii ɓarɛ gaagaa, ɓa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang katɔ. Ri ti dang zang doo knti jìng doo nɔngkɔ.
40021037	Diki naa bee tɔkɔlɔng, a yɔɔ jaa naa paasɛ shong kaa jaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ naa kasɛ, ri tãa kaa nyaa jaa ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
40021038	“A ɓɔɔ ri zi jaa yɔɔ a kana, ri tɔng zɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘Wee jaa ɓɔɔ naa shaa vuu vɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ, nɔɔ a ta ruu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, tɔ̀ɔ jaa wu nwang ɓɔɔ ɓuru kati.’
40021039	A ri seepaa ri yi jaa, ri nwangsɛ wu ka nyaa jaa biling, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka nɔngkɔ.”
40021040	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri tɔɔ, “Naa yɔɔ jaa kaɓa naa arɛ, palɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa ɓiɓɛ ka naa biya?”
40021041	Ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ jaa kaɓa, naa nyɔkɔ zang yeti shi kpang kaɓa vɔrɔ katɔ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔgn, ɓɔɔ naa alɛ wu jìng laa ka diki ɓɔɔ zang hã jìng laa inabi kagn ɓɛɛ.”
40021042	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã̀ gngn ka yeti labeenang Kpanti Laa kpang ya? Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ: ‘Tari ɓɔɔ zang gãa mãanang ri bɛ̃ɛyi, wukɔ ràa tari ɓɔɔ yiti gãa kati. Kpanti Laa kɔ palɛ veɓe. Ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓuru, ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ.’
40021043	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang naa ta gbalang ɓɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ Laa kɔ Kpanti ditɔ nɛɛ naa manɛ, zang a zang ɓɔɔ ri naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40021044	Ṣhɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ naa watɛ ka tari keɓe, bii ɓiɓɛ naa kaka ditɔ. Tari kɔ nɛɛ watɛ jong ka yuu shɔnzang, shɔnzang kaɓa nangkɛ n'aà zũng tapuru.]”
40021045	Ɓɔɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang Farisawa ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang naa weɓe, ri tantɛ zinang ka yeti ɓarɛ, nɛɛ Yeesɔ ràng yee keɓe ka yuu ɓarɛ kɔ.
40021046	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri nɛɛ ri yi Yeesɔ katɔ, a ri kaa vɔrɔ zang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang dɔli shing danggn nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
40022001	A Yeesɔ rang ri yee kaa tɔkn nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ,
40022002	“Kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi nwang naa ruu yɔɔ Kpanti ɓɔɔ palɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ vuu shaanang kn sinyɛ ɓɛɛ.
40022003	A naa shong zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ka bii zang ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ, nɛɛ ri 'a ta, a ri bɛ̃ɛ anang kati ɓɛɛ.
40022004	“A yɔɔ kpanti ti naa shong zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔgn tɔkn ka bii zang ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa kɔɔ ri nɛɛ n hangsɛ vuu shaanang palɛnang tɔ. N yele guu napoo mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ɔ̃lɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ tɔ. N shìli vuu shaanang tɔ. Nɔɔ a nɔng kn sinyɛ shaanang ta.’
40022005	“A zang ɓɔɔ kpanti gaarɛ kaɓa, ri yee laa ɓarɛ kagn kpang. A ri daarɛ ɓarɛ ri. Zang gbete daa ka jaa ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ gbete daa ka nɔng vuu ɓiɓɛ malɛnang.
40022006	A zang ɓɔɔ kpanti gaarɛ, ɓɔɔ ri yaa knti, ri yiki zang shoonang kpanti, ri dang ri jìng, a ri nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ.
40022007	A gnvɔ shaa kpanti, kpanti shong zang sɔɔja ɓiɓɛ, ri daa nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔkɔ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ, a ri dɔɔ gari ɓarɛ nɛɛ waa kpayi kpayi.
40022008	“A Kpanti naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔgn, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Zang hangsɛ kn sinyɛ palɛnang tɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ n gaarɛ ri, ri daa naa ɓɔɔ ri shaayi kaa takpang.
40022009	Nɔɔ dita nyaa gbabang, nɔɔ daa gaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ìi piti, ri a nɔng kn sinyɛ.’
40022010	A zang shoonang yɔɔ ri daa ka nyaa gbabang, ri daa kpalɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri ìi ɓɛɛ kati. Zang shi kpang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ piti. A zang ɓɔɔ zang gaarɛ, ri yi nyaa nɔng kn sinyɛ kati.
40022011	“A yɔɔ kpanti naa arɛ, nɛɛ wu naa leng jìng ka zang ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ɓɛɛ, a naa zi shɔnzang gbete ɓɔɔgn nɔngkɔ, hãa zɔ̃ng fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang kn sinyɛ shaanang, hãlɛ ka bii kpang.
40022012	A yɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘Masang, mɔɔ palɛ bɛ̀'ɛ, mɔɔ a ka nihn, fɔ̃ɔrɔ kn sinyɛ shaanang kagn bii kpang viya?’ Yɔɔ shii tɔ wek, vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ takpang.
40022013	“A yɔɔ kpanti kɔɔ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ yi wu ta, n'ɔɔ ta naa nɛɛ doo. N'ɔɔ daa tasɛ ka biling, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kɔngkɔng ɓɛɛ. Nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kaayi, zang shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka kpaaka ɓɛɛ.’”
40022014	A Yeesɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ zang gaarɛ, ri dɔli, a zang ɓɔɔ zang shɛ̃ɛrɛ, ri kaa tɔ̀'ɔ dɔli kpang.”
40022015	A zang Farisawa ri daa tɔng zɔɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ ri yi wu ka yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ.
40022016	A ri shong zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng knti Kpanti Hiridu tɔɔ, ri daa kɔɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Maalang, ruu zi tɔ, mɔɔ suu see ɓ'aà kpang. Mɔɔ tùs'u zang ɓ'aà vuu ɓɔɔ nizang, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zang wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ruu ɓaaɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ ti shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓ'aà kpang ɓɛɛ.
40022017	Kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ, ka yuu ruu keɓe ta. Ruu shu Kpanti Kayisa, Kpanti Rooma saka tipi katɔ ya, kɔ ruu shu kpang?”
40022018	Yeesɔ ti zi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ gãsɛ m ka ruu viya?
40022019	Nɔɔ tusu m saka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shu saka tipi nɔng ta.” A ri atɛ wu saka kati.
40022020	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Wee ɓu waa nyaating, nɛɛ nung wi ka yuu saka keɓe wiya?”
40022021	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ Kayisa.” A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ a Kayisa vuu ɓiɓɛ ta, nɔɔ ti a Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ.”
40022022	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri yaa wu ri daa kati.
40022023	Ka diki kaɓa, zang Sadukiyawa ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang nɛɛ vɔ tɔ, zang seepaa ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ saa kpang, ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ,
40022024	“Maalang, Musa kɔɔ rùu tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yi jaa kagn nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ kpang, nɛɛ vɔ tɔ, ɓeezung wu sɔɔrɔ soro ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu yi wu jaa kati.
40022025	Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng ɓuru, nà'a ɓarɛ yi ri manziti. Jamari ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang shing soro, yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang, a vɔrɛ yàa ɓeezung ɓɔɔ pãng ka dakn ɓiɓɛ soro ɓiɓɛ.
40022026	A ɓeezung naa sɔɔrɔ wu, a ti yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang, ti vɔrɛ yaa soro kaɓa. Ɓeezung knti ɓɔɔgn ti naa sɔɔrɔ soro kaɓa tɔkn, a ti yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang, ti vɔrɛ yaa wu. Dɔ̃lɔ nɔngkɔ, daa nɔng ka yuu ɓarɛ man ziti nandon.
40022027	A jaa soro kaɓa naa vɔ kaa nɛɛ knti.
40022028	Ka diki ɓɔɔ zang naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa, jaa soro kaɓa naa nwang ɓu kaa soro wi gbete ka teteng zang manziti kɔ ri shìli wu ɓ'aà wiya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shìli wu katɔ kɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.”
40022029	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ning katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi labeenang Kpanti Laa, nɛɛ n'aa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
40022030	Zang nɛɛ naa wisi zang paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa, zang shing soro ɓi takpang, zang ti naa a zang wujɛ soro ɓi takpang nɛɛ zang gee ri kpang. Zang naa nwalɛ ɓi kaa naa zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
40022031	Ka yuu ruu ɓɔɔ zang naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ gã vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔ nɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, gngn kpang ya?
40022032	Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, ‘Nkɔ Laa Ibirayi, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Ishaaku, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Yakubu.’ Zang keɓe ri vɔlɔ tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ. Wee Laa ɓaa yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu Laa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ zang wisi ri paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓi Là'a zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ kpang, ɓi Laa zang ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ.”
40022033	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tãa tɔ naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ.
40022034	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa ri tãayi nɛɛ Yeesɔ y'ee zang Sadukiyawa yuu tɔ nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ, a ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng gbete.
40022035	A zang gbete ɓɔɔ zi labeenang Laa dɔli ka teteng ɓarɛ, gãsɛ Yeesɔ, hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ,
40022036	“Maalang, ka yeti nyaa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa d'angnɛ, ɓu wi bang wiya?”
40022037	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ kasɛ ruu Kpanti Laa ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ yeti ɓaaɓɛ piti, nɛɛ suru bii ɓaaɓɛ piti, nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓaaɓɛ piti.
40022038	Wee nyaa bang ɓɔɔ Laa dang kɔ. Wukɔ ka tìng.
40022039	Ɓɔɔ ɓàng doo ɓiɓɛ, ɓi weɓe. ‘Kàsɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwalɛ nɛɛ ri doo naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.’
40022040	Labeenang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ri kɔɔrɔ piti, di yuu ɓi ka nyaa kɔ Kpanti Laa dang ziti ɓee kɔ.”
40022041	Zang Farisawa ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ ka nɔng gbete, a Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ,
40022042	“Nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ Kirisi (zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ) ɓu wiya? Ɓu jaa zɔ̃ng wiya?” A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda.”
40022043	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “A ka ruu vi, Suru Laa tusu Dawuda gbalang, a zirɛ, a ɓaa Kirisi nɛɛ ‘Kpanti’ viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Dawuda kɔɔyi tɔɔ:
40022044	‘Kpanti Laa kɔɔ Kpanti mɛɛ tɔɔ, nwang ta naa nakn mɛɛ, n shing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang ditɔ, mɔɔ naa ri nɛɛ doo ɓaaɓɛ.’
40022045	Dawuda nɛɛ ɓàa wu nɛɛ ‘Kpanti,’ ɓu wi bang ka teteng ɓarɛ wiya?”
40022046	Zang gbete ɓɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa takpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu ka diki kaɓa, zang gbete ɓɔɔ paasɛ wu ruu hɛ̃ɛnang ɓɔɔgn kpang.
40023001	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ,
40023002	“Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa, nɛɛ zang Farisawa, rikɔ tèng doo Musa.
40023003	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, ka vuu ɓɔɔ, ri kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ nɔɔ kati. A n'ɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ manɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
40023004	Ri ìi zang nyaa ka vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa katɔ palɛnang, a ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri lee naa ɓarɛ kagn kpang.
40023005	Vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, ri palɛ ɓarɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi ri kati ɓɛɛ. Ri pu jaa baajaa ɓɔɔ ri tɛ̃ɛ ruu Laa ɓarɛ kagn nɛɛ koo zaa nwɛɛri pokoto pokoto, ri mã ka waa nyaating ɓarɛ. Ri ti hãlɛ ɓarɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓiɓɛ beebang beebang ɓɛɛ.
40023006	Ri kasɛ nwannang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang bang ri nwalɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn zang shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ.
40023007	Ri ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang jeere ri nyaa ka nɔng piti ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓaarɛ ri nɛɛ maalang.
40023008	“Zang wu ɓàa nɔɔ manɛ nɛɛ ‘maalang’ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, maalang manɛ ɓi gbete kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ manɛ kaa naa jaanaa zɔɔ kɔ nandon.
40023009	N'ɔɔ ti ɓàa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ‘dada’ ka koo keɓe kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Daa manɛ ɓi gbete kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. Nɔng nwannang ɓiɓɛ ɓi ti ka lapa.
40023010	Zang ri ti ɓaarɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ ‘Zang bang’ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang bang manɛ ɓi gbete kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. Zang bang kaɓa wukɔ Kirisi.
40023011	Shɔnzang bang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ piti wukɔ wu raa zang ɓɔɔ shong nɔɔ jong.
40023012	Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ piti, zang naa sɔɔrɔ wukɔ yuu jong ka dii. A zang ɓɔɔ sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka dii, zang naa tuu wukɔ jong ka lapa.
40023013	“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu nɛɛ zang Farisawa, nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɔɔ zang gbalang ɓɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ Laa wukɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ta wu kpang, a nɔɔ ti yàa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ wu tanang katɔ gbalang kpang ɓɛɛ.
40023014	Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu nɛɛ zang Farisawa. Nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ mulu suvɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti gaa Laa sasak, nɛɛ tɔɔ zang zi nɔɔ kati ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Kpanti Laa naa dang nɔɔ jìng ditɔ dɔli, ɓa ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang piti.
40023015	“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang Farisawa. Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ rakɛ ka yuu tipi, nɛɛ yuu mii waapo piti, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kãa zang gbete ɓɔɔ dũng knti manɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ìi tɔ, nɔɔ risi wu, wu nwang zang ɓɔɔ ɓa nɔɔ vuu shi kpang palɛnang katɔ dakn ziti, ɓɔɔ daa nɛɛ nɔɔ ning ka waa bang.
40023016	“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ, zang jìng ringtang ɓɔɔ tusu zang gbalang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Naa zang tũng Laa nɛɛ Gãa Laa, vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kagn kpang. A naa shɔnzang tũng Laa nɛɛ zinariya ɓɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa, wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tũng ɓɛɛ ta.’
40023017	Nɔɔ shoko zang jìng ringtang. Ɓu vi bang viya? Zinariya ya, kɔ Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ risi zinariya keɓe nwang vuu Laa ɓɛɛ?
40023018	Nɔɔ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ ‘Naa shɔnzang tũng Laa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang d'ɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu kagn, vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kagn kpang. A n'aa shɔnzang tũng Laa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, zang wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tũng ɓɛɛ ta.’
40023019	Nɔɔ zang jìng ringtang, ɓu vi bang viya? Vuu ɓɔɔ zang a Kpanti Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang d'ɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɛɛ ya? Kɔ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu, ɓɔɔ risi vuu keɓe, ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Kpanti Laa nwang vuu Laa ɓɛɛ ya?
40023020	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tũng Laa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu, tũng Laa ɓi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ nandon.
40023021	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti tũng Laa nɛɛ Gãa Laa, tũng Laa ɓi nɛɛ Gãa Laa nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ nwang kagn ɓɛɛ.
40023022	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tũng Laa nɛɛ lapa, tũng ɓi nɛɛ laa nwannang Kpanti Laa, nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ning.
40023023	“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu nɛɛ zang Farisawa, nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ a Kpanti Laa vuu gbete ka yeti kopi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ langkɛ wu dɔli kpang naa rɛɛ zitaa, nɛɛ seteng, a ɓɔɔ yaaji kɔ̃ɔlaa ɓɛɛ katɔ nandon. A nɔɔ dũng ruu bang ɓɔɔ ka yeti labeenang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Kpanti Laa kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu tɔ̃ɔ. Nɛɛ gn zang wu ti kɔng nɔɔ katɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ ti kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nimbang ning.
40023024	Zang jìng ringtang ɓɔɔ tusu zang gbalang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ yàk'ɛ vuu seseere ɓɔɔ naa pũng, ka mii ɓoonang manɛ, a nɔɔ mã vuu bang, ɓɔɔ naa napoo kɔ jong.
40023025	“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu nɛɛ zang Farisawa. Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nwang naa waka, nɛɛ gbanti ɓɔɔ zang sɔɔ dakn biling kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, a yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔ̀ɔ ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeti manɛ nwang doo nɔngkɔ. Yeti manɛ ɓi ɓangge nɛɛ yuu kasɛnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
40023026	Yɔɔ Farisi kɔ jìng ringtang ɓi, gaayu nɛɛ yeti juwa, nɛɛ gbanti kɔ sɔɔnang shɔɔnang, tɔɔ dakn ɓarɛ wu pu kaa jong.
40023027	“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang Farisawa. Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ, nwang naa, yuu sàa ɓɔɔ zang mãarɛ, zang nwaa kponsi puru ka bii ɓarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri shi kaa nɛɛ biling ɓɛɛ. A yeti ɓarɛ ɓi kaka shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ pũlu katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
40023028	Nɔɔ nwang doo nɔngkɔ. Nɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka jìng zang, a vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti manɛ, ɓi zang nwaarɛnang nɛɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
40023029	“Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang Farisawa. Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gbarɛ mãanang yuu sà'a zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ.
40023030	A nɔɔ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Naa ruu nɛɛ nwang jong ka diki daa ɓuru ɓɔɔ ka tìng, ruu nɛɛ y'i naa ɓuru ka zang nyaa shoonang Laa nyɔnang nɛɛ ri kpang.’
40023031	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ nɔɔ zi tɔ, nɛɛ nɔkɔ wujɛ zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔkɔ zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
40023032	Nɔɔ hangsɛ nyaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ daa manɛ ri yaa ɓɛɛ ta.
40023033	“Sɔkɔ keɓe, nɔkɔ wujɛ sɔkɔ pudi ɓi. Nɔɔ naa wɔ daanang ka yeti waa bang ɓu kaa biya?
40023034	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n shong nɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ditɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ naa nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ ditɔ, nɔɔ ti ɓaarɛ ɓɔɔ naa ka laa. Nɔɔ ti naa nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gbãa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang manɛ. Nɔɔ ti naa hingki ɓɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ gari manɛ piti.
40023035	Tɔ̀ɔ, jìng dannang zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ̀kɔ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe piti, wu nwang ka yuu manɛ. Zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ bii Habila, a naa a ka yuu Zakariya jaa Berikiya ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nyɔ ka teteng Gãa Laa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɛɛ.
40023036	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, jìng dannang ɓɔɔ ka ruu vuu keɓe piti, naa nwang ɓi ka yuu zɔ̃ng doo jaa knti keɓe kɔ.
40023037	“Zang Urushalima, zang Urushalima, nɔkɔ nyɔkɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa. A nɔɔ ti luku zang ɓɔɔ zang shong ka bii manɛ nɛɛ tari. Diki ɓɔɔ n tɔɔ, n kpalɛ nɔɔ yuu ka zɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nà'a kn kpalɛ jaa seseere ɓiɓɛ ka dii nasãng daa kaa nɛya? A nɔɔ kasɛ kpang.
40023038	Zang naa yaa nɔɔ gãa ɓɔɔ ka Urushalima ditɔ, wu raa dãzãa.
40023039	N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ, nɔɔ naa paasɛ m zinang tɔkn, nɔɔ nɛɛ naa kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, ‘Laa wu a zang ɓɔɔ a ka nung Kpanti Laa tìnang tãanang ɓɛɛ.’”
40024001	Yeesɔ nwang tɔ nɛɛ Gãa Laa, daa kana, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri tusu wu Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ zang mãa ɓɛɛ kati.
40024002	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe tɔ nandon nizang. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang naa yaa tari ɓɔɔ pãng ka yuu zɔɔ gbete kpang. Zang naa jili ditɔ ka tipi nandon.”
40024003	Yeesɔ daa nwang tɔ ka yuu kɔpɔ Zeetung, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka naa ɓarɛ. A ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu diki ɓɔɔ zang naa palɛ vuu keɓe ta. Mɔɔ ti kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi diki ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gbãayu kagn, nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe naa waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
40024004	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, zang ɓɔɔ wu nwaarɛ nɔɔ kpang.
40024005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang dɔli naa a nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, nɛɛ rikɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ri naa nwaarɛ zang dɔli.
40024006	Nɔɔ ti naa tãlɛ nyaa sìiri tanang ditɔ nɛɛ ruu sìiri ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, vuu keɓe a ɓi katɔ, a ɓi gn diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.
40024007	Zang tipi ɓɔɔ naa gaa nyaa ditɔ nɛɛ zang tipi ɓɔɔgn. Kpanti ɓɔɔ ti naa gaa nyaa ditɔ nɛɛ Kpanti ɓɔɔgn. Nyɔkɔ bang, nɛɛ tipi ruutunang, ri ti naa nwang ditɔ ka tipi koo dɔli.
40024008	Vuu keɓe piti, ɓi doo jìng dannang gaayu naa ɓɔɔ jaa gaa zang soro yuu kɔnang ɓɛɛ.
40024009	“Zang ti naa yiki nɔɔ ditɔ, zang a zang ɓɔɔ ri dang nɔɔ jìng, tɔɔ ri nyɔ nɔɔ vɔrɔ kati. Zang koo keɓe piti naa bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ditɔ ka ruu nung mɛɛ.
40024010	Ka diki kaɓa, zang dɔli ri naa yaa danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Kpanti Laa ditɔ. Ri naa kasɛ ruu zɔɔ takpang, ri naa malɛ yuu zɔɔ ditɔ.
40024011	Zang ɓɔɔ ri suu sè'e nɛɛ ri zang nyaa shoonang Laa, ri naa arɛ ri nwaarɛ zang dɔli.
40024012	Ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ naa shangkɛ ɓɛɛ, zang naa kasɛ ruu zɔɔ tɔ̀'ɔ dɔli kpang.
40024013	A zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ naa mã danggn sasak, wukɔ naa wɔrɛ.
40024014	Zang naa rang zang koolaa keɓe Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa ditɔ nandon, tɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka rɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, koo keɓe wu naa waa nyaa kati.”
40024015	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ naa zi vuu baabi ɓɔɔ Daninya zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔyi, shii tɔ ka nɔng nwannang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa, (Zang ɓɔɔ bee Labeenang Laa katɔ, wu zi kati.)
40024016	Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu keɓe tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahuda, ri yurɛ, ri daa ka kɔpɔ.
40024017	Zang ɓɔɔ ka yuu gãa, wu shooro tɔ̀'ɔ tipi, nɛɛ wu naa ya vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ kpang.
40024018	Zang ɓɔɔ ka jaa, wu ti gbãayu tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ wu naa tuu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang.
40024019	Vuu gn kɔnang kagn yuu zang soro ɓɔɔ jaa ka yeti nɛɛ ɓɔɔ jaa ka naa, ka diki kaɓa.
40024020	Nɔɔ gaa Kpanti Laa nɛɛ, vuu keɓe wu palɛ nɛɛ gãmbang guusi, kɔ ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang manɛ kpang.
40024021	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jìng dannang bang kagn diki kaɓa ɓɛɛ. Zang zi jìng dannang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe gngn ka koo keɓe doo gbete kpang. Zang naa paasɛ jìng dannang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe takpang.
40024022	Kpanti Laa nɛ̀'ɛ s'ɔɔrɔ̀ diki keɓe ka knti tɔkɔlɔng kpang, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wɔ kagn gbete gãagãa kpang. A Kpanti Laa naa s'ɔɔrɔ̀ diki keɓe, ka ruu zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ ɓɛɛ.
40024023	“Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, ka nihn, kɔ ka kaaɓa, nɔɔ yee laa manɛ kagn kpang.
40024024	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ Kirisi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri suu sè'e nɛɛ ri zang nyaa shoonang Laa naa alɛ ditɔ, ri tusu vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang kati. Naa ri zunung zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri nwaarɛnang katɔ, ri nɛɛ nw'aarɛ̀ ri katɔ.
40024025	Nɔɔ shing danggn kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
40024026	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang nɛɛ naa kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, Kirisi ka jìngti, nɔɔ daa kpang. Ri nɛɛ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, wee ka yeti jaka tìng ɓee, nɔɔ yee laa kagn kpang,
40024027	ka ruu ɓɔɔ, anang Jaa Shɔnzang nwang ɓi naa shala mii ɓɔɔ mangkɛ nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɔng, a zang ɓɔɔ ka dii ɓɔɔ laa hãa nyaa kagn ri ti zi katɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
40024028	Nɔng ɓɔɔ vuu vɔ kagn, jãa kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔngkɔ.
40024029	“Jìng dannang bang kaɓa nɛɛ waa nyaa tɔ hn, laa kɔ ruu zi ka lapa ɓee, naa tɔ̀ɔ katɔ. Shala ti naa yàkɛ̀ nɔng takpang. Sang ri ti naa shili nɛɛ lapa. Vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa piti naa rùut'u katɔ.
40024030	“Tɔ̀ɔ zang naa zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn ka lapa ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ n ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n a kana ɓɛɛ. Zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe piti, ri naa kaa ditɔ. Ri ti naa zi m kati, ka ɓɔɔ n a ka yeti sãmbong nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang mɛɛ, nɛɛ bannang mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
40024031	N naa shong zang nyaa shoonang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ lapa ditɔ nɛɛ vuu kãng ɓɔɔ k'aa dɔli ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ ri kpalɛ m zang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n shɛ̃ɛrɛ ka koo keɓe piti, nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɔng, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dii ɓɔɔ laa hãa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ.
40024032	“Nɔɔ mantɛ vuu ta, ka bii laa sìiri. Nasãng laa sìiri nɛɛ lɔɔ gɔpɔ tɔ, ɓɔɔ shɔɔ nɛɛ lusu tɔ, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ nɔng guusi a naabm tɔ.
40024033	Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi vuu keɓe tɔ piti naa weɓe, n'ɔɔ zi kati nɛɛ Jaa Shɔnzang a naabm tɔ, ka nyaa gãa.
40024034	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, koo jaa knti keɓe naa ɓa kpang, vuu keɓe naa palɛ tɔ nizang gbongkarɛ nandon.
40024035	Lapa nɛɛ tipi ri naa shaarɛ ditɔ nandon, a ruu mɛɛ shaarɛ ɓi kpang.
40024036	“Zang gbete ɓɔɔ zi diki, nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ n gbãayu kagn kpang. Zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ n ɓɔɔ n Jaa Laa piti, ruu zi kpang, ɓi Kpanti Laa kɔ zi gbete.
40024037	Diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang naa a kagn, nwang naa diki ɓɔɔ Nuhu nwang kagn ɓɛɛ.
40024038	Ka diki ɓɔɔ mii lapa bang a gn kpang, zang shaa vuu shaanang, zang ɓoo ɓɔɔ ɓoonang, zang gee soro, a zang ti 'a zang wujɛ soro ɓarɛ, zang shingnɛ. Ri palɛ nɔngkɔ sasak, Nuhu naa daa nɔng ka yeti Laana.
40024039	Ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ knti kpang. A mii lapa bang naa arɛ, see ri nandon. Diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang naa arɛ nwang doo nɔngkɔ.
40024040	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ziti ri lang jaa, Laa naa tuu zang gbete wu yaa ɓɔɔ gbete.
40024041	Zang soro ziti ɓɔɔ ri naa nang vuu ka yuu ree, Laa ti naa tuu gbete, wu yaa ɓɔɔ gbete.
40024042	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti manɛ a kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
40024043	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, naa zang gãa nɛ̀'ɛ tãa nyaa diki ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ a vuu ɓɔɔnang kagn tɔ, nɛ̀'ɛ gãng jìng ka gãa ɓiɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Shɔngɓɔ nɛ̀'ɛ naa shɛ̃ɛ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ see wu vuu ɓɛɛ.
40024044	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang a ka làa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
40024045	“A ɓu wi zang shoonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ, ɓɔɔ dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ yaa wu zang ɓɔɔ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu alɛ ri vuu shaanang ka laa ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu kagn wiya?
40024046	Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ, zang shoonang kaɓa kɔ, dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ naa ìi wu palɛ doo shoonang ɓɔɔ wu yaa wu ɓɛɛ.
40024047	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, dabang ɓiɓɛ naa shing wu ka yuu vuu naa ɓiɓɛ nandon.
40024048	A n'aa zang shoonang kaɓa, yeti ɓiɓɛ shi kpang, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Dabang gãa mɛɛ a ɓi pati kpang?’
40024049	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, a gaa tɔɔsung ɓeezung shoonang nyɔkɔnang kati. A shaa vuu shaanang, a ti ɓoo sàa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ sàa palɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40024050	A dabang gãa zang shoonang kaɓa, naa a ka diki ɓɔɔ zang shoonang kaɓa shing danggn anang ɓiɓɛ kpang nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ wu zi kpang ɓɛɛ.
40024051	Dabang ɓiɓɛ naa dang wu jìng ditɔ, wu ti shing wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kaayi, zang shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka kpaaka ɓɛɛ.
40025001	“Ka diki kaɓa kpanti roonang Laa naa nwang naa ruu rɛɛ ja soo kopi ɓɔɔ ri daa kn sinyɛ shaanang ɓɛɛ. Ri yaka waa zà'ang sɔɔ nɛɛ ri daa ɓee sinyɛ ɓeevɛ yuu.
40025002	Ka teteng ja soo kopi kaɓa, ɓɔɔ maani zũng kpang, a ɓɔɔ maani zũng ɓarɛ katɔ.
40025003	Ɓɔɔ zũng kpang maani kaɓa, daa ɓarɛ nɛɛ nung waa ka zà'ang kpang.
40025004	A ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ maani kaɓa, daarɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ nung waa ka zà'ang ning.
40025005	“Ri daa nwang tɔ, a sinyɛ ɓeevɛ a pati kpang, a hingro naa yiki ri.
40025006	Kaa nɛɛ teteng gãmbang, zang sãa nyaa ka lapa, nɛɛ, ‘Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ a kana, nɔɔ nwang ta, nɔɔ kpisi wu yuu.’
40025007	“A rɛɛ ja soo kopi kaɓa ri seepaa, ri gisi waa ɓɔɔ ka zà'ang sɔɔ ɓarɛ.
40025008	A ja soo maani ɓɔɔ zũng kpang kaɓa, kɔɔ rɛɛ ɓeesang ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ rùu nung manɛ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ waa zà'ang sɔɔ ɓuru ning kana ɓɛɛ.’
40025009	“A, rɛɛ ja soo maani ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ kaɓa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nung ɓuru, daa ɓɔɔ ruu basɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang. Nɔɔ dita, n'ɔɔ daa hoo ɓɔɔ manɛ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri malɛ ɓɛɛ.’
40025010	“Ja soo maani ɓɔɔ zũng kpang kaɓa, ri daa tɔ nɔng nung hoonang, a sinyɛ ɓeevɛ naa a ka knti ɓarɛ. Ja soo maani ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ bii tɔ kaɓa, ri daa ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ wu, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shaa kn sinyɛ ɓɛɛ. A zang ku nyaa gãa kati.
40025011	“Knti nɛɛ tɔɔ wu bee tɔkɔlɔng, ja soo maani ɓɔɔ ri daa nung waa zà'ang sɔɔ ɓarɛ hooronang, ri naa arɛ. Ri ɓaa nyaa nɛɛ, ‘Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ, puu ruu nyaa gãa jong.’
40025012	“Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, ‘N kɔɔ nɔɔ katɔ kɔ nwani, n zi nɔɔ nung kpang.’”
40025013	A Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi diki nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ n gbãayu kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40025014	“Kpanti roonang Laa, naa nwang naa ruu yɔɔ ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu daa zanti, a ɓaa nyaa ka zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ, yàa ri vuu naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
40025015	Yɔɔ kaɓa, a zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ gbete saka jaka maani, ti a zang gbete jaka ziti, a ti a zang gbete jaka gbete ka naa zũnnang ɓarɛ. A seepaa daa zanti kati.
40025016	Zang shoonang yɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ ta saka jaka maani kaɓa, tuu saka ɓiɓɛ daa hooro vuu ɓɔɔ wu naa malɛ nɛɛ mani tantɛnang. A naa walɛ jaka ɓɔɔgn n'ɔng maani.
40025017	A zang gbete ɓɔɔ ta saka jaka ziti, ti daa walɛ ɓɔɔgn n'ɔng ziti.
40025018	A, zang gbete ɓɔɔ ta jaka gbete kaɓa, daayi daa gbãa tipi, a waasɛ̃ saka yɔɔ gãa ɓiɓɛ kagn.
40025019	“Diki bee tɔ, a yɔɔ gãa rɛɛ zang shoonang kaɓa naa gbãayu kati. A ɓaa ri nyaa, hɛ̃ɛlɛ ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ saka ɓɔɔ wu alɛ ri ɓɛɛ kati.
40025020	A zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu a wu jaka maani, arɛ naa a wu kaa jaka kopi. A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti, mɔɔ a m jaka maani, n walɛ ɓɔɔgn tɔ n'ɔng maani.’
40025021	“Yɔɔ gãa ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Nn hn, mɔɔ zang shoonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang, ti palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, n shing mɔɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ. A ta, mɔɔ tãa tìnang nɛɛ n.’
40025022	“A zang shoonang yɔɔ gãa gbete ɓɔɔ yɔɔ a wu jaka ziti, ti arɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti, mɔɔ a m jaka ziti n walɛ ɓɔɔgn tɔ n'ɔng ziti.’
40025023	“Yɔɔ gãa ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Nn hn zang shoonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang, ti palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, n shing mɔɔ ka yuu ɓɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ. A ta, mɔɔ tãa tìnang nɛɛ n.’
40025024	“A zang shoonang yɔɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ yɔɔ a wu jaka gbete naa arɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti, n zi tɔ, mɔɔ kpãa nyaa ɓaa katɔ, mɔɔ y'ee vuu ɓ'aà ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓ'aà kpang ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ ti kpalɛ vuu ɓ'aà ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ vang jìng vuu kpang ɓɛɛ.
40025025	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kaa vɔrɔ, a n daayi, n daa waasɛ̃ saka ɓaaɓɛ ka tipi. Vuu ɓaaɓɛ keɓe, ta, ta.’
40025026	“A yɔɔ gãa ɓiɓɛ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ ɓ'aà zang shoonang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ lagn dɔli. Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ n y'ee vuu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ n ɓaa kpang. N ti kpalɛ vuu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ n vang kpang.
40025027	A ka ruu vi, mɔɔ shìng m saka mɛɛ ka gãa ɓɔɔ zang shing saka kagn kpang viya? Wee n gbãayu, n nɛɛ naa ta kaa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang gisi zang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ning, kpang ya?’
40025028	“A raa jìng kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ ta saka ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ ta, n'ɔɔ a zang shoonang ɓɔɔ, ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kopi ɓɛɛ,
40025029	ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn zang naa gisi wu ɓɔɔgn ditɔ tɔkn, tɔ̀ɔ ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ wu shang kati. A zang piti ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang, vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ tɔkɔlɔng, zang naa ta ditɔ.’
40025030	A yɔɔ kpanti kɔɔ zang tɔkn nɛɛ ‘Nɔɔ tasɛ zang shoonang shi kpang keɓe ta ka biling, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang naa kaayi, zang shaa nyaa kagn kpaaka kpaaka ɓɛɛ.’”
40025031	“Ka diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang naa a ka naa bannang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka ri lapa piti, naa nwang ka yuu laa nwannang Kpanti ɓiɓɛ.
40025032	Zang naa kpalɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe ditɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ nandon, tɔɔ, wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓiɓɛ kaa naa ɓɔɔ jagang shɛ̃ɛrɛ mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ nɛɛ teteng jàa ɓɛɛ.
40025033	Wu naa kpalɛ mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ka naa nakn, jàa ɓi kaa naa nagang ɓiɓɛ.
40025034	Kpanti wu naa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka naa nakn ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ a ri tìnang tãanang tɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ a ta n'ɔɔ ta vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ shìli nɔɔ, doo ka diki ɓɔɔ wu gaayu koo keɓe mãanang ɓɛɛ.
40025035	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyɔkɔ nyɔ m, nɔɔ a m vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ. Sutu ti mãa m nyaa, nɔɔ a m vuu ɓoonang. N ti a zanti, nɔɔ ta m ka gãa manɛ.
40025036	N nwang bii waati, a nɔɔ hãa m fɔ̃ɔrɔ. Kɔnang yi m, nɔɔ gãng jìng ka n. Zang mã m ka sãa, a nɔɔ lengke jìng ka n ɓɛɛ.’
40025037	“A zang ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, naa kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti, nyɔkɔ nyɔ mɔɔ gn vi, ruu zi mɔɔ, a ruu a mɔɔ vuu shaanang viya? Sutu ti mã mɔɔ nyaa gn vi, ruu a mɔɔ vuu ɓoonang viya?
40025038	Mɔɔ ti 'a zanti gn vi, ruu zi mɔɔ, a ruu ta mɔɔ ka gãa ɓuru viya? Mɔɔ ti nwang bii waati gn vi, ruu ti hãa mɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ viya?
40025039	Kɔnang ti yi mɔɔ gn vi, a zang ti mã mɔɔ gn vi ka sãa, a ruu zirɛ, ruu daa leng jìng ka mɔɔ viya?’
40025040	“A Kpanti naa kasɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, ‘N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ zang gbete ɓɔɔ wukɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng rɛɛ manzung keɓe, nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ nkɔ.’
40025041	“A naa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka naa nagang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa ku nɔɔ nyaa tɔ ka bii, ka ruu vuu shi kpang manɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ dita yeti waa ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ka ruu Kpanti suru shi kpang nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
40025042	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyɔkɔ nyɔ m, nɔɔ a m vuu shaanang kpang ɓɛɛ. sutu ti mã m nyaa, nɔɔ ti a m vuu ɓoonang kpang.
40025043	N a zanti, nɔɔ ti ta m ka gãa manɛ kpang. N nwang bii waati, nɔɔ hãa m fɔ̃ɔrɔ kpang. Kɔnang yi m, a zang ti mã m ka sãa nɔɔ lengke jìng ka n kpang.’
40025044	“A ri naa kasɛ wu nyaa doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti Laa, ruu zi mɔɔ gn vi nyɔkɔ nyɔ mɔɔ katɔ, sutu mãa mɔɔ, bii ɓaaɓɛ ti waati, a ruu yi mɔɔ naa ka bii kpang viya? Mɔɔ ti a zanti gn vi, a ruu ta mɔɔ ka gãa ɓuru kpang viya? Kɔnang ti palɛ mɔɔ gn vi, ruu ti zi mɔɔ gn vi ka sãa a ruu lengke jìng ka mɔɔ kpang viya?’
40025045	“A Kpanti naa kasɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, ‘N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng rɛɛ manzung keɓe kpang, nɔɔ palɛ nkɔ kpang.’
40025046	“Ri naa daa ɓarɛ ka nɔng jìng dannang ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, ri naa wàl'ɛ ɓarɛ kaa suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40026001	Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa yee keɓe rannang tɔ nandon, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ,
40026002	“Nɔɔ zi tɔɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa Pasika yaa lɛɛ kaa ziti. Zang naa yi m ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang, zang a zang ɓɔɔ ri naa ɓaa m naa ka laa ɓɛɛ.”
40026003	Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka yeti gãa Kayifa, Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa.
40026004	A ri tɔng zɔɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ ri yi Yeesɔ nɛɛ nwiiri, ri nyɔ wu ɓɛɛ.
40026005	Ri kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “R'uu palɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa Pasika kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ palɛ nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
40026006	Diki ɓɔ̀'ɔgn Yeesɔ ka Bɛtani, ka gãa Siman ɓɔɔ bɛɛ vuu bii shaa wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40026007	A jaa soro ɓɔ̀'ɔgn, a nɛɛ nung tũurunang ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔli, ka zà'ang nung ɓɔɔ shi dɔli ɓɛɛ, a tũngku Yeesɔ ka yuu bɛɛ shaa vuu shaanang.
40026008	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri zi naa weɓe, gnvɔ shaa ri, ri tɔɔ, “Zang lasɛ nung keɓe ka ruu viya?
40026009	Zang nɛ̀'ɛ màlɛ̀ nung keɓe saka gaagaa, tɔɔ zang alɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
40026010	Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓi tɔ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ k'ongsò jaa soro keɓe ka ruu viya? Jaa soro keɓe pàl'ɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
40026011	Nɔɔ nw'alɛ̀ manɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang diki diki, a n nw'ang nɛɛ nɔɔ sasak kpang.
40026012	Nung kɔ jaa soro tũngku m ka bii ɓee, tũuru m kaa nung vɔrɔ kɔ nwani.
40026013	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang naa rang tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa kagn koo keɓe piti, zang naa kɔɔ ruu vuu kɔ jaa soro keɓe palɛ ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, danggn jaa soro keɓe nɛ̀'ɛ ning zang ɓɛɛ.”
40026014	A zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yahuda Isikariyoti, daa ka bii zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa,
40026015	a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Naa n a nɔɔ Yeesɔ, nɔɔ a m viya?” A ri gã saka ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ azurufa bmati tu kopi, nɛɛ ri naa a wu.
40026016	A Yahuda gaa tɔɔsung gbalang kãanang ɓɔɔ wu naa malɛ zang Yeesɔ kaa nɛɛ diki kaɓa kɔ.
40026017	Ka diki ɓɔɔ zang gaayu shaanang nyaalaa borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ ruu pàl'ɛ mɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa shaa ka nyaalaa Pasika ka niya?”
40026018	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ daa ka bii shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ka gari, nɔɔ daa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ ‘Maalang tɔɔ, diki mɛɛ a tɔ naabm, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kasɛ n tɔɔ, n shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa Pasika nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ.’”
40026019	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri daa palɛ ka naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ vuu shaanang Pasika kati.
40026020	Yeesɔ naa nwang tɔ ka nɔng vuu shaanang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ laarang,
40026021	ri shaa vuu shaanang kana, a Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, shɔnzang gbete ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ, naa malɛ m ditɔ.”
40026022	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔli. A ri gaa tɔɔsung Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛnang kati nɛɛ, “Ɓu wiya maalang? Nkɔ ya?”
40026023	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ hãa naa nɛɛ n ka gbanti, wukɔ naa nyɔ yuu mɛɛ.
40026024	Jaa Shɔnzang naa vɔ katɔ naa ɓɔɔ Labeenang Kpanti Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A jìng dannang kagn yuu zang ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ yuu Jaa Shɔnzang ɓɛɛ. Zang nɛɛ yi zang kaɓa kpang kɔ gbã̀'agbãa, wukɔ nɛɛ daa wu.”
40026025	A Yahuda ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Nkɔ ya maalang?” A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, mɔkɔ.”
40026026	Ri shaa vuu shaanang kana, a Yeesɔ tuu borodi zãa Kpanti Laa, a shalɛ a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kati. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ta ta nɔɔ shaayi. Weɓe yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ kɔ.”
40026027	A ti tuu juwa, a zãa Kpanti Laa, a ri kati. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ta ta, nɔɔ ɓooro ka yuu manɛ nandon.
40026028	Wee zìi mɛɛ ɓɔɔ naa tusu zang nɛɛ nyaa shɔɔ ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ zang, naa nwang kaa nizang ɓɛɛ. Zìi mɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ ka ruu zang dɔli, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ Laa wu kɔsɔ ri vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati ɓɛɛ.
40026029	N kɔɔ nɔɔ, n naa ɓoo mii jìng laa inabi tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ tɔkn kpang, n naa ɓoo kaa ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ɓɔɔ ruu daa ɓoo nɛɛ nɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
40026030	A ri naa gaa soo, ri daa kaa kɔpɔ Zeetung.
40026031	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ zìi, nɔɔ naa yuku ditɔ nandon nɔɔ yaa m. Laa kɔɔ nɔngkɔ ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘N nyɔ jagang vɔrɔ ditɔ, tɔɔ mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ri naa tantɛ kati.’
40026032	“N nɛɛ seepaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa, nɔɔ naa ìi m kaa nɛɛ Galili.”
40026033	A Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Naa ri yuku doo piti ri yaa mɔɔ, n yaa mɔɔ m kpang.”
40026034	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, ɓɔɔ kn naa ɓaa nyaa lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ zìi keɓe, bɛɛ mɔɔ laa nyaa tɔ daa doo taati, nɛɛ mɔɔ zi m nung ɓ'aà kpang.”
40026035	Bituru ti kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔkn, tɔɔ, “Naa zang tɔɔ zang nyɔ m doo katɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ ning piti, n laa nyaa ɓaaɓɛ m kpang.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ, ri ti kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ nandon.
40026036	Yeesɔ naa a kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Gesemani ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nwang ka nihn, n daa gaa doo Kpanti Laa ka kaaɓa.”
40026037	A Yeesɔ daa nɛɛ Bituru, nɛɛ wujɛ Zebedi ɓɔɔ ziti ɓɛɛ. A bii soo wu, gaa tɔɔsung rɛ̃rɛnang kati.
40026038	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Bii soo m tɔ nung vɔrɔ gbete. Nɔɔ nwang ka nihn, n'ɔɔ gãng jìng nɛɛ n ning.”
40026039	Yeesɔ daa tɔ ka tìng tɔkɔlɔng, a zuu kaa nɛɛ buru ka tipi, a gaa Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ, gbalang nɛɛ kagn, kɔsɔ m jìng dannang keɓe katɔ. Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓaaɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.”
40026040	A naa gbãayu ìi zang taati ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, hingro yiki ri tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ Bituru tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gãng jìng nɛɛ n naa gbete kpang ya?
40026041	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, nɔɔ ti gaa Kpanti Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Sheetang nɛ̀'ɛ nwaarɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Suru bii manɛ kasɛ ɓi katɔ, a bii manɛ kɔ lakɛ ɓi kaa takpang.”
40026042	A Yeesɔ ti paarɛ tɔkn, daa gaa Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ, mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ jìng dannang keɓe wu ɓa kpang, n dàng katɔ, wu ti nwang naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
40026043	A Yeesɔ ti gbãayu naa ìi ri, hingro yiki ri tɔ tɔkn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ hingro kpiti ri jìng tɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
40026044	Yeesɔ ti yaa ri, daa nɔng Laa gaanang daa kaa doo taati. Ti daa paasɛ doo nyaa gbete ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang kɔ.
40026045	A gbãayu naa ìi zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kati. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rooyi, nɔɔ õ̀s'ɔ manɛ doo naa ya? Nɔɔ zirɛ, laa yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng. Zang a zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang Jaa Shɔnzang tɔ.
40026046	Nɔɔ seepaa ta ruu gbãayu. Nɔɔ zirɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu mɛɛ kɔ a kana ɓa.”
40026047	Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa nyaa, a Yahuda zang gbete ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ a kati. Yahuda a nɛɛ zang dɔli ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri d'ɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri shong ɓɛɛ ning. Zang kaɓa, ri see yere bang, nɛɛ labasaa ka naa ning.
40026048	Yahuda ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ, kɔɔ ri tɔ, ka tìng nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ n daa kɔng wu, wukɔ Yeesɔ. N'ɔɔ yi wu.”
40026049	Yahuda ri naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng tɔ a sharɛ daa kɔng Yeesɔ. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nwang tɛya Maalang?”
40026050	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ atɛ mɔɔ tà masang.” A zang ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Yahuda ri tɛɛyi, ri daa yi Yeesɔ kati.
40026051	Zang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ gbete, zɔ̃ng yere bang ɓiɓɛ, wɔng shoo jaafoo kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani kak.
40026052	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Hãa yere bang ɓaaɓɛ ta ka kpãa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng yere bang, naa vɔ ɓi doo nɛɛ wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
40026053	Mɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ naa n gàa Daa mɛɛ, shong m zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɔɔ ɓa tìng kopi tu ziti katɔ tantɛnang kpang ya?
40026054	A n nɛɛ palɛ tɔ nɔngkɔ, ruu Laa ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, vuu keɓe naa nwang ditɔ naa weɓe, nwang kaa bɛɛ nizang viya?”
40026055	A Yeesɔ raa jìng, hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri a wu yinang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ see yere bang nɛɛ labasaa ka naa gaagaa, nɛɛ nɔɔ naa yi ɓu nkɔ naa zang shɔngɓɔ ya? N nwalɛ ka yeti Gãa Laa kɔ diki diki, n tusu zang vuu, nɔɔ yi m kpang.
40026056	Vuu kɔ zang palɛ ɓ'ee, ɓee ɓi kaa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.” A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri yuku nandon ri yaa wu.
40026057	A zang ɓɔɔ ri yi Yeesɔ ri daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka bii Kayifa, kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ ka nɔngkɔ.
40026058	Bituru dũuru wu ka knti katara sasak, daa nɛɛ wu ka dàbang Kayifa. A Bituru turɛ daa nwang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng ka gãa, nɛɛ tɔɔ wu zi naa ɓɔɔ zang hangsɛ nyaa ruu keɓe kati.
40026059	A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri doo zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang kɔ, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri zɛ̃ɛ wu nyaa, tɔ̀ɔ ri nyɔ wu kati ɓɛɛ.
40026060	Zang sè'e dɔli ri kɔɔrɔ ruu see ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a nyaa ɓarɛ daa gbete kpang. Nɛɛ knti, zang sè'e ziti ɓɔɔgn, ri naa seepaa kati. Ri a ka tìng zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɛɛ.
40026061	Ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu zunung ɓɔɔ wu jili Gãa Laa ka tipi, wu mãa ɓɔɔgn ka diki taati katɔ.”
40026062	A Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, seepaa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa ka ruu kɔ zang kɔɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓee kpang ya?”
40026063	Yeesɔ ti ãa nyaa ɓi kagn kpang. A Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu kà Gãa Laa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ, kɔɔ ruu jong. Mɔkɔ Kirisi Jaa Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ya?”
40026064	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Nn nkɔ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ naa zi m ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ ka naa nakn Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu piti ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti naa zi naa ɓɔɔ n a ka yeti sãmbong ditɔ.”
40026065	Ɓɔɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa tãa naa weɓe, lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe kɔɔ ruu shi kpang tɔ, tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu Jaa Laa. Ruu kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ rùu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ takpang. Nɔɔ tãa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ kãntang keɓe tɔ nɛɛ shoo manɛ.
40026066	Nɔɔ zi ɓu bɛ̀'ɛ ka yeti manɛ viya?” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Dàa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ tɔ.”
40026067	A ri tùlù wu sisãa ka jìng, ri ti ma wu nɛɛ naa tung, a zang ɓɔɔ ri ti nyɔ wu nɛɛ naa.
40026068	Ri kpaa wu tɔɔ, “Kirisi, ɓàa ruu n'ung zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ mɔɔ ta.”
40026069	Ka laa kaɓa, Bituru nwang doo ka dàbang Kayifa. A jaa shoonang zang soro tɔkɔlɔng naa arɛ kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓ'aà doo zang ɓɔɔ dũng Yeesɔ yɔɔ Galili kɔ.”
40026070	A Bituru laa nyaa ruu keɓe ka tìng ɓarɛ nandon tɔɔ, “N zi vuu kɔ mɔɔ rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ m kpang.”
40026071	Bituru naa seepaa daa nwang kaa nyaa gãa naabm, a jaa shoonang zang soro tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔgn ti naa zi wu. A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Bɛɛ yɔɔ keɓe nwang ɓi doo nɛɛ Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara kɔ.”
40026072	A Bituru ti laa nyaa tɔkn nɛɛ Laa tũnnang ning tɔɔ, “N zi yɔɔ keɓe nung m kpang.”
40026073	Laa nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ɓa tɔkɔlɔng, zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔng kaɓa, ri arɛ. Ri kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ doo zang ɓiɓɛ kɔ nizang. N'aa yee ɓɔɔ mɔɔ rang ka yeti nyaa ɓaaɓɛ, wukɔ nwangsɛ mɔɔ yuu.”
40026074	A Bituru kɔɔ ri nɛɛ Laa tũnnang ning tɔɔ, “N zi yɔɔ keɓe nung m kpang. N nɛɛ suu sè'e, Laa wu palɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.” A kǹ naa ɓaa nyaa kaa tantɛnang.
40026075	A Bituru naa kpaa danggn ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ kǹ naa ɓ'aa nyaa, bɛɛ mɔɔ laa nyaa mɛɛ tɔ daa doo taati.” A Bituru nwangnɛ, daa kaa ka biling zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ.
40027001	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri tɔng zɔɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ ri naa nyɔ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
40027002	A ri mã wu, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka bii gɔmna Bilatu.
40027003	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Yahuda ɓɔɔ malɛ Yeesɔ zirɛ, zang jɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ ruu tɔ, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kaa tɔ, naa kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ. A see saka azurufa bmati tu kopi ɓɔɔ zang a wu ka ruu Yeesɔ, daa sɔɔrɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa.
40027004	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n nyɔ nɔɔ yuu shɔnzang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ tãa zang ruu kpang, nɛɛ nɔɔ nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.” A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu ɓuru hãa ɓi tɔɔgn kpang, ɓi kaa ruu ɓaaɓɛ.”
40027005	A Yahuda vang ri saka kaɓa ka Gãa Laa, a daayi daa bɔ̃ɔ vɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, a vɔ kati.
40027006	Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri see saka azurufa kaɓa kati. Ri tɔɔ, “Naa ruu tɛ̃ɛ saka keɓe ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu tɛ̃ɛ saka kagn ka Gãa Laa tɔkn, ruu ɓa nyaa labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa bee tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, saka ɓɔɔ zang hoo shɔnzang nɛɛ mani ɓi saka zìi ɓɛɛ.”
40027007	A ri mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ ri see saka keɓe ri daa hoo tipi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mãa ɓari ɓɛɛ nɛɛ mani. Tɔ̀ɔ wu nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang gbãa vɔrɔ zang zanti kagn ɓɛɛ.
40027008	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓaa tipi kaɓa doo naa nɛɛ, “Tipi zìi shɔnzang.”
40027009	Vuu kɔ zang palɛ ɓee, ɓee ɓi ka nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Irimiya zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Irimiya kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ri see saka azurufa bmati tu kopi kaɓa, ɓɔɔ zang Isirela ri mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ ri shu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ,
40027010	ri hoo tipi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mãa ɓari nɛɛ mani, naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa tusu m ɓɛɛ.”
40027011	Zang a tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka tìng gɔmna, a gɔmna hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ kpanti zang Yahudawa ya?” Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, nkɔ”
40027012	A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa, ri zɛ̃ɛ wu nyaa, a ãa nyaa ɓi kagn kpang.
40027013	Bilatu ti hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔkn tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ tãa vuu piti kɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?”
40027014	Yeesɔ ti ã̀a wu nyaa ɓi ka bii kpang. Ti kasɛ nyaa ɓi ka yuu vuu gbete ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Gɔmna Bilatu mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
40027015	Diki vuu shaanang nyaalaa Pasika nɛɛ a tɔ, gɔmna yaarɛ zang, zang gbete ɓɔɔ zang mã ka sãa, ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ naa katɔ.
40027016	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Baraba, ɓɔɔ zang zi wu nung tɔ nandon, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ, kagn yeti sãa.
40027017	Zang kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nandon, a Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “N yaa nɔɔ ɓu wi naa wiya? Baraba ya, kɔ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Kirisi ɓɛɛ?”
40027018	Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zi ɓi tɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri atɛ wu Yeesɔ ɓi ka ruu sũnyaa kaanang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
40027019	Bilatu nwang doo ka nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang ɓiɓɛ, a ɓeeso shong wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ yi naa ka bii shɔnzang tɔ̃ɔ kiɓi kpang. N dang jìng ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang nɛɛ zìi lɛɛkɔ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ dɔli.”
40027020	A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri dɔ̃lɔ zang dɔli nyaa nɛɛ ri kɔɔ Bilatu nɛɛ wu yaa Baraba kɔ naa, wu nyɔ Yeesɔ.
40027021	Gɔmna Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ka teteng zang ziti keɓe, n yaa nɔɔ ɓu wi naa wiya?” Ri tɔɔ, “Baraba.”
40027022	A Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “'N palɛ vi nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kirisi, viya?” Ri goo nyaa nandon tɔɔ, “Yaa wu, zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa.”
40027023	Bilatu ti hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn, nɛɛ, “Ka ruu viya? Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓu viya?” Ri ti goo nyaa tɔkn nabm ka lapa nandon nɛɛ, “Yaa wu, zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa.”
40027024	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Bilatu zirɛ, nɛɛ zang kaɓa ri ɓa wu yuu katɔ, ri ti shii varɛ tɔ, tuu mii sɔɔ naa ɓiɓɛ nɔng ka jìng ɓarɛ nandon. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Naa mɛɛ ɓi kagn ruu zìi yɔɔ keɓe kpang. Ɓi kaa ruu manɛ.”
40027025	A ri goo nyaa nandon nɛɛ, “R'uu zìi yɔɔ keɓe wu naa nwang ka yuu ɓuru nɛɛ wujɛ ɓuru gbã̀'agbãa.”
40027026	A Bilatu yàa ri Baraba naa kati. A kɔɔ zang, nɛɛ zang nyɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ gbãa, a tuu Yeesɔ a zang kati, nɛɛ zang daa ɓaa wu naa ka laa.
40027027	A rɛɛ sɔɔja gɔmna tuu Yeesɔ daa nɛɛ wu ka yeti gãa gɔmna. Ri kpalɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ nimbang nandon, ri kiiri Yeesɔ nyaa kaa teteng.
40027028	Ri tu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, a ri lu wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ ɓɔɔ nwɛɛri, naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ kpanti ri lu ɓɛɛ.
40027029	Ri ti, ti kɔkɔ naa lapoo yuu kãnang kpanti, ri hãa wu ka yuu. A ri tuu labalang naa ɓɔ̀'ɔ kpanti, ri a wu ka naa nakn. Ri ti tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ri kpaa wu. Ri tɔɔ, “Ruu jee mɔɔ nyaa kpanti zang Yahudawa.”
40027030	Ri ti tùlù wu sisãa ka bii. Ri tuu labalang ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ, ri nyɔkɔ wu nɔng ka yuu.
40027031	Ri kpaa wu tɔ sasak, a ri zɔ̃ng fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ ɓɔɔ nwɛɛri kaɓa, ri hãa wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kati. A ri daa kaa nɛɛ wu, nɛɛ ri daa ɓaa wu naa ka laa.
40027032	Ri nwang tɔ, ri daa kana ka gbalang, a ri naa ɓee yuu nɛɛ yɔɔ gari Kiranɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Siman. A ri yi wu nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning, nɛɛ wu tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang daa ɓaa Yeesɔ naa kagn ɓɛɛ.
40027033	Ri naa a tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Golgota, (dìiri nung keɓe ɓi, nɔng ɓɔɔ nw'ang yuu zɔ̃ɔpi ɓɛɛ.)
40027034	Ri tuu sàa ɓɔɔ zang nwɛɛtɛ nɛɛ gãnang. (Ɓɔɔ palɛ zang, zang tãa kɔnang kpang ɓɛɛ) ri a Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu ɓooyi. Yeesɔ tãa ka nyaa, a bɛ̃ɛ ɓoonang.
40027035	Ri ɓaa Yeesɔ naa tɔ ka laa. A ri naa shaa laa, ri basɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ka naa ɓarɛ.
40027036	Ri nwang ka nɔngkɔ, ri gãng jìng ka wu.
40027037	A ri bee vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ, ri ɓang ka yuu paa laa ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri beeyi tɔɔ, “Wee Yeesɔ Kpanti zang Yahudawa kɔ.”
40027038	Zang ti ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge naa jong ka laa, ka kagn Yeesɔ. Ɓɔɔ gbete ka naa nakn a ɓɔɔ gbete ka naa nagang.
40027039	Zang ɓɔɔ ri tɛɛ gbalang, ri rang wu nyaa gɛ̃gɛ̃ɛ, ri ti waa yuu ɓarɛ kpɔkpɔk,
40027040	ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ jili Gãa Laa, mɔɔ mãa ɓɔɔgn ka diki taati katɔ, ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ ta. Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Jaa Laa, shooro ta ka tipi, nɛɛ laa kɔ zang ɓaa mɔɔ naa kagn ɓi.”
40027041	Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa, ri ti kpaa wu doo nɔngkɔ. Ri tɔɔ,
40027042	“Ta yuu zang ɓɔɔgn, a zunung ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Wu mɔkɔ Kpanti Isirela kpang ya? N'aa sh'oorò nɛɛ laa kɔ zang ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓee, ruu shing danggn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
40027043	Shing danggn ka bii Laa, Laa nɛɛ kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, wu ta wu ta. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wukɔ Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ.”
40027044	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri naa ka laa ka kagn Yeesɔ, ri rang wu nyaa gɛ̃gɛ̃ɛ doo nɔngkɔ.
40027045	Nɔng tɔ̀ɔ ka tipi kaɓa nandon nɛɛ laagɛ̃ sasak, laa naa kpɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ mani.
40027046	Laa naa kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ, Yeesɔ mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Ɛloyi, Ɛloyi, lama Sabatani.” Dìiri yee keɓe, ɓi “Laa mɛɛ, Laa mɛɛ, mɔɔ yaa m ka ruu viya?”
40027047	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri kaɓa, ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔyi, ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe ɓaa nyaa kana Iliya.”
40027048	A zang gbete ɓarɛ tantɛ yunang daa tuu sɔ̀ɔsɔ, hãa ka mii ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ sàa kagn ɓɛɛ, a màa ka laa, 'a Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu ɓoo ta.
40027049	A zang ɓɔɔ yaa knti ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yaa wu ka nɔngkɔ, Iliya wu arɛ, wu ta wu, ruu zirɛ.”
40027050	A Yeesɔ mɛɛ nyaa kaa tɔkn ka lapa, a vɔ kati.
40027051	Fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang ku nɔng tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani, lɔɔsɔ ka làa kaɓa. Gaayu lɔɔsɔnang nɛɛ paa daa nɔng ka dii. Tipi ruutu, a pɛngkɛ ti puusu.
40027052	Nyaa sàa ɓɔɔ zang gb'ãal'ɛ vɔrɔ kagn ti pulu, zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, ri seepaa kati.
40027053	Ri naa nwangkɛ nɛɛ sàa, ka knti ɓɔɔ zang wisi Yeesɔ paa tɔ nɛɛ saa, ri daa ka Urushalima. Ri daa nwang nyaa ka bii zang dɔli.
40027054	Yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja, nɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng ka Yeesɔ, ri zi naa ɓɔɔ tipi ruutu, nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ palɛ, bii kàa ri vɔrɔ. Ri tɔɔ, “Bɛ̀'ɛ yɔɔ keɓe, Jaa Laa kɔ nizang.”
40027055	Zang soro ɓɔɔ ri yìk'i Yeesɔ naa ka bii, ka diki kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri dũuru wu nɛɛ Galili, ri kagn ka nɔngkɔ gaagaa. Ri shii nɛɛ nɔng beebang ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.
40027056	Ka teteng zang soro kaɓa, Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Marayamu nà'a rɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yusufu, a ɓɔɔ nà'a rɛɛ wujɛ Zebedi ri kagn.
40027057	Ka diki kaɓa nɛɛ laarang, yɔɔ gari Arimataya ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Yusufu, ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ dɔli naa a kati. Yusufu ɓi doo zang ɓɔɔ dũng knti Yeesɔ kɔ.
40027058	Yusufu dàa gaa bii vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ka naa Bilatu. A Bilatu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ, zang wu daa a wu bii vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ta.
40027059	A Yusufu tuu bii vɔrɔ Yeesɔ, kãng nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ puru ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
40027060	A daa wɔɔ ka yeti sàa shɔɔ ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ wu shu ka tari bang ɓɔɔ naa yeng puru ɓɛɛ. A jìiri tari bang, ku nyaa sàa ka nɛɛ mani, a daa kati.
40027061	Marayamu Magadaliya, nɛɛ Marayamu ɓɔɔ gbete, ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ naa dang.
40027062	Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa Pasika kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang Farisawa ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Bilatu.
40027063	Ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, ruu kpaa danggn ruu ɓɔɔ yɔɔ sè'e kaɓa kɔɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ wu doo ningkãari tɔ. Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu naa seepaa ditɔ nɛɛ saa, ka lɛɛ ɓɔɔ diki naa daa taati ɓɛɛ.
40027064	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔ zang ta, zang daa gãng jìng ka yuu saa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, diki taati wu ɓa katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri nɛ̀'ɛ naa ɓɔ̀'ɔ bii vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ, Seepaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ. Sè'e ɓɔɔ knti, naa ɓa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang kaatɔ.”
40027065	A Bilatu kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ see sɔɔja ta, nɔɔ daa gã yuu sàa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.”
