40027066	A ri daayi, ri daa rangsɛ nyaa sàa, a ri ɓang vuu kpanti ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ, Bilatu dang nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu puu nyaa sàa kpang ɓɛɛ, ka yuu sàa. A ri shing zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ gã yuu saa ka nɔngkɔ.
40028001	Nɔng naa gantɛ tɔ gbete, ka knti diki ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudawa, Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Marayamu ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ri daayi nɛɛ ri daa leng jìng ka yuu saa.
40028002	A tipi ruutunang ɓɔɔ bang ruutu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa shooro, daa ka nɔng yuu sàa, a jìiri tari ɓɔɔ zang ku nyaa sàa nɛɛ mani, nwang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
40028003	Waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ, nwang naa shala mii ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ ɓɛɛ. Fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ti puru shãashãa.
40028004	Sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng ka yuu saa, ri kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, bii ɓarɛ mãrɛ, ri nwang ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
40028005	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ lapa kaɓa, kɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri daa jìng lennang ka yuu sàa kaɓa nɛɛ, “N'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, n zi tɔ, nɔɔ kãa Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ.
40028006	Tɔ̀'ɔ nɔng kpang, seepaa tɔ naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ a ta, nɔɔ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛ̀'ɛ roo kagn ɓɛɛ.
40028007	Nɔɔ dita pati, nɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, seepaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa. Dà'a Galili kana tìng ɓarɛ. Ri daa zi wu ka nɔngkɔ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ.”
40028008	A zang soro kaɓa, ri yaa nɔng yuu sàa kaa tantɛnang, nɛɛ vɔrɔ kaanang, nɛɛ tìnang tãanang ning, a ri yurɛ, nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
40028009	A Yeesɔ naa ɓee ri yuu, a jee ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Palɛ biya?” Ɓudo ɓɔɔ ri zi wu naa weɓe, ri see zɔɔ, ri daa yi wu ka doo, ri b'ang wu kati.
40028010	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, nɔɔ dita nɔɔ daa kɔɔ rɛɛ manzung, nɛɛ ri daa ka Galili, ri daa zi m ka nɔngkɔ.”
40028011	Zang soro ri daa tɔ, a zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ, ri daa ka gari. Ri daa kɔɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, vuu piti ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kati.
40028012	Ɓɔɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri tɔng zɔɔ, a ri sèe saka gaagaa ri a rɛɛ sɔɔja,
40028013	nɛɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ri kɔɔrɔ zang nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri a nɛɛ zìi bɛɛ hingro yiki ruu katɔ, ri ɓɔɔ bii vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ.
40028014	Gɔmna nɛɛ naa tãa ruu keɓe tɔɔ, ruu naa kɔɔ wu naa ɓiɓɛ ditɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ naa dang jìng ɓɛɛ.”
40028015	A rɛɛ sɔɔja ri ta saka ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ kati. Zang yahudawa ri ti r'ang ruu keɓe doo naa lɛɛkɔ sasak.
40028016	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kopi tu gbete naa daa ka Galili, ka yuu kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
40028017	Ri daa ìi wu, a ri b'ang wu. A zang ɓɔɔ ri, zi kpang nɛɛ wukɔ nizang kpang.
40028018	A Yeesɔ arɛ naa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Laa a m naa tɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka tipi nandon.
40028019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang tipi ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon ruu mɛɛ, tɔɔ, ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng m kati. Nɔɔ ti palɛ ri batizima nɛɛ nung Daa mɛɛ Laa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɛɛ Jaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Suru Laa.
40028020	Nɔɔ ti kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, nɛɛ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ n dang nɔɔ ɓɛɛ nandon. N yaa nɔɔ kpang. N nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ sasak, diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe naa waa nyaa, nɛɛ mani.”
41001001	Wee naa ɓɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi Jaa Laa gaayu ɓɛɛ.
41001002	Gaayu ka naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ. “Laa tɔɔ, ‘N shong zang shoonang mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ palɛ mɔɔ gbalang ditɔ ka tìng ɓaaɓɛ.’
41001003	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn, rang yee Laa ka yeti jìngti tɔɔ. ‘Kpanti a kaa tɔ nɔɔ palɛ wu gbalang ta Nɔɔ shiiri wu katɔ ɓororo,’”
41001004	A Yɔhana naa nw'ang nyaa palɛ zang batizima ka jìngti. Kɔɔ zang ruu Laa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ ta, n'ɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti, tɔɔ n palɛ nɔɔ batizima. Laa wu yaa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ kati.”
41001005	A zang dɔli nɛɛ tipi Yahudiya nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka Urushalima, ri daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri kɔɔrɔ Laa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, a Yɔhana palɛ ri batizima ka mii rang Urudung.
41001006	Yɔhana hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ shãngti vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ rakumi ɓɛɛ. A ti mã guruji ka sãng ɓiɓɛ. Vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ɓi ti zɔɔrɔ nɛɛ warɛ.
41001007	Kɔɔ zang tɔɔ “Zang ɓɔɔ a ka knti mɛɛ ɓa m katɔ nɛɛ bannang. N daa naa ɓɔɔ n sɔ̃ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, n kãlɛ soo koodoo ɓiɓɛ kpang.
41001008	N palɛ nɔɔ batizima m nɛɛ mii, naa palɛ nɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ Suru Laa.”
41001009	Diki nɛɛ tɔɔ wu bee tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ a kaa nɛɛ Nazara ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili, a Yɔhana palɛ wu batizima ka mii rang Urudung.
41001010	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwang nɛɛ mii hn, a zi lapa puuyi, Suru Laa shooro kana, ka yuu ɓiɓɛ naa koro.
41001011	A ri ti tãa yee nɛɛ lapa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ gbãnggbãng kɔ.”
41001012	A Suru Laa tantɛ wu dɔ̃nang ka jìngti.
41001013	Nw'ang ka jìngti diki laa ziti, a Sheetang gãsɛ wu kaa sasak. Ka nɔng kaɓa vuu kpaasi kagn nɔngkɔ, a zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ri arɛ, ri yi wu naa ka bii.
41001014	Ka knti ɓɔɔ zang mã Yɔhana tɔ ka sãa, Yeesɔ naa a ka tipi Galili kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa tɔɔ,
41001015	“Diki a tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti yaa kaa naabm. Nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ ta, n'ɔɔ shing danggn ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa.”
41001016	Yeesɔ ra kana nyaa mii waapo Galili, a zi rɛɛ Siman nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Anduru ri vang jang jaazìi kana mii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓarɛ zang jaazìi yinang ɓɛɛ.
41001017	A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa tɔɔ “Nɔɔ arɛ nɔɔ dũng m. N tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa zang nyaa ri a ka bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”
41001018	A ri yaa jang ɓarɛ tantɛnang, ri dũng wu.
41001019	Yeesɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu daa ka tìng tɔkɔlɔng, zi Yakubu nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Yɔhana wujɛ Zebedi, ri gbarɛ jang jaazìi ɓarɛ ka yeti tonsi.
41001020	A ti tantɛ ri nyaa ɓaanang. Ri yaa daa ɓarɛ Zebedi ka yeti tonsi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ri shoonang, a ri dũng wu.
41001021	A ri daa ka gari Kafanahu. A diki ɔ̃sɔnang naa arɛ, Yeesɔ daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa, a g'aa zang tɔɔsung vuu tusunang kati.
41001022	Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka naa ɓɔɔ, wu tusu vuu ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tusu ri vuu ɓi naa ɓɔɔgn. Tùsù zang ɓi naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ kpang.
41001023	Ka laa kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kagn yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓarɛ. A mɛɛ nyaa tɔɔ.
41001024	“Mɔɔ kãa vi ka bii ɓuru viya? Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara? Mɔɔ arɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ naa nyɔkɔ ruu katɔ ya? N zi mɔɔ nung tɔ, mɔkɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ à nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.”
41001025	A Yeesɔ mangkɛ suru shi kpang tɔɔ, “Vɔ̃ nyaa ta! Nw'ang ta mɔɔ yaa wu bii.”
41001026	A suru shi kpang tuu wu, loo wu ka tipi, a mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, a nwangnɛ yaa wu bii kati.
41001027	Zang piti ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, “Ɓi lee vuu tusunang kiya? Yɔɔ keɓe mangkɛ suru shi kpang, a ri ti ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ.”
41001028	A nyaa Yeesɔ baa nɔng kaa tantɛnang ka tipi Galili nandon.
41001029	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ Yeesɔ nwang nɛɛ gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa hn, ri daa kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana ka gãa rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Anduru.
41001030	Ka diki kaɓa Bituru ɓeekpeng ɓɔɔ yi ɓeeso roo ka tipi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bii zaa wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. A zang kɔɔ Yeesɔ kati.
41001031	A Yeesɔ arɛ yi wu naa, a wisi wu paa. Bii ɓɔɔ zaa wu, yaa wu nɔng kati. A Bituru ɓeekpeng seepaa a atɛ ri vuu shaanang kati.
41001032	Nɛɛ laarang bɛɛ laa hãa nyaa tɔ dii, zang atɛ wu zang kɔnang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kaa dɔli.
41001033	Zang gari, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ wu kagn ɓɛɛ dɔli.
41001034	A Yeesɔ masɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ ri ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ dɔli. A ti nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ bii zang dɔli. Yàa suru shi kpang gbalang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi wu nung tɔ ɓɛɛ.
41001035	A Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ yuu gãndi, yaa gãa, daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang daa gaa Laa ka nɔngkɔ.
41001036	A Siman ri see zɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu, ri kãa wu.
41001037	Ri daa ìi wu tɔ, a ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zang piti ri kãa mɔkɔ.”
41001038	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “R'uu daa nɔɔ rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ka tìng ɓuru naabm ta, tɔ̀ɔ n daa rang yee Laa kaa jong nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n a ka ruu yee Laa kɔ rannang ɓɛɛ.”
41001039	A rakɛ ka tipi Galili nandon, rang zang yee Laa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa, a ti nwàngsɛ̀ zang dɔli suru shi kpang.
41001040	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa katɔ, arɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu, gaa wu tɔɔ “Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ katɔ, mɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ masɛ m katɔ.”
41001041	A gn yɔɔ kɔng Yeesɔ dɔli, Yeesɔ dìi naa lee wu, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ “N kasɛ tɔ, vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ wu yaa mɔɔ nɔng ta.”
41001042	A vuu bii yaa yɔɔ nɔng kaa tantɛnang.
41001043	A Yeesɔ shaarɛ wu nyaa gbãnggbãng, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ,
41001044	“M'ɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Daayi mɔɔ daa tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu vaa ka Gãa Laa bii ɓaaɓɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ ti dɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɔɔ Musa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ zang ri zi kagn nɛɛ vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ yaa mɔɔ nɔng tɔ.”
41001045	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa kaɓa, daayi daa kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ pàlɛ̀ wu ɓi doo nɛɛ mani. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu nwang bii ka dalɛ, wu daa gari ɓɔɔgn takpang. Nwalɛ kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ti daa bii Yeesɔ ɓi doo nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti.
41002001	Diki nɛɛ tɔɔ wu bee tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ naa gbãayu tɔkn ka Kafanahu, a zang tãa nyaa tɔɔ Yeesɔ a gãa tɔ.
41002002	A zang kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, nɔng yi nyaa kaa nɛɛ biling piti. A Yeesɔ rang ri yee Laa kati.
41002003	A zang dɛ̃ɛti ri tuu zang ɓɔɔ bii ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ, ri atɛ wu.
41002004	Ri walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri daa nɛɛ wu ka bii Yeesɔ kpang, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri vang yuu sãa ri puu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kagn, ri yaa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ta ka laa naa nɛɛ soo, ka tìng Yeesɔ.
41002005	Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ tɔɔ, “Man jaa, zang yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.”
41002006	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang, ri nwang kagn nɔngkɔ. Ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ, a ri ti hɛ̃ɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ,
41002007	“Yɔɔ keɓe kɔɔ ruu nɔngkɔ, ka ruu viya? Tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ naa Kpanti Laa. Naa wu Kpanti Laa kpang, zang ɓɔɔ yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang kagn koo keɓe gbete ya?”
41002008	Yeesɔ zi ɓi tɔ ka yeti suru bii ɓiɓɛ tantɛnang nɛɛ, ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ veɓe kɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ “Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓu ka ruu vi, nɔngkɔ viya?
41002009	Ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ nɛɛ ‘Zang yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ,’ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘seepaa ta mɔɔ tuu vuu roonang ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ daayi.’ Ɓu wi kpãa kpang ka teteng yee keɓe wiya?
41002010	N m'asɛ̀ yɔɔ keɓe ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zi kati nɛɛ, zang a Jaa Shɔnzang naa tɔ ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ wu yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ.” A raa jìng kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ nɛɛ,
41002011	“N kɔɔ mɔɔ, seepaa, mɔɔ tuu vuu roonang ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ daa gãa.”
41002012	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ seepaa tantɛnang tuu siri ɓiɓɛ, ra ka jìng zang nandon, a daayi. Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri zi naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn. A ri dɔɔ Kpanti Laa. Ri tɔɔ “Ruu zi vuu bɔɔ naa weɓe, gngn kpang.”
41002013	Yeesɔ ti naa paasɛ daanang tɔkn ka nyaa rang mii waapo. A zang dɔli ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a tusu ri vuu kati.
41002014	Yeesɔ rakɛ kana nyaa mii waapo, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Leevi jaa Alifaya nwang tɔ ka yeti gãa saka tipi tanang. A Yeesɔ ɓaa wu nyaa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ “Dũng m ta” A Leevi seepaa dũng wu kati.
41002015	Laa ɓa tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ daa ka gãa Leevi, daa nwangnɛ shaa vuu shaanang kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang dɔli ri dũng knti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
41002016	Ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang ɓarɛ labeenang, ri zi Yeesɔ shaa vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kpang hn, ri hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bì'i ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “shaa vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kpang ka ruu viya?”
41002017	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa naa weɓe, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ “Zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔ̀ng ri kpang, ri daa bii zang ɓɔɔ, palɛ zang kɔnang ɓi kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔng ri katɔ kɔ, ri daa shɛ̃ɛning. N arɛ nɛɛ, n naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti kpang. N arɛ nɛɛ n naa ɓaa nyaa m ka zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
41002018	Ka diki kaɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Farisawa, ri seng nyaalaa. A zang ɓɔɔgn ri arɛ, ri naa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ “Ka ruu vi zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana, nɛɛ Farisawa ri s'eng nyaalaa, ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ ri sèng ɓarɛ kpang viya?”
41002019	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ “sinyɛ ɓeevɛ ɓeesang, sèng nyaalaa ka diki ɓɔɔ sinyɛ ɓeevɛ doo nɛɛ ri kpang.
41002020	Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ nɛɛ tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ ri kpang, tɔɔ ri naa s'eng nyaalaa ka diki kaɓa kɔ.
41002021	“Zang lu fɔ̃ɔrɔ gbaala ɓi jong nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kpang. Naa zang lurɛ, sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ shɔɔ naa gɔɔ katɔ lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ gbaala kaɓa, yaa yeng kaa bang dɔli.
41002022	Zang ti tɛ̃ɛ saa shɔɔ ɓi jong ka yeti zà'ang gbaala ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ koo ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa zang tɛ̃ɛyi, saa naa si katɔ, wu sãa zà'ang kati. Saa tɛ̃ɛ ka tipi, zà'ang ti lasɛ katɔ. Zang tɛ̃ɛ saa shɔɔ ɓi ka zà'ang shɔɔ kɔ doori.”
41002023	Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang, Yeesɔ sɔɔ gbalang ɓɔɔ tɛɛ yeti jaa zee, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri gaa tɔɔsung yuu zee bɔ̃ɔrɔnang kati ri shaayi.
41002024	A zang Farisawa kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Zirɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ ri palɛ shoonang ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang.”
41002025	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ “Nɔɔ gã vuu ɓɔɔ Dawuda p'al'ɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nyɔ ri dɔli nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu gngn kpang ya?
41002026	Naa ɓɔɔ daa ka Gãa Laa ka diki ɓɔɔ Abiyata kɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, a daa tuu borodi ɓɔɔ zang dang nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kɔ ri shaa shɛ̃ɛning, a shaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu kpang ya?”
41002027	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ “Zang palɛ diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓi ka ruu shɔnzang kɔ jong, zang palɛ wu shɔnzang ka ruu diki ɔ̃sɔnang kpang.
41002028	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang kɔ Kpanti nɛɛ ɓɔɔ diki ɔ̃sɔnang piti.”
41003001	Diki ɓɔɔgn, Yeesɔ daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa tɔkn, a yɔɔ ɓɔɔ naa ɓiɓɛ ɓakɛ katɔ kagn nɔngkɔ.
41003002	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kãa ruu nɛɛ Yeesɔ. Ri shu wu jìng ka bii, nɛɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ masɛ zang kɔ naa ɓakɛ katɔ tɔ, ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang, tɔɔ ri walɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri naa kɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kati.
41003003	A Yeesɔ ɓaa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ naa ɓakɛ katɔ kaɓa nyaa tɔɔ “Arɛ mɔɔ naa shii ka tìng zang piti ka nihn”
41003004	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ “Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kasɛ katɔ, nɛɛ ruu palɛ tɔ̃ɔ ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ya, kɔ nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang? Nɛɛ ruu ta yuu zang ya, kɔ nɛɛ ruu nyɔ zang vɔrɔ katɔ kɔ jong?” Ri ãa nyaa kpang.
41003005	Gnvɔ shaa Yeesɔ, a Yeesɔ shu ri jìng kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ka bii, ka ruu yuu taarɛnang ɓarɛ. A raa jìng kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ naa ɓakɛ katɔ tɔɔ, “Dìi naa ɓaaɓɛ ta” A yɔɔ dìi naa ɓiɓɛ, naa ɓiɓɛ nwang tɔ̃ɔ kaa tɔkn.
41003006	A ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa ri zi naa weɓe, ri nwangkɛ, ri daa tɔng zɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Hiridu ka naa ɓɔɔ ri naa nyɔ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
41003007	A Yeesɔ naa daa kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka nyaa mii waapo. Zang dɔli ri dũng wu nɛɛ tipi Galili a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tipi Yahudiya
41003008	nɛɛ gari Urushalima nɛɛ tipi Idumiya, nɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ rang Urudung ka wu nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwangnɛ mani ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ kiiri rɛɛ gari Taya nɛɛ Sidong nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ. Zang dɔli keɓe, ri a ka bii Yeesɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tãa ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
41003009	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ ri shang dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri pàlɛ̀ wu tonsi katɔ pati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ màas'ɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
41003010	Yeesɔ masɛ zang tɔ dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang ka bii ɓarɛ ning, ri b'eng zang nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri daa lee Yeesɔ naa ka bii.
41003011	Zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓarɛ nɛɛ zi Yeesɔ tɔ, ri ti tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ri sãlɛ nyaa nɛɛ “Mɔkɔ Jaa Laa.”
41003012	Yeesɔ wu ti mangkɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ ri tusu zang nɛɛ wukɔ Jaa Laa kpang.
41003013	A Yeesɔ naa vangnɛ daa ka kɔpɔ, a ɓaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ katɔ nyaa, a ri daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
41003014	A shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang kopi tu ziti kati. Nɛɛ ri nwang nɛɛ wu, nɛɛ wu shong ri, ri daa rang zang yee Laa.
41003015	Nɛɛ wu ti a ri naa ɓɔɔ ri nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ mani, ka bii zang ɓɛɛ.
41003016	Nung zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ keɓe. Siman ɓɔɔ (wu naa ɓaa nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ).
41003017	A ɓɔɔ Yakubu jaa Zebedi nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa ri nung ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ Buwanaji ɓɛɛ. (Dìiri nung keɓe, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ nwang naa shala mii ɓɛɛ).
41003018	A ɓɔɔ Anduru, nɛɛ Filibu, nɛɛ Baatolomi, nɛɛ Matiyu nɛɛ Tooma, nɛɛ Yakubu jaa Alifaya, nɛɛ Tadayu, nɛɛ Siman ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ tipi ɓarɛ wu gbãayu nɛɛ knti kpang ɓɛɛ,
41003019	a ɓɔɔ Yahuda Isikariyoti ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu Yeesɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
41003020	Yeesɔ naa daa tɔ yeti gãa, a zang dɔli ri ti kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔkn ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu shaa vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ takpang.
41003021	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ ɓeezung ri tãa naa weɓe, ri daayi, nɛɛ ri daa gɔ̃ wu kaatɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “shoko ta wu tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
41003022	A zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu labeenang ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Urushalima, ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ “Bahazabu kagn bii ɓiɓɛ. Nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ɓi nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ kpanti suru shi kpang a wu ɓɛɛ.”
41003023	A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa, kɔɔ ri ruu kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, “Sheetang nwangsɛ sheetang ɓi biya?”
41003024	Naa zang ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓarɛ gbete ri basɛ zɔɔ, ri shaarɛ ɓarɛ tɔ.
41003025	Zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gãa gbete, nɛɛ basɛ zɔɔ tɔ, ri naa shaarɛ ɓarɛ kaatɔ.
41003026	Naa sheetang ti bàsɛ̀ bii ɓiɓɛ, nwàng ɓi takpang. Shaarɛ ɓi kaatɔ kɔ nwani.
41003027	“Zang ɓɔɔ daa gãa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔli, wu see vuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Mã̀ zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔli kaɓa ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ wu walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu see vuu ɓiɓɛ kati.
41003028	“N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, Laa yà'a zang gbalang vuu shi kpang piti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, nɛɛ yee shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang r'ang ɓɛɛ katɔ nandon,
41003029	zang ɓɔɔ rang yee ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka yuu Suru Kpanti Laa, Laa yaa wu gbalang ɓi kpang dondong. P'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ Laa yaa zang gbalang kpang ɓi tɔ.”
41003030	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri naa weɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
41003031	Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa nyaa, a niiɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ri naa shii ka biling, a ri shong zang nɛɛ zang daa ɓaa wu nyaa.
41003032	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Naaɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa naaɓɛ, ri ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ka biling. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ.”
41003033	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kaa ɓi n tusu nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ n ɓaa ri nɛɛ naa mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaanaa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”
41003034	A raa jìng pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Naa mɛɛ kɔ, ri nɛɛ rɛɛ jaanaa mɛɛ ɓee.”
41003035	“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ, wukɔ naa mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaanaa mɛɛ.”
41004001	Diki nɛɛ tɔɔ bee tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ naa gaa tɔɔsung vuu tusunang kaa tɔkn, ka nyaa mii waapo Galili. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ vang tonsi daa nwang kagn yuu mii. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nandon ri ti shiiri ɓarɛ ka nyaa dang gãnggãng.
41004002	A tusu ri vuu dɔli nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ nɛɛ,
41004003	nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta n'ɔɔ tãayi, “Zang jaa lannang ɓɔɔgn, nɛɛ wu dàa vang jìng vuu ka jaa ɓiɓɛ.
41004004	Vang jìng vuu kana, a jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka gbalang, a jaaning ri ti arɛ ri naa yakɛ.
41004005	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri ti shili ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɔɔ zũng tapuru kagn dɔli kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri tantɛ takɛnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zũng tipi wu dɔli kpang ɓɛɛ.
41004006	A laa naa tuuyi, ri tɔɔrɔ, ri waatɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ shɔng ɓarɛ daa tipi dii kpang ɓɛɛ.
41004007	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri ti shili ka teteng kɔkɔ. A kɔkɔ bangkɛ mulu ri. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri tasɛ yuu kpang.
41004008	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ, a ri bangkɛ, ri tasɛ yuu. Ri shing jìng ɓɔɔ bmati tu kopi, ɓɔɔ laa taati, a ɓɔɔ laa maani.”
41004009	A Yeesɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa tɔɔ “Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tãayi.”
41004010	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kaa bm, zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu dìiri ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ ri nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɛɛ kati.
41004011	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Laa a nɔɔ kɔ naa zinang ruu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ka yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi ɓɛɛ, a vuu piti, zang tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang ɓarɛ nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang.
41004012	Ka a ruu ɓɔɔ, ‘Tɔ̀ɔ, ri shu jìng nɛɛ ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu, ri zi kpang, ri ti ɓaa shoo, ɓaa shoo, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang. Naa nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, ri nɛɛ gbãayu tɔ, Laa nɛɛ yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ.’”
41004013	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi dìiri nyaa vuu jeenang, keɓe kpang ya? A nɔɔ naa zi, dìiri nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔ ɓi ka biya?
41004014	Zang ɓɔɔ vang jìng vuu kaɓa, rang ɓi ruu Laa.
41004015	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang naa jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka gbalang ɓɛɛ. Ri tãa ruu Laa, a sheetang arɛ naa ta ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ri tãa ɓɛɛ tantɛnang.
41004016	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti nwang ɓarɛ naa jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka yuu pɛngkɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri tãa ruu Laa, a ri ta tantɛnang nɛɛ yeti gbete.
41004017	Ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ruu kaɓa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri mã danggn ka naa lapa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A jìng dannang naa seepaa ka ruu Kpanti Laa, ri tantɛ ruu Laa yaanang.
41004018	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti nwang ɓarɛ naa jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti kɔkɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri tãa ruu Laa,
41004019	a rɛ̃rɛnang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nɛɛ vuu naa kasɛnang, nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ yeti zang kasɛ, naa mulu ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ kati, a ruu bii naa nwàng ri vuu kaa takpang.
41004020	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ɓarɛ naa jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri tãa ruu Laa, ri tarɛ, ruu Laa nwang ri vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ri naa nwang ka naa jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ra jaa bmati tu kopi, ɓɔɔ laa taati, a ɓɔɔ laa maani ɓɛɛ.”
41004021	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ kagn atɛ waa zà'ang sɔɔ, wu zuu nɛɛ pɛntɛng, kɔ wu shing ka dii ɓonla ya? Shing wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shing waa zà'ang sɔɔ kagn lapa kpang ya?
41004022	Vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ, zang naa nwangsɛ ditɔ. Vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang zi dìiri ɓiɓɛ kpang, zang naa zi ditɔ.
41004023	Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tãayi.”
41004024	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing jìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓɛɛ ning. Naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ. Ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ, ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ ɓi kaatɔ.
41004025	Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn, zang gisi wu ɓɔɔgn tɔkn. Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang, zang naa ta ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ tɔkɔlɔng ditɔ.”
41004026	A ti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ vang jìng vuu ka jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
41004027	Shɔnzang kaɓa rooyi nɔng wu gantɛ, wu ti seepaa diki diki, zi naa ɓɔɔ jìng vuu kaɓa takɛ, wu ti bang ɓɛɛ kpang.
41004028	Ɓi tipi palɛ vuu, vuu ti tarɛ. Gaayu nɛɛ lagbãng, wu ti naa nwangsɛ yuu, tɔɔ wu shing jìng kati.
41004029	Jìng vuu nɛɛ zũng tɔ, wu ya jangsi, wu kpayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki vuu yeenang a tɔ ɓɛɛ.
41004030	“A ti kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Rùu gã̀s'ɛ Kpanti roonang Laa ɓu nɛɛ viya? Ruu tusu naa ɓɔɔ nwangsɛ ɓu kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kiya?
41004031	Nwang naa jìng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ masita ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ tɔkɔlɔng piti ka teteng jìng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓarɛ ka tipi ɓɛɛ.
41004032	Zang nɛɛ ɓaa tɔ, naa bangnɛ, vãarɛ nasãng bang, bang, jaaning ri ti naa kɔ̃lɔ saara kagn.”
41004033	Yeesɔ rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe dɔli, ka naa ɓɔɔ ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn katɔ ɓɛɛ.
41004034	Kɔɔ ri ruu kagn nɛɛ nyaa waati gbete kpang. Rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kɔ nandon, nɛɛ nwang tɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka bm, wu nwangsɛ ri dìiri ruu ɓɔɔ wu rang nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kati nandon.
41004035	Ka diki kaɓa nɛɛ laarang, Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “R'uu ta nɔɔ waapo ta ka dang.”
41004036	Ri yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kati, a ri vang tonsi ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwang kagn, ri daa nɛɛ wu. Tonsi ɓɔɔ kagn nɔngkɔ, ri dũuru wu.
41004037	A jasung seepaa rannang kati. Jasung ti vãlɛ mii kana yeti tonsi, tonsi nɛɛ wu ɔ̃ɔ kaatɔ.
41004038	Yeesɔ roo ɓi katɔ ka knti tonsi. Shing yuu ɓiɓɛ ka laa yuu pãnnang. A ri hingsi wu, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang ruu ɔ̃ɔ kana ruu ɓaaɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn kpang ya?”
41004039	A Yeesɔ seepaa mangkɛ jasung, a kɔɔ mii ɓɔɔ gɔnsɔ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Shii kikiri”, mɔɔ gɔnsɔ takpang. A jasung shii kaa kikiri.
41004040	A hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ shing danggn gn kpang ya?”
41004041	Ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ kaa naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Wee ɓi lɛɛ zang viya? Jasung nɛɛ mii waapo ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ wiya?”
41005001	Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri ta mii waapo tɔ ka dang ɓɔɔ ka tipi zang Ganasara ɓɛɛ.
41005002	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwangnɛ yeti tonsi hn, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kaa nɛɛ nɔng yuu saa ka bii Yeesɔ.
41005003	Yɔɔ kaɓa nwalɛ ɓi ka nɔng yuu saa. Zang ɓɔɔ zunung wu mãanang nɛɛ saka kagn gbete tɔkn kpang.
41005004	Lɔɔrɔ koo vuu ɓɔɔ zang zaayi, zang mã wu nɛɛ mani. Wu ti kakɛ saka ɓɔɔ zang ta naa nɛɛ doo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, diki, diki. Zang ɓɔɔ zunung wu yitinang kagn gbete kpang.
41005005	Rakɛ ka nɔng yuu saa, ti vang ɓɔɔ kɔpɔ nɛɛ zìi ɓɔɔ nɛɛ laagɛ̃. Diki, diki kaarɛ nyaa, wu ti gbãnkɛ bii nɛɛ tari.
41005006	Ɓɔɔ zi Yeesɔ nɛɛ nɔng beebang, yurɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng ɓiɓɛ.
41005007	A mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kãa vi ka bii mɛɛ viya? Yeesɔ Jaa Kpanti Laa? N zɔɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ nung Laa, mɔɔ dang m jìng kpang.”
41005008	Kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, “Suru shi kpang, nwang ta mɔɔ yaa wu bii ɓɛɛ.”
41005009	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓaa nung ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ viya?” kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓaa nung mɛɛ nɛɛ Dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu dɔli ɓɛɛ.”
41005010	A gaa Yeesɔ sasak, nɛɛ wu hing ri nɛɛ tipi kaɓa kpang.
41005011	Ka diki kaɓa bɛɛ gãnya ɓɔɔ ri shaa kagn ka doo kɔpɔ naabm gaagaa.
41005012	A suru shi kpang ri gaa Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Yaa ruu ta, ruu daa hãlɛ nyaa ka bii gãnya kaɓa.”
41005013	A yàa suru shi kpang gbalang, a ri nwangnɛ, ri daa hãlɛ nyaa ka bii gãnya. Gãnya kɔ gaagaa nung labang ziti ɓa, ri yuku, ri naa soo nyaa rang ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛrɛ, ri daa ɔ̃ɔrɔ ka yeti mii nandon.
41005014	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shaa gãnya, ri yuku, ri daa kɔɔ zang gari bang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri roo gãa ka gari tɔkɔlɔng vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ. A zang nwangkɛ nɛɛ ri naa zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.
41005015	Ɓɔɔ ri a tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ, ri naa zi zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nwang tɔ ka nɔngkɔ, hãa vuu tɔ ka bii, raa shɔnzang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ tɔkn. A ri kaa vɔrɔ.
41005016	Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ gãnya, ri kɔɔrɔ zang kati.
41005017	A zang kaɓa, ri gaa tɔɔsung Yeesɔ gaanang kati, nɛɛ wu dita, wu yaa ri tipi ɓarɛ.
41005018	Yeesɔ v'ang tonsi kana, a zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang nwangkɛ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, gaa wu nɛɛ wu daa nɛɛ wu ning.
41005019	A Yeesɔ kasɛ kpang. Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dita gãa, mɔɔ daa kɔɔ rɛɛ ɓaazung vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ gn ɓaaɓɛ kɔng Laa ɓɛɛ”
41005020	A daayi, daa ka yeti Dekapoli rɛɛ gari kopi, a gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ pàlɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ kati. Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, ri mã naa ka danggn.
41005021	Yeesɔ naa ta waapo tɔ ka dang tɔkn nɛɛ tonsi. Ɓɔɔ doo ka nyaa waapo, zang ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa, ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng.
41005022	A zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Yayiru, arɛ naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng Yeesɔ,
41005023	a gaa wu tɔɔ, “Jaa mɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, vuu palɛ katɔ nung vɔrɔ gbete. Arɛ mɔɔ daa ìi wu naa ɓaaɓɛ jong ka bii, tɔ̀ɔ, bii wu yaa wu nɔng.”
41005024	A Yeesɔ daa ka nɛɛ wu ning. Zang dɔli ri dũuru wu kati. Ri ti kpalɛ wu bii kana.
41005025	A jaa soro ɓɔɔ kagn, zìi kpaa wu daa saa kopi tu ziti.
41005026	Jaa soro kaɓa, dang jìng tɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zang bii dɔli, wɔsɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ nandon, kɔnang ɓiɓɛ daa nɛɛ tìng kɔ jong.
41005027	Jaa soro kaɓa tãa nyaa Yeesɔ tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, seepaa, a ka knti Yeesɔ ka teteng zang, a lee naa ka nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ Yeesɔ.
41005028	Kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Naa n lee naa ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, kɔnang mɛɛ waa nyaa katɔ.”
41005029	A zìi ɓɔɔ kpaa wu tantɛ kaa dɔnnang. A tãa ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kɔnang ɓiɓɛ waa nyaa tɔ.
41005030	Yeesɔ tantɛ zinang nɛɛ, naa zang masɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu, masɛ zang ɓɔɔ tɔ. A raa jìng hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi, lee naa ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ mɛɛ wiya?”
41005031	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ zang dɔli ri kpalɛ mɔɔ bii, a mɔɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ doo nɛɛ mani Ɓu wi lee m naa ka bii wiya?”
41005032	Yeesɔ dũng jìng nɛɛ wu zi kaa zang ɓɔɔ lee wu naa ka bii ɓɛɛ.
41005033	A jaa soro ɓɔɔ lee naa ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ Yeesɔ zi tantɛnang nɛɛ Yeesɔ kãa wukɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, a nɛɛ vɔrɔ kaanang, bii zaa wu kana, tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ wu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ wu ɓɛɛ kaa nandon.
41005034	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Man jaa, danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ masɛ mɔɔ tɔ. Daa waasɛ̃, kɔnang ɓaaɓɛ wu waa nyaa ta.”
41005035	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa nyaa, zang shoonang ri a nɛɛ gãa Yayiru, ri naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Jaa ɓaaɓɛ vɔ tɔ. Mɔɔ kpãa maalang tɔ̀'ɔ dalɛ waati kpang.”
41005036	Yeesɔ y'ee laa ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Kɔɔ Yayiru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ.”
41005037	Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu nɛɛ ri shii ka nɔngkɔ. A ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ Bituru, nɛɛ Yakubu, nɛɛ Yɔhana jaa naa Yakubu kɔ shɛ̃ɛning daa nɛɛ ri.
41005038	Ɓɔɔ ri a tɔ ka gãa Yayiru, a Yeesɔ zirɛ, zang zi zɔɔ ɓi takpang. Zang kaa kana, zang ti ɓaarɛ nyaavaa kana lapa.
41005039	Yeesɔ daa ka yeti gãa a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kaarɛ ka ruu viya? Jaa vɔ ɓi ka takpang, roo ɓi katɔ waati.”
41005040	A ri laarɛ wu. Yeesɔ ãtɛ zang ka biling nandon, a ɓaa nyaa ka daa jaa, nɛɛ naa jaa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ wu, a daa nɛɛ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ jaa kagn ɓɛɛ.
41005041	A yi naa jaa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Talita kumi,” (Dìiri yee keɓe ɓi, “Jaa, n kɔɔ mɔɔ, seepaa ta.”)
41005042	A jaa seepaa tantɛnang, gaa tɔɔsung rakɛnang kati. S'aa jaa kaɓa kopi tu ziti. Ɓɔɔ ri zi naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn.
41005043	A Yeesɔ shàarɛ̀ ri nyaa tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ zang vuu keɓe kpang. A ti kɔɔ ri tɔkn nɛɛ, ri a jaa vuu ɓɔɔ jaa shaa ɓɛɛ ta.
41006001	Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daa ka gari ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri ti daa kaa nɛɛ wu ning.
41006002	Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudawa, Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung vuu tusunang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa. Zang piti ɓɔɔ ti tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe zi vuu keɓe ɓi biya nɔngkɔ viya? Laa a wu zũnang vi nɔngkɔ viya? zunung ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ ruu mã naa ka danggn katɔ.
41006003	Wee ɓu zang ɓɔɔ seere laa ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Wu Marayamu kɔ niiɓɛ kpang ya? Wu ti rɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yusufu nɛɛ Yahuda nɛɛ Siman kɔ jaa niiɓɛ kpang ya? Wu ti rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ soro kɔ nɛɛ ruu ka nihn kpang ya?” Gnvɔ shaa ri, ri bɛ̃ɛ wu kati.
41006004	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang a zang nyaa shoonang Laa bannang ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn piti, zang gari ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung, nɛɛ zang yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ kɔ ri a wu bannang ɓi kpang shɛ̃ɛning.”
41006005	Yeesɔ walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ka nɔngkɔ kpang. Masɛ zang tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ wu shing ri naa ka yuu ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
41006006	Yeesɔ mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
41006007	A ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti, a ɓakɛ ri kaa ziti, ziti, shongko ri. A ti a ri naa ɓɔɔ ri nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
41006008	Shaarɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, ri tuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri daa zanti nɔng ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, ri tuu labalang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Nɛɛ ri tuu vuu shaanang nɛɛ duku ka naa ɓarɛ kpang. Nɛɛ ri ti daa nɛɛ saka ka naa ɓarɛ kpang.
41006009	Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri hãa koodoo katɔ. Nɛɛ ri ti hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ziti ka bii kpang.
41006010	A ti kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Gãa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ daa kagn piti, n'ɔɔ nwang ka nɔngkɔ, diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa wu a nɛɛ mani.
41006011	Nɔng piti ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ ta nɔɔ kagn kpang, a ri ti kasɛ nɛɛ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ nɛɛ yaa nɔng kaɓa kaa tɔ, n'ɔɔ waa zũng tapuru ɓɔɔ ka doo manɛ katɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ ruu manɛ hãa ɓi tɔɔgn kpang, ɓi kaa ruu ɓarɛ.”
41006012	A ri daa rang zang yee Laa kati. Ri kɔɔ zang t'ɔɔ, zang ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ta, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ.
41006013	Ri ti nwangsɛ suru shi kpang dɔli. A ri ti tungku zang kɔnang dɔli nung ka yuu. A ri masɛ ri kati.
41006014	Hiridu ɓɔɔ roo kpanti ka Galili tãa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa Yeesɔ baa nɔng tɔ nandon ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang wisi Yɔhana ɓɔɔ pàl'e zang batizima paa tɔ nɛɛ saa ka ruu nɔngkɔ walɛ naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn palɛnang.”
41006015	A zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Ɓi Iliya.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔgn naa ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ ka tìng ɓɛɛ.”
41006016	Ɓɔɔ Hiridu tãa naa weɓe, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yɔhana ɓɔɔ n d'ɔng yuu ɓiɓɛ zang wisi wukɔ paa nɛɛ saa.”
41006017	Hiridu kɔ shong zang nɛɛ zang daa yi Yɔhana zang mãrɛ, zang loo wu ka sãa, ka ruu Hirodiya soro jaa diiɓɛ Filibu ɓɔɔ wu ta ɓɛɛ.
41006018	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yɔhana kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ Hiridu tɔɔ, “Daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ta soro jaa daaɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
41006019	Hirodiya mang Yɔhana ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang batizima ka yeti, kasɛ nɛɛ wu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ katɔ, a walɛ gbalang kpang.
41006020	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Hiridu kaa vɔrɔ Yɔhana katɔ, ti zi tɔ nɛɛ Yɔhana ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ Hiridu yiti Yɔhana tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu lee Yɔhana naa ka bii kpang. Hiridu ɓaa shoo katɔ ka nyaa Yɔhana tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a yè'e Yɔhana kpãa wu ka yeti dɔli.
41006021	Hirodiya naa walɛ gbalang vuu ɓɔɔ wu kongso ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yɔhana ka lee ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ zang yi Hiridu kagn raa bii ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa, kpanti Hiridu gaarɛ zang bang bang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang sɔɔja, nɛɛ zang Galili ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn dɔli, nɛɛ ri naa shaa vuu shaanang.
41006022	A jaa Hirodiya ɓɔɔ soro arɛ naa sɔ dang. Dang ɓɔɔ jaa sɔɔrɛ daa kpanti Hiridu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ka yeti dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kpanti kɔɔ jaa tɔɔ, “Gaa vuu piti ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ, n a mɔɔ katɔ.” A tũng jaa Laa tɔ̀ɔ,
41006023	“Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaa ka naa mɛɛ piti, n a mɔɔ katɔ. Naa mɔɔ gaa m nɛɛ n basɛ tipi ɓɔɔ n roo kpanti kagn ziti, n a mɔɔ dang gbete, n a mɔɔ katɔ.”
41006024	A jaa nwangnɛ daa hɛ̃ɛ niiɓɛ tɔɔ, “N daa gaa ɓu viya?” Niiɓɛ kɔɔ wu tɔ̀ɔ, “Daayi mɔɔ gaa yuu kporontong Yɔhana ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ.”
41006025	A jaa laabii gbãayu kaa tantɛnang daa ka bii kpanti kɔɔ wu tɔ̀ɔ, “N kasɛ mɔɔ a m yuu kporontong Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ka yeti pɛntɛng kãntang keɓe.”
41006026	Ɓɔɔ kpanti tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔli a zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ takpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tũng jaa Laa tɔ ka shoo zang piti ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ɓɛɛ. Kasɛ nɛɛ wu yaa nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ jaa ɓɛɛ takpang.
41006027	A kpanti shong sɔɔja gbete ka teteng sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng ka wu, nɛɛ wu daa atɛ wu yuu Yɔhana. A yɔɔ daayi, daa dɔng yuu Yɔhana ka sãa.
41006028	Atɛ yuu kporontong Yɔhana ka pɛntɛng, a a jaa kati. Jaa ti tuuyi daa a niiɓɛ.
41006029	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana ri tãa nyaa, ri arɛ ri naa tuu bii vɔrɔ Yɔhana, ri daa gbãa kati.
41006030	Zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kaɓa, ri gbãayu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri kɔɔ wu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri tusu ɓɛɛ.
41006031	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ a ta ruu daa ɔ̃sɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɔngkɔ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri 'alɛ̀ ka bii ɓarɛ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri a kana, zang ɓɔɔ ri ti daa kana. Ri walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang takpang.
41006032	Ri vang tonsi, ri daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
41006033	Zang dɔli zi ri, ri daa kana, a ri zi ri nung kaa tantɛnang. Ri yuku nɛɛ gari ɓarɛ piti piti, ri daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ka tìng ɓarɛ.
41006034	Yeesɔ nwang tɔ nɛɛ yeti tonsi a zi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, a gn ɓarɛ ri kɔng wu gn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nw'ang naa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ jagang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ gaa ri yuu vuu tusunang kaa zɔ̃ng zɔ̃ng.
41006035	Laa hãa nyaa kana, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri naa kɔɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang laa ɓa tɔ, gãa ti ki nihn kpang.
41006036	Yaa zang naa ta, zang ɓu wu daa hoo vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ka gari ɓɔɔ ka nihn naabm ɓɛɛ.”
41006037	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ a ri vuu shaanang ta ri shaayi.” A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu daa hoo borodi nung jaka ziti, ruu naa a ri ya?”
41006038	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Borodi manɛ yaa kaa nɛya? Nɔɔ dita nɔɔ zirɛ.” A ri daa zirɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yaa kaa maani nɛɛ jaazìi ziti.”
41006039	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri kɔɔ zang ta, zang ri kusu zɔɔ, ri nwalɛ ka yuu wusi bɛbɛtɛ ɓɔɔ ka nɔngkɔ.
41006040	A zang kusu zɔɔ ɓɔɔ laa maani, ɓɔɔ laa ziti tu kopi, zang nwalɛ.
41006041	A Yeesɔ see borodi maani, nɛɛ jaazìi ziti kaɓa, tuu jìng ka lapa zãa Laa, a shalɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri alɛ zang ta. A ti basɛ jaazìi ziti kaɓa ka yuu zang piti.
41006042	Zang ri shaayi, buru ɓarɛ yirɛ.
41006043	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri kpalɛ borodi nɛɛ jaazìi ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ knti saang kopi tu ziti.
41006044	Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu kaɓa ri labang maani.
41006045	A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tantɛnang nɛɛ ri vang tonsi ta ri daa gari Bɛsɛda ɓɔɔ ka nyaa rang dang ɓɛɛ ka tìng. Nɛɛ wu jee zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ doo nyaa ka gbongkarɛ.
41006046	J'ee zang nyaa tɔ, a naa seepaa daa ka kɔpɔ, nɛɛ wu daa gaa Laa.
41006047	Kaa nɛɛ laarang, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri shɛ̃ɛ teteng mii waapo tɔ, Yeesɔ ɓi ti doo ka bm ka tipi.
41006048	A zi zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri dang jìng kana nɛɛ tonsi zaanang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jasung raa jìng ka bii ɓarɛ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ ra ka yuu paa mii nɛɛ yuu gãndi. Nɛɛ wu ɓa ri katɔ,
41006049	a ri zi wu, ra kana yuu paa mii, ri kɔɔ nɛɛ naa raanang, ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa.
41006050	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi wu, a bii kaa ri vɔrɔ nandon ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ rang yee kaa tantɛnang nɛɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓi nkɔ, n'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang.”
41006051	A Yeesɔ vang kaa yeti tonsi, a jasung ɓɔɔ rarɛ vɔ̃ nyaa kati. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri mã naa ka danggn.
41006052	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi dìiri ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu nɛɛ borodi kaɓa gn kpang ɓɛɛ, a ri ti kasɛ nɛɛ ri ta vuu ɓɔɔ zang tusu ri ka yeti ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
41006053	Ri ta mii tɔ, ri naa a ka tipi Janesara. A ri mã tonsi ɓarɛ ka nyaa gãnggãng ka nɔngkɔ.
41006054	Ɓɔɔ ri nwang nɛɛ yeti tonsi hn, zang tantɛ Yeesɔ nung zinang.
41006055	A zang yuku, zang daarɛ ka gari ɓarɛ nandon. A zang gaa tɔɔsung zang kɔnang seerenang ka vuu roonang ɓarɛ, zang daa nɛɛ ri ka nɔng piti ɓɔɔ zang tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
41006056	Nɔng piti ɓɔɔ zang tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ kagn, ka yeti gari ɓɔɔ bang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang rooro gãa waati piti, zang ãtɛ zang kɔnang ka teteng gari ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu y'aa zang kɔnang jong, ri lee naa kaa nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri lee naa ka nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, kɔnang ɓarɛ yàa ri nɔng.
41007001	Zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri a nɛɛ Urushalima, ri naa kiiri Yeesɔ nyaa ka teteng.
41007002	A ri zi zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri shaa vuu shaanang, ri sɔɔ naa ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang tìng ri tusu ɓɛɛ kpang.
41007003	(Zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang Yahudawa nandon, ri sɔɔ naa katɔ gbongkarɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa ɓarɛ t'us'u, tɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang kati.
41007004	Ri nɛɛ gbãayu tɔ nɛɛ kasuwa, ri shaa vuu shaanang kpang, ri wili bii ɓarɛ ka gbongkarɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa ɓarɛ tùsù ri ɓɛɛ. Ri ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ daa ɓarɛ tusu ri dɔli. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa rɛɛ waka nɛɛ ɓari nɛɛ gbanti sɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.)
41007005	A zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu kaɓa, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa ɓuru tusu kpang ka ruu viya? Ri shaa vuu shaanang, ri sɔɔ naa ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa ɓuru tusu ruu kpang ka ruu viya?”
41007006	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang kɔɔ ka yuu manɛ, nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ, nizang kɔ nwani. Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa Ishaya tɔɔ, ‘Zang keɓe ri dɔɔ m ka nyaa lapa waati, yeti ɓarɛ ɓi ka bii mɛɛ kpang.
41007007	Ri dɔɔ m ɓarɛ waati. Ri tusu zang nyaa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang dangnɛ kaa naa wukɔ ruu Laa jong.’”
41007008	“Nɔɔ yaa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, nɔɔ d'ũng nyaa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang dang ɓɛɛ.”
41007009	A ti kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, nɔɔ dũng ɓɔɔ daa manɛ dang ɓɛɛ dɔli.
41007010	Musa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu shing jìng ka diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ’ nɛɛ ‘Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ, zang wu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka tipi tang.’
41007011	Nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ tɔɔ, ‘zang nɛ̀'ɛ kɔɔ diiɓɛ nɛɛ 'n a Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ a nɔɔ tɔ nandon’ Vuu ɓɔɔgn kpang,
41007012	nɔɔ yàa zang gbalang tɔ nɛɛ zang wu shing jìng tɔ̀'ɔ ka daa zang nɛɛ naa zang kpang.”
41007013	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ shing ruu Laa nwang tɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ tusu zang vuu ɓɔɔ d'aa manɛ tusu ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ naa weɓe ti kagn dɔli. Nɔɔ tusu zang wu ruu Laa kpang.
41007014	A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓàs'i ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔkn, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta nandon nɔɔ tãayi, nɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
41007015	Vuu ɓɔɔ daa ka yeti shɔnzang, ɓɔɔ raa shɔnzang wu nwang zang shi kpang ka tìng Laa ɓi kagn kpang. Ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa shɔnzang kɔ shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tìng Laa.
41007016	Ẓang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tãayi.]”
41007017	A Yeesɔ naa yaa zang ka biling daa ka yeti gãa. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri naa hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ wu kɔɔ ri dìiri yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ ta.
41007018	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi kpang kɔ doori ya? Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ daa ka buru shɔnzang, ràa zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tìng Laa kpang, kpang ya?
41007019	ka ruu ɓɔɔ, daa ɓi ka ɓoro ɓiɓɛ kpang, daa ɓi ka buru ɓiɓɛ kɔ jong, wu naa nwang kaa nɛɛ dii.” (Yeesɔ kɔɔ naa weɓe, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang wu zi kati nɛɛ vuu shaanang ɓi tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nandon).
41007020	A ti kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa shɔnzang, wukɔ shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tìng Laa.
41007021	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu naa, rɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang vuu shi kpang, rooronang nɛɛ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang gee ka takpang, shɔngɓɔ ɓɔɔnang, shɔnzang nyɔnang, rooronang nɛɛ soro zang ɓɔɔgn,
41007022	kasɛnang vuu ɓɔɔ wu ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang kpang nɛɛ gɔ̃ɔ kãanang, nɛɛ zang nwaarɛnang, nɛɛ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ palɛnang, nɛɛ sũnyaa kaanang, nɛɛ yee shi kpang rannang ka yuu zang, nɛɛ yuu tuunang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ naa shoko, nw'ang ɓi nɛɛ yeti shɔnzang.
41007023	Vuu shi kpang keɓe, a ɓi nɛɛ yeti shɔnzang kɔ nandon. Rikɔ shing zang, zang nwang zang shi kpang ka tìng Laa.”
41007024	A Yeesɔ naa seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daa ka tipi Taya nɛɛ tipi Sidong. A daa hãa nyaa ka yeti gãa, kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu zi nɛɛ wu ka nɔngkɔ kpang. Zang ti naa zi ɓiri, nɛɛ wu kagn nɔngkɔ.
41007025	A jaa soro ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ soro, naa tãa nyaa nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, a tantɛ anang naa tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng ɓiɓɛ.
41007026	Jaa soro keɓe ɓi zang Heleni. Zang yi wu ɓi ka tipi Fonishiya ɓɔɔ ka tipi Siriya ɓɛɛ. A gaa Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu nw'angsɛ̀ wu suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka bii jaa ɓiɓɛ jong.
41007027	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “R'uu a wujɛ kɔ vuu shaanang shɔɔnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang tuu vuu shaanang wujɛ zang tasɛ zaa kpang.”
41007028	A jaa soro kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi tɔ nɔngkɔ nizang, zaa ɓɔɔ ka dii teeburu, ri yakɛ kɔkɔlɔ borodi ɓɔɔ shili nɛɛ naa wujɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.”
41007029	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ m naa weɓe ɓɛɛ, gbãayu ta mɔɔ daa gãa, suru shi kpang yàa jaa ɓaaɓɛ bii tɔ.”
41007030	A jaa soro gbãayu daa ìi jaa ɓiɓɛ roo tɔ ka latãng, suru shi kpang nwang tɔ yaa wu bii tɔ.
41007031	A Yeesɔ yaa tipi Taya, nɛɛ wu daa kaa nyaa waapo Galili a sɔɔ kaa nɛɛ tipi Sidong nɛɛ tipi Dekapoli (ree gari kopi)
41007032	A zang atɛ wu zang shoo nɔɔ katɔ, a ti r'ang nyaa rũntung. A ri gaa Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu shing wu naa ka bii, tɔ̀ɔ, wu masɛ wu kati.
41007033	A Yeesɔ naa gɔ̃ɔ wu ka bm dang gbete, a hãlɛ saa naa ka shoo yɔɔ, a tu sisãa, a lee rìiti yɔɔ nɛɛ mani.
41007034	A Yeesɔ tuu jìng ka lapa a shu gn, a kɔɔ yɔɔ tɔɔ “Efata,” (Dìiri ruu keɓe ɓi, “Lu ta.”)
41007035	Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a shoo yɔɔ luku kati. Rìiti ɓiɓɛ ti ɓele, a gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang tɔ̃ɔ kati.
41007036	A Yeesɔ shaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ, ri daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Yeesɔ nɛɛ, shaarɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang, ri ti daa kɔɔrɔ zang ɓarɛ kaa gbãnggbãng kɔ jong.
41007037	Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu kaɓa, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe palɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nandon. P'alɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ shoo nɔɔ katɔ wu tãa nɔng. A zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ ti rang yee.”
41008001	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔgn, ri naa kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa, vuu ɓɔɔ ri shaa ɓɛɛ takpang. A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ,
41008002	“Zang keɓe gn ɓarɛ kɔng m dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nwang tɔ nɛɛ n daa diki taati, vuu shaanang ɓarɛ takpang ɓɛɛ.
41008003	Naa n jee ri nyaa nɛɛ ri dita gãa, ri shaa vuu ka nyaa kpang, doo daa kaa ri katɔ ka gbalang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri 'alɛ̀ nɛɛ nɔng beebang ɓɛɛ.”
41008004	A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “A ruu walɛ borodi ka niya ka jìngti keɓe, ruu a zang keɓe naa ɓɔɔ daa ri katɔ wiya?”
41008005	A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Borodi manɛ yaa nɛya?” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Yaa man ziti.”
41008006	A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, nɛɛ ri nw'al'ɛ ta tipi. A see borodi manziti kaɓa, a zãa Kpanti Laa, a shalɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri alɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ ta. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri alɛ zang kati.
41008007	A jaazìi seseere ti yaa doo gn ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ tɔkɔlɔng. A Yeesɔ ti zãa Kpanti Laa ka ruu jaazìi kaɓa, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri alɛ zang ta kɔ doori.
41008008	Zang keɓe piti, ri shaa vuu shaanang, buru ɓarɛ yirɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ knti, saang manziti.
41008009	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang kaɓa, ri labang dɛ̃ɛti.
41008010	A jee ri nyaa kati, a vang tonsi kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tantɛnang daa ka tipi Damanuta.
41008011	A zang Farisawa ri arɛ, ri gaa tɔɔsung nyaa laanang nɛɛ Yeesɔ. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri gãsɛ wu katɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi kati nɛɛ Yeesɔ a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa.
41008012	A Yeesɔ shu gn, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang koo jaa knti keɓe, nɔɔ kasɛ n tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu viya? N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, n tusu nɔɔ kpang.”
41008013	A y'aa ri ka nɔngkɔ, vang tonsi tɔkn, ta mii waapo daa ka nyaa gãnggãng dang.
41008014	Danggn ning zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ katɔ, ri tuu borodi ka naa kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ yaa ka yeti tonsi gbete ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
41008015	Ri daa kana, a Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu shaarɛ ri nyaa ɓɛɛ kati, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn kagn, nɔɔ gãng jìng ka yisi ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Hiridu ning.”
41008016	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri gaa tɔɔsung yee rangkɛnang kaa naa ɓarɛ. Ri tɔɔ, “Yeesɔ rang ruu yee keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, borodi ka naa ɓuru kpang ɓɛɛ.”
41008017	Yeesɔ ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ka naa ɓarɛ ɓii tɔ, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ɓu ka ruu vi, nɛɛ borodi ka naa manɛ kpang viya?” Nɔɔ zi ɓu gn kpang ya? Nɔɔ zi dìiri vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu nɔɔ kpang ya?
41008018	Jìng manɛ kagn, nɔɔ zi nɔng kpang ya? Shoo manɛ kagn, nɔɔ tãa nɔng kpang ya? Nɔɔ kpaa danggn,
41008019	ka diki ɓɔɔ n 'a zang labang maani borodi maani kpang ya? Nɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ knti, saang nɛya? A ri kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “saang kopi tu ziti.”
41008020	A borodi manziti ɓɔɔ n 'a zang labang dɛ̃ɛti, nɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ saang nɛya? Ri ti kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Saang manziti.”
41008021	A ti naa hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi ɓu gn kpang ya?”
41008022	Ri naa a ka Bɛsɛda. Zang atɛ wu zang ɓɔɔ jìng ringtang, a zang gaa wu, nɛɛ wu lee wu naa ka bii, tɔɔ wu masɛ wu kati.
41008023	A Yeesɔ yi zang jìng ringtang ka naa, daa nɛɛ wu ka knti gari. A Yeesɔ tu sisãa ka jìng ɓiɓɛ, a lee naa ka jìng ɓiɓɛ, a hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kana ya?”
41008024	A zang jìng ringtang kaɓa tuu jìng, a kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi zang ri rakɛ kana, ri nwang kaa naa laa.”
41008025	A Yeesɔ lee naa ka tɔkn jìng yɔɔ, jìng ɓiɓɛ ɓele kati, a zi vuu piti kaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
41008026	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu kati, nɛɛ wu dita gãa. A shaarɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, mɔɔ daa yeti gari takpang.
41008027	A Yeesɔ ti yi gbalang daanang ɓi kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri daarɛ ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ka tipi Kayisariya Filipi ɓɛɛ. Ri daa kana, a Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, tɔɔ, “Zang kɔɔ nɛɛ m ɓu wiya?”
41008028	A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa Iliya. A zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, mɔɔ ɓaa zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.”
41008029	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “A nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ nkɔ wiya?” Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ Kirisi.”
41008030	A Yeesɔ shaarɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wukɔ Kirisi kpang.
41008031	Yeesɔ gaa ri tɔɔsung vuu tusunang tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ n Jaa shɔnzang n naa dang jìng ditɔ dɔli. Zang bang zang Yahudawa, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri naa bɛ̃ɛ m ditɔ. Zang naa nyɔ m vɔrɔ, Laa naa wisi m paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
41008032	Kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kpang, kɔɔ ri waati, naa ɓɔɔ ri zi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Bituru gɔ̃ɔ wu dang gbete, a mangkɛ wu.
41008033	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ raa jìng zi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu doo ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ, a mangkɛ Bituru tɔɔ, “Dita kaɓa sheetang. Mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ kpang, mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
41008034	A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu dũng m, wu yaa yuu ɓiɓɛ kasɛnang ta, wu ta jìng dannang ɓɔɔ a ka ruu nung mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Wu tuu laa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang naa ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓɛɛ, wu dũng m.
41008035	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ, naa loo ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. A Zang ɓɔɔ loo yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu mɛɛ, nɛɛ ka ruu, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, wukɔ naa ta yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi jong.
41008036	Naa shɔnzang wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon, a loo suru bii ɓiɓɛ, vuu ɓɔ̀'ɔ koo keɓe nw'ang wu ɓu viya?
41008037	Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang kɔ̃sɔ suru bii ɓiɓɛ nɔng kagn ya?
41008038	Shɔnzang piti ɓɔɔ yusɛ̃ɛ mɛɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Ruu mɛɛ, nɛɛ tuuru wu ka tìng zang shi kpang kɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓee. Jaa Shɔnzang naa tuuru yusɛ̃ɛ ɓiɓɛ doo nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu naa a nɛɛ bannang ɓɔɔ Daa ɓiɓɛ a wu ɓɛɛ. Ti naa a nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ning ɓɛɛ.”
41009001	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng zang kɔ ri shiiri ɓee, ri zǐ Kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa roo ɓɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri vɔrɛ.”
41009002	Diki mangbete naa ɓa tɔ, Yeesɔ see rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yakubu, a ɓɔɔ Yɔhana kɔ shɛ̃ɛning daa nɛɛ ri ka kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ bee dɔli ɓɛɛ. A bii Yeesɔ risi kaa n'aa ɓɔɔgn ka jìng ɓarɛ.
41009003	Fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ risi nw'ang kaa puru shãashãa. Zang fɔ̃ɔrɔ sɔɔnang ɓɔɔ sɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ wu puu naa weɓe kagn koo keɓe kpang.
41009004	A ri zi Iliya nɛɛ Musa, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, ri rang yee kana nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
41009005	Bituru kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, wee ruu ka nihn wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, ruu waa k'uutu taati ka nihn, ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ gbete, ɓɔɔ Musa gbete, a ɓɔɔ Iliya ti gbete.”
41009006	Bituru kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ takpang, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ dɔli.
41009007	A sãmbong arɛ naa zuu ri kati. Ri ti tãa yee nɛɛ yeti sãmbong tɔɔ, “Wee jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ gbãnggbãng kɔ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ning.”
41009008	Ɓɔɔ ri raa jìng hn, ri zi zang ɓɔɔ takpang, ri zi kaa Yeesɔ kɔ nɛɛ ri gbete.
41009009	Ri sh'oorò doo naa nɛɛ kɔpɔ, Yeesɔ shaarɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ vuu kɔ nɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ kpang, Laa nɛɛ wisi Jaa Shɔnzang paa tɔ ka vɔrɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang kati.”
41009010	Ri vɔ̃ nyaa kaa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ dìiri ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ Laa naa wisi wu paa ditɔ ka vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
41009011	A ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Ka ruu vi zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, Iliya kɔ gaayu anang shɔɔnang tɔ̀ɔ, Kirisi wu arɛ viya?”
41009012	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Iliya kɔ a shɔɔnang nizang, tɔ̀ɔ, wu shìli vuu ka tɔkn waasɛ̃. A ti hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, a ka ruu vi zang beeyi tɔɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang naa dang jìng ditɔ, zang ti naa bɛ̃ɛ wu viya?
41009013	N kɔɔ nɔɔ Iliya a tɔ, ri palɛ wu vuu piti ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ. Ri palɛ wu naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ.”
41009014	Ri naa a tɔ bii zang nimbang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, a ri zi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ka bii ɓarɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ti laa nyaa kana nɛɛ ri.
41009015	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri zi Yeesɔ hn, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri tãa tìnang dɔli, a ri yurɛ ri daa kpisi wu yuu ri jee wu nyaa kati.
41009016	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rangkɛ ɓu ruu vi nɛɛ ri viya?”
41009017	Zang gbete ka yeti zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Maalang, n atɛ mɔɔ jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang nɔɔ wu nyaa katɔ, rang yee takpang ɓɛɛ.
41009018	Nɔng ɓɔɔ naa mã wu kagn, loo wu ka tipi. Puru ti p'u wu nɛɛ nyaa kpung, kpung. Wu ti sh'aa tãri kpaaka, kpaaka. Wu ti shiiri wu gbatagbata. N gaa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, nɛɛ ri nwangsɛ suru shi kpang keɓe, ri zunung kpang.”
41009019	A Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zang koo jaa knti keɓe, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang ɓee, nɔɔ nɛɛ 'n nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Nɔɔ nɛɛ n mã danggn nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Nɔɔ atɛ m jaa bì'i ta.”
41009020	A ri atɛ wu jaa kati. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang zi Yeesɔ hn, mã jaa, jaa watɛ ka tipi. Jaa jìiri ka tipi, puru pu jaa nɛɛ nyaa kpung, kpung.
41009021	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ daa jaa tɔɔ, “Diki ɓɔɔ kɔnang keɓe gaa wu yuu bee tɔ ya?” A kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Gaa wu yuu bee doo tɔkɔlɔng.”
41009022	“Diki ɓɔ̀'ɔgn loo wu ka waa, diki ɓɔ̀'ɔgn ti loo wu ka mii, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kati. Mɔɔ nɛɛ zunung katɔ, gn ɓuru wu kɔng mɔɔ, mɔɔ yi ruu naa kagn, mɔɔ màsɛ̀ ruu wu.”
41009023	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, mɔkɔ nɛɛ zunung danggn shinnang katɔ jong. Zang piti ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa, vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa wu ɓi kagn kpang.
41009024	A d'aa jaa mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm tantɛnang tɔɔ, “N shing danggn katɔ, yi m naa kagn. N shing danggn ka bii ɓaaɓɛ gbãnggbãng.”
41009025	A ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi zang ɓɔɔ gaagaa ri yuku ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, mangkɛ suru shi kpang, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Suru shi kpang kɔ nɔɔ jaa nyaa nɛɛ shoo ɓee, n kɔɔ mɔɔ nwang ta mɔɔ yaa wu bii. Mɔɔ paasɛ anang tɔ̀'ɔ bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.”
41009026	A suru shi kpang mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, a mã jaa tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̃ɔ, a nwangnɛ yàa jaa bii kati. Jaa roo ka tipi ɓoromang naa zang ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang dɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri kɔɔyi tɔ jaa vɔ tɔ.
41009027	A Yeesɔ yi jaa ka naa, a yì jaa naa ka bii, a jaa seepaa kati.
41009028	Yeesɔ daa tɔ ka yeti gãa ka bm, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu zunung nwangsɛnang ɓuru kpang ka ruu viya?”
41009029	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe nw'ang ɓi jong waati kpang, zang nwangsɛ ɓi nɛɛ Laa gaanang.”
41009030	A Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, ri naa sɔɔ kaa nɛɛ tipi Galili. Yeesɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang gbete wu zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kagn kpang.
41009031	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ vuu ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang naa tuu Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ, zang a zang. Ri naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Zang nɛɛ nyɔ wu vɔrɔ tɔ, Laa naa wisi wu paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
41009032	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri zi dìiri vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri tɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu, ri kaa vɔrɔ.
41009033	Ri naa a tɔ ka Kafanahu, Yeesɔ naa hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ wu nwang kagn tɔɔ, “Ɓaasi nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ɓu nɛɛ vi ka gbalang viya?”
41009034	Ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ ri laa nyaa nɛɛ ɓu wi bang ka teteng ɓarɛ wiya ɓɛɛ?
41009035	A Yeesɔ nwang ka tipi, kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang zang bang, wukɔ wu risi yuu ɓiɓɛ naa zang wujaa ɓɔɔ palɛ zang shoonang jong.”
41009036	A Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka jaa tɔkɔlɔng, a shing ka teteng ɓarɛ. A naa tuu jaa kaɓa ka naa ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ,
41009037	“Zang ɓɔɔ ta jaa ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ naa weɓe ka nung mɛɛ, tà nkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti ta m, ta ɓi nkɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ta m nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ ning.”
41009038	Yɔhana kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, ruu zi zang ɓɔɔ kagn nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ nung ɓaaɓɛ, a ruu zãa wu. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi nɛɛ ruu kpang ɓɛɛ.”
41009039	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ zãa wu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, ti raa nyaa tantɛnang, wu naa rang yee shi kpang ka yuu mɛɛ tɔkn kpang.
41009040	Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓuru katɔ, wukɔ zang ɓuru.
41009041	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ a nɔɔ mii ɓoonang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓaa nɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng Kirisi ɓɛɛ, naa ta vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa shing wu ɓɛɛ ditɔ.
41009042	“Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ jaa gbete ka teteng wujɛ seseere kɔ ri shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ ɓee, palɛ vuu shi kpang, jìng ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa naa dangnɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ mã ree bang ka turu ɓiɓɛ, zang tasɛ wu ka yeti mii waapo katɔ.
41009043	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ, nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, dɔng katɔ, mɔɔ tasɛ. Daa nɔng suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ naa dang gbete gbã̀'agbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ naa ziti ɓaaɓɛ ka yeti waa bang ɓɔɔ ning kpang ɓɛɛ.
41009044	ḳa nɔng kaɓa, jaagn ɓɔɔ shaa bii ɓarɛ, vɔ ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Waa ɓɔɔ ti shaa ri zang ningsi ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.]
41009045	Doo ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ, nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, dɔng ta mɔɔ tasɛ. Daa nɔng suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ doo dang gbete gbã̀'agbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ daa tasɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ doo ziti ɓaaɓɛ ka yeti waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.
41009046	Ḳa nɔng kaɓa jaagn ɓɔɔ shaa bii ɓarɛ, vɔ ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Waa zang ti shaa ri zang ningsi ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.]
41009047	Jìng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nɛɛ dɔ̃ mɔɔ, nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, zɔ̃ng ta mɔɔ tasɛ. Daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti nɛɛ jìng dang gbete gbã̀'agbãa, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang tasɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ jìng ɓaaɓɛ ziti piti ka waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.
41009048	Ka nɔng kaɓa, jaagn ɓɔɔ shaa bii ɓarɛ, vɔ ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Waa bii zang ti ningsi ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.
41009049	“Zang naa raa zang, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ waa, naa ɓɔɔ zang raa vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ tãa ɓɛɛ.
41009050	“Tãa ɓi tɔ̃ɔ. Naa lanang tãa nɛɛ takpang, zang palɛ bɛɛ nɛɛ mani wu la tɔkn viya? Tãa ɓɔɔ shing zang, nɛɛ zang nw'ang ka nyaa zɔɔ, wu nwang ka bii manɛ ning. Nɔɔ ti nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ zɔɔ.”
41010001	A yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daa ka tipi Yahudiya, a ta rang Urudung. A zang dɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kaa tɔkn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a tusu ri vuu kaa naa ɓasidi ɓɛɛ.
41010002	Zang Farisawa ri naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri naa gãsɛ wu. Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu Laa kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ zang wu h'ing soro ɓiɓɛ ya?”
41010003	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Musa dang nɔɔ nyaa ɓu nɛɛ viya?”
41010004	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Musa kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang wu bee zang soro labeenang soro hinnang, zang a wu tɔ̀ɔ zang yaa wu naa kati.”
41010005	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Musa bee nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ tà vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu kpang ɓɛɛ.
41010006	Ɓɔɔ Laa gaayu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe mãanang, ‘Laa mãa zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro.’
41010007	‘Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang varɛ yaa diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ, ɓakɛ zɔɔ kaa nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ.
41010008	Tɔ̀ɔ, ri ziti ri nwang kaa bii gbete’. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri tɔ̀'ɔ ziti kpang, ri kaa bii gbete.
41010009	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ ɓ'ak'ɛ tɔ, shɔnzang wu basɛ takpang.”
41010010	Yeesɔ daa ka yeti gãa, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri naa hɛ̃ɛ wu ruu keɓe kaa tɔkn.
41010011	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri kati tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nwangsɛ soro ɓiɓɛ, a shing ɓɔɔgn, palɛ soro ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang vuu shi kpang.
41010012	Zang soro ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yupaa gãa varɛ ɓiɓɛ, a daa gee zang ɓɔɔgn, palɛ ɓi vuu dũndũng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn kaɓa.”
41010013	Zang ɓɔɔ ri atɛ Yeesɔ wujɛ seseere nɛɛ wu shing ri naa ka yuu, tɔɔ wu ti gaa ri Laa. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri mangkɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri atɛ wujɛ kati.
41010014	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi naa weɓe, gnvɔ shaa wu dɔli, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ yaa wujɛ seseere ka nɔngkɔ ri a ka bii mɛɛ, n'ɔɔ zãa ri anang kpang. Kpanti roonang Laa ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ.
41010015	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta Laa nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti naa jaa tɔkɔlɔng kpang, Laa naa nwang Kpanti ɓiɓɛ kpang.”
41010016	A see ri, shing ri naa ka yuu, a gaa ri Laa kati.
41010017	Yeesɔ yi gbalang daanang ɓiɓɛ tɔ, daa kana, a jaa varɛ ɓɔɔ yurɛ naa tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, a hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, n palɛ vi tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu a m suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang viya?”
41010018	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓaa m nɛɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ ka ruu viya?” Zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kagn kpang, ɓi Kpanti Laa kɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbete.
41010019	Mɔɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ tɔ, Laa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang, mɔɔ palɛ vuu dũndũng kpang, mɔɔ ɓɔ̀'ɔ shɔngɓɔ kpang, mɔɔ suu sè'e ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ kpang, mɔɔ mulu zang kpang. Ɓaa shoo ka nyaa daaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ naaɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.”
41010020	A yɔɔ kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, n gaayu jìng shinnang ka nyaa kɔ Laa dang ɓee nandon, bɛɛ n doo tɔkɔlɔng.”
41010021	Yeesɔ shu wu jìng tɔ ka bii, kasɛ wu kati. A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ shing jìng tɔ ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ nizang, yaa mɔɔ vuu gbete. Dita, mɔɔ daa malɛ vuu naa ɓaaɓɛ nandon, mɔɔ basɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, saka vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ malɛ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ naa walɛ vuu naa ditɔ ka lapa. Tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ arɛ mɔɔ dũng m.”
41010022	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ yɔɔ tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔli, kãngtɛ waa nyaating, a yaa Yeesɔ daa kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu naa ɓiɓɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
41010023	A Yeesɔ raa jìng pɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔng, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti kagn naa kpãa zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn daanang ɓi dɔli.”
41010024	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn. A Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Wujɛ mɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ daanang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti, kpãa nyaa dɔli.”
41010025	Daanang zang vuu naa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kpãa nyaa bang. Kpãayi ɓà ɓɔɔ vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ rakumi ɓù nɛɛ yeng shɔng fɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ.
41010026	Ruu kaɓa kpãa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ dɔli. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “A ɓu wi naa walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang gbete wiya?”
41010027	Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang zunung palɛnang kpang, Laa zunung ɓi katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zunung vuu piti palɛnang ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
41010028	A Bituru hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “A wee ruu yaa vuu ɓuru nandon ruu dũng mɔɔ ɓee?”
41010029	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yaa gãa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓeezung, nɛɛ ɓeenaa, nɛɛ diiɓɛ, nɛɛ niiɓɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tipi ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu mɛɛ nɛɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa,
41010030	naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu yaa ɓɛɛ ditɔ ka koo keɓe. Naa walɛ gãa nɛɛ ɓeezung, nɛɛ ɓeenaa, nɛɛ niiɓɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ, nɛɛ tipi dakn laa maani. Zang ti naa dang wu jìng ditɔ dɔli, ti naa walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ditɔ.
41010031	Zang dɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka tìng kãntang keɓe, kɔ naa waa nyaa knti. Zang kɔ ri ka knti kãntang keɓe, kɔ naa sɔɔ zang tìng kaa jong.”
41010032	Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa kana Urushalima, Yeesɔ ti ka tìng ɓarɛ. Ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ doo naa ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ t'us'u ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũuru ri ka knti, ri kaa vɔrɔ. A Yeesɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nyaa kaa dang gbete tɔkn, a gaa ri tɔɔsung vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ wu kɔɔnang kati.
41010033	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta nɔɔ tãayi. Ruu d'aa kana Urushalima, zang ɓɔɔ naa a zang bang bang, zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ. Ri naa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu, ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri tuu wu ri a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang kati.
41010034	Ri naa kpaa wu, ri ti naa tùlù wu sisãa ka bii. Ri naa nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa, tɔ̀ɔ, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kati. Kpanti Laa naa wisi wu paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
41010035	A Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana, wujɛ Zebedi ri a ka bii Yeesɔ. Ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, ruu kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu gaa mɔɔ katɔ.”
41010036	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓu viya?”
41010037	A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ wee ruu ziti ɓɛɛ, zang gbete wu naa nwang ka naa nakn ɓaaɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ gbete wu nwang ɓi ka naa nagang ɓaaɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
41010038	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gà'a ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ naa zunung jìng dannang katɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ n naa dang ɓɛɛ ya? Zang naa palɛ nɔɔ batizima katɔ nɛɛ jìng dannang naa ɓɔɔ zang naa palɛ m ɓɛɛ ya?”
41010039	A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu zunung katɔ.” A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zunung jìng dannang ɓɔɔ n dang ɓi katɔ, zang ti naa palɛ nɔɔ batizima ɓɔɔ zang palɛ m ɓi katɔ.
41010040	Ɓɔɔ nwannang manɛ ka naa nakn nɛɛ naa nagang mɛɛ, ɓi nkɔ a zang naa kpang. Nɔng nwannang keɓe, ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ ri ɓɛɛ.”
41010041	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ kopi, ri tãa naa weɓe, gnvɔ shaa ri nɛɛ rɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana dɔli.
41010042	A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang, nɛɛ zang bang bang ɓarɛ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang zirɛ nɛɛ ri kɔ zang bang.
41010043	Ɓɔɔ manɛ ɓi nɔngkɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang zang bang ka teteng manɛ, wukɔ wu nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ nɔɔ shoonang ɓɛɛ jong.
41010044	Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu naa nw'ang ka tìng, wukɔ wu nw'ang jaafoo manɛ jong.
41010045	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang àr'ɛ nɛɛ zang shòng wukɔ shoonang kpang, àr'ɛ nɛɛ wu shong zang katɔ kɔ jong. Wu ti mã̀lɛ̀ yuu ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu zang dɔli nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu ta yuu ɓarɛ kati.”
41010046	Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa, ri a ka Jeriko. Ɓɔɔ ri seepaa daanang kati nɛɛ Jeriko, Batimawu jaa Timawu ɓɔɔ jìng ringtang ɓɛɛ, nwang ka nyaa gbalang gaa vuu.
41010047	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Batimawu tãayi nɛɛ Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara kɔ tɛɛ gbalang, a gaa tɔɔsung nyaa mɛɛrɛnang kati tɔɔ, “Yeesɔ Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda, gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
41010048	Zang dɔli ri mangkɛ wu, ri kɔɔ wu, nɛɛ wu vɔ̃ nyaa ta. A mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ nyaa ɓi kaa nabm kɔ jong nɛɛ, “Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda, gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
41010049	A Yeesɔ shiiyi, kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang wu ɓaa wu nyaa ta. A zang ɓaa zang jìng ringtang kaɓa nyaa kati. Ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ loo danggn kpang. Seepaa ta, ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa kana.”
41010050	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Batimawu tãa naa weɓe, tasɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu zuu sɔɔrɔ nɛɛ mani, a ta ka lapa, a daa ka bii Yeesɔ.
41010051	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ “Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n palɛ mɔɔ viya?” A zang ringtang kaɓa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, n kasɛ nɛɛ n zi nɔng tɔkn.”
41010052	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dita, danggn ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ shing ka bii Laa, masɛ mɔɔ tɔ,” A tantɛ nɔng kaa zinang tɔkn. A dũng Yeesɔ kaa knti.
41011001	Ri a tɔ ka Urushalima naabm, ri ka gari Bɛtafaji nɛɛ Bɛtaniya ɓɔɔ ri ka doo kɔpɔ zeetung ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ shong zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti.
41011002	Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita gari tɔkɔlɔng kɔ ka tìng manɛ ɓa. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa ka yeti gari hn, nɔɔ daa ìi jaa seesaa zang mã ka laa, ɓɔɔ zang vang gngn kpang ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Nɔɔ kã̀l'ɛ nɔɔ a nɛɛ mani.
41011003	Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ palɛ seesaa keɓe ka ruu viya?’ Nɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti Yeesɔ kasɛ katɔ. Sɔ̀ɔr'ɔ nɔɔ ditɔ tantɛnang.’”
41011004	A ri daayi, ri daa ìi jaa seesaa shii tɔ ka nyaa gbalang, zang mã ka nyaa gãa. A ri kãlɛ kati.
41011005	A zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔngkɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kã̀l'ɛ jaa seesaa kiɓi ka ruu viya?”
41011006	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri kati. Ri yaa ri, ri kãlɛ jaa seesaa, ri daa kaa nɛɛ mani.
41011007	Ri atɛ Yeesɔ jaa seesaa kati. Ri wɔɔrɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka dakn ɓiɓɛ, a Yeesɔ vangnɛ, nwang kagn.
41011008	Zang dɔli ri wɔɔrɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka gbalang, zang ɓɔɔ ri ti wɔɔrɔ ɓarɛ nasãng laa ɓɔɔ gɔpɔ kagn gaagaa ɓɔɔ ri kakɛ nɛɛ nyaa jaa ɓɛɛ.
41011009	Zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri ka tìng Yeesɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ti dũng wu ka knti, ri mɛɛrɛ nyaa kana lapa nɛɛ, “Zang wu dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ta. Laa a zang ɓɔɔ a ka nung ɓiɓɛ tìnnang tãanang tɔ.
41011010	Kpanti ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng daa ɓuru Dawuda naa rooyi, Laa wu shingnɛ wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zang wu ti dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ta.”
41011011	Yeesɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ Urushalima tɔ, a daa ka yeti Gãa Laa. A pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu tɔ nandon, a naa nwangnɛ daa ka gari Bɛtaniya nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa hãa nyaa kana ɓɛɛ.
41011012	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, ri a kana nɛɛ Bɛtaniya, a nyɔkɔ nyɔ Yeesɔ kati.
41011013	Zi laa sìiri ɓɔɔ tu gɔpɔ gaagaa nɛɛ nɔng beebang, a daayi nɛɛ wu daa hã jaa ɓiɓɛ. Ɓɔɔ naa a tɔ doo ɓiɓɛ, a ìi jaa sìiri ka laa kpang, gɔpɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu diki ɓɔɔ laa sìiri ra jaa kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
41011014	A ku laa sìiri nyaa ka bii tɔɔ, “Zang wu naa walɛ jìng laa ka bii ɓaaɓɛ tɔkn kpang.” A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ kati.
41011015	Ri naa a tɔ ka Urushalima, a Yeesɔ naa tu ka yeti Gãa Laa. A gaa tɔɔsung hingkinang zang ɓɔɔ ri malɛ vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri hooro vuu ka yeti Gãa Laa kati. A ti zìili teeburu zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ saka nɛɛ nɔng nwannang zang ɓɔɔ ri malɛ ning koro ɓɛɛ.
41011016	Kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu tuu vuu wu sɔɔ yeti Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani kpang.
41011017	A tusu zang vuu, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Labeenang Kpanti Laa kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ‘Gãa mɛɛ zang naa ɓaa ɓi nɛɛ, Gãa Laa gaanang zang koolaa piti kpang ya?’ Nɔɔ raayi nwang kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ ka ruu viya?”
41011018	A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri tãayi, a ri gaa tɔɔsung gbalang ɓɔɔ ri naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ kãanang kati. Ri kaa vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ piti, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ.
41011019	Laa naa hãa nyaa tɔ, Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri nwangkɛ ka nɛɛ yeti gari.
41011020	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, ri gbãayu kana, a ri zi laa sìiri ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ku wu nyaa ka bii, vɔ tɔ nɛɛ yuu paa daa ka dìiri ɓiɓɛ nandon.
41011021	A Bituru naa kpaa danggn, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti, zirɛ, laa sìiri ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ ku wu nyaa ka bii vɔ tɔ,”
41011022	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Kpanti Laa ning.
41011023	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa, yaa danggn naa kpang, shing danggn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi naa nwang ditɔ nɔngkɔ. Naa zang kaɓa kɔɔ kɔpɔ keɓe nɛɛ, ‘Ruu ta nɛɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ daa watɛ ka mii waapo, Laa naa pàl'ɛ wu katɔ.’
41011024	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayi, nɔɔ shing danggn nɛɛ nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ tɔ, Laa a nɔɔ katɔ.
41011025	Nɔɔ nɛɛ seepaa tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ gaa Laa, nɔɔ yà'a zang ɓɔɔ palɛ nɔɔ vuu shi kpang gbalang katɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Daa manɛ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, wu yàa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ kaa jong.”
41011026	Ṇaa nɔɔ yàa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang, Daa manɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa naa yàa nɔɔ ɓɔɔ manɛ doo kpang kɔ.]
41011027	A ri naa a kaa tɔkn ka Urushalima. Yeesɔ ra kana yeti Gãa Laa, a zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa, ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
41011028	A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe nandon nɛɛ naa kiya? Ɓu wi a mɔɔ naa vuu keɓe palɛnang wiya?”
41011029	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kaaɓi, n hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu jong gbete, nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ m tɔ, n ti kɔɔ nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
41011030	A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, ɓu wi a Yɔhana naa batizima ɓɔɔ wu pàl'ɛ zang wiya? Laa a wu yaa, kɔ shɔnzang a wu? Nɔɔ kɔɔ m ta.”
41011031	A ri gaa tɔɔsung nyaa laanang ka naa ɓarɛ, ri tɔɔ, “Naa ruu kɔɔ wu nɛɛ Laa a wu, naa hɛ̃ɛ ruu nɛɛ, ‘A ka ruu vi, nɔɔ shing danggn ka yuu Yɔhana kpang viya?
41011032	R'uu ti kɔɔ wu kpang, nɛɛ shɔnzang a wu kpang.’” (Ri kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɛɛ. Zang piti ri shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ Yɔhana ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Laa).
41011033	A ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu zi kpang.” A Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N ti kɔɔ nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ mani doo kpang kɔ.”
41012001	A Yeesɔ rang ri yee kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔgn shɔlɔ laa inabi ka jaa ɓiɓɛ, a mang gbãng ɓee nyaa jaa nɔng kiiri, kiiri. Ti palɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kãng jìng laa inabi kagn, a ti waa putali ɓɔɔ zang shii kagn zang gãng jìng ka jaa ɓɛɛ. A yãa zang nɛɛ ri gãng jìng kagn. Seepaa daa zanti ka koolaa ɓɔɔgn.
41012002	Diki jìng laa inabi hãnang naa raa bii, a yɔɔ naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ gbete a shong wu ka bii zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa, nɛɛ wu daa ta wu jìng laa ka naa ɓarɛ.
41012003	Ri yi zang shoonang yɔɔ, ri nyɔ wu, a ri sɔɔrɔ wu naa waati.
41012004	A yɔɔ jaa ti paasɛ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔgn shoonang tɔkn. Ri shing wu nyaa vuu waa ka yuu, a ri pal'ɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ.
41012005	A yɔɔ ti naa shong zang ɓɔɔgn tɔkn, a ri ti nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Yɔɔ jaa kaɓa shongko zang nɔngkɔ gaagaa, ri nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gbãa waati, a ri ti nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ ka tipi.
41012006	Zang ɓɔɔ naa wu shongnɛ, yaa kaa jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ gbãnggbãng kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A naa shong kaa wukɔ nɛɛ knti, nɛɛ naa kasɛ, ri tãa kaa nyaa jaa ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
41012007	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ yaa ri jaa ka naa ri zi jaa yɔɔ a kana, ri tɔng zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, ‘Wee jaa ɓɔɔ naa shaa vuu vɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ, nɔɔ a ta, ruu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu vɔ ɓiɓɛ wu nwang kaa ɓɔɔ ɓuru.’
41012008	A ri seepaa, ri yi jaa yɔɔ, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, ri daa tasɛ wu ka nyaa jaa biling.
41012009	“A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri tɔɔ, ‘Naa yɔɔ jaa kaɓa naa arɛ, palɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa ɓiɓɛ ka naa biya?’ Ri kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Yɔɔ jaa kaɓa naa nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa ka naa kaɓa vɔrɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu yàa zang ɓɔɔgn jaa kati.’
41012010	A Yeesɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ gã yee keɓe gngn kpang ya? Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ Tari ɓɔɔ zang jaka mãanang ri bɛ̃ɛyi, wukɔ naa ràa tari ɓɔɔ yiti jaka ɓɛɛ kati.
41012011	Kpanti Laa kɔ palɛ veɓe. Ɓɔɔ jìng ɓuru, ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ.’”
41012012	Zang bang bang, zang Yahudawa nɛɛ ri yi Yeesɔ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi tɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ, Yeesɔ rang nyaa vuu jeenang ɓiɓɛ ka yuu ɓarɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ. A ri yaa wu, ri daayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpalɛ gaagaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
41012013	A ri shong zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng knti kpanti Hiridu, nɛɛ ri daa yi wu ka yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ.
41012014	A ri arɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, ruu zi tɔ mɔɔ suu sè'e ɓaa kpang, ruu ɓaaɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ ti shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ mung zang ɓaa dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ tusu zang ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔ ruu jong, daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu sh'u kpanti Kayisa saka tipi katɔ ya, kɔ ruu shu kpang?”
41012015	Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã̀s'ɛ m ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ atɛ m dinari karɛ n zirɛ.”
41012016	A ri atɛ wu gbete. A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Wee ɓu waa nyaating, nɛɛ nung wiya?” A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔ̀'ɔ kpanti Kayisa.”
41012017	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kayisa, nɔɔ a wu, nɔɔ ti a Kpanti Laa vuu ɓiɓɛ.” Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
41012018	A zang Sadukiyawa ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ zang nɛɛ vɔ tɔ Laa naa wisi zang paa ɓi tɔɔ nɛɛ sàa kpang, arɛ naa hɛ̃ɛ wu ruu.
41012019	Ri tɔɔ, “Musa bee ruu tɔɔ, zang nɛɛ vɔrɛ, nɛɛ yaa soro ɓiɓɛ jaa kagn kpang, ɓeezung wu sɔɔrɔ soro ɓiɓɛ katɔ, wu yi ɓeezung jaa.
41012020	Zang varɛ ɓɔɔgn, nà'a ɓarɛ yi ri man ziti. Jamari shing soro, a vɔrɛ yaa soro, yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang. A ɓeezung ɓɔɔ pãng ka dakn ɓiɓɛ, naa sɔɔrɔ soro ɓiɓɛ, a ti vɔrɛ, yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang.
41012021	A zang ɓɔɔ pãng ka dakn zang ɓɔɔ doo knti kaɓa, ti vɔrɛ, yi jaa nɛɛ wu kpang.
41012022	Dɔ̃lɔ nɔngkɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ zang manziti kaɓa nandon, ri yiki jaa nɛɛ wu kpang. A jaa soro kaɓa naa vɔ kaa nɛɛ knti.
41012023	Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa, jaa soro kaɓa naa nwang ɓu kaa soro wi ka teteng ɓarɛ gbete wiya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shìli wu katɔ kɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.”
41012024	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ning gbalang katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi labeenang Laa, nɛɛ n'aa ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ vuu nɛɛ mani kpang ɓɛɛ.
41012025	Laa nɛɛ wisi zang paa tɔ nɛɛ saa, zang shing soro ɓi takpang. Zang ti naa a zang wujɛ soro ɓi takpang nɛɛ zang gee ri kpang. Zang naa nwalɛ ɓi ka naa zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
41012026	Ka ruu zang paa wisinang nɛɛ saa, nɔɔ gã gngn ka yeti labeenang Musa kpang ya? Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang bèe ruu waa ɓɔɔ shaa jaa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang bee ka nɔngkɔ nɛɛ, Laa kɔɔ Musa tɔɔ, wukɔ Laa Ibirayi, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Ishaaku, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Yakubu.
41012027	Zang keɓe ri vɔlɔ tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, wee Laa ɓàa yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu Laa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ zang w'is'i ri paa tɔ nɛɛ saa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓi Là'a zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ kpang, ɓi Là'a zang ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ning gbalang katɔ dondong.”
41012028	A shɔnzang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, arɛ naa ìi ri, ri laa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ, a ti tãa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ zang nyaa tɔ̃ɔtɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Ka teteng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, ɓu wi bang wiya?”
41012029	A Yeesɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ bang, wukɔ tɔɔ nɛɛ ‘Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta zang Isirela, Kpanti Laa ɓuru wukɔ Laa gbete.
41012030	M'ɔɔ kasɛ Kpanti Laa ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ yeti ɓaaɓɛ nandon, nɛɛ suru bii ɓaaɓɛ nandon, nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓaaɓɛ nandon, nɛɛ kaka ɓaaɓɛ nandon.’
41012031	Ɓɔɔ ɓang knti ɓiɓɛ keɓe ‘M'ɔɔ kasɛ ruu shɔnzang doo naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.’ Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, ɓɔɔ ɓa rɛɛ weɓe kagn kpang.”
41012032	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu kaɓa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔ tɔ̃ɔ, maalang. Naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔyi nizang kɔ. Kpanti Laa wukɔ Laa gbete, Laa ɓɔ̀'ɔgn kpang, wukɔ gbete.
41012033	Laa kasɛ, nɛɛ zang wu kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ yeti gbete, nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓiɓɛ nandon, nɛɛ kaka ɓiɓɛ nandon, zang wu ti kasɛ shɔnzang doo naa ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ yuu zang kɔ. Nyaa dannang keɓe dũnnang, ɓa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔrɔ Laa vuu katɔ.”
41012034	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ zũnang ning, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ta Laa wu nwang Kpanti ɓaaɓɛ kaa tɔkɔlɔng.” Zang ɓɔɔ naa paasɛ wu ruu hɛ̃ɛnang ɓɔɔgn takpang.
41012035	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu doo naa ka Gãa Laa, a hɛ̃ɛ zang tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri kɔɔ ɓu ka ruu vi nɛɛ Kirisi jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda viya?
41012036	Suru Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa Dawuda tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti Laa kɔɔ Kpanti mɛɛ tɔɔ, nwang ka naa nakn mɛɛ n shing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang ditɔ, mɔɔ naa ri nɛɛ doo ɓaaɓɛ.’
41012037	“Dawuda nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kpanti, r'aa jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓi kaa biya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa, ri ɓaa shoo kaa ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tìnang tãanang ning.”
41012038	Ɓɔɔ wu tusu zang vuu doo naa, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ ning. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri rakɛ nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ beebang, nɛɛ tɔɔ zang jeere ri nyaa ka kasuwa.
41012039	Ri ti kasɛ nwannang ka nɔng tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̃ɔ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shìli zang bang bang, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn, zang shaa vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ.
41012040	Ri mulu suvɔ, ri talɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ nandon. Ri ti gaa Laa sasak nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi ri kati. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, jìng dannang ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa naa dang ri naa ɓa ɓɔɔ zang piti katɔ.”
41012041	Yeesɔ nwang tɔ naabm ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang looro saka kagn ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, pɛ̃ɛrɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang looro saka ɓɛɛ. Zang vuu naa, ri dɔli, ri looro saka kana gaagaa.
41012042	A suvɔ ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang arɛ naa loo saka tɔkɔlɔng.
41012043	Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, suvɔ kɔ vuu ka naa kpang ɓee, vuu ɓɔɔ looyi kɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri looro saka ka nɔng kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
41012044	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ri nwangsɛ saka ɓarɛ ka yeti vuu naa ɓarɛ bɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. Suvɔ ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ kpang keɓe, atɛ ɓi vuu naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu wàl'ɛ vuu shaanang nɛɛ mani kɔ nwani nandon.”
41013001	Ɓɔɔ wu nwang doo naa nɛɛ Gãa Laa, zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, zi tari kɔ jìng lòonang kagn kpang, nɛɛ gãa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang mãarɛ ɓee.”
41013002	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi gãa kɔ zang mãarɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓee tɔ waa? Zang naa yaa tari ɓɔɔ pãng ka yuu zɔɔ gbete kpang. Zang naa jili ɓi ditɔ ka tipi nandon.”
41013003	Yeesɔ naa nwang tɔ ka tipi, ka kɔpɔ Zeetung, raa jìng ka Gãa Laa ka dang. Bituru nɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana, a ɓɔɔ Anduru ri naa hɛ̃ɛ wu ruu bɛɛ wu ka bm.
41013004	Ri tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ ruu diki ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe naa palɛ ɓɛɛ jong. Ɓu vi naa tùs'u ruu nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe palɛ kagn a tɔ viya?”
41013005	A Yeesɔ gaa ri tɔɔsung ruu kɔɔnang kati tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nwaarɛ nɔɔ”
41013006	Zang dɔli naa a ditɔ nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, ri naa kɔɔyi nɛɛ “Rikɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ” Ri nwaarɛ zang dɔli.
41013007	Nɔɔ nɛɛ tãayi zang nɛɛ kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ zang takɛ sìiri ka nɔng naabm, nɛɛ ruu sìiri ɓɔɔ zang ta kpala kpala, bii wu sɔɔ nɔɔ kpang. Vuu keɓe naa palɛ ɓi ditɔ, ɓi gn diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ kpang.
41013008	Zang tipi ɓɔɔgn ri naa gaa nyaa ditɔ nɛɛ zang tipi ɓɔɔgn. Kpanti ɓɔɔgn, wu ti naa gaa nyaa nɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔgn. Tipi naa ruutu ditɔ ka tipi koolaa dɔli, nyɔkɔ ti naa nwang ditɔ. Vuu keɓe ɓi doo jìng dannang gaayu, naa ɓɔɔ jaa gaa zang yuu kɔnang ɓɛɛ.
41013009	Nɔɔ shing yuu manɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang naa a nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ ruu ditɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang naa nyɔ nɔɔ ditɔ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa. Zang naa atɛ nɔɔ ditɔ ka tìng rɛɛ gɔmna nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti ka ruu mɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ kɔɔ ri ruu Laa kati.
41013010	Zang naa rǎng zang ɓɔɔ ka rɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ditɔ gbongkarɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, koo wu naa waa nyaa kati.
41013011	Zang nɛɛ atɛ nɔɔ tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa kɔɔ zang ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang nɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ tɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi nɔkɔ rang yee kpang, ɓi Suru Laa rang nɛɛ nyaa manɛ ɓɛɛ.
41013012	Zang naa a zang rɛɛ ɓeezung ditɔ nɛɛ zang wu nyɔ vɔrɔ. Daa zang, ri ti naa a zang wujɛ ɓarɛ ditɔ nɛɛ zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ. Wujɛ ri ti naa shii varɛ ditɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri yi ri ɓɛɛ, ri shingnɛ, nɛɛ zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ.
41013013	Zang piti, ri ti naa bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ditɔ ka ruu mɛɛ, shɔnzang ɓɔɔ mã danggn sasak wukɔ naa wɔrɛ.
41013014	“Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu baabi sh'ii tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ daa ɓɔɔ wu shii kagn kpang, Ẓang ɓɔɔ gã vuu keɓe, wu zi kati.] Zang ɓɔɔ ka tipi Yahuda ri yurɛ, ri daa ka kɔpɔ.
41013015	Zang ɓɔɔ ka yuu sãa wu shooro nɛɛ wu dàa ya vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti gãa kpang.
41013016	Zang ɓɔɔ ka j'aa wu ti gbãayu tɔ̀'ɔ, wu naa tuu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang.
41013017	Zang soro ɓɔɔ jaa ka yeti, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ jaa ka naa ka diki kaɓa, ri naa nw'ang vuu gn kɔnang.
