41013018	Nɔɔ gaa Laa nɛɛ, vuu keɓe wu palɛ nɛɛ gãmbang guusi kpang.
41013019	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jìng dannang bang kagn diki kaɓa ɓɛɛ. Zang zi jìng dannang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe gngn ka koo keɓe doo gbete kpang. Zang naa paasɛ jìng dannang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe zinang ti takpang.
41013020	Kpanti Laa nɛɛ sɔɔrɔ diki keɓe ka knti tɔkɔlɔng kpang, shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wɔ kagn gbete gãagãa kpang. Kpanti Laa naa s'ɔɔrɔ̀ diki keɓe, ka ruu zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ ɓɛɛ.
41013021	“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, Kirisi kagn nihn, kɔ ka kaaɓa, n'ɔɔ yee laa manɛ kagn kpang.
41013022	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri naa ɓaa yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ Kirisi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri naa suu sè'e nɛɛ ri zang nyaa shoonang Laa, naa alɛ ditɔ. Ri naa tusu vuu bang bang, ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ ri nwaarɛ zang kati. Naa ri nɛɛ zunung zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri nwaarɛnang katɔ, ri nɛ̀'ɛ nwaarɛ ri katɔ.
41013023	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, n kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ piti ka tìng.
41013024	“Jìng dannang kaɓa nɛɛ waa nyaa tɔ, laa kɔ ruu zi ka lapa ɓee, naa tɔ̀'ɔ katɔ. Shala ti naa yakɛ nɔng takpang.
41013025	Sang ri ti naa shili nɛɛ lapa. Vuu piti ɓɔɔ ka lapa ti naa rùut'u katɔ.
41013026	Tɔ̀ɔ, zang naa zi Jaa Shɔnzang kati ka ɓɔɔ wu a ka yeti sãmbong, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ bannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
41013027	Wu naa shong zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kati, ri kpàlɛ̀ wu zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ ka dìiri koo piti.
41013028	“Nɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii laa sìiri. Nasãng laa sìiri nɛɛ lɔɔ gɔpɔ tɔ, ɓɔɔ shɔɔ nɛɛ lusu kana, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, nɔng guusi a naabm tɔ.
41013029	Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi vuu kɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ palɛ nɛɛ naa weɓe, nɔɔ z'i katɔ nɛɛ diki Jaa Shɔnzang a naabm tɔ.
41013030	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, vuu keɓe naa palɛ ditɔ nizang gbongkarɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, zang koo jaa knti keɓe, naa ɓa kati.
41013031	Lapa nɛɛ tipi ri naa shaarɛ ditɔ, ruu mɛɛ shaarɛ ɓi kpang.
41013032	“Zang ɓɔɔ zi diki nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ n gbãayu kagn gbete kpang. Zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n Jaa Laa piti, ruu zi kpang, Kpanti Laa kɔ zi gbete.
41013033	Nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi diki kaɓa kpang ɓɛɛ.
41013034	Diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang gbãayu kagn, nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu daa zanti, y'aa gãa ɓiɓɛ ka naa zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Basɛ ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri naa palɛ ka knti ɓɛɛ katɔ nandon. A ti kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka nyaa gãa, nɛɛ wu gãng jìng tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
41013035	Gãng jìng kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ zi diki ɓɔɔ yɔɔ gãa naa gbãayu kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A nɛɛ laarang ya, nɛɛ teteng gãmbang ya, kɔ naa ɓɔɔ kn gaayu nyaa ɓaanang ya, kɔ nɛɛ gãndi zangzang ya, nɔɔ zi kpang.
41013036	Naa yɔɔ nwang nyaa wɔɔli, wu naa ìi nɔɔ, nɔɔ roo katɔ kpang.
41013037	Vuu kɔ n kɔɔ ɓee, n kɔɔ zang piti. Nɔɔ shing jìng kagn tɔ̃ɔ.”
41014001	Diki ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa Pasika ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ nyaalaa Borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang, yaa kaa ziti. A rɛɛ zang bang bang, zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri tɔng zɔɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ ri naa yi Yeesɔ nɛɛ nwiiri, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
41014002	Ri kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Ruu p'alɛ̀ ka diki ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ palɛ nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
41014003	Diki ɓɔɔgn Yeesɔ shaa vuu shaanang kana ka Bɛtani, ka gãa Siman ɓɔɔ bɛɛ vuu bii shaa katɔ ɓɛɛ. A jaa soro ɓɔɔgn a nɛɛ nung tũurunang ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔli ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ naadi ɓɛɛ, ka zà'ang, a puuyi tungku Yeesɔ ka yuu.
41014004	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔngkɔ, gnvɔ shaa ri dɔli. Ri kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Zang làs'ɛ nung keɓe ka ruu viya?”
41014005	Zang nɛɛ tɔɔ zang malɛ nung keɓe katɔ, nɛɛ ɓa dinari laa maani dakn taati katɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang nɛɛ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang, saka bii kati. A ri mangkɛ jaa soro kati.
41014006	Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yaa jaa soro ka nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kongso wu ka ruu viya?” Pàl'ɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
41014007	Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang nwalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ diki diki. Diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ piti nɔɔ naa pàl'ɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ manɛ ditɔ, n nw'ang m nɛɛ nɔɔ sasak kpang.
41014008	Palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ wu zunung katɔ ɓɛɛ. Tũuru m ɓi kaa nung ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ naa tũuru vɔrɔ mɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang gbãa kati kɔ nwani.
41014009	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang naa rang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa kagn koo keɓe piti, zang naa kɔɔ ruu vuu kɔ jaa soro keɓe pàlɛ̀ m ɓee ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, danggn jaa soro keɓe nɛɛ ning zang ɓɛɛ.
41014010	A Yahuda Isikariyoti, zang gbete ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, daa ka bii zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ wu nyɔ ri yuu Yeesɔ.
41014011	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri tãa tìnang dɔli. A ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ ri naa a wu saka. A Yahuda gaa tɔɔsung gbalang kãanang naa ɓɔɔ wu naa nyɔ ri yuu Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ kati.
41014012	Ka diki ɓɔɔ zang gaayu nyaalaa Borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang shaanang, diki ɓɔɔ zang yele mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ ruu daa pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa shaa ka nyaalaa ka niya?”
41014013	A shong zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita yeti gari, nɔɔ daa ɓee yuu ditɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ tuu mii ka bɛng. Nɔɔ dũng wu.
41014014	Gãa ɓɔɔ wu hãa nyaa kagn, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang gãa kaɓa nɛɛ ‘Maalang tɔɔ, yeti gãa roonang ɓɔɔ wu naa shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa kagn nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kiya?’
41014015	Tusu nɔɔ ka gãa lapa ɓɔɔ bang, ɓɔɔ zang shìli laa nwannang tɔ kagn tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Nɔɔ shìli ruu vuu shaanang nyaalaa ka nɔngkɔ.”
41014016	A zang ziti kaɓa, ri seepaa, ri daa gari kati. A ri daa zi vuu piti kaa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. A ri shìli vuu shaanang nyaalaa kati.
41014017	Kaa nɛɛ laarang, Yeesɔ naa a kaa nɛɛ zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
41014018	R'i shaa vuu shaanang kana, a Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang gbete ka teteng manɛ naa nyɔ yuu mɛɛ ditɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang kana nɛɛ n ɓɛɛ.”
41014019	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔli. Zang ɓu gaa tɔɔsung Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛnang kati nɛɛ, “Nkɔ ya?”
41014020	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang gbete ka teteng manɛ kɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ hãa naa kana yeti gbanti gbete nɛɛ n ɓɛɛ.
41014021	Jaa Shɔnzang naa vɔ katɔ naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Kpanti Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Jìng dannang kagn yuu zang ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ yuu Jaa Shɔnzang ɓɛɛ. Zang nɛ̀'ɛ yi zang kaɓa kpang kɔ gbã̀'agbãa, wukɔ nɛɛ daa wu.”
41014022	R'i shaa vuu shaanang kana, a Yeesɔ tuu borodi, a zãa Kpanti Laa, a shalɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ta ta, nɔɔ shaayi, wee yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ kɔ.”
41014023	A ti tuu juwa, zãa Kpanti Laa, a a ri nɛɛ ri ɓoo vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, ri ɓooro ka nyaa ɓarɛ nandon.
41014024	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Wee zìi mɛɛ ɓɔɔ naa tusu nɛɛ, nyaa shɔɔ ɓɔɔ Laa a zang naa nwang kaa nizang ɓɛɛ kɔ. Zìi mɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang naa tɛ̃ɛ ka ruu zang dɔli ɓɛɛ.
41014025	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, n naa ɓɔɔ mii jìng laa inabi tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ tɔkn kpang. N naa ɓɔɔ kaa ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ɓɔɔ ruu daa ɓoo nɛɛ nɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
41014026	A ri naa gaa soo, ri seepaa ri daa ka kɔpɔ Zeetung.
41014027	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ naa yuku ditɔ nandon. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang beeyi tɔɔ, ‘Zang naa nyɔ jagang vɔrɔ ditɔ, tɔɔ mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ri naa tantɛ kati’.
41014028	Laa nɛɛ naa wisi m paa tɔ, nkɔ naa daa Galili shɔɔnang.”
41014029	Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N'aa ri yuku doo piti, ri yaa mɔɔ, n yaa mɔɔ m kpang.”
41014030	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ zìi keɓe, ɓɔɔ kn naa ɓaa nyaa daa doo ziti, bɛɛ mɔɔ laa nyaa tɔ daa doo taati, nɛɛ mɔɔ zi m nung ɓaa kpang.”
41014031	Bituru ti kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔkn nabm tɔɔ, “Naa zang tɔɔ zang nyɔ m doo katɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ ning piti, n laa nyaa ɓaaɓɛ m kpang” Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ nandon.
41014032	A ri daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Gasemani ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nwang ta ka nihn, n daa gaa doo Laa.”
41014033	A daa nɛɛ rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana ning. Ɓɔɔ ri daa kana gbalang, a gaa tɔɔsung yeti lasɛnang kaa nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ning.
41014034	Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Bii soo m tɔ nung vɔrɔ gbete. Nɔɔ nwang ka nihn, n'ɔɔ gãng jìng kagn.”
41014035	Daa tɔ ka tìng tɔkɔlɔng, a zuu kaa nɛɛ buru ka tipi, a gaa Laa nɛɛ, gbalang nɛ̀'ɛ kagn, là'a jìng dannang keɓe nɛɛ a yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
41014036	A gaa Laa tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa mɔɔ ɓaa kagn gbete kpang. Kɔsɔ m jìng dannang keɓe katɔ. Wu vuu ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, palɛ ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓaaɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
41014037	A gbãayu naa ìi rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana ri rooro tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ Bituru tɔɔ, “Siman, mɔɔ roo katɔ ya? Mɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gãng jìng naa gbete kpang ya?
41014038	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, nɔɔ ti gaa Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Sheetang nɛɛ nwaarɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Suru bii manɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓi katɔ, bii manɛ kɔ lakɛ ɓi kaa takpang.”
41014039	A Yeesɔ ti paarɛ tɔkn daa gaa Laa. Paasɛ dòo nyaa gbete ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang kɔ.
41014040	A ti arɛ naa ìi ri, ri rooro tɔ tɔkn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, hingro kpiti ri jìng tɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ. Ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ wu takpang.
41014041	Yeesɔ ti naa gbãayu tɔkn daa dakn taati, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rooyi, nɔɔ ɔ̃sɔ manɛ doo naa ya? Daa tɔ kati, laa palɛ tɔ. Zang nyɔ yuu Jaa Shɔnzang tɔ, ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
41014042	Nɔɔ seepaa ta ruu daayi. Zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu mɛɛ a naabm tɔ.”
41014043	Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa nyaa, a Yahuda zang gbete ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ a kati. Yahuda nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang, bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang bang, bang zang Yahudawa ri shong ɓɛɛ. Ri see yee bang nɛɛ labasaa ka naa ning.
41014044	Zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ zang kaɓa ɓi tɔ ka tìng nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ n daa kɔ̃ng wu, wukɔ Yeesɔ, nɔɔ yirɛ. Nɔɔ yiti wu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ daa nɛɛ wu ning.”
41014045	Yahuda naa arɛ, tantɛ daanang ka bii Yeesɔ. A ɓaa wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, a kɔ̃ng wu kati.”
41014046	A zang ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Yahuda, ri yi Yeesɔ kati.
41014047	Zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri nɛɛ Yeesɔ, zɔ̃ng yee bang ɓiɓɛ, wɔng shoo jaafoo kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ mani.
41014048	A Yeesɔ raa jìng hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri a wu yinang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ see yee bang nɛɛ labasaa ka naa gaagaa, nɛɛ nɔɔ naa yi ɓu nkɔ, naa zang yi zang ɓɔɔ ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ɓɛɛ ya?
41014049	N nwalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa kɔ diki diki, n tusu zang vuu, nɔɔ yi m kpang. Vuu kɔ zang palɛ m ɓee, ɓèe ɓi nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, ri b'ee ka yeti labeenang Laa ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.”
41014050	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri yuku nandon ri yaa wu.
41014051	Yɔɔ jasang ɓɔɔ kagn, lu fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ kɔ, ka bii shɛ̃ɛning, dũng Yeesɔ ka knti. Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi Yeesɔ, nɛɛ ri yi yɔɔ jasang kaɓa jong.
41014052	A yɔɔ yàa ri fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, yɔɔ yuu bii naa.
41014053	A ri daa kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka gãa kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang bang, bang zang Yahudawa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ ka nɔngkɔ.
41014054	Bituru dũng wu ka knti katara, a ri daa shɛ̃ɛ dabang gãa kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani. A daa nwang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng ka gãa kaɓa ka nyaa waa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, sɔɔrɔ si katɔ ɓɛɛ.
41014055	Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri doo zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang kɔ, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri zɛ̃ɛ wu nyaa, tɔɔ ri nyɔ wu kati. A ri walɛ kpang.
41014056	Zang dɔli ri kɔɔ ruu see ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a nyaa ɓarɛ daa gbete kpang.
41014057	Nɛɛ knti, zang ɓɔɔ ri seepaa, a ri kɔɔ ruu see ka yuu Yeesɔ tɔɔ,
41014058	“Ruu tãayi, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N jili Gãa Laa kɔ zang mãa nɛɛ naa ɓɛɛ ditɔ, n mãa ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ zang mãa nɛɛ naa kpang, ka yeti diki taati.’”
41014059	Ruu ɓɔɔ zang knti keɓe ri kɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ piti ti daa gbete kpang kɔ doori.
41014060	A kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa seepaa, shii ka tìng ɓarɛ, a hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa ka ruu kɔ zang kɔɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓee kpang ya?”
41014061	Yeesɔ ti ãa nyaa ɓi kagn kpang. A kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ti hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔkn nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Kirisi, Jaa Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ ɓɛɛ ya?”
41014062	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, nkɔ.” Nɔɔ naa zi m ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ ka naa nakn Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu piti ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti naa zi naa ɓɔɔ n a ka yeti sãmbong ditɔ.
41014063	A kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ka bii, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ tɔkn ɓɛɛ takpang.
41014064	Nɔɔ tãa ruu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ka yuu Laa ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ zi ɓu bɛ̀'ɛ ka yeti manɛ viya?” A zang piti ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ, daa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ vɔrɔ tɔ.”
41014065	A zang ɓɔɔ ri gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ ri tùlù wu sisãa ka bii ɓɛɛ kati. A ri mung wu jìng, ri nyɔ wu nɛɛ naa, a ri ti kpaa wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ ta.” A zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng ka gãa, ri ta wu, ri ti nyɔ wu jong nɛɛ naa.
41014066	Ɓɔɔ Bituru doo ka dabang gãa, jaa zang soro ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa shoonang, naa arɛ.
41014067	Ɓɔɔ wu zi Bituru nw'ang sɔɔrɔ ka nyaa waa, pɛ̃ɛrɛ wu, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓaa doo zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ dũng Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
41014068	A Bituru laa nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi vuu kɔ mɔɔ rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ m kpang.” A seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daa ka nyaa gãa.
41014069	A jaa zang soro kaɓa naa zi wu tɔkn a gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ kati tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe doo zang ɓarɛ kɔ.”
41014070	A Bituru ti laa nyaa tɔkn. Laa nɛɛ tɔ wu ɓa tɔkɔlɔng, zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔng kaɓa, ti kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ doo zang ɓarɛ kɔ nizang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ zang tipi Galili ɓɛɛ.”
41014071	A Bituru gaa tɔɔsung ruu shi kpang kɔɔrɔnang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ Laa tũnnang ning tɔɔ, “N zi yɔɔ kɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ m kpang.”
41014072	Ɓɔɔ Bituru hangsɛ nyaa kɔɔnang hn, kpaasa kn naa paasɛ nyaa daa kaa doo ziti. A Bituru naa kpaa danggn vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu kati. Bɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ kn naa ɓaa nyaa daa doo ziti bɛɛ mɔɔ laa nyaa mɛɛ tɔ daa dakn taati.” A Bituru kaa kaa zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ.
41015001	Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ, zang bang bang, zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri doo zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang kɔ ɓɛɛ, ri mã nyaa ka zɔɔ. Ri mã Yeesɔ, a ri daa nɛɛ wu, ri daa a wu Gɔmna Bilatu.
41015002	Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ kpanti zang Yahudawa ya?” A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, nkɔ.”
41015003	A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri zɛ̃ɛ wu nyaa ka vuu dɔli.
41015004	A Bilatu ti hɛ̃ɛ tɔkn tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ãa nyaa kagn kpang ya? Mɔɔ tãa vuu kɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓee kpang ya?”
41015005	Yeesɔ ti ãa nyaa ɓi kagn kpang. Vuu kɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓa, kpãa Bilatu nyaa ka yeti dɔli.
41015006	Ka diki ɓɔɔ zang shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ, Gɔmna yàar'ɛ zang tipi ɓiɓɛ shɔnzang gbete ɓɔɔ zang mã ka sãa, ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ naa katɔ.
41015007	Ka diki kaɓa, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Baraba kagn sãa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nyaa ɓɛɛ.
41015008	A zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ arɛ kɔɔ Bilatu tɔɔ, Bilatu wu pàl'ɛ ri vuu ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ̀ ri ka diki nyaalaa ɓɛɛ ta.
41015009	A Bilatu hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n yaa nɔɔ Kpanti zang Yahudawa naa ya?”
41015010	Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi ɓi tɔ nɛɛ, zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri atɛ wu Yeesɔ ka ruu sũnyaa ɓɛɛ.
41015011	A zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri dɔ̃lɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ Bilatu wu yaa ri Baraba kɔ naa jong.
41015012	Bilatu ti hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ n palɛ vi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa nɛɛ Kpanti Yahudawa viya?”
41015013	Ri goo nyaa tɔkn tɔɔ, “Yaa wu ta zang ɓa wu naa ka laa.”
41015014	Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ka ruu viya? Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓu viya?” Ri ti goo nyaa gbãnggbãng ka lapa nandon nɛɛ, “Yaa wu ta, zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa.”
41015015	Bilatu kasɛ nɛɛ wu pàl'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ, a yaa ri Baraba naa. A kɔɔ zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri nyɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ gbãa. A a ri Yeesɔ kati nɛɛ zang daa ɓaa wu naa ta ka laa.
41015016	A zang sɔɔja ri yi wu, ri daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka yeti gãa Gɔmna. A ri kpalɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ nimbang kaa nandon.
41015017	A ri lu wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ nwɛɛri naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ kpanti ri lu ɓɛɛ. Ri ti t'i kɔkɔ naa vuu yuu kãnang kpanti, ri hãa wu ka yuu.
41015018	Ri tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ri jeere wu nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Kpanti zang Yahudawa wu nwang dondong.”
41015019	Ri nyɔ wu nɛɛ labalang ka yuu, ri ti tùlù wu sisãa ka bii, a ri tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ri kpãa wu kati.
41015020	Ri kpaa wu tɔ, a ri zɔ̃ng fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ nwɛɛri kaɓa, ri hãa wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ tɔkn. Ri nwangsɛ wu kaa biling, ri daa ka nɛɛ wu, nɛɛ ri daa ɓa wu naa kaa laa.
41015021	Ka gbalang, ri ɓee yɔɔ tipi Kiranɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Siman bɛɛ nɛɛ wu a ka gari. Ri yi wu nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning, nɛɛ wu tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang daa ɓaa Yeesɔ naa kagn ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ keɓe kɔ d'aa rɛɛ Alezanda nɛɛ Rufu.
41015022	A ri a kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Golgota ɓɛɛ, Ḍìiri nung keɓe, ɓi nɔng ɓɔɔ nwang yuu zɔ̃ɔpi ɓɛɛ]
41015023	Ri a wu sàa ɓɔɔ zang nwɛɛtɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ muru ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu ɓooyi, a ɓoo kpang.
41015024	A ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa. Ri shaa laa nɛɛ ri zi naa ɓɔɔ ri basɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. A ri basɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng ka naa ɓarɛ.
41015025	Ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa ka saka mandɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ gãndi ɓɛɛ.
41015026	Ri bee vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔyi ka yuu paa laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri beeyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti zang Yahudawa.”
41015027	Ri ɓ'aa zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge naa jong laa ka kagn Yeesɔ. Ɓɔɔ gbete ka nakn Yeesɔ, a ɓɔɔ gbete ka nagang ɓiɓɛ.
41015028	Ṿuu keɓe nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa bee ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa beeyi tɔɔ, “Wu naa vɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.„
41015029	Zang ɓɔɔ ri tɛɛ gbalang, ri rang wu nyaa gɛ̃gɛ̃ɛ, ri ti waa yuu ɓarɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ jili Gãa Laa, mɔɔ mãa ɓɔɔgn ka diki taati katɔ.
41015030	Ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ ta, mɔɔ shooro ka tipi nɛɛ laa kɔ zang ɓaa mɔɔ naa kagn ɓi.”
41015031	Zang bang bang zang, ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri r'ang Yeesɔ ka naa ɓarɛ, ri ti kpaa wu jong. Ri kɔɔ zɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ta yuu zang ɓɔɔgn, zunung ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi kpang.
41015032	N'aa Kirisi Kpanti Isirela shooro nɛɛ laa kɔ zang ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓee, rùu shing danggn katɔ bii ɓiɓɛ.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri naa ka laa ka kagn Yeesɔ, ri rang wu nyaa gɛ̃gɛ̃ɛ jong.
41015033	Laa kaa dãngdãng yuu, a nɔng tɔɔ ka tipi kaɓa nandon, saka taati palɛ nɛɛ mani.
41015034	Saka taati naa palɛ tɔ, Yeesɔ mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Eloyi, Eloyi lama sabatani.” Dìiri yee keɓe ɓi, “Laa mɛɛ, Laa mɛɛ, mɔɔ yaa m ka ruu viya?”
41015035	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔng kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta nɔɔ tãayi, ɓaa nyaa kana Iliya.”
41015036	A zang gbete yurɛ daa hãa vuu ɓoɓoro ka saa ɓɔɔ gbang katɔ, a mã ka laa, a dõ̀ɔ wu ka nyaa nɛɛ wu ɓooyi. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shii ta gbongkarɛ, ruu zirɛ, Iliya nɛɛ a ditɔ, wu witi wu ka tipi ɓɛɛ.”
41015037	A Yeesɔ mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, a vɔ kati.
41015038	A fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang ku nɔng tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani, lɔɔsɔ kaa nɛɛ paa daa nɔng ka dii.
41015039	Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ shii ka tìng Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔ ɓɛɛ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe, Jaa Laa kɔ nizang.”
41015040	Zang soro ɓɔɔ kagn, ri shiiri nɛɛ nɔng beebang, ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka teteng zang soro kaɓa, Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Marayamu nà'a rɛɛ Yakubu ɓɔɔ wujaa nɛɛ Yusufu, a ɓɔɔ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Salomi, ri kagn.
41015041	Zang soro keɓe kɔ ri dũuru Yeesɔ ka knti, a ri ti yi wu naa ka bii, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu ka Galili ɓɛɛ. Zang soro ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ wu ka Urushalima gaagaa, kagn nɔng kɔ doori.
41015042	Nɛɛ laarang ka diki kaɓa, ka lee ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri kpalɛ bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓuru kaa diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɛɛ.
41015043	Yusufu yɔɔ Arimataya ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang dɔli, ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɛɛ. Yusufu shing jìng ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ, mã danggn, daa gaa vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ka naa Gɔmna Bilatu.
41015044	Ɓɔɔ Bilatu tãayi nɛɛ Yeesɔ vɔ tɔ, kpãa wu ka yeti dɔli naa ɓɔɔ vɔ pati ɓɛɛ. A shong zang nɛɛ zang daa ɓàa wu nyaa ka zang bang sɔɔja kaɓa. A naa hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ Yeesɔ vɔ tɔ ya?
41015045	Ɓɔɔ Bilatu naa tãa nɛɛ nyaa zang bang sɔɔja kaɓa nɛɛ Yeesɔ vɔ tɔ, yàa Yusufu gbalang vɔrɔ Yeesɔ tuunang kati.
41015046	A Yusufu hoo fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ puru kati. A witi vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ka tipi, kãng kaa nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ, a daa wɔɔ wu ka yeti saa ɓɔɔ zang ɓee ka tari bang ɓɔɔ shii doo paa ɓɛɛ. A jìiri tari, ku nyaa saa kaa nɛɛ mani.
41015047	Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Marayamu nà'a Yusufu, ri zi nɔng ɓɔɔ zang wɔɔ vɔrɔ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ kati.
41016001	Diki ɔ̃sɔnang naa ɓa tɔ, Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Marayamu nà'a Yakubu, a ɓɔɔ Salomi, ri hoo nung ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri daa tũuru vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ka bii.
41016002	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ gbete ka knti diki ɔ̃sɔnang bɛɛ laa nwang tɔ, rɛɛ Marayamu ri daa kana yuu sàa.
41016003	Ri rangkɛ kana naa ɓarɛ ka gbalang nɛɛ, “Ɓu wi daa jìiri ruu tari ɓɔɔ ka nyaa sàa ɓɛɛ jong wiya?” Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tari bii bang dɔli ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ nyaa sàa hn, ri zirɛ zang jìiri tari bii tɔ.
41016005	Ri tu ka yeti sàa, a ri zi jasang ɓɔɔ hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru nwang tɔ ka naa nakn. A ri mã naa danggn.
41016006	A yɔɔ jasang kaɓa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ mã naa ka danggn kpang.” Nɔɔ kãa Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀'ɔ nɔng kpang, zang wisi wu paa tɔ. Nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang wɔɔ wu kagn ɓɛɛ.
41016007	Nɔɔ dita nɔɔ daa kɔɔ Bituru, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kɔ doori nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛ Galili shɔɔnang. Ri daa zi wu ka nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.”
41016008	Vuu keɓe kpãa rɛɛ Marayamu ka yeti dɔli, bii ti zaa ri katɔ. A ri nwangkɛ, ri yuku, ri daayi. Ri ãa zang nyaa ka bii gbete kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
41016009	Ỵeesɔ seepaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa, ka lee ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ tɔ gbete ka knti diki ɔ̃sɔnang zang Yahudawa, nɛɛ gãndi zangzang, a naa nwang nyaa ka bii Marayamu Magadaliya, ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ manziti ɓɛɛ, kɔ shɔɔnang.
41016010	A Marayamu daayi daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri nw'al'ɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ kati. Marayamu daa ìi ri, bɛɛ ri kaa nyaa vɔ doo naa.
41016011	Ɓɔɔ ri tãayi nɛɛ nyaa Marayamu nɛɛ Yeesɔ doo ningkãari, nɛɛ Marayamu ti zi wu jìng tɔ ka bii, ri tɔɔ, ruu keɓe ɓi nizang kpang.
41016012	Ka knti weɓe, Yeesɔ naa nwang nyaa kaa tɔkn nɛɛ bii naa ɓɔɔgn ka bii zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri dũng knti ɓiɓɛ bɛɛ ri a nɛɛ Urushalima, ri daa ka jaa gari.
41016013	A ri gbãayu ri daa kɔɔ rɛɛ ɓeezung. A rɛɛ ɓeezung tɔɔ, ruu keɓe ɓi nizang kpang.
41016014	Kaa nɛɛ knti, Yeesɔ naa nwang nyaa ka bii zang kopi tu gbete ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, bɛɛ ri shaa doo vuu shaanang. A mangkɛ ri, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn nɛɛ, wu doo ningkãari kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ti kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi wu tɔ, ri kɔɔ ri kpang ɓɛɛ.
41016015	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita ka koo piti, nɔɔ daa rang zang piti, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa.
41016016	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tarɛ, nɛɛ shing danggn katɔ, a zang nɛɛ palɛ wu batizima, wukɔ naa walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti tãayi, a shing danggn kpang, Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ wukɔ ruu.
41016017	Laa naa a zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn ditɔ. Ri naa nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ nung mɛɛ. Ri ti naa rangkɛ yee nɛɛ nyaa koo ɓɔɔgn.
41016018	Naa ri yi sɔkɔ nɛɛ naa, kɔ ri ɓoo zɔ̃pɔ ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang katɔ, palɛ ri vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Ri naa shing naa ɓarɛ ka bii zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ ri katɔ, bii zang kɔnang, wu ti yaa ri nɔng.”
41016019	Kpanti Yeesɔ hangsɛ ri nyaa yee rannang tɔ, Laa tuu wu kaa ningkãari daa nɔng ka lapa. A daa nw'ang ka naa nakn Kpanti Laa.
41016020	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ daa kati, ri daa rang yee Laa kaa nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti. A Kpanti Yeesɔ ti palɛ shoonang nɛɛ ri ning. Tusu zang nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri rangnɛ, ɓi nizang kɔ nwani. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang zi ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ].
42001001	N jee mɔɔ nyaa Dabang Tiyofilu. Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ zang dɔli ri bee vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka teteng ɓuru tɔ,
42001002	naa ɓɔɔ ruu tãa ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee Laa ɓɔɔ ri zi naa ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe gaayu nɛɛ jìng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
42001003	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n pɛ̃ɛrɛ, n tɔɔ naa n bè'e mɔɔ vuu keɓe, gbete, gbete, tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n tãa tɔ, n ti kãa dìiri ruu keɓe tɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
42001004	Tɔ̀ɔ, m'ɔɔ zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ mɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ kati.
42001005	Ka diki ɓɔɔ Hiridu nwang gɔmna ka tipi Yahudiya, zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ kagn, zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Zakariya. Zakariya ɓi ka teteng zang vaa Abija, ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ nung Abija ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ keɓe gee jaa soro ka zɔ̃ng Haruna ɓɔɔ bɛɛ wukɔ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓaa jaa soro bì'i nɛɛ Alisabatu.
42001006	Zakariya nɛɛ Alisabatu ri zang tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ nandon.
42001007	A ri yi jaa kagn kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Alisabatu shìi katɔ ɓɛɛ. S'aa ɓarɛ bang tɔ kɔ nandon.
42001008	Diki ɓɔɔ kagn Zakariya palɛ shoonang ɓiɓɛ kana Gãa Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi lɛ̀'ɛ diki shoonang palɛnang zang vaa Abija kɔ ɓɛɛ.
42001009	Zang Abija ri z'ɔ̃ng Zakariya, nɛɛ wu daa dɔ̀ɔ Laa vuu ɓɔɔ pũngku tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ ka Gãa Laa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓɔɔ ri shaa laa naa ɓasidi, laa yi wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
42001010	Zakariya daa tɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa ka laa ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀'ɔ Laa vuu ɓɔɔ pũngku sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka biling ri gaa Laa kana.
42001011	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa naa nw'ang nyaa ka bii Zakariya, a shii ka nakn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu ɓɔɔ pũngku sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
42001012	Ɓɔɔ Zakariya zi wu, bii soo wu, a kaa vɔrɔ.
42001013	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang Zakariya, Laa tãa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaa ɓɛɛ tɔ. Soro ɓaaɓɛ Alisabatu yi mɔɔ jaa ditɔ zang varɛ, m'ɔɔ ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yɔhana.
42001014	Mɔɔ naa tãa tìnang ditɔ ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ dɔli. Zang dɔli ri ti naa tãa tìnang ditɔ jong dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang yi wu ɓɛɛ.
42001015	N'aa nwang zang bang ka tìng Kpanti Laa. Naa ɓoo sàa ɓi kpang. Ti naa ɓoo vuu ɓɔɔ zã katɔ ɓɔɔ palɛ zang ɓi kpang. Suru Laa naa gaayu nwannang ka bii ɓiɓɛ bɛɛ wu doo ka yeti niiɓɛ.
42001016	Wukɔ naa sɔɔrɔ zang Isirela dɔli ri naa dũng Kpanti Laa ɓarɛ.
42001017	Wukɔ naa sɔ̀'ɔ Yeesɔ tìng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa naa a wu naa bannang, nɛɛ suru ɓiɓɛ, naa ɓɔ̀'ɔ Iliya ɓɛɛ. Wu ti shing daa wujɛ, ri kasɛ ruu wujɛ ɓarɛ. Wu ti shing zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaalaa kpang, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaalaa. Wu ti shing zang, zang nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ bii tɔ nɛɛ ri dũng kaa Laa ɓɛɛ.”
42001018	A Zakariya hɛ̃ɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa tɔɔ, “N zi bɛ̀'ɛ nɛɛ vuu keɓe nizang viya? N kaa dabang, soro mɛɛ ti kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ.”
42001019	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nkɔ Jibirilu ɓɔɔ sh'ii ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ. Laa shong m nɛɛ n naa rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ, nɛɛ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ keɓe.
42001020	Ɓaa shoo ta mɔɔ tãayi, mɔɔ nwang kaa zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ rang yee takpang diki ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe naa palɛ a nɛɛ mani, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tà yee ɓɔɔ n kɔɔyi ɓɔɔ nw'ang ditɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42001021	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka biling, ri ti gã Zakariya ɓi kana. Ri ti rɛ̃rɛ kana, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, knti Zakariya bee tɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ.
42001022	Ɓɔɔ nwang tɔ ka biling, kasɛ nɛɛ wu rang yee nɛɛ zang, zunung yee rannang takpang. A zang yisi ka yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ Zakariya zi vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa. A rang zang yee kaa nɛɛ naa. A nwang zang ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kati.
42001023	A diki ɓɔɔ Zakariya palɛ shoonang ka Gãa Laa naa waa nyaa, a naa gbãayu ka gãa ɓiɓɛ.
42001024	Diki kaɓa naa ɓa tɔ, Alisabatu, Zakariya ɓeeso naa tuu jaa kati. Alisabatu waasɛ̃ yuu ɓiɓɛ shala maani. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
42001025	“Kpanti Laa kɔ palɛ m vuu keɓe, kɔsɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ tuu m yusɛ̃ɛ ka teteng zang tɔ kati.”
42001026	Shala ɓɔɔ Alisabatu tuu jaa, daa tɔ mangbete, Laa naa shong zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jibirilu ɓɛɛ, ka gari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Nazara ka tipi Galili.
42001027	Laa shong wu ka bii ja soo ɓɔɔ roo varɛ gn kpang ɓɔɔ Yusufu zɔ̃ng Dawuda gee tɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓaa nung ja soo kaɓa nɛɛ Marayamu.
42001028	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka Lapa arɛ naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N jee mɔɔ nyaa, zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng ka teteng zang soro ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓi nɛɛ mɔɔ ning.”
42001029	Ɓɔɔ Marayamu tãa naa weɓe, ruu kaɓa kpãa wu ka yeti dɔli. Marayamu gaa tɔɔsung rɛ̃rɛnang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ɓi lɛɛ nyaa jeenang vi nɔngkɔ viya?
42001030	A zang nyaa shoonang Kpanti Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang Marayamu, Laa tãa tìnang ɓaaɓɛ dɔli.
42001031	Mɔɔ naa tuu jaa ditɔ, mɔɔ yi zang varɛ. Mɔɔ naa ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
42001032	Naa nw'ang zang bang. Zang naa ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jaa Kpanti Laa. Kpanti Laa naa shing wu Kpanti ditɔ naa dabang ɓiɓɛ Dawuda.
42001033	Naa roo Kpanti, zang Yahudawa dondong. Kpanti ɓɔɔ wu naa rooyi, naa waa nyaa ɓi kpang.”
42001034	A Marayamu hɛ̃ɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa tɔɔ, “Wee n roo varɛ gn kpang ɓee, vuu keɓe naa nw'ang biya?”
42001035	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Suru Laa naa a ditɔ ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. N'aa bannang Laa naa zuu mɔɔ ditɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, jaa ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓi ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang kɔ mɔɔ naa yi ɓee, zang naa ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jaa Laa.
42001036	Zirɛ ɓaazung Alisabatu ɓɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ, tuu jaa tɔ, ka wee wu kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ ɓee. Alisabatu ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ shii katɔ, tuu jaa tɔ shala daa lɛɛ mangbete.
42001037	Vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa Laa palɛnang ɓi kagn kpang.”
42001038	A Marayamu kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Laa kɔ mãa m, vuu keɓe wu nw'ang ta ka yuu mɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.” A zang nyaa shoonang Laa daayi, yaa wu kati.
42001039	Ka diki kaɓa, Marayamu kpalɛ bii, a seepaa, làabìi daanang ka gari ɓɔɔ ka tipi Yahudiya ka nɔng ɓɔɔ kɔpɔ kagn gaagaa ɓɛɛ.
42001040	Marayamu naa shɛ̃ɛ gari kaɓa tɔ, a naa daa ka gãa Zakariya, daa jee Alisabatu nyaa kati.
42001041	Ɓɔɔ Alisabatu tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ Marayamu jee wu hn, jaa ɓɔɔ wu tuu ka yeti ruutu bii. A Suru Laa naa arɛ nwang ka yeti Alisabatu,
42001042	a Alisabatu mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm tɔɔ, “Ka teteng zang soro ɓɔɔ ka koolaa keɓe nandon, zang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu tìnang tãanang ɓa ɓɔɔ wu a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ kagn kpang. A Laa ti 'a jaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa yirɛ tìnang tãanang tɔ.
42001043	A ka ruu vi Laa yaa mɔɔ nà'a Kpanti mɛɛ, nɛɛ mɔkɔ mɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ jong viya?
42001044	Ɓɔɔ n tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ jee m hn, jaa ɓɔɔ ka yeti mɛɛ tantɛ bii ruutunang. Ka ruu tìnang ɓɔɔ wu tãa ɓɛɛ.
42001045	Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing danggn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi naa nwang ditɔ naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42001046	A Marayamu kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N dɔɔ Kpanti Laa kana yeti mɛɛ.
42001047	Suru bii mɛɛ tã̀'a tìnang ka ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ta yuu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
42001048	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn mɛɛ kɔng wu ɓɔɔ n jaafoo ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu lɛɛkɔ keɓe, zang koolaa keɓe nandon nɛɛ zang koo jaa knti ri kɔɔ ditɔ nɛɛ Laa a m tìnang tãanang m tɔ.
42001049	Ka ruu vuu bang, bang ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ bang pàlɛ̀ m ɓɛɛ Wukɔ Laa, shi kpang ɓi kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
42001050	Gn zang ɓɔɔ ri a wu bannang, ɓɔɔ ri alɛ ka koo keɓe nandon kɔng wu katɔ.
42001051	P'al'ɛ vuu bang bang tɔ, nɛɛ naa bannang ɓiɓɛ. T'ant'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ dɔli ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ.
42001052	S'ɔɔrɔ̀ rɛɛ kpanti bang, bang yuu ka dii. Ti shing zang ɓɔɔ ri sòo yuu ka dii ri nwang zang bang.
42001053	'A zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ gaagaa. A s'ɔɔrɔ̀ zang ying naa waati.
42001054	A ti kpaa danggn nɛɛ wu naa yǐ jaafoo ɓiɓɛ zang Isirela naa ka bii,
42001055	naa ɓɔɔ wu a rɛɛ daa ɓuru nyaa ka tìng ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ gn dabang ɓuru Ibirayi nɛɛ zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ, naa kɔng wu sasak koo naa waa nyaa nɛɛ mani.”
42001056	Marayamu nwang nɛɛ Alisabatu shala taati, a naa gbãayu daa gari ɓiɓɛ.
42001057	Diki ɓɔɔ Alisabatu y'i jaa kagn naa arɛ, a yi jaa kaa zang varɛ.
42001058	A zang nyaa gãa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung ri tãa nyaa tɔɔ Kpanti Laa pàlɛ̀ Alisabatu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, a ri dɔɔ bii kaa jong.
42001059	Alisabatu yi jaa tɔ diki daa mantaati, a zang arɛ nɛɛ zang naa yè'e jaa kaa shaa. A zang nɛɛ zang ɓaa jaa nung kaa nɛɛ Zakariya ka nung diiɓɛ.
42001060	A nà'a jaa kasɛ kpang. Nà'a jaa tɔɔ zang ɓaa nung jaa nɛɛ Yɔhana.
42001061	Ri kɔɔ Alisabatu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yɔhana kagn kpang”
42001062	A zang rang daa jaa yee kaa nɛɛ naa, nɛɛ wu kɔɔ zang nung ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa jaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
42001063	Zakariya kɔɔ zang nɛɛ naa tɔɔ, zang a wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee vuu kagn ɓɛɛ. A bee kati nɛɛ, “Nung ɓiɓɛ ɓi Yɔhana.” Ɓɔɔ zang zi naa weɓe zang piti ri mã naa ka danggn.
42001064	A nyaa Zakariya puu kati, gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang, a dɔɔ Laa.
42001065	Ɓɔɔ zang nyaa gãa ɓarɛ ri zi naa weɓe, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ nandon. A zang ri rang ruu keɓe ka tipi Yahudiya ɓɔɔ kɔpɔ kagn dɔli bee nandon.
42001066	Zang piti ri tãa ruu keɓe, ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Ri tɔɔ jaa keɓe naa nwang ɓi lɛɛ zang kiya? Ka ɓɔɔ ri zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓi nɛɛ wu ning ɓɛɛ.
42001067	A Suru Laa a ka bii Zakariya daa Yɔhana, a Zakariya kɔɔ zang yee Laa kati tɔɔ,
42001068	“Ruu dɔ̀ɔ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Là'a zang Isirela ta, ka ruu ɓɔɔ arɛ yi zang ɓiɓɛ naa ka bii, a ti ta yuu ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
42001069	Ti a ruu zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔli tɔ, zɔ̃̌ng zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ kpanti Dawuda. Zang keɓe kɔ naa ta yuu ɓuru
42001070	Laa palɛ tɔ naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
42001071	Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu naa ta ruu ditɔ nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ ruu kpang, nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu kpang ɓɛɛ.
42001072	Ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ gn daa ɓuru naa kɔng wu katɔ, nɛɛ wu ti naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ daa ɓuru nɛɛ wu pàl'ɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
42001073	Vuu ɓɔɔ wu tũng daa ɓuru Ibirayi ɓɛɛ,
42001074	nɛɛ wu naa ta ruu ditɔ, nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ ruu kpang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu pàl'ɛ wu shoonang, ruu kaa vɔrɔ kpang ɓɛɛ kati.
42001075	Ruu nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn yeti ɓuru kpang, ruu ti palɛ vuu kaa naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu doo ningkãari ka koo keɓe nandon.”
42001076	A raa jìng ka bii jaa rɛ̃ɛting a kɔɔ jaa tɔɔ, “Jaa mɛɛ, zang naa ɓaa mɔɔ nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ naa sɔ̀'ɔ Kpanti ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ tìng, mɔɔ pàl'ɛ wu gbalang ɓɛɛ.
42001077	Mɔkɔ naa tusu zang Laa, nɛɛ Laa naa yà'a ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu ta yuu ɓarɛ kati.
42001078	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn zang kɔng Laa ɓuru dɔli ɓɛɛ. Naa shong nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ naa ta yuu ɓuru ɓɔɔ naa nw'ang naa làa ɓɔɔ nw'ang ɓɛɛ.
42001079	Wu yakɛ nɔng kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nɔng vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, ri zi nɔng kati. Wukɔ naa tusu ruu gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu nwang nɛɛ Laa waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ.”
42001080	A jaa naa bangnɛ, a zũng danggn. Nwang ka jìngti sasak diki ɓɔɔ wu naa nwang nyaa ka zang Isirela nandon a nɔng.
42002001	Ka diki kaɓa Kayisa Agɔsitu kpanti zang tipi Rooma, shong nyaa nɛɛ zang gã zang ɓɔɔ ka tipi ɓiɓɛ nandon.
42002002	Zang gã̀ zang gngn ka tipi Rooma kpang. Zang gãnang keɓe wukɔ ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang bɛɛ Kiriniyu nwang gɔmna ka tipi Siriya.
42002003	Zang ɓu daarɛ ka gari ɓarɛ nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang daa gã ri kati.
42002004	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yusufu seepaa nɛɛ gari Nazara ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ, a daa ka gari ɓɔɔ zang yi Dawuda kagn, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Bɛtalami ka tipi Yahudiya ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi zɔ̃ng Dawuda ɓɛɛ.
42002005	Yusufu daa nɛɛ ɓeeso Marayamu ɓɔɔ jaa ka yeti ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang daa gã ri kati.
42002006	Ɓɔɔ ri doo ka Bɛtalami, diki ɓɔɔ Marayamu yi jaa kagn naa arɛ,
42002007	a yi jamari ɓiɓɛ kaa zang varɛ, leng wu nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang leng jaa rɛ̃ɛting nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. A wɔɔ wu ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ vuu vaa vuu shaanang kagn ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri walɛ gãa ɓɔɔ ri roo kagn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shing zang zanti kpang ɓɛɛ.
42002008	Ka tipi kaɓa naabm, zang jagang ri kagn nɔngkɔ. Ri roo ka dalɛ, ri gãng jìng ka vuu vaa ɓarɛ nɛɛ zìi.
42002009	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, naa nwang nyaa ka bii ɓarɛ, a nɔng yakɛnang Kpanti Laa naa yakɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ ri kagn, a ri kaa vɔrɔ.
42002010	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, n atɛ nɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ a nɔɔ tìnang tãanang dɔli, ɓɔɔ zang piti naa tãa tìnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
42002011	Zang yi nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa ta yuu manɛ tɔ lɛɛkɔ ka gari ɓɔɔ zang yi Dawuda kagn ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ Kpanti Kirisi.
42002012	Wee naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa zi kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ daa zi jaa rɛ̃ɛting, zang leng ka sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ, zang wɔɔ ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃̀'ɛ vuu vaa vuu shaanang kagn ɓɛɛ.”
42002013	A ri tantɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa keɓe zinang, nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔgn gaagaa, ri dɔɔ Laa kana. Ri kɔ̀'ɔyi nɛɛ,
42002014	“Zang wu dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kpalakpala ta. Zang ɓɔɔ Laa tãa tìnang ɓarɛ katɔ ka tipi keɓe, ri ti tãa tìnang nwannang ta.”
42002015	Ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ri gbãayu tɔ ka lapa, zang jagang naa kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Ruu daa nɔɔ ta ka Bɛtalami, ruu daa zi vuu kɔ palɛ, a Kpanti Laa kɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ.”
42002016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri laabii, ri daayi, ri daa ìi rɛɛ Yusufu nɛɛ Marayamu nɛɛ jaa rɛ̃ɛting ɓɔɔ ri wɔɔ ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃̀'ɛ vuu vaa vuu shaanang kagn ɓɛɛ.
42002017	Ɓɔɔ ri zi wu tɔ, ri kɔɔrɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kɔɔ ri ka yuu jaa keɓe kati.
42002018	Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ zang jagang kaɓa ri kɔɔyi, ri mã naa ka danggn.
42002019	A Marayamu shing ruu keɓe piti ka yeti ɓiɓɛ. A ti rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu keɓe ka yeti ɓiɓɛ.
42002020	Ɓɔɔ zang jagang nɛɛ ri gbãa kaa yuu, ri a Laa bannang, ri dɔɔ wu, ka ruu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri zirɛ a ri ti tãayi ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
42002021	Zang yi Yeesɔ tɔ diki daa tɔ mantaati, a zang arɛ nɛɛ zang naa yè'e Yeesɔ kaa shaa ka naa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang yee wu shaa tɔ, a zang ɓaa wu nung kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ. Nung ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa a wu, bɛɛ niiɓɛ tuu wu gn ka yeti kpang ɓɛɛ.
42002022	Diki ɓɔɔ rɛɛ Yusufu nɛɛ Marayamu ri daa dɔɔ Laa vuu naa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, nɛɛ tɔɔ Laa wu sɔɔ ri vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ naa arɛ. A ri daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka Urushalima nɛɛ ri daa a wu Laa.
42002023	Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Jamari ɓɔɔ varɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ shɔnzang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ vuu vaa yirɛ piti, zang wu a Laa katɔ.”
42002024	Rɛɛ Yusufu ri daa Urushalima, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri daa dɔɔ Laa ning koro kɔ koro ziti naa ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ.
42002025	Ka diki kaɓa, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn Urushalima, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Simiyon. Simiyon zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu Laa katɔ, a ti ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Bɛɛ Simiyon kaɓa gã ɓi diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa ta yuu zang Isirela ɓɛɛ. Suru Laa ɓi kagn bii ɓiɓɛ.
42002026	Suru Laa ti kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu zi Kirisi zang ɓɔɔ Laa tɔɔ arɛ naa ta yuu zang ka gbongkarɛ tɔɔ wu vɔrɛ.
42002027	Suru Laa dɔ̃ɔ Simiyon ka laa kaɓa daa ka yeti Gãa Laa. Rɛɛ Yusufu ri a kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kati.
42002028	A Simiyon ta jaa kaa naa ɓiɓɛ, a zãa Laa kati tɔɔ,
42002029	“Kpanti Laa, mɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ tɔ. Yeti jaafoo ɓaaɓɛ ka tɔ, yaa wu ta wu vɔrɛ.
42002030	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jìng mɛɛ zi zang ɓɔɔ naa ta yuu zang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ
42002031	Zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shingnɛ, nɛɛ zang koolaa piti ri zi wu ɓɛɛ.
42002032	Wukɔ naa nwang nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri zi kpang, vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Wu ti naa shing zang, zang a zang ɓaaɓɛ Isirela bannang.”
42002033	A diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Simiyon kɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
42002034	Simiyon shìng ri naa ka yuu ɓarɛ, a gaa ri Laa kati. Kɔɔ Marayamu nà'a Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Laa zɔ̃ng jaa keɓe nɛɛ wu naa nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ zang Isirela dɔli naa shaarɛ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ. Zang dɔli ti naa ta yuu ɓarɛ, ka ruu ɓiɓɛ. Wu ti naa nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ zang rang wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
42002035	Tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa shing rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ ka yeti zang wu nwangsɛ bii kati. Yeti naa lasɛ mɔɔ, kɔng mɔɔ ka yeti naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa mɔɔ nɛɛ yere bang ɓɛɛ.”
42002036	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ kagn zang soro, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Ana. Ana jaa Fanuwel ɓɔɔ ka zɔ̃ng Ashera ɓɛɛ. Saa ɓiɓɛ ti daa laa dɛ̃ɛti tu dɛ̃ɛti. Nw'ang nɛɛ ɓeevɛ saa manziti kɔ nwani, a nwang suvɔ kati. Daarɛ Gãa Laa nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zìi diki diki, wu dɔɔ Laa. Wu ti gaa Laa, wu seng nyaalaa.
42002038	Ka laa kaɓa, Ana arɛ naa zãa Laa, a rang zang ɓɔɔ ri gã naa ɓɔɔ Laa naa ta yuu zang Urushalima, ruu ka yuu jaa keɓe.
42002039	Yusufu nɛɛ Marayamu ri hangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kɔɔ ɓɛɛ palɛnang tɔ nandon, ri gbãayu ka gari ɓarɛ Nazara ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ.
42002040	A jaa naa bangnɛ, zũng danggn kati. Zũnang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ gaagaa. Laa tãa tìnang vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ dɔli.
42002041	S'aa nɛɛ mɔɔ tɔ, daa Yeesɔ nɛɛ niiɓɛ ri daarɛ ka Urushalima, ka ruu nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
42002042	Ɓɔɔ saa Yeesɔ daa tɔ kopi tu ziti, ri daa Urushalima kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ naa ɓɔɔ ri dàar'ɛ ɓɛɛ.
42002043	Nyaalaa waa nyaa tɔ, ri gbãayu kana gãa, a Yeesɔ nw'ang ɓi kaa Urushalima ka nɔngkɔ. Diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ ri zi kpang.
42002044	Ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa Yeesɔ kagn teteng zang ɓarɛ. A ri naa gaa tɔɔsung Yeesɔ kãanang kaa nɛɛ laarang ka teteng rɛɛ ɓeezung nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeesang.
42002045	Ri ìi wu kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri gbãayu ka Urushalima tɔkn, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri kãa wu ɓɛɛ.
42002046	Ri kãa wu diki taati, a ri naa ìi wu ka Gãa Laa. Nwang tɔ ka teteng zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ. Ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ, wu ti hɛ̃ɛlɛ ri ruu.
42002047	Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu zũnang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
42002048	Ɓɔɔ, diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ ri zi wu naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, niiɓɛ hɛ̃ɛ tɔɔ, “Jaa, mɔɔ p'alɛ̀ ruu nɔngkɔ ka ruu viya? Ruu kãa mɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ daaɓɛ, gbãnggbãng.”
42002049	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kãa m ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ n naa nw'ang ka gãa Daa mɛɛ kpang ya?”
42002050	Ri zi dìiri nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ri kpang.
42002051	A seepaa daa kaa nɛɛ ri ka Nazara. Ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓarɛ ning. A niiɓɛ shing ruu keɓe ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nandon.
42002052	A Yeesɔ bang bii kati zũnang ɓiɓɛ ti daa kana nɛɛ tìng. Laa ti tãa tìnang vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ dɔli, a zang piti ri tãa tìnang ɓiɓɛ doo nɔngkɔ.
42003001	Laa rang yee nɛɛ Yɔhana jaa Zakariya ka jìngti, ka diki ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Bilatu Pontu kɔ gɔmna tipi Yahudiya ɓɛɛ. Hiridu ɓi kaa gɔmna tipi Galili, a jaa daa ɓiɓɛ Filibu ɓi gɔmna tipi Ituriya nɛɛ tipi Tirakoniti. Lisaniya ɓi gɔmna tipi Abileni. Ka diki kaɓa, rɛɛ Ana nɛɛ Kayifa rikɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa, Kayisa Taberiyu wukɔ zang bang rɛɛ tipi keɓe nɛɛ tipi Rooma nandon, daa saa kopi tu maani.
42003003	Yɔhana daarɛ ka tipi ɓɔɔ ka nyaa rang Urudung nandon, kɔɔrɔ zang nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ ta, nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ. N palɛ nɔɔ batizima, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu yàa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ kati.”
42003004	Naa ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa bee ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ishaya beeyi tɔɔ, “Zang tãa zang ɓɔɔ kagn, rang yee Laa ka yeti jìngti tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ pàl'ɛ Kpanti Laa gbalang ta, nɔɔ shiiri katɔ ɓororo, tɔ̀ɔ, wu ra kaa gn, wu a ka bii zang ɓiɓɛ.
42003005	Zang wu zũuru guurang nandon, zang ti jili kɔpɔ nɛɛ jaa gboonang ka tipi nandon. Zang ti shiiri gbalang ɓɔɔ lengke bii katɔ ɓororo. Gbalang ɓɔɔ gɔgɔlɔ, zang ti palɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
42003006	Shɔnzang piti ri naa zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa naa ta yuu zang ditɔ.’”
42003007	A Yɔhana kɔɔ zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri 'alɛ̀ nɛɛ wu palɛ ri batizima tɔɔ, “Sɔkɔ pudi kiɓi, ɓu wi kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ yuu jìng dannang ɓɔɔ Laa atɛ ɓɛɛ wiya?
42003008	Nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ tɔ, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang tɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ manɛ nɛɛ, ‘Rùu ɓuru wujɛ Ibirayi kpang.’ N kɔɔ nɔɔ, Laa zunung ɓɔɔ wu pàl'ɛ Ibirayi zɔ̃ng nɛɛ tari kɔ ka tipi ɓee katɔ.
42003009	Kãntang keɓe zang ɓaa nyaa kãasãng tɔ ka dimbang laa nandon. Laa ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ra jaa ɓɔɔ shi kpang, Zang dɔngnɛ, zang tasɛ ka yeti waa.”
42003010	A zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yɔhana tɔɔ, “A ruu palɛ ɓu kaa biya.”
42003011	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ziti, wu a zang ɓɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ kagn wu basɛ doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42003012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi ri ti arɛ nɛɛ Yɔhana wu palɛ ri batizima. Ri hɛ̃ɛ Yɔhana tɔɔ, “Maalang r'uu palɛ ɓu kaa viya?”
42003013	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ ta saka tipi wu ɓa naa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.”
42003014	Sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri ti hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “A r'uu palɛ ɓuru kaa viya?” Yɔhana ti kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge kpang. Nɔɔ suu sè'e nɛɛ zang ri palɛ vuu shi kpang kpang. Saka ɓɔɔ zang shu nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wu daa nɔɔ katɔ.”
42003015	Bii shaa zang kana dɔli. Zang dɔli ri gaa tɔɔsung rɛ̃rɛnang ka yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ, naa ɓu bɛɛ Yɔhana kɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa naa shong ɓɛɛ ya?
42003016	A Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa nandon tɔɔ, “N pàl'ɛ nɔɔ batizima m nɛɛ mii, zang ɓɔɔ naa a ka knti mɛɛ, ɓa m bannang katɔ. N daa naa ɓɔɔ n kãlɛ soo koodoo ɓiɓɛ kpang. Wukɔ naa pàl'ɛ nɔɔ batizima nɛɛ Suru Laa nɛɛ waa.
42003017	Vuu ɓɔɔ wu naa hãlɛ vuu nɛɛ mani kagn naa ɓiɓɛ. Naa kooro dadong ɓiɓɛ ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu kpalɛ jìng vuu ɓiɓɛ ka bɔ̃nɔ. Wu yaa gãrɛ ɓiɓɛ, wu doo kaa nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42003018	Yɔhana tùsù zang vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe dɔli. A ti rang ri yee tɔ̃ɔ Laa.
42003019	Kpanti Hiridu ɓɔɔ Yɔhana mangkɛ wu ka ruu Hirodiya soro jaa diiɓɛ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ Hiridu palɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ. Ti naa palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔgn, kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang daa loo Yɔhana ka sãa.
42003021	Yɔhana palɛ zang piti batizima tɔ, a naa pàlɛ̀ Yeesɔ kati. Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gà'a Laa doo naa lapa puu kati,
42003022	a Suru Laa shooro kaa naa koro ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. A ri tãa yee nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ.”
42003023	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung shoonang ɓiɓɛ palɛnang, bɛɛ saa ɓiɓɛ daa bmati tu kopi. Zang kɔ̀'ɔ ɓi nɛɛ Yeesɔ jaa Yusufu ɓɔɔ daa ɓiɓɛ Heli ɓɛɛ.
42003024	Heli ɓi kaa jaa Matata, Matata ɓi jaa Leevi, Leevi ɓi kaa jaa Meliki. Meliki ɓi jaa Janayi a Janayi ɓi kaa jaa Yusufu.
42003025	Yusufu ɓi ti jaa Matatiya, Matatiya ɓi jaa Emo. A Emo ɓi kaa jaa Nahum. Nahum ɓi ti jaa Azaliya. Azaliya ɓi jaa Najaya.
42003026	A Najaya ɓi jaa Mahata, Mahata ɓi jaa Matatiya. Matatiya ɓi jaa Shimeya. Shimeya ɓi jaa Yusufu, Yusufu ɓi ti jaa Yahuda.
42003027	A Yahuda ɓi jaa Yuwana, Yuwana ɓi jaa Refaya. Refaya ɓi ti jaa Zerubabe, a Zerubabe ɓi jaa Shalitiyel, Shalitiyel ɓi jaa Neri,
42003028	a Neri ɓi jaa Meliki, Meliki ɓi jaa Adi. Adi ɓi ti jaa Kosam, a Kosam ɓi jaa Elimadam. Elimadam ɓi jaa Eri,
42003029	a Eri ɓi jaa Jashuwa. Jashuwa ɓi ti jaa Eliyiza. Eliyiza ɓi ti jaa Matata. Matata ɓi jaa Leevi,
42003030	a Leevi ɓi jaa Simiyon. Simiyon ɓi jaa Yahuda, a Yahuda ɓi ti jaa Yusufu. Yusufu ɓi jaa Jonam, a Jonam ɓi jaa Eliyakim, a Eliyakim ɓi jaa Maliya.
42003031	Maliya ɓi ti jaa Mena. Mena ɓi jaa Matata, Matata ɓi jaa Natang. Natang ɓi jaa Dawuda,
42003032	a Dawuda ɓi jaa Jeesi. Jeesi ɓi ti jaa Obida. Obida ɓi jaa Buwaza, Buwaza ɓi jaa Salamuna. Salamuna ɓi jaa Nashong,
42003033	a Nashong ɓi jaa Aminada, Aminada ɓi ti jaa Adi, Adi ɓi ti jaa Arama. Arama ɓi jaa Heziron, Heziron ɓi jaa Periza, a Periza ɓi jaa Yahuda.
42003034	Yahuda ɓi jaa Yakubu, Yakubu ɓi jaa Ishaaku, Ishaaku jaa Ibirayi, a Ibirayi ɓi jaa Tera. Tera ɓi jaa Naaho,
42003035	a Naaho ɓi jaa Saruja. Saruja ɓi jaa Riyu, a Riyu ɓi jaa Pelek. Pelek ɓi ti jaa Eba. Eba ɓi jaa Sheela,
42003036	a Sheela ɓi jaa Kaana. Kaana ɓi ti jaa Arafasa. Arafasa ɓi jaa Sheem, a Sheem ɓi jaa Nuhu. Nuhu ɓi jaa Lamek,
42003037	Lamek ɓi jaa Mɛtusela, Mɛtusela ɓi kaa jaa Anuhu. Anuhu jaa Jared, Jared ɓi jaa Mahalale, a Mahalale ɓi ti jaa Kaana.
42003038	Kaana ɓi jaa Enosh. Enosh ɓi jaa Shiitu, a Shiitu ɓi ti jaa Adamu. Adamu ɓi kaa ɓɔ̀'ɔ Laa.
42004001	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gbãayu kana nɛɛ Rang Urudung, nɛɛ Suru Laa ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a Suru Laa dɔ̃ɔ wu ka jìngti.
42004002	Sheetang gãsɛ wu ka jìngti kaɓa sasak diki laa ziti, nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu shi kpang. Ka diki kaɓa, shaa vuu ɓɔɔ ka nyaa kpang. A nyɔkɔ naa nyɔ wu kati.
42004003	A Sheetang kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Jaa Laa, kɔɔ tari keɓe ta, wu ri borodi.”
42004004	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Wu vuu shaanang kɔ shing shɔnzang nw'ang ningkãari kpang.’”
42004005	A Sheetang tuu wu, vang nɛɛ wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bee ka lapa ɓɛɛ, a tusu wu koolaa ɓɔɔ ka bm bm ɓɛɛ shàlok nandon.
42004006	A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N a mɔɔ naa ka yuu koolaa keɓe nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang a m tɔ ɓɛɛ. N ti a zang piti ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.
42004007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa mɔɔ tang nɛɛ gutu, mɔɔ dɔɔ m, vuu keɓe piti naa nwang kaa ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ.”
42004008	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Shɔnzang wu dɔɔ Kpanti Laa ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ wu ti bang wukɔ gbete.’”
42004009	A Sheetang tuu Yeesɔ daa nɛɛ wu ka Urushalima, a daa shing wu ka sɔ̃ngsɔ̃ng yuu Gãa Laa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Jaa Laa, shɛ̃ɛ ta tipi nɛɛ nɔng kiɓi,
42004010	ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Laa kɔ̀'ɔ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ruu ditɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ri naa ta mɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ, ka gbalang.’
42004011	‘Mɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔ doo ɓaaɓɛ ka tari ɓɛɛ.’”
42004012	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti Laa ti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ wu gãsɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti zang ɓɛɛ kpang.’”
42004013	Sheetang hangsɛ nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu gãsɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ mani tɔ nandon, a seepaa daayi, yaa Yeesɔ kaa gbongkarɛ.
42004014	Yeesɔ gbãayu ka Galili, ka naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a wu ɓɛɛ. Nyaa ɓiɓɛ sãlɛ nɔng ka tipi kaɓa nandon.
42004015	Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓarɛ, a zang ri dɔɔ wu dɔli.
42004016	A Yeesɔ naa a ka gari Nazara, nɔng ɓɔɔ wu bang kagn ɓɛɛ. Daa kaa naa ɓasidi ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa, ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓarɛ. A seepaa kati nɛɛ wu gã ruu Laa.
42004017	A zang a wu labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa bee ɓɛɛ, a kãlɛ, puuyi, a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang beeyi nɛɛ,
42004018	“Suru Kpanti Laa kagn bii mɛɛ, Laa zõ̀ng m nɛɛ n rang zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang yee tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ. Shɔng m nɛɛ n kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ri ka sãa, nɛɛ zang yaa ri naa tɔ. Nɛɛ n ti kɔɔ zang jìng ringtang nɛɛ ri zi nɔng ta. Nɛɛ n ti yaa zang ɓɔɔ zang dang ri jìng ɓɛɛ naa.
42004019	Nɛɛ n ti kɔɔ zang nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu zang ɓiɓɛ kagn a tɔ.”
42004020	A leng labeenang bì'i kati a sɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang ka gãa kaɓa, a raa tɔɔsung nwang ka tipi. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang kaɓa, ri tɛ̃ɛ wu jìng ka bii nandon.
42004021	A kɔɔ ri kati tɔɔ, “Ruu Laa kɔ nɔɔ tãayi, n gã lɛɛkɔ ɓee, nw'ang tɔ nizang.”
42004022	Zang piti rang vuu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. A ri mã naa ka danggn ka ruu yee tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Wee ɓu bɛɛ jaa Yusufu kpang ya?”
42004023	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N zi tɔ, nɔɔ naa kɔɔ m nyaa vuu jeenang keɓe ditɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang bii masɛnang, wu masɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ta.’ Nɔɔ ti naa kɔɔ m ɓɔɔ ditɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ka Kafanahu ɓɔɔ ruu tãayi, palɛ ta ka gari kɔ zang yi mɔɔ kagn ɓee.
42004024	A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang kasɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓi jong ka gari ɓiɓɛ kpang.’
42004025	“Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta nɔɔ tãayi. Ka diki Iliya zang nyaa shoonang Laa, Laa ku lapa, 'a zang mii lapa kpang, saa taati nɛɛ shala mangbete, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyɔkɔ bang naa nwang ka tipi kaɓa nandon. Suvɔ kagn Isirela dɔli,
42004026	a Laa shong Iliya ka bii suvɔ ɓɔɔ ka gari Zarafa ɓɔɔ ka tipi Sidong ɓɛɛ.
42004027	Ka diki Ilisha zang nyaa shoonang Laa, zang vuu bii kagn tipi Isirela dɔli, a Laa masɛ zang gbete kagn teteng ɓarɛ kpang. Laa masɛ Naama yɔɔ Siriya kɔ gbete.”
42004028	Ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa ri tãa naa weɓe, gnvɔ shàa ri dɔli.
42004029	Ri seepaa, ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti gari, ri shing wu ka tìng, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka nyaa kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ ri rooro gãa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri daa zìi wu kaa guurang.
42004030	A sɔɔ teteng ɓarɛ, yi gbalang ɓiɓɛ daa ɓiri.
42004031	Yeesɔ seepaa daa ka gari Kafanahu ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ. Nw'ang tɔ ka nɔngkɔ, a naa daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓarɛ, daa tusu ri vuu.
42004032	A ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ wu tusu ri vuu ɓɛɛ. Tusu zang vuu, mɔɔ kɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ zi tɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi wukɔ nizang.
42004033	Ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kagn. A mɛɛ nyaa nabm ka lapa tɔɔ,
42004034	“Ayii! Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara, ruu, ɓaaɓɛ hãa kagn nɛɛ ruu ya? Mɔɔ arɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ naa nyɔkɔ ruu katɔ ya? N zi mɔɔ tɔɔ, mɔkɔ zang shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.”
42004035	A Yeesɔ mangkɛ suru shi kpang tɔɔ, “Vɔ̃ nyaa ta, mɔɔ nw'ang nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ.” A suru shi kpang tuu wu, loo wu ka tipi ka jìng zang piti. A nwangnɛ, yàa wu bii kati, palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ kpang.
42004036	Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Wee ɓi lɛɛ yee kiya? Mangkɛ suru shi kpang, kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri nwang ta nɛɛ yeti zang, a ri nwangkɛ, ri yaa zang bii.”
42004037	A nyaa Yeesɔ sãlɛ nɔng ka tipi kaɓa nandon.
42004038	A Yeesɔ seepaa yaa gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang kaɓa, a daa ka gãa Siman, ka laa kaɓa, Siman ɓeekpeng ɓɔɔ yi soro ɓiɓɛ roo katɔ nɛɛ bii zaa wu katɔ. A ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu masɛ wu.
42004039	A Yeesɔ daa ka bii Siman ɓeekpeng, a daa shii paa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a mangkɛ bii ɓɔɔ zaa wu kati, a bii yaa wu nɔng kati. A Siman ɓeekpeng seepaa kaa tantɛnang, kãa ri vuu shaanang.
42004040	Laa daa tɔ ka nyaa vaa, zang piti ɓɔɔ zang kɔnang ɓarɛ kagn, ri atɛ ri ka bii Yeesɔ. A Yeesɔ shìli ri naa ka yuu nandon, a masɛ ri kati.
42004041	A suru shi kpang ti nwangkɛ kaa nɛɛ bii zang dɔli. Ri mɛɛrɛ nyaa kana nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Jaa Laa.” A mangkɛ ri, kasɛ nɛɛ ri rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ wukɔ kirisi ɓɛɛ.
42004042	Yeesɔ seepaa kaa nɛɛ gãndi, a daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A zang ri kãa Yeesɔ, ri kãa Yeesɔ, ri daa ìi wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kagn ɓɛɛ. A ri gàa wu nɛɛ wu yaa tipi ɓarɛ kpang.
42004043	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Laa shong m nɛɛ n rang yee tɔ̃ɔ kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔgn jong.”
42004044	A seepaa daayi daa rangkɛ zang yee Laa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ka tipi Yahudiya ɓɛɛ nandon.
42005001	Diki ɓɔɔ kagn, Yeesɔ shii ka nyaa mii waapo Janisara, a zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri màas'ɛ wu, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri tãa yee Laa.
42005002	A Yeesɔ raa jìng zi tonsi ziti ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang jaazìi yinang ka nyaa mii waapo. Zang jaazìi yinang kaɓa, ri nwang tɔ nɛɛ yeti tonsi, ri sɔɔ kaa jang jaazìi ɓarɛ.
42005003	A Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛ ka yeti tonsi ɓɔɔ gbete. Tonsi ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, ɓi ɓɔɔ Siman. A Yeesɔ kɔɔ Siman tɔɔ, wu dɔ̃ tonsi nɛɛ nyaa rang, wu daa nɛɛ mani ka yeti mii tɔkɔlɔng. A Yeesɔ nwang ka yeti tonsi, tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ vuu kana nɛɛ nɔngkɔ.
42005004	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa yee rannang tɔ, a kɔɔ Siman tɔɔ, “Zaa tonsi ta, mɔɔ daa nɛɛ mani ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mii bee katɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ jang jaazìi ka mii, tɔɔ nɔɔ yi jaazìi kati.”
42005005	A Siman kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Dabang, ruu dang jìng tɔ nɛɛ zìi sasak, ruu walɛ vuu kpang, n tɛ̃ɛ jang keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔkɔ kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ.”
42005006	Ɓɔɔ ri tɛ̃ɛ jang jaazìi tɔ, ri raa jaazìi kaa gaagaa, jang ɓarɛ nɛɛ wu lɔɔsɔ kaatɔ.
42005007	A ri ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ ɓeesang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti tonsi ɓɔɔ gbete, nɛɛ ri naa yi ri naa ka jong bii. A ri arɛ ri naa see jaazìi. Jaazìi bì'i wisi nyaa tonsi ziti kaɓa kaa nandon. Tonsi ɓarɛ yaa tɔkɔlɔng nɛɛ wu ɔ̃ɔ kaa yeti mii.
42005008	Ɓɔɔ Siman Bituru zi naa weɓe, tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “N zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ Kpanti, daa ɓaa ta, mɔɔ yaa m, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n m zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42005009	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Siman nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu, ri mã naa ka danggn ka ruu jaazìi ɓɔɔ ri yi ɓɛɛ.
42005010	Rɛɛ Siman ɓeesang, rɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana wujɛ Zebedi, ri mã naa ka danggn doo nɔngkɔ. A Yeesɔ kɔɔ Siman tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, kãntang keɓe mɔɔ nwang ɓaa tɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ yi jaazìi kpang, mɔɔ nw'ang ɓaa kaa zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa zang nyaa nɛɛ ri a ka bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42005011	Ri nwangsɛ tonsi tɔ ka nyaa gãnggãng, a ri yaa vuu ɓarɛ piti, ri dũng Yeesɔ.
42005012	Diki ɓɔɔgn, Yeesɔ daa yeti gari ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a yɔɔ ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa wu dɔli kagn nɔngkɔ. Ɓɔɔ zi Yeesɔ hn, arɛ naa tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, a gaa wu tɔɔ, “Dabang, naa mɔɔ kasɛ katɔ, mɔɔ masɛ m katɔ.”
42005013	A Yeesɔ dìi naa ɓiɓɛ lee wu, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kasɛ tɔ, vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ wu waa nyaa ta.” A vuu bii yaa yɔɔ nɔng kaa tantɛnang.
42005014	Yeesɔ shaarɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Daa sasak, mɔɔ daa tusu zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ Laa vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ. Mɔɔ ti dɔɔ Kpanti Laa vuu ɓɔɔ Musa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ zang ri zi kagn nɛɛ vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ waa nyaa tɔ.”
42005015	A nyaa Yeesɔ sãlɛ nɔng ɓi doo nɛɛ mani. Zang kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa nɛɛ zang naa tãa yee ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu ti màsɛ̀ ri kɔnang ɓarɛ.
42005016	A Yeesɔ naa yaa nɔng kaɓa daa ka jìngti, daa gaa Laa naa ɓasidi ɓɛɛ.
42005017	Diki ɓɔɔ kagn, Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu kana, a zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔli ɓɔɔ alɛ nɛɛ gari piti ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili, nɛɛ Yahudiya, a ɓɔɔ gari Urushalima nandon, ri nw'ang kagn nɔngkɔ. A Laa a Yeesɔ naa ɓɔɔ wu màs'ɛ zang kɔnang nɛɛ mani kati.
42005018	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ri tuu zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ ɓɔɔ ri ta ka laa nɛɛ ri atɛ wu ka tìng Yeesɔ,
42005019	a ri walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri daa nɛɛ wu ka bii Yeesɔ kaa takpang, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. A ri vangnɛ, ri puu nɔng ka yuu sãa lapa, ri yaa wu naa kaa nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ ri ta wu kagn, ri shing wu ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka tìng Yeesɔ.
42005020	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa ri shing danggn ka bii Kpanti Laa, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ tɔɔ, “Masang, n yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.”
42005021	A zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, nɛɛ zang Farisawa ri gaa tɔɔsung ruu hɛ̃ɛlɛnang kaa naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ kɔ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu Laa ɓɛɛ ɓu wiya? Ɓi Laa kɔ gbete yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42005022	Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu viya?
42005023	Ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ,’ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Seepaa ta, mɔɔ rarɛ’ ɓu wi kpãa kpang ka teteng yee ziti keɓe wiya?
42005024	N masɛ yɔɔ keɓe ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zi kati nɛɛ, zang a Jaa Shɔnzang naa tɔ ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ wu yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ.” A kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ mɔɔ, seepaa ta mɔɔ tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ta mɔɔ kagn mɔɔ daa gãa.”
42005025	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ, seepaa kaa tantɛnang ka jìng zang, a see laa ɓɔɔ zang tà wu kagn, a daa gãa kati. Dɔɔ Laa kana gbalang gbalang.
42005026	Zang piti ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri dɔɔ Laa kati. Bii kaa ri vɔrɔ, ri tɔɔ, “Ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa ɓɔɔgn lɛɛ tɔ.”
42005027	Yeesɔ masɛ zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ tɔ, a seepaa daanang kati. Daa kana, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Leevi nwang tɔ ka yeti gãa saka tipi tanang. A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dũng m ta.”
42005028	A Leevi yaa vuu piti seepaa, dũng wu kati.
42005029	Leevi daa palɛ vuu shaanang ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu Yeesɔ. Ka teteng zang kɔ shaa vuu shaanang ɓa, zang saka tipi tanang kagn nɔngkɔ gaagaa. Ri shaa vuu shaanang kana nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
42005030	Zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ɓɔɔ ri doo zang Farisawa kɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kana nɛɛ, “Ka ruu vi, nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang nɔɔ ti ɓooro vuu nɛɛ zang saka tipi tanang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kpang kɔ doori viya?”
42005031	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ bii kɔ̀ng ri kpang, ri daa bii zang ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang kɔnang ɓi kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ bii k'ɔng ri katɔ kɔ ri daa shɛ̃ɛning.
42005032	N arɛ nɛɛ n naa ɓaa nyaa ka zang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ kpang. N arɛ nɛɛ n naa ɓaa nyaa m ka zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang kpang ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri yaa vuu shi kpang, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti kati.”
42005033	A zang kaɓa ri ti hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang Farisawa, ri seng nyaalaa ɓarɛ katɔ nɛɛ Laa gaanang piti, a ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ ri sèng ɓarɛ kpang, ka ruu viya?”
42005034	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ ɓeesang ri s'eng nyaalaa ka diki ɓɔɔ sinyɛ ɓeevɛ doo nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ ya? Ri sèng kpang.
42005035	Diki ɓɔɔ zang naa tuu sinyɛ ɓeevɛ a doo naa, tɔ̀ɔ, ri naa seng nyaalaa kati.”
42005036	A ràng ri nyaa vuu jeenang kati tɔɔ, “Zang lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ shɔɔ ɓi jong, zang lu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ gbaala nɛɛ mani kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang palɛ nɔngkɔ, zang làs'ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ shɔɔ ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kaɓa naa daa zɔɔ ɓi tɔ nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ gbaala kaɓa kpang.
42005037	Zang ti tɛ̃ɛ saa shɔɔ ɓi jong ka yeti zà'ang gbaala ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ koo ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa zang tɛ̃ɛyi, sãa zà'ang ɓikatɔ. Saa ti tɛ̃ɛ ka tipi. Koo bì'i ti làs'ɛ katɔ.
42005038	Zang tɛ̃ɛ saa shɔɔ ɓi doo ka zà'ang ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kɔ doori.
42005039	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓoo saa gbaala ɓi tɔ, kasɛ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ɓi takpang. Kɔ̀'ɔ ɓi nɛɛ, ‘Ɓɔɔ gbaala kɔ tɔ̃ɔ.’”
42006001	Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɔɔ kagn, Yeesɔ sɔ̀ɔ gbalang ɓɔɔ tɛɛ yeti jaa zee, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri lɔɔrɔ yuu zee, ri shaatɛ ka naa ɓarɛ, ri shaayi.
42006002	Ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa ri zi naa weɓe, ri hɛ̃ɛyi, ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓ'a nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ka ruu vi, nɔɔ palɛ shoonang ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang viya?”
42006003	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gã vuu ɓɔɔ Dawuda palɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nyɔ wu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ gngn kpang ya?
42006004	Naa ɓɔɔ daa ka yeti Gãa Laa, daa tuu borodi ɓɔɔ zang dang nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ Laa vuu ka Gãa Laa kɔ ri shaa shɛ̃ɛning. A shaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu kpang ya?”
42006005	A hangsɛ nyaa ruu tɔɔ, “Jaa shɔnzang kɔ kpanti diki ɔ̃sɔnang.”
42006006	Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɔɔ kagn, Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu ka yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓarɛ. Ka yeti gãa kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ naa nakn ɓiɓɛ ɓakɛ katɔ kagn nɔngkɔ.
42006007	Zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri tɛ̃̀ɛ wu jìng ka bii, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri zirɛ naa masɛ zang katɔ ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ya. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri naa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu ɓɛɛ kati.
42006008	Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ. A kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ naa ɓakɛ katɔ tɔɔ, “Arɛ mɔɔ shii ka nihn.” A yɔɔ seepaa a ka bii Yeesɔ.
42006009	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “'N hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ karɛ, ‘Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ ruu pàlɛ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ya, kɔ nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang? Nɛɛ ruu masɛ zang ya, kɔ nɛɛ ruu nyɔ zang vɔrɔ katɔ kɔ jong?’”
42006010	A Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ nandon, a kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ naa ɓakɛ katɔ tɔɔ, “Dìi naa ɓaaɓɛ ta.” A yɔɔ dìi naa, a naa ɓiɓɛ nwang tɔ̃ɔ kaa nɔng tɔkn.
42006011	Gnvɔ̃ shaa rɛɛ Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri daa hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
42006012	Ka diki kaɓa, Yeesɔ naa daa Laa gaanang ka kɔpɔ. Yeesɔ gaa Laa nɛɛ zìi sasak, nɔng gantɛ nɛɛ mani.
42006013	Nɔng naa gantɛ tɔ, a ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang kopi tu ziti a tɔɔ nɛɛ ri ɓarɛ kaa zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ. Zang shoonang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ kaɓa, zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ,
42006014	Siman ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ naa a wu nung nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ Anduru. A ɓɔɔ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana nɛɛ Filibu, nɛɛ Baatolomi,
42006015	nɛɛ Matiyu, nɛɛ Tooma, nɛɛ Yakubu jaa Alifaya, nɛɛ Siman ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ tipi ɓarɛ wu gbãayu nɛɛ knti kpang ɓɛɛ
42006016	nɛɛ Yahuda jaa Yakubu, a ɓɔɔ Yahuda Isikariyoti ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
42006017	Yeesɔ shooro tɔ nɛɛ kɔpɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, a daa shii ka nyɛlɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ dɔli, nɛɛ zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri alɛ nɛɛ tipi Yahudiya, nɛɛ gari Urushalima, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri alɛ nɛɛ gari Taya nɛɛ Sidong ɓɔɔ ka nyaa waapo ɓɛɛ. Ri arɛ nɛɛ ri naa tãa yee Laa ɓɔɔ wu rangnɛ, nɛɛ wu ti màsɛ̀ ri kɔnang ɓarɛ.
42006018	A Yeesɔ ti masɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kaa jong.
42006019	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri lee Yeesɔ naa ka bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang masɛnang nwangkɛ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, masɛ zang ɓɛɛ.
42006020	Yeesɔ tuu jìng pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ, ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa naa a nɔkɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta wu nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ.
42006021	“Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ, ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nyɔ nɔɔ katɔ kãntang keɓe ɓɛɛ, Laa naa a nɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ yi nɔɔ buru ɓɛɛ ditɔ. “Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kaa nyaavɔ kãntang keɓe ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ naa laarɛ ditɔ ɓɛɛ.
42006022	Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ, naa zang kasɛ ruu manɛ kpang, zang bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ, zang dãa nɔɔ, zang kɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ shi kpang, ka ruu Jaa Shɔnzang.
42006023	Zang nɛɛ palɛ nɔɔ tɔɔ naa weɓe, nɔɔ dɔɔ bii katɔ. Nɔɔ ti tãa tìnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kpanti Laa shing nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn bang ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Daa ɓarɛ pàl'ɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa doo nɔngkɔ ka tìng.
42006024	“Jìng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, ɓɔɔ vuu naa manɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ walɛ tìnang tãanang manɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
42006025	“Jìng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, ɓɔɔ buru manɛ puu katɔ kãntang keɓe ɓɛɛ, nyɔkɔ naa nyɔ nɔɔ ditɔ. “Jìng dannang kagn yuu manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ laarɛ katɔ kãntang keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti manɛ naa lasɛ ditɔ gbãnggbãng, nɔɔ ti naa kaa nyaavɔ ditɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
42006026	“Jinang dannang kagn yuu ɓaaɓɛ, naa zang piti rang yee tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri rang yee tɔ̃ɔ doo nɔngkɔ ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ ri zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ.”
42006027	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ruu kɔ n rang ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ ri kpang katɔ. Nɔɔ ti palɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu manɛ kpang tɔ̃ɔ katɔ.
42006028	Nɔɔ gaa Laa ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu manɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dang nɔɔ jìng ɓɛɛ.
42006029	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔ nɔɔ ka kashoo dang gbete, nɔɔ raa wu dang gbete, wu ti nyɔrɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti ta fɔ̃ɔrɔ bang ɓaaɓɛ, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ hãa nɛɛ biling, mɔɔ ti zãa wu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ hãa nɛɛ tìng kpang.
42006030	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gaa vuu ka naa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ zãa wu kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti tuu vuu ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ zang sɔɔrɔ mɔɔ kpang.
42006031	Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang ri palɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ ri doo nɔngkɔ.
42006032	Naa nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu manɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ naa walɛ ɓu vi ka bii Kpanti Laa viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kpanti Laa kpang, ri kàs'ɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
42006033	Naa nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kɔ tɔ̃ɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ naa walɛ vi ka naa Laa viya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang ri palɛ doo nɔngkɔ.
42006034	Naa nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ ri naa sɔɔrɔ nɔɔ vuu manɛ katɔ kɔ, nyaa kɔpɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ naa walɛ vi ka naa Kpanti Laa viya? Zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kpang, ri a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang kɔ doori nyaa kɔpɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri naa ta kaa doo nɔngkɔ tɔkn.
42006035	Nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang katɔ. Nɔɔ palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ. N'ɔɔ ti a zang vuu nyaa kɔpɔ nɛɛ zang wu naa sɔɔrɔ nɔɔ tɔkn kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa shing nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kati. N'ɔɔ ti naa nw'ang wujɛ Kpanti Laa kati. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn zang ɓɔɔ zãa wu kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ shi kpang kɔng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
42006036	Gn zang wu kɔng nɔɔ katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ gn zang kɔng Daa manɛ ɓɛɛ.
42006037	N'ɔɔ jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu kpang, Kpanti Laa wu ti naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu kpang kɔ doori. N'ɔɔ kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ zang keɓe palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang. Tɔɔ kpang Laa wu ti naa kɔɔ kaa takpang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang. Nɔɔ yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ Laa wu ti naa yaa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.
42006038	Nɔɔ a zang vuu katɔ, Laa naa a nɔɔ ditɔ jong. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta ka naa Laa, naa yi nyaa waka katɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, zang naa zìiti, zang ìi naa kagn. Zang wu ti tɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkn wu kãng ka tipi, tɔɔ zang wu a nɔɔ kati. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, waka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã zang vuu nɛɛ mani, Laa naa mã nɔɔ doo nɛɛ wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
42006039	A Yeesɔ ti rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, “Zang jìng ringtang, yi zang jìng ringtang labalang ɓɔ̀ɔ ri ya? Ri daa gɔlɔ zɔɔ ka yeti too kpang ya?
42006040	Zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu, ɓa zang ɓɔɔ tusu wu vuu ɓi kpang. Nɛɛ mantɛ vuu tɔ piti, naa nwang ɓi kaa doo naa zang ɓɔɔ tusu wu vuu kɔ.
42006041	“Mɔɔ sh'ing jìng ka zũng laa ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓaazung kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, mɔɔ yee laa ɓaa ka lawaa bang ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓaaɓɛ kpang ka ruu viya?
42006042	A mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓaazung ɓu kaa biya nɛɛ, ‘Manzung, n kaaɓi, n sha mɔɔ zũng laa tɔkɔlɔng kɔ ka jìng ɓaaɓɛ ɓi,’ a mɔɔ ti zi lawaa bang ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓaaɓɛ ɓi kpang viya? Zang ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, nwangsɛ lawaa bang ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓaaɓɛ gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ zi nɔng kaa tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ sha zũng laa ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓaazung kati.
42006043	“Laa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ra jaa ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓi kpang. A laa ɓɔɔ shi kpang ti ra jaa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang kɔ doori.
42006044	Zang zi laa nung ɓi ka jaa ɓɔɔ wu ra ɓɛɛ. Zang hãa mangoro ɓɔɔ ka laa kaashiyaawo ya? Zang ti hãa jaa sìiri katɔ ka bii kɔkɔ gbantang ya?
42006045	Shɔnzang ɓi doo nɔngkɔ. Zang tɔ̃ɔ nwangsɛ ɓi doo vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ. A zang shi kpang ti nwangsɛ ɓi doo vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa shɔnzang piti, a ɓi nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
42006046	“Ka ruu vi, nɔɔ ɓaarɛ m nɛɛ Kpanti, Kpanti, a nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ kpang viya?
42006047	Zang piti ɓɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ, ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓɔɔ n rangnɛ, a ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kàsɛ̀, 'n tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa nwang ɓɛɛ.
42006048	Zang kaɓa nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu mãa gãa, a shu too, loo doo gãa ka yuu pɛngkɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Diki ɓɔɔ mii rang kpayi, nyɔ ka bii gãa, palɛ gãa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang mãa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
42006049	A zang ɓɔɔ tãa yee mɛɛ, a palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ shu too gãa ka takpang ɓɛɛ. Loo doo gãa ɓiɓɛ ka tipi waati. Diki ɓɔɔ mii rang kpayi nyɔ ka bii gãa, gãa kaɓa tantɛ watɛnang. Watɛnang ɓiɓɛ shing baabi kagn kɛɛm.”
42007001	Yeesɔ hangsɛ zang nyaa vuu keɓe kɔɔnang tɔ ka shoo zang nandon, a naa seepaa daa ka Kafanahu.
42007002	Yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja Rooma ɓɔɔ kagn nɔngkɔ. Kɔnang yi zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ. Kɔnang ɓiɓɛ bang dɔli, nɛɛ wu vɔrɛ yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng.
42007003	A yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja kaɓa naa tãa nyaa Yeesɔ, a shong zang bang bang zang Yahudawa, nɛɛ ri daa gaa Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu naa màsɛ̀ wu zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ.
42007004	A zang bang bang zang Yahudawa naa a ka bii Yeesɔ. A ri bakɛ wu gbãnggbãng, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ pàl'ɛ wu vuu keɓe tɔ.
42007005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ ruu zang ɓuru dɔli ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ ti mãa ruu gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓuru.”
42007006	A Yeesɔ dàa kaa nɛɛ ri. Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ sɔɔja zirɛ Yeesɔ a kana naabm, a shong rɛɛ ɓeesang nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Dabang, mɔɔ kpãa yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a ka gãa mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
42007007	N ti daa naa ɓɔɔ n a ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Rang yee kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, kɔnang wu yaa zang shoonang mɛɛ bii.
42007008	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n m doo ka naa zang kɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri ti kagn naa mɛɛ. Naa n kɔɔ ɓɔɔ gbete nɛɛ ‘Dita,’ daa katɔ. Naa n ti kɔɔ ɓɔɔ gbete nɛɛ ‘Arɛ,’ ti a katɔ. Naa n ti kɔɔ zang shoonang mɛɛ nɛɛ ‘palɛ vuu keɓe,’ ti palɛ katɔ.”
42007009	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa yee kaɓa naa weɓe, mã naa ka danggn. A raa jìng kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũuru wu gaagaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ, n zi zang Isirela ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bì'i mɛɛ gngn naa zang keɓe kpang.”
42007010	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ sɔɔja shong ri ka bì'i Yeesɔ naa gbãayu ka gãa, ri zirɛ vuu yaa zang shoonang yɔɔ sɔɔja nɔng tɔ.
42007011	Ka knti vuu keɓe, Yeesɔ naa tantɛ kaa daanang ka gari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Naying ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ri daa nɛɛ wu ning.
42007012	Yeesɔ a tɔ ka nyaa gãa gari naabm, a ɓee zang yuu ri t'uu vɔrɔ jaa suvɔ ɓɔɔ kagn gari ka kaɓa. Suvɔ kaɓa ti dũuru ri kana knti, nɛɛ zang gari ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ vɔ kaɓa wukɔ jaa suvɔ kaɓa gbete.
42007013	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi suvɔ ɓɔɔ jaa ɓiɓɛ vɔrɛ, gn ɓiɓɛ kɔng wu a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kaa kpang.”
42007014	A Yeesɔ arɛ naa lee naa ka laa ɓɔɔ zang tuu vɔrɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu vɔrɔ ri shii kaa kikiri. A kɔɔ vɔrɔ tɔɔ, “Jasang, n kɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ seepaa ta.”
42007015	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ seepaa, a gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang kati. A Yeesɔ yi wu a niiɓɛ kati.
42007016	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ, ri kaa vɔrɔ kaa nandon. A ri dɔɔ Laa ri tɔɔ, “Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ bang nwang nyaa lɛɛ tɔ ka teteng ɓuru. Laa a lɛɛ tɔ, nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang ɓiɓɛ.”
42007017	Nyaa Yeesɔ sãlɛ nɔng, ka ruu vuu kɔ wu palɛ ɓee ka tipi Yahudiya nandon nɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ naabm nɛɛ Yahudiya ɓɛɛ nandon.
42007018	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana ri kɔɔ wu ruu ka yuu vuu keɓe nandon.
42007019	A Yɔhana ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti, a shong ri ka bii Yeesɔ. Yɔhana tɔɔ, ri daa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ya? kɔ ruu gãng jìng ka zang ɓɔɔgn”?
42007020	A zang ɓɔɔ Yɔhana shongnɛ naa a ka bii Yeesɔ. Ri tɔɔ, “Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima shong ruu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ ruu hɛ̃ɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Mɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ya kɔ ruu gãng jìng ka zang ɓɔɔgn?’”
42007021	Ka laa kaɓa Yeesɔ masɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang ɓarɛ ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ dɔli. A ti nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ bii zang dɔli. A ti masɛ zang jìng ringtang, ri zi nɔng kati.
42007022	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita nɔɔ daa kɔɔ Yɔhana vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓɛɛ. Zang jìng ringtang ri zi nɔng kana. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kàa katɔ ri ti ra kana. Kɔnang zang vuu bii ti yaa ri nɔng tɔ. Zang shoo gbooto ri ti tãa nɔng kana. N ti wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔ katɔ paa, a zang ti rǎng zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang ruu tɔ̃ɔ Laa kana.
42007023	Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa danggn naa ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42007024	Zang ɓɔɔ Yɔhana shongnɛ ri daa tɔ, Yeesɔ naa gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ruu Yɔhana kati tɔɔ. “Nɔɔ daa ɓu vi zinang ka jìngti viya? lagaa ɓɔɔ jasung zìiti ɓɛɛ ya?
42007025	Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, nɔɔ daa ɓu vi zinang viya? Nɔɔ daa ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ ya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri hã̀al'ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ri ti tãa tìnang vuu naa ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ gaagaa, ri nwalɛ ɓarɛ ka dàbang kpanti.
42007026	A nɔɔ daa ɓu vi zinang viya? Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ya? Nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔ a ɓa zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓi kaatɔ.
42007027	Wee zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ zang bee ruu ɓiɓɛ ka labeenang Laa kɔ. ‘Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, N shong zang nyaa shoonang mɛɛ ditɔ ka tìng ɓaaɓɛ, wu naa palɛ mɔɔ gbalang.’
42007028	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ka teteng zang piti ɓɔɔ zang soro yiki ka koo keɓe zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima kagn gbete kpang. A zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ tɔkɔlɔng ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti ɓa wu bannang katɔ.”
42007029	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ piti, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi, ri tãa ruu keɓe. Ri dɔɔ Laa ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yɔhana palɛ ri batizima ɓɛɛ.
42007030	A zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔli, ri bɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ nɛɛ Yɔhana wu pàlɛ̀ ri batizima kpang.
42007031	Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “N gãsɛ zang koo jaa knti keɓe ɓu nɛɛ viya?
42007032	Ri nwang naa wujɛ ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka kasuwa, ri ɓaarɛ nyaa ka zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Ruu jee nɔɔ leere, nɔɔ sɔ dãng kpang. Ruu ti ɓaa nyaavaa, nɔɔ kaa nyaa vɔ kpang’.
42007033	Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima arɛ, shaa vuu shaanang kpang, ti ɓoo sàa kpang. Nɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘Suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ’.
42007034	A Jaa Shɔnzang arɛ, shaa vuu shaanang katɔ, ti ɓoo katɔ. Nɔɔ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ zi zang nyɔkɔ keɓe, ɓi ti zang ɓɔɔ ɓoo saa dɔli ɓɛɛ. Yi wusang ɓi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri doo zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ ɓɛɛ’.
42007035	Zũnang ɓɔɔ Laa a zang, tusu bii ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42007036	Yɔɔ Farisawa ɓɔɔ kagn ɓaa Yeesɔ nyaa nɛɛ wu daa shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ wu ka gãa ɓiɓɛ. A Yeesɔ daa gãa yɔɔ Farisawa kaɓa kati, daa nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shaa vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ.
42007037	Jaa soro ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kagn gari kaɓa. Ɓɔɔ tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ shaa vuu shaanang ka gãa zang Farisawa kaɓa, seepaa, tuu nung ɓɔɔ pũngku sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang s'u nung bì'i ka zà'ang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ tari ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. A nɛɛ mani ka bii Yeesɔ.
42007038	A naa shii ka knti Yeesɔ ka doo ɓiɓɛ naabm, kaa kana, miiri ɓiɓɛ ti shili kana doo Yeesɔ. A ti alɛ miiri ɓɔɔ shili ka doo Yeesɔ kaa nɛɛ suuyuu ɓiɓɛ. Tɔ̃kɔ doo Yeesɔ, a tungku nung ɓɔɔ wu a nɛɛ mani kagn.
42007039	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa ɓɔɔ ɓaa Yeesɔ nyaa zi naa weɓe, kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Naa yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, nɛɛ zi jaa soro kɔ lee wu naa ka bii ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɛɛ ti zi naa nwannang jaa soro keɓe tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jaa soro keɓe ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42007040	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Siman vuu ɓɔɔ, n tɔɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ kagn.” A Siman kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓu viya, maalang?”
42007041	Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn a zang ziti saka nyaa k'ɔp'ɔ. Zang gbete ta saka dinari laa maani, dakn maani. Ɓɔɔ gbete ta laa ziti tu kopi.
42007042	Zang kɔ ri ta saka ka naa yɔɔ ɓa, ri walɛ saka ɓɔɔ ri sɔɔrɔ yɔɔ takpang, a yɔɔ yàa ri saka ɓɔɔ ri talɛ ɓɛɛ nandon. Ka teteng zang ziti kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ naa kasɛ yɔɔ keɓe dɔli ɓu wiya?”
42007043	Siman kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ yaa wu saka dɔli ɓɛɛ.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔ tɔ̃ɔ.”
42007044	A Yeesɔ raa jìng pɛ̃ɛrɛ jaa soro, a kɔɔ Siman tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi jaa soro keɓe tɔ waa? N a ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ a m mii ɓɔɔ m sɔɔ doo nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Jaa soro keɓe kɔ sɔɔ m doo nɛɛ miiri ɓiɓɛ, a ti alɛ nɛɛ suuyuu ɓiɓɛ.
42007045	Mɔɔ ti tɔ̃kɔ kashìi nyaa mɛɛ kpang, a ɓu doo ɓɔɔ n a ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ jaa soro keɓe yaa doo mɛɛ tɔ̃kɔnang gn kpang.
42007046	Mɔɔ ti tũuru nung ka yuu mɛɛ kpang, jaa soro keɓe tũuru m nung ka doo mɛɛ.
42007047	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ mɔɔ, zang yaa wu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ dɔli tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ tusu nɛɛ wu kasɛ m dɔli ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang yaa wu gbalang tɔkɔlɔng, kasɛ ruu zang ɓi tɔkɔlɔng.”
42007048	A kɔɔ jaa soro tɔɔ, “N yaa mɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.”
42007049	A zang ɓɔɔ ri nw'ang nɛɛ wu ka nɔng vuu shaanang, ri gaa tɔɔsung yee rangkɛnang ka naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Wee ɓu yɔɔ ki kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ wiya?”
42007050	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ jaa soro kaɓa tɔɔ, “Danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ, a mɔɔ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ. Dita waasɛ̃.”
42008001	Knti bee kpang, Yeesɔ naa seepaa nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, daarɛ ka rɛɛ gari bang bang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, tɔkɔlɔng. Rang zang yee tɔ̃ɔ Laa. Kɔɔ zang ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu Kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo ɓɛɛ. Daarɛ nɛɛ zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ning.
42008002	A ɓɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ, nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ wu màsɛ̀ ri kɔnang ɓɔɔ yiki ri ɓɛɛ. Zang soro kaɓa ɓi rɛɛ Marayamu ɓɔɔ Zang ɓaa nɛɛ Magadaliya, ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang manziti nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
42008003	Nɛɛ Yuwana soro Kuza ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang ka dabang Kpanti Hiridu ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ Susana, a ɓɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔgn gaagaa, ɓɔɔ ri see vuu naa ɓarɛ, ri kãa Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ vuu shaanang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
42008004	Zang kpalɛ tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ gaagaa, a zang ɓɔɔ ti alɛ doo naa nɛɛ gari ɓarɛ. A Yeesɔ rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang.
42008005	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔgn nwangnɛ nɛɛ wu daa vang jìng vuu ka jaa ɓiɓɛ. Vang jìng vuu kana a jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka gbalang, a zang naalɛ kaa nɛɛ doo. Jaaning ri ti naa arɛ ri yakɛ.
42008006	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka yuu tipi pɛngkɛ, a ri takɛ. Ri bangkɛ kana, a ri naa tɔɔrɔ, ri waatɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ tipi yà kpang ɓɛɛ.
42008007	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri ti shili ka nɔng ɓɔɔ kɔkɔ kagn gaagaa ɓɛɛ, a ri takɛ. Ri bangkɛ kana nɛɛ kɔkɔ ning, a kɔkɔ naa bangkɛ mulu ri.
42008008	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ. Ri bangkɛ ri tasɛ yuu. Ri shing jìng gaagaa, ɓa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang katɔ dakn laa maani.” Ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a naa kɔɔ ri nabm tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu tãayi.”
42008009	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, naa hɛ̃ɛ wu dìiri yee ɓɔɔ wu rang nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɛɛ kati.
42008010	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ruu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ka yuu Kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi, Laa a nɔkɔ naa zinang. A ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn, n rang ri yee ɓi nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri shu jìng nɛɛ ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu, ri zi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓaa shoo nɛɛ ri tãayi, ri ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
42008011	“Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Dìiri nyaa vuu jeenang keɓe. Jìng vuu keɓe, ɓi ruu Kpanti Laa.
42008012	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka gbalang nwang ɓi kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu Kpanti Laa a Sheetang kpanti suru shi kpang, arɛ naa zɔ̃ng ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ri tãa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Laa, ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
42008013	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ shili ka yuu tipi pɛngkɛ, nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu Laa, a ri ta nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ. A ri nwang ɓarɛ naa jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ɓaa dìiri tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri shing danggn ɓarɛ ka naa lapa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Ri yaa gbalang Laa ka diki ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ danggn ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
42008014	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka teteng kɔkɔ, ri nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri dũng kana, a rɛ̃rɛnang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ vuu naa kasɛnang naa mulu ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ri tãayi. A ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ri tãayi nwang ri vuu ɓɔɔ kaa takpang.
42008015	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ ri shili ka tipi tɔ̃ɔ, nwang kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ tãa ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri tarɛ, ri shing ka yeti ɓarɛ, ri mã danggn, a ri naa nwang kaa naa jìng vuu ɓɔɔ bangnɛ ra jaa gaagaa ɓɛɛ.
42008016	“Zang mang waa zà'ang sɔɔ ɓi jong, zang zuu nɛɛ gãntang kpang. Zang ti shing ka dii latãng kpang. Zang nɛɛ mang waa zà'ang sɔɔ tɔ, zang shing ɓi ka yuu vuu lapa kɔ jong, tɔ̀ɔ, wu yakɛ zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu tu ka yeti gãa nɔng kati
42008017	“Vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ɓɔɔ Laa naa nwangsɛ kpang, ɓi kagn kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang ti zi kpang, Laa naa nwangsɛ ditɔ, zang zirɛ.
42008018	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ gãng jìng ka naa ɓɔɔ tãa yee Laa ɓɛɛ ning. Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn, zang naa gisi wu ɓɔɔgn ditɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkɔlɔng, zang naa ta ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ wu shing danggn kagn, ka naa ɓiɓɛ ditɔ.”
42008019	A nà'a Yeesɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ naa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a ri walɛ gbalang daanang bii ɓiɓɛ naabm kaa takpang, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ gaagaa ɓɛɛ.
42008020	A zang ɓɔɔgn kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Naaɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa naaɓɛ ri shi ka biling, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ.”
42008021	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nà'a mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa nà'a mɛɛ ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu Laa, a ri ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
