42008022	Diki ɓɔɔgn, Yeesɔ vang tonsi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ruu ta nɔɔ rang ta, ruu daa nɔɔ nyaa rang ɓɔɔ dang.” A ri seepaa daanang kati.
42008023	Ri daa kana yeti tonsi, a hingro yi Yeesɔ kati. A jasung bang naa seepaa rannang ka yuu waapo. Mii a kana yeti tonsi, tonsi nɛɛ wu ɔ̃ɔ kaa tɔ,
42008024	a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri daa hingsi wu. Ri tɔɔ, “Dabang Dabang, ruu ɔ̃ɔ kana.” A Yeesɔ seepaa mangkɛ jasung nɛɛ mii ɓɔɔ ri gɔnsɔ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A mii kaa kati, jasung ti vɔ̃ nyaa kaa jong.
42008025	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ kaa kiya?” Ri kaa vɔrɔ, ri ti mã naa ka danggn. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Wee ɓi lee zang viya? Jasung nɛɛ mii ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ wiya?”
42008026	Ri ta rang tɔ, a ri naa a ka tipi Ganasara ɓɔɔ ka paa ɓɔɔ laa nwangnɛ mani, raa zɔɔ jìng nɛɛ Galili ɓɛɛ.
42008027	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwang nɛɛ yeti tonsi hn, a zang gbete ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nwang nɛɛ gari kaɓa, arɛ naa ɓee wu yuu kati. Diki ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kaɓa hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka bii kpang bee tɔ. Ti roo gãa kpang. Roo ɓi ka nɔng yuu sàa.
42008028	Ɓɔɔ wu zi Yeesɔ hn, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, a tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ. Mɛɛrɛ nyaa kana nabm, nɛɛ “Mɔɔ kãa vi ka bì'i mɛɛ viya? Yeesɔ Jaa Kpanti Laa. N zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ, mɔɔ dang m jìng kpang.”
42008029	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ kɔɔ suru shi kpang tɔɔ, nɛɛ wu nw'ang ta, wu yaa yɔɔ bii ɓɛɛ. Suru shi kpang keɓe yuku wu paa ka bii dɔli. Zang mã wu nɛɛ saka nɛɛ lengtaa, nɛɛ tɔɔ zang gãng jìng ka wu ɓɛɛ. A dɔlɔ saka nɛɛ lengtaa kaɓa katɔ, wu ti daarɛ ka jìngti naa ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang tasɛ wu naa ɓɛɛ.
42008030	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓaa nung ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ viya?” A kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓaa m nɛɛ ‘Dɔli.’” Kɔɔ nɔngkɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
42008031	A suru shi kpang kaɓa, ri gaa Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu dɔ̃ɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ka ruu zang shi kpang, kpang.
42008032	Ka laa kaɓa, gãnya ɓɔɔ ri shaa kagn doo kɔpɔ ka nɔngkɔ. A suru shi kpang ri gàa Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu yaa ri, ri tu ka bii gãnya. A Yeesɔ y'aa ri kati.
42008033	A suru shi kpang kaɓa ri nwangkɛ nɛɛ bii yɔɔ, ri daa hãlɛ nyaa ka bii gãnya. A gãnya kɔ gaagaa ɓa, yuku ri sɔɔ gbalang nyaa rang ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛrɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri daa ɔ̃ɔrɔ ka yeti mii nandon, a ri vɔlɔ.
42008034	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri gã gãnya zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ naa weɓe, ri yuku, ri daa kɔɔrɔ zang ruu keɓe ka gari kaɓa, nɛɛ gari tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ ka tipi kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
42008035	A zang nwangkɛ, nɛɛ ri daa zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri a tɔ, ka bii Yeesɔ, ri zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang nwangnɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, nwang tɔ ka tìng Yeesɔ. Hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka bii, suru bii ɓiɓɛ ti sɔɔ tɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔkn. A zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ ri kaa vɔrɔ kati.
42008036	Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri zi jìng bii ri kɔɔ zang naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ masɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bɛɛ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kati.
42008037	A zang tipi Ganasara nandon ri bakɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu dita, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kaa vɔrɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ vang tonsi gbãayu kati.
42008038	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang nwangnɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, gàa Yeesɔ tɔɔ, wu daa nɛɛ wu ning. Yeesɔ kasɛ kpang, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ,
42008039	“Gbãayu ta gari ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ daa kɔɔrɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.” A yɔɔ daayi, daa kɔɔrɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ pàlɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ, kaa nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti ka gari.
42008040	Yeesɔ naa gbãayu tɔ ka nyaa rang dang tɔkn, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ri tãa tìnang dɔli, a ri ta wu kati. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ ri gã wu katɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.
42008041	A zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yayiru, arɛ naa tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, bakɛ wu nɛɛ wu daa ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ. Yayiru kaɓa ɓi zang bang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang.
42008042	Yayiru bakɛ Yeesɔ, ka ruu jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang soro, ɓɔɔ saa ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti vɔ kana. Yeesɔ daa kana gbalang, a zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri màas'ɛ wu kati.
42008043	A jaa soro ɓɔɔ zìi kpaa wu daa saa kopi tu ziti, zang ɓɔɔ zunung wu masɛnang kagn kpang
42008044	'a nɛɛ knti, naa lee naa ka nyaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ Yeesɔ. A zìi ɓɔɔ kpaa wu dɔng kaa tantɛnang.
42008045	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi lee m naa ka bii wiya?” Ɓɔɔ zang piti ri laa nyaa tɔ, nɛɛ ri zi kpang, Bituru naa kɔɔ Yeesɔ kati tɔɔ “Dabang, mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu viya? Mɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ zang kɔ ri kiiri mɔɔ nyaa ka teteng ri kɔ màas'ɛ mɔɔ kpang ya?”
42008046	Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ lee m naa kagn bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi naa zang masɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa a m nwang tɔ nɛɛ bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42008047	A jaa soro ɓɔɔ lee Yeesɔ naa ka bii, zi tɔ nɛɛ zang zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ tɔ, a arɛ, bii zaa wu kana, a naa tang ka tìng Yeesɔ. A kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ wu lee Yeesɔ naa ka bii ɓɛɛ, ka shɔɔ zang nandon nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zìi dɔng kaa tantɛnang ɓɛɛ.
42008048	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ jaa soro kaɓa tɔɔ, “Man jaa, danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ masɛ mɔɔ tɔ, daa waasɛ̃.”
42008049	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ rang yee doo naa ka nyaa, zang gbete a nɛɛ gãa yɔɔ zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang kaɓa, naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Jaa ɓaaɓɛ vɔ tɔ, mɔɔ gboro maalang takpang.”
42008050	Yeesɔ tãa kati, a kɔɔ Yayiru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, shing ɓaa danggn kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ka bii mɛɛ, suru jaa a ɓi ditɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔkn.”
42008051	Yeesɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ gãa Yayiru tɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu daa nɛɛ wu ka yeti gãa kpang, daa nɛɛ rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana nɛɛ Yakubu, nɛɛ daa jaa, nɛɛ naa jaa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
42008052	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng nandon ri kaa ɓarɛ kana, zang ɓɔɔ ri ti ku naa yuu ka ruu jaa ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ kaa kpang, vɔ ɓi ka takpang, roo ɓi katɔ waati.”
42008053	A ri laarɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ jaa vɔ ɓi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
42008054	A Yeesɔ yi jaa ka naa, a ɓaa jaa nyaa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Jaa seepaa ta.”
42008055	A suru bii jaa gbãayu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng tɔkn. A jaa seepaa kaa tantɛnang. A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri kati tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ a wu vuu ta wu shaayi.”
42008056	Daa jaa nɛɛ nà'a jaa ri mã naa ka danggn. Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ri kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ vuu kɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
42009001	Yeesɔ ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bì'i ɓiɓɛ kopi tuu ziti ka nɔng gbete, a a ri naa suru shi kpang nandon nwangsɛnang nɛɛ zang kɔnang masɛnang.
42009002	A shong ri nɛɛ ri dita ri daa rang zang yee Kpanti roonang Laa nɛɛ ri ti masɛ zang kɔnang.
42009003	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ tuu vuu zanti daanang ka naa kpang. N'ɔɔ tuu labalang nɛɛ duku nɛɛ vuu shaanang nɛɛ saka ka naa kpang. N'ɔɔ ti hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ziti ka bii kpang.
42009004	Gãa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa nyaa kagn, nɔɔ nwang ka nɔngkɔ, diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔ̃sɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn wu a nɔng.
42009005	Nɔng ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ ta nɔɔ kpang, nɔɔ nɛɛ daa kaa tɔ, n'ɔɔ waa zũng tapuru ɓɔɔ ka doo manɛ katɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwang vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ ruu manɛ hãa ɓi tɔɔgn nɛɛ ri kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ Laa naa jee ri ruu ditɔ.”
42009006	A ri seepaa, ri daarɛ ka rɛɛ gari tɔkɔlɔng, tɔkɔlɔng nandon. Ri rangkɛ zang yee Laa, a ri ti masɛ zang kɔnang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri daarɛ ɓɛɛ nandon.
42009007	Ɓɔɔ Hiridu kpanti Galili tãa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, kpãa wu ka yeti dɔli. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ Laa wisi Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima paa tɔ tɔkn nɛɛ sàa.
42009008	A zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ Iliya nwang nyaa tɔ tɔkn. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ Laa wisi zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa tɔkn.
42009009	Hiridu tɔɔ, “N dɔng yuu Yɔhana tɔ, ɓi kaa wi palɛ vuu kɔ n tãa nyaa ɓɛɛ wiya?” A kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri ìi zɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ kati.
42009010	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kopi tu ziti naa gbãayu kɔɔ wu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ see ri kɔ shɛ̃ɛning daa nɛɛ ri ka gbalang gari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Bɛsɛda ɓɛɛ.
42009011	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ri tãa nyaa nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ daayi, ri dũuru knti ɓiɓɛ kati. Ri naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ tɔ, a Yeesɔ jee ri nyaa, a rang ri yee Kpanti roonang Laa kati. A ti masɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang yiki ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
42009012	Ka diki kaɓa nɛɛ laarang, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti, ri naa arɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yaa zang naa ta, zang wu daarɛ ka gari ɓɔɔ bang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ ka nihn naabm, zang ɓu wu daa kãa vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nɔng roonang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ gãa ka nihn kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42009013	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔkɔ n'ɔɔ a ri vuu shaanang.” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Borodi ɓuru yaa kaa maani nɛɛ jaazìi ziti kɔ nwani. Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ ruu daa hoo zang kɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓee vuu shaanang ya?”
42009014	(Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ka nɔng kaɓa daa labang maani katɔ) A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu kaa bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kusu zang ta laa ziti tu kopi, laa ziti tu kopi, ri nwalɛ ka tipi.”
42009015	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ri kusu zang kaa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. A ri kɔɔ zang, zang ri nwalɛ ka tipi.
42009016	A tuu borodi maani kɔ nɛɛ jaazìi ɓa, tuu jìng ka lapa, a zãa Laa, shalɛ, a basɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri alɛ zang ta.
42009017	Zang shaayi, buru ɓarɛ yirɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri kpalɛ ɓɔɔ zang yaarɛ knti sà'ang kopi tu ziti.
42009018	Diki ɓɔɔ kagn Yeesɔ gaa Laa kana, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri kagn nɔngkɔ. Hangsɛ nyaalaa gaanang tɔ, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ri kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ nkɔ wiya?”
42009019	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ mɔkɔ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ mɔkɔ Iliya. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, mɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa wisi wukɔ paa nɛɛ saa.”
42009020	A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “A nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ nɛɛ nkɔ wiya?” A Bituru kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ kirisi. Zang ɓɔɔ Laa tɔ naa a ɓɛɛ.”
42009021	A Yeesɔ shaarɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, ri kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang.
42009022	A ti kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Jaa shɔnzang naa dang jìng ditɔ dɔli. Zang bang, bang zang Yahudawa, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ri ti bɛ̃ɛ wu, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Laa naa wisi wu paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
42009023	A kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu dũng m, wu yaa yuu ɓiɓɛ kasɛnang ta, wu ta jìng dannang ɓɔɔ a ka ruu nung mɛɛ diki, diki wu dũng m.
42009024	ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ loo ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ loo yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu mɛɛ naa walɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
42009025	Naa shɔnzang wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon a loo suru bii ɓiɓɛ, vuu keɓe nwǎng wu ɓu viya?
42009026	Zang ɓɔɔ tuuru yusɛ̃ɛ mɛɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ yee mɛɛ, Jaa Shɔnzang naa tuuru yusɛ̃ɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓi doo nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu a ka naa bannang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ Daa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
42009027	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn teteng zang kɔ ka nihn ɓee ri vɔ kpang. Ri zi kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa roo ɓɛɛ gbongkarɛ.”
42009028	Diki mantaati ɓa tɔ, a Yeesɔ naa vang kɔpɔ daa gaa Laa. Daa nɛɛ rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana nɛɛ Yakubu kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
42009029	Gaa Laa doo naa, a waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ risi kaa naa ɓɔɔgn. Fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nwang kaa puru shãashãa.
42009030	A zang ziti, Musa nɛɛ Iliya ri nwang nyaa, ri rang yee kana nɛɛ wu.
42009031	Ri nwang nyaa bii ɓarɛ kɔlɔ katɔ, a ri rang yee nɛɛ wu ka naa ɓɔɔ wu naa vɔ ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ.
42009032	A Bituru nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu hingro kpiti ri jìng tɔ, ɓɔɔ ri hingsi jìng ri zi Yeesɔ ka bannang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
42009033	Ɓɔɔ zang ziti kaɓa seepaa daanang tɔ, Bituru kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang, wee ruu ka nihn, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. R'uu kaaɓi ruu waa k'uutu taati, ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ gbete, ɓɔɔ Musa gbete, a ɓɔɔ Iliya ti gbete.” (A Bituru zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ keɓe ɓi kpang.)
42009034	Bituru kɔɔ ruu kaɓa doo naa nyaa, sãmbong arɛ naa zuu ri, a ri kaa vɔrɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ sãmbong zuu ri kana ɓɛɛ.
42009035	Ri tãa yee nɛɛ yeti sãmbong tɔɔ, “Wee Jaa Mɛɛ ɓɔɔ N zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ kɔ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ning.”
42009036	Ri tãa yee tɔ naa weɓe, a ri naa zi Yeesɔ kaa bm. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ taati kaɓa, ri shing ruu keɓe ka yeti ɓarɛ. Ka diki kaɓa ri kɔɔ zang gbete vuu ɓɔɔ ri zi ɓɛɛ kpang.
42009037	Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ taati ri shooro tɔ nɛɛ kɔpɔ nɛɛ gãndi a zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa naa ɓee wu yuu kati.
42009038	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ m'ɛɛ nyaa kana nɛɛ, “Maalang, n gaa mɔɔ katɔ, gn jaa gbete mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.
42009039	Suru shi kpang keɓe nɛɛ mã wu tɔ, mɛɛrɛ nyaa tantɛnang. Wu ti mãrɛ, puru wu puu nɛɛ nyaa dung dung. Dang wu jìng sasak, yaa wu naa pati kpang.
42009040	N gàa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ n tɔɔ ri nwangsɛ suru shi kpang keɓe ri zunung kpang.”
42009041	Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “zang koo jaa knti keɓe, nɔɔ shi kpang. Nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa rɛ̃rɛkɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ n nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Nɔɔ nɛɛ n mã danggn nɛɛ nɔɔ saa nɛya? Atɛ m jaa ɓaaɓɛ ta.”
42009042	Ɓɔɔ jaa a kana, suru shi kpang tuu wu loo ka tipi a mã kati. Yeesɔ mangkɛ suru shi kpang a suru shi kpang nwangnɛ a sɔɔrɔ daa jaa, jaa ɓiɓɛ kati.
42009043	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔngkɔ piti, ri mã naa ka danggn ka ruu vuu piti ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ.
42009044	Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta nɔɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ danggn wu ning nɔɔ kaa takpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa tuu Jaa shɔnzang ditɔ a zang ɓɔɔgn ri yɔɔ wu vɔrɔ.
42009045	Ri zi dìiri ruu kɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓee kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Laa waasɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ, kasɛ nɛɛ ri zi kpang. Ri tɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu dìiri ruu keɓe a ri kaa vɔrɔ.
42009046	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri gaa tɔɔsung nyaa laanang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ naa nwang zang bang ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
42009047	Yeesɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, tuu jaa tɔkɔlɔng shii wu nɛɛ doo ka tìng ɓiɓɛ.
42009048	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ ta jaa keɓe, ka ruu mɛɛ ta ɓi nkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta m, ta zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ shing gn nɛɛ wu ɓi zang bang kpang ka teteng manɛ wukɔ zang bang manɛ.”
42009049	Yɔhana kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dabang, ruu zi zang ɓɔɔ kagn nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ nung ɓaaɓɛ, a ruu zãa wu. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, dũng knti ɓaaɓɛ ɓi nɛɛ ruu kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42009050	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ zãa wu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓuru kpang, ɓi doo zang ɓuru kɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42009051	Ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gbãayu daa lapa yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ shing jìng daanang kaa Urushalima.
42009052	A shong zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ka tìng. A zang shoonang kaɓa ri daa hãa nyaa ka gari zang Samariya ɓɔɔ gbete. Ri nɛɛ ri walɛ wu nɔng roonang,
42009053	A zang gari kaɓa ri kasɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ wu a ka yeti gari ɓarɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ shing jìng ɓi kaa Urushalima daanang ɓɛɛ.
42009054	Ɓɔɔ Yakubu nɛɛ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri zi naa weɓe, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang mɔɔ kasɛ tɔ ruu gaa Laa, wu shong waa nɛɛ lapa, wu shaa ri ya?”
42009055	A Yeesɔ raa jìng mangkɛ ri.
42009056	A sha kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa ka gari ɓɔɔgn.
42009057	Ri daa kana gbalang a zang ɓɔɔgn gbete kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N dũng knti ɓaaɓɛ n daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ daa ɓɛɛ piti.”
42009058	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yeng rɛɛ yaka jìngti kagn, a saara jaaning ti kagn, a gãa ɓɔɔ Jaa shɔnzang roo ɓi kagn kpang.”
42009059	A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Dũng m ta.” A zang kaɓa kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Dabang ya m ta n daa gbãa daa mɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ.”
42009060	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dũng m ɓaaɓɛ. Yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang gn kpang ri gbãa zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ. Daa ɓaari mɔɔ daa kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tõ̀'ɔ Kpanti roonang Laa.”
42009061	Zang ɓɔɔgn ti kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N dũng mɔɔ katɔ Dabang, yaa m ka gbongkarɛ n daa jee zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa mɛɛ nyaa.”
42009062	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ gaayu shoonang Laa palɛnang a nwaa jìng ka knti, daa naa ɓɔɔ wu daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti kpang.”
42010001	Ka knti vuu keɓe Yeesɔ zɔ̃ngkɔ zang laa taati tu kopi a ɓakɛ ri ziti, ziti, a shongko ri ka rɛɛ gari nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti ɓɔɔ wu naa daarɛ ɓɛɛ.
42010002	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zee daa naa yeenang tɔ, a zang yeenang haa kaa takpang. Nɔɔ gaa Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang jaa ɓɛɛ ta, wu shong zang zee yeenang ka jaa ɓiɓɛ.
42010003	Nɔɔ dita, n shong nɔɔ naa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ka teteng zaa wisi.
42010004	N'ɔɔ tuu duku saka tɛ̃ɛnang nɛɛ duku zanti daanang, nɛɛ koodoo ɓɔɔ, ka naa kpang. N'ɔɔ ti suukãng ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ jee zang nyaa ka gbalang kpang.
42010005	Gãa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa nyaa kagn piti, nɔɔ jee zang nyaa nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ nwang tɔ̃ɔ.’
42010006	Naa zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng ka nwannang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ kagn gãa kaɓa, naa nwang ditɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa zang kaɓa kagn kpang naa nwang nɔngkɔ kpang.
42010007	Nɔɔ nwang ka gãa gbete kaɓa kɔ, n'ɔɔ shaa vuu, n'ɔɔ ti ɓoo mii ɓoonang ɓɔɔ ri a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang sɔ̀ɔr'ɔ zang shoonang doo ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ dɔ̃sɔ gãa kpang.
42010008	Gari ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa nyaa kagn piti, zang nɛɛ ta nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ shaa vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
42010009	Nɔɔ masɛ zang kɔnang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gari kaɓa katɔ. Nɔɔ ti kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, ‘Diki ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti a tɔ kaa naabm.’
42010010	Gari ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa kagn, zang gari kaɓa nɛɛ ta nɔɔ kpang, nɔɔ sɔɔrɔ boo gãa ɓarɛ, nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ri nɛɛ,
42010011	‘Rùu wàa nɔɔ tapuru gari manɛ ɓɔɔ ka doo ɓuru tɔ, tɔɔ zang zi kati nɛɛ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu ditɔ’. Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, Kpanti roonang Laa a naabm tɔ.
42010012	N kɔɔ nɔɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, jìng dannang zang gari kaɓa naa ɓa ɓɔɔ zang gari sɔɔdɔm katɔ.
42010013	“Jìng dannang kagn yuu ɓaaɓɛ gari Korazing. Jìng dannang kagn yuu ɓaaɓɛ gari Bɛsɛda, ka ruu ɓɔɔ shoonang bang kɔ n palɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ n nɛɛ palɛ nɔngkɔ ka gari Taya nɛɛ Sidong, ri nɛɛ yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ, ri nɛɛ kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ. Ri nɛɛ hãa sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ, ri nɛɛ tɛ̃ɛ pũngku tɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kaa gn nɛɛ ri ràa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ yuu knti tɔ.
42010014	Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, Laa naa dang nɔɔ jìng ɓa ɓɔɔ zang rɛɛ gari Taya nɛɛ Sidong katɔ.
42010015	Zang gari Kafanahu, nɔkɔ naa ɓa rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ nandon nɛɛ bannang ya? Kpang, Laa naa tasɛ nɔɔ ka waa kɔ jong.”
42010016	A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa manɛ, ɓaa shoo ka nyaa mɛɛ kɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ɓi nkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti bɛ̃ɛ m, bɛ̃ɛ ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.”
42010017	Zang ɓɔɔ laa taati tu kopi ziti ri gbãayu. Ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang suru shi kpang ri ti ɓ'aa shoo ka nyaa ɓuru katɔ, ruu nɛɛ kɔɔ ri ruu tɔ ka nung ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42010018	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N zi sheetang watɛ nɛɛ lapa naa shala ɓɔɔ mang takoti ɓɛɛ.
42010019	Nɔɔ zirɛ n a nɔɔ naa tɔ, nɔɔ ra ka yuu sɔkɔ nɛɛ gbuuri. Nɔɔ ti ɓa zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ zang kpang yuu katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ kpaa nɔɔ naa ka bii kpang.
42010020	N'ɔɔ tãa tìnang ka ruu ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ɓaa shoo ka nyaa manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ tãa tìnang manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bee nung manɛ tɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.”
42010021	Ka laa kaɓa Yeesɔ dɔɔ Laa kati ka ruu tìnang tãanang ɓɔɔ suru Laa a wu ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N zãa mɔɔ tɔ Dada, Kpanti lapa nɛɛ tipi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ wàasɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng katɔ, mɔɔ naa tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɔngkɔ Dada, wee naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
42010022	“Daa mɛɛ a m vuu piti tɔ ka naa. A zang ɓɔɔ zi Jaa kagn gbete kpang. Daa kɔ zi wu gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zi Daa kagn gbete kpang, Jaa kɔ zi wu gbete nɛɛ shɔnzang piti ɓɔɔ Jaa kasɛ nɛɛ wu tusu wu Daa ɓɛɛ.”
42010023	A raa jìng kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nwiiri tɔɔ, “Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ.
42010024	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri zi vuu kɔ nɔɔ zi ɓee, a ri zi kpang. Ri nɛɛ ri tãa vuu kɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓee, ri ti tãa kpang.”
42010025	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zi labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa bee ɓɛɛ dɔli, seepaa nɛɛ wu gãsɛ Yeesɔ. Hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, naa n palɛ ɓu bɛ̀ɛ vi n walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ viya?”
42010026	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi, kɔɔ nɛɛ viya? Ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gãrɛ kɔɔ nɛɛ viya?”
42010027	Kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Labeenang Laa tɔɔ, ‘Zang wu kasɛ Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti zang nɛɛ yeti gbete, nɛɛ suru bii zang piti, nɛɛ kaka zang piti, nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang zang piti.’ Nɛɛ ‘Zang ti kasɛ ruu ɓeezung doo naa ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ bii zang ɓɛɛ kɔ.’”
42010028	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Palɛ veɓe kɔ, mɔɔ walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ditɔ.”
42010029	A yɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ, a hɛ̃ɛ tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi manzung wiya?”
42010030	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔgn seepaa nɛɛ gari Urushalima nɛɛ wu daa ka gari Jeriko. Daa kana a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ri nɔɔ wu ka gbalang. Ri nyɔ wu ri talɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ, ri daayi, ri yaa wu ka nɔngkɔ nung vɔrɔ gbete.
42010031	Zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa sɔɔ gbalang kaɓa a naa kpaa jìng ka wu ka tipi. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zi wu naa weɓe, kusu waala daayi.
42010032	Zang Leevi ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang ka Gãa Laa ti arɛ naa kpaa jìng ka wu. A ti kusu waala doo nɔngkɔ, daayi, yaa wu.
42010033	A yɔɔ Samariya ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ wu daa zanti sɔɔ gbalang kaɓa, arɛ naa kpaa jìng ka wu ka tipi, a gn ɓiɓɛ kɔng wu.
42010034	A daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ daa sɔɔ wu nyaa vuu waa, nwaa nung kagn, a kãng kati. A tuu wu, shing wu ka dakn seesaa ɓiɓɛ a daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka gãa ɓɔɔ zang zanti ɔ̃sɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, a gãng jìng ka wu ka nɔngkɔ.
42010035	Nɔng naa gãntɛ, a see saka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ dinari ɓɛɛ ziti, a zang gãa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Yi m zang kɔnang keɓe naa jong ka bii. Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ ningsi ka yuu ɓiɓɛ piti, n nɛɛ naa gbãayu tɔ, 'n naa sɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ mɔɔ.’”
42010036	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zi labeenang Laa dɔli kaɓa tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi ka teteng zang taati kaɓa ɓɔɔ tusu nɛɛ wukɔ ɓeezung yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ri nyɔ wu ka gbalang kaɓa wiya?”
42010037	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zi labeenang Laa dɔli kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ Samariya ɓɔɔ gn yɔɔ kɔng wu ɓɛɛ.” A Yeesɔ risi nyaa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dita mɔɔ daa palɛ jong naa yɔɔ Samariya kaɓa.”
42010038	Yeesɔ ri daa kana gbalang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ a naa hãa nyaa ka jaa gari. A jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Mata ta wu zanti ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ.
42010039	Jaanaa Mata ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Marayamu nwang ka tìng Yeesɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ.
42010040	A Mata nwaa bii ɓi nɛɛ shoonang palɛnang. A arɛ naa kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang, mɔɔ yee laa ɓaa ka ɓɔɔ jaanaa mɛɛ yàa m shoonang ka bm ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Kɔɔ wu ta nɛɛ wu yi m naa ka shoonang.”
42010041	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mata, mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ, a bii ti nwaa mɔɔ ka ruu vuu dɔli.
42010042	Vuu ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ ɓi gbete kɔ nwani. Marayamu ya ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi tɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ta kagn nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ tɔkn kpang.”
42011001	Diki ɓɔɔ kagn Yeesɔ gaa Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Hangsɛ nyaa tɔ, a zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ arɛ naa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dabang, kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu naa ɓɔɔ ruu gaa Laa jong, naa ɓɔɔ Yɔhana kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42011002	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ gaa Laa, nɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Daa ɓuru Laa, zang wu dɔɔ nung tɔ̃ɔ ɓaaɓɛ ta. Zang zirɛ nɛɛ mɔkɔ Kpanti.
42011003	A ruu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ruu shaa lɛɛkɔ jong lɛɛkɔ.
42011004	Yaa ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓuru katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ ruu yà'a zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ yaa Sheetang wu gãsɛ ruu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa kaka ɓuru katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.’”
42011005	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa zang gbete ka teteng manɛ, daa ka bii ɓeesang nɛɛ gãmbang zìi, nɛɛ wu a wu borodi jong taati,
42011006	ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓeesang ɓɔɔ a zanti shɛ̃ɛ gãa nɛɛ zìi, vuu ɓɔɔ wu a wu kpang.
42011007	Ɓeesang ɓɔɔ ka yeti jaka kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, ‘M'ɔɔ kpãa m kpang, kãntang keɓe, n ku nyaa gãa tɔ. Wujɛ mɛɛ ti rooro tɔ, n zunung ɓɔɔ n seepaa n a mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ takpang.’
42011008	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, naa seepaa a wu borodi doo ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu ɓɛɛsang kpang, seepaa ditɔ, a wu gaagaa naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu tìng ɓɔɔ yɔɔ yi ɓɛɛ.
42011009	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ gaa ta, Laa a nɔɔ katɔ. Nɔɔ kãa ta, nɔɔ ìi katɔ. Nɔɔ ti ɓaa nyaa ta, Laa kasɛ nɔɔ nyaa katɔ.
42011010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ gaayi, Laa a wu katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ kãayi, ti ìi katɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa nyaa, Laa kasɛ wu nyaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
42011011	Ɓi d'aa kiya ka teteng manɛ, naa jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ gaa jaazìi ka naa ɓiɓɛ, tuu sɔkɔ kɔ jong a wu ka nung jaazìi wiya?
42011012	Kɔ naa jaa gaa angkn, wu a jaa gbuuri wiya?
42011013	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shi kpang, nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a wujɛ manɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ka tansi Daa manɛ Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ ya? Zunung ɓɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ ri gaa wu suru tɔ̃ɔ kpang ya?”
42011014	Yeesɔ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ bii zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ, a suru shi kpang naa nwangnɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɔɔ katɔ naa rang yee kati. zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nandon ri mã naa ka danggn.
42011015	A zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ tɔɔ, nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Bahazabu, kpanti suru shi kpang a wu ɓɛɛ.
42011016	Zang ɓɔɔ ri gãsɛ wu. Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Tusu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi kagn nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ Laa shong ɓɛɛ.”
42011017	Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓi tɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓarɛ gbete ri nɛɛ basɛ yuu ɓarɛ, ri nɛɛ gaa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ, ri shaarɛ ɓarɛ kaatɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gãa gbete ri nɛɛ ti basɛ yuu ɓarɛ, ri shaarɛ kaatɔ.
42011018	Naa sheetang basɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ nwang biya? N kɔ̀'ɔ ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ n nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Bahazabu a m ɓɛɛ, ɓɛɛ.
42011019	Naa n nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Bahazabu a m, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nɔɔ, ri nwangsɛ ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ viya? Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rikɔ naa nwang zang ɓɔɔ naa jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ.
42011020	N nɛɛ nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ naa Laa, Kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa rooyi, a tɔ ka teteng manɛ.
42011021	“Zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔli nɛɛ see vuu waa ɓiɓɛ tɔ, nɛɛ gã gãa ɓiɓɛ tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ yi naa ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ ka vuu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
42011022	Zang ɓɔɔ ɓa wu kaka katɔ nɛɛ gàa nyaa nɛɛ wu, a nɛɛ ti ɓa wu kaka, sè'e vuu waa ɓɔɔ zang keɓe shing danggn kagn ɓɛɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, wu basɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɛɛ kaa nandon.
42011023	“Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ɓang ɓi nɛɛ n kpang, wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti kpalɛ zang nɛɛ n kpang, tantɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong.
42011024	“Suru shi kpang nɛɛ nwang tɔ nɛɛ bii zang. Daayi, kãarɛ nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mii kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ìi kpang, wu kɔɔ kati nɛɛ, ‘N gbãayu kaa gãa gbaala mɛɛ tɔkn.’
42011025	Nɛɛ arɛ, nɛɛ naa ìi gãa, zang kooro katɔ, a zang ti shìli vuu katɔ nyaa kiiri.
42011026	Gbãayu daa atɛ suru shi kpang ɓɔɔgn, manziti, ɓɔɔ ɓa wu shi kpang palɛnang katɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri naa nwang kaa gãa kaɓa. Nwannang zang kaɓa naa lasɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang ɓi kaatɔ.”
42011027	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔ̀'ɔ ruu doo naa, jaa soro gbete ka teteng zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ jaa soro ɓɔɔ yi mɔɔ, a ti a mɔɔ mii danggn ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42011028	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu Laa, ri shing ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ jong.”
42011029	Zang dɔli ri 'alɛ̀ kana g'n tɔkn, a Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang koo jaa knti keɓe, ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. Zang ti pàlɛ̀ ri kpang. Zang tusu ri ɓɔ̀'ɔ Yunana kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
42011030	Jaa Shɔnzang naa nwǎng zang koo jaa knti keɓe vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓi doo naa ɓɔɔ Yunana nwàng zang gari Ninivi ɓɛɛ kɔ.
42011031	Zang soro ɓɔɔ roo kpanti ka Sheeba naa seepaa ditɔ, wu dɔng zang koo jaa knti keɓe ruu, ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, a nɛɛ koolaa ɓɔɔgn kpalakpala nɛɛ wu naa tãa zũnang kpanti Sulemanu ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa kpanti Sulemanu katɔ kagn nihn.
42011032	Zang gari Ninivi naa seepaa ditɔ, ri dɔng zang koo jaa knti keɓe ruu, ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ka diki ɓɔɔ Yunana rang ri ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Yunana bannang katɔ kagn nihn.
42011033	“Zang ɓɔɔ kagn mang waa zà'ang sɔ̀ɔ, wu zuu nɛɛ gãntang kpang. Shing ɓi yuu vuu lapa kɔ jong, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri tu ka yeti gãa, ri zi nɔng kati.
42011034	Jìng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ waa zà'ang sɔɔ bii ɓaaɓɛ. Jìng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, bii ɓaaɓɛ yakɛ katɔ nandon. Jìng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, bii ɓaaɓɛ tɔ̀ɔ ɓi katɔ nandon.
42011035	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, p'al'ɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔ̀'ɔ bii ɓaaɓɛ nɛ̀'ɛ tɔɔyi ɓɛɛ.
42011036	Bii ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ yakɛ katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, naa yakɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ katɔ nandon, naa ɓɔɔ waa zà'ang sɔɔ yakɛ mɔɔ nɔng ɓɛɛ.”
42011037	Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa yee rannang tɔ, a yɔɔ Farisawa ɓaa wu nyaa kati nɛɛ wu daa shaa vuu shaanang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ. A daayi, daa nwang ka nɔng vuu shaanang ka gãa yɔɔ.
42011038	Yɔɔ Farisawa mã naa ka danggn, ka ɓɔɔ wu zirɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ sɔɔ naa ka gbongkarɛ, shaa vuu shaanang kpang ɓɛɛ.
42011039	A Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ Farisawa, nɔɔ sɔɔ dakn waka nɛɛ dakn gbanti kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, a yeti manɛ ɓi zang mulunang kɔ nɛɛ yeti lanang shɛ̃ɛning.
42011040	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shoko ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ biling, wukɔ palɛ yeti doori kpang ya?
42011041	Nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti waka manɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu manɛ piti nwang ditɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
42011042	“Jìng dannang kagn yuu manɛ Farisawa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zɔ̃ng Laa vuu gbete ka teteng vuu kopi ɓɔɔ nɔɔ walɛ naa ree zitaa nɛɛ seteng nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ ka yɔkɔ naa weɓe piti. A nɔɔ yaa ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ zang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ruu naa ɓɔɔ r'uu kasɛ Laa ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ palɛ vuu keɓe nandon, nɔɔ yaa ɓɔɔ kpang.
42011043	“Jìng dannang kagn yuu manɛ Farisawa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ nɔng nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, nɛɛ nɔɔ ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang jee nɔɔ nyaa, zang a nɔɔ bannang kagn ka kasuwa ɓɛɛ.
42011044	Jìng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang naa yuu saa, ɓɔɔ zang zi kpang, zang ra ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42011045	Zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang Labeenang Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, mɔɔ lasɛ ruu yeti katɔ kɔ doori nɛɛ vuu kɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42011046	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jìng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tusu zang Labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ìi zang vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa nyaa tuunang katɔ, nɔɔ lee naa manɛ ɓi kagn naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi zang naa tuunang kpang ɓɛɛ.
42011047	Jìng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ mãarɛ yuu sà'a zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ daa manɛ ri nyɔkɔ ɓɛɛ.
42011048	Nɔɔ kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ dabang manɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nyɔkɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, a nɔɔ mãarɛ manɛ kaa yuu sàa ɓarɛ.
42011049	Laa rang yee ka yeti zũnang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘N shong ri zang nyaa shoonang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ n shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Ri naa nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ, ri ti dang ɓɔɔ jìng.’
42011050	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang naa dǎng zang koo jaa knti keɓe kɔ jìng, ka ruu zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, doo nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Laa gaayu koo keɓe mãanang, ɓɛɛ.
42011051	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ gaayu ka bii Habila a nɛɛ mani ka bii Zakariya ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ ka teteng nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn nɛɛ Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ zang naa dang zang koo jaa knti keɓe kɔ jìng.
42011052	“Jìng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ta zang gbalang ruu Laa zinang, a nɔɔ ti dñ̀ng gbalang kaɓa kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ daanang katɔ gbalang kpang.”
42011053	Yeesɔ yaa nɔng kaɓa, a Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa ri gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang kaa nɛɛ wu nɛɛ tɔɔ gnvɔ nɛɛ shaa wu tɔ wu rang yee kaa yuu vuu dɔli. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ wu vuu ka yuu vuu gaagaa.
42011054	Ri kasɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ ri yi wu kaa yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ.
42012001	Zang ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓarɛ tɔ labang gaagaa, nɔng doo naanang kagn kpang. Ri vãlɛ kaa yuu zɔɔ. A Yeesɔ gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɔɔnang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jìng ka yisi zang Farisawa. Yisi ɓarɛ ɓi nwaarɛnang ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ.
42012002	Vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ, ɓɔɔ Laa naa nwangsɛ kpang ɓi kagn kpang.
42012003	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔlɔ katɔ, zang naa tãa ɓi ditɔ piti. Nɔɔ nɛɛ rang zang katɔ ka yeti gãa nɛɛ nwiiri zang naa kɔɔ zang nimbang ditɔ nandon.
42012004	“Masang, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ gãmpãng bii kɔ shɛ̃ɛning a ri zunung vuu ɓɔɔ palɛnang tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ knti kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
42012005	N tusu nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ katɔ. Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ Laa ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔ gãmpãng bii tɔ, zunung ɓɔɔ wu tasɛ ka waa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Nizang n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
42012006	“Zang malɛ jaaning tɔkɔsisi maani, wu kɔpɔ ziti kpang ya? Laa sùu gbete kagn teteng ɓarɛ kpang.
42012007	Nɔɔ zi kpang ya? Naa doo suuyuu ɓɔɔ ka yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ, Laa gã katɔ nandon. Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, nɔɔ ɓa tɔkɔsisi katɔ.
42012008	“N ti kɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta m ka jìng zang nɛɛ wu ɓi ɓɔɔ mɛɛ, Jaa Shɔnzang naa kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ, ka tìng zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ wu ɓi zang ɓiɓɛ kɔ nizang.
42012009	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ laa nyaa mɛɛ ka tìng zang, n naa laa nyaa ɓiɓɛ doo katɔ kɔ ka tìng zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
42012010	“Zang piti ɓɔɔ rang yee shi kpang, ka yuu Jaa Shɔnzang, Laa yaa wu gbalang katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu Suru Laa Laa yaa wu gbalang ɓi kpang.
42012011	“Zang nɛɛ atɛ nɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ zang jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa, kɔ ka bii gɔmna, kɔ bii zang bang bang ɓɔɔ ri yiti tipi ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ daa kasɛ zang nyaa, nɛɛ naa vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
42012012	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru Laa naa tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ditɔ ka laa kaɓa ɓɛɛ.”
42012013	Zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ gaagaa kaɓa, kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, kɔɔ manzung nɛɛ wu basɛ vuu vɔ ta nɛɛ n.”
42012014	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Masang, ɓu wi shing m zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, kɔ zang ɓɔɔ basɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓɛɛ wiya?”
42012015	A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nandon tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ gãng jìng, ka jìng shinnang ka vuu naa ning. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang gãsɛ suru bii shɔnzang nɛɛ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ gaagaa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42012016	A kɔɔ ri ruu kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, “Zang vuu naa ɓɔɔ kagn, lang jaa, a walɛ vuu shaanang dɔli.
42012017	A rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘N palɛ biya? Nɔng ɓɔɔ n tɛ̃ɛ vuu gbaa mɛɛ kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.’
42012018	A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N zi vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ. N jili bɔ̃nɔ mɛɛ ka tipi, n m'ãarɛ̀ ɓɔɔgn bang bang. Tɔ̀ɔ, n kpalɛ vuu gbaa mɛɛ nɛɛ vuu naa mɛɛ kagn nandon.’
42012019	Tɔ̀ɔ, n kɔɔ bii mɛɛ kati nɛɛ, ‘Mɔɔ walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ, nung saa gaagaa. Nwang ta mɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang, nɔɔ ɓoo ɓɔɔ ɓoonang, mɔɔ tãa tìnang kati’.
42012020	A Laa naa kɔɔ yɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘Shoko kiɓi, lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ zìi keɓe, mɔɔ vɔ kaatɔ. Vuu kɔ mɔɔ shĩ̀l'i ɓɛɛ, naa raa ɓu kaa ɓɔɔ wiya?’”
42012021	A Yeesɔ hangsɛ yee ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpàlɛ̀ yuu ɓarɛ vuu naa, a ka tìng Laa, vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn kpang, ri naa nwang ɓarɛ doo naa yɔɔ kɔ doori.”
42012022	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ nyɔ yuu manɛ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa shaayi, nɛɛ ruu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa ka bii ɓɛɛ kpang.
42012023	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, suru bii shɔnzang ɓa vuu shaanang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Bii shɔnzang ti ɓa fɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
42012024	Nɔɔ zi rɛɛ gãgãa karɛ. Ri lang jaa kpang, ri ti yee zee jong kpang. Gòot'o vuu tɛ̃ɛnang ɓarɛ ɓi kagn nɛɛ bɔ̃nɔ kpang. Laa a ri vuu shaanang katɔ. Nɔɔ ɓaa jaaning katɔ.
42012025	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu gisi yuu ɓiɓɛ diki katɔ ka ruu rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ ya?
42012026	A nɔɔ nɛɛ zunung vuu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng naa weɓe palɛnang kpang, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu viya?
42012027	Nɔɔ zi mangwaa ɓɔɔ ri bangkɛ ɓɛɛ karɛ. Ri palɛ wu shoonang kpang, ri ti see fɔ̃ɔrɔ kpang. Naa doo kpanti Sulemanu nɛɛ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ piti, fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shirɛ, daa doo mangwaa keɓe kpang.
42012028	Laa nɛɛ gbarɛ wusi kɔ zang zi lɛɛkɔ, ɓuru zang dɔɔ kaa nɛɛ waa ɓee, a nɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa ka bii ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang ka ruu viya?
42012029	“N'ɔɔ nyɔ yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shaayi, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓoo ɓɛɛ kpang.
42012030	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang ka koo keɓe, ri shing jìng ka vuu keɓe kɔ. Daa manɛ zi ɓi tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ veɓe katɔ.
42012031	Nɔɔ sh'ing danggn ka kpanti ɓɔɔ Laa roo ɓɛɛ kɔ jong. A nɔɔ vuu keɓe ditɔ kagn nandon.
42012032	“Wee nɔɔ rukutu ɓee, n'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, Daa manɛ kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ roo kpanti nɛɛ wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu naa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ.
42012033	Nɔɔ malɛ vuu naa manɛ ta, nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang ɓɛɛ saka. Nɔɔ kpalɛ yuu manɛ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ kpang, ka nɔng Laa. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ shaarɛ kpang, shɔngɓɔ daa ɓɔɔ kpang, tuuru ri ti daa lasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
42012034	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang shing gn ɓi doo ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kpalɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn kɔ doori ɓɛɛ.
42012035	“Nɔɔ kpalɛ bii tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ ti mang waa zà'ang sɔɔ manɛ katɔ.
42012036	Naa zang shoonang ɓɔɔ ri gã dabang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ daa ka nɔng kn sinyɛ shaanang ɓɛɛ. Naa dabang gbãayu, naa waa nyaa gãa naa gbete, ri puu wu tantɛnang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ kpalɛ bii nɔngkɔ, ka ruu diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ manɛ gbãayu ɓɛɛ.
42012037	Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang shoonang ɓɔɔ dabang ɓarɛ arɛ naa ìi ri ningkãari ɓɛɛ. N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, wukɔ naa tu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ jong, wu shing ri, ri nwang ka nɔng vuu shaanang, wu a ri vuu shaanang ri shaayi.
42012038	Zang shoonang keɓe naa tãa tìnang dɔli, naa dabang ɓarɛ a doo nɛɛ teteng gãmbang, kɔ nɛɛ yuu gãndi, naa ìi ri ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
42012039	Zi karɛ, naa zang gãa nɛ̀'ɛ zi laa ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ a ɓɛɛ katɔ, nɛ̀'ɛ yaa gãa ɓiɓɛ shɔngɓɔ wu shɛ̃ɛ kpang.
42012040	Nɔɔ kpalɛ bii nɔngkɔ doori, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Jaa Shɔnzang a ka laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing gn nɛɛ wu a kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42012041	Bituru hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Dabang, mɔɔ rang rukɔ nyaa vuu jeenang keɓe ya, kɔ mɔɔ rang zang piti?”
42012042	A kpanti kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi zang shoonang tɔ̃ɔ, a ti zũng katɔ wiya? Ɓɔɔ zang gãa ɓiɓɛ yaa wu gãa ka naa, nɛɛ wu alɛ zang vuu shaanang ka laa vuu shaanang ɓarɛ wiya?
42012043	Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang shoonang kaɓa kɔ. Zang gãa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ arɛ, nɛɛ naa ìi wu palɛ shoonang bì'i kana ɓɛɛ.
42012044	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang gãa ɓiɓɛ naa yà'a wu vuu naa ɓiɓɛ nandon, wu gãng jìng kagn.
42012045	A naa zang shoonang kaɓa kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, Diki dabang gãa mɛɛ bee tɔ, a gn kpang, a gaa tɔɔsung zang shoonang ɓɔɔ varɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ soro nyɔkɔnang. Wu ti shaa vuu shaanang, wu ti ɓoo sàa, sàa si wu.
42012046	Dabang gãa zang shoonang kaɓa, naa a ka diki ɓɔɔ zang shoonang kaɓa shing gn anang ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ naa dang wu jìng gbãnggbãng, wu daa shing wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
42012047	“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ a palɛ kpang, zang naa nyɔ wu ditɔ zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ.
42012048	Zang shoonang ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ kpang, naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ zang katɔ, zang naa nyɔ wu ɓi tɔkɔlɔng. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a wu vuu dɔli, zang naa ta ɓi doo dɔli kɔ, ka naa ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang ti yaa wu vuu dɔli, zang shing gn nɛɛ naa a zang ɓi doo dɔli kɔ.
42012049	“N a m waa dɔɔnang kɔ jong, ka koo keɓe. N kasɛ tɔ, waa bii nɛɛ shaa kana.
42012050	Jìng dannang naa ɓa m yuu naa ɓɔɔ zang hãa zang ka mii batizima ɓɛɛ.
42012051	Nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ naa n atɛ nwannang nyaa zɔɔ ka koo keɓe ya? Kpang, n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, n a m zang basɛnang kɔ jong.
42012052	Vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ lɛ̀'ɛkɔ, ka yeti gãa gbete zang nɛɛ kagn maani, ri basɛ zɔɔ. Zang taati shing jìng nɛɛ zang ziti kpang, a zang ziti ti shing jìng nɛɛ zang taati kpang.
42012053	Daa ri naa shing jìng nɛɛ wujɛ ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ kpang. A wujɛ varɛ ti shing jìng nɛɛ daa ɓarɛ kpang. Nà'a wujɛ ri naa shing jìng nɛɛ wujɛ ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ soro kpang. A wujɛ soro ri ti naa shing jìng nɛɛ nà'a ɓarɛ kpang. Shɔnkpang ɓɔɔ soro, naa shing jìng nɛɛ ɓeekpang ɓɔɔ soro kpang.”
42012054	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi sãmbong ɓɔɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ laa hãa nyaa kagn tɔ, nɔɔ tànt'ɛ kɔɔnang nɛɛ, ‘Mii naa a katɔ’ Mii ti naa a katɔ nɔngkɔ.
42012055	Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi pũngku nɛɛ waa nyaa tɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ ‘Nɔng nwannang a kaa tɔ.’ Nɔng nwannang ti a nizang.
42012056	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ nɛɛ pɛ̃ɛrɛ koo tɔ, nɛɛ lapa nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa nwang katɔ. A nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ka diki keɓe kpang ka ruu viya?
42012057	“Nɔɔ ti zi naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shɛ̃̀ɛr'ɛ yuu manɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ kpang, ka ruu viya?
42012058	Zang nɛɛ ɓàa mɔɔ nyaavaa, zang nɛɛ daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ka nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang. Kãa gbalang naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓàa mɔɔ nyaavaa ɓɛɛ ka gbalang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ka nɔng zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ruu daa tuu mɔɔ a zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri daa loo mɔɔ ka sãa ɓɛɛ.
42012059	N kɔɔ mɔɔ, mɔɔ hangsɛ nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang yee mɔɔ shunang ka gbongkarɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, zang naa yaa mɔɔ naa kati.”
42013001	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn nɔng, ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ ruu zang Galili ɓɔɔ Bilatu shingnɛ, zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ bɛɛ ri dɔɔ Laa vuu ɓɛɛ.
42013002	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Galili kaɓa, ri vɔ nɔngkɔ, vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓa ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang Galili ɓɔɔ nimbang ɓi katɔ ya?
42013003	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, wu nɔngkɔ kpang, naa nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ kpang, nɔɔ naa vɔ̀l'ɔ doo nɔngkɔ nandon.
42013004	Nɔɔ ti kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ zang kopi tu mantaati kɔ gãa beebang ɓɔɔ ka Siluwa jirɛ, nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ ɓa, ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ zang nimbang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka Urushalima katɔ ɓɛɛ ya?
42013005	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, wu nɔngkɔ kpang, naa nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang manɛ kpang nɔɔ naa vɔlɔ doo nɔngkɔ nandon.”
42013006	A Yeesɔ r'ang nyaa vuu jeenang keɓe kati tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ɓaa laa sìiri ka jaa ɓiɓɛ, a arɛ nɛɛ wu naa hãa kaa jìng laa sìiri, a ìi gbete kpang.
42013007	A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka jaa, tɔ̀ɔ, ‘Zirɛ, saa ɓɔɔ n a jaa sìiri hãnang ka laa sìiri keɓe, n ìi kpang daa lɛɛ taati. Dɔng ta ka tipi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ta nɔng waati ɓɛɛ.’
42013008	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka jaa kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, yaa ka nɔngkɔ saa gbete tɔkn ka gbongkarɛ. N gbãa doo ɓiɓɛ ditɔ, n tɛ̃ɛ vìi vuu vaa kagn.
42013009	Sãmpo nɛɛ naa ra jaa tɔ, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Nɛɛ naa ra jaa doo kpang kɔ, n naa dɔng kati.’”
42013010	Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɔɔ kagn, Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang.
42013011	A jaa soro kagn nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ saa kopi tu mantaati ɓɛɛ. Lang wu katɔ, zunung ɓɔɔ wu wisi bii ɓiɓɛ paa kpang.
42013012	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi wu, ɓaa wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa soro, kɔnang ɓaaɓɛ yaa mɔɔ nɔng tɔ.”
42013013	A shìng jaa soro naa ɓiɓɛ ka bii, a bii jaa soro shiiri kaa tantɛnang, a jaa soro dɔɔ Laa kati.
42013014	Gnvɔ shaa zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ masɛ zang kɔnang ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɛɛ. A yɔɔ zang bang rang yee, kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Diki mangbete ɓɔɔ zang palɛ shɔɔnang kagn, nɔɔ a ka diki kaɓa kɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang masɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ a ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang kpang.”
42013015	A Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ gbete kãlɛ napoo, kɔ seesaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ vàa, daa a wu mii ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang kpang ɓu wiya?
42013016	A ka ruu vi, jaa zɔ̃ng Ibirayi zang soro kɔ sheetang mã wu, saa kopi tu mantaati, zang yaa wu naa ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang kpang viya?
42013017	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ naa weɓe, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ wu kpang ɓɛɛ, nandon. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri tãa tìnang vuu ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn piti ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42013018	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa nwàng ɓu naa viya? N gãsɛ ɓu nɛɛ viya?
42013019	Nwang naa jìng masita ɓɔɔ zang tuuyi, zang ɓaa ka jaa ɓɛɛ. Wu naa bangnɛ, jaaning ri kɔng saara ka nasãng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42013020	A Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãsɛ kpanti roonang Laa ɓu nɛɛ viya?
42013021	Nwang naa yisi tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ zang soro tɛ̃ɛ ka zũng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ borodi nɛɛ mani, ɓɔɔ ka taasa gaagaa, wu puu kati ɓɛɛ.”
42013022	A Yeesɔ rang zang yee Laa ka gari bang bang nɛɛ jaa gari ɓɔɔ zang rooro ka gbalang, ka ɓɔɔ wu daa Urushalima ɓɛɛ.
42013023	A zang gbete hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, zang ɓɔɔ zang naa ta yuu ɓarɛ dɔli kpang ya?” A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ,
42013024	“Nɔɔ lakɛ yuu, nɔɔ tu yeti gãa nɛɛ nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ntɔ̃rɔng ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, zang dɔli ri naa kãa gbalang tunang, ri walɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
42013025	Zang gãa nɛɛ naa seepaa tɔ, nɛɛ ku nyaa gãa tɔ, nɔɔ naa shii ka biling, nɔɔ ɓaa nyaa, nɔɔ gàa wu nɛɛ, ‘Kpanti, puu ruu nyaa gãa.’ Naa kasɛ nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ, ‘N zi nɔɔ nung m kpang.’
42013026	Nɔɔ naa kɔɔ manɛ kaa nɛɛ, ‘Ruu shaa vuu shaanang, a ruu ti ɓoo mii nɛɛ mɔkɔ. Mɔɔ ti tusu zang vuu ka gari ɓuru kɔ.’
42013027	Naa kasɛ nyaa ɓi kaa nɛɛ, ‘N kɔɔ nɔɔ, n zi nɔɔ nung m kpang. Nɔɔ dita kaɓa nɔɔ yaa m bii, nɔɔ zang vuu shi kpang palɛnang kiɓi.’
42013028	Nɔɔ naa kaa ditɔ, ka nɔng kaɓa, nɔɔ shaa tãri kpaaka kpaaka. Nɔɔ naa zi rɛɛ Ibirayi ditɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti nɛɛ Ishaaku nɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, a zang nwangsɛ nɔɔ manɛ ka biling ɓɛɛ.
42013029	Zang naa alɛ ditɔ nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, zang shaa vuu shaanang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ.
42013030	Zang ɓɔɔ rikɔ doo knti kãntang keɓe, rikɔ naa sɔ̀'ɔ zang tìng. A zang ɓɔɔ rikɔ ka tìng, ri naa ràa zang ɓɔɔ waa nyaa knti ɓɛɛ.”
42013031	Ka laa kaɓa, zang Farisawa ri naa arɛ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Seepaa ta mɔɔ daa nɔng ɓɔɔgn, Hiridu kasɛ nɛɛ wu nyɔ mɔɔ katɔ.”
42013032	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa kɔɔ yaka jìngti kaɓa nɛɛ, ‘N nwangsɛ suru shi kpang, a n ti masɛ zang lɛɛkɔ, nɛɛ ɓuru. Lagbete n naa hangsɛ nyaa shɔɔnang mɛɛ.’
42013033	N daa m kana Urushalima lɛɛkɔ, nɛɛ ɓuru nɛɛ diki, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nyɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn kpang ɓɛɛ.
42013034	“Zang Urushalima, zang Urushalima, nɔkɔ nyɔkɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, a nɔɔ ti luku zang ɓɔɔ Laa shongko nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ nɛɛ n kpalɛ wujɛ manɛ naa ɓɔɔ nà'a kn kpalɛ jaa, zuu nasãng ɓiɓɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ti yaa m kpang.
42013035	Laa naa rà'a Gãa Laa manɛ yuu knti ditɔ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ walɛ jìng mɛɛ zinang takpang. Diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ a ka nung kpanti ɓɛɛ,’ a nɛɛ mani.”
42014001	Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɔɔgn, Yeesɔ daa vuu shaanang ka gãa zang bang Farisawa ɓɔɔ gbete, zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ri tɛ̃ɛ wu jìng ka bii selele.
42014002	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ doo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ naa pùrù katɔ, a ka bii Yeesɔ.
42014003	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang Labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang wu masɛ zang ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ya kɔ kasɛ kpang?”
42014004	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa kpang. A Yeesɔ lee yɔɔ naa ka bii, a masɛ wu kati, a jee wu nyaa nɛɛ wu dita.
42014005	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓu wi ka teteng manɛ, naa seesaa ɓiɓɛ, kɔ guu napoo ɓiɓɛ watɛ ka yeti too ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang tantɛ zɔ̃nnang kpang wiya?”
42014006	Ri ti kasɛ wu nyaa kpang.
42014007	Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang g'aar'ɛ ri, ri shɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔng nwannang ɓɔɔ zang shili ɓɛɛ, a rang ri yee keɓe kati tɔɔ,
42014008	“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ g'aarɛ̀ mɔɔ kn sinyɛ shaanang, mɔɔ nwang ka nɔng nwannang tɔ̃ɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ zi kpang naa zang gaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓa mɔɔ katɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
42014009	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ gaarɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Seepaa, mɔɔ yaa zang keɓe nɔng’ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu mɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dɔ̃sɔ ka laa nwannang ɓɔɔ ka knti ɓɛɛ.
42014010	Zang nɛɛ gaarɛ mɔɔ tɔ, daayi mɔɔ nwang ka laa ɓɔɔ ka knti ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ gaarɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ a tɔ, wukɔ kɔɔ mɔɔ kati nɛɛ, ‘Masang, seepaa mɔɔ nwang ka laa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.’ Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zang gaarɛ ri, ri zi kati nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓ'aa zang bang.
42014011	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ, zang naa sɔɔrɔ wukɔ yuu ka dii ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka dii, zang naa a wukɔ bannang jong.”
42014012	A Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gaarɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa zang nyaa vuu shaanang, m'ɔɔ ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ ɓaasang nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓaazung, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nyaa gãa manɛ gbete, ri ɓarɛ zang y'ing ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa mɔɔ ɓaa ri nyaa, ri naa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ditɔ jong.
42014013	Mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ mɔɔ a zang vuu shaanang, g'aar'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ doo shãa katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ jìng ringtang ɓɛɛ.
42014014	Laa naa a mɔɔ tìnang tãanang ditɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri naa ɓàa mɔɔ nyaa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa naa shu mɔɔ ɓi kaa diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓiɓɛ paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.”
42014015	Ɓɔɔ zang gbete ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka nɔng vuu shaanang tãa naa weɓe, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa shaa vuu shaanang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
42014016	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔ̀'ɔgn nwaa vuu shaanang gaagaa, a gaarɛ zang gaagaa.
42014017	Laa ɓɔɔ zang shaa vuu shaanang kagn a tɔ, a shong zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ wu gaarɛ ɓɛɛ ta nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ a ta, zang hangsɛ vuu shaanang tɔ’.
42014018	Zang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ g'aar'ɛ ri, ri gaa tɔɔsung yuu zɔ̃ngkɔnang gbete, gbete. Zang tìng shɔɔnang kɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang yɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘N daa zi doo nɔng jaa lannang ɓɔɔ n hoo ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ daa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ n zɔ̃ɔrɔ wu katɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ wu lasɛ kpang, n a kpang.’
42014019	A zang doo knti tɔɔ, ‘N hoo napoo jaa lannang kopi, n daa gãsɛ ri doo katɔ, mɔɔ daa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ n zɔ̃ɔrɔ wu katɔ, yeti ɓiɓɛ wu lasɛ kpang, n a kpang.’
42014020	Zang ɓɔɔ ti kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, ‘N shing soro doo nɛɛ doo, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n a kpang.’
42014021	A zang shoonang yɔɔ gbãayu daa kɔɔ wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. A gnvɔ shaa yɔɔ gãa, a kɔɔ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Dita nyaa gbalang, nɛɛ boo gãa ɓɔɔ ka gari piti, mɔɔ ɓaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kàa katɔ, nɛɛ zang jìng ringtang, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ doo shãa katɔ ɓɛɛ.’
42014022	A zang shoonang yɔɔ naa a tɔkn kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ m ɓɛɛ tɔ, nɔng ti yaa doogn.’
42014023	A yɔɔ gãa kɔɔ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ tɔkn tɔɔ, ‘Dita gbalang jaa, mɔɔ gɔ̃kɔ m zang, mɔɔ atɛ ri ka yeti gãa, tɔ̀ɔ, gãa mɛɛ wu yi nyaa kati.
42014024	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ zang gbete ɓɔɔ naa tãa vuu shaanang kagn teteng zang tìng shɔɔnang kɔ n gaarɛ ri ɓa kpang.’”
42014025	Diki ɓɔɔgn zang dɔli ri dàar'ɛ nɛɛ wu, a raa jìng kɔɔ ri tɔɔ,
42014026	“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ a ka bii mɛɛ, a kasɛ ruu mɛɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ruu diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ nɛɛ ɓeeso, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ soro nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ kpang, zunung ɓɔɔ wu nwang zang ɓɔɔ dũng m kpang.
42014027	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu dang jìng, wu naa vɔ naa ɓɔɔ n naa vɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, zunung ɓɔɔ wu dũng m kpang.
42014028	“Naa zang gbete ka teteng manɛ kasɛ tɔɔ wu mãa gãa ɓɔɔ bee ka lapa, nw'ang ka gbongkarɛ wu gã saka, wu zirɛ, naa daa naa ɓɔɔ wu hangsɛ nyaa gãa mãanang nɛɛ mani tɔ ɓɛɛ.
42014029	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa loo doo gãa a hangsɛ nyaa mãanang kpang, zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zirɛ, kpaa wu katɔ nɛɛ,
42014030	‘Yɔɔ keɓe gàa tɔɔsung gãa mãanang, hangsɛ nyaa kpang.’
42014031	Kpanti ɓɔɔ zang sĩ̀irì tanang ɓiɓɛ labang kopi nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta sìiri nɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔgn, ɓɔɔ zang sìiri tanang ɓiɓɛ labang bmati. Nwang ka gbongkarɛ, wu zirɛ wu nɛɛ zunung ɓɔɔ wu naa ta sìiri nɛɛ kpanti kaɓa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
42014032	Nɛɛ ti zi tɔ nɛɛ sìiri kaɓa naa ɓa wu yuu katɔ, shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓiɓɛ, wu shong ri, ri sũuru zɔɔ nɛɛ kpanti kaɓa bɛɛ à gn naabm kpang.
42014033	Dũnnang mɛɛ, nwang ɓi doo nɔngkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yaa vuu ɓiɓɛ piti kpang, zunung ɓɔɔ wu nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ dũng m kpang.
42014034	“Tãa ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, a lanang tãa nɛɛ takpang, zang zunung ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, wu la tɔkn takpang.
42014035	Shi ɓi takpang tingkiring. Daa naa ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ ka jaa kpang, ti daa naa ɓɔɔ zang vang ka dondong kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tãayi.”
42015001	Diki ɓɔɔgn, zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka tipi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ doori, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ, nɛɛ ri tãa yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ.
42015002	A ɓɔɔ zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Kpanti Laa, zi rɛɛ zang keɓe, ka bii Yeesɔ hn ɓɛɛ, ri gaa tɔɔsung yee gɔ̃ɔrɔnang ka naa ɓarɛ, ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe ta zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ti shaa vuu nɛɛ ri.”
42015003	A Yeesɔ rang ri yee keɓe kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ,
42015004	“Naa zang gbete ka teteng manɛ mã mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ laa maani, a ɓɔɔ gbete ningnɛ palɛ biya? Yaa ɓɔɔ laa dɛ̃ɛti tu kopi tu mandɛ̃ɛti kaɓa ka nɔngkɔ ka gbongkarɛ, wu daa kãa ɓɔɔ ning kaɓa, wu ìiyi.
42015005	Nɛɛ ìi tɔ, tãa tìnang dɔli. Tuuyi wu lu ka zã̀ngzã̀ng wu a gãa kaa nɛɛ mani.
42015006	Nɛɛ shɛ̃ɛ gãa tɔ, wu ɓaarɛ nyaa ka rɛɛ ɓeesang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri roo nyaa gãa gbete ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri naa shaa vuu shaanang, ri tãa tìnang nɛɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ìi mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ning ɓɛɛ.
42015007	A Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Zang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa tãa tìnang doo nɔngkɔ, ka ruu zang gbete ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ a kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tìnang tãanang kaɓa, ɓa ɓɔɔ zang tãa ka ruu zang laa dɛ̃ɛti tu kopi tu mandɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ katɔ.’
42015008	“Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, naa zang soro ɓɔɔgn saka ɓiɓɛ kopi, a ɓɔɔ gbete shishi, palɛ biya? Mang waa zà'ang sɔɔ, wu ya salang, wu kooro nɔng ɓɔɔ saka ɓiɓɛ shishi kagn tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, wu kãa waasɛ̃, wu ìiyi.
42015009	Nɛɛ ìi tɔ wu daa ɓaarɛ nyaa, ka rɛɛ ɓeesang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri roo zang nyaa gãa gbete, nɛɛ ri naa shaa vuu shaanang, ri tãa tìnang nɛɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ìi saka ɓiɓɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
42015010	A Yeesɔ naa hangsɛ nyaa kaa tɔɔ, ‘Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ri tãa tìnang doo nɔngkɔ, ka ruu zang gbete ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, ɓɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ a kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.’”
42015011	A Yeesɔ rang ri yee tɔkn tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔ̀'ɔgn wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ziti zang varɛ.
42015012	Diki ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ wujaa naa a ka bii daa ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Dada, a m vuu ɓɔɔ naa mɔɔ vɔrɛ zang naa a m ɓɛɛ ta’ A daa ɓarɛ tuu vuu naa ɓiɓɛ nandon, a basɛ ri.
42015013	Diki nɛɛ tɔɔ wu bee tɔkɔlɔng, ɓɔɔ wujaa naa kpalɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ nandon, a daa zanti nɛɛ mani ka koolaa ɓɔɔgn kpalakpala. Daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng tɔ a ningsi vuu ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng dũndũng palɛnang.
42015014	Ka knti ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ waa nyaa tɔ, nyɔkɔ bang naa shɛ̃ɛ ka koolaa ɓɔɔ wu daa zanti kagn ɓɛɛ. Walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shaa takpang, a gaa tɔɔsung jìng dannang kati.
42015015	A seepaa daa nwang nɛɛ zang koolaa kaɓa ɓɔɔ mã gãnya kagn ɓɛɛ. A yɔɔ shong wu nɛɛ wu daa gãng wu jìng ka gãnya.
42015016	Nyɔkɔ dang wu jìng kana, kasɛ nɛɛ wu shaa vuu ɓɔɔ gãnya ri shaa ɓɛɛ jong. A walɛ gbalang kaa takpang.
42015017	Diki bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, a shoo naa lu wu. A hɛ̃ɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Zang shoonang daa mɛɛ kagn gaagaa, ri shaa vuu shaanang ri yaa katɔ kɔ jong, n nwang ka nihn, nyɔkɔ yee m kana waati ka ruu viya?
42015018	N seepaa ditɔ, n daa ka bii daa mɛɛ n daa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, Dada, n pàlɛ̀ Laa vuu shi kpang tɔ, n ti pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ tɔɔ jong.
42015019	N daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓaa m nɛɛ jaa ɓaaɓɛ tɔkn takpang. Yiti m naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yiti zang shoonang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ’.
42015020	Hangsɛ nyaa rɛ̃rɛnang kaɓa tɔ, a seepaa yi gbalang yuu gbãanang gãa diiɓɛ. “Bɛɛ yaa gãa doo beebang, diiɓɛ zi wu tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, kɔng wu gn, a seepaa yurɛ daa kɔ̃ng wu ka gbalang kpenkpereng.
42015021	Jaa ɓiɓɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dada, n pàlɛ̀ Laa vuu shi kpang tɔ, n pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ tɔ jong. N daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓaa m nɛɛ jaa ɓaaɓɛ tɔkn takpang’.
42015022	Daa ɓiɓɛ yee laa ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ jaa ɓiɓɛ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓaa nyaa ɓi ka jaafoo ɓiɓɛ, kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ atɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ shi dɔli pati, pati nɔɔ hãa wu, n'ɔɔ ti atɛ jaa saa naa nɔɔ hãa wu, nɔɔ hãa koodoo ka doo ɓiɓɛ.
42015023	N'ɔɔ ti daa yi guu napoo mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n sang katɔ, nɔɔ yeeyi, ruu shaayi, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu tãa tìnang kati.
42015024	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jaa mɛɛ keɓe nwang naa ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ, a naa hingsi jìng tɔkn ɓɛɛ. Ning katɔ, a n naa ìi wu tɔkn ɓɛɛ’. A ri gaayu dãng sɔnang kati.
42015025	“Bɛɛ jaa zang varɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang daa ka jaa. Gbãayu kana nɛɛ jaa yaa gãa kaa naabm, a tãa soo ɓɔɔ zang gaarɛ nɛɛ dãng sɔnang ɓɔɔ shii vaa ɓɛɛ.
42015026	A ɓaa zang shoonang gbete nyaa, hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘Zang palɛ ɓu viya?’
42015027	A zang shoonang kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Jaa naaɓɛ arɛ, a daaɓɛ yee guu napoo ɓɔɔ wu sang katɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ gbãayu tɔ gãa waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ’.
42015028	Ɓɔɔ jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ dɔli, bɛ̃ɛ yeti gãa daanang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, daa ɓiɓɛ nwangnɛ naa bakɛ wu nɛɛ wu daa yeti gãa.
42015029	A kasɛ diiɓɛ nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Zirɛ, saa kɔ tɛɛrɛ ɓɛɛ nandon, n palɛ mɔɔ shoonang naa jaafoo. N ɓa nyaa ɓaaɓɛ gngn kpang. A mɔɔ a m shijaa gngn gbete nɛɛ n yeeyi ruu tãa tìnang nɛɛ rɛɛ masang kpang.
42015030	Jaa ɓaaɓɛ keɓe ɓɔɔ lasɛ vuu naa ɓaaɓɛ ka nɔng dũndũng arɛ, mɔɔ yee wu guu napoo ɓɔɔ mɔɔ sang ɓɛɛ.’
42015031	A daa ɓarɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Man jaa, mɔɔ nwang ɓaa nɛɛ n ka tipi, vuu mɛɛ keɓe piti ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.
42015032	Daa ɓɔɔ ruu shaa vuu shaanang ruu tãa tìnang tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jaa naaɓɛ keɓe nwang naa ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ a hingsi jìng tɔkn. Ning katɔ, a n ìi wu tɔkn ɓɛɛ.’”
42016001	Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bì'i ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn zang ying. Shing zang shoonang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu gãng wu jìng ka vuu naa ɓiɓɛ. A zang naa kɔɔ yɔɔ ying tɔɔ, zang shoonang kaɓa lasɛ mɔɔ vuu kana.
42016002	A yɔɔ ying ɓaa nyaa ka zang shoonang hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, ‘N tãa ɓu nyaa vi ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ viya? Bee m naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ shoonang nɛɛ vuu naa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ ta, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nwàng zang shoonang mɛɛ takpang ɓɛɛ.’
42016003	A zang shoonang hɛ̃ɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Wee yɔɔ gãa mɛɛ ta shoonang ɓɔɔ ka naa mɛɛ tɔ, n palɛ ɓu kaa biya? Kaka mɛɛ ti daa ɓɔ̀'ɔ jaa lannang takpang. Yusɛ̃ɛ ti tuu m vuu gaanang katɔ.
42016004	Yɔɔ gãa mɛɛ nɛɛ hing m tɔ, n zi vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri ta m ka gãa ɓarɛ tɔ.’
42016005	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓaa nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ ri talɛ nyaa kɔpɔ ka naa yɔɔ gãa ɓiɓɛ gbete gbete. A hɛ̃ɛ zang tìng shɔɔnang tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ ta nyaa kɔpɔ vi ka naa yɔɔ gãa mɛɛ viya?’
42016006	A zang keɓe kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘N ta nung zà'ang laa maani.’ A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Labeenang ɓaaɓɛ keɓe, nwang ta tipi pati pati, mɔɔ bee laa ziti tu kopi.’
42016007	A ti hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ doo knti tɔɔ, ‘mɔɔ ta ɓaa viya?’ Zang doo knti kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘N ta zee poo laa maani.’ A kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Labeenang ɓaaɓɛ keɓe, bee ta laa dɛ̃ɛti.’
42016008	“A yɔɔ gãa dɔɔ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ kpang keɓe, ka ruu zũnang ɓiɓɛ. Zũnang zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka vuu koo keɓe, ɓa ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka vuu Laa katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zunung naa ɓɔɔ ri sɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ doo naa rikɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42016009	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ “N kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ yiki wusang nɛɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ vuu naa manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɛɛ naa waa nyaa tɔ, zang naa ta nɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa nwang dondong ɓɛɛ.
42016010	Zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, sh'ing jìng ɓi doo nɔngkɔ ka ɓɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shi kpang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, ti palɛ doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ.
42016011	Naa nɔɔ shing jìng ka vuu naa ɓɔɔ koo keɓe tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, ɓu wi yà'a nɔɔ vuu naa ɓɔ̀'ɔ Suru Laa ka naa wiya?
42016012	Naa nɔɔ ti yee laa ka vuu zang kpang, ɓu wi a nɔɔ ɓɔɔ manɛ wiya?
42016013	“Zang shoonang ɓɔɔgn shŏng zang gãa ziti kpang. Kàs'ɛ ruu zang gbete, wu yaa ɓɔɔ gbete. Wu ti shing jìng ka ɓɔɔ gbete, wu yaa ɓɔɔ gbete. Zang ɓakɛ Laa dũnnang ɓi nɛɛ vuu koo keɓe kãanang kpang.”
42016014	Zang Farisawa ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔrɔ nandon naa weɓe, ri ɓàa wu zaa ka bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kasɛ saka dɔli ɓɛɛ.
42016015	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ t'usù yuu manɛ waati ka nɔng zang nɛɛ nɔɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ, Laa zi yeti manɛ ɓi tɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang zirɛ, nɛɛ ɓi vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ ka jìng Laa ɓi vuu baabi.
42016016	“labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa piti, zang palɛ shoonang nɛɛ wukɔ, a nɛɛ mani ka yuu Yɔhana ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ. Zang gaayu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti roonang Laa kɔɔnang doo nɛɛ diki Yɔhana kɔ. Zang ɓu ti ìi ɓi yuu, tɔ̀ɔ, wu shɛ̃ɛyi.
42016017	Lapa nɛɛ tipi ri naa waa nyaa ditɔ nandon tantɛnang, a vuu tɔkɔlɔng gbete ɓɔɔ naa shàar'ɛ waati ka teteng nyaa dannang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi ɓi kpang.
42016018	“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ hing soro ɓiɓɛ, a gee ɓɔɔgn, palɛ ɓi dũndũng. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti gee zang soro ɓɔɔ seepaa nɛɛ gãa varɛ ɓiɓɛ, ti palɛ ɓi doo dũndũng kɔ.
42016019	“Zang ying ɓɔɔ kagn, hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔli, a ti tãa ɓi tìnang diki diki.
42016020	A zang ɓɔɔgn, ɓi zang ying kpang, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Liyazaru, bii ɓiɓɛ nɔɔrɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Zang 'atɛ̀ wu diki diki ka nyaa gãa zang ying kaɓa,
42016021	nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu walɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ yaarɛ knti ɓɛɛ wu shaayi. Zaa ti arɛ ri lɛɛtɛ nyaa nɔɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ.
42016022	“Zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ying kpang kaɓa naa vɔrɛ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ri naa tuu suru bii ɓiɓɛ ri daa shing wu ka kagn Ibirayi. A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ying ti naa vɔrɛ, zang gbãa wu.
42016023	A suru ɓiɓɛ daa ka yeti waa. Dang jìng kana, a tuu jìng ka lapa zi Liyazaru nwang tɔ ka kagn Ibirayi nɛɛ nɔng beebang.
42016024	A ɓaa nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Dada Ibirayi, gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong. Shong Liyazaru wu hãa yuu paa saa naa ka mii wu sɔ̃sɔ m ka nyaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, waa tɔ̃ɔrɔ m shoo kana ɓɛɛ.’
42016025	“A Ibirayi kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Man jaa, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ doo ka koo mɔɔ walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, Liyazaru walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang. Kãntang keɓe Liyazaru tãa ɓi kaa tìnang ka nihn, mɔɔ ti dang ɓaa kaa jìng.
42016026	Naa doo nɔngkɔ kpang, rang bang kagn teteng ɓuru, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ seepaa nɛɛ nihn, nɛ̀'ɛ daa ka dang manɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ ti seepaa nɛɛ dang manɛ, a ka bii ɓuru ɓɛɛ.’
42016027	A yɔɔ kasɛ Ibirayi nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Dada, n zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ, shong Liyazaru jong ka gãa daa mɛɛ.
42016028	Jaanaa mɛɛ zang varɛ kagn maani, wu daa shaarɛ ri nyaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nɛ̀'ɛ a jong ka nɔng jìng dannang keɓe ɓɛɛ.’
42016029	“Ibirayi kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Labeenang ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri beeyi kagn. Ri ti ɓaa shoo ka labeenang ɓarɛ.’
42016030	Yɔɔ ti kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, ‘Kpang, dada Ibirayi, naa zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ, yupaa nɛɛ sàa, daa ka bii ɓarɛ, ri yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang katɔ, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ.’
42016031	A Ibirayi kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Naa ri ɓaa shoo ka labeenang rɛɛ Musa nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa kpang, naa zang ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ seepaa doori, ri ɓaa shoo doo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang kɔ.’”
42017001	Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang, zang palɛ vuu shi kpang a ɓi ditɔ kɔ nwani. Jìng dannang kagn yuu zang ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe a nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
42017002	Daa ɓɔɔ zang mã wu ree bang ka turu, zang tasɛ wu ka yeti mii waapo tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ wu nɛɛ shing jaa gbete ka teteng wujɛ seseere keɓe, wu palɛ shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
42017003	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn. “Ɓaazung nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang, mangkɛ wu katɔ. Nɛɛ yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang tɔ, nɛɛ kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ, mɔɔ ti yaa wu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
42017004	Nɛɛ palɛ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang dakn manziti ka diki gbete, a naa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Yaa m gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ n pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ katɔ. N kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ,’ mɔɔ yaa wu gbalang katɔ.”
42017005	Zang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yi ruu naa jong bii ruu shing danggn ka bì'i Laa gbãnggbãng.”
42017006	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa, nɛɛ nwang naa jìng masita, nɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ kɔɔ laa zulung bang keɓe katɔ nɛɛ, ‘Ruu ta nɛɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ daa shɔ bii ɓaaɓɛ ka yeti mii waapo’ ti palɛ katɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
42017007	“Naa zang gbete ka teteng manɛ, zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ lang jaa, kɔ gã mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, a nɛɛ jìngti, kɔɔ wu katɔ nɛɛ wu tantɛ daanang, wu daa nwang ka nɔng vuu shaanang, wu shaa vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ya?
42017008	Kɔɔ wu kpang. Kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, ‘Nwaa m vuu shaanang ta, mɔɔ ti kpalɛ bii tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ shìli m vuu shaanang ka yuu teeburu mɔɔ gã m, n shaa ka gbongkarɛ, mɔɔ see gbanti, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ naa shaa ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ kati.’
42017009	Zãa zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ya?
42017010	Nɔɔ manɛ doo nɔngkɔ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ nandon, nɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Rùu ɓuru zang shoonang waati. Ruu daa naa ɓɔɔ zang zãa ruu kpang. Ruu palɛ ɓuru shoonang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.’”
42017011	Yeesɔ daa kana Urushalima, a sɔɔ kaa nɛɛ nyaa ɓalɛ ɓɔɔ basɛ tipi Samariya nɛɛ tipi Galili ɓɛɛ.
42017012	T'ɔɔ, wu hãa nyaa kaa jaa gari, zang kopi ɓɔɔ vuu bii shaa ri katɔ, ri ɓee wu yuu kati. Ri shiiri nɛɛ nɔng beebang,
42017013	ri ɓaa wu nyaa nabm nɛɛ, “Kpanti Yeesɔ, gn ɓuru wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
42017014	Yeesɔ zi ri, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita, nɔɔ daa tùsù zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa bii manɛ.” Vuu bii ɓɔɔ shaa ri, yàa ri bii kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓɛɛ.
42017015	Ɓɔɔ zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ, zi naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ masɛ wu, gbãayu dɔɔ Laa kana nabm.
42017016	A naa tang ka tìng Yeesɔ, a zãa wu. Yɔɔ keɓe ɓi zang tipi Samariya.
42017017	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛyi t'ɔɔ, “N masɛ wu shɔnzang kopi kpang ya? Zang mandɛ̃ɛti ɓarɛ kaa kiya?
42017018	Ka ruu vi, ɓi mɔkɔ zang zanti keɓe, mɔɔ gbãayu shɛ̃ɛning mɔɔ naa zãa Laa viya?”
42017019	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ yɔɔ tɔɔ, “Seepaa ta mɔɔ daayi. Danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii Laa masɛ mɔɔ tɔ.”
42017020	Diki ɓɔɔgn zang Farisawa ɓɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ ruu anang diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang Laa, a ɓi naa ɓɔɔ zang zi nɛɛ jìng ɓɛɛ kpang.
42017021	Zang kɔɔ ɓi kpang nɛɛ, ‘Diki bii keɓe nɛɛ diki kaɓa kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa roo Kpanti ɓi kana ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ.’”
42017022	A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Diki a doo naa, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa kasɛ kagn nɛɛ, nɔɔ zi diki gbete ka teteng diki ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n naa roo kpanti kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ naa zi kpang.
42017023	Zang ti naa nwaarɛ nɔɔ ditɔ nɛɛ, ‘Jaa Shɔnzang ka kaaɓa a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ Jaa Shɔnzang keɓe’ Nɔɔ daa kpang. Nɔɔ dũng knti ɓarɛ kpang.
42017024	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, anang Jaa Shɔnzang naa nwang naa shala ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ, tɛɛ ka lapa, yakɛ dìiri gbayi gbayi ɓɛɛ.
42017025	Jaa Shɔnzang naa dang jìng ditɔ dɔli ka gbongkarɛ. Zang koo jaa knti keɓe ri bɛ̃ɛ wu, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu keɓe ri naa palɛ kati.
42017026	Diki Jaa Shɔnzang naa nwang doo naa diki Nuhu kɔ.
42017027	Zang shaa vuu, zang ti ɓooro vuu, zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro ri geere zɔɔ sasak diki ɓɔɔ Nuhu naa shɛ̃ɛ ka yeti Laana a nɛɛ mani. A mii bang naa arɛ, ningsi ri nandon.
42017028	Zang palɛ doo nɔngkɔ, ka diki Lootu. Zang shaa vuu, zang ɓoo vuu, zang hooro vuu, zang ti malɛ vuu. Zang ɓàar'ɛ vuu, zang ti mãarɛ gãa.
42017029	Diki ɓɔɔ Lootu naa nwangnɛ, yaa gari Sɔɔdɔm a nɛɛ mani. A tari ɓɔɔ waa kɔlɔ ka bì'i ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ lapa, ningsi ri nandon.
42017030	Naa nw'ang doo nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Jaa Shɔnzang nwang nyaa ɓɛɛ.
42017031	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ka yuu sãa lapa, ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ ka yeti gãa, wu shooro kpang nɛɛ wu daa tuu vuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ka dalɛ, wu ti gbãayu gãa takpang.
42017032	Nɔɔ kpaa danggn soro Lootu karɛ.
42017033	Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, wukɔ lò'o yuu ɓiɓɛ jong. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ loo yuu ɓiɓɛ, wukɔ ta yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi jong.
42017034	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, ka diki kaɓa nɛɛ zìi, zang ziti ri roo ka latãng gbete. Zang tuu zang gbete, zang yaa zang gbete.
42017035	Zang soro ziti ri nang vuu ka ree nɛɛ zɔɔ, zang tuu zang gbete, zang yaa zang gbete.”
42017036	Zang varɛ ziti ri ka dalɛ, zang tuu gbete, zang yaa gbete.
42017037	A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ka niya Kpanti?” Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔng ɓɔɔ vuu vɔ kagn, jãa kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔngkɔ.”
42018001	A Yeesɔ rang zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nyaa vuu jeenang keɓe, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu tusu ri kati nɛɛ ri gaa Laa diki diki, ri yaa gn naa kpang.
42018002	Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɔɔ kagn gari ɓɔɔ. Kaa vɔrɔ Laa kpang, ti a zang bannang ɓi jong kpang.
42018003	A Suvɔ ɓɔɔ ti doo kagn gari kaɓa kɔ. Alɛ ka bii ɓiɓɛ diki diki, gaa wu nɛɛ, ‘Ta m jong nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ n kpang ɓɛɛ.’
42018004	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kaɓa, ti yee laa ɓi ka wu kpang. A yɔɔ bì'i naa rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ knti tɔɔ, ‘N zi tɔ, n kaa vɔrɔ Laa kpang, n ti a shɔnzang bannang m kpang.
42018005	Jaa soro keɓe gboro m tɔ nɛɛ alɛnang ɓiɓɛ. Naa n jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu kpang, naa atɛ m leenang ka bii nɛɛ alɛnang ɓiɓɛ.’”
42018006	A Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang shi kpang kaɓa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
42018007	A Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ, ɓɔɔ ri shàl'ɛ nyaa ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zìi, ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓi kpang ya? Yi ri naa ka bii tantɛnang kpang ya?
42018008	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, tantɛ ri naa yinang ka bii katɔ. Naa ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n naa arɛ, n naa ìi zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Laa kagn ka koo keɓe ya?”
42018009	A ti kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing gn t'ɔ, ri ɓarɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, ri kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔgn ɓarɛ kpang, ruu keɓe kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang.
42018010	Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ziti ɓɔɔgn, ri daa Laa gaanang ka Gãa Laa. Zang gbete ɓi zang Farisi, a zang gbete ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi ɓɛɛ.
42018011	Yɔɔ Farisi seepaa gaa Laa, a kɔɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Laa n zãa mɔɔ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n nwang m naa zang ɓɔɔ nimbang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, nɛɛ zang dũndũng kpang. N m ti naa zang ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi kaɓa kpang ɓɛɛ.
42018012	N seng nyaalaa diki ziti ka teteng diki manziti. Ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ n walɛ nandon diki diki, n basɛ tìng kopi, 'n a mɔɔ tìng gbete.’
42018013	A zang ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi shii ɓi nɛɛ nɔng beebang, kasɛ nɛɛ wu wisi jìng paa kpang tingkiring. A nyɔ naa ka danggn, nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. A gàa Laa tɔɔ, ‘Gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong Laa, n m zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.’
42018014	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi keɓe gbãayu daa gãa ɓiɓɛ, Laa yaa wu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ tɔ, wu n'aa yɔɔ Farisi kaɓa kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tusu nɛɛ wu ɓa zang piti, zang naa sɔɔrɔ wukɔ yuu jong ka dii. Zang ɓɔɔ sɔɔrɔ yuu ka dii, zang naa a wukɔ bannang jong.”
42018015	Zang atɛ Yeesɔ wujɛ seseere kana, nɛɛ wu shing ri naa ka yuu, wu gaa ri Laa. A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri mangkɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri atɛ wujɛ ɓɛɛ.
42018016	A Yeesɔ ɓaa ri nyaa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yaa wujɛ ka nɔngkɔ, ri a ka bii mɛɛ. Nɔɔ hing ri kpang. Kpanti roonang Laa ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ.
42018017	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta Laa nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti ɓiɓɛ naa jaa tɔkɔlɔng kpang, nwang zang Laa kpang.”
42018018	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang zang Yahudawa hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, naa n palɛ bɛ̀'ɛ, 'n walɛ suru ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang viya?”
42018019	A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓ'aa m ka ruu vi nɛɛ maalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ viya? Zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kagn gbete kpang, ɓi Laa kɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbete.
42018020	Mɔɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ tɔ, Laa dang nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ palɛ dũndũng kpang, mɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang, mɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang vuu kpang, mɔɔ ta zang nyaa nɛɛ sè'e kpang, a rɛɛ daaɓɛ nɛɛ naaɓɛ bannang katɔ.’”
42018021	A yɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N gaayu nyaa dannang keɓe dũnnang bɛɛ n doo jasang.”
42018022	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa naa weɓe, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yàa mɔɔ kaa vuu gbete. Malɛ vuu ɓaaɓɛ nandon, mɔɔ basɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang ɓɛɛ saka. Tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ arɛ mɔɔ dũng knti mɛɛ. Mɔɔ naa walɛ vuu naa ditɔ ka lapa.”
42018023	Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ying tãa naa weɓe, bii tantɛ wu vɔnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu naa ɓiɓɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
42018024	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ bii vɔ wu naa weɓe, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Laa tanang wu nwang kpanti zang, kpãa zang ying dɔli.
42018025	Laa tanang wu nwang kpanti zang kpãa zang ying, ɓa ɓɔɔ vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ rakumi ɓu nɛɛ yeng shɔng fɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ.”
42018026	Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔyi, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “A zang ɓɔɔ walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang wi gbete wiya?”
42018027	A Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa shɔnzang katɔ, kpãa Laa palɛnang ɓi kpang.”
42018028	A Bituru kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “A wee ruu yaa gãa ɓuru nandon, ruu dũng mɔɔ ɓee?”
42018029	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ yaa gãa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang varɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeedaa nɛɛ ɓeenaa, a ɓɔɔ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu Kpanti roonang Laa,
42018030	naa walɛ vuu keɓe ditɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ɓɛɛ gaagaa ka koo keɓe. Wu ti naa nwang nɛɛ Laa dondong ka koo ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ.”
42018031	Yeesɔ gɔ̃ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu ziti dang gbete, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, ruu daa kana Urushalima, vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri bee ka yuu mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang, daa nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ ri bee ɓɛɛ.
42018032	Zang daa tuu m kaa tɔ, zang a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri kpaa m, ri palɛ m vuu yusɛ̃ɛ. Ri ti tùlù m sisãa ka bii.
42018033	Ri ti nyɔ m nɛɛ gbãa, tɔ̀ɔ, ri nyɔ m vɔrɔ kati. N naa seepaa nɛɛ sàa, ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ.”
42018034	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri zi dìiri vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ gbete kpang. Hã̀a ri kɔɔnang katɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, kpang.
42018035	Ri a tɔ ka Jeriko naabm, a zang ɓɔɔ jìng ringtang ɓɔɔ gaa vuu, nwang ka nyaa gbalang.
42018036	Tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dɔli ri haayi, a hɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɔɔ zang haa nyaa ɓɛɛ kati.
42018037	Zang kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara tɛɛyi.”
42018038	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ tãa naa weɓe, sãa nyaa ka lapa nabm tɔɔ, “Yeesɔ Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda, gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
42018039	A zang ɓɔɔ ri ka tìng, mangkɛ wu. Ri tɔɔ wu vɔ nyaa ta. Ti sãa nyaa ɓi kaa nabm kɔ jong nɛɛ, “Jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda gn mɛɛ wu kɔng mɔɔ jong.”
42018040	A Yeesɔ shiiyi, kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang wu atɛ wu yɔɔ jìng ringtang bì'i ta. Zang jìng ringtang a tɔ naabm, a Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ,
42018041	“Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ viya?” Kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang puu m jìng jong, n zi nɔng.”
42018042	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Jìng ɓaaɓɛ wu puu ta. Danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ, masɛ mɔɔ tɔ.”
42018043	A jìng ɓiɓɛ tantɛ puunang, a d'ũng Yeesɔ ka knti, dɔ̀'ɔ Laa kana. Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng, ri zi veɓe, ri dɔɔ Laa kaa jong.
42019001	Yeesɔ naa a ka Jeriko, tɛɛ kana ka yeti gari.
42019002	A yɔɔ zang bang zang saka tipi tanang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ying, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Zaka kagn nɔngkɔ.
42019003	Zaka kasɛ nɛɛ wu zi Yeesɔ katɔ, walɛ gbalang kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ketere, a zang ti shang dɔli ɓɛɛ.
42019004	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Zaka yuu ka tìng, daa vang ka laa zulung ɓɔɔ ka nyaa gbalang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ naa tɛɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
42019005	Yeesɔ naa a tɔ ka doo laa ɓɔɔ Zaka vang kagn, a tuu jìng ka lapa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zaka, shooro ta tipi pati. N daa roo lɛɛ ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ kɔɔ.”
42019006	Zaka tantɛ ka shooronang ka tipi, daa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka gãa, a wu laa nwannang. Tãa tìnang dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ a ka gãa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
42019007	Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ, ri gaa tɔɔsung yee gɔ̃ɔrɔnang kaa nandon tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe daa roo lɛɛ ka gãa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang.”
42019008	A Zaka shii paa, kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Dabang, n basɛ vuu naa mɛɛ nɔng ziti, n tuu nɔng gbete n basɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ shaa wu vuu kagn, n sɔɔrɔ wu vuu ɓɔɔ n shaa ɓɛɛ tìng dɛ̃ɛti.”
42019009	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ Zaka tɔɔ, “Lɛɛkɔ Laa ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa keɓe tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ ɓaa doo jaa Ibirayi kɔ ɓɛɛ.
42019010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n Jaa Shɔnzang n arɛ nɛɛ n naa kãa zang ɓɔɔ ri ning gbalang katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n ta yuu ɓarɛ kati ɓɛɛ.”
42019011	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu kaɓa tɔ, Yeesɔ rang ri yee ɓɔɔ kaa nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ ri yaa Urushalima kaa naabm ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ Kpanti roonang Laa nw'ang nyaa katɔ tantɛnang.
42019012	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn zang bang, daayi nɛɛ zang daa yi wu kpanti ka koolaa ɓɔɔgn kpalakpala. Nɛɛ tɔɔ, wu gbãayu gãa ɓiɓɛ kati.
42019013	Ɓɔɔ wu daa gn kpang, a ɓaa nyaa ka zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ kopi, a ri pãng gbete gbete, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ walɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔgn nɛɛ mani ka yuu weɓe, n gbãayu nɛɛ mani.’
42019014	A zang tipi ɓiɓɛ ri kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri shong zang nyaa shoonang ka knti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ daa yi yɔɔ kpanti nɛɛ, ‘Ruu kasɛ yɔɔ keɓe wu nwang kpanti ɓuru kpang.’
42019015	Zang daa yi yɔɔ kpanti ɓiri, a gbãayu. Naa shong zang ka bii zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ wu a ri saka ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu tãa naa saka ɓɔɔ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ri walɛ ka yuu ɓɔɔ wu a ri ɓɛɛ.
42019016	A zang shɔɔnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ gaayu anang shɔɔnang, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, n walɛ saka ɓɔɔgn tɔ, kopi ka yuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m ɓɛɛ’.
42019017	Dabang gãa ɓarɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, mɔɔ zang shoonang tɔ̃ɔ. Mɔɔ shing jìng ka vuu tɔkɔlɔng tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n a mɔɔ gari bang bang kopi mɔɔ yiti.’
42019018	A zang shoonang dabang ɓɔɔ ɓang knti zang keɓe, naa arɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, n walɛ saka ɓɔɔgn tɔ maani ka yuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m ɓɛɛ.’
42019019	A ti kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘M'ɔɔ yiti gari bang bang maani.’
42019020	A zang shoonang ɓɔɔ ti naa arɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, saka ɓaaɓɛ keɓe. Bɛɛ n mung m ka sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ n shingnɛ.
42019021	N kaa vɔrɔ ɓaaɓɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ kpãa nyaa ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ tuu vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti yee vuu ɓaa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ ɓaa kpang ɓɛɛ.’
42019022	A dabang gãa ɓarɛ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ zang shoonang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ, n dɔng mɔɔ ruu doo nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓaaɓɛ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ n kpãa nyaa katɔ, n tuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu ɓɔɔ mɛɛ kpang, n ti yee vuu m ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nkɔ ɓaayi kpang ɓɛɛ.
42019023	Mɔɔ shing m saka mɛɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shìli saka kagn kpang ka ruu viya? Wee n arɛ, n nɛɛ walɛ ɓɔɔgn, ɓɔɔ zang gisi m ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang ya?’
42019024	A dabang gãa ɓarɛ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔng tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ ta saka ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ ta, nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ, wàlɛ̀ p'ãng kopi ɓɛɛ.’
42019025	A zang ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Dabang, saka kagn naa ɓiɓɛ pãng kopi’.
42019026	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ kagn, zang naa gisi wukɔ vuu ɓɔɔgn ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkn. Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓiɓɛ ka naa kpang, ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ tɔkɔlɔng, zang naa ta ditɔ.
42019027	Ɓɔɔ zang kɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ n kpang, nɛɛ n roo kpanti ka yuu ɓarɛ kpang ɓee, nɔɔ atɛ ri ta ka tìng mɛɛ, nɔɔ nyɔ ri vɔrɔ.”
42019028	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a sɔ̀ɔ ri tìng Urushalima daanang kati.
42019029	Yaa gari Betafaji nɛɛ Batinya, ɓɔɔ ri ka kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zeetung, kaa naabm, a shong zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti.
42019030	Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita jaa gari kɔ ka tìng dang ɓa. Nɔɔ nɛɛ tu kaa yeti gari, nɔɔ daa zi jaa seesaa ɓɔɔ zang vang gngn kpang, zang mã ka nyaa gãa. Nɔɔ kãlɛ nɔɔ a nɛɛ mani.
42019031	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ ‘Nɔɔ kã̀l'ɛ ka ruu viya?’ Nɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ ‘Dabang ɓuru kasɛ katɔ.’”
42019032	A zang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shong ri, ri daayi ri daa ìi naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
42019033	R'i kã̀l'ɛ jaa seesaa bì'i doo naa, a zang ɓiɓɛ naa arɛ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kãlɛ jaa seesaa ka ruu viya?”
42019034	A ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dabang ɓuru kasɛ katɔ.”
42019035	A ri atɛ Yeesɔ jaa seesaa bì'i kati. Ri luku fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka dakn jaa seesaa, a ri shing Yeesɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
42019036	Jaa seesaa daa kana nɛɛ Yeesɔ, ri ti wɔɔrɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ kana gbalang.
42019037	Yeesɔ a tɔ naabm nɛɛ Urushalima, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ gbalang soo nyaa nɛɛ kɔpɔ Zeetung ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu nandon ri gaa tɔɔsung Laa dɔ̀ɔnang. Ri tãa tìnang, ri ti shii nyaa ka lapa gaagaa, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ ri zi nɛɛ jìng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
42019038	Ri kɔɔrɔ kana nɛɛ, “Laa wu a Kpanti ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ nung Kpanti Laa tìnang tãanang. Nwannang ka nyaa zɔɔ kagn lapa. Zang wu ti dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kpalakpala ɓɛɛ ta.”
42019039	A zang Farisawa ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang nimbang kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, mangkɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, nɛɛ ri vɔ̃ nyaa ta.”
42019040	“A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, naa zang keɓe ri vɔ̃ nyaa doori, tari kɔ ka tipi ɓɛɛ, ri dɔɔ m ditɔ.”
42019041	Yeesɔ a tɔ, yaa Urushalima kaa naabm, naa zi gari, a wɔsɔ miiri.
42019042	Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu gbete ɓɔɔ atɛ nwannang ka nyaa zɔɔ katɔ, wukɔ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ. A zang waasɛ nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ zi kaa takpang.
42019043	Diki ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang, ri kiiri nɔɔ nyaa ka teteng a kana. Ri naa nɔɔ nɔɔ, ri a ka yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti.
42019044	Ri ningsi nɔɔ nɛɛ wujɛ manɛ ka yeti gari manɛ kɔ, nɔɔ mã̀ayi nɔɔ ɓèe nyaa ka zɔɔ nandon ɓee. Ri naa yaa tari gbete wu pãng ka yuu zɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi laa ɓɔɔ Laa arɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42019045	A Yeesɔ naa daa ka Gãa Laa, gaa tɔɔsung zang ɓɔɔ ri malɛ vuu kagn hingkinang kati.
42019046	Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔɔ, ‘Gãa keɓe ɓi gãa Laa gaanang’. A nɔɔ raayi nwang nɔɔ manɛ kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.”
42019047	Tusu zang vuu kaa nɔngkɔ diki, diki. A rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔli, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang gari, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ katɔ.
42019048	A ri walɛ gbalang kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ri ɓaa shoo, ri tãa yee ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ yee gbete wu ɓa ri kpang.
42020001	Diki ɓɔɔgn Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu, a ti kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka Gãa Laa, a rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔli ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang, ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
42020002	A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ “Kɔɔ ruu jong, wi a mɔɔ naa, a mɔɔ palɛ vuu kɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ wiya?”
42020003	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, n kaa ɓi, n hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu jong gbete.
42020004	Nɔɔ kɔɔ m jong, “Batizima ɓɔɔ Yɔhana palɛ zang ɓɛɛ, ɓu wi a wu naa wiya, Laa ya, kɔ shɔnzang?”
42020005	A ri laa zɔɔ nyaa ka naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ “Ruu nɛɛ kɔɔ nɛɛ batizima Yɔhana, Laa a wu naa. Hɛ̃ɛ ruu nɛɛ ‘a ka ruu vi nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yɔhana kpang viya?’
42020006	Ruu nɛɛ ti kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘shɔnzang a wu naa’, zang kɔ nihn ɓee, nandon ri luku ruu katɔ nɛɛ tari ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ bɛɛ Yɔhana ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ.”
42020007	A ri kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, ri zi zang ɓɔɔ a Yɔhana naa batizima palɛnang kpang.
42020008	A Yeesɔ ti kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “N ti kɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ a m naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ mani kpang.”
42020009	A kɔɔ zang ruu keɓe nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔgn lang jaa, a ɓaa laa inabi kagn, a yàa zang ɓɔɔ langkɛ jaa, a daa zanti ka nɔng beebang, daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ diki bee wu.
42020010	Ka ɓɔɔ là'a jaa inabi hãnang arɛ, shong zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri lang wu jaa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang shoonang wu daa ta wu jaa inabi ka naa ɓarɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri lang wu jaa, ri nyɔ zang shoonang keɓe zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ, ri sɔɔrɔ wu naa waati.
42020011	Shong zang shoonang ɓɔɔgn tɔkn. Zang ɓɔɔ ri lang wu jaa, ri nyɔ zang shoonang keɓe ri palɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ, ri sɔɔrɔ wu naa waati doo nɔngkɔ.
42020012	A shong zang shoonang ɓɔɔ tɔkn kaa dakn taati. Ri shing zang shoonang bì'i nyaa vuu waa ka bii. Ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti jaa.
42020013	A zang jaa tɔɔ, ‘N palɛ kaa biya? N shong kaa jaa gbete ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ kasɛ, ri naa ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kɔ.’
42020014	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu yàa ri jaa, ri zi jaa ɓiɓɛ bii hn, ri tɔng zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ, jaa ɓɔɔ naa shaa vuu vɔ daa ɓiɓɛ kɔ a kana ɓa. Nɔɔ arɛ ruu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, tɔɔ jaa keɓe naa nwang kaa ɓɔɔ ɓuru.
42020015	A ɓɔɔ jaa naa a ka yeti jaa, ri yi wu, ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti jaa, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka nyaa jaa biling, a ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka nɔngkɔ. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ka yeti manɛ, zang jaa keɓe nɛɛ a tɔ, naa palɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa ri jaa keɓe viya?
42020016	Naa nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa jaa keɓe nandon, wu yaa rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔgn jaa bii zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu keɓe ri tɔɔ, wu zãa vuu keɓe nwannang nɔngkɔ katɔ.”
42020017	A pɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ruu Laa keɓe kɔɔrɔ ɓu nɛɛ viya? Ruu Laa ɓɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘Tari ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ mãa gãa ri bɛ̃ɛyi wukɔ naa raa tari ɓɔɔ yiti gãa ɓɛɛ kati’
42020018	Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ watɛ ka yuu tari keɓe kakɛ katɔ. Tari kɔ nɛɛ watɛ ka yuu shɔnzang, nang wu dɔ̃ɔ gbete yerek.”
42020019	Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔli, nɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu keɓe, nɛɛ ri yi Yeesɔ kaa tɔ tantɛnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka yuu ɓarɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri yi wu kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɛɛ.
