42020020	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri yi wu ɓɛɛ. Ri shongko zang ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ bii naa ri zang tɔ̃ɔ, ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ rang yee shi kpang tɔ, ri yi wu, ri a gɔmna ɓɔɔ zang Rooma shing ɓɛɛ.
42020021	A zang keɓe ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ “Maalang ruu zi tɔ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔyi, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tusu piti tɔ̃ɔ. Mɔɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓaa kpang. Mɔɔ t'usù ruu Laa ɓaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
42020022	Kɔɔ ruu jong, daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu shu kpanti Kayisa saka tipi katɔ ya, kɔ ruu shu kpang?”
42020023	Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ bì'i tɔ, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ,
42020024	“Nɔɔ atɛ m dinari karɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri atɛ tɔ, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, zang shing waa nyaating, nɛɛ nung wi kagn wiya?” A ri kasɛ wu nɛɛ, “Ɓɔ̀'ɔ Kpanti Kayisa.”
42020025	A kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ a Kayisa vuu ɓɔɔ ɓɔ̀'ɔ Kayisa ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ti a Laa vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ.”
42020026	A ri zunung naa ɓɔɔ ri yi wu nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu keɓe kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ ri nyaa waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. A ri vɔ̃ nyaa kati. Ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
42020027	Rɛɛ zang Sadukiyawa ri kasɛ ɓarɛ kpang nɛɛ zang kɔɔ yi nɛɛ zang nɛɛ vɔ tɔ, zang yupaa tɔkn kpang, ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
42020028	Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang. Musa bee rùu ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Laa tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ vɔrɛ naa yi jaa kagn kpang, ɓeezung wu sɔɔrɔ soro ɓiɓɛ wu yi wu jaa.
42020029	Wujɛ varɛ ɓɔɔ kagn jaanaa zɔɔ, ri manziti. Ɓɔɔ bang gaayu gee soro a vɔrɛ, bɛɛ yi jaa gn kpang.
42020030	Zang ɓɔɔ ɓang wu sɔɔrɔ soro keɓe, a ti vɔrɛ yi jaa doo kpang kɔ.
42020031	Ɓɔɔ ɓang zang keɓe ti sɔɔrɔ soro keɓe tɔkn. Ri palɛ nɔngkɔ, ri manziti nandon, a ri ti vɔlɔ ri yi jaa kpang kɔ nandon.
42020032	Kaa nɛɛ knti jaa soro bì'i naa vɔ jong.
42020033	Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ, jaa soro keɓe naa nwang ɓɔɔ wiya ka teteng ɓarɛ wiya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing soro keɓe katɔ, ri manziti nandon ɓɛɛ.”
42020034	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang koo keɓe ri gee soro, zang ti a ri wujɛ soro ri shìli.
42020035	A rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Laa zirɛ nɛɛ ri daa naa ɓɔɔ wu wisi ri paa katɔ, ri daa nɔng ɓɔɔ wu roo kpanti ɓɛɛ, ri gee soro ɓarɛ jong kpang. Zang ti a wujɛ soro jong, zang gee ri kpang.
42020036	Ri ti vɔ ɓarɛ takpang dondong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa naa zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓarɛ kaa wujɛ Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang wisi ri paa tɔ nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
42020037	Ka ruu zang paa wisinang nɛɛ sàa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ, Musa kɔɔ tɔ, ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ nɔngkɔ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bèe ruu waa ɓɔɔ shaa jaa laa bɛbɛtɛ ɓɛɛ. Musa ɓàa Laa nɛɛ, ‘Là'a Ibirayi, Là'a Ishaaku, nɛɛ Là'a Yakubu’ ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang keɓe ri doo ningkãari.
42020038	Laa ɓi Là'a zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi Là'a zang ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti nwang ningkãari ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42020039	Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi labeenang Laa dɔli ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka nɔng, ri tɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ rang nyaa tɔ tɔ̃ɔ maalang.”
42020040	Zang Sadukiyawa ɓasi, ri hɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɔɔ takpang.
42020041	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ ka ruu vi, nɛɛ Kirisi jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda viya?
42020042	Dawuda nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ bee ka yeti labeenang Zabura tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti Laa kɔɔ kpanti mɛɛ nɛɛ, nwang ka nakn mɛɛ,
42020043	n raa zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang ditɔ m'ɔɔ naa ri nɛɛ doo.’
42020044	Dawuda nɛɛ ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kpanti, a palɛ ka biya, naa nwang jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda tɔkn wiya?”
42020045	A Yeesɔ raa nyaa ka bii rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔ ri naa ɓɔɔ zang piti tãa ɓɛɛ.
42020046	Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ waasɛ̃. Ri kasɛ rakɛnang nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru, a ri ti kasɛ nyaa jeenang ka luumang. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang a ri nɔng nwannang bang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ yuu, zang shaa vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ.
42020047	Ri mulu suvɔ, ri talɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ nandon. Ri ti kasɛ Laa gaanang sasak nɛɛ zang zi ri kati. Laa naa dang ri jìng ɓa ɓɔɔ zang piti.”
42021001	Yeesɔ tuu jìng, a zi zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn, ri looro saka ɓɔɔ ri a Laa ka yeti nɔng ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ saka ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ.
42021002	A ti zi suvɔ ɓɔɔ vuu naa kpang, loo saka tɔkɔlɔng ɓiɓɛ jong.
42021003	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, vuu ɓɔɔ suvɔ kaɓa loo ɓɛɛ, ɓa ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang piti katɔ.
42021004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang keɓe ri nwangsɛ saka ɓarɛ ka yeti vuu naa ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ, ri a Laa. Suvɔ ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ kpang keɓe, atɛ ɓi vuu naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu walɛ vuu shaanang nɛɛ mani kɔ nwani nandon.”
42021005	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri rang yee ka yuu Gãa Laa, naa ɓɔɔ zang gbarɛ nɛɛ tari tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang a Laa nɛɛ zang gbarɛ Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
42021006	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Gãa Laa kɔ nɔɔ zi, nɛɛ vuu kɔ zang gbarɛ bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓee, diki a ditɔ ɓɔɔ zang naa jili Gãa keɓe, zang yaa tari gbete ɓɔɔ p'ãng ka yuu zɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42021007	A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang, zang naa palɛ vuu keɓe gn vi nɔngkɔ viya? Ɓu vi naa tusu ruu nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe naa palɛ kagn a tɔ viya?”
42021008	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gãng jìng waasɛ̃ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nwaarɛ nɔɔ. Zang dɔli a ditɔ nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, ri naa kɔɔyi nɛɛ rikɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ. A ri ti kɔɔ nɛɛ diki a naabm tɔ. Nɔɔ dñ̀ng ri kpang.
42021009	Nɔɔ nɛɛ tãayi zang nɛɛ kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ zang takɛ sìiri, nɛɛ zang ti palɛ nyaa, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Vuu keɓe kɔ ri gaayu shɔɔnang. Nɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa a tɔ naabm kpang.”
42021010	Ti kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Zang koolaa ɓɔɔgn ri naa ta sìiri nɛɛ zang koolaa ɓɔɔgn. Kpanti ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔgn ri ti naa ta sìiri.
42021011	Tipi naa ruutu ka nɔng piti piti. Nyɔkɔ nɛɛ kɔnang ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng naa nwang nyaa nɛɛ nɔng piti piti. Vuu vɔrɔ kaanang nɛɛ vuu bii bannang naa nwang bii ka lapa.
42021012	Ɓɔɔ diki keɓe à gn kpang, zang yi nɔɔ zang ti dang nɔɔ jìng. Zang a nɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, zang wu loo nɔɔ ka sãa. Zang daa nɛɛ nɔɔ ka bii kpanti, nɛɛ bii gɔmna, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ r'ang yee mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
42021013	Nɔɔ walɛ manɛ kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
42021014	Nɔɔ t'ɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang,
42021015	ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n a nɔɔ yee nɛɛ zũnang naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu manɛ kpang ri zunung naa ɓɔɔ ri laa nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
42021016	Naa doo rɛɛ daa manɛ nɛɛ nà'a manɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓaazung, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ ɓaasang ri naa nyɔ yuu manɛ ditɔ. A zang ti nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ ka teteng manɛ.
42021017	Zang piti ri kasɛ ruu manɛ kpang, ka ruu mɛɛ.
42021018	A vuu ɓɔɔ lee suuyuu manɛ gbete naa bii kpang.
42021019	Nɔɔ nɛɛ mã danggn tɔ kagn nɔɔ ta yuu manɛ katɔ.
42021020	“Nɔɔ nɛɛ zirɛ zang sìiri tanang nɛɛ kiiri gari Urushalima nyaa tɔ ka teteng, nɔɔ zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ zang jili wu kagn a tɔ naabm.
42021021	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudiya, ri yurɛ, ri waa ka yuu kɔpɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti gari Urushalima ri nwangnɛ ri yaa nɔng. A zang ɓɔɔ ri ka dalɛ ri hãa nyaa tɔ̀'ɔ ka yeti gari kpang.
42021022	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki kaɓa ɓi diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa dang zang jìng ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wu nwang kaa nɔngkɔ nizang.
42021023	Ka diki kaɓa, zang soro ɓɔɔ ri tuu jaa ka yeti nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri jaa ka naa, ri nwang vuu gn kɔnang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang koo keɓe ri naa dang jìng dɔli, a yeti ti naa lasɛ Laa nɛɛ ri dɔli ɓɛɛ.
42021024	Zang nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ nɛɛ yere bang. Zang ti yiki ɓɔɔ ka nyaa sìiri, zang daa nɛɛ ri, ka koo piti piti. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri naa jili gari Urushalima. Ri nwang nɔngkɔ sasak, diki ɓɔɔ Laa ka ri waa nyaa nɛɛ mani.
42021025	“Nɔɔ naa zi vuu ka laa, nɛɛ shala nɛɛ sang ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Zang koolaa ka bm bm ri naa kaa vɔrɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mii waapo kaarɛ nyaa a ti see varɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
42021026	Shɔnzang ri naa kaa vɔrɔ dɔli, nung vɔrɔ gbete, ka ruu jìng dannang ɓɔɔ a ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa, vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, zang naa zìiti ri katɔ.
42021027	Tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi Jaa Shɔnzang kati, ka ɓɔɔ wu a nɛɛ lapa ka yeti sãmbong ɓɛɛ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang, a ɓɔɔ bannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
42021028	Vuu keɓe nɛɛ gaayu palɛnang tɔ, nɔɔ tuu jìng ka lapa, nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu manɛ kagn, a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42021029	A kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe, nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ laa sìiri nɛɛ laa nimbang nandon.
42021030	Ri nɛɛ gaayu gɔpɔ shɔɔ lusunang tɔ, nɔɔ zi katɔ nɛɛ nɔng guusi a naabm tɔ.
42021031	Doo nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu keɓe nɛɛ gaayu palɛnang nɛɛ, nɔɔ zi kati, nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti kagn a naabm tɔ.
42021032	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, vuu keɓe palɛ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang koo jaa knti keɓe ri vɔlɔ kati nandon.
42021033	Lapa nɛɛ tipi naa shaarɛ ditɔ, a ruu mɛɛ shaarɛ ɓi kpang dondong.
42021034	“Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ nɛɛ kpiti nɛɛ vuu shaanang nɛɛ vuu ɓoonang. Rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki kaɓa nɛɛ arɛ, bɛɛ nɔɔ shing danggn kpang, naa ɓɔɔ saka ta yɔpɔ ɓɛɛ.
42021035	Diki kaɓa naa a ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka koo keɓe nandon.
42021036	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, nɔɔ gaa Laa diki diki, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ walɛ kaka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã danggn jìng dannang ɓɔɔ a ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ naa shii ka tìng mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ɓɛɛ.”
42021037	Nɛɛ nɔng laagɛ̃, Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɔng zìi nɛɛ a tɔ wu yaa yeti gari, wu daa kaa kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zeetung ɓɛɛ, wu daa roo ka nɔngkɔ.
42021038	Nɔng nɛɛ ti gãntɛ tɔ, zang ti kpalɛ zɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa, nɛɛ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ.
42022001	Ka ɓɔɔ diki nyaalaa borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ pasika a naabm tɔ.
42022002	Rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ nɛɛ nwiiri ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɛɛ.
42022003	A Sheetang naa nwaarɛ Yahuda ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Isikariyoti, ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
42022004	A Yahuda daa tɔng zɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang bang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ wu nyɔ ri yuu Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
42022005	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri tãa tìnang dɔli, a ri mã zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ ri a wu saka.
42022006	A kasɛ ri nyaa, a kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ wu nyɔ ri yuu Yeesɔ bɛɛ zang ka nɔng kpang ɓɛɛ.
42022007	Diki nyaalaa pasika ɓɔɔ zang shaa borodi ɓɔɔ yisi kagn kpang, ɓɔɔ zang yele mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ kagn ɓɛɛ naa arɛ.
42022008	Yeesɔ shɔng rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ daayi, nɔɔ daa shìli ruu vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ ruu naa shaa ɓɛɛ.”
42022009	A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Ruu daa shìli ka niya?”
42022010	Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ hãa nyaa tɔ, ka yeti gari, nɔɔ daa ɓee yuu nɛɛ zang varɛ, tuu mii ka bɛng. Nɔng dũng wu, nɔɔ hãa nyaa nɛɛ wu ka gãa ɓɔɔ wu hãa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
42022011	Nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ dabang gãa kaɓa nɛɛ, ‘Maalang, tɔɔ jaka ɓɔɔ wu naa shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ kagn, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bì'i ɓiɓɛ kiya?’
42022012	Tusu nɔɔ naa ka jaka ka gãa lapa, shìli vuu tɔ ka nɔng piti. Nɔɔ shìli vuu shaanang bì'i ka nɔngkɔ.”
42022013	A ri daayi, ri daa ìi naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ, a ri shìli vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
42022014	Ka ɓɔɔ laa vuu shaanang nyaalaa bì'i naa raa bii. Yeesɔ daa nwang ka nɔng vuu shaanang, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri naa nwang kaa jong.
42022015	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Bii shaa m tɔ gbãnggbãng nɛɛ diki keɓe wu arɛ. N shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa keɓe nɛɛ nɔɔ nɔng gbete tɔɔ zang naa dang m jìng kati.
42022016	N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ, n shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa keɓe ɓɔɔ takpang. N naa shaa ka ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ zang naa shaa kaa ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.”
42022017	A tuu juwa, zãa Laa, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ ta juwa keɓe ta, nɔɔ ɓooro nɛɛ zɔɔ.
42022018	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, n ɓoo mii inabi ɓɔɔ takpang, diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti kagn nɛɛ a tɔ, n naa ɓooyi.”
42022019	A tuu borodi zãa Laa, a sharɛ, a a ri, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Wee bii mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n a zang, zang nyɔ vɔrɔ ka ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe diki diki nɔɔ kpaa danggn mɛɛ kaa nɛɛ mani.”
42022020	Ɓɔɔ ri hangsɛ vuu shaanang, a tuu juwa ɓɔɔ mii inabi kagn naa ɓaasi ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Juwa keɓe ɓi nyaa shɔɔ ɓɔɔ Laa a ɓɛɛ. Nyaa shɔɔ keɓe, ɓi zìi mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n naa tɛ̃ɛ ka ruu manɛ kɔ mãrɛ.
42022021	“Nɔɔ zi karɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu mɛɛ kagn nɛɛ n, ka nɔng kɔ ruu shaa vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ.
42022022	Jaa Shɔnzang vɔ ɓi katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ naa nwang ɓɛɛ, a jìng dannang ɓi kagn yuu zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
42022023	A ri gaayu zɔɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛnang ka naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ, ɓu wi naa palɛ vuu keɓe wiya?
42022024	A ri ti gaayu nyaa laanang nɛɛ zɔɔ, ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
42022025	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri roo kpanti ka yuu zang ɓarɛ nandon. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
42022026	Ɓɔɔ manɛ ɓi nɔngkɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ bang ka teteng manɛ, wukɔ wu nw'ang naa zang wujaa ɓɔɔ shong nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
42022027	Zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka tipi, zang a wu vuu shaanang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ a wu vuu shaanang, wi bang wiya? Wu zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka tipi, zang a wu vuu shaanang kɔ bang kpang ya? Wee n ka teteng manɛ ɓee, nkɔ shong nɔɔ jong.
42022028	“Nɔɔ y'aa m ka ɓɔɔ n dang jìng kpang.
42022029	Naa ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ a m naa, nɛɛ n nwang kpanti, n a nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ doori.
42022030	Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ naa shaa vuu shaanang, nɔɔ ti ɓoo nɛɛ n ka nɔng vuu shaanang mɛɛ ka ɓɔɔ n naa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ. N ti shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang zɔ̃ng Isirela ɓɔɔ kopi tu ziti ruu.
42022031	“Siman, ɓaa shoo, zang a Sheetang naa tɔ, nɛɛ wu gãsɛ nɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, wu yaa zang shi kpang, naa ɓɔɔ zang hãlɛ zee ɓɛɛ.
42022032	Siman, n gàa mɔɔ Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ yaa danggn shinnang ka n ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ a tɔ ka bii mɛɛ tɔkn, m'ɔɔ yi rɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mantɛ vuu nɛɛ ri ka bì'i mɛɛ ɓɛɛ naa ka bii, ri shing danggn waasɛ̃.”
42022033	Siman kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Dabang n kasɛ tɔ, n daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ka sãa ruu vɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ.”
42022034	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Bituru, n kɔɔ mɔɔ, lɛ̀'ɛkɔ keɓe, mɔɔ laa nyaa nɛɛ mɔɔ zi m nung kpang dakn taati ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, kn wu ɓaa nyaa.”
42022035	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ n shong nɔɔ, nɔɔ tuu duku saka nɛɛ duku ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti tɛ̃ɛ vuu kagn ka naa kpang, nɔɔ ti hãa koodoo kpang ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔgn nɔɔ walɛ kpang ya?” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “Kpang.”
42022036	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe, zang ɓɔɔ duku saka ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu tuu ka naa ning, nɛɛ duku ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ vuu kagn piti. A zang ɓɔɔ yere bang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn kpang, wu malɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ wu hooyi.
42022037	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘A zang ɓakɛ wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta nyaa dannang ɓɛɛ.’ nwang ditɔ nizang ka yuu mɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ nw'ang kana nizang ɓɛɛ.”
42022038	A ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Zirɛ Dabang, yere bang kɔ ziti ka naa ɓuru ɓee.” A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Daa tɔ nɔngkɔ.” Ruu rang nɔɔ yee keɓe tɔkn kpang.
42022039	A nwang nɛɛ yeti gari daa ka yuu kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zeetung naa ɓɔɔ wu daarɛ diki diki ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri dũng wu ka knti.
42022040	A ɓɔɔ shɛ̃ɛ nɔng bì'i, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gaa Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ gãsɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42022041	A yaa ri daa kaa nɔng ɓɔɔgn, naabm, tang nɛɛ gutu ka nɔngkɔ, a gaa Laa kati nɛɛ,
42022042	“Daa mɛɛ, mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, kɔsɔ m jìng dannang keɓe jong. Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.”
42022043	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a mã wu danggn kati.
42022044	Rɛ̃rɛnang jìng dannang keɓe, shing wu, gaa Laa kaa gbãnggbãng nɛɛ gn ɓiɓɛ gbete. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yaanang sɔ̃lɔ nɛɛ nyaating ɓiɓɛ, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zìi sɔ̃lɔ.
42022045	“Yupaa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ wu gaa Laa ɓɛɛ, a ka bii rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a ìi ri, hingro yiki ri tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
42022046	Hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ roo ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ yupaa, nɔɔ gàa Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ gãsɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.’”
42022047	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ rang yee doo ka nyaa zang dɔli nwang nyaa. Zang gbete ka teteng rɛɛ zang kopi tu ziti, ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yahuda ɓɛɛ, wukɔ sɔɔ ri tìng. A ka bii Yeesɔ naabm nɛɛ wu kɔ̃ng wu katɔ.
42022048	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Yahuda, mɔɔ a zang Jaa Shɔnzang nɛɛ kɔ̃nang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ̃ng m ɓɛɛ ya?”
42022049	A ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nimbang ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang keɓe ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Dabang ruu ku ri ta nɛɛ yere bang ya?”
42022050	Zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ ku jaafoo kpanti rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ yere bang, wɔng wu shoo nakn ka tipi.
42022051	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “N'ɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe takpang.” A lee shoo yɔɔ nɛɛ naa, a màs'ɛ yɔɔ shoo.
42022052	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ kɔ nɔngkɔ nɛɛ yere bang, a ɓɔɔ labasaa mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ n zang ɓɔɔ shing zang nɛɛ ri haa nyaa ya?”
42022053	N nw'ang nɛɛ nɔɔ diki diki ka yeti Gãa Laa, nɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ yi m kpang. Lɛɛkɔ là'a manɛ kɔ arɛ, nɛɛ là'a zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nɔng tìiri ɓɛɛ.
42022054	Zang yi wu, zang daa nɛɛ wu, zang atɛ wu ka gãa kpanti rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Bituru dũng ri ka knti katara.
42022055	Zang dɔɔ waa ka dàbang, a ri nwang ka nyaa waa ka nɔngkɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ. Bituru naa sɔ̃ jong ka teteng ɓarɛ.
42022056	Jaa zang soro ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang ka gãa kaɓa, zi wu ka nyaa waa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu sɔ̃ ɓɛɛ. Jaa bii pɛ̃ɛrɛ wu, a tɔɔ, “Zang keɓe bɛɛ doo nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ doori.”
42022057	A Bituru laa nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa soro, n zi zang keɓe m kpang.”
42022058	Ɓɔɔ zang nwang naa gbete hn, zang varɛ ɓɔɔ zi wu, a kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ doo zang ɓarɛ kɔ.” Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Jèe, n wu zang ɓarɛ kpang.”
42022059	Ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ zang wu nwangnɛ knti wu bee tɔkɔlɔng, zang ɓɔɔgn yi tìng tɔɔ, “N suu sè'e kpang, yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ wu ning, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yɔɔ keɓe doo zang tipi Galili kɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42022060	A Bituru kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Jèe, n zi vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ keɓe m kpang.” Bɛɛ rang yee doo naa nyaa, kn ɓaa nyaa.
42022061	A Kpanti Yeesɔ raa jìng pɛ̃ɛrɛ Bituru. A Bituru kpaa danggn yee Yeesɔ naa ɓɔɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ kn ɓaa nyaa lɛɛkɔ, mɔɔ laa nyaa mɛɛ dakn taati.”
42022062	A nwang ka biling, kaa zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ.
42022063	Zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng ka wu, ri kpaa wu, ri ti nyɔkɔ wu.
42022064	Ri mã wu jìng nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ, a ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu ta, wi nyɔ mɔɔ wiya?”
42022065	Ri ràngkɛ̀ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ dɔli, ri ti dãlɛ wu.
42022066	Nɔng naa gantɛ tɔ, a rɛɛ zang bang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a zang atɛ Yeesɔ kati.
42022067	A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ “Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Kirisi mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu.” A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ kpang.
42022068	Naa n ti hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu, nɔɔ kasɛ m nyaa kpang.
42022069	Vuu ɓɔɔ yi nɛɛ lɛɛkɔ keɓe, Jaa Shɔnzang nwang ɓi kaa nakn Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ palɛ vuu piti ɓɛɛ.”
42022070	A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ mɔkɔ Jaa Laa ya?” A kasɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, “Nn, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42022071	A ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ruu kàsɛ̀, ruu tãa vi tɔkn ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ viya? Ruu tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ nɛɛ shoo ɓuru.”
42023001	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ yuu, ri yupaa nandon, ri atɛ wu ka bii Gɔmna Bilatu.
42023002	Ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ wu ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Ruu ìi zang keɓe nwaarɛ zang ɓuru, nɛɛ zang wu shù Kayisa kpanti tipi Rooma saka tipi kpang. Nɛɛ wukɔ ti Kirisi, nɛɛ wu doo kpanti kɔ.”
42023003	A Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ kpanti zang Yahudawa ya?” A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42023004	A Bilatu kɔɔ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri dũng ri ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ, “N zi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.”
42023005	A ri yì wu tìng ka bii nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe palɛ zang nɛɛ zang ri haa nyaa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu zang ɓɛɛ ka tipi Yahudiya. Gaayu ka tipi Galili sasak, a nɔng ka nihn.”
42023006	Ɓɔɔ Bilatu tãa naa weɓe, hɛ̃ɛ zang nɛɛ Yeesɔ zang tipi Galili ya?
42023007	A ɓɔɔ wu tãayi nɛɛ, Yeesɔ zang tipi Galili ɓɔɔ Hiridu roo kpanti kagn ɓɛɛ, a dɔ̃ wu ka bì'i kpanti Hiridu ɓɔɔ bɛ̀'ɛ ka Urushalima ka diki kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
42023008	Ɓɔɔ Hiridu zi Yeesɔ hn tãa tìnang dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tãa nyaa ɓiɓɛ tɔ. A kasɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu zi Yeesɔ katɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.
42023009	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, hɛ̃ɛlɛ wu ruu sasak, a Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa kpang.
42023010	Rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa, ri shi paa ri kɔɔrɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ kaa gbãnggbãng.
42023011	A kpanti Hiridu nɛɛ zang sɔɔja ɓiɓɛ, ri palɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ, a ri kpaa wu. A ri hãa wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ kpanti ri hãlɛ ɓɛɛ ka bii. A kpanti Hiridu sɔɔrɔ wu ka bii kpanti Bilatu.
42023012	Hiridu nɛɛ Bilatu ri gaayu wusang yinang ka diki keɓe. Bɛɛ ri shing jìng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang.
42023013	Bilatu ɓaa nyaa tɔkn ka zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri doo zang bang zang kɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɛɛ.
42023014	A kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ atɛ m yɔɔ keɓe, nɔɔ tɔɔ palɛ zang, nɛɛ zang haa nyaa. Ɓɔɔ n hɛ̃ɛlɛ wu ka tìng manɛ, n ìi wu nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ gbete kpang.
42023015	Kpanti Hiridu ti ìi wu nɛɛ mani kpang jong. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, gbãa ruu yuu nɛɛ wu tɔkn. Vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kagn kpang.
42023016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, n yaa wu naa.”
42023017	Ḍiki nyaalaa Pasika nɛɛ a tɔ, Bilatu yàar'ɛ ri zang gbete naa ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ka sãa ɓɛɛ.]
42023018	Ri goo nyaa ka lapa dɔ̃ɔ, gbete nɛɛ, “Nyɔ yɔɔ keɓe vɔrɔ, mɔɔ yàa ruu Baraba naa.”
42023019	(Zang loo Baraba ka sãa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ haa nyaa ka gari, a zang nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.)
42023020	Bilatu kasɛ nɛɛ wu yaa Yeesɔ naa katɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rang yee tɔkn nɛɛ zang, a gaa ri.
42023021	A ri goo nyaa tɔkn nabm nɛɛ, “Ɓaa wu naa ka laa, ɓaa wu naa ka laa.”
42023022	Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn, daa kaa nyaa taati nɛɛ, “Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ viya? N ìi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kpang. N nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, n yaa wu naa.”
42023023	A ri yi tìng kana, ri haa nyaa nabm nɛɛ, zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa. Nyaa ɓɔɔ ri haa ɓɛɛ naa shaa tìng.
42023024	A Bilatu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang pàlɛ̀ ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ ta.
42023025	A yaa ri zang ɓɔɔ zang loo ka sãa ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang haa nyaa ka gari, a zang nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ naa. A a ri Yeesɔ nɛɛ ri palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
42023026	Ka ɓɔɔ ri daa kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri daa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, ri kpisi yuu nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Siman, yɔɔ gari Kiranɛ, nɛɛ wu daa kaa gari. Ri yi wu, ri shing wu, nɛɛ wu tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang daa ɓaa Yeesɔ naa kagn ɓɛɛ, wu dũng Yeesɔ ka knti.
42023027	Ka teteng zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ ka knti, zang soro kagn ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyaavɔ ri ti ɓaarɛ nyaavaa.
42023028	A Yeesɔ raa jìng kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Zang soro gari Urushalima, n'ɔɔ kaa nyaavɔ, ka ruu mɛɛ kpang, nɔɔ kaa ka ruu yuu manɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ manɛ.
42023029	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki a kana ɓɔɔ zang naa kɔɔyi nɛɛ tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri shii katɔ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri tuu jaa gngn kpang, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ jaa mãa m'ii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
42023030	Wee diki ɓɔɔ zang naa kɔ̀'ɔ kɔpɔ kagn nɛɛ, ‘Ji jong ka yuu ɓuru.’ Zang ti kɔ̀'ɔ jaa kɔpɔ nɛɛ ‘Waasɛ ruu jong’ ɓɛɛ.
42023031	Zang nɛɛ palɛ m vuu keɓe ɓɔɔ n nwang naa laa bɛbɛtɛ, zang naa palɛ nɔɔ ɓi kaa biya, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang naa laa waatɛnang ɓɛɛ?”
42023032	Zang kagn ziti, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ, zang yi ri jong nɛɛ zang daa nyɔ ri vɔrɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
42023033	A ɓɔɔ ri a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ zɔ̃ɔpi ɓɛɛ, ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa, ka nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe. Ɓɔɔ gbete ka nakn, a ɓɔɔ gbete ka nagang ɓiɓɛ.
42023034	A Yeesɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Daa mɛɛ, yaa ri gbalang vuu keɓe katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ kpang ɓee.” Ri sh'aa laa ka naa ɓɔɔ ri basɛ rɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
42023035	Zang ri shii nɛɛ dalɛ, ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ, a rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri kpaa wu tɔɔ, “Ta yuu zang, wu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ lɛɛ ta jong, wukɔ nɛɛ Kirisi Jaa Laa ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
42023036	Zang sɔɔja ri kpaa wu, ri arɛ ri a wu mii inabi ɓɔɔ gbang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
42023037	Ri tɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ ta mɔkɔ nɛɛ Kpanti zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ.”
42023038	Zang bee vuu, zang ɓaa ka yuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa kagn, ka yupaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Wee kɔ Kpanti zang Yahudawa.”
42023039	Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ziti ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri naa nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ gbete rang wu yee shi kpang tɔɔ, “Wu mɔkɔ Kirisi kpang ya? Ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ ta mɔɔ ta ruu jong.”
42023040	Ɓɔɔ gbete mangkɛ ɓeesang tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ Laa kpang ya? Mɔɔ zi kpang mɔɔ vɔ vɔrɔ gbete nɛɛ wu kpang ya?
42023041	Vɔrɔ ɓuru ɓi ti waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu vɔ ɓuru ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ keɓe palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn kpang.”
42023042	A raa nyaa kɔɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ a tɔ ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa roo Kpanti, danggn mɛɛ wu ning mɔɔ kpang.”
42023043	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nizang n kɔɔ mɔɔ, lɛɛkɔ mɔɔ nwang nɛɛ n ka Paradayisi, nɔng ɓɔɔ tìnang waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42023044	Ɓɔɔ laa kaa dalɛ yuu, nɔng tɔɔ ka tipi kaɓa nandon sasak, saka taati ɓɔɔ laarang palɛ nɛɛ mani.
42023045	A fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa Gãa Laa basɛ ziti, gaayu nɛɛ paa daa lɔɔsɔ dii.
42023046	Yeesɔ kaa nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Daa mɛɛ, n a mɔɔ Suru bii mɛɛ tɔ ka naa ɓaaɓɛ.” Kɔɔ naa weɓe, a vɔrɛ.
42023047	Ɓɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ daa nɛɛ Yeesɔ zi naa weɓe, dɔɔ Laa tɔɔ, “Nizang yɔɔ keɓe, palɛ vuu shi kpang, kagn kpang.”
42023048	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ yuu ka nɔng, nɛɛ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu p'al'ɛ hn, ri gbãayu ka gãa ɓarɛ nɛɛ yeti lasɛnang. Ri waa naa ka danggn.
42023049	Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Yeesɔ nung tɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri zi Yeesɔ nung tɔ kɔ doori, ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu nɛɛ Galili ɓɛɛ, ri shii nɛɛ dalɛ, ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.
42023050	Zang ɓɔɔgn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yusufu, yɔɔ gari zang Yahudiya ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Arimataya ɓɛɛ. Ka gn teteng zang bang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ ri jɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ ruu ɓɛɛ. A ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang dɔli ɓɛɛ.
42023051	Kasɛ nyaa ɓi kagn ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri mã zɔɔ nyaa, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Gã ɓi diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo Kpanti ɓɛɛ.
42023052	Daa ka bii Bilatu, a gaa wu nɛɛ, wu a wu vɔrɔ Yeesɔ.
42023053	A witi vɔrɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ lapa, leng wu nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang leng vɔrɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Daa wɔɔ wu ka sàa ɓɔɔ zang ɓee ka yeti tari, ɓɔɔ zang gbãa vɔrɔ gngn doo gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.
42023054	Bɛɛ kaa diki ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ bii ka ruu diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɛɛ.
42023055	Zang soro ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ nɛɛ tipi Galili ri daa nɛɛ Yusufu, ri daa zi saa bì'i kati nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang wɔɔ vɔrɔ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
42023056	Ri gbãayu ka gãa, ri daa palɛ nung, ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ nung ɓɔɔ zang tũuru vɔrɔ ka bii ɓɛɛ. Ri ɔ̃sɔ ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
42024001	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ gbete, ka knti diki ɔ̃sɔnang. Nɛɛ gãndi zãngzãng, rɛɛ zang soro keɓe ri daa ka yuu sàa, ri tuu nung ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ka naa ning.
42024002	Ri daa ìiyi, zang dɔ̃ tari tɔ nɛɛ nyaa sàa.
42024003	Ri tu ka yeti sàa, a ri ìi vɔrɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ tɔ̀ɔ nɔng kpang.
42024004	Ri shi ka nɔngkɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ takpang. Ri rɛ̃rɛ doo naa, a ri zi zang varɛ ziti, ri shii tɔ nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru kalang kalang kɔlɔ katɔ, ka kagn ɓarɛ naabm.
42024005	Zang soro keɓe ri kaa vɔrɔ dɔli, a ri ɓaa yuu ka dii. A zang varɛ bì'i ri hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Ka ruu vi nɔɔ kãa zang ɓɔɔ Suru kagn bii ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang gbãa vɔrɔ viya?
42024006	Tɔ̀'ɔ nɔng kpang, yupaa tɔ. Nɔɔ kpaa danggn vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ nɔɔ bɛɛ doo ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ.
42024007	Ɓɔɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ, ‘Zang naa a zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang Jaa Shɔnzang, ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa. A lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati, zang wisi wu paa kati.’”
42024008	A ri kpaa danggn yee ɓiɓɛ kati.
42024009	Ɓɔɔ ri gbãayu nɛɛ nɔng yusaa, ri kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nimbang.
42024010	Zang soro ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ri vuu keɓe, ɓi rɛɛ Marayamu Magadaliya nɛɛ Yuwana nɛɛ Marayamu nà'a Yakubu, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang soro nimbang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
42024011	Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ keɓe, ri ɓaa shoo ɓarɛ ka ruu ɓarɛ kpang, ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ri shaarɛ ɓarɛ nyaa waati. Ri shing danggn ka ruu bì'i kpang.
42024012	A Bituru yupaa ɓiri, yurɛ daa ka nɔng yuu saa. Tangsɛ, a lengse jìng ka yeti sàa. Zi fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang leng vɔrɔ nɔng kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Gbãayu daa gãa, mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu zi keɓe
42024013	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ziti ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu diki diki, ɓɛɛ nɛɛ ri daa ka jaa gari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Imawu ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ yuu paa nɛɛ Urushalima mɔɔ daa kagn mɛli manziti.
42024014	Ri rang yee nɛɛ zɔɔ, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.
42024015	Ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri rang yee doo naa ka nyaa, ri ti hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ, ɓɛɛ, Yeesɔ naa ìi ri. Ri ɓakɛ doo ka nɛɛ zɔɔ, ri daayi.
42024016	A ri zi wu nung takpang, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zang zuu ri jìng katɔ.
42024017	A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ rangkɛ yee vi nɛɛ zɔɔ ka gbalang viya?” Ri shiiyi, ri zaa katɔ.
42024018	A zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kiliyopaa, kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ ɓaa zang zanti gbete ka Urushalima, ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ka nɔng, diki bee gn kpang ɓɛɛ ya?”
42024019	A hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ “Ɓu vi palɛ viya?” A ri kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara, zang nyaa shoonang Laa. Ɓɔɔ Laa a wu naa, nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu bang bang, nɛɛ wu ti rang zang yee wu kaa vɔrɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
42024020	A ɓɔɔ ti, naa ɓɔɔ, rɛɛ zang bang bang ɓuru ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri doo zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kɔ ɓɛɛ, ri a wu zang, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, a zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ.
42024021	Bɛɛ ruu shing danggn ɓuru nɛɛ, wukɔ naa ta yuu zang Yahuda. Ti wee kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, lɛɛkɔ keɓe diki daa kaa taati ɓɔɔ zang palɛ vuu keɓe ɓɛɛ.
42024022	Zang soro ɓɔɔ ri kagn, ka teteng ɓuru, ri kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ãa nyaa mɔɔ tãa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri daa ka yuu sàa lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ gãndi zãngzãng.
42024023	A ri ìi vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ka yeti saa kpang. Ri gbãayu, ri kɔɔ ruu tɔɔ, ri zili zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, Yeesɔ doo ningkãari.
42024024	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓuru, ri daa ka yuu sàa, ri daa ìi doo naa ɓɔɔ zang soro ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ doori. A ri zi Yeesɔ doo kpang kɔ.”
42024025	Yeesɔ rang ri yee tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zũng kpang ɓɛɛ, ɓoro manɛ valɛ bii dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ kpang nandon ɓɛɛ.
42024026	Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ Kirisi dang jìng vuu keɓe ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang a wu bannang ɓiɓɛ kpang ya?”
42024027	A Yeesɔ kɔɔrɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka labeenang Laa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kati. Gaayu nɛɛ labeenang ɓɔɔ Musa beere ɓɛɛ, a à nɔng ka yuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa nandon ri beere ɓɛɛ.
42024028	Ɓɔɔ ri a naabm tɔ nɛɛ jaa gari ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ ri daa ɓɛɛ a Yeesɔ palɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu sha nɛɛ doo ɓɛɛ.
42024029	A ri bakɛ wu nɛɛ, “Nwang nɛɛ ruu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kaa nɔng laarang, laa ti hãa nyaa kana ɓɛɛ.” A daayi nɛɛ wu daa nwang kaa nɛɛ ri.
42024030	Nwangnɛ nɛɛ wu shaa kaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ ri. Tuu borodi a gaa Laa, sharɛ a a ri.
42024031	A ri zi wu nung kati, a ningnɛ ri zi wu takpang.
42024032	Ri kɔɔ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “Ɓasi ka gbalang ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ ruu, a ti nwangsɛ ruu dìiri ruu vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu tãa tìnang ka yeti ɓuru dɔli.”
42024033	Ri yuu paa tantɛnang ri gbãayu ka Urushalima, a ri ìi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ kopi tu gbete. Ri kpalɛ yuu ka nɔng gbete, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
42024034	Ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Kpanti Yeesɔ yupaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa nizang, nwang nyaa tɔ ka bii Siman.”
42024035	A zang ziti keɓe kɔɔ ri naa vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ ri daa Imawu ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu ri yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ɓɔɔ wu shaa borodi ɓɛɛ.
42024036	Ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang vuu keɓe doo naa, Yeesɔ nwang nyaa, naa shii ka teteng ɓarɛ. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N kaa ɓi jong.”
42024037	Ri kaa vɔrɔ, ri tɔɔ naa ri zi ɓarɛ raanang.
42024038	A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ viya? A nɔɔ ti hɛ̃ɛlɛ nyaa ka yeti manɛ nɔngkɔ viya?
42024039	Nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ doo mɛɛ, nɛɛ naa mɛɛ, ɓi nkɔ. Nɔɔ lee m nɛɛ naa, nɔɔ zirɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kaka nɛɛ yɔpɔ ɓi kagn bii raanang naa wee, ka bii mɛɛ ɓee kpang ɓɛɛ.”
42024040	Kɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ, a tusu ri naa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ doo ɓiɓɛ.
42024041	Ɓɔɔ vuu bì'i kpãa ri doo ka yeti, ka ruu tìnang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ɓɛɛ. A ri ti kasɛ gn kpang kɔ sasak, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu bì'i nwang naa nɔngkɔ nizang kpang ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Vuu shaanang kagn nɔng manɛ ka nihn ya?”
42024042	Ri a wu jaa jaazìi ɓɔɔ zang nwaa katɔ ɓɛɛ,
42024043	a tarɛ shaa ka tìng ɓarɛ ka nɔngkɔ.
42024044	A rang yee nɛɛ ri tɔɔ, “Wee yee mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n ràng nɔɔ bɛɛ n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ ning ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yuu mɛɛ ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Laa ɓɔɔ Musa, nɛɛ labeenang rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, a ɓɔɔ labeenang kpanti Dawuda ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zabura ɓɛɛ, nwang ditɔ nizang nandon.”
42024045	A a ri naa, tɔɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ka labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ kati.
42024046	A kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Wee vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ɓɛɛ, Kirisi dang jìng, wu ti vɔrɛ, diki nɛɛ daa tɔ taati, wu yupaa nɛɛ sàa.
42024047	Zang kɔɔ zang koo piti ruu Laa, nɛɛ nung ɓiɓɛ kɔ, nɛɛ zang yaa vuu shi kpang, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ. Zang naa gaayu nɛɛ Urushalima.
42024048	N'ɔɔ kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ nandon.
42024049	N shong nɔɔ nyaa, vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ nwang ka gari Urushalima ka gbongkarɛ, Suru Laa wu a ka yuu manɛ.”
42024050	A nwang nɛɛ yeti gari nɛɛ ri, naabm nɛɛ Bɛtaniya. A see naa ka lapa, gaa Laa nɛɛ, Laa wu palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ jong.
42024051	A ɓɔɔ bɛɛ gà'a ri Laa doo naa, zang tuu wu zang daa nɛɛ wu ka lapa.
42024052	Ri bang wu, ri tãa tìnang dɔli. A ri gbãayu ri daa gari Urushalima,
42024053	ri dàar'ɛ yeti Gãa Laa diki diki, ri zãa Laa.
43001001	Zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Ruu, nw'ang doo ka tìng bɛɛ Laa gaayu koo mãanang gn kpang. Ruu keɓe nw'ang ɓi nɛɛ Laa. Ruu keɓe ɓi wukɔ Laa.
43001002	Nw'ang ɓi nɛɛ Laa ka tìng doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ bɛɛ Laa mãa koo gn kpang.
43001003	Laa mãarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe piti nɛɛ wukɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ kagn gbete ka teteng vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ ka koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ Laa mãa nɛɛ wu kpang, kagn kpang.
43001004	Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓi ka bii Ruu keɓe kɔ. Suru bii keɓe wukɔ yakɛ shɔnzang nɔng.
43001005	Nɔng yakɛnang keɓe, yakɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, a nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, ningsi wu kaa takpang.
43001006	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn Laa shong wu, zang ɓ'aa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yɔhana.
43001007	Arɛ nɛɛ wu naa kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ yakɛ nɔng keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ri tãayi, ri shing danggn kaa bii ɓiɓɛ.
43001008	Wu Yɔhana kɔ nɔng yakɛnang keɓe kpang, a ɓiri nɛɛ wu naa kɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓi ruu ka yuu nɔng yakɛnang keɓe.
43001009	Wee kɔ, zang ɓɔɔ yàk'ɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ kɔ, ɓɔɔ a ka koo naa yàk'ɛ nɔng, tɔ̀ɔ, shɔnzang nandon ri zi vuu kaa waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ.
43001010	Bɛɛ ka yeti koo kɔ nwani, wukɔ ti mãa koo keɓe, a zang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo ri zi wu kaa takpang.
43001011	A ka bii zang laa gãa ɓiɓɛ, a zang ɓiɓɛ ti ta wu kpang.
43001012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta wu nandon, a ri ti shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a ri naa nɛɛ, ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa wujɛ Laa.
43001013	Zang keɓe Laa yi ri. Zang yi ri naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang yi jaa ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang ti yi ri nɛɛ bii shɔnzang kpang. Ɓi ti ka gbalang ɓɔɔ zang varɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi wukɔ daa ɓarɛ.
43001014	A Ruu keɓe naa t'uu bii shɔnzang, a nwang kaa nɛɛ ruu nɔng gbete. Atɛ ruu tìnang tãanang dɔli nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. A ruu ti zi bannang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu, nɛɛ jìng ɓuru, ɓi bannang ɓɔɔ Daa a jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
43001015	Yɔhana kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Yɔhana mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa tɔɔ, “Wee zang ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ a ka knti mɛɛ kagn, wukɔ bang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ɓi ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ’”
43001016	Ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a wu gaagaa, rùu ti wàl'ɛ tɔ̃ɔ kana ka yuu zɔɔ yuu zɔɔ.
43001017	Naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa a nɛɛ bii Musa, tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang Laa, nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang, a ɓi kaa nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ.
43001018	Zang ɓɔɔ zi Laa tɔ kagn gbete kpang. Ɓi jaa gbete ɓɔɔ wu doo naa Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ nwang ka ɓuru Laa kɔ, tusu naa ɓɔɔ Laa nwang ɓɛɛ.
43001019	Zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ka Urushalima ri shong zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang Leevi, ka bii Yɔhana ɓɔɔ palɛ zang batizima ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri naa hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ ɓaa ɓu wiya?”
43001020	Yɔhana laa nyaa kpang. Kɔɔ ri ruu ɓɔɔ nizang, wàasɛ̀ ri vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓi nkɔ Kirisi (zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ) kpang.”
43001021	Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ “A mɔɔ ɓu kaa wiya?” “Mɔkɔ Iliya ya?” Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Wu nkɔ Iliya kpang.” Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔkn nɛɛ, “A mɔkɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ ya?” A ti kasɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ, “Ɓi nkɔ kpang.”
43001022	A ri d'ik'i wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu ta jong, mɔkɔ wiya? Tɔɔ ruu wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ, ruu daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shong ruu ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ zang ɓu nɛɛ mɔkɔ ɓu wiya?”
43001023	A Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa bee ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ rang yee Laa ka jìngti, ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ Kpanti Laa gbalang ta, nɔɔ shiiri katɔ ɓororo.’”
43001024	Zang ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Farisawa shong ri ɓɛɛ,
43001025	ri hɛ̃ɛ Yɔhana tɔɔ, “A ka ruu vi mɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang batizima viya? Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Kirisi kpang. Mɔkɔ ti Iliya kpang, a mɔɔ ti zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ naa a kpang ɓɛɛ?”
43001026	A Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N pàl'ɛ zang batizima m nɛɛ mii, zang ɓɔɔ shii kagn teteng manɛ kãntang keɓe, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi wu nung manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
43001027	Wukɔ a ka knti mɛɛ, n daa naa ɓɔɔ n kãlɛ soo koodoo ɓiɓɛ kpang.”
43001028	Zang p'al'ɛ vuu keɓe piti ka Bɛtani ɓɔɔ zang ta rang Urudung katɔ ka dang ɓɛɛ. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Yɔhana p'alɛ̀ zang batizima ɓɛɛ.
43001029	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a Yɔhana zi Yeesɔ a kana bì'i ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ Laa kaɓa, ɓɔɔ naa shingnɛ, Laa yà'a zang koo keɓe gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
43001030	Wee zang ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ n tɔɔ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ a ka knti mɛɛ kagn, wukɔ bang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ ɓi ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ kɔ.’
43001031	Bɛɛ n zi wu nung m doo kpang kɔ doori. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n arɛ n pàl'ɛ zang batizima nɛɛ mii, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu nwangsɛ zang Isirela wu kati nɛɛ wukɔ Kirisi.”
43001032	Yɔhana kɔɔ ruu keɓe tɔɔ, “N zi Suru Laa a nɛɛ lapa naa koro, a naa nwàng ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
43001033	N nɛɛ ti zi m kpang nɛɛ wukɔ kpang. Laa ɓɔɔ shɔng m nɛɛ n naa pàlɛ̀ zang batizima nɛɛ mii, wukɔ kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zirɛ Suru Laa arɛ naa nwàng ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, zang keɓe kɔ naa pàl'ɛ zang batizima nɛɛ Suru Laa.’
43001034	N ti naa zi nɔngkɔ nɛɛ jìng mɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ yɔɔ keɓe Jaa Laa bì'i kɔ.”
43001035	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, Yɔhana shii tɔ ka nɔngkɔ tɔkn nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti,
43001036	a zi Yeesɔ rakɛ. A Yɔhana kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ Laa kaɓa.”
43001037	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ziti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ naa weɓe, ri yaa wu ri dũng ɓarɛ kaa Yeesɔ.
43001038	A Yeesɔ raa jìng zi ri, ri dũng wu kana. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kãa viya?” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Rabii (dìiri nung keɓe ɓi maalang), nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwàng kagn kiya?”
43001039	A kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ arɛ, nɔɔ zirɛ” (bɛ̀'ɛ saka dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ laarang yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng). Ri dũng wu, ri daa zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu nwang kagn kati. Ri nwang kaa nɛɛ wu ka nɔngkɔ, laa hãa nyaa nɛɛ mani.
43001040	Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, a ri dũng Yeesɔ kaɓa. Zang ɓaa ɓɔɔ gbete nɛɛ Anduru jaa naa Siman ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ.
43001041	Dàa tantɛ jaa niiɓɛ Siman kɔ ìinang shɔɔnang, a kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Ruu ìi Masiya, zang ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa nɛɛ naa ta yuu zang tɔ” (wukɔ “Kirisi”).
43001042	A gɔ̃ Siman daa nɛɛ wu ka bii Yeesɔ. Yeesɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ Siman a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ Siman jaa Yɔhana waa? Zang ɓ'aa mɔɔ kaa nɛɛ Kefa” (Dìiri nung keɓe daa gbete nɛɛ Bituru ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ɓi “Tari ɓɔɔ bang ɓɛɛ”).
43001043	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, Yeesɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu daa ka Galili. A ìi Filibu a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “A ta nɛɛ n ning.”
43001044	Filibu ɓi doo zang Bɛsɛda kɔ, gari rɛɛ Anduru nɛɛ Bituru.
43001045	Filibu ti naa ìi Natanalu, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu ìi zang ɓɔɔ Musa bee vuu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Laa, a zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri ti bee jong tɔ. Zang keɓe, wukɔ Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara, jaa Yusufu.”
43001046	Natanalu hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nw'ang nyaa ka gari Nazara ɓu kagn ya?” Filibu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ “Arɛ mɔɔ daa zirɛ”
43001047	Yeesɔ zi Natanalu a kana bii ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang Isirela ɓɔɔ nizang kaɓa, vuu ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.”
43001048	Natanalu hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ p'alɛ̀ bɛ̀'ɛ mɔɔ zi m nɔngkɔ viya?” Yeesɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi mɔɔ dòo ka doo laa sìiri bɛɛ Filibu daa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa gn kpang.”
43001049	Natanalu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, mɔkɔ Jaa Laa. Mɔkɔ Kpanti zang Isirela.”
43001050	Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɛɛ n zi mɔɔ dòo ka doo laa sìiri ɓɛɛ ya? Mɔɔ naa zi vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe ditɔ.”
43001051	A kɔɔ ri kati tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, nɔɔ naa zi lapa puu ditɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ri naa a ka bii mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang, ri ti gbãayu ka lapa tɔkn.”
43002001	Diki naa gãntɛ tɔ ziti, zang g'ee soro ka gari Kana ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ. Nà'a Yeesɔ daa nɔng kaɓa kaa jong.
43002002	Zang ti gaarɛ Yeesɔ jong nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
43002003	Mii inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓoo ɓɛɛ waa nyaa tɔ, a nà'a Yeesɔ a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mii inabi ɓarɛ waa nyaa tɔ nandon.”
43002004	A kasɛ niiɓɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Maanaa, ruu ɓaaɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ n kpang. Y'aa m ka nɔngkɔ, laa mɛɛ a ɓi gn kpang.”
43002005	Nà'a Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri arɛ, ri yi zang naa ka shoonang ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ piti nɔɔ p'al'ɛ.”
43002006	Bɛɛ zang shɔ ɓawa tari kagn nɔngkɔ man gbete. Ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ mii ɓɔɔ zang sɔɔ bii nɛɛ mani, naa ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ. Ɓawa gbete naa zang tɛ̃ɛ mii kagn, bɛng taati.
43002007	Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yi zang naa ka shoonang keɓe nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ wisi rɛɛ ɓawa keɓe nyaa ta nɛɛ mii.” Ri wisi mii ka nyaa ɓawa lɛɛri.
43002008	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zã mii keɓe ta tɔkɔlɔng, nɔɔ daa a zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang kn sinyɛ ɓɛɛ.” A ri zã mii, ri daa nɛɛ mani.
43002009	Ɓɔɔ zang bang kn sinyɛ ta mii, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ raa mii inabi tɔ ɓɛɛ, a tãayi. Yɔɔ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ mii inabi keɓe a nɔng kpang (zang ɓɔɔ ri yi zang naa ka shoonang ɓɔɔ ri zã mii ri zi ɓarɛ tɔ) a ɓaa nyaa ka sinyɛ ɓeevɛ dang gbete,
43002010	a hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang a zang zanti ɓi mii inabi ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kɔ shɔɔnang, zang nɛɛ ɓoo tɔ, zang naa gɔɔ nyaa kaa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ la kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ yaa mii inabi tɔ̃ɔ gbongkarɛ mɔɔ naa a zang ɓaa kaa doo knti ka ruu viya?”
43002011	Wee vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gaayu palɛnang ɓɛɛ kɔ, ka gari Kana ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ. Tusu zang bannang ɓiɓɛ kaa nɔngkɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri shing danggn kaa bii ɓiɓɛ gbãnggbãng.
43002012	Kaa nɛɛ knti, Yeesɔ daa ka gari Kafanahu nɛɛ niiɓɛ, nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri nwang ka nɔngkɔ diki bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.
43002013	Là'a nyaalaa pasika ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ, y'aa kaa tɔkɔlɔng, a Yeesɔ daa kaa Urushalima.
43002014	Daa ka dàbang Gãa Laa, ìi zang ri malɛ napoo, nɛɛ mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, a ɓɔɔ ning koro. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ zang saka ri ti nwalɛ ɓarɛ ka teeburu ɓarɛ.
43002015	A zaa soo, p'al'ɛ gbãa nɛɛ mani, a hing zang nandon, nɛɛ mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, nɛɛ napoo ning, ɓɔɔ ka dàbang Gãa Laa ka biling. A ti zìili teeburu zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ zang saka, a vang saka ɓarɛ.
43002016	A Yeesɔ rang zang ɓɔɔ ri malɛ ning koro yee nabm tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ see veɓe ta, nɔɔ yaa nɔng. Nɔɔ risi Gãa Daa mɛɛ nwang naa luumang ka ruu viya?”
43002017	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bì'i ɓiɓɛ, ri kpaa danggn vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Sũnyaa ɓɔɔ n kaa ka ruu Gãa ɓaaɓɛ kɔng m ka ɓoro naa waa” ɓɛɛ kati.
43002018	Zang bang bang, zang Yahudawa ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu zi kagn nɛɛ zang a mɔɔ naa vuu keɓe palɛnang tɔ ɓu viya?”
43002019	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ jili Gãa Laa keɓe ta, n wisi paa tɔkn n hangsɛ nyaa diki taati.”
43002020	Zang bang bang, zang Yahudawa ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang mãa gãa keɓe saa laa ziti tu man gbete, mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ wisi ɓaa paa diki taati kɔ nwani ya?”
43002021	A ɓeekpang, ruu Gãa ɓɔɔ wu rang ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ ɓi bii ɓiɓɛ.
43002022	Ka ɓɔɔ Laa naa wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri naa kpaa danggn kati nɛɛ bɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ ri vuu keɓe tɔ kagn. A ri shing danggn kaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ ning.
43002023	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Yeesɔ doo ka Urushalima, ka diki nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ, zang dɔli ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zili vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ.
43002024	Yeesɔ ti 'a ri yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zi naa shɔnzang ɓi tɔ nandon,
43002025	daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn kɔɔ wu ruu shɔnzang kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
43003001	Yɔɔ zang Farisawa ɓɔɔ kagn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Nikodimu. Nikodimu ɓi ka teteng, zang bang bang zang Yahudawa.
43003002	Yɔɔ keɓe, diki ɓɔɔ kagn daa ka bì'i Yeesɔ nɛɛ zìi. Kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Maalang, ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa maalang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa wu zang ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ wu kpang, zang ɓɔɔ zunung vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn kɔ mɔɔ p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ gbete kpang.”
43003003	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, naa zang yi mɔɔ tɔkn kpang, mɔɔ daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo kpanti kpang.”
43003004	Nikodimu hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Zang yi zang biya tɔkn, zang nɛɛ bang tɔ viya? Zang tu tɔkn ka yeti nà'a zang, tɔ̀ɔ, nà'a zang wu yi zang tɔkn daa kaa dakn ziti ya?”
43003005	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, naa zang yi zang nɛɛ mii, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ bii Suru Laa kpang, zang keɓe daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa naa roo kpanti ɓi kpang.
43003006	Zang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang yirɛ, ɓi shɔnzang, zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa yirɛ, ɓi ti zang suru.
43003007	M'ɔɔ mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ mɔɔ n tɔɔ, zang wu yi mɔɔ tɔkn ɓɛɛ kpang.
43003008	Jasung rarɛ daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ tãa naa ɓɔɔ wu rãa ɓɛɛ, a mɔɔ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang piti ɓɔɔ Suru Laa yi wu, nwàng ɓi doo nɔngkɔ.”
43003009	Nikodimu hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Vuu keɓe nw'ang lɛɛ bɛɛ nɔngkɔ viya?”
43003010	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ tusu zang Isirela vuu kɔ nwani, mɔɔ zi vuu keɓe doo kpang nɛɛ mani ya?
43003011	N kɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, rùu r'ang yee ɓuru, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu ti kɔ̀'ɔ ɓuru vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi nɛɛ jìng ɓuru ɓɛɛ, a mɔɔ ta vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
43003012	N kɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, mɔɔ shing danggn kagn kpang, a naa n kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu kaa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa, mɔɔ shing danggn ɓi kaa biya?
43003013	Zang ɓɔɔ vang gngn daa ka lapa kpang, ɓi nkɔ Jaa Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ n shooro nɛɛ lapa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.”
43003014	Naa ɓɔɔ Musa wisi sɔkɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ zang kãngtɛ ka yuu laa paa ka jìngti, zang naa w'isì m ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang paa doo nɔngkɔ.
43003015	Tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, wu walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang kati.
43003016	Laa kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, shong nyaa nɛɛ Jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ wu shaarɛ kpang, wu wàlɛ̀ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang kɔ jong.
43003017	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shɔng Jaa ɓiɓɛ ka koo nɛɛ wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu kpang, nɛɛ wu naa ta ɓi yuu zang koo kɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
43003018	Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Jaa, zang jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu ɓi kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Jaa kpang, zang dɔng wu ruu ɓi tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Jaa gbete Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
43003019	Laa d`'ɔng zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ Jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ ruu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shɔng nɔng yakɛnang ka koo, a zang ri kasɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kɔ jong, ɓa nɔng yakɛnang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ ri p'alɛ̀ ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.
43003020	Zang ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang, kasɛ ruu nɔng yakɛnang ɓi kpang. À nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓi kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ zang zi vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
43003021	Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ, 'a ɓi katɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu p'alɛ̀, ɓi Laa yi wu naa kagn.
43003022	Kaa nɛɛ knti, Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa ka tipi Yahudiya. Ri daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ, ri pàl'ɛ zang batizima.
43003023	Yɔhana ti pàl'ɛ zang batizima ɓi jong ka gari Ayinɔng ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gari Salima naabm ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ mii kagn nɔng dɔli ɓɛɛ. Zang ri daarɛ ka bii ɓiɓɛ a ti palɛ ri batizima.
43003024	(Bɛɛ zang loo Yɔhana gn ka sãa kpang).
43003025	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yɔhana ɓɔ̀ɔ, ri g'aa tɔɔsung nyaa laanang nɛɛ yɔɔ Yahudawa ɓɔɔgn ka ruu bii sɔɔnang naa ɓɔɔ d'aa ɓarɛ tùsù ri ɓɛɛ.
43003026	A ri daa ka bii Yɔhana ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ɓeleng mɔɔ nɛɛ wu ka rang Urudung dang, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ r'uu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, pàl'ɛ zang batizima kana. Zang ri daarɛ kana bii ɓiɓɛ nandon.”
43003027	A Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Laa nɛɛ a zang vuu kpang, zang walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang.
43003028	Ɓeleng n kɔɔ m nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ ti tãa tɔ, N tɔɔ, ‘Ɓi nkɔ Kirisi kpang, Laa shong m ka tìng ɓiɓɛ.’
43003029	Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ ɓi wukɔ zang sinyɛ. Sinyɛ ɓeevɛ ɓeesang ɓɔɔ shiiyi, ɓaa shoo, tãa tìnang dɔli nɛɛ tãa yee sinyɛ ɓeevɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. N tãa tìnang m doo nɔngkɔ. Tìnang mɛɛ ti daa ɓi tɔ kiiri.”
43003030	Bannang ɓiɓɛ daa ɓi ditɔ nɛɛ tìng, n ti gbãayu m kaa nɛɛ knti kɔ jong.
43003031	Zang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa wukɔ ɓa zang piti, zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang koo yi wu, ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ koo. Ti r'ang yee ɓi naa zang koo keɓe. Zang ɓɔɔ a ɓi nɛɛ lapa wukɔ ɓa zang ɓi piti.
43003032	Zang keɓe rang yee ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu zirɛ, a ti tãa ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ta vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, kagn gbete kpang.
43003033	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta r'uu ɓiɓɛ, tusu zang tɔ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ɓi nizang.
43003034	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ Laa shongnɛ, rang ɓi doo yee Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa a wu Suru ɓiɓɛ, di nyaa kpang.
43003035	Daa kasɛ Jaa katɔ, a yaa vuu piti ka naa ɓiɓɛ.
43003036	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Jaa, wàlɛ̀ Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ Jaa wàlɛ̀ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓi kpang. Jìng dannang kagn yuu ɓiɓɛ ning.
43004001	Yeesɔ zirɛ nɛɛ zang Farisawa ri tãa nyaa tɔ, nɛɛ wu walɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔ dɔli, nɛɛ wu ti p'al'ɛ zang batizima kana dɔli ɓa ɓɔɔ Yɔhana palɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.
43004002	(Wu wukɔ ti p'al'ɛ zang batizima nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri palɛ).
43004003	A Yeesɔ yaa tipi Yahudiya gbãayu tɔkn daa Galili.
43004004	Gbalang ɓɔɔ wu tɛɛ nɛɛ mani sɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ tipi Samariya kɔ gbete.
43004005	A naa a kaa gari Sayika ka tipi Samariya. Gari bì'i naabm nɛɛ tipi (jaa lannang) ɓɔɔ Yakubu a jaa ɓiɓɛ Yusufu ɓɛɛ.
43004006	Rijiya ɓɔɔ Yakubu ɓeeyi kagn nɔngkɔ. Yeesɔ lee tɔ, ka ruu doo ɓɔɔ wu ra ɓɛɛ, a naa nwang ka nyaa rijiya bì'i, bɛɛ laa kaa dalɛ yuu.
43004007	A jaa soro tipi Samariya arɛ nɛɛ wu naa wɔ mii. Yeesɔ gaa wu nɛɛ, “A m mii jong n ɓooyi.”
43004008	(Bɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa ɓarɛ tɔ ka gari nɛɛ ri daa hoo vuu shaanang).
43004009	Jaa soro Samariya kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓaa zang Yahudiya, n m zang Samariya. Mɔɔ gaa mii ka naa mɛɛ ka ruu viya?” (Zang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang Samariya ri p'al'ɛ vuu jong nɔng gbete nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang)
43004010	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa mɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang tɔ. A mɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi zang ɓɔɔ gaa mii ka naa ɓaaɓɛ tɔ. Mɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ gàa wu tɔ, wu nɛ̀'ɛ 'a mɔɔ mii ɓɔɔ a zang Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ.”
43004011	Jaa soro kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Maalang, vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ wɔ mii nɛɛ mani kpang, rijiya ti bee katɔ. A mɔɔ walɛ mii ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ka niya?
43004012	Rijiya keɓe ɓi dabang ɓuru Yakubu a ruu. Ti ɓoo mii kagn, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ vuu vaa ɓiɓɛ piti, a naa vɔrɛ. Mɔɔ ɓa dabang ɓuru Yakubu ɓaa ɓu kaatɔ ya?”
43004013	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ ɓoo mii rijiya keɓe sutu mãa wu ditɔ tɔkn.
43004014	Zang piti ɓɔɔ ɓoo mii ɓɔɔ n a wu, sutu mãa wu takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mii ɓɔɔ n a wu, nwàng kaa naa sɔlɔng mii ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Sɔlɔng mii ɓɔɔ nwangsɛ mii ɓɔɔ 'a wu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
43004015	A jaa soro kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Maalang, a m mii keɓe karɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, sutu wu mãa m takpang, 'n ti alɛ nihn takpang, nɛɛ n wɔ mii kpang.”
43004016	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Daayi mɔɔ daa ɓaa ɓaavɛ nyaa, nɔɔ arɛ.”
43004017	Jaa soro kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Varɛ mɛɛ kagn kpang.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nyaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ varɛ ɓaaɓɛ kagn kpang, nizang kɔ nwani.
43004018	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ g'ee varɛ daa maani ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwàng nɛɛ wu kãntang keɓe, wu varɛ ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ m kãntang keɓe, ɓi nizang kɔ nwani.”
43004019	Jaa soro kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Maalang, n zirɛ mɔɔ ɓaa zang nyaa shoonang Laa.
43004020	Rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ka tìng ɓɛɛ, ri b'ang Laa ka yuu kɔpɔ keɓe. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yahudawa nɔɔ ti kɔ̀'ɔ manɛ nɛɛ nɔng Laa bannang ɓi ka Urushalima.”
43004021	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ “Jaa soro, n kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang, diki a kana, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bang Daa ka nihn kpang, nɔɔ, ti bang wu ka Urushalima kpang ɓɛɛ.
43004022	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Samariya, nɔɔ zi zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bang wu manɛ kpang. Ɓɔɔ ruu zang Yahudawa ruu zi Laa ɓɔɔ ruu bang wu ɓuru tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang yuu tanang nw'ang ɓi nɛɛ teteng zang Yahudawa kɔ ɓɛɛ.
43004023	Diki a doo naa, kãntang keɓe diki bì'i a tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete ri naa bang Laa kaa waasɛ̃, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a ri ɓɛɛ. Daa kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ, nɛɛ ri bang wu.
43004024	Laa ɓi Suru, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri bang wu ri b'ang wu nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Suru ɓiɓɛ a ri ɓɛɛ. Ri ti b'ang wu nɛɛ yeti gbete.”
43004025	Jaa soro kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “N zi tɔ, Masiya ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kirisi a ditɔ. Nɛɛ a tɔ, naa kɔɔ ruu vuu ditɔ nandon.”
43004026	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu kati nɛɛ, “Wee n rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓee, nkɔ Kirisi bì'i.”
43004027	L'ɔɔ nyaa gn kpang, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri gbãayu. Ɓɔɔ ri zi wu rang yee nɛɛ jaa soro bì'i, ri mã naa ka danggn, a zang ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ jaa soro kaa takpang nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ viya?” Kɔ, wu ti hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ jaa soro keɓe ka ruu viya?” kpang.
43004028	A jaa soro yaa bɛng mii ɓiɓɛ, daa ka yeti gari, daa kɔɔ zang nɛɛ,
43004029	“Nɔɔ arɛ nɔɔ zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ n p'al'ɛ ka tìng ɓɛɛ nandon. Naa ɓu bɛɛ Kirisi kɔ ya?”
43004030	A zang ri nwang nɛɛ yeti gari, ri a ka bii Yeesɔ.
43004031	Ka knti jaa soro, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri yì wu tìng ka bii nɛɛ, “Shaa vuu shaanang ta, maalang.”
43004032	Kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ n shaa ɓɛɛ kagn, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
43004033	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔ̀'ɔgn atɛ wu vuu shaanang tɔ ya?”
43004034	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Vuu shaanang mɛɛ ɓi palɛnang vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ shong m kasɛ ɓɛɛ, 'n ti hangsɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ wu a m ɓɛɛ.
43004035	Nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ kagn nɛɛ, ‘Shala yaa doo dɛ̃ɛti tɔɔ zang yee zee.’ N kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ tuu jìng karɛ nɔɔ zi jaa. Zee zũng jìng tɔ, daa naa yeenang tɔ.
43004036	Zang jaa lannang wàl'ɛ ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ Laa shing wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Kpalɛ zang ɓiɓɛ kana, tɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa jìng vuu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ naa yeeyi ri tãa tìnang kaa nyaa zɔɔ.
43004037	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ ɓ'aa jìng vuu, a zang ɓɔɔ wu naa yee ɓi kaa tɔ’, nizang kɔ nwani.
43004038	N shong nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ daa yee vuu ka jaa ɓɔɔ wu nɔkɔ lang kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔgn ri langnɛ, nɔɔ wàl'ɛ vuu shaanang manɛ kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ ri p'alɛ̀ shoonang ɓɛɛ.”
43004039	Zang Samariya dɔli ka gari kaɓa, ri shing danggn ka bì'i Yeesɔ ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ jaa soro kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ n p'al'ɛ ka tìng nandon” ɓɛɛ.
43004040	Ɓɔɔ zang tipi Samariya ri naa a ka bì'i Yeesɔ, ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu nw'ang nɛɛ ri. A nw'ang kaa nɛɛ ri diki ziti.
43004041	Zang dɔli tɔkn ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
43004042	A ri kɔɔ jaa soro tɔɔ, “Rùu shing danggn wu ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu kpang. Ruu tãa ruu ɓiɓɛ tɔ nɛɛ shoo ɓuru, a ruu ti zi tɔ nizang, nɛɛ yɔɔ keɓe kɔ naa ta yuu zang koo.”
43004043	Diki ziti ɓa tɔ, Yeesɔ yupaa nɛɛ wu daa kaa tipi Galili.
43004044	(Bɛɛ ti kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, “Zang a zang nyaa shoonang Laa bannang ɓi jong ka tipi ɓiɓɛ kpang.”)
43004045	Ɓɔɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ tipi Galili, zang Galili ri ta wu waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri daa nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ ka Urushalima, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu p'al'ɛ ka diki nyaalaa nandon ɓɛɛ.
43004046	Yeesɔ daa tɔkn ka Kaana ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ, nɔng ɓɔɔ wu risi mii, mii raa mii inabi ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ kpanti shoonang kagn ka Kafanahu, ɓɔɔ jaa ɓiɓɛ vuu palɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
43004047	Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kaɓa tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ yaa tipi Yahudiya tɔ, a tɔ ka tipi Galili, yupaa daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ, daa bakɛ wu nɛɛ wu daa màsɛ̀ wu jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng ɓɛɛ jong.
43004048	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, zang ti ãa nyaa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang zi ɓɛɛ gn kpang, nɔɔ shing danggn kpang.”
43004049	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ kpanti shoonang kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Maalang, arɛ ruu daayi, jaa mɛɛ nɛ̀'ɛ vɔrɛ.”
43004050	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Dita, jaa ɓaaɓɛ nw'ang ningkãari, vɔ kpang.” Yɔɔ shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a yi gbalang daa ɓiri.
43004051	Daa gãa kana, a zang ɓɔɔ ri pàl'ɛ wu shoonang, ri kpisi wu yuu ka gbalang, ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Bii jaa ɓaaɓɛ valɛ tɔ.”
43004052	A hɛ̃ɛ ri laa ɓɔɔ bii jaa valɛ kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ bii ɓɔɔ zaa jaa nɛɛ yaa wu nɔng ka ɓɔɔrɔ, bɛɛ laa nɛɛ kpɛ̃ɛ doo tɔkɔlɔng waati.
43004053	Daa jaa kpaa danggn kati nɛɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ ka laa kaɓa kɔ nɛɛ, “Dita, jaa ɓaaɓɛ nw'ang ningkãari, vɔ kpang” Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yɔɔ nɛɛ zang gãa ɓiɓɛ nandon ri shing danggn kati.
43004054	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gbãayu nɛɛ, tipi Yahudiya a ka tipi Galili, p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn daa kaa nɛɛ weɓe ziti.
43005001	Diki naa bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, ka knti vuu keɓe, Yeesɔ daa Urushalima, ka diki kaɓa, zang Yahudawa ri shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓarɛ.
43005002	Ka Urushalima, ka nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ nyaa gãa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, too mii kagn nɔngkɔ naabm, zang ɓaa nɛɛ Bɛsɛda, nɛɛ nyaa Yahudawa. Zang waa putali maani ka nyaa too mii bì'i.
43005003	Zang kɔnang dɔli ri rooro ka nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ zang jìng ringtang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ bii vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ṛi gã mii ɓɔɔ zang nyà'a ɓɛɛ.
43005004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, lee ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa daa ka too mii, wu nyà'a mii ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ nyàa mii tɔ, zang kɔnang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shɛ̃ɛ yeti mii shɔɔnang, naa doo kɔnang viya yi wu, yaa wu nɔng katɔ.]
43005005	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ka nyaa mii ka nɔngkɔ ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ, daa saa bmati tu kopi tu man taati ɓɛɛ.
43005006	Yeesɔ zi wu roo ka nɔngkɔ, a ti zi tɔ, nɛɛ yɔɔ bì'i roo tɔ nɔngkɔ diki ɓiɓɛ bee katɔ. Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ tɔ kɔnang ɓaaɓɛ wu yaa mɔɔ nɔng ya?”
43005007	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Maalang, zang ɓɔɔ tuu m, wu hãa m ka mii, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ nyàa mii tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. N nɛɛ tɔɔ n daa yeti mii, zang ɓɔɔ wu ti ɓa m, wu daa yeti mii shɔɔnang.”
43005008	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yupaa ta, mɔɔ tuu siri ɓɔɔ mɔɔ roo kagn ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ rarɛ.”
43005009	Kɔnang yaa yɔɔ nɔng tantɛnang, a tuu siri, a gaayu rannang kati. Yeesɔ p'al'ɛ vuu keɓe ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang.
43005010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang Yahudawa ri kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang masɛ wu ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Lɛɛkɔ diki ɔ̃sɔnang, mɔɔ ta nyaa dannang ɓuru tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tuu siri ɓaaɓɛ lɛɛkɔ ɓɛɛ.”
43005011	Yɔɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ masɛ m kɔ, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, Tuu siri ɓaaɓɛ ta mɔɔ rarɛ.”
43005012	A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Ɓu wi zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ tuu siri ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ rarɛ wiya?”
43005013	A ɓeekpang yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang masɛ wu zi zang ɓɔɔ masɛ wu nung kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tantɛ daanang ka teteng zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri kp'alɛ̀ zɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɛɛ.
43005014	Nɛɛ knti, Yeesɔ ìi wu ka yeti Gãa Laa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zirɛ, kɔnang ɓaaɓɛ yàa mɔɔ nɔng tɔ, mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang takpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe katɔ nɛɛ palɛ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
43005015	A yɔɔ yaa nɔng, daayi daa kɔɔ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ ɓi Yeesɔ masɛ wu.
43005016	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ palɛ vuu keɓe ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang, rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri gaayu gbalang kãanang ɓɔɔ ri kpãa wu ɓɛɛ.
43005017	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ palɛ shoonang ɓi doo naa, n ti palɛ shoonang jong.”
43005018	Ka ruu r'uu kɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, zang Yahudawa ri kãa gbalang kaa gbãnggbãng nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ta nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang ka yuu diki ɔ̃sɔnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ti ɓaa Laa nɛɛ Daa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Gãsɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa teetee nɛɛ Laa.
43005019	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, Jaa zunung ɓɔɔ wu p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, p'alɛ̀ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ zi Daa ɓiɓɛ p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ Daa p'alɛ̀ piti Jaa p'alɛ̀ doo nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
43005020	Daa kasɛ ruu Jaa katɔ, a t'i tusu Jaa vuu ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa wu palɛ katɔ. Ti naa tusu Jaa vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ zirɛ, nɔɔ mã naa kaa danggn.
43005021	Naa ɓɔɔ Daa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa, wu a ri suru bii, Jaa ti a zang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ, suru bii doo nɔngkɔ.
43005022	Daa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi kpang, yaa ruu jɛ̃ɛnang ɓi kaa naa Jaa.
43005023	Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri 'a Jaa bannang kati, naa ɓɔɔ ri 'a Daa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ 'a Jaa bannang kpang, 'a Daa ɓɔɔ shong wu bannang doo kpang kɔ.
43005024	“N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ti shing danggn ka bii zang ɓɔɔ shong m, wàl'ɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang katɔ. Laa ti naa dɔng wu ruu ɓi takpang. Ɓa yuu vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ suru tɔ, wɔ ɓi tɔ.
43005025	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, diki a kana, diki bì'i ti a tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ri tãa yee Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãayi, a ri ti dũngnɛ, ri nw'ang ningkãari tɔkn.
43005026	Naa ɓɔɔ Daa kɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ, 'a Jaa naa doo nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ, wu nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ.
43005027	Ti 'a Jaa naa tɔ nɛɛ wu jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ka ruu ɓɔɔ wukɔ Jaa Shɔnzang ɓɛɛ.
43005028	“N'ɔɔ mã naa ka danggn ka ruu vuu keɓe kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki a kana, diki ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ nandon ri tãa yee mɛɛ nɛɛ yeti saa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
43005029	Ri nwangkɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, zang wisi ri paa ri walɛ suru bii. Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang, zang wisi ri paa, tɔ̀ɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu ɓɛɛ.
43005030	“N palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ jong nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ kpang. N jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu m naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ m ɓɛɛ. N ti shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang m ka ɓɔɔ n jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n p'alɛ̀ m vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. N palɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ shong m kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
43005031	“Naa n kɔ̀'ɔ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ, zang ta ruu mɛɛ nɛɛ ɓi nizang kɔ nwani kpang.
43005032	Zang ɓɔɔ kɔ̀'ɔ zang ruu ka yuu mɛɛ kagn. N zi tɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ɓi nizang.
43005033	Nɔɔ shong zang ka bii Yɔhana, Yɔhana kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
43005034	N shing gn wu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ kpang. N kɔɔ vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ ta yuu manɛ kati.
43005035	Yɔhana nw'ang naa waa zà'ang sɔɔ ɓɔɔ shaayi, a yakɛ nɔng ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tãa tìnang nwannang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu yakɛ ɓɛɛ, diki bee kaa tɔ̀'ɔ dɔli kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ, tusu zang vuu ka yuu mɛɛ, ɓa vuu ɓɔɔ Yɔhana kɔɔ zang ka yuu mɛɛ katɔ.
43005036	Shoonang ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ a m nɛɛ n palɛ kɔ, n palɛ ɓee. Wukɔ tusu zang, tɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ Daa kɔ shong m.
43005037	A Daa ɓɔɔ shong m ti kɔɔ ruu jong ka yuu mɛɛ. Nɔɔ tãa yee Daa gngn kpang, nɔɔ ti zi waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ gngn kpang.
43005038	Ruu ɓiɓɛ ti kagn yeti manɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn ka zang ɓɔɔ wu shong ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
43005039	Nɔɔ ìi jìng ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gã labeenang waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ wàl'ɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang katɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Labeenang Laa keɓe, kɔɔ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ kɔ.
43005040	A nɔɔ ti kasɛ anang ka bii mɛɛ, n a nɔɔ suru bii kpang.
43005041	“N shing gn m ka dɔɔnang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang dɔɔ m ɓɛɛ kpang.
43005042	N zi zɔ̃ng manɛ m tɔ. Nɔɔ kasɛ Laa nɛɛ yeti manɛ kpang.
43005043	N a m nɛɛ nung Daa mɛɛ, a nɔɔ ta m kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ à anang yuu ɓiɓɛ nɔɔ ta wu katɔ.
43005044	Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ dɔɔ zɔɔ ka naa manɛ. Nɔɔ kasɛ kpang nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Laa gbete gãagãa, wu dɔɔ nɔɔ kpang. A nɔɔ palɛ biya nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ viya?
43005045	N'ɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, naa nkɔ kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ Daa ruu vuu shi kpang manɛ. Kpang, zang ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ Daa ruu vuu shi kpang manɛ ɓi kagn. Musa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ, wukɔ kɔ̀'ɔrɔ Daa.
43005046	Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn katɔ ka bii Musa nizang, nɔɔ nɛɛ sh'ing danggn tɔ ka bii mɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Musa bèe vuu ka yuu mɛɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
43005047	Wee nɔɔ shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ wu bee kpang ɓee, nɔɔ shing danggn biya ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔ̀'ɔ ɓee viya?”
43006001	Diki naa bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, Yeesɔ ta waapo Galili (ɓɔɔ zang ti ɓaa doo nɛɛ waapo Tiberiya kɔ ɓɛɛ) ka dang.
43006002	Zang dɔli ri dũng wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, ka ɓɔɔ wu masɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
43006003	Yeesɔ vang kɔpɔ daa nw'ang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka nɔngkɔ.
43006004	Bɛɛ nyaalaa Pasika ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ kagn ɓɛɛ a naabm tɔ.
43006005	Yeesɔ tuu jìng ka lapa, a zi zang dɔli ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a hɛ̃ɛ Filibu tɔɔ, “Rùu hoo borodi ka niya, ruu a zang keɓe ri shaayi wiya?”
43006006	Hɛ̃ɛ ruu keɓe nɛɛ wu gãsɛ Filibu ɓi katɔ waati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu naa pàlɛ̀ ɓi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
43006007	Filibu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa ruu hoo borodi doo nung dinari laa kopi, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang sha zang ɓu tɔkɔlɔng kpang.”
43006008	Zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Anduru jaa naa Siman Bituru, kɔɔ wu nɛɛ,
43006009	“Jaa kagn nihn, nɛɛ borodi ka naa maani, nɛɛ jaazìi seseere ziti. Vuu keɓe pàl'ɛ zang kɔ gaagaa ɓee ɓu viya?”
43006010	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri nwalɛ ka tipi.” (Wisi kagn nɔng bì'i dɔli.) A zang ri nwalɛ kaa tipi. Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng, daa labang maani katɔ.
43006011	A Yeesɔ see borodi ka naa a zãa Laa kati, a basɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka tipi ɓɛɛ. P'al'ɛ doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ jaazìi. Zang ɓu walɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa wu nyaa ɓɛɛ.
43006012	Zang ri shaa tɔ, ri puu tɔ, a kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bì'i ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɔɔ ri yàarɛ̀ ta, nɔɔ yaa ɓɔɔ wu lasɛ kpang.”
43006013	A ri kpalɛ kaa nandon vuu ɓɔɔ ri yàarɛ̀ ka borodi maani ɓɔɔ ri shaa ɓɛɛ, zang kpalɛ yi nyaa saang kopi tu ziti.
43006014	Ɓɔɔ zang ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ, ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Nizang, wee zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ naa a ka koo ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
43006015	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zirɛ nɛɛ zang a kaa tɔ, ri yi wu kpanti nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning, yaa nɔng daa ka yuu kɔpɔ tɔkn ka bm.
43006016	Laa hãa nyaa tɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri shooro ri daa nyaa waapo dii.
43006017	Ri vang tonsi, ri daa kana nɛɛ ri ta kaa waapo, ri dàa Kafanahu. Nɔng tɔ̀'ɔ tɔ, Yeesɔ à bii ɓarɛ gn kpang.
43006018	Bɛɛ mii rãa kana, ka ruu ɓɔɔ jasung bang ra ɓɛɛ.
43006019	Ri yaa nyaa rang tɔ, ri daa tɔ, mɛli taati kɔ dɛ̃ɛti, a ri zi Yeesɔ ra ka yuu paa mii, a kana bii tonsi naabm. Ri k'aa vɔrɔ.
43006020	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, ɓi nkɔ”
43006021	Ri kasɛ kati nɛɛ wu vang ta yeti tonsi. Vang tɔ ka yeti tonsi, a tonsi tantɛ nyaa rang dang ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓɛɛ shɛ̃ɛnang kati.
43006022	Nɔng naa gãntɛ, a zang dɔli ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ yaa ri ka nyaa rang dang ri zirɛ nɛɛ bɛɛ tonsi nɛɛ gbete kɔ nwani. Nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri nɛɛ vang tonsi nɛɛ wu kpang, ri nɛɛ daa ɓarɛ ka bm.
43006023	A tonsi ɓɔɔ ri alɛ nɛɛ Tiberiya ri naa shiiri ka nyaa rang, naabm nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔli ri shaa borodi ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zãa Laa a ri ɓɛɛ.
43006024	Ɓɔɔ zang ri zi naa weɓe, Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri tɔ̀'ɔ nɔng kpang. A zang bì'i ri vang rɛɛ tonsi ɓɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɛɛ, ri daa ka Kafanahu nɛɛ ri daa kãa Yeesɔ.
43006025	Ri ta waapo tɔ, a ri daa ìi Yeesɔ ka nyaa waapo dang. Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ “Maalang, mɔɔ a nihn gn viya?”
43006026	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, nɔɔ kãa m ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ n p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ kãa m manɛ ka ruu borodi ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ shaa ka buru gaagaa ɓɛɛ.
43006027	N'ɔɔ dang jìng nɛɛ nɔɔ kãa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ dang jìng ka nɔng vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lasɛ kpang dondong, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang n naa a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa tusu nɛɛ wu a wu naa tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
43006028	Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Ruu palɛ vi tɔ̀ɔ ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ ruu palɛ viya?”
43006029	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn ka zang ɓɔɔ wu shong ɓɛɛ. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
43006030	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “A mɔɔ p'al'ɛ ɓu vi ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ ruu mã naa ka danggn, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu shing danggn kaa bii ɓaaɓɛ viya?
43006031	Rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Maanaa ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri ka jìngti ɓɛɛ. Zang bee ka yeti Labeenang Laa nɛɛ, ‘A ri borodi nɛɛ lapa ri shaayi.’”
43006032	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, wu Musa a nɔɔ borodi ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi Daa mɛɛ 'al'ɛ nɔɔ borodi ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ nɛɛ lapa.
43006033	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, borodi Laa, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ à nɛɛ lapa 'a zang koo keɓe suru bii ɓɛɛ.”
43006034	Ri gàa wu nɛɛ, “Maalang, alɛ ruu kaa borodi keɓe kɔ diki diki.”
43006035	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri kati tɔɔ, “Nkɔ borodi ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ a ka bì'i mɛɛ nyɔkɔ nyɔ wu takpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti shing danggn ka bì'i mɛɛ, sutu mãa wu takpang.
43006036	Naa ɓaasi n kɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ nɔɔ zi m tɔ nɔɔ ti shing danggn gn ka bii mɛɛ kpang.
43006037	Zang ɓɔɔ Laa a m, a kaa bii mɛɛ nandon. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ a ka bii mɛɛ, n hing wu kpang.
43006038	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n a nɛɛ lapa, nɛɛ n naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ shong m kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
43006039	Zang ɓɔɔ shong m, kasɛ nɛɛ n ning zang gbete ka teteng zang kɔ wu a m ri ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɛɛ n naa wisi ri paa katɔ kɔ jong, ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
43006040	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Daa mɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing jìng ka bii mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n Jaa, nɛɛ ti shing danggn ka bì'i mɛɛ, wu walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. N ti naa wisi wu paa, n a wu suru bii ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
43006041	A zang Yahudawa ri gaayu yee gɔ̃ɔrɔnang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nkɔ borodi ɓɔɔ à nɛɛ lapa” ɓɛɛ.
43006042	A ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Wee ɓi Yeesɔ jaa Yusufu kpang ya? Ruu zi rɛɛ diiɓɛ nɛɛ niiɓɛ tɔ kpang ya? A palɛ kaa biya kɔɔ lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ, wu a nɛɛ lapa viya?”
43006043	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yaa yee kɔ nɔɔ gɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓi ta.”
43006044	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ shong m dɔ̃ zang, zang a ka bii mɛɛ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ zunung anang ka bii mɛɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. N ti naa wisi wu paa ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
43006045	Rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri beeyi nɛɛ, ‘Ri nandon Laa kɔ naa tusu ri vuu.’ Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ tusu, nɛɛ ti kpɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a katɔ ka bii mɛɛ.
43006046	N kɔ̀'ɔ wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zi Daa tɔ kagn kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa kɔ zi Daa ɓi shɛ̃ɛning.
43006047	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ.
43006048	Nkɔ borodi ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ.
43006049	Rɛɛ dabang manɛ, ri shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ maanaa ka ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ ka jìngti ri vɔlɔ doo nɛɛ mani.
43006050	Borodi ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa keɓe, naa zang ɓɔɔ shaayi, vɔ takpang.
43006051	Nkɔ borodi ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii, ɓɔɔ n a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ. Naa zang ɓɔɔ shaa borodi keɓe, nwang ningkãari dondong. Ɓi bii mɛɛ kɔ borodi keɓe, ɓɔɔ n naa malɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang koo ri walɛ suru bii ɓɛɛ.”
43006052	Zang Yahudawa bì'i ri làa zɔɔ nyaa ka naa ɓarɛ gbãnggbãng ri hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe a ruu yɔpɔ bii ɓiɓɛ biya ruu shaayi viya?”
43006053	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, naa nɔɔ shaa yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang kpang, a nɔɔ ti ɓoo zìi mɛɛ kpang, suru bii ɓi kagn bì'i manɛ kpang.
43006054	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ sh'aà yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ, nɛɛ ti ɓoo zìi mɛɛ, walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang katɔ. N ti naa wisi wu paa ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
43006055	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ, ɓi vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Zìi mɛɛ, ɓi ti vuu ɓoonang ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
43006056	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shaa yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ, nɛɛ ti ɓoo zìi mɛɛ, nwang ɓi nɛɛ n, n ti nw'ang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ.
43006057	Naa ɓɔɔ Daa ɓɔɔ sh'ing zang, zang nwang ningkãari ɓɔɔ wukɔ shong m, shing m n nwàng ningkãari. Naa zang ɓɔɔ shaa yɔpɔ bii mɛɛ, n shing wu doo nɔngkɔ, wu nwang ningkãari.
43006058	Weɓe kɔ, borodi ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ. Ɓi naa maanaa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang manɛ ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, ri shaarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ shaa borodi keɓe, vɔ takpang dondong.”
43006059	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ wu tusu zang vuu ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ka Kafanahu ɓɛɛ.
43006060	Zang dɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu keɓe, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Vuu kɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ, kpãa nyaa dɔli, ɓu wi ɓaa shoo tãayi wiya?”
43006061	Yeesɔ tantɛ zinang nɛɛ ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ kɔ, a kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Ruu keɓe lasɛ nɔɔ yeti, nɔɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ kaatɔ ya?
43006062	A naa nɔɔ zi m, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang, n gbãayu kana ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n kagn, nɔɔ palɛ biya?
43006063	Ɓi Suru Laa a zang suru bii ɓiri, bii shɔnzang zunung vuu ɓɔɔ palɛnang ɓi kpang. Ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓi ka yuu Suru ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ.
43006064	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng manɛ, ri shing danggn gn kpang kɔ sasak.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi tɔ dòo ka tìng ɓɛɛ.
43006065	A gisi ruu keɓe tɔkn tɔɔ, “Wee vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ n tɔɔ, naa Daa dɔ̃ zang, zang a ka bii mɛɛ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ zunung anang nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang kɔ.”
43006066	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ yi nɛɛ diki kaɓa daa nɛɛ mani, zang dɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ri yaa wu, ri rakɛ tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ wu kpang.
43006067	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ yaa m kaa tɔ jong ya?”
43006068	Siman Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, ruu daa kaa bii wiya? Mɔkɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
43006069	Ruu shing danggn tɔ, a ruu ti zi tɔ nɛɛ mɔkɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
43006070	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Wu nkɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔɔ wee nɔɔ kopi tu ziti ɓee kpang ya? Zang gbete ka teteng manɛ ɓi suru shi kpang.”
43006071	Rang ruu keɓe ɓi ka yuu Yahuda, jaa Siman Isikariyoti. Yahuda ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, wukɔ ti naa nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ.
43007001	Ka knti rɛɛ vuu keɓe, Yeesɔ rakɛ ka tipi Galili, a kasɛ nɛɛ wu rakɛ ka tipi Yahudiya kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Yahudawa kãa wu nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
43007002	Diki nyaalaa zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ zang waarɛ putali, zang nwang kagn, a naabm tɔ.
43007003	A rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Yaa nihn ta, mɔɔ daa tipi Yahudiya, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kati.
43007004	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ zang zi wu nung, waasɛ bii katɔ wu palɛ vuu kpang. Wee mɔkɔ palɛ vuu keɓe ɓee, tusu yuu ɓaaɓɛ ta, tɔ̀ɔ, zang koo piti ri zi mɔɔ nung.”
43007005	Rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ bì'i nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
43007006	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Laa ɓɔɔ n daa nɔng nyaalaa a gn kpang gbongkarɛ. Ɓɔɔ manɛ, laa piti daa nɔɔ manɛ tɔ.
43007007	Zang koo keɓe ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ manɛ kpang. Ri bɛ̃ɛ ɓarɛ nkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔrɔ ri nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓi vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
43007008	Nɔɔ daa nɔng nyaalaa manɛ ta. N daa nɔng nyaalaa keɓe m kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓɔɔ n daayi a gn kpang ɓɛɛ.”
43007009	Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a nw'ang ɓi kaa Galili ka nɔngkɔ.
43007010	Rɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ri daa nɔng nyaalaa tɔ, a Yeesɔ naa dũng ri kaa nɛɛ knti. Daayi naa ɓɔɔ zang piti ri zi wu ɓɛɛ kpang. Daa nɛɛ nwiiri.
43007011	Zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri kãa wu kana ka nɔng nyaalaa. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ kana nɛɛ, “Ɓu kiya?”
43007012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri rangkɛ yee nɛɛ nwiiri ka yuu ɓiɓɛ dɔli. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe yɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe nwaarɛ zang katɔ.”
43007013	A zang ɓɔɔ rang yee kaa tɔ̀'ɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ, naa ɓɔɔ zang piti tãa ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang kaa vɔrɔ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ.
43007014	Diki nyaalaa daa tɔ dɛ̃ɛti, a Yeesɔ naa daa kaa Gãa Laa, a gàa zang yuu vuu tusunang kaa nɔngkɔ.
43007015	Zang Yahudawa ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe p'alɛ̀ biya zi vuu nɔngkɔ, ti mantɛ vuu gngn kpang viya?”
43007016	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu keɓe, ɓi ɓɔɔ yuu mɛɛ kpang, a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.
43007017	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ n t'usù nɛɛ a nɛɛ bii Laa, zang keɓe nɛ̀'ɛ zi katɔ. N nɛɛ ti kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ ɓɔɔ yuu mɛɛ, nɛ̀'ɛ ti zi katɔ kpang ya?
43007018	Zang ɓɔɔ rang yee ɓɔɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ, kã̀'a ɓi yuu ɓiɓɛ bannang. Zang ɓɔɔ kã̀'a zang ɓɔɔ shong wu bannang, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Nw'aarɛ̀ zang ɓi kpang.
43007019	Wu Musa kɔ a nɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kpang ya? Zang ɓɔɔ dũng nyaa dannang bì'i kagn teteng manɛ gbete kpang? Nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ ka ruu viya?”
43007020	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kp'alɛ̀ zɔɔ, ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓaaɓɛ ning. Wi kãa gbalang nɛɛ wu nyɔ mɔɔ vɔrɔ wiya?”
43007021	Yeesɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn gbete kɔ nwani, nɔɔ mã naa tɔ ka danggn.
43007022	Musa kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ yee wujɛ manɛ shaa katɔ (wu ti Musa kpang, ɓi dabang manɛ ɓɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ri gaayu) ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ yee jaa shaa ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang.
43007023	Naa zang yee jaa shaa katɔ ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ ta nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ, a nɔɔ lasɛ yeti nɛɛ n ka ruu ɓɔɔ n masɛ shɔnzang ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ka ruu viya?
43007024	N'ɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zì nɛɛ jìng waati kpang, nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ka vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.”
43007025	A zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang Urushalima ri hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ, “Wee ɓi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang kãayi nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kpang ya?
43007026	A wee rang yee ka dalɛ waati ɓee. Zang ti ãa wu nyaa tɔɔ bii kpang. Zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri kasɛ tɔ kati, nɛɛ wukɔ Kirisi ya?
43007027	Ruu zi nɔng ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe a nɛɛ mani tɔ. Kirisi nɛɛ a tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ z'i nɔng ɓɔɔ wu a nɛɛ mani ɓi kpang.”
43007028	Yeesɔ tusu zang vuu kana ka Gãa Laa, a mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ zi m tɔ, a nɔɔ ti zi nɔng ɓɔɔ n a nɛɛ mani tɔ. N a m anang yuu mɛɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓi nizang kɔ nwani. Nɔɔ zi wu kpang.
43007029	N zi wu m tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n à nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Wukɔ ti shong m ɓɛɛ,”
43007030	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kãa gbalang nɛɛ ri yi wu katɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ lee wu naa kaa tɔ̀'ɔ bii kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ laa ɓiɓɛ yaa doogn ɓɛɛ.
43007031	Zang dɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ. A ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Naa Kirisi arɛ, naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓa ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe ɓu katɔ ya?”
43007032	Zang Farisawa ri tãa naa ɓɔɔ zang ri rangkɛ yee keɓe nɛɛ nwiiri ka yuu Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. A ri nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, ri shong zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa nɛɛ ri daa yi wu.
43007033	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ diki bee tɔ̀'ɔ dɔli kpang, tɔ̀ɔ 'n gbãayu, n daa bii zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.
43007034	Nɔɔ naa kãa m, nɔɔ ìi m kpang. Nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa kagn nɔɔ daa manɛ kpang.”
43007035	Zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri kɔɔrɔ ka naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Naa daa kaa niya a ruu ìi wu kpang wiya? Daa kaa rɛɛ gari zang Heleniyawa ɓɔɔ zang ɓuru ri nwalɛ kagn wu tusu zang Heleniyawa vuu ya?
43007036	Kɔɔ ka ruu vi nɛɛ ruu naa kãa wu, ruu ìi wu kpang, a ɓɔɔ ti nɛɛ ruu dàa nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang viya?”
43007037	Diki ɓɔɔ nyaalaa waa nyaa kagn kɔ, ɓa diki ɓɔɔ tɛɛrɛ tɔ nandon. Ka diki kaɓa, Yeesɔ shii paa, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ sutu nɛɛ mãa wu, wu a ka bii mɛɛ, n a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu ɓooyi.
43007038	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Rang mii ɓɔɔ a zang suru, ri zɛ̃ɛ ditɔ nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ.’”
43007039	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe, ɓi ka yuu Suru Laa ɓɔɔ Laa naa a zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka laa kaɓa, bɛɛ Laa a ri Suru bii gn kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang wisi Yeesɔ paa gn nɛɛ sàa, zang a wu bannang kpang ɓɛɛ.
43007040	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpàl'ɛ zɔɔ, ka ɓɔɔ ri tãa wu, kɔɔ ruu keɓe, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Laa bì'i kɔ nizang.”
43007041	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Wukɔ Kirisi bì'i.” A zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Kirisi naa a nɛɛ Galili ya?
43007042	Labeenang Laa kɔ̀ɔyi tɔɔ, Kirisi naa nwang ɓi nɛɛ teteng zɔ̃ng kpanti Dawuda, nɛɛ zang ti naa yi Kirisi ka Bɛtalami, gari ɓɔɔ Dawuda nw'ang kagn ɓɛɛ.”
43007043	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpàl'ɛ zɔɔ ri basɛ zɔɔ kaa ruu Yeesɔ.
43007044	Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ ri yi wu katɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ lee wu naa kaa tɔ̀'ɔ bii gbete kpang.
43007045	Ka ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa ri gbãayu, rɛɛ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ Farisawa ri hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ 'atɛ̀ wu kpang ka ruu viya?”
43007046	Zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa, ri kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ràng yee gngn naa yɔɔ keɓe kpang.”
43007047	Rɛɛ Farisawa ri hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nwaarɛ nɔɔ tɔ jong ya?
43007048	Nɔɔ zi zang bang bang zang Yahudawa tɔ nɛɛ zang Farisawa ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ gbete ya?
43007049	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpàl'ɛ zɔɔ kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dangnɛ ɓarɛ kpang kɔ ri shing danggn shɛ̃ɛning. Ri shaarɛ ɓarɛ katɔ kɔ nwani.”
43007050	Nikodimu zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ, ɓɔɔ daa bii Yeesɔ tɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, hɛ̃ɛ zang nimbang tɔɔ,
43007051	“Nyaa dannang ɓuru kɔ̀ɔ katɔ nɛɛ ruu dɔng zang ruu, nɛɛ zang nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ta, bɛɛ ruu tãa ruu gn nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?”
43007052	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ doo zang Galili kɔ waa? Kãa yeti Labeenang Laa karɛ, mɔɔ ìi kagn zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa naa nw'ang nyaa nɛɛ Galili kpang.”
43007053	A zang ɓu yi gbalang, daa gãa ɓiɓɛ kati.
43008001	Ạ Yeesɔ vang ɓi ka yuu kɔpɔ Zeetung.
43008002	Nɛɛ gãndi zãngzãng, gbãayu tɔkn ka Gãa Laa, a zang dɔli ri kp'alɛ̀ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Nwang ka tipi a gaa ri yuu vuu tusunang kati.
43008003	Zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang Labeenang Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Farisawa, ri atɛ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang ìi ka nɔng dũndũng palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Ri daa nɛɛ jaa soro, ri daa shing wu, nɛɛ wu shii ka teteng zang ka tìng Yeesɔ.
43008004	A ri kɔɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, “Maalang, jaa soro keɓe, zang ìi wu bɛɛ palɛ dũndũng.
43008005	Ka yeti Labeenang ɓuru, Musa dang ruu nyaa tɔɔ ruu luku zang soro ɓɔɔ naa weɓe nɛɛ tari, wu vɔrɛ. Mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓaa kaa nɛɛ viya?”
