43008006	Ri lang ɓarɛ saka nɛɛ ruu kɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ ɓee, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri walɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kati. A Yeesɔ ɓaa yuu ka dii, bee vuu ka tipi nɛɛ saa naa.
43008007	Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ wu doo naa sasak, a wisi bii paa kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Zang gbete ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang gngn kpang, wukɔ wu gaayu, wu lu jaa soro keɓe nɛɛ tari.”
43008008	A ɓaa yuu tɔkn dii, bee vuu ka tipi nɛɛ saa naa.
43008009	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu keɓe, ri daarɛ nandon gbete gbete. Rɛɛ zang bang kɔ ri gaayu daarɛnang shɔɔnang. Zang yaa kaa Yeesɔ ka bm nɛɛ jaa soro bì'i ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu shii ɓɛɛ.
43008010	Yeesɔ wisi bii paa, a hɛ̃ɛ jaa soro nɛɛ, “Ri kaa kiya, jaa soro? Zang yaa kagn gbete ɓɔɔ dɔng mɔɔ ruu kpang ya?”
43008011	Jaa soro kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang wu gbete kpang, Maalang.” A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N ti dɔng mɔɔ ruu kpang kɔ doori. Dita, mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang takpang.”
43008012	A Yeesɔ rang zang Farisawa yee tɔkn tɔɔ, “Nkɔ yakɛ koo, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dñ̀ng m ra ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔɔ katɔ kpang. Walɛ ɓi nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ kɔ jong.”
43008013	A zang Farisawa ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓi nizang kpang.”
43008014	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa n kɔɔ ruu doo ka yuu mɛɛ, ruu mɛɛ ɓi nizang kɔ nwani, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi nɔng ɓɔɔ n a nɛɛ mani tɔ, n ti zi nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa gn tɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ n a nɛɛ mani manɛ kpang, nɔɔ ti zi nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa gn ɓɛɛ kpang.
43008015	Nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu manɛ naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang jɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. N jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu m kpang.
43008016	Naa n nɛɛ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu doo katɔ, ruu jɛ̃ɛnang mɛɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ nizang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu m ka bm kpang ɓɛɛ. Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ shong m, ɓi nɛɛ n ning.
43008017	Ka yeti Labeenang nyaa dannang manɛ, zang beeyi nɛɛ naa zang ziti ri kɔɔ nyaa gbete, ruu ɓarɛ ɓi nizang kɔ nwani.
43008018	N kɔɔ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ, a Daa ɓɔɔ shong m, ti kɔɔ ruu jong ka yuu mɛɛ.”
43008019	A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓu kiya?” Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi m kpang, nɔɔ ti zi Daa mɛɛ doo kpang kɔ. Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ zi m tɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi Daa mɛɛ tɔ kɔ doori.”
43008020	Kɔɔ ruu keɓe, bɛ̀'ɛ tusu zang vuu ka yeti Gãa Laa, naabm nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ saka ɓɔɔ zang 'a Laa ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ yi wu kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓiɓɛ à gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
43008021	Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “N daa kaa tɔ, nɔɔ naa kãa m, nɔɔ vɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang manɛ ning. Nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa gn, nɔɔ daa manɛ kpang.”
43008022	A rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ nɛɛ, “Wee kɔɔyi nɛɛ ruu daa nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa kpang ɓɛɛ, nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa vɔrɔ ya?”
43008023	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ manɛ zang koo keɓe, n a m nɛɛ lapa. Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ manɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, n rɛ̃rɛ m nɔngkɔ kpang.
43008024	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ vɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang manɛ ning. Nɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn nɛɛ nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ n tɔɔ, nkɔ wukɔ kpang, nɔɔ naa vɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang manɛ.”
43008025	Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ ɓu wiya?” Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ doo ka tìng nɛɛ nkɔ wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
43008026	Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀'ɔ ka yuu manɛ kagn dɔli, ɓɔɔ n dɔng nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ shong m suu sè'e ɓi kpang, n ti kɔɔ zang koo keɓe m vuu ɓɔɔ n tãa ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
43008027	Ri zi ɓarɛ kpang nɛɛ Yeesɔ rang ri yee ɓi ka yuu Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓɛɛ kpang.
43008028	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ wisi m, ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang tɔ ka yuu laa, n'ɔɔ naa zi kati nɛɛ nkɔ wukɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zi kati nɛɛ n palɛ vuu gbete nɛɛ kaka yuu mɛɛ kpang. N kɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ Daa kɔɔ m nɛɛ n kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ.
43008029	Zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓi nɛɛ n, yaa m ka bm kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ diki, diki ɓɛɛ.”
43008030	Zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu kɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔrɔ ɓee, ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
43008031	Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ yiti ruu kɔ n tusu nɔɔ ɓee gbãnggbãng, nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ.
43008032	Nɔɔ naa zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang katɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ nizang keɓe, ti yaa nɔɔ naa katɔ.”
43008033	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “Ruu ɓuru zɔ̃ng Ibirayi, ruu nwàng jaafoo zang ɓɔɔ, ɓuru gngn kpang. Mɔɔ kɔɔ biya nɛɛ zang yaa ruu naa katɔ viya?”
43008034	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ huu shoo nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang, ɓi kaa jaafoo vuu shi kpang.
43008035	Jaafoo nw'ang ɓi ka gãa ɓɔɔ wu kagn dondong kpang, ɓi jaa kɔ nwang shɛ̃ɛning.
43008036	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Jaa nɛɛ yaa nɔɔ naa tɔ, zang yaa nɔɔ tɔ dondong.
43008037	N zi tɔ nɔɔ manɛ zɔ̃ng Ibirayi. A ka ruu vi nɔɔ kãa gbalang nɛɛ nɔɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ta ruu mɛɛ ka yeti manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
43008038	N kɔɔ nɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ n zi ka nɔng Daa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ palɛ manɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ka nyaa daa manɛ ɓɛɛ.”
43008039	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Daa ɓuru ɓi Ibirayi.” Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ wujɛ Ibirayi, nɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Ibirayi p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ.
43008040	Kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ kãa gbalang nɛɛ nɔɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ, ɓɔɔ nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ n tãa ka nyaa Laa ɓɛɛ. Ibirayi p'alɛ̀ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe ɓi kpang.
43008041	Nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ manɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa manɛ p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ.” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, ɓi wukɔ Daa ɓuru gbete. Zang yi ruu ɓuru jaa nɔng zaakn kpang.”
43008042	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa Laa kɔ nɛɛ daa manɛ nizang, nɔɔ nɛɛ kàs'ɛ ruu mɛɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n nwangnɛ bii Laa kɔ, n a ka nihn ɓɛɛ. N a m anang yuu mɛɛ kpang, wukɔ shong m.
43008043	Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang ka ruu viya? Ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ dñ̀ng vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
43008044	Nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ daa manɛ sheetang, a nɔɔ ti kasɛ manɛ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa manɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Daa manɛ nyɔ̀kɔ̀ zang vɔrɔ ɓi doo ka tìng. Ruu ɓiɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nizang ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. N'aa suu sè'e, palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ nwani, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ɓi zang sè'e, a sè'e ti nwàng ɓi nɛɛ bì'i ɓiɓɛ kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.
43008045	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ m ruu ɓɔɔ nizang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ sh'ing danggn ka bii mɛɛ kpang.
43008046	Zang gbete kagn teteng manɛ, ɓɔɔ t'usù vuu shi kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ ya? N nɛɛ kɔ̀'ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nizang, a nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ kpang ka ruu viya?
43008047	Zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang Laa, ɓaa shoo ɓi ka ruu Laa. Nɔɔ manɛ zang Laa kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ shoo ɓaanang ka ruu mɛɛ kpang.”
43008048	Zang Yahudawa ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔyi nɛɛ mɔɔ zang tipi Samariya, suru shi kpang ti kagn bii ɓaaɓɛ, nizang kɔ nwani kɔ.”
43008049	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Suru shi kpang ɓi ka bii mɛɛ kpang. N 'a m Daa mɛɛ bannang, nɔɔ a m bannang manɛ kpang.
43008050	N ti kã̀'a wu yuu mɛɛ bannang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kãa m ɓɛɛ ɓi kagn, wukɔ ti naa jɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓiri.
43008051	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yiti ruu mɛɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ vɔ kpang dondong.”
43008052	Ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri tãa naa weɓe, ri tɔɔ, “Ruu zi tɔ kati, suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓaaɓɛ. Ibirayi vɔ tɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa piti, mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓ'aa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yiti ruu ɓaaɓɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, vɔ kpang ya?
43008053	Mɔɔ ɓa dabang ɓuru Ibirayi ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓu kaatɔ ya? Rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, ri ti vɔlɔ jong. Mɔɔ ɓaa ɓu ka wiya?”
43008054	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa n 'a yuu mɛɛ bannang, bannang keɓe ɓi ɓɔɔ waati ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ a m bannang ɓi Daa mɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ wukɔ Là'a manɛ ɓɛɛ.
43008055	Nɔɔ zi wu gngn kpang, n zi wu m tɔ. Naa n kɔɔyi nɛɛ n zi wu kpang, n nw'ang kaa zang sè'e naa nɔkɔ. N zi wu m tɔ, n ti ta nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang.
43008056	Daa manɛ Ibirayi tãa tìnang dɔli, ka ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu zi diki ɓɔɔ n a kagn ɓɛɛ. Ti zirɛ a tãa tìnang dɔli.”
43008057	Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Saa ɓaaɓɛ daa laa ziti tu kopi gn kpang naa mɔɔ nɛɛ zi Ibirayi tɔ ya?”
43008058	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, ɓɔɔ zang yi Ibirayi bɛɛ n m kaa gn kɔ nwani.”
43008059	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri yakɛ tari nɛɛ ri luku wu kaatɔ. Waayi, a nwang nɛɛ nwiiri yaa Gãa Laa.
43009001	Yeesɔ daa kana gbalang, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang yi wu jìng ringtang ɓɛɛ.
43009002	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang, ɓu wi palɛ vuu shi kpang, a zang yi yɔɔ keɓe jìng ringtang wiya? Yɔɔ kɔ̀ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ya, k'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yi wu ɓɛɛ?”
43009003	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Wu yɔɔ kɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kpang, wu ti rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri yi wu ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang yi wu jìng ringtang, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi naa vuu palɛnang Laa, ka ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang ka bii yɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
43009004	R'uu palɛ shoonang zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ, bɛɛ doo nɔng laagɛ̃. Nɔng zìi a kana ɓɔɔ zang palɛ shoonang tɔ̀'ɔ gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.
43009005	Wee n doo ka koo ɓɛɛ, nkɔ yakɛ koo.”
43009006	Yeesɔ kɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ, a tu sisãa ka tipi, a tɔɔlɔ tapɔng nɛɛ mani, a bɔɔlɔ yɔɔ jìng ringtang ka jìng.
43009007	A kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Dita, mɔɔ daa sɔɔ jìng ka too mii ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Siluwa ɓɛɛ.” (Dìiri nung keɓe ɓi, “Zang shongnɛ”). A yɔɔ daayi, daa sɔɔ jìng, a gbãayu jìng ɓiɓɛ zi nɔng kana.
43009008	Zang ɓɔɔ ri roo nyaa gãa nɛɛ wu, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi wu tɔ gn gàar'ɛ vuu ɓɛɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ, “Wee ɓu bɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ nwalɛ gàar'ɛ vuu ɓɛɛ kpang ya?”
43009009	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ wukɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Ɓi wukɔ kpang, zang nw'ang wu katɔ.” A yɔɔ bii kɔɔ kaa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Ɓi nkɔ.”
43009010	Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “A palɛ kaa biya mɔɔ zi nɔng kaatɔ viya?”
43009011	Kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ tapɔng, bɔɔlɔ m ka jìng. A kɔɔ m nɛɛ n daa ka too mii ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Siluwa ɓɛɛ, n daa sɔɔ jìng. A n daa kati, ɓu doo ɓɔɔ n sɔɔ jìng hn, jìng mɛɛ zi nɔng k'aa tɔkn.”
43009012	Ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ bì'i ɓu kiya?” Yɔɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “N zi kpang.”
43009013	Ri daa nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bɛɛ jìng ringtang, ka nɔng zang Farisawa.
43009014	Diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ tapɔng kagn a màsɛ̀ yɔɔ jìng nɛɛ mani, ɓi ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang.
43009015	Zang Farisawa ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔkn naa ɓɔɔ jìng ɓiɓɛ zi nɔng kaa tɔkn ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, Yɔɔ bɔɔlɔ m tapɔng ka jìng, n sɔɔ jìng mɛɛ, a n zi nɔng kati.
43009016	Ka teteng zang Farisawa bì'i, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe, a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang ka yuu diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.” Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ, nɛɛ, “Naa yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, nɛɛ zunung ɓɔɔ wu palɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn, naa rɛɛ wee wu p'alɛ̀ ɓee kpang.” A ri basɛ zɔɔ kaa n'ɔngkɔ̀.
43009017	A zang Farisawa ri hɛ̃ɛ yɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “Wee m'as'ɛ jìng ɓaaɓɛ tɔ ɓee, mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ vi, ka yuu ɓiɓɛ viya?” Yɔɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ bì'i ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Laa.”
43009018	Rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ri kasɛ gn kpang kɔ sasak. Ri kasɛ gn kpang nɛɛ bɛɛ yɔɔ bì'i jìng ringtang, a zang màsɛ̀ wu jìng kpang. Ri ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yi wu ɓɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ.
43009019	A ri hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Wee jaa manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ nɔɔ yi wu jìng ringtang kɔ ya? A palɛ bɛ̀'ɛ zi nɔng kaa tɔkn viya?”
43009020	Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi yɔɔ, ri kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu zi tɔ ɓi jaa ɓuru kɔ, ruu ti zi tɔ ruu yi wu jìng ringtang.
43009021	Naa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, zi nɔng kãntang keɓe, naa wi ti màsɛ̀ wu jìng wiya, ruu zi ɓuru kpang. Bang tɔ, daa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu ta, kɔɔ nɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ.”
43009022	Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yi yɔɔ ri kasɛ nyaa nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang Yahudawa bii katɔ ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ri kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, wu kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi, ri zãa wu gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang daanang katɔ.
43009023	Ka ruu weɓe kɔ, rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ y'i yɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Bang tɔ, daa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ, nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu ta.”
43009024	Ri ɓaa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bɛɛ jìng ringtang nyaa tɔkn, daa kaa doo ziti, a ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ, ruu zi ɓuru tɔ, yɔɔ kaɓa ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
43009025	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ m'as'ɛ, kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa ti zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ya, n zi kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ n zirɛ ɓi gbete. N zi m ɓɔɔ ɓeleng, bɛɛ n jìng ringtang, kãntang keɓe n zi nɔng kaatɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.”
43009026	A ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ viya? Puu mɔɔ jìng biya?”
43009027	Yɔɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ, doo ɓasi ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo kagn kpang. Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ tãa kaa tɔkn ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ jong ya?”
43009028	Ri dãlɛ wu, a ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Ɓi mɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii yɔɔ kaɓa shɛ̃ɛning. Ruu ɓuru zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Musa ɓɛɛ.
43009029	“Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ, nɛɛ Laa rang yee nɛɛ Musa. Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kaɓa ruu zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu a ɓi nɛɛ mani kpang.”
43009030	Yɔɔ kasɛ nyaa, “Wee vuu ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ kaɓa masɛ jìng mɛɛ. Nɔɔ kɔɔ biya nɛɛ nɔɔ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu a nɛɛ mani kpang viya?
43009031	Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ, nɛɛ Laa ɓaa shoo ɓi jong ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓ'aa shoo ɓi ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri bang wu, ri ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ, ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
43009032	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ koo gaayu katɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu tãa gngn nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ m'asɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ zang yi wu jìng ringtang kpang.
43009033	Naa yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ a nɛɛ nɔng Laa kpang, nɛɛ zunung vuu keɓe palɛnang kpang.”
43009034	Ri kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ zang yi mɔkɔ ka yeti vuu shi kpang kirik, mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ tusu rukɔ vuu ya?” Ri hing wu ka biling.
43009035	Yeesɔ tãa nyaa nɛɛ zang hing yɔɔ ɓɔɔ wu m'asɛ̀ tɔ. Yeesɔ kãa wu, naa ìi wu, a hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Jaa Shɔnzang ya?”
43009036	Yɔɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Jaa Shɔnzang bì'i ɓu wiya? Kɔɔ m ta, n shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ.”
43009037	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi wu tɔ, wukɔ ti rang yee nɛɛ mɔɔ.”
43009038	A yɔɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, n shing danggn tɔ,” a bang Yeesɔ kati.
43009039	Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N à ka koo keɓe nɛɛ n naa basɛ teteng zang. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri jìng ringtang ri zi nɔng. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi nɔng katɔ jìng ɓarɛ wu zuuyi.”
43009040	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Farisawa ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu, ri tãa naa weɓe, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Wee jìng ɓuru zuu ɓu kaa tɔ jong ya?”
43009041	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Naa jìng manɛ nɛɛ zuu katɔ, zang nɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ nɔɔ zi nɔng manɛ katɔ, vuu shi kpang manɛ nw'ang tɔ ka bii manɛ ka nɔngkɔ.”
43010001	Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tù yeti vaa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ nɛɛ nyaa vaa kpang, nɛɛ sɔɔ nɔng ɓɔɔgn ɓi shɔngɓɔ, a ɓi ti zang ɓɔɔ ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ɓɛɛ.
43010002	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ sɔɔ nyaa vaa, ɓi wukɔ jagang mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ nizang.
43010003	Zang ɓɔɔ gã nyaa vaa, puu wu katɔ. Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓiɓɛ ri tãa yee ɓiɓɛ katɔ. Ɓaarɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ nung ɓarɛ gbete gbete, wu nwangsɛ ri ka biling.
43010004	Nɛɛ nwangsɛ ri tɔ, wu sɔɔ tìng a mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ri dũng wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi yee ɓiɓɛ nung tɔ ɓɛɛ.
43010005	Ri dñ̀ng zang zanti kpang. Ri yuu zang bì'i katɔ kɔ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi yee ɓiɓɛ nung kpang ɓɛɛ.”
43010006	Yeesɔ rang rɛɛ zang Farisawa yee keɓe nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang, a ri zi dìiri nyaa vuu jeenang bì'i kaa takpang.
43010007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, nkɔ nyaa vaa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ.
43010008	Zang ɓɔɔ ri 'a ka tìng mɛɛ nandon, ri ɓarɛ shɔngɓɔ, a ri ti zang ɓɔɔ ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ɓɛɛ. Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ri ti ɓ'aa shoo ka nyaa ɓarɛ kpang.
43010009	Nkɔ nyaa vaa. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tù nɛɛ bii mɛɛ, zang ta yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ. Ti hãa nyaa, wu nwangnɛ, wu ti walɛ nɔng shaanang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
43010010	Shɔngɓɔ ri a ɓarɛ nɔng vuu ɓɔɔnang, ri ti nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ, a ri lasɛ vuu. N a m nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ walɛ suru bii. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ nwang ningkãari, nɔɔ ti walɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
43010011	“Nkɔ jagang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Jagang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ malɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓiɓɛ.
43010012	Zang ɓɔɔ mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ wu ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang, zang shu wu katɔ, wu shaa zang mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ. Naa zi zaa wisi arɛ, yuu katɔ wu yaa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ. Zaa wusi yiki mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, wu ti tantɛ ɓɔɔ yaa ɓɛɛ.
43010013	Zang keɓe yuu ka ruu ɓɔɔ gn mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ kɔng wu kpang, a mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ wu ti ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
43010014	“Nkɔ jagang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ Daa zi m nung tɔ, n zi Daa nung tɔ jong. N zi mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ nung doo nɔngkɔ, ri ti zi m nung tɔ jong. N ti malɛ yuu mɛɛ, zang nyɔ m vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓarɛ.
43010016	Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ti kagn, ɓɔɔ ri ka vaa keɓe kpang ɓɛɛ. N atɛ ri ditɔ jong. Ri naa tã̀'a yee mɛɛ ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri nwang kaa vàa gbete, jagang ɓarɛ ti gbete.
43010017	“Daa kasɛ ruu mɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ, n malɛ yuu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang naa wisi m paa tɔkn.
43010018	Zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ kagn gbete kpang. Nkɔ kàs'ɛ zang nyɔ m vɔrɔ, nkɔ ti kàs'ɛ n nwang ningkãari tɔkn. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ n palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
43010019	Zang Yahudawa ri basɛ zɔɔ tɔkn ka ruu, ruu kɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ɓee.
43010020	Zang dɔli ka teteng ɓarɛ ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ. Ɓi shoko. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ ka ruu viya?”
43010021	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ ràng yee naa weɓe kpang. Suru shi kpang palɛ biya wu masɛ zang jìng ringtang viya?”
43010022	Bɛɛ kaa laa ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ zang a Gãa Laa tɔkn ɓɛɛ, ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ. Ka làa keɓe pũngku kpaa kana,
43010023	a Yeesɔ rakɛ ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang nwalɛ gn, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ka nung kpanti Sulemanu ɓɛɛ.
43010024	Rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ yaa ruu ɓu kaa naa weɓe kɔ sasak, ruu zi mɔɔ nung kpang ya? Mɔkɔ nɛɛ Kirisi, kɔɔ ruu faarik, mɔɔ wàasɛ̀ ruu kpang.”
43010025	Yeesɔ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn kɔ n palɛ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ a m ɓee, wukɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ.
43010026	Nɔɔ kasɛ danggn shinang ka bì'i mɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
43010027	Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ mɛɛ ri tãa yee mɛɛ ɓarɛ katɔ. N zi ri nung tɔ, a ri dũng m katɔ.
43010028	N a ri suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri vɔ ɓarɛ takpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zunung ɓɔɔ wu ta ri ka naa mɛɛ nɛɛ kaka kpang.
43010029	Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ a m ri, ɓa zang katɔ nandon. Zang ɓɔɔ ta ri nɛɛ naa Daa mɛɛ, nɛɛ kaka kagn gbete kpang.
43010030	Ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ Daa ruu gbete.”
43010031	A zang Yahudawa ri daa yakɛ tari tɔkn, nɛɛ ri luku wu nɛɛ mani.
43010032	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N p'al'ɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ dɔli, ɓɔɔ Daa a m naa nɛɛ n palɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ luku m, ɓu ka ruu wi ka teteng ɓarɛ gbete wiya?”
43010033	Zang Yahudawa ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu luku mɔɔ wu ka ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu luku mɔɔ, ka ruu ruu shi kpang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shɔnzang waati, mɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa Laa ɓɛɛ.”
43010034	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang bee ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang manɛ nɛɛ Laa tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ nwang manɛ naa Laa.’
43010035	Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔyi ɓi nizang dondong. Laa nɛɛ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ wu shong ri nɛɛ yee ɓiɓɛ tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ ri nwang naa Laa,
43010036	a zang ɓɔɔ Daa zɔ̃ngnɛ, a shong wu ka koo ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ kɔɔ ka ruu vi nɛɛ n kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔyi nɛɛ n Jaa Laa viya?
43010037	N'ɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ kpang, n nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ palɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
43010038	N nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ palɛ kɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn doo ka bii mɛɛ kpang, n'ɔɔ shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zi kaa gn dɔ̃ɔ gbete nɛɛ Daa kagn bii mɛɛ, nɛɛ n ti kagn bii Daa.”
43010039	Ri tɔɔ ri yi wu kaa tɔ tɔkn, a nwangnɛ nwiiri daayi.
43010040	A Yeesɔ ta rang Urudung tɔkn, daa ka nɔng ɓeleng ɓɔɔ Yɔhana pàl'ɛ zang batizima kagn ɓɛɛ, daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ.
43010041	Zang dɔli ri a ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Yɔhana p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓi kpang, vuu ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ka yuu yɔɔ keɓe nandon ɓi nizang kɔ nwani.”
43010042	Zang dɔli ri shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ ka nɔngkɔ.
43011001	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn roo gãa ka Bɛtani, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Liyazaru. Vuu p'al'ɛ wu katɔ. Bɛtani ɓi gari rɛɛ Marayamu nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Mata ɓɛɛ.
43011002	Marayamu keɓe, kɔ tũuru Yeesɔ nung ɓɔɔ pñ̀ngkù tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka doo, a àlɛ̀ nɛɛ suuyuu ɓiɓɛ. Liyazaru ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ keɓe, jaa niiɓɛ kɔ.
43011003	Rɛɛ ɓeenaa soro ziti keɓe, ri shòng Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, vuu palɛ zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ katɔ.”
43011004	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tãa ruu keɓe, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kɔnang keɓe nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kpang. Vuu keɓe p'alɛ̀ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu tusu zang bannang Laa, wu ti tusu zang bannang Jaa Laa kaa jong.”
43011005	Yeesɔ kasɛ ruu Mata katɔ nɛɛ jaa niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ soro, a ɓɔɔ Liyazaru.
43011006	Ɓɔɔ wu tãa nyaa nɛɛ vuu palɛ Liyazaru katɔ, nwang doo nɛɛ mani ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛɛ wu kagn ɓɛɛ, diki ziti tɔkn.
43011007	A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Ruu daa nɔɔ tipi Yahudiya tɔkn.”
43011008	A ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Maalang wee dò'o naa ɓee, zang Yahudawa nɛɛ ri luku mɔɔ nɛɛ tari mɔɔ vɔrɛ, mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ gbãayu ka nɔngkɔ tɔkn ya?”
43011009	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Laa nɛɛ nw'ang tɔ, palɛ saka kopi tu ziti tɔɔ wu hãa nyaa kpang ya? Zang ɓɔɔ rakɛ nɛɛ laagɛ̃, kpaa doo ɓi kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ yakɛ koo, yakɛ nɔng katɔ ɓɛɛ.
43011010	Naa rakɛ nɛɛ nɔng zìi, kpaa doo katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ yakɛ wu nɔng kpang ɓɛɛ.”
43011011	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe tɔ, a gisi ɓɔɔ kagn tɔɔ, “Hingro yi wusang ɓuru Liyazaru tɔ. N daa ditɔ, n daa hingsi wu.”
43011012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, hingro nɛɛ yi wu katɔ, hingsi jìng ditɔ.”
43011013	A ɓeekpang Yeesɔ gãsɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ Liyazaru vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri tɔɔ ɓarɛ naa Liyazaru roo ɓi hingro siri.
43011014	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri kaa faarik, tɔɔ, “Liyazaru vɔ tɔ.
43011015	Wee bɛɛ n nɛɛ wu kpang ɓee, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu manɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn kati. Ruu dita bii ɓiɓɛ.”
43011016	A Tooma (ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ jaa bãnang ɓɛɛ) kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu mantɛ vuu nɛɛ ri ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Ruu dita, ruu daa vɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ wu.”
43011017	Yeesɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, bɛɛ Liyazaru roo sà'a tɔ, daa diki dɛ̃ɛti.
43011018	Gari Bɛtani nɛɛ Urushalima daa mɛli ziti kpang,
43011019	zang tipi Yahudiya dɔli ri a tɔ, nɛɛ ri jee Marayamu nɛɛ Mata nyaa vɔ jaa naa ɓarɛ.
43011020	Mata tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ a kana, a nwangnɛ, nɛɛ wu daa kpisi wu yuu. Marayamu nwang ɓi kaa yeti gãa.
43011021	Mata kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Kpanti, naa mɔɔ nɛɛ ka nihn, jaanaa mɛɛ nɛɛ vɔ kpang.
43011022	N ti zi tɔ, naa mɔɔ gàa doo viya ka naa Laa kãntang, a mɔɔ katɔ.”
43011023	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Jaa naa ɓaaɓɛ yupaa ditɔ.”
43011024	Mata kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi tɔ, naa yupaa ditɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ saa, ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
43011025	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nkɔ wisi zang paa nɛɛ saa, nkɔ ti a zang suru bii. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, n'aa vɔ doori, nw'ang ningkãari ditɔ tɔkn.
43011026	Zang ɓɔɔ doo ningkãari, nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, vɔ kpang dondong, mɔɔ shing danggn tɔ kagn nɔngkɔ ya?”
43011027	Mata kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, Kpanti, N shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ, mɔkɔ Kirisi Jaa Laa, ɓɔɔ naa a ka koo ɓɛɛ.”
43011028	Mata kɔɔ ruu keɓe tɔ, a gbãayu daa yeti gãa, daa ɓaa jaa niiɓɛ Marayamu nyaa dang gbete, a kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang a tɔ, hɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓaaɓɛ.”
43011029	Ɓɔɔ Marayamu tãa naa weɓe, yupaa pati nwang ka biling, daa ka bii Yeesɔ.
43011030	Bɛɛ Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛ yeti gari gn kpang. Bɛɛ doo ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Mata kpisi wu yuu ɓɛɛ.
43011031	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri nɛɛ Marayamu ka yeti gãa, ri mã wu danggn, ri zi naa ɓɔɔ wu seepaa pati nw'ang ka biling, ri dũng wu ka knti. Ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa dàa kaa ɓi nyaavɔ ka yuu saa.
43011032	Marayamu naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kagn tɔ. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zi wu hn, daa tang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, naa mɔɔ nɛɛ ka nihn, jaanaa mɛɛ nɛɛ vɔ kpang.”
43011033	Yeesɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ wu kaayi, a zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ wu ri kaa jong ɓɛɛ. Vuu bì'i kpãa wu ka yeti dɔli, a gn ti kɔng wu dɔli.
43011034	A Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ gbãa wu ka niya?” Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Arɛ m'ɔɔ dàa zirɛ, Kpanti.”
43011035	Yeesɔ kaayi nɛɛ miiri ka jìng.
43011036	Zang Yahudawa ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
43011037	A zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ m'asɛ̀ jìng zang ɓɔɔ jìng ringtang, zunung ɓɔɔ wu zãa Liyazaru vɔnang kpang ya?”
43011038	Gn kɔng Yeesɔ tɔkn, a daa ka yuu sàa. Sàa bii ɓi yeng puru ɓɔɔ zang ku nyaa nɛɛ tari ɓɛɛ.
43011039	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dɔ̃ tari, nɔɔ yaa nɔng.” A Mata jaanaa Liyazaru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, wee diki ɓiɓɛ daa tɔ dɛ̃ɛti ka saa ɓɛɛ, pũng tɔ, pũngku kaa tɔ.”
43011040	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ mɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, naa mɔɔ shing danggn mɔɔ zi bannang Laa katɔ kpang ya?”
43011041	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri dɔ̃ tari ri yaa nɔng. A Yeesɔ tuu jìng ka lapa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Daa mɛɛ, n zãa mɔɔ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tãa m tɔ ɓɛɛ.
43011042	N zi tɔ, mɔɔ tãarɛ m katɔ diki diki. N kɔɔ vuu keɓe ka ruu zang kɔ ri shiiri ka nihn ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri shing danggn kati nɛɛ mɔkɔ shong m.”
43011043	Kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a ɓaa nyaa kaa nabm nɛɛ, “Liyazaru, nw'ang ta, mɔɔ a ka biling.”
43011044	Liyazaru nwangnɛ, doo naa ɓɔɔ zang dang wu nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang gbãa vɔrɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Zang ti mã wu jìng katɔ nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ. Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kãlɛ wu ta, nɔɔ yaa wu, wu daayi.”
43011045	A zang Yahudawa dɔli ɓɔɔ ri arɛ nɛɛ ri jee Marayamu nyaa ɓɛɛ. Ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ, a ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
43011046	Zang ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓarɛ ka bii zang Farisawa ri daa kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.
43011047	A rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Farisawa, ri ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang doo ruu kɔ, ɓɔɔ nimbang, a ri hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Ruu p'alɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓu kaa viya? Yɔɔ keɓe p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn ka naa dɔli.
43011048	Naa ruu yaa yɔɔ keɓe, zang ri shing danggn katɔ bii ɓiɓɛ nandon. Zang tipi Rooma ri a katɔ ri jili Gãa Laa ɓuru, ri ti see zang tipi ɓuru nandon.”
43011049	Zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Kayifa, ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ka s'aa kaɓa, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi vuu manɛ kpang.
43011050	Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang gbete vɔ ka nung zang dɔli wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ jong, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang tipi ɓuru nɛɛ vɔ nandon ɓɛɛ kpang ya?”
43011051	Kayifa zɔ̃ng wu nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu kɔɔ vuu keɓe kpang. Kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shing wu nɛɛ wu kɔɔyi. Kayifa kɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ka s'aa kaɓa, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔyi nɛɛ Yeesɔ naa vɔ ka ruu zang Yahudawa.
43011052	Wu ti ka ruu ɓarɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Vɔrɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu kpalɛ zang Laa ɓɔɔ zang tantɛ ri ka koolaa kaa jong nɔng gbete.
43011053	Rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri gaayu gbalang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kãanang nɛɛ diki keɓe kɔ.
43011054	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ rakɛ tɔ̀'ɔ waati ka dalɛ ka tipi Yahudiya kpang. Yupaa daa ka gari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Ifuremu ɓɔɔ ka jìngti ɓɛɛ. Daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
43011055	Diki nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ a naabm kana. Zang yùk'u paa kana nɛɛ jaa gari, zang daarɛ ka gari Urushalima nɛɛ zang daa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang dang nyaa nɛɛ zang palɛ, nɛɛ tɔɔ Laa wu yaa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri p'alɛ̀ vuu keɓe ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, diki nyaalaa wu a kati.
43011056	Ri kãa nɔng Yeesɔ ka ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ, ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zìrɛ naa yɔɔ keɓe a nɔng nyaalaa keɓe ɓu katɔ ya?”
43011057	Rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Farisawa, ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ka gn tɔ, wu naa kɔɔ ri, ri daa yi wu.
43012001	Diki nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ, yaa kaa man gbete, a Yeesɔ daa ka Bɛtani. Daa ka gãa Liyazaru, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ wu wisi paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
43012002	Zang nwaa wu vuu shaanang laarang. Mata kɔ basɛ ri vuu shaanang. Liyazaru ti ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri nw'ang ka nɔng vuu shaanang nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
43012003	A Marayamu tuu nung ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔli, ɓɔɔ ti a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ dìiri laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ naadi kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ɓɛɛ. Tuu nung, a tungku ka doo Yeesɔ, ti alɛ doo bì'i nɛɛ suuyuu ɓiɓɛ. S'ɛ̃ɛ nung ta yeti gãa kaa gbayigbayi.
43012004	Zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yahudawa Isikariyoti, ɓɔɔ wukɔ naa nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ, lasɛ yeti ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Marayamu palɛ ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
43012005	“Zang nɛɛ malɛ nung keɓe zang basɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu kaa naa ɓarɛ kpang saka bì'i kpang ka ruu viya? Nung keɓe naa zang hoo dinari laa maani dakn taati katɔ.”
43012006	Kɔɔ ruu keɓe, wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ gn zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang, kɔng wu katɔ kpang. Ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu shɔngɓɔ ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ yiti duku ɓɔɔ ri tɛ̃ɛ saka ɓarɛ kagn, lɛɛ ɓɔɔ ti ɓɔɔrɔ saka kagn katɔ ɓɛɛ.
43012007	Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yaa jaa soro ka nɔngkɔ. Shing nung keɓe ka ruu diki ɓɔɔ zang naa gbãa m ɓɛɛ.
43012008	Zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, ri ɓarɛ kagn teteng manɛ diki diki. N naa nw'ang m tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang.”
43012009	Zang Yahudawa dɔli ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka Bɛtani a ri daayi. Ri dàa ka ruu Yeesɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, nɛɛ ri daa zi ɓɔɔ kaa Liyazaru ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ.
43012010	Rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri mangnɛ, nɛɛ ri nyɔ Liyazaru vɔrɔ jong.
43012011	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Yahudawa dɔli, ri yaa ri kana, ri shing danggn kaa bii Yeesɔ ka ruu Liyazaru kɔ ɓɛɛ.
43012012	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri a nɔng nyaalaa shaanang, ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ a kana Urushalima.
43012013	Ri sãkɛ nasãng laa nung manja, a ri daayi nɛɛ ri daa kpisi wu yuu. Ri mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ nyaa kana lapa nɛɛ, “Zang wu dɔɔ Laa ta. Laa wu a zang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ nung ɓiɓɛ tìnang tãanang ta. Laa wu a kpanti zang Isirela tìnang tãanang.”
43012014	Yeesɔ walɛ jaa seesaa v'ang kagn, naa ɓɔɔ zang b'ee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
43012015	Zang bee tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, zang gari Sihiyona, kpanti manɛ a kana, v'ang ka dakn seesaa.”
43012016	Bɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee keɓe gn kpang. Ri naa zi kaa nɛɛ knti ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang wisi Yeesɔ paa tɔ, Laa ti a wu bannang tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri naa kpaa danggn kati nɛɛ zang bee vuu keɓe katɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a zang ti pàlɛ̀ wu vuu bì'i tɔ.
43012017	Zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri nɛɛ Yeesɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ɓaa Liyazaru nyaa nɛɛ saa, a wisi wu paa nɛɛ vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu vɔ ɓɛɛ, ri daa kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang vuu bì'i.
43012018	Zang dɔli ri daa kpisi wu yuu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tãayi nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn keɓe ɓɛɛ.
43012019	A zang Farisawa ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “Rùu p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ gn kpang tingkiring. Nɔɔ zirɛ, zang koo nandon ri daa tɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ.”
43012020	Zang Heleniyawa kagn teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri daa Laa bannang ka Urushalima, ka ɓɔɔ zang daa nyaalaa shaanang ɓɛɛ.
43012021	Ri daa ka bii Filibu (Filibu ɓi yɔɔ gari Bɛsɛda ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ), a ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Maalang, ruu kasɛ Yeesɔ zinang.”
43012022	Filibu daa kɔɔ Anduru, a ri daa kaa nyaa zɔɔ, ri daa kɔɔ Yeesɔ.
43012023	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Diki ɓɔɔ zang a Jaa Shɔnzang bannang kagn a tɔ.
43012024	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, naa zang ɓaa jìng zee ka tipi kpang, nwang ɓi ka nɔngkɔ, jìng zee gbete. Zang nɛɛ ɓaa tɔ, wu tarɛ, wu shing jìng kaa gaagaa.
43012025	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ suru bì'i ɓiɓɛ dɔli, shàar'ɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ̀ jong. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu suru bii ɓiɓɛ ka koo keɓe kpang, shing ɓi katɔ ka ruu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
43012026	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shòng m shoonang, wu dũng, m ka knti. Nɔng ɓɔɔ n kagn zang shoonang mɛɛ nw'ang doo ka nɔngkɔ. Daa mɛɛ ti naa a zang ɓɔɔ palɛ m shoonang bannang katɔ.”
43012027	A Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Jìng dannang keɓe kpãa m tɔ yeti dɔli. N kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? N kɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ, ‘Daa mɛɛ m'ɔɔ yaa diki keɓe wu a ka yuu mɛɛ kpang ya?’ Kpang, n a ka ruu jìng dannang ɓɔɔ diki keɓe kɔ.
43012028	Daa mɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang a mɔɔ bannang ɓɛɛ ta.” A zang tãa yee kaa nɛɛ lapa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N tusu zang bannang mɛɛ tɔ, n ti paasɛ ditɔ tɔkn.”
43012029	Zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng, ri tãa yee bì'i. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ɓi shala mɛɛyi. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa rang yee nɛɛ wu.”
43012030	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Yee ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓɛɛ, ɓi ka ruu mɛɛ kpang, ɓi ka ruu manɛ kɔ.
43012031	Diki ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ zang koo keɓe ruu a tɔ. Wee kaa diki ɓɔɔ zang nwangsɛ sheetang, kpanti koo keɓe ɓɛɛ kɔ.
43012032	Zang nɛɛ naa ɓaa m naa tɔ ka laa, a zang wisi m paa, tɔ̀ɔ, n naa gɔ̃ɔ zang piti, ri a ka bii mɛɛ.”
43012033	Ɓɔɔ kɔɔ naa weɓe, gãsɛ ɓi zɔ̃ng vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu naa vɔ ɓɛɛ.
43012034	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang bee ka yeti Labeenang nyaa dannang Laa ɓuru tɔɔ, Kirisi naa nw'ang ɓi dondong. A mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓaa ka biya nɛɛ zang naa tuu Jaa Shɔnzang viya? Ɓi kaa wi Jaa Shɔnzang keɓe wiya?”
43012035	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔng yakɛnang nwàng doo ka teteng manɛ diki b'ee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng. Nɔɔ rakɛ ta, bɛ̀'ɛ nɔng yakɛ doo katɔ, nɔng nɛ̀'ɛ tɔ̀'ɔyi. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔng nɛɛ tɔ̀'ɔ tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ràk'ɛ, zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa ɓɛɛ takpang ɓɛɛ.
43012036	Wee nɔng yakɛnang doo nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓee, nɔɔ shing danggn ka wu, tɔɔ nɔɔ yakɛ zang nɔng kati.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ, a daayi. Waasɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, zang ri zi wu kaa takpang.
43012037	Yeesɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn keɓe nandon, ri zi jìng ka bii, a ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang doo nɛɛ mani.
43012038	Vuu keɓe palɛ ɓi naa ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Ishaya kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti, ɓu wi shing danggn ka ruu ɓɔɔ rùu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ wiya? Ɓu wi ti zi naa vuu palɛnang ɓaaɓɛ wiya?”
43012039	Ishaya kɔɔ tɔkn tɔɔ, ri shing danggn kpang ka ruu ɓɔɔ,
43012040	“Laa zuu ri jìng katɔ, a ti zãa yeti ɓarɛ vuu zinang katɔ. Nɛɛ tɔɔ, jìng ɓarɛ wu zi nɔng kaa takpang Yeti ɓarɛ ti zi vuu kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nɛɛ gbãayu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu ta yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.”
43012041	Ishaya kɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi bannang Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, a rang ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
43012042	A zang bang bang zang Yahudawa dɔli, ri shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ. A ri nwangsɛ yuu ɓarɛ kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang Farisawa ɓɛɛ. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang zãa ri gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang daanang kpang.
43012043	Ri kasɛ ɓɔɔ shɔnzang dɔɔ ri, ɓa ɓɔɔ Laa dɔɔ ri katɔ.
43012044	A Yeesɔ mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, shing danggn wu ka bì'i mɛɛ kɔ gbete kpang. Shing danggn ka bii zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.
43012045	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi m tɔ, zi zang ɓɔɔ shong m tɔ.
43012046	N a ka koo keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ n yakɛ zang nɔng, tɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ wu nwang tɔ̀'ɔ nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kpang.
43012047	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tãa ruu mɛɛ, nɛɛ yiti ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang, n dɔng wu ruu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n arɛ nɛɛ n naa dɔng zang koo ruu kpang ɓɛɛ. N arɛ nɛɛ n ta yuu zang koo katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ.
43012048	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ m, nɛɛ ti ta ruu mɛɛ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ dɔng wu ruu kagn. Ruu mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wukɔ naa dɔng wu ruu ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
43012049	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n r'ang wu yee yuu mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ shong m kɔ, kɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ n dàa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ n daa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
43012050	N zi tɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Daa kɔɔyi, 'a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ m doo vuu ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ kɔɔ m nɛɛ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
43013001	Bɛɛ diki nyaalaa pasika ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ, yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng. Yeesɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ diki a tɔ, ɓɔɔ wu yaa koo keɓe, wu daa ka bii Daa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ kasɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ wu tusu ri naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ri dɔli ɓɛɛ.
43013002	Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri shaa vuu shaanang laarang kana. A sheetang shìng Yahuda Isikariyoti jaa Siman, rɛ̃rɛnang tɔ, ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ.
43013003	Yeesɔ ti zi tɔ, nɛɛ Daa ɓiɓɛ a wu naa vuu palɛnang tɔ nandon. Ti zi tɔ nɛɛ wu à nɛɛ bii Laa, nɛɛ wu ti gbãayu ka bii Laa ka nɔng.
43013004	A Yeesɔ seepaa nɛɛ nɔng vuu shaanang. Tu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ biling, a mã fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wili bii tɔ, alɛ nɛɛ manɛ ɓɛɛ ka sang.
43013005	A tɛ̃ɛ mii ka waka, a gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu sɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu kaa bii ɓiɓɛ doo. Wu ti alɛ nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ bii alɛnang ɓɔɔ wu mã ka sang ɓɛɛ.
43013006	A tɔ ka yuu Siman Bituru, a Bituru hɛ̃ɛ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ sɔɔ m doo ya Kpanti?”
43013007	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi dìiri vuu ɓɔɔ n pàl'ɛ mɔɔ kãntang keɓe kpang, mɔɔ naa zi ditɔ nɛɛ knti.”
43013008	Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ sɔ̀ɔ doo mɛɛ kpang dondong.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Naa n sɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ doo kpang, ruu mɛɛ hãa kagn nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang.”
43013009	A Siman Bituru kɔɔ wu kati tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ sɔ̀ɔ wu doo mɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, sɔɔ naa mɛɛ jong nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ.”
43013010	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wili bii tɔ, bii rìiti tɔ̀'ɔ bii ɓiɓɛ kpang, sɔɔ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ tɔkn kpang. Sɔɔ ɓi kaa doo kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Wee nɔɔ ɓee, bii manɛ tu tɔ nandon, yaa kaa zang gbete.”
43013011	(Yeesɔ zi zang ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Bii manɛ tu tɔ nandon, yaa ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang gbete.”)
43013012	Yeesɔ hangsɛ ri doo sɔɔnang tɔ, a hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng, a gbãayu daa nw'ang ka nɔng ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng vuu shaanang. A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ n pàl'ɛ nɔɔ kãntang keɓe ɓu tɔ ya?
43013013	Nɔɔ ɓ'aa m nɛɛ maalang, a nɔɔ ɓaa m nɛɛ kpanti. Nɔɔ ɓaa waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n maalang, a n ti Kpanti nizang ɓɛɛ.
43013014	Wee n maalang, n ti Kpanti manɛ, n sɔɔ nɔɔ doo tɔ ɓee, n'ɔɔ sɔɔ zɔɔ doo jong dòo nɔngkɔ.
43013015	N tusu nɔɔ naa tɔ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu kɔ n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓee doo nɔngkɔ.
43013016	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang shoonang, ɓa dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ ɓi kpang. Zang nyaa shoonang ti ɓa zang ɓɔɔ shong wu ɓi kpang.
43013017	Wee nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe tɔ ɓee, naa nɔɔ palɛ, nɔkɔ naa tãa tìnang.
43013018	“N kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka yuu manɛ nandon kpang. N zi zang ɓɔɔ n shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri m tɔ. Vuu keɓe nw'ang nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti Labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ. Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ n basɛ borodi mɛɛ nɛɛ wu, ràa m yuu knti tɔ. Nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ n kpang tɔ.”
43013019	N kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe kãntang, bɛɛ vuu bì'i palɛ gn kpang. Nɛɛ palɛ tɔ, nɔɔ zi kaa gn nɛɛ nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ n wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
43013020	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta zang ɓɔɔ n shong ɓɛɛ, ta m tɔ jong. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti ta m, ta ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.”
43013021	Yeesɔ kɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ, a vuu bì'i kpãa wu ka yeti, a kɔɔ kaa faarik tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang gbete ka teteng manɛ nyɔ yuu mɛɛ ditɔ.”
43013022	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ zɔɔ, ri zi zang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ruu bì'i ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
43013023	Zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ, nw'ang nɛɛ wu naabm.
43013024	A Siman Bituru rang wu yee, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ, wu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu wiya?”
43013025	A yɔɔ kaɓa wɔ ka bii Yeesɔ naabm, a hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Ɓu wiya Kpanti?”
43013026	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ n hãa borodi keɓe ka yɔkɔ, n a wu, zang bì'i kɔ naa malɛ yuu mɛɛ.” A sha borodi tɔkɔlɔng hãa ka yɔkɔ a, a Yahuda, jaa Siman Isikariyoti.
43013027	Ɓɔɔ Yahuda ta borodi hn, sheetang ta rɛ̃rɛnang ɓiɓɛ. Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ mangnɛ, nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ, palɛ ta pati.”
43013028	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn nɔng vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀, a Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
43013029	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ duku saka ɓarɛ ka naa Yahuda kɔ, Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu hoo vuu ɓɔɔ ri shaa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ shong wu nɛɛ wu daa a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang saka.
43013030	Yahuda ta borodi, a tantɛ nwannang daa biling. Bɛɛ kaa nɔng zìi.
43013031	Yahuda nw'ang tɔ ka biling, a Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bì'i ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ nimbang tɔɔ, “Kãntang keɓe, shɔnzang ri zi bannang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang kaa tɔ. Bannang Laa ti tusu bii kana jong, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ.
43013032	Zang nɛɛ zi bannang Laa kana ka bii mɛɛ, Laa ti tusu zang bannang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n Jaa Shɔnzang ditɔ jong. Laa suukãng kpang, a m bannang tantɛnang.
43013033	Wujɛ mɛɛ, n nwang tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ diki wu bee tɔkɔlɔng kpang. Nɔɔ naa kãa m ditɔ. N kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ doo vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀ɔ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ kɔ, ‘Nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ zunung daanang kpang.’
43013034	Kãntang keɓe, n dang nɔɔ kaa nyaa ɓɔɔ shɔɔ. Nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ. Naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ.
43013035	Naa nɔɔ kàs'ɛ ruu zɔɔ, zang zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bì'i mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”
43013036	Siman Bituru hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ daa ka niya, Kpanti?” Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ dũng m kãntang keɓe kpang. Mɔɔ naa dũng m kaa nɛɛ knti.”
43013037	Bituru hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, n dñ̀ng mɔɔ kãntang kpang ka ruu viya? N kasɛ tɔ, n vɔ ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ katɔ.”
43013038	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ vɔ katɔ ka ruu mɛɛ nizang ya? N kɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, ɓɔɔ kn naa ɓaa nyaa bɛɛ mɔɔ laa nyaa tɔ, daa doo taati, nɛɛ mɔɔ zi m nung ɓaa kpang.”
43014001	Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Yeti manɛ wu lasɛ kpang. Nɔɔ sh'ing danggn ka bii Laa, nɔɔ ti sh'ing jong ka bii mɛɛ.
43014002	Ka gãa Daa mɛɛ, jaka kagn dɔli. Naa nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, n nɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ tɔ. N daa shìli nɔɔ doo nɔng nwannang.
43014003	N nɛɛ daa tɔ, n nɛɛ daa shìli nɔng tɔ, n gbãayu kati. 'N naa see nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ daa nw'ang nɛɛ n, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ n kagn ɓɛɛ.
43014004	Nɔɔ zi gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ sɔɔyi nɔɔ daa nɔng ɓɔɔ n daa ɓɛɛ tɔ.”
43014005	Tooma kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, ruu zi nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dà'a ɓɛɛ kpang, a ruu zi gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu sɔɔ ɓɛɛ kaa biya?”
43014006	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wù tɔɔ, “Nkɔ gbalang, nkɔ nizang, nkɔ suru bii. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu daa bii Daa, sɔɔ nɛɛ bii mɛɛ kɔ gbete.
43014007	Naa nɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ zi m nung tɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ zi Daa mɛɛ nung tɔ jong. Vuu ɓɔɔ yi nɛɛ lɛɛkɔ, nɔɔ zi wu nung tɔ, nɔɔ ti zi wu tɔ nɛɛ jìng manɛ.”
43014008	Filibu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, shing ruu ta ruu zi Daa ɓaaɓɛ nung, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.”
43014009	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Filibu, n nw'ang tɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ diki mɛɛ bee tɔ, mɔɔ zi m nung gn kpang ya? Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi m tɔ, zi Daa tɔ. A mɔɔ kɔɔ m ka ruu vi nɛɛ, n shìng nɔɔ ta, nɔɔ zi Daa nung viya?
43014010	Filibu, mɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ n ka yeti Daa, Daa ti ka yeti mɛɛ kpang ya?” A raa jìng kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Ruu kɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓee, ɓi ruu mɛɛ kpang. Ɓi Daa ɓɔɔ ka yeti mɛɛ kɔ palɛ shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓiri.
43014011	Nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, nɛɛ n ka yeti Daa, Daa ti ka yeti mɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, nɔɔ shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn kɔ n palɛ ɓee.
43014012	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ. Ti palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ n palɛ katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n gbãayu n daa kaa bì'i Daa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
43014013	N ti pàl'ɛ nɔɔ vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gà'a nɛɛ nung mɛɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang a Daa bannang kati ka ruu Jaa.
43014014	Naa nɔɔ gà'a viya piti nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, n naa pàl'ɛ nɔɔ katɔ.
43014015	“Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu mɛɛ katɔ, nɔɔ dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ n dang ɓɛɛ katɔ.
43014016	N ti gà'a Daa, wu a nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa yi nɔɔ naa ka bii ɓɔɔgn wu naa nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ dondong.
43014017	Zang keɓe wukɔ Suru Laa, ɓɔɔ tusu zang ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ka yuu Laa. Zang koo ri tà wu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri zi wu nung kpang, ri ti zi wu nɛɛ jìng ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ zi wu nung manɛ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwang ɓi nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ti naa nwang ka yeti manɛ.
43014018	“A kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, N nɛɛ daa tɔ n yaa nɔɔ ka bm naa javɔ kpang, n a ditɔ ka bì'i manɛ.
43014019	Diki yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng bɛɛ zang koo ri zi m takpang. Nɔɔ zi m manɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n naa nwang ningkãari, nɔɔ naa nwang ditɔ ningkãari jong.
43014020	Diki kaɓa nɛɛ a tɔ, nɔɔ naa zi ka leekɔ nɛɛ, Daa ka yeti mɛɛ, n ti kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ. A ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ nɔɔ, ruu ti gbete.
43014021	“Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tà rɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ n dang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ti dũngnɛ, wukɔ kasɛ ruu mɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu mɛɛ, Daa mɛɛ kàs'ɛ wu katɔ. N ti kàs'ɛ wu katɔ, n ti nwàngs'ɛ wu bii mɛɛ.”
43014022	Yahuda (wu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Isikariyoti ɓɛɛ kpang) kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Kpanti, ka ruu vi mɔɔ nwàngs'ɛ rukɔ bii shɛ̃ɛning, mɔɔ nwangsɛ zang koo piti kpang viya?”
43014023	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ m katɔ, dũng vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu katɔ. Daa mɛɛ kasɛ wu katɔ. Ruu ti a nɛɛ Daa mɛɛ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ruu nw'ang nɛɛ wu.
43014024	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ m kpang dñ̀ng vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu ɓɛɛ kpang. R'uu kɔ nɔɔ tã̀'a ɓee, ɓi ɓɔɔ yuu mɛɛ kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ Daa ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.
43014025	“N kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ, ka wee n nwàng doo nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
43014026	Suru Laa ɓɔɔ Daa naa shong wu ka nung mɛɛ, naa tusu nɔɔ vuu ditɔ nandon. Wu ti kpaa nɔɔ danggn vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ nandon.
43014027	“Nɔɔ nwang waasɛ̃, vuu koo keɓe shing nɔɔ nɔɔ nw'ang waasɛ̃ kpang. Nwannang waasɛ̃ keɓe a ɓi nɛɛ bii mɛɛ. Yeti manɛ wu lasɛ kpang, nɔɔ ti kaa vɔrɔ kpang.
43014028	Nɔɔ tãayi, n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘N dà'a kaatɔ, n gbãayu ditɔ tɔkn ka bii manɛ’. Wee nɔɔ kasɛ m katɔ ɓee, nɔɔ tãa tìnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n dà'a ka bii Daa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Daa ɓa m bannang ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
43014029	N kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ, bɛ̀'ɛ palɛ gn kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ naa nwang tɔ nizang nɔɔ shing danggn kaa bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
43014030	N rang yee tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ, làa b'ee naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti koo a ka naa ɓɛɛ. Zunung ɓɔɔ wu palɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang.
43014031	N kasɛ nɛɛ zang koo keɓe ri zirɛ nɛɛ n kasɛ ruu Daa katɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n palɛ vuu piti naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ m nɛɛ n palɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ yupaa ta ruu daa nɔɔ.
43015001	“Yeesɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, N nwang naa laa inabi ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Daa mɛɛ ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka laa inabi ɓɛɛ.
43015002	Nasãng mɛɛ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ra jaa kpang, Daa mɛɛ dɔng katɔ. Nasãng ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ra jaa katɔ, kpɛ̃lɛ bii ɓiɓɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu gisi jaa r'anang kaa dɔli.
43015003	Ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ, a nɔɔ tarɛ ɓɛɛ, sh'ing nɔɔ manɛ tɔ, vuu shi kpang ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ kagn bii manɛ kpang.
43015004	Nɔɔ nw'ang nɛɛ n, n ti nw'ang nɛɛ nɔɔ. Nasãng ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ka bii laa inabi kpang ra jaa ɓi kpang. Nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ nw'ang nɛɛ n kpang, nɔɔ zunung vuu ɓɔɔ palɛnang kpang.
43015005	“Nkɔ laa inabi, nɔɔ manɛ kaa nasãng. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nw'ang nɛɛ n, n nɛɛ ti nwang nɛɛ wu, wukɔ ra jaa dɔli. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n nɛɛ kpang, nɔɔ zunung vuu ɓɔɔ palɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ.
43015006	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nwang nɛɛ n kpang, zang kaɓa nwang naa nasãng ɓɔɔ zang t'asɛ̀, wu tɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang kpalɛ nasãng ɓɔɔ naa weɓe zang vang ka waa, waa wu shaa ri.
43015007	Nɔɔ nɛɛ nwang nɛɛ n, ruu mɛɛ nɛɛ ti nwang ka yeti manɛ, nɔɔ gà'a vuu ɓɔɔ yeti manɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, zang a nɔɔ katɔ.
43015008	Zang zi bannang Daa mɛɛ ka zang dɔli ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa ri nyaa ɓɛɛ kɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ti zi kati nɛɛ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
43015009	Naa ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ kasɛ m, n kasɛ nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ. Nɔɔ y'aa kasɛnang kɔ n kàsɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓee kpang.
43015010	Naa nɔɔ ta nyaa ɓɔɔ n dang nɔɔ ɓee kpang, n kàs'ɛ nɔɔ katɔ sasak. Naa ɓɔɔ n ta rɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ dang m kpang, a ti kasɛ m sasak ɓɛɛ.
43015011	“N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ tãa tìnang ɓɔɔ n tãa ɓɛɛ kaa jong. Tìnang manɛ wu nwang kaa nyaa kiiri.
43015012	N dang nyaa n tɔɔ, nɔɔ yi tìng ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kàs'ɛ zɔɔ katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
43015013	Zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ zang wu a yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka ruu rɛɛ ɓeesang kagn kpang.
43015014	Nɔkɔ rɛɛ masang, nɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
43015015	N ɓàa nɔɔ tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri pàl'ɛ m shoonang kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang shoonang zi vuu ɓɔɔ dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ palɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. N ɓ'aa nɔɔ nɛɛ, rɛɛ masang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ n tãa ka nyaa Daa mɛɛ tɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.
43015016	Wu nɔkɔ zɔ̃ng m kpang, ɓi nkɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔɔ, n a nɔɔ shoonang, tɔɔ nɔɔ daa raa jaa. Zɔ̃ng jaa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ r'ar'ɛ, ri nwang dondong. Tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaa nandon ka naa Daa, nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, Daa wu a nɔɔ kati.
43015017	Ka ruu ruu keɓe kɔ n dang nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ yi tìng ka ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
43015018	“Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang ri bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ katɔ. Ri nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ tɔ, danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, ri bɛ̃ɛ ɓi nkɔ shɔɔnang.
43015019	Naa nɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri nɛɛ kàs'ɛ nɔɔ katɔ. N shɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ koo keɓe kɔ, nɔɔ manɛ tɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓarɛ kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kasɛ nɔɔ kpang.
43015020	Danggn wu ning nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓee kpang. N kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Zang shoonang ɓɔɔ ɓa dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓi kagn kpang.’ Zang ɓɔɔ ri dang m jìng, ri naa dang nɔɔ jìng doo katɔ kɔ. Ri nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka vuu ɓɔɔ n tùsù ri, ri naa ɓaa shoo katɔ ka ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ doori.
43015021	Ri palɛ nɔɔ vuu keɓe piti, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zang mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri ti zi zang ɓɔɔ shong m kpang ɓɛɛ.
43015022	Naa n nɛ̀'ɛ 'a tɔ, n nɛ̀'ɛ ràng ri ruu tɔ kpang, zang nɛɛ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang. Kãntang keɓe, n a tɔ, n tusu ri vuu shi kpang tɔ ri ti yaa kpang, vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ takpang.
43015023	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ m, bɛ̃ɛ Daa mɛɛ ɓi doo katɔ kɔ.
43015024	Naa n nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ, zang palɛ gngn kpang keɓe ka teteng ɓarɛ kpang, zang nɛɛ kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang. Ri zi rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang mã naa ka danggn tɔ, a ri bɛ̃ɛ m doo nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ Daa mɛɛ piti.
43015025	Vuu keɓe, ɓèe ɓi nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka labeenang nyaa dannang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang beeyi nɛɛ, ‘Ri bɛ̃ɛ m, n palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ kpang.’
43015026	“Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ naa yi nɔɔ naa ka bii a ditɔ. N nɛɛ dà'a tɔ bii Daa mɛɛ, n shong nɔɔ wu ditɔ. Zang keɓe wukɔ Suru ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ, wukɔ tusu zang ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ka yuu Laa. Wukɔ naa kɔ̀'ɔ zang ruu ka yuu mɛɛ.
43015027	Nɔɔ doo zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu mɛɛ kɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ doo nɛɛ n, ka diki ɓɔɔ n gaayu shoonang mɛɛ palɛnang ɓɛɛ.
43016001	“N kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ dang nɔɔ jìng, nɔɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
43016002	Zang naa nwangsɛ nɔɔ ditɔ kaa gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang. Diki a kana, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔ nɔɔ vɔrɔ, kɔ̀'ɔ ɓi nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
43016003	Zang ri palɛ nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi Daa kpang, ri ti zi m kpang kɔ doori ɓɛɛ.
43016004	N kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ a tɔ, n'ɔɔ kpaa danggn kati nɛɛ bɛɛ n kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ. N kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe ka tìng kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
43016005	“Kãntang keɓe, n gbãayu kaa tɔ, ka bì'i zang ɓɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ m ka teteng manɛ gbete nɛɛ n daa ka niya kpang, ka ruu viya?
43016006	Wee n kɔɔ nɔɔ kãntang ɓee, yeti manɛ lasɛ kaa tɔ kɔ jong.
43016007	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, daanang mɛɛ kɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa n daa kpang, zang ɓɔɔ naa yi nɔɔ naa ka bii ɓɔɔ wukɔ Suru Laa, a nɔng manɛ kpang. N nɛɛ daa tɔ, n shong wu kati wu a kaa nɔng manɛ.
43016008	Nɛɛ a tɔ, naa tusu zang koo rɛ̃rɛnang shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu shi kpang palɛnang, nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ti naa ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri ning gbalang ɓarɛ katɔ.
43016009	Naa dɔng ri ruu ka ruu vuu shi kpang palɛnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
43016010	Wu ti dɔng ri ruu ka ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n gbãayu kaa bii Daa nɔɔ zi m takpang dondong ɓɛɛ.
43016011	A ɓɔɔ ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang dɔng zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti koo keɓe ruu ɓi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
43016012	“Vuu ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ doogn dɔli, nɔɔ zunung danggn mãnang gn naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta ɓɛɛ kpang.
43016013	Suru keɓe ɓɔɔ wukɔ tusu zang ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ka yuu Laa nɛɛ a tɔ, naa shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Rang yee nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, kɔ̀'ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãa nɛɛ nyaa Laa ɓɛɛ, wu ti kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ naa a ka knti ɓɛɛ.
43016014	Shing zang, zang a m bannang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tuu vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wu naa nwangsɛ nɔɔ dìiri ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
43016015	Vuu Daa mɛɛ piti ɓi ɓɔɔ mɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɛɛ Suru Laa naa tuu yee ɓɔɔ n a wu, wu kɔɔ nɔɔ.
43016016	“Diki yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng bɛɛ nɔɔ zi m takpang, diki nɛɛ ti bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, nɔɔ zi m tɔkn.”
43016017	Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ, “Nɛɛ wu kɔɔ ruu ɓu nɛɛ viya? a kɔɔ kati nɛɛ ‘Diki yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi m takpang’, a kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, ‘Diki nɛɛ ti bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, nɔɔ zi m tɔkn’. A ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ‘Ka ruu ɓɔɔ n gbãayu ka bii Daa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ’ viya?
43016018	Ɓu vi ‘Diki nɛɛ bee tɔ’ kɔ, wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ viya? Ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ɓuru kpang.”
43016019	Yeesɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ wu dìiri ruu keɓe, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Diki nɛɛ bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng nɔɔ zi m takpang a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ, diki nɛɛ bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng tɔkn, nɔɔ zi m kaa tɔ.’ Nɔɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ ɓu ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ ka naa manɛ ya?
43016020	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, nɔɔ naa kaayi, nɔɔ ɓaa nyaa vaa, zang koo ri tãa ɓarɛ tìnang. Yeti manɛ naa lasɛ, yeti lasɛnang manɛ naa raa tìnang tãanang ditɔ.
43016021	Zang soro ɓɔɔ jaa kɔng wu, yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, là'a jìng dannang ɓiɓɛ a tɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ yi jaa tɔ, danggn jaa ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ng wu, ning wu kaa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tãa kaa tìnang ka ruu jaa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ ka koo ɓɛɛ.
43016022	Ɓɔɔ manɛ nw'ang doo nɔngkɔ, kãntang keɓe, yeti manɛ lasɛ dòo katɔ. N a ditɔ ka bii manɛ tɔkn, nɔɔ naa tãa tìnang ditɔ ka yeti manɛ dɔli. Zang ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ tìnang keɓe nɛɛ yeti manɛ kpang.
43016023	“Diki kaɓa nɛɛ naa a tɔ, nɔɔ gàa vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̀'ɔ ka naa mɛɛ kpang. N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani. Daa naa a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ g'aa ka naa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nung mɛɛ katɔ.
43016024	Nɔɔ gàa vuu gngn nɛɛ nung mɛɛ kpang, nɔɔ gàa ta, tɔɔ Laa wu a nɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, tìnang manɛ wu nwang kaa nyaa kiiri.”
43016025	“N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang. Diki a ka naa, ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ruu tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kpang ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu kaa yuu Daa mɛɛ faarik.
43016026	Diki kaɓa nɛɛ a tɔ, nɔɔ naa gàa wu nɛɛ nung mɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɛɛ n naa gà'a nɔɔ wu kpang.
43016027	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Daa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Kasɛ nɔɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ m katɔ, a nɔɔ ti shing danggn tɔ, nɛɛ n a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
43016028	N à nɛɛ bii Daa, a n à ka koo keɓe. N naa yaa koo keɓe ditɔ tɔkn, n gbãayu ka bii Daa.”
43016029	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ rang yee kana faarik faarik kati. Mɔɔ ràng yee tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang kpang.
43016030	Ruu zi tɔ kati nɛɛ mɔɔ zi vuu ɓaa tɔ nandon. Mɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu shing danggn tɔ, nɛɛ mɔɔ a ɓaa nɛɛ bii Laa kɔ nizang.”
43016031	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ kati ya?
43016032	Diki a doo naa, diki bì'i ti a tɔ, ɓɔɔ zang naa tantɛ nɔɔ nandon, zang ɓu daa gãa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ naa yaa m ka bm gbete. N wu ka bm nizang kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Daa kagn nɛɛ n ɓɛɛ.
43016033	N kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe, nɛɛ nɔɔ nw'ang nɛɛ n, tɔɔ, nɔɔ nw'ang kaa waasɛ̃. Nɔɔ dang jìng katɔ ka koo keɓe. N'ɔɔ mã danggn kagn, n ɓ'a vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe yuu tɔ.”
43017001	Yeesɔ hangsɛ nyaa ruu keɓe tɔ, a tuu jìng ka lapa, a gàa Laa tɔɔ, “Daa, laa a tɔ. Zang ri zi bannang mɛɛ ta, ɓɔɔ n Jaa ɓaaɓɛ, tɔɔ zang ri zi bannang ɓaaɓɛ kaa bii mɛɛ.
43017002	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ a m naa tɔ ka yuu zang piti. Mɔɔ nɛɛ, n a zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m ri ka naa, suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ta ɓɛɛ.
43017003	Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓi zinang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ nɛɛ mɔkɔ gbete, Laa ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ nkɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shong m ɓɛɛ.
43017004	N tusu zang koo bannang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n hangsɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m nɛɛ n palɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
43017005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Daa, tuu m ta, mɔɔ daa nɛɛ n ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ a m bannang naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m bɛ̀'ɛ zang mãa koo gn kpang ɓɛɛ.”
43017006	“N tùsù zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m ri ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, mɔɔ tɔ. Ri ɓarɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ, a mɔkɔ a m ri kati. Ri dũng ruu ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.
43017007	Ri zi tɔ kati nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m piti, a ɓi nɛɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ.
43017008	N kɔɔ ri nyaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shong m nɛɛ mani tɔ, a ri ti ta tɔ. Ri zi tɔ kati nɛɛ n a nɛɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ kɔ nizang. A ri ti shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ mɔkɔ shong m.
43017009	“N gaa mɔɔ ka ruu ɓarɛ kɔ. N gaa mɔɔ wu ka ruu zang koo kpang. N gaa mɔɔ m ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m ri ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
43017010	Zang mɛɛ piti ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ, a zang ɓaaɓɛ piti ti ɓɔɔ mɛɛ. N ti walɛ bannang tɔ ka ruu ɓarɛ.
43017011	Yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng n gbãayu kaa tɔ ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. N yaa koo keɓe m kaa tɔ, ri ɓarɛ doo ka koo. Daa, ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, yiti ri waasɛ̃ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri nwang kaa gbete naa ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ mɔɔ, ruu gbete ɓɛɛ.
43017012	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n doo nɛɛ ri, n yiti ri waasɛ̃ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓaaɓɛ, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ 'a m ɓɛɛ. N yiti ri waasɛ̃, vuu ɓɔɔ lee ri naa ka bii kpang, a ɓɔɔ gbete ti ning kpang. Ɓi zang gbete ɓɔɔ bɛɛ nɛ̀'ɛ ning ɓi katɔ kɔ nwani kɔ gbete. Ti ning ɓi ka n'aa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ naa ning ɓi katɔ kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.
43017013	Kãntang keɓe, n gbãayu kaa tɔ ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. Wee n doo ka koo nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ, n kɔ̀'ɔ vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, ri tãa tìnang ɓɔɔ n tãa ɓɛɛ kaa jong. Tìnang ɓarɛ wu ti nwang kaa nyaa kiiri.
43017014	N a ri nyaa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shong m nɛɛ mani tɔ, a zang koo bɛ̃ɛ ri tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓarɛ tɔ̀'ɔ zang koo kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ n m zang koo kpang ɓɛɛ.
43017015	N gaa mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ see ri katɔ, ri yaa koo kpang. N gaa mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ yiti ri waasɛ̃. M'ɔɔ yaa sheetang, zang shi kpang, wu lee ri naa ka bii kpang.
43017016	Ri ɓarɛ zang koo kpang, naa ɓɔɔ n m zang koo kpang ɓɛɛ.
43017017	Shing ri, ri nw'ang zang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn bii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ruu ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Ruu ɓaaɓɛ ɓi nizang.
43017018	N shong ri ka koo naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shong m ka koo ɓɛɛ.
43017019	N a mɔɔ yuu mɛɛ, ka ruu ɓarɛ kɔ, tɔɔ ri a mɔɔ yuu ɓarɛ kaa jong nizang.”
43017020	“N gaa mɔɔ ka ruu ɓarɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. N gà'a mɔɔ jong ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri naa shing danggn ka bii mɛɛ, ka ruu ruu ɓɔɔ ri naa tãa ka nyaa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
43017021	N gaa mɔɔ nɛɛ ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ gbete. Daa mɛɛ, n gaa mɔɔ nɛɛ ri nwang nɛɛ ruu, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwang nɛɛ n, a n ti nwang nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang koo ri shing danggn kati nɛɛ mɔkɔ shong m nizang.
43017022	N a ri doo bannang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m ɓɛɛ kɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri nw'ang kaa gbete naa ɓɔɔ rùu ɓuru nɛɛ mɔɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.
43017023	Naa ɓɔɔ n nwang nɛɛ ri, a mɔɔ nwang nɛɛ n ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri nwang kaa jong ka nyaa zɔɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang koo ri zi kati nɛɛ mɔkɔ shong m, nɛɛ mɔɔ ti kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ m ɓɛɛ.
43017024	“Daa mɛɛ, n kasɛ nɛɛ zang kɔ mɔɔ a m ri ɓee, ri nwang nɛɛ n ka nɔng ɓɔɔ n naa nw'ang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi bannang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ bɛɛ zang mãa koo gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ a m bannang keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ kasɛ m katɔ ɓɛɛ.
43017025	Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, zang koo ri zi mɔɔ ɓaa kpang. N zi mɔɔ m tɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ keɓe, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ mɔkɔ shong m.
43017026	N tusu ri mɔɔ tɔ, n ti tusu ri ditɔ sasak, tɔɔ ri kasɛ zɔɔ kaa jong naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ m ɓɛɛ. 'N ti nw'ang jong nɛɛ ri.”
43018001	Yeesɔ hangsɛ Laa gaanang tɔ, a nwangnɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri daa ta ràng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Kidirong ɓɛɛ ka dang. Zang l'ang vɔ̀'ɔ laa inabi kagn ka nɔngkɔ, Yeesɔ shɛ̃ɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
43018002	Yahuda ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ zi nɔng tɔ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔngkɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ diki diki ɓɛɛ.
43018003	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Yahuda sèe rɛɛ sɔɔja nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Farisawa ri shong ri ɓɛɛ, a daa nɛɛ ri ka vɔ̀'ɔ laa inabi. Zang keɓe ri tùurù vuu waa ka naa, nɛɛ waa zà'ang sɔɔ a ɓɔɔ waa tooshi.
43018004	Yeesɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang naa palɛ wu ɓi tɔ, a yupaa naa shii ka tìng ɓarɛ, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kãa ɓu wiya?”
43018005	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu kãa Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara” A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nkɔ ɓee.” Yahuda ɓɔɔ nyɔ yuu Yeesɔ shii nɛɛ ri ka nɔngkɔ.
43018006	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ “Nkɔ ɓee,” ri wɔ nɛɛ knti, a ri watɛ ka tipi.
43018007	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔkn nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ kãa wiya?” Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ruu kãa Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara.”
43018008	Yeesɔ kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ nkɔ ɓee. Nɔɔ nɛɛ kãa nkɔ, nɔɔ yaa rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii mɛɛ keɓe ɓarɛ ka nɔngkɔ ri daayi.”
43018009	Vuu keɓe nwang naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ka tìng ɓɛɛ, kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N ning zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a m ri ka naa gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.”
43018010	Bɛɛ yere bang kagn naa Siman Bituru. A Bituru zɔ̃ngnɛ ku jaafò'o kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa. Dɔng wu shoo nakn kak. (zang ɓaa jaafoo bì'i nɛɛ Malaku.)
43018011	Yeesɔ kɔɔ Bituru nɛɛ, “Hãa yere bang ɓaaɓɛ ta ka kpãa ka nɔng, mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ ɓu nɛɛ n tà jìng dannang ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ nɛɛ n dàng ɓɛɛ kpang ya?”
43018012	A rɛɛ sɔɔja zang Rooma nɛɛ zang bang ɓarɛ, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, ri yi Yeesɔ. Ri mã wu.
43018013	A ri atɛ wu ka bii Ana kɔ shɔɔnang. Ana, ɓi Kayifa ɓeekpang. Kayifa kɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu kaa Gãa Laa ka saa kaɓa.
43018014	Kayifa kɔ kɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ, zang gbete kɔ wu vɔ jong ka nung ɓɔɔ zang dɔli nɛɛ vɔ ɓɛɛ.
43018015	Siman Bituru nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu doo ka bì'i Yeesɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ, ri dũng Yeesɔ. Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa zi yɔɔ kaɓa nung tɔ gbãnggbãng. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang yaa wu daa kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka dàbang gãa kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ.
43018016	A Bituru shii ɓi kaa nyaa gãa biling. Yɔɔ kaɓa nwang tɔkn ka biling, naa rang yee nɛɛ jaa zang soro ɓɔɔ gã nyaa gãa nɛɛ wu yaa Bituru wu a yeti gãa. A zang yaa Bituru kati, a kaa dàbang gãa.
43018017	A jaa zang soro ɓɔɔ gã nyaa gãa hɛ̃ɛ Bituru tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ wu doo zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii yɔɔ kaɓa kɔ kpang ya?” Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpang, n m zang ɓiɓɛ kpang.”
43018018	Sɔ̀ɔr'ɔ si katɔ, a rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zang shoonang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri gã gãa, ri dɔɔ waa. Ri shiiri kaa nyaa waa nɛɛ waa wu nwaa ri bii. Bituru daa kaa jong daa shii nɛɛ ri, nɛɛ waa wu nwaa wu bii jong.
43018019	Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa hɛ̃ɛlɛ Yeesɔ ruu ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu zang ɓɛɛ.
43018020	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N waa m katɔ n tùsù zang koo vuu kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu piti, n tusu m ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, a ɓɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa. Nɔng ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa nandon ri kpalɛ kagn ɓɛɛ. N kɔ̀ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ m gngn nɛɛ nwiiri kpang.
43018021	A mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛ m ka ruu viya? Hɛ̃ɛlɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu ɓɛɛ. Hɛ̃ɛ ri vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ri. Ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ tɔ.”
43018022	Ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ nyaa naa weɓe, zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri gã gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ ri shii ka nɔng, nyɔ Yeesɔ nɛɛ naa ka kashoo. A kɔɔ wu nɛɛ “Mɔɔ r'ang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ruu nɔngkɔ ka ruu viya?”
43018023	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N nɛɛ kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn shi kpang, kɔ̀'ɔ zang kɔ ka nihn piti ɓɛɛ vuu bì'i ta. Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔyi nɛɛ nizang kɔ nwani, mɔɔ nyɔ m ɓu kaa ruu viya?”
43018024	A Ana dɔ̃ wu kaa dòo naa ɓɔɔ zang mã wu ɓɛɛ, ka bii Kayifa ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ.
43018025	Bituru shii doo ka nɔng ɓaasi nɛɛ waa wu nwaa wu bii. A zang ɓɔɔ ri shiiri nɛɛ wu, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ doo zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii yɔɔ kaɓa kɔ kpang ya?” Bituru laa nyaa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kpang, n m zang ɓiɓɛ kpang.”
43018026	Zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri pàl'ɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa shoonang, ti shing zang nɛɛ jaafoo ɓɔɔ Bituru d'ɔng wu shoo nɛɛ yere bang kɔ ɓɛɛ, rang yee. Hɛ̃ɛ Bituru nɛɛ, “N zi bɛɛ mɔkɔ nɛɛ yɔɔ kaɓa, ka vɔ̀'ɔ laa inabi kpang ya?”
43018027	A Bituru laa nyaa tɔkn nɛɛ, “Kpang.” A kn tantɛ nyaa kaa ɓaanang.
43018028	Nɛɛ gãndi zangzang, zang nwangsɛ Yeesɔ nɛɛ gãa Kayifa, zang daa nɛɛ wu ka gãa gɔmna. Zang Yahudawa ri daa yeti gãa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang ɓarɛ zãa ri palɛnang katɔ kpang, tɔɔ ri naa shaa vuu shaanang nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ kagn kati.
43018029	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Bilatu nwang kaa biling, daa ìi ri, a hɛ̃ɛyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ, vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe palɛ ɓu viya?”
43018030	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn kpang, ruu nɛɛ atɛ wu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang.”
43018031	Bilatu kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ dita nɛɛ wu nɔɔ daa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang manɛ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti Rooma a ruu naa nɛɛ ruu nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang.”
43018032	Vuu keɓe nwang ka naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Bɛɛ kɔɔ ri zɔ̃ng vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu naa vɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ.
43018033	Bilatu gbãayu daa ka yeti gãa, daa ɓaa nyaa, hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Kpanti zang Yahudawa ya?”
43018034	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Ruu keɓe mɔkɔ hɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ ya, kɔ zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu kagn yuu mɛɛ?”
43018035	Bilatu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zirɛ, n zang Yahudawa ya? Ɓi zang ɓaaɓɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri atɛ mɔɔ ka bii mɛɛ. Mɔɔ palɛ viya?”
43018036	Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti roonang mɛɛ nw'ang ɓi nɛɛ koo keɓe kpang. Naa kpanti roonang mɛɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ koo keɓe, zang mɛɛ ri nɛɛ g'aa nyaa kana. Zang nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa n kpang. Kpanti roonang mɛɛ nw'ang ɓi nɛɛ koo keɓe kpang.”
43018037	A Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ wu kati tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ɓu Kpanti ya?” Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, n Kpanti kɔ. N a ka koo keɓe, a zang yi m nɛɛ n kɔɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ nizang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang katɔ, ɓaa shoo katɔ ka yee mɛɛ.”
43018038	A Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “A zang ɓaa vi nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang viya?”
43018039	Vuu ɓɔɔ n p'alɛ̀ nɔɔ kagn diki diki ka nyaalaa pasika. N yaarɛ nɔɔ zang gbete naa ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ri ka sãa ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ kasɛ tɔ, n yaa nɔɔ kpanti zang Yahudawa naa ya?”
43018040	Ri m'ɛɛ nyaa nabm ka lapa nandon nɛɛ, “Wu yɔɔ keɓe kpang. Ruu kasɛ mɔɔ yaa ruu ɓuru Baraba naa.” Baraba keɓe, ɓi ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri haa nyaa ka gari a zang nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
43019001	A Bilatu a zang Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa.
43019002	Sɔɔja ri t'i kɔkɔ, ri hãa wu ka yuu kaa naa lapoo ɓɔɔ zang kãng kpanti yuu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri hãa wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ta bii naa nwɛɛri naa ɓɔɔ kpanti ri hãlɛ ɓɛɛ.
43019003	Ri ti 'alɛ̀ ka bì'i ɓiɓɛ, ri jee wu nyaa naa kpanti, ri kɔɔ nɛɛ, “Kpanti zang Yahudawa, m'ɔɔ nwang ningkãari dondong.” Ri daayi, ri daa nyɔ wu nɛɛ naa ka kashoo.
43019004	Bilatu nw'ang tɔkn daa ka bii zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka biling ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo karɛ, zang 'atɛ̀ nɔɔ wu kaatɔ ka biling, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zìi kati nɛɛ, n ìi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɔɔ n dɔng wu ruu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.”
43019005	A Yeesɔ nw'ang kati nɛɛ lapoo kɔkɔ ka yuu, nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ta bii naa nwɛɛri ka bii. A Bilatu kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, yɔɔ bì'i keɓe.”
43019006	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa ri zi wu hn, ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa wu naa ta laa, Nɔɔ ɓaa wu naa ta laa.” Bilatu kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ yi wu ta nɔɔ daa ɓaa wu naa ka laa. N ìi wu nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ n dɔng wu ruu kagn, tɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.”
43019007	Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Nyaa dannang ɓuru ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang nyɔ zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe vɔrɔ kagn. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔyi nɛɛ wukɔ Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ.”
43019008	Ɓɔɔ Bilatu tãa naa weɓe, bii kàa wu vɔrɔ kaa dɔli.
43019009	Gbãayu tɔkn nɛɛ Yeesɔ ka dàbang gãa, a hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zang niya?” A Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa kaa takpang.
43019010	Bilatu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ ràng m yee kpang ya? Mɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ n zunung ɓɔɔ n yaa mɔɔ naa katɔ, n zunung ɓɔɔ n shingnɛ zang wu ɓaa mɔɔ naa ka laa katɔ, kpang ya?”
43019011	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ zunung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ pàl'ɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, naa Laa a mɔɔ naa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu shi kpang zang ɓɔɔ ri a mɔɔ n ka naa kɔ, ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ.”
43019012	Ɓɔɔ Bilatu tãa naa weɓe, kãa gbalang nɛɛ wu yaa Yeesɔ naa. Zang Yahudawa ri goo nyaa, ri kɔɔ Bilatu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ yaa wu naa tɔ, mɔɔ ɓaa Kayisa ɓeesang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu kpanti, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ Kayisa kpang ɓɛɛ.”
43019013	Ɓɔɔ Bilatu tãa ruu keɓe, nwangsɛ Yeesɔ ka biling, a daa nwang ka yuu laa nwannang zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ “Nɔng ɓɔɔ zang wàa nɛɛ tari ɓɛɛ.” Nɛɛ nyaa Yahudawa zang ɓaa nɛɛ “Gabata.”
43019014	Bɛɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ bii ka ruu diki nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Bɛɛ làa a ka naa dalɛ yuu. A Bilatu kɔɔ zang Yahudawa kati tɔɔ, “Kpanti manɛ keɓe.”
43019015	Ri goo nyaa tɔɔ, “Nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ta, Nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ta. Ɓaa wu naa ka laa.” Bilatu hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kasɛ tɔ n ɓaa kpanti manɛ naa ka laa ya?” Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti ɓuru ɓi Kayisa kɔ gbete.”
43019016	A Bilatu a ri Yeesɔ kati, nɛɛ ri daa ɓaa wu naa ka laa.
43019017	Yeesɔ tuu laa ɓɔɔ zang daa ɓaa wu naa kagn, a nwangnɛ daa nɛɛ mani ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ “Yuu zɔ̃ɔpi” bɛɛ zang Yahudawa ɓaa ɓi nɛɛ Golgota.
43019018	A ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa ka nɔngkɔ. Ri ti ɓaa zang ziti naa jong nɛɛ wu. Ɓɔɔ gbete ka nakn, ɓɔɔ ka nagang, a Yeesɔ ɓi kaa teteng.
43019019	Bilatu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang bee vuu, zang ɓaa ka yuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa Yeesɔ naa kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ zang beeyi nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara, Kpanti zang Yahudawa.”
43019020	Zang Yahudawa dɔli ri gã vuu ɓɔɔ zang b'ee ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa Yeesɔ naa kagn bee nɛɛ gari kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang b'ee vuu bì'i nɛɛ nyaa Yahudawa, nɛɛ nyaa Rooma, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa Heleniyawa.
43019021	Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri daa ka bì'i Bilatu, ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Zang bèe kpang nɛɛ ‘kpanti zang Yahudawa’ kpang. Zang ri beeyi nɛɛ, ‘Yɔɔ keɓe kɔɔyi nɛɛ wukɔ kpanti zang Yahudawa.’”
43019022	Bilatu kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ n bèe ɓɛɛ, n b'ee m tɔ.”
43019023	Rɛɛ sɔɔja ri ɓ'aa Yeesɔ naa tɔ ka laa, a ri sèerè fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ri basɛ nɔng dɛ̃ɛti. Zang sɔɔja ɓu tuu nɔng gbete. Yaa kaa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu hãa nɛɛ tìng, ɓɔɔ zang duusu nyaa ka takpang ɓɛɛ.
43019024	Rɛɛ sɔɔja ri kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Ruu lɔɔsɔ kpang, ruu shaa laa, ruu zi zang ɓɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ keɓe raa ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.” Vuu keɓe nwang naa ɓɔɔ zang b'ee kaa yeti labeenang Laa ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang beeyi nɛɛ, “Ri basɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ mɛɛ ka bì'i ɓarɛ, a ri ti shaa laa ka ruu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ n hãa nɛɛ tìng ɓɛɛ.” Wee vuu ɓɔɔ sɔɔja ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
43019025	Nà'a Yeesɔ nɛɛ jaanaa nà'a Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ soro, nɛɛ Marayamu soro Kilopa, a ɓɔɔ Marayamu Magadaliya ri shiiri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa Yeesɔ naa naabm.
43019026	Yeesɔ zi niiɓɛ, nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ wu dɔli ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri shii ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ kɔ̀ɔ nà'a ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Maanaa, Jaa ɓaaɓɛ kiɓi kɔ.”
43019027	A kɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, bì'i tɔɔ, “Nà'a ɓaaɓɛ kiɓi kɔ.” A yɔɔ tuu nà'a Yeesɔ daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka gãa ɓiɓɛ.
43019028	Yeesɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ zang hangsɛ nyaa vuu tɔ nandon, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Sutu mãa m.” A kɔɔ nɔngkɔ tɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa wu nwang kaa nizang.
43019029	Zang shing mii inabi ɓɔɔ gbang katɔ kagn nɔngkɔ ka waka. A zang hãa sɔ̀ɔsɔ kagn, zang shing ka yuu laa hisop, zang a wu ka nyaa.
43019030	Yeesɔ m'aa mii inabi ɓɔɔ gbang katɔ tɔ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang hangsɛ nyaa tɔ.” A ɓaa yuu ka dii, vɔ kati.
43019031	A zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri gaa Bilatu nɛɛ wu yaa ta zang ri kakɛ doo zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaarɛ ri naa ka laa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ti witi vɔrɔ ɓarɛ zang daa gbãayi. Ri gaa wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ ɓi kaa diki ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ bii ka ruu diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɛɛ. Ri kasɛ kpang nɛɛ, ɓuru diki ɔ̃sɔnang wu ìi ri doo ka lapa kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ diki keɓe ɓi ɓɔɔ bang ɓɛɛ.
43019032	A rɛɛ sɔɔja ri daayi ri daa kakɛ doo rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri naa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɔɔnang.
43019033	Ɓɔɔ ri a ka yuu Yeesɔ, ri zirɛ vɔ ɓi tɔ, a ri kakɛ doo ɓiɓɛ kaa takpang.
43019034	Yɔɔ sɔɔja gbete shu kagn buru ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ shalang, zìi nɛɛ mii tɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ yɔɔ shu ɓɛɛ.
43019035	(Zang ɓɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ vuu keɓe, wukɔ kɔɔyi, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn kaa jong. Vuu kɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓi nizang, ti zi tɔ nɛɛ wu suu see kpang.)
43019036	Zang palɛ vuu keɓe naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang beeyi tɔɔ, “Zang ka kaka ɓiɓɛ gbete kpang.”
43019037	Zang ti bee kagn ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔkn tɔɔ, “Zang ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shu nɛɛ shalang nɛɛ jìng ɓarɛ.”
43019038	Ka knti weɓe, Yusufu yɔɔ gari Arimataya gaa Bilatu nɛɛ Bilatu wu a wu vɔrɔ Yeesɔ. (Yusufu ɓi doo zang ɓɔɔ dũng Yeesɔ kɔ, a kasɛ nɛɛ zang zi kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kaa vɔrɔ zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ.) Bilatu yaa wu nɛɛ wu daa tuu vɔrɔ Yeesɔ ta. A Yusufu daa kati, daa witi vɔrɔ Yeesɔ daa nɛɛ mani.
43019039	Ri daa nɛɛ Nikodimu, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ daa ka bii Yeesɔ nɛɛ zìi ɓɛɛ. Nikodimu atɛ gãnang ɓɔɔ nwàng naa lang, ɓɔɔ zang tũuru vɔrɔ ka bii, tɔ̀ɔ, wu pñ̀ng pati kpang, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ muru nɛɛ alu ɓɛɛ. Gãnang keɓe yi nyaa waka bang bang kopi katɔ.
43019040	Zang ziti keɓe, ri tuu vɔrɔ Yeesɔ, a ri tũuru wu gãnang kaɓa ka bii, a ri leng wu nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru naa ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri palɛ vɔrɔ, tɔ̀ɔ ri gbãayi ɓɛɛ.
43019041	Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa Yeesɔ naa ka laa ɓɛɛ, gbãng kagn nɔng naabm. Sàa shɔɔ kagn nɔngkɔ ɓɔɔ zang gbãa vɔrɔ gngn kpang ɓɛɛ.
43019042	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki kaɓa ɓi diki ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ bii ka ruu diki ɔ̃sɔnang, a sàa bì'i naabm, ri gbãa Yeesɔ kaa nɔngkɔ.
43020001	Nɔng gãntɛ tɔ gbete ka knti diki ɔ̃sɔnang, Marayamu Magadaliya daa ka yuu sàa bɛɛ nɔng yakɛ gn kpang. Zirɛ zang jìiri tari ɓɔɔ zang ku nyaa sàa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ tɔ.
43020002	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yurɛ daa ka bii Siman Bituru nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Yeesɔ kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang tuu vɔrɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ tɔ nɛɛ yeti sàa, ruu zi nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shing wu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.”
43020003	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Bituru nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kaɓa, ri yupaa nɛɛ ri dà'a ka yuu saa.
43020004	Ri yuu katɔ nandon, a yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ kaɓa, yurɛ yaa Bituru doo, a wukɔ daa shɛ̃ɛ yuu sàa shɔɔnang.
43020005	Ɓaa yuu ka dii, a lengse jìng ka yeti sàa, zi fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ ɓɔɔ zang leng Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Daa yeti sàa kaa takpang.
43020006	Siman Bituru a ka knti, a daa ɓi dɔ̃ɔ gbete ka yeti sàa. Zi fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang leng Yeesɔ nɛɛ mani ka nɔngkɔ.
43020007	A ɓɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang kãng yuu Yeesɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, ka nɔng gbete nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang leng Yeesɔ nɛɛ mani kpang. Zang leng ɓi ka bm dang gbete.
43020008	A yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ shɛ̃ɛ yuu sàa shɔɔnang kaɓa, daa yeti sàa kaa jong. Zi kaa jong nɔngkɔ, a shing danggn kati nɛɛ Yeesɔ seepaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa.
43020009	(Bɛɛ ri zi dìiri vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ Yeesɔ naa yupaa ditɔ nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ gn kpang)
43020010	A zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ keɓe, ri gbãayu, ri daa gãa.
43020011	Marayamu gbãayu ka yuu saa tɔkn, shii ka nyaa sàa biling a kaayi. Kaayi, a ɓaa yuu ka dii, a lengse jìng ka yeti sàa.
43020012	A zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ziti, ri hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru. Ri nwalɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang wɔɔ vɔrɔ Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Gbete nwang ka yupaa, a gbete nwang ka doo dii.
43020013	Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ Marayamu nɛɛ, “Jaa soro, mɔɔ kaa viya?” Marayamu kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang tuu Kpanti mɛɛ tɔ, n zi nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shing wu kagn kpang.”
43020014	Kɔ̀'ɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a raa jìng zi Yeesɔ shii tɔ. Zi kaa takpang nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ kpang.
43020015	Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Jaa soro, mɔɔ kaa viya? Mɔɔ kãa wiya?” Marayamu kɔ̀'ɔ ɓi naa zang gbãng kɔ, a kɔɔ wu nɛɛ “Maalang, mɔkɔ nɛɛ tuu wu, tusu m nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing wu kagn, n daa tuu wu.”
43020016	Yeesɔ ɓaa wu nyaa nɛɛ “Marayamu.” A raa jìng ka bì'i ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa Yahudawa nɛɛ, “Rabii” (Dìiri ruu keɓe ɓi “maalang”)
43020017	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ yi m naa gn bii kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n gbãayu gn lapa ka bii Daa mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Dàa ka bii rɛɛ manzung, mɔɔ daa kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, N gbãayu kana ka bii Daa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ doo daa manɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ, Laa mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ti doo Laa manɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.”
43020018	A Marayamu Magadaliya daayi, daa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu zi Kpanti Yeesɔ tɔ, a kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu ɓɛɛ kati.
43020019	Nɛɛ laarang ka diki kaɓa, ka diki ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ tɔ gbete, ka knti diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka yeti gãa, ri kulu nyaa gãa katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ a doo nɛɛ mani, naa shii ka teteng ɓarɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Yeti manɛ wu lasɛ kpang.”
43020020	Kɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ, a tusu ri naa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn. Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri zi Kpanti Yeesɔ naa weɓe, ri tãa tìnang dɔli.
43020021	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔkn tɔɔ, “Yeti manɛ wu lasɛ kpang. Naa ɓɔɔ Daa shong m ka koo, n shong nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ ka koo.”
43020022	Kɔɔ tɔ naa weɓe, a sha ɔ̃kɔnang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nyaa ka bii ɓarɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ta Suru tɔ̃ɔ Laa ta.
43020023	Naa nɔɔ yàa zang gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, Laa yàa ri tɔ kɔ doori. Naa nɔɔ yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang, Laa yaa ri doo kpang kɔ doori.”
43020024	Ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwang nyaa ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, Tooma (ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ jaa bãnang) ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ, ɓi ka nɔng kpang.
43020025	A rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ nimbang, ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Ruu zi Kpanti Yeesɔ tɔ.” Kɔɔ ri ɓi nɛɛ, “Naa n zi too kuusa ka naa ɓiɓɛ, a n hãa saa naa mɛɛ kagn, a n ti hãa naa mɛɛ ka kagn buru ɓiɓɛ kpang, n shing danggn m kpang.”
43020026	Diki ɓa tɔ mantaati, zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ri ka nyaa zɔɔ, ka yeti gãa. Tooma nɛɛ ri. Ri kulu nyaa gãa katɔ, a Yeesɔ a doo nɛɛ mani, naa shii ka teteng ɓarɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Yeti manɛ wu lasɛ kpang.”
43020027	A kɔɔ Tooma tɔɔ, “Hãa saa naa ɓaaɓɛ ka nihn, mɔɔ ti pɛ̃ɛrɛ naa mɛɛ. Mɔɔ dìi naa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ hãa ka kagn buru mɛɛ. M'ɔɔ nwàng wu zang ɓɔɔ yaa gn naa kpang, nwang ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ɓɛɛ.”
43020028	Tooma kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔkɔ Kpanti mɛɛ nɛɛ Laa mɛɛ.”
43020029	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ shing danggn kaa ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi m tɔ ɓɛɛ ya? Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi m kpang, ri shing danggn doo nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.”
43020030	Yeesɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔli ka jìng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang bee rùu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ka yeti labeenang keɓe nandon kpang.
43020031	Zang bee weɓe, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn kati, nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi, Jaa Laa. Nɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn tɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ, n'ɔɔ walɛ suru bii kati.
43021001	Nɛɛ knti, Yeesɔ nwang nyaa ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ka nyaa waapo ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Tiberiya ɓɛɛ. Tusu ri yuu ɓiɓɛ naa weɓe.
43021002	Siman Bituru nɛɛ Tooma ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jaa bãnang nɛɛ Natanalu (yɔɔ gari Kana ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galili ɓɛɛ.) nɛɛ wujɛ Zebedi ziti, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu doo ka bii Yeesɔ kɔ, ri ziti, ri nɛɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng gbete.
43021003	Siman Bituru kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N daa dòo jaazìi yinang.” Ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ning.” Ri daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka yeti tonsi. Ri tɛ̃ɛ jang nɛɛ zìi sasak nɔng gãntɛ nɛɛ mani, ri yi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang.
43021004	Bɛɛ laa ìi naa kana, Yeesɔ naa shii ka nyaa waapo. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ri zi kaa takpang nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ kpang.
43021005	A hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ masang, nɔɔ yi jaazìi kpang ya?” Ri kasɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu yi jaazìi wu gbete kpang.”
43021006	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ jang manɛ ka kagn tonsi ɓɔ̀'ɔ nakn nɔɔ yi jaazìi katɔ.” A ri tɛ̃ɛ jang kati, ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri gɔ̃rɛ ri atɛ ka yeti tonsi takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yi jaazìi tɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
43021007	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ, kɔɔ Bituru tɔɔ, “Ɓi Kpanti Yeesɔ.” Ɓɔɔ Bituru tãayi nɛɛ ɓi Kpanti, lu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ biling ɓiɓɛ ka bii (ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ tùlù fɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.) A shɛ̃ɛ ka yeti mii nɛɛ wu daa ka bii Yeesɔ.
43021008	Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nimbang kaɓa, rikɔ a ka nyaa dang gãnggãng ka yeti tonsi. Ri gɔ̃ jang ɓɔɔ jaazìi yi nyaa katɔ ka naa ning. Bɛɛ ri bee tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nyaa waapo kpang, nà'a zang dìi doo laa maani kɔ nwani.
43021009	Ri a tɔ nyaa waapo, a ri zirɛ zang tɛɛ waa tɔ nɛɛ shekere. Jaazìi kagn yuu waa, a borodi ti kagn nɔng.
43021010	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ atɛ jaazìi ka teteng jaazìi ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi kãntang ɓɛɛ.”
43021011	Siman Bituru vang tonsi daa gɔ̃ jang, a nɛɛ mani ka nyaa gãnggãng. Jang yi nyaa katɔ nɛɛ jaazìi bang bang, nung laa maani tu laa ziti tu kopi tu taati. Jang yi nyaa katɔ naa weɓe, a lɔɔsɔ kaa takpang.
43021012	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ arɛ nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang.” A zang gbete ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, hɛ̃ɛ wu kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ “Mɔkɔ wiya?” Kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri zi tɔ nɛɛ ɓi Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
43021013	Yeesɔ arɛ naa tuu borodi, a ri, a a ri jaazìi doo nɔngkɔ.
43021014	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ yupaa nɛɛ sàa, nwang nyaa tɔ ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, daa kaa nɛɛ weɓe doo taati.
43021015	Ri hangsɛ vuu shaanang tɔ, a Yeesɔ ràng Siman Bituru yee tɔɔ, “Siman jaa Yɔhana, mɔɔ kasɛ m ɓa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang keɓe ri kasɛ m ɓɛɛ katɔ ya?” A kasɛ Yeesɔ nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, Kpanti mɔɔ zi tɔ, n kasɛ mɔɔ katɔ.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Gãng jìng ka zang mɛɛ.”
43021016	Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔkn daa kaa doo ziti tɔɔ, “Siman jaa Yɔhana, mɔɔ kasɛ m katɔ ya?” Kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, Kpanti mɔɔ zi tɔ, n kasɛ mɔɔ katɔ.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Gãng jìng ka zang mɛɛ”,
43021017	Yeesɔ kɔɔ tɔkn daa kaa doo taati tɔɔ, “Siman jaa Yɔhana mɔɔ kasɛ m katɔ ya?” Yeti Bituru lasɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ hɛ̃ɛ wu daa doo taati nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ m katɔ ya?” ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, mɔɔ zi vuu tɔ nandon, mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ n kasɛ mɔɔ katɔ.” Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Gãng jìng ka zang mɛɛ.”
43021018	“N kɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani, mɔɔ nɛɛ doo jasang, mɔɔ kpalɛ bii nɛɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ daa nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ, mɔɔ dìi naa, zang ɓɔɔgn mã mɔɔ, wu tuu mɔɔ, wu daa nɛɛ mɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
43021019	(Yeesɔ kɔɔ vuu keɓe nɛɛ tɔɔ wu tusu naa ɓɔɔ Bituru naa vɔrɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang dɔɔ Laa kaa gn ɓɛɛ.) Yeesɔ hangsɛ ruu keɓe kɔɔnang tɔ, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
43021020	Bituru raa jìng ka knti, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ tiki ka danggn Yeesɔ naabm ka diki ɓɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang ɓɛɛ. A ti hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, wi naa nyɔ yuu ɓaaɓɛ wiya?”
43021021	Ɓɔɔ Bituru zi wu, hɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ tɔɔ, “A yɔɔ keɓe zang naa palɛ wu ɓi viya?”
43021022	Yeesɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa n kasɛ nɛɛ wu vɔ kpang, n gbãayu nɛɛ mani, ruu ɓaa hãa kagn ya? Palɛ ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
43021023	Ruu keɓe, baa teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ nɛɛ yɔɔ keɓe vɔ ɓi kpang. Yeesɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ yɔɔ vɔ kpang kpang, kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, “Naa n kasɛ nɛɛ wu vɔ kpang, 'n gbãayu nɛɛ mani, ruu ɓaaɓɛ hãa kagn ya?”
43021024	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ mantɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ keɓe kɔ kɔɔrɔ vuu keɓe, wukɔ ti beeyi ka labeenang. Ruu ti zi tɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ ɓi nizang kɔ nwani.
43021025	Vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔ kagn dɔli. Naa zang nɛɛ bee katɔ gbete gbete ka labeenang, koo keɓe nandon daa naa ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ labeenang ɓɔɔ zang beere kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.
44001001	Dabang Tiyofilu, ka yeti labeenang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang, n b'ee vuu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ p'al'ɛ a ti tusu ɓɛɛ nandon. N gaayu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu gaayu palɛnang,
44001002	à nɛɛ mani ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa tuu wu daa nɛɛ wu ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ daa lapa gn kpang, Suru Laa yi wu naa ka bii, a rang rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri nɛɛ ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ wu shong ri ɓɛɛ yee.
