44001003	Ka knti jìng dannang ɓiɓɛ, tusu ri yuu ɓiɓɛ diki laa ziti. Nwang nyaa ka bii ɓarɛ ka diki ka bm bm, naa ɓɔɔ ri làa nyaa takpang nɛɛ wu doo ningkãari kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri zi wu, a ti rang yee nɛɛ ri ka yuu Kpanti roonang Laa.
44001004	Diki ɓɔɔ bɛɛ shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ ri nɔng gbete, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N'ɔɔ yaa Urushalima kpang. Nɔɔ gã vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ Daa a nyaa nɛɛ wu a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
44001005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yɔhana pàlɛ̀ zang batizima nɛɛ mii. Diki b'ee takpang, zang pàl'ɛ nɔɔ batizima ditɔ nɛɛ Suru Laa.”
44001006	Ka ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Dabang, mɔɔ sɔɔrɔ zang Isirela kpanti ɓarɛ kaa laa keɓe kɔ ya?”
44001007	Yeesɔ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Laa nɛɛ diki ɓi Daa shìli nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, ruu manɛ hãa ɓi kagn kpang.
44001008	Diki ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a ka bii manɛ, nɔɔ nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀'ɔ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ ka gari Urushalima, nɛɛ tipi Yahudiya nandon, nɛɛ tipi Samariya, nɔɔ daa nɛɛ mani ka nɔng ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ”.
44001009	Kɔɔ ruu keɓe tɔ, a Laa tuu wu kati daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka lapa. Ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ wu nɛɛ jìng. A sãmbong ɓɔɔ arɛ naa zuu wu, ri zi wu takpang.
44001010	Ri shu jìng doo ka lapa, ri zi naa ɓɔɔ wu daa ɓɛɛ, a zang varɛ ziti ri hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru, ri shiiri ka kagn ɓarɛ.
44001011	Ri kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang tipi Galili, nɔɔ shiiri ka ruu vi nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ lapa viya? Yeesɔ kɔ zang tuu wu, zang daa nɛɛ wu ka lapa ɓee, naa gbãayu doo naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi wu daa ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
44001012	A zang shoonang Yeesɔ naa yaa kɔpɔ Zeetung, ri gbãayu ka gari Urushalima. Kɔpɔ Zeetung bì'i nɛɛ gari Urushalima daa mɛli gbete kpang.
44001013	Ri shɛ̃ɛ yeti gari tɔ, ri daa ka gãa lapa ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri nw'ang kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe rikɔ rɛɛ, Bituru, nɛɛ Yɔhana, nɛɛ Yakubu, a ɓɔɔ Anduru, nɛɛ Filibu, nɛɛ Tooma, nɛɛ Baatolomi, nɛɛ Matiyu, nɛɛ Yakubu jaa Alifaya, a ɓɔɔ Siman ɓɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ tipi ɓarɛ wu gbãayu nɛɛ knti kpang, nɛɛ Yahuda jaa Yakubu.
44001014	Ri kp'alɛ̀ zɔɔ diki diki, ri gaa Laa nɔng gbete nɛɛ rɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ kagn, nɛɛ Marayamu nà'a Yeesɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ jaanaa Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ varɛ.
44001015	Ka diki ɓɔɔ kagn, zang ɓɔɔ ri sh'ing danggn tɔ laa maani tu bmati, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ. A Bituru seepaa a shiiyi, rang yee.
44001016	Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang kɔɔyi nw'ang ditɔ nizang. Suru Laa rang yee ka tìng nɛɛ nyaa Dawuda ka yuu Yahuda ɓɔɔ sɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri daa y'i Yeesɔ tìng ɓɛɛ.
44001017	Bɛɛ Yahuda ka teteng ɓuru, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ z'ɔ̃ng wu nɛɛ wu p'al'ɛ shoonang keɓe jong nɛɛ ruu ɓɛɛ.”
44001018	(Saka ɓɔɔ Yahuda walɛ ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu p'al'ɛ, hoo tipi nɛɛ mani a watɛ kagn. Shɔ̀ nɛɛ yuu a buru ɓiɓɛ sãayi a lembo ɓiɓɛ tungku ka biling.
44001019	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima ri tãa ruu keɓe katɔ nandon ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri ɓaa tipi bii nɛɛ nyaa ɓarɛ nɛɛ Akaladama, dìiri nung bì'i ɓi “Tipi Zìi.”)
44001020	Bituru ti kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Zabura nɛɛ, ‘Gãa ɓiɓɛ wu nwang dãzãa, zang ɓɔɔ wu nwàng kagn kpang.’ Zang ti bee tɔkn nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓɔɔ wu ta nɔng shoonang ɓiɓɛ.’
44001021	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, r'uu zɔ̃ng zang gbete ka teteng zang keɓe ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ ruu doo nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ rakɛ nɛɛ ruu ɓɛɛ.
44001022	Gaayu nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ Yɔhana pàlɛ̀ zang batizima kagn, a nɛɛ mani ka diki ɓɔɔ zang tuu Yeesɔ nɛɛ teteng ɓuru zang daa nɛɛ wu ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Wu ti nwang zang gbete ka teteng ɓuru ɓɔɔ naa kɔɔ zang naa ɓɔɔ Laa wisi Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.”
44001023	A ri atɛ nung zang varɛ ziti. Yusufu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Basaba a zang ti ɓaa wu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ Jusitu ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ kaa Maatiya.
44001024	A ri gaa Laa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, mɔkɔ zi yeti zang piti, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, tusu ruu zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zɔ̃ng ka teteng zang ziti keɓe ta,
44001025	ɓɔɔ nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shong ɓɛɛ, wu tèng nɔng ɓɔɔ Yahuda yaayi daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ɓi wukɔ nɔng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
44001026	A ri shaa laa nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri zɔ̃ng zang gbete ka teteng zang ziti keɓe. L'aa yi Maatiya, a zang ɓakɛ wu kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang shoonang kopi tu gbete kaɓa.
44002001	Diki Pentiko naa arɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri sh'ing danggn tɔ, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng gbete.
44002002	A ri tãa yee nwang nɛɛ lapa naa jasung bang rarɛ, a naa baa yeti gãa ɓɔɔ ri nwang kagn ɓɛɛ.
44002003	A ri zi vuu naa rìiti waa, baa nɔng, a leere zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng piti ka yuu.
44002004	Suru Laa a kaa bii ɓarɛ, a ri gaayu yee rannang kaa nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔgn naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa tusu ri nɛɛ ri rang ɓɛɛ.
44002005	Zang Yahudawa kagn ka Urushalima ka diki kaɓa. Zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri d'ũng Laa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ tipi koolaa nandon ɓɛɛ.
44002006	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa yee keɓe, zang dɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ. Vuu keɓe kpãa ri dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tãa zang ɓɔɔ ri sh'ing danggn tɔ keɓe ri rangkɛ yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
44002007	Ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zang kɔ ri rang yee ɓee, ɓu bɛɛ zang tipi Galili kɔ nandon kpang ya?
44002008	A palɛ kaa biya ruu tãayi ri rang yee nɛɛ nyaa tipi ɓuru viya?
44002009	Ruu 'alɛ̀ ɓuru nɛɛ tipi Fatiya, nɛɛ tipi Madiya, nɛɛ tipi Elama, nɛɛ tipi Bagadaza, nɛɛ tipi Yahudiya, nɛɛ tipi Kapaadoosiya, nɛɛ tipi Pontu, ɓɔɔ tipi Asiya,
44002010	nɛɛ tipi Fijiya, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Pamfiliya, nɛɛ tipi Masar, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ kiiri Kiranɛ nyaa ka teteng ɓɔɔ ɓi tipi Libiya ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang zanti ɓɔɔ ri 'al'ɛ nɛɛ gari Rooma ɓɛɛ, ri ɓarɛ zang Yahudawa a ɓɔɔ kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri risi yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri kaa dòo zang Yahudawa kɔ doori ɓɛɛ.
44002011	A ɓɔɔ zang Karitawa, nɛɛ zang Larabawa. Ruu tãayi ri kɔɔrɔ vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ nɛɛ nyaa zang gãa ɓuru.”
44002012	Ri mã naa ka danggn, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri p'al'ɛ takpang. Ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zɔɔ kati nɛɛ “vuu keɓe ɓi lɛɛ viya?”
44002013	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpaa ri nɛɛ, “Ɓi saa palɛ ri”
44002014	A Bituru seepaa nɛɛ zang shoonang ri kopi tu gbete, a rang zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ yee tɔɔ, “Manzung zang Yahudiya, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka Urushalima nandon, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo n kɔɔ nɔɔ dìiri vuu keɓe.
44002015	Wu saa palɛ rɛɛ zang keɓe naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi doo saka mandɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ gãndi kɔ nwani.
44002016	Vuu keɓe, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa Jɔɔwel kɔɔ r'uu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Jɔɔwel kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
44002017	‘Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ka rɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ, N naa a shɔnzang piti Suru mɛɛ. Wujɛ manɛ zang soro nɛɛ zang varɛ, ri naa kɔɔrɔ ruu naa ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Wujɛ jasang manɛ, ri naa zili vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu zang ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ dabang manɛ, ri naa rɔ̃kɔ rɔ̃kɔnang.
44002018	Ka diki kaɓa, n naa a rɛɛ jaafoo mɛɛ zang soro nɛɛ zang varɛ naa, tɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
44002019	N tusu vuu ka lapa zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn. N ti tusu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ ka tipi. Zìi naa zɛ̃ɛ ka tipi, a waa naa shaa nɔng, zĩ̀ir'i ta nɔng piti.
44002020	Zang risi làa, wu tɔ̀ɔ kaa tɔ, shala wu ti r'aa ɓi kaa zìi, tɔ̀ɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang a Laa bannang kagn wu arɛ. Diki kaɓa wukɔ diki ɓɔɔ bang ɓɛɛ.
44002021	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gàa Laa nɛɛ wu yi wu naa ka bii, ka diki kaɓa, Laa ta yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ’.
44002022	“Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka ruu keɓe, rɛɛ manzung zang Isirela. Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara, zang ɓɔɔ Laa tùsù nɔɔ wu ka vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti zi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
44002023	Zang a nɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe, ka naa ɓɔɔ Laa sh'ing doo ka tìng ɓɛɛ. Ti Laa kɔ kasɛ a nɔɔ ɓaa wu naa ka laa. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ.
44002024	Laa ta wu nɛɛ naa vɔrɔ, a wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ka ruu ɓɔɔ, daa naa ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ yiti wu kpang ɓɛɛ.
44002025	Dawuda kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, ‘Diki diki jìng mɛɛ ɓi ka bii Laa, N ti zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓi nɛɛ n naabm. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kaa vɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang.
44002026	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yeti mɛɛ ɓi tìnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. N dɔɔ m Laa Naa wee n m shɔnzang waati ɓee, n nwàngnɛ n yaa gn naa kpang.
44002027	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ yaa m ka nɔng vɔrɔ kpang ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ ti yaa vɔrɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓaaɓɛ wu pũng ka sàa kpang.
44002028	mɔɔ tusu m gbalang ɓɔɔ n, sɔɔyi n wàl'ɛ Suru bii tɔ. Mɔɔ naa shing m 'n tãa tìnang ka tìng ɓaaɓɛ.’
44002029	“Rɛɛ manzung, n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu katɔ ka yuu dabang ɓuru Dawuda, nyaa zàa m kpang. Dawuda vɔrɛ, a zang gbãa wu, sà'a ɓiɓɛ ti doogn ka nɔng ɓuru kãntang keɓe.
44002030	Dawuda ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Laa, a ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tũng wu ɓi tɔ. Laa tũng wu vuu tɔɔ, wu y'i zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ gbete wu roo kpanti.
44002031	Dawuda naa zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa naa palɛ ka tìng ɓɛɛ, a rang ruu ka yuu naa ɓɔɔ zang wisi Kirisi paa ɓɛɛ. Dawuda kɔɔyi tɔɔ, Zang naa y'aa wu ka sàa kpang, bii ɓiɓɛ ti pũng kpang.
44002032	Laa wisi Yeesɔ keɓe paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa, ruu nandon ruu zi katɔ nɛɛ jìng ɓuru.
44002033	Laa wisi wu paa, a shing wu tɔ ka nakn ɓiɓɛ, a a wu suru ɓɔɔ bɛɛ a ruu nyaa nɛɛ wu naa a ruu ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zirɛ, nɔɔ ti tãa kãntang keɓe, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tɔɔ wu a ruu ɓɛɛ kɔ.
44002034	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Dawuda daa ka lapa kpang ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔ doo nɛɛ mani tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti Laa kɔɔ kpanti mɛɛ tɔɔ, Nwang ka nakn mɛɛ,
44002035	n sh'ing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang ditɔ mɔɔ naa ri nɛɛ doo ɓaaɓɛ.’
44002036	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang Isirela, nɔɔ zi ta tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa wu naa ka laa keɓe, Laa shing kaa wukɔ nwàng Kpanti, wukɔ ti Kirisi zang ɓɔɔ Laa tɔɔ, wu naa a ɓɛɛ.”
44002037	Ɓɔɔ zang ri tãa ruu keɓe, kpãa ri ka yeti dɔli, a ri hɛ̃ɛ Bituru nɛɛ rɛɛ zang shoonang ɓɔɔ nimbang tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, r'uu palɛ ɓu kaa viya?”
44002038	Bituru kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang ɓu wu yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ ta, zang palɛ nɔɔ batizima nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ Kirisi, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu yaa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ ɓɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu a nɔɔ Suru ɓiɓɛ kati.
44002039	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ Laa 'a nyaa ɓi ka ruu manɛ kɔ nɛɛ wujɛ manɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ti ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri naabm ka bii Laa kpang. Suru keɓe, ka ruu zang piti ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti ɓuru” naa ɓaa ri nyaa ɓɛɛ.
44002040	Bituru rangkɛ ri ruu ɓɔɔ kaa gn dɔli, a shaarɛ ri nyaa kati tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ta yuu manɛ katɔ nɛɛ naa jìng ɓɔɔ zang naa dǎng zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ shi kpang ɓɛɛ.”
44002041	Zang dɔli ri ta ruu ɓiɓɛ, a zang palɛ ri batizima. Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ gisi ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ ri daa nung zang labang taati katɔ.
44002042	Zang keɓe ri shing yuu ɓarɛ ɓi ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang shoonang ri tusu ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ kaa yuu ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ti ka vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ri shaa ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ti ka Laa gaanang.
44002043	Zang piti ri kaa vɔrɔ a Laa ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔli nɛɛ naa zang shoonang keɓe.
44002044	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri nwang ka nɔng gbete, ri bàs'ɛ vuu naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ zɔɔ.
44002045	Ri malɛ vuu ɓarɛ ri bàsɛ̀ saka nɛɛ zɔɔ. Ri a zang ɓu naa ɓɔɔ daa wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
44002046	Ri kp'alɛ̀ zɔɔ ka Gãa Laa diki diki. A ri ti shaa vuu ɓarɛ ka nyaa zɔɔ ka gãa ɓarɛ. Ri shaa vuu shaanang, ri tãa tìnang, ri ti ta zɔɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete.
44002047	Ri dɔɔ Laa, a zang piti ti rang yee tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ, Laa ti gìs'i ri zang ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu ɓarɛ tɔ ka zɔɔ diki diki.
44003001	Diki ɓɔɔgn, Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ri daa ka Gãa Laa, ka laa ɓɔɔ zang daarɛ Laa gaanang ɓɛɛ, ka saka taati ɓɔɔ laarang.
44003002	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔgn, zang y'i wu kàa katɔ. Zang tùur'u wu diki diki, zang naa shing wu ka nyaa Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ, “Shi Dɔli.” ɓɛɛ. Gàar'ɛ vuu ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri 'alɛ̀ ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ.
44003003	Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ bì'i zi Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana, ri hãa nyaa kaa yeti Gãa Laa, a gaa vuu ka naa ɓarɛ.
44003004	Ri shu yɔɔ jìng ka bii, a Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Pɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu karɛ”
44003005	A shu ri jìng ka bii, kɔɔ ɓi naa ri a wu vuu.
44003006	A Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “K'ɔpɔ̀ kagn naa mɛɛ kpang tingkiring, N a mɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ka nung Yeesɔ Kirisi yɔɔ gari Nazara, n kɔɔ mɔɔ, yupaa ta mɔɔ rarɛ.”
44003007	A y'i yɔɔ ka naa, yì wu naa ka paa yunang. Doo yɔɔ nɛɛ jìng doo ɓiɓɛ tantɛ lakɛnang.
44003008	Yɔɔ zaa ka lapa, a shii nɛɛ doo, a gaayu ranang. A daa yeti Gãa Laa kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana, r'arɛ̀ wu ti zaa ka lapa, ti dɔ̀'ɔ Laa kana.
44003009	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nandon ri zì wu, ra kana, ti dɔ̀'ɔ Laa kana,
44003010	a ɓɔɔ ri zi wu nung nɛɛ wukɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ gaarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nwang ka nyaa Gãa ɓɔɔ Shi Dɔli, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ.
44003011	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ yɔɔ yi rɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana dòo ka naa, zang dɔli ri mã naa ka danggn. A ri yuku ri daa ka bii ɓarɛ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ putali Sulemanu ɓɛɛ.
44003012	Ɓɔɔ Bituru zi zang, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, zang Isirela nɔɔ mã naa ka danggn ka ruu vuu keɓe ka ruu viya, a nɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ rùu j'ìng ka bii nɔngkɔ viya? Nɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ruu masɛ yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang yuu ɓuru, k'ɔ ka ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ruu p'alɛ̀ Laa ɓɛɛ ya?
44003013	Là'a rɛɛ dabang ɓuru Ibirayi, nɛɛ Ishaaku, nɛɛ Yakubu kɔ a zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ Yeesɔ bannang ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ a zang bang bang Yahudawa wu nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ wu ka tìng kpanti Bilatu, ka ɓɔɔ Bilatu kɔ̀'ɔyi tɔ nɛɛ wu yaa wu naa kaatɔ ɓɛɛ.
44003014	“P'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi kpang, ɓi ti zang tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ wu doo nɛɛ mani. Nɔɔ gàa Bilatu nɛɛ wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, wu yàa nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ kɔ naa jong.
44003015	Nɔɔ nyɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang wàl'ɛ suru bii ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ. A Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa, rùu zi wu nɛɛ jìng ɓuru.
44003016	Danggn shinnang ka nung Yeesɔ kɔ masɛ yɔɔ kɔ nɔɔ zi nɛɛ jìng, a nɔɔ ti zì wu nung tɔ ɓee. Ɓi nung Yeesɔ nɛɛ danggn shinnang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ masɛ yɔɔ keɓe dɔ̃ɔ gbete, naa wee nɔɔ zi ɓee.
44003017	“Rɛɛ manzung, n zi tɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang manɛ, nɔɔ p'al'ɛ Yeesɔ, wu nɛɛ gb'ãa kpang.
44003018	Laa kɔɔ ɓi tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ nyaa rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ nandon, nɛɛ Kirisi naa dang jìng katɔ. Vuu keɓe ɓèe ɓi kaa nyaa ruu keɓe kɔ.
44003019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ ta, nɔɔ gbãayu kaa bii Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, wu yaa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ kati.
44003020	Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu yaa nɔɔ gbalang nɔɔ ɔ̃sɔ kati.
44003021	Yeesɔ keɓe nwang doo ka lapa ka gbongkarɛ diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa risi vuu piti, wu raa kaa naa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang tɔkn, wu a nɛɛ mani. Diki ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ ri p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang, ɓɔɔ ri nwang doo ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
44003022	Musa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Laa naa zɔ̃ng zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ditɔ, nɛɛ teteng rɛɛ manzung manɛ, naa ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ng m ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, ka vuu ɓɔɔ, wu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ nandon.
44003023	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang nyaa shoonang Laa kaɓa kpang, zang nw'angs'ɛ wu katɔ nɛɛ teteng zang Laa, zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ.’
44003024	Nizang, zang nyaa shoonang Laa nandon, ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang ruu Laa ɓɛɛ, gàay'u nɛɛ yuu Samayila nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri 'al'ɛ ka knti ɓiɓɛ, ri kɔɔrɔ ruu tɔ, ka yuu rɛɛ diki keɓe.
44003025	Nɔkɔ kaa wujɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa keɓe. Nɔkɔ ti tà vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa, nɛɛ wu a rɛɛ dabang manɛ ɓɛɛ kati. Laa kɔɔ Ibirayi tɔɔ, ‘N a zang koo keɓe nandon tìnang tãanang nɛɛ bii zɔ̃ng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.’
44003026	Laa wisi zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ paa tɔ, a shong wu kaa bii manɛ kɔ shɔɔnang, tɔ̀ɔ, wu a nɔɔ tìnang tãanang ka ɓɔɔ wu shing nɔɔ nandon, nɔɔ yaa gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ ɓɛɛ.”
44004001	Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ri rang yee doo ka naa nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ Sadukiyawa, ri a ka bii ɓarɛ.
44004002	Yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ nɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tusu zang vuu, a ti kɔɔ ri nɛɛ Yeesɔ yupaa tɔ nɛɛ sàa, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang yupaa katɔ nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ.
44004003	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri yiki Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana, ri daa loo ri ka sãa nɛɛ nɔng wu gãntɛ ka gbongkarɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ kaa nɛɛ laarang.
44004004	Zang dɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ri kɔɔyi, ri shing danggn. Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ri daa kaa nung labang maani.
44004005	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ rɛɛ dabang ɓarɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka Urushalima.
44004006	Ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ Ana, kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ Kayifa, nɛɛ Yɔhana, nɛɛ Alezanda, a ɓɔɔ kaa rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing zɔɔ nɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ.
44004007	Zang atɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ka tìng ɓarɛ, a ri hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ walɛ naa vuu palɛnang ka niya nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ mani wiya? Nɔɔ palɛ nɛɛ nung wiya?”
44004008	A Suru Laa a kaa bii Bituru, a kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ dabang,
44004009	nɔɔ n'ɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ ruu, ruu keɓe ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu yi zang ɓɔɔ vuu palɛ katɔ naa ka bii, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ ruu masɛ wu,
44004010	n kaa ɓi, n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ zang Isirela piti faarik, nɛɛ yɔɔ kɔ shii ka tìng manɛ ɓee, zang masɛ wu nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ Kirisi, yɔɔ gari Nazara ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa wu naa ka laa, a Làa naa wisi wu paa ka sàa ɓɛɛ.
44004011	Yeesɔ keɓe kɔ, ‘Tari ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ mãa gãa nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛyi, wukɔ naa raa tari ɓɔɔ yiti gãa ɓɛɛ kati.’
44004012	Zang ɓɔɔ ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka koo keɓe gbete ɓɔɔ Laa a zang nung ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wukɔ ta yuu zang ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
44004013	Zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, ri zi naa ɓɔɔ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ri rang yee ri kaa vɔrɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. A zang ti kɔɔ ri nɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ɓarɛ zang waati, ri bee laa gngn kpang ɓɛɛ, ri mã naa ka danggn. Ri naa zi kati nɛɛ zang keɓe ri nw'ang ɓarɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ.
44004014	Ka ɓɔɔ ri zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang masɛ wu shìi nɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana, vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ takpang.
44004015	A ri kɔɔ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana nɛɛ ri nwang ka biling gbongkarɛ. A ri tɔng zɔɔ ka naa ɓarɛ.
44004016	Ri hɛ̃ɛ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Ruu palɛ biya nɛɛ rɛɛ zang keɓe viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima nandon, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ zang keɓe ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ gngn kpang ɓɛɛ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu ti là'a nyaa kpang.
44004017	Ruu nɛɛ tɔɔ ruu zãa ruu keɓe nɔng baanang, r'uu ɓ'aa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang keɓe, ruu dàng ri nyaa nɛɛ ri rang zang ɓɔɔ yee tɔ̀'ɔ ka nung Yeesɔ kpang.”
44004018	A ri ɓaa Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana nyaa tɔkn ka yeti gãa. Ri dang ri nyaa nɛɛ ri rang yee, ri tusu zang vuu tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ kpang.
44004019	Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ s'ee karɛ ka yeti manɛ nɔɔ zirɛ, wi tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa wiya? Naa rùu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa manɛ ya, kɔ ruu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa?
44004020	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zunung naa ɓɔɔ ruu yaa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi nɛɛ jìng ɓuru, a ruu ti tãa nɛɛ shoo ɓuru kɔɔnang kpang ɓɛɛ.”
44004021	Zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, ri dàng ri nyaa gbãnggbãng, a ri yaa ri naa. Ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri dang ri jìng kagn kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nandon ri dɔɔ Laa kana ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ.
44004022	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, ɓɔɔ zang masɛ wu keɓe, s'aa ɓiɓɛ ɓ'a laa ziti katɔ.
44004023	Ɓɔɔ zang y'aa Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana naa, ri tantɛ daanang ka bii zang shoonang ɓɔɔ nimbang. Ri daa kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
44004024	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu keɓe hn, ri mɛɛ nyaa dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ka lapa ri gaa Laa tɔɔ, “Dabang ɓuru, zang ɓɔɔ mãa lapa nɛɛ tipi nɛɛ mii waapo nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ nandon ɓɛɛ.
44004025	Mɔkɔ rang yee nɛɛ bii Suru Tɔ̃ɔ ɓaaɓɛ, nɛɛ nyaa zang shoonang ɓaaɓɛ dabang ɓuru Dawuda, nɛɛ ‘Zang ri ɓɔɔ zi Laa kpang, ri làs'ɛ yeti ɓarɛ ka ruu viya? A zang ri tɔng zɔɔ waati ka ruu viya?
44004026	Rɛɛ kpanti zang koo ri kpalɛ bii, a rɛɛ zang bang bang, ri tɔng zɔɔ nɔng gbete nɛɛ ri gaa nyaa nɛɛ Kpanti Laa nɛɛ Kirisi ɓiɓɛ’.
44004027	Kpanti Hiridu nɛɛ kpanti Bilatu, ri kpalɛ yuu nizang ka gari keɓe nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Isirela ka yuu Yeesɔ, zang shoonang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ Kirisi, zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ.
44004028	Ri kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ ri p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ sh'ing ɓaa doo ka tìng nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ wu nwang nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
44004029	Kpanti, kãntang keɓe, zi nyaa ɓɔɔ ri dang ta, m'ɔɔ mã ruu danggn jong, ruu rang Ruu ɓaaɓɛ, ruu kaa vɔrɔ kpang.
44004030	Dìi naa ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ masɛ zang. Mɔɔ a ruu naa, r'uu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ, zang shoonang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓi kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
44004031	Ri hangsɛ nyaa Laa gaanang tɔ, a nɔng ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ yuu ruutu. Suru Laa a ka bii ɓarɛ, a ri gaa tɔɔsung ruu Laa kɔɔnang, ri kaa vɔrɔ kpang.
44004032	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ nandon, yeti ɓarɛ gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ, ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ ɓiɓɛ ka bm kpang. Ri basɛ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ nɛɛ zɔɔ ri nandon.
44004033	Rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ, ri kɔɔ zang ruu paa yunang Kpanti Yeesɔ nɛɛ sàa, ri k'aa vɔrɔ kpang. A Laa pàlɛ̀ ri tɔ̃ɔ dɔli.
44004034	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ dang jìng ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nandon ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn naa tipi nɛɛ gãa, ri malɛ, ri atɛ saka vuu ɓɔɔ ri malɛ keɓe.
44004035	Ri naa atɛ ka tìng rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ. Zang basɛ, zang a zang ɓu naa ɓɔɔ daa wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
44004036	Ri palɛ kana naa weɓe, a Yusufu zɔ̃ng Leevi, yɔɔ Kuburu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ri a wu nung nɛɛ Baranaba (dìiri nung keɓe ɓi, “Jaa ɓɔɔ mã zang danggn ɓɛɛ.”)
44004037	Malɛ tipi ɓiɓɛ, a atɛ saka, naa a rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ.
44005001	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Hananiya nɛɛ ɓeeso Safaratu, ri malɛ tipi ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ kagn.
44005002	Vaa nyaa saka a waasɛ, ɓeeso kasɛ nyaa kagn. A atɛ ɓɔɔ yaa knti, naa a rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ.
44005003	Bituru hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Hananiya, ka ruu vi sheetang ta rɛ̃rɛnang ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ sù'u Suru Laa sè'e a mɔɔ vaa saka tipi ɓɔɔ mɔɔ malɛ mɔɔ yiti viya?
44005004	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ malɛ gn kpang, wu ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ kpang ya? Ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ti malɛ tɔ, saka piti wu ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ kɔ kpang ya? Ka ruu vi mɔɔ naa mang ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe viya? Mɔɔ suu wu shɔnzang sè'e kpang mɔɔ suu ɓaa Laa sè'e.”
44005005	Ɓɔɔ Hananiya tãa ruu keɓe naa weɓe, tantɛ watɛnang ka tipi a vɔrɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu keɓe piti, ri kaa vɔrɔ dɔli.
44005006	Wujɛ jasang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng, ri seepaa, ri leng vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ, ri nwangsɛ wu ka biling. Ri daa gbãa wu.
44005007	Knti b'ee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, ɓeeso arɛ, zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓi kpang.
44005008	A Bituru hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ ruu jong, tipi ɓɔɔ nɔɔ malɛ, wee saka bì'i kɔ nandon ya?” Kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn, saka bì'i kɔ nandon.”
44005009	Bituru hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Ka ruu vi nɔɔ mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ ɓaavɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ gãsɛ Suru Laa viya? Ɓaa shoo mɔɔ tãa doo zang ɓɔɔ ri dàa gbãa ɓaavɛ kɔ, ri a kana nyaa gãa ɓee. Ri tuu mɔɔ ditɔ jong, ri nwangsɛ mɔɔ ka biling.”
44005010	A tantɛ watɛnang ka tìng Bituru ka nɔngkɔ a vɔrɛ. Wujɛ jasang kaɓa, ri a ka yeti gãa, ri zi wu vɔ tɔ. A ri tuu wu, ri nwangsɛ wu ka biling, ri daa gbãa wu ka kagn ɓeevɛ.
44005011	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu keɓe ri kaa vɔrɔ dɔli.
44005012	Rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔli ka teteng zang. A zang ɓɔɔ ri sh'ing danggn tɔ ri kp'al'ɛ zɔɔ diki diki ka nɔng gbete, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Putali Sulemanu ɓɛɛ.
44005013	Zang rang yee tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ, a zang biling ɓɔɔ shɛ̃ɛ teteng ɓarɛ kaa tɔ̀'ɔ kagn gbete kpang.
44005014	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Laa, ri shangnɛ diki diki. Ri shang dɔli zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro nandon.
44005015	Ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ri p'alɛ̀, zang dɔli ri atɛ zang kɔnang ɓarɛ ka nyaa gbalang, ri wɔɔ ri ka yuu latãng nɛɛ siri, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Bituru nɛɛ tɛɛnang, jasuru ɓiɓɛ kɔ̀ wu ti a ka yuu ɓarɛ shɛ̃ɛning wu m'as'ɛ ri kati.
44005016	Zang ri alɛ dɔli nɛɛ rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ kiiri Urushalima nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ. Ri atɛ zang kɔnang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, zang m'as'ɛ ri nandon.
44005017	Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ nandon, ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang Sadukiyawa ɓɛɛ, ri kaa sũnyaa, a gnvɔ shaa ri dɔli.
44005018	Ri yiki rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ, ri loo ri ka sãa.
44005019	Nɛɛ zìi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa arɛ naa puu nyaa sãa, a nwangsɛ ri ka biling. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ,
44005020	“Nɔɔ daa ka yeti Gãa Laa, nɔɔ daa shii ka nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ a zang Suru bii ɓɛɛ nandon.”
44005021	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri daa yeti Gãa Laa bɛ̀'ɛ nɔng gantɛ tɔ, a ri g'aa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ. Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu, ri ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ. Ri shong nyaa nɛɛ zang daa atɛ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ kaɓa ta nɛɛ sãa.
44005022	Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa, ri daa ka sãa, ri daa ìi rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ tɔ̀'ɔ ka sãa kpang. Ri gbãayu ri daa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ.
44005023	Ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ ruu daa ka sãa, ruu ìi nyaa gãa kulu katɔ gbatagbata. Zang ɓɔɔ ri gã sãa bii ri shiiri ka nyaa gãa. A ɓɔɔ ruu puu nyaa gãa, ruu ìi zang ɓɔɔ kaa tɔ̀'ɔ yeti sãa kpang.”
44005024	Ɓɔɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri tãa naa weɓe, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi naa ɓɔɔ ruu keɓe naa dii nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
44005025	A zang ɓɔɔ arɛ naa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ loo ri ka sãa, ri shiiri ka Gãa Laa, ri tusu zang vuu.”
44005026	A rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri gã Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ, ri daayi nɛɛ ri daa atɛ ri. Ri atɛ ri wu nɛɛ bàng kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ, zang nɛɛ luku ri nɛɛ tari ɓɛɛ.
44005027	Zang atɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ka tìng rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, ri shi ka tìng ɓarɛ ka nɔngkɔ. A kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa rang ri yee tɔɔ,
44005028	“Ruu dàng nɔɔ nyaa gbãnggbãng nɛɛ nɔɔ tusu zang vuu tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nung yɔɔ keɓe kpang. Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ ta, nɔɔ baa gari Urushalima tɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tusu ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang zirɛ nɛɛ rukɔ nyɔ wu vɔrɔ.”
44005029	Bituru nɛɛ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ruu ɓ'aa shoo ɓuru ka nyaa Laa, ɓa ɓɔɔ ruu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa shɔnzang katɔ.
44005030	Là'a rɛɛ d'aa ɓuru wisi Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ sàa. Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ.
44005031	Laa a wu bannang, a shing wu ka nakn ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu nwang zang bang, 'a wu ti nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ ta yuu zang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Isirela ri walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ, zang wu yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati.
44005032	Ruu zi vuu keɓe tɔ, nɛɛ jìng ɓuru, ruu ti kɔɔrɔ zang. Rùu nɛɛ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ Laa a zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
44005033	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, ri tãa ruu keɓe gnvɔ shaa ri dɔli, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri nyɔ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ keɓe kaa vɔrɔ.
44005034	A zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ, yɔɔ Farisi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Gamaliyel. Yɔɔ keɓe tusu zang nyaa dannang Laa, a zang ti 'a wu bannang dɔli. A shii paa ka teteng ɓarɛ, a kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang nwangsɛ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ka biling ka gbongkarɛ.
44005035	A rang rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɔɔ nimbang yee tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Isirela ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ palɛ waasɛ̃, nɛɛ vuu kɔ nɔɔ mangnɛ, nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ rɛɛ zang keɓe ɓee.
44005036	Diki ɓɔ̀'ɔgn yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Tuuda nwang nyaa, kɔɔrɔ zang nɛɛ wu ɓi zang bang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ri daa nung laa maani dakn dɛ̃ɛti katɔ. Zang naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ a zang tantɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ, a ri shaarɛ.
44005037	Ka knti ɓiɓɛ, Yahuda yɔɔ tipi Galili nwang nyaa ka diki ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang gã zang ɓɛɛ, zang dɔli ri dũng wu, a ri haa nyaa. Zang ti nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ri shaarɛ jong.
44005038	N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ ka ruu keɓe, n'ɔɔ palɛ rɛɛ zang keɓe vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Nɔɔ y'aa ri ka nɔngkɔ, vuu kɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓee, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ shɔnzang, shaarɛ ditɔ.
44005039	Nɛɛ à nɛɛ bii Laa, nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zãa ri palɛnang kpang. Naa nɔɔ zãa ri naa nwang ɓi kaa naa nɔɔ gaa nyaa manɛ nɛɛ Laa.”
44005040	Zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Gamaliyel. Ri ɓaa rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ nyaa tɔkn ka yeti gãa. Ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang nyɔ zang shoonang Yeesɔ keɓe nɛɛ gbãa. A zang dang ri nyaa, nɛɛ ri rang zang yee tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ kpang. A zang yaa ri ri daayi.
44005041	Rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ri yaa nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang ri tãa ɓarɛ tìnang, nɛɛ Laa zirɛ ri daa naa ɓɔɔ ri dang jìng ka ruu nung Yeesɔ tɔ.
44005042	Diki, diki ri tusu zang vuu, a ri ti kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka yeti Gãa Laa nɛɛ yeti gãa zang, nɛɛ Yeesɔ wukɔ Kirisi
44006001	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Laa ri shang kana dɔli, rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri r'ang nyaa Heleniyawa ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee ka yuu rɛɛ zang Ibiraniyawa ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang n'ɛɛ bàs'ɛ vuu shaanang diki diki, zang yee laa ka rɛɛ suvɔ ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
44006002	A rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ kopi tu ziti keɓe, ri ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓarɛ nandon, a ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu yaa ruu Laa rangkɛnang nɛɛ ruu basɛ vuu shaanang kpàng.
44006003	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang manziti ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi tɔ Suru Laa kagn bii ɓarɛ, a ri ti zũng dɔli ɓɛɛ. R'uu shing rikɔ ri gãng jìng ka vuu shaanang basɛnang.
44006004	Rùu r'aa jìng ɓuru kaa Laa gaanang, nɛɛ ruu Laa kɔɔrɔnang.”
44006005	Ruu rɛɛ zang kopi tu ziti keɓe, daa zang piti ka yeti. A zang shɛ̃ɛrɛ rɛɛ Istifanu, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa dɔli, a Suru Laa ti kagn bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ Filibu, nɛɛ Porokoru, nɛɛ Nikana, nɛɛ Timon, nɛɛ Barimina, nɛɛ Nikola yɔɔ tipi Antakiya ɓɔɔ bɛɛ dũng gbalang zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ. Kãntang keɓe dũng kaa Yeesɔ Kirisi.
44006006	Zang atɛ ri ka bii rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ. Rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ri shìli ri naa ka yuu, a ri ti gaa ri Laa.
44006007	Ruu Laa ti bà'a nɔng ɓi kana. Zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu, ri ti shang kana diki diki ka Urushalima. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bì'i Laa ri shang kana jong diki diki.
44006008	Laa pàlɛ̀ Istifanu tɔ̃ɔ dɔli, a ti a wu naa vuu palɛnang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, p'al'ɛ vuu bang bang dɔli ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ ka teteng zang.
44006009	A zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang Libatinawa, ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang Yahudawa nɛɛ gari Kiranɛ nɛɛ gari Alezandiriya, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tipi silisiya nɛɛ tipi Asiya ri kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ kaa takpang. Zang keɓe ri gaayu nyaa laanang kaa nɛɛ wu.
44006010	Suru Laa 'a Istifanu zũnang dɔli naa ɓɔɔ n'ɛɛ ràng yee, zang keɓe ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ wu nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
44006011	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri dõ̀lɔ̀ zang ɓɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nwiiri nɛɛ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ruu tãayi kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu Laa, a ti dãlɛ Musa.”
44006012	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu keɓe naa weɓe, yeti zang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ lasɛ dɔli. Ri arɛ, ri naa yi Istifanu ri daa nɛɛ wu ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ.
44006013	Ri atɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri naa suu sè'e ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Ri kɔ̀ɔyi tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang diki diki ka yuu Gãa Laa, a ɓɔɔ ka yuu nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ.
44006014	Ruu ti tãayi kɔ̀'ɔyi nɛɛ Yeesɔ yɔɔ gari Nazara keɓe, jili Gãa Laa keɓe ka tipi, wu ti kɔ̃sɔ vuu daa ɓɔɔ daa ɓuru ri tusu, ɓɔɔ Musa a ri ɓɛɛ.”
44006015	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, ri shu jìng ka waa nyaating Istifanu, ri zirɛ waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ nw'ang naa waa nyaating zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
44007001	Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, hɛ̃ɛ Istifanu tɔɔ, “R'uu kɔ zang kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓee nɔngkɔ nizang ya?”
44007002	Istifanu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung nɛɛ rɛɛ daa mɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa zang piti bannang ɓɛɛ, nwang nyaa ka bii dabang ɓuru Ibirayi, bɛɛ wu doo ka tipi Bagadaza bɛɛ daa nwang gn ka gari Haran kpang.
44007003	Laa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, ‘Yaa gãa ɓaaɓɛ ta, nɛɛ tipi ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ n tùs'u mɔɔ naa kagn ɓɛɛ.’
44007004	A Ibirayi yaa tipi Kaladiyawa kati daa nwang kaa Haran. D'aa Ibirayi naa vɔrɛ a Laa naa shing Ibirayi nɛɛ wu sèe gãa, wu a ka tipi kɔ nɔɔ kagn kãntang ɓee.
44007005	Bɛɛ Laa a wu tipi ka nihn k'ɔ tɔkɔlɔng nɛɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang. A Laa a Ibirayi nyaa tɔɔ wu 'a Ibirayi ditɔ, wu nwang kaa ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang naa yiki ka knti ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa, bɛɛ Laa a wu jaa gn kpang.
44007006	Laa kɔɔ wu ruu keɓe hn. ‘Zɔ̃ng ɓaaɓɛ ri daa nwang zang zanti ka koolaa ɓɔɔgn, ri daa nwang jaafoo ka nɔng. Zang dang ri jìng saa laa maani dakn dɛ̃ɛti.’
44007007	Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N naa dang zang ɓɔɔ zõ̀ng ɓaaɓɛ ri shòng ri jìng ditɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɛɛ knti, ri nwangnɛ ri yaa koolaa kaɓa, ri a ka nihn ri naa b'ang m.’
44007008	A Laa a Ibirayi nyaa ka yuu shaa yeenang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ zang naa yi Ishaaku, Ibirayi yee wu shaa, bɛɛ diki ɓiɓɛ daa tɔ mantaati. Nɛɛ knti, Ishaaku naa yi Yakubu, a Yakubu naa yiki rɛɛ dabang ɓuru kopi tu ziti.
44007009	“Rɛɛ dabang ɓuru, ri kaa sũnyaa nɛɛ Yusufu, a ri malɛ wu nɛɛ wu daa nwang jaafoo ka tipi Masar. A Laa y'aa wu ɓi kaa takpang.
44007010	Laa nwangsɛ wu ka jìng dannang ɓiɓɛ nandon. Laa a wu zũnang a ka ruu nɔngkɔ Firawuna kpanti Masar, kasɛ wu dɔli, a shing wu nɛɛ wu nwang gɔmna ka tipi Masar nɛɛ wu ti nwang zang bang ka gãa firawuna.
44007011	A nyɔkɔ naa nwang ka tipi Masar, nɛɛ tipi Kà'ana nandon. Nyɔkɔ keɓe, dang zang jìng dɔli. Rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri walɛ vuu shaanang kpang.
44007012	Ɓɔɔ Yakubu tãa nyaa nɛɛ vuu shaanang kagn ka Masar. A shong rɛɛ dabang ɓuru nɛɛ ri daa walɛ vuu shaanang. Wee daanang ɓɔɔ shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.
44007013	Ɓɔɔ ri naa paasɛ daanang, Yusufu tusu ri yuu ɓiɓɛ kati, a Firawuna naa zi rɛɛ zang gãa Yusufu nung kati.
44007014	A Yusufu shòng daa ɓiɓɛ Yakubu nyaa, kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu a nɛɛ zang gãa ɓiɓɛ nandon ka Masar. Zang gãa Yakubu nandon, ri laa taati tu kopi tu maani.
44007015	A Yakubu naa daa Masar kati. Yakubu nɛɛ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru, ri daa vɔlɔ kaa nɔngkɔ.
44007016	Zang sɔɔrɔ vɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka Shɛɛkɛm. A zang gbãa ri ka sàa ɓɔɔ Ibirayi hoo ka naa wujɛ Hamɔɔ, a shu ri saka ɓɛɛ.
44007017	“Ka ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɔɔ wu pàl'ɛ Ibirayi vuu ɓɔɔ wu a Ibirayi nyaa kagn a naabm ka naa, zang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ka Masar ri shang tɔ dɔli.
44007018	Nɛɛ knti, zang naa yi kpanti ɓɔɔgn ka Masar ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yusufu kpang ɓɛɛ.
44007019	Kpanti keɓe ta yeti shi kpang, nɛɛ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng ɓuru, dang rɛɛ dabang ɓuru jìng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, sh'ing ri nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning nɛɛ ri vang jaa rɛ̃ɛting ɓarɛ ka biling nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri vɔlɔ ɓɛɛ.
44007020	Zang yi Musa ka laa keɓe kɔ. Musa shi dɔli, a Laa kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ. Zang nwang nɛɛ wu ka gãa daa ɓiɓɛ shala taati kɔ nwani.
44007021	Ɓɔɔ zang naa nwangsɛ wu ka biling, jaa Firawuna ɓɔɔ zang soro tuu wu raa kaa jaa ɓiɓɛ, a hingti wu kaa naa jaa ɓiɓɛ.
44007022	Zang tusu Musa labeenang, a zang tusu wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang mantɛ ka tipi Masar nandon, a zunung yee rannang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang dɔli.
44007023	“S'aa Musa daa tɔ laa ziti, a kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, wu daa leng jìng doo ka rɛɛ ɓeezung, zang Isirela.
44007024	Daa tɔ, lee ɓɔɔ a zi yɔɔ Masar dang yɔɔ Isirela gbete jìng kana. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, dàa ta yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang dang wu jìng ɓɛɛ nyaa, a nyɔ yɔɔ Masar vɔrɔ.
44007025	(Musa kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ri zi katɔ nɛɛ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ, a ri zi ɓarɛ kaa takpang.)
44007026	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a zi zang Isirela ziti ri gaa nyaa. Nɛɛ wu basɛ ri kaa tɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, nɔɔ jaanà'a zɔɔ, n'ɔɔ dàng zɔɔ jìng kpang.’
44007027	Zang ɓɔɔ dang zang gbete jìng ɓɛɛ, dɔ̃ Musa nɛɛ kaa, a hɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ, ‘Wi shing mɔɔ zang bang, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ruu ruu wiya?’
44007028	Mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ n'ɛɛ nyɔ yɔɔ Masar ka ɓɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ ya?
44007029	Ɓɔɔ Musa tãa naa weɓe, Musa yurɛ daa ka tipi Madayana, daa nwang zanti ka nɔngkɔ.
44007030	“Saa ɓa tɔ laa ziti, a zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa nwang nyaa ka wu, ka jaa laa ɓɔɔ waa shaayi ka yeti jìngti, ka doo kɔpɔ Sinayi naabm ɓɛɛ.
44007031	Musa zi vuu keɓe, a mã naa ka danggn. Dàa naabm nɛɛ wu daa zirɛ, a tãa yee Kpanti Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ,
44007032	‘Nkɔ Là'a rɛɛ dabang ɓaaɓɛ, Là'a Ibirayi nɛɛ Ishaaku, nɛɛ Yakubu.’ Bii zà'a Musa kana, ka ruu vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu kaa ɓɛɛ, a pɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔng bì'i takpang.
44007033	A Kpanti Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Tulu koodoo ɓaaɓɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔng kɔ mɔɔ shii kagn ɓee, ɓi nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
44007034	N pɛ̃ɛrɛ tɔ, n zi jìng ɓɔɔ zang mɛɛ dang ka Masar tɔ. N ti tã̀a kaanang ɓɔɔ ri kaa ɓɛɛ tɔ. N arɛ n t'ɔɔ, n yaa ri naa. Arɛ n shong mɔɔ, mɔɔ gbãayu ka Masar.’
44007035	“Musa keɓe ɓɔɔ zang Isirela bɛ̃ɛ wu ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ wu t'ɔɔ, wi shing mɔɔ zang bang, a ɓɔɔ zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang ka yuu ɓuru wiya ɓɛɛ. Laa shong wukɔ, nɛɛ wu naa nwang zang bang, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ta ri ɓɛɛ nɛɛ bii zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ nwang nyaa ka wu ka jaa laa ɓɔɔ waa shaa ɓɛɛ.
44007036	Musa nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ Masar. Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔli ka Masar, ɓɔɔ ka waapo Maliya, a ɓɔɔ ti ka jìngti, saa laa ziti.
44007037	Musa kɔ, kɔɔ zang Isirela tɔɔ, ‘Laa naa zɔ̃̌ng nɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ditɔ, naa ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ng m ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shoonang keɓe, naa a ɓi doo nɛɛ teteng zang manɛ kɔ.’
44007038	Musa keɓe kɔ nwang nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Isirela ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka jìngti, a ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ rang wu yee ka kɔpɔ Sinayi ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru. Wukɔ ti tà ruu r'uu Laa ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ, a 'a ruu.
44007039	“A rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ri bɛ̃ɛ wu, ka yeti ɓarɛ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri nɛɛ gbãayu ɓarɛ ka Masar.
44007040	A ri kɔɔ Haruna tɔɔ, ‘Mãa ruu vaka ta, ɓɔɔ sɔ̀'ɔ ruu tìng ɓɛɛ. Ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ Musa ɓɔɔ nw'angsɛ̀ ruu nɛɛ Masar ɓuru takpang.’
44007041	Ka diki keɓe kɔ, ri mãa vaka naa napoo. Ri dɔ̀ɔ wu vuu, a ri nwaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ ri tãa tìnang, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
44007042	A Laa raa ri yuu knti. A yaa ri nɛɛ ri bang rɛɛ sang ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri bee ka yeti labeenang ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa beeyi tɔɔ, ‘Zang Isirela, nɔɔ dɔ̀ɔ nkɔ vuu vaa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yele ka jìngti saa laa ziti ɓɛɛ ya?
44007043	Nɔɔ tuu manɛ putali vaka manɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Moleki ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ rakɛ nɛɛ mani, a ɓɔɔ sang vaka manɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Ramfa ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓarɛ vaka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ bang ri katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n y'aa nɔɔ, zang ri sèe nɔɔ, ri ɓa tipi Babila nɛɛ mani.’
44007044	“Rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri rakɛ nɛɛ putali ka jìngti. Putali ɓɔɔ tusu ri nɛɛ Laa kagn ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang palɛ putali keɓe naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ Musa, a ti tusu wu ɓɛɛ.
44007045	Nɛɛ knti, rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ta putali keɓe, ka naa rɛɛ daa ɓarɛ, ri tuu kaa naa, ka ɓɔɔ Joshuwa sɔɔ ri tìng ɓɛɛ. Ri naa ta tipi keɓe, ka naa rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka nɔng, a Laa hingki zang, yaa rɛɛ dabang ɓuru nɔng ɓɛɛ. Putali keɓe, nwang ka nɔngkɔ sasak a nɔng ka yuu Dawuda.
44007046	Laa kasɛ ruu Dawuda dɔli, a Dawuda gaa Laa nɛɛ Laa wu yaa wu, wu mãa Là'a Yakubu gãa nwannang.
44007047	Ɓi kaa Sulemanu naa mãa Gãa bì'i kati.
44007048	“Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa zang piti, nwàng ki gãa ɓɔɔ zang mãa nɛɛ naa ɓi kpang naa ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ ka tìng ɓɛɛ tɔɔ,
44007049	Kpanti Laa tɔɔ, ‘lapa nwang ɓi naa laa nwannang mɛɛ, a tipi ɓi kaa nɔng doo tɛ̃ɛnang mɛɛ. Nɔɔ mãa m zɔ̃ng gãa kiya? Nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ n ɔ̃sɔ kagn kiya?
44007050	Wu nkɔ palɛ vuu piti keɓe nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang mɛɛ kpang ya?’
44007051	“Nɔɔ taarɛ yuu dɔli. Yeti manɛ nɛɛ shoo manɛ nɔɔ doo katɔ. Nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ nɛɛ nɔɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ kpang. Nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ doo vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ d'aa manɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
44007052	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa kagn gbete ɓɔɔ rɛɛ d'aa manɛ dang wu jìng kpang ya? Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ruu anang zang tɔ̃ɔ keɓe ka tìng, rɛɛ daa manɛ ti nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ. Wee nɔɔ ti nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ, zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ tɔ.
44007053	Nɔkɔ tà nyaa dannang Laa, ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa a ruu ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ dñ̀ng kaa takpang.”
44007054	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Istifanu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, gnvɔ shaa ri, ri shaa tãri.
44007055	Suru Laa a ka bii Istifanu, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, tuu jìng ka lapa, a zi bannang Laa nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ shii ka kagn ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
44007056	A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, n zirɛ lapa puuyi, a Jaa Shɔnzang shii ka nakn Laa.”
44007057	Ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, a ri huuru shoo ɓarɛ nɛɛ saa naa. A ri k'a ka yuu ɓiɓɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
44007058	Ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti gari, a ri luku wu nɛɛ tari. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu keɓe jìng ka bii ri tɛ̃̀ɛ, jasang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ka nɔng, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Shaawulu fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ wu gãng jìng kagn.
44007059	Ri luku Istifanu kana, a gaa Laa tɔɔ, “Kpanti Yeesɔ, ta suru mɛɛ ta.”
44007060	A tang nɛɛ gutu, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, mɔɔ yiti vuu shi kpang kɔ ri palɛ ɓee ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ kpang.” Kɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ a vɔ kati.
44008001	Shaawulu kasɛ nyaa kagn ka ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ Istifanu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa zang gaayu ɓɔɔ zang dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa jìng ka Urushalima. Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, zang tantɛ ri ka tipi Yahudiya nɛɛ tipi Samariya nandon. Ɓi rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ kɔ ri nwang ɓarɛ shɛ̃ɛning.
44008002	Zang ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete ri gbãa Istifanu, ri kaa wu nyavɔ gbãnggbãng.
44008003	Shaawulu kãa ɓi gbalang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu ningsi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, dɔ̃ɔ gbete. Dàar'ɛ ka gãa gãa, yiki zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro, wu daa looro ri ka sãa.
44008004	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɔɔ ri tantɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti ri rangkɛ ruu Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri daarɛ ɓɛɛ.
44008005	Filibu daa ka gari ɓɔɔ ka tipi Samariya, daa kɔɔ zang ruu Kirisi ka nɔngkɔ.
44008006	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, a ri ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ, ri ɓaa shoo kaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
44008007	Suru shi kpang, ri mɛɛrɛ nyaa ka lapa ka ɓɔɔ ri nwangkɛ nɛɛ bii zang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kàa katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ vɔ katɔ, zang ti masɛ ri jong.
44008008	Zang tãa tìnang ka gari kaɓa dɔli.
44008009	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ka gari kaɓa, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Siman. Bɛɛ hɛ̃ɛpaa. Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔli, a kɔɔrɔ zang nɛɛ wu ɓi zang bang.
44008010	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gari nandon, zang bang nɛɛ wujɛ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Ri kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe ɓi naa vuu palɛnang Laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ, ‘Naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ bang dɔli ɓɛɛ.’”
44008011	Ri dũng wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki bee tɔ, ɓɔɔ wu pàl'ɛ ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri zirɛ ri mã naa ka danggn nɛɛ paa hɛ̃ɛnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
44008012	Ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kpanti roonang Laa ɓɔɔ Filibu kɔɔ ri, a ɓɔɔ kaa nung Yeesɔ Kirisi, zang palɛ ri batizima, zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro nandon.
44008013	Siman nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ shing danggn jong ka knti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ wu batizima tɔ, ràk'ɛ kaa nɛɛ Filibu diki diki. Siman mã naa ka danggn, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu zìl'i Filibu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
44008014	Zang shoonang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima, ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ zang Samariya ri ta ruu Laa tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri dɔ̃ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ka bii ɓarɛ.
44008015	Ri daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, a ri gaa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ Laa, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu a ri Suru ɓiɓɛ kati.
44008016	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛ̀'ɛ Suru Laa a gn ka bii zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang palɛ ri batizima ɓarɛ doo nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
44008017	Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ri shìli naa kaa yuu ɓarɛ, a Suru Laa a kaa bii ɓarɛ.
44008018	Siman zirɛ Laa a zang Suru ɓiɓɛ ka ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ri shìli naa ka yuu zang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, 'a Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana saka,
44008019	a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ a m naa vuu palɛnang keɓe jong, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ shing naa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ Suru Laa wu a jong ka bii ɓiɓɛ.”
44008020	Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ shaarɛ nɛɛ saka ɓaaɓɛ ning, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ hoo vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang waati katɔ ɓɛɛ.
44008021	Ruu ɓaaɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn ka shoonang keɓe kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti ɓaaɓɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
44008022	Kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓaaɓɛ ta, ka ruu vuu shi kpang keɓe, mɔɔ gaa Laa wu yaa mɔɔ gbalang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ vuu shi kpang naa weɓe ɓɛɛ.
44008023	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zirɛ sũnyaa kagn yeti ɓaaɓɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, vuu shi kpang ti ɓa mɔɔ yuu tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
44008024	Siman kɔɔ Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ gaa m Laa jong, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔyi wu palɛ m kaa tɔ̀'ɔ gbete kpang.”
44008025	Bituru nɛɛ Yɔhana ri kɔɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ, a ri ti rang zang ruu Laa tɔ, ri gbãayu ri daa Urushalima kati. Ri kɔɔrɔ zang ruu Laa ka rɛɛ gari Samariya ka gbalang ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓɛɛ.
44008026	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kɔɔ Filibu tɔɔ, “Yupaa mɔɔ daa ka dii mɔɔ sɔɔ gbalang gbaala ɓɔɔ yupaa nɛɛ Urushalima daa ka Gaza ɓɛɛ.”
44008027	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Filibu kpalɛ bii a daayi. Daa kana, a kpisi yuu nɛɛ yɔɔ tipi Habasha ɓɔɔ bii varɛ ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, gbãayu dà'a kaa tipi ɓiɓɛ. Yɔɔ keɓe zang bang kɔ nwani. Wukɔ yiti saka Kandakatu, jaa soro ɓɔɔ roo kpanti ka tipi Habasha ɓɛɛ. Dàa Urushalima nɛɛ wu daa bang Laa.
44008028	A gbãayu kana, vang ka yuu keke ɓɔɔ gbantang gɔ̃ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ wu nwang ka yeti keke, gã labeenang ɓɔɔ Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa bee ɓɛɛ.
44008029	A Suru Laa kɔɔ Filibu tɔɔ, “Daa ka nɔng keke kaɓa naabm.”
44008030	A Filibu yurɛ daa ka bii keke daa tãayi yɔɔ gã labeenang Ishaya zang nyaa shoonang Laa. A Filibu hɛ̃ɛ wu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zi vuu kɔ mɔɔ gã ɓɛɛ ɓu tɔ ya?”
44008031	Yɔɔ zang bang keɓe kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ n'ɛɛ kɔɔ m dìiri ɓiɓɛ kpang, n zi biya?” A kɔɔ Filibu nɛɛ wu vang ta, wu naa nwang nɛɛ wu ka yeti keke,
44008032	Nɔng ɓɔɔ yɔɔ kaɓa gãrɛ keɓe, Nw'ang naa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ zang daa nɛɛ mani ka nɔng yeenang ɓɛɛ, a puu nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang. Nwang naa jaa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ zang kpang shãngti ɓiɓɛ, kaa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
44008033	Zang p'al'ɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ a zang ɓɔɔ ti jɛ̃̀'ɛ wu ruu tɔ̃ɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ bɛɛ diki ɓiɓɛ ka koo keɓe waa nyaa gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
44008034	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii varɛ ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ kaɓa, hɛ̃ɛ Filibu tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ m jong, zang nyaa shoonang Laa rang ruu ka yuu wiya? Ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ya, kɔ ka yuu zang ɓɔɔgn?”
44008035	A Filibu puu nyaa gaayu nɛɛ ruu zang nyaa shoonang Laa keɓe ɓɔɔ yɔɔ gã ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔ yɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa kati ka yuu Yeesɔ.
44008036	Ri daa kana ka gbalang, a ri naa a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mii kagn ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii varɛ ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ keɓe kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Mii keɓe, palɛ m batizima ta.”
44008037	[Filibu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Naa mɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa nɛɛ yeti ɓaaɓɛ nandon, n palɛ mɔɔ batizima katɔ.” Yɔɔ kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N shing danggn tɔ, nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi wukɔ Jaa Laa„
44008038	A kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ raa nyaa gbantang nɛɛ keke wu shiiyi. Filibu nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ bii varɛ ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ, ri shooro kaa nɛɛ yeti keke, ri daa ka yeti mii, a Filibu palɛ wu batizima kati.
44008039	Ri nwang tɔ nɛɛ yeti mii, a Suru Laa tuu Filibu daa nɛɛ wu. Yɔɔ zang bang keɓe, zi Filibu takpang, a yi gbalang daanang ɓiɓɛ, tã̀a tìnang dɔli.
44008040	Filibu daa nwang nyaa ka gari Azotu. A riki rɛɛ gari nandon, kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, a nɛɛ mani ka Kayisariya.
44009001	Bɛɛ gnvɔ yeti Shaawulu ka gn kpang, ka ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu nyɔkɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii Kpanti Yeesɔ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Dàa ka bii kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ,
44009002	a gaa wu nɛɛ wu bee wu labeenang ɓɔɔ wu daa a zang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ka gari Damasiku ɓɛɛ. Wu nɛɛ daa ìi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Gbalang keɓe kagn nɔng, zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro, wu yiki ri, wu mãlɛ naa ɓarɛ, wu a nɛɛ ri ka gari Urushalima.
44009003	Daa kana gbalang, a naabm tɔ nɛɛ Damasiku, a nɔng yakɛ nɛɛ lapa, kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng.
44009004	Watɛ ka tipi, a tãa yee kɔ̀'ɔ wu nɛɛ, “Shaawulu, Shaawulu, mɔɔ dang m jìng nɔngkɔ, ka ruu viya?”
44009005	A Shaawulu hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ, “Ɓu mɔkɔ wiya, Kpanti?” A yee keɓe kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Nkɔ Yeesɔ, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dang wu jìng ɓɛɛ.”
44009006	“Yupaa ta mɔɔ daa ka yeti gari, zang daa kɔɔ mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ ditɔ.”
44009007	Zang ɓɔɔ ri daa nɛɛ wu, ri shiiyi, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ takpang. Ri tãa yee tɔ, a ri zi zang kaa tɔɔ gbete kpang.
44009008	Shaawulu naa yupaa nɛɛ tipi, ɓɔɔ puu jìng, a zi nɔng takpang. Zang yi wu kaa naa, zang daa nɛɛ wu ka Damasiku.
44009009	Diki ɓiɓɛ taati zi nɔng kpang. Shaa vuu shaanang kpang, ti ɓoo mii kpang.
44009010	Ka gari Damasiku, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kagn, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Hananiya. Yeesɔ rang yee nɛɛ wu bɛɛ rɔ̃kɔ katɔ tɔɔ, “Hananiya” A kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ, “Wee n ɓee, Kpanti.”
44009011	A Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yupaa mɔɔ daa ka gãa Yahuda ɓɔɔ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ, ‘Gbalang ɓɔɔ shiiri katɔ’ ɓɛɛ, m'ɔɔ daa hɛ̃ɛ nɔng yɔɔ gari Taasu, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Shaawulu ɓɛɛ kãntang keɓe gaa Laa.
44009012	Ɓɔɔ wu gaa doo Laa, a zi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Hananiya kaɓa ka yeti rɔ̃kɔnang. Hananiya arɛ naa shing wu naa ka yuu, a jìng ɓiɓɛ zi nɔng kaa tɔkn.”
44009013	A Hananiya kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpanti, zang dɔli ri kɔɔ m ruu tɔ ka yuu yɔɔ keɓe, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ.
44009014	Wee à ka Damasiku ɓee, ɓi rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, a wu naa nɛɛ wu naa yiki zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa nung ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ nandon.”
44009015	A Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Dita ka ruu ɓɔɔ n z'ɔ̃ng wu tɔ, nɛɛ wu pàlɛ̀ m shoonang ɓɛɛ. Wu daa kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti ɓarɛ, nɛɛ zang Isirela, ruu mɛɛ kati ɓɛɛ.
44009016	'N ti tusu wu naa ɓɔɔ wu naa dang jìng dɔli, ka ruu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.”
44009017	A Hananiya daayi, daa hãa nyaa ka yeti gãa, shing naa ka yuu Shaawulu, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Manzung Shaawulu, Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nw'ang nyaa ka mɔɔ ka gbalang, ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a ka nihn ɓɛɛ, wukɔ shong m. Shong m nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ zi nɔng kaa tɔkn, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, Suru Laa wu a kaa bii ɓaaɓɛ”.
44009018	Nyaa kɔɔ doo naa ɓee, vuu naa koko bii jaazìi nwang nɛɛ jìng Shaawulu, a zi nɔng kaa tɔkn. A yupaa, zang palɛ wu batizima kati.
44009019	A naa shaa vuu shaanang, a kaka ɓiɓɛ sɔɔ kati. Shaawulu nwang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, ka Damasiku diki bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.
44009020	A yupaa tantɛnang daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, a gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu rang zang ruu ka yuu Yeesɔ kati. Kɔɔ zang nɛɛ “Yeesɔ ɓi Jaa Laa.”
44009021	Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, ri mã naa ka danggn, a ri hɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ, “Wee ɓi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ nyɔ̀k'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa nung Yeesɔ vɔrɔ ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Ti a ka nihn ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu yiki ri, wu daa nɛɛ ri ka Urushalima, wu daa a rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kpang ya?”
44009022	Shaawulu ti rang zang yee Laa kaa gbãnggbãng. Ruu ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi, wu ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ laa nyaa kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri ka Damasiku ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ wu takpang.
44009023	Diki naa bee tɔ, a rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ri tɔng zɔɔ ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ naa ri nyɔ Shaawulu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
44009024	Zang naa kɔɔ wu vuu ɓɔɔ ri mangnɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri gã nyaa gãa gari nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zìi piti nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ.
44009025	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, diki ɓɔɔgn zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Shaawulu ri mã soo ka sà'ang ri shing wu kagn, ri yaa wu naa nɛɛ hangka ɓɔɔ zang yaa ka bii binting, ɓɔɔ zang mã̀ayi zang kiiri gari nyaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
44009026	Shaawulu daa Urushalima nɛɛ wu daa ɓakɛ yuu kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nandon, ri tɔɔ, wu ɓi gn zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa nizang kpang.
44009027	A Baranaba atɛ wu ka bii rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ. Naa kɔɔ ri naa ɓɔɔ Shaawulu zi kpanti Yeesɔ ka gbalang, a kpanti rang wu yee ɓɛɛ. A ti kɔɔ ri n'aa ɓɔɔ rang zang ruu ka yuu nung Yeesɔ ka Damasiku, kaa vɔrɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
44009028	A Shaawulu nwang kaa nɛɛ ri, rakɛ ka Urushalima nandon. Kɔ̀'ɔ zang ruu ka yuu nung Kpanti Yeesɔ ti kaa vɔrɔ kpang.
44009029	Ti rang yee, a ri laa zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri r'ang ɓarɛ nyaa Heleniyawa ɓɛɛ. A zang Yahudawa keɓe, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ naa ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
44009030	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ri tãa nyaa, ri tuu Shaawulu ri daa nɛɛ wu ka gari Kayisariya. Ri daa shing wu nɛɛ wu dita ka gari Taasu.
44009031	Ka diki kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudiya, nɛɛ tipi Galili, nɛɛ tipi Samariya nandon, ri tãa tìnang nwannang ɓarɛ kati. Suru Laa yi ri naa kagn, a mã ri danggn. Ri shang kaa jong ka ɓɔɔ ri nwangnɛ ri a Laa bannang ɓɛɛ.
44009032	Bituru rakɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti, a diki ɓɔɔgn daayi nɛɛ wu daa leng rɛɛ zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Liida ɓɛɛ.
44009033	Daa ìi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn nɔng, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Aniya ɓɔɔ bii ɓiɓɛ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zunung ɓɔɔ wu yupaa nɛɛ latãng ɓiɓɛ kpang saa daa mantaati.
44009034	Bituru kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Aniya Yeesɔ Kirisi masɛ mɔɔ tɔ. Yupaa mɔɔ palɛ latãng ɓaaɓɛ waasɛ̃.” A Aniya tantɛ paa yunang.
44009035	Zang ɓɔɔ ri roo gãa ka Liida nɛɛ gari Sharong ri zi wu katɔ nandon. Ri ti raa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kaa nandon.
44009036	Jaa soro ɓɔɔ kagn dũng Laa, ka gari Joopa zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Tabita (Tabita nɛɛ nyaa Heleniyawa ɓi Dorika, nung ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa m'akà ɓɛɛ). Jaa soro keɓe p'alɛ̀ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ diki diki, ti yi zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang, naa ka bii.
44009037	Ka laa kaɓa, vuu palɛ wu, a vɔrɛ. Zang sɔ̀ɔ vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, a zang daa shing wu ka yeti gãa lapa
44009038	Joopa nɛɛ Liida ri bee kpang. Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Joopa ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ Bituru ka Liida, ri shong zang varɛ ziti ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Ruu zɔ̃ɔrɔ mɔɔ katɔ, a ka bii ɓuru tantɛnang.”
44009039	A Bituru kpalɛ bii a daa kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang shong ri ɓɛɛ. Daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng tɔ, a zang vang nɛɛ wu ka gãa lapa. Rɛɛ suvɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ nandon ri kaa nyavɔ. Ri ti tusu wu rɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Dorika haarɛ bɛɛ wu doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
44009040	Bituru nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ yeti gãa nandon, a tang ka tipi gaa Laa, a raa jìng ka vɔrɔ a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Tabita, yupaa ta.” A Tabita puu jìng, ɓɔɔ zi Bituru yupaa nwang doo paa.
44009041	Bituru yì wu naa ka bii, a shii kaa nɛɛ doo. Bituru, ɓaa nyaa kaa rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ suvɔ a a ri Tabita kaa ningkãari.
44009042	Ruu keɓe baa gari Joopa nandon, a zang dɔli ri shing danggn kaa bii Laa.
44009043	Bituru nw'ang ka Joopa ka gãa Siman, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zaa koo vuu ɓɛɛ, diki ɓiɓɛ bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.
44010001	Zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ kagn Kayisariya, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Koneliyu. Wukɔ zang bang vaa sɔɔja Rooma ɓɔɔ laa maani dakn man gbete, ɓɔɔ ɓi rɛɛ zang Italiya kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kagn ɓɛɛ.
44010002	Koneliyu ɓi zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Bang Laa nɛɛ zang gãa ɓiɓɛ piti. Yi rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang naa ka bii, ti gaa Laa diki diki.
44010003	Diki ɓɔɔ kagn bɛɛ laa kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ, nung saka taati, Koneliyu rɔ̃kɔ. Ka rɔ̃kɔnang keɓe, zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ gbàrɛgbàrɛ arɛ a ɓaa wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Koneliyu.”
44010004	Koneliyu ã̀tɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ jìng ka bii. Bii kaa wu vɔrɔ, a kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓu viya Kpanti.” Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Laa tãa gaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaa wu tɔ. Ti zi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, danggn ɓaaɓɛ ning Laa kpang.
44010005	Shong rɛɛ zang varɛ ka Joopa ri daa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ka Siman ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ.
44010006	Nwàng zanti ka gãa Siman yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zaa koo vuu ɓɛɛ. Roo gãa ka nyaa waapo naabm.”
44010007	Ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ wu daa tɔ, Koneliyu ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang varɛ ziti ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ yɔɔ sɔɔja gbete ka teteng rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri gã wu ɓɛɛ. Yɔɔ keɓe dũng doo Laa kɔ.
44010008	Kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ nandon, a shong ri kaa Joopa.
44010009	Nɔng gantɛ tɔ rɛɛ zang keɓe, ri yi gbalang tɔ, ri a tɔ naabm nɛɛ Joopa. Bituru vang ɓi kaa gãa lapa bɛ̀'ɛ laa kaa dalɛ yuu nɛɛ wu gaa Laa.
44010010	Nyɔkɔ nyɔ wu tɔ, kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shaa ɓɛɛ. Zang nwà'a wu vuu shaanang doo kana, a rɔ̃kɔ kati.
44010011	Zirɛ lapa puuyi, vuu a kana nɛɛ lapa naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ bang ɓɔɔ zang yaa naa nɛɛ soo ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ dɛ̃ɛti ɓɛɛ. A zang yaa naa kaa nɛɛ mani.
44010012	Ka yeti fɔ̃ɔrɔ keɓe, rɛɛ yɔpɔ ɓɔɔ takɛ doo dɛ̃ɛti kagn ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ gɔ̃ nɛɛ buru, nɛɛ rɛɛ jaaning ɓɔɔ ri tãarɛ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
44010013	A tãa yee kɔɔ wu tɔɔ. “Bituru yupaa ta mɔɔ nyɔrɛ mɔɔ shaayi”.
44010014	Bituru kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpang Kpanti, n shaa vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang zang Yahudawa zãa ruu shaanang katɔ, gngn kpang.”
44010015	A tãa yee tɔkn daa kaa doo ziti nɛɛ, “vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ t'ɔɔ̀ kpang nɛɛ shi kpang, kpang.”
44010016	Zang palɛ vuu keɓe nɔngkɔ dakn taati, a zang gɔ̃ vuu bì'i, zang daa nɛɛ mani ka lapa.
44010017	Bituru rɛ̃rɛ dɔɔ kana ka yuu dìiri rɔ̃kɔnang kɔ wu rɔ̃kɔ ɓee, a zang ɓɔɔ Koneliyu shong ri, hɛ̃ɛ nɔng gãa Siman tɔ, ri ìi tɔ, a ri shii kaa nyaa gãa.
44010018	Ri ɓaa nyaa, a ri hɛ̃ɛ zang tɔɔ, “Zang zanti kagn gãa keɓe ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Siman Bituru ya?”
44010019	Bituru rɛ̃rɛ doo kana ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu zi ɓɛɛ, a Suru Laa kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Siman, zang varɛ taati ri kãa nɔng ɓaaɓɛ.
44010020	Kpalɛ bii, mɔɔ shooro. Mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ gn ziti ka yuu daanang kpang. Mɔɔ daa nɛɛ ri, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nkɔ shong ri ɓɛɛ.”
44010021	A Bituru shooro nɛɛ gãa lapa daa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kãa wu ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ à ka ruu viya?”
44010022	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “ Zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Koneliyu kɔ shong ruu. Koneliyu zang tɔ̃ɔ, bang Laa, a zang Yahudawa nandon, ri a wu bannang dɔli. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ gbete, kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ka gãa ɓiɓɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
44010023	Bituru ɓaa ri nyaa daa kaa nɛɛ ri ka yeti gãa. Ri roo kaa nɔngkɔ. Nɔng gãntɛ tɔ, a Bituru kpalɛ bii daa kaa nɛɛ ri. Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Joopa, ri daa kaa jong nɛɛ wu.
44010024	Nɔng gãntɛ kaa tɔkn, a ri shɛ̃ɛ Kayisariya kati. Ri daa ìi Koneliyu nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeesang ɓɔɔ wu ɓaarɛ ri nyaa ri gã wu tɔ.
44010025	Bituru hãa nyaa kana ka yeti gãa, a Koneliyu kpisi wu yuu. Tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, a bang wu.
44010026	Bituru wisi wu paa, a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Shii doo paa n m doo shɔnzang naa mɔkɔ.”
44010027	Ri r'ang yee kana nɛɛ zɔɔ ri daa yeti gãa, a ɓɔɔ Bituru daa ka yeti gãa daa ìi zang ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ gaagaa.
44010028	A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi tɔ, nyaa dannang zang Yahudawa zãa ruu nwannang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ katɔ. Nɛɛ ri ti daa zanti ka gãa ɓarɛ kpang. Laa tusu m, wàasɛ̀ m kpang, t'ɔɔ, n ɓàa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri zang shi kpang kpang.
44010029	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ zang shong nyaa, n laa nyaa kpang, n tantɛ anang. 'N hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ shong nyaa ka ruu viya?”
44010030	Koneliyu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Diki daa lɛɛkɔ dɛ̃ɛti bɛɛ n ka yeti gãa mɛɛ, n gà'a Laa bɛɛ laa naa weɓe kɔ saka taati. A zang ɓɔɔ hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ kɔlɔ katɔ nwang nyaa a shii ka tìng mɛɛ,
44010031	a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Koneliyu, Laa tãa gaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gaa wu tɔ, danggn vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang ti ning wu kpang.
44010032	Shong nyaa ka Joopa zang daa ɓàa mɔɔ nyaa ka Siman ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ. Nwàng zanti ka gãa Siman, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zaa koo vuu ɓɛɛ. Gãa Siman ka nyaa waapo naabm.’
44010033	A n tantɛ nyaa kaa shoonang ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. Mɔɔ ti p'al'ɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ arɛ ɓɛɛ. Wee ruu kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nandon ka tìng Laa ɓee, kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ ta.”
44010034	A Bituru gaa tɔɔsung yee rannang kati tɔɔ, “Nizang, n zi tɔ kati nɛɛ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓi kpang.
44010035	Ka zɔ̃ng zang kɔ ka koo nandon, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kaa vɔrɔ Laa, nɛɛ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ, Laa ta wu ɓi katɔ.
44010036	Laa shòng zang Isirela nyaa nɛɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ. Zang kɔɔ ri Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ shing ri, ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti zang piti ɓɛɛ.
44010037	Nɔɔ tãa ruu kɔ baa tipi Yahudiya ɓee tɔ, ɓɔɔ zang gaayu nɛɛ tipi Galili, kaa knti ɓɔɔ Yɔhana kɔɔ zang ruu batizima tɔ ɓɛɛ.
44010038	Ruu keɓe ɓi ruu Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara. Ɓɔɔ Laa a wu Suru ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ keɓe daarɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti, pàl'ɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, ti masɛ zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
44010039	Vuu ɓɔɔ wu p'al'ɛ ka tipi Yahudawa nɛɛ gari Urushalima ruu zi nɛɛ jìng ɓuru. A ri ti nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, ka ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ.
44010040	A Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ka ɓɔɔ diki daa taati ɓɛɛ. A nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ zang zi wu.
44010041	Wu zang piti ri zi wu kpang, ɓi rukɔ ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu katɔ kɔ zi wu shɛ̃ɛning. Rùu shaa vuu shaanang, a ruu ɓoo vuu nɛɛ wu ka knti ɓɔɔ wu seepaa tɔ nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
44010042	A a ruu nyaa nɛɛ ruu kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa. Rùu kɔ̀'ɔ zang nɛɛ Laa zɔ̃ng wukɔ nɛɛ wu nwang zang ɓɔɔ naa jɛ̃̀'ɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nwang doo ningkãari ruu.
44010043	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, Laa yaa zang keɓe gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ katɔ nandon, ka ruu nung ɓiɓɛ.”
44010044	Bituru rang yee doo kana nyaa, a Suru Laa a ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka ruu ɓiɓɛ nandon.
44010045	Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Bituru nɛɛ gari Joopa, ri mã naa ka danggn, ka ɓɔɔ Laa a zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang Suru ɓiɓɛ jong ɓɛɛ.
44010046	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tãayi zang ri rangkɛ yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔgn, ri dɔɔ Laa, ka ruu bannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A Bituru rang yee tɔɔ,
44010047	“Zang keɓe, Laa a ri Suru ɓiɓɛ tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ a ruu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zãayi rùu palɛ ri batizima nɛɛ mii kpang kagn ya?”
44010048	A kɔɔyi nɛɛ, zang palɛ ri batizima nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu nw'ang nɛɛ ri diki wu bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng
44011001	Rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudiya nandon, ri tãayi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ri ta ruu Laa tɔ jong.
44011002	Ɓɔɔ Bituru daa ka Urushalima zang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ zang yee zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang shaa ka gbongkarɛ, ri rangkɛ wu.
44011003	Ri tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ daa zanti ka gãa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa kpang ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ ti shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ ri, ka ruu viya?
44011004	A Bituru kɔɔ ri ruu bì'i kaa nandon nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ gaayu ɓɛɛ tɔɔ,
44011005	“Bɛɛ n gà'a Laa ka gari Joopa, a n rɔ̃kɔ. N zi vuu a nɛɛ lapa naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ bang ɓɔɔ zang yaa naa nɛɛ soo ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ dɛ̃ɛti ɓɛɛ. Vuu bii naa shi ka tìng mɛɛ naabm.
44011006	A n pɛ̃ɛrɛ waasɛ̃, n zi rɛɛ yɔpɔ soro nɛɛ yɔpɔ kpaasi, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ri gɔ̃ nɛɛ buru ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ jaaning.
44011007	A n tãa yee kɔ̀'ɔ m nɛɛ, ‘Bituru, yupaa, mɔɔ nyɔrɛ mɔɔ shaayi.’
44011008	N kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Kpang, Kpanti vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang daa nyaa mɛɛ gngn kpang.’
44011009	A yee bì'i kasɛ nyaa tɔkn nɛɛ lapa daa kaa doo ziti tɔɔ, ‘Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ mɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ shi kpang kpang.’
44011010	Zang palɛ vuu keɓe nɔngkɔ dakn taati, a zang gɔ̃ vuu bì'i zang daa nɛɛ mani ka lapa.
44011011	Knti bee kpang zang taati, ri tantɛ nyaa nwannang ka gãa ɓɔɔ ruu kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang shong ri ka bii mɛɛ nɛɛ Kayisariya.
44011012	Suru Laa kɔɔ m tɔɔ n daa nɛɛ ri, 'n rɛ̃rɛ gn ziti kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa mangbete zang Joopa keɓe, ri daa nɛɛ n ka Kayisariya, a ruu daa ka yeti gãa Koneliyu nandon.
44011013	A Koneliyu kɔɔ ruu naa ɓɔɔ wu zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ a kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, ‘Shong zang ɓɔɔ, wu daa ka Joopa, zang daa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ka Siman ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bituru ɓɛɛ.
44011014	Naa kɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti gãa ɓaaɓɛ nandon.’
44011015	Ɓɔɔ n gaayu yee rannang hn, Suru Laa a ka bii ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ gaayu a ka bii ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
44011016	A n kpàa danggn ruu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Yɔhana palɛ nɔɔ batizima ɓi nɛɛ mii, zang naa palɛ nɔɔ manɛ nɛɛ Suru Laa ’ ɓɛɛ.
44011017	Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa a ri vuu ɓɔɔ wu a ruu ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn ka bì'i Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi tɔ jong. N m kaa wi n zãa Laa wiya?”
44011018	Ka ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu keɓe, ri rangkɛ rɛɛ Bituru takpang, ri dɔɔ kaa Laa, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, Laa a rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang gbalang tɔ jong nɛɛ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri vɔ kaa takpang.”
44011019	Zang ɓɔɔ ri t'ant'ɛ, ka ruu jìng ɓɔɔ zang dang zang ka knti ɓɔɔ Istifanu vɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, ri daarɛ beebang ka tipi Fonishiya nɛɛ tipi Kuburu, nɛɛ gari Antakiya. Ri kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ruu Laa kpang, ri kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ zang Yahudawa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
44011020	A zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng ɓarɛ zang Kuburu nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kiranɛ, ri daa ka Antakiya ri daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa jong, ka yuu Kpanti Yeesɔ.
44011021	Laa yi ri naa kagn, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang dɔli ri shing danggn, a ri nwang kaa zang Laa.
44011022	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Urushalima, ri tãa ruu keɓe, a ri shong Baranaba kaa Antakiya.
44011023	Ɓɔɔ daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, a zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa 'a ri tìnang tãanang tɔ, tãa tìnang jong. A mã ri danggn nɛɛ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ nandon.
44011024	Baranaba ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, Suru Laa kagn bii ɓiɓɛ, ti shing danggn ka bì'i Laa dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang dɔli ri a ka bii Laa.
44011025	A Baranaba daa ka gari Taasu nɛɛ wu daa kãa nɔng Shaawulu.
44011026	Daa ìi wu, a atɛ wu ka Antakiya. Ri ziti ri nwalɛ nɛɛ zang, ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, a ri ti tusu zang dɔli vuu, saa gbete. Zang gaayu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓaanang ka Antakiya kɔ nɛɛ Kirista.
44011027	Ka diki kaɓa, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri yupaa nɛɛ Urushalima, ri daa ka Antakiya.
44011028	Zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Agabu, Laa a wu naa vuu palɛnang, a yupaa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, (nyɔkɔ bang a kana ka koo nandon. Nyɔkɔ keɓe n'aa 'a ka saa ɓɔɔ Kalawudiyu nwang Kpanti ɓɛɛ).
44011029	Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ r'i kpalɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓu walɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri yi rɛɛ ɓeezung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ doori ka tipi Yahudiya ɓɛɛ naa ka bii.
44011030	Ri kpalɛ kati nɔngkɔ, a ri shòng rɛɛ zang bang, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa saka bì'i kaa nɛɛ naa rɛɛ Baranaba nɛɛ Shaawulu.
44012001	Ka diki kaɓa kɔ, kpanti Hiridu gaayu ɓɔɔ wu dang zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa jìng.
44012002	Shingnɛ zang dɔng yuu Yakubu jaanaa Yɔhana nɛɛ yere bang a Yakubu vɔrɛ.
44012003	Zirɛ vuu kɔ wu p'al'ɛ ɓee zang Yahudawa ri tãa tìnang dɔli, a yi Bituru kaa jong. Palɛ vuu keɓe ka diki nyaalaa Borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
44012004	Yi Bituru tɔ, a loo wu ka sãa, a wu zang ɓɔɔ ri gã sãa ɓɛɛ ka naa, nɛɛ ri gãng jìng ka wu. Basɛ zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ gã wu nɔng dɛ̃ɛti. Nɔng ɓu sɔɔja kagn dɛ̃ɛti. Hiridu mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ nyaalaa ɓɔɔ zang kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ Laa tɛɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ ɓa tɔ, wu naa jɛ̃ɛ Bituru ruu kati, ka jìng zang piti.
44012005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mã Bituru ka sãa. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri ti gà'a Laa ɓi kana gbãnggbãng ka ruu Bituru.
44012006	Nɛɛ zìi ka diki ɓɔɔ nɔng n'ɛɛ gantɛ tɔ, Hiridu nw'angsɛ̀ Bituru kaa jìng zang piti ɓɛɛ, Bituru roo katɔ ka teteng zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri gã wu ɓɛɛ. Zang mã wu nɛɛ saka ziti. Zang ɓɔɔ ri gã sãa ɓɔɔ ri kagn ziti, ka nyaa gãa sãa nɛɛ biling.
44012007	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, nwang nyaa ka yeti sãa. Shiiyi, a yeti sãa yakɛ kaa gbayi gbayi. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa bì'i zìiti Bituru ka nyaa zãngzãng a hingsi wu. Kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Yupaa pati.” Saka ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ naa Bituru nɛɛ mani tantɛ tɛ̃ɛnang ka tipi.
44012008	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa keɓe kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓaaɓɛ ta nɛɛ koodoo.” Bituru hãayi. A ti kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Lu fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ ɓaaɓɛ ta ka bii mɔɔ arɛ ruu daayi.”
44012009	Bituru dũng wu, ri nwangnɛ mani ka biling. Bituru zi ɓiri mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ vuu kɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa palɛ ɓee ɓi nizang kpang. Kɔɔ ɓi naa nɛɛ wu rɔ̃kɔ katɔ.
44012010	Ri ɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri gã sãa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang, ri ti naa ɓa ɓɔɔ tɔkn. Ri naa a ka nyaa gãa saka ɓɔɔ zang ɓa kaa wukɔ, zang daa ka yeti gari ɓɛɛ. Nyaa gãa bii puu nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, a ri nwang ka biling. Ri yi gbalang sasak, ri a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ gbalang bang keɓe waa nyaa ɓɛɛ, a zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ tantɛ wu kaa yaanang.
44012011	A Bituru zi vuu ɓɔɔ p'al'ɛ wu kati, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N zi tɔ kati nɛɛ vuu keɓe nizang kɔ nwani. Laa shong zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ n'aa tà m nɛɛ naa Hiridu, a ti ta m nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang Yahudiya nandon, ri shing gn nɛɛ naa palɛ m ɓɛɛ.”
44012012	Ɓɔɔ wu zi naa weɓe, daa ka gãa Marayamu nà'a Yɔhana ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Maraku ɓɛɛ. Zang dɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng, ri gà'a Laa.
44012013	Bituru ɓaa nyaa ka nyaa gãa biling, a jaa zang soro ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Rooda arɛ naa kasɛ wu nyaa.
44012014	Jaa zang soro keɓe naa tãa yee Bituru, a tãa tìnang dɔli. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yurɛ gbãayu ka yeti gãa, puu nyaa gãa kpang. Dàa kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, Bituru shii ka yaa gãa.
44012015	Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ “Shoko ta mɔɔ katɔ ya?” Jaa bì'i yi tìng nɛɛ nizang. Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.”
44012016	Bituru ti shii ɓi ka nyaa gãa ka nɔngkɔ ɓaa nyaa. Ri naa puu nyaa gãa kaa nɛɛ knti. Ɓɔɔ ri zi wu ri mã naa ka danggn.
44012017	Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ naa, nɛɛ ri vɔ̃ nyaa. A kɔɔ ri naa ɓɔɔ Laa nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ sãa kati. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kɔɔ Yakubu nɛɛ rɛɛ manzung ɓɔɔ nimbang ruu keɓe.” A yaa ri, daa ɓi kaa nɔng ɓɔɔgn.
44012018	Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gantɛ, rɛɛ sɔɔja ri haa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ dɔli nɛɛ Bituru daa ka niya?
44012019	Hiridu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang kãa Bituru ta. Zang kãa wu, zang ìi wu kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Hiridu jɛ̃ɛ zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri gã Bituru ruu, a shingnɛ zang nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ. Ka knti vuu keɓe, Hiridu yupaa nɛɛ tipi Yahudiya daa ka Kayisariya daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ diki bee katɔ.
44012020	Diki bee tɔ ɓɔɔ yeti Hiridu lasɛ dɔli nɛɛ zang Taya nɛɛ zang Sidong ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri see zɔɔ dɔli, ri daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri gaayu ri rang yee nɛɛ Balastu, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang rɛɛ jaa doo kpanti ɓɛɛ. A ri raa bii kaa nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ, ri gaa kpanti kati nɛɛ wu nwang nɛɛ ri ka nyaa zɔɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri wàl'ɛ vuu shaanang ɓarɛ ka tipi kpanti kɔ ɓɛɛ.
44012021	Hiridu shìng zang keɓe diki. Ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ wu shing ri naa arɛ, Hiridu hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ kpanti ɓiɓɛ, a nwang ka yuu laa kpanti, a rang ri yee.
44012022	Ri goo nyaa nɛɛ, “Wee ɓi shɔnzang rang yee kpang, ɓi vuu gãnti rang yee.”
44012023	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa tantɛ wu waanang nɛɛ kɔnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, a Laa bannang kpang ɓɛɛ. Jaagn ri shaa wu, a vɔrɛ.
44012024	Ruu Laa ti baa nɔng ɓi kana daa kana nɛɛ tìng.
44012025	Baranaba nɛɛ Shaawulu ri daa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang shong ri ka Urushalima tɔ, a ri gbãayu. Ri atɛ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Maraku ɓɛɛ ka naa ning.
44013001	Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Antakiya ɓɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa kagn nɛɛ rɛɛ maalang. Zang keɓe ɓi rɛɛ Baranaba, nɛɛ Simiyon ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ “zang vìiri” ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ Lukiyu yɔɔ Kiranɛ, a ɓɔɔ Manaya ɓɔɔ b'ang ka yeti gãa gbete nɛɛ Hiridu ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ Shaawulu.
44013002	Diki ɓɔɔgn ri bang Laa, a ri seng nyaalaa a Suru Laa kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zɔ̃ng m Shaawulu nɛɛ Baranaba ka ruu shoonang, ɓɔɔ n ɓàa ri nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
44013003	Ri seng nyaalaa tɔ, ri ti gaa Laa, a ri shìli rɛɛ Shaawulu nɛɛ Baranaba naa kaa yuu, a zang lɔɔ ri nyaa kati nɛɛ ri dita.
44013004	Baranaba nɛɛ Shaawulu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa shɔng ri, ri daa ka gari Selusiya. Ri vang laana nɛɛ Selusiya ri daa ka Kuburu.
44013005	Ri a tɔ ka Salami, a ri kɔɔrɔ zang ruu Laa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang. Yɔhana ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Maraku nɛɛ ri ning, yi ri naa ka shoonang.
44013006	Ri riki tipi Kuburu tɔ nandon, ri a nɛɛ mani ka gari Paafo. Ka Paafo ri kpisi yuu nɛɛ yɔɔ Yahudawa ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛpaa zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Ba-Yashuwa. Suu sè'e nɛɛ wu zang nyaa shoonang Laa.
44013007	Ba-Yashuwa ɓi ka teteng rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Sajiya Bulu, gɔmna Kuburu ka knti ɓɛɛ. Gɔmna keɓe, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ zi vuu dɔli ɓɛɛ. A gɔmna ɓaa Baranaba nɛɛ Shaawulu nyaa nɛɛ wu tãa ruu Laa.
44013008	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛpaa keɓe zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Elayima nɛɛ nyaa Heleniyawa, kasɛ nɛɛ wu zãa ri ruu Laa kɔɔnang katɔ. Kasɛ kpang nɛɛ gɔmna wu shing danggn ka bì'i Laa kpang.
44013009	A Shaawulu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bulu ɓɛɛ, Suru Laa a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Shu yɔɔ ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛpaa keɓe jìng ka bii,
44013010	a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Jaa suru shi kpang kiɓi. Mɔkɔ kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang. Yeti ɓaaɓɛ ɓi zang nwaarɛnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Mɔɔ kãa gbalang diki diki nɛɛ mɔɔ risi ruu Laa wu nwang kaa naa sè'e.
44013011	N'aa vuu palɛnang Laa lee mɔɔ ditɔ kãntang keɓe. Jìng ɓaaɓɛ zuu katɔ, mɔɔ zi nɔng kpang diki bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.” A pũngku nɛɛ nɔng tɔɔnang ri z'uu Elayima jìng kati. Rakɛ, tã̀l'ɛ naa, kãa zang ɓɔɔ y'i wu naa ɓɛɛ.
44013012	Ɓɔɔ gɔmna zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ Elayima, shing danggn kaa bii Laa, ti mã naa ka danggn, ka vuu ɓɔɔ Baranaba nɛɛ Shaawulu ri tusu ka yuu Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
44013013	Bulu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ, ri vang tonsi nɛɛ Paafo, ri a ka Paaga ɓɔɔ ka tipi Pamfiliya ɓɛɛ. A Yɔhana yaa ri, gbãayu daa Urushalima.
44013014	Ri sha ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ Paaga ri daa ka Antakiya ɓɔɔ ka tipi Pisidiya ɓɛɛ. Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang, ri daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, a ri nw'ang ka tipi.
44013015	Ka knti ɓɔɔ zang hangsɛ labeenang nyaa dannang Musa nɛɛ rɛɛ labeenang zang nyaa shoonang Laa gãnang tɔ, zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, ri shong nyaa ka bii ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ n'ɛɛ tɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang kagn, ɓɔɔ mã ri danggn, nɔɔ kɔɔ ta.”
44013016	A Bulu yupaa kati, wi naa a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang Isirela nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ k'aa vɔrɔ Laa katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo.
44013017	Là'a rɛɛ zang Isirela keɓe, z'ɔ̃ng rɛɛ dabang ɓuru. A shing ri, ri shang dɔli, a ri ti nwang zang bang ka ɓɔɔ ri nwang naa zang zanti ka tipi Masar ɓɛɛ. A ti nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ tipi kaɓa nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ.
44013018	Laa ti mã danggn nɛɛ ri nung saa laa ziti ka jìngti.
44013019	A ningsi zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang doolaa manziti ka tipi Kà'ana, a basɛ rɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ tipi rɛɛ zang keɓe. Ri nwang kagn saa laa maani dakn dɛ̃ɛti a tu laa ziti tu kopi.
44013020	Nɛɛ knti Laa yiki ri zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu ɓɛɛ sasak a nɛɛ mani ka yuu Samayila zang nyaa shoonang Laa.
44013021	A zang Isirela ri naa kɔɔyi, nɛɛ ri kasɛ kaa kpanti, a Laa yi ri Sɔɔlì jaa Kiishi yɔɔ doo laa Biliyaminu. Sɔɔlì roo kpanti zang Isirela saa laa ziti.
44013022	Ka knti ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ Sɔɔlì, a yi Dawuda kpanti. Laa kɔɔ ruu ka yuu Dawuda tɔɔ, ‘N walɛ Dawuda jaa Jeesi tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, wukɔ naa palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.’
44013023	“Laa atɛ zang Isirela, zang ɓɔɔ ta yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ zɔ̃ng yɔɔ keɓe kɔ, naa ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe wukɔ Yeesɔ.
44013024	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Yeesɔ a gn kpang, Yɔhana kɔɔ zang ruu Laa tɔɔ, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ zang palɛ ri batizima.
44013025	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Yɔhana hangsɛ shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓi kaa tɔ, hɛ̃ɛ zang tɔɔ, ‘Nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ nkɔ wiya? Wu nkɔ zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gã wu ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ a doo naa ka knti mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n daa naa ɓɔɔ n kãlɛ soo koodoo ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.’
44013026	“Rɛɛ manzung zɔ̃ng Ibirayi, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi Laa kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ Laa kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ, zang shong rùu kɔ nyaa nɛɛ ruu, ɓɔɔ ta yuu ɓuru keɓe.
44013027	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka Urushalima nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang ɓarɛ ri zi Yeesɔ nung kpang. Ri ti zi r'uu rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ zang gã ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang diki diki kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa keɓe ri kɔɔ tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ ri dɔng wu ruu ɓɛɛ.
44013028	Ri ìi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kpang. Ri kɔɔ Bilatu nɛɛ wu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ doo nɛɛ mani.
44013029	Ka ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang beeyi nɛɛ zang naa palɛ wu tɔ nandon, ri witi vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ yuu laa, ri gbãa wu ka saa.
44013030	Laa naa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa.
44013031	Nw'al'ɛ nyaa diki dɔli ka bii rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ wu nɛɛ Galili, ri a ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ. Rikɔ kɔɔ zang vuu keɓe.
44013032	“Ruu atɛ nɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a rɛɛ dabang ɓuru,
44013033	nwang tɔ nizang ka teteng ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu zɔ̃ng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ wu wisi Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Zabura ziti ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, ‘Mɔkɔ jaa mɛɛ, lɛɛkɔ n nwang Daa ɓaaɓɛ tɔ.’
44013034	“Ka ɓɔɔ Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa nɛɛ wu pũng takpang ɓɛɛ, Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N pàl'ɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nwang ditɔ nizang ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ Dawuda ɓɛɛ katɔ.’
44013035	Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Zabura ka nɔng ɓɔɔ kagn tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ y'aa zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓaaɓɛ wu pũngnɛ kpang.’
44013036	“Dawuda ka diki ɓiɓɛ pàl'ɛ zang ɓiɓɛ shoonang naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Vɔrɛ, a zang gbãa wu ka sà'a rɛɛ dabang ɓiɓɛ, a vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ pũngnɛ.
44013037	Zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa pñ̀ng ɓi kpang
44013038	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ zirɛ, zang kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ zang yà'a nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ katɔ ka ruu yɔɔ keɓe kɔ̀.
44013039	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ keɓe, nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa. Nɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka yeti vuu piti ɓɔɔ bɛɛ nyaa dannang Musa risi nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
44013040	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ palɛ waasɛ̃ vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ri kɔɔyi, nɛɛ p'alɛ̀ nɔɔ. Ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
44013041	‘Nɔɔ zirɛ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpaa zang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ nɔɔ ti vɔlɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ka diki manɛ keɓe, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ naa zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ doori nɔɔ shing danggn kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.’”
44013042	Ri nw'ang kana nɛɛ yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, zang gaa ri nɛɛ ri paasɛ ruu keɓe kɔɔnang tɔkn ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ɓɔɔ a ɓɛɛ.
44013043	Zang ri daarɛ tɔ, a zang Yahudawa dɔli nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng kaa doo gbalang zang Yahudawa kɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ, ri dũng Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba. A ri rang rɛɛ zang keɓe yee, kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri yaa gbalang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ri keɓe kpang.
44013044	Ɓɔɔ diki ɔ̃sɔnang naa raa bii mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zang gari bì'i kpalɛ nandon nɛɛ ri tãa ruu Laa
44013045	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ri zi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ dɔli ri kaa sũnyaa gbãnggbãng. Ri laa nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ ri ti dãlɛ wu.
44013046	A Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri rang yee, ri kaa vɔrɔ kpang, tɔɔ, “Ruu nɛɛ rang nɔkɔ ruu Laa shɔɔnang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛyi, nɔɔ tusu yuu manɛ naa nɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpàng kpang, ruu raa jìng kaa bii zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.
44013047	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔɔ rùu tɔɔ, ‘N shing mɔɔ, mɔɔ nwang vuu ɓɔɔ yakɛ nɔng ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ shing zang, Laa ta yuu zang ɓɛɛ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa piti.’”
44013048	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ri tãa naa weɓe, ri tãa tìnang dɔli. Ri a ruu Laa bannang, a rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Laa shingnɛ, nɛɛ ri walɛ Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang katɔ, ri shing danggn ka bì'i Laa.
44013049	Ruu Laa ti baa tipi kaɓa nandon.
44013050	Rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ri dɔ̃lɔ rɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang a ri bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang gari kaɓa. Ri shing zang nɛɛ zang ri dang rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba jìng. Ri hing ri nɛɛ tipi kaɓa.
44013051	Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri waa zũng tapuru ɓɔɔ ka doo ɓarɛ, nwàng kaa naa ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang Yahudawa nɛɛ ruu ɓarɛ hãa ɓi tɔɔ kagn nɛɛ ri kpang ɓɛɛ. A ri daa kaa Ikoniya.
44013052	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri tãa tìnang dɔli, Suru Laa ti a ka bì'i ɓarɛ.
44014001	Ka Ikoniya Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri daa yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang ka nyaa zɔɔ. Ri rang yee Laa, a zang dɔli rɛɛ Yahudawa nɛɛ zang Heleniyawa ri shing danggn.
44014002	Rɛɛ Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ danggn shinnang katɔ, ri dɔ̃lɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, a ri lasɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ.
44014003	Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri nwang ka nihn diki ɓarɛ bee katɔ. Ri rang yee Laa ri kaa vɔrɔ kpang a Laa tusu zang nɛɛ yee tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ nizang kɔ nwani, ka ɓɔɔ yaa rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ.
44014004	Zang gari ri basɛ zɔɔ tìng ziti. Tìng gbete ri ta nyaa zang Yahudawa, a ɓɔɔ gbete ri ta ɓarɛ kaa nyaa rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ.
44014005	Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang nɛɛ Yahudawa, ri mã zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang ɓarɛ, nɛɛ ri dang rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ jìng, nɛɛ ri ti luku ri nɛɛ tari.
44014006	Zang shoonang Yeesɔ ri tãa nyaa, a ri yurɛ, ri daa ka gari Lisitira nɛɛ Daabe ɓɔɔ ka tipi Likoniya ɓɛɛ. Ri ti daarɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ kiiri ri nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ.
44014007	Ri kɔɔrɔ zang ruu Laa kaa nɔngkɔ.
44014008	Ka Lisitira yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn zang yi wu kàa katɔ. Ra ɓi gngn kpang.
44014009	Ɓaa shoo, tã̀'a ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A Bulu shu wu jìng ka bii, a zi danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang masɛ wu tɔ.
44014010	A Bulu mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa tɔɔ, “Yupaa mɔɔ shii doo paa.” A yɔɔ yupaa kpãari, a gaayu ranang kati.
44014011	A zang ɓɔɔ ri kp'al'ɛ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu p'al'ɛ, ri goo nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ nyaa zang Likoniya ri tɔɔ, “Vuu gãnti ri tuu bii shɔnzang ri a ka bii ɓuru.”
44014012	Ri ɓaa Baranaba nɛɛ Zafasa, a ri ɓaa Bulu ɓi kaa nɛɛ Hami, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ r'ang ri yee ɓɛɛ.
44014013	Zang bang vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zafasa ɓɔɔ jà'a vaa ɓiɓɛ ka nyaa gãa gari ɓɛɛ. Atɛ guu napoo nɛɛ rɛɛ mangwaa vuu ɓɔɔ ri mã katɔ rikiki ɓɛɛ, ka nyaa jaa vaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri dɔ̀'ɔ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
44014014	Ɓɔɔ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri p'alɛ̀, ri lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ. Ri yurɛ ri daa ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ. Ri mɛɛ nyaa ri tɔɔ,
44014015	“Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe ka ruu viya? Ruu ɓuru doo shɔnzang kɔ naa nɔkɔ. Ruu arɛ ruu tɔɔ ruu naa kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa. Ruu tɔɔ nɔɔ yaa gbalang vuu ɓɔɔ nwàng nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang keɓe. Nɔɔ a ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɔɔ wukɔ mãa lapa nɛɛ tipi nɛɛ waapo nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ nandon ɓɛɛ.
44014016	Ka koo ɓɔɔ tɛɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ, Laa yaa zang koo nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
44014017	Laa bì'i ti tusu doo nɛɛ mani diki diki, nɛɛ wu kagn ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. 'A nɔɔ mii lapa, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓàar'ɛ wu ra jaa kaa là'a ɓarɛ. 'A nɔɔ vuu shaanang, wu ti shingnɛ nɔɔ tãa tìnang.”
44014018	Ruu kɔ rɛɛ zang shoonang ri kɔɔ ɓee, zãa zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ napoo dɔɔnang kpang.
44014019	Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Antakiya ɓɔɔ ka tipi Pisidiya ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri ti a nɛɛ Ikoniya. Ri dɔ̃lɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ ɓɛɛ nyaa, a zang ri ta nyaa ɓarɛ, a ri luku Bulu nɛɛ tari. Ri gɔ̃ wu ka tipi ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti gari, ri tɔɔ naa vɔ ɓi tɔ.
44014020	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn, ri naa kpalɛ zɔɔ ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng, yupaa a daa yeti gari. Nɔng naa gãntɛ, ri daa ka gari Daabe nɛɛ Baranaba.
44014021	Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka Daabe, a zang dɔli ri shing danggn ka bii Laa. A ri gbãayu ri sɔɔ Lisitira nɛɛ Ikoniya, ri naa a ka Antakiya ɓɔɔ ka tipi Pisidiya ɓɛɛ.
44014022	Ri mã zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ danggn, ri kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri y'aa danggn kɔ ri shing ɓee kpang. Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Rùu dang jìng dɔli ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti ɓɛɛ kati.”
44014023	Ri nɛɛ shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri sɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa tìng tɔ, ri seng nyaalaa, ri ti gaa ri Laa. Ri ti gaa Laa ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu yiti rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu keɓe waasɛ̃.
44014024	Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri tɛɛ tipi Pisidiya tɔ, ri a ka tipi Pamfiliya.
44014025	Ri kɔɔ zang ruu Laa ka gari Paaga, a ri tɛɛyi ri daa ka Ataliya.
44014026	Ri v'ang tonsi nɛɛ nihn, ri gbãayu ka Antakiya, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang g'aay'u zang gaa ri Laa kagn, nɛɛ wu yiti ri ka ruu shoonang kɔ ri p'al'ɛ tɔ ɓee ɓɛɛ.
44014027	Ri shɛ̃ɛ Antakiya tɔ, ri kpalɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, a ri kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Laa yi ri naa kagn ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ Laa puu zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang gbalang tɔ jong nɛɛ ri shing danggn ka bì'i ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
44014028	A ri nwang kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kaɓa ka nɔngkɔ, diki ɓarɛ bee katɔ.
44015001	Zang ɓɔɔgn, ri a nɛɛ tipi Yahudiya ka Antakiya, a ri tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ yee shaa naa ɓɔɔ Musa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ kpang, Laa ta yuu manɛ kpang.”
