44015002	Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri laa zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang keɓe gbãnggbãng ka ruu ruu keɓe. A zang naa kɔɔyi nɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Antakiya ɓɔɔ, ri daa Urushalima. Ri daa hɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng, ka ruu ruu keɓe.
44015003	A zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri shing ri zanti kati. Ri sɔɔ tipi Fonishiya nɛɛ Samariya, ri kɔɔrɔ zang naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa kati ɓɛɛ. Ruu keɓe shing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri tãa tìnang dɔli.
44015004	Ɓɔɔ ri shɛ̃ɛ Urushalima zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang, ri ta ri waasɛ̃. A Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Laa yi ri naa kagn a ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
44015005	A zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ ka vaa zang Farisawa ɓɛɛ, ri yupaa ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri y'ee shaa katɔ. Zang ti kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ.”
44015006	A zang shoonang Yeesɔ, ri nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka ruu r'uu keɓe.
44015007	Ri laa zɔɔ nyaa tɔ gbãnggbãng, a Bituru yupaa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ zi tɔ diki bee tɔ ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng m ka teteng manɛ, nɛɛ n kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri tãayi, ri ti shing danggn ɓɛɛ.
44015008	Laa ɓɔɔ zi rɛ̃rɛnang zang tɔ nandon, tusu nɛɛ ri daa wu yeti tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ a ri Suru ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu a ruu ɓɛɛ.
44015009	Basɛ teteng ɓarɛ nɛɛ ruu kpang. Yàa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
44015010	Nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ gãsɛ Laa ka ruu viya? Nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ shing vuu ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ rɛɛ daa ɓuru ruu zunung tuunang kpang ɓɛɛ.
44015011	Wu nɔngkɔ kpang. Rùu shing danggn tɔ, a Laa yi ruu naa kagn nɛɛ bì'i Kpanti Yeesɔ, wu ta yuu ɓuru kati naa ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.”
44015012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri nwang kaa kikiri, ka ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa ɓɔɔ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri kɔɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, ɓɔɔ Laa yi ri naa kagn, ri p'alɛ̀ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.
44015013	Ri hangsɛ yee ranang tɔ, a Yakubu rang yee kati tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo karɛ rɛɛ manzung.
44015014	Wee Siman kɔ̀'ɔ ruu doo naa ɓee naa ɓɔɔ Laa gaayu kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, a zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri nwang zang ɓiɓɛ tɔ.
44015015	R'uu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri kɔɔyi daa gbete nɛɛ weɓe. Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
44015016	‘Nɛɛ knti, n gbãayu ditɔ n naa mãa nɔng nwannang Dawuda ɓɔɔ ji ɓɛɛ. N mãa nɔng ɓɔɔ jili ɓɛɛ. N wisi paa ka nɔng,
44015017	tɔ̀ɔ, zang nimbang ri kãa Laa kati, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nung mɛɛ ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
44015018	Laa ɓɔɔ tùsù zang vuu keɓe doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, wukɔ kɔɔ vuu keɓe.’
44015019	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, r'uu kpãa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ ri a ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.
44015020	R'uu bèe ri laa kɔ jong, r'uu kɔɔ ri nɛɛ r'i shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang yee vaka kpang, ri rooro nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ wu soro ɓarɛ kpang kpang, ri shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bɔ̃ɔ vɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, ri ti shaa zìi kpang.
44015021	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki b'ee tɔ ɓɔɔ zang gã nyaa dannang Musa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang diki diki ɓɛɛ. Zang ti kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓiɓɛ ka gari gari nandon.”
44015022	A zang shoonang Yeesɔ ri nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, nyaa ɓarɛ a gbete nɛɛ ri shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ, ri shong ri ka Antakiya nɛɛ ri daa nɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba. A ri zɔ̃ng zang varɛ ziti ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri 'a ri bannang dɔli ɓɛɛ. Yahuda ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Basaba ɓɛɛ, ri nɛɛ Siila.
44015023	A zang shong ri nɛɛ labeenang keɓe tɔɔ, “Rukɔ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ruu nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang, ɓɔɔ ruu manzung manɛ ɓɛɛ, ruu shong nyaa nɛɛ zang jèe ruu rɛɛ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang Isirela, a ri zi Laa ɓarɛ tɔ kati ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka Antakiya nɛɛ Siriya nɛɛ Silisiya ɓɛɛ.
44015024	Ruu tãa nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔ̀'ɔgn ri daa nɛɛ teteng ɓuru, ri daa kpãa nɔɔ, ri lasɛ nɔɔ yeti nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Rùu ti kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ kagn nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔ nɔɔ kpang.
44015025	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu kpalɛ zɔɔ, a nyaa ɓuru daa gbete, nɛɛ ruu shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang, ruu shong ri ka bii manɛ. Ri daa nɛɛ rɛɛ wusang ɓuru Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba,
44015026	ɓɔɔ ri loo yuu ɓarɛ tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri pàl'ɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi shoonang ɓɛɛ.
44015027	Rùu shong nɔɔ Yahuda nɛɛ Siila ri kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓarɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ nɔɔ gbete nɛɛ vuu kɔ ruu bè'e nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
44015028	Nyaa ɓuru daa gbete nɛɛ Suru Laa nɛɛ ruu gisi nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̀'ɔ ka yuu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
44015029	N'ɔɔ shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang yee vaka kpang, nɔɔ shaa zìi kpang. Nɔɔ ti shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bɔ̃ɔ vɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, nɔɔ rooro nɛɛ soro ɓɔɔ wu soro manɛ kpang kpang. Naa nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ rɛɛ vuu keɓe kpang nɔɔ tãa tìnang katɔ.”
44015030	A zang shing ri zanti kati. Ri daa Antakiya kati, ri daa kpalɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri a ri labeenang bì'i.
44015031	Ɓɔɔ zang ri gã labeenang bì'i, ri tãa tìnang dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu bì'i mã ri danggn ɓɛɛ.
44015032	Yahuda nɛɛ Siila ɓɔɔ ri doo zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ doori, ri rang zang yee sasak. Yee ɓarɛ mã zang danggn kati.
44015033	Ri nwang ka Antakiya tɔkɔlɔng, a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri shing ri zanti nɛɛ ri daa waasɛ̃. A ri gbãayu ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri shong ri ɓɛɛ.
44015034	Ạ Siila kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang ɓi doo ka nɔngkɔ].
44015035	Bulu nɛɛ Baranaba ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa Antakiya ka nɔngkɔ. Ri nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, a ri ti kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ zang ruu Laa ɓɛɛ.
44015036	Diki naa bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, a Bulu kɔɔ Baranaba nɛɛ, “Ruu gbãayu ta ruu leng rɛɛ manzung ɓuru ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang ruu Laa kagn ɓɛɛ. R'uu zi naa ɓɔɔ ri nwang ɓɛɛ.”
44015037	Baranaba kasɛ nɛɛ ri daa nɛɛ Yɔhana ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Maraku ɓɛɛ ning.
44015038	Bulu zi naa ɓɔɔ ri dà'a nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ gbãayu ka Pamfiliya, yaa ri daa nɛɛ ri ka nɔng shoonang kpang kpàng.
44015039	Ri hàa nyaa, a ri basɛ zɔɔ. Baranaba ri ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Maraku ri vang laana ri daa ka Kuburu.
44015040	A Bulu tuu ɓi kaa Siila. Ka knti ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ri gàa ri Laa tɔ nɛɛ Laa wu gãng jìng ka ri, a ri yi gbalang ri daayi.
44015041	Bulu daa ka Siriya nɛɛ Silisiya ri mã zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa danggn.
44016001	Bulu daa ka Daabe, a naa daa ka Lisitira nɔng ɓɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Timoti kagn ɓɛɛ. Niiɓɛ ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ doori, ɓi zang Yahudawa a diiɓɛ ɓi kaa zang Heleniyawa.
44016002	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɔɔ ri ka Lisitira nɛɛ Ikoniya ri rang yee tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu Timoti.
44016003	Bulu kasɛ nɛɛ wu daa nɛɛ Timoti, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yèe wu shaa kati. Yèe wu shaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi kaɓa nandon, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ d'aa Timoti zang Heleniyawa ɓɛɛ.
44016004	Ɓɔɔ ri tɛ̀ɛrɛ̀ rɛɛ gari, ri kɔɔrɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima ri dang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ri dũng nyaa keɓe waasɛ̃.
44016005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu naa ka bii, a ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ gbãnggbãng, a ri ti shang kaa diki diki.
44016006	Suru Laa zãa ri ruu Laa kɔɔnang ka tipi Asiya ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri tɛɛrɛ tipi Fijiya nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Galatiya.
44016007	Ri a tɔ, ka nyaa tipi Misiya, ri tɔɔ ri daa ka tipi Bitiniya, a Suru Yeesɔ zãa ri daanang.
44016008	A ri sɔɔ yeti tipi Misiya ri tɛɛyi ri daa ka gari Torowasa.
44016009	Nɛɛ zìi Bulu rɔ̃kɔ. Zi yɔɔ tipi Makidoniya shiiyi gaa wu nɛɛ, “T'arɛ mɔɔ a ka tipi Makidoniya mɔɔ naa yi ruu naa ka bii.”
44016010	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ Bulu rɔ̃kɔ naa weɓe, ruu kpalɛ bii daanang Makidoniya. Ruu zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓaa ruu nyaa nɛɛ ruu daa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang kaɓa Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ.
44016011	A ruu vang Laana nɛɛ Torowasa ruu sha dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ruu daa ka Samutaraki. Nɔng naa gantɛ, ruu daa Niyapoli.
44016012	Ruu yupaa nɛɛ nihn, ruu daa kaa Filipi ɓɔɔ wukɔ gari bang ka tipi Makidoniya ɓɛɛ. Gari keɓe, ɓi gari zang Rooma. Ruu nwang ka gari keɓe, diki bee ruu katɔ tɔkɔlɔng.
44016013	Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ruu nwang ka nyaa gari biling, ruu daa ka nyaa rang. Ruu tɔɔ naa ruu wàl'ɛ nɔng Laa gaanang katɔ ka nɔng. Ruu nwang ka nɔngkɔ, ruu ràng rɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri kp'al'ɛ, yee Laa.
44016014	Ka teteng zang soro ɓɔɔ ri tã̀'a ruu keɓe, Jaa soro ɓɔɔ kagn gbete, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Lidiya. Jaa soro keɓe, zang gari Tayatira, màl'ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ nwɛɛri ɓɛɛ. Ɓi ti zang ɓɔɔ bang Laa ɓɛɛ. Laa puu wu jìng nɛɛ, wu zi vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔ̀'ɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu ti shing danggn kati.
44016015	Zang palɛ wu batizima tɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, a gaa ruu nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi tɔ nɛɛ n zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa, nɔɔ a ta ka gãa mɛɛ nɔɔ nwang ka nɔng.” Yi ruu tìng ka bii, a ruu kasɛ kati.
44016016	Diki ɓɔɔgn, ruu daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang gaa Laa kagn ɓɛɛ, a jaa zang soro ɓɔɔ ɓi jaafoo, kpisi ruu yuu. Jaafoo keɓe suru shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shing wu hɛ̃ɛ zang paa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓiɓɛ, ri walɛ vuu nɛɛ wu dɔli, ka ruu paa ɓɔɔ wu hɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
44016017	Dũng ruu nɛɛ Bulu ka knti mɛɛrɛ nyaa, kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zang keɓe, ri zang shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ.”
44016018	P'alɛ̀ naa weɓe diki diki, a yeti Bulu naa lasɛ, a raa jìng kɔɔ suru shi kpang tɔɔ, “N dang mɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ Kirisi, nwangnɛ mɔɔ yaa wu bii.” A suru shi kpang tantɛ nwannang.
44016019	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang jaafoo ri zirɛ nɛɛ zang lasɛ ri gbalang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ saka nɛɛ mani tɔ, ri yiki rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila, ri gɔ̃ ri, ri daa nɛɛ ri ka tìng rɛɛ zang bang. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃̀'ɛ zang ruu kagn ka Kasuwa ɓɛɛ.
44016020	Zang atɛ ri tɔ, ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃̀'ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, a ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang keɓe ri ɓarɛ zang Yahudawa. Ri kpãa zang gari ɓuru.
44016021	“Ri kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ ruu, nɛɛ ruu dũng gbalang ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ, ruu zang Rooma ruu tarɛ, ruu dũngnɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.”
44016022	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri tɛ̃ɛ nyaa jong ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ruu ka yuu Bulu nɛɛ Siila ɓɛɛ. A rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang lɔɔsɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ka bii Bulu nɛɛ Siila ɓɛɛ. Ri ti kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang wu nyɔkɔ ri ta nɛɛ gbãa.
44016023	Zang nyɔkɔ ri tɔ zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ, a zang loo ri ka sãa. Zang kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa nɛɛ wu ku ri gbãnggbãng.
44016024	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa tãa naa weɓe, daa nɛɛ ri ka yeti sãa ɓɔɔ tìng. Mã ri doo ka bii laa waa bang.
44016025	Nɛɛ gãmbang zìi Bulu nɛɛ Siila ri gà'a Laa, ri ti gà'a wu soo. Zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ri dòo ka sãa kɔ ɓɔɔ nimbang, ri ɓaa shoo ri tãa ri.
44016026	A tipi tantɛ ruutunang, a zìiti gãa daa nɔng ka doo ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang loo ka tipi ɓɛɛ. Nyaa gãa ri tantɛ pulunang, a saka ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang looro ri ka sãa nɛɛ mani tɛ̃ɛ nandon, yaa ri naa.
44016027	Zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa hingsi jìng. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zi nyaa gãa sãa bm, kɔɔ ɓi naa zang ɓɔɔ ka sãa ri yuku tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zɔ̃ng yere bang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu nyɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa vɔrɔ.
44016028	A Bulu mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ lasɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang, ruu doo ka nɔng nandon.”
44016029	Zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa ɓaa nyaa nɛɛ zang atɛ waa. A daa ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila kagn ɓɛɛ. Tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng ɓarɛ, bii zà'a wu kpɔkpɔk.
44016030	A sɔɔ ri tìng nwangsɛ ri ka biling, a hɛ̃ɛ ri tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ maalang, n p'alɛ̀ vi n ta yuu mɛɛ viya?”
44016031	Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Shing danggn ka bì'i Kpanti Yeesɔ, mɔɔ ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ katɔ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ nandon.”
44016032	A ri kɔɔ wu ruu Laa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ piti.
44016033	Zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa see ri doo nɛɛ zìi kɔ tantɛnang daa sɔɔ ri nɔɔrɔ. A ri palɛ wu batizima nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ nandon.
44016034	A see Bulu nɛɛ Siila daa nɛɛ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ. Daa a ri vuu shaanang nɛɛ ri shaayi. Wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ nandon, ri tãa tìnang dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn tɔ, ka bì'i Laa ɓɛɛ.
44016035	Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gantɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃̀'ɛ zang ruu, ri shong rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ gã ri ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa nɛɛ, “Yaa rɛɛ zang kaɓa naa ta ri daayi.”
44016036	Zang ɓɔɔ gã sãa daa kɔɔ Bulu kati nɛɛ, “Rɛɛ zang bang ri shong nyaa ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ Siila, nɛɛ n yaa nɔɔ naa ta. Nɔɔ yupaa ta, nɔɔ daa waasɛ̃.”
44016037	A Bulu kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang shong ri ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Ruu zang Rooma a zang nyɔ ruu nɛɛ gbãa ka jìng zang piti. Ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn kpang, zang ti loo ruu ka sãa. Zang nɛɛ zang yaa ruu naa kaa nɛɛ nwiiri ya? Ruu daa kpang. Zang bang Rooma bì'i ri a ka nihn nɛɛ doo ɓarɛ ri yaa ruu naa.”
44016038	Zang ɓɔɔ zang shong ri, ri daa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang Rooma ruu keɓe. Ɓɔɔ ri tãayi nɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila ri doo zang Rooma kɔ, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ.
44016039	Ri daayi ri daa gaa Bulu nɛɛ Siila, a ri nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ yeti sãa. Ri kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri dita ri yaa gari.
44016040	Bulu nɛɛ Siila ri nwangnɛ yeti sãa ri daa ka gãa Lidiya. Ri ìi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng, a ri rang zang ruu ɓɔɔ mã ri danggn ɓɛɛ, a ri daa kati.
44017001	Bulu nɛɛ Siila ri sɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ gari Amfipoli nɛɛ Apoloniya, ri a ka Tesalonika, nɔng ɓɔɔ gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa kagn ɓɛɛ.
44017002	Bulu daa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang naa ɓasidi wu daarɛ ɓɛɛ. Diki ɔ̃sɔnang taati, ɓɔɔ Bulu rang yee nɛɛ rɛɛ zang, nwangsɛ ri dìiri ruu Laa ɓɛɛ.
44017003	A kɔɔ ri nɛɛ Kirisi dang jìng gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa yupaa nɛɛ saa. Bulu kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ kɔ n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓee wukɔ Kirisi.”
44017004	Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri ta ruu keɓe, a ri ɓang ka bii rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila. Rɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ zang a ri bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Heleni ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa ɓɛɛ, ri ɓang jong ka bii ɓarɛ.
44017005	Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn kpang, ri kaa sũnyaa, a ri gaarɛ zang shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ kɛɛm kɛɛm ɓɛɛ. Ri gaayu nyaa haanang ka gari, ri daa ka gãa yɔɔ ɓɔɔgn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jaasong, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri kãa rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila nɛɛ ri nwàngs'ɛ ri zang ka biling ɓɛɛ.
44017006	Ɓɔɔ ri ìi Bulu nɛɛ Siila kpang, ri gɔ̃ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jaasong nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ, ri daa nɛɛ ri ka tìng rɛɛ zang bang gari. Ri goo nyaa nɛɛ, “Zang keɓe ri kpãa zang tɔ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti. Wee ri a tɔ ka gari ɓuru ɓɛɛ,
44017007	a Jaasong y'itì ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ. Ri ta rɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Kayisa kpanti tipi ɓuru dang ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ nɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ kagn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yeesɔ.”
44017008	R'uu kɔ ri kɔ̀'ɔ ɓee, kpãa rɛɛ zang gari nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang ka yeti dɔli.
44017009	A rɛɛ zang bang, ri shing Jaasong nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang yiki ri, nɛɛ ri shu saka, ɓɔɔ zang yaa ri naa ɓɛɛ, a zang y'aa ri, ri daa kati.
44017010	Ɓɔɔ nɔng tɔ̀ɔ hn, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri tantɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila shinnang nɛɛ ri dita gari Beriya. Ɓɔɔ ri shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, ri daa ka nɔng zɔɔ kpalɛnang zang Yahudawa.
44017011	Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ka nihn, ri ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ Tesalonika kpang. Ri ɓaa shoo gbãnggbãng ka ɓɔɔ ri tãa ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri gã ruu Laa diki diki nɛɛ ri zirɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔyi n'ɛɛ nizang ɓɛɛ.
44017012	Zang Yahudawa dɔli, ri shing danggn nɛɛ rɛɛ zang soro Heleni dɔli ɓɔɔ zang a ri bannang ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ zang Heleni dɔli zang varɛ, ri shing danggn jong.
44017013	Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ka Tesalonika ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Siila ri kɔɔ zang ruu tɔ jong ka Beriya, a ri daayi ri daa zàrɛ̀ zang nɛɛ zang ri haa nyaa.
44017014	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri tantɛ Bulu dɔ̃nang nɛɛ wu daa ka nyaa waapo. A zang yaa Siila nɛɛ Timoti ɓarɛ kaa Beriya ka nɔngkɔ.
44017015	Zang ɓɔɔ ri daa shing Bulu, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka Ataniya. Ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ ri gbãayu kaa tɔ, Bulu shong ri nɛɛ ri kɔɔ Siila nɛɛ Timoti nɛɛ ri naa ìi wu pati.
44017016	Ka ɓɔɔ Bulu gã Siila nɛɛ Timoti ka Ataniya ɓɛɛ zirɛ gari bì'i vuu gãnti kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, a vuu bì'i kpãa wu ka yeti dɔli.
44017017	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, laa zɔɔ nyaa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang nɛɛ rɛɛ Yahudawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ ri dũng kaa Laa ɓɛɛ. Ti rang yee jong nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri alɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ka gari ɓɛɛ.
44017018	A zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng vuu ɓɔɔ Epikuru nɛɛ Sitoki ri t'us'u ɓɛɛ, ri ti a ka bii ɓiɓɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ri kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ nɛɛ “Yɔɔ kɔ yìk'i nyaa katɔ ɓee, naa kɔ ɓu viya?” Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ kɔ̀'ɔ r'uu ka yuu vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ ruu zi gngn kpang ɓɛɛ.” Ri kɔɔ ruu keɓe waati kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Bulu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu Yeesɔ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu yupaa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
44017019	A ri ɓaa nyaa ka Bulu, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ Ariyopagu ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ruu kasɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ rùu, r'uu ka yuu vuu kɔ mɔɔ t'usù ɓee.
44017020	Vuu kɔ mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ ruu ɓee ruu tãa ɓɔɔ gngn kpang tingkiring, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu kasɛ nɛɛ ruu tãa dìiri ɓiɓɛ.”
44017021	(Ri kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang gari Ataniya nɛɛ zang zanti ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng laa yee ri nyaa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu shɔɔ, ri ti rangkɛ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.)
44017022	Bulu shii paa ka teteng rɛɛ Ariyopagu a kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N zi tɔ nɔɔ zang Ataniya nɔɔ zang vuu gãnti kɔ nwani.
44017023	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓɔɔ n tɛɛ ka yeti gari manɛ n p'ɛ̃ɛrɛ̀ rɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bang vuu gãnti manɛ kagn, n zi nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔ̀'ɔ vuu gãnti manɛ vuu kagn, ɓɔɔ gbete zang bee vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ‘Ɓɔ̀'ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ruu zi wu nung kpang ɓɛɛ.’ Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bang wu, nɔɔ ti zi wu nung kpang keɓe, n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
44017024	Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ mãa koo nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti koo nandon, ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti lapa nɛɛ tipi, nwang ɓi jong ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang mãa ɓɛɛ kpang.
44017025	Ti shing jìng ɓi ka bii shɔnzang nɛɛ ri palɛ wu shoonang ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ a zang piti suru bii nɛɛ ɔ̃kɔnang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ piti ɓɛɛ.
44017026	Mã̀a zang kɔ, ri ka koo ka bm bm ɓee, nɛɛ bii zang gbete. A shing ri nɛɛ ri nwalɛ ka dalɛ koo keɓe piti, piti. Wukɔ kà ri diki ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka koo keɓe, a ti shĩ̀lì nyaa nɔng ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ kagn ɓɛɛ doo ka tìng.
44017027	Palɛ nɔngkɔ waati kpang, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri kãa nɔng ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ naa ri ti 'ìi wu ka ɓɔɔ ri tãlɛ naa, ri kãa wu ɓɛɛ. Laa bee katɔ nɛɛ nɔng zang gbete ka teteng ɓuru kpang.
44017028	Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Ruu nwangnɛ, ruu rarɛ, ruu nwang shɔnzang, ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ.’ Ɓi naa ɓɔɔ zang soo g'aanang manɛ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Ruu doo wujɛ ɓiɓɛ kɔ.’ ɓɛɛ.
44017029	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu wujɛ Laa, r'uu tɔ̀'ɔ kpang nɛɛ ruu rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ Laa nwang naa vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɔɔ azurufa a ɓɔɔ tari, ɓɔɔ shɔnzang palɛ nɛɛ zũnang ɓiɓɛ kpang.
44017030	Rɛɛ s'aa ɓɔɔ bɛ̀'ɛ nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang, Laa gã̀ ɓi takpang. Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe, Laa dang zang nyaa ka niya nandon, nɛɛ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ.
44017031	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa z'ɔ̃ng diki tɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu kagn ɓɛɛ. Naa jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu gn dang gbete kpang. Jɛ̃̀'ɛ zang ruu nɛɛ bii zang ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe nwàng nizang ka ɓɔɔ wu wisi zang keɓe paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.”
44017032	Ɓɔɔ ri tãayi Bulu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu paa yunang nɛɛ saa, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpaa wu, a zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ “Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ ruu tãa ruu ka yuu vuu keɓe tɔkn.”
44017033	A Bulu nwangnɛ, yaa ri kati.
44017034	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ri ɓang ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ wu. Zang keɓe ɓi rɛɛ Diyonisiyu ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ zang Ariyopagu ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Damari nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
44018001	Nɛɛ knti Bulu yaa Ataniya daa ka gari Koranti.
44018002	Bulu ìi yɔɔ Yahudawa ɓɔɔ kagn ka gari Koranti zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Akpiila nɛɛ ɓeeso Pirisila. Akpiila ɓi zang gari Pontu. Wee n'ɛɛ a doo naa nɛɛ Italiya ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti Kiladiyu dang nyaa nɛɛ zang Yahudawa nandon, ri yaa Rooma ta ɓɛɛ. Bulu daayi nɛɛ wu daa leng ri.
44018003	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓi putali wàanang naa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ, nwang kaa nɛɛ ri, palɛ shoonang kaa nɛɛ ri.
44018004	Bulu ri là'a zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ zang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang Heleniyawa ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang diki diki. Kasɛ nɛɛ ri ta ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
44018005	Ɓɔɔ Timoti nɛɛ Siila ri a nɛɛ Makidoniya, Bulu raa jìng ɓi kaa ruu Laa kɔɔrɔnang dɔ̃ɔ gbete. Kɔɔrɔ zang Yahudawa nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi.
44018006	Ri bɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ, a ri kɔɔrɔ vuu shi kpang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ nɛɛ ri, a waa zũng tapuru ɓɔɔ ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ nɛɛ shaarɛ, ɓi nɔkɔ kãa nɛɛ yuu manɛ. Ruu mɛɛ hãa ɓi kagn kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ lɛɛkɔ, n daarɛ m kaa bii rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.”
44018007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yaa ri daa nwang ka gãa yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Tatiyu Jusitu ɓɔɔ bang kaa Laa ɓɛɛ. Gãa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang naabm.
44018008	Kiripu ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang shing danggn ka bii Kpanti Laa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ piti. Zang Koranti ɓɔɔ ri ti ɓaa shoo ka ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Bulu rang ɓɛɛ, ri shing danggn, a zang palɛ ri batizima.
44018009	Diki ɓɔ̀'ɔgn nɛɛ zìi, Bulu rɔ̃kɔ, Kpanti Laa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Kɔɔrɔ zang ɓaa ruu, mɔɔ yaa kpang.
44018010	N nɛɛ mɔɔ ning. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang mɛɛ kagn gari keɓe dɔli ɓɛɛ.”
44018011	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Bulu nwang ka nɔngkɔ saa gbete, nɛɛ shala mangbete, tusu zang ruu Laa.
44018012	Ka ɓɔɔ zang Rooma naa yi Gaaliyo gɔmna tipi Akaya, zang Yahudawa ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a ri yi Bulu ri daa nɛɛ wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kagn ɓɛɛ.
44018013	Ri kɔɔ zang nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang nɛɛ zang ri bang Laa, wu naa ɓɔɔ zang dang ruu nyaa ɓɛɛ kpang.”
44018014	Bɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ wu kasɛ nyaa kaa tɔ, a Gaaliyo kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang Yahudawa, naa ruu keɓe zang nɛ̀'ɛ tɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe palɛ zang vuu shi kpang k'ɔ naa kãa ruu ɓɔɔ bang dɔli, nɛɛ daa naa ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ mã danggn nɛɛ nɔɔ katɔ.
44018015	Wee nɔɔ laa zɔɔ nyaa manɛ ka ruu ruu, nɛɛ rɛɛ nung, nɛɛ nyaa dannang manɛ ɓee, nɔɔ palɛ manɛ ka naa manɛ. N kasɛ kpang n jɛ̃ɛ ruu ka yuu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kpang.”
44018016	A hing ri nɛɛ yeti gãa ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ ruu kagn ɓɛɛ.
44018017	Ri yi Sɔtanɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, ri nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa ka tìng gãa ruu jɛ̃ɛnang ka nɔngkɔ. Vuu bii ti kpãa Gaaliyo ɓi kpang tingkiring.
44018018	Bulu nwang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Koranti tɔkn diki bee wu katɔ, a naa yaa ri. Naa vang laana nɛɛ rɛɛ Pirisila nɛɛ Akpiila, ri daa tipi Siriya. Ka gari Sensheriya, Bulu yele suuyuu ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ a Laa nyaa nɛɛ wu y'elè suuyuu ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
44018019	Ɓɔɔ ri naa a ka Afisa, Bulu yaa ree Pirisila nɛɛ Akpiila daa ɓi kaa gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, ri daa laa zɔɔ nyaa ɓi nɛɛ zang Yahudawa.
44018020	Zang bì'i ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu nwang nɛɛ ri diki wu bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng, a kasɛ kaa takpang.
44018021	Ɓɔɔ wu tɔɔ wu daa kaa tɔ, kɔɔ ri katɔ kɔ jong nɛɛ, “Laa nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, n gbãayu ditɔ ka bii manɛ.” A vang laana kaa nɛɛ Afisa.
44018022	Ɓɔɔ naa shɛ̃ɛ tipi Kayisariya, daa jee zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nyaa ka Urushalima. A tɛɛyi daa ka Antakiya.
44018023	Nwang tɔ ka nɔngkɔ, diki bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng a yaa nɔng kaɓa, daa ka rɛɛ tipi Galatiya nɛɛ tipi Firijiya, dàa mã rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa danggn.
44018024	Ka diki kaɓa, yɔɔ Yahudawa ɓɔɔ kagn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Apolo, zang yi wu ka gari Alezandiriya, a a kaa Afisa. Zunung yee rannang dɔli, a ti zi labeenang Laa gbãnggbãng.
44018025	Zang tusu wu gbalang Laa tɔ gbãnggbãng. Suru Laa shing wu kɔ̀'ɔ ruu, a ti tusu zang ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ka yuu Yeesɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete. A zi ɓi kaa doo batizima Yɔhana kɔɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
44018026	Gaayu yee rannang ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Rɛɛ Pirisila nɛɛ Akpiila ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, a ri ɓaa wu nyaa, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka gãa ɓarɛ. Ri daa tusu wu gbalang Laa kaa waasɛ̃.
44018027	Apolo kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu daa ka Akaya, a rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri mã wu danggn, a ri bee zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa ɓɛɛ labeenang nɛɛ ri ta wu waasɛ̃. Ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, yi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Laa yi ri naa kagn, a ri shing danggn ka bii Laa, naa ka bii dɔli.
44018028	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zunung yee rannang dɔli, ɓ'a rɛɛ zang Yahudawa yuu nɛɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ri laa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ ka jìng zang piti ɓɛɛ. Tùs'u zang ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi.
44019001	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Apolo doo ka Koranti, Bulu riki tipi kaɓa, a sòo nyaa daa ka Afisa. Ìi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng,
44019002	a hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ, Suru ɓiɓɛ a katɔ ka bii manɛ ya?” Ri kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Kpang, ruu tãa ruu Suru Laa gngn kpang.”
44019003	Bulu hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ, “Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, zang pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ manɛ zɔ̃ng batizima kiya?” Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Zɔ̃ng ɓɔ̀'ɔ Yɔhana.”
44019004	Bulu kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Batizima Yɔhana ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri shing danggn ka bii zang ɓɔɔ a ka knti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe wukɔ Yeesɔ.”
44019005	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, a zang pàlɛ̀ ri batizima kaa nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ.
44019006	Bulu shìli ri naa ɓiɓɛ ka yuu, a Suru Laa a kaa bii ɓarɛ. A ri gaayu yee rannang kaa nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔgn. Ri kɔɔrɔ zang ruu Laa.
44019007	Zang bì'i ri zang varɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kopi tu ziti
44019008	Bulu daa ka yeti gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, kɔɔ zang ruu Laa nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning. Nwang nɛɛ ri ka nɔngkɔ shala taati. Là'a nyaa nɛɛ zang, kasɛ nɛɛ ri ta ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔ̀'ɔ ri ka yuu Kpanti roonang Laa ɓɛɛ.
44019009	Zang ɓɔɔ ri taarɛ yuu, ri shing danggn kpang. Ri kɔɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu gbalang keɓe, ka tìng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ nandon. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Bulu yaa ri, sèe kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning daa nɛɛ ri ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ zang tusu zang labeenang kagn ɓɔɔ zang ɓ'aa nɛɛ nung Tirana ɓɛɛ. Laa nyaa nɛɛ ri ka nɔngkɔ, ka yuu ruu Laa diki diki.
44019010	P'al'ɛ nɔngkɔ, saa ziti ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Asiya ri tãa ruu Laa, zang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ nandon.
44019011	Laa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔli, ɓɔɔ zang zi gngn kpang ɓɛɛ nɛɛ naa Bulu.
44019012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang talɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu àl'ɛ jìng nɛɛ mani nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu hã̀l'ɛ ka bii, zang daa nɛɛ mani ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔng katɔ ɓɛɛ, a kɔnang ɓarɛ yaa ri bii. Rɛɛ suru shi kpang ri ti nwangnɛ ri yaa zang bii.
44019013	A zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ ri daarɛ gari gari ri nwangsɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ bii zang, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri nw'angsɛ̀ suru shi kpang kaa jong nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ. Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N dang mɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
44019014	Yɔɔ Yahudawa ɓɔɔ kagn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Siiba, ɓi zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Wujɛ ɓiɓɛ kagn manziti ri p'alɛ̀ vuu keɓe doo nɔngkɔ.
44019015	A suru shi kpang kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “N zi Yeesɔ nung ɓi tɔ, n ti zi Bulu nung tɔ. Nɔɔ manɛ kaa rɛɛ wiya?”
44019016	Zang ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ zaayi, yi ri, a ɓa kaka ɓarɛ nandon. Nyɔ ri zɛ̃ɛzɛ̃ɛ. A ri yurɛ ri nwangnɛ yeti gãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka bii ɓarɛ kpang. Ti shìng ri nyaa vuu waa nɛɛ bii piti piti.
44019017	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka Afisa, ree zang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ri tãa vuu keɓe katɔ nandon. Zang ri ti kaa vɔrɔ nandon, a zang dɔɔ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ kati.
44019018	Zang dɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri 'al'ɛ, ri kɔɔrɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ ka shoo zang piti.
44019019	Zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛpaa ri sèerè labeenang ɓarɛ nandon, ri dɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ nɛɛ waa ka jìng zang nandon. Zang gãrɛ nɛɛ naa zang malɛ rɛɛ labeenang keɓe daa nung Azurufa labang dakn laa ziti tu kopi.
44019020	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu Laa daa nɛɛ tìng, a ti baa nɔng nandon.
44019021	Ka knti ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe palɛ tɔ nɔngkɔ, Bulu kɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu sɔɔ nɛɛ tipi Makidoniya nɛɛ tipi Akaya wu daa kaa Urushalima. A ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N nɛɛ daa tɔ Urushalima, n daa katɔ, n daa zi Rooma.”
44019022	Shong zang ɓɔɔ ri yi wu naa ka shoonang ri ziti, Timoti nɛɛ Erasitu ka tìng ka Makidoniya, a nwang kaa Asiya tɔkn tɔkɔlɔng.
44019023	Ka diki kaɓa, zang haa nyaa dɔli ka Afisa ka ruu gbalang keɓe.
44019024	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn sã vuu nɛɛ azurufa zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Dimitiriyu. Ri sã gãa vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Aritimi ɓɛɛ tɔkɔlɔng tɔkɔlɔng hn nɛɛ azurufa. Shoonang keɓe shingnɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang nɛɛ wu, ri walɛ saka dɔli.
44019025	Dimitiriyu ɓ'aar'ɛ ri nyaa, a ti ɓaa nyaa jong ka zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ doo zɔ̃ng shoonang keɓe kɔ ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ ri tɔɔ “Jèe, nɔɔ zi tɔ ruu wàl'ɛ vuu naa ɓuru ka shoonang keɓe kɔ.
44019026	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ jìng manɛ, nɔɔ ti tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu palɛ tɔ. Kɔɔyi nɛɛ vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ shɔnzang p'alɛ̀ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang tingkiring. Zang dɔli ri ta ruu ɓiɓɛ tɔ ka Afisa keɓe nɛɛ tipi Asiya nandon.
44019027	Naa ruu nɛɛ palɛ waasɛ̃ kpang zang ɓ'aa shoonang ɓuru keɓe kaa nung shi kpang. Wu ti nɔngkɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, nà'a jaa gãa ɓuru, Aritimi ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang dɔli keɓe, gãa ɓiɓɛ zang risi ɓi tɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Zang ti làs'ɛ bannang ɓɔɔ zang a wu kaa tɔ. Vuu gãnti ɓɔɔ zang bang wu katɔ, ka tipi Asiya nɛɛ koo nandon ɓɛɛ.”
44019028	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ dɔli, ri gaayu nyaa goonang, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Aritimi vuu gãnti zang Afisawa wukɔ bang.”
44019029	Nɔng shoo tãanang ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ ka gari kpang. Zang gari ri yuku ri daarɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ka gari ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ gbete. Zang ti gɔ̃ɔ Gaayu nɛɛ Arisitaku zang Makidoniya ɓɔɔ ri ra doo nɛɛ Bulu ɓɛɛ, zang daa nɛɛ ri ka nɔng bì'i.
44019030	Bulu kasɛ nɛɛ wu daa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ yuu kaɓa jong, a zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri zãa wu daanang.
44019031	Zang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi kaɓa ɓɔɔ ri wusang Bulu, ri shong nyaa ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri gaa wu nɛɛ wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ wu a ka nɔng kɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓee kpang
44019032	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri zi naa zɔɔ takpang, zang ri goo nyaa nɛɛ hn, zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ hn, zang dɔli ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀, a zang kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
44019033	Zang Yahudawa ri dɔ̃ Alezanda nɛɛ wu daa shii ka tìng zang, wu rang yee nɛɛ zang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang kpalɛ yuu ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ. A Alezanda tuu naa ka lapa nɛɛ tɔɔ zang vɔ̃ nyaa kati, tɔ̀ɔ, wu rang zang yee kati.
44019034	Ɓɔɔ ri zirɛ nɛɛ wu zang Yahudawa, ri goo nyaa dɔ̃ɔ gbete ka lapa sasak dàa 'awà ziti katɔ. Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Aritimi vuu gãnti zang Afisawa wukɔ bang.”
44019035	Zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ bè'e zang laa ka gari ɓɛɛ, naa palɛ tɔ zang vɔ̃ nyaa tɔ, a rang ri yee tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang gari Afisa ɓɛɛ, ɓu wi zi kpang nɛɛ gari Afisa kɔ gãng jìng ka gãa vuu gãnti Aritimi, a ɓɔɔ ti tari ɓɔɔ watɛ nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ, kpang wiya?
44019036	Zang ɓɔɔ laa nyaa vuu keɓe kagn kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ vɔ̃ nyaa, n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu hakaka kpang.
44019037	Nɔɔ 'atɛ̀ rɛɛ zang keɓe ka nihn, ri ɓɔ̀ɔ wu vuu ka gãa vuu gãnti kpang, ri ti dãa nà'a jaa gãa ɓuru katɔ kpang.
44019038	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Dimitiriyu nɛɛ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ, ri nɛɛ mang zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka yeti, ri daa ɓaa nyaavaa. Zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ ruu kagn.
44019039	Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kpãa nɔɔ kagn ka bm, ruu ti ɓaa nyaa ka zang gari ri kpalɛ, zang wu tãa ruu manɛ.
44019040	Naa ruu palɛ waasɛ̃ kpang, zang jɛ̃ɛ ruu ruu nɛɛ ruu shingnɛ zang hà'a nyaa ka ruu vuu kɔ nɔɔ palɛ lɛɛkɔ ɓee. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa shingnɛ ruu haa nyaa keɓe kagn kpang. Naa zang hɛ̃ɛ ruu, nyaa ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ zang kagn waasɛ̃, ka ruu vuu keɓe kpang.”
44019041	Kɔɔ ruu tɔ naa weɓe, a jee ri nyaa nɛɛ zang sãtɛ ta.
44020001	Nyaa ɓɔɔ zang haa ɓɛɛ naa kaa tɔ, a Bulu shong nyaa ka rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ ri arɛ. Mã ri danggn, a jee ri nyaa nɛɛ wu daa kaa tɔ. A yaa ri, daa kaa tipi Makidoniya.
44020002	Riki tipi keɓe, mã ri danggn tɔ gbãnggbãng, a yaa ri daa kaa gari Heleni.
44020003	Nwang ka Heleni shala taati. Bɛɛ kpalɛ bii kana nɛɛ wu vang laana wu daa kaa tipi Siriya a zirɛ zang Yahudawa ri tɔng zɔɔ tɔ, ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. A mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu sɔɔ kaa nɛɛ tipi Makidoniya wu gbãayu.
44020004	Soopata jaa Firifu, yɔɔ gari Beriya daa nɛɛ wu, a ɓɔɔ zang gari Tesalonika rɛɛ Arisitaku nɛɛ Sakundu, nɛɛ Gaayu yɔɔ gari Daabe, nɛɛ Timoti a ɓɔɔ kaa rɛɛ Tikiku nɛɛ Torofimu zang tipi Asiya.
44020005	Ri daa ɓarɛ ka tìng, ri daa gã ruu ka Torowasa.
44020006	Ruu vang laana ka Filipi bɛɛ zang shaa nyaalaa borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang tɔ. Ruu naa ìi ri ka Torowasa, bɛɛ ri roo tɔ ka nɔng, diki ɓarɛ daa maani. Ruu nw'ang ka nihn diki manziti.
44020007	Ka diki ɔ̃sɔnang nɛɛ laarang, ruu kpalɛ zɔɔ ruu tɔɔ ruu shaa borodi, a Bulu rang zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ ɓɛɛ yee, ka ruu ɓɔɔ tɔɔ nɔng nɛɛ gantɛ tɔ, wu daa kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ. Rang ri yee sasak gãmbang zìi a nɛɛ mani.
44020008	Waa zà'ang sɔɔ kagn dɔli ka yeti gãa lapa ɓɔɔ ruu nwang kagn ɓɛɛ.
44020009	A yɔɔ jasang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Afitiko nwang ka nyaa hangka ɓɔɔ zang ɓee ka bii binting ɓɛɛ. A hingro kpãa wu ka ɓɔɔ Bulu dɔ̃ɔ ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi doo nɛɛ tìng ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ hingro naa yi wu dɔ̃ɔ gbete, a watɛ kaa nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ yeti gãa ɓɔɔ wukɔ duusu ka lapa daa kaa dakn taati ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ zang naa tuu wu, vɔ tɔ.
44020010	A Bulu shooro ka tipi daa watɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a kɔ̃ng wu. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yeti manɛ wu lasɛ kpang, ɓi doo ningkãari.”
44020011	Bulu gbãayu ka lapa a sha borodi shaayi. Rang zang yee nɔng gãntɛ nɛɛ mani a yupaa daa ɓi kati.
44020012	'A zang yɔɔ jasang keɓe, ri daa gãa kaa nɛɛ wu ningkãari. Ri tãa tìnang dɔli.
44020013	Ruu daa ɓuru kaa tìng ruu vang laana ruu daa ka gari Aso, ruu tɔɔ ruu daa tuu Bulu ka nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu daa ɓi nɛɛ doo ɓɛɛ.
44020014	Ɓɔɔ ruu daa ɓ'ee zɔɔ ka Aso, naa vang laana kati, a ruu daa kaa Mitileni.
44020015	Ruu yupaa nɛɛ laana, ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ, ruu a tɔ ka Kiyosi. Ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ tɔkn, ruu a tɔ ka Sama. A ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔkn, ruu a tɔ ka Miletu.
44020016	Bulu kɔɔ ɓi ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu tɛɛ ɓi nɛɛ laana wu daa ka Afisa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu kasɛ wu suukãng ka Asiya kpang ɓɛɛ. Là'abii nɛɛ wu kasɛ wu shɛ̃ɛ Urushalima ka diki nyaalaa Pentiko.
44020017	Bulu shong nyaa nɛɛ Miletu nɛɛ zang daa ɓàa wu nyaa ka rɛɛ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Afisa ɓɛɛ.
44020018	Ɓɔɔ ri arɛ, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zi zɔ̃ng nwannang ɓɔɔ n nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ tɔ, ɓu doo ɓɔɔ n a ka tipi Asiya ɓɛɛ.
44020019	N palɛ shoonang Kpanti Laa nɛɛ miiri ka jìng mɛɛ, n lakɛ jìng kpang. Ka yeti jìng dannang ɓɔɔ n dangnɛ ka ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri tɔng zɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
44020020	Nɔɔ ti zi naa ɓɔɔ n wàasɛ̀ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ kpang tɔ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ka ɓɔɔ n tusu nɔɔ vuu ka jìng zang piti, a n ti d'ũng nɔɔ ɓɔɔ ka gãa gãa, n tùs'u nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
44020021	N shaarɛ rɛɛ zang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang nyaa nandon, n tɔɔ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ, ri a ka bii Laa. Ri shing danggn kaa bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ.
44020022	Bɛɛ n daa kaa tɔ Urushalima. Suru Laa dɔ̃ɔ m nɛɛ n daayi, n ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang daa palɛ m ka nɔng kaɓa kpàng.
44020023	Suru Laa shaarɛ m nyaa ka gari ɓɔɔ n daa kagn piti, nɛɛ zang daa mã m ka sãa, zang ti dang m jìng.
44020024	N ti tɔɔ m kpang nɛɛ suru bii mɛɛ daa naa vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ kpang. Ǹ kasɛ n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang shong m ɓɛɛ, n ti hangsɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ a m nɛɛ n palɛ ɓɛɛ. Shoonang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ n kɔɔrɔ zang r'uu, ka yuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàl'ɛ zang ɓɛɛ.
44020025	“Nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ n rakɛ ka teteng manɛ, n kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti roonang Laa ɓɛɛ, n zi tɔ, nɔɔ zi m takpang dondong.
44020026	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe, k'ɔp'ɔ zìi zang ɓɔɔ tɔ̀'ɔ kagn yuu mɛɛ kpang lɛɛkɔ (zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yaa gbalang keɓe, ruu mɛɛ hãa ɓi tɔ̀'ɔgn kpang).
44020027	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ nandon, n z'arɛ̀ doo kpang ɓɛɛ.
44020028	Nɔɔ gãng jìng ka yuu manɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa, a ri nɔɔ ka naa ɓɛɛ waasɛ̃. Nɔɔ nwang jagang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ɓɔɔ ri nwàng ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu hoo ri nɛɛ zìi Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
44020029	N zi tɔ, n nɛɛ daa tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu, ɓɔɔ ri nwang naa zaa wusi ɓɔɔ shaa varɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, ri naa a ditɔ ka teteng manɛ. Gn manɛ kɔng ri kpang.
44020030	Ka teteng manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri naa risi ruu nizang ditɔ, wu nwang kaa naa sè'e, nɛɛ tɔɔ ri gɔ̃ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri dũng kaa rikɔ.
44020031	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, danggn wu ning nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ ka saa taati, n yaa ɓɔɔ n mangkɛ zang ɓu kpang. N mangkɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ zìi nɛɛ laagɛ̃ piti, nɛɛ miiri ka jìng mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
44020032	“N yaa nɔɔ tɔ, ka naa Laa nɛɛ yee ɓiɓɛ. Yee ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu yiti nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ bangnɛ wu ti a nɔɔ tìnang tãanang ɓɔɔ wu shing zang ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
44020033	N tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ saka, kɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ, wu nɛ̀'ɛ raa ɓɔɔ mɛɛ kpang.
44020034	Nɔɔ zi tɔ, n palɛ shoonang nɛɛ naa mɛɛ keɓe, 'n wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ n ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
44020035	N tusu nɔɔ ka vuu piti nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ shoonang gbãnggbãng naa weɓe, n'ɔɔ yi zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ takpang naa ka bii. Danggn yee ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Mɔɔ tã̀a tìnang, ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a zang vuu, ɓa ɓɔɔ zang kɔ a mɔɔ jong katɔ.’”
44020036	Ɓɔɔ Bulu hangsɛ nyaa ruu keɓe, tang ka tipi, a gaa Laa nɛɛ ri nandon.
44020037	Ri k'aarɛ̀ kaatɔ nandon ka ɓɔɔ ri jee wu nyaa daanang, a ri kɔ̃ng wu ɓɛɛ.
44020038	Yee ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ ri zi wu takpang dondong ɓɛɛ, kpãa ri ka yeti dɔli. Ri daa shing wu kaa nɔng laana.
44021001	Ruu jee ri nyaa, a ruu basɛ zɔɔ, ruu vang laana ruu daayi. Ruu sha dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ruu a ka gari Kosi. Nɔng naa gãntɛ, a ruu daa ka gari Rodesa, a ruu naa yupaa ruu daa gari Patara.
44021002	Ruu walɛ laana ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri tarɛ ri daa ka Fonishiya, a ruu vang kagn.
44021003	Ruu a tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu zi gari Kuburu kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu yaa wu kaa ka nagang. Ruu daa ɓuru kaa tipi Siriya, ruu naa shooro ka gari Taya ka ruu ɓɔɔ laana wìt'i zang vuu ka nihn kɔ ɓɛɛ.
44021004	Ruu ìi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ kagn ka nɔng, a ruu nwang nɛɛ ri diki manziti. Suru Laa kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri kɔɔ Bulu nɛɛ wu daa Urushalima kpang.
44021005	Ɓɔɔ diki paa yunang ɓuru a ɓiri, ruu yupaa ruu yi gbalang daanang ɓuru. Ri seepaa nɛɛ wujɛ, nɛɛ soro ɓarɛ nandon, ri naa shing ruu. Ruu nwang tɔ nɛɛ ri, ruu yaa yeti gari tɔ, a ruu tang nɛɛ gutu ka nyaa waapo, ruu gaa Laa. Ruu jee zɔɔ nyaa, a ruu basɛ zɔɔ kati.
44021006	Ruu vang laana a ri gbãayu, ri daa gãa ɓarɛ kati.
44021007	Ɓɔɔ ruu yi gbalang daanang nɛɛ gari Taya, ruu naa a ka gari Talamaya. Ruu jee zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɛɛ. Ruu roo ka nɔng ɓarɛ diki gbete.
44021008	Nɔng naa gãntɛ ruu yupaa ruu daa Kayisariya. Ruu daa ka yeti gãa Filibu ɓɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ, ruu nwang ka nɔngkɔ. Filibu kagn teteng zang manziti ɓɔɔ zang shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ.
44021009	Wujɛ ɓiɓɛ zang soro dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ zang gee ri gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓaarɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa.
44021010	Ruu nwang tɔ ka nɔngkɔ diki ɓuru bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, a zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Agabu ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ tipi Yahudiya.
44021011	Ɓɔɔ wu a ka bii ɓuru, tuu guruji ɓɔɔ Bulu mã sãng nɛɛ mani, mã doo nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Suru Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima, ri daa mã zang guruji keɓe doo naa weɓe kɔ, ri a zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.”
44021012	Ɓɔɔ ruu tãa naa weɓe, ruu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng, ruu gàa Bulu nɛɛ wu daa Urushalima takpang.
44021013	A kasɛ ruu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ palɛ ɓu vi, nɔɔ k'aarɛ̀ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ lɔɔrɔ m sisìng viya? N daa Urushalima keɓe m katɔ. Ri nɛɛ kasɛ ri mã m katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ri nyɔ m vɔrɔ ka ruu nung Kpanti Yeesɔ, n kasɛ m tɔ.”
44021014	Ta yee ɓuru kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa wu. Ruu kɔɔ ɓuru kati nɛɛ, “Laa wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
44021015	Ruu nwang tɔ ka nɔngkɔ diki bee ruu tɔkɔlɔng, a ruu kpalɛ vuu ɓuru, ruu yi gbalang Urushalima daanang kati.
44021016	Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Kayisariya, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing ruu, ri atɛ ruu ka gãa yɔɔ gari Kuburu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Manasong ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ruu nwang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Yɔɔ keɓe, ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri gaayu Laa dũnnang doo pati ɓɛɛ.
44021017	Ɓɔɔ ruu shɛ̃ɛ Urushalima, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri ta ruu waasɛ̃.
44021018	Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ Bulu daa nɛɛ ruu ka bii Yakubu, zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng nandon.
44021019	Bulu jee ri nyaa, a gaa tɔɔsung ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔrɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe gbete gbete nandon.
44021020	Ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe, ri dɔɔ Laa. A ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Manzung ɓuru, mɔɔ zi tɔ waa, zang labang dɔli ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa ka teteng zang Yahudawa, ri ti pìiri jìng nɛɛ nyaa dannang Laa dũnnang kpang.
44021021	Ri ti tãa nyaa nɛɛ mɔɔ tusu zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri dñ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ takpang. Mɔɔ nɛɛ ri yee wujɛ ɓarɛ shaa kpang, nɛɛ ri dñ̀ng vuu ɓɔɔ dabang ɓuru ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu kpang.
44021022	Ruu palɛ ɓu kaa biya? Ri tã̀'a nyaa katɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ a tɔ.
44021023	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ keɓe. Zang varɛ ri kagn ka nihn dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ ri tũng vuu ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ.
44021024	Daa nɛɛ ri, mɔɔ p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang p'alɛ̀, tɔɔ zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔkn ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ. Mɔkɔ mɔɔ shu vuu ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ shu ɓɛɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, zang kpɛ̃ɛ ri yuu kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi kati nandon, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ri ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓi nizang kpang. Nɛɛ mɔɔ dũng ɓaa doo nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ kɔ.
44021025	Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ ri dũng kaa Laa kãntang ɓɛɛ, nyaa ɓuru daa gbete, a ruu bee ri laa tɔ nɛɛ ri shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang yee vaka kpang, ri shaa zìi kpang, ri ti shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bɔ̃ɔ vɔ̃ɔrɔ katɔ kpang, ri ti rooro nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ soro ɓarɛ kpang kpang.”
44021026	A Bulu daa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang keɓe. Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang p'alɛ̀, tɔ̀ɔ, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ. A daa kaa yeti Gãa Laa nɛɛ wu kɔɔ zang diki ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, nɛɛ ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa waa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ. Diki ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀'ɔ Laa vuu vaa kagn ka ruu zang ɓu ɓɛɛ.
44021027	Diki manziti bì'i yaa ka tɔkɔlɔng waa nyaa kaa tɔ, a zang Yahudawa tipi Asiya, ri zi Bulu ka yeti Gãa Laa. Ri zàrɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ ɓɛɛ nandon, a ri yi wu.
44021028	Ri goo nyaa nɛɛ “Zang Isirela nɔɔ yi ruu naa ka bii. Wee yɔɔ ɓɔɔ tusu vuu nɛɛ nɔng piti piti, nɛɛ zang ri kasɛ ruu zang ɓuru kpang, nɛɛ zang ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ kpang, kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu Gãa Laa keɓe. Palɛ wu ti vuu keɓe kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, 'atɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ka yeti Gãa Laa keɓe. Shing tɔ nihn nwang nɔng shi kpang tɔ ka jìng Laa.”
44021029	Ri kɔɔ nɔngkɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ ri zi Torofimu yɔɔ tipi Afisa nɛɛ Bulu ka gari ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa 'at'ɛ yɔɔ tɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa.
44021030	Gari nandon, nɔng shoo tãanang ɓi tɔ̀'ɔgn kpang. Zang ri yuku nɛɛ nɔng piti piti ri arɛ, ri yi Bulu ri gɔ̃ wu, ri nwangsɛ wu nɛɛ yeti Gãa Laa. A zang tantɛ nyaa gãa Kulunang.
44021031	Ri nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu kaa vɔrɔ, a nyaa daa ka shoo zang bang sɔɔja Rooma nɛɛ zang haa nyaa kana ka gari Urushalima nandon.
44021032	Zang bang sɔɔja tantɛ rɛɛ zang bang sɔɔja seennang nɛɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ, a daa nɛɛ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang haa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang ri zi zang bang sɔɔja nɛɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓiɓɛ, ri yaa Bulu nyɔnang.
44021033	Zang bang sɔɔja bì'i daa ka bii Bulu naabm a yi wu. Kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang ri mã wu nɛɛ saka ziti. A hɛ̃ɛ zang nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ keɓe ɓu wiya, 'a palɛ zang viya?”
44021034	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri goo nyaa ka lapa, zang ɓu kɔɔ n'aabm̀, zang ɓu kɔɔ n'aabm̀. Ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ ri haa dɔli ɓɛɛ, zang bang sɔɔja tãa dìiri ruu bì'i kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang dita nɛɛ Bulu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja kagn ɓɛɛ.
44021035	Ɓɔɔ Bulu a tɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang nàal'ɛ doo kagn zang vangnɛ zang daa ka yeti nɔng gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɛɛ, sɔɔja ri tuu wu katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri sè'e gnvɔ kana dɔli ɓɛɛ.
44021036	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri a kana knti ɓarɛ ri goo nyaa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ta.”
44021037	Yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng nɛɛ ri shɛ̃ɛ kaa nɛɛ Bulu ka nɔng gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja, a Bulu hɛ̃ɛ zang bang sɔɔja tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kàs'ɛ tɔ, n rang mɔɔ yee ya?” A zang bang sɔɔja kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “A ɓeekpang mɔɔ zunung nyaa Heleniyawa ɓaa katɔ ya?”
44021038	“Wu mɔkɔ yɔɔ tipi Masar ɓɔɔ sɔɔ zang tìng zang haa nyaa ka nihn, a mɔɔ see zang ɓɔɔ ri haa nyaa labang dɛ̃ɛti mɔɔ daa nɛɛ ri ka jìngti kpang ya?”
44021039	A Bulu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N m zang Yahudawa, zang yi m ka gari Taasu ka tipi Silisiya. Zang zi gari ɓuru tɔ dɔli. Yàa m gbalang jong n ràng zang kɔ ri kpalɛ ɓee yee.”
44021040	Zang bang sɔɔja yàa wu gbalang, a shii ka yupaa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang vang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. A wìi zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ naa. Ri vɔ̃ nyaa tɔ, a Bulu rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa zang Yahudawa tɔɔ,
44022001	“Rɛɛ manzung, nɛɛ rɛɛ daa mɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, ka ruu kɔ n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ ɓee.”
44022002	Ɓɔɔ ri tãayi rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa Yahudawa, ri ɓaa shoo kaa tɔ̃ɔ. A kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
44022003	“N zang Yahudawa. Zang yi m ka gari Taasu ka tipi Silisiya, n bang kaa Urushalima ka nihn. N bee laa ka bii Gamaliyel, zang tusu m nyaa dannang rɛɛ dabang ɓuru gbãnggbãng. N ti kasɛ nɛɛ n pàl'ɛ Laa shoonang gbãnggbãng naa wee nɔɔ palɛ lɛɛkɔ ɓee.
44022004	N dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng gbalang keɓe jìng, n nyɔ̀kɔ̀ ri ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ. N yiki zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro n mã ri, n looro ri ka sãa.
44022005	Zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ katɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ hɛ̃ɛ ri ɓɛɛ. N ta labeenang ka naa ɓarɛ kɔ nɛɛ n daa a rɛɛ manzung ɓuru zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Damasiku ɓɛɛ. Ǹ daa ka nɔng kaɓa, nɛɛ n daa yiki rɛɛ zang keɓe, 'n mã ri nɛɛ saka, n atɛ ri ka Urushalima, tɔ̀ɔ, zang naa dang ri jìng.
44022006	“N daa kana, n a tɔ ka Damasiku naabm, bɛɛ laa kaa dãngdãng yuu. Nɔng yakɛ nɛɛ lapa kiiri m nyaa ka teteng tantɛnang.
44022007	N watɛ ka tipi, a n tãa yee ɓaa m nyaa nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ, ‘Shaawulu, Shaawulu, mɔɔ dang m jìng vi nɔngkɔ viya?’
44022008	A n hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, ‘Ɓu mɔkɔ wiya Kpanti.’ Kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Nkɔ Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dang m jìng ɓɛɛ.’
44022009	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ n ri zi nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ, a ri tãa yee zang ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ n kaa takpang.
44022010	N hɛ̃ɛyi n tɔɔ, ‘A 'n palɛ ɓu kaa viya Kpanti.’ A Kpanti kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Yupaa mɔɔ daa ka yeti gari Damasiku, zang daa kɔɔ mɔɔ vuu piti ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ wu ɓɛɛ, ka nɔngkɔ.’
44022011	Jìng mɛɛ zi nɔng takpang, ka ruu nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ keɓe, a zang ɓɔɔ ri daa nɛɛ n, ri yi m kaa naa ri daa nɛɛ n ka Damasiku.
44022012	“Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ka gari Damasiku zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Hananiya. D'ũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ gbãnggbãng, zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ka gari kaɓa, ri rang ruu ɓiɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ.
44022013	A ka bii mɛɛ, a naa shii ka kagn mɛɛ, a kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Manzung Shaawulu, jìng ɓaaɓɛ wu zi nɔng ta tɔkn.’ N tantɛ nɔng zinang, a n zi wu kati.
44022014	Kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Là'a rɛɛ dabang ɓuru zɔ̃ng mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ mɔɔ zi zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ mɔɔ ti tãa ruu nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ.
44022015	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ naa nwang zang ɓɔɔ naa kɔɔ zang piti ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, ka yuu vuu kɔ mɔɔ zirɛ a mɔɔ ti tãa ɓee.
44022016	Mɔɔ gã ɓu kaa vi kãntang viya? Yupaa zang palɛ mɔɔ batizima, zang kɔsɔ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓaaɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ ɓàa nung ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.’
44022017	“N gbãayu n daa Urushalima. N gà'a Laa ka yeti Gãa Laa, a n rɔ̃kɔ.
44022018	N zi kpanti kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Shing doogn, mɔɔ nwangnɛ mɔɔ yaa Urushalima, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tà ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa kɔ̀'ɔ ka yuu mɛɛ kpang.’
44022019	N kɔɔ wu n tɔɔ, ‘Kpanti, ri zi naa ɓɔɔ n daarɛ ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang n yiki zang, a n ti nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ.
44022020	Ka ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ Istifanu yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ vɔrɔ, n ka nɔng. Nyaa mɛɛ kagn, nkɔ ti gãng jìng ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.’
44022021	A Kpanti kɔɔ m tɔɔ, ‘Dita, N shong mɔɔ ka nɔng beebang, ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.’”
44022022	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri ɓàa Bulu shoo sasak, ɓɔɔ naa kɔɔ ruu keɓe, ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ dita nɛɛ wu, nɔɔ daa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe nwang ningkãari kpàng.”
44022023	Ri goo nyaa kana, ri ti wìiri fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ kana lapa, a ri ti vang zũng tapuru ka lapa.
44022024	Yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja Rooma kɔɔ zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ri dita nɛɛ Bulu ka yeti nɔng ɓɔɔ gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu nɛɛ gbãa, tɔ̀ɔ, wu kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang Yahudawa, ri haa nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
44022025	Zang mã wu, zang tɔɔ zang nyɔ wu kaatɔ, a Bulu hɛ̃ɛ zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ shii ka nɔng naabm tɔɔ, “Nyaa daanang kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ nyɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang Rooma, nɔɔ ti dɔng wu ruu ka takpang ɓɛɛ ya?”
44022026	Ɓɔɔ yɔɔ sɔɔja tãa naa weɓe, daa ka bii zang bang ɓarɛ, daa hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ ɓu viya? Yɔɔ keɓe ɓi zang Rooma.”
44022027	A yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja daa ka bii Bulu daa hɛ̃ɛ wu, tɔɔ, “Kɔɔ m jong, mɔɔ zang Rooma ya?” Bulu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Nn”
44022028	A yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “N hoo nwannang zang Rooma mɛɛ m nɛɛ saka dɔli.” Bulu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Zang yi m nɛɛ mani.”
44022029	Zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri tɔɔ ri nyɔ Bulu, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, ɓɔɔ ri tãa naa weɓe ri gɔ̃ɔ bii nɛɛ knti tantɛnang. Yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja kaa vɔrɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu naa zirɛ nɛɛ Bulu ɓi zang Rooma ɓɛɛ, a wuti mã wu nɛɛ saka ɓɛɛ.
44022030	Zang bang sɔɔja keɓe, kasɛ nɛɛ wu zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri haa Bulu nyaa kagn bii, ka ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓaa rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri nw'ang ka tipi. A kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang kãlɛ saka ɓɔɔ zang mã Bulu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, zang atɛ wu nɛɛ wu shii ka tìng ɓarɛ nandon.
44023001	Bulu shù zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu jìng ka bii, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, n palɛ shoonang ka tìng Laa nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang mɛɛ kalang kalang, a nɛɛ mani lɛɛkɔ keɓe.”
44023002	A Hananiya, kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ shii nɛɛ Bulu naabm nɛɛ wu nyɔ Bulu naa ka kashoo kpãng.
44023003	Bulu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Laa nyɔ mɔɔ ditɔ jong, wukɔ mɔɔ nwang naa bii binting ɓɔɔ zang nwaa kponsi puru kagn ɓi. Mɔɔ nwang ka nɔng keɓe nɛɛ mɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ m ruu, naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓ'ee kpang mɔɔ ta nyaa dannang ɓaa katɔ, mɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ zang nyɔ m”.
44023004	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shii nɛɛ Bulu naabm ri kɔɔ tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ dãa zang ɓɔɔ Laa yi wu kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ ya?”
44023005	A Bulu kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, n zi kpang nɛɛ wukɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kpang. Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘M'ɔɔ rang ruu shi kpang, ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti rɛɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ kpang.’”
44023006	Bulu zirɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ ruu keɓe vaa ɓarɛ ziti. Nyaa dang gbete zang Sadukiyawa, nyaa dang gbete ɓi kaa rɛɛ Farisawa. A mɛɛ nyaa ka nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, n zang Farisi, n ti jaa rɛɛ Farisawa. Zang nɛɛ zang jɛ̃ɛ m ruu ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ n shingnɛ nɛɛ zang nɛɛ vɔ tɔ zang naa seepaa ditɔ nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.”
44023007	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ vuu keɓe hn, rɛɛ zang Farisawa nɛɛ zang Sadukiyawa ri gaayu nyaa haanang nɛɛ zɔɔ, a ri basɛ zɔɔ kati.
44023008	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Sadukiyawa ri kɔ̀'ɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang naa yupaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ sàa kpang, nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa nɛɛ rɛɛ suru, ri ɓarɛ ti kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang Farisawa ri ti kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ vuu taati keɓe kagn nandon.
44023009	Ri haa nyaa kana nabm, a zang ɓɔɔ ri zi nyaa dannang Laa dɔli ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ ka và'a zang Farisawa kɔ doori ɓɛɛ, ri shii paa, ri laa nyaa ka yuu ruu keɓe nabm, ri tɔɔ, “Ruu zi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yɔɔ keɓe palɛ ɓuru kpang. A nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, k'ɔ suru nɛɛ rang wu yee, nɔɔ zi tɔ ya?”
44023010	Ri haa nyaa kaa nɛɛ gnvɔ ning, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja kaa vɔrɔ nɛɛ ri nɛɛ lɔɔsɔ Bulu. Kɔɔ rɛɛ zang sɔɔja nɛɛ ri dita ka teteng ɓarɛ, ri ta Bulu nɛɛ gbãnggbãng, ri daa nɛɛ wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja kagn ɓɛɛ.
44023011	Nɛɛ zìi kpanti Yeesɔ naa shii ka kagn Bulu kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Mã danggn kagn. Mɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu tɔ̃ɔ, ka yuu mɛɛ ka Urushalima ka nihn, mɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang ditɔ nɔngkɔ tɔkn ka Rooma.”
44023012	Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ zang Yahudawa ri tɔng zɔɔ, a ri tũng zɔɔ vuu nɛɛ naa ri nyɔ Bulu vɔrɔ gn kpang, ri shaa vuu shaanang kpang, ri ti ɓoo mii kpang.
44023013	Zang ɓɔɔ ri tɔng zɔɔ keɓe ri ɓa laa ziti katɔ.
44023014	A ri daa ka bii rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa, ri kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Ruu tũng zɔɔ vuu tɔ gbãnggbãng nɛɛ ruu nɛɛ nyɔ Bulu vɔrɔ gn kpang, nyaa ɓuru lèe vuu shaanang kpang.
44023015	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ shong nyaa ta ka bii zang bang sɔɔja Rooma kãntang nɛɛ wu atɛ nɔɔ Bulu. Nɔɔ palɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ tãa ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. Ruu kpalɛ bii tɔ, ruu nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓuru kaa gbalang bɛ̀'ɛ a nihn gn kpang.”
44023016	Jaa ɓɔɔ jaanà'a Bulu ɓɔɔ soro yi ɓɛɛ, tãa ruu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri waa Bulu ka gbalang ɓɛɛ, a daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ gãa rɛɛ sɔɔja kagn ɓɛɛ, daa kɔɔ Bulu.
44023017	A Bulu ɓaa nyaa ka yɔɔ sɔɔja gbete, kɔɔ wu tɔɔ, “Daa nɛɛ jasang keɓe ka bii zang bang manɛ, daa kɔɔ wu vuu ɓɔɔ kagn.”
44023018	A yɔɔ sɔɔja daa kaa nɛɛ wu ka bii zang bang sɔɔja a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ ka sãa zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Bulu ɓɛɛ, ɓa m nyaa kɔɔ m tɔɔ 'n atɛ jasang keɓe ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. Nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ jasang keɓe nɛɛ wu kɔɔ mɔɔ kagn.”
44023019	A yɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja yi jasang bì'i ka naa daa nɛɛ wu dang gbete a hɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ nwiiri tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ m ruu viya?”
44023020	A jasang bì'i kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang Yahudawa ri mã zɔɔ nyaa tɔ nɛɛ ri kɔɔ mɔɔ, ɓuru mɔɔ atɛ Bulu ka tìng zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ri palɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri tãa ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃.
44023021	Mɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ɓaa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kagn ri ɓa laa ziti katɔ, ri waa ka gbalang ri g'ã wu. Ri tũng zɔɔ vuu nɛɛ, ri nɛɛ nyɔ Bulu vɔrɔ gn kpang, ri shaa vuu shaanang kpang, ri ti ɓoo mii kpang. Ri kpalɛ bii tɔ, ri gã ɓarɛ kaa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔ̀'ɔ ɓɛɛ.”
44023022	Zang bang sɔɔja shaarɛ yɔɔ jasang nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ m ruu bì'i tɔ kpang.” A kɔɔ yɔɔ nɛɛ wu dita.
44023023	A zang bang sɔɔja ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang bang sɔɔja ziti, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ sèe sɔɔja laa maani dakn ziti, a ɓɔɔ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri vang gbantang laa taati tu kopi, nɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri yiti shalang ɓɛɛ laa maani dakn ziti. Ri kpalɛ bii, ri daa ka Kayisariya. Mɔɔ kpalɛ bii nɔɔ yupaa daanang ka saka mandɛ̃ɛti nɛɛ zìi keɓe.
44023024	“M'ɔɔ walɛ Bulu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu vang ɓɛɛ jong. Mɔɔ yiti wu tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ daa a Gɔmna Filiku wu.”
44023025	A bèe Gɔmna Filiku laa, kɔɔ wu nɛɛ,
44023026	“Nkɔ Kaladiyu Lisiya, n bee mɔɔ zang bang Gɔmna Filiku labeenang keɓe. N jee mɔɔ nyaa.
44023027	Zang Yahudawa ri y'i yɔɔ keɓe, bɛɛ ri nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu kaa vɔrɔ. N tãa nyaa nɛɛ wu zang Rooma, a n daa nɛɛ sɔɔja mɛɛ, n daa ta wu nɛɛ naa ɓarɛ.
44023028	N kasɛ nɛɛ n tãa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ wu p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n daa nɛɛ wu ka bii zang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɛɛ.
44023029	N zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ k'ɔ zang loo wu ka sãa ɓɛɛ kpang. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ wu palɛ, ɓi ka gbalang nyaa dannang ɓarɛ.
44023030	N tãa nyaa nɛɛ zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri tɔng zɔɔ nɛɛ ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n dɔ̃ wu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. N kɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ vuu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ri daa kɔɔrɔ kaa mɔkɔ.”
44023031	Rɛɛ sɔɔja ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. Ri tuu Bulu nɛɛ zìi, ri daa nɛɛ wu sasak, ri daa ka gari Antipatiri.
44023032	Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri ra nɛɛ doo ri gbãayu. Ri yaa kaa rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ vang ka gbantang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ ri daa nɛɛ wu.
44023033	Ri daa nɛɛ wu ka Kayisariya, ri daa a Gɔmna labeenang bì'i, a ri a wu Bulu kaa naa.
44023034	Gɔmna gã labeenang bì'i, a hɛ̃ɛ Bulu nɛɛ wu zang tipi kiya? Zang kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu yɔɔ tipi Silisiya.
44023035	A kɔɔyi tɔɔ, Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ, ri nɛɛ a tɔ, tɔɔ n tãa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang daa nɛɛ Bulu ka gãa kpanti Hiridu, zang gã wu katɔ.
44024001	Diki ɓa tɔ maani, a Hananiya kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, daa ka Kayisariya nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang bang bang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ daa rang ri yee ɓɛɛ, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Tatulu. Ri daa ka bii Gɔmna Filiku, ri kɔɔ wu ruu ɓarɛ ka yuu Bulu.
44024002	Zang ɓaa Bulu nyaa, a Tatulu gaayu ruu shi kpang kɔɔrɔnang ka yuu Bulu tɔɔ, “Zang bang Filiku, diki bee tɔ ruu tãa tìnang nwannang nɛɛ zɔɔ, ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ. Mɔkɔ ti p'alɛ̀, a zang atɛ rɛɛ vuu shɔɔ ka ruu tipi keɓe.
44024003	Zang tipi keɓe ri ta vuu keɓe tɔ ka nɔng piti piti. Ruu kɔɔrɔ ruu vuu keɓe diki diki, a ruu ti zã̀a mɔɔ tɔ gbãnggbãng.
44024004	N suu mɔɔ kãng takpang. N gà'a mɔɔ, palɛ ruu tɔ̃ɔ, m'ɔɔ tãa ruu tɔkɔlɔng kɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ɓee.
44024005	Ruu zirɛ yɔɔ keɓe, kpãa zang dɔli, shing zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri ka koo piti nɛɛ ri haa nyaa. Wukɔ ti zang bang rɛɛ và'a zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ zang Nazarawa ɓɛɛ.
44024006	Kasɛ nɛɛ wu risi Gãa Laa wu nwang kaa nɔng shi kpang, a ruu yi wu. Ḅɛɛ ruu tɔɔ ruu dɔng wu ruu naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang ɓuru kasɛ ɓɛɛ.]
44024007	A zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Lisiya ɓɛɛ, naa ta wu ka naa ɓuru nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning.
44024008	“A Lisiya kɔɔyi tɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri ɓaa wu nyaavaa, ri a ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. Naa mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛ wu, kɔɔ mɔɔ ditɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ruu kɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee, nizang kɔ nwani.”
44024009	Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ri kasɛ nyaa jong kagn, nɛɛ vuu kɔ wu kɔɔ ɓee nɔngkɔ nizang.
44024010	Gɔmna tusu Bulu naa nɛɛ wu rang yee ta. A Bulu kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N zi tɔ saa ɓaaɓɛ b'ee tɔ, mɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ka tipi keɓe. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ ruu ka yuu mɛɛ ka tìng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ tìnang tãanang.
44024011	Naa mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ zang, zang kɔɔ mɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ diki daa kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ n daa Laa bannang ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ.
44024012	Ri ìi m gngn n laa nyaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa kpang. N ti shing zang gngn ri laa nyaa ka gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang, kɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ka yeti gari kpang.
44024013	Naa mɔɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ ri nɛɛ ri tusu mɔɔ vuu gbete ɓɔɔ tusu nɛɛ vuu kɔ ri ɓà'a m nyaavaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee nizang kɔ nwani, ri tusu mɔɔ kpang.
44024014	N kàs'ɛ nyaa katɔ ka tìng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ, n bang Là'a rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ka gbalang kɔ ri ɓaa nɛɛ shi kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ. N ti shing danggn ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Musa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ labeenang rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa.
44024015	N ti shing danggn m doo nɔngkɔ, ka bii Laa, naa ɓɔɔ zang keɓe ri shing ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ zang shi kpang, Laa naa wisi ri paa katɔ nɛɛ sàa.
44024016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kasɛ nɛɛ diki diki n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa nɛɛ tìng shɔnzang piti.
44024017	“Saa mɛɛ bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng n daa Urushalima kpang. Wee n nɛɛ daayi, n tɔɔ n daa a rɛɛ zang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang vuu ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ, 'n ti dɔɔ Laa vuu vaa.
44024018	N palɛ vuu keɓe kɔ, a ri naa ìi m ka yeti Gãa Laa, bɛɛ n hangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa tɔkn ɓɛɛ tɔ. Bɛɛ zang kpalɛ ka bii mɛɛ kpang. Zang ti haa nyaa kpang.
44024019	Bɛɛ rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ tipi Asiya ri ka nɔng. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, ri a ta jong, ri ɓaa m nyaavaa ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, ri nɛɛ zirɛ n nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
44024020	Nɛɛ ti nɔngkɔ kpang, zang keɓe ri kɔɔ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ zang daa nɛɛ n ka tìng zang ɓɔɔ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ.
44024021	Ɓi ruu gbete ɓɔɔ n m'ɛɛ nyaa ka teteng ɓarɛ n kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Zang ɓàa m nyaavaa ka bii manɛ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ n shingnɛ nɛɛ zang naa yupaa ditɔ nɛɛ sàa’ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.”
44024022	Filiku zi ruu Gbalang keɓe tɔ gbãnggbãng ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Zang bang sɔɔja Lisiya nɛɛ a tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n naa dɔng nɔɔ ruu manɛ.” A di nyaa ruu ɓarɛ tãanang kaa nɔngkɔ.
44024023	A kɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ Bulu ka naa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu shing zang, zang gã Bulu waasɛ̃, zang yaa wu katɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ti y'aa rɛɛ ɓeesang ri pàlɛ̀ wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.
44024024	Diki bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng Filiku a nɛɛ ɓeeso Durusila ɓɔɔ ɓi zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ. A shong nyaa nɛɛ zang atɛ Bulu, a ri ɓaa shoo ri tãa naa ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ ri ruu, ka ruu danggn shinnang ka bii Kirisi Yeesɔ.
44024025	Ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang yiti yuu zang waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ruu diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kagn ɓɛɛ. Filiku kaa vɔrɔ, a kɔɔ Bulu tɔɔ, “Dita gbongkarɛ, n nɛɛ walɛ diki tɔ, n ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ditɔ tɔkn.”
44024026	Shing danggn ɓi tɔɔ naa Bulu a wu saka, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓ'aarɛ̀ wu nyaa rangkɛ yee nɛɛ wu.
44024027	Saa naa ɓa tɔ ziti, a Borokiya Fesitu naa nwang kpanti ka nɔng Filiku. Filiku kasɛ nɛɛ zang Yahudawa ri kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yaa Bulu ka sãa ka nɔngkɔ.
44025001	Ɓɔɔ bee diki Fesitu daa taati tɔ ka tipi kaɓa, yupaa nɛɛ Kayisariya daa ka Urushalima.
44025002	Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa, ri atɛ ruu Bulu ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Ri gaa Fesitu nɛɛ,
44025003	wu palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ jong, wu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang atɛ Bulu ka Urushalima. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tɔng zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ ri naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kaa gbalang ɓɛɛ.
44025004	Fesitu kasɛ ri nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang mã Bulu ka sãa ka Kayisariya, n ti daa kaa doo nɔngkɔ.
44025005	Zang bang bang manɛ ɓɔɔ ri d'ũng m, ri daa nɛɛ n ka Kayisariya ri daa kɔɔyi, nɛɛ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.”
44025006	Fesitu nwang nɛɛ ri diki daa mantaati k'ɔ kopi katɔ, a daa Kayisariya kati. Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a nwang ka yeti nɔng ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ ruu kagn ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔyi nɛɛ, zang atɛ wu Bulu.
44025007	Zang atɛ Bulu tɔ, a zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ Urushalima ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng. A ri gaa tɔɔsung ruu shi kpang dɔli kɔɔrɔnang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ tìng nyaa tãanang kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ti kagn gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ tùs'u zang nɛɛ ruu keɓe nizang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ kpang.
44025008	Bulu ta yuu ɓiɓɛ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ta nyaa dannang zang Yahudawa kpang, wu ti ɓɔɔ lasɛ Gãa Laa kpang, n pàlɛ̀ wu kpanti Rooma vuu shi kpang kpang.”
44025009	Fesitu kasɛ nɛɛ zang Yahudawa ri kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu nɔngkɔ, hɛ̃ɛ Bulu tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ katɔ mɔɔ daa Urushalima, zang daa jɛ̃ɛ mɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu kɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ka tìng mɛɛ ɓɛɛ ya?”
44025010	Bulu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “N shii ka tìng rɛɛ zang ruu jɛ̃ɛnang Kayisa kɔ, wee ɓi nɔng ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ jɛ̃ɛ m ruu kagn kɔɔ nwani. Mɔɔ zi tɔ n pàlɛ̀ rɛɛ zang Yahudawa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn kpang.
44025011	Naa n ta nyaa dannang, k'ɔ n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ m vɔrɔ tɔ, n t'ɔɔ kpàng nɛɛ n yuu vɔrɔ kpang. Nyaavaa kɔ ri ɓaa m nɛɛ nizang kpang, n zi zang ɓɔɔ a ri n kpang. N kasɛ nɛɛ zang daa nɛɛ ruu mɛɛ ka tìng Kayisa”.
44025012	Fesitu rang yee tɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu tãa nyaa ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ, a naa kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ Kayisa wu daa jɛ̃ɛ mɔɔ ruu, mɔɔ daa kaa bii Kayisa kɔ.”
44025013	Diki naa bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, a kpanti Agiripa nɛɛ Banike ri a ka Kayisariya nɛɛ ri naa jee Fesitu nyaa, ɓɔɔ wu à ka tipi kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
44025014	Diki ɓarɛ bee tɔ ka Kayisariya tɔkɔlɔng, a Fesitu kɔɔ kpanti ruu Bulu kati tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ kagn Filiku yaa wu ka sãa.
44025015	Ɓɔɔ n daa ka Urushalima, a rɛɛ zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa nɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ri kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Ri tɔɔ n nyɔ wu vɔrɔ.
44025016	A n kɔɔ ri nɛɛ zang Rooma ri palɛ ɓarɛ nɔngkɔ kpang. Ri a zang zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nyaavaa wu waati nɔngkɔ kpang. Ri 'atɛ̀ ri ɓarɛ gbongkarɛ nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa wu nyaavaa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang yàa wu gbalang wu kɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nyaavaa kagn ɓɛɛ.
44025017	A ri naa arɛ ka nihn ka nyaa zɔɔ. N suukãng kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ, n nwang ka nɔng ruu jɛ̃ɛnang, a n tɔɔ zang atɛ yɔɔ bì'i.
44025018	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa wu nyaavaa ri shii paa, ri kɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, ɓɔɔ n shing danggn, n tɔɔ naa ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang,
44025019	ri kɔɔrɔ ruu ɓarɛ ka yuu nyaa ɓɔɔ ri laa nɛɛ wu ka gbalang Laa ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri dũng ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ti ka yuu yɔɔ ɓɔɔgn zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ, a Bulu kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ɓi doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
44025020	N zi naa ɓɔɔ n kãa dìiri ruu keɓe kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n hɛ̃ɛ Bulu n tɔɔ wu kasɛ tɔ wu daa ka Urushalima, zang daa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu ka nɔngkɔ ka yuu rɛɛ vuu kɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ ya?
44025021	Bulu gaa m nɛɛ zang mã wu ka sãa, Kayisa wu daa tãa ruu ɓiɓɛ. A n kɔɔ zang nɛɛ zang mã wu ka sãa ka nɔngkɔ. N naa dɔ̃ wu ditɔ ka bii Kayisa.”
44025022	Agiripa kɔɔ Fesitu tɔɔ, “N kasɛ n tãa yɔɔ bii nɛɛ shoo mɛɛ.” Fesitu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Ɓuru mɔɔ tãa wu ditɔ.”
44025023	Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ, a Agiripa nɛɛ Banike ri a nɛɛ zang ka knti ɓarɛ zingkãng zingkãng. Rɛɛ zang bang sɔɔja, nɛɛ zang bang bang gari ri daa nɛɛ ri ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ yuu kagn ɓɛɛ. A Fesitu kɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri atɛ Bulu ta.
44025024	Fesitu kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kpanti Agiripa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ ruu ka nihn nandon, nɔɔ zi yɔɔ keɓe ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa nandon ɓàa wu nyaavaa ka bii mɛɛ ka nihn nɛɛ Urushalima. Ri goo nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang yaa yɔɔ keɓe ningkãari kpàng”.
44025025	N zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu ti palɛ, ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ m kpang. Wee wukɔ ti gaa m nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang dɔ̃sɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ ka bii Agɔsitu ɓee, n ti kasɛ tɔ n dɔ̃ wu ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
44025026	N ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ waasɛ̃ ɓɔɔ naa n bee Kayisa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n atɛ wu ka tìng manɛ. N atɛ wu ka tìng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ gbɛ̃̀tigbɛ̃̀ti kpanti Agiripa. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kãa dìiri ruu bì'i tɔ, tɔɔ n walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n bee ɓɛɛ kati.
44025027	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zì naa ɓɔɔ n dɔ̃̌ zang, zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ka sãa, n zì vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu palɛ, ɓɔɔ n bee zang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, kpang ɓɛɛ.
44026001	A Agiripa kɔɔ Bulu kati tɔɔ, “Zang yaa mɔɔ gbalang tɔ, rang yee ɓaaɓɛ ta.” Bulu wìi naa ɓiɓɛ ka lapa, a gaayu ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔɔnang tɔɔ,
44026002	“Kpanti Agiripa, n zirɛ nyaating mɛɛ pu dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n walɛ gbalang n kɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri kɔɔrɔ ka yuu mɛɛ ka tìng ɓaaɓɛ lɛɛkɔ ɓɛɛ.
44026003	Ti nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ mɔɔ zi gbalang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri tusu tɔ nandon ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa mɔɔ m'ɔɔ mã danggn, mɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka ruu mɛɛ waasɛ̃.
44026004	“Naa ɓɔɔ n nwangnɛ tìng shɔɔnang bɛɛ nɔɔ doo jasang ka teteng zang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ti ka Urushalima a à nɛɛ mani ka lɛɛkɔ keɓe, zang Yahudawa ri zi tɔ nandon.
44026005	Naa ri tɔɔ ri kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nwani, ri zi tɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang n m zang Farisawa, và'a zang ɓɔɔ ɓa rɛɛ vaa zang piti ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓuru ka jìng ɓɔɔ ri shing ka gbalang Laa dũnnang ɓuru gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ.
44026006	Wee n shii ɓee, zang jɛ̃ɛ m ruu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n shing danggn ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a rɛɛ dabang ɓuru doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
44026007	Nyaa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng ɓuru kopi tu ziti, ri shing danggn nɛɛ Laa a ri, ka ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zìi piti ɓɛɛ. Kpanti, ka ruu danggn kɔ n shing ɓee kɔ, zang Yahudawa ri kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu mɛɛ.
44026008	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yahudawa, ka ruu vi danggn shinnang nɛɛ Laa wisi zang paa katɔ nɛɛ saa kpãa nɔɔ nɔngkɔ viya?
44026009	“N rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ m doo nɔngkɔ, n tɔɔ, n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n zunung katɔ nandon, n zãa zang nung Yeesɔ yɔɔ Nazara ɓaanang.
44026010	N palɛ nɔngkɔ ka Urushalima. Zang bang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri yaa m gbalang, a n mãlɛ zang Laa ka sãa dɔli. Ɓɔɔ zang nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ, n kàsɛ̀ nyaa kagn.
44026011	N shingnɛ zang dang ri jìng ka rɛɛ gãa zɔɔ kpalɛnang diki diki. N p'alɛ̀ ri nɔngkɔ nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri kɔɔ vuu shi kpang ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ kati. Yeti mɛɛ lasɛ nɛɛ ri gbãnggbãng, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n dàar'ɛ ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔgn, n daa dang ri jìng ka nɔngkɔ.
44026012	“N palɛ naa weɓe kɔ, a diki ɓɔɔ kagn zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ri yàa m gbalang, a ri a m nyaa shoonang ɓarɛ nɛɛ n daa ka Damasiku.
44026013	Kpanti, n daa kana ka gbalang bɛɛ laa kaa dãngdãng yuu, a vuu yakɛ nɔng nɛɛ lapa. Nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ, ɓa ɓɔɔ laa yakɛ katɔ. Yakɛ nɔng kiiri ruu nyaa ka teteng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
44026014	“Ruu watɛ ka tipi nandon, a n tãa yee kɔɔ m nɛɛ nyaa Yahudawa tɔɔ, ‘Shaawulu, mɔɔ dang m jìng ka ruu viya? Wee mɔɔ ta doo nɛɛ knti ɓee, k'ɔng ɓi doo mɔkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ napoo nɛɛ ta laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓiɓɛ kpaa wu nɛɛ mani tɔ, kɔng wu ɓɛɛ.’
44026015	A n hɛ̃ɛyi n tɔɔ, ‘Ɓu mɔkɔ wiya, Kpanti.’ A Kpanti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘Nkɔ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dang wu jìng ɓɛɛ.
44026016	Yupaa mɔɔ shii doo paa. N nwang nyaa ka bii ɓaaɓɛ ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ. N tɔɔ n z'ɔ̃ng mɔɔ, m'ɔɔ palɛ m shoonang. Mɔɔ ti kɔɔrɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zirɛ lɛɛkɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n naa tusu mɔɔ ka tìng ɓɛɛ.
44026017	N ta mɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ naa rɛɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ ti nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ɓɔɔ n shong mɔɔ ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
44026018	M'ɔɔ pùu ri jìng, ri yaa nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, ri a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ti yaa nɔng ɓɔɔ sheetang roo kpanti kagn, ri a ka bii Laa. Tɔ̀ɔ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii mɛɛ, Laa wu kɔsɔ ri vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati. Wu ti a ri nɔng nwannang jong ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ngkɔ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.’
44026019	“Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kpanti Agiripa, n ta nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ n zi nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ kpang.
44026020	Ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang n kɔɔ zang ruu Laa ka Damasiku, a n ti daa kɔɔ ka Urushalima, a n ti riki tipi Yahudiya nandon. N ti kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang jong n tɔɔ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, ri a ka bii Laa. Ri ti p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
44026021	Rɛɛ zang Yahudawa ri yi m ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, nɛɛ ri nyɔ m vɔrɔ bɛɛ n ka yeti Gãa Laa.
44026022	Là'a kɔ yi m naa ka bii sasak, a nɛɛ mani ka lɛɛkɔ kɔ n kɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang nɛɛ wujɛ piti ɓee. N kɔɔ m doo vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa nɛɛ Musa ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ naa palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
44026023	Ri kɔɔyi tɔɔ Kirisi naa dang jìng ditɔ, wukɔ ti naa yupaa shɔɔnang nɛɛ saa, wu kɔɔ rɛɛ zang Isirela nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ruu nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ.”
44026024	Ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ ruu kana naa weɓe, Fesitu shaa wu nɛɛ varɛ nɛɛ, “Bulu, mɔɔ shoko, l'aa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ bèe dɔli risi mɔɔ yuu kaatɔ”.
44026025	A Bulu kasɛ Fesitu nyaa tɔɔ, “Zang bang, yuu mɛɛ risi ka takpang, ruu kɔ n kɔɔ ɓee ɓi nizang kɔ nwani.
44026026	Kpanti Agiripa n kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu keɓe nyaa mɛɛ zaa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ zi vuu keɓe tɔ nandon ɓɛɛ. N ti zi tɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa shoo ɓaaɓɛ kagn gbete ka yeti ruu keɓe kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang w'aa katɔ zang palɛ vuu keɓe kpang ɓɛɛ.
44026027	Kpanti Agiripa mɔɔ shing danggn katɔ, ka bii rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ya? N zi tɔ mɔɔ shing katɔ.”
44026028	Agiripa kɔɔ Bulu tɔɔ, “Ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ka jìng ɓaaɓɛ nwannang kɔ ruu nwang nɛɛ mɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng ɓee, daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ risi m n nwang zang ɓɔɔ dũng Kirisi ɓɛɛ tɔ ya?”
44026029	Bulu kasɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Naa nwannang ɓuru bee katɔ kɔ tɔkɔlɔng, n gaa Laa m, n tɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ zang kɔ ri ɓaa shoo, ri tãa m lɛɛkɔ keɓe, ri nwang naa ɓɔɔ n nwang ɓɛɛ nandon. Wu naa ɓɔɔ zang mã m nɛɛ saka keɓe kpang.”
44026030	A kpanti, nɛɛ Gɔmna, nɛɛ Banike, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ, ri seepaa.
44026031	Ri daa tɔ, a ri kɔɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ keɓe palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, kɔ zang mã wu ka sãa ɓɛɛ kpang.”
44026032	A Agiripa kɔɔ Fesitu tɔɔ, “Naa yɔɔ keɓe nɛɛ kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ zang daa jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu ka tìng Kayisa kpang, ruu nɛɛ yaa wu naa katɔ.”
44027001	Zang naa kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ ruu daa tipi Italiya nɛɛ laana, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang a Yuliya zang bang sɔɔja Rooma, rɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ri ka sãa ɓɛɛ. Yuliya ɓi ka teteng rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ “sɔɔja Kayisa Agɔsitu” ɓɛɛ.
44027002	Ruu vang laana ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ gari Adaramitiya ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri daa ka rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ka nyaa waapo tipi Asiya ɓɛɛ. A ruu yupaa daanang kati Arisitaku yɔɔ gari Tesalonika ɓɔɔ ka tipi Makidoniya ɓɛɛ daa nɛɛ ruu ning.
44027003	Ɓɔɔ nɔng naa gãntɛ, ruu shɛ̃ɛ gari Sidong. Yuliya palɛ Bulu tɔ̃ɔ. Yaa wu nɛɛ wu daa jee rɛɛ ɓeesang nyaa nɛɛ tɔɔ, ri a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
44027004	Ruu yaa gari Sidong. Jasung a nɛɛ bii ɓuru kɔ jong, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu bã nɛɛ tipi Kuburu dang gbete ɓɔɔ jasung kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
44027005	Ruu tɛɛ ka yuu waapo naabm nɛɛ tipi Silisiya nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tipi Pamfiliya, a ruu a kaa gari Mira ɓɔɔ ka tipi Lisiya ɓɛɛ.
44027006	Yuliya yɔɔ sɔɔja ìi laana gari Alezandiriya ka nihn ɓɔɔ daa ka tipi Italiya ɓɛɛ, a tɛ̃ɛ ruu kagn.
44027007	Laana daa lɛɛm lɛɛm a diki bee ruu kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jasung kpãa ruu nyaa dɔli ɓɛɛ. A ruu naa a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gari Kinida naabm. Jasung zãa ruu daanang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu bã tipi Karita dang gbete ɓɔɔ jasung kagn kpang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gari Salamone naabm ɓɛɛ.
44027008	Ruu dang jìng ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu sɔɔ nyaa gãnggãng naabm ɓɛɛ, a ruu naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ “Nɔng nyaa waapo ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ” nɛɛ mani. Nɔng keɓe ɓi nɛɛ Lasiya naabm.
44027009	Ruu nwang ka nɔngkɔ diki bee katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ruu tɔɔ daa nɛɛ laana nwang naa ɓɔɔ ruu mãlɛ yuu ɓuru katɔ ɓɛɛ. A laa ɓɔɔ zang daa zanti kagn ti ɓa tɔ. A Bulu kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe tɔɔ,
44027010	“Rɛɛ masang, n zi tɔ daanang ɓuru keɓe vuu ɓɔɔ daa palɛ ruu katɔ ka gbalang, ruu ti vang vuu dɔli. Wu vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓuru nɛɛ laana keɓe kɔ lasɛ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ruu loo rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ katɔ ka teteng ɓuru.”
44027011	Yɔɔ sɔɔja raa shoo ɓi ka vuu ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ kpang. Ɓaa shoo ɓi ka rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ laana ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
44027012	Nɔng ɓɔɔ laana ri shiiri kagn kaɓa, ka laa pũngku shi kpang, a zang dɔli ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ri y'aa nɔng bii katɔ. Ri daa ka gari Fonisi ri daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ. Ka laa pũngku, Fonisi ɓi doo nɔng ɓɔɔ laana ri shiiri kagn ka tipi Karita ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ka nɔng keɓe kɔ zang yi gbalang daanang nɔng ɓɔɔ ka paa nɔng ɓɔɔ laa nwang nyaa kagn nɛɛ nɔng ka dii nɔng ɓɔɔ laa hãa nyaa kagn.
44027013	Jasung gaayu rãanang nɛɛ dii lɛɛm lɛɛm, a rɛɛ zang laana zirɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ri wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri zɔ̃ng laa ɓɔɔ ri mã laana kagn ɓɛɛ, a ri sɔɔ nɛɛ laana nɛɛ nyaa gãnggãng waapo gari Karita naabm gbãnggbãng.
44027014	Knti ɓarɛ bee kpang, a jasung bang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Yurokilido gaayu ranang nɛɛ Karita.
44027015	Jasung bii naa waa laana ɓɔɔ ruu kagn ɓɛɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri raa laana jìng ri daa nɛɛ bii jasung bì'i takpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa laana bì'i kaa gbã̀'agbãa, a jasung dɔ̃rɛ daa kaa nɛɛ mani.
44027016	Daa sɔɔ nɛɛ ruu nɛɛ gari Kawuda ɓɔɔ waapo kiiri nyaa teteng ɓɛɛ naabm, ruu dang jìng ka gbongkarɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu ta jaa tonsi ɓuru nɛɛ naa jasung.
44027017	Ri gɔ̃ jaa tonsi ri a tɔ nɛɛ mani ka yeti laana a ri kãngtɛ soo ka tɔɔsung laana. Ri kaa vɔrɔ nɛɛ jasung daa nɛɛ ri ka seseele ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Sariti ɓɔɔ ka nyaa waapo tipi Libiya naabm ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kãlɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ri mã ka lapa nɛɛ jasung wu gɔ̃ ri nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Jasung dɔ̃ ri kaa waati.
44027018	Jasung bang ɓɔɔ ra ɓɛɛ shii kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ ri gaayu vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti laana vannang ka mii.
44027019	Ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa taati, ri vang vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ shoonang nɛɛ mani nɛɛ naa ɓarɛ ka mii.
44027020	Diki bee tɔ, ruu zi làa kɔ rɛɛ sang kpang. Jasung ti ra ɓi doo naa gbãnggbãng. Ruu rɛ̃rɛ ɓuru takpang, nɛɛ ruu nw'ang ditɔ ningkãari tɔkn kpang.
44027021	Diki bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng ri shaa vuu shaanang ka nyaa kpang, a Bulu shii ka tìng ɓarɛ kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ masang naa nɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa mɛɛ, nɔɔ nɛɛ yupaa nɛɛ gari Karita kpang. Vuu kɔ ruu làs'ɛ a ruu looro ɓee, ruu nɛɛ palɛ kpang.
44027022	Kãntang keɓe n gaa nɔɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn kagn, zang ɓɔɔ lò'o yuu ɓiɓɛ kagn ka teteng manɛ gbete kpang. Nɔɔ lò'o laana kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
44027023	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka ɓooro nɛɛ zìi, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ a ka bii mɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ n zang ɓiɓɛ, a n ti bang wu ɓɛɛ.
44027024	A kɔɔ m tɔɔ, Bulu, mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, mɔɔ daa shii ditɔ ka tìng Kayisa. Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, ti ta yuu rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ daa nɛɛ ri ka yeti laana nandon ri vɔ kpang.
44027025	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ masang, nɔɔ mã danggn kagn. N shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa, vuu kɔ zang kɔɔ m ɓee, naa nwang ditɔ nɔngkɔ”.
44027026	Jasung dɔ̃ ruu, daa nɛɛ ruu ka nyaa gãnggãng, nɔng ɓɔɔ waapo kiiri ka teteng ɓɛɛ doo nɛɛ mani.
44027027	Ka lee ɓɔɔ diki ɓuru daa kaa kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti, jasung dɔ̃ ruu ka yuu waapo Adariya. Nɛɛ gãmbang zìi zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana ri zi ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa ruu a tɔ ka tipi naabm.
44027028	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri gãsɛ naa ɓɔɔ mii bee ka tipi dii ɓɛɛ. Ri zirɛ nɛɛ, mii bee ɓi naa ɓɔɔ zang naa doo laa maani tu bmati ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ruu daa ka tìng tɔkɔlɔng ri gãsɛ tɔkn, ɓi kaa laa dɛ̃ɛti tu kopi.
44027029	Ri kaa vɔrɔ nɛɛ laana ɓuru daa kpaa rɛɛ tari, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri yàarɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ yi tonsi tɔ̀ɔ laana wu shii ɓɛɛ naa dɛ̃ɛti ka yeti mii. Ri yaarɛ naa nɛɛ knti laana kɔ jong. Ri wàa nɔng gãntɛnang katɔ.
44027030	Zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana ri kãa gbalang nɛɛ ri yuu kaatɔ, ri yaa laana, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri yaa jaa tonsi naa ka mii. Ri p'al'ɛ kaa naa ri yaarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yi laana tɔɔ wu shiiyi ɓɛɛ naa, nɛɛ tìng ɓiɓɛ.
44027031	A Bulu kɔɔ zang bang sɔɔja nɛɛ rɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana keɓe ri nɛɛ nwàng ka yeti laana kpang, nɔɔ wɔ kpang.”
44027032	A sɔɔja ri d'ɔl'ɔ soo ɓɔɔ zang yi jaa tonsi nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, a jaa tonsi daa ka mii.
44027033	Kaa nɛɛ yuu gãndi Bulu bakɛ ri nandon, nɛɛ ri shaa vuu shaanang. Kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gãng jìng nɛɛ nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ daa lee kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti nɔɔ ti shaa vuu ka nyaa kpang.
44027034	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ, nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang. Nɔɔ nɛɛ shaa vuu shaanang kpang nɔɔ nwàng ningkãari kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ loo yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi kagn teteng manɛ gbete kpang.”
44027035	Kɔɔ tɔ nɔngkɔ, a tuu borodi, zãa Laa ka tìng ɓarɛ nandon. A shalɛ borodi, a gaayu shaanang kati.
44027036	Ri mã danggn a zang ɓu shaa kaa jong.
44027037	Ɓɔɔ ruu ka yeti laana nandon, ruu laa maani dakn ziti, tu laa taati tu kopi, tu mangbete.
44027038	Ri nandon ri shaa vuu shaanang tɔ, daa ri tɔ, a ri vãlɛ jìng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ alakama ɓɔɔ ka yeti laana ɓɛɛ ka mii, nɛɛ tɔɔ laana wu kpiti kaa takpang.
44027039	Nɔng gãntɛ tɔ, a ri zi tipi kaɓa nung kaa takpang. Ri zi naa waapo ɓɔɔ daa ka biling seseele kagn ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri nɛɛ zunung katɔ, ri raa laana jìng wu daa shii ka yuu seseele kaɓa kɔ.
44027040	Ri d'ɔl'ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ yi laana, tɔ̀ɔ, laana wu shii ɓɛɛ, a ri yaarɛ naa. Vuu bii ri ɔ̃ɔrɔ ka mii. Ri ti kãlɛ rɛɛ soo ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zaa laana nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri tuu sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang mã ka tìng laana ka lapa nɛɛ jasung wu gɔ̃ laana kati. Ri raa jìng ri daa kaa nɛɛ nyaa gãnggãng bì'i.
44027041	Laana vang ka yuu seseele a shiiyi. Ting laana bii tìi ka seseele daa takpang. Jasung ɓɔɔ rãa ɓɛɛ, ti sãlɛ knti laana ɓi kana.
44027042	Sɔɔja ri tɔng zɔɔ nɛɛ ri nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ ka sãa, ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti laana ɓɛɛ vɔrɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nɛɛ zaarɛ ka mii ri waa zaa mii ri daa nyaa gãnggãng ri yuku ɓɛɛ.
44027043	Zang bang sɔɔja kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu Bulu, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zãa ri nɛɛ ri nyɔkɔ zang bì'i vɔrɔ kpang. Kɔɔ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ zunung zaa mii waanang tɔ, rikɔ ri gaayu shɔɔnang, ri zaa ka mii, ri waa zaa mii ri daa nyaa gãnggãng.
44027044	Zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa knti ri yiki naa ɓarɛ kaa laa katako, a zang ɓɔɔ ri yiki laa ɓɔɔ sãkɛ nɛɛ bii laana ri nw'ang nyaa gãnggãng ɓarɛ kati ka knti ɓarɛ. Wee naa ɓɔɔ ruu nwang nyaa gãnggãng nandon, vuu ɓɔɔ lee ruu naa bii kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ.
44028001	Ruu wɔ tɔ, a zang naa kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ zang ɓaa nɔng bì'i nɛɛ Malita.
44028002	Zang nɔng bì'i ri palɛ ruu tɔ̃ɔ dɔli. Mii a kana, a sɔɔrɔ ti s'i katɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri tɛɛ ruu waa. A ri ti jee ruu nyaa waasɛ̃.
44028003	Bulu kpalɛ sãnsãng laa a mãrɛ nɛɛ wu loo kaa waa. A sɔkɔ tãa waa, nwangnɛ yeti sãnsãng laa. A kengtɛ ka naa Bulu.
44028004	Ɓɔɔ zang gari Malita ri zi sɔkɔ ka naa Bulu, ri kɔɔrɔ zɔɔ tɔɔ, “Yɔɔ kaɓa zang ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Wɔ tɔ nɛɛ waapo, shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang d'ũng wu doo naa, vɔ ditɔ nɛɛ mani.”
44028005	Bulu wìi naa, a sɔkɔ watɛ ka waa palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ kaa takpang.
44028006	Ri gã ɓarɛ kaa ɓɔɔ wu puuyi wu watɛ ka tipi tantɛnang wu vɔrɛ ɓɛɛ. Knti naa beeyi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ wu kpang, ri risi nyaa tɔɔ, yɔɔ keɓe ɓi vuu gãnti.
44028007	Tipi yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Babiliya, kpanti tipi Malita kagn nɔng naabm. Ta ruu waasɛ̃, ti a ruu vuu shaanang, a ruu nwang zanti ka gãa ɓiɓɛ diki taati.
44028008	Daa Babiliya roo ka latãng bii nwaa wu, a yeti ti tɔ̃ɔrɔ wu katɔ. Bulu daa ka yeti gãa ɓɔɔ wu roo ɓɛɛ, gaa wu Laa, a shìng wu naa ka bii, a vuu yaa wu nɔng.
44028009	Ɓɔɔ Bulu palɛ naa weɓe, zang kɔnang ɓɔɔ ri ka gari ri a nandon, a Bulu masɛ ri.
44028010	Ri alɛ rùu vuu dɔli. Ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu vang laana ruu tɔɔ ruu daa kaa tɔɔ, ri tɛ̃ɛ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ naa ruu kasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ nandon.
44028011	Shala ɓa tɔ taati, a ruu naa vang laana ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ tipi Alezandiriya ɓɔɔ zang bee waa nyaating jaa bãnang varɛ ziti ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laana keɓe nw'ang ka gari Malita nɛɛ guusi.
44028012	Ruu naa shɛ̃ɛ gari Sirakusa, a ruu roo ka nɔngkɔ diki taati.
44028013	Laana ɓuru naa yupaa nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, a ka gari Rejiyu. Nɔng naa gãntɛ tɔ a jasung gaayu ranang nɛɛ dii. Ruu roo diki ziti, a ruu shɛ̃ɛ gari Putiyoli.
44028014	Ruu ìi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng. Ri gaa ruu nɛɛ ruu nwang nɛɛ ri, diki manziti. A ruu naa seepaa kaa nɛɛ nihn ruu shɛ̃ɛ Rooma kati.
44028015	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng, ri tãa nyaa nɛɛ ruu a tɔ, ri a sasak ri a ka Kasuwa Apiyu nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Nɔng vuu shaanang taati ɓɛɛ, ri naa kpisi ruu ka nɔngkɔ. Ɓɔɔ Bulu zi ri, zãa Laa, a mã danggn kati.
44028016	Ɓɔɔ ruu shɛ̃ɛ Rooma, zang y'aa Bulu nɛɛ wu nwang ɓi ka bm nɛɛ sɔɔja ɓɔɔ gã wu ɓɛɛ.
44028017	Diki ɓuru daa tɔ taati, a Bulu kpalɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari ɓɛɛ. Ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, a kɔɔ ri tɔɔ, “Rɛɛ manzung, n p'alɛ̀ rɛɛ zang ɓuru vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang. N ti shii bàng nɛɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru tusu ruu kpang. Zang mã m ka sãa ka Urushalima, a zang tuu m zang a zang Rooma.
44028018	Zang Rooma ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ m ruu, a ri nɛɛ ri yaa m naa kaatɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri tɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ m vɔrɔ kpàng ɓɛɛ.
44028019	Zang Yahudawa ri kasɛ kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n tɔɔ zang naa jɛ̃ɛ m ruu ka tìng Kayisa. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ n ti kɔɔ zang ka yuu zang mɛɛ kagn kpang.
44028020	N ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ n tɔɔ n rang yee nɛɛ nɔɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang mã m nɛɛ saka keɓe, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ zang Isirela ri shing gn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.”
44028021	Ri kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Zang shong ruu nyaa gn nɛɛ labeenang nɛɛ tipi Yahudiya ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Rɛɛ manzung ɓɔɔ ri ti a kagn nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa, nɛɛ ruu naa weɓe kpang. Ri ti kɔɔ ruu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang.
44028022	Ruu kasɛ ruu tɔɔ ruu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zi tɔ zang r'ang ruu nɛɛ nɔng piti piti ka ruu gbalang keɓe.”
44028023	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kà zɔɔ diki nɛɛ Bulu. Ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ ri ka zɔɔ naa arɛ zang dɔli ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Bulu nwàng kagn ɓɛɛ. Bulu nwangsɛ ri dìiri ruu a ti kɔɔ ri ruu ka yuu Kpanti roonang Laa nɛɛ gãndi sasak nɔng tɔɔ nɛɛ mani. Kasɛ nɛɛ ri ta ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ri ka yuu Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rang ri yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ka yeti labeenang Musa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa.
44028024	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ta ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta ɓarɛ kaa takpang.
44028025	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri daayi, nyaa ɓarɛ daa gbete kpang. Bulu kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe ka gbongkarɛ, a ri tantɛ, tɔɔ, “Suru Laa kɔɔ rɛɛ dabang manɛ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang nɛɛ nyaa Ishaya tɔɔ,
