44028026	Suru Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Daayi mɔɔ kɔɔ rɛɛ zang keɓe nɛɛ, Nɔɔ ɓ'aa shoo, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ kpang. Nɔɔ shu jìng, nɔɔ shu jìng, Nɔɔ zi vuu kpang.
44028027	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti rɛɛ zang keɓe kpãa nyaa ruu tanang dɔli ɓɛɛ. Ri nɔɔ shoo ɓarɛ tɔ, ri ti mung jìng ɓarɛ tɔ. Jìng ɓarɛ nɛɛ zi nɔng, shoo ɓarɛ nɛɛ ti tãa ruu, ri nɛɛ zi vuu nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ. Ri nɛɛ gbãayu ka bii mɛɛ, n nɛɛ masɛ ri.’”
44028028	A Bulu hangsɛ nyaa ruu ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “N kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ta yuu zang, Laa shong nyaa tɔ nɛɛ mani ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri ti naa tãa ditɔ.”
44028029	[Ɓɔɔ Bulu kɔɔ ruu keɓe naa weɓe, zang Yahudawa ri daayi, ri laa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ ka gbalang nɛɛ gnvɔ ning.]
44028030	Bulu nwang ka bm ka nɔngkɔ saa ziti, ka gãa ɓɔɔ wu shu saka katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ta zang ɓɔɔ ri alɛ wu nyaa jeenang waasɛ̃.
44028031	Kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu Kpanti roonang Laa. Ti tusu zang vuu ka yuu kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zãa wu ruu keɓe kɔɔnang kpang.
45001001	Labeenang keɓe, a nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu ɓɔɔ n jaafoo Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. A n ti zang shoonang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zɔ̃ng m, a shing m nɛɛ, n kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ.
45001002	Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe, Laa 'a nyaa ɓiɓɛ tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ka tìng, nɛɛ bii rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ, a zang ti bee ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ.
45001003	Ruu keɓe, ɓi ka yuu Jaa ɓiɓɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ka bii shɔnzang, wu ɓi zɔ̃ng Dawuda.
45001004	Ka nwannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓi kagn kpang ɓɛɛ, Laa t'usù nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ wu wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
45001005	Laa a ruu gbalang nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ, a ruu nwàng zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ka ruu Yeesɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu gɔ̃ zang koolaa nandon ri shing danggn, ri ti dũng nyaa ɓiɓɛ.
45001006	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Rooma, nɔɔ jong kagn. Nɔɔ doo ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ ri, nɛɛ ri nwang zang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ kɔ.
45001007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n bè'e nɔɔ nandon laa keɓe, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ka gari Rooma, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ruu manɛ katɔ, a zɔ̃ngkɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ naa nwang zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Daa ɓuru Laa nɛɛ, Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ri yi nɔɔ naa ka bii, a ri ti shing yeti manɛ ri valɛ katɔ.
45001008	N gaayu, n zãa Laa mɛɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang koo nandon, ri rang ruu ka yuu danggn shinang manɛ ɓɛɛ.
45001009	Laa ɓɔɔ n pàl'ɛ wu shoonang, nɛɛ suru mɛɛ ka ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ, zi tɔ nɛɛ n gaa wu ka ruu manɛ, n yaa diki kpang.
45001010	N gaayi, diki diki nɛɛ wu nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, wu yàa m gbalang jong, n daa leng jìng ka nɔɔ diki wu bee takpang.
45001011	N kasɛ nɔɔ zinang katɔ gbãnggbãng, tɔ̀ɔ, n a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa alɛ zang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu mã nɔɔ danggn kati.
45001012	N tɔɔ, n kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ruu mã nɔɔ zɔɔ danggn, nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
45001013	Manzung, ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n kasɛ nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe. N mang diki diki nɛɛ n daa leng nɔɔ, a vuu ɓɔɔ zãa m kagn. N kasɛ n shing zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ, ri dũng Laa naa ɓɔɔ n wàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka teteng zang nimbang, ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ.
45001014	N m zang ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang piti shoonang ɓɛɛ, zang Heleni nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Heleni kpang ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri bèe laa katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri bèe laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
45001015	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, bii shaa m, n kasɛ n tɔɔ, n naa rang nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kaa gari Rooma, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa jong.
45001016	Yusɛ̃ɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔɔnang tuu m kpang. Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔ naa vuu palɛnang Laa ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu zang piti, ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Zang Yahudawa kɔ shɔɔnang, wu tɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ.
45001017	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔ tusu zang naa ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ, zang wu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ danggn shinnang, wu waa nyaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ Labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ, wukɔ walɛ suru bii.”
45001018	Gnvɔ Laa tusu bii tɔ nɛɛ lapa, ka yuu zang piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ shi kpang, ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang zi vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ka yuu Laa kpang, nɛɛ yeti shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
45001019	Laa dang ri jìng ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ naa zang zi ka yuu Laa, ri zi tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa tusu ri tɔ ɓɛɛ.
45001020	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Laa mãa koo gn kpang, vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi kpang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nwannang ɓiɓɛ, ri zi tɔ gbayi gbayi. Zang ri zili vuu keɓe katɔ ka vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ri jãa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.
45001021	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi Laa tɔ, a ri a wu bannang kaa takpang, nɛɛ wukɔ Laa kpang. Ri ti zã̀a wu kpang. A rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ sɔ̀ɔ gbalang kpang. A yeti ɓarɛ tɔɔyi, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kaa takpang.
45001022	Ri tɔɔ ri zũng katɔ, a ɓeekpang, ri ɓarɛ shoko.
45001023	Ka ɓɔɔ ri nɛ̀'ɛ bang Laa ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi dondong, ri bang ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang palɛ, nwàng naa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ, nɛɛ jaaning, nɛɛ yɔpɔ jìngti, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri gɔ̃ nɛɛ buru ɓɛɛ.
45001024	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang ri shoko nɔngkɔ, Laa yaa ri, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ sãnsãnrãng ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri p'alɛ̀ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ zɔɔ.
45001025	Ri kɔ̃sɔ ruu nizang ɓɔɔ ka yuu Laa nɛɛ sè'e. Ri bang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mã̀ayi, a ri p'alɛ̀ wu shoonang, ri yaa Laa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ wu dondong ka nɔngkɔ. N'ɔngkɔ̀.
45001026	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa yaa ri nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang soro ɓarɛ ri yaa roonang nɛɛ zang varɛ, ri rooro kaa nɛɛ zang soro kɔ doori. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang p'alɛ̀ gngn nɔngkɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
45001027	Zang varɛ ri palɛ doo nɔngkɔ, ri yaa roonang tɔ nɛɛ zang soro ri rooro kaa doo nɛɛ zang varɛ kɔ. Zang varɛ ri palɛ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ zɔɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang dang ri jìng naa ɓɔɔ dà'a ri ɓɛɛ, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
45001028	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri y'itì vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ zang zi ka yuu Laa ka yeti ɓarɛ kpang. Laa yaa ri tɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang, tɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa palɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ.
45001029	Yeti ɓarɛ ɓi gnvɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, ri kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa zang ɓɛɛ. Ri pàl'ɛ zɔɔ shi kpang. Ri kaa sũnyaa dɔli, ri nyɔ zang vɔrɔ, ri gaarɛ nyaa. A ri nwaarɛ zɔɔ. Ri rɛ̃rɛ vuu shi kpang ka yuu zang diki diki, ri rang zang.
45001030	Ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zɔɔ, ri kasɛ Laa kpang, ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ dɔli, ri ti kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu ɓarɛ. Ri nwangsɛ vuu shi kpang ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri yi ri ɓɛɛ kpang.
45001031	Ri shoko, ri p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ri kasɛ ruu zang kpang, gn zang ti kɔng ri kpang.
45001032	Ri zi tɔ nɛɛ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri huu shoo wu ka nɔng palɛnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ri tãa tìnang zang ɓɔɔ ri p'alɛ̀ vuu keɓe ɓɛɛ.
45002001	Masang, mɔɔ kɔɔ zang katɔ nɛɛ zang ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ ya? Naa mɔɔ doo zang kiya, daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔngkɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ naa mɔɔ dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, a mɔɔ palɛ doo vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ, mɔɔ dɔng ɓaa yuu ɓaaɓɛ ruu.
45002002	Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ Laa dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe ruu, palɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ.
45002003	A mɔkɔ masang, mɔɔ palɛ doo vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dɔng zang ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ ya? Mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓaa nɛɛ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ mɔɔ ruu kpang ya?
45002004	Mɔɔ rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ waasɛ̃ ka yuu Laa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, palɛ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ dɔli, a dang mɔɔ jìng tantɛnang kpang, a ti mã danggn nɛɛ mɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ ya? Laa pàl'ɛ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓaaɓɛ kati.
45002005	Wee nɔɔ kpãa nyaa nɔngkɔ, a nɔɔ ti kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ kpang, nɔɔ kpàl'ɛ yuu manɛ ɓi gnvɔ Laa. Nɔɔ shingnɛ, jìng ɓɔɔ Laa naa dang nɔɔ, wu bangnɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ gnvɔ ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɛɛ, naa nwangsɛ bii kagn ɓɛɛ.
45002006	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa naa sɔ̀ɔr'ɔ zang ɓu doo ka doo, vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓu p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
45002007	Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi tìng, ri palɛ ɓarɛ tɔ̃ɔ kɔ sasak, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu a ri bannang, wu dɔ̀ɔ ri, ri ti nw'ang ningkãari dondong. Laa naa a ri suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
45002008	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ yuu ɓarɛ dɔli, ri kasɛ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kpang. Ri dũng vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Gnvɔ naa shà'a Laa nɛɛ ri, wu dang ri jìng.
45002009	Zang nandon ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ri naa dang jìng dɔli. Zang gaayu nɛɛ zang Yahudawa kɔ shɔɔnang, wu tɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ.
45002010	A Laa naa a zang ɓɔɔ ri p'alɛ̀ vuu tɔ̃ɔ kɔ bannang, wu ti dɔɔ ri, wu ti shing ri, ri nw'ang ka nyaa zɔɔ. Gaayu nɛɛ zang Yahudawa kɔ shɔɔnang, wu naa tɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ.
45002011	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi jong gn dang gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.
45002012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, ɓɔɔ ri zi nyaa dannang Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ri shaarɛ doo nɛɛ mani. Ka wee zang jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu ka doo nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa d'angnɛ kpang ɓee. Zang jɛ̃ɛ ɓi zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ruu ka doo nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dangnɛ ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
45002013	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang raa zang tɔ̃ɔ ka ting Laa, wu ka r'uu ruu Laa ɓɔɔ zang tãa ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa nɛɛ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ, Laa ɓ'aa ri nɛɛ ri zang tɔ̃ɔ.
45002014	Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ri zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ ɓarɛ kpang. A ri nɛɛ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ, rikɔ nwàng kaa nyaa dannang nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ. A ri zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kaa takpang.
45002015	Vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ kɔ t'usù nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kagn yeti ɓarɛ. Yeti ɓarɛ ti tusu doo nɔngkɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, lee ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, lee ɓɔɔ wu ti kɔ̀ɔ ri nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
45002016	Ka diki keɓe, Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓu ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓu waasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Jɛ̃ɛ ruu keɓe, nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ka ruu Laa kɔ n kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ nɔɔ ɓee.
45002017	A mɔkɔ, mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ ɓaa zang Yahudawa. Mɔɔ di yuu ɓaa kaa bii nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ, a mɔɔ dɔ̀'ɔ bii nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓaa zang Laa.
45002018	Mɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ, a nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ, ti tusu mɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, mɔɔ zɔ̃ng vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
45002019	Nyaa zaa mɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, Nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ yi zang jìng ringtang labalang kpang. Mɔɔ nwang naa waa ɓɔɔ yakɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ nɔng ɓɛɛ.
45002020	Mɔkɔ ti kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang naa wujɛ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ zi ɓaa tɔ nɛɛ, mɔɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mɔɔ zi vuu tɔ piti, vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔyi ɓi ti nizang tingkiring.
45002021	Kpɛ̃ɛrɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ jong, mɔɔ nɛɛ tusu zang ɓɔɔ vuu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ kpang, mɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri ɓɔ̀ɔ shɔngɓɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
45002022	M'ɔɔ roo nɛɛ soro zang kpang, mɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, zang ri roo nɛɛ soro zang ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu vaka kpang, mɔɔ daa ɓɔ̀ɔ vuu ka jaka vaka kpang.
45002023	Mɔɔ dɔ̀'ɔ bii nɛɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ manɛ kagn. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ta nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ tɔ, nɔɔ shingnɛ zang sèng Laa kpang.
45002024	Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu nung Laa ka ruu manɛ kɔ zang Yahudawa”.
45002025	Nɔɔ nɛɛ dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ katɔ, shaa yeenang manɛ tɔ̃ɔ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ta nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ katɔ, nɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ yee shaa kpang gbã̀'agbãa.
45002026	Naa zang ɓɔɔ yèe shaa kpang, dũng vuu ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, Laa rìs'i wu, wu nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ yee shaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
45002027	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa ɓarɛ kpang, ri naa ɓa nɔɔ ditɔ zang Yahudawa, ri nɛɛ dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔkɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, a zang ti yee nɔɔ shaa katɔ, a nɔɔ t'a nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
45002028	Ɓu wi zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ nizang wiya? Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ zang yee wu shaa katɔ, a ti ta bii naa zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ kpang.
45002029	Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ nizang ɓi, zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔ̃sɔ wu ɓoro tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang y'ee shaa ɓɛɛ. Wu nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dangnɛ kɔ̃sɔ wu kpang. Zang keɓe ɓi Laa dɔɔ wu, wu shɔnzang ri dɔɔ wu kpang.
45003001	A zang Yahudawa, ri ɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Shaa yeenang nwang zang ɓu viya?
45003002	Nwǎng zang vuu katɔ dɔli. Laa a zang Yahudawa kɔ Ruu ɓiɓɛ ka naa, nɛɛ ri yiti.
45003003	A zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ shing danggn kpang, ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ? Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa nɛɛ wu p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ takpang ya?
45003004	Wu nɔngkɔ kpang. Naa zang piti ri suu sè'e, Laa palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ rang yee, zang piti ri zi katɔ nɛɛ yee ɓaaɓɛ nizang. Naa zang ɓà'a mɔɔ nyaavaa, mɔkɔ mɔɔ shaayi”.
45003005	Naa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ, shingnɛ, zang wu zi vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ? Ruu kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Nɛɛ Laa nɛɛ dang ruu jìng tɔ, p'alɛ̀ shi kpang ya? (N rang yee m naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri rangkɛ ɓɛɛ)
45003006	Wu nɔngkɔ kpang. Naa Laa palɛ vuu gn dang gbete, palɛ biya wu jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu viya?
45003007	Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ, naa sè'e ɓɔɔ n suuyi, shingnɛ, zang a Laa bannang a ti shingnɛ zang zi vuu nizang ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ kaa gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ, ka ruu vi Laa dang m jìng naa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang viya?
45003008	A ka ruu vi ruu p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang tɔ̀ɔ, tɔ̃ɔ wu nwang ka nɛɛ mani kpang viya? Zang ɓɔɔgn ri rang ruu shi kpang ka yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ruu kɔɔrɔ nɔngkɔ. Zang naa dang ri jìng ditɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
45003009	Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ ruu zang Yahudawa ruu ɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓu kaa tɔ ya? Nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring. N kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ka tìng nɛɛ zang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang nandon, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang katɔ.
45003010	Naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ kagn gbete ka jìng Laa kpang.
45003011	Zang ɓɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ti kãa nɔng Laa kagn gbete kpang.
45003012	Zang piti ri ràa Laa yuu knti tɔ, ri nandon, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ kagn teteng ɓarɛ gbete kpang tingkiring.
45003013	Nyaa ɓarɛ ɓi sàa ɓɔɔ nyaa bm ɓɛɛ Yee ɓɔɔ ri rangnɛ, ɓi zang nwaarɛnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning Ruu ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃pɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa sɔkɔ ɓɛɛ.
45003014	Nyaa ɓarɛ ɓi nyaa rìiti kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ la katɔ ɓɛɛ.
45003015	Ri wìiri kpang, ri shǐng zang nyaa vuu waa ka bii, a ri nyɔ zang vɔrɔ.
45003016	Nɔng ɓɔɔ ri daa piti ri lasɛ nɔng, ri y'aa zang nɛɛ yeti lasɛnang.
45003017	Ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri shing zang, zang ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
45003018	Ri kaa vɔrɔ Laa ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang tingkiring”.
45003019	Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang bèe ka yeti nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng ɓarɛ nyaa dannang keɓe ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu zãa shɔnzang nandon nyaa jãanang kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu shingnɛ Laa wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo nandon ruu kati.
45003020	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang nwàng zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi jong ka tìng Laa ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ pù'u zang ɓi jìng, zang zi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.
45003021	Kãntang keɓe, Laa nwangsɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu shing zang, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ tɔ. Ruu gbalang keɓe, hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kpang. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri kɔɔ ruu ka yuu gbalang keɓe.
45003022	Laa sh'ing zang, zang nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ zang shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ɓi ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.
45003023	Zang piti ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ri daa naa ɓɔɔ ri walɛ bannang ɓɔɔ Laa a zang ɓɛɛ takpang.
45003024	A ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ zang waati, Laa yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ a shing ri tɔ, ri nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ka tìng ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
45003025	Laa a zang wu, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwang kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa yà'a shɔnzang nandon gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa palɛ vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, wu tusu zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ. Ka tìng, Laa mã danggn, a yee laa ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
45003026	Kãntang keɓe, y'ee laa kaa tɔ, ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu tusu zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ. Ka gbalang keɓe, Laa tusu zang nɛɛ wu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ wu ti shing zang piti ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ.
45003027	Ruu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓuru ka yuu viya? Vuu kpang. Ka ruu vi nɔngkɔ viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ ya? Wu nɔngkɔ kpang, ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ.
45003028	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu di nyaa ruu tɔ nɛɛ, shɔnzang raa zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shingnɛ kɔ gbete, wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang palɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
45003029	Laa ɓi Laa zang Yahudawa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ya? Ɓi doo Là'a zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang kɔ doori kpang ya? Ɓi doo Laa ɓarɛ kɔ.
45003030	Laa ɓi gbete kak. Shing zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa katɔ, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ɓɛɛ. Wu ti shing zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa kpang, ri nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ doo ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ɓɛɛ kɔ.
45003031	Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, ruu kɔsɔ nyaa dannang Laa kaa tɔ nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ɓɛɛ ya? Wu nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring. Ruu shɔ nyaa dannang Laa ɓi kaa nɛɛ tɔɔsung kɔ jong.
45004001	Ruu kɔɔ ɓu kaa vi ka yuu Ibirayi dabang rɛɛ dabang ɓuru viya?
45004002	Naa Laa nɛɛ shingnɛ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ Ibirayi nɛ̀'ɛ kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn. A nɛ̀'ɛ kɔɔrɔ ruu keɓe kaa tɔ̀'ɔ ka tìng Laa kpang.
45004003	Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ibirayi shing danggn ka bii Laa, a ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ, Laa ta wu nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ.”
45004004	Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang nɛɛ zang shu wu katɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang a wu, wu waati kpang, ɓi ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ wu p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
45004005	A zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang, nɛɛ shing danggn ɓi ka bii Laa, ɓɔɔ shing zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, wu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ. Zang keɓe, danggn ɓɔɔ wu shingnɛ risi wu, wu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa.
45004006	Dawuda ti kɔɔ ruu doo nɔngkɔ, ka yuu tìnang zang piti ɓɔɔ Laa ta wu, nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ. Wu ka ruu shoonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Dawuda kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
45004007	“Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. zang ɓɔɔ Laa kɔsɔ vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
45004008	Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa kp'aarɛ̀ danggn vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ”
45004009	Tìnang kɔ Dawuda ràng ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ya? Kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yee kpang jong. Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, labeenang kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ibirayi shing danggn ka bii Laa, a ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ, Laa ta wu, nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ”.
45004010	Vuu keɓe nwang gn vi nɔngkɔ viya? Ka knti ɓɔɔ Ibirayi yee shaa tɔ ɓɛɛ ya? Kɔ bɛɛ yee shaa gn kpang ya? Vuu keɓe nwang nɔngkɔ bɛɛ yee shaa gn kpang.
45004011	Zang yèe Ibirayi shaa ɓi kaa nɛɛ knti. Shaa kɔ zang yee wu ɓee, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi kagn nɛɛ Laa kasɛ wu katɔ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa. Laa ti ta wu nɛɛ, wu zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa t'a wu bɛɛ zang yee wu shaa gn kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Ibirayi kɔ nwang kaa dabang zang piti ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Laa. A Laa ti ta ri tɔ, nɛɛ ri zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, naa zang yee ri shaa ti katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
45004012	Ibirayi ti doo dabang zang ɓɔɔ zang yee ri shaa katɔ kɔ. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang yee ri shaa katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri nwangnɛ, ri shing danggn ka bii Laa naa ɓɔɔ dabang ɓuru Ibirayi nwangnɛ bɛɛ zang yee wu shaa gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
45004013	Laa a Ibirayi nɛɛ zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ nyaa, nɛɛ koo keɓe naa nwang ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ. Laa a nyaa keɓe wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ Ibirayi dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa, a Laa ta wu kati nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
45004014	Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, ri kɔ tà vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa ɓɛɛ, danggn shinnang ɓi kaa waati. A nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa arɛ, shaarɛ ɓi kaa waati.
45004015	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ ta nyaa Laa, Laa dang zang jìng katɔ ɓɛɛ. A nɔng ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kagn kpang, zang tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ zang ta nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dangnɛ tɔ kpang.
45004016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu di yuu ɓi ka danggn ɓɔɔ zang shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa a nyaa keɓe wu ka ruu zɔ̃ng Ibirayi ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri zɔ̃ng Ibirayi ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn naa ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ. Ibirayi ɓi kaa dabang ɓuru nandon.
45004017	Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N shing mɔɔ tɔ, m'ɔɔ nwang dabang zang koolaa dɔli”. Wukɔ daa ɓuru ka tìng Laa ɓɔɔ wu shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ wisi zang paa nɛɛ saa, zang nwang ningkãari, a ti mãarɛ vuu shɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
45004018	Ibirayi shing danggn ka bii Laa ɓi doo ka laa ɓɔɔ vuu bì'i nwàng naa mɔɔ yaa gn naa kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nw'ang dabang zang koolaa, naa ɓɔɔ Laa a wu nyaa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Zɔ̃ng ɓaaɓɛ naa shang dɔli.”
45004019	Ibirayi yaa danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa naa kpang, nɛɛ tɔkɔlɔng ning, naa doo ɓɔɔ s'aa ɓiɓɛ yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng wu daa laa maani ɓɛɛ. Zi tɔ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ wɔ̀ɔng tɔ, a ɓeeso Saratu daa naa jaa yinang takpang.
45004020	Ibirayi yaa danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ kpang, a ti yaa gn naa ka ruu, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ɓɛɛ kpang. Danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa, a wu kaka, a dɔɔ Laa kati.
45004021	Zi ɓi tɔ gbãnggbãng ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ Laa zunung ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa ɓɛɛ katɔ.
45004022	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, “Laa ta wu nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ”.
45004023	Ruu kɔ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zang tà wu nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ” ɓee, zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa ka ruu Ibirayi ka bm kpang.
45004024	Zang bee ka ruu ɓuru jong. Ɓɔɔ Laa naa ta rùu nɛɛ rùu zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ rùu shing danggn ka bii Laa, ɓɔɔ wisi Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
45004025	Laa a Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu vɔ ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓuru. A Laa ti wisi wu paa tɔkn ningkãari nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ kaa tìng Laa.
45005001	Wee ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka tìng Laa, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ruu nwàng kaa nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Laa ka ruu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
45005002	Laa pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ kɔ̀ ruu kagn ɓee, nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu tãa tìnang ka wee ruu shing jìng ka tìng, nɛɛ Laa naa a ruu bannang ɓiɓɛ jong ɓee.
45005003	A ruu ti, tãa tìnang ka jìng dannang ɓuru ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu zi tɔ jìng dannang shing ruu, ruu mã danggn ɓɛɛ.
45005004	Danggn mãnang shingnɛ zang wu nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ. Nwannang tɔ̃ɔ wu shing ruu, ruu yaa gn naa kaa takpang.
45005005	Ruu nɛɛ yaa gn naa kpang, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ruu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shìng ruu zɔ̃ng zang kasɛnang ɓiɓɛ tɔ, ka yeti ɓuru nɛɛ bii Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu a ruu ɓɛɛ.
45005006	Kirisi vɔ ka ruu ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka laa ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ ɓɛɛ, bɛɛ ruu lakɛ naa gn ka bii kpang.
45005007	Zang ɓɔɔ kàs'ɛ wu vɔ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, ka tìng Laa kagn kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ n'aa kasɛ katɔ wu vɔ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ,
45005008	Laa tusu ruu naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ruu ɓuru dɔli ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ruu doo zang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang, Kirisi vɔ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
45005009	Ka ruu zìi ɓiɓɛ, ruu nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka tìng Laa. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa pàl'ɛ ruu ɓa weɓe katɔ, ta ruu ditɔ nɛɛ jìng dannang ɓɔɔ Laa naa dang zang ɓɛɛ.
45005010	Ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ruu shing jìng gn nɛɛ Laa kpang, Laa shingnɛ ruu nw'ang nɛɛ wu ka nyaa zɔɔ ka ruu Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ vɔ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Wee ruu nwang tɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓee, Jaa ɓiɓɛ ta yuu ɓuru katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwàng ɓi ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
45005011	Wu wee kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Laa shingnɛ nɛɛ, ruu tãa tìnang nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ shing ruu tɔ kãntang ruu kaa wusang Laa ɓee.
45005012	Naa ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang a ka koo, nɛɛ bii zang gbete, a vuu shi kpang atɛ vɔrɔ. Kãntang keɓe zang piti ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vɔrɔ nw'ang vuu zang piti tɔ.
45005013	Ɓɔɔ Laa 'at'ɛ nyaa dannang ɓiɓɛ gn kpang, bɛɛ vuu shi kpang kagn koo. A Laa bee vuu ɓɔɔ kaa tɔ̀'ɔ yuu vuu shi kpang, kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ dang nyaa gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
45005014	Vɔrɔ ti ny'ɔ zang doo nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ yuu Adamu, à nɛɛ mani ka yuu Musa. Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang naa ɓɔɔ Adamu palɛ ka ɓɔɔ wu ta nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ri vɔ doo nɛɛ mani. Adamu nwang ɓi naa Kirisi ɓɔɔ naa a nɛɛ knti ɓɛɛ.
45005015	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang waati, ɓi naa vuu shi kpang, kpang. Nizang, zang dɔli ri vɔlɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ Adamu gbete palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a zang waati ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ka bii zang dɔli katɔ.
45005016	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang waati, ɓi n'aabm̀ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang gbete kaɓa palɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu shi kpang gbete, keɓe shingnɛ Laa dàng zang jìng. Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang waati keɓe, shing tɔ, Laa ta ruu tɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ gaagaa ɓɛɛ.
45005017	Vɔrɔ roo kpanti, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ Adamu gbete palɛ. A zang gãsɛ vuu keɓe kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ dɔli, a shing ri waati, ri nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ. Ri nw'ang ningkãari, ri roo kpanti nɛɛ bii zang gbete keɓe, Yeesɔ Kirisi.
45005018	Bɛɛ zang nɛɛ dang zang piti jìng katɔ, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang gbete palɛ ɓɛɛ. A ka ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi gbete palɛ ɓɛɛ, Laa shingnɛ zang piti ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ. Wu ti a ri suru bii.
45005019	Naa ɓɔɔ zang gbete ta nyaa dannang Laa, a shingnɛ zang dɔli ri raa zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ ɓɛɛ. Doo nɔngkɔ, zang gbete dũng nyaa Laa, a naa shingnɛ zang dɔli ri nwàng zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa.
45005020	Laa 'atɛ̀ nyaa dannang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ, vuu shi kpang palɛnang wu shangnɛ. A ka nɔng ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang shang dɔli, Laa palɛ tɔ̃ɔ ka nɔngkɔ gbãnggbãng.
45005021	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang roo kpanti nɛɛ bii vɔrɔ, tɔ̃ɔ Laa ti roo kpanti doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ bii nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu walɛ suru ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
45006001	Rùu kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? R'uu yi tìng ta nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu gisi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu p'alɛ̀ ruu ka yuu zɔɔ yuu zɔɔ ya?
45006002	Kpang, ruu palɛ nɔngkɔ kpang. Ɓɔɔ ruu yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓuru tɔ, ruu palɛ takpang.
45006003	Nɔɔ zi kpang ya? Ka ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ruu batizima, zang ɓakɛ ruu nɛɛ Kirisi, a ruu vɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ wu vɔ ɓɛɛ.
45006004	Ka ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ ruu batizima, nwàng naa ruu vɔ katɔ nɛɛ Kirisi, a zang gbã̀a ruu nɛɛ wu. Tɔɔ, zang naa wisi ruu paa kaa jong naa ɓɔɔ Daa ɓiɓɛ wisi wu paa nɛɛ bannang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang nwannang kaa naa ɓɔɔgn.
45006005	Naa zang ɓakɛ ruu nɛɛ wu ka zɔ̃ng vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, zang ti ɓakɛ ruu nɛɛ wu doo nɔngkɔ, ka paa ɓɔɔ zang wisi wu ɓɛɛ.
45006006	Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓ'aa nwannang ɓɔɔ ɓeleng ruu nwang ka tìng ɓi tɔ ka laa nɛɛ Yeesɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ kasɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang wu shaarɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ ruu nwang kaa tɔ̀'ɔ naa jaafoo vuu shi kpang palɛnang kpang.
45006007	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ vɔ tɔ, wɔ ɓi tɔ, palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi takpang.
45006008	Ruu nɛɛ vɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ, ruu zi tɔ ruu naa nw'ang ningkãari jong nɛɛ wu.
45006009	Ruu zi tɔ, vɔrɔ palɛ Yeesɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi takpang. Yeesɔ vɔrɛ, a zang wisi wu paa tɔkn ningkãari, vɔ ɓi takpang.
45006010	Ka ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔrɛ, vɔ doo gbete kak, ka ruu vuu shi kpang. A kãntang keɓe, nwàng kaa ningkãari ka ruu Laa.
45006011	Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ doo nɔngkɔ, ka yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwàng naa vɔrɔ, nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ nwàng ningkãari ka ruu Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
45006012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang wu ɓaa saara ka bii manɛ ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo kaa tɔ̀'ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ bii kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
45006013	N'ɔɔ ti yaa bii manɛ dang gbete wu ràa vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ a Laa bii manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ zang wisi ri paa nɛɛ saa ri nwàng kaa ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ risi bii manɛ dang gbete katɔ kɔ jong wu nwang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ shoonang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
45006014	N'ɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang, wu roo kpanti ka nwannang manɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ tɔ̀'ɔ jaafoo nyaa dannang Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ manɛ kaa zang ɓɔɔ Laa pàl'ɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
45006015	A nɛɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ, r'uu p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang ta, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ɓi nyaa dannang Laa roo kpanti ka yuu ɓuru kpang, ɓi tɔ̃ɔ Laa rooyi ɓɛɛ ya? Kpang tingkiring.
45006016	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, naa nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang jaafoo ɓiɓɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Nɔɔ manɛ jaafò'o zang gãa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa nɔɔ ɓaa shoo doo ka nyaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nwǎng zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, naa nɔɔ ti ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
45006017	Ruu zãa Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ jaafò'o vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ naa ɓaa shoo ka ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang tusu nɔɔ, a nɔɔ tarɛ nɛɛ yeti manɛ nandon.
45006018	Zang tà nɔɔ nɛɛ naa vuu shi kpang manɛ, a nɔɔ ràa jaafò'o vuu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang.
45006019	N rang nɔɔ yee, n gãsɛ nɔɔ vuu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi diki diki ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bii shɔnzang manɛ lakɛ naa ka bii, ka vuu zinang kpang ɓɛɛ. Bɛɛ nɔɔ a dũndũng, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, yuu manɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete naa jaafoo, kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ 'a yuu manɛ doo nɔngkɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ nwang kaa zang Laa nizang.
45006020	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ nɔɔ doo naa jaafoo vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ, ruu manɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang kpang.
45006021	Nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ ɓu vi ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ p'al'ɛ, ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe yusɛ̃ɛ ɓarɛ tuu nɔɔ kaa tɔ ɓee viya? Vuu kaɓa nwàng nɔɔ vɔrɔ.
45006022	A kãntang keɓe zang ta nɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, naa vuu shi kpang palɛnang, nɔɔ kaa jaafoo Laa. Vuu keɓe shing nɔɔ nɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Wu ti shingnɛ nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
45006023	Zang nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, zang vɔ katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a ruu waati, ɓi suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓ'ak'ɛ bii tɔ, nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
45007001	Manzung, nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀'ɔ kãntang keɓe tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Nyaa kɔ Laa dang ɓee, kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ bɛɛ zang doo ningkãari kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
45007002	Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, soro ɓɔɔ zang gee tɔ, ri basɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ ɓeevɛ kpang, ɓeevɛ nɛɛ doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Ɓeevɛ nɛɛ vɔ tɔ, wɔ tɔ nɛɛ naa nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ ɓakɛ wu nɛɛ ɓeevɛ ɓɛɛ.
45007003	Naa yaa ɓeevɛ, daa gee zang ɓɔɔgn, bɛɛ ɓeevɛ doo ningkãari, zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ dũndũng ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓeevɛ nɛɛ vɔrɛ, zang yaa wu gbalang tɔ, wu daa gee zang ɓɔɔgn. P'alɛ̀ wu vuu dũndũng kpang, nɛɛ gee zang ɓɔɔgn ɓɛɛ.
45007004	Manzung, nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, risi nɔɔ manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ɓakɛ bii tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ manɛ kaa zang Kirisi ɓɔɔ Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu shòng Laa shoonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kati.
45007005	Ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ruu nwàng doo nwannang naa shɔnzang waati ɓɛɛ, bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ kasɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang, sè'e paa kaa gbãnggbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa dannang Laa shing wu ɓɛɛ. Vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ nwang ruu ɓuru vɔrɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
45007006	Kãntang keɓe, Laa ta ruu tɔ nɛɛ naa nyaa dannang ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nwalɛ ɓuru kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang roo kpanti tɔ̀'ɔ yuu ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Kãntang keɓe, ruu pàl'ɛ Laa shoonang kaa tɔ, ka gbalang ɓɔɔgn, ka ɓɔɔ ruu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Wu ka gbalang gbaala, ka ɓɔɔ ruu dũng nyaa dannang Laa, ɓɔɔ zang b'ee nɛɛ naa ɓɛɛ kpang.
45007007	Ruu kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ vuu shi kpang ya? Kpang. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kɔ tùsù m vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓɛɛ. N nɛ̀'ɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ zang shing jìng ka vuu zang kpang, naa Laa nɛɛ dang nyaa nɛɛ, “Zang wu shing jìng ka vuu zang kpang.”, kpang ɓɛɛ.
45007008	Ɓi vuu shi kpang walɛ gbalang nɛɛ bii nyaa dannang Laa, a shing m, n shĩ̀l'i jìng ka vuu zang ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Naa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, nɛɛ kpang, vuu shi kpang nɛɛ zunung vuu ɓɔɔ palɛnang kpang.
45007009	Ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n zi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ gn kpang, bɛɛ n m ningkãari. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ n tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ hn, n kasɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang kaa gbãnggbãng.
45007010	N nwang kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ wu a zang suru, nyɔ m kaa vɔrɔ kɔ jong.
45007011	Vuu shi kpang walɛ gbalang nɛɛ bii nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, a nwaarɛ m, a ti nyɔ m vɔrɔ.
45007012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, shi kpang ɓi kagn ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kpang. Nyaa dannang Laa ɓu kɔɔ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ, ti pàl'ɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ.
45007013	Wee nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ keɓe kɔ nyɔ m vɔrɔ ya? Wu nɔngkɔ kpang. Ɓi vuu shi kpang, tuu vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a nyɔ m vɔrɔ nɛɛ mani, tɔɔ wu tusu bii ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyaa dannang Laa kɔ shingnɛ vuu shi kpang tusu nɛɛ wu kaa shi kpang tingkiring.
45007014	Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓi vuu suru, a n m kaa shɔnzang. N raa m kaa naa jaafoo vuu shi kpang palɛnang.
45007015	N zi vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ m kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ palɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ, n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ jong.
45007016	Naa n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kpang kɔ jong, n zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ.
45007017	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓi nkɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ kpang, ɓi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yeti mɛɛ kɔ shing m.
45007018	N zi tɔ ka bii shɔnzang mɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kagn kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa n kasɛ doo katɔ ka yeti mɛɛ, n p'al'ɛ tɔ̃ɔ, a n zunung palɛnang kaa takpang ɓɛɛ.
45007019	N p'alɛ̀ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ palɛnang kpang. N palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ palɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ jong.
45007020	Naa n p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ palɛnang kpang, zang zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ ɓi nkɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ keɓe nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ kpang. Ɓi vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yeti mɛɛ kɔ jong, palɛ.
45007021	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ n zi ka bii mɛɛ keɓe. Naa n kasɛ n tɔɔ n palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, n palɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang kɔ gbete.
45007022	Ka yeti mɛɛ, n tãa tìnang nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ katɔ.
45007023	A n ti zirɛ, nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ kagn yeti mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ waa zɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Nwang m kaa naa nyaa dannang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka bii mɛɛ, mã m ka sãa.
45007024	N m zang ɓɔɔ tãa tìnang kpang ɓɛɛ. Wi ta m jong nɛɛ naa bii mɛɛ kɔ raa m vɔrɔ ɓee wiya?
45007025	N zãa Laa tɔ, ta m tɔ nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n pàl'ɛ nyaa dannang Laa shoonang nɛɛ yeti mɛɛ, n pàl'ɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang dangnɛ shoonang ɓi kaa nɛɛ bii shɔnzang mɛɛ.
45008001	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang tɔ gbete nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi Laa dɔng ri ruu ɓarɛ takpang.
45008002	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa dannang Suru Laa ɓɔɔ a ruu suru bii nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ta m tɔ nɛɛ naa nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ.
45008003	Vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa zunung palɛnang kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bii shɔnzang lakɛ naa bii kpang, Laa palɛ tɔ. Laa ningsi vuu shi kpang ka bii shɔnzang, ka ɓɔɔ wu shong nyaa nɛɛ Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ arɛ, tuu bii naa bii shɔnzang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
45008004	Laa p'al'ɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ tɔɔ, ruu nwang naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, wu naa ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang kasɛ kpang. Ruu palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zang wu palɛ, ruu palɛ kaa nyaa kiiri.
45008005	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwàng ɓarɛ ka naa ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang ɓarɛ kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri nwang ɓɛɛ, ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwàng naa ɓɔɔ Suru kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri nwangnɛ, ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Suru kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
45008006	Naa zang rɛ̃rɛ shi kpang, naa ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nwǎng zang ɓi vɔrɔ. Naa zang rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kasɛ, Laa shingnɛ zang walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, a yeti zang ti valɛ katɔ.
45008007	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang shing rɛ̃rɛnang zang, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ bii zang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, zang risi yuu zang kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, dñ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Nizang, zunung dũnnang ɓi kpang tingkiring.
45008008	Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ, ri shingnɛ Laa wu tã̀a tìnang kpang.
45008009	Nɔɔ nwàng manɛ tɔ̀'ɔ naa ɓɔɔ bii manɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, naa Suru Laa nɛɛ nwang kagn nizang ka yeti manɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ Suru Kirisi nɛɛ kagn ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang, ɓi zang Kirisi kpang.
45008010	Naa Kirisi nwàng kagn yeti manɛ, naa bii manɛ vɔ doo katɔ, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ, Suru Laa a nɔɔ suru bii ditɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ta nɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
45008011	Laa ɓɔɔ wisi Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ saa, suru ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nwàng ka yeti manɛ, Laa keɓe ɓɔɔ wisi Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ saa, a nɔɔ suru bii ditɔ. A nɔɔ suru bii nɛɛ bii Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ nwang ka yeti manɛ ɓɛɛ.
45008012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ manzung, zang mã ruu nyaa kagn nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang ɓuru kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
45008013	Naa ruu nwang naa ɓɔɔ bii ɓuru kasɛ, ruu vɔ katɔ. A naa Suru Laa yi ruu naa kagn, ruu yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ruu nw'ang ditɔ ningkãari.
45008014	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa tusu ri, rikɔ wujɛ Laa.
45008015	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa a nɔɔ Suru ɓɔɔ risi nɔɔ naa jaafoo waati kpang, shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ tɔkn kpang ɓɛɛ. Suru Laa keɓe shing nɔɔ n'ɔɔ nwang manɛ wujɛ Laa kɔ jong. Wukɔ ti yi nɔɔ naa ka bii, nɔɔ ɓaa Laa kaa nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Daa ɓuru.”
45008016	Suru Laa ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ suru bii ɓuru ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ruu wujɛ Laa.
45008017	Wee ruu wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓee, ruu naa wàl'ɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa shìng zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ruu ti naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shìng Kirisi ditɔ nɛɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nɛɛ dàng jìng tɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ Kirisi dang ɓɛɛ, Laa ti naa a ruu bannang jong naa ɓɔɔ wu a Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
45008018	N zi tɔ, jìng kɔ ruu dang kãntang ɓee, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ nɛɛ bannang ɓɔɔ Laa naa a ruu ɓɛɛ kpang.
45008019	Nizang, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa m'ãarɛ̀ ɓɛɛ nandon, ri gã diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa nwàngs'ɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ bii ɓɛɛ.
45008020	Kãntang keɓe, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ, zi naa ɓɔɔ vuu nwang kpang ɓɛɛ. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓarɛ nɔngkɔ kpang. Ɓi Laa kɔ shing ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɔngkɔ.
45008021	Nɛɛ wu ta yuu vuu kɔ wu mãarɛ ɓee ditɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri pũng kaa takpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu ti a ri bannang ɓɔɔ wu alɛ̀ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
45008022	Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ nandon ri tãa kɔnang, ri ti ju doo kana, mɔɔ kɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ jaa kɔng wu ɓɛɛ.
45008023	Wu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ kɔ tãa kɔnang gbete kpang. Rùu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ Laa gaayu a ruu nwang ka yeti ɓuru ɓee, ruu ju doo nɔngkɔ ka yeti ɓuru, ka wee ruu gã diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa kɔ̀'ɔyi nɛɛ ruu kaa wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, bii ɓuru wu wɔ kaa nandon.
45008024	Zang tà yuu ɓuru ka ruu gn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ɓɛɛ kɔ. A ruu nɛɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ, ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ gn shinnang kpang. Zang shing gn ɓi jong ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
45008025	Naa ruu shing gn ka vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi gn kpang, ruu mã danggn, ruu gã vuu bì'i.
45008026	Suru Laa, a doo nɔngkɔ, wu yi ruu naa ka bii, wee ruu lakɛ naa ka bii kpang ɓee. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zunung ɓɔɔ ruu gaa Laa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Suru Laa kɔ bàk'ɛ ruu Laa nɛɛ junang ɓɔɔ nyaa zunung kɔɔnang kpang ɓɛɛ.
45008027	A Laa ɓɔɔ zi yeti shɔnzang tɔ nandon, zi vuu ɓɔɔ Suru rɛ̃rɛ tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru bakɛ Laa ka ruu zang Laa, ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ yeti Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
45008028	Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, ka yeti vuu piti, Laa palɛ shoonang ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, vuu keɓe wu nwàng ri tɔ̃ɔ kati. Rikɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa ri nyaa nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu pàl'ɛ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
45008029	Zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri ɓarɛ tɔ, kusu ri ɓarɛ dang gbete nɛɛ ri nwang naa Jaa ɓiɓɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Jaa ɓiɓɛ kɔ wu nwang kaa jamari rɛɛ ɓeezung ɓɔɔ ri dɔli ɓɛɛ.
45008030	A Laa ta rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu ɓàa ri dang gbete nyaa. Zang kɔ wu ɓaa ri nyaa ɓee, risi ri nɛɛ ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ. A a zang kɔ wu risi ri nɛɛ ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓee, bannang kati.
45008031	Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ vi tɔkn viya? Laa nɛɛ ɓàng nɛɛ ruu ɓɛɛ, wi shii bàng nɛɛ ruu, wu ɓa ruu kaka wiya?
45008032	Laa zãa Jaa ɓiɓɛ jìng dannang kpang, a zang wu, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓuru nandon. Naa a ruu vuu piti ɓi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ waati nɛɛ wu ning kpang ya?
45008033	Ɓu wi kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ wiya? Laa kɔ kɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang kpang.
45008034	Ɓu wi d`'ɔng ri ruu wiya? Ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ vɔrɛ, Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa. Nwang ka nakn Laa. Wukɔ ti bàk'ɛ Laa ka ruu ɓuru.
45008035	Ɓu wi zunung ɓɔɔ wu basɛ ruu nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Kirisi kàsɛ̀ ruu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ wiya? Vuu gãsɛnang ɓɔɔ a ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ ya? Vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa ruu dɔli ɓɛɛ ya? Naa doo jìng dannang yupaa ya? Naa nyɔkɔ nwangnɛ ya? Naa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu hãa ka bii kpang ya? Naa zang shìng ruu doo baabi ya? Naa zang nyɔkɔ ruu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ ya?
45008036	Zang bee nɔngkɔ ka yeti Labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Zang kɔɔ ruu diki diki nɛɛ zang nyɔ ruu vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ kɔ. Zang palɛ ruu naa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ zang daa yee ri kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ”.
45008037	Wu nɔngkɔ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ basɛ ruu nɛɛ Yeesɔ kpang. Ka vuu kɔ palɛ ruu ɓee nandon zang ɓɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu ɓuru katɔ keɓe, yiki ruu naa kagn, ruu ɓa vuu keɓe yuu gbãnggbãng.
45008038	N zi m tɔ nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ basɛ ruu kagn nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ruu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa ruu vɔ doo katɔ, naa ruu doo ningkãari, naa doo zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ bang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, naa doo vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kãntang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa a ka tìng ɓɛɛ.
45008039	Naa doo vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka tipi dii. Vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng vuu ɓɔɔ Laa m'ãarɛ̀ ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu basɛ ruu, nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ruu nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ kpang.
45009001	Vuu kɔ n kɔ̀'ɔ ɓee, nizang kɔ nwani. N suu sè'e kpang, kaa ruu ɓɔɔ, n m zang Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Rɛ̃rɛnang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ Suru Laa roo kpanti kagn, ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ nizang, n suu sè'e kpang.
45009002	Nizang, yeti mɛɛ lasɛ dɔli, vuu ɓɔɔ ti kɔng m ka yeti ka ruu rɛɛ manzung zang Isirela di nyaa kpang.
45009003	Naa nɛ̀'ɛ yi ri naa ka bii katɔ, n nɛ̀'ɛ gàa Laa wu kù m nyaa. 'N nwàng tɔ̀'ɔ zang Kirisi kpang, ka ruu rɛɛ manzung ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng ɓuru gbete ɓɛɛ.
45009004	Rikɔ zang Isirela, Laa shing ri, ri ràa wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, a tusu ri bannang ɓiɓɛ. Laa mã nyaa nɛɛ ri, a ri nyaa ɓɔɔ wu dangnɛ ɓɛɛ. Rikɔ zunung Laa bannang ka gbalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. A Laa ti a rikɔ nyaa.
45009005	Ri ɓarɛ zɔ̃ng rɛɛ dabang ɓɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Kirisi ka bii shɔnzang ɓiɓɛ, nwangnɛ doo laa ɓarɛ kɔ. Zang wu dɔɔ Laa ta dondong, ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti ka yuu vuu piti ɓɛɛ. Nɔngkɔ.
45009006	N tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, Laa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a zang nyaa kagn kpàng, kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu zang Isirela nandon kɔ, zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri nɛɛ ri zang ɓiɓɛ kɔ kpang.
45009007	Zɔ̃ng Ibirayi ɓi ti wujɛ Laa kɔ nandon kpang. Laa kɔɔ Ibirayi nɛɛ, “Zang naa gã zɔ̃ng Ishaaku kɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ ri zɔ̃ng ɓaaɓɛ kɔ”.
45009008	Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, wu wujɛ Ibirayi nandon wujɛ Laa kpang. Ɓi wujɛ ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa, a zang yì Ibirayi ri, rikɔ zɔ̃ng Ibirayi.
45009009	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi ka ɓɔɔ wu a Ibirayi nyaa keɓe tɔɔ, “Ka laa ɓɔɔ n shingnɛ, n gbãayu ditɔ, Saratu naa yi jaa zang varɛ”.
45009010	A wu ti weɓe kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Ka ɓɔɔ Rebeka t'uu jaa, yì dabang ɓuru Ishaaku wujɛ ziti.
45009011	Ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang yi ri gn kpang, ri ti p'al'ɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ gn nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang. Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zɔ̃nnang ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ng jaa gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ wu nwang vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔɔ nà'a ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ bang kɔ naa pàl'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ wujaa shoonang.” Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa zɔ̃ng zang ɓi ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa zang ɓɛɛ, wu ka ruu, vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
45009013	Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “N kasɛ m Yakubu n bɛ̃ɛ Isuwa katɔ”.
45009014	Rùu kɔ̀'ɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Nɛɛ Laa palɛ vuu gn dang gbete ya? Nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring.
45009015	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔɔ Musa tɔɔ, “Gn kɔng m ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ gn ɓarɛ kɔng m katɔ ɓɛɛ. N p'alɛ̀ tɔ̃ɔ m ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ n pàl'ɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ”.
45009016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang kasɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ kɔ shingnɛ, Laa wu z'ɔ̃ng wu kpang, ɓi gn zang ɓɔɔ kɔng wu ɓɛɛ, kɔ shingnɛ.
45009017	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔɔ Firawuna ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “N yi mɔɔ kpanti, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, n tusu naa vuu palɛnang mɛɛ ka vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ. 'N ti shingnɛ zang koo nandon ri tãa ruu mɛɛ kati”.
45009018	Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, gn kɔng Laa ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ gn ɓarɛ kɔng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu ti shing zang ɓɔɔ, ri t'aar'ɛ yuu.
45009019	Zang gbete ka teteng manɛ hɛ̃ɛ m katɔ nɛɛ, “Laa nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓi nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ, kɔ̀'ɔ ka ruu vi nɛɛ, ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ viya? Wi zunung ɓɔɔ wu bɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ palɛnang wiya”?
45009020	Masang, mɔkɔ wi mɔɔ kasɛ Laa nyaa wiya? Ɓari hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ mãa wu katɔ nɛɛ, “Ka ruu vi mɔɔ mãa m nɔngkɔ viya ya?”
45009021	Zang ɓɔɔ mãarɛ ɓari palɛ tapɔng katɔ naa ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka tapɔng gbete keɓe, mãa ɓari katɔ nɛɛ mani ziti. Ɓɔɔ gbete wu shing ka ruu vuu shaanang nɔng mung nwannang. Ɓɔɔ gbete wu nwaarɛ vuu shaanang diki waati kagn.
45009022	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa p'alɛ̀ nwang doo nɔngkɔ. Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu tusu gnvɔ ɓiɓɛ wu ti nwangsɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mã danggn gbãnggbãng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ nɛɛ wu jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu nɛɛ gnvɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri daa naa ɓɔɔ wu ningsi ri kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
45009023	Palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ wu tusu bannang ɓiɓɛ. Bannang ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ ruu, ɓɔɔ gn ɓuru kɔng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ wu kpàlɛ̀ ri bii doo ka tìng nɛɛ ri ta bannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
45009024	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi rukɔ zang ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu ɓɛɛ. Zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu ka teteng zang Yahudawa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, zɔ̃ngkɔ jong ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ.
45009025	Naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ka yeti Labeenang ɓɔɔ Yushaawu bee nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri zang mɛɛ kpang. N ɓaa ri kaa nɛɛ ‘Zang mɛɛ’ Zang tipi ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n kasɛ ri kpang, n ɓaa ri kaa nɛɛ ‘Zang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ri dɔli ɓɛɛ’.
45009026	Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Nɔɔ wu zang mɛɛ kpang’ ɓɛɛ, Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari ti naa ɓàa ri doo ka nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ ri wujɛ ɓiɓɛ”.
45009027	Ishaya kɔɔ ruu ka yuu zang Isirela tɔɔ, “Naa zang Isirela ri shang doo naa seseele ɓɔɔ ka nyaa waapo, zang ɓɔɔ zang naa ta yuu ɓarɛ ri dɔli kpang.”
45009028	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu ditɔ nandon, pìiri jìng kpang ɓɛɛ.
45009029	Naa ɓɔɔ Ishaya kɔɔ ka tìng ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Naa Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti bannang katɔ nɛ̀'ɛ yàa ruu zɔ̃ng ɓuru kagn kpang, ruu nɛɛ raa tɔ naa gari Sɔɔdɔm, ruu nɛɛ nwang kaa naa gari Gomora”.
45009030	Ruu kɔ̀'ɔ ɓu nɛɛ viya? Ruu kɔɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri tɔɔ ri risi yuu ɓarɛ, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa kpang. A Laa risi ri tɔ, ri nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
45009031	A zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ, ri tɔɔ ri kãa ɓarɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓɔɔ shing ri, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ, a ri wàlɛ̀ kaa takpang.
45009032	Ri walɛ kpang ka ruu viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing gn ɓarɛ ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ri p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ, wu ka danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Laa kpang. Ri kpaa doo ka tari ɓɔɔ shing zang zang kpaa doo ɓɛɛ.
45009033	Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, ǹ shing tari ka Sihiyona, ɓɔɔ zang kpaa doo kagn ɓɛɛ. Tari bang ɓɔɔ sh'ing zang, zang watɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu kpang”.
45010001	Rɛɛ manzung, n kasɛ ka yeti mɛɛ gbãnggbãng, a n ti gaa Laa ka yuu zang mɛɛ zang Yahudawa, nɛɛ Laa wu ta yuu ɓarɛ jong.
45010002	N kɔɔ ruu katɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ, ri kasɛ katɔ gbãnggbãng nɛɛ ri pàl'ɛ Laa shoonang. A ri zi gbalang ɓɔɔ ri pàl'ɛ Laa shoonang kaa tɔ̀'ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang.
45010003	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi gbalang ɓɔɔ risi zang, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. A ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ kaa nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ. Ri tà gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa shìng zang, nɛɛ zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ mani ka tìng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
45010004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kirisi shing tɔ naa vuu palɛnang nyaa dannang Laa di nyaa tɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Laa, Laa risi wu kaa tɔ wu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ.
45010005	Musa b'ee naa ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ shingnɛ zang nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa tɔ̀ɔ, “Naa mɔɔ tɔɔ mɔɔ nwang ningkãari, palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ”.
45010006	A ka yuu naa ɓɔɔ Laa risi zang ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ, Musa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “M'ɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang nɛɛ, Ɓu wi vangnɛ daa ka lapa wiya?” (Wu daa atɛ Kirisi ka tipi)
45010007	Mɔɔ ti hɛ̃ɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang nɛɛ, ɓu wi daa ka koo ɓɔɔ ka tipi dii wiya? (wu daa nwangsɛ Kirisi nɛɛ saa).
45010008	Vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ keɓe, “Ruu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓi nɛɛ mɔɔ naabm, ka yeti nyaa ɓaaɓɛ, ti kagn ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ.” Ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn ɓɛɛ kɔ.
45010009	Naa mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ kɔ Kpanti” a mɔɔ ti shing danggn nɛɛ Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa. Laa ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ katɔ.
45010010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ shing danggn nɛɛ yeti, tɔ̀ɔ Laa wu risi zang, zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang nɛɛ kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang, Laa wu ti, ta yuu zang kati.
45010011	Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔ̀ɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu kpang”.
45010012	Ruu keɓe muku zang piti, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gbalang ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu zang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, ɓi gbete ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓi wukɔ Kpanti zang piti, shing zang piti ɓɔɔ ri gaa wu, ri walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ dɔli.
45010013	Naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gàa Laa nɛɛ nung Laa, Laa ta yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ”.
45010014	A zang nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang, zang palɛ biya zang gaa wu, wu ta yuu zang viya? A zang shing danggn biya ka bii zang ɓɔɔ zang tãa ruu ɓiɓɛ gngn kpang viya? Zang nɛɛ kɔɔ katɔ kpang, zang palɛ biya zang tãa ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang shing danggn kati viya?
45010015	A zang ɓɔɔ yuu paa biya wu daa kɔɔ zang ruu Laa, zang nɛɛ shong wu katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ viya? Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri à Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kɔɔnang, doo ɓarɛ shili dɔli”.
45010016	A kaa tɔ̀'ɔ zang piti ri dñ̀ng vuu ɓɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Ishaya kɔɔ ka yeti Labeenang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Kpanti, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ kpang”.
45010017	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang nɛɛ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ tɔ, zang shing danggn kati. Zang tã̀'a ruu keɓe, ka ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ruu Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
45010018	N hɛ̃ɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, Ri tã̀a Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kpang nizang ya? Ri tã̀a katɔ. Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Ri kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka dalɛ koo nandon. Ruu ɓarɛ daa ka dìiri ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
45010019	'N ti hɛ̃ɛ tɔkn ɓɛɛ, zang Isirela ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ bì'i kɔɔ kpang nizang ya? Musa kɔ kasɛ nyaa ruu keɓe shɔɔnang tɔɔ, “N shing nɔɔ zang Isirela nɔɔ kaa sũnyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri daa naa kpang ɓɛɛ. N shing nɔɔ, gnvɔ wu shàa nɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ”.
45010020	Ishaya kaa vɔrɔ kpang, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri kãa m kpang rikɔ ìi m kaa jong. N ti nw'ang nyaa ka zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ nɔng mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ”.
45010021	Ɓɔɔ wu a ka yuu zang Isirela, Ishaya kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N dĩ̀i zang ɓɔɔ ri taarɛ yuu dɔli, zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, naa, laa hãa nyaa nɛɛ mani”.
45011001	N hɛ̃ɛyi ɓɛɛ, Laa bɛ̃ɛ zang ɓiɓɛ tɔ ya? Kpang. N nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ, n zang Isirela, zɔ̃ng Ibirayi. N m nɛɛ doo laa Biliyaminu.
45011002	Laa bɛ̃ɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu z'ɔ̃ng ri bɛɛ zang gaayu koo mãanang gn kpang, kpàng. Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Iliya gaa Laa ka yuu zang Isirela kpang ya? Iliya kɔɔyi tɔɔ,
45011003	“Kpanti Laa, zang ri nyɔkɔ zang nyaa shoonang ɓaaɓɛ tɔ nandon. Zang ri ti jili nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ vuu kagn ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ɓi kaa nkɔ zang nyaa shoonang ɓaaɓɛ gbete ɓɔɔ n yaa ɓɛɛ. Zang ri ti kãa m, nɛɛ ri nyɔ m vɔrɔ”.
45011004	Laa kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ viya? Laa tɔɔ, “N shɛ̃̀ɛrɛ̀ yuu mɛɛ zang doo kagn labang manziti ɓɔɔ ri bang vaka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Baal gn kpang ɓɛɛ”.
45011005	Kãntang keɓe doo nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ ri katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn ɓarɛ kɔng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri yaa doogn tɔkɔlɔng.
45011006	Zɔ̃ngkɔ ri ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn ɓarɛ kɔng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ, wu ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa Laa nɛɛ zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ka ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, gn zang nɛɛ kɔng Laa ɓi katɔ nizang kpang.
45011007	Ruu keɓe, kɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Zang Isirela ri ìi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kãa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ ri kɔ ri ìiyi. Zang nimbang ri huuru shoo ɓarɛ ka tɔ, ri tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa ɓayi ɓarɛ takpang.
45011008	Naa ɓɔɔ Labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Vuu ɓɔɔ yirɛ, a nɔng ka lɛɛkɔ, Laa shing tɔ yeti ɓarɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Laa a ri jìng ɓɔɔ zi nɔng kpang, nɛɛ shoo ɓɔɔ tãa nɔng kpang ɓɛɛ”.
45011009	A Dawuda kɔɔyi tɔ, “Vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ri shaayi wu nwang ri naa saka ɓɔɔ zang langnɛ nɛɛ wu yi ri ɓɛɛ. Ri watɛ ta, zang wu dang ri jìng. Jìng ɓarɛ wu z'uur'u, tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi nɔng kaa takpang. Jìng ɓɔɔ ri dangnɛ, wu shing ri, ri lang gũntang dondong”.
45011011	'N hɛ̃ɛ kati ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri kpaa doo, ri wàtɛ̀ gbinggbing ya? Nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, Laa ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu shing zang Yahudawa, ri kaa sũnyaa kaa nɛɛ ri.
45011012	Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri palɛ kɔ shingnɛ Laa a zang koo vuu tɔ̃ɔ dɔli. A ka ruu gbalang ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ning ɓɛɛ, Laa shing zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ri tãa tìnang dɔli. Laa nɛɛ ta yuu zang Yahudawa tɔ jong nandon, tìnang naa shang kaa dɔli kɔ jong kpang ya?
45011013	N rang yee kaa nɛɛ nɔkɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa shong m nɛɛ n p'al'ɛ shoonang ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n dɔ̀'ɔ bii ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ wu a m nɛɛ n palɛ ɓɛɛ.
45011014	Naa n sh'ing zang zɔ̃̌ng mɛɛ katɔ, ri kaa sũnyaa, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ.
45011015	Ka ɓɔɔ Laa bɛ̃ɛ ri, Laa raa zang koo ri yi wusang nɛɛ wu. A Laa nɛɛ ta ri tɔ tɔkn ɓɛɛ, naa nwang naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, ri walɛ suru bii tɔ kpang ya?
45011016	Naa borodi ɓɔɔ zang gaayu zang sharɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ka jìng Laa, borodi ɓɔɔ nimbang keɓe, ɓi kaa doo tɔ̃ɔ kɔ. Naa zang a Laa dìiri laa nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, rɛɛ nasãng laa ɓi doo ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
45011017	Zang dɔlɔ nasãng laa inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ, a zang atɛ nasãng laa inabi ɓɔɔ ta nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka waala zang naa tiisi ka nɔng ɓarɛ. A nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang naa laa inabi ɓɔɔ ta ka waala ɓɛɛ, kãntang keɓe nɔɔ wàl'ɛ manɛ kaa vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii laa inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
45011018	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ risi nasãng ɓɔɔ zang dɔlɔ ri katɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, kpang. N'ɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ kpang, nɔɔ manɛ nasãng waati. Wu nɔkɔ yiti dìiri kpang, ɓi dìiri laa kɔ yiti nɔɔ.
45011019	Nɔɔ kɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ, “Zang dɔlɔ nasãng nɛɛ tɔɔ zang yaa m nɔng n tèng nɔng ɓarɛ”.
45011020	Nɔngkɔ nizang. Zang dɔlɔ ri, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn kpang ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ tèng nɔng ɓarɛ ɓi kaa ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tèng nɔng ɓarɛ tɔ kpang, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kɔ jong.
45011021	Laa nɛɛ yaa nasãng laa inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ kɔ̀'ɔ ɓu nɛɛ naa yaa nɔɔ katɔ ya?
45011022	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu nɛɛ gnvɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang ɓɛɛ. Jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ruu nɛɛ gnvɔ ning, a pàl'ɛ ɓi kaa nɔkɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ yaa tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa nɔngkɔ kpang, zang dɔlɔ nɔɔ ditɔ jong.
45011023	Zang Yahudawa ri nɛɛ shing danggn tɔ tɔkn zang sɔɔrɔ ri tɔkn ka nɔng ɓarɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Laa zunung ɓɔɔ wu sɔɔrɔ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
45011024	Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, nɔɔ nwàng manɛ naa nasãng laa inabi ɓɔɔ ta ka waala, zang tiisi nɔɔ ka bii laa inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe zang palɛ gngn kpang. Zang Yahudawa ri nwàng naa nasãng laa inabi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa Laa tɔɔ, wu tiisi nasãng kɔ zang dɔlɔ ɓee ka laa ɓɔɔ zang dɔlɔ ri kagn, kpãa wu kpang tingkiring.
45011025	Rɛɛ manzung, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yahudawa kpang, n kasɛ nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ dìiri vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ zang Isirela ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ri taarɛ yuu dɔli. Ri nw'ang nɔngkɔ sasak Laa wu ta yuu manɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yahudawa kpang nandon.
45011026	Naa ɓɔɔ zang naa ta yuu zang Isirela nandon keɓe. Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ t'a yuu zang naa nwang nyaa nɛɛ gari Sihiyona. Tɔɔ wu shingnɛ zɔ̃ng Yakubu ri yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang kati.
45011027	Wee vuu ɓɔɔ n a nyaa nɛɛ n palɛ nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ kɔ, ka ɓɔɔ n naa yà'a ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ”.
45011028	Zang Yahudawa ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ Laa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa katɔ ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi Laa kpang nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa tãanang kati. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃ng ri ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri doo zang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu rɛɛ dabang dabang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
45011029	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa nɛɛ z'ɔ̃ng zang tɔ, bɛ̃ɛ ri ɓi takpang, nɛɛ ti a zang vuu tɔ, tà ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ tɔkn kpang.
45011030	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ ka tìng nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa kpang, kãntang keɓe gn manɛ kɔng Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Yahudawa ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
45011031	Zang Yahudawa doo nɔngkɔ, kãntang keɓe, ri ɓaa shoo ɓarɛ tɔ̀'ɔ ka nyaa Laa kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, gn ɓarɛ wu kɔng Laa kaa jong, naa ɓɔɔ k'ɔng wu ka yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
45011032	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa risi zang piti naa zang ɓɔɔ wu mã ri ka sãa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tɔɔ, gn ɓarɛ wu kɔng wu kati.
45011033	Laa pàl'ɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ dɔli, ti zũng dɔli, a zi vuu piti. Zang ɓɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa shii ka yuu vuu kpang, ruu ti zi gbalang ɓiɓɛ kpang.
45011034	Naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ zi rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa rɛ̃rɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ wu ruu kagn kpang. Wi 'a wu vuu tɔ gn, tɔ̀ɔ, wu sɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang kaɓa kati wiya?”
45011036	Vuu piti a nɛɛ bii Laa. Mãa vuu piti ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ, a vuu piti ti gbãayu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng. R'uu dɔɔ nɔɔ Laa dondong. Nɔngkɔ.
45012001	Rɛɛ manzung, ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang Laa, ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ruu dɔli ɓɛɛ, n gaa nɔɔ katɔ gbãnggbãng. Nɔɔ a Laa yuu manɛ, naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ wu ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ a wu yuu manɛ tɔ naa vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ wu ɓɛɛ, a nɔɔ kaa doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ shing yuu manɛ kaa gbãnggbãng nɔɔ pàl'ɛ wu shoonang ɓɔɔ shing wu, wu tãa tìnang manɛ ɓɛɛ. Wee gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa kàsɛ̀ nɛɛ nɔɔ b'ang wu ɓɛɛ kɔ.
45012002	N'ɔɔ yi tìng nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang koo keɓe kasɛ palɛnang ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ yaa Laa wu kɔ̃sɔ nɔɔ yeti manɛ, wu a nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ shɔɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kati. Vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a ti shing wu tãa tìnang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
45012003	A ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ m ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ nandon. Zang ɓu wu rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ wu ɓa zang piti katɔ kpang. Wu rɛ̃rɛ teetee kɔ jong, wu gãsɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
45012004	Bii ɓi gbete, a takɛ vuu kagn kaa zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Vuu ɓu palɛ shoonang ɓiɓɛ n'aabm̀.
45012005	Ruu doo nɔngkɔ. Ruu dɔli, a ruu nwang kaa naa bii gbete kɔ nwani, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓakɛ bii gbete nɛɛ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓu yi zɔɔ naa ka bii.
45012006	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓu wu palɛ shoonang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ka gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ɓɛɛ. Naa Laa a ruu naa nɛɛ ruu kɔɔ zang ruu ɓiɓɛ, ruu kɔɔyi ka doo danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ɓɛɛ.
45012007	Nɛɛ tɔɔ, ruu palɛ zɔɔ shoonang, ruu palɛ shoonang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tusu zang vuu, ka vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ.
45012008	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ mã zang danggn, ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu mã zang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu basɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ, wu bàsɛ̀ nɛɛ yeti gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ nɛɛ zang bang, wu palɛ shoonang nɛɛ kaka ɓiɓɛ ning. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, wu mã nyaa tìng katɔ kpang.
45012009	M'ɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang nɛɛ sè'e kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shi kpang, bɛ̃ɛ katɔ, m'ɔɔ yiti ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbãnggbãng ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ.
45012010	Nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ gbãnggbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa gbete ka gbalang Kirisi ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ zarɛ bii ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a zɔɔ bannang kpang.
45012011	Nɔɔ p'al'ɛ shoonang nɛɛ kaka, nɔɔ si rang kpang. Nɔɔ pàl'ɛ Laa shoonang nɛɛ yeti gbete.
45012012	Gn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka vuu ɓɔɔ a ɓɛɛ, wu shing nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ tãa tìnang. Zang nɛɛ dang nɔɔ jìng, nɔɔ mã danggn. Nɔɔ gaa Laa diki diki.
45012013	Basɛ vuu naa ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ta zang zanti katɔ ka yeti gãa ɓaaɓɛ.
45012014	Gàa Laa, wu palɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dang nɔɔ jìng tɔ̃ɔ. Gàa wu, wu palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ gàa wu, wu ku ri nyaa ka bii kpang.
45012015	Nɔɔ tãa tìnang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa tìnang, zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ kaa nyavɔ nɔɔ ka nɛɛ ri.
45012016	Nɔɔ gang jìng ka zang ɓɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gang jìng ka yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ ɓ'ak'ɛ yuu manɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang bang bang kpang. Nɔɔ rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ zũng manɛ katɔ kpang.
45012017	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ shi kpang, nɔɔ wàa pãng doo nɛɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ kpang. Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn n'ɔɔ p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang piti ri zirɛ nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
45012018	Palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zunung katɔ ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ zang piti.
45012019	Manzung, nɔɔ wàa pãng kpang, nɔɔ yàa Laa kɔ jong, wu wàa nɔɔ pãng. Laa kɔɔ ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ tɔɔ, “Nkɔ waa pãng, n shing ri, ri dang jìng jong”.
45012020	Labeenang Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nyɔkɔ nɛɛ nyɔ zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang, a wu ɓaa vuu shaanang kɔ jong. Sutu nɛɛ mãa wu, a wu mii wu ɓooyi. Mɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ tɔ nɔngkɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu dɔli, kɔng wu naa ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃̀ɛ wu sheleng waa ka yuu ɓɛɛ”.
45012021	Nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang wu ɓa kaka manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ ɓa kaka vuu shi kpang katɔ kɔ jong nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang.
45013001	Zang ɓu wu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang bang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi Laa kɔ gbete a zang naa bannang nwannang ɓɛɛ. A zang kɔ ri nw'ang zang bang ɓee, ɓi Laa shingnɛ ri nwàngnɛ.
45013002	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shii bàng nɛɛ zang bang, bɛ̃ɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ nɔngkɔ, shingnɛ, zang wu dɔng wu ruu.
45013003	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ zang bang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang kɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ. Mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ zang bang kpang ya? Palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, zang bang dɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ ditɔ.
45013004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bang ɓi jaafoo Laa ɓɛɛ. P'alɛ̀ shoonang, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu yi mɔɔ naa kaa bii. Mɔɔ nɛɛ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang, mɔɔ ka vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang a wu bannang ka dalɛ waati kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓi zang shoonang Laa, jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ka nung ɓɔɔ Laa nɛ̀'ɛ jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɛɛ. Wu dàng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang jìng.
45013005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓaa shoo ka nyaa rɛɛ zang bang. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ, Laa dang mɔɔ jìng ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ zi tɔ ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ, mɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ p'alɛ̀ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
45013006	Wee doo vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ shu saka tipi ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bang ri ɓarɛ zang shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri a yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ shoonang keɓe ɓɛɛ.
45013007	Vuu ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ dũng nɔɔ, nɔɔ shu ri ta. Nɔɔ shù zang ɓɔɔ ta saka tipi, saka tipi. Nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ ri ta saka ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ malɛ ɓɛɛ, saka ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ daa naa sennang katɔ, nɔɔ seng wu. Nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ daa naa bannang katɔ bannang.
45013008	Zang ɓɔɔ wu dũng nɔɔ nyaa k'ɔp'ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ wu dũng nɔɔ nyaa k'ɔp'ɔ ruu zang kasɛnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu shɔnzang katɔ, d'ũng vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ.
45013009	Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ palɛ dũndũng kpang, mɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang, mɔɔ ɓɔ̀ɔ shɔngɓɔ kpang, mɔɔ shing jìng ka vuu zang kpang” nɛɛ ɓɔɔ yaa ɓɛɛ piti, ri kɔɔ ɓi dɔɔ vuu gbete kɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kasɛ ruu shɔnzang naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ”.
45013010	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu shɔnzang katɔ, pàlɛ̀ wu vuu shi kpang, kpàng. Naa mɔɔ kasɛ ruu shɔnzang, mɔɔ dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ tɔ nandon.
45013011	Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi diki keɓe tɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hìngs'i jìng nɛɛ hingro a tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu ɓuru kagn, a naabm tɔ, ɓa ɓɔ̀'ɔ diki ɓɔɔ ruu gaayu danggn shinnang ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kagn tɔ.
45013012	Nwàng kaa naa ɓɔɔ nɔng gãntɛ kana, nɔng laagɛ̃ a kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ri palɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ ta. Ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwàng ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
45013013	R'uu gaayu nwannang waasɛ̃, naa zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaarɛ zɔɔ, nɔɔ ɓooro saa ɓɛɛ kpang, nɔɔ palɛ dũndũng kpang, nɔɔ ti p'alɛ̀ shi kpang kpang, nɔɔ hàa nyaa kpang, nɔɔ ti kaa sũnyaa kpang.
45013014	Nɔɔ yaa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi wu ta rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ. N'ɔɔ ràa shoo tɔ̀'ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ bii manɛ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
45014001	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn doo rɛ̃rɛkɛ, nɔɔ ta wu katɔ ka teteng manɛ. N'ɔɔ laa nyaa kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ wu ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
45014002	Zang ɓɔɔ danggn shinnang ɓiɓɛ yà'a wu gbalang katɔ wu shaa vuu piti, a zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn doo rɛ̃rɛkɛ shaa ɓi sɔ̃ngkɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
45014003	Zang ɓɔɔ shaa vuu piti keɓe, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ wu ɓa zang ɓɔɔ shaa ɓi sɔ̃ngkɔ keɓe katɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ shaa ɓi sɔ̃ngkɔ, wu ti dɔng zang ɓɔɔ shaa vuu piti ruu kpang, nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu bɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓi gbete kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa tà wu ɓi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
45014004	Mɔɔ dɔng zang shoonang zang ɓɔɔ ruu kpang. Ɓi dabang gãa ɓiɓɛ kɔ kɔɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ. Nɛɛ ti palɛ shi kpang wukɔ kɔɔyi. Shii ditɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa yi wu naa katɔ ka bii wu shiiyi ɓɛɛ.
45014005	Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, diki keɓe ɓa diki ɓɔɔ nimbang katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ti kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ diki piti ɓi gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing gn nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
45014006	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ, diki ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ nimbang katɔ, kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ wu a Laa bannang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shaa vuu piti, shaa ka ruu Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zãa Laa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ vuu piti shaanang, bɛ̃ɛ ka ruu Laa, a ti zã̀a wu katɔ.
45014007	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng ɓuru, nwàng nwannang yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, a ti vɔ vɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
45014008	Ruu nɛɛ nwangnɛ, ruu nwàng ɓuru nwannang Laa. A ruu nɛɛ ti vɔrɛ, ruu vɔ ɓuru ka ruu ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ, zang a Laa bannang ɓɛɛ. Naa ruu nwàng doo ningkãari, a naa ruu vɔ doo katɔ, ruu ɓuru zang Laa.
45014009	Ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, Kirisi vɔrɛ, a Laa wisi wu paa ningkãari tɔkn, tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwàng kaa Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
45014010	A mɔɔ dɔng ɓaazung, ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ ruu ka ruu viya? A mɔɔ z'i ɓaazung, ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ka ruu viya? Rùu nandon, ruu naa shii ditɔ ka tìng Laa, wu dɔng rùu, r'uu.
45014011	Naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Nizang n kɔɔ nɔɔ, naa wee n nwàng ningkãari dondong ɓee, zang piti ri naa tang m ditɔ nɛɛ gutu. Zang piti ri kɔɔ ditɔ nɛɛ nkɔ Laa”.
45014012	Zang naa shing zang ɓu ditɔ, wu kɔɔ Laa vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
45014013	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa ruu ɓɔɔ ruu dɔng zɔɔ ɓɛɛ ta. N'ɔɔ shing ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ shing ɓaazung ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ, wu kpaa doo kpang, wu ti palɛ vuu shi kpang kpang.
45014014	N ɓɔɔ n shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ bii Kirisi ɓɛɛ, n zi m tɔ nɛɛ, vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ɓi shi kpang, ɓi kagn kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ vuu keɓe shi kpang, ɓi ti shi kpang ka jìng ɓiɓɛ.
45014015	Naa mɔɔ lasɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ yeti, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shaa ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ kpang. Mɔɔ yaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shaayi, wu ningsi zang ɓɔɔ Kirisi vɔ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
45014016	Mɔɔ shingnɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓàa nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, zang a wu nung shi kpang kpang.
45014017	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ, wukɔ vuu shaanang nɛɛ vuu ɓoonang kpang. Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ wu, a zang ti tãa tìnang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa shingnɛ ɓɛɛ.
45014018	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ Kirisi shoonang naa weɓe, shingnɛ, Laa tãa tìnang, wu ti shingnɛ, shɔnzang wu kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
45014019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, diki diki, r'uu shing jìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ zang ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu ti yì zɔɔ naa kagn, ruu shing danggn gbãnggbãng.
45014020	Mɔɔ lasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ, ka ruu vuu shaanang kpang. Vuu shaanang piti ɓi tɔ̃ɔ. A naa nɔɔ shaa vuu piti ɓɔɔ shing zang ɓɔɔ, wu p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang, nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ.
45014021	Naa mɔɔ yaa yɔpɔ shaanang, nɛɛ saa ɓoonang, nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ, ɓɔ̀ɔ shing ɓaazung ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ, wu palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ.
45014022	Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ, ka yuu vuu keɓe ɓi ka teteng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ Laa. Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ zi tɔ, ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu p'alɛ̀ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
45014023	Naa nɛɛ zì kpang, nɛɛ vuu kɔ wu shaa ɓee, naa wu p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ya, naa wu palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ya ɓɛɛ. Naa shaayi, Laa dɔng wu ruu katɔ, nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ka doo danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka doo danggn ɓɔɔ zang shingnɛ, nɛɛ vuu bì'i tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, zang keɓe palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi tɔ.
45015001	Ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn ɓuru tɔ gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ, ruu yi zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn doo rɛ̃rɛkɛ naa ka bii, ri shing danggn jong gbãnggbãng. R'uu p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shing ruu, rukɔ tãa tìnang ka bm gbete kpang.
45015002	Zang ɓu wu pàlɛ̀ ɓeezung ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ shing wu tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ, wu ti shing wu, wu zũng danggn.
45015003	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kirisi palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãa tìnang ka bm kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, “Dãanang ɓɔɔ zang dãa nɔɔ, zang dãa Nkɔ”.
45015004	Vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa piti, zang beeyi nɛɛ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu, wu mã ruu danggn, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu shing gn kati.
45015005	Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn, nɔɔ ti yi tìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing gn palɛnang ɓɛɛ, wu shingnɛ n'ɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ. N'ɔɔ p'al'ɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ.
45015006	Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ goo nyaa kaa gbete, n'ɔɔ dɔɔ Là'a kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ti Daa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
45015007	Nɔɔ ta zɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ tìnang, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri dɔɔ Laa kati. Naa ɓɔɔ Kirisi ta nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
45015008	N kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ, Kirisi nwàng zang ɓɔɔ palɛ zang Yahudawa shoonang, tɔɔ, wu tusu nɛɛ Laa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ katɔ. Tɔɔ, wu shingnɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ wu a rɛɛ dabang ɓuru wu nwang kaa nizang.
45015009	Nɛɛ tɔɔ, wu ti shing zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ri dɔ̀ɔ Laa jong ka ruu gn ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ kɔng wu ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n dɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, N gaa soo, n dɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ mani”.
45015010	Zang ti bee tɔkn nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ tãa tìnang”
45015011	tɔkn nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, nɔɔ dɔɔ Laa ta. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo piti ri dɔɔ Laa ta”.
45015012	Ishaya ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zɔ̃ng Jeesi gbete a ditɔ, zang naa nwangsɛ wu, wu nwang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ, a ri naa shing gn ɓarɛ ka bii ɓiɓɛ”.
45015013	Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ shing gn ɓɛɛ, wu shingnɛ nɔɔ tãa tìnang gbãnggbãng ka yeti manɛ, yeti manɛ wu ti valɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Suru Laa wu a nɔɔ naa, nɔɔ shing gn kaa gbãnggbãng.
45015014	Manzung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ n zi tɔ, nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ dɔli. Nɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ tɔ nandon. Nɔɔ zunung naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tusu zɔɔ vuu tɔ.
45015015	Ka labeenang kɔ n bè'e nɔɔ ɓee, n waasɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ, n kpaa nɔɔ danggn ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. N waasɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu bannang ɓɔɔ Laa a m ɓɛɛ.
45015016	N nwàng zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, nɛɛ n palɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang shoonang. N kɔɔ ri Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri nwang kaa naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang a Laa, ɓɔɔ shing Laa wu tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ Suru Laa risi nwang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
45015017	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n ɓakɛ bii nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi n làk'ɛ jìng katɔ ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ n pàl'ɛ Laa ɓɛɛ.
45015018	N rang yee, n waasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Kirisi shing m n palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ɓɔɔ n shing zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, ri ɓaa shoo kaa tɔ ka nyaa Laa ɓɛɛ. N shing ri nɛɛ r'uu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ri, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ.
45015019	Nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa palɛ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka rakɛnang ɓɔɔ n gaayu nɛɛ Urushalima, n riki nɔng nandon, n daa nɛɛ mani ka Ilirikum ɓɛɛ, n hangsɛ zang ruu Laa kɔɔnang tɔ nandon ka yuu Kirisi.
45015020	Vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ka yeti mɛɛ gbete ɓɛɛ, ɓi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang tãa ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɛ̀'ɛ nwang naa ɓɔɔ n mãa gãa m ka yuu doo gãa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn loo ɓɛɛ, ɓɛɛ.
45015021	Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ zang kɔ̀ɔ ri ruu ɓiɓɛ gn kpang, ri naa zi wu ditɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa gn kpang, ri naa zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ ditɔ”.
45015022	Vuu ɓɔɔ zãa m anang bii manɛ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
45015023	Kãntang keɓe n hangsɛ shoonang mɛɛ tɔ ka rɛɛ tipi keɓe. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ n kasɛ n tɔɔ n daa ka bii manɛ ka rɛɛ saa kɔ tɛɛ ɓee.
45015024	N shing gn anang tɔ kati kãntang. N nɛɛ yupaa tipi Asabaniya daanang tɔ, n naa leng nɔɔ ka gbalang. N nɛɛ nwang tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ diki nɛɛ bee tɔ tɔkɔlɔng, n'ɔɔ yi m naa kagn, n daa Asabaniya.
45015025	A kãntang keɓe, n daa doo ka gari Urushalima, n daa a ri vuu ɓɔɔ yi ri naa ka bii ɓɛɛ.
45015026	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka Makidoniya nɛɛ Akaya ri zɔ̃ng nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri yi zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, ɓɔɔ ri ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Urushalima ɓɛɛ naa ka bii.
45015027	Rikɔ zɔ̃ng nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ. Nizang, daa ɓɔɔ ri yi zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang naa katɔ ka bii. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, ri walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa a zang Yahudawa ka ruu suru ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ jong. Daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ri bàs'ɛ vuu naa ɓarɛ tɔ jong nɛɛ zang Yahudawa.
45015028	N nɛɛ hangsɛ shoonang keɓe tɔ. N nɛɛ a ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ ri tɔ nandon. N yupaa daanang Asabaniya kati, n leng nɔɔ kaa gbalang.
45015029	N zi tɔ nɛɛ n nɛɛ a tɔ ka bii manɛ, n shingnɛ Kirisi wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbãnggbãng.
45015030	Manzung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n gaa nɔɔ nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a ruu ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ n. Nɔɔ gaa m Laa jong gbãnggbãng
45015031	Nɔɔ gaayi nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ɓarɛ ka bii Laa kpang, ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudiya, ri p'alɛ̀ m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima ri tãa tìnang vuu ɓɔɔ n 'atɛ̀ ri ɓɛɛ.
45015032	Tɔ̀ɔ, n tãa tìnang kaa ɓɔɔ n 'a ka bii manɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n tãa tìnang jìng ɓɔɔ n naa leng ka nɔɔ, n ɔ̃sɔ kati.
45015033	Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shingnɛ ruu nwàng ka nyaa zɔɔ, wu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ nandon. Nɔngkɔ.
45016001	N kasɛ nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ Fibi, jaa soro ɓɔɔ shing danggn doo naa ɓɔɔ ruu shing kɔ, ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ. Fibi keɓe, palɛ zang Laa shoonang ka gari Sensheriya.
45016002	N'ɔɔ ta wu naa zang ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ zang Laa ri ta zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ka naa manɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, pàlɛ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ dɔli a ti pàlɛ̀ m jong ɓɛɛ.
45016003	Nɔɔ jèe m Pirisila nɛɛ ɓeevɛ Akpiila nyaa. Zang ɓɔɔ ruu p'alɛ̀ Yeesɔ Kirisi shoonang nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
45016004	Ri 'a zang yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ, zang nyɔ rikɔ jong vɔrɔ, ka nung ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ m ɓɛɛ. N zãa ri tɔ gbãnggbãng. Wu nkɔ zã̀'a ri ka bm kpang, zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri zi Laa kpang, a ri dũng kaa Laa nandon, ri zã̀'a ri jong.
45016005	Nɔɔ jèe m zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri kp'alɛ̀ yuu ka gãa ɓarɛ nyaa jong. Nɔɔ jèe m masang Abinɛtu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ nyaa. Wukɔ zang tìng shɔɔnang ka tipi Asiya ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
45016006	Nɔɔ jèe Marayamu ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang tɔ gbãnggbãng ka ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ, nyaa.
45016007	Nɔɔ jee Adaranika nɛɛ Yuniya, ɓɔɔ ri doo zang Yahudawa naa nkɔ, ɓɔɔ zang mã ri nɛɛ n ka sãa ɓɛɛ nyaa. Zang zi ri nung tɔ gbãnggbãng ka teteng rɛɛ zang shoonang Kirisi. Rikɔ gaayu Laa dũnnang shɔɔnang, a n naa dũngnɛ.
45016008	Nɔɔ jèe m masang Ampiliyalu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu gbãnggbãng nyaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu zang Kpanti Kirisi naa nkɔ ɓɛɛ.
45016009	Nɔɔ jèe m Urubanu zang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shoonang Kirisi nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ nyaa. Nɔɔ ti jèe m masang Isitaki ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ nyaa.
45016010	Nɔɔ jèe m Abali ɓɔɔ zang ri zi tɔ nɛɛ palɛ Kirisi shoonang nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ nyaa. N'ɔɔ ti jèe m zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa Aristobulu ɓɛɛ nyaa.
45016011	Nɔɔ jèe m Hirodiya nyaa. Hirodiya ɓi doo zang Yahudawa kɔ naa nkɔ. N'ɔɔ ti jèe m zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa Narikisa ɓɛɛ nyaa.
45016012	Nɔɔ jèe m rɛɛ Tarafina nɛɛ Tarafusa nyaa. Ri pàl'ɛ Laa doo shoonang kɔ. N'ɔɔ ti jèe masang Barasisa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ nyaa. Ɓi jaa soro ɓɔɔ p'al'ɛ shoonang Kpanti Yeesɔ tɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
45016013	Nɔɔ jèe m Rufu nyaa. Zang ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti nɛɛ shoonang Kpanti Yeesɔ palɛnang ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ ti jèe m ɓ'eenàa ɓɔɔ nwang kaa doo nà'a mɛɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ, nyaa.
45016014	Nɔɔ jèe m rɛɛ Asekiritu, nɛɛ Filigon nɛɛ Hami nɛɛ Patoroba nɛɛ Hama nɛɛ rɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ nyaa.
45016015	Nɔɔ jèe m rɛɛ Filologu nɛɛ Juliya, a ɓɔɔ Neru nɛɛ ɓ'eenàa, a Olimpa nɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ nyaa.
45016016	Nɔɔ jèe zɔɔ nyaa, nɔɔ kɔ̃ng zɔɔ katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kirisi ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Kirisi kɔ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti ri j'ee nɔɔ nyaa.
45016017	Manzung, ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n gaa nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri basɛ teteng zang, a ri ti shing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn, ri yaa gbalang Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri tusu nɔɔ vuu naa ɓɔɔgn naa ɓɔɔ zang tusu nɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ yaa gbalang ɓarɛ katɔ.
45016018	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ naa weɓe ri pàl'ɛ ɓarɛ Kpanti ɓuru Kirisi shoonang kpang, ri kãa ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ buru ɓarɛ. Ri nwaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang nɛɛ nyaa ɓɛlɛɓɛlɛ, nɛɛ nyaa tìnang ɓarɛ.
45016019	Zang piti ri tãa nyaa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yiti ruu Laa gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n tãa tìnang manɛ. N kasɛ nɔɔ zũng katɔ ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu manɛ wu hãa kagn nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang.
45016020	Laa ɓɔɔ shing ruu, ruu nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ naa lasɛ naa vuu palɛnang Sheetang ditɔ, wu shingnɛ n'ɔɔ n'aa Sheetang kaa nɛɛ doo. N gaayi Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
45016021	Timoti zang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shoonang nɛɛ wu jèe nɔɔ nyaa. Lukiyu, nɛɛ Jaasong a ɓɔɔ Susibatara ɓɔɔ ri doo zang Yahudawa kɔ, ri j'ee nɔɔ nyaa jong.
45016022	Nkɔ Tatiyu ɓɔɔ n bèe labeenang keɓe, n j'ee nɔɔ nyaa jong n m zang ɓɔɔ dũng doo Kirisi kɔ ɓɛɛ.
45016023	Gaayu, zang ɓɔɔ n nwang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kirisi ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, j'ee nɔɔ nyaa jong. Erasitu ɓɔɔ zang gari ri shing saka ka naa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ manzung ɓuru Kpaatu ɓɔɔ dũng doo Kirisi kɔ, ri j'ee nɔɔ nyaa.
45016024	Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon. Nɔngkɔ.
45016025	Ruu dɔɔ Laa, ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu shingnɛ nɔɔ shing danggn gbãnggbãng, ka doo Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Bɛɛ zang waasɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe katɔ, ka saa dɔli, a zang nwangsɛ tɔ kati ɓɛɛ.
45016026	A kãntang keɓe labeenang ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri beere shing tɔ, ruu nizang nwangsɛ bii tɔ. Laa ɓɔɔ nwàng ɓi ningkãari dondong, ti kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ zang koo piti ri zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang keɓe. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ri ɓaa shoo kaa nyaa Laa, ri shing danggn kaa bii ɓiɓɛ.
45016027	Ruu dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ zũng dɔli ɓɛɛ dondong, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi palɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔngkɔ.
46001001	Labeenang keɓe a nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ m katɔ, a zɔ̃ng m nɛɛ, n nwang zang nyaa shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ruu nɛɛ manzung ɓuru Sɔtanɛ.
46001002	Ruu bè'e zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ɓɔɔ ri ka Koranti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ nwang zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ, n'ɔɔ arɛ n'ɔɔ nwang naa zang piti ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ dalɛ koo piti ɓɔɔ ri ɓaarɛ nung Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti ɓuru nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
46001003	Ruu gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru nɛɛ, Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri a nɔɔ tìnang tãanang, ri ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.
46001004	N zãa Laa diki diki, ka ruu manɛ, ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ bang ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
46001005	Pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ waasɛ̃, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ka gbalang n'aabm̀ n'aabm̀. Shing nɔɔ, a nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nizang, a nɔɔ ti zunung yee ɓiɓɛ rannang ɓɛɛ.
46001006	R'uu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ka tìng, ka yuu Kirisi ɓaa saara tɔ ka yeti manɛ.
46001007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ yàa nɔɔ tɔ̀'ɔ kagn ka vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang kpang. Ka wee nɔɔ gã diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi naa nwàngs'ɛ ruu yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkn ɓee.
46001008	Ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, yiti nɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa wu a nɛɛ mani. Tɔ̀ɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi gbãayu, Laa wu naa dɔng nɔɔ ruu kaa takpang, nɛɛ nɔɔ p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang.
46001009	Laa p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ ɓi katɔ diki diki. Wukɔ ɓàa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ n'ɔɔ naa ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Jaa ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
46001010	Manzung, n gaa nɔɔ ka ruu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, nyaa manɛ wu daa gbete, ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ ti kusu zɔɔ kpang. Rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ wu daa gbete, n'ɔɔ ti palɛ vuu gbete.
46001011	Rɛɛ manzung, n kɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa Kuluwi ri kɔɔ m nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri haa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ ka teteng manɛ.
46001012	Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ keɓe, nɔɔ k'usù yuu manɛ ka vaa vaa. Zang ɓu ka teteng manɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N dũng m Bulu”, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ “N dũng m Apolo”, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ, “N dũng m Bituru”. A zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N dũng m Kirisi.”
46001013	N kaa ɓi n hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ, Kirisi kusu bii katɔ ya? Nɔɔ kɔɔ m jong, zang ɓ'aa nkɔ Bulu naa ka laa ka ruu manɛ ya? Zang pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ batizima nɛɛ nung mɛɛ ya?
46001014	N zãa Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ batizima ka vaa manɛ gbete kpang ɓɛɛ. N pàlɛ̀ m rɛɛ Kiripu nɛɛ Gaayu kɔ batizima shɛ̃ɛning.
46001015	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ kagn nɛɛ n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ batizima nɛɛ nung mɛɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
46001016	(N kpaa danggn tɔ. N pàlɛ̀ ɓɔɔ Sitifana nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ batizima. Zang ɓɔɔ n palɛ ri batizima takpang, ɓi rikɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
46001017	Yeesɔ Kirisi shong m nɛɛ, n naa pàlɛ̀ zang wu batizima kpang. Shong m nɛɛ n naa kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Laa. N nyɔ zang wu nɛɛ nyaa waati kpang, n ti kɔɔ zang ruu nɛɛ zũnang yuu mɛɛ kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri zi kati nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang kagn ka vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Kirisi vɔ ka yuu laa ɓɛɛ.
46001018	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shàar'ɛ kana, ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Kirisi vɔ ka yuu laa ɓi vuu shoko waati. Ɓɔɔ ɓuru, ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu ɓuru kana, ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, naa vuu palɛnang Laa kagn ka vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔ ɓɛɛ.
46001019	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N bɛ̃ɛ zũnang zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng dɔli nɛɛ kaaɓa. N ti kɔsɔ zũnang zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu dɔli ɓɛɛ nɛɛ kaaɓa.”
