46001020	Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng katɔ ka koo keɓe, zũnang ɓarɛ kaa waati, zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang nyaa dannang zang Yahudawa zũnang ɓarɛ ti waati, zang ɓɔɔ ri ti là'a zang nyaa ka koo keɓe zũnang ɓarɛ doo waati kɔ. Laa tusu ruu tɔ nɛɛ zũnang zang koo keɓe, ɓi naa ɓɔɔ shoko waati.
46001021	Laa ɓɔɔ zũng dɔli ɓɛɛ, kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang koo ri zi wu nung nɛɛ zũnang ɓarɛ kpang. Nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ jong, nɛɛ ruu kɔ ruu rangnɛ, a zang risi naa nyaa shoko ɓee.
46001022	Zang Yahudawa ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri zi ɓarɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi kaa gn nɛɛ ruu keɓe nizang. Zang Heleniyawa ri ti kasɛ ɓarɛ zũnang.
46001023	A ruu kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ zang ɓuru ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ. Ruu keɓe làs'ɛ rɛɛ zang Yahudawa yeti katɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ ɓi ruu shoko.
46001024	Zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ nɛɛ ri nw'ang zang ɓiɓɛ, zang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang Heleniyawa piti, ri zi ɓarɛ tɔ nɛɛ, naa vuu palɛnang Laa ɓuru ka bì'i Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ, a wukɔ ti tusu ri naa ɓɔɔ zũnang Laa nwang ɓɛɛ.
46001025	Vuu ɓɔɔ nwàng ka jìng shɔnzang naa Laa palɛ vuu shoko ɓɛɛ, vuu shoko keɓe ɓa zũnang shɔnzang katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang zirɛ kɔɔ nɛɛ Laa lakɛ naa ɓi bii kpang, ɓa vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔli palɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ.
46001026	Manzung, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ karɛ ka yeti manɛ, ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang koo ri zi ka teteng manɛ nɛɛ ri zũng katɔ, kagn dɔli kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang barɛ ɓɔɔ koo keɓe kagn, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang ti a ri bannang katɔ, kagn dɔli kpang kɔ doori.
46001027	Zang ɓɔɔ zang koo ri zi ri naa ri shoko, Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ rikɔ nɛɛ ri nwang zang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri zũng katɔ ɓɛɛ kati. Ti shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, ka koo keɓe kɔ jong, nɛɛ tɔɔ yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
46001028	Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang bɛ̃̀ɛ katɔ ka koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ zang kɔsɔ nɛɛ kaaɓa, ɓɔɔ zang risi naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu sɔɔrɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri zi ɓarɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, yuu nɛɛ mani ka dii.
46001029	Laa palɛ vuu keɓe nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu lakɛ jìng kaa tɔ̀'ɔ ka ting ɓiɓɛ kpang.
46001030	Nɔɔ ɓ'akɛ̀ zɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka ruu Laa kɔ gbete. Ti doo Laa kɔ shingnɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi a ruu zũnang ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Ti ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ, Laa z'i ruu naa zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. A ti t'a yuu ɓuru tɔ ka vuu shi kpang nandon, risi ruu, ruu nwang zang ɓiɓɛ.
46001031	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
46002001	Rɛɛ manzung, ɓɔɔ n a ka nɔng manɛ tìng shɔɔnang, n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa waasɛ katɔ ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ ruu ɓɛɛ. N a wu nɛɛ nyaa naa tãa, a ɓɔɔ zinang ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ manɛ katɔ kpang.
46002002	N kɔɔ ka yeti mɛɛ, n tɔɔ, wee n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓee, n rɛ̃rɛ ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu ka laa a vɔ ɓɛɛ.
46002003	N a naa zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ naa ka bii kpang ɓɛɛ. N kaa vɔrɔ, bii zàa m kagn.
46002004	Ka ɓɔɔ n rang nɔɔ yee Laa kaɓa, n ɓakɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ zũnang shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo keɓe kpang. Ɓi Suru Laa nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Laa kɔ tusu nɔɔ nɛɛ, vuu keɓe nizang kɔ nwani.
46002005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, dìiri danggn shinnang manɛ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓi vuu zũnang shɔnzang kpang, ɓi naa vuu palɛnang Laa shingnɛ.
46002006	Ruu zi tɔ nɔngkɔ, a ruu kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri z'ũng danggn tɔ, ruu zũnang Laa doo nɛɛ mani. A zɔ̃̌ng zũnang kaɓa ɓi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ ɓɔɔ koo jaa knti keɓe kpang. À ɓi ti nɛɛ bii zang ɓɔɔ ri roo kpanti ka koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ ri shàar'ɛ ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
46002007	Zũnang kɔ ruu rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee, ɓi zũnang Laa ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Laa waasɛ katɔ, shɔnzang ri zi kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa p'al'ɛ vuu keɓe doo ka tìng bɛɛ zang mãa koo keɓe gn kpang, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu naa nwang nɛɛ wu ka nɔng bannang ɓiɓɛ.
46002008	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn gbete, ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri roo kpanti ka koo keɓe ɓɔɔ zi zũnang keɓe kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa ri nɛɛ zi katɔ, ri nɛɛ ɓ'aa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa zang bannang piti, naa ka laa kpang.
46002009	Vuu keɓe nwàng kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ: “Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri zi gngn kpang, a zang ɓɔɔ ti tãa gngn kpang, a zang ɓɔɔ ti rɛ̃rɛ gngn ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, Laa shìli rɛɛ vuu keɓe kɔ, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
46002010	Laa nwangsɛ rukɔ vuu keɓe nɛɛ naa Suru ɓiɓɛ. Suru Laa zi yeti vuu tɔ nandon dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ti zili rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ tɔ.
46002011	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi suru zang kaɓa kɔ zi shɛ̃ɛning. Laa doo nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zi rɛ̃rɛnang Laa kpang, ɓi Suru ɓiɓɛ kɔ zi gbete.
46002012	Suru ɓɔɔ Laa shìng ruu ka yeti ɓuru, ɓi Suru ɓiɓɛ, ɓi ɓɔɔ koo keɓe kpang. Suru keɓe kɔ shing ruu, ruu zi vuu piti ɓɔɔ Laa 'a ruu waati ɓɛɛ.
46002013	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu nɛɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang keɓe, ruu kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ wu nɛɛ yee ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri tùsù ruu nɛɛ zũnang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi Suru Laa tùsù ruu vuu keɓe. Ruu nwangsɛ ɓuru dìiri vuu Suru Laa, ruu kɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kagn ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
46002014	Zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa nɛɛ kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang, ta vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa alɛ Zang ɓi kpang. Zang kaɓa zi vuu keɓe kpang, vuu bì'i nwang wu ɓi naa vuu shoko, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi Suru Laa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning shing zang, zang zi vuu kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
46002015	A zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ zi dìiri vuu keɓe ɓi katɔ nandon, a zang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo keɓe ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ ɓi kaa takpang.
46002016	Nwang ɓi kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ zi rɛ̃rɛnang Kpanti Laa kagn ya? Zang ɓɔɔgn tusu wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ ya?”  Ɓɔɔ ɓuru Suru Laa ɓi kagn bii ɓuru, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru ɓi gbete nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kirisi.
46003001	Nizang rɛɛ manzung, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ, n rang nɔɔ yee naa zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kagn yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. N rang nɔɔ yee naa shɔnzang waati kɔ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nw'ang doo naa wujɛ rɛ̃ɛting waati ka gbalang Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
46003002	N 'a nɔɔ m'ii, wu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lakɛ katɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ nɔɔ daa naa shaanang gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Bì'i kãntang keɓe nɔɔ ti daa naa shaanang gn kpang kɔ sasak.
46003003	Nɔɔ nwang doo naa zang koo keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa doo sũnyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ, nɔɔ haa doo nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ naa nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ doo naa zang koo keɓe kɔ kpang ya? Nɔɔ palɛ wu naa ɓɔɔ zang piti palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?
46003004	Naa zang gbete kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N dũng m Bulu” a zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, “N dũng m Apolo”, wee nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ nɔngkɔ ɓee, nɔɔ doo naa zang koo keɓe kɔ.
46003005	Zang ɓaa wi nɛɛ Apolo wiya? Zang ɓaa wi nɛɛ Bulu wiya? Rùu ɓuru zang shoonang waati ɓɔɔ Laa shongnɛ, nɛɛ ruu shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓu palɛ ɓi shoonang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ka naa ɓɛɛ.
46003006	Rùu ɓuru naa zang ɓɔɔ ri lang jaa ɓɛɛ. Nkɔ ɓaa jìng vuu, a Apolo ɓaarɛ mii kagn. Ɓi Laa kɔ ka bm gbete shingnɛ jìng vuu tarɛ, a bangnɛ.
46003007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ɓ'aa jìng vuu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓàar'ɛ mii kagn, ri ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shingnɛ, jìng vuu tarɛ, a bangnɛ, wukɔ ɓa ri nandon.
46003008	Zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa jìng vuu, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓaarɛ mii kagn, ri ɓarɛ gbete, zang ɓɔɔ ɓa zɔɔ kpang. Laa naa 'a zang ɓu vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
46003009	Wee ruu ziti ɓee, ruu kpalɛ yuu ɓuru nɛɛ Laa ruu palɛ shoonang. Nɔɔ manɛ kaa jaa ɓɔɔ Laa lang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ manɛ naa gãa ɓɔɔ Laa mãa ɓɛɛ.
46003010	Laa pàlɛ̀ m tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng, y'aa m nɛɛ nkɔ n gaayu shoonang kaɓa. N loo doo gãa kaɓa waasɛ̃, naa zang ɓɔɔ zunung gãa mãanang katɔ ɓɛɛ. N loo doo gãa tɔ a zang ɓɔɔ mãa ɓi ka gãa. Zang ɓu wu palɛ waasɛ̃ naa ɓɔɔ wu mãa gãa bì'i ɓɛɛ.
46003011	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ lò'o doo gãa ɓɔɔgn takpang. Doo gãa ɓɔɔ Laa looyi, ɓi wukɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi.
46003012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu zinariya, zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu azurufa, zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu ɓarɛ tari ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔli ɓɛɛ, ri mãa gãa nɛɛ mani ka yuu doo gãa kɔ zang loo ɓee. A zang ɓɔɔ ri see ɓarɛ laa, nɛɛ wusi, a ɓɔɔ furu vuu, ri mãa gãa nɛɛ mani, ka yuu doo gãa keɓe.
46003013	Diki ɓɔɔ shoonang zang naa tusu bii kagn a ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka diki kaɓa, ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi gbãayu ka koo keɓe, Laa naa gãsɛ shoonang zang ɓu nɛɛ waa, waa kɔ naa t'usù kati waasɛ̃ naa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng shoonang zang ɓu nwàng ɓɛɛ.
46003014	Naa gãa ɓɔɔ zang mãa ka yuu doo gãa kaɓa nɛɛ shii katakata ka yeti waa, waa nɛɛ shaa kpang, Laa a zang kaɓa vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
46003015	Naa gãa zang kaɓa waa shaayi zang kaɓa wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang kpang. Laa ta yuu zang kaɓa katɔ naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang wɔ nɛɛ yeti waa ɓɛɛ.
46003016	Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ nɔkɔ Gãa Laa, a Suru Laa nwàng ka yeti manɛ kpang ya?
46003017	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ lasɛ Gãa Laa keɓe, Laa naa nyɔ zang kaɓa vɔrɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃ng Gãa keɓe nɛɛ wu nwang ɓɔɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Gãa keɓe ɓi nɔkɔ.
46003018	N'ɔɔ nwaarɛ yuu manɛ kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu zũng dɔli ka yeti vuu koo keɓe, wu risi yuu ɓiɓɛ naa shoko, tɔ̀ɔ, wu zũng kati.
46003019	N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang zili ka koo keɓe nɛɛ ɓi zũnang, ka jìng Laa ɓi vuu shoko. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nizang kɔ nwani. Zang beeyi nɛɛ, “Laa yi zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng dɔli ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zang zũnang ɓɛɛ.”
46003020	Zang ti bèe ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɛɛ, “Laa zi ɓi tɔ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng katɔ ɓi waati”.
46003021	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu rang yee bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu di yuu ka bii shɔnzang kpang. Vuu piti ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ.
46003022	Naa doo wiya? Naa doo Bulu, naa Apolo naa Bituru, ri ɓarɛ zang shoonang manɛ. Koo nandon, nɛɛ suru bii, nɛɛ vɔrɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ nandon. Naa doo vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zili kãntang keɓe, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ a doo ka knti, ri ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ nandon.
46003023	Nɔɔ manɛ kaa ɓɔɔ Kirisi, a Kirisi ɓi kaa ɓɔɔ Laa.
46004001	N kasɛ zang piti ri zirɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ruu zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ruu dũng wu ɓɛɛ, Laa a ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu waasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ ka naa, nɛɛ ruu gãng jìng kagn.
46004002	Vuu ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ ka bì'i zang ɓɔɔ gãng zang jìng ka vuu ɓɛɛ, wu gãng jìng ka vuu nɛɛ yeti gbete.
46004003	Naa nɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ n palɛ vuu shi kpang, ɓi wukɔ kpãa m kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ n palɛ vuu shi kpang. Naa ri dɔɔ m doo katɔ, ɓi wukɔ kpãa m kpang. Naa doo nkɔ nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ, n dɔ̀ng yuu mɛɛ ruu kpang.
46004004	Nizang, n zi vuu ɓɔɔ jìng kpantɛ m, n palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi ti nkɔ d`'ɔng yuu mɛɛ ruu nɛɛ zang yaa m tɔ kpang. Ɓi Laa d`'ɔng m ruu ɓiri.
46004005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔng zang ruu ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ yaa gbongkarɛ diki ɓiɓɛ wu arɛ. Diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ gbãayu kagn ɓɛɛ. Naa nwangsɛ dìiri vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ̃ katɔ kãntang keɓe ditɔ. Ti naa nwangsɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ zang ɓu rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ditɔ. Ka diki kaɓa kɔ, Laa naa dɔ̀ɔ zang ɓu nɛɛ dɔɔnang ɓɔɔ daa teetee nɛɛ zang ɓu ɓɛɛ.
46004006	Rɛɛ manzung, ka vuu kɔ n kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ nɔɔ ɓee, n tuu Apolo a ɓɔɔ yuu mɛɛ n gã̀s'ɛ nɔɔ vuu nɛɛ mani, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ zi kati. N ti kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ naa zi dìiri ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ ɓa vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.” Daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ti zì zang ɓɔɔ naa vìi kpang.
46004007	Ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi yuu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ ɓa zang piti katɔ ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ ɓu wiya? Vuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ wu Laa kɔ a mɔɔ kpang kagn ya? Laa kɔ nɛɛ a mɔɔ vuu piti, a mɔɔ rangkɛ yee vi bang bang ka yuu vuu kaɓa naa kaka ɓaaɓɛ a mɔɔ viya?
46004008	Nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ manɛ tɔ nandon. Nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ kaa zang ying. Nɔɔ nw'ang kpanti tɔ, a rùu ɓuru gn kpanti kpang. Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ kpanti nizang, wukɔ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ruu nɛɛ roo kpanti kaa nɛɛ nɔɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ.
46004009	N zirɛ, mɔɔ kɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ Laa zɔ̃ng ruu, ɓɔɔ ruu zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ rukɔ ruu waa nyaa knti. Rùu ɓuru naa zang ɓɔɔ zang dɔng ri ruu nɛɛ zang nyɔ ri vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu shìi ka dalɛ ka nihn, tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ka koo nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ri tɛ̃ɛ ruu jìng kaa bii.
46004010	Ruu nwang kaa naa zang shoko, ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi. Nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng katɔ ɓɔɔ ri ɓakɛ yuu kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Rùu lakɛ naa ɓuru bii kpang. Kaka ɓi kagn bii manɛ. Zang seng nɔɔ manɛ katɔ, ruu ɓuru zang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ri vuu yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
46004011	Wee ruu rang yee ka nyaa ɓee, nyɔkɔ nyɔ ruu katɔ, sutu mã ruu, ruu hã̀lɛ̀ ɓuru sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka bii, zang dang ruu jìng, a gãa ɓɔɔ ruu nw'ang kagn ti kpang.
46004012	Ruu palɛ shoonang nɛɛ naa ɓuru gbãnggbãng. Zang nɛɛ dãlɛ ruu, ruu gaa ri Laa nɛɛ, Laa wu palɛ ri tɔ̃ɔ. Zang dang ruu jìng a ruu mã danggn.
46004013	Zang ri nɛɛ kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu ɓuru, ruu kàs'ɛ ri nyaa ɓuru tɔ̃ɔ. Zang ri risi ruu naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang vang ka dondong ka koo ɓɛɛ. Naa doo kãntang keɓe, ri z'i ruu naa zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ ka tipi, zang naalɛ ri nɛɛ doo ɓɛɛ.
46004014	N bè'e nɔɔ vuu keɓe nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu nɔɔ kpang. N kasɛ nɛɛ n tusu nɔɔ m vuu kɔ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
46004015	Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tùsù nɔɔ vuu, ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi doo labang kopi, d'aa manɛ ɓɔɔ yi nɔɔ ɓi gbete kɔ nwani. Ɓi nkɔ nwàng naa daa manɛ ka gbalang Yeesɔ Kirisi keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nkɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.
46004016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ.
46004017	Vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ n shong Timoti nɛɛ wu a ka bì'i manɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa kpaa nɔɔ danggn nwannang mɛɛ ka gbalang Yeesɔ Kirisi, naa ɓɔɔ n tùsù zang ka nɔng piti, a ɓɔɔ ti ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ piti, nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Timoti ɓi jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nɛɛ wu gbete ka bì'i Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ti palɛ shoonang Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ.
46004018	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ri lakɛ jìng, ri kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ n nɛɛ a tɔ, n naa leng nɔɔ kpang ya?
46004019	Laa nɛɛ kasɛ nyaa tɔ, diki bee kpang, n a ditɔ ka nɔng manɛ. N naa zi kati nɛɛ jìng mɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ jìng keɓe, ri nɛɛ ri zunung palɛnang tɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ɓɛɛ kpang.
46004020	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti roonang Laa ɓi yee ɓɔɔ zang rangkɛ nɛɛ nyaa waati kpang, ɓi vuu naa vuu palɛnang Laa.
46004021	Nɔɔ kasɛ wiya? N a nɛɛ gbãa ya kɔ nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n a kaa nɛɛ yeti ɓɔɔ valɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ? Tɔ̀ɔ, n naa tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
46005001	Zang ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ ri palɛ dũndũng. Naa doo zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang, ri p'alɛ̀ zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang keɓe kpàng. N tãayi nɛɛ zang gbete ka teteng manɛ, rooro nɛɛ soro ɓeedaa.
46005002	Zang ri nɛɛ p'alɛ̀ naa weɓe ka teteng manɛ, nɔɔ palɛ biya nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ viya? Nɔɔ k'aa katɔ kɔ jong, ka ruu vuu shi kpang manɛ. Nɔɔ hing zang ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang keɓe katɔ, nɔɔ yaa teteng manɛ.
46005003	Wee n ka nɔng nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓee, n rɛ̃rɛ ruu manɛ katɔ. N dɔ̀ng zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe ruu tɔ, nɛɛ nung Yeesɔ Kirisi, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, n nɛɛ nɔɔ nɔng gbete. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu kɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓee. Nɔɔ nɛɛ kpalɛ zɔɔ nɔng gbete, yeti mɛɛ dà'a gbete nɛɛ ɓɔɔ manɛ. Naa vuu palɛnang Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ ti kagn teteng manɛ ning.
46005005	Nɔɔ yàa Sheetang zang keɓe, wu lasɛ yɔpɔ bii ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, suru bii ɓiɓɛ wu wɔ kati, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ naa gbãayu ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ.
46005006	Daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ naa wee nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ ɓee kpang. Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ yisi tɔkɔlɔng tànt'ɛ yeti borodi baanang wu shing borodi wu puuyi kpang ya?
46005007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nwangsɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe nɔɔ yaa teteng manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɛɛ bà'a ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nwangsɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ nwang kaa zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ruu dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, ruu ɓuru kaa kalang kalang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi vɔ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ nwang naa jaa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa, ka laa ɓɔɔ zang shaa nyaalaa pasika ɓɛɛ.
46005008	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu y'aa nɔɔ zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang ta nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu shi kpang kaɓa, wu baa kaa tɔ̀'ɔ teteng ɓuru kpang. Ruu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ruu ti dũng gbalang Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete. Ka naa weɓe kɔ, ruu nwang naa borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang tingkiring ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri sh'aa ka nyaalaa pasika ɓɛɛ. Wee naa ɓɔɔ ruu shaa nyaalaa kaɓa jong tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
46005009	Ka yeti labeenang ɓɔɔ n bee nɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ nwàng nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng ɓɛɛ kpang.
46005010	N kɔɔ wu nɛɛ nɔɔ nwàng nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang, ri ti palɛ dũndũng, a ri ti shing jìng ka vuu zang, ri ɓɔɔrɔ vuu, ɓɔɔ ri ti bang vaka, ri ɓarɛ nɛɛ ruu ka koo keɓe diki diki. Ruu palɛ biya ruu nwàng nɛɛ ri kpang viya?
46005011	N kɔɔ nɔɔ m nɛɛ, nɔɔ nwàng nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu dũng Laa a palɛ dũndũng, shing jìng ka vuu zang, ti bang doo vaka, dãlɛ zang, ti ɓoo saa, a ti ɓɔɔrɔ vuu ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ ti shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang keɓe kpang tingkiring.
46005012	Zang a m naa nɛɛ n jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang ruu kpang. Rùu màngk'ɛ ɓuru zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ri nɛ̀'ɛ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang.
46005013	Ɓi Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng wu kpang ruu. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ, “Nɔɔ h'ing zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi katɔ, nɔɔ yaa teteng manɛ.”
46006001	Naa zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ vuu shi kpang, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa ɓ'aa nyaavaa ka tìng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang kpang ya? Wu nɛ̀'ɛ daa nɛɛ zang kaɓa ka tìng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ jong kpang ya?
46006002	Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kɔ ri naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu kpang ya? Naa nɔkɔ naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo ruu, a nɔɔ dɔ̀ng zɔɔ ruu, ka ruu vuu tɔkɔlɔng tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pàl'ɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?
46006003	Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ rukɔ naa jɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ruu kpang ya? Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, a ruu dɔ̀ng zang ruu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu pàl'ɛ zɔɔ ka koo keɓe kpang ka ruu viya?
46006004	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ p'alɛ̀ zɔɔ vuu, nɔɔ daa ɓaa zɔɔ nyaavaa ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ sèng ri kpang gbãagbãa, ri dɔng nɔɔ ruu.
46006005	Yusɛ̃ɛ tuu nɔɔ kpang ya? Zang kagn teteng manɛ gbete ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ ɓɔɔ naa dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ruu kpang ya?
46006006	Daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa daa ɓà'a ɓeezung ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ nyaavaa, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang, wu daa jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu ɓɛɛ kpang.
46006007	Nizang, naa nɔɔ ɓàar'ɛ zɔɔ nyaavaa, ruu zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ. Naa zang palɛ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang, mɔɔ mã danggn wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ɓa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ daa ɓaa zang nyaavaa katɔ. Naa zang mulu mɔɔ, a mɔɔ yaa ka nɔngkɔ gbã̀'agbãa, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
46006008	Ɓɔɔ nɔkɔ nɛɛ y'aa zang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ nɔɔ vuu shi kpang jong, nɔkɔ pàl'ɛ zɔɔ shi kpang ka naa manɛ. Nɔɔ ti mulu zɔɔ, wee nɔɔ jaanaa zɔɔ ka gbalang Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
46006009	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ta yeti shi kpang, ri daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kpang. N'ɔɔ nwaarɛ yuu manɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng, zang ɓɔɔ ri bang vaka, zang ɓɔɔ ri rooro nɛɛ soro zang, zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri rooro doo nɛɛ zang varɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
46006010	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓɔ̀'ɔ shɔngɓɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng ka vuu zang, zang ɓɔɔ sàa si ri, zang ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ yee shi kpang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri mulu zang, nɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang keɓe, ri daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kpang.
46006011	Ɓeleng, zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ, ri nwang nwannang shi kpang keɓe kɔ. A Laa naa kɔsɔ vuu shi kpang manɛ, nɔɔ kaa kalang kalang. A shɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang kaa zang ɓiɓɛ. Laa z'i nɔɔ manɛ kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ a bì'i ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nung Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ ruu bang wu ɓɛɛ.
46006012	A zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, “Zang zãa m vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang” Nizang zang zãa mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang. Wu vuu piti tɔ̃ɔ kpang. Ɓɔɔ mɛɛ, n kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ, zang zãa m vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang, a n kasɛ kaa takpang, vuu ɓɔɔ wu yi m gbãnggbãng n raa kaa naa jaafoo vuu bì'i kpang.
46006013	Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, “Laa mãa vuu shaanang nɛɛ zang shaa ka buru. Ti mãa buru ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang shaa ɓɛɛ” Nɔngkɔ nizang. Lee ɓɔɔ Laa naa ningsi buru ditɔ, nɛɛ vuu shaanang ning. Laa mãa bii nɛɛ zang palɛ wu dũndũng nɛɛ mani kpang. Laa mãa bii nɛɛ zang wu dũng Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ mani. Ti kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ a bii vuu ɓɔɔ bii kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
46006014	Naa ɓɔɔ Laa wisi Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ saa. Laa naa wisi ruu paa ditɔ jong nɛɛ saa nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ.
46006015	Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ bii manɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang ya? Naa n tuu bii Yeesɔ Kirisi dang gbete n ɓakɛ nɛɛ bii zang soro ɓɔɔ rakɛ wà'azaa tɔ̃ɔ ya? N'ɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring.
46006016	Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ rakɛ wà'azaa ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa shɔnzang gbete kpang ya? Nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “zang ziti keɓe ri nw'ang kaa shɔnzang gbete.”
46006017	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓakɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, suru ɓiɓɛ nwang kaa gbete nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ.
46006018	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ y'aa dũndũng palɛnang. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang palɛ nandon, zang palɛ wu ka bii kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ dũndũng, pàl'ɛ ɓi bii ɓiɓɛ vuu shi kpang.
46006019	Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ bì'i manɛ nwàng ɓi naa Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa nwang kagn ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Laa shing Suru ɓiɓɛ ka yeti manɛ. Bii manɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kpang, ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ Laa.
46006020	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, hoo nɔɔ nɛɛ zìi Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ a Laa bannang nɛɛ bii manɛ.
46007001	N tɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ bèe m labeenang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu gee soro kpang, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
46007002	A ka ruu ɓɔɔ dũndũng shang dɔli, zang varɛ ɓu wu gee soro ɓiɓɛ, zang soro ɓu wu ti gee varɛ ɓiɓɛ.
46007003	Zang varɛ wu pàlɛ̀ ɓeeso vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang varɛ pàl'ɛ soro ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang soro wu ti pàlɛ̀ ɓeevɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ soro pàl'ɛ ɓeevɛ ɓɛɛ.
46007004	Bii zang soro ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓeevɛ. Bii zang varɛ ɓi ti doo ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang kɔ, ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓeeso.
46007005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n'ɔɔ zãa zɔɔ bii manɛ kpang. Naa nɔɔ kasɛ katɔ, nɔɔ kà zɔɔ diki nɛɛ nɔɔ gaa Laa, tɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ zãa zɔɔ bii. Diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ka zɔɔ nɛɛ waa nyaa tɔ, nɔɔ ɓang bii nɛɛ zɔɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Sheetang nɛɛ walɛ gbalang wu gãsɛ nɔɔ, wu shing nɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yiti yuu manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
46007006	Ruu kɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓee, n dang nɔɔ wu nyaa nɛɛ, zang ɓu wu gee soro kpang. N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ m katɔ nɛɛ, n kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ, nɔɔ gee soro.
46007007	Ka jìng mɛɛ, naa zang ri gee soro kpang, naa wee n gee kpang ɓee, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. A Laa palɛ zang kaa bm bm. A zang ɓɔɔ naa, wu palɛ vuu hn, a ti a zang ɓɔɔ naa, wu palɛ vuu ɓi kaa naa ɓɔɔgn.
46007008	Zang ɓɔɔ ri gee soro gn kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ gee varɛ gn kpang, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ suvɔ, n rang yee keɓe nɛɛ rikɔ. Ri nwang nwannang yuu ɓarɛ, ri gee zɔɔ kpang naa wee n nwang ɓee, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
46007009	A zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ kagn ɓɔɔ ri zunung yuu ɓarɛ yitinang kpang, ri gee zɔɔ. Naa zang gee zɔɔ, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ɓɔɔ sɛ̃ɛrɛ bii ɓannang nɛɛ soro nɛ̀'ɛ shaa mɔɔ naa waa ɓɛɛ.
46007010	Zang ɓɔɔ ri gee varɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ zang soro wu seepaa gãa varɛ ɓiɓɛ kpang. Wu nkɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ kpang, ɓi Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ.
46007011	Naa zang soro nɛɛ seepaa doo nɛɛ mani, wu nwang nɔngkɔ, wu gee varɛ takpang. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, wu gbãayu ka gãa ɓeevɛ ka nɔng. Zang varɛ wu hing soro ɓiɓɛ kpang tingkiring.
46007012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri gee zang ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe. Ruu keɓe nkɔ kɔɔ ɓɔɔ yuu mɛɛ, wu nyaa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi dang ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng Yeesɔ Kirisi gee soro ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng Kirisi ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Jaa soro bì'i, nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, nɛɛ wu nwang nɛɛ wu katɔ. Zang keɓe wu hing soro bì'i kpang.
46007013	A naa zang soro ɓɔɔ gee zang varɛ ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng Laa kpang. Zang varɛ keɓe nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ wu nwang nɛɛ wu katɔ, wu seepaa kpang.
46007014	N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang varɛ ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng Laa kpang Laa z'ɔ̃ng wu ka ruu soro ɓiɓɛ. Laa ti zɔ̃ng jaa soro ɓɔɔ dũng wu kpang ka ruu varɛ ɓiɓɛ. Naa nɔngkɔ kpang, wujɛ ɓarɛ ri nwang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ Laa kpang. Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe Laa tà wujɛ ɓarɛ, ri kaa zang ɓiɓɛ.
46007015	Naa zang ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng Laa kpang kasɛ nɛɛ wu yaa zang ɓɔɔ wu gee ɓɛɛ katɔ, wu yaa wu. Ri nɛɛ yaa zɔɔ tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa ka teteng ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang varɛ, nɛɛ ti zang soro, t'a nyaa dannang kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kasɛ nɛɛ ruu nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
46007016	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ soro ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ zi kpang Laa t'a yuu varɛ manɛ katɔ, ka ruu manɛ kpang ya? Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ varɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ nɔɔ zi kpang Laa ta yuu soro manɛ katɔ ka ruu manɛ kpang ya?
46007017	Zang ɓu wu nwang naa ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa wu nyaa nɛɛ wu nwang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓu wu ti nwang naa ɓɔɔ wu nw'ang ka tìng a Laa ɓaa wu nyaa nɛɛ wu naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu ka teteng zang Laa nandon nɛɛ zang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
46007018	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kagn ɓɔɔ zang yee wu shaa tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa wu nyaa, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ wu gɔ̃ koo bii ka yuu shaa ka nɔng, wu nwang kaa naa bɛɛ wu yee shaa ka takpang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti kagn ɓɔɔ bɛɛ yee shaa gn kpang, ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa wu nyaa ɓɛɛ, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ zang yee wu shaa kpang.
46007019	Naa zang yee shaa katɔ, naa zang yee shaa doo kpang, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe nandon, zang ri dũng rɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ.
46007020	Zang ɓu wu nwang naa ɓɔɔ wu nwang ka tìng, a Laa naa ɓaa wu nyaa nɛɛ wu naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
46007021	Naa Laa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa bɛɛ mɔɔ jaafoo, mɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kpãa mɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ jaafoo ɓɛɛ kpang. Mɔɔ nɛɛ walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yaa jaafoo nwannang katɔ, m'ɔɔ ti yaayi.
46007022	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa mɔɔ jaafoo ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ mɔɔ naa dũng Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kãntang keɓe, mɔɔ ɓaa tɔ̀'ɔ jaafoo kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ ɓ'ak'ɛ yuu tɔ nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Doo nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ jaafoo kpang, ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa wu nyaa, nw'ang jaafoo Kirisi tɔ.
46007023	Laa ningsi vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a hoo nɔɔ nɛɛ mani. Nɔɔ tɔ̀'ɔ jaafò'o shɔnzang kpang, nɔɔ manɛ kaa jaafò'o Yeesɔ Kirisi.
46007024	Rɛɛ manzung, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, n tɔɔ, zang ɓu wu yaa naa ɓɔɔ wu nw'angn'ɛ ka ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa wu nyaa ɓɛɛ kpang, wu ɓakɛ yuu ɓi nɛɛ Laa sasak.
46007025	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu, ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri gee soro gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓi Laa a m nyaa dannang ka yuu ruu keɓe kpang. N kɔɔ nɔɔ m ɓɔɔ yeti mɛɛ. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi pàlɛ̀ m tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n nwang zang ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang shing gn ka wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
46007026	Ɓɔɔ n zi ka yeti mɛɛ, naa zang nwang waati zang gee soro kpang, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki a ka naa ɓɔɔ zang dang jìng dɔli ɓɛɛ.
46007027	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gee soro tɔ, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, wu hing soro ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gee soro gn kpang, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ wu gee soro kpang.
46007028	Naa n kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ piti, naa zang ɓɔɔ gee soro palɛ wu vuu shi kpang kpang. Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri g'ee soro tɔ, ri naa dang jìng dɔli, ka koo keɓe. N kasɛ nɛɛ jìng dannang kaɓa wu à ka yuu manɛ kpang.
46007029	Manzung, m'ɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka vuu kɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓee. Diki ɓɔɔ Laa ka ruu ɓɛɛ, bee takpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu nɛɛ lɛɛkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri gee soro tɔ, ri nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ soro ɓarɛ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
46007030	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyavɔ ri nw'ang naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyavɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa tìnang, ri nw'ang naa zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa tìnang kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri hooro vuu, ri nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ vuu ɓarɛ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
46007031	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, ri shing danggn nandon ka yuu vuu keɓe kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, koo keɓe naa wee wu kãntang ɓee, waa nyaa kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
46007032	N kasɛ kpang, vuu keɓe ri kpãa nɔɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ gee soro gn kpang, rɛ̃rɛ ɓi ka ruu vuu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ gbete. Kasɛ nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ wu tãa tìnang ɓiɓɛ.
46007033	A zang ɓɔɔ gee soro tɔ, rɛ̃rɛ ɓi ka yuu vuu koo keɓe. Kasɛ nɛɛ soro ɓiɓɛ wu tãa tìnang ɓiɓɛ.
46007034	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓiɓɛ vãarɛ kaa tɔ nɔng ziti. Zang soro ri doo nɔngkɔ. Zang soro ɓɔɔ varɛ ɓiɓɛ tɔ̀'ɔgn kpang, nɛɛ wujɛ soro ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ ka yuu vuu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ri tuu yeti ɓarɛ nɛɛ bii ɓarɛ nandon ri a wu. A zang soro ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gee varɛ tɔ rɛ̃rɛ ɓi ka yuu vuu koo keɓe. Kasɛ nɛɛ ɓeevɛ wu tãa tìnang ɓiɓɛ.
46007035	N kɔɔrɔ ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ n yi nɔɔ naa ka bii ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ n nɔɔ nɔɔ gbalang kpang. N kasɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ti walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pàl'ɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi shoonang nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ.
46007036	Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri shu vuu tɔ ka yuu jaa soro ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ zirɛ sɛ̃ɛrɛ roonang nɛɛ jaa soro keɓe nɛɛ mãa wu kana dɔli, kàsɛ̀ nɛɛ wu nɛɛ tuu soro ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔ, wu tuu soro ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Palɛ wu vuu shi kpang kpang.
46007037	Naa zang zõ̀ng nɛɛ yeti zang, zang shing zang wu nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning kpang, nɛɛ zang g'ee jaa soro ɓɔɔ wu shu vuu tɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kaɓa kpang, rɛ̃rɛnang keɓe nwang nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ. Ti zi tɔ nɛɛ vuu kɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ ɓee, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Nɛɛ gee jaa soro bì'i kpang, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
46007038	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ gee jaa soro ɓɔɔ wu shu vuu tɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, p'alɛ̀ tɔ̃ɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ geenang kɔ p'alɛ̀ tɔ̃ɔ ɓa zang ɓɔɔ gee katɔ ɓɛɛ.
46007039	Zang soro ɓɔɔ gee varɛ tɔ, Laa ɓakɛ wu ɓi tɔ nɛɛ varɛ ɓiɓɛ dondong. A naa varɛ ɓiɓɛ vɔrɛ, wàl'ɛ gbalang katɔ wu gee varɛ ɓɔɔgn, ɓɔɔ bii tìng wu nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ. Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu gee doo zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa katɔ kɔ.
46007040	Ɓɔɔ n zi ka yeti mɛɛ, naa jaa soro kaɓa gee varɛ ɓɔɔ kpang, tãa tìnang ɓa ɓɔɔ wu nɛɛ gee varɛ ɓɔɔgn katɔ. N zi tɔ, Suru Laa kɔ tusu m vuu kɔ n kɔɔ ɓee.
46008001	N kaaɓi, n rang yee ka yuu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang bang vaka nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tɔɔ, ruu nandon ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ nizang tɔ. Nizang, ruu nandon ruu zi vuu tɔ. A zɔ̃ng vuu zinang kaɓa shing zang, zang wu tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ. Ɓi zɔɔ kasɛnang kɔ yi zang naa ka bii dɔli.
46008002	Naa zang ɓɔɔ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu zi vuu tɔ, zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu nɛ̀'ɛ zi ɓɛɛ gn kpang.
46008003	A zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ Laa, Laa zi wukɔ nɛɛ wu zang ɓiɓɛ.
46008004	Ka ruu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang bang vaka nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, suru ɓi kagn bii vaka kpang. Ruu ti zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓi gbete kɔ nwani.
46008005	Naa vuu doo kagn ka lapa, nɛɛ tipi gaagaa ɓɔɔ zang bang ri naa Laa ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ zang ri risi ri naa kpanti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
46008006	Ruu zi ɓuru tɔ, Laa ɓi gbete. Wukɔ Daa, wukɔ mãa vuu piti, wukɔ ti mãa ruu nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu a wu bannang. Kpanti ti gbete kɔ nwani, wukɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi. Laa mãa vuu piti nɛɛ bì'i ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Rùu ti nwang ningkãari ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
46008007	A kaa tɔ̀'ɔ zang piti ri zi tɔ nɛɛ vaka ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ bii ìi ri tɔ nɛɛ vaka. Kãntang ri zi ɓarɛ nɛɛ vuu shaanang kaɓa ɓi ɓɔɔ vaka. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ri shaa zɔ̃ng vuu shaanang kaɓa ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ vuu shaanang kaɓa shing ri ri nwang zang shi kpang.
46008008	Ruu zi tɔ, naa ruu shaa zɔ̃ng vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, naa ruu shaa doo kpang, vuu shaanang kaɓa, shing ruu, ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa kpang. Naa ruu shaa kpang, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Naa ruu shaayi naa risi ruu, ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ kpang.
46008009	Nɔɔ zi manɛ tɔ nɛɛ, Laa yaa ruu gbalang tɔ, ruu shaa zɔ̃ng vuu shaanang ɓu nandon. Nɔɔ palɛ waasɛ̃ nɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ shing zang ɓɔɔ danggn shinnang ɓarɛ zũng gn kpang ri nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang.
46008010	Naa zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ zɔ̃ng vuu shaanang kaɓa shing ri, ri nw'ang zang shi kpang, ri zì mɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zì ɓaa tɔ, mɔɔ nwang ka gãa vaka mɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang nwaa ka ruu vaka bannang. Shing wu katɔ wu naa shaa vuu shaanang vaka jong.
46008011	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa mɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang kaɓa, mɔɔ shing zang kaɓa yaa gbalang tɔ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shing ɓaazung ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ jong ning gbalang, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ ya?
46008012	Naa nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ ɓaazung manɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ri, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri zi ɓarɛ nɛɛ shing ri, ri nwang zang shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti pàlɛ̀ Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ jong.
46008013	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa n zirɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ n shaayi shing manzung katɔ wu palɛ vuu shi kpang, n shaa vuu shaanang kaɓa takpang dondong. N nɛ̀'ɛ shing manzung wu ning gbalang.
46009001	N zi m tɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zãa m katɔ kagn kpang. N m zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi. N ti zi Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ jìng mɛɛ. Nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ n atɛ ri nɛɛ ri naa dũng Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ n pàlɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ.
46009002	Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ doo kpang nɛɛ n zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang. Nɔɔ zi manɛ tɔ nɛɛ n m zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang zi ka nɔkɔ nɛɛ n zang shoonang Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
46009003	Naa zang ri rang ruu shi kpang ka yuu mɛɛ, n kɔɔ ri m nɛɛ,
46009004	Daa naa ɓɔɔ zang a ruu vuu shaanang nɛɛ vuu ɓoonang ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?
46009005	Vuu ɓɔɔ zãayi naa ruu gee zang soro ɓɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ kagn ya? Jaa soro bì'i wuti daarɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu daarɛ nɛɛ ruu, naa ɓɔɔ Bituru nɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ nimbang nɛɛ rɛɛ jaanaa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
46009006	Nɔɔ kɔɔ manɛ nɛɛ ɓi nkɔ nɛɛ Baranaba ruu palɛ shoonang nɛɛ naa ɓuru tɔ̀ɔ ruu walɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ruu shaa ɓɛɛ ya?
46009007	Sɔɔja ɓɔɔ kagn ta sìiri, wu ti kãa vuu shaanang nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ya? Zang ɓɔɔ kagn lang jaa shaa vuu ɓɔɔ wu lang ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Jagang napoo ri ɓoo mii napoo kpang ya?
46009008	N kɔ̀'ɔ ruu keɓe, wu naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rang yee waati kpang. Labeenang nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ Musa beeyi kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ.
46009009	Zang bèe nɔngkɔ, ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Musa nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ shoonang nɛɛ napoo ka jaa ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ mã wu nyaa ɓiɓɛ katɔ kpang.” Laa kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka yuu napoo kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ya?
46009010	Kpang, Laa kɔɔ ruu keɓe, ka yuu ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu shɔnzang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ lang jaa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ waa zee, ri sh'ing jìng katɔ nɛɛ zang a ri ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ jong ɓɛɛ.
46009011	Naa ɓɔɔ zang vang jìng vuu ka jaa, ruu kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ nɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ Laa tɔ. Ti nwǎng nɔɔ vuu Suru Laa kana ka yeti manɛ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a ruu vuu naa manɛ ɓɔɔ koo keɓe kpang ya?
46009012	Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn nɛɛ, nɔɔ a ri vuu naa manɛ katɔ, daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ alɛ ruu vuu, ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ katɔ kpang ya? Ruu zi tɔ nɔngkɔ, a ruu tɔɔ gngn nɛɛ, ruu gaa nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ a ruu vuu naa manɛ kpang. Ruu kasɛ tɔ ruu dang jìng kɔ jong, ka ɓɔɔ ruu, nɛ̀'ɛ nɔ̀'ɔ gbalang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.
46009013	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang ka yeti Gãa Laa, ri walɛ vuu shaanang ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang ri alɛ ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti palɛ shoonang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn, ri walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ri dɔɔ Laa ɓɛɛ jong.
46009014	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, ri ɓarɛ doo nɔngkɔ. Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ, zang ri a ri vuu nwannang koo keɓe katɔ, ka ruu shoonang ɓarɛ.
46009015	Naa doo nɔngkɔ piti, n tɔɔ gngn nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ wu a m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Wee n b'ee laa keɓe, n bee wu nɛɛ nɔɔ a m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. N vɔ katɔ gbã̀'agbãa, ka ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zãa m vuu ɓɔɔ n dɔɔ bii kagn ɓɛɛ.
46009016	Naa n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa doori, vuu ɓɔɔ naa n tuu yuu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi Laa kɔɔ m nɛɛ n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ. Jìng dannang kagn yuu mɛɛ, n nɛɛ kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kaɓa kpàng ɓɛɛ.
46009017	Naa nkɔ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ yeti mɛɛ nɛɛ, n kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, n nɛɛ shing jìng katɔ nɛɛ zang a m vuu ɓɔɔ. 'A ɓi nkɔ rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ n palɛ shoonang keɓe kpang, ɓi Laa yaa m shoonang keɓe ka naa, a dang m nyaa nɛɛ n pàlɛ̀ wu.
46009018	N walɛ ɓu viya? Wee n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa waati ɓee, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ n walɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa zang wu nɛɛ zang a m vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang.
46009019	N m jaafoo zang ɓɔɔ kpang. N m ti ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Naa n doo jaafoo zang ɓɔɔ kpang n risi yuu mɛɛ tɔ naa jaafò'o zang piti, tɔ̀ɔ, n atɛ zang dɔli ri naa dũng Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi.
46009020	N nɛɛ nwang nɛɛ zang Yahudawa n palɛ vuu naa zang Yahudawa, tɔ̀ɔ, n atɛ ri ri naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi. Naa nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ Laa a Musa yi m doo kpang, naa n nwang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang keɓe yi ri katɔ, n p'alɛ̀ bii naa zang ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang yi wu doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n gɔ̃ ri jong ri naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi.
46009021	Naa n nɛ̀'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng nyaa dannang Musa kpang, n palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n atɛ ri jong ri naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi. N tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, n dñ̀ng nyaa dannang Laa kpang kpang. N dũng m nyaa dannang Yeesɔ Kirisi.
46009022	Naa n nwàng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn gn gbãnggbãng ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn kagn ɓɛɛ kpang, n risi yuu mɛɛ naa ri. Tɔ̀ɔ, n atɛ ri, ri naa dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi. Naa zang nwang doo naa viya, n kasɛ tɔ n risi yuu mɛɛ naa ri. Tɔ̀ɔ, n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n zunung katɔ nandon, n gɔ̃ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ teteng ɓarɛ ri a ka bii Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta yuu ɓarɛ kati.
46009023	N palɛ vuu keɓe piti ka ruu, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa. Tɔ̀ɔ, n naa walɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ a ka bii zang ka ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kaa jong.
46009024	Naa zang gɛ̃ɛ zang nɛɛ ri yurɛ, zang dɔli ri yuku, a zang a ɓi kaa zang gbete, ɓɔɔ à tìng shɔɔnang kɔ vuu. Nɔɔ yuku nabm, tɔ̀ɔ, zang wu a nɔɔ vuu.
46009025	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu yurɛ, kpɛ̃ɛrɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ doo yunang waasɛ̃. Wu zãa yuu ɓiɓɛ vuu dɔli. Ri p'alɛ̀ nɔngkɔ nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang a ri vuu ɓɔɔ naa lasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu palɛ ɓuru nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang a ruu vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ kpang dondong ɓɛɛ.
46009026	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n yuu m kaara, tɔ̀ɔ, n daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang di nyaa yunang kagn ɓɛɛ. N nwang m naa zang ɓɔɔ gaa nyaa, wu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
46009027	N kasɛ tɔ n dang jìng ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, tɔ̀ɔ, n yiti yuu mɛɛ kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, Laa nɛ̀'ɛ naa bɛ̃ɛ m.
46010001	Manzung, n kasɛ danggn wu ning nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ri dũng Musa ɓɛɛ kpang. Sãmbong ɓɔɔ kagn sɔ̀ɔ ri tìng. A ri ti ra ka tipi waati, ri ta waapo ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Waapo ɓɔɔ mii ɓiɓɛ nwɛɛri ɓɛɛ.
46010002	Ka ɓɔɔ ri ra ka dii sãmbong, a ri ti rarɛ ri ta waapo, zang palɛ ri batizima. Batizima kaɓa, tusu kati nɛɛ, ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng Musa kɔ nandon.
46010003	Ri nandon ri shaa vuu shaanang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
46010004	Ri nandon ri ɓooro mii ɓɔɔ Laa a ri ɓɛɛ. Mii ɓɔɔ ri ɓoo ɓɛɛ, nwang nɛɛ yeti tari ɓɔɔ daarɛ nɛɛ ri ka ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ ka jìngti ɓɛɛ. Tari kaɓa wukɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ.
46010005	Ri nandon ri zi tìnang ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ, ri tãa ɓɛɛ katɔ, a ri dɔli ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ Laa yeti doo nɛɛ mani. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri vɔlɔ ka jìngti. Vɔrɔ ɓarɛ tantɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti.
46010006	Vuu kɔ ri palɛ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓee, nwàng ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ ɓɔɔ shaarɛ ruu nyaa nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu shing jìng kaa tɔ̀'ɔ vuu shi kpang palɛnang naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri palɛ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
46010007	N'ɔɔ bang vaka naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ri bang ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Zang keɓe ri nwang ka tipi, ri shaa vuu shaanang a ri ɓoo saa. A ri seepaa ri sɔ dang.”
46010008	Ruu p'alɛ̀ nɔɔ dũndũng naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ri p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang kaɓa ri palɛ dũndũng, a Laa nyɔ shɔnzang labang dakn bmati tu taati vɔrɔ ka laa gbete.
46010009	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, ri gãsɛ Laa nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa shing sɔkɔ, sɔkɔ yiki ri. Ruu gãsɛ Laa ɓuru jong naa rikɔ kpang.
46010010	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ, ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee, a zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ wukɔ nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ, arɛ naa nyɔ̀kɔ̀ ri vɔrɔ. Ruu gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee naa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
46010011	Vuu kɔ palɛ ri doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓa, nwàng ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ shaarɛ zang nyaa nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri palɛ kaa waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. Zang bèe vuu keɓe ka yeti labeenang nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang shaarɛ ruu nyaa nɛɛ mani. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, rùu nwàng ɓuru kaa làa ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa kagn a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.
46010012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zirɛ nɛɛ wu shi ɓi katɔ nɛɛ kaka gbatagbata, wu palɛ waasɛ̃, wu nɛɛ watɛ ka ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
46010013	Vuu gãsɛnang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ mani, ɓɔɔ ɓi n'aabm̀ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ zang nandon nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Laa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa ɓɛɛ, ɓi katɔ. Yaa vuu gãsɛnang ɓɔɔ ɓa kaka manɛ katɔ, wu a ka bii manɛ kpang. Naa vuu gãsɛnang a ka bii manɛ, a nɔɔ kaka katɔ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ taarɛ yuu, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ wɔ ɓɛɛ kati.
46010014	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ yaa vaka ta dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
46010015	Nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ yàa nɔɔ shoo kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ ta ka yeti manɛ naa vuu kɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓee tɔ̃ɔ ya?
46010016	Ka laa ɓɔɔ ruu nandon ruu shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ruu kpaa danggn Kpanti Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Ruu zã̀a Laa ka yuu juwa. Naa ruu ɓooyi ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ka zìi ɓiɓɛ. Ruu nɛɛ sha borodi tɔ, ruu shaayi ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ Kirisi nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ.
46010017	Ɓɔɔ ruu shaa borodi kaɓa, ruu dɔli, a borodi ɓɔɔ ruu shaayi, ɓi kaa gbete. Wukɔ tusu ruu nɛɛ ruu ɓuru gbete nɛɛ zɔɔ.
46010018	Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ nwannang zang Yahudawa karɛ. Ka nɔng ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ shaa yɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa, ri ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔrɔ wu yɔpɔ kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
46010019	N kɔ̀'ɔ ɓu nɛɛ viya? N kɔ̀'ɔ ɓu nɛɛ vaka vuu ɓɔɔ ya? A vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang a vaka palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ katɔ ya?
46010020	Kpang, n kɔ̀'ɔ wu nɔngkɔ kpang. N kɔɔ m tɔɔ, vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang, ri a vaka ri a ɓarɛ suru shi kpang. Ri dɔɔ ɓarɛ Laa kpang. N kasɛ kpang nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ suru shi kpang kpang.
46010021	N'ɔɔ ɓòo vuu ka juwa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, nɔɔ ti daa ɓ'oo ɓɔɔ ka juwa suru shi kpang, kpang. Nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɔɔ ti daa sh'aa ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang tɔkn kpang.
46010022	R'uu p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, Kpanti Laa kaa sũnyaa nɛɛ ruu ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu ɓa wu kaka katɔ ya?
46010023	Nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, zang zãa nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn gbete kpang. Nizang, zang zãa nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn gbete kpang, a wu kaa tɔ̀'ɔ vuu piti yǐ zang naa ka bii kpang. Nizang, zang zãa nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, a vuu kaa gn ɓɔɔ ri sh'ing zang zang ri sh'ii nɛɛ kaka ka vuu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang ɓɛɛ.
46010024	Zang ɓu wu p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yi zang ɓɔɔgn naa kaa bii ɓɛɛ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ kpang.
46010025	Shaa yɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang malɛ ka kasuwa ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ hɛ̃ɛlɛ zang ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ ɓɛɛ.
46010026	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Koo keɓe nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ piti ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ”.
46010027	Naa zang ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓi kpang, ɓàa zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ nyaa nɛɛ mɔɔ naa shaa vuu shaanang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, a mɔɔ kasɛ tɔ. Shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ wu shing mɔɔ ka tìng ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ kpang nɛɛ naa mɔɔ shaayi tɔ̃ɔ ya, kɔ shi kpang ya? kpang.
46010028	Zang ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ naa kɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ, “Vuu shaanang keɓe zang b'ang vaka nɛɛ mani.” Mɔɔ shaa kpang, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ mɔɔ kaɓa. Nɛ̀'ɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ nɔɔ p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ.
46010029	Mɔɔ y'aa vuu shaanang kaɓa ka ruu rɛ̃rɛnang zang kaɓa, wu ka ruu rɛ̃rɛnang ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N y'aa vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ n p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ka ruu viya?
46010030	Naa n zã̀a Laa ka yuu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ n shaa ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ m ka ruu viya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ n zãa Laa kagn ɓɛɛ ya?”
46010031	N kàs'ɛ zang keɓe nyaa nɛɛ, ka vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ nandon. Naa mɔɔ shaa doo vuu, naa mɔɔ ɓoo doo vuu, palɛ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a Laa bannang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
46010032	Palɛ waasɛ̃, mɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ zang ɓɔɔ yeti kpang, naa zang keɓe ri doo zang Yahudawa, naa doo zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang, naa doo zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.
46010033	Naa ɓɔɔ n kãa m gbalang n shing zang ri tãa tìnang ka vuu piti ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ. N shing jìng m ka vuu ɓɔɔ yi nkɔ naa ka bii shɛ̃ɛning kpang. N shing jìng m ka vuu ɓɔɔ, yi zang dɔli naa ka bii ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n atɛ ri, Laa wu ta yuu ɓarɛ kati.
46011001	Nɔɔ palɛ vuu doo naa ɓɔɔ n p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ naa ɓɔɔ Kirisi p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ.
46011002	N dɔɔ nɔɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ danggn ruu mɛɛ nandon, ning nɔɔ kpang ka vuu piti ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ n tùsù nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
46011003	A n kasɛ nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe katɔ. Kirisi wukɔ zang bang ka yuu zang varɛ, a zang bang zang soro ɓi kaa varɛ ɓiɓɛ. A zang bang Kirisi ɓi kaa Laa.
46011004	Zang varɛ nɛɛ gaa Laa, naa nɛɛ kɔɔ doo vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ wu ɓɛɛ, wu hãa vuu waayu ka yuu kpang. Naa hãayi sèng Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang ɓiɓɛ kpang.
46011005	Ɓɔɔ zang soro naa gaa Laa, naa nɛɛ kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ wu, wu z'uu yuu katɔ, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Naa zuu yuu kpang, sèng ɓeevɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ɓi gbete nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛ wu yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
46011006	Zang soro nɛɛ tɔɔ wu zùu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, wu yele suuyuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ kpiikpi. Ruu zi tɔ, naa zang yele suuyuu zang soro naa zang ti kpɛ̃ɛyi, ɓi vuu yusɛ̃ɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wu zuu yuu katɔ.
46011007	Ruu ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ, zang varɛ wu zùu yuu ɓi kpang, ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa mãa ɓi zang varɛ naa bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ti zi bannang Laa ɓi ka bii zang varɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ. A zang zi bannang zang varɛ ɓi ka bii ɓeeso.
46011008	Zang mãa zang varɛ wu nɛɛ bii zang soro kpang. Zang mãa ɓi zang soro kɔ jong nɛɛ bii zang varɛ.
46011009	Laa ti mãa zang soro ka ruu zang varɛ, wu zang varɛ ka ruu zang soro kpang.
46011010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang soro wu zuu yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri zi kaagn nɛɛ ɓeevɛ kɔ zang bang ɓiɓɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ri lasɛ yeti kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ wu kpang.
46011011	Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, ka wee ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓee, zang soro di bii kaa bii zang varɛ. A zang varɛ ti di bii kaa bii zang soro.
46011012	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃ng kaka zang varɛ a mãa zang soro nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Kãntang keɓe, kaa zang soro yi zang varɛ kati. A vuu piti à ɓi kaa nɛɛ bii Laa.
46011013	Nɔɔ zi ɓu biya ka yeti manɛ viya? Naa zang soro shii paa ka Gãa Laa, gaa Laa, zuu yuu ka takpang tɔ̃ɔ ya?
46011014	Ka gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ vuu ɓɛɛ, naa suuyuu zang varɛ b'ee dɔli palɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ kpang ya?
46011015	Ɓɔɔ zang soro suuyuu beebang ɓi vuu jasang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa a wu suuyuu beebang tɔɔ, wu zuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
46011016	Naa zang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ruu keɓe, wu zirɛ nɛɛ ruu nandon nɛɛ zang Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ka bm bm nandon, ruu palɛ ɓuru nɔngkɔ.
46011017	Ka vuu kɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee, n dɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ka yuu vuu keɓe kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ bang Laa, nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang dɔli ɓa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ katɔ.
46011018	Vuu ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang keɓe. Zang ri kɔɔ m nɛɛ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ nɛɛ kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɔɔ basɛ zɔɔ ka vaa ka bm bm, nɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang. N zirɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ruu keɓe nizang.
46011019	Nɔɔ basɛ zɔɔ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa nɔngkɔ kpang, zang zi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yeti gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.
46011020	Wee nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ ɓee, naa nɔɔ kpalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang, nɔɔ kpaa manɛ danggn Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang.
46011021	N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ shaa vuu shaanang kana, zang ɓu shaa ɓi vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nyɔ ri ɓarɛ katɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓoo saa ɓarɛ tɔ, ri puu tɔ, saa yee ri kana.
46011022	Ayii! Gãa manɛ kagn ɓɔɔ naa nɔɔ shaa vuu, nɔɔ ti ɓoo vuu ɓoonang kagn ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Nɔɔ seng zang Laa kpang ka ruu viya? A nɔɔ ti palɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang vuu yusɛ̃ɛ wiya? N kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ɓu kaa nɛɛ viya? Nɔɔ shing ɓu ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ n dɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ katɔ ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ naa weɓe ya? Kpang. N dɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ kpang tingkiring.
46011023	Laa tùsù m vuu kɔ n tusu nɔɔ ɓee doo ka tìng. Tùsù m tɔɔ nɛɛ zìi, ka diki ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ yuu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kagn ɓɛɛ. Tuu borodi ka naa,
46011024	zãa Laa tɔ, a shalɛ. A kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Wee bii mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n a zang ka ruu manɛ kɔ. Nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ kpaa danggn mɛɛ kaa gn.”
46011025	Zang shaa borodi tɔ, a Kpanti Yeesɔ ti tuu juwa ɓɔɔ mii inabi kagn doo nɔngkɔ, a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Wee juwa ɓɔɔ naa tusu zang nɛɛ Laa mã nyaa shɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ, nɛɛ zìi mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ p'al'ɛ nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓoo ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ kpaa danggn mɛɛ kaa gn.”
46011026	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ gaayu lɛɛkɔ sasak, diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gbãayu a nɛɛ mani, lee ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shaa borodi naa weɓe, a nɔɔ ɓoo mii inabi naa weɓe. Nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ manɛ zang nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ vɔ ka ruu zang nandon.
46011027	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ shaa borodi Yeesɔ keɓe nɛɛ ti ɓoo mii inabi ɓiɓɛ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ daa naa kpang ɓɛɛ. Nwang naa ɓɔɔ palɛ bii Kpanti Yeesɔ nɛɛ zìi ɓiɓɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
46011028	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓu wu bengke yeti ɓiɓɛ ka gbongkarɛ waasɛ̃ tɔɔ wu shaa borodi Kpanti Yeesɔ, wu ti ɓoo mii inabi ɓiɓɛ.
46011029	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi dìiri bii kpanti Yeesɔ keɓe kpang, nɛɛ shaa borodi nɛɛ ti ɓoo mii inabi zang keɓe gɔ̃ jìng dannang Laa a nɛɛ mani ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
46011030	Ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, zang dɔli ka teteng manɛ vuu palɛ ri katɔ. Nɔɔ ti lakɛ naa ka bii kpang. A zang ɓɔɔ ti vɔlɔ.
46011031	Naa ruu bengke yeti ɓuru waasɛ̃ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu shaayi, Laa naa dɔ̀ng ruu ruu kpang.
46011032	Kpanti Yeesɔ dɔng ruu ruu, a ti gɔ̃ ruu shoo waati kpang, tusu ruu gbalang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, diki ɓɔɔ wu naa dɔng zang koo ruu kagn wu ɓakɛ ruu kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ ri kpang.
46011033	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe. Ka laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ nɔɔ gã zɔɔ katɔ.
46011034	Zang ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ nɛɛ nyɔ wu dɔli, wu shaa vuu shaanang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ wu arɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ shingnɛ Laa wu dɔng nɔɔ ruu nɛɛ zɔɔ kpalɛnang manɛ kpang. N nɛɛ naa a tɔ ka nɔng manɛ, n naa kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ ruu ditɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
46012001	Manzung, ruu rɛ̃rɛ nɔɔ kaa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a zang ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe katɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
46012002	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ ɓeleng bɛɛ nɔɔ shing danggn gn ka bii Kpanti Laa kpang, zang tusu nɔɔ gbalang ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ bang vaka ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓarɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
46012003	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kasɛ nɔɔ zi tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Naa zang ɓɔɔ rang yee, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a wu, zang kaɓa ràng yee shi kpang ka yuu Yeesɔ kpang. zang ɓɔɔ ti zunung kɔɔnang katɔ nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ kɔ Kpanti ɓuru.” kpang, naa Suru Laa kɔ a wu naa kɔɔnang kpang ɓɛɛ.
46012004	Vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a zang naa nɛɛ zang ri palɛ, ɓi kagn ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. A Suru Laa ɓi kaa gbete kɔ nwani.
46012005	Shoonang ɓɔɔ zang ti pàl'ɛ Yeesɔ kagn ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, a Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang ri palɛ wu shoonang keɓe, ɓi kaa gbete kɔ nwani.
46012006	Naa ɓɔɔ zang ri palɛ shoonang kagn ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, a Laa ɓɔɔ a zang naa vuu palɛnang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu keɓe nandon, ɓi kaa gbete.
46012007	Suru Laa tusu zang bii ɓiɓɛ ka bm bm, tɔ̀ɔ, zang kaɓa wu yi zang Laa nandon naa kaa jong ka bii.
46012008	Suru Laa a zang gbete naa, wu rang yee nɛɛ zũnang. Suru gbete keɓe, wu ti a zang ɓɔɔ naa, wu kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu ɓɛɛ.
46012009	Suru Laa a zang ɓɔɔ naa, ri shing danggn ka bii kpanti Yeesɔ, wu ti a zang ɓɔɔ naa ri masɛ zang kɔɔnang.
46012010	Zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri naa, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a wu ɓi, naa wu kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri ɓarɛ naa, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Suru Laa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Suru Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri naa, ri rang nyaa ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri ɓarɛ naa, ri kɔɔ zang dìiri nyaa kaɓa.
46012011	Ka vuu kɔɔ zang palɛ nandon ɓee, ɓi doo Suru gbete keɓe kɔ, a zang naa, zang ri palɛ nɔngkɔ. Wu a zang ɓu naa vuu palɛnang kaɓa n'aabm̀, naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
46012012	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓakɛ, a raa bii shɔnzang ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. A bii shɔnzang ɓi kaa gbete kɔ nwani, vuu keɓe ri ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɔng gbete, tɔ̀ɔ, ri nwang kaa bii gbete. Yeesɔ Kirisi nwang doo nɔngkɔ.
46012013	Ruu doo nɔngkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng ɓuru, ri ɓarɛ zang Yahudawa, a zang ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ zang Yahudawa kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ jaafoo a zang ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ jaafoo kpang. Ruu nandon, ruu raa tɔ naa zang gbete, ka làa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ruu batizima ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ ka diki kaɓa, Laa a ruu Suru ɓiɓɛ gbete kaɓa kɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa a ruu ɓi Suru gbete kaɓa kɔ nandon nɛɛ wu nwang ka yeti ɓuru.
46012014	Vuu dɔli ɓakɛ, a raa bii shɔnzang kati. Bii shɔnzang wu vuu gbete kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang.
46012015	Naa doo shɔnzang kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N m naa kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n m ka bii kpang.” Ruu keɓe kɔ shing wu nwang tɔ̀'ɔ bii kpang kpang.
46012016	Naa shoo kɔɔ jong nɛɛ, “N m jìng kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n m ka bii kpang.” Nw'ang kaa wukɔ wu y'aa bii ya?
46012017	Naa bii shɔnzang nɛ̀'ɛ jìng kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ tãa nɔng nɛɛ viya? Naa bii shɔnzang nɛɛ shoo kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ gũng sɛ̃ɛ vuu nɛɛ viya?
46012018	A Laa mã̀a bii ɓuru kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɔngkɔ kpang, Laa mã̀a bii shɔnzang nɛɛ vuu ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
46012019	Naa bii ɓuru nɛɛ vuu gbete kɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ ɓi bii kpang.
46012020	Nizang, vuu kagn bii ɓuru dɔli, a bii ɓi kaa gbete gã̀agã̀a.
46012021	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, gbalang ɓɔɔ jìng kɔɔ naa nɛɛ, “N palɛ vi nɛɛ mɔɔ viya?” kagn kpang. Yuu ti kɔɔ doo nɛɛ “N palɛ vi nɛɛ nɔɔ viya?” kpang.
46012022	Wu nɔngkɔ kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ ka bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ nɛɛ ri lakɛ kpang, naa ri kpang ruu nwàng ningkãari kpàng,
46012023	Vuu ɓɔɔ ka bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu risi naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ruu gãng jìng ka rikɔ gbãnggbãng. Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi ka bii ɓuru nɛɛ shi kpang, ruu gang jìng ka rikɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
46012024	A vuu ɓɔɔ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ruu ri kpang, ruu yaa ri ka nɔngkɔ. Laa shìli bii shɔnzang nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu a vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu a wu bannang kpang bannang kati.
46012025	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang basɛ bii katɔ kpang. Vuu keɓe nandon ri yi zɔɔ naa ɓarɛ ka bii teetee.
46012026	Naa vuu gbete ka bii ɓuru dang jìng, bii nimbang keɓe ri dang jìng kaa nyaa zɔɔ.
46012027	Ɓɔɔ manɛ, nɔɔ nandon nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ, nɔkɔ manɛ kaa bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ ɓi gbete ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓu ka teteng manɛ, ka bii keɓe kɔ.
46012028	Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, Laa kɔɔyi, nɛɛ zang ɓu wu nwangnɛ, shoonang ɓiɓɛ kagn. Gaayu zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri nwang zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi. A naa zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri kɔɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ri ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓang knti zang tìng. A zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri màsɛ̀ zang kɔnang, ri ɓang knti. Zɔ̃ngkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri yi zang naa ka bii. Nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ɓarɛ zang bang ɓɔɔ ri yiti zang ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang nɛɛ n'aa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a ri ɓɛɛ.
46012029	Zang piti ri zang shoonang Kirisi kɔ nandon kpang, zang piti ri wu zang nyaa shoonang Laa kpang, wu zang piti ri tusu zang ruu Laa kpang. Laa a zang piti naa nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn kpang.
46012030	Wu zang piti, ri màs'ɛ zang kɔnang kpang, wu ti zang piti, ri kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ kpang, wu zang piti nwangsɛ zang dìiri ruu kaɓa kpang.
46012031	Ɓɔɔ manɛ, nɔɔ shing manɛ jìng nɛɛ Suru Laa naa a nɔɔ naa ditɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri ɓa weɓe shinang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa veɓe nandon keɓe, nɔɔ palɛ vuu ka gbalang kɔ n t'us'u nɔɔ ɓee.
46013001	Naa n zunung yee rannang doo katɔ nɛɛ nyaa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ka koo, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ. A n kasɛ zang kaa takpang n nwang naa gbongshɛng ɓɔɔ kaa nyaa ɓɛɛ. N ti nwang naa gbongbolong ɓɔɔ ri goo nyaa ɓɛɛ.
46013002	Naa Laa a m naa vuu palɛnang, naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu m ɓɛɛ. Naa n ti zi vuu piti. Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa waasɛ katɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ n ti zi tɔ jong. Naa Laa a m doo zɔ̃ng danggn shinnang ɓɔɔ naa n zunung katɔ, n kɔɔ kɔpɔ wu dɔ̃sɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn. Naa n kasɛ zang kpang, n m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang tingkiring.
46013003	Naa n tuu doo vuu naa mɛɛ nandon, n bàsɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A n ti kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ zang tuu m zang dɔɔ m ka waa. Naa n kasɛ zang kpang, vuu keɓe ri nwang m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang.
46013004	Naa mɔɔ kàsɛ̀ zang katɔ, mɔɔ mã danggn dɔli. Mɔɔ ti pàl'ɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, mɔɔ kaa sũnyaa kpang. Mɔɔ ràng yee bang bang ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Mɔɔ ti tuu yuu ɓaa kpang.
46013005	Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ zang katɔ nw'ang ɓi nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ zang. Kàsɛ̀ ɓi yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang. Lasɛ yeti ɓi pati kpang. Yiti vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ ka yeti kpang.
46013006	Zang ɓɔɔ kàsɛ̀ zang katɔ, naa zang palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ tãa tìnang katɔ. Naa zang palɛ vuu shi kpang, tãa tìnang kpang.
46013007	Zang kasɛnang yaa vuu nyaa ka gbalang kpang, shing danggn ɓi sasak, yaa gn naa ka vuu kpang, mã danggn ka vuu piti.
46013008	Zang ɓɔɔ kàsɛ̀ zang katɔ, di nyaa zang kasɛnang ɓi kpang. Diki a kana ɓɔɔ zang ri naa yaa vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ri kɔɔrɔnang. Diki a kana ɓɔɔ zang ri naa kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ ruu tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ kpang, kpang. Vuu zinang ti naa waa nyaa kaa tɔ.
46013009	Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ruu Laa ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ri ɓarɛ nyaa kiiri kpang.
46013010	Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa shing vuu piti, wu nwang nyaa kiiri, ka diki kaɓa kɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu nyaa kiiri kpang keɓe, ri waa nyaa kati.
46013011	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n doo wujɛ, n rangkɛ yee naa wujɛ. N ti rɛ̃rɛ naa wujɛ. N zili vuu m nɛɛ jìng wujɛ. A ɓɔɔ n bangnɛ, n yaa vuu wujɛ ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ nandon.
46013012	Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zili kãntang keɓe, ruu zirɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ruu pɛ̃ɛrɛ ka vìilaa ɓɔɔ wu kalangkalang kpang ɓɛɛ. Diki a ditɔ ɓɔɔ ruu zi ri tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ jìng ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ n zi kãntang keɓe, wu gň nyaa kiiri kpang. Ka diki kaɓa, n naa zi kaa nyaa kiiri naa ɓɔɔ Laa zì m tɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.
46013013	Vuu kagn taati ɓɔɔ ri waa nyaa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe rikɔ danggn shinnang, nɛɛ gn ɓɔɔ zang yaa naa kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang kasɛnang, ka teteng vuu taati keɓe, zang kasɛnang kɔ ɓa ri.
46014001	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ shing jìng ka zang kasɛnang gbãnggbãng. A nɔɔ ti shing jìng nɛɛ yeti gbete, Suru Laa wu a nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ shoonang nɛɛ manɛ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ shing jìng, wu a nɔɔ naa, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ kɔ gbãnggbãng.
46014002	Zang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a wu naa, a rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ, rang yee ɓi nɛɛ Laa, wu nɛɛ shɔnzang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shɔnzang ri tãa ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ kpàng ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔrɔ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa wàasɛ̀ zang katɔ, ɓɛɛ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a wu ɓɛɛ.
46014003	Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu, rang yee ɓi nɛɛ shɔnzang. Ruu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, yi zang naa katɔ ka bii. Ruu bì'i mã zang danggn katɔ, wu shingnɛ yeti ɓarɛ wu valɛ.
46014004	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang yi ɓi yuu ɓiɓɛ naa ka bii. A zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa, yi ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ naa ka bii.
46014005	N kasɛ nɛɛ Suru Laa wu a zang ɓu naa wu kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa, n kàsɛ̀ wukɔ gbãnggbãng. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓa zang ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kagn ɓɔɔ nwàngs'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa dìiri ruu bii kpang ɓɛɛ.
46014006	Manzung, ka diki ɓɔɔ n naa a ka nɔng manɛ, naa n ràng nɔɔ yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ n kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang, yee mɛɛ yi nɔɔ naa biya ka bii viya? Naa n arɛ, n tusu vuu ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ɓɔɔ Laa tusu m kpang, n ti shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ zi vuu tɔkn gaagaa kpang, naa n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa kpang, a n ti tusu ruu Laa kpang, ruu mɛɛ yì nɔɔ naa ka bii kpang.
46014007	N gãsɛ nɔɔ vuu, doo nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang gaarɛ soo nɛɛ mani naa leere, nɛɛ vũngta ɓɔɔ suru ka bii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa ri nw'angsɛ̀ soo wu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang, zang tã̀'a soo ɓɔɔ zang gaa ɓɛɛ biya?
46014008	Naa zang jèe gbò'o sìiri waasɛ̃ kpang, zang tãa biya zang kpalɛ bii sìiri tanang kaa viya?
46014009	Nɔɔ manɛ doo nɔngkɔ, zang ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ biya nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang tãa kpang ɓɛɛ. R'uu manɛ tɛɛ ɓi naa jasung waati.
46014010	Nyaa ɓɔɔ zang koo ri rangkɛ dɔli. Nyaa keɓe nandon nwang ka doo ruu.
46014011	Naa n tãa nyaa zang kpang, zang ɓɔɔ rang m nyaa kaɓa nw'ang ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ n tãa nyaa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. N m ti kaa doo zang ɓɔɔ wu tãa nyaa mɛɛ kpang kɔ.
46014012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, wee nɔɔ shing jìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa alɛ zang ɓee. Nɔɔ shing jìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ naa yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa naa nɛɛ mani ka bii kɔ gbãnggbãng. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri shii kaa nɛɛ kaka kɔ sasak.
46014013	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ, wu gaayi Suru Laa wu a wu naa ɓɔɔ wu nwàngs'ɛ zang dìiri ruu bì'i nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
46014014	N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang gàa Laa nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang, ɓi Suru ɓiɓɛ gaa Laa ɓiri. A yeti ɓiɓɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ ɓi kaa takpang.
46014015	A n palɛ ɓu kaa biya? Naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ keɓe. N gaa Laa nɛɛ Suru ɓɔɔ Laa a m ɓɛɛ, n ti gàa Laa jong nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang mɛɛ. N g'aa soo nɛɛ Suru ɓɔɔ Laa a m ɓɛɛ, n ti g'aa soo jong nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang mɛɛ.
46014016	Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, naa mɔɔ zãa Laa nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ, a zang ɓɔɔ tãa nyaa kaɓa kpang, tã̀'a ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zãa Laa kaa biya wu naa kasɛ nyaa kaa jong nɛɛ mɔɔ nɛɛ “Nɔngkɔ” viya?
46014017	Naa mɔɔ zãa Laa doo tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, Laa gaanang ɓaaɓɛ yi zang ɓɔɔ naa ka bii kpang.
46014018	N zãa Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru ɓiɓɛ a m naa tɔ, n r'ang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ n kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang, n ɓa nɔɔ katɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.
46014019	Naa doo nɔngkɔ piti, naa zang kpalɛ ka Gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ n zi ka yeti mɛɛ naa n kɔɔ ruu maani nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang ri tãa katɔ wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ naa n kɔɔ ruu labang kopi nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang ri tãa kpang ɓɛɛ.
46014020	Manzung, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ naa wujɛ kpang. Nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng shi kpang palɛnang, nɔɔ risi yuu manɛ naa wujɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng rɛ̃rɛnang, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ kaa rɛ̃rɛnang zang bang.
46014021	Zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ‘N naa shɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔgn, ri naa kɔ̀'ɔ zang mɛɛ keɓe ruu mɛɛ. N rang ri yee nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi nung kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa n rang yee doo nɔngkɔ piti, ri ɓaa shoo ri tãa m kpang’”.
46014022	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa Suru Laa a zang naa, zang rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn gn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang, ri zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ ɓi Laa rang yee. Wu ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ɓarɛ tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang. Zang nɛɛ kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu zang, wee ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Wu ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn gn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang kpang.
46014023	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri nɛɛ kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nandon, zang ɓu nɛɛ gaayu yee rannang tɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang. Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu keɓe kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓarɛ kpang, ri naa à ka nɔng, ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ shoko takɛ nɔɔ manɛ tɔ kɔ nandon.
46014024	A naa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri kɔɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ri, naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu keɓe kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓi kpang, à ka nɔng. A tãa ruu ɓarɛ kaɓa nandon, ruu kaɓa tusu wu nɛɛ wu ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu kaɓa, ri dɔng wu ruu katɔ.
46014025	Ruu kaɓa nwàngs'ɛ wu rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ruu kaɓa shing wu wu tang ka tìng Laa wu bang Laa. Wu ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ Laa kagn nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ nizang.
46014026	Manzung, nɔɔ nɛɛ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu biya? Nɔɔ nɛɛ kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ bang Laa, zang gbete wu tusu soo ɓɔɔ zang gaa ɓɛɛ. Zang gbete wu tùsù zang ruu Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ wu tùsù zang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ wu rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ wu ti kɔɔ zang ɓi dìiri ruu keɓe. Zang ri palɛ vuu piti naa ɓɔɔ yi zang naa ka bii, zang ri zi ruu Laa kaa gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ.
46014027	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ kagn nɔng, ɓɔɔ ri rang yee nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang. Zang ri ɓa taati kpang, ka teteng ɓarɛ, ri rang yee. Ri ti rang gbete gbete. Zang ɓu nɛɛ rang tɔ, wu yaa zɔɔ nɔng. Zang ɓɔɔ ri ti kɔɔ zang kaa dìiri ruu bì'i, tɔ zang piti ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ ɓɛɛ kati.
46014028	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kagn nɔng, ɓɔɔ Laa a wu naa dìiri ruu ɓɔɔ zang rang nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang kaɓa zinang kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri rang nyaa kaɓa ri vɔ̃ nyaa katɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri r'ang nyaa bì'i nɛɛ Laa ka yeti ɓarɛ.
46014029	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ri, ri nɛɛ ka nɔng ri ziti kɔ taati ri rang yee. Zang ɓɔɔ nimbang ri rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ ɓarɛ kaa tɔ waasɛ̃ ka yuu ruu ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
46014030	Naa Laa tusu zang ɓɔɔ, vuu shɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ bɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ shiiyi, kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu. Zang ɓɔɔ shiiyi, ɓɔɔ rang yee ka nyaa kaɓa wu vɔ̃ nyaa ka gbongkarɛ.
46014031	Zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu, wu yaa zang ɓɔɔ nɔng, tɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi wu nwàng zang vuu kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu ɓarɛ wu mã zang piti danggn kati.
46014032	Zang ɓɔɔ Laa a ri Suru ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ri, ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri yiti Suru ɓɔɔ Laa a ri kaɓa katɔ.
46014033	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa tã̀a tìnang nyaa ɓɔɔ ruu haa kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa ruu nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ, Laa tãa tìnang wukɔ jong. Ka Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kagn nandon.
46014034	Zang soro ri vɔ̃ nyaa katɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ nɔɔ bang Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri rang yee ɓarɛ kpang. Ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ katɔ kpang, naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ.
46014035	Ri nɛɛ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri hɛ̃ɛ zang, ri yaa gbongkarɛ. Ri nɛɛ shɛ̃ɛ gãa tɔ, ri hɛ̃ɛ varɛ ɓarɛ. Naa zang soro rang yee ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ zɔɔ ka Gãa Laa, ɓi vuu yusɛ̃ɛ.
46014036	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ, ruu Laa nwang nyaa nɛɛ bii manɛ kɔ ya? Nɔkɔ tãa ruu bì'i gbete ya?
46014037	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu wu ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ti rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ suru Laa ti a wu naa tɔ. Wu zi katɔ nɛɛ ruu kɔ n bè'e nɔɔ ɓee, ɓi Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ dang nyaa nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu keɓe.
46014038	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tà ruu keɓe nɔngkɔ kpang, zang ri ɓaa shoo ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kpang jong.
46014039	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, manzung, n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn Suru Laa wu a nɔɔ naa, nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Laa tusu nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ zãa zang yee rannang nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ katɔ kpang, kpang.
46014040	Nɔɔ palɛ vuu kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ zang haa nyaa kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
46015001	Manzung, n kaa ɓi n kpaa nɔɔ danggn Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ɓeleng n kɔɔ nɔɔ ka tìng ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Bɛɛ nɔɔ ta ruu bì'i tɔ, a nɔɔ shii tɔ kagn nɛɛ kaka manɛ gbãnggbãng.
46015002	Laa ti t'a yuu manɛ kana ka ruu ruu kaɓa, nɔɔ nɛɛ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn kagn tɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
46015003	N kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe tɔ ka tìng, ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔɔ m ka tìng ɓɛɛ. Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe ɓa vuu piti katɔ, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe, kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ Kirisi vɔ ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang b'ee ka yeti labeenang Laa ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ wu naa palɛ ɓɛɛ.
46015004	Zang nɛɛ Yeesɔ vɔrɛ, zang gbãa wu, Laa wisi wu paa ka lee ɓɔɔ diki ɓiɓɛ daa taati ka sàa ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang b'ee ka labeenang Laa ka tìng nɛɛ naa palɛ ɓɛɛ.
46015005	Ɓɔɔ Laa wisi wu paa tɔ, tusu Bituru yuu ɓiɓɛ. A naa tusu zang kopi tu ziti ɓɔɔ ri mantɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ, yuu ɓiɓɛ jong.
46015006	Ka laa ɓɔ̀'ɔgn ti tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ri ɓa laa maani dakn mani katɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ, a ri zi wu jong. Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zi wu kaɓa, zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, a ɓɔɔ nimbang ɓarɛ doo ningkãari.
46015007	Diki ɓɔɔ kagn tusu Yakubu yuu ɓiɓɛ. Nɛɛ knti, naa tùsù zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ nandon yuu ɓiɓɛ jong.
46015008	Nkɔ m kaa zang ɓɔɔ wu gɔɔ nyaa yuu ɓiɓɛ tusunang ka bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ n nwang m naa jaa ɓɔɔ bɛɛ daa naa yinang gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
46015009	Ka teteng zang shoonang Yeesɔ nandon, nkɔ waa nyaa knti tingkiring. N daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa m nɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka ting, n dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa jìng ɓɛɛ.
46015010	A gn mɛɛ naa kɔng Laa. Ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang, palɛ m tɔ̃ɔ, a shing m n raa zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi m kãntang keɓe. Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ m, wu waati kpang. Nw'ang vuu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n palɛ shoonang nɛɛ kaka mɛɛ, n ɓa zang shoonang ɓɔɔ nimbang nandon ɓɛɛ. N palɛ vuu keɓe wu nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ kpang, ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka bii mɛɛ palɛ.
46015011	Naa doo nkɔ kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ keɓe, naa ti nkɔ kpang, naa rikɔ kɔɔyi p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Ruu nandon ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ doo ruu tɔ̃ɔ gbete keɓe kɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi, a nɔɔ ti shing danggn tɔ jong.
46015012	Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kɔ, ruu kɔɔrɔ zang ɓee, kɔɔyi nɛɛ Laa w'is'i Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ sàa. Laa nɛɛ w'is'i Yeesɔ Kirisi paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa, a palɛ biya, zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ri kɔɔ nɛɛ zang naa wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ nɛɛ sàa kpang viya?
46015013	Naa zang nɛɛ naa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa kpang, nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ Laa wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa doo nɛɛ sàa kpang kɔ ɓɛɛ.
46015014	Naa Laa wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ sàa kpang, nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ r'uu kɔ rùu kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ ɓee, ɓi waati ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti shing danggn tɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
46015015	Laa nɛɛ wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ sàa kpang, nwang kaa naa ruu kɔɔ r'uu tɔ nɛɛ sè'e ka yuu Laa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang tɔ nɛɛ ɓi Laa wisi, Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ. A ɓeekpang nizang, Laa wisi zang paa katɔ nɛɛ sàa kpang ɓɛɛ.
46015016	Nɛɛ nizang, Laa wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa kpang, Laa wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa doo nɛɛ sàa kpang kɔ.
46015017	Laa nɛɛ wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa gn nɛɛ sàa kpang, nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn manɛ waati ɓɛɛ. Laa yaa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ ɓi gn kpang.
46015018	Ti nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi a ri vɔlɔ, ri shaarɛ ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
46015019	Naa ruu shing jìng ka bii Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu yi ruu naa ka bii ka ruu vuu koo keɓe kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ruu nw'ang vuu gn kɔnang ɓa zang piti.
46015020	Nizang, Laa wisi Yeesɔ Kirisi paa tɔ nɛɛ sàa. Ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ ɓɛɛ, Laa wisi wukɔ paa shɔɔnang, a ruu zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ Laa naa wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ paa ditɔ jong nɛɛ sàa.
46015021	Ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, vɔrɔ a ka koo nɛɛ bii zang gbete, ti doo zang gbete kɔ shingnɛ, Laa wisi ruu paa nɛɛ sàa.
46015022	Zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔ̀l'ɔ kãntang keɓe ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang yi ri nɛɛ bii Adamu, Laa ti naa a zang piti suru bii doo nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri ɓakɛ bii tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
46015023	Vuu keɓe piti ri palɛ ka laa ɓarɛ. Kirisi kɔ yupaa shɔɔnang nɛɛ sàa, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu naa gbãayu ka koo keɓe, Laa naa wisi zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ Kirisi paa ditɔ nandon.
46015024	Tɔ̀ɔ, diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa kagn wu a kati. Ka laa kaɓa, Yeesɔ naa ɓa vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri roo kpanti ka koo keɓe yuu, nɛɛ vuu piti ka lapa ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ. Wu naa ningsi naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ. Wu tuu kpanti ka yuu vuu piti, wu a Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓiɓɛ kati.
46015025	Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe, ɓi Kirisi kɔ kpanti, diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa ɓa yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ Kirisi kpang nandon, wu a nɛɛ mani. Laa wu ti shing ri, Yeesɔ wu naalɛ ri nɛɛ doo.
46015026	Vɔrɔ kɔ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ Kirisi kpang, ɓɔɔ Laa naa ningsi wukɔ doo knti.
46015027	Nw'ang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, Laa “Shing Jaa ɓiɓɛ tɔ, wu naa vuu piti nɛɛ doo ɓiɓɛ.” Ɓɔɔ zang bee naa weɓe ruu zi tɔ vuu piti naa ɓaa shoo ɓi kaa nyaa Yeesɔ kɔ. Nwàng wu naa ɓɔɔ Laa naa sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka dii ka tìng Yeesɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔ shing vuu kaɓa ri sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓarɛ ka dii ka tìng Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
46015028	Laa nɛɛ shing vuu piti tɔ, nɛɛ ri sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓarɛ ka dii ka tìng Yeesɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ, wu sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa dii ka tìng Laa, ɓɔɔ wukɔ shing wu ka tìng nɛɛ wu n'aa vuu piti nɛɛ doo ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu roo kpanti kaa yuu vuu piti, a vuu piti ri ɓakɛ zɔɔ kaa nɔng ɓiɓɛ.
46015029	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn zang palɛ ri batizima, ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa nɛɛ nizang kɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, ri yupaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ sàa kpang, ka ruu vi zang kaɓa ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ri palɛ batizima ka nung zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ viya?
46015030	A rukɔ, naa Laa naa wisi zang paa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ sàa kpang, ka ruu vi, ruu malɛ yuu ɓuru ka naa vɔrɔ diki diki viya?
46015031	Manzung, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, n nwàng m naa ɓɔɔ n vɔlɔ diki diki ɓɛɛ. N suu see kpang, naa n nɛɛ kɔ̀'ɔyi nɛɛ n tãa tìnang ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ manɛ kaa zang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
46015032	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n doo ka Afisa zang dɔli ri bɛ̃ɛ ruu mɛɛ. Nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ n gaa nyaa nɛɛ zing ɓɔɔ ri shaa varɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ. Naa Laa nɛɛ wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa kpang, n dàng jìng nɔngkɔ ka ruu viya? Vuu keɓe nwǎng m ɓu viya? Naa zang nɛɛ naa yupaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ sàa kpang, naa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, “Ruu shaa nɔɔ vuu shaanang, ruu tãa nɔɔ tìnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ɓuru ruu vɔlɔ kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
46015033	N'ɔɔ yaa zang ri nwaarɛ nɔɔ kpang. Naa mɔɔ rakɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shi kpang, mɔɔ naa palɛ doo shi kpang naa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
46015034	Nɔɔ yaa vuu shoko manɛ ta, a nɔɔ ti yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu nɔɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ri zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
46015035	Zang ɓɔɔ hɛ̃ɛ katɔ, nɛɛ “Zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ ri naa yupaa biya? Bii ɓarɛ naa nwang ɓi kaa biya?”
46015036	Zang ɓɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ naa weɓe, ri ɓarɛ shoko. Mɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ, jìng vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ka tipi vɔ ka gbongkarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu tarɛ kpang ya?
46015037	Jìng vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓaa ka tipi, ɓi jìng vuu waati. Mɔɔ ɓaa wu vuu bì'i dɔ̃ɔ gbete kpang. Mɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa jìng zaakn kpang, mɔɔ ɓaa jìng vuu ɓɔɔgn.
46015038	Laa a zɔ̃ng vuu ɓu bii ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Shing zɔ̃ng jìng vuu ɓu wu t'a bii naa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ ta ɓɛɛ.
46015039	Vuu ɓɔɔ ningkãari ka koo keɓe ri ɓarɛ ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Zɔ̃ng ɓu bii ɓarɛ n'aabm̀. Bii shɔnzang ɓi n'aabm̀, bii rɛɛ yɔpɔ jìngti ɓi ti n'aabm̀. Bii rɛɛ jaaning ɓi n'aabm̀, a ɓɔɔ jaazìi ti n'aabm̀.
46015040	Vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa bii ɓarɛ kagn. Vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka koo keɓe, bii ɓarɛ ti doogn kɔ. Shinang vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa n'aabm̀. Shinang vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi ɓi ti n'aabm̀.
46015041	Laa ɓɔɔ ruu zi ka lapa ɓɛɛ, yakɛ nɔng n'aabm̀, a shala ti yakɛ nɔng n'aabm̀. Shinang rɛɛ sang ɓi ti n'aabm̀. Sang ɓu jong nɛɛ shinang ɓiɓɛ n'aabm̀ n'aabm̀.
46015042	Bii zang ɓɔɔ yupaa nɛɛ sàa nw'ang ɓi doo nɔngkɔ. Bii shɔnzang nwàng ɓi doo naa jìng vuu kɔ. Ɓɔɔ zang gb'ãa bii, pũng ɓi katɔ. Laa nɛɛ naa wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa, bii ɓiɓɛ raa ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ pñ̀ng takpang, ɓɛɛ.
46015043	Ɓɔɔ zang gbãayi, shi ka jìng zang kpang, ti lakɛ naa ka bii kpang. Zang nɛɛ wisi wu kaa paa, bii raa kaa vuu ɓɔɔ shi dɔli ɓɛɛ. Ti lakɛ naa kaa gn bii ning.
46015044	Ɓɔɔ zang gbãayi ɓi bii shɔnzang, ɓɔɔ zang naa wisi wu paa ɓi ka bii suru. Bii shɔnzang kagn, bii ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ suru ɓi doo kagn kɔ.
46015045	Ka yeti labeenang Laa, zang beeyi nɛɛ, “Laa mãa Adamu, ɓɔɔ wukɔ shɔnzang ɓɔɔ nwang ningkãari shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.” A Adamu ɓɔɔ a doo knti ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ɓi kaa suru ɓɔɔ arɛ, nɛɛ wu a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ.
46015046	Ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ ɓɔ̀'ɔ, Suru Laa kɔ a shɔɔnang kpang, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ bii yɔpɔ kagn, nɛɛ kaka kɔ a shɔɔnang, tɔ̀ɔ, ɓɔɔ Suru Laa wu naa a kati.
46015047	Laa mãa Adamu ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang ɓi nɛɛ tapuru ɓɔɔ ka tipi ɓɛɛ. Adamu ɓɔɔ ɓang wu, a ɓi nɛɛ lapa.
46015048	Zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ɓarɛ ka koo keɓe, ri nwàng ɓarɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ Laa mãa wu nɛɛ tapuru ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ɓarɛ ka lapa, ri naa nw'ang ɓarɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ à nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ.
46015049	Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe, ruu nwàng naa zang ɓɔɔ Laa mãa wu nɛɛ tapuru ɓɛɛ. Lee ɓɔɔ ruu naa nw'ang ditɔ naa zang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ.
46015050	Manzung, n kɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang mãa nɛɛ yɔpɔ nɛɛ kaka, a ɓɔɔ zìi, daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti ɓi kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ p'ũng katɔ, nwang vuu ɓɔɔ pñ̀ng kpang ɓi kpang.
46015051	Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, n kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang waasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu vɔlɔ wu katɔ nandon kpang. Zang naa kɔ̃sɔ ruu bii ɓi katɔ kɔ jong nandon tantɛnang,
46015052	naa ɓɔɔ zang ka jìng ɓɛɛ. Ka ɓɔɔ zang naa jee vuukãng ɓɔɔ zang di nyaa vuu piti kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang nɛɛ jee tɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ri yuku paa tɔkn. Laa a ri kaa bii ɓɔɔ naa pũng takpang ɓɛɛ. Ka laa kaɓa, Laa naa kɔ̃sɔ ruu bii katɔ nandon.
46015053	Bii ɓuru kɔ pũng katɔ, ti vɔ katɔ ɓee, naa raa kaa vuu ɓɔɔ naa pũng takpang, ti vɔ takpang ɓɛɛ.
46015054	Ka laa ɓɔɔ bii ɓɔɔ pũng katɔ, ti vɔ katɔ kɔ̃sɔ bii, nwang kaa ɓɔɔ pũng takpang, ti vɔ takpang. Naa nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ zang b'ee ka ka yeti labeenang Laa doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang beeyi nɛɛ, “Laa ɓa vɔrɔ yuu tɔ, ti ningsi naa vuu palɛnang vɔrɔ tɔ.”
46015055	“Vɔrɔ ɓa suru bii yuu takpang dondong. N'aa ɓɔɔ wu palɛ zang vuu nɛɛ mani ti takpang.”
46015056	Vɔrɔ nyɔ zang ɓi ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu shi kpang ti walɛ kaka ɓi ka nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ Laa a ɓɛɛ.
46015057	Ruu zã̀a Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, ruu ɓa vɔrɔ yuu vɔrɔ tɔ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang piti ɓɛɛ. Ruu ɓa ri yuu nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
46015058	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, manzung, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka, vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing nɔɔ n'ɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ palɛ shoonang Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yeti manɛ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pàl'ɛ Kpanti Kirisi naa nwǎng nɔɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
46016001	Ka ruu saka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri ka Urushalima naa nɛɛ mani ka bii ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ palɛ doo naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka rɛɛ Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ka tipi Galatiya nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
46016002	Ka diki Lahadi, zang ɓu wu zɔ̃ng vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti saka ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ɓɛɛ. Wu shingnɛ ka ruu shoonang Laa palɛnang. Nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ sasak tɔ̀ɔ, ka laa ɓɔɔ n naa arɛ n leng nɔɔ, nɔɔ naa kp'alɛ̀ saka ɓɔɔ kaa takpang.
46016003	N nɛɛ naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng manɛ tɔ, n naa bee labeenang n a zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri ɓɛɛ, n naa shong ri, ri daa nɛɛ labeenang kaɓa. Ri t'uu saka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ ɓɛɛ, ri daa nɛɛ mani ka Urushalima.
46016004	Naa dà'a ɓɔɔ n dà'a Urushalima jong, tɔ̀ɔ, ri ti daa nɛɛ n.
46016005	N mangnɛ nɛɛ n dà'a ka tipi Makidoniya, tɔ̀ɔ, n a nɔng manɛ kati, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n tɔ̀ɔ, n s'ɔɔ tipi Makidoniya ɓɛɛ.
46016006	N shing jìng nɛɛ n naa nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ diki bee katɔ tɔkɔlɔng. Ǹ naa nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ pũngku wu waa nyaa nɛɛ mani. N nɛɛ tɔɔ n daa kaa tɔ, n'ɔɔ a m vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi m naa nɛɛ mani ka bii ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ ti daa shing m kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ n kasɛ daanang ɓɛɛ piti.
46016007	N kasɛ kpang nɛɛ n nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ tɔkɔlɔng, n laabì'i daanang kpang. N shing jìng nɛɛ n naa nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ diki wu bee m katɔ tɔkɔlɔng naa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
46016008	N naa nwang ka Afisa ka nihn diki nyaalaa Pentiko wu a nɛɛ mani.
46016009	Laa puu m gbalang tɔ nɛɛ n palɛ shoonang bang ɓɔɔ nwang vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, a zang dɔli ri shing jìng kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ n kpang.
46016010	Timoti nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng manɛ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ wu tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, pàl'ɛ Kpanti Kirisi doo shoonang kɔ naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ.
46016011	Zang ɓɔɔ wu pɛ̃ɛrɛ wu naa vìi kpang. Nɔɔ yi wu naa kɔ jong, ka bii n'ɔɔ a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu daa zanti nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu yi gbalang zanti ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔ̀'ɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ katɔ kpang. Wu ti gbãayu wu naa ìi m ka nihn. Ruu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nihn ruu gã wu katɔ.
46016012	Ka ruu jaanaa ɓuru Apolo, n gàar'ɛ wu gbãnggbãng nɛɛ wu dũng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, wu naa leng jìng ka nɔɔ. A pɛ̃ɛrɛ ka jìng ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ daa naa ɓɔɔ wu a kãntang gn kpang. Nɛɛ walɛ gbalang tɔ, a ditɔ ka nɔng manɛ.
46016013	Nɔɔ gãng jìng waasɛ̃. Nɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ yaa gn naa kpang, nɔɔ lakɛ yuu kagn.
46016014	Ka vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ, nɔɔ p'al'ɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ zɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
46016015	Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Sitifana nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ rikɔ t'a Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa shɔɔnang ka tipi Akaya. Ri ti a yuu ɓarɛ tɔ nɛɛ ri palɛ shoonang ri yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa naa ka bii.
46016016	N gaa nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe bannang katɔ. Nɔɔ ti seng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang nɛɛ ri katɔ.
46016017	N tãa tìnang tɔ dɔli ka ruu ɓɔɔ Sitifana nɛɛ Fɔtunati nɛɛ Akayiku ri a ka bii mɛɛ ka nihn ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ n zi ri, nwang kaa naa n zili nɔkɔ.
46016018	Ri mã m danggn tɔ naa ɓɔɔ ri mã nɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ seng ri tɔ.
46016019	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Asiya nandon, ri jee nɔɔ nyaa. Akpiila nɛɛ Pirisila, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka gãa ɓarɛ, ri ti jee nɔɔ nyaa jong tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ ri gbete ka bii Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
46016020	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nihn nandon, ri jee nɔɔ nyaa. N'ɔɔ ti j'ee zɔɔ nyaa jong nɔɔ kɔ̃ng zɔɔ katɔ ka ruu nung Laa.
46016021	Nkɔ Bulu, n bee nyaa kɔ n jee nɔɔ ɓee nɛɛ naa mɛɛ.
46016022	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kagn ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang, Laa wu shingnɛ wu shaarɛ dondong. Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi a ta.
46016023	Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
46016024	N kasɛ ruu manɛ katɔ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nandon ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ, nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
47001001	Labeenang keɓe a nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ m katɔ, a n nwang zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ manzung ɓuru Timoti, ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu bè'e zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka Koranti, nɛɛ zang Laa nandon ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Akaya nandon ɓɛɛ.
47001002	N gaa Daa ɓuru Laa, nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ ri a nɔɔ tìnang tãanang, ri ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.
47001003	Ruu zãa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa wukɔ ti Là'a Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Daa ɓɔɔ gn zang kɔng wu dɔli ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ Laa ɓɔɔ mã zang danggn ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ.
47001004	M'ã ruu danggn ka ɓɔɔ ruu dang jìng ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu zunung naa ɓɔɔ ruu mã zang ɓɔɔ ri dang jìng ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng danggn kaa jong ɓɛɛ. Zɔ̃ng danggn ɓɔɔ Laa mã ruu ɓɛɛ.
47001005	Kirisi dang jìng tɔ, a ruu ti dang jìng tɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ. A naa ɓɔɔ Laa mã Kirisi danggn, Laa ti mã ruu danggn doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi.
47001006	Naa ruu dàng jìng, jìng dannang ɓuru keɓe, wukɔ mã nɔɔ danggn, wu ti ta yuu manɛ. Laa nɛɛ mã ruu danggn tɔ, mã nɔɔ danggn tɔ jong, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã danggn kaa jong ka zɔ̃ng jìng dannang kɔ ruu dang ɓee.
47001007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa gn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii manɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ naa wee nɔɔ dang jìng tɔ naa ɓɔɔ ruu dang ɓee, Laa mã nɔɔ danggn kana naa ɓɔɔ wu mã ruu ɓɛɛ.
47001008	Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu kasɛ nɛɛ danggn jìng ɓɔɔ ruu dang ka tipi Asiya wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Jìng dannang kaɓa, bang dɔli, bɛɛ ruu yaa gn naa tɔ nɛɛ ruu nwàng tɔ̀'ɔ ningkãari kpang.
47001009	Ruu tɔɔ ɓuru naa zang dɔng ruu ruu tɔ, zang nyɔ ruu vɔrɔ. A ɓeekpang vuu keɓe palɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu tusu ruu nɛɛ r'uu di yuu ka bii ɓuru kpang, ruu di yuu ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ wisi zang paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
47001010	Ta yuu ɓuru ka jìng dannang ɓɔɔ bang dɔli, ɓɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ nyɔ ruu vɔrɔ kaɓa, naa ta yuu ɓuru ditɔ. Ruu shing gn ɓuru tɔ, ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, naa ta yuu ɓuru ɓi kaa nɔngkɔ sasak.
47001011	Nɔɔ nɛɛ yi ruu naa katɔ ka bii, n'ɔɔ gàa ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta gaanang ɓɔɔ zang dɔli ri gaa wu ka yuu ɓuru kati. Wu shingnɛ, ruu tãa tìnang kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang dɔli ri mɛɛ nyaa kaa lapa, ri zãa wu kati ka ruu ɓuru.
47001012	Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu tuu yuu ɓuru kagn lapa gbete, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ nwannang ɓuru ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ, ruu palɛ nizang nɛɛ yeti gbete, naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ruu palɛ wu ka doo zũnang yuu ɓuru kpang, ruu palɛ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàl'ɛ ruu ɓɛɛ.
47001013	Ruu bè'e nɔɔ ɓuru vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gãrɛ, nɔɔ zi katɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. N shing gn nɛɛ nɔɔ naa zi ditɔ nandon kpãngkpãng.
