47001014	Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi kãntang keɓe gn nandon kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ a kagn, n'ɔɔ naa tuu yuu ka ruu ɓuru naa ɓɔɔ ruu naa tuu ka ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
47001015	N zi tɔ nɔngkɔ kɔ, n mang ka yeti mɛɛ nɛɛ n gaayu n leng nɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ tãa tìnang kaa dakn ziti.
47001016	Bɛɛ n mangnɛ nɛɛ, n leng nɔɔ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ n daa Makidoniya ɓɛɛ, n nɛɛ ti gbãayu kaa tɔ, n ti sɔɔ nɔng manɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ yi m naa kaa bii, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n daa Yahudiya nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
47001017	Ɓɔɔ n mangnɛ, n tɔɔ, n a ka bii manɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ kɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang mɛɛ daa gn gbete kpang ya? Nɔɔ zi manɛ ɓu nɛɛ n mang vuu ka yeti mɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang koo ri palɛ ɓɛɛ ya? Tɔ̀ɔ, n kasɛ nyaa kaa nɛɛ “Nn” a ɓɔɔ kaa nɛɛ “Kpang” làa gbete ya?
47001018	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa suu sè'e ɓi kpang, doo nɔngkɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ, ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ “Nn”, zang ti kɔsɔ nyaa nɛɛ “Kpang” làa gbete kpang.
47001019	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi Jaa Laa, ɓɔɔ Siila nɛɛ Timoti, a ɓɔɔ nkɔ, ruu kɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ “Nn” a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ “Kpang” kpang. Yeesɔ kɔɔ ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ diki diki, ta nyaa ziti ɓi jong kpang.
47001020	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a zang nandon, Laa palɛ katɔ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu nɛɛ kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ, “Wu nwang nɔngkɔ” nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ruu a Laa ɓuru bannang.
47001021	Ɓi Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ shing ruu, ruu zi gbãnggbãng nɛɛ ruu wàlɛ̀ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ, nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ shɛ̃ɛrɛ ruu, a kusu ruu dang gbete.
47001022	Shing vuu ka bii ɓuru, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri zi kaa gn nɛɛ rùu ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ. A a ruu Suru ɓiɓɛ tɔ ka yeti, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu zi kaa gn nɛɛ naa 'a ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing ruu katɔ ɓɛɛ ditɔ nandon.
47001023	Laa kɔ kɔ̀ɔ r'uu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu mɛɛ, N à Koranti takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ n tɔɔ, n kpãa nɔɔ takpang ɓɛɛ.
47001024	Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ, rukɔ r'uu tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu zi tɔ, nɔɔ shii tɔ gbãnggbãng, ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ. Ruu palɛ shoonang ɓuru nɛɛ nɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ tãa tìnang kati kɔ jong.
47002001	N mang m tɔ ka yeti mɛɛ nɛɛ, n leng jìng tɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ, n làsɛ̀ nɔɔ yeti tɔkn kpang.
47002002	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n nɛɛ lasɛ nɔɔ yeti tɔ, wi yaa kati ɓɔɔ shing m yeti mɛɛ wu valɛ wiya? Yaa ɓi doo zang ɓɔɔ n lasɛ ri yeti keɓe kɔ.
47002003	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n bèe nɔɔ labeenang kaɓa. N kasɛ kpang n a ka bii manɛ, yeti wu lasɛ m nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔkɔ nɛ̀'ɛ shing m, n tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi tɔ ka yeti mɛɛ, n nɛɛ tãa tìnang tɔ, nɔɔ piti nɔɔ tãa tìnang tɔ jong.
47002004	Ɓɔɔ n bèe nɔɔ labeenang kaɓa, vuu kpãa m ka yeti dɔli, a yeti mɛɛ ti lasɛ katɔ gbãnggbãng. N kaa nɛɛ miiri. N kasɛ kpang, n lasɛ nɔɔ yeti kpang. N kasɛ katɔ kɔ jong, nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ gbãnggbãng nandon ɓɛɛ.
47002005	A naa zang ɓɔɔ kagn, lasɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yeti ka teteng manɛ, lasɛ ɓi nkɔ yeti kpang. Lasɛ ɓi nɔkɔ nandon yeti. N kɔɔ vuu keɓe ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ n kpãa zang kaɓa nyaa dɔli kpang.
47002006	Gbalang ɓɔɔ zang nimbang ka teteng manɛ ri sɔɔyi, ri dàng yɔɔ kaɓa jìng, daa tɔ.
47002007	Kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ yaa wu gbalang ta, nɔɔ mã wu danggn, tɔ̀ɔ, rɛ̃rɛnang dɔli wu ɓa kaka ɓiɓɛ kpang.
47002008	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ nɔɔ p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu zirɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ wu katɔ gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ.
47002009	N bèe nɔɔ labeenang kaɓa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ n gãsɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, n zirɛ naa nɔɔ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ katɔ, ka vuu piti ɓɛɛ.
47002010	Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yaa wu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ, n yaa wu tɔ jong. Naa vuu ɓɔɔ kagn nizang, ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ yaa zang gbalang ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, n yaa zang gbalang ɓiɓɛ tɔ ka tìng Yeesɔ Kirisi ka ruu manɛ.
47002011	Tɔ̀ɔ, wu zãa Sheetang gbalang ɓɔɔ wu vang ruu ka yuu ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu mang ɓi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
47002012	Ɓɔɔ n a ka Torowasa, n tɔɔ, n naa kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi. N zirɛ, Kpanti Laa puu m gbalang shoonang tɔ ka nɔng.
47002013	A ka ruu ɓɔɔ n ìi manzung Titu ka nɔng kpang, vuu bì'i kpãa m ka yeti dɔli. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n yaa rɛɛ zang gari kaɓa, a n daa ka gari Makidoniya.
47002014	Ruu zãa Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, sɔ̀'ɔ ruu tìng diki diki, a ruu ɓa Sheetang yuu tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓakɛ yuu tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. A ti shingnɛ, zang tãlɛ yee ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti nɛɛ bì'i ɓuru, naa ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ pũngku sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ, t'alɛ̀ nɔng ɓɛɛ.
47002015	Ruu ɓuru kaa naa vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ Kirisi dɔ̀'ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, rukɔ kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu ɓarɛ kana, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shàar'ɛ ɓarɛ kana Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
47002016	Ka nɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri shàar'ɛ katɔ, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka nɔng zang ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu ɓarɛ kana, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ. Ɓu wi zunung shoonang keɓe palɛnang wiya?
47002017	Ruu ɓuru naa zang dɔli ɓɔɔ, ruu Laa nwàng ri ɓarɛ kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri kãa vuu shaanang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu palɛ shoonang ɓuru nɛɛ yeti gbete. Ruu kɔɔ ruu Laa ɓuru naa ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ruu gbalang ɓɛɛ. Naa zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ kaa naa zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi.
47003001	Nwàng kaa naa ɓɔɔ ruu dɔɔ yuu ɓuru tɔkn ɓɛɛ ya? Ruu ɓuru naa zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Ruu kasɛ labeenang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nizang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu bee nɔɔ labeenang keɓe kpang, ruu ti kasɛ nɛɛ naa manɛ kpang.
47003002	Nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, nɔkɔ labeenang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Labeenang keɓe, zang bèe ka yeti manɛ tɔɔ, zang piti ri zi kati, ri ti gãrɛ.
47003003	Nɔɔ tusu tɔ nɛɛ, nɔkɔ labeenang keɓe ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ beeyi ɓɛɛ, a shong nyaa kaa nɛɛ mani nɛɛ bii ɓuru. Bee labeenang keɓe nɛɛ mii vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee laa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang. Bee ɓi nɛɛ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Bee wu ka rɛɛ tari pɛkɛtɛ ɓɔɔ zang bee vuu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Beere ɓi ka yeti shɔnzang.
47003004	Ruu kɔɔrɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi shingnɛ, ruu yaa gn naa ka bii Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
47003005	Vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka bii ɓuru, ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ruu kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ruu zunung shoonang keɓe palɛnang katɔ kpang. Kaka ɓuru a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa.
47003006	Wukɔ a ruu kaka, ruu palɛ wu shoonang naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang shɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu nyaa dannang shɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang bee katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ Suru Laa. Nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ zang bee katɔ, nyɔ zang ɓi vɔrɔ, a Suru Laa a zang ɓi suru bii.
47003007	Zang bee nyaa dannang kaɓa ɓi ka tari, a bannang Laa tusu bii katɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ wu a zang nyaa dannang kaɓa ɓɛɛ. Waa nyaating Musa yakɛ ka ruu bannang keɓe. Naa doo wee yakɛnang waa nyaating Musa shaarɛ katɔ ɓee, yakɛnang bì'i kɔlɔ dɔli, daa ɓɔɔ zang Isirela ri shing jìng ka waa nyaating Musa kpang.
47003008	Bannang Laa nɛɛ tusu bii, ka ɓɔɔ Laa a zang nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ naa weɓe. A bannang ɓɔɔ tusu bii ka ɓɔɔ zang nwangsɛ nyaa dannang shɔɔ keɓe, ɓa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang kaɓa bannang katɔ kpang ya?
47003009	Naa nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ a nɛɛ bannang ning. A bannang nyaa dannang shɔɔ ɓɔɔ ta yuu zang naa nw'ang ɓi kaa biya?
47003010	Nizang, vuu ɓɔɔ ɓeleng bannang ɓiɓɛ kagn, nwang tɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ bannang ɓɔɔ kãntang ɓa wu tɔ ɓɛɛ.
47003011	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa vuu ɓɔɔ t'ɛɛ katɔ nɛɛ a nɛɛ bannang ning, bannang vuu ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi dondong keɓe ɓa ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ t'ɛɛ katɔ kaɓa katɔ.
47003012	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu shing gn naa weɓe, ruu rang yee, nyaa zàa ruu kpang.
47003013	Ruu ɓuru naa Musa ɓɔɔ zùu vuu ka yuu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Isirela ri nɛɛ zi yakɛnang bannang Laa, ɓɔɔ shaarɛ kana ka waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
47003014	Nizang, yeti ɓarɛ kpãa nyaa vuu zinang katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ yirɛ, a nɛɛ mani lɛɛkɔ, zang zùu yeti ɓarɛ doo nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Musa z'uu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri nɛɛ gã labeenang ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ gbaala kagn, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang nɛɛ raa zang ɓɔɔ dũng kaa Laa tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, Kirisi wu puu zang sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zuu zang jìng kaɓa kati.
47003015	Naa doo lɛɛkɔ keɓe, zang nɛɛ gã ri nyaa dannang Musa, sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ keɓe zùu yeti ɓarɛ doo katɔ.
47003016	Zang nɛɛ raa jìng ka bì'i Kpanti Laa, Kirisi wu puu zang sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ keɓe kati.
47003017	Kpanti Laa keɓe, ɓi wukɔ Suru. Zang ɓɔɔ Suru Kpanti Laa nɛɛ kagn bii ɓiɓɛ, zang keɓe wɔ ɓi tɔ.
47003018	Ɓɔɔ ruu dũng Laa nɔngkɔ, sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ keɓe zùu jìng ɓuru kpang, ruu zi bannang Kpanti Laa katɔ. Bannang keɓe, ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ ɓi suru ɓɛɛ, rìs'i ruu kana, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang naa wukɔ. Ti gìs'i ruu bannang ɓɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ kana, ka yuu zɔɔ, yuu zɔɔ.
47004001	Gn ɓuru kɔng Laa, a a ruu shoonang keɓe nɛɛ ruu palɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa gn naa kpang.
47004002	Rùu dɔ̃ vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ, nɛɛ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ tɔ piti nɛɛ kaa. Ruu palɛ vuu tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ sè'e kpang. Ruu ti risi ruu Laa tɔ̀'ɔ wu raa sè'e kpang. Ruu kɔɔ r'uu ɓɔɔ nizang ka dalɛ, ka tìng Laa. Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓu wu zi ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ruu ɓuru zang tɔ̃ɔ.
47004003	Naa zang ɓɔɔ kagn, r'uu kɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ ɓee, kpãa ri nyaa zinang katɔ. Zang keɓe, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri shaarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
47004004	Ri shing danggn kpang ka ruu ɓɔɔ Sheetang ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti koo keɓe, zãa yeti ɓarɛ vuu zinang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zãa ri zinang nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ ka bii ɓarɛ katɔ. Nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu bannang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wu doo Laa kɔ gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ.
47004005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓuru kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi, nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti, a ruu ɓuru kaa zang shoonang manɛ ka ruu Yeesɔ.
47004006	Laa ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔng yakɛ ta ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ,” ɓi doo wukɔ shing nɔng yakɛnang ɓiɓɛ, yakɛ yeti ɓuru. A shingnɛ ruu zi bannang Laa ka waa nyaating Yeesɔ Kirisi.
47004007	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, a ruu vuu ɓɔɔ bang keɓe, rùu ɓɔɔ ruu nwang ɓuru naa ɓari tapɔng. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang bang keɓe, ɓi ɓɔɔ Laa, wu ɓɔɔ ɓuru kpang.
47004008	Zang dǎng ruu jìng diki diki, a ruu yaa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ ka takpang. Lee ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru vãarɛ katɔ, a ruu yaa gn naa kaa takpang.
47004009	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ ruu kpang, ri dɔli, a Laa yaa ruu kpang. Lee ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ ruu, ruu roo ka tipi, a ruu vɔ kaa takpang.
47004010	Diki diki ruu malɛ yuu ɓuru katɔ ka naa vɔrɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi vɔ ɓɛɛ. Wee ruu nwang ningkãari ɓee, zang zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓi doo ningkãari kɔ.
47004011	Ka nwannang ɓuru nandon, ruu malɛ yuu ɓuru ka naa vɔrɔ ka ruu Yeesɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati ka bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ keɓe, nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓi doo ningkãari.
47004012	Nwàng ɓi kaa naa ɓɔɔ ruu màlɛ̀ yuu ɓuru tɔ ka naa vɔrɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ suru bii tɔ ɓɛɛ.
47004013	Wee Suru ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang shing danggn a zang bee vuu keɓe nɛɛ, “N shing danggn tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n rang yee.” Wukɔ ti kagn yeti ɓuru. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu rang yee jong.
47004014	Ruu zi tɔ, Laa ɓɔɔ wisi Kpanti Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ saa naa wisi ruu paa ditɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ wu wisi Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu tuu ruu nɛɛ nɔɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, wu daa nɛɛ ruu ka ting Yeesɔ.
47004015	Vuu keɓe nandon, zang palɛ ka ruu manɛ kɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa nɛɛ pàlɛ̀ zang dɔli tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, nɛɛ ta yuu ɓarɛ tɔ, ri a Laa bannang kati, ri ti zãa wu.
47004016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa gn naa kpang. Naa wee bii biling ɓuru pũng katɔ ɓee, bii suru ɓuru ri ɓi shɔɔ diki diki.
47004017	Jìng dannang kɔ ruu dang ɓee, bee kpang. Daa doo vuu ɓɔɔ a ɓɛɛ kpang. Jìng dannang keɓe, atɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bang katɔ, ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi dondong. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ nɛɛ mani ɓi kagn kpang.
47004018	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu shing jìng ɓuru ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang zì nɛɛ jìng ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu shing jìng ɓuru ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi nɛɛ jìng kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang zì nɛɛ jìng, nwang ɓi sasak kpang, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi nɛɛ jìng kpang kɔ nwang dondong.
47005001	Ruu zi tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ bii ɓuru kɔ nwàng naa putali nɛɛ tantɛ tɔ, Laa naa a ruu bii ditɔ ka lapa, ɓɔɔ ruu naa nwang kagn. Bii ɓɔɔ wu a ruu keɓe nwang ɓi dondong.
47005002	Kãntang keɓe, wee ruu nwàng nɛɛ bii ɓuru ɓɛɛ, ruu tãa tìnang kpang, ruu zaa katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kasɛ Laa wu hãa ruu bii ɓuru kaɓa ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ.
47005003	Ruu kasɛ ruu nwang nɛɛ bii shɔɔ ɓuru, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwàng kaa tɔ̀'ɔ bii kagn kpang kpang.
47005004	Ka wee ruu nwang doo ka bii ɓuru kɔ nwàng naa putali ɓee, ruu zirɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ruu dang jìng, a ruu zaa katɔ. Ruu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ruu kasɛ bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe takpang kpang. Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ zang hãa ruu bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang wu t'a nɔng, wu ningsi vɔrɔ kati.
47005005	Laa kɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpàlɛ̀ ruu bii ka ruu bii kɔ̃sɔnang keɓe, a a ruu suru ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kaa gn nɛɛ wu a ruu vuu piti ɓɔɔ wu shing ruu ɓɛɛ katɔ.
47005006	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, diki diki ruu yaa gn naa kpang. Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ wee ruu nwang doo ka bì'i shɔnzang ɓuru ɓee, ruu nwang gn nɛɛ kpanti Yeesɔ nɔng gbete kpang.
47005007	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwannang ɓuru ɓi vuu danggn shinnang, wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi nɛɛ jìng kpang.
47005008	Ruu yaa gn naa kpang. Ruu kasɛ katɔ kɔ jong, ruu yaa bii kɔ wukɔ gãa ɓuru ɓee, ruu daa nwang kaa nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ.
47005009	Ruu kasɛ, naa ruu doo ka bii keɓe, naa ruu doo ka lapa, ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shing wu, wu tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ.
47005010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nandon ruu naa shii ditɔ ka tìng Yeesɔ Kirisi, wu jɛ̃ɛ ruu ruu. Wu jɛ̃ɛ ruu ruu, wu palɛ zang ɓu vuu naa ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ pàl'ɛ ruu vuu ka doo vuu tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ɓu palɛ ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ.
47005011	Ruu zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ zang kaa vɔrɔ Laa tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu bàk'ɛ zang piti. Laa zi ruu nung tɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, n ti shing gn nɛɛ, ka yeti manɛ, nɔɔ zi ruu nung tɔ gbãnggbãng.
47005012	Ruu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, ruu b'ee nɔɔ labeenang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ka yuu ɓuru tɔkn kpang. Ruu tɔɔ ruu a nɔɔ manɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri zi ka bii zang, wu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang kati.
47005013	Naa shoko nɛɛ ta ruu katɔ, ɓi ka ruu ruu Laa. Ruu nɛɛ shoko kpang, ɓi ka ruu manɛ.
47005014	Ɓi kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ ruu nɛɛ mani kɔ yiti ruu. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, zang gbete vɔ tɔ ka ruu zang piti. Nwang ɓi kaa naa ɓɔɔ ri nandon ri vɔ jong nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
47005015	Vɔ ka ruu zang piti, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri doo ningkãari ri nwàng tɔ̀'ɔ, nwannang yuu ɓarɛ kpang. Ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa nwannang zang ɓɔɔ vɔrɛ, a zang wisi wu paa tɔkn ningkãari ka ruu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
47005016	R'uu dɔ̀ng zang ɓɔɔ ruu, tɔ̀'ɔ ka doo nwannang shɔnzang kpang. Nizang, ɓeleng ruu dɔ̀ng Yeesɔ Kirisi ruu ka gbalang kaɓa kɔ, a kãntang keɓe, ruu palɛ tɔ̀'ɔ nɔngkɔ kpang.
47005017	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓakɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓi kaa zang shɔɔ. Gbalang nwannang gbaala ɓiɓɛ ɓa ɓi tɔ. Nwannang ka gbalang shɔɔ gaayu tɔ.
47005018	Ɓi Laa ɓɔɔ risi ruu, ɓɔɔ ruu shing jìng nɛɛ wu kpang, ruu nwang wusang ɓiɓɛ kɔ, palɛ vuu keɓe. A a ruu shoonang nɛɛ ruu risi zang ɓɔɔ ta wu, ri nwang wusang ɓiɓɛ.
47005019	Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ keɓe, Laa kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ wu rìs'i zang koo piti, ri nwang rɛɛ wusang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi. Yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, yiti ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang. A ti a ruu shoonang keɓe tɔ nɛɛ, ruu kɔɔ zang, nɛɛ wu kasɛ wu rìs'i zang piti, ri nwang wusang ɓiɓɛ.
47005020	Ruu nwàng ɓuru kaa naa zang nyaa shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ bàk'ɛ zang nɛɛ bii ɓuru. Ruu gaa nɔɔ ka nung ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nɛ̀'ɛ gaa nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ y'aa Laa wu risi nɔɔ n'ɔɔ nwang wusang ɓiɓɛ.
47005021	Yeesɔ Kirisi palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi gngn kpang, a ka ruu ɓuru, Laa risi wu naa zang ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. A ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, yuu ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi shingnɛ, ruu nwàng zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa.
47006001	Ka shoonang kɔ ruu p'alɛ̀ ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Laa ɓee, ruu gàa nɔɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, wu nwàng naa pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ ka dalɛ waati kpang.
47006002	Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N tãa yee manɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ n nɛ̀'ɛ palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. N ti yì nɔɔ naa ka bii ka diki ɓɔɔ laa ɓɔɔ n ta yuu manɛ kagn a ɓɛɛ.” Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ta, kãntang keɓe, ɓi kaa laa ɓɔɔ Laa yi nɔɔ naa ka bii ɓɛɛ kɔ. Wee ɓi kaa diki ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu manɛ kagn kɔ.
47006003	Ruu kasɛ kpang nɛɛ ruu shing zang wu palɛ vuu shi kpang kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu kasɛ kpang ruu nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gbalang kpang.
47006004	Ka vuu ɓɔɔ ruu p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ nandon, ruu tusu yuu ɓuru katɔ kɔ jong, nɛɛ ruu ɓuru zang shoonang Laa ka danggn ɓɔɔ ruu m'ã ka jìng dannang, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang kpãa ruu, a ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa ruu ɓɛɛ.
47006005	Zang nyɔ ruu tɔ nɛɛ gbãa, zang mã ruu ka sãa, a zang ti kãarɛ ruu. Zang mã ruu nyaa ka shoonang sasak, ruu ti roo hingro ka jìng kpang, a nyɔkɔ ti nyɔ ruu.
47006006	Ka nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ɓuru, nɛɛ danggn mãnang, nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ, ruu tusu yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ruu ɓuru zang shoonang Laa. Nɛɛ bii Suru Laa, a ɓɔɔ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ zang nɛɛ mani nizang ɓɛɛ.
47006007	Ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yee nizang ɓɔɔ ruu rang ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ kaa nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Laa. Nwannang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa kɔ nwang kaa naa vuu waa ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ruu ta sìiri nɛɛ mani, a ruu ti gãng bii nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
47006008	Lee ɓɔɔ zang a ruu bannang, lee ɓɔɔ zang ti p'al'ɛ ruu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ, zang dãa ruu ɓɔɔ katɔ. Lee ɓɔɔ zang ti dɔ̀ɔ ruu, zang risi ruu naa zang sè'e, a ruu ti r'ang ɓuru ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
47006009	Mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zang zi ruu nung kpang, a ɓeekpang zang zi ruu nung ɓuru tɔ gbayigbayi, zang rìs'i ruu naa vɔrɔ, a ruu ɓuru ti ningkãari. Zang dang ruu jìng, a zang nyɔ ruu vɔrɔ kaa takpang.
47006010	Zang làs'ɛ ruu yeti katɔ, a ruu tãa kaa tìnang diki diki, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ vuu ka naa ɓuru kpang, a ɓi rukɔ shing zang ri wàl'ɛ vuu naa. Mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ vuu ka naa ɓuru kpang, a ɓeekpang vuu piti ɓi ka naa ɓuru.
47006011	Zang Koranti, ruu rang nɔɔ yee ɓɔɔ nizang, ruu waasɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓuru kpang.
47006012	Ɓi rukɔ waasɛ naa ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi nɔkɔ zãa yuu manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu kpang.
47006013	Kãntang keɓe, n rang nɔɔ yee kaa naa nɔɔ wujɛ mɛɛ. Nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu naa ɓɔɔ ruu kàsɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tùsù ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓɛɛ katɔ.
47006014	N'ɔɔ kp'alɛ̀ yuu tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang, naa nɔɔ doo gbete nɛɛ ri kpang. Ɓu vi ɓakɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang viya? Vuu ɓɔɔ ti ɓakɛ nɔng yakɛnang ɓi kagn nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
47006015	Nyaa Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Sheetang daa gbete ɓi jong kpang. Vuu kagn gbete ɓɔɔ ɓakɛ zang ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng Laa kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
47006016	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri palɛ biya nyaa ɓarɛ wu daa gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri bang vaka viya? Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu ɓuru gãa Laa, Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N palɛ nɔng nwannang mɛɛ ka nɔng zang mɛɛ, n nwang ka teteng ɓarɛ. N nwang Laa ɓɔɔ ri bang ɓɛɛ, ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa zang mɛɛ.”
47006017	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nwang ta, nɔ'ɔ yaa teteng ɓarɛ, nɔɔ kusu yuu manɛ dang gbete. N'ɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, n ta nɔɔ kati, n'ɔɔ nwang zang mɛɛ.
47006018	N nwang Daa manɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ nwang manɛ kaa wujɛ mɛɛ ɓɔɔ soro nɛɛ ɓɔɔ varɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa zang piti bannang katɔ kɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe”
47007001	Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, Laa a nyaa keɓe nandon ka ruu ɓuru kɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yiti yuu ɓuru tɔ̃ɔ. Ruu yaa vuu piti ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, bii nɛɛ yeti ɓuru nwang shi kpang ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ. Ruu a Laa bannang, ruu a wu yuu ɓuru, ruu nw'ang kaa zang ɓiɓɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
47007002	Nɔɔ tùs'u ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu ɓɛɛ katɔ. Ruu palɛ zang ɓɔɔ kagn vuu shi kpang, kpang. Ruu shing zang ɓɔɔ lasɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, a ruu ti mulu zang ɓɔɔ kpang.
47007003	N kɔɔ vuu keɓe nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n dɔng nɔɔ ruu kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ɓaasi n kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ruu vɔ doo katɔ, naa ruu doo ningkãari, ruu ɓuru nɛɛ nɔɔ nɔng gbete.
47007004	N yaa gn naa ka yuu manɛ kpang. N tuu yuu mɛɛ ka ruu manɛ dɔli. Ka jìng ɓɔɔ ruu dang ɓɛɛ nandon, n yaa gn naa gn kpang. Yeti mɛɛ ɓi tìnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
47007005	Ka knti ɓɔɔ ruu naa shɛ̃ɛ Makidoniya tɔ, ruu ɔ̃sɔ kpang tingkiring. Jìng dannang ɓi nɛɛ nɔng piti, piti, zang ri haa nyaa nɛɛ ruu, ruu ti kaa vɔrɔ ka yeti ɓuru.
47007006	A Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ mã zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa gn naa tɔ danggn ɓɛɛ, mã ruu danggn nɛɛ anang Titu.
47007007	Wu anang ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning shingnɛ yeti ɓuru valɛ kpang, ɓɔɔ ti kaa ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã wu danggn, ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔ ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ m zinang katɔ gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ, a yeti ti lasɛ nɔɔ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ lasɛ m yeti ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ tɔ kati, nɔɔ ta m nyaa kaa tɔ. Kãntang keɓe n tãa kaa tìnang gbãnggbãng.
47007008	Labeenang ɓɔɔ n bèe nɔɔ lasɛ nɔɔ yeti katɔ, a n tɔ̀ɔ, kaa takpang nɛɛ n nɛ̀'ɛ bee nɔɔ labeenang bii kpang kpang. N zi tɔ labeenang bii lasɛ nɔɔ yeti katɔ, diki b'ee kaa takpang, yeti mɛɛ lasɛ kaa jong tɔkɔlɔng.
47007009	A kãntang keɓe, n tãa tìnang tɔ kati, wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ n lasɛ nɔɔ yeti ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi kaa ruu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓɔɔ lasɛ nɔɔ, shing nɔɔ tɔ, nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeti ɓɔɔ lasɛ nɔɔ ɓi Laa shingnɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn nɛɛ vuu kɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
47007010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti lasɛnang ɓɔɔ ɓi ka naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ, shing zang, zang gbãayu ka bì'i Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta yuu zang kati. Zang ɓɔɔ lasɛ yeti kagn ka yuu vuu keɓe kpang. A yeti lasɛnang ɓɔɔ ɓi shɔnzang shingnɛ waati, shingnɛ zang vɔ vɔrɔ suru.
47007011	Nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ yeti lasɛnang keɓe ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ mani, pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ ta. Naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ làabii, nɔɔ zɔ̃ng yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ. Yeti manɛ lasɛ tɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ, a nɔɔ ti kaa vɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ naa a ka tìng ɓɛɛ. Shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ m zinang katɔ gbãnggbãng, a nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ ta m nyaa, nɔɔ dang zang ɓɔɔ palɛ m vuu shi kpang jìng. Ka vuu kɔ palɛ ɓee nandon, nɔɔ tusu yuu manɛ nɛɛ ruu manɛ hãa ɓi kagn kpang.
47007012	Ka ɓɔɔ n b'ee labeenang kaɓa, ruu mɛɛ hãa kagn nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kpang. Ruu mɛɛ ti hãa kagn nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ wu vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. N bèe m nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n tusu nɔɔ kaa gbàr'ɛ gbàr'ɛ ka tìng Laa nɛɛ nɔɔ 'a yuu manɛ tɔ nizang, nɛɛ nɔɔ pàl'ɛ ruu shoonang.
47007013	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu mã danggn kati. Ruu mã danggn katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ruu tãa tìnang tɔkn gbãnggbãng ka ruu tìnang ɓɔɔ Titu tãa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔ ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nandon nɔɔ shing wu, wu yaa rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ wu rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ.
47007014	N kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ wu, ruu bang bang katɔ ka yuu manɛ, a nɔɔ ti shingnɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu m kpang. Ruu kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ ruu nizang diki diki, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu bang bang ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ Titu ka yuu manɛ, nɔɔ shing tɔ nwang tɔ nizang.
47007015	Titu kpaa danggn naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta wu, nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ kpang, a nɔɔ ti seng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ti naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nandon nɔɔ kasɛ tɔ, nɔɔ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kasɛnang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ mani dà'a kaa nɛɛ tìng kɔ sasak.
47007016	N tãa tìnang tɔ kati kãntang keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n shing danggn kaatɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete ka bii manɛ ɓɛɛ.
47008001	Manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu tɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ka tipi Makidoniya ɓɛɛ.
47008002	Naa wee manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ka Makidoniya ri dang jìng tɔ gbãnggbãng ɓee, ri tãa tìnang doo nɛɛ mani diki diki. Naa wee vuu naa ɓarɛ kagn kpang tingkiring ɓee, ri a zang vuu doo nɛɛ mani nɛɛ yeti gbete.
47008003	N kɔɔ nɔɔ, ri a vuu ɓɔɔ ri zunung anang katɔ ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ri alɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ a ɓɛɛ katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ mã ri nyaa kagn kpang.
47008004	Ri gàa ruu, ri ti bakɛ ruu nɛɛ ruu yaa ri jong ri yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudiya naa jong ka bii.
47008005	Vuu ɓɔɔ ri p'al'ɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn katɔ. Ri gaayu ri a Kpanti Yeesɔ yuu ɓarɛ, a ri ti naa a ruu yuu ɓarɛ kaa jong naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
47008006	Bɛɛ Titu gaayu tɔ, kp'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ alɛ waati nɛɛ yeti gbete, a ruu kɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu yaa kpang, wu hangsɛ shoonang bì'i katɔ.
47008007	Ka vuu piti, nɔɔ ɓa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ nimbang tɔ. Nɔkɔ ka ting, ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ shoonang palɛnang katɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ti ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ruu. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kasɛ nɔkɔ n'ɔɔ sɔɔ tìng ka shoonang keɓe, ɓɔɔ tusu nɛɛ nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ zang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
47008008	N dang nɔɔ wu nyaa kpang. N kasɛ nɛɛ n gãsɛ zang kasɛnang manɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n zirɛ nɛɛ nizang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.
47008009	Nɔɔ zi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi pàlɛ̀ ruu ɓɛɛ tɔ. Yeesɔ ɓi jaa ying ka vuu suru, a risi yuu ɓiɓɛ nwang zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓiɓɛ kpang ka ruu manɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ nwang wujɛ ying kati.
47008010	Vuu ɓɔɔ n zi ka yeti mɛɛ keɓe, nɔɔ hangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayu s'aa ɓɔɔ ta. Wu nɔkɔ gaayu vuu keɓe palɛnang shɛ̃ɛning kpang, nɔkɔ gaayu kasɛnang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ katɔ.
47008011	Nɔɔ palɛ shoonang bì'i ta, n'ɔɔ hangsɛ. Nɔɔ là'abii hangsɛnang naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayu palɛnang. Nɔɔ palɛ shoonang bì'i nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa manɛ kãntang ɓɛɛ.
47008012	Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ, mɔɔ a zang vuu, Laa tãa tìnang vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a ɓɛɛ katɔ. Nɔɔ a dɔli naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zunung katɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ mɔɔ a vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓaaɓɛ kpang kpang.
47008013	N tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, n yaa zang ɓɔɔ, n shing vuu ɓɔɔ kpiti katɔ ka yuu manɛ kpang.
47008014	Wee vuu doo kagn ka naa manɛ dɔli kãntang ɓee, naa nɔɔ y'i zang ɓɔɔ ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ kagn kpang naa ka bii, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Lee ɓɔɔ ɓɔɔ manɛ kagn kpang, ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ kagn dɔli, ri ti yi nɔɔ naa jong ka bii. Ka gbalang naa weɓe kɔ, nɔɔ palɛ zɔɔ vuu teetee.
47008015	Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ kp'alɛ̀ vuu shaanang dɔli, wu walɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa wu teetee ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kpalɛ ɓi tɔkɔlɔng, wu walɛ naa ɓɔɔ daa wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.”
47008016	Ruu zãa Laa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, Titu wu kasɛ ruu manɛ gbãnggbãng naa ɓɔɔ shing m n kasɛ ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
47008017	Ɓɔɔ n t'ɔɔ, n shong wu ka bii manɛ, bɛ̃ɛ kpang, kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ wu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, kasɛ nɛɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu daa katɔ ka bii manɛ.
47008018	Ruu dɔ̃ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ zang zi wu nung tɔ piti, ka ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɛɛ, wu daa nɛɛ wu.
47008019	Wu nɔngkɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri zɔ̃ng wu tɔ, nɛɛ wu rakɛ nɛɛ ruu, ka ɓɔɔ ruu daa nɛɛ vuu kɔ zang kpalɛ ɓee. Vuu kɔ ruu bàs'ɛ ɓee, tɔ̀ɔ, wu a Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi bannang, wu ti tusu nɛɛ ruu kasɛ katɔ ruu yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ naa ka bii.
47008020	Ruu p'alɛ̀ waasɛ̃, ruu kasɛ kpang, ruu shing zang ɓɔɔ ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee ka naa ɓɔɔ ruu basɛ vuu kɔ zang alɛ ruu waati ɓee kpang.
47008021	Ruu mang ɓuru ka yeti ɓuru nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu ka jìng Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ka jìng shɔnzang jong.
47008022	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu shong manzung ɓuru nɛɛ ri. Ruu gãsɛ wu tɔ dɔli, ruu zirɛ, kasɛ katɔ wu yì zang naa ka bii. A wee shing gn tɔ ka bii manɛ gbãnggbãng ɓee, kasɛ kaa tɔ gbãnggbãng wu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii.
47008023	Titu ɓi zang ɓɔɔ rakɛ nɛɛ n ɓɛɛ, palɛ shoonang ɓi nɛɛ n, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii. Zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri daa nɛɛ wu keɓe, ri daa ɓarɛ ka nung zang ɓarɛ, shoonang ɓarɛ shingnɛ, zang a Kirisi bannang.
47008024	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ tusu zang keɓe nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ ri katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri shong ri, ri tã̀'a nyaa ditɔ, ri zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ yee bang bang ɓɔɔ ruu rangkɛ ka yuu manɛ, ɓi nizang kɔ nwani.
47009001	Daa naa ɓɔɔ n bè'e nɔɔ labeenang tɔ̀'ɔ sasak, ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudiya ɓɛɛ kpang.
47009002	N zi tɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ yi ri naa katɔ ka bii, a ruu ti rangkɛ ruu tɔ bang bang ka yuu manɛ ka tipi Makidoniya. N kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Akaya ri kpalɛ bii tɔ doo saa ɓɔɔ, nɛɛ ri yi zang kaɓa naa ka bii.” Kasɛnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ yi ri naa ka bii zàrɛ̀ zang nimbang tɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ.
47009003	Kãntang keɓe, n shong nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ manzung ɓuru keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ ruu bang bang ɓɔɔ ruu rang ka yuu manɛ wu nwàng kaa tɔ̀'ɔ naa ruu w'ɔng nyaa waati kpang. N kasɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n arɛ, bɛɛ nɔɔ kpalɛ bii manɛ tɔ piti nɛɛ vuu manɛ, naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ.
47009004	Naa zang Makidoniya ri a nɛɛ n ka bii manɛ, ri ìiyi nɔɔ kpalɛ bii gn nɛɛ vuu manɛ kpang, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ruu dɔli. Ruu yaa yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ tuu nɔɔ ɓi ka nɔngkɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ ri ruu ka yuu manɛ, nyaa zaa m kpang ɓɛɛ.
47009005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti, n tɔ̀ɔ, naa n dɔ̃ rɛɛ manzung ɓuru keɓe ka tìng ka bii manɛ, ri daa kpalɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ nɔɔ a zang ɓɛɛ wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. N a m kaa knti. Ɓɔɔ n arɛ bɛɛ nɔɔ kpalɛ vuu tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwang kaa naa nɔɔ kasɛ katɔ n'ɔɔ a zang, zang mã nɔɔ nyaa katɔ kpang.
47009006	Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa jìng vuu tɔkɔlɔng, ti yee ɓi doo tɔkɔlɔng kɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa jìng vuu dɔli, ti naa yee ɓi doo dɔli kɔ.
47009007	Zang ɓu a vuu naa ɓɔɔ wu mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, wu naa zang mã wu nyaa kagn kpang. Wu ti tãa tìnang katɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu a ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kasɛ ɓi zang ɓɔɔ tãa tìnang ka ɓɔɔ wu a vuu ɓɛɛ.
47009008	A Laa ti zunung ɓɔɔ wu a nɔɔ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ walɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kaa nandon. N'ɔɔ ti walɛ vuu dɔli ɓa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ palɛ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ kaa nɛɛ mani ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng.
47009009	Naa ɓɔɔ zang bèe ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ a zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang vuu nɛɛ yeti gbete. Danggň tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ, ning Zang kpang gbinggbing.”
47009010	Laa kɔ a zang jìng vuu, zang ɓàayi, wu ti a wu vuu shaanang, wu shaayi. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa naa a nɔɔ jìng vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓaanang ɓɛɛ ditɔ nandon, wu ti shingnɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ takɛ wu bangkɛ. Ka naa weɓe, Laa shingnɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a zang nɛɛ yeti gbete, n'ɔɔ a zang kaa dɔli.
47009011	Ti shingnɛ, nɔɔ nwang zang ying, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ alɛ zang vuu kaa diki diki. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang dɔli ri zãa Laa kaa ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ alɛ ri, nɛɛ bii ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
47009012	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu kɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓee, a wu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ti shing jong zang dɔli ri zãa Laa.
47009013	Shoonang tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓee, wukɔ tusu zang nɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nizang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ri dɔɔ Laa ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi, a nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu keɓe kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ti dɔɔ Laa ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ basɛ vuu manɛ, nɔɔ a ri nɛɛ yeti gbete. A nɔɔ ti a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ jong ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
47009014	Ka ɓɔɔ ri gaa Laa ka ruu manɛ, ri kasɛ katɔ gbãnggbãng ri zi nɔɔ, ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ bang dɔli ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
47009015	Ruu zãa Laa ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu a ruu ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu gãsɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
47010001	Nkɔ Bulu nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ, n gaa nɔɔ, n ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu hakaka kpang, n ti tuu yuu mɛɛ kpang, naa Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Zang kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ naa n dòo nɛɛ nɔɔ nɔng gbete, n kaa doo vɔrɔ, a n nɛɛ tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang, n kaa vɔrɔ takpang.
47010002	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ katɔ, n'ɔɔ shing m nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning, n nɛɛ a tɔ, n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ vuu nɛɛ gnvɔ kpang. N zi tɔ, n zunung ɓɔɔ naa n pàl'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, ruu palɛ vuu ɓuru naa zang koo ɓɛɛ, vuu katɔ nɛɛ gnvɔ.
47010003	Ruu nwang ka koo kɔ nizang, a ruu gàa nyaa ɓuru kaa tɔ̀'ɔ ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ zang koo ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
47010004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu waa ɓɔɔ ruu t'a sìiri nɛɛ mani, ɓi zɔ̃ng vuu waa ɓɔɔ zang koo keɓe ri ta sìiri nɛɛ mani kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓi vuu waa ɓɔɔ Laa a ruu ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ruu ningsi zang ɓɔɔ ri ta sìiri nɛɛ ruu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
47010005	Ruu ningsi nyaa laanang nɛɛ yuu tuunang, ɓɔɔ zãa zang nɛɛ zang ri zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu kɔsɔ nɛɛ kaaɓa. Ruu shing ri, ri rɛ̃rɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
47010006	Nɔɔ nɛɛ tusu yuu manɛ tɔ nɛɛ, nɔɔ dũng kaa nyaa ɓuru, tɔɔ ruu kpalɛ bii ɓɔɔ ruu dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓuru kpang jìng kati.
47010007	Nɔɔ pɛ̃ɛrɛ manɛ bii biling vuu kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ tuu yuu nɛɛ wu ɓi ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ya? Wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zang kaɓa wu rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓuru doo zang Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ naa wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
47010008	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa n rangkɛ doo yee bang bang ka yuu naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi a ruu ka yuu manɛ, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu m kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa a ruu naa nɛɛ ruu ningsi nɔɔ katɔ kpang, nɛɛ ruu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii kɔ jong, n'ɔɔ bangnɛ ɓɛɛ.
47010009	N kasɛ kpang, wu nwang naa ɓɔɔ n shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ nɛɛ labeenang kɔ n bee nɔɔ ɓee kpang.
47010010	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ, “Rɛɛ labeenang Bulu kpiti katɔ, a vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ zang ri palɛ bang dɔli. A nɛɛ a tɔ ka bii ɓuru, wu zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ruu ɓiɓɛ ti kpãa zang takpang.”
47010011	Zɔ̃ng zang keɓe, ri zi katɔ nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ruu bee ka yeti labeenang ɓuru, bɛɛ ruu ka nɔng naabm kpang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu naa palɛ, rùu nɛɛ kaa nɛɛ nɔɔ, ɓi gbete.
47010012	Ruu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, ruu kusu yuu ɓuru nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu ti gãsɛ yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ri kpang. Ri shing vuu ɓɔɔ ri gãsɛ yuu ɓarɛ kagn nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ, ri ti jɛ̃̀'ɛ yuu ɓarɛ ruu ɓi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri gãsɛ yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓarɛ shoko waati.
47010013	Ɓɔɔ ɓuru, yee bang bang ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ ka yuu ɓuru ɓa nɔng ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang. Di nyaa ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ shoonang ɓɔɔ Laa a ruu di nyaa ɓɛɛ. Ɓakɛ kaa nɛɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ka teteng manɛ ning.
47010014	Wee nɔɔ ka teteng nɔng ɓɔɔ shoonang ɓuru di nyaa ɓee, rukɔ a ka bii manɛ nɛɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ shɔɔnang. Ruu ɓa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang di ruu nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.
47010015	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu rangkɛ yee bang bang, ruu ɓa nyaa ɓalɛ ɓuru, ruu daa nɛɛ mani ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn ri p'alɛ̀ shoonang kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu shing ɓuru gn kɔ jong nɛɛ, danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ, wu daa nɛɛ tìng. Ruu ti zunung ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ ruu p'al'ɛ tɔ ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ bannang katɔ. Rùu palɛ shoonang keɓe, diki ka teteng nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa shing ruu nyaa ɓalɛ ɓɛɛ.
47010016	Nɛɛ nwang tɔ nɔngkɔ, ruu zunung katɔ ruu daa nɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ zang ɓa Koranti ka knti ɓɛɛ, ruu daa kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka nɔngkɔ. Zang dɔ̀ɔ ruu ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ɓɔɔgn palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa a ɓi zang kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
47010017	A zang bèe ɓi ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu rangkɛ ka yuu vuu piti ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
47010018	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ta ɓi zang ɓɔɔ dɔ̀'ɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ Kpanti dɔ̀'ɔ wu, Laa ta ɓi wukɔ.
47011001	N zɔ̃ɔrɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn tɔkɔlɔng nɛɛ vuu shoko kɔ n palɛ ɓee. N zi tɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn katɔ.
47011002	N kaa sũnyaa ka yuu manɛ naa ɓɔɔ Laa kaayi ɓɛɛ. N a nyaa tɔ nɛɛ, n a nɔɔ Kirisi wu gee nɔɔ. A n kasɛ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ zang gee nɔɔ kagn, n tuu nɔɔ naa jaa soro ɓɔɔ roo varɛ gn kpang, ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii kpang ɓɛɛ. N a nɔɔ varɛ manɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ gbete ɓɛɛ kati.
47011003	N kaa vɔrɔ, zang naa shingnɛ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ shi kpang, nɔɔ yaa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a Kirisi yeti manɛ ɓɔɔ kankalang dɔ̃ɔ gbete, nɔɔ pàl'ɛ wu shoonang ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ sɔkɔ nwaarɛ Hawawu nɛɛ zũnang sè'e ɓɛɛ.
47011004	N kà'a nɔɔ vɔrɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zirɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ a tɔ ka bii manɛ, nɔɔ tantɛ wu tanang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tantɛ danggn shinnang ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ nɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ, naa doo n'aabm̀ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti t'a suru ɓɔɔgn naa doo Suru Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta nɛɛ bii ɓuru kpang ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ ti ta Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔgn ka yuu Laa, naa doo n'aabm̀ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
47011005	N zi tɔ, n m doo naa zang kɔ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ manɛ nɛɛ rikɔ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ bang bang, nɛɛ ri ɓa m katɔ ɓa kɔ.
47011006	N zi tɔ, n zunung yee rannang kpang, a zang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ ɓi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ, n zi labeenang Laa kpang kpang. Ruu tusu nɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ gbàr'ɛ gbàr'ɛ, diki diki ka gbalang n'aabm̀ n'aabm̀.
47011007	Wee n tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, n'ɔɔ shu m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ɓɔɔ n rang nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓee. Wee n tuu yuu kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, n risi nɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang zang bang kati ɓee. N palɛ vuu shi kpang ya?
47011008	Ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n palɛ shoonang ka teteng manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng ɓɔɔgn rikɔ shu m. Nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ n ta ri vuu nɛɛ ɓangge, tɔ̀ɔ, n yi nɔɔ naa nɛɛ mani ka bii ɓɛɛ.
47011009	Ka ɓɔɔ n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ, k'ɔpɔ̀ nɛɛ ka naa mɛɛ kpang, n kpãa zang gbete ka teteng manɛ nɛɛ wu yi m naa ka bii kpang. Manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ tipi Makidoniya, rikɔ a m vuu piti ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ. N ĩ̀i nɔɔ ka yuu, nɛɛ nɔkɔ nɔɔ yi m naa ka bii kpang. N ìi kãntang keɓe kpang, n ti ĩ̀i nɔɔ kpang dondong.
47011010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nizang Yeesɔ Kirisi kagn ka yeti mɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka tipi Akaya kpang, ɓɔɔ sh'ing m n vɔ̃ nyaa, n kɔ̀ɔ ruu bang bang kɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓee takpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
47011011	N kɔɔ vuu keɓe ɓu ka ruu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ ya? Laa zi tɔ, n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ.
47011012	N yaa vuu kɔ n palɛ ɓee kpang. Tɔ̀ɔ, n zãa zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ ri zang shoonang Yeesɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ yi ri naa kagn, ri kɔɔ nɛɛ ri palɛ shoonang doo naa ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
47011013	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kaɓa ri ɓarɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nizang kpang ɓɛɛ, ri ɓarɛ zang shoonang ɓɔɔ sè'e. Ri suu sè'e ka yuu shoonang ɓarɛ, ri risi yuu ɓarɛ naa zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
47011014	Nizang, wee wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang mã naa ka danggn kpang. Naa doo Sheetang risi yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, naa zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ yakɛ ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
47011015	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ri risi yuu ɓarɛ naa zang shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, wee ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Nɛɛ knti, Laa naa dang ri jìng teetee nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
47011016	N pàas'ɛ ruu keɓe tɔkn, zang ɓɔɔ wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, n shoko kpang. Naa nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ doo katɔ piti, nɔɔ ta m naa shoko gbã̀'agbãa, tɔ̀ɔ, n naa walɛ gbalang tɔkɔlɔng n rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu mɛɛ.
47011017	Vuu kɔ n kɔɔ ɓee, wu vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ nɛ̀'ɛ a m naa katɔ n kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka yuu ruu bang bang kɔ n rangkɛ ka yuu mɛɛ ɓee, n rang yee m naa shoko.
47011018	Wee zang dɔli ri rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu vuu koo ɓee, palɛ ditɔ jong nɔngkɔ.
47011019	Nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ nɔɔ zũng tɔ dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ shoko ɓɛɛ, a nɔɔ tãa tìnang ɓarɛ ya?
47011020	Nɔɔ mã danggn katɔ nɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ risi nɔɔ naa jaafoo ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ shaa nɔɔ katɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri risi nɔɔ naa shoko ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri risi nɔɔ naa vìi, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dãlɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
47011021	Yusɛ̃ɛ tuu m katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kaa vɔrɔ dɔli, a ruu palɛ nɔɔ rɛɛ vuu keɓe kpang. N rang yee kaa naa zang shoko. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu rangkɛ yee bang bang katɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ, n ràngkɛ̀ m doo nɔngkɔ.
47011022	Ri zang Ibiraniyawa ya? N m doo nɔngkɔ. Ri zang Isirela ya? N m doo nɔngkɔ. Ri zang zɔ̃ng Ibirayi ya? N m doo nɔngkɔ.
47011023	Ri zang ɓɔɔ palɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi shoonang ya? N palɛ Yeesɔ shoonang, n ɓa ri katɔ. N rang yee naa zang shoko. N palɛ shoonang tɔ gbãnggbãng, n ɓa ri katɔ. Zang mã m ka sãa doo dɔli ɓa ri katɔ, zang nyɔ m tɔ nɛɛ gbãa dɔli, ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ katɔ. A zang yàar'ɛ m nung vɔrɔ gbete diki diki.
47011024	Zang Yahudawa ri nyɔ m tɔ nɛɛ gbãa, naa bmati tu kopi tu mandɛ̃ɛti, doo maani.
47011025	Zang Rooma ri nyɔ m tɔ nɛɛ gbãa doo taati. Zang ti luku m nɛɛ tari doo gbete. Laana ɔ̃ɔ tɔ nɛɛ ruu doo taati. Diki ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ laana ɔ̃ɔyi, ruu yi naa laa ka mii, mii tuu ruu daa nɛɛ ruu, nɔng laagɛ̃ gbete nɛɛ nɔng zìi gbete.
47011026	Ka rakɛnang mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n daarɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, n dang jìng tɔ ka mii ɓɔɔ kpaa ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri ta zang vuu nɛɛ ɓangge ɓɛɛ. N dang jìng tɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kɔ doori ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ. N dang jìng ka gari bang, ɓɔɔ ka jìngti, ɓɔɔ ka mii waapo, a ɓɔɔ ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri suu sè'e nɛɛ ri doo zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kɔ.
47011027	N lee tɔ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ n palɛ shoonang gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ. Diki mɛɛ dɔli n roo hingro kpang. Lee ɓɔɔ n shaa vuu kpang, n ti ɓoo mii kpang. Diki mɛɛ dɔli vuu shaanang daa nyaa mɛɛ kpang. Sɔ̀ɔr'ɔ ti si m, a fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ n hãa ka bii kpang.
47011028	Ruu kɔɔ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ takpang. Diki diki n rɛ̃rɛ m ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng piti ɓɛɛ.
47011029	Ɓu wi shing gn gbãnggbãng ka vuu Suru Laa kpang, a bii mɛɛ vɔ kpang wiya? Ɓu wi shing zang ɓɔɔ, nɛɛ zang palɛ vuu shi kpang, a yeti lasɛ m dɔli kpang wiya?
47011030	Naa n tɔɔ, n rangkɛ yee bang bang, n rangkɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ n lakɛ naa ka bii kpang ka vuu Suru Laa ɓɛɛ.
47011031	Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Laa, wukɔ ti Daa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ zang piti dɔɔ wu dondong ɓɛɛ, zi tɔ, n suu sè'e kpang.
47011032	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n ka Damasiku, Gɔmna ɓɔɔ kpanti Areta yi ɓɛɛ, shing zang nɛɛ, zang gã nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ zang shɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ mani ka yeti gari ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ zang ri yi m.
47011033	A zang yaa m naa kaa ka yeti sà'ang nɛɛ hangka ɓɔɔ zang yaa ka bii binting ɓɔɔ zang mãayi zang kiiri gari nyaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, a n wɔ kaa nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ.
47012001	Yee rangkɛnang bang bang nwang zang vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang, n ti rangkɛ katɔ nɔngkɔ. Kãntang keɓe, n rang ruu kaa yuu naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ nwang nyaa ka n, a nwàngsɛ̀ m vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ.
47012002	Saa ɓa tɔ kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti lɛɛkɔ, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kagn, n zi wu nung katɔ, Laa tuu wu daa nɛɛ wu ka lapa ɓɔɔ bee katɔ kpala kpala ɓɛɛ. Naa Laa t'uu wu ka bii keɓe daa lapa nɛɛ wu ya, naa ti ka bii shɔnzang kpang ya? N zi kpang. Ɓi Laa kɔ zi gbete.
47012003	N pàas'ɛ ruu keɓe tɔkn, n zi tɔ yɔɔ kaɓa, zang tuu wu zang daa nɛɛ wu ka gãa Laa ka lapa, naa bɛɛ ningkãari ya, naa vɔ katɔ ya? N zi kpang, ɓi Laa kɔ gbete zirɛ. A yɔɔ keɓe tãalɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa shɔnzang zunung kɔɔnang kpang, a zang ti kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu rang yee ka yuu vuu bì'i kpang.
47012005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n rang yee bang bang ka yuu yɔɔ keɓe kɔ. N rang yee bang bang ka yuu mɛɛ kpang, n rangkɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang nɛɛ n lakɛ naa ka bii ka vuu Suru Laa kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
47012006	Naa n kasɛ nɛɛ n rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu mɛɛ, n palɛ vuu shoko kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔrɔ m ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. A n kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang kaa tɔ̀'ɔ yuu mɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ n ɓa naa wee n ɓee katɔ kpang. N kasɛ zang rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ n palɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang tãayi n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
47012007	Tɔ̀ɔ, zang zãa m yuu tuunang ka lapa dɔli, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ n zili ɓɛɛ. Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ shing nɔng ɓɔɔ ka bii mɛɛ, kɔng m naa zang ɓaa m nɛɛ kɔkɔ. Kɔnang keɓe, nwang naa zang nyaa shoonang Sheetang ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̃ wu nɛɛ, wu naa dang m jìng, wu zãa m yuu tuunang ɓɛɛ.
47012008	N gàa Laa tɔ, daa doo taati ka yuu kɔnang keɓe, n tɔɔ wu masɛ m jong.
47012009	A kasɛ m nyaa tɔɔ, “Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ n pàl'ɛ mɔɔ wukɔ yi mɔɔ naa ka bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa vuu palɛnang mɛɛ palɛ shoonang gbãnggbãng ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ lakɛ naa ka bii ka vuu Suru Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.” N tãa kaa tìnang gbãnggbãng, n tuu yuu mɛɛ ka yuu naa ɓɔɔ n lakɛ n'aa ka bii ka vuu Suru Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n tãa naa vuu palɛnang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ yiti m ɓɛɛ kati.
47012010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n tãa tìnang ka ɓɔɔ n lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, nɛɛ dãanang ɓɔɔ zang dãa m, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa m ka yeti, nɛɛ jìng ɓɔɔ zang dang m, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpãarɛ m ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kaka nɛɛ tɔ̀'ɔ ka bii mɛɛ kpang, n tãa kaka ka laa kaɓa kɔ jong.
47012011	N palɛ vuu tɔ naa shoko. Nɔkɔ shing m n palɛ nɔngkɔ. Nɔkɔ nɛ̀'ɛ kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu mɛɛ. Naa n doo vuu ɓɔɔ kpang piti, zang shoonang Yeesɔ manɛ ɓɔɔ bang bang kaɓa, ri ɓa m kpang.
47012012	Laa palɛ vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn nɛɛ bii mɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ n mã danggn, n palɛ shoonang mɛɛ ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu kaɓa kɔ tusu zang nɛɛ n zang shoonang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nizang.
47012013	N pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓu vi, a n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ manɛ kpang viya? Ɓi ka ɓɔɔ n kpãa nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ a m vuu kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. N gaa nɔɔ n'ɔɔ kɔsɔ m vuu shi kpang kɔ n palɛ ɓee katɔ.
47012014	Daa kaa doo taati ɓɔɔ n kpalɛ bii anang, n naa leng nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. N naa kpã̀a nɔɔ nyaa kpang. N kasɛ m nɔkɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, wu vuu manɛ kpang. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri yi jaa kɔ ri kpàl'ɛ wujɛ vuu jong, wu jaa kɔ kpalɛ ri kpang.
47012015	N tãa tìnang katɔ, n ningsi vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa mɛɛ, nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ piti, ka ruu manɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n yi nɔɔ naa ka bii. Nɔɔ kàs'ɛ m tɔkɔlɔng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ ya?
47012016	Nɔɔ kàs'ɛ katɔ, nɛɛ n kpãa nɔɔ nyaa dɔli ka ruu vuu kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, n pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ zũnang, n z'uu nɔɔ jìng nɛɛ sè'e,
47012017	n shaa nɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ bii zang nyaa shoonang ɓɔɔ n shongko ri ka bii manɛ ɓɛɛ ya?
47012018	N gàa Titu nɛɛ wu daayi, a n shong manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, wu daa nɛɛ wu. Titu shaa nɔɔ katɔ ya? Ruu nɛɛ Titu ruu palɛ vuu ɓuru yeti gbete, a gbalang ɓuru ti gbete kpang ya?
47012019	Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ manɛ ɓu nɛɛ, ruu tɔɔ ruu ta yuu ɓuru ka tìng manɛ ya? Manzung ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, ruu r'ang nɔɔ yee ka tìng Laa, wee ruu ɓakɛ yuu tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓee. A vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ, ruu palɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ ruu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii.
47012020	N kaa vɔrɔ naa n daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng manɛ, n daa ìi nɔɔ n'aabm̀, wu naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ n ìi nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, a nɔɔ ti naa zirɛ n n'aabm̀ wu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. N kaa vɔrɔ n daa ìi nɔɔ nɔɔ haarɛ nyaa, nɔɔ kaa sũnyaa, gnvɔ ka yeti manɛ dɔli. Nɔɔ ti kasɛ yuu manɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, nɔɔ dãlɛ zɔɔ, nɔɔ rangkɛ zang, nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ dɔli. A nɔɔ ti vɔ̃ɔtɔ nɔng.
47012021	N kaa vɔrɔ naa n paasɛ anang tɔkn ka bii manɛ, Laa naa shingnɛ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu m ka ruu manɛ. N naa k'aa ka ruu zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, a ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti vuu sãnsãnrãng, nɛɛ dũndũng, nɛɛ vuu yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
47013001	Anang mɛɛ ka bii manɛ ɓɔɔ n naa leng jìng ka nɔɔ, daa kaa nɛɛ weɓe doo taati. Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Zang nɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, zang ziti kɔ taati ri kasɛ nyaa kagn gbongkarɛ nɛɛ nɔngkɔ”.
47013002	N kasɛ, n tɔ̀'ɔ, n shàar'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ka ting ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang nimbang nandon nyaa. N shàarɛ̀ nɔɔ nyaa tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n leng jìng ka nɔɔ dòo doo ziti kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. N shàar'ɛ nɔɔ nyaa tɔkn ka wee n tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓee. Naa n a tɔkn, zang ɓɔɔ naa wɔ ka naa mɛɛ gbete kpang.
47013003	Naa nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang tusu nɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ rang yee nɛɛ bii mɛɛ. Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ palɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓi naa zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ naa ka bii kpang kpang, tusu naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ka teteng manɛ.
47013004	Ka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa, bɛɛ lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, a nwàng ningkãari kãntang keɓe nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Laa. Ka ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ, ruu lakɛ naa doo ka bii kpang kɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu naa palɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ, ruu naa ɓakɛ yuu kaa nɛɛ Kirisi, ruu walɛ naa vuu palɛnang Laa kati, ruu palɛ nɔɔ shoonang nɛɛ mani.
47013005	Nɔɔ gãsɛ yuu manɛ karɛ nɔɔ zirɛ, naa nɔɔ nwang doo nwannang danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ ya? Nɔɔ gãsɛ yuu manɛ ta. Nɔɔ zi tɔ nizang Kirisi nwang ka yeti manɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi kpang, bɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gãsɛ yuu manɛ nɛɛ mani ɓa kaka manɛ tɔ.
47013006	N shing gn nɛɛ nɔɔ naa zi ditɔ nɛɛ zang gãsɛ ruu tɔ ruu daa naa zang shoonang ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ.
47013007	Ruu gaa Laa nɛɛ nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang kpang. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ tɔɔ zang zi kati nɛɛ ruu ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu tɔ kpang, ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kati ɓɛɛ. Naa doo ka wee zang z'i ruu naa vuu gãsɛnang ɓa ruu yuu tɔ ɓee.
47013008	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu palɛ ɓuru vuu ɓɔɔ yi Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa naa ka bii, wu daa nɛɛ tìng ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Ruu p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ gbalang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓuru kpang.
47013009	Ruu tãa ɓuru tìnang, ruu nɛɛ lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, a kaka manɛ ɓi kagn ɓɛɛ. Ruu gaa ɓuru Laa, n'ɔɔ nwang nyaa kiiri, ka vuu piti.
47013010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n bè'e nɔɔ laa keɓe ka wee n gn nɛɛ nɔɔ nɔng gbete kpang ɓee. Tɔ̀ɔ, n nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng manɛ, n palɛ nɔɔ vuu kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ gnvɔ, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa a m ɓɛɛ kpang. Laa a m naa nɛɛ n yi nɔɔ naa ka bii nɔɔ bangkɛ, nɛɛ n ningsi nɔɔ katɔ kpang.
47013011	Manzung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n di nyaa labeenang keɓe nɛɛ, “Laa wu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ.” Nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ nwang nyaa kiiri ɓɛɛ, n'ɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nyaa manɛ wu daa zɔɔ gbete, a n'ɔɔ ti nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ. Laa ɓɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu zang katɔ, a ti shingnɛ zang ri nw'ang ka nyaa zɔɔ, naa nwang ditɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ.
47013012	Nɔɔ jee zɔɔ nyaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
47013013	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nihn nandon, ri jee nɔɔ nyaa.
47013014	Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ zang nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ nwannang ɓɔɔ zang nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Suru Laa, wu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ nandon.
48001001	Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu ɓɔɔ zang ɓàa m nyaa nɛɛ n nwang zang shoonang Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Nyaa keɓe wu shɔnzang ɓaayi kpang, wu ti shɔnzang shingnɛ kpang, ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi shingnɛ nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓɔɔ wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
48001002	Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ n ka nihn nandon, ruu jee nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa ka tipi Galatiya nyaa.
48001003	N gaa Daa ɓuru Laa, nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.
48001004	Yeesɔ a zang yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu ta yuu ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu zang shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Wu ti ta ruu nɛɛ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rɛ̃rɛ a ti palɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe nwang nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Daa ɓuru Laa kasɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
48001005	Zang wu a Laa bannang ta gbinggbing. Nɔngkɔ.
48001006	N mã naa tɔ ka danggn ka ruu manɛ. Knti bee gn vi, nɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi palɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ dũng kaa ruu ɓɔɔgn viya?
48001007	Nizang, ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔgn ɓi kagn kpang. N kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ri kpantɛ nɔɔ jìng, ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
48001008	A naa nɛɛ doo rukɔ, nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, nɛɛ kɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔgn, wu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang kpang, zang dɔng wu ruu, zang tasɛ wu ka waa bang.
48001009	Ruu kɔɔ ruu keɓe tɔ ka tìng, ruu ti paasɛ kɔɔnang tɔkn nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ naabm nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta ɓɛɛ, zang wu dɔng wu ruu, zang tasɛ wu ka waa bang.
48001010	Ruu keɓe nwang naa ɓɔɔ n kãayi nɛɛ nyaating mɛɛ wu puu ka bii shɔnzang ya? Kpang, n kasɛ nyaating mɛɛ wu puu ka bii Laa. N kasɛ nɛɛ tɔ zang piti ri zi m nung ya? Naa n nɛɛ palɛ nɔngkɔ, n nɛɛ tɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ Kirisi shoonang kpang.
48001011	N kaaɓi n kɔɔ nɔɔ rɛɛ manzung mɛɛ, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓee, wu shɔnzang nwangsɛ kpang.
48001012	N ti ta nɛɛ bii shɔnzang ɓɔɔ kpang. Wu ti shɔnzang tusu m kpang. Ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nwàngsɛ̀ m.
48001013	Zang kɔɔ nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ n nwang ka tìng bɛɛ n dũng doo gbalang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ tɔ. Naa ɓɔɔ n dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng gbalang Kirisi jìng, gn ɓarɛ kɔng m kpang ɓɛɛ tɔ. N p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n zũnung katɔ nandon, n tɔɔ n ningsi ri dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
48001014	Nkɔ ka tìng rɛɛ sangvaa mɛɛ nandon, ka ruu gbalang zang Yahudawa dũnnang. N shing jìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru ri tusu ɓɛɛ palɛnang gbãnggbãng.
48001015	A Laa palɛ m tɔ̃ɔ, zɔ̃ng m bɛɛ zang yi m gn kpang, a ɓaa m nyaa nɛɛ n naa palɛ wu shoonang. A ɓɔɔ wu naa kasɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ,
48001016	nɛɛ wu nwangsɛ m Jaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ n kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Jaa keɓe. N daa ka bii zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu kɔɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ wu zi ka yuu vuu keɓe kpang.
48001017	N ti daa ka Urushalima ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang zang shoonang Yeesɔ doo ka tìng ɓɛɛ kpang. N daa m katɔ kɔ jong ka tipi Arabiya, a n gbãayu ka Damasiku.
48001018	Saa naa ɓa tɔ taati, a n daa ka Urushalima, n tɔɔ n daa zi Bituru nung kaa waasɛ̃, a n nwang nɛɛ wu diki kopi tu maani.
48001019	N zi zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ kpang. N zi Yakubu jaanaa Kpanti ɓuru kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
48001020	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu kɔ nwani ka tìng Laa, vuu kɔ n bee nɔɔ ɓee, nizang, n suu sè'e kpang.
48001021	Nɛɛ knti, n naa daarɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ka tipi Siriya nɛɛ tipi Silisiya.
48001022	Ka diki kaɓa, bɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kirisi ka tipi Yahudiya ri zi m gn nɛɛ jìng ɓarɛ kpang.
48001023	Ri tãa ɓarɛ ruu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ri kɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ, “Yɔɔ ɓeleng ɓɔɔ dang ruu ɓɔɔ ruu dũng Kirisi jìng, kãntang keɓe, kɔɔ zang ruu kaa yuu danggn shinnang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ nɛɛ wu ningsi katɔ ɓɛɛ”
48001024	A ri dɔɔ Laa ka ruu mɛɛ.
48002001	Saa naa ɓa tɔ kopi tu dɛ̃ɛti, n daa Urushalima tɔkn nɛɛ Baranaba. Ruu daa nɛɛ Titu ning.
48002002	N daayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔɔ m nɛɛ n daayi ɓɛɛ. Ka ɓɔɔ n shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, n ɓaa rɛɛ zang bang nyaa dang gbete. Ruu nwang nɛɛ ri, a n kɔɔ ri r'uu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ nɛɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ n p'al'ɛ ka tìng, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ n palɛ kãntang, wu shaarɛ waati kpang.
48002003	Titu ɓɔɔ n daa nɛɛ wu, naa wee wu zang Heleni ɓee, zang yi wu nɛɛ kaka nɛɛ wu y'ee shaa kpang.
48002004	Ruu keɓe gaayu ka ɓɔɔ zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ ri dũng doo Kirisi kɔ, ri kasɛ ɓarɛ katɔ nɛɛ, zang yèe wu shaa. Zang keɓe ɓɔɔ ri shɛ̃ɛ ka teteng ɓuru nɛɛ ri zili naa ɓuru, ri ti kãa gbalang naa ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu ɓuru ka ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ ɓee. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri risi ruu naa jaafoo.
48002005	Rùu yàa ri bii naa kpang nɛɛ tɔkɔlɔng ning, tɔɔ ruu yìtì nɔɔ ruu nizang ɓɔɔ ka yuu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kirisi kati.
48002006	A zang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang bang ɓɛɛ (ruu mɛɛ hãa kagn nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ ɓeleng ri nwang ka tìng ɓɛɛ kpang. Laa palɛ vuu ɓi jong gn dang gbete kpang). Rɛɛ zang bang kaɓa ri kɔ̀ɔ m vuu ɓɔɔ kagn shɔɔ kpang.
48002007	Ri zi ɓarɛ katɔ kɔ jong nɛɛ, Laa a m shoonang tɔ nɛɛ n kɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ, naa ɓɔɔ shing Bituru, nɛɛ wu kɔɔ zang Yahudawa Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
48002008	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Laa shing Bituru nɛɛ wu nwang zang shoonang Yeesɔ ka teteng zang Yahudawa, Laa shing m doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ n nwang zang shoonang Yeesɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang.
48002009	Ka ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang keɓe, Yakubu nɛɛ Bituru a ɓɔɔ Yɔhana ri zirɛ nɛɛ Laa a m shoonang keɓe tɔ, ri yi naa mɛɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Baranaba ri jee ruu nyaa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu palɛ shoonang gbete nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ, ruu mã zɔɔ naa nɛɛ, ri palɛ shoonang ka teteng zang Yahudawa, ruu palɛ ɓuru ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ.
48002010	Ri kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ, danggn wu ning ruu zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang, ɓɔɔ ri ka teteng zang kaɓa kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Vuu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n shing danggn palɛnang ɓee kɔ.
48002011	Ɓɔɔ Bituru a ka gari Antakiya, n t'a nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang ka jìng zang piti, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ waasɛ bii katɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
48002012	Ɓɔɔ zang varɛ ɓɔɔ Yakubu shong ri ri a nɔng kaɓa gn kpang, Bituru shaa vuu shaanang nɔng gbete nɛɛ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri naa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng, Bituru gɔ̃ bii, shaa vuu shaanang tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ ri kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang yèe zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang shaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
48002013	Manzung ɓuru, zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ nimbang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng, ri gaayu vuu palɛnang nɛɛ yeti gbete kpang kaa jong nɛɛ Bituru. A ri nwaarɛ Baranaba kaa jong nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ yeti gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.
48002014	Ɓɔɔ n zirɛ ri yi gbalang kaara ka doo ruu nizang ɓɔɔ ka yeti Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kirisi kpang, n kɔɔ Bituru ka tìng ɓarɛ nandon n tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ zang Yahudawa, a mɔɔ nwàng kaa tɔ̀'ɔ naa zang Yahudawa kpang. Mɔɔ nwang ɓaa naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ. A ka ruu vi, mɔɔ kãa gbalang mɔɔ shing zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, ri nwang nwannang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning viya?”
48002015	Nizang, zang yi ruu ɓuru zang Yahudawa, ruu wu zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
48002016	Naa doo nɔngkɔ, ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ shɔnzang nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang keɓe palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu shing danggn tɔ jong ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa nɛɛ bii danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nwàng zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi jong ka tìng Laa, ka ɓɔɔ zang palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
48002017	Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, a wee ruu kãa gbalang ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ka ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ Kirisi ɓee, zang nɛɛ naa ìiyi ruu ɓuru doo zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ɓɛɛ. Nw'ang ɓu kaa naa Yeesɔ kɔ shing zang zang palɛ vuu shi kpang ya? Wu nɔngkɔ kpang.
48002018	Naa n bɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ nyaa dannang zang Yahudawa ka ruu ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ ri shing m n nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa kpang. N palɛ m wu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tãa tìnang mɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, n nɛɛ shing gn tɔkn nɛɛ nyaa dannang keɓe ta yuu mɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
48002019	Ɓi rɛɛ nyaa dannang keɓe kɔ shingnɛ n zirɛ nɛɛ n vɔ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n dũng ri nandon kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n shing danggn tɔ̀'ɔ ka ri kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, n walɛ suru bii ka bii Laa.
48002020	Zang ɓaa m naa m tɔ laa nɛɛ Kirisi, ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ nkɔ nwang ningkãari kpang. Ɓi kaa Kirisi ɓɔɔ ka bii mɛɛ kɔ nwang ningkãari. Nwannang kɔ n nwang kãntang ɓee, n nwang m kaa nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ n shing ka bii Jaa Laa ɓɔɔ kasɛ m, a a zang yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka ruu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
48002021	N bɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ m ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa shɔnzang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa nɛɛ bii nyaa dannang katɔ, nwang ɓi kaa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔ ɓi kaa dalɛ waati ɓɛɛ.
48003001	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang tipi Galatiya nɔɔ shoko nizang. Ɓu wi zuu nɔɔ jìng nɔngkɔ wiya? Zang kɔɔ ka shoo manɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa Yeesɔ Kirisi naa ka laa a vɔrɛ ɓɛɛ.
48003002	'N hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu gbete keɓe, Laa a nɔɔ Suru ɓiɓɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kasɛ ɓɛɛ ya, kɔ ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ, a nɔɔ shing danggn ɓɛɛ?
48003003	Nɔɔ palɛ shoko vi nɔngkɔ viya? Nɔɔ gaayu Laa dũnnang, nɔɔ shing gn ka naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ hangsɛ nyaa kaa nɛɛ kaka yuu manɛ ya?
48003004	Nɔɔ dang jìng keɓe nandon ka dalɛ waati ya? N zi tɔ, wu nɔngkɔ kpang.
48003005	Laa a nɔɔ Suru ɓiɓɛ, a ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ka teteng manɛ. Palɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kasɛ ɓɛɛ ya, kɔ palɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ tãa Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ, a nɔɔ shing danggn ɓɛɛ?
48003006	Danggn Ibirayi wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Zang bee vuu ka labeenang Laa ka yuu Ibirayi nɛɛ, “Ibirayi shing danggn ka bii Laa, a Laa ta wu nɛɛ wu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ.”
48003007	Nɔɔ zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Laa rikɔ wujɛ Ibirayi ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
48003008	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi, zang bee ka labeenang ɓiɓɛ doo ka tìng nɛɛ, Laa naa risi zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ditɔ, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ɓɛɛ. A zang bee naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ Ibirayi Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ doo ka tìng ɓɛɛ tɔɔ, “Laa naa shing zang koo keɓe nandon ri tãa tìnang nɛɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.”
48003009	Ibirayi shing danggn, a Laa a wu tìnang tãanang kati. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn, ri tãa tìnang doo naa ɓɔɔ wu tãa kɔ.
48003010	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing gn ɓarɛ nɛɛ naa ri dũng nyaa dannang, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ka tìng Laa, Laa naa dɔng ri ruu ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bee ka labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dũng vuu piti ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang nyaa dannang Laa diki diki kpang, Laa dɔng wu ruu tɔ.”
48003011	Kãntang keɓe, ruu zi tɔ kati nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ kagn ka tìng Laa nɛɛ bii nyaa dannang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ raa zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shingnɛ, wukɔ nwang ningkãari ɓɛɛ.”
48003012	A nyaa dannang di yuu ɓi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ ka bii danggn ɓɔɔ zang shing ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang bee ɓi katɔ kɔ jong, ka labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kasɛ, ti nwang ningkãari ka doo nyaa dannang kɔ.”
48003013	Yeesɔ Kirisi ta yuu ɓuru tɔ, ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ kù ruu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu dũng nyaa dannang kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kù Kirisi nyaa jong ka nung ɓɔɔ wu nɛɛ kù ruu ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ haatɛ wu ka lapa, Laa ku wu nyaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
48003014	Yeesɔ Kirisi palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ wu shingnɛ, tìnang ɓɔɔ Laa a Ibirayi nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu raa kaa ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, ri nɛɛ shing gn ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, rùu ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn tɔ ka bii Kirisi, Laa wu a ruu Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ a ruu nyaa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kati.
48003015	Manzung, n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe, n gãsɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ diki diki ɓɛɛ. Naa zang ziti ri a zɔɔ nyaa ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ta nyaa keɓe kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ti gisi vuu tɔkn ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
48003016	Ruu keɓe doo nɔngkɔ, Laa a ɓi Ibirayi nɛɛ zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ rɛɛ nyaa keɓe. Laa kɔɔ kpang ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Rɛɛ zɔ̃ng ɓaaɓɛ” Kpang. Nɛɛ nwàng kaa naa r'ang yee ka yuu zang dɔli. Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zɔ̃ng ɓaaɓɛ.” rang yee ka yuu zang gbete kɔ nwani. Zang gbete keɓe wukɔ Kirisi.
48003017	Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ keɓe, Laa a nyaa, a ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ. Nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓi kaa nɛɛ knti, bɛɛ saa ɓa tɔ laa maani dakn dɛ̃ɛti tu bmati tu kopi, zunung ɓɔɔ wu ningsi nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
48003018	Nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ nɔɔ wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ dũng nyaa dannang ɓiɓɛ ya? Naa nɛ̀'ɛ nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa nɛɛ wu a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. A ruu zi ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ, Laa a Ibirayi vuu kaɓa, ɓi ka doo nyaa ɓɔɔ wu a wu ɓɛɛ.
48003019	Zang dang nyaa ɓu ka ruu viya? Nɛɛ zang zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang kati. Zɔ̃ng Ibirayi keɓe, ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ a tɔ, nyaa dannang ti di nyaa ɓi kaa tɔ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ rikɔ atɛ nyaa dannang keɓe, a 'a shɔnzang gbete ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ shii ka teteng Laa nɛɛ zang piti ɓɛɛ.
48003020	Zang ɓɔɔ shii ka teteng zang, shii ɓi ka teteng zang ziti. A Laa ɓi ka bm gbete ka ɓɔɔ wu a Ibirayi nyaa ɓɛɛ.
48003021	Wee nwang ɓu kaa naa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ daa gbete nɛɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ wu a ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Wu nɔngkɔ kpang tingkiring. Naa nyaa ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ dang kagn ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, shɔnzang nɛɛ raa zang tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ka tìng Laa nɛɛ bii nyaa dannang keɓe.
48003022	A zang bee ɓi tɔ, ka labeenang Laa nɛɛ, shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ka koo nandon, ri nwàng ɓarɛ naa ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang mã ri ka sãa ɓɛɛ. Tɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ka doo danggn shinnang ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi wu raa ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ kati.
48003023	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ là'a danggn shinnang a gn kpang, nyaa dannang mã ruu ɓuru nandon ka sãa, tɔ̀ɔ, danggn shinnang wu naa nwangsɛ bii nɛɛ mani.
48003024	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nyaa dannang kɔ yiti ruu sasak, tɔ̀ɔ, wu atɛ ruu ka bii Kirisi. Tɔɔ ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ kati ka tìng Laa, nɛɛ bii danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ɓɛɛ.
48003025	Kãntang kɔ, laa ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ a tɔ ɓee, wu tɔ̀'ɔ nyaa dannang kɔ yiti ruu kpang.
48003026	Kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ nandon nɔɔ nwàng kaa wujɛ Laa, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
48003027	Nɔɔ nandon ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɔɔ batizima tɔ, nɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nwang manɛ kaa nwannang Yeesɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ.
48003028	A vuu ɓɔɔ bàsɛ̀ teteng zang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, a jaafoo nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ jaafoo kpang, a zang varɛ nɛɛ zang soro, ɓi tɔɔ kagn kpang. Nɔɔ nandon nɔɔ manɛ kaa gbete ka yuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓakɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
48003029	Naa nɔɔ zang Yeesɔ Kirisi, nɔɔ manɛ kaa zɔ̃ng Ibirayi, a nɔɔ naa ta vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ.
48004001	Vuu ɓɔɔ n tɔ̀'ɔ n kɔɔ keɓe. Naa jaa ɓɔɔ naa shaa vuu vɔ diiɓɛ doo jaa tɔkɔlɔng, zang palɛ wu naa jaafoo. Naa doo ka wee zang zi tɔ nɛɛ vuu piti ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ ɓee.
48004002	Ka ɓɔɔ wu doo jaa tɔkɔlɔng, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ri gang jìng ka wu, a ri ti pàlɛ̀ wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu nɛ̀'ɛ palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ sasak, diki ɓɔɔ daa ɓiɓɛ ka zang ɓɛɛ, wu a nɛɛ mani.
48004003	Rùu doo nɔngkɔ, ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ruu zũng danggn gn ka vuu Suru Laa kpang, ruu nwang ɓuru jaafoo rɛɛ nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri tusu ɓɛɛ.
48004004	A ka ɓɔɔ laa ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ naa arɛ, Laa naa shong nyaa nɛɛ Jaa ɓiɓɛ. Jaa keɓe jaa soro yi wu, a ti dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ ri dũngnɛ.
48004005	Nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa dannang Laa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu raa wujɛ Laa kati.
48004006	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, Laa shong nyaa nɛɛ Suru Jaa ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu nwang ka yeti manɛ. Suru ɓɔɔ kaarɛ nyaa nɛɛ, “Daa mɛɛ, Daa mɛɛ” ɓɛɛ.
48004007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ manɛ tɔ̀'ɔ jaafoo kpang, nɔɔ kaa jaa gãa. Naa wee nɔɔ kaa Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓee, Laa naa a nɔɔ vuu piti ɓɔɔ wu shing wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
48004008	Ɓeleng bɛɛ nɔɔ zi Laa gn kpang, a nɔɔ nwang jaafoo vuu ɓɔɔ ri vuu gãnti kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
48004009	A kãntang keɓe nɔɔ zi Laa tɔ kati. N kɔɔ ɓu biya, Laa zi nɔɔ tɔ kati ɓee. Ka ruu vi, nɔɔ gbãayu ka rɛɛ nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri tusu, ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, a naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ ti kagn kpang, nɔɔ nwang jaafoo ɓarɛ tɔkn viya?
48004010	Nɔɔ shìli diki ka ruu vuu shaanang nɔng mung shaanang, nɛɛ rɛɛ shala ɓɔɔ, nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ, a ɓɔɔ saa ɓɔɔ.
48004011	Vuu kɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓee, shing tɔ n kaa kaa vɔrɔ. Mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ n p'alɛ̀ ka ruu manɛ shàarɛ̀ tɔ waati.
48004012	Rɛɛ manzung, n gà'a nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ nwang naa ɓɔɔ n nwàng ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n nw'ang tɔ naa nɔkɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ m vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn kpang.
48004013	Danggn wu ning nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, n rang nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu palɛ m katɔ ɓɛɛ.
48004014	A nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ m ka ɓɔɔ n kɔng vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Kɔnang mɛɛ nwang naa vuu ɓɔɔ gãsɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ta m katɔ kɔ jong naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ tà zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ t'a m naa nkɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ.
48004015	Kãntang keɓe, ɓu vi palɛ tìnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa gbãnggbãng kaa viya? N nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ n kɔɔ ruu keɓe katɔ nɛɛ, naa nɔɔ nɛɛ zunung katɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ zɔ̃ngkɔ jìng manɛ katɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ a m.
48004016	N nwang tɔ kaa zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaa nyaa nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ ya?
48004017	Zang kaɓa, ri palɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, ri kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ gbãnggbãng, a vuu ɓɔɔ ri mang ka yeti ɓarɛ ka yuu manɛ ɓi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang. Ri kasɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ, ri basɛ teteng manɛ nɛɛ n, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ shòng kaa rikɔ.
48004018	Naa zang kasɛ ruu zang ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang mang ka yeti ka yuu zang, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zang wu palɛ nɔngkɔ diki diki, wu ka laa ɓɔɔ n ka nɔng shɛ̃ɛning kpang.
48004019	Rɛɛ manzung, n tãa kɔnang ka yuu manɛ naa ɓɔɔ jaa kɔng zang soro ɓɔɔ yi kaa jaa ɓɛɛ. N kasɛ nɛɛ zang zi nwannang Yeesɔ Kirisi ka nwannang manɛ.
48004020	Mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ n nɛ̀'ɛ kaa nɛɛ nɔɔ kãntang keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, n kɔ̃sɔ naa ɓɔɔ n rang nɔɔ yee ɓɛɛ. Ruu manɛ kpãa m tɔ dɔli.
48004021	N kaa ɓi, n hɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri dũng nyaa dannang Laa, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tãa vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang ya?
48004022	Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wujɛ Ibirayi ziti. Ɓɔɔ gbete jaafoo yì wu, a ɓɔɔ gbete soro ɓɔɔ ɓi jaafoo kpang yi wu.
48004023	Jaa gbete ɓɔɔ jaafoo yirɛ keɓe, zang yi ɓi ka naa ɓɔɔ zang yi jaa diki diki ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ jaafoo kpang yirɛ keɓe, ɓi Laa a nyaa, a zang yi wu.
48004024	Vuu keɓe nwang naa vuu ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ vuu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Zang soro ziti keɓe, ri nwang naa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a ziti ɓɛɛ. Nyaa gbete a ɓi nɛɛ yuu kɔpɔ Sinayi, yiki wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓi jaafoo. Nyaa keɓe wukɔ Hajaratu.
48004025	Zang gãsɛ Hajaratu ɓi nɛɛ kɔpɔ Sinayi ɓɔɔ ka tipi Arabiya ɓɛɛ. Gari Urushalima kãntang keɓe nwang ɓi kaa doo naa Hajaratu kɔ, zang yi wu tɔ jaafoo nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ piti.
48004026	A Urushalima ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ jaafoo kpang, ɓi wukɔ nà'a ɓuru.
48004027	Labeenang kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang soro ɓɔɔ yi jaa gngn kpang, tãa tìnang ta. Tìnang wu shing mɔɔ, mɔɔ mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa, mɔɔ kaayi mɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tãa naa ɓɔɔ jaa kɔng zang zang nɛɛ yi kaa tɔ gngn kpang ɓɛɛ Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang soro ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang bɛ̃ɛ wu katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu yi jaa kpang, wu naa yi jaa kaa gaagaa, wu ɓa jaa soro ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ varɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
48004028	Kãntang keɓe rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ manɛ kaa wujɛ Laa, ka ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ wu a ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa a zang yi Ishaaku ɓɛɛ.
48004029	Ka diki kaɓa, jaa ɓɔɔ zang yi naa ɓɔɔ zang yiki jaa diki diki, dang jaa ɓɔɔ zang yi nɛɛ bii Suru Laa ɓɛɛ jìng. Kãntang keɓe, zang palɛ doo ka naa nɔngkɔ.
48004030	A labeenang Laa kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ viya? Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nwangsɛ jaa soro ɓɔɔ jaafoo kiɓi nɛɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ ka biling. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, jaa jaafoo basɛ vuu daa ɓarɛ nɛɛ jaa jaa soro ɓɔɔ ɓi jaafoo kpang kpang.”
48004031	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, ruu ɓuru wujɛ jaa soro ɓɔɔ jaafoo ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu ɓuru wujɛ jaa soro ɓɔɔ jaafoo kpang ɓɛɛ.
48005001	Kirisi ta yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ruu nwang tɔ̀'ɔ naa jaafoo kpang. Nɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ wu shingnɛ, n'ɔɔ nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ ri jaafoo ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ nwang tɔ̀'ɔ jaafoo tɔkn kpang.
48005002	Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka vuu kɔ nkɔ Bulu n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓee. Naa nɔɔ kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang yee nɔɔ shaa naa ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri yee ɓɛɛ. Nɔ̀ɔ shing tɔ Kirisi ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ka bii manɛ kpang tingkiring.
48005003	N shaarɛ nɔɔ nyaa tɔkn, naa zang ɓɔɔ yaayi zang yee wu shaa, wu dũng nyaa nimbang ɓɔɔ zang dang ɓɛɛ ta.
48005004	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ ri kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ ri nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa nɛɛ nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ ri dũng ɓɛɛ, ri basɛ zɔɔ ɓarɛ tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi. Nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ manɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ zang katɔ ɓɛɛ ya?
48005005	Ɓɔɔ ɓuru, ruu shing gn ɓuru nɛɛ Laa naa shing ruu ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Suru ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ ruu gã ɓɛɛ kɔ.
48005006	Ruu nɛɛ ɓakɛ yuu tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, naa ruu yee shaa katɔ, naa ruu yee doo kpang, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang tingkiring. Vuu ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ ɓi danggn shinnang ɓɔɔ shing mɔɔ, mɔɔ kasɛ zang ɓɛɛ.
48005007	Bɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu kana waasɛ̃ ka gbalang Kirisi, nɔɔ daa kana nɛɛ tìng. Ɓu wi shing nɔɔ, a nɔɔ yaa ruu ɓɔɔ wukɔ nizang dũnnang wiya?
48005008	Vuu keɓe ɓi Laa ɓɔɔ ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa kɔ nwaarɛ nɔɔ kpang.
48005009	Zang kɔɔrɔ nyaa nɛɛ, “Yisi tɔkɔlɔng shing zũng borodi palɛnang dɔli ɓɔɔ zang wee ɓɛɛ wu puuyi.”
48005010	Ɓɔɔ mɛɛ, sisìng lɔɔ m ka ruu manɛ kpang. Yuu ɓɔɔ ruu kpalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ shing m sisìng lɔɔ m kpang. N zi tɔ, nɔɔ ta ruu ɓɔɔgn kpang, a zang ɓɔɔ kpantɛ nɔɔ jìng keɓe, naa doo wiya, Laa naa dang wu jìng ditɔ.
48005011	Rɛɛ manzung, naa n kɔɔrɔ zang doo naa nɛɛ zang ri yee shaa katɔ ɓɛɛ, a zang dang m jìng ɓi kaa ruu viya? Naa nɛɛ nɔngkɔ nizang, r'uu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang ka yuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa Yeesɔ naa kagn nɛɛ shingnɛ zang nɛɛ hàa nyaa kpang.
48005012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpãa nɔɔ keɓe, ri nɛ̀'ɛ kàsɛ̀ katɔ zang ɓ'ee ri, wukɔ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ.
48005013	Ɓɔɔ manɛ ɓɛɛ, rɛɛ manzung, zang ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ n'ɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri jaafoo kpang ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ yaayi nwannang manɛ keɓe, wu yàa nɔɔ gbalang vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang manɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ palɛnang kpang. Zɔɔ kasɛnang wu shing nɔɔ katɔ kɔ jong, n'ɔɔ pàl'ɛ zɔɔ shoonang.
48005014	Vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang nandon ri kɔɔyi, daa ɓi gbete nɛɛ ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Kasɛ ruu shɔnzang naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
48005015	A naa nɔɔ palɛ vuu naa yɔpɔ kpaasi, nɔɔ lasɛ zɔɔ yeti, a nɔɔ ti shing zɔɔ nyaa vuu waa ka bii. Nɔɔ gãng jìng waasɛ̃ nɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ ningsi zɔɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
48005016	Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ keɓe. Nɔɔ yaa Suru Laa wu tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang nwannang ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang manɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
48005017	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ bii ɓuru kasɛ daa gbete nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. A vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kasɛ ti daa jong gbete nɛɛ ɓɔɔ bii ɓuru kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang kɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu ziti keɓe ri shing jìng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mɔɔ zunung vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ palɛnang kaa takpang.
48005018	Naa Suru Laa kɔ sɔ̀'ɔ mɔɔ tìng mɔɔ ɓaa tɔ̀'ɔ jaafoo vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
48005019	Vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang p'alɛ̀, waasɛ bii ɓi katɔ kpang. Vuu keɓe ɓi rooronang nɛɛ wujɛ soro, nɛɛ sãnsãnrãng, nɛɛ dũndung palɛnang.
48005020	Vaka bannang nɛɛ nvaa shaanang. Zang ri shing jìng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang, ri gaa nyaa, ri kaa sũnyaa, gnvɔ shà'a ri, ri kasɛ vuu yuu ɓarɛ. Ri basɛ zɔɔ ka vaa vaa.
48005021	Ri shing jìng ka vuu zɔɔ, ri ɓoo sàa, sàa palɛ ri, a ri gaarɛ zɔɔ ri shaa vuu shaanang dɔli nɛɛ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe dɔli. N shaarɛ nɔɔ nyaa kãntang keɓe naa ɓɔɔ n shaarɛ nɔɔ tɔ ka tìng ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zɔ̃ng vuu keɓe, ri daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa roo kpanti kpang.
48005022	A Suru Laa shing zang ɓiri, zang wu kasɛ zang, zang wu tãa tìnang, yeti zang wu valɛ katɔ, zang wu mã danggn, zang wu palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, zang wu pàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, zang wu nwang zang ɓɔɔ zang shing danggn katɔ bii ɓiɓɛ.
48005023	Zang wu tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, wu ti yiti yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃. Nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ zãa vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe palɛnang, ɓi kagn kpang.
48005024	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓi kaa zang Yeesɔ Kirisi y'aa vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang kasɛ ɓɛɛ palɛnang ɓi tɔ nandon.
48005025	Suru Laa a ruu suru bii tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wukɔ wu ti tusu ruu naa ɓɔɔ ruu nwang nwannang ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
48005026	Ruu lakɛ jìng kpang, ruu zarɛ zɔɔ kpang, ruu ti kaa sũnyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang.
48006001	Rɛɛ manzung, naa zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ nɛɛ palɛ zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn. Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kagn bii manɛ, nɔɔ sɔɔrɔ wu tɔkn ka gbalang. N'ɔɔ s'ɔɔrɔ̀ wu kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ hakaka kpang. Zang ɓu wu gãng jìng ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang jong.
48006002	Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kpãa zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ, nɔɔ yi zɔɔ naa kagn. Naa nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi dang ɓɛɛ tɔ.
48006003	Naa zang ɓɔɔ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ, a ɓeekpang wu ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, zang keɓe nwaarɛ ɓi yuu ɓiɓɛ.
48006004	Zang ɓu wu gãsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, wu tãa tìnang ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Wu gãsɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔgn palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
48006005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓu palɛ ɓi shoonang, ɓɔɔ Laa a wu nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
48006006	zang ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃̀ɛr'ɛ wu ruu gbalang Laa dũnnang, wu basɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
48006007	Nɔɔ nwaarɛ yuu manɛ kpang. Laa ɓi zang ɓɔɔ zang risi wu naa shoko kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓayi, mɔɔ naa yee ɓaa doo wukɔ.
48006008	Naa zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang ɓiɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, ti naa nwǎng wu ɓi vɔrɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓayi, nɛɛ tɔɔ Suru Laa wu tãa tìnang, naa nwǎng wu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
48006009	Ruu lee tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nɛɛ leeyi, ruu nɛɛ yaa kpang, diki a ditɔ ɓɔɔ naa nwǎng ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
48006010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, diki diki naa ɓɔɔ ruu zunung katɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu pàlɛ̀ zang piti tɔ̃ɔ. Ruu pàlɛ̀ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa kɔ tɔ̃ɔ gbãnggbãng.
48006011	Nɔɔ zi vuu kɔ n bee nɔɔ nɛɛ naa mɛɛ bang kɔsɔrɔ kɔsɔrɔ ɓee.
48006012	Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔ̀'ɔ bii nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ jìng zang wu zirɛ ɓɛɛ, ri kãa gbalang nɛɛ ri mã n'ɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ kaka, nɛɛ n'ɔɔ yee shaa. Ri palɛ ɓarɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang dang ri jìng naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa Yeesɔ Kirisi naa ka laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
48006013	Naa doo zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa, ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri kasɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ yee shaa, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ kati nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ tɔ zang yee nɔɔ shaa tɔ.
48006014	Ɓɔɔ mɛɛ, n kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang m ka yuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi naa kagn kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa keɓe kɔ shingnɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo nwàng m vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓaa vuu keɓe tɔ ka yuu laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa Yeesɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. N ti nwang m kaa zang ɓɔɔ yaa rɛɛ vuu koo tɔ ɓɛɛ.
48006015	Naa zang yee shaa katɔ, naa zang yee shaa doo kpang, ɓi vuu keɓe kɔ kpãa m kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe, ɓi naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔ̃sɔ ruu tɔ, ruu nwang zang shɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
48006016	Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri nwang nwannang naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ rikɔ zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri ɓɛɛ, Laa wu shingnɛ yeti ɓarɛ wu valɛ, a gn ɓarɛ wu ti kɔng wu katɔ.
48006017	N hangsɛ nyaa ruu keɓe nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ wu kpãa m takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa nɔɔrɔ kɔ ka bii mɛɛ, wukɔ tusu nɛɛ n m jaafoo Yeesɔ Kirisi.
48006018	Rɛɛ manzung, n gaa Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi wu palɛ nɔɔ nandon tɔ̃ɔ. Nɔngkɔ.
49001001	Labeenang keɓe, nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔ kasɛ, a n nwàng zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. N bè'e zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Afisa ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ.
49001002	N gaa Daa ɓuru Laa nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.
49001003	Ruu zãa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ti Laa nɛɛ Daa Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shingnɛ ruu tãa tìnang. Wukɔ ti a ruu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu shing danggn ka bii Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
49001004	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Laa mãa koo gn kpang, zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu tɔ nɛɛ ruu nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓuru kpang ɓɛɛ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
49001005	Laa mang ɓi tɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ wu gɔ̃ ruu ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, r'uu nwang wujɛ ɓiɓɛ. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ, a ti tãa tìnang ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
49001006	Ruu dɔɔ Laa ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang dɔli ɓɛɛ, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ, wu a ruu naa ka zingzing nɛɛ bii Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ.
49001007	Zìi Yeesɔ kɔ shingnɛ, Laa ta yuu ɓuru, a yaa ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓuru. Ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ Laa bang ɓi dɔli.
49001008	Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ruu daa naa ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Laa zũngnɛ, a ti zi vuu dɔli.
49001009	A tuu zũnang nɛɛ vuu zinang ɓiɓɛ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ wu mang ɓɛɛ. A tusu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ wu kasɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ, a waasɛ katɔ nɛɛ bii Kirisi.
49001010	Diki nɛɛ a tɔ, Laa naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ditɔ. Nɛɛ kpalɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu mãarɛ ɓɛɛ nandon, vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ tipi nandon, tɔɔ Kirisi wu nwang zang bang ɓarɛ kati.
49001011	Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ruu nwang zang ɓiɓɛ. Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu ɓi tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, nɛɛ ruu nwang zang ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wee ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔ palɛ vuu piti wu daa gbete nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu mangnɛ, a wu ti kasɛ doo ka ting ɓɛɛ.
49001012	Palɛ vuu keɓe, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ ruu zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi shɔɔnang, ruu shingnɛ zang ri dɔɔ bannang Laa kati.
49001013	Nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ nizang, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ta yuu manɛ, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, a Laa a nɔɔ Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zi kati nɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ kaa zang Laa.
49001014	Suru Laa keɓe kɔ p'alɛ̀, Laa 'a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa nɛɛ wu a zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ shing zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang Laa ri wɔrɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, tɔɔ zang ri dɔɔ bannang Laa kati.
49001015	Ka ruu keɓe kɔ, ɓu doo ɓɔɔ n tãa nyaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Kpanti Yeesɔ, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zang Laa nandon ɓɛɛ.
49001016	N yaa ɓɔɔ n zãa Laa ka ruu manɛ kpang. Danggn manɛ ning m ka ɓɔɔ n gaa Laa diki diki kpang.
49001017	N gaa Là'a Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi. Daa, ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang ɓɛɛ, wu a nɔɔ Suru ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ shing nɔɔ n'ɔɔ zũngnɛ, a wu ti nwangsɛ nɔɔ Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zi wu kati ɓɛɛ.
49001018	N gaa Laa wu puu nɔɔ yeti, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing gn kagn, ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ tìnang ɓɔɔ Laa a nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu a nɔɔ, bang dɔli.
49001019	A ɓɔɔ ti naa ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang dɔli, palɛ shoonang ka bii ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Naa vuu palɛnang kɔ ka bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn tɔ ɓee, ɓi doo naa kaka ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang dɔli,
49001020	ɓɔɔ wu palɛ shoonang nɛɛ mani, ka ɓɔɔ wu w'is'i Yeesɔ Kirisi paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ. A shing wu nɛɛ wu nwang ka nakn ɓiɓɛ ka lapa.
49001021	Yeesɔ Kirisi roo kpanti ka nɔngkɔ, ɓa yuu rɛɛ kpanti nandon, naa doo zang nyaa shoonang sheetang piti, nɛɛ nung piti ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa zang nɛɛ mani, wu ka koo keɓe kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, nɛɛ koo ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ nandon.
49001022	Laa shing vuu piti tɔ ka naa vuu palɛnang Yeesɔ Kirisi a zang zɔ̃ng wu nɛɛ wu nwang zang bang ka yuu vuu piti ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.
49001023	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa keɓe ri nwang kaa naa bii ɓiɓɛ. Rikɔ shingnɛ zang ri zi naa ɓɔɔ wu nwang ɓɛɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ɓɔɔ wukɔ hangsɛ nyaa vuu piti ka nɔng piti ɓɛɛ.
49002001	Ɓeleng ka tìng, bɛɛ nɔɔ nwang manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ dñ̀ng nyaa Laa kpang, a nɔɔ ti p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
49002002	Ka laa kaɓa, nɔɔ nwang manɛ nwannang keɓe kɔ, nɔɔ dũlu manɛ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔ̀'ɔ koo keɓe. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo manɛ ka nyaa kpanti rɛɛ suru shi kpang. Suru keɓe kɔ ka yeti zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
49002003	Nizang bɛɛ ɓeleng ruu nandon naa rikɔ, ruu nw'ang nwannang ɓuru ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang ɓuru kasɛ ɓɛɛ. A ruu palɛ vuu piti dàa naa vuu ɓɔɔ bii ɓuru kasɛ, a rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru ti kasɛ ɓɛɛ. A gnvɔ ti shaa Laa dɔli, ka ruu ɓuru nɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ rɛɛ vuu keɓe ɓɛɛ.
49002004	A gn zang kɔng Laa kaa dɔli doo nɛɛ mani, a kasɛnang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ruu nɛɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ mani ti bang dɔli.
49002005	Ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ruu nwang naa ruu vɔlɔ katɔ, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa shingnɛ ruu nwang ningkãari nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ kɔ shingnɛ zang ta yuu manɛ.
49002006	Laa wisi ruu paa nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ka ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn tɔ ka wu, a shing ruu nɛɛ ruu nwang nɛɛ wu ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
49002007	Laa palɛ vuu keɓe, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ka koo ɓɔɔ a ka tìng ɓɛɛ, wu tusu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɔɔ daa naa gãsɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi palɛ ɓɛɛ.
49002008	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ta yuu manɛ ɓi ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ nɔɔ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ. Ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔkɔ palɛ nɛɛ yuu manɛ kpang, ɓi Laa a nɔɔ waati.
49002009	Ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu manɛ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ walɛ ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
49002010	Laa kɔ mãa ruu, ka yuu ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, nɛɛ ruu nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ Laa kpàlɛ̀ ruu bii, doo ka tìng, nɛɛ ruu naa palɛ ɓɛɛ.
49002011	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, danggn wu ning nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nw'ang ka tìng ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang yi nɔɔ manɛ zang Yahudawa kpang, ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri ɓaa nɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa ka takpang ɓɛɛ. A ri ɓaa yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. (Vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri palɛ ka bii zang nɛɛ naa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.)
49002012	Ka laa kaɓa, bɛɛ nɔɔ shing danggn gň ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang. Bɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ zang zanti, a nɔɔ manɛ ka teteng zang Laa kpang. Rɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa mã nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ, a a ri nyaa kagn, ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ nwang manɛ ka koo keɓe, vuu ɓɔɔ zang shing gn kagn ɓɛɛ kpang, a Laa manɛ ti kagn kpang.
49002013	A kãntang keɓe, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing gn tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓɔɔ bɛɛ nɔɔ naabm nɛɛ Yeesɔ kpang, zang atɛ nɔɔ tɔ naabm ka ruu zìi ɓiɓɛ.
49002014	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ shing ruu tɔ, ruu nwang kaa nyaa zɔɔ, ka ɓɔɔ wu sh'ing zang Yahudawa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang ri nwang kaa gbete ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ jili vuu ɓɔɔ basɛ ri, a ri shing jìng nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
49002015	Shing tɔ zang p'alɛ̀ shoonang tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nyaa dannang zang Yahudawa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang keɓe kasɛ piti ɓɛɛ kpang. Palɛ nɔngkɔ nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu shingnɛ zɔ̃ng zang piti keɓe, ri nwang shɔnzang ɓɔɔ shɔɔ gbete, ka ɓɔɔ wu a zang bii ɓiɓɛ, zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka naa weɓe kɔ, wu shing ri, ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ.
