49002016	Ka vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi vɔ ka yuu laa, wukɔ ningsi jìng ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri shing nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zɔ̃ng zang ziti keɓe, Yeesɔ ɓakɛ ri yuu nɛɛ bii laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓ'aa wu naa kagn ɓɛɛ, a sũuru ri tɔkn nɛɛ Laa.
49002017	A Kirisi arɛ, naa kɔɔ zang piti Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ shingnɛ zang ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ nɔɔ naabm nɛɛ Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, a ti kɔɔ zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ naabm nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ jong.
49002018	Nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ruu nandon ruu walɛ gbalang anang ka tìng Daa nɛɛ bii Suru gbete keɓe.
49002019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Isirela kpang, nɔɔ tɔ̀'ɔ zang zanti, a ɓɔɔ zang koolaa ɓɔɔgn kpang. Nɔɔ manɛ zang gbete nɛɛ zang Laa, Daa manɛ kaa gbete, wukɔ Laa.
49002020	Nɔɔ nwang manɛ naa gãa ɓɔɔ zang mãa ɓɛɛ, a zang shoonang Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, rikɔ ɓarɛ kaa doo gãa ɓɔɔ zang loo ka tipi ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, ɓi kaa tari ɓɔɔ yiti gãa ɓɛɛ.
49002021	Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ yiti gãa bì'i dɔ̃ɔ gbete, a gãa bii bangnɛ, wu raa Gãa tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
49002022	Zang mãa nɔɔ kana jong ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɔng gbete, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ raa gãa ɓɔɔ Laa nwàng kagn nɛɛ bii Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
49003001	Ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, n gaa Laa, nkɔ Bulu ɓɔɔ zang mã m ka sãa ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka ruu manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ɓɛɛ.
49003002	Nizang, n zi tɔ nɔɔ tãa naa ɓɔɔ Laa a m shoonang keɓe tɔ nɛɛ n palɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwàng nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kati.
49003003	Laa nwàngsɛ̀ m vuu ɓɔɔ wu mangnɛ, a waasɛ kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ ka rɔ̃kɔnang. (N bee vuu tɔ ka yuu vuu keɓe, a kaa tɔ̀'ɔ dɔli kpang,
49003004	naa nɔɔ gã vuu ɓɔɔ n bee ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ n zirɛ ka yeti vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ka yuu Kirisi katɔ.)
49003005	Ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, zang tusu rɛɛ shɔnzang vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ keɓe kpang, a kãntang keɓe Laa nwàngsɛ̀ rɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kpang, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ tɔ nɛɛ bii Suru ɓiɓɛ.
49003006	Vuu ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ keɓe, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa shing tɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang, ri tãa tìnang ɓɔɔ Laa a ɓɛɛ kana nɛɛ zang Isirela. Ri nwang kaa bii gbete. Ri ti nwang kaa gbete ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a zang Isirela nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
49003007	Laa shing m nɛɛ n nwang zang shoonang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ bii vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu a m ɓɛɛ. Laa a m vuu tɔ̃ɔ keɓe nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ.
49003008	Nkɔ ɓɔɔ n daa doo rɛɛ zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri daa doo rɛɛ zang nimbang kpang. Laa a kaa dòo nkɔ gbalang nɛɛ n daa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang Isirela kpang, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu tìnang ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ɓɔɔ zang walɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
49003009	'N ti shing zang piti ri zi naa ɓɔɔ zang naa palɛ shoonang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mang ka yeti a wàasɛ̀ zang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ mãa vuu piti waasɛ vuu keɓe doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ.
49003010	Kasɛ nɛɛ ka koo jaa knti keɓe, wu tusu rɛɛ kpanti, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang, zũnang ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔɔ nwang ka bm bm ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ bii zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ.
49003011	Laa palɛ vuu keɓe ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ wu mang doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. A walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu mang keɓe kaa nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
49003012	Ka yuu ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ nɛɛ wu, a ɓɔɔ danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ruu daa katɔ ka tìng Laa bii zaa ruu kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zãa ruu kpang.
49003013	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ yaa gn naa ka ruu jìng ɓɔɔ n dang ka ruu manɛ ɓee kpang. Jìng dannang keɓe, ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ yaa gn naa kpang ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ vuu keɓe, ri nwang nɔngkɔ ka ruu manɛ kɔ jong.
49003014	Ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, n tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng Daa ɓuru
49003015	ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ nandon, ka lapa nɛɛ koo keɓe, ri walɛ nung ɓarɛ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
49003016	N gaa Laa ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang dɔli ɓɛɛ, wu a nɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang nɛɛ bii Suru ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ walɛ kaka kaa yeti bii manɛ.
49003017	Tɔ̀ɔ, Kirisi wu nwang kaa yeti manɛ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. N gaa Laa wu shingnɛ, n'ɔɔ nwang naa laa ɓɔɔ hìiri ɓiɓɛ yi naa tipi gbãnggbãng ka zɔɔ manɛ. N'ɔɔ ti nwang kaa naa gãa ɓɔɔ zang loo doo ɓiɓɛ ka yuu zɔɔ kasɛnang ɓɛɛ.
49003018	Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ zang Laa nimbang nandon, n'ɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang kasɛnang Yeesɔ Kirisi bangnɛ. Bangnɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
49003019	N'ɔɔ ti zi zang kasɛnang kɔ ɓa naa ɓɔɔ zang zi dìiri ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓee. Tɔ̀ɔ, vuu piti wu nwang kaa bii manɛ nyaa kiiri.
49003020	Zang wu dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu pàl'ɛ ruu vuu ɓa ɓɔɔ ruu gaa wu, a ruu ti rɛ̃rɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. P'alɛ̀ nɛɛ bii naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shoonang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
49003021	Zang ri a wu bannang ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi. Zang ri palɛ nɔngkɔ sasak, zang yaa kpang dondong. Nɔngkɔ.
49004001	N ɓɔɔ zang mã m ka sãa ka ruu ɓɔɔ n palɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ shoonang ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ daa naa nyaa ɓaanang ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
49004002	N'ɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ kpang, n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu hakaka kpang, n'ɔɔ ti mã danggn nɛɛ zɔɔ diki diki. Nɔɔ tusu zɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi zɔɔ naa ka bii ɓɛɛ.
49004003	Nɔɔ p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zunung katɔ piti, n'ɔɔ shingnɛ yuu kpalɛnang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa shing nɔɔ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ kpalɛ, wu t'antɛ̀ kpang. Nɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu gbete ka nwannang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
49004004	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa, ri kaa bii gbete, a Suru Laa ti gbete, naa ɓɔɔ gn shinnang ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ ti doo gbete kɔ ɓɛɛ.
49004005	Kpanti ɓuru ɓi gbete, danggn shinnang ti gbete, a batizima doo gbete kɔ.
49004006	Laa ɓi gbete, wukɔ Daa zang piti. Wukɔ kpanti zang piti, ti palɛ shoonang nɛɛ naa zang piti, ti kagn bii zang piti.
49004007	Zang pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi basɛ zang ɓu ɓɛɛ. 'A zang naa, nɛɛ zang ri palɛ vuu ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng.
49004008	Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Ka ɓɔɔ wu daa ka lapa kpalakpala ɓɛɛ, yiki zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ wu kpang a, daa nɛɛ ri naa ɓɔɔ zang yiki zang ka nyaa sìiri ɓɛɛ, a alɛ zang ɓiɓɛ vuu ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng”.
49004009	Zang ɓaa ɓu vi kãntang nɛɛ, “Daa ka lapa” viya? Zang tɔɔ ɓɔɔ daa ka tipi dii shɔɔnang kpalakpala ɓɛɛ.
49004010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ daa ka tipi dii, ɓi wukɔ daa doori ka lapa kpalakpala, tɔ̀ɔ, wu nw'ang kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon.
49004011	Wukɔ “Alɛ shɔnzang vuu Suru”. Zõ̀ng zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri nwang zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri nwang zang nyaa shoonang Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri nwang ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ, ri kɔɔrɔ zang ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. A shing zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri ɓarɛ kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng ka zang Laa ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ.
49004012	P'alɛ̀ vuu keɓe nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri kpalɛ bii ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ ri naa shòng zang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ ri shingnɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri zũng danggn kati.
49004013	Ka ruu weɓe kɔ, ruu nandon ruu naa nwang nɔɔ gbete ka danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ti ka naa ɓɔɔ ruu zì Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu naa zũng danggn kati, naa Kirisi, tɔ̀ɔ ruu nwang kaa naa wu dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
49004014	Tɔ̀ɔ ruu nwàng kaa tɔ̀'ɔ naa wujɛ ɓɔɔ zang r'aarɛ̀ ri yuu, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang, ri tusu ɓɛɛ kpang. Zang sè'e keɓe, ri shing zang, zang ri palɛ vuu shi kpang nɛɛ zũnang ɓɔɔ ri nwangsɛ nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
49004015	R'uu ràngkɛ̀ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ tusu nɛɛ rùu kasɛ zɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ jong, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu b'ang kaa vuu piti, ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
49004016	Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ɓɔɔ ri nwang kaa naa bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Bii keɓe, Yeesɔ kɔ yiti nɔng gbete, a shing vuu ɓɔɔ ka bii piti ri palɛ shoonang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ bii keɓe bangkɛ, wu lakɛ ka naa ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu zɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
49004017	N kɔɔ vuu keɓe nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ, n ti shaarɛ nɔɔ nyaa. N'ɔɔ nwàng nwannang manɛ tɔ̀'ɔ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ daa naa ɓi kpang tɔ̃ɔri ɓɛɛ.
49004018	Zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang basɛ ri ɓarɛ tɔ, nɛɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ Laa a zang ɓɛɛ. Yeti ɓarɛ zi vuu gn kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri taarɛ yuu dɔli ɓɛɛ.
49004019	Yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ri takpang tingkiring. Ri shing yuu ɓarɛ ɓi kaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang. Ri palɛ zɔ̃ng vuu sãnsãnrãng nandon, ri laabii vuu ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ palɛnang.
49004020	Wee wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ kpang.
49004021	Nizang, nɔɔ tãa ruu katɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ dũng wu nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ. Zang ti tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nizang katɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ.
49004022	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ yaa vuu ɓeleng ɓɔɔ bii manɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ ta, ɓɔɔ shing nɔɔ nɔɔ nwang naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ nɔɔ katɔ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, bɛɛ lasɛ bii manɛ kana.
49004023	Suru Laa wu risi yeti manɛ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ wu nwang shɔɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
49004024	Wu shing nɔɔ nɔɔ nwang shɔɔ. Bɛɛ zang mãa nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ nw'ang manɛ naa Laa, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ, n'ɔɔ ti nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang ka bii manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
49004025	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓu wu suu sè'e takpang, nɔɔ kɔɔ rɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓuru kaa zang zɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
49004026	Yeti ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ lasɛ tɔ, mɔɔ yaayi wu shing mɔɔ, mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kpang. Mɔɔ ti nwang nɛɛ yeti ɓɔɔ lasɛ mɔɔ keɓe, laa wu hãa nyaa nɛɛ mani kpang.
49004027	Mɔɔ puu Sheetang gbalang kpang.
49004028	Zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ shɔngɓɔ wu yaa vuu ɓɔɔnang ta, wu gaayu shoonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang ta nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu yi zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang naa ka bii.
49004029	N'ɔɔ rangkɛ yee sãnsãnrãng takpang. Nɔɔ r'ang kaa yee ɓɔɔ yi zang naa katɔ ka bii ɓɛɛ, zɔ̃ng yee ɓɔɔ shing zang zang bangnɛ ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ wu nwàng zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa mɔɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ kati.
49004030	N'ɔɔ làsɛ̀ Suru Laa yeti kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru Laa kɔ tusu nɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ zang Laa ɓɛɛ. Suru keɓe kɔ tusu zang nɛɛ diki a ditɔ, ɓɔɔ Laa naa ta yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
49004031	N'ɔɔ yiti zang ɓɔɔ ka yeti kpang, gnvɔ wu shàa nɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kpang, mɔɔ lasɛ yeti nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kpang, n'ɔɔ rangkɛ yee shi kpang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ kpang. N'ɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ shing nɔɔ nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ zang kpang tingkiring.
49004032	Nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ kɔ jong, gn zɔɔ wu ti kɔng nɔɔ katɔ. Nɔɔ yaa zɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ zɔɔ katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Laa yàa nɔɔ gbalang nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
49005001	Wee nɔɔ kaa wujɛ Laa, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓee, nɔɔ nw'ang nwannang naa ɓɔɔ Laa nwàng ɓɛɛ.
49005002	Nɔɔ nw'ang nwannang zɔɔ kasɛnang, naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi kasɛ ruu ɓuru, a a yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Suru bii ɓiɓɛ keɓe, ɓɔɔ wu a Laa, nwang kaa naa vuu ɓɔɔ pũngku sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀'ɔ Laa, a shingnɛ Laa tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ.
49005003	Wee nɔɔ kaa zang Laa ɓee, zang wu kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ rooro nɛɛ wujɛ soro kpang, nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ naa doo zɔ̃ng dũndũng kiya kpang, nɛɛ nɔɔ shing jìng ka vuu zang ɓɔɔ kpang.
49005004	N'ɔɔ ti rangkɛ nyaa shoko nɛɛ yee sãnsãnrãng takpang. Nɔɔ zã̀a manɛ Laa kɔ jong.
49005005	Ǹ kàsɛ̀ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ zi vuu keɓe waasɛ̃. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ dũndũng, ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓiɓɛ ti kalang kalang kpang, ɓɔɔ ti shing jìng ka vuu zang, naa daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi roo kpanti kagn nɛɛ Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ vuu keɓe dàa wu ka yeti, ɓa ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
49005006	Zang ɓɔɔ wu nwaarɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa shoko kpang. Ɓi ka ruu rɛɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe kɔ, gnvɔ shaa Laa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
49005007	N'ɔɔ kp'alɛ̀ yuu nɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ rɛɛ shi kpang keɓe kpang.
49005008	Ɓeleng bɛɛ nɔɔ nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, a wee nɔɔ raa zang Kpanti Yeesɔ tɔ ɓee, nɔɔ manɛ kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nwang nwannang manɛ kaa naa zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ kaa zang nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
49005009	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi nɔng yakɛnang kɔ nwangsɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ waasɛ̃, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
49005010	Nɔɔ kãa vuu ɓɔɔ shing Kpanti Yeesɔ tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ.
49005011	Ruu manɛ wu hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa palɛnang kpang, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ nwangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe katɔ ka dalɛ kɔ jong.
49005012	Naa zang rang yee ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang keɓe ri palɛ̀ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, ɓi vuu yusɛ̃ɛ.
49005013	Nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ, tùs'u zang naa ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe nwang ɓɛɛ.
49005014	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi katɔ piti, nwang ɓi naa nɔng yakɛnang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Hingsi jìng, zang ɓɔɔ roo katɔ ɓɛɛ, a mɔɔ yupaa ka vɔrɔ, Kirisi wu yakɛ nɔng ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ.”
49005015	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ gãng jìng ka nwannang manɛ waasɛ̃. N'ɔɔ nwàng wu naa shoko kpang, nɔɔ nw'ang naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng katɔ ɓɛɛ.
49005016	Naa nɔɔ walɛ gbalang vuu palɛnang, nɔɔ palɛ vuu bì'i waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, rɛɛ diki keɓe, shi ɓi takpang ɓɛɛ.
49005017	N'ɔɔ nwàng wu naa shoko kpang, nɔɔ kãa manɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ nɔɔ p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ.
49005018	N'ɔɔ yaa sàa wu si nɔɔ kpang, lasɛ nɔɔ katɔ. Nɔɔ yaa Suru Laa kɔ jong wu nwang ka yeti manɛ.
49005019	Nɔɔ rang zɔɔ yee nɛɛ soo ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔɔ Kirisi nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ soo ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zãa wu nɛɛ mani, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ soo ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ gaa soo, n'ɔɔ dɔɔ Kirisi ka yeti manɛ.
49005020	N'ɔɔ zãa Daa ɓuru Laa diki diki, ka ruu vuu piti, nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi.
49005021	Nɔɔ ɓ'aa shoo ka nyaa zɔɔ ka ruu bannang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
49005022	Zang soro ɓɔɔ zang gee nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓ'aa shoo ka nyaa varɛ manɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa ka nyaa Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
49005023	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, varɛ wukɔ zang bang ka yuu soro ɓiɓɛ, naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi zang bang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ɓɔɔ ri nwang ɓarɛ naa bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
49005024	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang soro ɓɔɔ zang gee nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓ'aa shoo ka nyaa varɛ manɛ ka vuu piti, naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
49005025	Varɛ, nɔɔ kàs'ɛ soro manɛ naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi kàsɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, a a zang yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
49005026	Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu shing ri, ri nwang zang Laa nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ruu ɓiɓɛ, ka knti ɓɔɔ wu sɔɔ ri tɔ nɛɛ mii ɓɛɛ.
49005027	Kirisi palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ri nwang kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri shi dɔli, kalang kalang, shi kpang kagn bii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ti luku ri ka bii kpang, bii ɓarɛ ti g'ɔɔrɔ̀ kpang, a vuu shi kpang ti kagn bii ɓarɛ kpang.
49005028	Varɛ ri wu kàsɛ̀ soro ɓarɛ katɔ naa ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Varɛ ɓɔɔ kasɛ soro ɓiɓɛ, kasɛ ɓi yuu ɓiɓɛ.
49005029	(Zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃̀ɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓi gngn kpang. A bii ɓiɓɛ ɓi vuu shaanang kɔ jong, wu gãng jìng kagn waasɛ̃, naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi gang jìng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ.
49005030	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓuru ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ɓɔɔ rikɔ nwang kaa naa vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.)
49005031	Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, zang varɛ yaa daa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nà'a ɓiɓɛ, ri gee zɔɔ nɛɛ ɓeeso, ri ziti keɓe ri nwang kaa naa shɔnzang gbete.”
49005032	Ruu nizang ɓɔɔ bang, ɓɔɔ ruu keɓe nwangsɛ kagn, n zirɛ, zang rang yee ɓi ka yuu Yeesɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ.
49005033	Zang r'ang nɔkɔ ruu keɓe jong. Varɛ ɓu wu kasɛ ɓeeso naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a soro ɓu wu seng ɓeevɛ katɔ
49006001	Wujɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri yiki nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu Laa. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa palɛnang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
49006002	Nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dangnɛ nɛɛ “A daaɓɛ nɛɛ naaɓɛ bannang katɔ,” wukɔ shɔɔnang ka teteng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, ɓɔɔ Laa gisi nyaa anang kagn ɓɛɛ nɛɛ,
49006003	“tɔ̀ɔ, vuu piti wu nwàng mɔɔ kaa tɔ̃ɔ, diki ɓaaɓɛ wu bee kati ka koo.”
49006004	Zang ɓɔɔ ri yiki wujɛ ɓɛɛ, n'ɔɔ p'alɛ̀ wujɛ manɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shing ri, yeti ɓarɛ wu làs'ɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ hingti ri, ri bang ka naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri mangkɛ wujɛ, a ri ti kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ri ruu ɓɛɛ.
49006005	Jaafoo, nɔɔ dũng nyaa dabang gãa manɛ katɔ. Nɔɔ seng ri, n'ɔɔ ti kaa vɔrɔ ɓarɛ gbãnggbãng. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ yeti gbete, naa nɔɔ shòng kaa Kirisi.
49006006	N'ɔɔ zi wu jìng ɓarɛ, n'ɔɔ p'al'ɛ vuu keɓe kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, ri dɔɔ nɔɔ kati ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ yeti manɛ nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ jaafoo Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
49006007	Nɔɔ palɛ shoonang jaafoo manɛ nyaa tabɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. N'ɔɔ ti palɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shŏng Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, wu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shŏng shɔnzang kpang.
49006008	Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, kpanti naa sɔɔrɔ zang ɓu doo ditɔ, jaafoo nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jaafoo kpang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
49006009	Dabang gãa, nɔɔ nwang doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ jaafoo manɛ. N'ɔɔ kɔɔ ri vuu ɓɔɔ hing ri bii manɛ anang kpang. Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, dabang gãa manɛ ɓɔɔ wukɔ ti ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ ɓi gbete ka lapa. Zang ɓɔɔ jɛ̃̀ɛ ruu ɓi jong gn dang gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.
49006010	N di nyaa kaa nɛɛ ruu keɓe, naa vuu palɛnang Kpanti Yeesɔ wu shing nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka ka yuu ruu gn kɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓee.
49006011	Nɔɔ hãlɛ vuu waa sìiri tanang Laa, ɓɔɔ Laa a nɔɔ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ shi bang kaa nɛɛ mani ka ɓɔɔ Sheetang naa kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ wu nwaarɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
49006012	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu g'aa nyaa wu nɛɛ shɔnzang kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu gaa nyaa ɓuru nɛɛ rɛɛ suru ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ shi kpang, ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ kaa nɛɛ rɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang, nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti koo jaa knti keɓe ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
49006013	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ sèe vuu waa sìiri tanang Laa ta, tɔ̀ɔ diki ɓɔɔ shi kpang keɓe n'ɛɛ a tɔ, nɔɔ shii bang kaa nɛɛ sheetang ka ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa gaanang nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ g'aa nyaa tɔ nɛɛ wu, nɔɔ nɛɛ shaa wu tɔ, nɔɔ shii kaa nɛɛ doo, ka nɔng manɛ gbãnggbãng.
49006014	Nɔɔ kpalɛ bii katɔ n'ɔɔ shiiyi. Ruu ɓɔɔ nizang wu nwang naa guruji ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã ka sang ɓɛɛ. Nwannang tɔ̃ɔ manɛ naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, wu nwang naa vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zuu danggn nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
49006015	Bii ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ daa kɔɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ shingnɛ yeti zang valɛ ɓɛɛ, wu nwang naa koodoo ka doo manɛ.
49006016	N'ɔɔ ti yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ, wu nwàng nɔɔ naa kãati diki diki. N'ɔɔ nɔɔ shɔng ɓɔɔ Sheetang taka nɔɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ mani.
49006017	Nɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, Laa nɛɛ ta yuu manɛ tɔ, nwang nɔɔ kaa naa waalaa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ hãa ka yuu ɓɛɛ. Ruu Laa wu nwang nɔɔ ɓi kaa naa yere bang, ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
49006018	Nɔɔ gaa Laa diki diki naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa tusu nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ gaa wu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ nandon. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe nɔngkɔ, n'ɔɔ lee kpang. N'ɔɔ ti gaa Laa diki diki ka ruu zang Laa nandon.
49006019	A n'ɔɔ gaa m Laa jong, wu hãa m ruu ka nyaa, n nɛɛ kpalɛ bii tɔ, n tɔɔ n kɔɔ zang kaa ruu ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n rang yee, n nwàngsɛ̀ zang ruu nizang ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ka yuu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ, 'n kaa vɔrɔ kpang.
49006020	Zang shong m ka ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe kɔ, a zang mã m ka sãa. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ gaa m Laa, wu shingnɛ, n rang yee keɓe naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ, n kaa vɔrɔ kpang.
49006021	Tikiku manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ wu dɔli, ɓɔɔ ti palɛ Laa shoonang nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ, naa kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ditɔ nandon ka yuu mɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ tãa naa ɓɔɔ n nwang ɓɛɛ.
49006022	Ka ruu ruu keɓe kɔ, n shong wu ka bii manɛ, wu kɔɔ nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ ruu nandon ruu nwang ɓɛɛ. Tɔɔ wu mã nɔɔ danggn kati.
49006023	N gaa Daa ɓuru Laa nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri shing rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, yeti ɓarɛ wu valɛ katɔ, ri kasɛ ruu zɔɔ, ri ti yi rɛɛ manzung ɓuru naa kagn, ri shing danggn.
49006024	N gaa Laa nɛɛ wu pàlɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi gbãnggbãng tɔ̃ɔ.
50001001	Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ Bulu nɛɛ Timoti, ɓɔɔ ruu jaafoo Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ruu bè'e nɔɔ zang Laa nandon ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ka gari Filipi ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ nɔkɔ zang bang bang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang ka ruu zang Laa ɓɛɛ.
50001002	Ruu gaa Daa ɓuru Laa nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.
50001003	Diki diki n nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛ ruu manɛ tɔ, n zãa Laa mɛɛ ka ruu manɛ.
50001004	Ka laa ɓɔɔ n gaa Laa piti ka yuu manɛ nandon, n tãa tìnang dɔli.
50001005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ yi m naa ka bii ka ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ yi m naa kagn ka ɓɔɔ n g'aay'u ɓɛɛ, à nɛɛ mani kãntang keɓe.
50001006	N yaa gn naa kpang, Laa ɓɔɔ gaayu shoonang tɔ̃ɔ kaɓa ka yeti manɛ, naa hangsɛ shoonang keɓe ditɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ.
50001007	Daa naa ɓɔɔ n rɛ̃rɛ zɔ̃ng rɛ̃rɛnang keɓe tɔ ka yuu manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nandon nɛɛ n, ruu zi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ruu ka nyaa zɔɔ tɔ, kãntang kɔ wee zang mã m ka sãa, a ɓɔɔ ti ka laa ɓɔɔ n shii ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ. N tusu zang nɛɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓi nizang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.
50001008	Laa zi tɔ nizang nɛɛ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ dɔli, naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi kasɛ ruu ɓɛɛ.
50001009	N gaa Laa ka ruu manɛ, nɛɛ, kasɛnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ nɛɛ manɛ wu daa nɛɛ tìng sasak. N'ɔɔ ti zi vuu dɔli, n'ɔɔ zunung naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ basɛ teteng vuu tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ ka vuu piti.
50001010	Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zɔ̃ng vuu ɓɔɔ wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓa Vuu piti ɓɛɛ kati. Vuu keɓe kɔ ri shingnɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kagn, nɔɔ nwang manɛ zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang naa tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
50001011	N ti gaa Laa nɛɛ n'ɔɔ walɛ nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, n'ɔɔ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ jong. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ri dɔ̀ɔ Laa, ri ti a wu bannang ka ruu vuu keɓe.
50001012	Manzung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, n kasɛ, nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ vuu kɔ palɛ m ɓee, shingnɛ Ruu Laa daa ɓi nɛɛ tìng kɔ jong.
50001013	Vuu keɓe kɔ shingnɛ sɔɔja nandon ɓɔɔ ri gã gãa kpanti Rooma nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nandon, ri zi kati nɛɛ zang mã m ka sãa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n dũng Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
50001014	Mãnang kɔ zang mã m ka sãa ɓee, mã̀ rɛɛ manzung mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ danggn tɔ ka gbalang kpanti Yeesɔ. Ri kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Laa kana gbãnggbãng ri kaa vɔrɔ takpang.
50001015	Nizang, zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn, ri kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kaa sũnyaa, a ri ti kasɛ nɛɛ ri shing zang zang ri palɛ nyaa ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ zang ruu Laa ɓi ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri pàl'ɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
50001016	Zang doo knti keɓe ri palɛ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kasɛ m katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ti zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa shingnɛ nɛɛ zang mã m ka sãa, tɔ̀ɔ, n tusu zang kati nɛɛ Ruu Laa ɓi nizang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.
50001017	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa sũnyaa kaɓa, ri kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ka yuu Yeesɔ nabm, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri ɓa m ɓɛɛ. A ri kɔɔrɔ ruu ɓarɛ kaa nyaa lapa waati. Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri gisi m jìng dannang ka yuu, ka wee n ka sãa ɓee.
50001018	P'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, naa ri nwaarɛ zang doo katɔ, naa ri nwaarɛ zang ka takpang, n tãa m tìnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Ruu Yeesɔ kɔ ɓa vuu piti, a zang ti kɔɔrɔ zang ruu bì'i kana ɓɛɛ. N tãa m kaa tìnang kɔ sasak.
50001019	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi tɔ, Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaa m, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Suru Yeesɔ Kirisi yi m ka bii ɓɛɛ, naa shingnɛ zang naa yaa m naa ditɔ.
50001020	Vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ka yeti mɛɛ, a n ti shing gn kagn, ɓi naa ɓɔɔ n p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ yusɛ̃ɛ naa tuu m kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa n ningkãari a naa n vɔ doo katɔ, n kasɛ diki diki n nwang zang ɓɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, naa wee n kãntang ɓee. Tɔ̀ɔ, n shingnɛ, zang a Yeesɔ Kirisi bannang kati.
50001021	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka bii mɛɛ, naa n nwang ningkãari, n nwang ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ gbete. Naa n vɔ doo katɔ piti, wukɔ ti tɔ̃ɔ.
50001022	Naa n nwang ningkãari ka koo keɓe, n ti palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ yi zang naa ka bii ɓɛɛ katɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n zi ɓɔɔ n zɔ̃ng gbete ɓɛɛ kpang.
50001023	N shii kaa teteng vuu ziti keɓe. N kasɛ gbãnggbãng, n yaa koo keɓe, n daa nwang kaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓa nwannang ningkãari ka koo keɓe katɔ ɓɛɛ.
50001024	A naa n nwang ningkãari ka koo keɓe, wukɔ daayi jong ka ruu manɛ.
50001025	Nn, nɔngkɔ nizang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n nwang kaa nɛɛ nɔɔ ka koo keɓe. N nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ, n yi nɔɔ naa kaa bii nɔɔ shing danggn kaa gbãnggbãng. Nɔɔ ti tãa tìnang kaa dɔli.
50001026	Tɔ̀ɔ, n nɛɛ a tɔ ka nɔng manɛ tɔkn, nɔɔ naa tãa tìnang kaa dɔli, nɔɔ dɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ̀ m ɓɛɛ.
50001027	Nwannang manɛ, wu nwang naa ɓɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ daayi, tɔ̀ɔ, naa n naa leng nɔɔ, naa n leng nɔɔ doo kpang, n tãa nyaa katɔ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ dà'a gbete. N ti tãa katɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kpalɛ yuu nɛɛ zɔɔ, nɔɔ shii gbãnggbãng, nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang ri shing danggn ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa.
50001028	'N ti tãayi nɛɛ nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ kpang tingkiring. Wukɔ naa tusu ri kati nɛɛ Laa naa ningsi ri, nɔɔ naa wɔ manɛ katɔ. A nɔɔ ti zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ naa tusu ri ditɔ nɛɛ vuu keɓe nɔngkɔ.
50001029	Laa ɓɔɔ yàa nɔɔ gbalang nɛɛ n'ɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ti yaa nɔɔ gbalang tɔ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ dang jìng ka ruu ɓiɓɛ.
50001030	Nɔɔ zi m katɔ ka ɓɔɔ n dang jìng ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ti tãa nyaa jìng dannang mɛɛ doo naa. Kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ dang kaa jìng jong naa ɓɔɔ n dàng ɓɛɛ.
50002001	Wee nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Kirisi ɓee, danggn shinnang keɓe zàr'ɛ nɔɔ kana, nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ ya? Kasɛnang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɔɔ mã nɔɔ danggn katɔ ya? A nɔɔ ti nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Suru Laa ya? Nɔɔ kasɛ katɔ ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ya? A gn zɔɔ ti kɔng nɔɔ katɔ ya?
50002002	N gaa nɔɔ katɔ rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ wu daa gbete, n'ɔɔ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ, n'ɔɔ ti ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ zɔɔ, n'ɔɔ kasɛ nyaa zɔɔ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n tãa tìnang kaa nyaa kiiri.
50002003	N'ɔɔ kàsɛ̀ wu yuu manɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, n'ɔɔ ti tuu yuu manɛ kpang. Risi yuu ɓaaɓɛ naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, mɔɔ zì zang ɓɔɔ naa ri ɓa mɔɔ katɔ.
50002004	Zang ɓu wu shing jìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, wu shing jìng jong ka vuu ɓɔɔ ɓeezung kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
50002005	Rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti manɛ wu nwang naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ.
50002006	Yeesɔ nwang naa Laa ka ruu piti, a tɔɔ kaa takpang nɛɛ wu gãsɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Laa nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning kpang.
50002007	Yaa vuu keɓe nandon, a risi yuu ɓiɓɛ naa jaafoo kɔ jong. A tuu bii shɔnzang, zang yi wu naa ɓɔɔ zang yi jaa shɔnzang ɓɛɛ.
50002008	Ka ɓɔɔ wu shɔnzang, sɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ ka dii a ti kasɛ nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ. Vɔ vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa zang naa ka laa ɓɛɛ.
50002009	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa tuu wu a wu bannang ɓɔɔ bang dɔli, a ti a wu n'ung ɓɔɔ ɓa nung zang piti ɓɛɛ.
50002010	tɔ̀ɔ, zang nɛɛ tãa nung Yeesɔ tɔ zang piti, ri tang ka tipi ri b'ang wu. Naa zang tãa nung keɓe ka lapa naa ka koo keɓe, naa doo ka tipi dii ɓɛɛ.
50002011	Zang ɓu ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ, ka shoo zang piti, nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kpanti ɓiɓɛ. Wu ti naa a Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru bannang.
50002012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa mɛɛ diki diki, bɛɛ n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo kaa nyaa mɛɛ gbãnggbãng ka wee kãntang n tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓee. Nɔɔ yi tìng n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ yuu manɛ ɓɔɔ Laa ta tɔ ɓɛɛ, wu nwang kaa nyaa kiiri. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ vɔrɔ kaanang nɛɛ bii zaanang.
50002013	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔ shing mɔɔ, nɛɛ mɔɔ kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ ti shingnɛ, mɔɔ zunung ɓarɛ palɛnang.
50002014	Nɔɔ palɛ vuu piti, n'ɔɔ gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee kpang, n'ɔɔ ti laa nyaa kpang.
50002015	Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ nwang kaa zang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ kpang, nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang, a ri ti tɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ nwang kaa wujɛ Laa, ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka wee nɔɔ nwang ka teteng zang koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ ri sɔɔ gbalang gbete jong kaara kpang, ri ti palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓee. N'ɔɔ nwang kaa teteng ɓarɛ ka koo keɓe naa sang ɓɔɔ yakɛ nɔng ɓɛɛ.
50002016	Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ ti kɔɔ zang ruu ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ. Naa nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi naa gbãayu, n naa tãa tìnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n naa zi kaa wukɔ nɛɛ n nyɔ bii ka nɔng shoonang ka dalɛ waati kpang ɓɛɛ.
50002017	Danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi nwang naa vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔɔ Laa ɓɛɛ. Naa zang tɛ̃ɛ zìi mɛɛ doo ka yuu vuu kɔ nɔɔ dɔɔ Laa ɓee, n tãa m tìnang nɛɛ nɔɔ.
50002018	Daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa tìnang jong tɔ. Nɔɔ kpalɛ yuu nɛɛ n, ruu tãa tìnang.
50002019	Naa Kpanti Yeesɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, n tantɛ Timoti shonnang ditɔ ka bii manɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɛɛ gbãayu tɔ ka bii mɛɛ, ruu manɛ ɓɔɔ wu naa kɔɔ m, wu mã m danggn kati.
50002020	Timoti kɔ gbete, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓiɓɛ daa gbete nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɛɛ, wukɔ ti kasɛ ruu manɛ gbãnggbãng.
50002021	Zang nimbang ri nandon, zang ɓu rɛ̃̀r'ɛ ɓi ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ a wu tìnang ɓɛɛ, ri rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ ɓarɛ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang.
50002022	A nɔɔ nandon, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Timoti tusu tɔ nɛɛ wu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ. N nɛɛ wu, ruu kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ka nyaa zɔɔ. Ka shoonang kɔ ruu palɛ ɓee, dũng m, naa ɓɔɔ jaa dũng daa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
50002023	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n shing jìng nɛɛ n shong wu ka bii manɛ tantɛnang, n nɛɛ zi naa ɓɔɔ vuu nwalɛ ka nɔng mɛɛ ka nihn tɔ ɓɛɛ.
50002024	N shing gn ka bii Laa nɛɛ n nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ n naa tantɛ anang ditɔ ka bii manɛ.
50002025	N zi ka jìng mɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, n shong manzung ɓuru Abafaroditu ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shoonang nɛɛ zɔɔ, a ruu ti ta sìiri ka bii zɔɔ nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shong wu nɛɛ wu naa yi m naa ka bii ɓɛɛ.
50002026	Kasɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ gbãnggbãng nɛɛ wu zi nɔɔ nandon tɔkn. Vuu bii kpãa wu dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ tãayi nɛɛ vuu p'al'ɛ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
50002027	Nizang, bɛɛ vuu palɛ wu katɔ, yaa tɔkɔlɔng nɛɛ vɔ tɔ. A gn ɓiɓɛ kɔng Laa, nwang naa ɓɔɔ gn mɛɛ kɔng Laa jong ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu lasɛ m yeti tɔ̀'ɔ ka wee vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa m, kiiri m nyaa ka teteng ɓee kpang.
50002028	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kasɛ katɔ gbãnggbãng n shong wu, wu naa ìi nɔɔ, tɔɔ n'ɔɔ tãa tìnang nɔɔ nɛɛ zi wu tɔ tɔkn ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, yeti mɛɛ wu valɛ kaa jong.
50002029	Nɛɛ shɛ̃ɛ nɔng manɛ tɔ, nɔɔ ta wu waasɛ̃, n'ɔɔ tãa tìnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi doo zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kɔ naa nɔkɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ seng wu tɔ.
50002030	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yaa tɔkɔlɔng nɛɛ vɔrɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu palɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi shoonang ɓɛɛ. Malɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu hangsɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ pàlɛ̀ m ɓɛɛ.
50003001	Rɛɛ manzung, n gisi nɔɔ ruu keɓe. Kpanti ɓuru wu shingnɛ n'ɔɔ tãa tìnang dɔli. Naa wee n bee nɔɔ doo vuu ɓɔɔ n bèe nɔɔ tɔ ka tìng ɓee, vuu keɓe kpãa m kpang. Nizang n palɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu lee nɔɔ naa kaa tɔɔ bii kpang.
50003002	Nɔɔ gãng jìng waasɛ̃ ka zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang naa zaa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri yi tìng nɛɛ, zang ri yee shaa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
50003003	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi rukɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang yee ri shaa ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Rukɔ bang Laa nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Suru ɓiɓɛ, a ruu ti walɛ bannang ɓuru ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ruu pãng yuu ɓuru ka rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ bì'i shɔnzang kpang.
50003004	Vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka koo keɓe ɓɔɔ zang pãng yuu kagn kpang. Naa vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kagn, nkɔ nɛɛ pãng yuu kagn nɛɛ ɓa zang piti.
50003005	Zang yee m shaa, bɛɛ zang yi m tɔ diki mɛɛ daa mantaati. N zang Isirela kirik. N zang zɔ̃ng Biliyaminu. N ti zang Ibiraniyawa kɔ nandon. Ka gbalang nyaa ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa ri dang ɓɛɛ, bɛɛ n ka vaa rɛɛ Farisawa.
50003006	Ɓeleng n tusu zang naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ vuu zang Yahudawa nɛɛ kaka bii mɛɛ nandon ɓɛɛ. Ka ɓɔɔ n dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi jìng. N ta nyaa dannang zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ shing zang zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa wu gbete kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ n palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang.
50003007	Vuu ɓɔɔ ɓeleng n zirɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ nwang vuu ɓɔɔ katɔ, n risi tɔ, tɔ̀'ɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu Kirisi.
50003008	Nizang, vuu naa mɛɛ nandon, n risi tɔ naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zinang ɓɔɔ n zi Kpanti mɛɛ Yeesɔ kirisi, ɓa vuu piti katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu Yeesɔ kɔ n yaa vuu piti tɔ. N risi vuu piti naa vuu wɔ̀sɔ̀nang, tɔ̀ɔ, n wàlɛ̀ m kaa Yeesɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
50003009	'N ti nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ. Laa wu tuu m zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n shing danggn ka bii Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Wu ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, wu ti ka ruu ɓɔɔ n dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa dang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi Laa kɔ risi m, n nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
50003010	N kasɛ m vuu gbete, wukɔ nɛɛ, n zi Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, n ti zi naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa. N kasɛ n ɓakɛ yuu jong nɛɛ wu, n dang jìng, n nwang kaa jong naa wu ka vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu vɔ ɓɛɛ.
50003011	Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, Laa wu wisi m paa jong naa ɓɔɔ wisi wu paa ɓɛɛ.
50003012	N tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ n walɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n shing jìng mɛɛ kagn ka tìng kaɓa kpang, n ti tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ shi kpang kagn ka bii mɛɛ kpang kpang. N daa m nɛɛ tìng, tɔ̀ɔ, n naa yiti rɛɛ vuu kaɓa naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi yiti m jong ɓɛɛ.
50003013	Rɛɛ manzung, n t'ɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, n walɛ rɛɛ vuu kaɓa tɔ kpang. Vuu gbete ɓɔɔ n palɛ keɓe. N rɛ̃rɛ m tɔ̀'ɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang, n daa m nɛɛ tìng, n shing jìng m ka vuu ɓɔɔ ka tìng mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
50003014	N daa nɛɛ tìng kɔ sasak, tɔ̀ɔ, n daa shɛ̃ɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ n shing jìng kagn ka tìng ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa m nyaa nɛɛ n naa walɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Laa nɛɛ, n naa nwang nɛɛ wu ka lapa.
50003015	Wee naa ɓɔɔ rùu ɓɔɔ ruu tɔ̀'ɔ wujɛ ka rɛɛ vuu Suru Laa kpang, rùu rɛ̃rɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Naa zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ rɛ̃rɛ n'aabm̀, Laa naa tusu nɔɔ ditɔ nɔɔ zi waasɛ̃.
50003016	Vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa vuu piti ɓɛɛ, ruu dũng rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ruu dũng ɓɛɛ kɔ sasak.
50003017	Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ nɔɔ nandon. Nɔɔ ti pɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ naa weɓe jong. Rùu nwàng nɔɔ ɓuru kaa gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng ɓɛɛ.
50003018	N kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ nɔɔ rɛɛ vuu keɓe tɔ, wu doo gbete kpang. Vuu kɔ n kɔɔrɔ tɔkn nɛɛ miiri ka jìng ɓee. N kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn teteng manɛ, ri nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔ ka yuu laa ɓɛɛ kpang.
50003019	Zang keɓe, ri daa ɓarɛ ka nɔng waa. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi buru ɓarɛ kɔ nwang kaa naa Laa ɓarɛ, ri ti tuu yuu ɓarɛ ka rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yusɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ tuu ri kagn kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. Ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ ka yuu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
50003020	Rùu ɓuru zang lapa kɔ jong, a ruu shu jìng, ruu gã Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wu t'a yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ, wu a nɛɛ lapa.
50003021	Nɛɛ a tɔ, naa palɛ shoonang nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang bang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shing zang piti ri palɛ vuu ka naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa kɔ̃sɔ bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ lakɛ naa ka bii kpang ti vɔ katɔ keɓe, wu nwang kaa naa bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bannang kagn ɓɛɛ.
50004001	Rɛɛ manzung ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ gbãnggbãng, n shing jìng n kasɛ nɔɔ zinang. Nɔkɔ shing m n tãa tìnang, n ti dɔɔ bii nɛɛ nɔkɔ. Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ shii nɔngkɔ gbãnggbãng ka bii Laa
50004002	Ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀'ɔ Afodiya nɛɛ Sitiki keɓe. N gaa ri gbãnggbãng, n zɔ̃ɔrɔ ri katɔ, ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓarɛ zang Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
50004003	N gaa mɔɔ katɔ, zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang nɛɛ n, a ti ɓaa shoo ka nyaa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ yì rɛɛ zang soro keɓe naa ka bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nɛɛ n, ruu palɛ shoonang, a ruu ti dang jìng nɛɛ zɔɔ, ka ɓɔɔ ruu, kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ Kilema nɛɛ rɛɛ wusang shoonang mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ Laa b'ee nung ɓarɛ tɔ nandon ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ wu beere nung zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
50004004	Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ tãa tìnang diki diki. N paasɛ nɔɔ kɔɔnang tɔkn, nɔɔ tãa tìnang.
50004005	Nɔɔ yaa nwannang manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi tìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ manɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, wu nwang vuu ɓɔɔ zang piti ri zi ɓɛɛ kati. Kpanti Kirisi yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng a kaa tɔ.
50004006	Nɔɔ kpãa yuu manɛ ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, nɔɔ kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ Laa vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ jong. N'ɔɔ gaa Laa ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rang yee nɛɛ wu, nɔɔ ti zãa wu.
50004007	Naa nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ, yeti valɛnang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa, ɓɔɔ ɓa naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang zi naa ɓɔɔ nwang ɓɛɛ katɔ, naa gãng jìng ka ɓoro manɛ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu lee nɔɔ naa kaa tɔ̀'ɔ bii kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
50004008	Rɛɛ manzung, ruu ɓɔɔ n gɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ mani keɓe. Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang seng katɔ ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ teetee ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ shi dɔli ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ, a zang ti a wu bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ, vuu nandon ɓɔɔ daa naa dɔɔnang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
50004009	Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ, k'ɔ nɔɔ tarɛ ka bii mɛɛ, k'ɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ tãa ka nyaa mɛɛ, k'ɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ka nwannang mɛɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ palɛ wukɔ. Laa ɓɔɔ shingnɛ yeti zang wu valɛ ɓɛɛ, naa nwang ditɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ.
50004010	N tãa tìnang dɔli ka ruu ɓɔɔ n zang Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki ɓa tɔ dɔli, nɔɔ yi m naa kana bii tɔkn. N zi tɔ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ruu mɛɛ katɔ, a nɔɔ walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi m naa kaa tɔ̀'ɔ bii ɓɛɛ kpang.
50004011	N kɔɔ ruu keɓe, wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kpɛ̃ɛrɛ yuu mɛɛ tɔ nɛɛ, vuu wu daa m katɔ, naa nwannang mɛɛ doo naa viya?
50004012	Ǹ zi naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ, n nwangnɛ, vuu ka naa mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ tɔ. N ti zi naa ɓɔɔ n nwang vuu mɛɛ kagn gaagaa tɔ. Naa doo ka zɔ̃ng nwannang kiya, n kpɛ̃ɛrɛ yuu mɛɛ tɔ. Naa nyɔkɔ nyɔ m, naa n puu doo katɔ, naa vuu kagn dɔli, naa vuu kagn kpang, n zi naa ɓɔɔ n shii gbãnggbãng tɔ.
50004013	N zunung ɓɔɔ n palɛ rɛɛ vuu keɓe katɔ piti, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ a m ɓɛɛ.
50004014	Naa doo nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi m naa ka bii ka ɓɔɔ n dàng jìng ɓɛɛ.
50004015	Nɔɔ zang Filipi, nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ nɔɔ zi tɔ, nɛɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ n gaayu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang ruu tɔ̃ɔ Laa, gaayu nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ n yupaa n yaa Makidoniya ɓɛɛ, nɔkɔ yi m naa ka bii shɛ̃ɛning. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ, ri ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ n, a ruu alɛ zɔɔ vuu, rùu ti t'alɛ̀ nɛɛ naa zɔɔ kpang.
50004016	Ka ɓɔɔ n ka gari Tesalonika, nɔɔ yi m naa ka bii, ɓa doo gbete katɔ, ka ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa mɛɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
50004017	N shing jìng mɛɛ wu ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a m ɓɛɛ kpang. N kasɛ m nɛɛ, Laa wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ yi m naa ka bii ɓɛɛ.
50004018	Nɔɔ a m vuu piti ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ ti gisi vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ dɔli ɓa vuu ɓɔɔ n shing gn ɓiɓɛ tɔ. Ɓɔɔ Abafaroditu atɛ m vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ alɛ wu. Vuu bì'i daa m katɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ takpang. Vuu keɓe nwang naa vuu ɓɔɔ pũngku sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ shingnɛ Laa tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ.
50004019	Laa mɛɛ, vuu naa ɓiɓɛ kagn dɔli, ɓɔɔ wu a zang nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ ditɔ nandon.
50004020	Zang ri a Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru, bannang dondong. Nɔngkɔ.
50004021	Jee m zang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi zɔ̃ngkɔ ri, nɛɛ ri nwang zang ɓiɓɛ nyaa. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ n ka nihn, ri jee nɔɔ nyaa.
50004022	Zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka nihn nandon ri jee nɔɔ nyaa. Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka yeti gãa kpanti Kayisa kɔ ri jee nɔɔ nyaa gbãnggbãng.
50004023	Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
51001001	Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔ kasɛ, a n nwàng zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ kaa manzung ɓuru Timoti.
51001002	Rùu jee zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Kolosi, ɓɔɔ ri manzung ɓuru ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing nɛɛ ri gbete ka bii Kirisi ɓɛɛ. N gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru, wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ wu shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ
51001003	Rùu zãa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi diki diki, ruu nɛ̀'ɛ gaa nɔɔ Laa ɓɛɛ.
51001004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu tã̀a nyaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi tɔ, a ɓɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang Laa nandon ɓɛɛ.
51001005	Ka ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa tìng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ tãa naa ɓɔɔ sh'ing zang, zang yaa gn naa kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shingnɛ, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zang, shii ɓi ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing gn ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ zang shìng nɔɔ katɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
51001006	Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ atɛ zang tìnang tãanang kana, a tìnang keɓe, baa koo tɔ nandon. Naa ɓɔɔ baa teteng manɛ doo nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ tãanang, a nɔɔ naa zi naa ɓɔɔ nwàng ɓɛɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
51001007	Nɔɔ tãa vuu keɓe nɛɛ nyaa Epafara, zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang nɛɛ ruu, ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ wu dɔli ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi shoonang nɛɛ yeti gbete, ka nung ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
51001008	Kɔ̀ɔ rùu naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa shing nɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zang ɓɛɛ.
51001009	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rùu gaa Laa diki diki ka ruu manɛ, ruu gaayu doo nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ ruu tãa ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ. Ruu gaa Laa wu shing nɔɔ nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ nɛɛ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ. Suru Laa wu a nɔɔ zũnang nɛɛ vuu zinang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
51001010	Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ naa zunung nwannang ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru kasɛ ɓɛɛ kati, nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shing wu tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ kati diki diki. Nwannang manɛ naa shing nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Zinang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi vuu ka yuu Laa, naa daa kaa nɛɛ tìng diki diki.
51001011	Laa wu a nɔɔ kaka nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, jìng dannang nɛɛ a tɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn kaa vuu piti.
51001012	Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru kati, nɔɔ tãa tìnang. Laa ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ dàa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ wàl'ɛ vuu jong ka teteng vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing zang ɓiɓɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu roo kpanti kagn, ɓɔɔ yakɛ ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
51001013	Tà yuu ɓuru nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, atɛ ruu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ dɔli, roo kpanti ɓɛɛ.
51001014	Jaa ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu ɓuru nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, a zang yàa ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ rùu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
51001015	Ruu zi nwannang Laa ɓɔɔ ruu zi nɛɛ jìng kpang ka bii Yeesɔ kɔ. Wukɔ jamari rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ ɓɛɛ,
51001016	ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa mãa vuu nandon ka lapa nɛɛ tipi nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi katɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi nɛɛ jìng kpang, nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang nandon. Laa mãa koo keɓe nandon nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ, ti ka ruu ɓiɓɛ.
51001017	Yeesɔ nw'ang ɓi ka tìng bɛɛ zang mãa vuu gn gbete kpang. Vuu piti ri nwang ka nɔng ɓarɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
51001018	Wukɔ zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ɓɔɔ ri nw'ang kaa naa bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Bii keɓe walɛ suru bii nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Wukɔ jamari zang ɓɔɔ zang wisi ri paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ka vuu piti wukɔ wu nwang kaa tìng.
51001019	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔ kasɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nwannang ɓiɓɛ wu nwang ka bii Jaa nandon.
51001020	A Laa kasɛ tɔ, nɛɛ wu sɔɔrɔ koo piti ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ bii Jaa. Zìi Jaa ɓɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ ka yuu laa kɔ shingnɛ Laa nwang kaa nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ shɔnzang, a sɔɔrɔ vuu piti ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ tipi ɓɛɛ.
51001021	Diki ɓɔɔ kagn bɛɛ nɔɔ ka bii Laa naabm kpang, bɛɛ nɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ wu kpang, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ a nɔɔ ti p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ.
51001022	A kãntang keɓe, ka ruu vɔrɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ, nɔɔ raa wusang Laa tɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu atɛ nɔɔ kaa tìng ɓiɓɛ, nɔɔ kaa zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
51001023	Nɔɔ yi tìng manɛ ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔsɔ nɔɔ ka vuu gn shinnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ walɛ ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe kɔ, n Bulu n raa zang shoonang. Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ zang tɔ nandon ka koo ɓɛɛ.
51001024	Kãntang keɓe, n tãa kaa tìnang ka jìng ɓɔɔ n dang ka ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ. Jìng kɔ n dang ɓee, hangsɛ ɓi nyaa vuu ɓɔɔ yàa m ka jìng dannang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shing m, nɛɛ n dang ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ɓɔɔ rikɔ kaa bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
51001025	A Laa shing m n nwàng zang shoonang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ. A m shoonang keɓe n p'al'ɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwàng nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kati. Shoonang keɓe ɓi ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓiɓɛ nyaa kiiri ɓɛɛ.
51001026	Ɓɔɔ wu waasɛ shɔnzang katɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ, a kãntang keɓe nwangsɛ kaa zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
51001027	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ keɓe, kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwàngsɛ̀ zang ɓiɓɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bɛ̀'ɛ wu waasɛ katɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zi wu kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ wu waasɛ katɔ, ɓɔɔ bannang kagn, ɓɔɔ wu shìng zang piti ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ wu waasɛ katɔ keɓe kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Kirisi kagn yeti manɛ, ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ Laa naa a nɔɔ bannang ɓiɓɛ katɔ.”
51001028	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu kɔɔ zang piti, ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ruu shaarɛ zang piti nyaa, a ruu ti tusu ri nɛɛ zũnang ɓuru nandon, tɔ̀ɔ ruu atɛ zang ɓu ka tìng Laa naa zang ɓɔɔ zũng danggn tɔ, ɓɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
51001029	Ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ, n palɛ shoonang, n kɔngnɛ nɛɛ kaka ɓɔɔ ka bii mɛɛ nandon, ɓɔɔ Kirisi a m, ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang ka bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
51002001	N kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ n palɛ shoonang nɛɛ kaka mɛɛ nandon, ka ruu manɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Lawodikiya, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi m gngn nɛɛ jìng ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
51002002	N palɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n mã ri danggn kati. Tɔ̀ɔ zɔɔ kasɛnang ɓarɛ wu ɓakɛ ri yuu kaa nɔng gbete, tɔ̀ɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ kaa nyaa kiiri. Ri ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa waasɛ katɔ keɓe, ɓɔɔ ɓi wukɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
51002003	Ɓɔɔ Laa w'aasɛ̀ zũnang nɛɛ vuu zinang nandon ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
51002004	N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu keɓe tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu nw'aarɛ̀ nɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa laanang sè'e kpang, naa nyaa keɓe shi doo naa viya?
51002005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa wee n nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang ɓee, n nɛɛ nɔɔ ka suru. N tãa tìnang ka ɓɔɔ n zi naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu teetee, a nɔɔ ti shii gbãnggbãng ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bì'i Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
51002006	Wee nɔɔ t'a Yeesɔ Kirisi tɔ, nɛɛ wu nwang Kpanti manɛ ɓee, nɔɔ nwangnɛ, nɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ wu.
51002007	Nɔɔ ɓ'aa saara manɛ ka bii ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ bang kati. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ shii ka gbãnggbãng ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ zang tusu nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti zãa Laa ka yeti manɛ diki diki.
51002008	Nɔɔ g'ãng jìng kagn, zang nɛ̀'ɛ yi nɔɔ nɛɛ zang nwaarɛnang nɛɛ zũnang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii shɔnzang, ti nwàng zang vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zũnang ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ dabang ri tusu ka tìng a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa dannang sè'e ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri t'usù ɓɛɛ, wu nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kpang ɓɛɛ.
51002009	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwannang Laa nandon ɓi ka bii shɔnzang Yeesɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ,
51002010	a zang a nɔɔ vuu piti tɔ, nyaa kiiri ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ kɔ zang bang ka yuu rɛɛ kpanti nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang bang.
51002011	Ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ wu, zang yee nɔɔ shaa, wu zɔ̃ng shaa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri y'ee ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi zɔ̃ng shaa yeenang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ ɓi kaa yuu ɓuru, ɓɔɔ wu tà nɛɛ naa bii ɓuru ɓɔɔ kasɛ ɓi vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓɛɛ.
51002012	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɔɔ batizima, nwang naa ɓɔɔ zang gbãa nɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Kaa batizima kɔ nwàng naa ɓɔɔ zang ti wisi nɔɔ paa jong nɛɛ Yeesɔ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka naa vuu palɛnang Laa ɓɔɔ wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ.
51002013	Bɛɛ ɓeleng nɔɔ nwang manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ti, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ zang Isirela kpang, nɔɔ zi nyaa dannang Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. A kãntang keɓe Laa a nɔɔ suru bii tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi. A ti kɔsɔ ruu vuu shi kpang ɓuru tɔ nandon.
51002014	Laa ningsi nyaa dannang tɔ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ, a àlɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yuu ɓuru ɓɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ nwang ruu naa nyaa kɔpɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ningsi tɔ nandon ka ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa vuu keɓe jong ka laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa Yeesɔ naa kagn ɓɛɛ.
51002015	Ka yuu laa kaɓa kɔ, Laa t'a yuu ɓuru nɛɛ naa rɛɛ suru ɓɔɔ ri roo kpanti, p'al'ɛ ri vuu yusɛ̃ɛ ka jìng zang piti, a sèe ri naa ɓɔɔ zang sè'e zang ɓɔɔ zang yiki ka nyaa sìiri ɓɛɛ.
51002016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu dãa nɔɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shaayi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓooyi ɓɛɛ kpang. K'ɔ ka yuu diki Laa, k'ɔ ka yuu vuu shaanang shala shɔɔ, k'ɔ ka yuu diki ɔ̃sɔnang.
51002017	Vuu keɓe nandon nwàng ɓi naa jasuru vuu ɓɔɔ a doo ka tìng ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi.
51002018	Nɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu ɓa nɔɔ katɔ, wu dɔng nɔɔ ruu kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu zìl'i vuu ka si hingro, a yi tìng, suu sè'e nɛɛ wu tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, a bang ɓi kaa rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Zɔ̃ng zang keɓe tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ, ka dalɛ waati, ka rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ wu rɛ̃rɛ naa shɔnzang ɓɛɛ,
51002019	di yuu ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang ɓuru kpang. Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ yiti bii ɓiɓɛ nandon ka nɔng gbete, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bii tiisi ɓɛɛ nɛɛ hìiri, a bii bangnɛ naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ wu bang ɓɛɛ.
51002020	Nɔɔ vɔ manɛ tɔ, nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, a zang ti ta yuu manɛ tɔ, nɛɛ naa rɛɛ nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri tusu ɓɛɛ. A ka ruu vi nɔɔ nwang nwannang naa nɔɔ manɛ zang koo keɓe viya? Ka ruu vi nɔɔ dũng rɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dangnɛ nɛɛ,
51002021	“N'ɔɔ yiti vuu keɓe kpang”, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ “N'ɔɔ tãa vuu keɓe ka nyaa kpang”, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ “N'ɔɔ lee naa ka vuu kaɓa kpang” viya?
51002022	Vuu keɓe, ri naa shaarɛ ɓarɛ kaa tɔ, zang nɛɛ palɛ shoonang tɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓarɛ nyaa dannang shɔnzang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri tusu ɓɛɛ.
51002023	Nyaa dannang keɓe, t'usù bii mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zũnang kagn, ka ɓɔɔ ri shing zang nɛɛ kaka nɛɛ zang bang vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang kasɛ bannang ɓɛɛ. Ri suu sè'e nɛɛ ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ kpang, a ri ti dang bii ɓarɛ jìng ka ɓɔɔ ri palɛ bii hakaka ɓɛɛ. A nyaa dannang keɓe ri zunung ɓɔɔ wu zãa ri vuu ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ palɛnang kaa takpang.
51003001	Wee zang wisi nɔɔ paa tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓee, nɔɔ shing jìng manɛ kaa rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Kirisi nwàng kagn ka nakn Laa ɓɛɛ.
51003002	Nɔɔ rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ manɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng kaɓa ɓɛɛ, wu ka yuu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo ka nihn ɓɛɛ kpang.
51003003	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwàng ɓi naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ vɔ tɔ, a suru bii manɛ ɓɔɔ kãntang zang waasɛ ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ wu ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
51003004	Suru bii manɛ ɓɔɔ nizang ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi. Nɛɛ nwang nyaa tɔ, nɔɔ naa nwang nyaa jong nɛɛ wu, nɔɔ walɛ bannang kaa jong.
51003005	Nɔɔ vang vuu koo keɓe ɓɔɔ bii manɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ ta nɛɛ kaaɓa. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa dũndũng, nɛɛ sãnsãnrãng palɛnang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang kasɛ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yeti shɔnzang kasɛ, a ɓɔɔ kaa nung sũnang, (Nung sũnang nwàng ɓi naa vaka bannang).
51003006	Ka ruu rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ, Laa naa dǎng zang ɓɔɔ ri ta nyaa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ jìng.
51003007	Bɛɛ ɓeleng nɔɔ nwangnɛ, nɔɔ palɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti manɛ kasɛ ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ.
51003008	A kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ vang rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa, gnvɔ, yeti shi kpang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bii manɛ kasɛ, a ɓɔɔ zang bɛ̃ɛnang. Zang dãanang, nɛɛ yee shi kpang wu nwang tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ nyaa manɛ kpang.
51003009	Nɔɔ suu zɔɔ sè'e takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ tu bii gbaala manɛ tɔ nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ piti.
51003010	Nɔ̀ɔ hãa bii shɔɔ tɔ, ɓɔɔ Laa risi shɔɔ diki diki ka doo nwannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu sh'ing nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ zi wu kaa dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
51003011	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa basɛ teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang kpàng. Zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa katɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri yee shaa kpang, kpang, zang ɓɔɔ jìng ɓarɛ puu gn kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shaa yɔpɔ shɔnzang ɓɛɛ kpang, basɛ teteng jaafoo nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri jaa gãa ɓɛɛ kpang. Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ, ɓi kaa vuu piti, wukɔ ɓi ka yeti vuu piti.
51003012	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ manɛ kaa zang Laa. Laa kasɛ nɔɔ, a zɔ̃ngkɔ nɔɔ, nɛɛ n'ɔɔ nwang kaa ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ. Nɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ gn zang kɔng nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ tuu yuu kpang, n'ɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu hakaka kpang, nɔɔ mã gn katɔ.
51003013	Nɔɔ mã gn nɛɛ zɔɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ lasɛ nɔɔ yeti, nɔɔ yàa zɔɔ gbalang katɔ. Nɔɔ yàa zɔɔ gbalang naa ɓɔɔ Laa yàa nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
51003014	Ka yuu rɛɛ vuu keɓe, nɔɔ kàsɛ̀ ruu zɔɔ katɔ. Zɔɔ kasɛnang kɔ ɓ'akɛ̀ vuu piti wu nwang gbete.
51003015	Yeti valɛnang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi a zang, wukɔ wu nwang ka yeti manɛ gbãnggbãng. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang bii gbete, tɔ̀ɔ, wu a nɔɔ yeti valebm keɓe kɔ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ ti zãa wu katɔ.
51003016	Yee Yeesɔ Kirisi wu nwang ka yeti manɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tusu vuu, a nɔɔ ti kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zɔɔ vuu nɛɛ zũnang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ gaa soo ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dɔɔ Laa nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zãa wu nɛɛ mani nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti zãa wu ka yeti manɛ.
51003017	Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ piti, nɔɔ p'al'ɛ ka nung Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zãa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
51003018	Zang soro ɓɔɔ zang gee nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa varɛ manɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wee ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa nɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ palɛ kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ.
51003019	Varɛ, nɔɔ kasɛ soro manɛ katɔ. N'ɔɔ palɛ ri hakaka kpang.
51003020	Wujɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri yi nɔɔ ɓɛɛ diki diki. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu keɓe kɔ shing Laa, Laa tãa tìnang manɛ ɓɛɛ.
51003021	Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi wujɛ ɓɛɛ, n'ɔɔ lasɛ wujɛ manɛ yeti diki diki kpang, ri yaa gn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii manɛ katɔ.
51003022	Jaafoo, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ ri dabang gãa manɛ ka vuu piti. Nɔɔ ɓ'aa, wu ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi jìng ɓarɛ katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, tɔɔ nyaating wu pu nɔɔ nɛɛ ri kpang. Nɔ̀ɔ palɛ nɛɛ yeti gbete ka ruu bannang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a Laa ɓɛɛ.
51003023	Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ piti, nɔɔ p'al'ɛ nɛɛ yeti manɛ nandon, naa nɔɔ pàl'ɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ, nɔɔ pàl'ɛ wu shɔnzang kpang.
51003024	Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, Kpanti Yeesɔ naa sɔ̀ɔr'ɔ nɔɔ doo ditɔ. Naa a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shìng zang ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ dabang gãa ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pàl'ɛ wu shoonang ɓɛɛ.
51003025	A zang ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ ɓi vuu shi kpang, naa zang keɓe doo wiya, zang naa pàl'ɛ wu vuu ɓi dòo ka d'oo vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa palɛ vuu ɓi jong gn dang gbete kpang ɓɛɛ.
51004001	Dabang gãa, nɔɔ pàl'ɛ jaafoo manɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a ti daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, dabang gãa manɛ ɓi doogn kɔ ka lapa.
51004002	Nɔɔ gaa Laa diki diki, nɔɔ gãng jìng waasɛ̃, nɔɔ ti zãa wu.
51004003	Nɔɔ ti gàa rùu Laa jong, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu pùu ruu gbalang tɔ̃ɔ jong, ruu rang zang yee ɓiɓɛ. Ruu kɔ̀ɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang waasɛ katɔ ka yuu Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wee zang mã m ka sãa kãntang ɓee, zang mã m ka ruu vuu keɓe kɔ ɓɛɛ.
51004004	N'ɔɔ gàa Laa wu shing m n kɔɔ vuu keɓe waasɛ̃ naa ɓɔɔ n nɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ.
51004005	Nɔɔ palɛ vuu nɛɛ zũnang ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa ri yàa nɔɔ gbalang tɔkɔlɔng, nɔɔ kɔɔ ri ruu kagn waasɛ̃.
51004006	Yee manɛ wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ diki diki, nyaa manɛ wu tɛ̃ɛ tãa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Nɔɔ ti zi naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zang ɓu nyaa tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
51004007	Manzung ɓuru Tikiku ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ wu dɔli, ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang nɛɛ yeti gbete, a ti doo zang shoonang Kpanti Yeesɔ kɔ nɛɛ ruu ɓɛɛ, naa kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu ditɔ ka yuu mɛɛ nandon.
51004008	N shong wu ka bii manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ wu kɔɔ nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ ruu nandon ruu nwang ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, sisìng wu valɛ nɔɔ kati.
51004009	Ri a nɛɛ Onesimu, manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ wu dɔli a ti palɛ vuu nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ɓi zang manɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri naa kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu piti ɓɔɔ palɛ ruu ka nihn ɓɛɛ.
51004010	Arisitaku ɓɔɔ zang mã jong ka sãa nɛɛ n ɓɛɛ, jee nɔɔ nyaa. Maraku ɓɔɔ dabang ɓarɛ gbete nɛɛ Baranaba ɓɛɛ, jee nɔɔ nyaa jong. (N kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu tɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, nɛɛ a tɔ, nɔɔ ta wu waasɛ̃)
51004011	Joshuwa, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jusitu ɓɛɛ, jee nɔɔ nyaa jong. Zang taati keɓe rikɔ zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti tɔ, ri palɛ shoonang nɛɛ n ka ruu kpanti roonang Laa, a ri ti yi m naa tɔ ka bii gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ.
51004012	Epafara ɓɔɔ doo zang manɛ kɔ, a ti pàl'ɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi shoonang, jee nɔɔ nyaa, gaa Laa ka ruu manɛ gbãnggbãng, gaa wu nɛɛ, wu shing nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka, n'ɔɔ zũng danggn, n'ɔɔ ta ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.
51004013	N kɔɔ ruu katɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu shoonang ɓɔɔ wu p'alɛ̀ gbãnggbãng ka ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Lawodikiya nɛɛ gari Hirapoli.
51004014	Luka, zang gãnang ɓuru, nɛɛ Dema ri jee nɔɔ nyaa.
51004015	N'ɔɔ kɔɔ manzung ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Lawodikiya nɛɛ, ruu jee ri nyaa. A ɓɔɔ jaa soro ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Nimfa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
51004016	Nɔɔ nɛɛ gã labeenang keɓe tɔ, zang wu daa gã̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka gari Lawodikiya jong. Nɔɔ ti gã labeenang ɓɔɔ zang shong nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ mani nɛɛ gari Lawodikiya jong.
51004017	N'ɔɔ ti kɔɔ Akipu nɛɛ, “Shing jìng, mɔɔ hangsɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ta ka bii Kpanti Yeesɔ katɔ.”
51004018	Nkɔ Bulu, n bèe nyaa jeerenang keɓe nɛɛ naa mɛɛ. Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, nɔɔ gàa m Laa katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n doo ka sãa ɓɛɛ. Laa wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
52001001	Labeenang keɓe, nɛɛ bii mɛɛ Bulu, a ɓɔɔ Siila nɛɛ Timoti. Ruu bee zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi ka gari Tesalonika, ɓɔɔ ri zang daa ɓuru Laa nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Laa wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, wu ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.
52001002	Ruu zãa Laa diki diki ka ruu manɛ nandon, a ruu ti ɓaa nung manɛ diki diki ka ɓɔɔ ruu gaa Laa ɓɛɛ.
52001003	Diki ɓɔɔ ruu gaa Laa ɓuru ɓɔɔ wukɔ ti Daa ɓuru ɓɛɛ, danggn manɛ ning ruu kpang. Ruu ɓaa nung manɛ ka naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ t'usù danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ shoonang gbãnggbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi katɔ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ti naa ɓɔɔ gn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ruutu kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ.
52001004	Rɛɛ manzung ruu zi tɔ, Laa kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ, a zɔ̃ngkɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang zang ɓiɓɛ.
52001005	Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu kɔɔ wu nɛɛ nyaa waati kpang. Laa a ruu naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ tɔ nɛɛ Suru ɓiɓɛ, a ruu ti shing danggn tɔ gbãnggbãng ka yuu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ zi zɔ̃ng nwannang ɓɔɔ ruu nwangnɛ, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ruu doo nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ruu palɛ vuu keɓe nandon ruu tɔɔ ruu yi nɔɔ naa ka bii.
52001006	Nɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ nwannang tɔ naa ɓɔɔ ruu nwang ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ti naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ nwang ɓɛɛ. Zang dang nɔɔ jìng dɔli, a nɔɔ ta ruu ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi doo nɛɛ mani, nɔɔ tãa tìnang ɓɔɔ Suru Laa shing zang zang tãa ɓɛɛ.
52001007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nwang manɛ kaa zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Makidoniya nɛɛ Akaya nandon ri masɛ nwannang manɛ ɓɛɛ.
52001008	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ bii manɛ, baa wu tipi Makidoniya nɛɛ Akaya kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ruu danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa baa nɔng tɔ jong piti piti. Vuu ɓɔɔ naa ruu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ̀'ɔ kagn kpang.
52001009	Zang kaɓa nandon, ri kɔ̀ɔ ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta ruu ka ɓɔɔ ruu naa leng nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ti naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yaa vaka bannang nɔɔ naa bang kaa Laa wukɔ nizang, a ɓi ti ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
52001010	A ri ti kɔ̀ɔ ruu nɛɛ nɔɔ gã Jaa ɓiɓɛ wu a nɛɛ lapa, Jaa ɓiɓɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ wu wisi paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ, a naa t'a yuu ɓuru ka laa ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu lasɛ yeti nɛɛ ri ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ruu ɓɛɛ.
52002001	Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, lennang ɓɔɔ ruu leng nɔɔ, nwàng nɔɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ katɔ.
52002002	Nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ zang dang ruu jìng, a zang dãlɛ ruu ka Filipi tɔ, a ruu naa a ka bii manɛ ka Tesalonika. Zang dɔli nɛɛ ri zãa ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kɔɔnang ka gari manɛ, a Laa mã ruu danggn doo nɛɛ mani, a ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
52002003	Ka ɓɔɔ ruu kãa gbalang nɛɛ nɔɔ ta Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, ruu sùu nɔɔ sè'e kpang. Ruu mang vuu shi kpang kagn yeti ɓuru ka yuu manɛ kpang. Ruu ti tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ruu nwaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ kpang.
52002004	Ruu kɔɔrɔ ruu ɓuru naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ ruu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ jong. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zirɛ ruu daa naa ɓɔɔ wu a ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ tɔ ruu daa kɔɔ zang ɓɛɛ. Ruu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ruu rang yee tɔ̀ɔ zang ri tãa tìnang kpang, ruu kasɛ ɓuru nɛɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓuru tɔ wu tãa tìnang.
52002005	Nɔɔ zi tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ruu a ka bii manɛ, ruu a wu nɛɛ nyaa tãa kpang. Ruu rang nɔɔ yee wu naa ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ruu walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, Laa zi yeti ɓuru tɔ.
52002006	Ruu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ruu shing nɔɔ nɔɔ dɔɔ ruu kpang, a ruu ti kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔ̀ɔ ruu ɓɛɛ kpang.
52002007	Wee ruu zang shoonang Yeesɔ ɓee, ruu nɛ̀'ɛ hɛ̃ɛlɛ nɔng vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ ka naa manɛ. A ruu palɛ nɔɔ kaa tɔɔ hakaka kpang, ruu yiti nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nà'a jaa gãng jìng ka wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
52002008	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu kpalɛ bii tɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ wu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ruu ti vɔ ka ruu manɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ gbãnggbãng.
52002009	Rɛɛ manzung, n tɔɔ n kpà'a nɔɔ danggn. Nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shoonang dɔli tɔ. Ruu p'al'ɛ shoonang nɛɛ zìi nɛɛ laagɛ̃, ruu walɛ vuu shaanang ɓuru, tɔ̀ɔ ruu kpãa nɔɔ kaa takpang, ka ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Laa ɓɛɛ.
52002010	Nɔɔ nɛɛ Laa nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ ruu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ tɔ, ka nwannang ɓuru, ruu mang shi kpang ka yeti ɓuru kpang, ruu nwàng tɔ̃ɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ruu p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang kagn kpang.
52002011	Nɔɔ zi tɔ ruu palɛ zang ɓu ka teteng manɛ naa ɓɔɔ d'aa palɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
52002012	Ruu tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu mã nɔɔ danggn, ruu yi tìng, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang zɔ̃ng nwannang ɓɔɔ shing Laa, Laa tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ ɓ'aa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ naa nwang jong ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ wu nwang kpanti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ zi bannang ɓiɓɛ.
52002013	A vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ruu zãa Laa diki diki ɓɛɛ kagn. Ruu atɛ nɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ Laa shong nyaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ tãayi, a nɔɔ tarɛ. Wu naa nyaa shoonang shɔnzang kpang, naa nyaa shoonang Laa. Ti nyaa shoonang Laa kɔ nizang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu Laa ti kõ̀s'ɔ yeti manɛ kana ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ.
52002014	Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, vuu kɔ p'alɛ̀ nɔɔ ɓee, p'al'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi Yahudiya ɓɔɔ ri ɓakɛ yuu ɓarɛ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ doo nɔngkɔ. Zang tipi manɛ dãng nɔɔ jìng doo nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang Yahudawa dang ri jìng jong ɓɛɛ.
52002015	Zang Yahudawa ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa nɛɛ kpanti Yeesɔ vɔrɔ, a ri ti hing ruu ɓɛɛ. Laa tãa tìnang ɓarɛ kpang tingkiring. Ri ti shing jìng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kpang tingkiring.
52002016	Ri ti kãa naa ɓɔɔ ri zãa ruu gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang ruu, ɓɔɔ naa ta yuu ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu kɔ̀ ri palɛ ɓee, kɔ shingnɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ diki diki ɓɛɛ, ɓèe nyaa kaa kiiri. A kãntang yeti Laa lasɛ tɔ nɛɛ ri, jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu kaa tɔ.
52002017	Rɛɛ manzung, zang shing ruu nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning ruu basɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ diki tɔkɔlɔng. Ruu yaa nɔɔ nɛɛ bii waati, a ruu yaa rɛ̃rɛnang kaa tɔ̀'ɔ yuu manɛ kpang. Nizang, ruu kasɛ katɔ ka yeti ɓuru gbãnggbãng, a ruu kãa gbalang ruu naa zì nɔɔ tɔkn.
52002018	Ruu kasɛ yuu gbãanang ka bii manɛ. N nɛɛ yuu mɛɛ, n kãa gbalang tɔ ɓa doo gbete katɔ, a Sheetang zãa ruu gbalang daanang katɔ.
52002019	Ruu kasɛ nɛɛ ruu naa leng nɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi a tɔkn, nɔkɔ shing ruu ruu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓuru, ruu ti tãa tìnang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
52002020	Nizang ruu lakɛ jìng nɛɛ nɔkɔ, nɔkɔ shing ruu ruu tãa tìnang.
52003001	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ka ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu tǐ naa ɓɔɔ ruu zì nɔɔ kpang takpang, ruu mang ka yeti ɓuru nɛɛ zang yaa ruu ka bm ka Atina.
52003002	A ruu shong manzung ɓuru Timoti, ɓɔɔ palɛ Laa shoonang nɛɛ ruu ka gbalang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yeti Kirisi ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɛɛ. Ruu tɔɔ wu naa shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ shii gbãnggbãng, wu ti mã nɔɔ danggn, nɔɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
52003003	Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu yaa danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Kirisi ka ruu jìng ɓɔɔ zang dang nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa kɔ mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang dang ruu jìng.
52003004	Ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ruu doo nɛɛ nɔɔ, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ doo ka tìng nɛɛ ruu naa dang jìng ditɔ. A naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi tɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu dang jìng tɔ nɔngkɔ teetee.
52003005	Vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ruu shong Timoti ɓɛɛ kɔ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ n t'i ɓɛɛ takpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu shong wu, nɛɛ wu daa zi ruu naa ɓɔɔ danggn shinnang manɛ nwang ɓɛɛ. Ruu zi kpang naa Sheetang gãsɛ nɔɔ tɔ, nɔɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ shing tɔ shoonang ɓuru nandon shaarɛ tɔ waati ya?
52003006	Wee Timoti gbãayu tɔ ka bii ɓuru, ti atɛ ruu nyaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, nɛɛ nɔɔ shing danggn doo ka bii Yeesɔ, a nɔɔ ti kasɛ ruu katɔ. A ti kɔɔ ruu nɛɛ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ tɔ̃ɔ diki diki ka yuu ɓuru, nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zi ruu doo naa ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɔɔ zinang ɓɛɛ kɔ.
52003007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, ruu ɓɔɔ zang kɔ̀ɔ ruu ka yuu manɛ, mã̀ ruu danggn tɔ, ka vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa ruu nɛɛ jìng dannang ɓɔɔ ruu dang ɓɛɛ. Ruu danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ mã ruu danggn.
52003008	Wee nɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka ka yuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓakɛ tɔ nɛɛ Kpanti Yeesɔ ɓee, ruu tãa tìnang nwannang ningkãari kaatɔ.
52003009	Nyaa ɓɔɔ ruu zãa Laa nɛɛ mani ka ruu manɛ kpang. Ruu zãa wu ka ruu tìnang ɓɔɔ wu shing ruu, ruu tãa tìnang ka ruu manɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ruu gaa wu ɓɛɛ.
52003010	Nɛɛ zìi nɛɛ laagɛ̃ ruu gaa wu nɛɛ yeti ɓuru nandon, nɛɛ wu yàa ruu gbalang jong ruu zi nɔɔ nɛɛ jìng ɓuru, tɔɔ ruu tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ yaa nɔɔ doogn ka danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ.
52003011	Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ daa ɓuru nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ ri shìli ruu gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu a ka bii manɛ ɓɛɛ.
52003012	Kpanti ɓuru wu shingnɛ zɔɔ kasɛnang manɛ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zang piti, wu daa nɛɛ ting kɔ sasak. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ naa kasɛ zang kaa naa ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
52003013	Laa wu shingnɛ nɔɔ shii gbãnggbãng, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu tɔɔ kaa takpang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang, ka tìng Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru ɓɛɛ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ naa a nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
52004001	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, n gisi nɔɔ ruu nɛɛ, nɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang nɛɛ Laa wu tãa tìnang manɛ tɔ ka bii ɓuru, a nɔɔ ti nwang kana nɔngkɔ kãntang. A ruu gaa nɔɔ nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ nwang nɔngkɔ sasak.
52004002	Nɔɔ zi nyaa ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ a ruu ɓɛɛ tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang ɓɛɛ.
52004003	Laa kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kpang. Nɛɛ nɔɔ ti yaa dũndũng palɛnang dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
52004004	Zang varɛ ɓu wu yiti yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ka gbalang tɔ̃ɔ naa ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ shɔnzang piti ri kasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
52004005	Wu ka gbalang dũndũng palɛnang kpang, naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
52004006	Wu roo nɛɛ soro ɓeezung kpang tingkiring. Naa rooyi, pàl'ɛ ɓeezung vuu shi kpang, ti shaa wu katɔ. Ruu kɔ̀ɔ ruu keɓe tɔ ka tìng, a ruu shaarɛ nɔɔ nyaa gbãnggbãng nɛɛ Kpanti Laa naa dang zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu keɓe jìng katɔ.
52004007	Laa ɓaa ruu nyaa nɛɛ ruu naa nwang ka yeti dũndũng palɛnang kpang, nɛɛ ruu nwang ɓuru naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
52004008	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ vuu kɔ ruu tusu ɓee, bɛ̃ɛ ɓi shɔnzang kpang, bɛ̃ɛ ɓi Laa ɓɔɔ a ruu Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
52004009	Ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ rɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu bee labeenang ka yuu ruu keɓe kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, Laa tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
52004010	A nɔɔ ti tusu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ rɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ka Makidoniya ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu gaa nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ sasak.
52004011	Nɔɔ mang ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang manɛ kikiri, nɔɔ haarɛ nyaa kpang, nɔɔ haa nyaa ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ kpang, nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ shoonang nɛɛ naa manɛ naa ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ka tìng ɓɛɛ.
52004012	Ka naa weɓe kɔ, nɔɔ shing zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn gn kpang, ri seng nɔɔ. Nɔ̀ɔ ti shing jìng tɔ̀'ɔ ka bii zang ɓɔɔ, ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
52004013	Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ lasɛ yeti kaa tɔ̀'ɔ sasak naa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing gn ka bii Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, ri lasɛ yeti ɓɛɛ kpang.
52004014	Ruu shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ, Yeesɔ vɔrɛ, a yuu paa tɔkn, a ruu ti shing danggn tɔ nɛɛ, Laa naa sɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ditɔ jong nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi.
52004015	Vuu kɔ ruu tusu nɔɔ ɓee, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ naa gbãayu, ɓɔɔ ruu doo ningkãari ka diki kaɓa, rukɔ daa ka bii ɓiɓɛ shɔɔnang, ruu yaa zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
52004016	Laa naa mɛɛ nyaa nabm, a zang bang rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, naa rang yee, a zang ri tãa yee vuukãng ɓɔɔ Laa jee ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Kpanti Yeesɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ wu naa shooro kaa nɛɛ lapa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ a ri vɔlɔ ɓɛɛ, rikɔ yupaa ningkãari shɔɔnang.
52004017	Tɔ̀ɔ, ɓɔɔ ruu doo ningkãari ka diki kaɓa, Laa naa sè'e ruu, daa kaa nɛɛ ruu ka yeti sãmbong wu daa lapa nɛɛ ruu. Ruu daa kpisi kpanti Yeesɔ yuu ka lapa. Ruu nw'ang kaa nɛɛ Kpanti sasak.
52004018	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ mã zɔɔ danggn nɛɛ ruu keɓe.
52005001	Daa naa ɓɔɔ n bee nɔɔ labeenang ka yuu diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ naa gbãa yuu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang.
52005002	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ nɔɔ zi tɔ waasɛ̃ nɛɛ Diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ naa a kagn, naa nwang naa ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ, a nɛɛ zìi bɛɛ nɔɔ shing gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
52005003	Ka laa ɓɔɔ zang ri gaayu kɔɔrɔnang nɛɛ, “Ruu nwang tɔ nyaa zɔɔ, a vuu ɓɔɔ shing ruu ruu kaa vɔrɔ kpang.” A jìng dannang wu a kaa yuu ɓarɛ tantɛnang naa ɓɔɔ jaa kɔng zang soro ɓɛɛ. Zang gbete wɔ̀ kpang.
52005004	Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ nwang manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kpang, tɔ̀ɔ Diki keɓe wu arɛ nɔɔ mã naa ka danggn naa ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ a nɛɛ zìi ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ shing gn kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
52005005	Nɔɔ nandon, nɔɔ manɛ zang nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ manɛ zang nɔng laagɛ̃. Ruu nandon, ruu nwang ɓuru naa zang nɔng zìi nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
52005006	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu gãng nɔɔ jìng, r'uu nwàng naa zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Ruu nwang nɔɔ ningkãari, ruu yiti yuu ɓuru waasɛ̃.
52005007	Ka nwannang shɔnzang shɔnzang ri rooro ɓi nɛɛ zìi, zang ɓɔɔ ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ kpang, ri ɓoo saa nɛɛ zìi saa si ri.
52005008	A ruu ɓuru zang nɔng laagɛ̃, r'uu yiti yuu ɓuru waasɛ̃. Danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Laa nɛɛ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ zɔɔ, wu nwàng ruu naa kãati. Gn ɓɔɔ ruu shingnɛ nɛɛ Laa naa ta yuu ɓuru ditɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, wu nwang ruu naa wà'alaa ka yuu ɓuru.
52005009	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu nɛɛ wu dɔng ruu ruu, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu dang jìng ka diki ɓɔɔ wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓɛɛ kpang. Zɔ̃ngkɔ ruu nɛɛ wu ta yuu ɓuru nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
52005010	Yeesɔ vɔ ka ruu ɓuru nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang kaa nɔng gbete nɛɛ wu, naa ruu doo ningkãari, k'ɔ ruu vɔlɔ katɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu a kagn ɓɛɛ.
52005011	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ mã zɔɔ danggn, nɔɔ yi zɔɔ naa ka bii. Nɔɔ shing danggn kaa gbãnggbãng naa wee nɔɔ palɛ ɓee.
52005012	Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu gaa nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ seng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang ka teteng manɛ waasɛ̃. Zang ɓɔɔ rikɔ sɔ̀'ɔ nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ tìng, a ri ti tusu nɔɔ vuu, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kpang ɓɛɛ.
52005013	Nɔɔ seng ri katɔ dɔli, nɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓarɛ katɔ, ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ waasɛ̃.
52005014	Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu gaa nɔɔ, nɔɔ shaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ waati nyaa katɔ, nɔɔ mã zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa gn naa danggn pati nɔɔ yi zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ naa ka bii kpang naa ka bii, a nɔɔ ti mã danggn nɛɛ zang piti.
52005015	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, zang ɓɔɔ wu waa pãng vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ wu doo nɛɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ kpang. Nɔɔ shing jìng kɔ jong diki diki nɛɛ nɔɔ pàl'ɛ zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Nɔɔ ti pàlɛ̀ zang piti tɔ̃ɔ jong.
52005016	Nɔɔ tãa tìnang diki diki, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zang Laa ɓɛɛ.
52005017	Nɔɔ gaa Laa, n'ɔɔ suu diki kpang.
52005018	Naa doo viya p'alɛ̀ mɔɔ, zãa Laa katɔ. Wee naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwangnɛ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ kɔ.
52005019	N'ɔɔ nɔɔ Suru Laa gbalang shoonang ɓiɓɛ palɛnang kpang.
52005020	N'ɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.
52005021	Nɔɔ gãsɛ ruu piti ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ. Nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
52005022	Ruu manɛ wu hãa kagn nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang kpang tingkiring.
52005023	Laa ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ, wu palɛ nɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete. Wu shingnɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang, ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi a kagn ɓɛɛ.
52005024	Laa ɓɔɔ ɓaa ruu nyaa nɛɛ ruu nwang zang ɓiɓɛ, shing ruu katɔ ruu nwang nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
52005025	Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ gàar'ɛ rùu Laa jong.
52005026	Nɔɔ jee zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ nandon, nyaa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
52005027	N ɓakɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ Laa, nɔɔ gã labeenang keɓe ka nɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nandon.
52005028	Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
53001001	Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ Bulu, a ɓɔɔ kaa Siila nɛɛ Timoti. Ruu bee zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Tesalonika ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri zang Daa ɓuru Laa, nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
53001002	Daa ɓuru Laa nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ri pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri ti shingnɛ nɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ.
53001003	Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu zãa Laa diki diki ka ruu manɛ tɔ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu zãa wu tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ daa kana nɛɛ tìng dɔli, a naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓu ka teteng manɛ ri kasɛ zɔɔ ti daa nɛɛ tìng kɔ sasak.
53001004	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu rangkɛ ruu bang bang ka yuu manɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ruu lengke zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ruu kpang. Ruu rangkɛ ruu ka yuu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã danggn, a nɔɔ shing danggn sasak ka yeti jìng kɔ nɔɔ dang nandon ɓee ɓɛɛ.
53001005	Vuu keɓe nandon tusu nɛɛ Laa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi gn dang gbete kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ naa daa naa ɓɔɔ Laa nwang Kpanti manɛ katɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dang jìng ka ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
53001006	Laa naa palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ditɔ. Naa dang zang ɓɔɔ ri dang nɔɔ jìng ditɔ.
53001007	Naa shing nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dang jìng kãntang, nɔɔ ɔ̃sɔ, a ruu ti ɔ̃sɔ jong. Naa palɛ vuu keɓe ka diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ naa nwang nyaa nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ bang dɔli ɓɛɛ.
53001008	Naa nwang nyaa nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ shaa katɔ ɓɛɛ, wu dang zang ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ Laa katɔ jìng, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ka yuu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
53001009	Ri naa dang jìng ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓɔɔ zang ningsi ri dondong ɓɛɛ. Laa naa ku ri ka biling, ri daa nɔng ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru kagn kpang. Ri zi bannang ɓiɓɛ kpang dondong.
53001010	Ka diki ɓɔɔ wu arɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ zang ɓiɓɛ nandon ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ri dɔ̀ɔ wu ri a wu bannang kati. Nɔɔ naa nwang jong ka teteng ɓarɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ sh'ing danggn tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
53001011	Vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ruu gaa nɔɔ Laa diki diki ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ruu kɔɔ Laa ɓuru nɛɛ wu shingnɛ n'ɔɔ daa naa nwannang kɔ wu ɓàa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang ɓee katɔ. Wu ti shingnɛ nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ nandon. Wu ti yi nɔɔ naa ka bii nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, n'ɔɔ nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ.
53001012	Ka naa weɓe kɔ, zang a Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ bannang ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ nɛɛ bii manɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ti palɛ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓuru, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ.
53002001	Rɛɛ manzung, ka ruu yuu gbãanang Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang naa kpalɛ ruu ruu ìi wu ɓɛɛ. Ruu gaa nɔɔ,
53002002	sisìng wu tantɛ nɔɔ lɔɔnang kpang. Vuu bì'i wu ti kpãa nɔɔ ka yeti ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ Diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru gbãayu kagn a tɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa doo zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ kagn kɔɔyi, naa ti zang ɓɔɔ palɛ Laa shoonang ɓɛɛ kɔ kɔɔyi, a ɓɔɔ ti nɛɛ, ka yeti labeenang ɓɔɔ zang tɔɔ a nɛɛ bii ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
53002003	Nɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ wu nwaarɛ nɔɔ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ kpang. Zang dɔli ri nɛɛ raa Laa yuu knti tɔ naa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ɓɛɛ a yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng nyaa dannang ɓi kpang nɛɛ nwang nyaa tɔ, ɓɔɔ Laa naa ningsi wu ɓi ka waa ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, Diki Kpanti ɓuru wu a kati.
53002004	Naa risi vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ vaka, kɔ vuu ɓɔɔ zang bang katɔ piti, naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Wu shing yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu ɓa ri katɔ nandon. Ti naa daa ka yeti Gãa Laa wu nwang ka nɔngkɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ wukɔ kaa Laa.
53002005	Danggn ning nɔɔ katɔ ya? Ɓɔɔ n doo nɛɛ nɔɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe tɔ nandon.
53002006	Vuu ɓɔɔ ti zãa vuu keɓe palɛnang kãntang keɓe kagn, a nɔɔ ti zi vuu keɓe tɔ. Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng nyaa dannang ɓi kpang keɓe naa nwang nyaa ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa zi tɔ nɛɛ wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
53002007	Kãntang keɓe, zang dɔli ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ kpang kana, ruu zi ɓuru kaa nɛɛ ruu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa nwangsɛ ruu ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. A vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ, palɛ gn kpang, Laa nɛɛ kɔsɔ zang ɓɔɔ zãa vuu keɓe palɛnang tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu keɓe wu palɛ kati.
53002008	Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu nwangsɛ zang ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng nyaa dannang ɓi kpang kati. Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ a tɔ naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, wu ti ningsi wu nɛɛ ɔ̃kɔnang nyaa ɓiɓɛ.
53002009	Yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng nyaa dannang ɓi kpang keɓe, naa a nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Sheetang wu p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɔɔ sè'e ɓɛɛ ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng.
53002010	Naa nwaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri naa shaarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zɔ̃ng nwannang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ, ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Ri shaarɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang a ri ti tarɛ, tɔɔ zang ta yuu ɓarɛ kati kpang ɓɛɛ.
53002011	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa shingnɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tingkiring tɔɔ ri shing danggn kaa sè'e.
53002012	Laa palɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ka yuu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ kpang, ri tãa ɓarɛ tìnang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu kɔɔ kati nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ.
53002013	Rɛɛ manzung, ruu z'ãa Laa katɔ ka diki kiya piti, ka ruu manɛ, ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa zɔ̃ng nɔɔ nɛɛ wu ta yuu manɛ kɔ shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ wu ta yuu manɛ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Suru ɓiɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ wu shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ nwang zang Laa, a ɓɔɔ kaa ruu danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ ka yuu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
53002014	Laa ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ naa tãa tìnang jong ka ruu bannang Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi.
53002015	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka, nɔɔ yiti rɛɛ ruu nizang ɓɔɔ ruu tusu, ka ɓɔɔ, ruu kɔɔrɔ nɔɔ, a ruu ti bee nɔɔ ka yeti labeenang tìng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ, waasɛ̃.
53002016	Ruu gaa Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Daa ɓuru Laa ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu ka tìng, ɓɔɔ ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ mã ruu danggn a shingnɛ ruu shing gn gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ.
53002017	Wu mã nɔɔ danggn gbãnggbãng, tɔ̀ɔ, diki diki nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ ti kɔɔrɔ ruu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
53003001	Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, n hangsɛ ruu kaa nɛɛ ruu keɓe. Nɔɔ gà'a ruu Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ wu baa nɔng piti piti, wu daa nɛɛ tìng kɔ sasak. Zang ri a ruu bii bannang, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a ruu bii bannang ɓɛɛ.
53003002	N'ɔɔ gaa Laa jong wu ta ruu nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu zang piti shing danggn tɔ ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
53003003	A Laa ɓi zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, mã mɔɔ danggn katɔ, wu shingnɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu lee mɔɔ naa ka bii kpang.
53003004	Laa m'ã ruu danggn ka bii manɛ kɔ. Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ ti palɛ katɔ sasak.
53003005	Ruu gaa Kpanti wu sɔɔ nɔɔ tìng, n'ɔɔ z'i kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ gbãnggbãng. Laa wu ti sh'ing nɔɔ n'ɔɔ mã danggn, n'ɔɔ gã anang Yeesɔ.
53003006	Rɛɛ manzung ɓuru, ruu dang nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nung Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ nɔɔ ɓ'akɛ̀ yuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri nwang nwannang rang ɓɛɛ kpang. A ri dũng nyaa ɓuru kpang ɓɛɛ.
53003007	Nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, nɔɔ zi tɔ waasɛ̃ nɛɛ daa naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng nyaa ɓuru tɔ. Ɓɔɔ ruu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ, ruu si rang kpang.
53003008	Diki diki naa zang yi ruu naa ka bii, ruu shu ri katɔ. Ruu palɛ shoonang gbãnggbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kasɛ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ wu shu ruu vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
53003009	Ruu palɛ vuu keɓe, wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ yi ruu naa ka bii kpang, kpang. Ruu palɛ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng ɓɛɛ.
53003010	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ruu doo nɛɛ nɔɔ, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ shoonang palɛnang kpang, nɔɔ a wu vuu shaanang kpang”
53003011	Ruu kɔɔ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu tãayi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ri nwang nwannang rang. Ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ri hã̀l'ɛ nyaa ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
53003012	Ruu dang rɛɛ zang keɓe nyaa nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, ruu shaarɛ ri nyaa, nɛɛ ri nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri p'al'ɛ shoonang, ri walɛ vuu shaanang ɓarɛ nɛɛ mani.
53003013	A ɓɔɔ manɛ manzung ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ lee tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang kpang.
53003014	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ nɛɛ dũng ruu kɔ ruu shong nɔɔ ka yeti labeenang keɓe kpàng. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ zi zang keɓe waasɛ̃ n'ɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu kpang, tɔ̀ɔ yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu wu.
53003015	A nɔɔ palɛ wu kaa tɔ̀'ɔ naa zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ wu kpang kpang. Nɔɔ shaarɛ wu nyaa katɔ kɔ jong naa ɓaazung.
53003016	Ruu gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ shing yeti ɓuru wu valɛ ɓɛɛ, wu shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ diki diki, a ka gbalang kiya piti. Kpanti ɓuru wu nwang nɛɛ nɔɔ nandon.
53003017	N bee vuu keɓe nɛɛ naa mɛɛ. Nkɔ Bulu, n jee nɔɔ nyaa. Wee naa ɓɔɔ n bee nung mɛɛ, n nɛɛ hangsɛ labeenang tɔ ɓɛɛ.
53003018	N gaa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ nandon tɔ̃ɔ.
54001001	Labeenang keɓe a nɛɛ bii mɛɛ Bulu, zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru, nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, rikɔ zɔ̃ng m.
54001002	N bè'e mɔkɔ Timoti ɓɔɔ ka gbalang Laa dũnnang, mɔɔ ɓaa kaa jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ɓɛɛ. N gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi Kpanti ɓuru, gn ɓaaɓɛ wu kɔng ri jong, ri ti pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri shingnɛ mɔɔ nwang waasɛ̃.
54001003	Ka ɓɔɔ n yupaa Makidoniya daanang, n kɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ n tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ nwang ka Afisa ka nɔngkɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn ka nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ ri tusu vuu ɓɔɔ nizang kpang, shaarɛ ri nyaa nɛɛ ri yaa ta.
54001004	Mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ ri nɛɛ ri suukãng waati ka nɔng ruu gbãagbãa kɔɔrɔnang, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ ri gã zɔ̃ng rɛɛ dabang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Vuu keɓe shing ɓi nyaa laanang waati. Shingnɛ ruu zi vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa mang ka yuu ɓuru nɛɛ ruu walɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ tusu vuu keɓe shɛ̃ɛning.
54001005	N kɔɔ mɔɔ nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ nɛɛ zɔɔ kasɛnang ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ yeti ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu ti kasɛ ruu zɔɔ nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ nizang keɓe ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
54001006	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ning gbalang keɓe tɔ, ri ràa jìng ɓarɛ kaa nyaa laanang naa shoko.
54001007	Ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri tusu zang nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ ri rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa takpang. A ri rang yee kaa mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, ri zi vuu bii tɔ gbãnggbãng.
54001008	Ruu zi tɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, zang nɛɛ palɛ shoonang nɛɛ mani waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ.
54001009	Zang dang nyaa wu ka ruu zang tɔ̃ɔ kpang. Ɓi ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri takɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing gn ka bii Laa kpang, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri seng Laa kpang, ri ti seng vuu tɔ̃ɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ daa ɓarɛ nɛɛ nà'a ɓarɛ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ,
54001010	Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang varɛ ɓɔɔ ri rooro nɛɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri palɛ doo nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓɔɔrɔ zang ri malɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri suru sè'e ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ ruu nizang ka yuu ruu kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu zang piti ɓɔɔ ri p'alɛ̀ vuu ka doo vuu tusunang ɓɔɔ nizang kpang ɓɛɛ.
54001011	Vuu ɓɔɔ nizang keɓe, ɓi ka Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang piti dɔɔ wu katɔ, a m nɛɛ n kɔɔ zang ɓɛɛ.
54001012	N zãa Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ a m kaka, n palɛ shoonang mɛɛ nɛɛ mani tɔ. N ti zãa wu tɔ ka ɓɔɔ zirɛ n daa naa tɔ, zɔ̃ng m nɛɛ n shòng wu ɓɛɛ.
54001013	Ka tìng, n rang yee shi kpang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, n dang zang ɓiɓɛ jìng, a n ti palɛ ri nɛɛ ɓangge, a zɔ̃ng m doo nɛɛ mani. A gn mɛɛ kɔng Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n zi vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Bɛɛ n ti shing danggn gn kpang ɓɛɛ,
54001014	a kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi pàlɛ̀ m tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ bang dɔli ɓɛɛ. A tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ shingnɛ, n shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, a n ti kàs'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru piti, ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
54001015	Ruu keɓe nizang kɔ nwani, ti daa naa ɓɔɔ zang piti ri shing danggn kagn ɓɛɛ tɔ. Yeesɔ Kirisi a ka koo nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Nkɔ ɓa zang piti vuu shi kpang palɛnang.
