54001016	Ka ruu ruu keɓe kɔ, gn mɛɛ kɔng Laa, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi wu t'us'u naa ɓɔɔ wu mã danggn nɛɛ n gbãnggbãng, wu tà yuu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ nkɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang n ɓa zang piti ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ ri naa shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ri zi kati, ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang kati.
54001017	Rùu nandon ruu dɔ̀ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti dondong ɓɛɛ ta. Laa ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓi jong kpang, zang ti zi wu ɓi jong nɛɛ jìng kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ gbete ɓɛɛ. Ruu a wu bannang ta dondong. Nɔngkɔ.
54001018	Jaa mɛɛ Timoti, ruu kɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ɓee, ɓi kaa doo ruu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri kɔɔ tɔ kagn ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ dũng nyaa keɓe, mɔɔ ta sìiri bii ditɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
54001019	Mɔɔ ti yiti danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓaaɓɛ, wu ti nwang tɔ̃ɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri y'aa danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ka vuu ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ kɔɔ ri kpang ɓɛɛ.
54001020	Himinaya nɛɛ Alezandiriya ri ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kɔ. N yàa Sheetang naa tɔ wu dang ri jìng. Tɔ̀ɔ, shoo wu lu ri kati, ri yaa ruu shi kpang kɔɔrɔnang kaa yuu Laa.
54002001	Vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ shɔɔnang keɓe. Gaa Laa mɔɔ ti bakɛ wu ka ruu zang piti. Mɔɔ ti zãa Laa ka ruu ɓarɛ nandon.
54002002	Mɔɔ ti gàa Laa ka ruu rɛɛ kpanti, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang bang ɓɛɛ nandon. Tɔ̀ɔ, rùu ɓɔɔ ruu dũng Laa ruu nwang kaa nyaa zɔɔ kikiri nɛɛ zang piti. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu a Laa bannang kati ruu ti seng zang jong.
54002003	Zɔ̃̌ng Laa gaanang keɓe, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru kasɛ zɔ̃ng gaanang keɓe kɔ.
54002004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang piti, nɛɛ ri ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang.
54002005	Laa ɓi gbete kɔ nwani, a zang ɓɔɔ shɛ̃ɛ ka teteng Laa nɛɛ zang piti ɓi doo gbete kɔ. Zang keɓe wukɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi.
54002006	Wukɔ a yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu ta yuu shɔnzang nandon. A yuu ɓiɓɛ teetee ka laa ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang piti kagn ɓɛɛ.
54002007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa shing m, zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ n kɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Isirela kpang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, n ti tusu ri danggn shinang ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani. N suu wu sè'e kpang.
54002008	N kasɛ zang varɛ, ri nɛɛ gaa Laa ka nɔng piti ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ yuu zang gaa Laa ɓɛɛ, ri tuu naa ɓarɛ ka lapa. Yeti ɓarɛ wu lasɛ katɔ kpang, ri ti p'alɛ̀ naa ri laa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang.
54002009	N kasɛ zang soro ri hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu yusɛ̃ɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ kaa tɔ̃ɔ. Ri gb'arɛ̀ bii wu nɛɛ yuu ɓɔɔ ri ti ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ kpang. Wu ti nɛɛ laa shoo, nɛɛ vuu turu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ kpang. Wu ti nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔli ɓɛɛ kpang.
54002010	Ri gb'ar'ɛ bii nɛɛ shoonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri palɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
54002011	Zang soro wu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu nɛɛ nwiiri. Wu tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang.
54002012	N kasɛ kpang, zang soro ɓɔɔ wu tusu zang varɛ vuu kpang. Zang soro wu ti nwàng zang bang ka yuu zang varɛ kpang. Wu nwang ɓi nɛɛ nwiiri ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang kp'alɛ̀ zɔɔ zang bang Laa ɓɛɛ.
54002013	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa mãa Adamu kɔ shɔɔnang, a naa mãa Hawawu ɓɛɛ.
54002014	A zang ti nwaarɛ wu Adamu kpang. Zang nwaarɛ ɓi Hawawu, a ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ.
54002015	A zang soro naa ta yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓi kaa jaa ɓɔɔ wu yi ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ka bii Yeesɔ kpang, nɛɛ ti kasɛ ruu zang katɔ, nɛɛ ti palɛ shi kpang kpang, nɛɛ ti yiti yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ.
54003001	Ruu keɓe nizang kɔ nwani, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, kasɛ ɓi shoonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kɔ.
54003002	Zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, wu nwang ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, wu gee soro gbete kɔ nwani. Wu zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ lasɛ pati kpang, zang ɓɔɔ yiti yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang seng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ta zang zanti ka gãa ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ, ti zunung naa ɓɔɔ wu tusu zang vuu katɔ.
54003003	Wu zang ɓɔɔ ɓoo saa kpang, wu zang ɓɔɔ gnvɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ dɔli kpang, gàa nyaa kpang, ti haa nyaa kpang. Wu ti zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu saka dɔli kpang.
54003004	Wu yiti zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃, wu shing wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ, ri ti seng wu katɔ.
54003005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu yiti zang ka gãa ɓiɓɛ kpang, palɛ biya, wu yiti zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa viya?
54003006	Wu ti zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa diki bee gn kpang, kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɛ̀'ɛ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ dɔli, zang nɛ̀'ɛ dɔng wu ruu naa ɓɔɔ zang dɔng Sheetang ɓɛɛ.
54003007	Wu ti nwang zang ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang, ri seng wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa nɔngkɔ kpang, zang palɛ wu vuu yusɛ̃ɛ, ti palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ Sheetang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
54003008	Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi zang naa ka shoonang ka Gãa Laa, ri nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ti nwang zang ɓɔɔ ta nyaa ziti kpang. Ri ti ɓoo saa kpang, ri ti zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng ka saka kãanang kpang.
54003009	Ri ti yiti ruu nizang keɓe ɓɔɔ Laa nwangsɛ ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ dũng wu ri shingnɛ, ri yaa gn naa kpang.
54003010	Zang gã̀sɛ̀ ri ka gbongkarɛ. Ri nɛɛ shaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ ri kagn keɓe tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang a ri naa shoonang palɛnang kati.
54003011	Zang soro ɓarɛ ri nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri ràng zang kpang. Ri nwàng wu zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ pati kpang. Ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
54003012	Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi zang naa ka shoonang ka Gãa Laa, zang ɓu wu gee soro gbete. Ri yiti wujɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka gãa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ waasɛ̃.
54003013	Zang ɓɔɔ ri yi zang naa ka shoonang ka Gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang ɓarɛ waasɛ̃, zang a ri bannang katɔ. Ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri rang ruu ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi katɔ, nyaa zàa ri kpang.
54003014	Ka wee n bee mɔɔ labeenang keɓe ɓee, n shing gn daanang ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kãntang.
54003015	Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ suu m kãng anang, labeenang keɓe, wu kɔ̀ɔ mɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ zang ri nwang ka yeti Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. Gãa Laa keɓe, ɓi wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi ningkãari dondong ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe, kaa rikɔ doo gãa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yiti ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
54003016	Ruu nizang ɓɔɔ Laa nwangsɛ ka yuu gbalang ɓiɓɛ kɔ ruu dũng ɓee, bang dɔli. Wu vuu ɓɔɔ zang laa nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang. Yeesɔ tuu bii shɔnzang a nɔng ka koo. Suru Laa tusu nɛɛ wu ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ri zi wu nɛɛ jìng ɓarɛ. Zang ri kɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ ka koo piti. A zang dɔli ka koo ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Zang tuu wu tɔ, zang daa nɛɛ wu ka lapa, ka tìng Laa.
54004001	Suru kɔɔ tɔ faarik nɛɛ, diki a ditɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri naa yaa danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri naa ɓaa shoo ka nyaa rɛɛ suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang ɓɛɛ. Ri naa dũng vuu ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang ri tusu ɓɛɛ.
54004002	Ɓi zang sè'e ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang, nɛɛ vuu palɛnang kɔ ri tusu zang zɔ̃ng vuu keɓe. Zang keɓe ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ ka vuu ɓɔɔ Sheetang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
54004003	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang nɛɛ, soro geenang shi kpang. Nɛɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ kagn, ri ti shaa kpang. Vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ, nɛɛ tɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu, ɓɔɔ ri ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang tɔ, ri tarɛ ri ti zãa wu kati ɓɛɛ.
54004004	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãa piti ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, n'ɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Nɔɔ ta vuu piti, nɔɔ zãa wu.
54004005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu shaanang piti, ɓi ruu Laa shingnɛ wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ, a ɓɔɔ kaa Laa ɓɔɔ ruu gàa ka nɔng shaanang ɓɛɛ.
54004006	Naa mɔɔ kɔɔ rɛɛ ɓaazung, ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ruu keɓe diki diki, mɔɔ nwang zang shoonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔ̀'ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi. Mɔɔ ti alɛ ɓaa suru bii ɓaaɓɛ ruu nizang ɓɔɔ zang kɔ̀'ɔ ka yuu danggn shinnang, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang tùsù mɔɔ, a mɔɔ yiti gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ.
54004007	Yaa gbalang ruu gbãagbãa ɓɔɔ daa naa kɔɔrɔnang kpang kaɓa katɔ. Mɔɔ kãa ɓaa gbalang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa nizang.
54004008	Pìirinang ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shing bii ɓaaɓɛ lakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ yuu ɓaaɓɛ vuu Suru Laa, nwang mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka gbalang naa bm bm. Nwǎng mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka nwannang ɓuru kãntang keɓe, ti naa nwàng mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka ɓɔɔ koo naa waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
54004009	Ruu keɓe nizang kɔ nwani, ti daa naa ɓɔɔ zang piti tarɛ ri shing danggn gn tɔ.
54004010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rùu palɛ shoonang, a ruu ti takɛ bii, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu shing danggn ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu zang piti ɓɛɛ. T'a yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ kɔ gbãnggbãng.
54004011	Kɔɔ ri ruu keɓe, mɔɔ ti tusu ri vuu keɓe diki diki.
54004012	Mɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ wu risi mɔɔ naa vìi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ doo jasang ɓɛɛ kpang. Nwang ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri kpɛ̃ɛr'ɛ vuu ka bii ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ka yee ɓɔɔ mɔɔ rang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ zang ɓɛɛ, ka danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ kaa nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ɓaaɓɛ.
54004013	A yuu ɓaaɓɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kpalɛ zang yuu, mɔɔ gã ri labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang ruu Laa, mɔɔ ti tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa vuu. N a nɛɛ mani.
54004014	Palɛ shoonang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ yaa kpang. Ɓɔɔ wu a mɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang ri rang yee, a zang bang Gãa Laa ri shìng mɔɔ naa ka yuu ɓɛɛ.
54004015	Palɛ vuu keɓe, mɔɔ shing yuu ɓaaɓɛ kagn gbãnggbãng, tɔɔ zang piti ri zi naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ daa nɛɛ tìng kati.
54004016	Gãng jìng ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ ti gãng jìng, ka vuu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tusu ɓɛɛ. Palɛ rɛɛ vuu keɓe diki diki. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ tɔ, mɔɔ ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
54005001	Mɔɔ mangkɛ zang bang kpang. Rang wu yee naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ rang daa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Palɛ rɛɛ jasang naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ rɛɛ jaanaa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ wujaa ɓɛɛ.
54005002	Palɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri bang tɔ naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ nà'a ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti palɛ rɛɛ wujɛ soro naa ɓaanaa. Mɔɔ seng ri katɔ.
54005003	Seng rɛɛ suvɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ yǐ ri naa ka bii kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ.
54005004	Suvɔ ɓɔɔ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wujɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ kagn, wujɛ keɓe ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ naa ɓɔɔ ri gaayu shoonang Laa palɛnang, ka ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zang ɓɔɔ yi ri shoonang ɓɛɛ. Ka gbalang keɓe, ri wà'a rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ yi ri, nɛɛ rɛɛ dabang ɓarɛ pãng, vuu ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ̀ ri ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe Laa kasɛ wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
54005005	Suvɔ ɓɔɔ ɓi ka bm, zang ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka wu kpang shing gn ɓi kaa bii Laa. Gaa Laa nɛɛ zìi nɛɛ laagɛ̃, nɛɛ Laa wu yi wu naa ka bii.
54005006	A suvɔ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing jìng ka tìnang tãanang, naa nwang doo ningkãari, suru ɓiɓɛ vɔ ɓi tɔ.
54005007	Kɔɔ ri vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu tɔɔ kaa takpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang.
54005008	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gãng jìng ka zang ɓiɓɛ kpang, nɛɛ gãng jìng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ kɔ gbãnggbãng kpang. Zang keɓe bɛ̃ɛ danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Laa tɔ. Ɓa zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kpang kaa tɔ.
54005009	Suvɔ ɓɔɔ s'aa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ɓa laa taati gn kpang nɛɛ ti gee varɛ dòo d'oo gbete kɔ nwani kpang, mɔɔ bèe nung ɓiɓɛ ka yeti labeenang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ b'ee nung rɛɛ suvɔ kpang.
54005010	Nɛɛ ti suvɔ ɓɔɔ zang zi wu tɔ nɛɛ shoonang tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ti gãng jìng ka wujɛ ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ t'a zang zanti katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ti p'alɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ vuu, tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ti yi zang ɓɔɔ ri dang jìng naa ka bii ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ti shing yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu palɛ tɔ̃ɔ ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ bee nung ɓiɓɛ.
54005011	Mɔɔ bèe nung suvɔ ɓɔɔ ri doo jasang ka labeenang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ beere nung rɛɛ suvɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri gãng jìng ka ri ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa bii ɓarɛ seepaa, ri kàs'ɛ nɛɛ ri gee ɓarɛ kaa varɛ. Ri naa y'aa nyaa ɓɔɔ ri a Yeesɔ Kirisi kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
54005012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa d'ɔng ri ruu kaa tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri yaa nyaa ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri a Yeesɔ Kirisi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
54005013	Naa ti nɔngkɔ kpang, ri si kaa rang, ri kɔng kaa bii ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ ka gãa gãa ɓɛɛ. Bɛɛ ri gaa kaa yuu zang rannang, ri ti ràngk'ɛ yee kaa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu ɓarɛ hãa kagn kpang ɓɛɛ.
54005014	N kasɛ suvɔ ɓɔɔ ri doo jasang, ri gee varɛ, ri yi jaa. Ri gãng jìng ka gãa ɓarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu yàa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ ruu kpang gbalang kaa tɔ̀'ɔ, ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu ɓuru kpang.
54005015	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, suvɔ ɓɔɔ ri yaa gbalang Laa tɔ, ri dũng ɓarɛ kaa sheetang ɓɛɛ.
54005016	Naa jaa soro ɓɔɔ dũng Laa, a zang ɓiɓɛ kagn ri suvɔ, wu gãng jìng ka ri. Wu tɔ̀'ɔ kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri gãng jìng ka ri kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri gãng jìng ɓarɛ kaa suvɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ yi ri naa ka bii kpang ɓɛɛ.
54005017	Zang bang ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng ka zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri nɛɛ palɛ shoonang tɔ̃ɔ, zang shu ri saka tìng ziti. Zang ɓɔɔ shoonang ɓarɛ ɓi ruu Laa kɔɔrɔnang nɛɛ vuu tusunang, zang wu shu rikɔ nɔngkɔ gbãnggbãng.
54005018	Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ mã nyaa vuu vaa ka làa ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ mɔɔ shoonang ka jaa ɓaaɓɛ kpang.” A zang ti kɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ shu zang ɓɔɔ pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ shoonang, saka ɓiɓɛ katɔ.”
54005019	Naa zang tɔɔ zang bang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri naa kɔɔ mɔɔ, ri nɛɛ ɓa ziti katɔ kpang, mɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓarɛ kpang.
54005020	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang, mangkɛ ri ka jìng zang piti. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang nimbang ri kaa vɔrɔ kati.
54005021	N gaa mɔɔ nɛɛ nung Laa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ mɔɔ, mɔɔ dñ̀ng nyaa kɔ n dang mɔɔ ɓee. Ka vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ nandon, mɔɔ shɛ̃ɛrɛ zang katɔ kpang, mɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu gn dang gbete kpang.
54005022	Mɔɔ laabii ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing naa ɓaaɓɛ, ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri tɔɔ, ri palɛ shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Mɔɔ yi naa ɓaaɓɛ ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn ri palɛ kpang. Nwang ɓaa nwannang tɔ̃ɔ.
54005023	Mɔɔ ɓoo mii tɔ̀'ɔ waati kpang, lu sàa kagn tɔkɔlɔng ka ruu yeti ɓɔɔ kpãa mɔɔ, nɛɛ kɔnang diki diki ɓɛɛ.
54005024	Vuu shi kpang zang ɓɔɔ tusu bii tantɛnang, bɛɛ zang kɔɔ gn kpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang. Vuu shi kpang zang ɓɔɔ tusu bii pati kpang, tusu bii ɓi nɛɛ knti.
54005025	Vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓi doo nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ kpãa zinang kpang. Ɓɔɔ zang zi kãntang kpang, w'aasɛ̀ bii dondong kpang
54006001	Mɔɔ nɛɛ jaafoo, mɔɔ zì dabang gãa ɓaaɓɛ, naa zang ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a wu bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu rang yee shi kpang kaa tɔ̀'ɔ yuu Laa nɛɛ yuu vuu kɔ ruu tusu zang ɓɛɛ kpang.
54006002	Ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ jaafoo ɓɛɛ, dabang gãa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dũng Laa, nɔɔ risi ri naa vìi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔ̀ɔ pàlɛ̀ ri shoonang gbãnggbãng kɔ jong. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, dabang gãa manɛ ri ɓarɛ doo zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, a nɔɔ ti kasɛ ri manɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Tusu zang vuu keɓe, mɔɔ ti kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri palɛ nɔngkɔ.
54006003	zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tusu vuu ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ daa gbete nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu tusu ka yuu gbalang Laa kɔ ruu dũng ɓɛɛ kpang.
54006004	Zang keɓe ɓi jìng lakɛnang yee wu, zi vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang. Kasɛ ɓi ruu nyaa laanang ka yuu ruu nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ zang haa dɔli ɓɛɛ. Sh'ing zang ri kaa sũnyaa, ri basɛ zɔɔ, ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zɔɔ, ri dãa zɔɔ, ri rɛ̃rɛ vuu shi kpang ka yuu zɔɔ,
54006005	a ri hãa nyaa diki diki. Zang keɓe, yeti ɓarɛ zunung rɛ̃rɛnang tɔ̃ɔ kpang, ri ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓarɛ kpang. Zang keɓe, ri kɔɔ ɓarɛ nɛɛ gbalang Laa ɓi gbalang ɓɔɔ zang walɛ saka kagn ɓɛɛ.
54006006	Gbalang Laa shing zang katɔ zang walɛ vuu naa. Zang keɓe, vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ dàa wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
54006007	Ruu à nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ka koo keɓe kpang. Ruu ti tuu vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu yaa koo keɓe kpang.
54006008	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu shaanang nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓuru nɛɛ kagn, ri daa ruu katɔ.
54006009	zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓarɛ vuu naa, sheetang gãsɛ ri katɔ. Wu shing ri ri palɛ vuu shoko nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ ri katɔ, ɓɔɔ ri kàsɛ̀ ka yeti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe kɔ ri shing zang zang wu shaarɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete.
54006010	Kasɛnang saka wu kɔ dìiri vuu shi kpang nandon. Zang ɓɔɔ ri làabii walɛnang, ri yaa gbalang danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Laa tɔ. A ri atɛ yuu ɓarɛ yeti lasɛnang ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ng dɔli tɔ.
54006011	A ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ Timoti, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓaa zang Laa ɓɛɛ, yaa vuu keɓe ɓaa nandon. Kãa ɓaa gbalang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ diki diki, zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa nizang ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ zang katɔ ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ mã danggn dɔli ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
54006012	Ìi yuu kagn ka gbalang danggn kɔ ruu shing ɓee. Yiti suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ walɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ gbãnggbãng. Wee suru bii ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa mɔɔ nyaa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ, ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ nyaa ka shoo zang dɔli nɛɛ mɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
54006013	Ka tìng Laa ɓɔɔ a vuu piti suru bii ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ka tìng Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ ruu ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shingnɛ ka tìng kpanti Bilatu ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ mɔɔ,
54006014	dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang mɔɔ ɓɛɛ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang, diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nwang nyaa kagn wu a nɛɛ mani.
54006015	Yeesɔ Kirisi naa nwang nyaa ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa shing ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ zang piti dɔɔ wu, wukɔ roo kpanti gbete. Wukɔ Kpanti ka yuu rɛɛ kpanti nandon. Wukɔ dabang gãa rɛɛ dabang gãa.
54006016	Wukɔ vɔ ɓi kpang gbete. Nwàng ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ ɓi katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zunung daanang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zi wu gngn kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti zi wu kagn kpang. Zang wu b'ang wu diki diki, naa vuu palɛnang wu nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ dondong, Nɔngkɔ.
54006017	Kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zang ying ka koo keɓe ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ kpang. Ri shing gn ka vuu naa ɓɔɔ nwang dondong kpang, ɓɔɔ naa weɓe kpang. Ri shing gn ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ a ruu vuu piti, ka diki kpang, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu tãa tìnang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
54006018	Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri nwang zang ying nɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri mung naa kpang, ri a zang vuu, ri basɛ vuu ɓarɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓɔ̀'ɔ ɓarɛ kagn kpang.
54006019	Naa ri palɛ naa weɓe, ri kpàl'ɛ yuu ɓarɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ ri lò'o ɓarɛ doo vuu ɓɔɔ naa yi ri naa ka bii ka tìng ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ kati.
54006020	Timoti, gãng jìng ka vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a mɔɔ ka naa ɓɛɛ waasɛ̃. Mɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka yee sãnsãnrãng ɓɔɔ zang rangkɛ kpang, mɔɔ ti laa nyaa ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang suu sè'e nɛɛ wukɔ “zũnang” ɓɛɛ kpang.
54006021	Zang ɓɔɔ ri y'aa danggn kɔ ri shing ka bii Laa ɓee tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓɔɔ naa weɓe ɓɛɛ. N gaa Laa, wu p'alɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon.
55001001	Labeenang keɓe a nɛɛ bii mɛɛ Bulu, zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kasɛ nɛɛ n nwang zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa tɔɔ, n kɔɔ zang ruu, ka yuu suru bii ɓɔɔ wu a ruu nyaa nɛɛ wu naa a ruu ɓɛɛ. Suru bii keɓe, ɓɔɔ ɓuru, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
55001002	N bee mɔkɔ Timoti jaa mɛɛ, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ mɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ. N gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, gn ɓaaɓɛ wu kɔng ri katɔ, ri palɛ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri ti shingnɛ mɔɔ nwang waasɛ̃.
55001003	N zãa Laa ɓɔɔ n pàl'ɛ wu shoonang nɛɛ yeti gbete tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang mɛɛ ri p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ. N zãa wu ka ɓɔɔ, n gaa wu nɛɛ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ zìi n ɓaa nung ɓaaɓɛ kagn diki diki ɓɛɛ.
55001004	N nɛɛ kpaa danggn miiri ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ tɔ, n kasɛ n zi jìng ɓaaɓɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n tãa tìnang kaa gbãnggbãng.
55001005	Danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing gbãnggbãng, ning m kpang, naa ɓɔɔ nabang ɓaaɓɛ Looyi nɛɛ naaɓɛ Yunis, ri shing ɓɛɛ. N ti zi zɔ̃ng danggn shinnang keɓe kagn yeti ɓaaɓɛ.
55001006	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kpà'a mɔɔ danggn, mɔɔ palɛ shoonang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a mɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ n shìng mɔɔ naa ka yuu ɓɛɛ.
55001007	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru ɓɔɔ Laa a ruu, ɓi ɓɔɔ shing ruu, ruu tuuru yusɛ̃ɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Suru Laa keɓe, shing ruu ruu shii ɓuru nɛɛ kaka kɔ jong, ruu kasɛ ruu zang, ruu ti yiti yuu ɓuru waasɛ̃.
55001008	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu mɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ kpang. Yusɛ̃ɛ wu ti tuu mɔɔ ka yuu mɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang mã m ka sãa ka ruu Kirisi ɓɛɛ kpang. Dang jìng jong ka ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, naa ɓɔɔ n dang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ kaka ɓɔɔ Laa a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
55001009	Wukɔ ɓàa ruu nyaa, a tà yuu ɓuru, nɛɛ ruu nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ. Wu ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ ruu p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu mang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi bɛɛ zang mãa koo gn kpang.
55001010	A kãntang keɓe naa nwàngsɛ̀ rùu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ kaa nɛɛ anang Yeesɔ Kirisi, zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa kaka vɔrɔ, a nwangsɛ ruu suru bii nɛɛ nwannang ɓɔɔ gbinggbing ɓɛɛ, ka gbalang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa.
55001011	Laa zɔ̃ng m nɛɛ n nwang zang shoonang Yeesɔ, n tusu zang vuu, a n ti kɔ̀ɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa.
55001012	N dang jìng ka ruu rɛɛ vuu keɓe kɔ. A n yaa gn naa m gn kpang tingkiring, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi zang ɓɔɔ n shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. A n ti zi m tɔ nɛɛ, zunung ɓɔɔ wu yìt'i m vuu ɓɔɔ wu a m ka naa tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa wu a nɛɛ mani.
55001013	Yiti ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ n tusu mɔɔ ɓɛɛ gbãnggbãng. Mɔɔ ti yaa danggn shinnang nɛɛ zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ bii tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ kpang.
55001014	Gãng jìng ka ruu nizang ɓɔɔ Laa a mɔɔ ka naa ɓɛɛ. Yiti nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Suru Laa, ɓɔɔ nwang ka yeti ɓuru ruu nandon ɓɛɛ.
55001015	Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, rɛɛ Figelu nɛɛ Hamɔgini nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka tipi Asiya nandon, ri yaa m tɔ.
55001016	Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi wu palɛ Onɛsiforu nɛɛ zang gãa ɓiɓɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, lee ka ɓɔɔ wu yi m naa ka bii diki diki kpang ɓɛɛ. Yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ zang mã m ka sãa tuu wu kpang.
55001017	Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ wu a gari Rooma hn, tantɛ m kãanang, naa ìi m kati.
55001018	Kpanti Yeesɔ wu palɛ wu tɔ̃ɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti zì vuu ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ̀ m ka Afisa ɓɛɛ tɔ gbayi gbayi.
55002001	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Jaa mɛɛ, tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wu shingnɛ mɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka. Tɔ̃ɔ keɓe, ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ ɓuru tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
55002002	T'us'u vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tãayi, n t'us'u ka jìng zang dɔli ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ tusu zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ri gn katɔ ka bii ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zunung ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang ɓɔɔ kaa jong ɓɛɛ.
55002003	Naa ɓɔɔ sɔɔja tɔ̃ɔ mã danggn jìng dannang ɓɛɛ, mã danggn doo nɔngkɔ, naa mɔɔ dang jìng ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
55002004	Zang sɔɔja ɓɔɔ ka nyaa sìiri, ta sìiri tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang bang ɓiɓɛ wu tãa tìnang ɓiɓɛ kati. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri sɔɔja kpang ri p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
55002005	Zang ɓɔɔ ri yuu jajaayu nɛɛ dñ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ zang dang ɓɛɛ kpang, walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang.
55002006	Zang ɓɔɔ lang jaa ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang gbãnggbãng zang wu a wukɔ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang walɛ ka jaa, shɔɔnang.
55002007	Rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu kɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ɓee waasɛ̃, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa a mɔɔ gbalang ditɔ mɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ nandon.
55002008	Danggn Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ zang wisi paa nɛɛ saa, wu ning mɔɔ kpang. Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ wu jaa zɔ̃ng Dawuda ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ n t'us'u ka yeti Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɛɛ.
55002009	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, n dang jìng, a zang ti mã m nɛɛ saka, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ ǹ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. A zang mã Ruu Laa bì'i ɓi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ katɔ kpang.
55002010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n mã danggn vuu piti ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu ta yuu ɓarɛ kaa jong. Yuu tanang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ti atɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
55002011	Ruu keɓe nizang kɔ nwani. Zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ, Ruu nɛɛ vɔ tɔ nɛɛ wu, Ruu ti naa nwang ditɔ ningkãari nɛɛ wu.
55002012	Ruu nɛɛ mã danggn sasak, ruu naa roo kpanti nɛɛ wu. Naa ruu bɛ̃ɛ wu, ti naa bɛ̃ɛ ruu jong.
55002013	Naa ruu ɓuru zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn ka bii ɓuru kpang, Yaa nyaa ɓɔɔ wu kɔ̀ɔ ɓi kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, sùu yuu ɓiɓɛ sè'e ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ.
55002014	Kpaa rɛɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ danggn vuu keɓe, mɔɔ ti shaarɛ ri nyaa gbãnggbãng ka tìng Laa, nɛɛ ri gaa nyaa ka yuu ruu kpang. Nwàng zang vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kpang, lasɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa ɓɛɛ ɓarɛ katɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
55002015	P'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zunung katɔ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kati. Zang shoonang ɓɔɔ yusɛ̃ɛ shoonang ɓiɓɛ tuu wu kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nwàngs'ɛ zang dìiri ruu Laa tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
55002016	Mɔɔ ɓaa shoo ɓaa ka yee sãnsãnrãng ɓɔɔ zang rangkɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, shing zang, zang yaa gbalang Laa kaa beebang.
55002017	Zɔ̃ng yee keɓe nwang ɓi naa nɔɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shaa ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. Zang ziti ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri t'usù zɔ̃ng yee keɓe, ɓi rɛɛ Hayimeniyu nɛɛ Filetu.
55002018	Ri yaa gbalang ɓɔɔ nizang tɔ, ri kpantɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ jìng, ri kɔɔrɔ ri nɛɛ, Laa wisi zang paa ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ saa kpang.
55002019	A doo gãa ɓɔɔ Laa loo ɓɛɛ, shii ɓi katɔ katakata, zang zìiti kpang. Zang bee vuu keɓe ka bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Laa zi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ tɔ”. A “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, wu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa, wu yaa gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ katɔ.”
55002020	Ka yeti gãa bang taasa nɛɛ juwa kagn, ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Zang p'alɛ̀ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɔɔ nɛɛ azurufa, zang p'alɛ̀ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ laa, a zang mãa ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tapɔng. Zang shing ɓɔɔ ɓi ka ruu vuu shaanang ka nɔng mung, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ shoonang ɓi nɛɛ mani diki diki.
55002021	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ rɛɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe kpang nandon, nwang ɓi naa taasa Zinariya ɓɔɔ zang shaa vuu shaanang kagn ka lee mung ɓɛɛ. Taasa keɓe, shi zang ɓiɓɛ ka jìng dɔli. Zang ɓiɓɛ palɛ shoonang tɔ̃ɔ piti nɛɛ mani katɔ.
55002022	Yaa vuu ɓɔɔ bii jasang kasɛ ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ kãa ɓaa gbalang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nwang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa. Mɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ ri. Palɛ vuu keɓe nɔng gbete nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ.
55002023	Ruu ɓaaɓɛ wu hãa kagn nɛɛ ruu shoko kɔɔrɔnang nɛɛ nyaa laanang kpang. Mɔɔ zi tɔ ri shingnɛ zang ri haa nyaa.
55002024	Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ Laa shoonang wu hàa nyaa ɓi kpang. Wu nwang ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ zang piti tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu ti nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ tusu zang vuu, mã danggn katɔ ɓɛɛ.
55002025	Wu kɔsɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ wu nɛɛ gnvɔ ning kpang. Naa Laa nɛɛ kasɛ, ri naa walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ri 'arɛ̀ ri zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
55002026	Shoo naa lu ri ditɔ, ri wɔ nɛɛ naa suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ lang saka yi ri kagn, a shing ri, nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
55003001	Danggn wu ning mɔɔ kpang. Diki ɓɔɔ koo naa waa nyaa kagn naa nwang diki jìng dannang.
55003002	Ka diki keɓe, zang ri naa kàs'ɛ yuu ɓarɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ri naa kɔng jìng nɛɛ vuu ɓarɛ, ri kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu ɓarɛ, ri naa tuu bii dɔli, ri naa dãlɛ zang, ri naa ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang ɓɔɔ yiki ri kpang, ri naa zã̀a zang kpàng, ri ti naa dũng Laa kpang, ri p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
55003003	Ri naa pàlɛ̀ zang tɔ̃ɔ kpang, gn zang ti naa kɔng ri kpang, ri naa rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zang, ri naa yiti yuu ɓarɛ kpang, a gnvɔ ti ka yeti ɓarɛ dɔli. Ri naa kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓarɛ kpang.
55003004	Ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing gn ka bii ɓarɛ kpang. Ri naa rɛ̃̀rɛ̀ ka gbongkarɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri p'al'ɛ vuu kpang, ri naa lakɛ jìng dɔli. Ri naa kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri tãa tìnang kagn ɓa ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ Laa katɔ.
55003005	Ri naa palɛ bii mɔɔ kɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ ri d'ũng Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete, a nwannang ɓarɛ tusu ɓi nɛɛ ri dũng Laa kpang tingkiring. Ruu ɓaaɓɛ wu hãa kagn nɛɛ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang keɓe kpang.
55003006	Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ri naa dàar'ɛ zang ka gãa. Ri ɓ'a kaka zang soro ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ yeti kɔ̃sɔnang kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓi ka yuu vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri kasɛ ri palɛ ɓarɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
55003007	Zang soro keɓe, diki diki ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ri vuu, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ nizang kaa takpang doo nɛɛ mani.
55003008	Naa ɓɔɔ Jani ri nɛɛ Jambari ri bɛ̃ɛ nyaa Musa ɓɛɛ, zang keɓe ri bɛ̃ɛ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang doo nɔngkɔ. Zang keɓe, yeti ɓarɛ zunung rɛ̃rɛnang kpang. Danggn shinnang ɓarɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ nizang kpang.
55003009	Ri dàa tìng beebang kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ri zi shoko ɓarɛ ditɔ ɓɛɛ. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ p'al'ɛ rɛɛ Jani nɛɛ Jambari ɓɛɛ kɔ.
55003010	Ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ, mɔ̀ɔ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ n tusu ɓɛɛ tɔ, mɔɔ zi nwannang mɛɛ tɔ, a mɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ n shing jìng mɛɛ kagn tɔ. Mɔɔ zi danggn ɓɔɔ n shing ka bii Laa tɔ, nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ n mã nɛɛ zang, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ n kasɛ zang ɓɛɛ a ɓɔɔ danggn ɓɔɔ n mã ka jìng dannang ɓɛɛ.
55003011	Mɔɔ ti zi naa ɓɔɔ zang dang m jìng ɓɛɛ nɛɛ jìng dannang ɓɔɔ n dang ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ m ka Antakiya, nɛɛ Ikoniya, nɛɛ Lisitira tɔ, jìng ɓɔɔ zang dang m, a n mã danggn ɓɛɛ. Laa ta yuu mɛɛ ka vuu keɓe nandon.
55003012	Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ wu nwang zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa gbãnggbãng ka ɓɔɔ wu ɓakɛ yuu nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi, zang dang wu jìng katɔ.
55003013	A zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ, ri tuu waa nyaating zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, ri shaarɛ katɔ, shaarɛnang ɓarɛ daa nɛɛ tìng kɔ jong. Ri nwaarɛ zang, zang ti nwaarɛ ri.
55003014	Ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ, dũng ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ a mɔɔ ti shing danggn tɔ kagn gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti zi zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu mɔɔ vuu ɓɛɛ tɔ.
55003015	Mɔɔ ti zi tɔ, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ mɔɔ doo wujaa, mɔɔ zi labeenang Laa ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu shing mɔɔ mɔɔ zũngnɛ tɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ Laa wu ta yuu ɓaaɓɛ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
55003016	Yee ɓɔɔ ka yeti labeenang Laa nandon, Laa nwangsɛ ɓi nɛɛ bii Suru ɓiɓɛ. Zang tusu zang vuu nɛɛ yee keɓe kɔ, zang ti mangkɛ zang nɛɛ mani, zang gbarɛ zang nɛɛ mani, a zang ti tusu zang nwannang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ mani,
55003017	tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ Laa shoonang, wu walɛ zũnang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ shoonang tɔ̃ɔ ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng piti nɛɛ mani.
55004001	N gàa mɔɔ nɛɛ nung Laa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri doo ningkãari ruu ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi naa nwang nyaa ditɔ, naa roo kpanti, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ mɔɔ ruu keɓe.
55004002	Kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa, yi tìng ɓaa ka kɔɔrɔnang, naa nɛɛ là'a kɔɔnang, naa nɛɛ ti laa kɔɔnang kpang piti. Mangkɛ zang, mɔɔ ti mã̀ zang danggn. Mɔɔ mã danggn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tusu zang vuu ɓɛɛ.
55004003	Diki naa a ditɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa shoo ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang tusu kpang. Ri dũng ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri kpalɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu vuu, nɛɛ ri tùsù ri vuu ɓɔɔ bii sh'aa ri, rì kasɛ tãanang ɓɛɛ.
55004004	Ri ɓaa shoo, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nizang, ɓɔɔ ka yuu gbalang Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri ɓàar'ɛ shoo ɓarɛ ka ruu gbãagbãa.
55004005	Ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ, yiti yuu ɓaaɓɛ waasɛ̃ diki diki, mɔɔ nɛɛ dang jìng, mã danggn, palɛ ɓaa shoonang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa mɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ. P'al'ɛ shoonang ɓaaɓɛ nandon naa zang shoonang Laa.
55004006	Ɓɔɔ mɛɛ, laa mɛɛ a ɓi tɔ, ɓɔɔ zang lu m, naa ɓɔɔ zang lu Laa vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓoo katɔ ɓɛɛ. Diki a tɔ ɓɔɔ n yaa koo keɓe ɓɛɛ.
55004007	N yuu m tɔ waasɛ̃ n yurɛ n daa hangsɛ nyaa. N yaa danggn ɓɔɔ n shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.
55004008	Kãntang keɓe, Laa shing vuu ɓɔɔ wu a m ɓɛɛ tɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, naa a m vuu keɓe ka diki ɓɔɔ wu jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kagn ɓɛɛ. A nkɔ ka bm kpang, a zang piti ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ wu, ri gãng jìng diki ɓɔɔ wu gbãayu kagn ɓɛɛ.
55004009	Kãa gbalang mɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ pati,
55004010	ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Dema kasɛ ruu vuu koo keɓe, yaa m tɔ, daa tɔ ka gari Tesalonika. Karasika daa ka Galatiya, a Titu daa ɓi kaa Dalamatiya.
55004011	Ɓi kaa Luka kɔ shɛ̃ɛning nɛɛ n, kãa nɔng Maraku, mɔɔ a nɛɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yi m naa katɔ ka shoonang mɛɛ keɓe.
55004012	N shong Tikiku ɓi ka Afisa
55004013	Mɔɔ nɛɛ a kaa tɔ, mɔɔ atɛ m fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ n hãa nɛɛ biling, ɓɔɔ n yaa ka nɔng Kaapu ka gari Torowasa ɓɛɛ ka naa ning. Mɔɔ ti atɛ rɛɛ labeenang kiɓi ka naa jong. Labeenang ɓɔɔ n shing danggn gbãnggbãng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ koo vuu ɓɛɛ.
55004014	Alezanda yɔɔ ɓɔɔ sã vuu ɓɛɛ palɛ m vuu shi kpang dɔli. Laa naa palɛ wu vuu ditɔ jong ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ wu p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
55004015	Gãng jìng ka wu gbãnggbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ zang kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ.
55004016	Ka ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang, zang ɓaa m nyaavaa ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ tà m nyaa kagn kpang. Zang ri yaa m nandon. N gaa Laa wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ kpang.
55004017	A Yeesɔ Kirisi y'aa m kaa takpang, a m kaka, a n zunung ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ zang ruu Laa nandon. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zang Yahudawa kpang, ri tãa kati. A Laa t'a m nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri nyɔ m vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
55004018	Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ta m ditɔ, ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ ri palɛ m nandon. Wu daa nɛɛ n ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu roo kpanti ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Zang ri a wu bannang ta dondong. Nɔngkɔ.
55004019	Mɔɔ jèe m Akpiila nɛɛ ɓeeso Pirisila nyaa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa Onɛsiforu nandon.
55004020	Erasitu nwàng ɓi ka Koranti, a n yaa Torofimu ka gari Miletu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ vuu p'al'ɛ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
55004021	Kãa gbalang mɔɔ arɛ bɛɛ pũngku kpaa gn kpang. Yubulu, nɛɛ Pudin, nɛɛ Linu, nɛɛ Kalawudiya, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa. Manzung ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ka nihn, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa jong.
55004022	Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi wu shingnɛ, mɔɔ tãa tìnang, Laa wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon.
56001001	Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ nkɔ Bulu zang ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ Laa shoonang nɛɛ zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi. Laa zɔ̃ng m nɛɛ n nwang zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ, a shong m nɛɛ n yi zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng ri katɔ naa ka bii, ri shing danggn gbãnggbãng. N ti shing ri, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ shingnɛ ri nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
56001002	Tɔ̀ɔ, ri shing gn ka suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ suu sè'e kpang a zang nyaa bɛɛ zang mãa koo gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
56001003	Ka ɓɔɔ diki a tɔ teetee Laa nwangsɛ rùu ruu suru bii keɓe, ka yeti yee ɓiɓɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru, a m ruu keɓe, a kɔɔ m nɛɛ n kɔɔrɔ zang.
56001004	N bee mɔkɔ Titu, ɓɔɔ ka gbalang danggn kɔ ruu shing nandon ɓee, mɔɔ ɓaa kaa jaa mɛɛ nizang ɓɛɛ. N gaa Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru, ri pàlɛ̀ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri shingnɛ, mɔɔ nwang waasɛ̃.
56001005	N yaa mɔɔ ka tipi Karita n tɔɔ, mɔɔ hangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ, ruu yaa nyaa ka gbalang ɓɛɛ waasɛ̃. A mɔɔ ti zɔ̃ngkɔ zang bang ka Gãa Laa ka gari gari, naa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
56001006	Zang bang zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, wu nwang ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Soro ɓiɓɛ gbete kɔ nwani. Wujɛ ɓiɓɛ nandon ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa. Ri wu wujɛ ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kpang a ri ti tãa shoo kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
56001007	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bang Gãa Laa gãng jìng ɓi ka shoonang Laa, wu nwang ɓi zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Wu tuu yuu kpang, wu ti ta yeti gbãngko kpang. Wu zang ɓɔɔ sàa si wu kpang, wu zang ɓɔɔ laa nyaa kpang. Wu ti zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng ka saka kãanang ɓɛɛ kpang, a wu ti zang ɓɔɔ shaa varɛ dɔli kpang.
56001008	Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ta zang zanti ka gãa ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu sãnsãnrãng kpang ɓɛɛ, palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii katɔ diki diki, ti palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ yiti yuu ɓiɓɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ.
56001009	Wu ti yiti ruu nizang ɓɔɔ ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri tusu ɓɛɛ gbãnggbãng. Wu palɛ nɔngkɔ, wu mã̀ zang ɓɔɔ danggn nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tusu ɓɛɛ. Wu ti tùsù zang ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ ruu bii katɔ naa ɓɔɔ ri ning gbalang ɓɛɛ.
56001010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang dɔli nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa gbalang zang Yahudawa dũnnang ri dũng kaa Laa, ri ta ruu nizang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri tusu ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri nwaarɛ zang ɓarɛ nɛɛ yee shoko ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ ɓɛɛ.
56001011	Zãa ri ruu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang ɓɛɛ katɔ. Ri kpantɛ danggn ɓɔɔ zang gãa gãa dɔli ri shing ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa tusunang kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing jìng ɓarɛ ka saka kãanang ɓɛɛ.
56001012	Zang nyaa shoonang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ kagn, doo zang Karita kɔ, kɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, “Zang Karita ɓarɛ zang see, ri nwang naa yɔpɔ kpaasi, ri ɓarɛ zang r'ang ɓɔɔ shaa vuu dɔli ɓɛɛ.”
56001013	Ruu kɔ yɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ ɓee, nizang kɔ nwani. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mangkɛ ri nabm, tɔ̀ɔ ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ.
56001014	Ri yaa ruu gbãagbãa zang Yahudawa ta nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang palɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa katɔ, ri tusu zang ɓɛɛ.
56001015	Ka jìng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete, vuu piti ɓi tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nandon. A zang ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang palɛnang lasɛ ri tɔ, ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ɓarɛ ka ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kpang, vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kagn kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ lasɛ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
56001016	Ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ri zi Laa tɔ, a vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ tusu nɛɛ ri zi Laa kpang. Ri ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang bɛ̃ɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa zang kpang, ri daa naa vuu tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang ɓarɛ kpang tingkiring.
56002001	Ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ, tùsù zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓaa vuu ɓɔɔ daa doo vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri tusu ɓɛɛ.
56002002	Kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ, ri nwang wu zang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ lasɛ pati kpang, ri nwàng zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri bannang katɔ, ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ waasɛ̃. Ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ, ri kasɛ zang gbãnggbãng, a ri ti mã danggn gbãnggbãng.
56002003	Kɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛ tɔ ri nwang nwannang naa zang soro ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete ri nɛ̀'ɛ nwàng ɓɛɛ. Ri rang zang kpang, ri nwàng jaafoo sàa kpang, Ri tusu naa ɓɔɔ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri nɛɛ nwang ɓɛɛ,
56002004	tɔ̀ɔ, ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang soro ɓɔɔ ri doo jasang naa ɓɔɔ ri kàs'ɛ varɛ ɓarɛ nɛɛ wujɛ ɓarɛ kati.
56002005	Ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ ri, ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ waasɛ̃, ri p'alɛ̀ dũndũng kpang, ri nwang zang soro ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang gãa ɓarɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa varɛ ɓarɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri rang yee shi kpang kaa tɔ̀'ɔ ka yuu ruu Laa kpang.
56002006	Kɔɔ jasang doo nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ katɔ.
56002007	Ka vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ piti, tusu yuu ɓaaɓɛ, mɔɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ zang kpɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tusu zang vuu nɛɛ yeti gbete, mɔɔ ti pìiri nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tusu zang ɓɛɛ kpang.
56002008	Tusu vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ shi kpang kpang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang kati, ri wàlɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀'ɔ ka yuu ɓaaɓɛ kaa takpang.
56002009	Kɔɔ jaafoo ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa dabang gãa ɓarɛ. Ri shingnɛ, dabang gãa ɓarɛ, ri tãa tìnang ka vuu ɓɔɔ ri pàl'ɛ ri ɓɛɛ nandon. Ri laanyaa nɛɛ ri kpang.
56002010	Ri ɓɔ̀ɔ vuu dabang gãa ɓarɛ kpang. Ri tusu diki diki nɛɛ ri zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, wu shingnɛ, zang ri rang yee tɔ̃ɔ kaa yuu vuu kɔ ruu tusu ka yuu Laa, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
56002011	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa t'us'u tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu ta yuu zang piti nɛɛ mani tɔ ɓɛɛ.
56002012	Tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ keɓe, kɔ tusu ruu, ruu yaa nwannang ta naa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu vuu koo ɓɛɛ. Ruu nwangnɛ, ruu yiti yuu ɓuru katɔ, ruu nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu dũng Laa ka nwannang ɓuru ka koo keɓe.
56002013	Ka wee vuu nwangnɛ, ruu gã diki tìnang tãanang ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn nɛɛ naa a ɓɛɛ. Diki ɓɔɔ bannang Laa ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓa zang piti, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ti ta yuu ɓuru naa nwangsɛ bii ɓɛɛ.
56002014	Yeesɔ a yuu ɓiɓɛ ka ruu ɓuru nɛɛ wu ta ruu nɛɛ naa vuu shi kpang nandon. Wu shing ruu ruu nwang zang ɓiɓɛ kɔ bm gbete. Wu shing ruu ruu nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ bii tɔ nɛɛ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
56002015	Tusu zang vuu keɓe. P'al'ɛ shoonang nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓaaɓɛ nandon, mɔɔ mã̀ zang ɓaaɓɛ danggn. Mɔɔ ti mangkɛ ri. Mɔɔ yaa zang ɓɔɔ wu risi mɔɔ naa vìi kpang.
56003001	Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa rɛɛ kpanti, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang tipi. Ri ti kpalɛ bii diki diki, ri p'al'ɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
56003002	Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ kpang. Ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ zang, ri yi wusang nɛɛ zang piti. Ri p'alɛ̀ hakaka kpang.
56003003	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓeleng ruu nɛɛ yuu ɓuru bɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu shoko, ruu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa laa kpang, zang nwaarɛ ruu. Ruu nwang ɓuru jaafoo, vuu ɓɔɔ bii ɓuru kasɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ zang tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Ruu sù'ukãng ka nɔng vuu shi kpang palɛnang nɛɛ sũnyaa kaanang. Zang piti bɛ̃ɛ ruu katɔ, a ruu ti bɛ̃ɛ zang piti.
56003004	A ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru, tusu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ zang piti ɓɛɛ.
56003005	Ta yuu ɓuru kati. Wu ka ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ yuu ɓuru ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Tà yuu ɓuru, ɓi ka ruu gn ɓuru ɓɔɔ kɔ̀ng wu ɓɛɛ. Tà yuu ɓuru ka bii ɓɔɔ Suru Laa sɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ. Bii sɔɔnang ɓɔɔ risi ruu naa zang yi ruu kaa shɔɔ, a a ruu suru bii shɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
56003006	Laa a ruu suru ɓiɓɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
56003007	Tɔ̀ɔ, ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi, ruu nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ kaa tìng Laa, a ruu wàl'ɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn ɓiɓɛ kati.
56003008	Ruu kɔ zang kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nizang kɔ nwani. N kasɛ mɔɔ yi tìng ɓaa ka vuu kɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓee tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri dũng vuu keɓe, ri p'al'ɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Shoonang keɓe, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ ti yi zang piti naa katɔ ka bii.
56003009	Mɔɔ ɓaa shoo ɓaa ka nyaa shoko ɓɔɔ zang là'ayi, nɛɛ rɛɛ dabang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri gã̀k'ɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Mɔɔ haarɛ nyaa nɛɛ zang kpang, nɔɔ ti basɛ zɔɔ ka yuu nyaa ɓɔɔ Musa dangnɛ bɛɛ kpang. Naa nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ yì nɔɔ naa ɓi ka bii kpang, ti nwang nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang.
56003010	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu basɛ teteng zang, shaarɛ wu nyaa doo ziti kɔ nwani. Ka knti weɓe, ruu ɓaaɓɛ wu hãa tɔ̀'ɔ kagn nɛɛ wu kpang.
56003011	Mɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, zɔ̃ng zang keɓe, yaa gbalang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ti yi tìng ɓi kaa nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, dɔng wu ruu tɔ, nɛɛ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang.
56003012	N nɛɛ shong Aratima kpang, n shong Tikiku ditɔ ka bii ɓaaɓɛ. Nɛɛ a tɔ, mɔɔ palɛ pati mɔɔ a ka bii mɛɛ ka gari Nikopoli. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n tɔɔ, laa pũngku keɓe n nwang lɛɛ ka nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
56003013	Yi Apolo nɛɛ Zeena yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zi nyaa dannang dɔli naa ka bii ri yupaa zanti ɓarɛ daanang. Mɔɔ yi ri naa kagn ri walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nandon.
56003014	Zang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang, tɔ̀ɔ, ri yi zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang naa jong ka bii. Ri nwàng nwannang waati kpang.
56003015	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ n, ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa. Mɔɔ jèe ruu wusang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ nyaa. Laa wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon.
57001001	Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ, nkɔ Bulu, ɓɔɔ zang mã m ka sãa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n pàl'ɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi shoonang ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ Timoti ɓɔɔ nwang kaa naa jaanaa ɓuru ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing nɛɛ wu gbete ɓɛɛ. Ruu bee Filimon wusang shoonang ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ mɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ.
57001002	Ruu bee mɔɔ labeenang keɓe, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri kp'alɛ̀ yuu ka gãa ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ kaa m'an'a ɓuru Afiya nɛɛ Akibu ɓɔɔ pàl'ɛ Laa doo shoonang kɔ naa rukɔ ɓɛɛ.
57001003	N gaa Daa ɓuru Laa nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ri pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ri shingnɛ, nɔɔ tãa tìnang, nɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ.
57001004	Filimon, n zãa Laa mɛɛ diki diki ka ruu ɓaaɓɛ, n nɛɛ ɓaa nung ɓaaɓɛ tɔ, ka ɓɔɔ n gaa Laa ɓɛɛ.
57001005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n tãa nyaa danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ɓɔɔ ti naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kàsɛ̀ rɛɛ zang Laa ɓɛɛ.
57001006	N gaa Laa nɛɛ mɔɔ yi tìng ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ. Laa wu ti tusu mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka yeti tɔ̃ɔ piti, ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu zang Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
57001007	Masang, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ zang ɓɛɛ, shing m tɔ, n tãa tìnang, ti mã m danggn tɔ gbãnggbãng. Mɔɔ ti shing tɔ yeti zang Laa valɛ tɔ.
57001008	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ka wee mɔɔ nwàng kaa naa jaanaa mɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓee, n kɔɔ mɔɔ katɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete mɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa palɛnang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
57001009	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kasɛ zɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, n gaa mɔɔ katɔ kɔ jong. N gaa mɔɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ n m zang nyaa shoonang Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ, a zang ti mã m ka sãa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
57001010	N gaa mɔɔ ka ruu Onesimu ɓɔɔ nwang kaa naa jaa mɛɛ, ka wee zang mã m ka sãa ɓee.
57001011	Bɛɛ ɓeleng nw'ang naa vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ ka bii ɓaaɓɛ, kãntang keɓe raa zang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ka bii mɛɛ nɛɛ bii ɓaaɓɛ.
57001012	Wee n dɔ̃ mɔɔ wu ɓee, nwang naa ɓɔɔ n dɔ̃ mɔɔ suru bii mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
57001013	Bɛɛ n kasɛ n tɔɔ wu nwang nɛɛ n ka nihn, wu pàlɛ̀ m shoonang ka nung ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ pàlɛ̀ m ɓɛɛ. Ka wee n nwang ka sãa ka ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ n kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ ɓee.
57001014	A n kasɛ kaa tɔ̀'ɔ n palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ nyaa kagn kpang kpang. N kasɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ pàl'ɛ m, wu nwang nɛɛ yeti ɓaaɓɛ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ nwang naa zang shing mɔɔ nɛɛ gbãnggbãng ning, mɔɔ p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
57001015	Vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ y'aa zɔɔ ka gbongkarɛ tɔkɔlɔng ɓɛɛ kɔ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa nwang ɓɔɔ ɓaaɓɛ kaa tɔkn dondong.
57001016	Kãntang keɓe ɓi tɔ̀'ɔ jaafoo waati kpang, ɓa jaafoo ɓi kaatɔ. Ɓi kaa manzung ɓuru ka gbalang Yeesɔ Kirisi. Ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ka bii mɛɛ. Nwǎng mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ditɔ jong gbãnggbãng, wu naa jaafoo kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, naa ɓaazung ka gbalang Kpanti ɓuru.
57001017	Mɔɔ nɛɛ zi m nɛɛ, n ɓaasang ka ruu Kirisi, ta Onesimu naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ nɛɛ tà m ɓɛɛ.
57001018	Nɛɛ palɛ mɔɔ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn, naa mɔɔ nɛɛ dũng wu nyaa k'ɔp'ɔ, nkɔ shurɛ.
57001019	Vuu keɓe n bèe nɛɛ naa mɛɛ. Nkɔ Bulu n shurɛ. Danggn wu ning mɔɔ kpang, n dũng mɔɔ suru bii ɓaaɓɛ.
57001020	Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ mɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, n gaa Laa, mɔɔ palɛ m tɔ̃ɔ keɓe jong, ka ruu kpanti ɓuru. Shing m yeti mɛɛ wu valɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ manzung ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ.
57001021	N zi tɔ, mɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ mɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ. Mɔɔ ti palɛ ɓa katɔ.
57001022	Shìli m yeti gãa katɔ gbete, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n shing gn mɔ̀ɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ Laa kàs'ɛ nɔɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaa wu katɔ. Wu a nɔɔ n tɔkn.
57001023	Epafara, masang ɓɔɔ zang mã m nɛɛ wu ka ruu Kirisi ɓɛɛ, jee mɔɔ nyaa.
57001024	Maraku, nɛɛ Arisitaku, nɛɛ Dema, nɛɛ Luka zang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ shoonang nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa jong.
57001025	N gaa Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, wu p'alɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon.
58001001	Ka tìng, Laa rang yee nɛɛ rɛɛ dabang ɓuru nɛɛ nyaa rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ doo dɔli, a ka gbalang naabm naabm.
58001002	A ka doo knti keɓe, Laa rang ruu yee ɓi kaa nɛɛ nyaa Jaa ɓiɓɛ. Jaa keɓe, Laa zɔ̃ng wu nɛɛ vuu piti wu naa nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ, a Laa mãa koo nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
58001003	Jaa keɓe, nɔng yakɛnang bannang Laa kagn bii ɓiɓɛ. Rùu ti zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa nwàng ɓɛɛ, ka bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete. Wukɔ ti yiti koo nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ruu ɓiɓɛ. Ka knti ɓɔɔ wu sɔɔ zang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ, daa nwàng ka nɔng nwannang ɓiɓɛ ka lapa, ka nakn Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58001004	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, bannang Jaa Laa ɓa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa kati, naa ɓɔɔ nung ɓɔɔ Laa a wu, ti ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
58001005	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔ̀ɔ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɔɔ gbete gngn kpang nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Jaa mɛɛ lɛɛkɔ n tusu tɔ nɛɛ n Daa ɓaaɓɛ”. Ti kɔ̀ɔ kpang tɔkn nɛɛ “N nwang daa ɓiɓɛ a wu nwang ɓi kaa Jaa mɛɛ”
58001006	A kɔɔ tɔkn, ka ɓɔɔ Laa nwangsɛ jamari ɓiɓɛ ka koo, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa nandon ri bang wu ta”
58001007	Ka ɓɔɔ Laa rang yee ka yuu rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Rìs'i rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa katɔ, ri nwang jasung, a ti rìs'i zang ɓɔɔ ri pàl'ɛ wu shoonang ri nwang nyɛlɛ waa.”
58001008	Ka yuu Jaa ɓiɓɛ, Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Mɔkɔ Laa, kpanti roonang ɓaaɓɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ gbinggbing ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ teetee, wukɔ nwang laa naa yitinang, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ roo kpanti nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
58001009	Mɔɔ kasɛ ɓaa nɛɛ zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa, mɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ shi kpang ɓaa katɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nkɔ Laa, ɓɔɔ n Là'a ɓaaɓɛ, n shing mɔɔ ka yuu rɛɛ sangvaa ɓaaɓɛ ka ɓɔɔ n nwàa mɔɔ nung, ɓɔɔ shing mɔɔ mɔɔ tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ.”
58001010	A ti kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “Kpanti, mɔkɔ loo doo koo keɓe ka tìng, a mɔkɔ ti mãa lapa nɛɛ naa ɓaaɓɛ.
58001011	Ri làs'ɛ katɔ nandon, a mɔɔ nwàng ɓaa dondong. Ri kà'a katɔ naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ diki ɓiɓɛ bee tɔ ɓɛɛ.
58001012	Mɔɔ leng ri katɔ naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ, zang kõ̀s'ɔ ri katɔ naa ɓɔɔ zang kɔ̃sɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. A mɔɔ nwang ɓaa n'ɔngkɔ̀ diki diki, a saa ɓaaɓɛ ti waa nyaa ɓi kpang.”
58001013	Laa kɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa gbete gngn kpang nɛɛ, “Nwang ka nakn mɛɛ ka gbongkarɛ. 'N risi zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ mɔɔ kpang, ri nwang laa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ naa doo kagn ɓɛɛ” kpang.
58001014	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri pàl'ɛ Laa shoonang ɓɛɛ waati. Laa shong ri, nɛɛ ri yi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu naa ta yuu ɓarɛ naa ka bii.
58002001	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu shing nɔɔ jìng gbãnggbãng ka vuu ɓɔɔ ruu tãarɛ ɓɛɛ, vuu keɓe nɛɛ wɔ̀ ruu nɛɛ naa kpang ɓɛɛ.
58002002	Naa r'uu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa kɔɔyi, nwang tɔ nɔngkɔ nizang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tà kpang, nɛɛ ti dñ̀ng kpang, zang dang wu jìng katɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58002003	A naa ruu shing jìng gbãnggbãng ka ruu naa ɓɔɔ zang ta yuu zang, ɓɔɔ bang katɔ naa weɓe kpang, ruu wɔ biya? Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi Kpanti Yeesɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, wukɔ gaayu ruu keɓe kɔɔnang ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ ri tãayi, rikɔ tusu ruu nɛɛ ruu keɓe nizang kɔ nwani.
58002004	Laa ti tusu jong nɛɛ ruu keɓe nizang naa ɓɔɔ ri tusu ɓɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ. A ti basɛ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Suru ɓiɓɛ a zang ka naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
58002005	Laa shing wu zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ri roo kpanti ka koo ɓɔɔ wu naa mãa ɓɛɛ kpang. Koo kɔ ruu rang yee ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee.
58002006	A zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ kagn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ, ka yeti labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Shɔnzang ɓu viya? a mɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ wiya? A jaa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ gãng jìng ka wu ɓɛɛ, ɓu viya?
58002007	Mɔɔ shing wu, zang nyaa shoonang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ri ɓa wu, a diki bee kaa tɔ̀'ɔ dɔli kpang. A mɔɔ a wu bannang nɛɛ dɔɔnang,
58002008	a mɔɔ shing vuu piti ka naa ɓiɓɛ.”  Ka wee Laa shing vuu piti ka naa ɓiɓɛ ɓee, Laa yaa vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ ka naa ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. A kãntang keɓe, ruu zi gn mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ vuu piti ka naa ɓiɓɛ kɔ kpang.
58002009	A ruu zirɛ, Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ zang sh'ing wu zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ri ɓ'a wu, a diki bee kaa takpang ɓee, zang a wu bannang nɛɛ dɔɔnang ka ruu jìng ɓɔɔ wu dangnɛ a vɔrɛ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe piti ɓi ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ zang ɓɛɛ, shingnɛ Yeesɔ tãa naa ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ nwang ɓɛɛ ka nung zang piti.
58002010	Daa naa katɔ, Laa ɓɔɔ vuu piti nwang ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ, a wukɔ ti mãa vuu piti ɓɛɛ, wu shing Yeesɔ wu nwang nyaa kiiri nɛɛ jìng ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu atɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ri walɛ bannang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔ sɔɔ ri tìng, zang daa ta yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
58002011	Zang ɓɔɔ shingnɛ zang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang shing ri ri nwàng zang tɔ̃ɔ piti, Daa ɓarɛ gbete. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu Yeesɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa ri nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓeezung ɓɛɛ kpang.
58002012	Kɔɔ Laa tɔɔ, “N kɔɔ rɛɛ manzung ruu bannang ɓaaɓɛ. N g'aa soo, n dɔɔ mɔɔ ka tìng zang dɔli, ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ, ri bang mɔɔ ɓɛɛ”.
58002013	A ti kɔ̀ɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “N shing gn ka bii Laa” a kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ “Wee n ɓee nɛɛ wujɛ ɓɔɔ Laa a m ri ɓɛɛ”
58002014	Wee wujɛ bì'i ri ta bii shɔnzang ɓee, a tuu bii jong nɔngkɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu vɔrɛ, wu ningsi sheetang kati. Zang ɓɔɔ zang a wukɔ naa vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
58002015	A Yeesɔ yaa zang naa, zang ɓɔɔ ɓu doo ɓɔɔ ri nwangnɛ ɓɛɛ, ri nwang ɓarɛ naa jaafoo ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kaa vɔrɔ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
58002016	Nizang, Yeesɔ yi wu rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa naa ka bii kpang ɓɛɛ, “Yi ɓi rɛɛ zɔ̃ng Ibirayi naa ka bii”.
58002017	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wu nwang naa rɛɛ ɓeezung kɔ gbãnggbãng ka vuu piti, tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kati. Ɓɔɔ gn zang kɔng wu katɔ, a ti zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ka shoonang ɓɔɔ wu pàl'ɛ Laa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu a zang yuu ɓiɓɛ, zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, vuu keɓe wu shingnɛ, Laa wu kɔsɔ zang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati.
58002018	A wee Yeesɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ dang jìng tɔ, a zang ti gãsɛ wu tɔ ɓee, zunung ɓɔɔ wu yi zang ɓɔɔ zang gã̀s'ɛ ri kãntang naa katɔ ka bii.
58003001	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung ɓɔɔ nɔɔ doo zang Laa kɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa tɔ jong ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ shing rɛ̃rɛnang manɛ ka bii Yeesɔ, ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang shoonang nɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɔ̀'ɔ danggn kɔ ruu shing ɓee.
58003002	Yeesɔ nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng wu ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ Musa nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka shoonang ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ̀ zang Laa nandon ɓɛɛ.
58003003	A zang zirɛ, Yeesɔ daa ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang ɓa ɓɔɔ Musa katɔ tɔ. Naa ɓɔɔ bannang ɓɔɔ zang a zang ɓɔɔ mãa gãa ɓa ɓɔɔ gãa ɓɔɔ wu mãayi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58003004	Nizang, gãa piti zang ɓɔɔ mãayi kagn, a ɓi kaa Laa kɔ mãa vuu piti.
58003005	Musa nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ka gãa Laa nandon ka shoonang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu kɔɔ ruu kaa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ Laa naa kɔɔ ka tìng ɓɛɛ. A wu ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ shoonang waati.
58003006	A Yeesɔ nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ zang shing gn katɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka Gãa Laa nandon, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi Jaa ɓɛɛ. Rukɔ Gãa keɓe, ruu nɛɛ yiti danggn ɓɔɔ ruu mãrɛ gbãnggbãng, nɛɛ gn ɓɔɔ ruu shingnɛ kɔ, ruu dɔɔ bii nɛɛ mani ɓee.
58003007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, “Naa nɔɔ tãa yee Laa lɛɛkɔ,
58003008	nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ shoo ɓaanang kpang, naa ɓɔɔ zang p'al'ɛ ka ɓɔɔ ri lasɛ Laa yeti ɓɛɛ. Ka ɓɔɔ ri gãsɛ wu ka jìngti ɓɛɛ.
58003009	Ka ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang manɛ ri gãsɛ m, a ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ n p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ, saa laa ziti ɓɛɛ.
58003010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yeti mɛɛ lasɛ nɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang kaɓa. A n kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Zang keɓe ri ɓaa shoo ka yee mɛɛ kpang diki diki. A ri dũng nyaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n dang ɓɛɛ kpang.’
58003011	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, gnvɔ shaa m, a n tũng vuu, n tɔɔ, ‘Ri àr'ɛ, ri ɔ̃sɔ nɛɛ n ka nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n kagn kpang dondong.’”
58003012	Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ palɛ waasɛ̃, zang gbete ka teteng manɛ, nɛɛ t'a yeti ɓɔɔ vuu shi kpang kagn, a ti shing danggn ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ, yeti ɓɔɔ shing wu wu ràa Laa ɓɔɔ ningkãari yuu knti ɓɛɛ.
58003013	Nɔɔ mã zɔɔ danggn katɔ kɔ jong diki diki, tɔɔ vuu shi kpang wu shing zang ɓɔɔ kaa tɔ̀'ɔ ka teteng manɛ wu taarɛ yuu kpang, ka laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ doo ningkãari kɔ, zang ɓaa nɛɛ “Lɛɛkɔ” ɓee.
58003014	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓuru kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ vuu ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu nɛɛ yaa gn ɓɔɔ ruu gaayu, ruu shingnɛ kpang, diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa wu a nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
58003015	Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Naa nɔɔ tãa yee ɓiɓɛ lɛɛkɔ nɔɔ taarɛ yuu manɛ kpang naa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka ɓɔɔ ri lasɛ Laa yeti ɓɛɛ”.
58003016	Ɓu rɛɛ wi, ri tãa yee Laa, a ri lasɛ wu yeti wiya? Ɓi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Musa nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ Masar kɔ nandon.
58003017	A gnvɔ shàa Laa nɛɛ rɛɛ wi, saa laa ziti wiya? Ɓi doo zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ri vɔlɔ ka jìngti ɓɛɛ.
58003018	Laa tũng rɛɛ wi vuu nɛɛ ri a nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang ɓiɓɛ kpang wiya? Ɓi doo zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
58003019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu zirɛ nɛɛ ri daa ɔ̃sɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn kpang ɓɛɛ.
58004001	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wee nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa arɛ ka yuu daanang ka nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang ɓiɓɛ doo kagn ɓee, ruu palɛ waasɛ̃ zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓuru nɛ̀'ɛ daa nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang kaɓa kpang.
58004002	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kɔɔ ruu Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa tɔ jong, naa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ ri ɓɛɛ. A ruu ɓɔɔ ri tãayi nwàng ri vuu ɓɔɔ kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri tãayi, ri shing danggn kpang ɓɛɛ.
58004003	Rùu ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn tɔ ɓɛɛ, rùu daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa kagn ruu ɔ̃sɔ nɛɛ wu. Naa ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “A n tũng vuu ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ gnvɔ shàa m ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, ‘Ri daa nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang mɛɛ kpang dondong.’”  A kɔɔ ruu keɓe, bɛɛ hangsɛ shoonang ɓiɓɛ tɔ, doo ka ɓɔɔ wu mãa koo ɓɛɛ.
58004004	Zang kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ kagn, ka yeti labeenang Laa ka yuu diki manziti nɛɛ, “A ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa manziti, Laa ɔ̃sɔ ka shoonang ɓɔɔ wu p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ nandon.”
58004005	Zang kɔ̀ɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “Ri daa nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang mɛɛ kpang dondong.”
58004006	A zang yàa kaa zang ɓɔɔ gbalang nɛɛ ri daa ɔ̃sɔ nɛɛ Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ rikɔ tãa Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa shɔɔnang, ri daa ɔ̃sɔ nɛɛ Laa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri shing danggn kpang ɓɛɛ.
58004007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, Laa shing diki ɓɔɔgn tɔkn ɓɔɔ ɓaayi nɛɛ, “Lɛɛkɔ”. Saa naa ɓa tɔ dɔli, Laa naa kɔɔ ruu ka yuu diki keɓe nɛɛ nyaa Dawuda. Ruu ɓɔɔ ruu bee nɔɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Naa nɔɔ tãa yee ɓiɓɛ lɛɛkɔ, nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ shoo ɓaanang kpang”.
58004008	Naa Joshuwa nɛ̀'ɛ daa katɔ, a zang nɛɛ ti daa ka nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang Laa katɔ, Laa nɛɛ rang yee nɛɛ knti ka yuu diki ɓɔɔgn kpang.
58004009	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang Laa ri ɔ̃sɔ ditɔ naa ɓɔɔ ka lee ɓɔɔ diki daa manziti ɓɔɔ Laa ɔ̃sɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
58004010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ daa nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang Laa tɔ, ɔ̃sɔ ɓi tɔ jong ka shoonang ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔɔ Laa ɔ̃sɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu hangsɛ shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
58004011	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zunung katɔ ɓɛɛ, ruu daa nɔɔ nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang kaɓa. Zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓuru wu ta nyaa Laa naa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, a ri daa nɔng ɔ̃sɔnang Laa kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
58004012	Ruu Laa palɛ shoonang katɔ. Wɔng nyaa ɓa yere bang ɓɔɔ nyaa ziti katɔ. Basɛ suru bii katɔ nɛɛ suru. Wu ti basɛ rɛɛ gboko nɛɛ sɛ̃ɛting kaka. Ti dɔng ruu katɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang mang ka yeti ɓɛɛ.
58004013	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãayi kagn gbete, ɓɔɔ waayi, Laa zi wu kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. Vuu piti ɓi ka dalɛ, zang larɛ ri ɓi katɔ ka jìng Laa ɓɔɔ ruu naa shii ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ruu kɔɔ wu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
58004014	Wee kpànt'i zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ ɓuru kagn, ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang dɔli ɓee. Kpanti keɓe wukɔ Yeesɔ Jaa Laa, ɓɔɔ daa tɔ ka lapa ɓee. R'uu yiti nɔɔ danggn, ɓɔɔ ruu shingnɛ, rùu kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ keɓe gbãnggbãng.
58004015	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ ɓuru, gn ɓuru kɔng wu katɔ, ka ɓɔɔ ruu lakɛ naa ka bii kpang ɓɛɛ. Kpanti ɓuru keɓe ɓi zang ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ wu katɔ ka gbalang n'aabm̀ n'aabm̀, naa ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ ruu ɓɛɛ. A palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi kaa takpang.
58004016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, r'uu a ka bii Laa, ruu yaa gn naa kpang. Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ waati ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, gn ɓuru wu kɔng wu, wu ti palɛ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ yi ruu naa ka bii, ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ nɛɛ wu yi ruu naa ka bii ɓɛɛ.
58005001	Zang z'ɔ̃ng kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓu, ka teteng rɛɛ shɔnzang. Ri shing wu nɛɛ wu pàlɛ̀ Laa shoonang ka nung ɓarɛ, wu ti dɔ̀ɔ Laa vuu, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu kɔsɔ zang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati.
58005002	Zunung ɓɔɔ wu pàl'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu kpang, a ri ning gbalang kati ɓɛɛ, hakaka kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
58005003	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, dɔ̀ɔr'ɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang zang dɔli.
58005004	Shɔnzang a yuu ɓiɓɛ, bannang nwannang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ Laa vuu ka Gãa Laa kpang. Laa ɓaa wu nyaa katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa Haruna nyaa ɓɛɛ.
58005005	Kirisi doo nɔngkɔ, wu wukɔ a yuu ɓiɓɛ bannang nwannang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi Laa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ Jaa mɛɛ, lɛɛkɔ n tusu tɔ, nɛɛ n Daa ɓaaɓɛ”
58005006	A ti kɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa dondong, naa ɓɔɔ Malakisadak nw'ang ɓɛɛ.”
58005007	Ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nw'ang ka koo keɓe, rangkɛ yee nɛɛ Laa a gaarɛ wu, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nɛɛ miiri ka jìng. Gaa Laa ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ ta yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ, wu vɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. A Laa tãa wu ka ɓɔɔ wisi wu paa nɛɛ saa ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, a ti a Laa yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58005008	Naa wee wu Jaa ɓee, kpɛ̃ɛrɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu dũng nyaa Laa doo nɛɛ mani ka jìng ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ.
58005009	Ka ɓɔɔ hangsɛ shoonang ɓiɓɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ, nwang zang ɓɔɔ ta yuu zang nandon, ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, yuu ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ zang tarɛ, wu nwang kaa ɓɔɔ gbinggbing ɓɛɛ.
58005010	A Laa shing Yeesɔ nɛɛ wu nwang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, naa ɓɔɔ Malakisadak nw'ang ɓɛɛ.
58005011	Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ ka yuu vuu keɓe kagn dɔli, a kpãa ruu nyaa kaa naa ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ zi kati ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ valɛ bii vuu mantɛnang dɔli ɓɛɛ.
58005012	Nizang, kãntang keɓe nɔkɔ nɛɛ tusu zang vuu kati, a nɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu paasɛ nɔɔ ruu nizang ɓɔɔ kpãa kpang, ɓɔɔ ka ruu Laa ɓɛɛ tusunang tɔkn. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, zang wu a nɔɔ m'ii, wu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lakɛ katɔ kpang.
58005013	Zang ɓɔɔ vuu shaanang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ɓi m'ii, zang keɓe ɓi doo jaa rɛ̃ɛting. Zang keɓe zunung ɓɔɔ wu basɛ teteng vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang kpàng.
58005014	Vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ lakɛ katɔ ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng bii tɔ ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kpɛ̃ɛrɛ yuu ɓarɛ tɔ diki diki, naa ɓɔɔ ri bàs'ɛ teteng vuu tɔ̃ɔ, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
58006001	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu ɓa nɔɔ vuu tìng shɔɔnang ɓɔɔ zang tusu ruu ka yuu Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ruu kpɛ̃ɛrɛ kaa vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa katɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu zũng danggn kati. Ruu gàa nɔɔ yuu tusunang tɔkn nɛɛ, zang ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, zang yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓɔɔ raa zang vɔrɔ, zang ri shing danggn ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ kpang.
58006002	Nɛɛ vuu tusunang, ka yuu batizima, nɛɛ naa shinnang ka yuu zang, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang wisi zang paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang, ka ɓɔɔ koo naa waa nyaa ɓɛɛ.
58006003	Rùu zi rɛɛ vuu keɓe ɓi tɔ, r'uu ɓa ri, ruu daa kaa tìng. Laa nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
58006004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ ri a tɔ kagn ri zi gbalang Laa tɔ, Laa ti a ri vuu ɓɔɔ wu a zang nɛɛ lapa tɔ, a ri ti walɛ Suru Laa tɔ jong,
58006005	ri ti tãa tɔ̃ɔ Ruu Laa tɔ, a ri ti zi naa ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang koo ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ nwang ɓɛɛ tɔ.
58006006	Naa ri yaa gbalang Laa doo nɛɛ mani, naa zang tɔɔ zang s'ɔɔrɔ̀ ri tɔkn, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, zang zunung takpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwang naa ri ɓaa Jaa Laa naa kaa laa tɔkn, a ri shingnɛ, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu, ka jìng zang piti ɓɛɛ.
58006007	Tipi ɓɔɔ ɓoo mii lapa, ɓɔɔ a ka yuu ɓiɓɛ diki diki, a pàl'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri lang wu, vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zang kɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ, Laa pàl'ɛ tipi keɓe tɔ̃ɔ.
58006008	A tipi keɓe naa ɓi kɔkɔ nɛɛ wusi kɔ takɛ kagn shɛ̃ɛning, vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ mani kpang. Zang ku tipi keɓe nyaa katɔ, a zang naa dɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ waa. Laa palɛ doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu alɛ ri rɛɛ vuu keɓe, ri nɛɛ bɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang ɓiɓɛ katɔ.
58006009	Masang ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, naa ruu ràng yee doo nɔngkɔ, ruu zi tɔ, ɓɔɔ manɛ, nɔɔ shìi manɛ ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, Laa ta yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
58006010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu gn dang gbete kpang, danggn ning wu shoonang manɛ kpang. Nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tusu nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ wu katɔ, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi zang ɓiɓɛ naa ka bii, a nɔɔ ti yi ri doo naa ɓɛɛ.
58006011	Rùu kasɛ zang ɓu ka teteng manɛ wu shing yuu kagn, diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa wu a nɛɛ mani. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing gn kagn ɓɛɛ kati.
58006012	Ruu kasɛ, nɔɔ si rang kpang, nɔɔ màsɛ̀ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shingnɛ, nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ ri mã ɓɛɛ, rikɔ naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa ɓɛɛ.
58006013	Ka ɓɔɔ Laa a Ibirayi nyaa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ɓa Laa katɔ kagn kpang, Laa tũng vuu nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ.
58006014	Kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nizang, n shing mɔɔ m'ɔɔ tãa tìnang, n a mɔɔ zɔ̃ng dɔli.”
58006015	A ka knti ɓɔɔ Ibirayi mã danggn, gã tɔ, Laa a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu a wu nyaa ɓɛɛ.
58006016	Shɔnzang ri tũng vuu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ɓa ri katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu tũnnang kɔ shingnɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛɛ, wu nwang nizang. Wu shingnɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ zang là'a ɓɛɛ wu di nyaa.
58006017	Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu shingnɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ta nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a keɓe ri zirɛ, nɛɛ wu kɔ̃sɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ ɓi kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, tũng vuu tɔ̀ɔ, wu tusu kati nɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa, wu naa palɛ katɔ.
58006018	Vuu keɓe ziti, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tũng, nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ wu a ɓɛɛ, ri kɔ̃sɔ kpang, a Laa ti suu sè'e ka yuu ɓarɛ kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rùu ɓɔɔ rùu yurɛ, ruu walɛ nɔng waanang, zang mã ruu danggn gbãnggbãng nɛɛ ruu yiti gn vuu ɓɔɔ zang shing ruu ka tìng keɓe gbatagbata.
58006019	Gn ɓɔɔ ruu shing keɓe kɔ yiti ruu gbatagbata, vuu ɓɔɔ lee ruu naa ka bii kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu dàa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa kagn. Ruu ɓa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang ku nyaa gãa Nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang, nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
58006020	Nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔ daa tìng shɔɔnang, ka nung ɓɔɔ ruu nɛɛ dàa ɓɛɛ. Ka knti ɓɔɔ nwang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa tɔ dondong, naa ɓɔɔ Malakisadak nwang ɓɛɛ.
58007001	Malakisadak keɓe, bɛɛ wukɔ kpanti nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Salama ɓɛɛ, a ti zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti ɓɛɛ. Kpisi Ibirayi yuu, ka ɓɔɔ Ibirayi gbãayu nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ wu shaa rɛɛ kpanti ka sìiri ɓɛɛ, a gàa Ibirayi Laa nɛɛ Laa shingnɛ Ibirayi wu tãa tìnang.
58007002	A Ibirayi basɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu see ka nyaa sìiri vaa kopi a a wu vaa gbete. Dìiri nung Malakisadak ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang ɓi, “Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ” a ɓɔɔ kaa “Kpanti Salama” ɓi kaa “Kpanti ɓɔɔ shingnɛ zang ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
58007003	Daa ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang, nà'a ɓiɓɛ ti kpang, zang zi dìiri zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ kpang. Zang ti zi diki ɓɔɔ zang yi wu kagn ɓɛɛ kpang, a ɓɔɔ diki ɓɔɔ wu vɔ kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Nw'ang ɓi naa Jaa Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ Laa vuu ɓɛɛ dondong.
58007004	Nɔɔ zi bannang Malakisadak karɛ. Ibirayi dabang dabang ɓuru, basɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu ta ka nyaa sìiri vàa kopi, a a wu vàa gbete.
58007005	Nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔyi tɔ, zɔ̃ng Leevi ɓɔɔ ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri ta vaa gbete, ka teteng vuu zang ɓɔɔ zang basɛ vàa kopi ɓɛɛ. Zang Leevi keɓe, ɓi rɛɛ ɓeezung, ka wee rɛɛ ɓeezung bii, ri doo zɔ̃ng Ibirayi kɔ ɓee.
58007006	Yɔɔ keɓe dñ̀ng dìiri zɔ̃ng ɓiɓɛ ka zɔ̃ng Leevi kpang, a ta vuu vàa gbete keɓe doo nɛɛ mani ka naa Ibirayi, a gàa wu Laa nɛɛ Laa wu shingnɛ wu tãa tìnang. Ibirayi ɓɔɔ Laa a wu nyaa ɓɛɛ.
58007007	Wu vuu nyaa laanang kpang, zang ɓɔɔ gaa Laa, wukɔ zang bang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ zang gaa wu Laa nɛɛ Laa pàlɛ̀ wu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
58007008	Zang Leevi ɓɔɔ ri ta vuu vàa gbete keɓe, ri ɓarɛ shɔnzang ɓɔɔ ri vɔ̀l'ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. A Malakisadak ɓɔɔ ta vuu vàa gbete, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ɓi doo ningkãari, naa ɓɔɔ labeenang Laa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ.
58007009	Zang kɔ̀'ɔ katɔ nɛɛ, Leevi ɓɔɔ t'a vuu vaa gbete keɓe, wukɔ a vuu keɓe kaa jong nɛɛ bii Ibirayi.
58007010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka ɓɔɔ Malakisadak kpisi Ibirayi yuu bɛɛ Leevi doo ka sãng dabang dabang ɓiɓɛ Ibirayi ɓɛɛ.
58007011	Laa a zang Isirela nyaa dannang ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zɔ̃ng Leevi rikɔ dɔɔ Laa vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. A shoonang zɔ̃ng Leevi zunung ɓɔɔ kɔsɔ zang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɛɛ kaa takpang. Naa nɛɛ zunung katɔ, Laa nɛɛ shong Yeesɔ takpang. Yeesɔ ɓi zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa naa Malakisadak, ɓi ka zɔ̃ng Haruna kpang.
58007012	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang nɛɛ kɔ̃sɔ zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa tɔ, zang kɔ̃sɔ nyaa dannang kaa doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
58007013	Yeesɔ kɔ zang kɔɔrɔ ruu keɓe ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓee, ɓi ka zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔgn. Zang gbete ka zɔ̃ng kaɓa dɔ̀ɔ Laa vuu ɓi gngn doo gbete kpang.
58007014	Zang zi tɔ piti nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ nw'ang ɓi nɛɛ zɔ̃ng Yahuda. Musa kɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ katɔ ka yuu zɔ̃ng zang keɓe, nɛɛ zang gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ naa nwang zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kpang. Ka ɓɔɔ wu rang yee ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ Laa vuu ɓɛɛ.
58007015	Vuu kɔ ruu kɔɔ ɓee, nw'angs'ɛ bii tɔ kaa biling tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka wee Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ dɔɔ Laa vuu, nwang nyaa tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Malakisadak nwang ɓɛɛ.
58007016	Nwang tɔ zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ Laa vuu ka Gãa Laa, wu ka doo vuu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri tusu ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi ka doo naa vuu palɛnang suru bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
58007017	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, labeenang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ ɓ'aa zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ dondong, naa ɓɔɔ Malakisadak nw'ang ɓɛɛ”.
58007018	Nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ tìng, zang kɔsɔ tɔ dang gbete, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang, a ti pàlɛ̀ zang vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
58007019	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa dannang Musa shing vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi jong wu nwang nyaa kiiri kpang ɓɛɛ. A kãntang keɓe, Laa atɛ vuu ɓɔɔ waasɛ̃ tɔ, ɓɔɔ ri sh'ing gn kagn ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu a kaa bii ɓiɓɛ naabm.
58007020	Laa tũng vuu kagn. Ka ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng zang Leevi ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, zang tũng vuu kagn kpang.
58007021	A Yeesɔ nwang zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ka ɓɔɔ Laa tũng vuu ɓɛɛ, Laa kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Kpanti Laa tũng vuu tɔ, kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ takpang. ‘Mɔɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa dondong.’”
58007022	Ka ruu vuu kɔ Laa tũng ɓee kɔ, Yeesɔ nwang kaa zang ɓɔɔ shingnɛ Laa mã ruu nyaa ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ tìng katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58007023	Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ri ɓarɛ dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ vɔrɔ zãa ri nwannang katɔ, ri dɔɔ Laa vuu dondong kpang.
58007024	A ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwang ɓi ningkãari dondong, nwang zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓi gbinggbing.
58007025	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zunung katɔ, wu ta yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri a ka bii Laa nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ katɔ, ka laa kiya piti. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi ningkãari, diki diki bakɛ Laa ka ruu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
58007026	Zɔ̃ng kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa keɓe, ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang, ɓɔɔ zang dãa wu kpang, ɓɔɔ ɓi kankalang ɓɛɛ, a zang zɔ̃ng katɔ nɛɛ teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, zang shing wu dang gbete, ɓɔɔ zang a wu nɔng nwannang ka lapa kpalakpala.
58007027	Ɓi naa rɛɛ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ shing wu, wu d'ɔɔ vuu diki diki, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ kɔ shɔɔnang, a wu ti naa d'ɔɔ ka ruu vuu shi kpang zang ɓɛɛ kpang. D'ɔɔ vuu ɓi tɔ doo gbete kak, paasɛ takpang, ka ɓɔɔ wu a yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
58007028	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa dannang Musa zɔ̃ng ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang katɔ, ri nwang kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng wu nɛɛ knti, a tũng vuu kagn, zang keɓe, palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi gngn kpang tingkiring.
58008001	Gbãnggbãng ruu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ keɓe. Kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ Laa vuu, ɓɔɔ ɓuru kagn naa weɓe, ɓɔɔ nwang ka nakn laa nwannang Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ bannang piti ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ka lapa.
58008002	A palɛ shoonang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓi kagn kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ, nɔng Laa bannang ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu shɔnzang palɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
58008003	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang zɔ̃ng kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ɓu nɛɛ wu a Laa vuu ɓɔɔ zang alɛ wu, a wu ti dɔɔ ɓɔɔ. Doo nɔngkɔ, daa naa katɔ zang ɓɔɔ dɔɔ Laa vuu keɓe, wu walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a Laa ɓɛɛ jong.
58008004	Naa Yeesɔ nɛɛ ka koo, nɛɛ nwàng zang ɓɔɔ dɔ̀ɔ Laa vuu kpang tingkiring, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri kagn, ɓɔɔ ri a Laa vuu naa ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang zang Yahudawa kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ.
58008005	Ri palɛ shoonang ɓarɛ ka koo, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ ɓi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Nwang ɓi naa jasuru nɔng keɓe ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ka ɓɔɔ Musa bɛɛ nɛɛ wu ɓà'a Laa kaa k'uutu ɓɔɔ zang bang wu kagn ɓɛɛ, Laa shaarɛ wu nyaa tɔɔ, “Shing jìng kagn, mɔɔ palɛ vuu piti ka doo naa ɓɔɔ zang tusu mɔɔ ka yuu kɔpɔ ɓɛɛ.”
58008006	A shoonang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ta keɓe, ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ ɓi katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ shingnɛ Laa mã nɛɛ shɔnzang, ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ gbaala katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a ruu, atɛ zang vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ɓa nyaa gbaala ɓɔɔ wu mã keɓe katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58008007	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa mã tìng shɔɔnang nɛɛ nyaa kiiri, Laa nɛɛ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ wu mã nyaa ɓɔɔgn kpang.
58008008	A Laa zi vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ a kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Diki a kana ɓɔɔ n naa mã nyaa shɔɔ nɛɛ zang Isirela a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang Yahuda.
58008009	Ɓi naa nyaa ɓɔɔ n mã nɛɛ rɛɛ dabang dabang ɓarɛ kpang. Ka diki ɓɔɔ n yi ri ka naa, n nwangsɛ ri nɛɛ tipi Masar ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa kaɓa kɔɔ ri nɛɛ ri palɛ nɛɛ yeti gbete kpang, a n raa ri yuu knti kati.
58008010	Laa ti kɔɔyi tɔɔ, Wee nyaa ɓɔɔ n naa mã nɛɛ zang Isirela ka rɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ kɔ. N naa shǐng ri rɛɛ nyaa dannang mɛɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ a n beere ka ɓoro ɓarɛ. N naa nw'ang Laa ɓarɛ, a ri nwang ɓarɛ kaa zang mɛɛ.
58008011	Zang ɓu tùsù zang gari ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang tipi ɓiɓɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ, ‘Kpɛ̃ɛrɛ gbalang Laa’ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri nandon ri zi gbalang mɛɛ ditɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ yi nɛɛ yuu wujɛ, daa nɔng ka yuu zang bang ɓɛɛ.
58008012	N naa kɔsɔ ri vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ, a ǹ ti kpaa danggn vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ takpang tingkiring”
58008013	Ka ɓɔɔ Laa rang yee, ka yuu nyaa shɔɔ keɓe, risi ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang nwàng kaa ɓɔɔ gbaala. Vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ri gbaala tɔ, nɛɛ kpɛ̃ɛ kana, bɛɛ ning ɓi kaatɔ.
58009001	Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa mã tìng shɔɔnang kaɓa, tusu zang gbalang naa ɓɔɔ zang bang Laa katɔ. A nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang, ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri bang Laa ti kagn ka koo keɓe.
58009002	Zang ɓ'aa k'uutu, a zang basɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ. Ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ waa nyaa biling, zang tɛ̃ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang shìli waa zà'ang sɔɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ teeburu ɓɔ̀'ɔ borodi ɓɔɔ zang a Laa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔng keɓe zang ɓaa nɛɛ “Nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang ɓɛɛ”.
58009003	Yeti k'uutu ɓɔɔ tìng, nɔng ɓɔɔ kagn, zang ku nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ. Zang ɓaa ɓi nɛɛ, “Nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang tingkiring” ɓɛɛ.
58009004	Ka nihn, zang shing vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya, zang dɔ̀'ɔ Laa vuu ɓɔɔ pũngku sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ akpaati ɓɔɔ zang shing nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa mã ɓɛɛ. Zang zuu bii akpaati keɓe dɔ̃ɔ gbete nɛɛ zinariya. Ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, zang shing ɓari ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya, a zang tɛ̃ɛ vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Maanaa ka yeti ɓiɓɛ. A zang shing ɓɔɔ laa naa yitinang Haruna ɓɔɔ lusu katɔ ɓɛɛ, a rɛɛ tari pɛkɛtɛ ɓɔɔ Laa b'eer'e nyaa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ kagn.
58009005	Ka yuu akpaati bì'i, zang palɛ jasuru zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ziti, nasãng ɓarɛ kagn. Vuu keɓe ri tusu bannang Laa. Ri wàa putali kaa yuu nyaa kunang akpaati nɛɛ nasãng ɓarɛ. Vuu nyaa kunang akpaati keɓe, zang ɓaa nɛɛ, “Nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa kɔsɔ vuu shi kpang kagn ɓɛɛ.” Ruu kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ ruu gn dɔli ka yuu rɛɛ vuu keɓe kãntang kpang.
58009006	Zang nɛɛ shìli vuu keɓe tɔ nandon naa weɓe, rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ri daarɛ kaa yeti k'uutu ɓɔɔ biling, ri palɛ shoonang ɓarɛ diki diki.
58009007	A ɓi kaa kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa kɔ daa yeti nɔng ɓɔɔ tìng ka bm, ti daa ɓi doo gbete kɔ nwani ka saa gbete. Daa naa waati kpang, tuu zìi vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang yee ɓɛɛ ka naa ning, ɓɔɔ wu a Laa ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ka ruu rɛɛ vuu shi kpang zang, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ, ri zi kpang ɓɛɛ.
58009008	Suru Laa tusu zang nɛɛ naa k'uutu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri palɛ, nɛɛ doo ka nɔng, gbalang ɓɔɔ zang daa nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang, puu gn kpang tingkiring.
58009009	Zang tusu ɓi zang koo jaa knti vuu nɛɛ vuu keɓe. Zang tusu ri nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang a Laa, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ ɓɛɛ, shingnɛ rɛ̃rɛnang zang ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa, wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ kpang.
58009010	Rɛɛ vuu keɓe, ɓi ka yuu vuu shaanang nɛɛ vuu ɓoonang nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu sɔ̀ɔrɔ̀nang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Wee ɓi nyaa dannang ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka bii biling kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, tɔ̀ɔ laa ɓɔɔ Laa naa kɔ̃sɔ vuu piti, wu a nɛɛ mani.
58009011	A wee Kirisi a ɓi tɔ, wukɔ kaa kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ka yuu rɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ kaa nihn kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. K'uutu ɓɔɔ Kirisi palɛ shoonang ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, ɓa weɓe katɔ, a ɓi ti nyaa kiiri. Ɓi shɔnzang palɛ kpang, a ɓi ti ka koo keɓe kpang.
58009012	Kirisi daa yeti nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang keɓe doo gbete kak, paasɛ kpang. Ti daa ɓi nɛɛ zìi rɛɛ jàa nɛɛ napoo kpang, daa ɓi nɛɛ zìi bì'i ɓiɓɛ. A ta yuu ɓuru kaa gbinggbing.
58009013	Zìi rɛɛ jàa nɛɛ napoo, a ɓɔɔ pũngku m'ɔk'ɔ napoo ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓisi zang ɓɔɔ ka gbalang zang Yahudawa, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, risi ri ri nw'ang zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi ka bii biling kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
58009014	Zìi Kirisi palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe kpang ya? Kirisi ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii kpang, a Laa yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Suru Laa ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi dondong ɓɛɛ. Zìi ɓiɓɛ shing katɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu shi kpang palɛnang, wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu pàlɛ̀ Laa ɓɔɔ ɓi ningkãari shoonang kati.
58009015	Ka ruu ruu keɓe kɔ, Kirisi shing tɔ, Laa mã nyaa shɔɔ nɛɛ ruu. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa ri nyaa, ri walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a ri nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, gbinggbing. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kirisi ɓɔɔ vɔ tɔ, ta ri tɔ nɛɛ jìng ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ dang ri, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ, bɛɛ ri dũng doo nyaa tìng shɔɔnang ɓɔɔ Laa m'ã nɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ.
58009016	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yaa nyavɔ, zang ri shi ka gbongkarɛ, zang ɓɔɔ yaa nyaa keɓe nɛɛ vɔ tɔ nizang, tɔ̀ɔ, zang palɛ vuu nɛɛ nyaa nyavɔ ɓiɓɛ.
58009017	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ yaa nyavɔ nɛɛ doo ningkãari, zang palɛ shoonang ɓi nɛɛ nyavɔ keɓe kpang. Zang palɛ shoonang ɓi nɛɛ nyavɔ ka knti ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ yaa nyavɔ vɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
58009018	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang y'ee vuu vaa, zang tɛ̃ɛ zìi ɓiɓɛ ka gbongkarɛ, a zang palɛ shoonang kaa nɛɛ nyaa tìng shɔɔnang ɓɔɔ Laa mã ɓɛɛ.
58009019	Ka ɓɔɔ Musa kɔɔ zang vuu ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa ɓɛɛ nandon, a tuu zìi m'ɔk'ɔ napoo nɛɛ ɓɔɔ jàa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa, a nwɛɛtɛ nɛɛ mii, a ɓisi ka labeenang nyaa dannang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ka nɔng ɓɛɛ nandon. Ɓisi nɛɛ gɔpɔ, a ɓɔɔ shãngti mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ zang nwaa kpaa kagn ɓɛɛ.
58009020	Kɔɔ zang tɔɔ, “Wee zìi ɓɔɔ Laa mã nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ mani kɔ, a dang nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ nɔɔ dũngnɛ ɓɛɛ.”
58009021	A ɓisi k'uutu kaa doo nɔngkɔ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti k'uutu piti nɛɛ zìi.
58009022	Nizang, nyaa dannang Laa kasɛ nɛɛ zang shing vuu piti wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ zìi ɓɔɔ zang ɓisi kagn ɓɛɛ. Naa zìi nɛɛ tɛ̃ɛ kpang, Laa kɔsɔ zang vuu shi kpang zang kpang.
58009023	Daa naa ɓɔɔ zang shing rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ jasuru vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa keɓe, ri nwang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ zìi vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa naa weɓe tɔ. A vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ɓɔɔ ɓi kaa rikɔ ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ, zang shing ri ri nwang tɔ̃ɔ ɓi kaa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58009024	Kirisi daa ka yeti k'uutu ɓɔɔ shɔnzang palɛ nɛɛ naa, ɓɔɔ ɓi jasuru ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ kpang. Daa ɓi ka lapa dɔ̃ɔ gbete, nɔng ɓɔɔ wu shii kagn, ka tìng Laa, ka nung ɓuru ɓɛɛ.
58009025	Ti daa wu ka lapa nɛɛ tɔɔ wu daa a Laa yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔkn kpãngkpãng kpang. Naa ɓɔɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, palɛ ka saa saa ɓɛɛ. Dà'a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn kpang, ɓɔɔ ka yeti Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zìi ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
58009026	Naa nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, Kirisi nɛ̀'ɛ dàng jìng tɔ, ka yuu zɔɔ yuu zɔɔ, ɓu doo ɓɔɔ koo gaayu ɓɛɛ. A kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɔngkɔ kpang. Kirisi nwang nyaa kaa doo gbete kak, paasɛ takpang, ka wee koo waa nyaa kaa tɔ ɓee, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu kɔsɔ vuu shi kpang nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu a ɓɛɛ.
58009027	Naa ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ nɛɛ shɔnzang wu vɔ doo gbete, nɛɛ knti wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kati ɓɛɛ.
58009028	Kirisi doo nɔngkɔ, a zang yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ doo gbete kak, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu kɔsɔ zang dɔli vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati. Nwang nyaa ditɔ tɔkn, daa kaa doo ziti. Wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu naa kɔsɔ zang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang, nɛɛ tɔɔ wu ta ɓi kaa yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri gã wu ɓɛɛ.
58010001	Nyaa dannang ɓi jasuru rɛɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ naa alɛ, ɓi vuu bì'i kɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ nizang kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zunung naa ɓɔɔ shing zang ɓɔɔ ri a Laa bannang, ri nwang nyaa kiiri nɛɛ bii zɔ̃ng vuu gbete ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa, ɓɔɔ zang paasɛ ka saa saa ɓɛɛ kpang.
58010002	Naa nɛɛ nɔngkɔ kpang, zang nɛɛ yaa vuu dɔɔnang tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri a Laa bannang, ɓɔɔ zang kɔsɔ ri vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, ri nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛ tɔ̀'ɔ ka yuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang.
58010003	A ka vuu kɔ zang dɔɔ Laa ka saa saa ɓee, kpà'a zang ɓi danggn vuu shi kpang.
58010004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zìi rɛɛ guu napoo nɛɛ ɓɔɔ jàa zunung ɓɔɔ wu kɔsɔ zang vuu shi kpang kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ.
58010005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ka ɓɔɔ Kirisi a ka koo, kɔɔ Laa tɔɔ, “Mɔɔ kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ mɔɔ, a zang ti a mɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. A mɔɔ palɛ m ɓaa, bii ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ nɛɛ n a mɔɔ wukɔ tɔkn ɓɛɛ.
58010006	Mɔɔ tãa tìnang vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ mɔɔ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓaa kpang.
58010007	A n kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ‘Wee n ɓee Laa, n a tɔ, n naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee vuu ka yuu mɛɛ ka yeti labeenang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ.’”
58010008	Ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ruu keɓe, kɔɔ Laa nɛɛ, “Vuu dɔɔnang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang alɛ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ nɛɛ naa ning dɔ̃ɔ gbete, nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ ka ruu vuu shi kpang, mɔɔ kasɛ ɓaa kpang. A mɔɔ tã̀a tìnang ɓarɛ ɓaa ti kpang.” (A nyaa dannang kɔɔ ɓi katɔ nɛɛ zang p'al'ɛ rɛɛ vuu keɓe).
58010009	A naa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Wee n ɓee, n a tɔ, nɛɛ n naa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.” Yaa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang nɛɛ tɔɔ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ wu tèng nɔng ɓiɓɛ.
58010010	Laa kɔ kasɛ a zang shingnɛ ruu nwàng zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa. Ka ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi, a Laa yuu ɓiɓɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ doo gbete kak ɓɛɛ.
58010011	A zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ɓu shii diki diki palɛ shoonang ɓiɓɛ, a Laa rɛɛ vuu dɔɔnang gbete keɓe, paasɛ ka yuu zɔɔ, yuu zɔɔ. Rɛɛ vuu dɔɔnang ɓɔɔ kɔsɔ rɛɛ vuu shi kpang kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ.
58010012	A ka ɓɔɔ Kirisi, a Laa yuu ɓiɓɛ tɔ doo gbete ɓɔɔ dondong ka ruu rɛɛ vuu shi kpang, nwang tɔ ka nak'n Laa.
58010013	Ɓi doo nɛɛ laa kaɓa, gãrɛ nɛɛ Laa risi zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ wu kpang, ri nwang laa ɓɔɔ wu naa doo kagn ɓɛɛ.
58010014	Nɛɛ vuu dɔɔnang ɓɔɔ gbete ɓɔɔ dondong keɓe, Kirisi shing tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zang kɔsɔ ri vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ tɔ, ri nwang tɔ nyaa kiiri.
58010015	A Suru Laa kɔɔ rùu r'uu ka yuu ɓiɓɛ jong. Gaayu kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
58010016	“Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, wee nyaa ɓɔɔ n naa mã nɛɛ ri ka knti rɛɛ diki kaɓa kɔ. N naa shing nyaa dannang mɛɛ ka yeti ɓarɛ, a n beere ka ɓoro ɓarɛ”.
58010017	A gisi ruu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ, “N naa kpaa danggn vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri ta nyaa dannang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ takpang, dondong.”
58010018	Laa nɛɛ kɔsɔ rɛɛ vuu keɓe tɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, zang a Laa vuu ka ruu vuu shi kpang tɔ̀'ɔ kagn kpang.
58010019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ rɛɛ manzung, ka ruu zìi Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ, ruu yaa gn naa daanang, bii Laa kpang.
58010020	Yeesɔ puu ruu gbalang tɔ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu a ɓɛɛ, gbalang ɓɔɔ zang ri walɛ suru bii nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu tɛɛ nɛɛ mani, ruu daa bii Laa nɛɛ yeti fɔ̃ɔrɔ nyaa pɛɛrɛ kaɓa ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ɓeleng ku gbalang katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58010021	A wee zang bang ɓuru kagn ɓɔɔ dɔɔ Laa vuu, ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang ka Gãa Laa ɓee.
58010022	R'uu a nɔɔ ta, ka bii Laa nɛɛ yeti tɔ̃ɔ. Ruu yaa gn naa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Kirisi sɔɔ yeti ɓuru tɔ kalang kalang, rɛ̃rɛnang shi kpang kagn kpang. A zang ti sɔɔ ruu bii katɔ nɛɛ mii ɓɔɔ kalang kalang ɓɛɛ.
58010023	R'uu yiti vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔ̀ɔ ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ɓɛɛ gbãnggbãng, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru wu vãarɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ a nyaa, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa kagn katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58010024	R'uu kãa gbalang naa ɓɔɔ ruu zarɛ zɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu kasɛ zɔɔ, a ruu ti palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
58010025	ruu yaa nɔɔ yuu kpalɛnang nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang, naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔng bii yaarɛnang ɓɛɛ. Ruu mã nɔɔ zɔɔ danggn ruu ti mã nɔɔ zɔɔ kaa gbãnggbãng, ka wee ruu zi tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ gbãayu kagn, a naabm kana ɓee.
58010026	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ruu yi tìng nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang nɛɛ gbãa, ka knti ɓɔɔ ruu zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang tɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔyi ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ takpang.
58010027	Ɓi kaa vɔrɔ kaanang jìng, ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa naa dang ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓee, kɔ yaa shɛ̃ɛning, nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ shing baabi dɔli, ɓɔɔ naa shaa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
58010028	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta nyaa dannang Musa tɔ, naa zang ziti kɔ taati nɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ nɔngkɔ. Zang nyɔ zang keɓe vɔrɔ, gn ɓiɓɛ kɔng zang kpang.
58010029	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti manɛ, jìng dannang zang ɓɔɔ risi Jaa Laa naa vìi, naa bang ɓu biya? Zang ɓɔɔ risi zìi Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ Laa mã nyaa shɔɔ nɛɛ mani, naa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zìi ɓɔɔ zang kɔsɔ wu vuu shi kpang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. A ti dãa Suru Laa ɓɔɔ palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
58010030	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zi zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Pãng waanang ɓi ɓɔɔ mɛɛ, nkɔ naa waayi” ɓɛɛ nung tɔ. A ti kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ “Kpanti Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ruu ditɔ”.
58010031	Naa zang shɛ̃ɛ ka naa Laa, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu jɛ̃ɛ wu ruu, ɓi vuu bii baanang.
58010032	Nɔɔ kpaa danggn diki ɓɔɔ ɓa tɔ ɓɛɛ, ka knti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ ka yuu Kirisi tɔ. Nɔɔ mã danggn, a nɔɔ t'aar'ɛ yuu gbãnggbãng ka jìng dannang.
58010033	Lee ɓɔɔ zang dãa nɔɔ, a zang dang nɔɔ jìng ka jìng zang piti. A lee ɓɔɔ nɔɔ daa ka bii zang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ri nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ mã ri danggn.
