58010034	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ri ka sãa kɔng nɔɔ katɔ. Ɓɔɔ zang laasɛ vuu manɛ zang seeyi, yeti manɛ lasɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ yuu manɛ, nɔɔ zi tɔ, nɛɛ vuu manɛ kagn ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe katɔ, a ti nwang ɓi dondong ɓɛɛ.
58010035	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n'ɔɔ yaa gn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ mã ɓɛɛ naa kpang, nwǎng nɔɔ vuu ditɔ bang.
58010036	N'ɔɔ yaa danggn mãnang kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Wu a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa nɛɛ wu a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kati.
58010037	Zang bee ka labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Diki bee kpang, zang ɓɔɔ a ɓɛɛ, naa a ditɔ, suukãng kpang.
58010038	A zang tɔ̃ɔ mɛɛ nwang ningkãari ɓi nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ. Naa gɔ̃ bii nɛɛ knti, n tãa tìnang ɓiɓɛ kpang”.
58010039	A rùu ɓuru kaa tɔ̀'ɔ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri gɔ̃ bii nɛɛ knti, ri shaarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ruu ɓuru ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn, a Laa wu ta yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
58011001	Danggn shinnang ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓuru ɓɔɔ tusu ruu nɛɛ ruu naa walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu shing gn ɓiɓɛ katɔ. Wukɔ shingnɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi gn kãntang keɓe kpang, wu nwang naa ruu zi katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58011002	Laa kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu rɛɛ dabang dabang ɓuru, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ɓɛɛ kɔ.
58011003	Danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shingnɛ, kɔ tusu ruu nɛɛ koo keɓe nwàng nɔngkɔ, ka doo ruu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zili keɓe, zang palɛ ɓi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zili kpang ɓɛɛ.
58011004	Danggn shinnang Habila shing wu, a a Laa vuu nɛɛ zang dɔɔyi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tãa tìnang ɓa ɓɔɔ Kayinu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Danggn shinnang shingnɛ, Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, wu zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ wu a ɓɛɛ. A danggn shinnang ɓiɓɛ kɔ shingnɛ, vɔ tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, zìi ɓiɓɛ kaa doo naa, nɛɛ Laa wu waa wu pãng ta.
58011005	Danggn shinnang Anuhu shingnɛ, Laa tuu wu nɛɛ koo keɓe ningkãari, daa nɛɛ wu ka lapa. A zang ìi wu kaa takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa tuu wu tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang tuu wu gn kpang, zang kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Laa tãa tìnang ɓiɓɛ katɔ.
58011006	Naa zang shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang, zang p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tãa tìnang zang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang piti ɓɔɔ a ka bii Laa, wu sh'ing danggn katɔ nɛɛ Laa kagn, wu ti shing danggn nɛɛ Laa a zang ɓɔɔ ri kãa wu vuu katɔ.
58011007	Danggn shinnang Nuhu kɔ shing wu, ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa shaarɛ wu ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ naa a ka tìng ɓɔɔ wu zi gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Laa, a palɛ laa na ɓɔɔ wu t'a yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri ka gãa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. T'us'u ka danggn ɓɔɔ wu sh'ing ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, zang koo keɓe ri palɛ ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang, a raa kaa zang ɓɔɔ Laa tɔɔ wu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ wu shing ɓɛɛ.
58011008	Danggn shinnang Ibirayi shing wu ka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nyaa nɛɛ wu daa nɔng ɓɔɔ naa nw'ang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓaa shoo a daayi. Naa doo ka ɓɔɔ wu zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa kpang ɓɛɛ.
58011009	Sh'ing danggn, a mãa gãa ɓiɓɛ ka tipi ɓɔɔ zang a wu nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, naa zang zanti ka tipi ɓɔɔgn. Nwang ka yeti rɛɛ k'uutu, nɛɛ Ishaaku nɛɛ Yakubu ɓɔɔ Laa a ri nyaa keɓe jong nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
58011010	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shing jìng ɓi ka tìng ka gari ka lapa ɓɔɔ zang loo doo ɓiɓɛ katɔ, ɓɔɔ ɓi Laa kɔ dìi doo ɓiɓɛ, a mãayi ɓɛɛ.
58011011	Danggn shinnang Saratu shingnɛ, Laa a wu naa, a tuu jaa ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ saa ɓiɓɛ ɓa tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi ɓi tɔ zang ɓɔɔ a nyaa, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu a nyaa kagn katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58011012	A ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ bii zang gbete keɓe, ɓɔɔ ɓi kaa naa vɔrɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ, zõ̀ng ri nwangkɛ gaagaa, naa sang ka lapa. A ri ti ɓa ɓɔɔ zang gã ri katɔ naa seseele ɓɔɔ ka nyaa waapo ɓɛɛ.
58011013	Zang keɓe nandon, ri vɔlɔ, bɛɛ ri shing danggn doo katɔ. Ri walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang a ri nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ri zili waati nɛɛ nɔng beebang, a ri kasɛ katɔ ka yeti ɓarɛ. A ri ti kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ, ri ɓarɛ zang zanti, a ri ti nwang ɓarɛ ka teteng zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ ka koo.
58011014	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ruu naa weɓe, ri tusu ɓarɛ nɛɛ, ri kãa ɓarɛ dòo tipi ɓarɛ.
58011015	Naa ri nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu tipi ɓɔɔ ri yaa ɓɛɛ, ri nɛɛ walɛ gbalang ɓɔɔ ri gbãayu kagn tɔ.
58011016	A ri rɛ̃rɛ ɓarɛ ka yuu tipi ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ tuu Laa ka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ wu Laa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gbarɛ ri gari tɔ ɓɛɛ.
58011017	Danggn shinnang Ibirayi shing wu ka ɓɔɔ Laa gãsɛ wu, a Laa Ishaaku naa vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ zang alɛ wu nyaa ɓɛɛ, kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ wu dɔɔ jaa gbete ganggang ɓiɓɛ kaa tɔ.
58011018	Bɛɛ Laa kɔɔ wu tɔ nɛɛ, “Zang naa ɓaa zɔ̃ng ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ bii Ishaaku kɔ”
58011019	Ibirayi rɛ̃rɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Laa zunung ɓɔɔ wu wisi Ishaaku paa nɛɛ vɔrɔ katɔ. Ɓɔɔ zang yàa wu Ishaaku ningkãari, nw'ang kaa naa vɔ katɔ, a yupaa tɔkn.
58011020	Danggn shinnang kɔ shing Ishaaku, shing naa ka yuu rɛɛ Yakubu nɛɛ Isuwa, a kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ naa a ka tìng ka yuu zang ɓu ɓɛɛ.
58011021	Doo danggn shinnang kɔ shing Yakubu, ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ tɔɔ wu vɔ kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ, shìng wujɛ Yusufu ɓu naa ka yuu, a gàa ri Laa. Ka laa kaɓa, tiki ka labalang ɓiɓɛ, bang Laa.
58011022	Danggn shinnang Yusufu shing wu, ka ɓɔɔ zi tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ wu vɔrɛ a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ, kɔɔ ruu ka yuu diki ɓɔɔ zang Isirela ri nwangnɛ, ri yaa tipi Masar. Kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu naa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
58011023	Danggn shinnang rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri yi Musa, shingnɛ, ri waasɛ wu shala taati ka knti ɓɔɔ zang yi wu ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zirɛ jaa bì'i shi dɔli ɓɛɛ, ri kaa vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ri ta nyaa ɓɔɔ kpanti tipi kaɓa dangnɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
58011024	Danggn shinnang Musa shing wu, ka ɓɔɔ wu bang tɔ, bɛ̃ɛyi nɛɛ zang ɓàa wu nɛɛ wu jaa jaa Firawuna ɓɔɔ soro kpang.
58011025	Zɔ̃ngnɛ, nɛɛ zang dang wu jìng, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Laa ka nung ɓɔɔ wu nɛɛ tãa tìnang ɓɔɔ zang tãayi ka ɓɔɔ zang palɛ vuu shi kpang, a diki tìnang bì'i ti bee kpang ɓɛɛ.
58011026	Risi vuu yusɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ zang pàl'ɛ zang, ka ruu Kirisi, nɛɛ nwǎng zang tɔ̃ɔ dɔli, ɓa vuu naa ɓɔɔ ka Masar nandon katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ shing jìng ɓi ka tìng ka vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu naa walɛ ɓɛɛ.
58011027	Danggn shinnang shing wu a yaa Masar, kaa vɔrɔ gnvɔ ɓɔɔ naa shà'a kpanti kpang. Mã danggn daayi, naa zang ɓɔɔ zi Laa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri zi wu ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
58011028	Danggn shinnang kɔ shing wu, gaayu diki nyaalaa borodi ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃ɛ yisi kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. Kɔɔ zang Isirela nɛɛ ri nwaa zìi ka nyaa gãa ɓarɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ̀k'ɔ jamari zang Masar vɔrɔ, wu nyɔkɔ ɓɔɔ zang Isirela kpang.
58011029	Danggn shinnang shing zang Isirela ri tɛɛ nɛɛ teteng waapo ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ, “Waapo ɓɔɔ Raa katɔ” ɓɛɛ, naa ri ra ka tipi. A ɓɔɔ zang Masar ri tɔɔ ri tɛɛ kaa jong, mii shaa ri.
58011030	Danggn shinnang zang Isirela shingnɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ zang mãayi zang kiiri gari Jeriko nyaa nɛɛ mani ka teteng, jirɛ, ka knti ɓɔɔ ri jìng doo ɓiɓɛ diki manziti ɓɛɛ.
58011031	Danggn shinnang Rahab, jaa soro ɓɔɔ rakɛ wà'azaa ɓɛɛ, shingnɛ, zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, ɓi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa Laa kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ta zang Isirela waasɛ̃ ka gãa ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ri daayi nɛɛ ri daa zili nwannang zang gari Jeriko ɓɛɛ.
58011032	A n kɔɔ ɓu vi tɔkn viya? Laa kpang, ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ ruu ka yuu Gidiyɔng, nɛɛ Barak, nɛɛ Samsong, nɛɛ Jafuta, nɛɛ Dawuda, nɛɛ Samayila, a ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ.
58011033	Ɓɔɔ ri, ka ruu danggn shinnang ɓarɛ, ri shaa rɛɛ tipi kpanti dɔli nɛɛ sìiri ɓɛɛ. Ri dɔ̀ng zang ruu gn dang gbete kpang, a ri walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang a nyaa ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɔɔ nyaa zing.
58011034	Ri ningsi waa ɓɔɔ shaa nɛɛ gnvɔ ning ɓɛɛ, ri wɔ nɛɛ vɔrɔ yere bang. Zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri lakɛ naa ka bii kpang, zang a ri kaka, a ri raa zang ɓɔɔ ri ta sìiri nɛɛ kaka ɓɛɛ, ri shing zang sìiri tipi ɓɔɔgn ri yuku.
58011035	Zang soro ɓɔɔ zang ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ katɔ, zang wisi ri paa tɔ kn ningkãari. Zang ɓɔɔ zang tõ̀ɔrɔ ri shoo, kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ zang dang ri jìng katɔ kɔ jong, ka ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ɓɛɛ, a ri vɔlɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri zi tɔ, nɛɛ Laa naa wisi ri paa ditɔ, ri nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka lapa.
58011036	Zang ɓɔɔ zang kpaa ri, a zang nyɔ ri nɛɛ gbãa. A zang ɓɔɔ zang mã̀lɛ̀ ri nɛɛ saka, zang tɛ̃ɛ ri ka sãa.
58011037	Zang luku rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tari, ri vɔlɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ zang basɛ ri doo paa ziti. Zang nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yere bang. Zang keɓe ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang, ri mã ɓarɛ koo jàa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ. Zang dang ri jìng dɔli.
58011038	Rɛɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, koo keɓe daa ɓɔɔ ri nwang kagn ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri rakɛ ka jìngti, nɛɛ yuu rɛɛ kɔpɔ. Ri nw'al'ɛ ka yeng tari bang, a ɓɔɔ ka yeng puru.
58011039	Zang keɓe nandon, Laa kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ɓɛɛ. A zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng ɓarɛ, ɓɔɔ walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa a nyaa ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kaa takpang.
58011040	Laa mang vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kagn, ɓɔɔ wu shing rùu jong kagn ɓɛɛ. Naa rùu kagn kpang, nwang nyaa kiiri kpàng.
58012001	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wee zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔ ruu r'uu, ri shang nɔngkɔ, ri kiiri ruu nyaa ka teteng ɓee. Ruu vang nɔɔ vuu piti ɓɔɔ zãa ruu gbalang, nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kpãa ruu, ɓɔɔ ruu wìi kagn ɓɛɛ. Ruu mã danggn, ruu yuu nɔɔ yunang kɔ, zang shing ka tìng ɓuru ɓee.
58012002	Ruu shing nɔɔ jìng ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ tusu ruu naa ɓɔɔ ruu shing danggn, ti shingnɛ danggn shinnang ɓuru wu nwang nyaa kiiri ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ, ka ruu tìnang ɓɔɔ Laa naa a wu ka tìng, mã danggn ka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ. Yee laa ka yusɛ̃ɛ n'aa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu ɓɛɛ kpang, a daa nwàng ka nakn laa nwannang Kpanti Laa.
58012003	Nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ karɛ ka yuu Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ mã danggn ka jìng ɓɔɔ wu dangnɛ ka ɓɔɔ zang bɛ̃ɛ wu ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ lee kaa takpang, nɔɔ ti yaa gn naa kpang.
58012004	Ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ t'aarɛ̀ yuu nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, nɔɔ shii bang gn daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ nɔɔ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
58012005	Danggn wu ning nɔɔ ruu gn mãnang ɓɔɔ Laa ɓ'aa nɔɔ nɛɛ wujɛ ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Jaa mɛɛ, mɔɔ risi shoo ɓɔɔ Laa gõ̀ mɔɔ, wu nwang naa vuu pìirinang kpang. Naa ti mangkɛ mɔɔ, mɔɔ yaa gn naa kpang.
58012006	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa gɔ̃ zang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ri katɔ kɔ shoo ɓɛɛ. Wu ti dang zang piti ɓɔɔ wu tarɛ nɛɛ jaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ jìng.”
58012007	Mã danggn ka jìng dannang, naa ɓɔɔ daa gɔ̃ jaa shoo ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi jaa kiya daa ɓiɓɛ gõ̀ wu shoo kpang wiya ɓɛɛ?
58012008	Naa zang gõ̀ nɔɔ shoo, naa ɓɔɔ zang gɔ̃ wujɛ piti kpang, nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ gãa kpang, nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ nɔng zaakn.
58012009	Wu nɔngkɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, rɛɛ daa ɓuru ɓɔ̀'ɔ bii shɔnzang kagn, ɓɔɔ ri gɔ̃ ruu shoo ɓɛɛ, a ruu seng ri katɔ. Naa ruu a Daa ɓuru ɓɔɔ ka lapa yuu ɓuru tɔ, ruu nw'ang ningkãari, wukɔ daayi kpang ya?
58012010	Rɛɛ daa ɓuru ri gɔ̃ ruu shoo diki bee kpang, naa ɓɔɔ ri zirɛ daa ɓɛɛ. A shoo ɓɔɔ Laa gɔ̃ ruu nwǎng ɓi rukɔ tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang kaa jong zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓuru kpang naa wu.
58012011	Ka laa ɓɔɔ zang gɔ̃ mɔɔ shoo, tìng nyaa kpang, kɔng katɔ. Nɛɛ knti shoo kɔ zang kasɛ nɛɛ zang gɔ̃ zang ɓee, naa nwǎng zang kaɓa tɔ̃ɔ, wu ti shingnɛ ri palɛ zang tɔ̃ɔ, ri ti nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ.
58012012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ tuuru naa manɛ kɔ tɛ̃ɛ ɓotok, ɓi ta ka lapa, nɔɔ ti shiiri gutu manɛ ɓɔɔ lakɛ naa bii kpang ɓɛɛ ka ruu jìng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dang ɓɛɛ.
58012013	Nɔɔ yaa shi kpang palɛnang, nɔɔ dũng gbalang Laa ta, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kàa katɔ, ka ruu shi kpang palɛnang wu lakɛ katɔ kɔ jong, wu kpaa s'aa doo ɓiɓɛ sasak kpang.
58012014	Kãa gbalang mɔɔ nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ zang piti, mɔɔ ti nwang zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang, ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa mɔɔ nwàng zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang, ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ kpang, mɔɔ zi Laa kpang.
58012015	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ nɛ̀'ɛ wàlɛ̀ tɔ̃ɔ Laa kpang a zang ɓɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ ta yeti ɓɔɔ la katɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nyaa haanang seepaa, ɓɔɔ lasɛ zang dɔli ɓɛɛ.
58012016	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ nɛ̀'ɛ nw'ang zang dũndũng, kɔ wu nwang zang ɓɔɔ yee laa ka vuu Laa kpang naa Isuwa, ɓɔɔ ka ruu vuu shaanang laa gbete, mã̀lɛ̀ bannang ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang bang, ka naa jaanaa ɓiɓɛ.
58012017	Nɔɔ zi tɔ, nɛɛ knti, naa kasɛ nɛɛ daa ɓiɓɛ wu gàa wu Laa, Laa wu palɛ wu tɔ̃ɔ. A daa ɓiɓɛ bɛ̃ɛ wu. Gbalang ɓɔɔ wu kɔ̃sɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ takpang, naa doo ɓɔɔ wu kãayi nɛɛ miiri ka jìng ɓɛɛ.
58012018	Nɔɔ à, wu ka kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ zang lee nɛɛ naa kpang ɓɛɛ kpang, naa ɓɔɔ zang Isirela 'a ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ ti a, wu ka nyɛlɛ waa ɓɔɔ shaa nabm ɓɛɛ kpang, wu ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kɔngkɔng ɓɛɛ kpang, a wu ti ka nɔng jasung mii ɓɔɔ rãa ɓɛɛ kpang.
58012019	Nɔ̀ɔ à, wu ti ka nɔng gboo ɓɔɔ kaa nyaa ɓɛɛ kpang, wu ka nɔng yee ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri tãa vuu ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi, ri gaayi nɛɛ ri kasɛ ri pàasɛ̀ tãanang takpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
58012020	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zunung danggn mãnang ka yuu nyaa ɓɔɔ yee kaɓa dang kpang ɓɛɛ. Yee kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Naa doo vuu vaa lee kɔpɔ keɓe, zang wu luku nɛɛ tari wu vɔrɛ.”
58012021	Nizang, vuu ɓɔɔ ri zirɛ shing baabi dɔli, vuu bì'i shingnɛ Musa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N kaa vɔrɔ dɔli, bii zaa m kagn”.
58012022	Nɔɔ à manɛ ka kɔpɔ Sihiyona, a ɓɔɔ ka gari bang ɓɔ̀'ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ɓi ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Gari keɓe wukɔ Urushalima ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ a manɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ɓɔɔ ri ɓa naa ɓɔɔ zang gã katɔ, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ri dɔ̀'ɔ Laa, ri tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ.
58012023	Nɔɔ 'a manɛ tɔ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ rikɔ jamari ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ zang b'eer'e nung ɓarɛ tɔ ka lapa, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ a ka bii Laa, ɓɔɔ wukɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang piti ruu ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ ka bii rɛɛ suru zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ zang shing ri tɔ, ri nwang tɔ nyaa kiiri ɓɛɛ.
58012024	A ɓɔɔ ka bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ shii ka teteng ɓuru nɛɛ Laa, ka nyaa shɔɔ kɔ Laa mã nɛɛ ruu ɓee. A nɔɔ ti a ka nɔng zìi ɓɔɔ zang ɓisi katɔ, kaa nyavɔ, kɔɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓa zìi Habila katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58012025	Nɔɔ palɛ waasɛ̃, n'ɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ Laa kɔ rang yee ɓee kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa zang ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃̀ɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Musa ɓɔɔ shàarɛ̀ ri nyaa ka koo keɓe ri wɔ kpang, a ruu nɛɛ bɛ̃̀ɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ lapa, a shaarɛ ri nyaa ɓɛɛ, ruu palɛ biya ruu wɔ viya?
58012026	Ka diki Musa kaɓa, yee ɓiɓɛ zìiti koo katɔ. A kãntang, a nyaa tɔ nɛɛ, “Yaa dòo doo gbete kak, n naa zìiti wu koo kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, n naa zìiti lapa jong.”
58012027	Ruu kɔ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Yaa dòo doo gbete” tusu nɛɛ zang naa zìiti vuu ɓɔɔ Laa mãarɛ ɓɛɛ, zang rùk'u, zang yaa nɔng. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang yaa kaa vuu ɓɔɔ zang zunung zìitinang kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
58012028	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, r'uu zã̀a nɔɔ Laa, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, a ruu nɔng kpanti roonang ɓɔɔ zang zìiti ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. R'uu zã̀a nɔɔ Laa ruu ti bang wu ka gbalang ɓɔɔ shing wu, wu tãa tìnang. Ruu a wu bannang, ruu ti kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ.
58012029	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ɓɔɔ waa shaarɛ vuu piti katɔ Laa dang zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓiɓɛ kpang jìng doo nɔngkɔ, wu ningsi ri piti.
58013001	Nɔɔ yi tìng nɛɛ zɔɔ kasɛnang, wee nɔɔ manzung zɔɔ ka gbalang Laa dũnnang ɓee.
58013002	Nɔɔ yaa zang zanti tanang ka gãa manɛ kpang, Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri p'al'ɛ nɔngkɔ, a ri ta zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ, ri zi kpang.
58013003	Danggn zang ɓɔɔ zang mã ri ka sãa, wu ning nɔɔ kpang, nɔɔ nwang naa nɔɔ doo ka sãa kɔ nɛɛ ri. Danggn wu ti ning nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang dang ri jìng ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ t'a doo bii kɔ ɓɛɛ.
58013004	Zang piti ɓɔɔ ri gee zɔɔ tɔ, ri seng zɔɔ katɔ, a zang ɓɔɔ ri gee zɔɔ tɔ, ri yaasɛ zɔɔ gn naa kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa naa dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri rooro nɛɛ soro zang, ruu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58013005	Ka nwannang manɛ, nɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, nɔɔ shing jìng ka saka kasɛnang kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa manɛ, wu tiisi nɔɔ katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “N yàasɛ̀ mɔɔ gn naa kpang, n ti yaa mɔɔ kpang”, ɓɛɛ.
58013006	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rùu kɔɔ katɔ, nyaa zaa ruu kpang nɛɛ, “Kpanti Laa wukɔ yi m naa ka bii, n kaa vɔrɔ kpang, shɔnzang p'alɛ̀ m viya?”
58013007	Danggn wu ning nɔɔ zang bang manɛ ɓɔɔ ri ràng nɔɔ yee Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ p'ɛ̃ɛr'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nwannang ɓarɛ nwàng ri ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ màsɛ̀ danggn shinnang ɓarɛ.
58013008	Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓi doo naa ɓɔɔ wu nɛɛ ka ɓɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓi doo nɔngkɔ lɛɛkɔ, ti nwang ɓi nɔngkɔ gbinggbing.
58013009	Nɔɔ y'aa vuu ɓɔɔ zang tusu, ɓɔɔ ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa gngn kpang, wu shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ ning gbalang kpang. Ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ ruu kɔ, mã ruu danggn, wu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ ruu shaa ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ kpang. Vuu shaanang keɓe, ti nwàng zang ɓɔɔ ri shaayi vuu tɔ̃ɔ kpang.
58013010	Nɔng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ dɔ̀'ɔ Laa vuu kagn ka ruu ɓuru, ɓi nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang ka yeti k'uutu kaɓa, ri walɛ gbalang vuu shaanang kaɓa shaanang kpang ɓɛɛ.
58013011	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, tuu zìi rɛɛ vuu vaa keɓe ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀'ɔ Laa, ka ruu vuu shi kpang zang daa nɛɛ mani ka nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓi kagn kpang tingkiring. Wu a Laa ka ruu vuu shi kpang zang. A yɔpɔ rɛɛ vuu vaa keɓe, zang dɔɔ ɓi kaa yuu knti gari.
58013012	Yeesɔ dang jìng doo nɔngkɔ ka yuu knti gari, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu sɔɔ zang vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kati nɛɛ zìi ɓiɓɛ.
58013013	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu yaa zang ɓuru ta ruu daa nɔɔ, ka bii ɓiɓɛ ka knti gari, yusɛ̃ɛ wu t'uu ruu jong nɛɛ wu.
58013014	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gari ɓɔɔ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓuru gbinggbing kagn koo keɓe kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu kãa ɓuru gari ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ.
58013015	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, r'uu dɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ Laa diki diki nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ. Naa ruu dɔ̀'ɔ Laa, nwang ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu dɔ̀'ɔ wu ka waa ɓɛɛ. Wee ɓi kaa vuu ɓɔɔ koo nyaa ɓuru a wu ɓɛɛ kɔ, ka ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔyi nɛɛ wukɔ Kpanti ɓɛɛ.
58013016	Danggn wu ti ning nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang nɛɛ vuu basɛnang nɛɛ zɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa tãa tìnang zɔ̃ng vuu keɓe ɓa vuu ɓɔɔ ruu dɔ̀'ɔ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
58013017	Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa rɛɛ zang bang manɛ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, rikɔ gãng jìng ka nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ri ti naa kɔɔ Laa naa ɓɔɔ ri yiti nɔɔ ditɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri p'al'ɛ shoonang keɓe nɛɛ tìnang tãanang, wu nɛɛ yeti lasɛnang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ri palɛ nɔngkɔ, nwàng nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
58013018	Nɔɔ gaa ruu Laa diki diki, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, rùu zi tɔ, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru ɓi tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, a ruu ti kasɛ nɛɛ ruu p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa katɔ ɓɛɛ diki diki.
58013019	N gaa nɔɔ katɔ gbãnggbãng, nɔɔ gaa Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, wu shingnɛ, n gbãayu kaa bii manɛ pati.
58013020	N gaa Laa ɓɔɔ shingnɛ, zang nw'ang ka nyaa zɔɔ, ɓɔɔ wisi Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ paa tɔkn nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti jagang mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu zìi ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ Laa mã nyaa ɓɔɔ gbinggbing nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
58013021	N gaa wu, wu a nɔɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shing wu, wu tãa tìnang ka yeti ɓuru, nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ Kirisi. Zang a wu bannang ta gbinggbing. Nɔngkɔ.
58013022	Rɛɛ manzung, n gaa nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ mã danggn nɛɛ r'uu kɔ n mã nɔɔ danggn nɛɛ mani ɓee. Vuu kɔ n bee nɔɔ ɓee, ɓi dɔli kpang.
58013023	N kasɛ nɔɔ tãayi nɛɛ, zang yaa manzung ɓuru Timoti naa tɔ nɛɛ sãa. Nɛɛ à pati, ruu naa zi nɔɔ nɛɛ wu.
58013024	N'ɔɔ jèe m zang bang manɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa nyaa. Zang ɓɔɔ ri à nɛɛ tipi Italiya, ri j'ee nɔɔ nyaa.
58013025	Laa wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nandon. Nɔngkɔ.
59001001	N jee nɔɔ nyaa zang Isirela Laa ɓɔɔ ri tantɛ ka koo nandon ɓɛɛ. Nkɔ Yakubu zang shoonang Laa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi, n bee nɔɔ labeenang keɓe.
59001002	Rɛɛ manzung, nɔɔ tãa manɛ tìnang kɔ jong, naa zang gãsɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ vuu ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ.
59001003	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, danggn shinnang manɛ kɔ zang gãsɛ ɓee, kɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ zunung danggn mãnang ɓɛɛ.
59001004	Nɔɔ mã danggn nɔngkɔ sasak. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang ɓɛɛ, vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ yaa kagn ka nwannang manɛ kpang.
59001005	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zũng kpang, wu gaa Laa, Laa a wu zũnang katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ Laa a zang piti vuu katɔ, ti a zang naa ka z'ingz'ing ɓɛɛ. Zãa zang vuu ɓɔɔ zang gaa ɓɛɛ kpang.
59001006	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gaa vuu ka naa Laa, wu shing gn gbãnggbãng nɛɛ Laa a wu katɔ. Wu yaa gn naa kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ gaa vuu yaa gn naa katɔ, nwang ɓi naa mii waapo ɓɔɔ gɔnsɔ zɔɔ a jasung ti rãa wu ɓɛɛ.
59001007	Zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, ɓɔɔ ta yeti ziti ka tìng Laa. Rɛ̃rɛ ɓi jong gbete ka yuu vuu kpang. Zang keɓe wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ Laa a wu vuu ɓɔɔ katɔ kpang.
59001009	Zang ɓɔɔ wu zang ying kpang, ɓɔɔ dũng Laa, wu tãa tìnang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ka tìng Laa wu ɓi zang bang ɓɛɛ.
59001010	Zang ying ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dũng Laa, Laa nɛɛ sɔɔrɔ wu yuu ka dii, wu tãa tìnang doo nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ying shaarɛ ɓi katɔ naa mangwaa ɓɔɔ nyaa kɔ doo naa, waatɛ kaatɔ ɓɛɛ.
59001011	Naa ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ tuu tɔ wusi tɔɔrɔ kaatɔ, mangwaa ɓiɓɛ ri ti lɔɔrɔ ri watɛ. Shinang ɓarɛ wu lasɛ. Zang ying lasɛ doo nɔngkɔ, ka ɓɔɔ wu shòngt'o ka nɔng vuu naa ɓiɓɛ kãanang ɓɛɛ.
59001012	Zang ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ gãsɛ wu, nɛɛ watɛ kpang wukɔ tãa tìnang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shìi kakata, nɛɛ watɛ kpang, naa ta vuu ɓɔɔ Kpanti Laa tɔɔ wu a zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe wukɔ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
59001013	Zang ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ gãsɛ wu, wu tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ “Ɓi Laa gãsɛ m” kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ gãsɛ Laa nɛɛ wu palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi kagn kpang. Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ gãsɛ zang ɓi kpang.
59001014	Ɓi rɛ̃rɛnang shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka yeti zang kɔ, shing zang zang kasɛ vuu. Wu shing zang zang palɛ vuu shi kpang.
59001015	Rɛ̃rɛnang keɓe nɛɛ ɓaa mɔɔ saara tɔ ka yeti, wu shing mɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang. Vuu shi kpang nɛɛ nwang vuu bii ɓaaɓɛ tɔ, wu nwàng mɔɔ vɔrɔ kati.
59001016	Rɛɛ manzung ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, zang wu nwaarɛ nɔɔ kpang.
59001017	Vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ ti gbarɛ katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang a zang piti, a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa. Vuu keɓe ri a ɓarɛ nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ mãa vuu ɓɔɔ ri yakɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ bii ɓi jong kpang, ràa ruu yuu knti, wu yaa ruu ka nɔng tɔɔnang kpang.
59001018	Wukɔ kasɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, a shing ruu ruu nwang wujɛ ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ yee ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang kaa naa jamari rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu m'ãarɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
59001019	Ree manzung ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, danggn wu ning nɔɔ vuu keɓe kpang. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo waasɛ̃, n'ɔɔ tãa ruu pati, n'ɔɔ kɔlɔ nyaa kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɔng yee rannang kpang. N'ɔɔ ti see gnvɔ pati kpang.
59001020	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gnvɔ nɛɛ kagn ka yeti zang, zang zunung shoonang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ palɛnang kpang ɓɛɛ.
59001021	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ yaa gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ, nɛɛ gɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kãa ɓɛɛ nandon. Nɔɔ ta ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Laa shing nɔɔ ka yeti manɛ ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ ti tà nɛɛ jìng gbakɛnang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu keɓe ta yuu manɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
59001022	Nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu keɓe kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ. N'ɔɔ nwaarɛ yuu manɛ nɛɛ ruu tãanang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang.
59001023	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tãa ruu keɓe, nɛɛ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ, kpang nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ zi jìng ɓiɓɛ ka vìilaa ɓɛɛ.
59001024	Nɛɛ zi waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ tɔ, ɓɔɔ wu yaa nɔng nyaa kɔ doo naa ɓee, danggn ning wu naa ɓɔɔ waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ nwang tɔ.
59001025	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing jìng ka nyaa dannang Laa ɓɔɔ ta yuu ɓuru katɔ waasɛ̃. Nɛɛ dũngnɛ sasak, nɛɛ nwang zang ɓɔɔ tãa ruu, danggn ning wu kpang, nɛɛ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu tãa ɓɛɛ katɔ. Laa shing zang keɓe wu tãa tìnang ka vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ piti.
59001026	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu dũng Laa, nɛɛ mung nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang, nwaarɛ ɓi yuu ɓiɓɛ. Laa dũnnang ɓiɓɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ waati.
59001027	Laa dũnnang ɓɔɔ Daa ɓuru Laa zirɛ nɛɛ wukɔ kalang kalang, a ti tɔ̃ɔ ka jìng ɓiɓɛ keɓe, nɛɛ zang lengke jìng ka rɛɛ javɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ suvɔ ɓɔɔ ri dang jìng ɓɛɛ. Zang wu lee naa ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe kpang.
59002001	Manzung, n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu dang gbete kpang. ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ zang a wukɔ bannang ɓa zang piti ɓɛɛ.
59002002	Naa zang ɓɔɔ a ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ yuu, nɛɛ jaa saa naa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ tari ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Zinariya, ka naa ɓiɓɛ, a hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ ka bii. A zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ying kpang hãa sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka bii nɛɛ ti a jong.
59002003	A nɔɔ yee zang ɓɔɔ hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ tɔ̃ɔ laa ka bii. Nɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Arɛ mɔɔ nwang ka nɔng tɔ̃ɔ keɓe.” A nɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang ying kpang ɓɔɔ hãa sɛ̃ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka bii ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Shii nɛɛ kaaɓa,” nɔɔ nɛɛ kɔ̀ɔ wu nɔngkɔ kpang nɔɔ kɔ̀'ɔ wu nɛɛ “Nwang ka tipi ka nɔngkɔ.”
59002004	Nɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ tɔ naa weɓe, nɔɔ palɛ vuu gn dang gbete. Nɔɔ jɛ̃̀ɛ zang ruu tɔ shi kpang.
59002005	Manzung ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓaa shoo. Laa zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ ri zang ying kpang, ɓɔɔ ri ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ ri nwang zang ying ka danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ. Shing ri tɔ, ri walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa tɔɔ wu shing zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu roo kpanti ɓɛɛ.
59002006	Nɔɔ risi zang ɓɔɔ ri zang ying kpang naa vìi. Wu zang ying kɔ ri dang nɔɔ jìng kpang ya? Wu rikɔ ɓaa nɔɔ nyaavaa kpang ya?
59002007	Wu rikɔ kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang ka yuu n'ung tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ kɔ zang ɓaa nɔɔ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ kpang ya?
59002008	Nɔɔ nɛɛ dũng nyaa dannang Laa ɓɔɔ ka yeti labeenang ɓiɓɛ. Wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Nyaa dannang Laa ɓɔɔ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ kasɛ zang naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ,”
59002009	Nɔɔ nɛɛ p'alɛ̀ vuu gn dang gbete, nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ. Nɔɔ ti palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta nyaa dannang Laa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
59002010	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dũng nyaa dannang Laa nandon tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a naa ta gbete, nwang ɓi kaa naa ɓɔɔ ta nandon ɓɛɛ.
59002011	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ “Mɔɔ roo nɛɛ soro zang kpang” Wukɔ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang.” mɔɔ nɛɛ roo nɛɛ soro zang kpang, a mɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ katɔ, mɔɔ ta nyaa dannang tɔ.
59002012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ palɛ doo nɔngkɔ. Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang, lee ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ ruu ruu ditɔ ka naa ɓɔɔ ruu dñ̀ng nyaa dannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ta yuu ɓuru katɔ ɓɛɛ.
59002013	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gn kɔng Laa kpang, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ gn zang kɔ̀ng wu ɓi kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ gn zang kɔng wu katɔ, naa zirɛ nɛɛ gn zang ɓɔɔ kɔng Laa ɓa ruu ɓɔɔ wu dɔng zang ɓɛɛ katɔ.
59002014	Manzung, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa, a p'alɛ̀ shoonang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, danggn shinnang keɓe nwǎng wu viya? Ta yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ ya?
59002015	Naa zang ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ, zang varɛ, k'ɔ ɓɔɔ soro, fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ wu hãa ka bii kagn kpang. Vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ wu ti shaa lɛɛkɔ kpang.
59002016	A zang gbete ka teteng manɛ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Laa wu yi mɔɔ naa kagn mɔɔ walɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ nɛɛ vuu shaanang,” a nɔɔ a wu vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ ɓu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ya?
59002017	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, danggn shinnang ka bii Laa ɓi doo nɔngkɔ, mɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ mɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang, danggn shinnang ɓaaɓɛ nwang mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang.
59002018	Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi nɛɛ, “Zang keɓe shing ɓi danggn ka bii Laa, a zang kaɓa palɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ.” N kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ zunung danggn shinnang katɔ, ka bii Laa a palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ kpang ya? N tusu mɔɔ nɛɛ n shing danggn ka bii Laa ka vuu ɓɔɔ n palɛ ɓɛɛ.”
59002019	Nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ, nɛɛ Laa ɓi gbete kɔ nwani. Wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ, Suru shi kpang ri zi tɔ kɔ doori, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ kagn.
59002020	Zang ɓɔɔ zũng kpang kiɓi, mɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ danggn shinnang nɛɛ tusu bii nɛɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, nwang ɓi waati kpang ya?
59002021	Danggn dabang ɓuru Ibirayi ɓɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ka ruu shoonang ɓiɓɛ wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Ibirayi tɔɔ wu dɔɔ jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ Ishaaku ka yuu nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu vaa kagn ɓɛɛ.
59002022	Nɔɔ zi ka vuu ɓɔɔ Ibirayi palɛ keɓe kɔɔ nɛɛ shoonang nɛɛ danggn shinnang ka bii Laa daa kaa nyaa gbete. Shoonang Ibirayi kɔ shingnɛ danggn shinnang ɓiɓɛ daa kaa nyaa kiiri.
59002023	Vuu keɓe nwang naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti Labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang beeyi nɛɛ, “Ibirayi shing danggn ka bii Laa, a Laa ta wu nɛɛ wu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ. A zang ɓaa wu kaa nɛɛ wusang Laa.”
59002024	Mɔɔ zi tɔ waa, shɔnzang nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa nɛɛ shoonang jong. Wu nɛɛ danggn shinnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang.
59002025	Rahab jaa soro ɓɔɔ bɛɛ rakɛ wà'azaa palɛ doo nɔngkɔ. Nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa doo ka vuu shoonang kɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ ta zang nyaa shoonang ɓɔɔ zang shong ri nɛɛ ri zili tipi Jeriko, a shing ri zanti kaa nɛɛ gbalang ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ tɔɔ ri wɔ kati ɓɛɛ.
59002026	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Suru nɛɛ ka bii kpang, bii ɓi kaa vɔrɔ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ shoonang ɓɔɔ tusu zang nɛɛ mɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang, danggn shinnang ɓaaɓɛ vɔ ɓi doo katɔ kɔ.
59003001	Manzung n'ɔɔ nwàng zang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu kɔ nandon kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi tɔ wee ruu tusu zang vuu ɓee, zang naa jɛ̃ɛ ruu ruu ɓa ɓɔɔ zang piti katɔ ɓɛɛ.
59003002	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ rùu nandon jìng kpantɛ ruu katɔ diki diki ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ, nyaa kpantɛ wu ɓi jong ka nɔng yee rannang kpang, zang keɓe ɓi shɔnzang tɔ̃ɔ ka vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Zunung naa ɓɔɔ wu shing yuu ɓiɓɛ katɔ.
59003003	Ruu hãa gbantang saka ka nyaa, tɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ruu ti raa ri jìng ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
59003004	Laana kɔ nɔɔ zirɛ bang ka yuu mii, jasung dɔ̃ɔ ɓee. Jaa saka ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zaayi raa nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓi tɔkɔlɔng hn. Wu ti zaa nɛɛ mani wu daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
59003005	Rìiti ɓɔɔ ka nyaa ɓuru doo nɔngkɔ. Ɓi katɔ tɔkɔlɔng hn ka bii ɓuru, nwangsɛ yee bang bang dɔli. Waala bangnɛ, bangnɛ, waa tɔkɔlɔng dɔɔyi.
59003006	Rìiti nwang naa waa. Ka teteng vuu ɓɔɔ ka bii ɓuru piti, shi kpang nwangnɛ bii rìiti kɔ. Zɔ̀'ɔ bii nimbang keɓe nɛɛ zɔ̃pɔ ɓiɓɛ. Lasɛ nwannang zang ka koo keɓe nɛɛ waa ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ nɔng waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi jong kpang ɓɛɛ.
59003007	Vuu jìngti, nɛɛ jaaning, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri gɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ buru ka tipi, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri ka yeti mii waapo ɓɛɛ, shɔnzang zunung mãnang katɔ ka vaa. Zang ti mã katɔ diki, diki.
59003008	A zang ɓɔɔ zunung rìiti mãnang ɓi kagn kpang. Rìiti palɛ ɓi vuu shi kpang kɔ sasak. Zɔ̃pɔ vɔrɔ kagn bii ɓiɓɛ dɔli.
59003009	Ruu dɔ̀'ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa ɓuru nɛɛ wukɔ, a ruu ti dãa shɔnzang ɓɔɔ Laa mãa wu naa bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani.
59003010	Ruu dɔɔ Laa, a ruu ti dãa zang nɛɛ nyaa gbete keɓe. Manzung, nɔɔ palɛ wu nɔngkɔ kpang.
59003011	Mii lalata nɛɛ mii tɔ̃ɔ ri nwang katɔ, nɛɛ sɔlɔna mii gbete ya?
59003012	Manzung, Laa sìiri ra jaa gbaranti katɔ ya? Gbaranti ti ra jaa sìiri katɔ ya? Mii lalata nwangsɛ mii tɔ̃ɔ ɓi jong kpang doo nɔngkɔ.
59003013	Ɓu wi zũng dɔli, a ti zi vuu dɔli ka teteng manɛ wiya? Wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ wu ti lakɛ jìng kpang, tɔɔ zang zi zũnang ɓiɓɛ kati.
59003014	Nɔɔ nɛɛ kaa sũnyaa gbãnggbãng, nɔɔ nɛɛ ti kasɛ yuu manɛ dɔli ka yeti manɛ, n'ɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ruu bang bang ka yuu manɛ kpang, n'ɔɔ ti suu sè'e ka ruu vuu ɓɔɔ nizang kpang.
59003015	Wee ɓi zũnang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ koo keɓe. Ɓi ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kpang. Ɓi ɓɔɔ suru shi kpang.
59003016	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔng ɓɔɔ sũnyaa kaanang nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ri kasɛ yuu ɓarɛ dɔli kagn, nɔng keɓe vɔ̃ɔtɔ ɓi kaatɔ. A vuu shi kpang nwang ɓi ka nɔng dɔli.
59003017	Zũnang ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓi n'aabm̀. Zang ɓɔɔ zũnang keɓe kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ, shi kpang nwang ɓi ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang. Zũnang keɓe, shing zang, zang kasɛ nwannang ka bii zɔɔ, palɛ vuu ɓi hakaka kpang, yi wusang ɓi dɔli, gn zang kɔng wu dɔli, a ti palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ dɔli. P'alɛ̀ vuu ɓi jong gn dang gbete kpang, ti nwaarɛ zang ɓi nɛɛ vuu palɛnang kpang.
59003018	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ zang ri nwang ka nyaa zɔɔ, ri p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔɔ ri shing zang, zang ri nwang kaa nyaa zɔɔ.
59004001	Ɓu vi shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ haa nyaa, a nɔɔ ti gaa nyaa nɛɛ zɔɔ viya? Wu rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ, waa zɔɔ ka yeti manɛ kpang ya?
59004002	Nɔɔ kasɛ vuu, a nɔɔ walɛ kpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ. Nɔɔ sh'ing ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ nwàng ɓɔɔ manɛ, a nɔɔ walɛ kaa takpang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ gaa nyaa a nɔɔ ti ta sìiri. Nɔɔ walɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ gaa ka naa Laa kpang ɓɛɛ.
59004003	Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti gaa tɔ, a nɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ gaa ka gbalang shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ daa vãlɛ ka nɔng vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
59004004	Nɔɔ zi kpang nɛɛ naa nɔɔ yi wusang nɛɛ vuu koo keɓe nɔɔ nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ dũndũng ɓɛɛ kpang ya? Zang keɓe nwang ɓi kaa zang ɓɔɔ gaa nyaa nɛɛ Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu koo keɓe risi yuu ɓiɓɛ kaa zang ɓɔɔ gaa nyaa nɛɛ Laa ɓɛɛ.
59004005	Nɔɔ kɔɔ ɓu nɛɛ, Labeenang Laa kɔ̀ɔ waati nɛɛ, “Suru bii ɓɔɔ Laa shingnɛ nɛɛ wu nwang ka yeti ɓuru, kaa sũnyaa dɔli” ya?
59004006	Kaka ɓɔɔ Laa a ruu nɛɛ ruu dũng wu nɛɛ mani ɓa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu rɛ̃rɛ nɛɛ ruu kasɛ ka yeti ɓuru katɔ. Naa ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yeti Labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Laa kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ jìng dɔli ɓɛɛ kpang. Laa a ɓi zang ɓɔɔ lakɛ jìng kpang kaka ɓɔɔ wu dũng wu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ”
59004007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, a Laa yuu ɓaaɓɛ. Mɔɔ t'aar'ɛ yuu nɛɛ suru shi kpang, yuu ditɔ wu yaa mɔɔ.
59004008	A ka bii Laa naabm, tɔɔ wu ti a jong ka bii ɓaaɓɛ naabm. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang ta. Nɔɔ ti kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta yeti ziti ɓɛɛ.
59004009	Yeti manɛ wu lasɛ ta kati, nɔɔ kaa nyaavɔ. Tabɛ̀'ɛ manɛ wu raa kaa nyaavɔ. Tìnang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ɓɛɛ, wu raa kaa yeti lasɛnang, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ.
59004010	Risi yuu ɓaaɓɛ naa mɔɔ wu vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ka tìng Kpanti Laa, tɔɔ Kpanti Laa wu a mɔɔ bannang kati.
59004011	Manzung, n'ɔɔ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zɔɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ rang yee shi kpang ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ, a ti dɔng wu ruu, rang yee shi kpang ka yuu nyaa dannang Laa a ti tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ naa wu ɓa nyaa dannang Laa katɔ. Mɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ, mɔɔ ɓa nyaa dannang Laa katɔ, mɔɔ ɓ'aa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nyaa dannang Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Mɔɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ ɓa nyaa dannang Laa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
59004012	Zang ɓɔɔ dang nyaa a ti jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ɓi gbete kɔ nwani, wukɔ Laa. Nɛɛ kasɛ tɔ, wu ta yuu ɓuru. Nɛɛ ti kasɛ kpang, wu nyɔ ruu vɔrɔ. A mɔɔ ɓaa kaa wi mɔɔ jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng doo Laa kɔ ruu wiya?
59004013	Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka ruu mɛɛ, nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ, “Nɛɛ lɛɛkɔ kpang, ɓuru ruu daa ka gari keɓe nɛɛ gari kaɓa, ruu daa nwang ka nɔng saa gbete, ruu malɛ vuu, ruu ti hooro ɓɔɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, ruu gisi vuu naa ɓuru kati ɓɛɛ.”
59004014	Nɔɔ ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ ɓuru atɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Suru bii manɛ nwang naa viya? Nɔɔ nwang manɛ naa miis'ìng ɓɔɔ kpaa nɛɛ gãndi nyaa kɔ doo naa sãtɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
59004015	Nɔɔ kɔ̀ɔ manɛ nɛɛ “Laa nɛɛ kasɛ tɔɔ, ruu nwang doo ningkãari, rùu palɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ vuu kaɓa.”
59004016	Ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe nɔɔ lakɛ jìng, a nɔɔ rang ruu bang bang ka yuu manɛ. Ruu bang bang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔrɔ ka yuu manɛ naa weɓe ɓi vuu shi kpang.
59004017	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi vuu tɔ̃ɔ naa ɓɔɔ wu nɛɛ palɛ, a nɛɛ palɛ kpang, palɛ ɓi vuu shi kpang.
59005001	Zang ying nɔɔ ɓaa shoo n'ɔɔ tãayi. Nɔɔ kaayi n'ɔɔ ti ɓaa nyaavaa ka ruu jìng dannang bang ɓɔɔ naa a ka yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ.
59005002	Vuu naa manɛ pũng tɔ, fɔ̃ɔrɔ manɛ tuuru ti shaa tɔ,
59005003	a zinariya nɛɛ azurufa manɛ sisaa ti shaa tɔ. Sisaa keɓe kɔ naa nwang vuu ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ruu ka yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ. Ti naa shaa yɔpɔ bii manɛ naa waa. Nɔɔ kp'alɛ̀ saka manɛ kaa làa ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
59005004	Nɔɔ shu zang ɓɔɔ kpalɛ vuu shaanang manɛ ɓɔɔ ka jaa manɛ kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri kaa Laa nyaavɔ kana, a Laa ɓɔɔ mãa vuu piti, ti tãa nyaavɔ ɓarɛ tɔ.
59005005	Nɔɔ nwàng manɛ ka koo keɓe nɔɔ tãa tìnang nɔɔ sh'aa vuu tɔ, nɔɔ ɔ̃rɛ naa napoo ɓɔɔ gã diki ɓɔɔ zang naa yele ri kagn ɓɛɛ.
59005006	Nɔɔ dɔng zang tɔ̃ɔ ruu, a nɔɔ nyɔ ri vɔrɔ. Ri shii bàng nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang.
59005007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ manzung, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ mã danggn kagn, nɔɔ gã diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ gbãayu ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ zi zang ɓɔɔ ri lang jaa ɓɛɛ. Ri gã vuu ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa ka tipi ɓɛɛ, mii tìng shɔɔnang nɛɛ mii ɓɔɔ gɔɔ nyaa wu arɛ. Mã danggn sasak diki ɓɔɔ wu kpalɛ vuu shaanang ka jaa ɓiɓɛ a nɛɛ mani.
59005008	Nɔɔ mã danggn dɔɔ nɔngkɔ. Nɔɔ shing gn kagn, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki ɓɔɔ Kpanti Yeesɔ a kagn a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.
59005009	Manzung n'ɔɔ gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee ka yuu zɔɔ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ naa jɛ̃ɛ ruu r'uu, kɔ shii tɔ ka nyaa gãa ɓee.
59005010	Manzung, nɔɔ kpaa danggn zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri rang yee Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri dang jìng, a ri ti mã danggn ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ mã danggn doo naa ɓɔɔ ri mã ɓɛɛ kɔ.
59005011	Rùu ɓaa ri ɓuru kaa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ Laa a ri tìnang tãanang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ ri mã gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tãa ruu Ayuba tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ wu mã danggn ka laa ɓɔɔ wu dang jìng ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti tãa tɔ naa ɓɔɔ Laa shing jìng dannang ɓiɓɛ nwǎng wu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Nizang, sisìng Laa nwaa kpang, gn ɓuru kɔng wu katɔ.
59005012	Manzung, vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe nandon keɓe. Nɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ, n'ɔɔ tũng vuu kpang. N'ɔɔ tũng vuu nɛɛ nung Laa kpang. N'ɔɔ ti tũng vuu nɛɛ nung koo keɓe kpang. N'ɔɔ tũng vuu nɛɛ nung vuu ɓɔɔ kpang tingkiring. Nɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ ruu katɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ, “Nn” nɔɔ di nyaa ka nɔngkɔ. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti bɛ̃ɛ ruu katɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ “Kpang”, nɔɔ di nyaa ka nɔngkɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa nɛ̀'ɛ jɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ ruu nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ ɓɛɛ.
59005013	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng manɛ dang jìng ya? Wu gaa Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn tãa ɓi tìnang ya? Wu gaa soo, wu dɔɔ Laa nɛɛ mani.
59005014	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng manɛ vuu palɛ wu katɔ ya? Wu ɓaa nyaa ka zang bang bang gãa Laa, ri gaa wu Laa. Ri tũuru wu nung ka bii nɛɛ nung Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi.
59005015	Naa zang gaa Laa, zang shing danggn kagn waasɛ̃, Laa gaanang keɓe shing kɔnang katɔ wu yaa zang nɔng. Laa wu ti a wu kaka bii. Naa palɛ doo vuu shi kpang, Laa yaa wu gbalang vuu shi kpang keɓe katɔ.
59005016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kɔɔ zɔɔ vuu shi kpang manɛ katɔ, n'ɔɔ gaa zɔɔ Laa, tɔɔ n'ɔɔ valɛ. Laa gaanang zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa palɛ vuu bang bang dɔli.
59005017	Iliya doo shɔnzang naa rukɔ. Gaa Laa, nɛɛ mii wu a kpang. Mii ti 'a kpang saa taati nɛɛ shala mangbete.
59005018	A ti naa gaa Laa tɔkn, mii naa a tɔkn a vuu naa takɛ ka tipi tɔkn.
59005019	Rɛɛ manzung, zang gbete ka teteng manɛ nɛɛ yaa gbalang ɓɔɔ nizang, a zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ sɔɔrɔ wu tɔkn,
59005020	nɔɔ zi ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ shing zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, yaa gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ, ta yuu zang kaɓa tɔ nɛɛ naa vɔrɔ. Laa ti yà'a zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kaɓa gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ katɔ.
60001001	Nkɔ Bituru zang nyaa shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, n bè'e nɔɔ labeenang keɓe, n jee nɔɔ nyaa, zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ zang tantɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti ka rɛɛ tipi Panta nɛɛ Galatiya nɛɛ Kapaadoosiya nɛɛ Asiya a ɓɔɔ tipi Bɛtaniya ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nwalɛ zanti ka nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ.
60001002	Nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ Daa ɓuru Laa zi vuu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu palɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ tɔ, doo ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Suru ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ n'ɔɔ nwang zang ɓiɓɛ, n'ɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa Yeesɔ Kirisi. Zìi Yeesɔ keɓe wu sɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ nwang zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa. Laa wu gisi nɔɔ tìnang tãanang, wu ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ diki diki.
60001003	Ruu dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Laa nɛɛ Daa Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ gbãnggbãng, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, shingnɛ ruu nwàng zang ɓɔɔ zang yi ruu shɔɔ tɔkn ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, gn shinnang ɓuru wu shàarɛ̀ kaa takpang. Ruu walɛ vuu keɓe ka ɓɔɔ zang wisi Yeesɔ paa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ.
60001004	Ruu ti zi tɔ nɛɛ ruu naa walɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa shing ka lapa ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Vuu keɓe ri pũng kpang dondong, ri lasɛ kpang, ri ti shàarɛ̀ kpang tingkiring.
60001005	Laa ti gã nɔɔ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ri zi kati nɛɛ jìng ɓarɛ, nɛɛ Laa ta yuu manɛ ditɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ.
60001006	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ tãa tìnang ta ka ruu rɛɛ vuu kɔ Laa palɛ ɓee. Kãntang keɓe, yeti manɛ lasɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang gãsɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ vuu gãsɛnang ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti zi tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ nɔɔ kagn keɓe bee kpang.
60001007	Vuu gãsɛnang alɛ ka bii manɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri zi kati nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa ɓi ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani. Zinariya ɓɔɔ lasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, zang dɔɔ ka waa, tɔ̀ɔ, zang zirɛ n'ɛɛ ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang palɛ danggn shinnang manɛ ɓɔɔ ɓa zinariya shinang katɔ doo nɔngkɔ. Zang gãsɛ danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa kãntang keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi naa nwang nyaa, zang wu dɔɔ Laa, zang ti a wu bannang ka ruu danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ.
60001008	Nɔɔ zi Yeesɔ gngn nɛɛ jìng manɛ kpang, nɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ doo nɛɛ mani, a nɔɔ ti shing danggn tɔ ka bii ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ tã̀'a tìnang ka yeti manɛ dɔli ɓa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓɛɛ katɔ.
60001009	Naa nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi nɔngkɔ sasak, Laa ta yuu manɛ, a nɔɔ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang.
60001010	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa kɔɔ zang ruu doo ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, ka yuu vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi, nɛɛ wu a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa keɓe ri kãa nɔng, ri hɛ̃ɛlɛ zang nɛɛ ri zǐ vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka yuu naa ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu zang ɓɛɛ.
60001011	Suru Kirisi ɓɔɔ nwang ka yeti ɓarɛ kɔɔrɔ ri naa ɓɔɔ Kirisi naa dang jìng, tɔ̀ɔ, zang naa a wu bannang kati ɓɛɛ. Ri kãa nɔng, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri zi làa ɓɔɔ zang naa p'alɛ̀ vuu keɓe kagn, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang naa p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ.
60001012	A Laa tusu ri nɛɛ ri pàl'ɛ ɓi yuu ɓarɛ shoonang kpang, ri pàl'ɛ ɓi nɔkɔ. Kãntang keɓe, zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ nɔɔ ruu Laa, ri kɔɔ nɔɔ rɛɛ vuu keɓe tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ à nɛɛ lapa a ri naa ɓɛɛ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri zi rɛɛ vuu keɓe jong.
60001013	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ yiti yuu manɛ waasɛ̃ nɔɔ kpalɛ bii tɔ̃ɔ. Nɔɔ ti shing manɛ gn dɔ̃ɔ gbete ka vuu ɓɔɔ Laa naa a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ naa nwang nyaa ɓɛɛ.
60001014	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ wujɛ ɓɔɔ ɓaa shoo katɔ ka yee ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ yaa vuu ɓeleng nɔɔ kasɛ palɛnang bɛɛ nɔɔ zi Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa gn kpang ɓɛɛ ta.
60001015	Naa ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ, nɔɔ nwang zang ɓiɓɛ, palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi kpang, n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang doo kpang kɔ, ka nwannang manɛ ka vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ piti.
60001016	Naa ɓɔɔ zang b'ee ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “N'ɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ka nwannang manɛ kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shi kpang ɓi kagn bii mɛɛ kpang tingkiring ɓɛɛ.”
60001017	Nɔɔ nɛɛ gaa Laa, nɔɔ ɓaa wu nɛɛ, “Daa” nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ka nwannang tɔ̃ɔ manɛ ka vuu piti ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ, ka wee nɔɔ nwang zanti ka koo keɓe ɓee. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa manɛ, dɔ̀ng zang ruu ɓi gn dang gbete kpang, ka naa ɓɔɔ wu palɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
60001018	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, Yeesɔ Kirisi ta yuu manɛ nɛɛ tɔɔ nɔɔ yaa rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ dabang manɛ ri palɛ, ɓɔɔ daa naa kpang ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ ta yuu manɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ lasɛ katɔ naa rɛɛ zinariya nɛɛ azurufa kpang.
60001019	Ta yuu manɛ ɓi nɛɛ zìi bii ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ɓa vuu piti katɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ Kirisi nwàng naa jaa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ zang zɔ̃ngnɛ nɛɛ zang dɔ̀'ɔ Laa ɓɛɛ. Ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, shi kpang ɓi kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
60001020	Ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Laa mãa koo gn kpang, Laa zɔ̃ng Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ wu ta yuu zang nɔngkɔ. A kãntang keɓe, ka wee koo waa nyaa kaa tɔ ɓee, Laa nwangsɛ wu, ka ruu manɛ kɔ.
60001021	Nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Laa ɓɔɔ wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa, a a wu bannang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ shing danggn, a nɔɔ ti shing jìng ka bii Laa.
60001022	Nɔɔ nwangsɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka yeti manɛ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ dũng ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. A nɔɔ ti kàsɛ̀ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ kana nizang. Nɔɔ kàs'ɛ ruu zɔɔ nɔngkɔ gbãnggbãng, nɛɛ yeti manɛ nɛɛ kaka manɛ piti.
60001023	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa yi nɔɔ tɔ shɔɔ tɔkn, nɛɛ bii ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ. Ruu ɓiɓɛ keɓe shing zang katɔ, zang palɛ vuu wu nwang ɓi dondong. Ɓi shɔnzang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ kɔ yi nɔɔ kpang, ɓi Laa ɓɔɔ vɔ ɓi jong kpang kɔ a nɔɔ suru bii keɓe nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ.
60001024	Ɓi naa ɓɔɔ zang b'ee ka yeti labeenang Laa ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Shɔnzang piti ri nwang naa wusi Shinang ɓarɛ ɓi naa mangwaa wusi, wusi nɛɛ tɔɔrɔ tɔ, mangwaa wu lɔɔyi ɓɛɛ.
60001025	A Ruu Laa nwang ɓi dondong”. Ruu keɓe ɓi wukɔ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
60002001	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wee Laa a nɔɔ suru bii shɔɔ tɔ ɓee, nɔɔ nwangsɛ gnvɔ ta nandon ka yeti manɛ, n'ɔɔ suu zang sè'e takpang, n'ɔɔ nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ vuu palɛnang kpang, n'ɔɔ shing jìng ka vuu zang kpang, n'ɔɔ ti rang yee shi kpang tɔ̀'ɔ ka yuu zang kpang.
60002002	Nɔɔ nw'ang manɛ naa wujɛ rɛ̃ɛting ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyɔkɔ mii nà'a ɓarɛ, diki diki ɓɛɛ kɔ jong. Nɔɔ kaa manɛ nyɔkɔ ruu Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ mii ɓɔɔ nizang, ɓɔɔ shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ zũng danggn ɓɛɛ. Diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa ta yuu manɛ wu a nɛɛ mani.
60002003	Nɔɔ zi tɔ, nɛɛ yuu manɛ nɛɛ dabang ɓuru Yeesɔ p'alɛ̀ tɔ̃ɔ dɔli.
60002004	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ a naabm ka bii ɓiɓɛ. Wukɔ tari ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi dondong kaɓa, ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii, ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri bɛ̃ɛyi naa vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ka jìng Laa ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ng wu, wu ɓi zang ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang a wu bannang ɓa zang piti ɓɛɛ.
60002005	Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi a nɔɔ suru bii tɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ nwàng doo naa rɛɛ tari kɔ. Tari ɓɔɔ Laa mãa gãa ɓɔɔ suru nwang kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ manɛ zang ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng ri nɛɛ ri nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔ̀'ɔ wu vuu ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ shòng wu kaa nɛɛ yeti manɛ piti naa ɓɔɔ wu tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi.
60002006	Zang b'ee ka yeti labeenang Laa ka tìng tɛ̃ɛ tɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ, Laa kɔɔyi tɔ̀ɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, N sh'ing tari tɔ̃ɔ ka Sihiyona, tari ɓɔɔ n mãa gãa mɛɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kɔ. Nkɔ zɔ̃ng wu, ɓa vuu piti katɔ ka jìng mɛɛ. Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu wu kpang.”
60002007	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ, Yeesɔ kɔ ɓa vuu piti ka jìng manɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ri naa zirɛ, “Tari ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri mãa gãa ri bɛ̃ɛyi, wukɔ naa ràa tari ɓɔɔ yiti gãa kati.”
60002008	Zang bèe ka nɔng ɓɔɔ ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Wee tari ɓɔɔ zang naa kpaa doo kagn, zang watɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ”. Ri kpaa doo ri watɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri dñ̀ng ruu Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔ kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang nɔngkɔ, doo ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ.
60002009	Ɓɔɔ manɛ, nɔɔ manɛ zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri katɔ ɓɛɛ, rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ri shong kpanti ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ manɛ zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ ri nɛɛ nɔɔ nwang zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ n'ɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang rɛɛ vuu bang bang, ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ wu pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ ka ɓɔɔ wu nwangsɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. A 'atɛ̀ nɔɔ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ nwang ka nɔng ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ.
60002010	Ɓeleng nɔɔ manɛ zang Laa kpang. Kãntang keɓe nɔɔ raa zang Laa tɔ. Ɓeleng nɔɔ zi gn zang ɓɔɔ kɔng Laa ɓɛɛ kpang, kãntang keɓe gn manɛ kɔng wu kaa tɔ.
60002011	Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ manɛ zang zanti. Nɔɔ nwàng manɛ zanti waati ka koo keɓe. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ yaa rɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, rɛɛ vuu keɓe ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri nyɔ nɔɔ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
60002012	Nɔɔ nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang ri zirɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ri rang yee shi kpang doo ka yuu manɛ, ri zili vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ, ri naa dɔ̀ɔ Laa ditɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu naa a ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
60002013	Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa rɛɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ zang shing ri zang bang ka yuu zang ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ, ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi. Nɔɔ seng kpanti ɓɔɔ ɓa rɛɛ kpanti piti ɓɛɛ.
60002014	Nɔɔ ti ɓaa shoo ka nyaa rɛɛ gɔmna ɓɔɔ kpanti keɓe tuu ri nɛɛ ri dang zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang jìng, wu ti dɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
60002015	Laa kasɛ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ yee shi kpang ka yuu manɛ, ri vɔ̃ nyaa kati.
60002016	Nɔɔ nwàng manɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ ri jaafoo zang ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ wee nɔɔ jaafoo zang ɓɔɔ kpang ɓee, nɔɔ walɛ gbalang vuu shi kpang palɛnang tɔ kpang. Nɔɔ nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri pàl'ɛ Laa shoonang ɓɛɛ.
60002017	N'ɔɔ a zang piti bannang katɔ. N'ɔɔ ti kàsɛ̀ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ katɔ. N'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ Laa Katɔ. N'ɔɔ ti a kpanti bannang katɔ.
60002018	Zang shoonang, n'ɔɔ gãsɛ yuu manɛ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ rikɔ dabang gãa manɛ kpang, nɔɔ seng ri katɔ ka vuu piti. Ri nɛɛ palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, k'ɔ ri nɛɛ dang nɔɔ jìng, nɔɔ seng ri gbã̀'agbãa.
60002019	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ mã danggn ka jìng ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa tãa tìnang nwannang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe katɔ, naa nɛɛ dang jìng ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang, zang dɔ̀'ɔ zang keɓe kɔ.
60002020	Naa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, a mã danggn ka ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ, zang dɔ̀'ɔ wu katɔ ya? Zang p'alɛ̀ wu ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ palɛ wu kɔ nwani. Naa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, a zang dang wu jìng ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, a mã danggn, zang keɓe daa naa ɓɔɔ Laa dɔ̀'ɔ wu tɔ.
60002021	Laa ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ, n'ɔɔ nwang zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ naa nɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ a zang dang nɔɔ jìng, nɔɔ mã danggn katɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, dang jìng ka ruu manɛ ɓɛɛ. Nwannang ɓiɓɛ kɔ tusu nɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nw'ang ɓɛɛ.
60002022	Yeesɔ Kirisi p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn kpang tingkiring, sè'e ti nwang gngn nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang.
60002023	Zang ri dãlɛ wu, a dãa zang ɓi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ jong kpang. Ka ɓɔɔ zang dang wu jìng, kɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, wu naa palɛ zang vuu shi kpang ditɔ jong kpang. Shing jìng ɓi ka bii Laa ɓɔɔ dɔ̀ng zang ruu gn dang gbete kpang ɓɛɛ kɔ jong.
60002024	Yeesɔ ta vuu shi kpang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa ka laa ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ruu yi tìng tɔɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang kpang. Ruu nw'angn'ɛ ruu p'al'ɛ kaa vuu tɔ̃ɔ. Kɔnang ɓuru valɛ tɔ nandon, ka ruu nyaa vuu waa ɓɔɔ zang shìli wu ka bii ɓɛɛ.
60002025	Ɓeleng nɔɔ nwang manɛ naa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ ning katɔ ɓɛɛ, kãntang keɓe, nɔɔ gbãayu tɔ, nɔɔ dũng kaa zang ɓɔɔ gã nɔɔ, kasɛ kpang nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu lee nɔɔ naa ka bii kpang.
60003001	Doo nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang soro ɓɛɛ, n'ɔɔ gãsɛ yuu nɛɛ varɛ manɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa varɛ zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shing danggn ka ruu Laa kpang, nwannang tɔ̃ɔ soro ɓiɓɛ shing wu katɔ, wu arɛ, wu dũng ruu Laa naa nɔɔ rang ri yee doo nɛɛ nyaa manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
60003002	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, varɛ manɛ ri zìl'i nwannang tɔ̃ɔ manɛ, ri ti zìl'i naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ Laa ɓɛɛ.
60003003	N'ɔɔ tɔɔ kpang nɛɛ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ diki diki ka yuu naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gbarɛ bii manɛ nɛɛ yuu tinang ɓɔɔ n'aabm̀, nɔɔ hãa vutu zinariya ka turu, nɔɔ ti hãalɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka bii ɓɛɛ kpang.
60003004	Shinang manɛ wu tusu bii ka nwannang tɔ̃ɔ manɛ kɔ jong. Nwang kikiri mɔɔ tuu yuu ɓaaɓɛ kpang, zɔ̃ng shinang keɓe kɔ làsɛ̀ ɓi kpang, ti nwǎng mɔɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ka tìng Laa.
60003005	Zang soro ɓɔɔ ri ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng ka bii Laa, ri gb'ar'ɛ bii ɓarɛ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri gãsɛ yuu nɛɛ varɛ ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
60003006	Saratu nwang doo nwannang keɓe kɔ. A Ibirayi bannang, ɓaa wu nɛɛ, “Daa mɛɛ”. Nɔɔ nɛɛ nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ ti kaa vɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ, kãntang nɔɔ kaa wujɛ ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
60003007	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ varɛ zang ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ soro manɛ, nɔɔ zi tɔ, ri lakɛ naa ka bii naa nɔkɔ kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ a ri bannang jong ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nandon nɔɔ wàl'ɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ Laa a zang waati kɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ zãayi, Laa tãa gaanang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaa wu kpang ɓɛɛ kagn kpang.
60003008	N hangsɛ nɔɔ nyaa ruu kaa nɛɛ ruu keɓe. Nɔɔ nandon nyaa manɛ wu daa gbete, gn zɔɔ wu kɔng nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ rɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɛɛ. N'ɔɔ ti pàlɛ̀ zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ katɔ, a n'ɔɔ ti lakɛ jìng kpang.
60003009	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ shi kpang, n'ɔɔ ti palɛ ri doo shi kpang kɔ kpang. Zang ri nɛɛ dãa nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ ti dãa ri jong kpang. Nɔɔ gaa ri manɛ Laa kɔ jong, wu pàlɛ̀ ri tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa shɛ̃ɛrɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ wu pàl'ɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
60003010	Zang bee ka yeti Labeenang Laa tɔɔ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ nɛɛ wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ, wu tãa tìnang, wu ràng yee ɓɔɔ shi kpang takpang. Wu ti suu sè'e takpang.
60003011	Wu yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang, wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii katɔ ɓɛɛ. Wu kãa gbalang ɓɔɔ wu nwang nɛɛ zang ka nyaa zɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wu shing jìng ka wukɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
60003012	Laa gãng jìng ɓi ka zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ti ɓ'aa shoo katɔ ka ɓɔɔ ri gaa wu ɓɛɛ. Bɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi katɔ”.
60003013	Naa mɔɔ shing ka yeti ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ, mɔɔ palɛ ɓaa tɔ̃ɔ kɔ gbete, zang ɓɔɔ palɛ mɔɔ shi kpang kagn ya?
60003014	Naa zang dàng mɔɔ doo jìng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii katɔ, Laa pàl'ɛ mɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ katɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri palɛ mɔɔ shi kpang, kpang. Vuu ɓɔɔ wu ti kpãa mɔɔ kpang.
60003015	Shing jìng ɓaa ka ɓɔɔ mɔɔ a Yeesɔ Kirisi bannang kɔ jong gbete. Wu nw'ang kpanti ɓaaɓɛ ka vuu piti. Nɔɔ kpalɛ bii manɛ katɔ diki diki, n'ɔɔ kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri hɛ̃ɛ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ, nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
60003016	Ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kɔɔ zang ruu Laa ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ katɔ kpang, nɔɔ seng zang katɔ. Nɔɔ ti p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ tɔɔ ri rang yee shi kpang ka yuu manɛ, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu ri ka ɓɔɔ ri dãlɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri naa zǐ nwannang manɛ ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Kirisi ditɔ ɓɛɛ.
60003017	Naa nɔɔ dang jìng ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ, Laa nɛɛ kàs'ɛ nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ dang j'ìng ka ruu shi kpang palɛnang ɓɛɛ.
60003018	Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ dang jìng, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓuru a hangsɛ shoonang keɓe doo gbete. Zang ɓɔɔ ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa, vɔ ka ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, wu atɛ ruu ka bii Laa. Zang ri nyɔ wu vɔrɔ, a Laa wisi wu paa nɛɛ sàa tɔkn.
60003019	Ka knti ɓɔɔ Laa a wu suru bii tɔ, daayi daa ràng rɛɛ suru shi kpang Ruu Laa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang mã ri kagn ɓɛɛ.
60003020	Suru shi kpang keɓe, ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri bɛ̃ɛ ruu Laa dũnnang doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, ka ɓɔɔ Laa mã danggn, gã ri ka diki ɓɔɔ Nuhu p'alɛ̀ laana ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa, zang mantaati ɓɔɔ ri vang laana, ri wɔrɛ.
60003021	Mii kaɓa tùs'u zang ɓi kaa batizima ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe ta yuu manɛ ɓɛɛ. Batizima ɓɔɔ zang pàl'ɛ nɔɔ, sɔɔ nɔɔ manɛ bii rìiti manɛ kpang, ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ ruu gaa Laa nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ wu kɔsɔ ruu vuu shi kpang nɛɛ yeti ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Laa ta yuu ɓuru ka ruu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi yupaa nɛɛ sàa ɓɛɛ.
60003022	Yeesɔ Kirisi daa tɔ ka lapa, nwàng ɓi kaa nɔng nwannang bang ka nakn Laa. Ti roo kpanti jong ka yuu rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa nɛɛ rɛɛ suru ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ kagn piti.
60004001	Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi dang jìng nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kpalɛ bii doo nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ dang jìng nɛɛ bii manɛ naa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ dang jìng tɔ nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ, yaa vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓi tɔ ɓɛɛ.
60004002	Vuu ɓɔɔ yi nɛɛ lɛɛkɔ, nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ manɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, wu vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
60004003	Nɔɔ suukãng tɔ dɔli, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri zi Laa kpang ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ di nyaa ta ka nɔngkɔ. Ɓeleng nɔɔ nwang manɛ nwannang ɓɔɔ daa naa kpang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ palɛ manɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti manɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ ɓooro vuu ɓɔɔ si nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ gaarɛ zɔɔ nɔɔ tãa tìnang diki diki, nɔɔ ɓooro sàa, nɔɔ ti bang vaka, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa dang nyaa nɛɛ n'ɔɔ p'alɛ̀ kpang ɓɛɛ.
60004004	Kãntang keɓe nɔɔ kp'alɛ̀ zɔɔ tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ ri, nɔɔ palɛ zɔ̃ng rɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ɓa kaka katɔ kaɓa kpang. Ɓɔɔ ri zi naa weɓe ri mã naa kaa danggn, ri dãa nɔɔ.
60004005	Diki a doo kana, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dãa nɔɔ keɓe, ri naa shii ka tìng Laa, ri kɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ ri nwàng ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ. Diki bee kpang, ɓɔɔ Laa naa dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri ningkãari ka koo keɓe nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ruu ɓɛɛ.
60004006	Kirisi ràng zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ruu Laa tɔ jong nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, suru bii ɓarɛ wu nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ Laa nwàng ɓɛɛ. Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ Laa jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu tɔ kaa ɓɔɔ ri ka koo keɓe naa ɓɔɔ wu jɛ̃ɛ zang piti ɓɛɛ.
60004007	Diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe waa nyaa kagn, a naabm tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ yiti yuu manɛ waasɛ̃, n'ɔɔ shii tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ gaa Laa kati.
60004008	Nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ gbãnggbãng nɛɛ yeti manɛ nandon, wukɔ ɓa vuu piti. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang, nɔɔ yaa ri gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri pàlɛ̀ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ katɔ.
60004009	Nɔɔ ta zang ɓɔɔ ri a ka gãa manɛ katɔ, n'ɔɔ gɔ̃ɔrɔ yee kagn kpang.
60004010	Laa palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ ka gbalang n'aabm̀ n'aabm̀. Laa a zang ɓu naa vuu palɛnang wu palɛ vuu ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓu wu palɛ tɔ̃ɔ, wu palɛ shoonang nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ Laa a wu, wu yi zang ɓɔɔ naa ka bii.
60004011	Zang ɓɔɔ Laa nɛɛ a wu naa yee rannang, wu rang yee ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zunung ɓɔɔ wu shŏng zang katɔ, wu shong nɛɛ kaka ɓɔɔ Laa a wu piti. Nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri dɔɔ Laa ka ruu vuu piti, ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi. Bannang nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ dondong. Nɔngkɔ.
60004012	Rɛɛ masang, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, n'ɔɔ mã naa ka danggn ka ruu rɛɛ jìng dannang ɓɔɔ bang dɔli kɔ ri alɛ ka bii manɛ ɓee kpang. Vuu keɓe ri alɛ nɛɛ ri gãsɛ danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n'ɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ kpang nɛɛ ɓi vuu shɔɔ kpang.
60004013	N'ɔɔ tãa tìnang kɔ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kpalɛ yuu manɛ doo ka jìng dannang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ dang ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ tusu bannang ɓiɓɛ tɔ, nɔɔ tãa tìnang kaa dɔli.
60004014	Naa zang ri dãa nɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Kirisi, n'ɔɔ tãa manɛ tìnang. Naa nɔɔ dang jìng nɔngkɔ, Suru Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti bannang katɔ, ɓi nɛɛ nɔɔ ning.
60004015	Naa zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ dang jìng ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, naa nyɔ zang vɔrɔ, naa ɓɔɔ zang viri, naa zang ɓɔɔ kàs'ɛ nyaa ka ruu kɛɛm kɛɛm ɓɛɛ, zang dɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ dang jìng ka ruu rɛɛ vuu keɓe katɔ ya? Zang gbete ka teteng manɛ wu dang jìng ɓi nɔngkɔ kpang.
60004016	Naa zang ɓɔɔ dang jìng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ wu dũng Kirisi, yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu wu kpang. Wu zãa ɓi Laa kɔ jong, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang gã wu ɓi kaa teteng rɛɛ zang Kirisi ɓɛɛ.
60004017	Diki a tɔ, ɓɔɔ Laa dɔng zang ruu ɓɛɛ, gaayu dɔng zang ɓiɓɛ kɔ ruu shɔɔnang. Laa nɛɛ gaayu nɛɛ dɔng rukɔ ruu shɔɔnang, a naa hangsɛ nyaa ɓi kaa biya nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa kpang viya?
60004018	Zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Ɓɔɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ri wɔrɛ, zang dɔng ri ruu kpang, kpãa nyaa dɔli. Nɛɛ nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ri dũng Laa kpang, ri palɛ ɓarɛ kaa biya?”
60004019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dang jìng ka ruu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔ kasɛ nɔngkɔ, ri palɛ tɔ̃ɔ diki diki, ri ti a Laa yuu ɓarɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ mãa ruu, a ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu palɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
60005001	Ruu ɓɔɔ n kɔɔ rɛɛ zang bang Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka teteng manɛ kagn. N m doo zang bang kɔ. N zi jìng ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ dang ɓɛɛ nɛɛ jìng mɛɛ. N ti naa walɛ bannang jong nɛɛ nɔɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa a ruu bannang keɓe ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n gaa nɔɔ n tɔɔ n'ɔɔ,
60005002	gãng jìng ka rɛɛ zang Laa ɓɔɔ Laa a nɔɔ ri ka naa ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ n'ɔɔ gãng jìng ka ri naa ɓɔɔ jagang gang jìng ka mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu lee ri naa ka bii kpang. N'ɔɔ gãng jìng wu naa zang mã nɔɔ nyaa kagn kpang, nɔɔ gãng jìng naa vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa tìnang palɛnang katɔ nɛɛ yeti gbete ɓɛɛ. Wu ka ruu saka ɓɔɔ zang shu nɔɔ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ kasɛ tɔ ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ shoonang keɓe katɔ ɓɛɛ.
60005003	N'ɔɔ p'alɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ Laa a nɔɔ ri ka naa, nɛɛ n'ɔɔ gãng jìng ka ri nɛɛ kaka kpang. Nɔɔ nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ ri zirɛ, ri dũng ɓɛɛ kɔ jong.
60005004	Naa nɔɔ palɛ nɔngkɔ, ka diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti jagang tusu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, zang piti ri zi wu nɛɛ jìng, naa a nɔɔ bannang. Zang kãng nɔɔ lapoo yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ ka yuu. Kɔlɔnang lapoo keɓe tù ɓi kpang dondong. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ɓa suru shi kpang yuu tɔ ɓɛɛ.
60005005	Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ manɛ doo jasang n kɔɔ nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa rɛɛ zang bang. Ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nandon ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ seng zɔɔ katɔ, a nɔɔ kpalɛ bii diki diki n'ɔɔ shòng zɔɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang bee ka yeti labeenang Laa nɛɛ, “Laa kasɛ ruu zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ kpang, a ɓi zang ɓɔɔ ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ kpang tìnang tãanang.”
60005006	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ n'ɔɔ tuu yuu manɛ ka tìng Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti zang piti ɓɛɛ kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, wu naa shing nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ nwang zang bang ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
60005007	Nɔɔ yaa vuu ɓɔɔ kpãa nɔɔ piti ka naa ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ gãng jìng ka nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
60005008	Nɔɔ yiti yuu manɛ waasɛ̃ nɔɔ ti gãng jìng waasɛ̃, sheetang zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ nɔɔ kpang kaɓa rakɛ nɛɛ nɔng piti piti. Nwang ɓi zing ɓɔɔ shaa varɛ ɓɛɛ, kãa vuu ɓɔɔ wu shaa ɓɛɛ.
60005009	N'ɔɔ yàa wu gbalang kpang, nɔɔ shii gbãnggbãng. Nɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Laa diki diki n'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Nɔɔ zi tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng piti piti ka koo keɓe, ri dang jìng doo nɔngkɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dǎng ɓɛɛ.
60005010	Nɔɔ nɛɛ dang jìng tɔ nɔngkɔ tɔkɔlɔng, Laa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ piti a nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ n'ɔɔ naa nwang nɛɛ Kirisi, ka nɔng bannang ɓiɓɛ dondong ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ naa gbarɛ nɔɔ tɔkn, wu ti naa shingnɛ nɔɔ shii nɛɛ kaka ka yeti vuu piti.
60005011	Kpanti roonang Laa wu nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ kɔ dondong. Nɔngkɔ.
60005012	Ɓi Siila yì m naa kagn, a bèe nɔɔ labeenang tɔkɔlɔng kɔ n a nɔɔ ɓee. N zi tɔ Siila ɓi doo zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kɔ nɛɛ ruu. Siila daa naa ɓɔɔ zang shing gn ka bii ɓiɓɛ tɔ. N bè'e nɔɔ ruu keɓe n tɔɔ, n mã nɔɔ danggn. N ti kɔɔ nɔɔ faarik nɛɛ nizang, wee ɓi naa ɓɔɔ Laa pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ sh'ii nɛɛ kaka ka rɛɛ vuu keɓe.
60005013	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka Babila, ɓɔɔ Laa ti zõ̀ng ri doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ ri jee nɔɔ nyaa. Jaa mɛɛ Maraku jee nɔɔ nyaa jong.
60005014	Nɔɔ jee zɔɔ nyaa n'ɔɔ kɔ̃ng zɔɔ ka danggn, zang zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ. Yeti manɛ nandon, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Yeesɔ Kirisi wu valɛ katɔ.
61001001	Labeenang keɓe, nɛɛ naa mɛɛ, nkɔ Siman Bituru, nkɔ jaafoo Yeesɔ Kirisi, nkɔ ti zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ. N bè'e nɔɔ labeenang keɓe, nɔɔ nandon ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi naa ɓɔɔ ruu shing jong ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu tɔ̃ɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru nɛɛ nɔɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ Laa, ruu walɛ gbalang, a ruu shing danggn keɓe.
61001002	Laa wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, wu shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu ti valɛ katɔ, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi vuu ka yuu Laa nɛɛ yuu Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ ka yuu zɔɔ, yuu zɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
61001003	Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ shingnɛ a ruu zi Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ zɔ̃ng ruu nɛɛ ruu nwang nɛɛ wu ka nɔng bannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a ruu ti nwang zɔ̃ng nwannang tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu zi Laa tɔ, a ruu vuu piti nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ yi ruu naa kagn, ruu nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ, ruu ti dũng gbalang ɓɔɔ Laa tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ.
61001004	Ka gbalang keɓe, a ruu vuu bang bang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu a ruu ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ naa nwǎng ruu vuu tɔ̃ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Palɛ vuu keɓe nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ka ruu rɛɛ vuu keɓe, ruu wɔ nɛɛ naa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ zang koo keɓe ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ yi tìng kɔ jong. Laa wu a nɔɔ zɔ̃ng nwannang ɓiɓɛ.
61001005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, wee nɔɔ shing danggn tɔ ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓee, nɔɔ gisi nwannang tɔ̃ɔ kaa gn, n'ɔɔ ti gisi zũnang ka yuu nwannang tɔ̃ɔ manɛ.
61001006	Wu zũnang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, nɔɔ ti yiti yuu manɛ waasɛ̃. Nɔɔ ti mã danggn gbãnggbãng, nɔɔ nɛɛ mã danggn tɔ, nɔɔ ti nwang nwannang ɓɔɔ Laa tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ.
61001007	Nɔɔ pàlɛ̀ zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, naa nɔɔ jaanaa gbete, ka yuu nwannang keɓe. Nɔɔ ti kasɛ zang piti.
61001008	Naa nɔɔ palɛ rɛɛ vuu keɓe diki diki, zinang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zì Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi naa nwǎng nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ katɔ. Nwannang manɛ ti nwǎng nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ katɔ.
61001009	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ p'alɛ̀ rɛɛ vuu keɓe kpang, nwang naa zang jìng ringtang ɓɔɔ zi vuu ɓɔɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Danggn ning wu tɔ nɛɛ, Laa yàa wu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ɓeleng wu palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ.
61001010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rɛɛ manzung, n gaa nɔɔ, nɔɔ shing jìng kagn, nɔɔ palɛ rɛɛ vuu keɓe nɛɛ kaka manɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓaa nɔɔ nyaa a ti zɔ̃ng nɔɔ nɛɛ n'ɔɔ palɛ naa weɓe kɔ ɓɛɛ. Naa nɔɔ palɛ rɛɛ vuu keɓe, nɔɔ yaa gbalang Laa kpang dondong.
61001011	Ka gbalang keɓe kɔ, nɔɔ naa walɛ gbalang daanang nɔng ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi naa roo kpanti. Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ wukɔ ti ta yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Ruu naa daa nwang nɛɛ wu ka nɔng kaɓa dondong.
61001012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kpàar'ɛ nɔɔ danggn rɛɛ vuu keɓe doo nɛɛ mani ka wee nɔɔ zi ri tɔ, a nɔɔ ti shii tɔ gbãnggbãng ka yuu ruu nizang kɔ nɔɔ ta ɓee.
61001013	Ka wee n doo ningkãari ka koo ɓee, n zirɛ tɔ̃ɔ n kpàarɛ̀ nɔɔ danggn rɛɛ vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ n'ɔɔ kpalɛ bii diki diki.
61001014	N zi tɔ, diki yaa ka tɔkɔlɔng n vɔ kaa tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔɔ m doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ.
61001015	N palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n zunung katɔ ɓɛɛ ditɔ, n shing nɔɔ danggn rɛɛ vuu keɓe wu ning nɔɔ kpang, ka knti ɓɔɔ bɛɛ n vɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ.
61001016	Rùu kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu, naa ɓɔɔ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi naa a nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu kɔɔrɔ keɓe wu ruu gbãagbãa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang nwangsɛ nɛɛ zũnang ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ruu zi bannang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ jìng ɓuru.
61001017	Ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa tusu ruu bannang nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ, ruu ka nɔng. Ruu ti tãa katɔ ka ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti bannang kɔɔyi ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Wee Jaa mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ katɔ gbãnggbãng ɓɛɛ kɔ, shing m n tãa tìnang dɔli.”
61001018	Bɛɛ ruu nɛɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ ka yuu kɔpɔ Laa, a ruu tãa yee ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ lapa nɛɛ shoo ɓuru.
61001019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, r'uu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀, ɓi nizang kɔ nwani. Naa nɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka ruu keɓe waasɛ̃, wukɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kaɓa nwàng naa waa zà'ang sɔɔ ɓɔɔ yakɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, nɔng gãntɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ka diki keɓe, ɓɔɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ sang yuu gãndi naa arɛ, nɔɔ naa zi vuu piti kaa wukɔ gbayi gbayi.
61001020	Vuu ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe, n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ ruu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri kɔɔrɔ, ɓɔɔ ri b'eere ka labeenang Laa. Rikɔ kɔɔrɔ dìiri ruu bì'i nɛɛ zũnang ɓarɛ kpang.
61001021	Ruu ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ri kɔɔyi nwang ɓi nɛɛ rɛ̃rɛnang shɔnzang kpang. Ɓi Suru Laa kɔ a zang naa, wu ti shing zang, zang kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.
61002001	Ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ sè'e, ri nw'ang nyaa ka teteng rɛɛ zang Laa. Kãntang keɓe doo nɔngkɔ, maalang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu sè'e, ri naa nwang nyaa ditɔ ka teteng manɛ. Ri naa arɛ, ri tusu zang vuu sè'e ɓɔɔ shing zang ri ning gbalang ɓɛɛ. Ri naa laa nyaa nɛɛ ri zi dabang ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ t'a yuu ɓarɛ ka vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang. Ka ruu vuu kɔ ri palɛ ɓee, diki bee kpang, jìng dannang bang a ditɔ ka yuu ɓarɛ, wu nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ.
61002002	Zang dɔli ri naa palɛ dũndũng ɓɔɔ maalang keɓe ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ri shing zang kati zang ri rang ruu shi kpang ka yuu gbalang Laa ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
61002003	Rɛɛ maalang ɓɔɔ tùs'u zang vuu sè'e kaɓa, ri shing jìng ɓarɛ ka vuu zang, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri naa nwaarɛ nɔɔ nɛɛ sè'e, tɔ̀ɔ, ri walɛ vuu kaa naa manɛ. Laa dɔng ri ruu ɓi tɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, kpalɛ bii tɔ nɛɛ wu dang ri jìng. Diki ɓɔɔ wu naa ningsi ri dɔ̃ɔ gbete, a naabm tɔ.
61002004	Ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, gn ɓarɛ kɔng Laa kpang. Laa yiki ri, vang ri ka nɔng waa. Zang mã̀lɛ̀ ri doo nɛɛ saka, ka nɔng waa kaɓa ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ kɔngkɔng ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, diki ɓɔɔ zang naa jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu wu a nɛɛ mani.
61002005	Zang ɓeleng ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang gn ɓarɛ kɔng Laa doo kpang kɔ. Shingnɛ mii kpayi, nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang nandon. Ta ɓi yuu Nuhu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Nuhu kɔɔrɔ zang nɛɛ zang ri palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ta yuu Nuhu nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ, ri manziti.
61002006	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ gari Sɔɔdɔm nɛɛ Gomora doo nɔngkɔ, Laa ti dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ kagn ruu. A dɔɔ rɛɛ gari ziti keɓe dɔ̃ɔ gbete nɛɛ waa, yaa pũngku ɓarɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning ka tipi. Wee tusu zang nɛɛ zang ri zi naa ɓɔɔ wu dang zang ɓɔɔ ri naa dñ̀ng nyaa ɓiɓɛ kpang jìng ɓɛɛ.
61002007	Ka diki kaɓa, ta yuu Lootu ɓɔɔ wukɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, dũndũng ɓɔɔ zang shi kpang kaɓa ri palɛ ka gari, kpãa Lootu ka yeti dɔli ɓɛɛ.
61002008	Lootu zang tɔ̃ɔ kaɓa, nwang ka teteng zang shi kpang. Zìl'i zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ diki diki ɓɛɛ. Ti tã̀l'ɛ ruu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa ri palɛ, làsɛ̀ wu yeti dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
61002009	Ruu Nuhu nɛɛ Lootu tusu ruu nɛɛ Laa zi gbalang ɓɔɔ wu naa ta yuu zang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani tɔ, nɛɛ naa vuu ɓɔɔ gãsɛ ri ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe kɔ, ti tusu nɛɛ Laa zi gbalang ɓɔɔ wu naa dang zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang jìng tɔ, diki ɓɔɔ wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu kagn, wu a nɛɛ mani.
61002010	Jìng dannang keɓe naa a ka bii zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ka naa ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri ti bɛ̃ɛ naa vuu palɛnang Laa katɔ ɓɛɛ. Maalang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu sè'e keɓe, ri kaa vɔrɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang, ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ dɔli. Ri ti kaa vɔrɔ ruu shi kpang kɔɔrɔnang ka yuu zang bang bang ɓɔɔ ri ka tìng Laa ka lapa, ɓɔɔ zang a ri bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ri dãlɛ ri ɓarɛ katɔ kɔ jong.
61002011	Doo zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɔɔ ri ɓa rɛɛ maalang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu sè'e keɓe kaka katɔ nɛɛ bannang, ri dãlɛ ri nɔngkɔ ka tìng Laa kpang.
61002012	Zang keɓe ri rangkɛ yee shi kpang ka yuu vuu ɓɔɔ ri zi tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ vuu naa shoko. Ri palɛ vuu teetee naa yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ zang yi ri nɛɛ, ri nɛɛ bang tɔ, zang yirɛ zang yee ɓɛɛ. Nizang, ri shaarɛ doo nɔngkɔ, naa yɔpɔ jìngti, zang tãa nung ɓarɛ takpang.
61002013	Laa naa dang ri jìng jong ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri dang zang jìng ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri tãa ɓarɛ tìnang naa doo nɛɛ laagɛ̃ piti. Nwannang ɓarɛ ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu nɔɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri nwalɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ, ri shaa vuu shaanang a ɓeekpang ri nwaarɛ nɔɔ manɛ waati. Ri palɛ ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
61002014	Ri pɛ̃ɛrɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ kpang, diki diki jìng ɓarɛ ɓi ka zang soro ɓɔɔ ri rakɛ, wà'azaa ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, ri palɛ dũndũng nɛɛ ri. Ri lee vuu shi kpang palɛnang ɓarɛ kpang. Naa ri zi zang ɓɔɔ shii ka gbalang Laa nɛɛ kaka kpang, ri nwaarɛ ri, ri shing ri, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang. Ri shing jìng ɓarɛ ka vuu zang kɔ diki, diki. Zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ naa weɓe, Laa dɔng ri ruu ɓarɛ tɔ.
61002015	Ri yaa gbalang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ, ri dũng ɓarɛ kaa gbalang Balamu jaa Beeyɔ kɔ jong. Ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, Balamu kasɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ, wu palɛ vuu shi kpang nɛɛ tɔɔ zang a wu saka.
61002016	A zang mangkɛ wu ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Ka diki kaɓa, seesaa ɓɔɔ rang yee ɓi jong kpang, rang wu yee naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang rang ɓɛɛ. Seesaa bì'i zãa zang nyaa shoonang Laa keɓe, vuu shoko ɓɔɔ wu nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
61002017	Maalang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu sè'e keɓe, ri nwang ɓarɛ naa too mii ɓɔɔ ɔ̃ɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri nwang naa sãmbong mii ɓɔɔ jasung tantɛ, atɛ mii kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa yaa ri nɔng ɓarɛ kagn ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ, katɔ kɔngkɔng ɓɛɛ.
61002018	Ri rangkɛ yee bang bang ɓɔɔ waati ka yuu ɓarɛ. Ri ti kasɛ ri nwaarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri yaa vaa zang ɓɔɔ ri zi gbalang Laa kpang ɓɛɛ. Maalang ɓɔɔ ri tusu zang vuu sè'e keɓe, ri kasɛ nɛɛ ri shing zang, zang ri palɛ zɔ̃ng dũndũng piti nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri tãa tìnang palɛnang doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
61002019	Ri kɔɔrɔ zang kaɓa nɛɛ ri naa yaa ri naa ditɔ, a ɓeekpang ɓɔɔ ri rang yee keɓe, ri zunung naa ɓɔɔ ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Naa vuu ɓɔɔ yiti zang, zang zunung yaanang kpang, zang nwang ɓi kaa jaafoo vuu bì'i.
61002020	Naa zang ri zi Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ Kpanti ɓuru, a wukɔ ti ta yuu ɓuru, a ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang ri nwang zang shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri nɛɛ naa ràa jìng tɔkn, ri gaayu rɛɛ vuu shi kpang keɓe palɛnang nɛɛ knti, nwannang ɓarɛ naa lasɛ, ɓa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang kaa tɔ.
61002021	Ri nɛ̀'ɛ zi gbalang ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kpang gbã̀'agbãa, wukɔ nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ. Ka ɓɔɔ ri zi tɔ, ri naa yaa nyaa dannang Laa tɔkn ri dũng takpang ɓɛɛ.
61002022	Vuu kɔ zɔ̃ng zang keɓe ri palɛ ɓee, daa teetee nɛɛ nyaa vuu jeenang ɓɔɔ zang ɓuru ri kɔɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ, “Zaa gbã̀ayu daa sh'aa jennang ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ ti nɛɛ gãnya ɓɔɔ zang sɔɔ wu bii katɔ, gbãayu ɓi tɔ, daa gbãa bii ɓi kana ɔ̃ti tɔkn.”
61003001	Masang, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, n bè'e nɔɔ labeenang daa kaa nɛɛ weɓe doo ziti. Ka yeti labeenang ziti keɓe, n kpàa nɔɔ danggn rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ nɔɔ zi tɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ rɛ̃rɛ kaa tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu rɛɛ vuu keɓe.
61003002	N kasɛ nɛɛ danggn ruu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri kɔɔ ka tìng doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Danggn nyaa dannang ɓɔɔ dabang ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru kɔɔ zang shoonang, ɓɔɔ wu shongko ri ka bii manɛ, nɛɛ ri kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, wu ti ning nɔɔ kpang.
61003003	Vuu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zi shɔɔnang keɓe. N kasɛ nɛɛ nɔɔ zirɛ nɛɛ ka diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe waa nyaa kaatɔ, zang ɓɔɔgn ri nwangkɛ nyaa, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe, ri naa kpaa nɔɔ katɔ.
61003004	Ri naa kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔɔ zang nɛɛ wu gbãayu katɔ nizang, a wu kaa kiya? Dabang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ta ruu Laa, ri vɔlɔ tɔ, vuu piti ɓi doo naa ɓeleng. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ koo gaayu katɔ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ bii gn kpang.”
61003005	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ naa weɓe kaɓa, ri kasɛ kpang, nɛɛ ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ Laa rang yee waati, a lapa nɛɛ tipi nwangsɛ bii kpang. Nwangsɛ tipi nɛɛ yeti mii, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, palɛ tipi ɓi kaa nɛɛ mii.
61003006	Laa ningsi koo ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang doo nɛɛ mii kɔ, ka laa ɓɔɔ mii bang kpayi shaa koo nandon ɓɛɛ.
61003007	A yee ɓɔɔ Laa rangnɛ kɔ shingnɛ, lapa nɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ kãntang keɓe, wu nwangnɛ, wu gã diki ɓɔɔ waa naa lasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nandon ɓɛɛ. Yaa vuu piti ka nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ wu naa dɔng zang piti ruu, wu ti ningsi zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, a ri dũng wu kpang ɓɛɛ.
61003008	Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, danggn wu ning nɔɔ vuu tɔ̃ɔ gbete keɓe kpang. Ka jìng Laa, diki gbete ɓi naa saa labang gbete. A saa labang gbete, ɓi naa diki gbete. Ka jìng ɓiɓɛ ri ɓarɛ gbete.
61003009	Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ Laa suu zang kãng dɔli, p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Ɓi nɔngkɔ kpang, Laa mã ɓi danggn kɔ jong nɛɛ nɔɔ. Laa yaa zang ɓi gbalang nɛɛ, wu yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ. Kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ wu shaarɛ kpang, kasɛ nɛɛ zang piti ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
61003010	Naa doo nɔngkɔ piti, diki nɛɛ a tɔ, Kpanti Yeesɔ Kirisi naa gbãayu naa shɔngɓɔ ka diki kaɓa, zang ri naa tãa nyaa ɓɔɔ zang mɛɛ ɓɛɛ, a lapa wu ning kati. Waa wu shaa vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ koo kati nandon. Tipi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ piti naa ning katɔ nandon.
61003011	Wee nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, vuu piti naa yaalɛ nɔngkɔ ɓee, nɔɔ nwang nwannang manɛ waasɛ̃. Nɔɔ a Laa yuu manɛ dɔ̃ɔ gbete, nɔɔ dũng wu ka vuu piti ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
61003012	Nɔɔ shing jìng manɛ ka diki Laa, n'ɔɔ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa shingnɛ diki kaɓa naa a pati ɓɛɛ. Diki kaɓa, ɓɔɔ waa shaa lapa kagn, tɔ̀ɔ, wu ning kati ɓɛɛ. A waa wu ti yaalɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka lapa nɛɛ koo nandon ɓɛɛ.
61003013	Laa kɔɔ ruu ɓuru tɔ, nɛɛ wu naa mãa lapa shɔɔ nɛɛ koo shɔɔ. Nɔng ɓɔɔ vuu piti naa nwang ɓi tɔ̃ɔ diki diki ɓɛɛ. Wee ɓi vuu ɓɔɔ ruu gã ɓɛɛ kɔ.
61003014	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ ka wee nɔɔ gã diki ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ a tɔkn ɓee, nɔɔ shing yuu manɛ n'ɔɔ nwang nwannang tɔ̃ɔ, tɔ̀ɔ Laa wu kɔɔ kpang. Nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kpang, nɔɔ nwang kaa nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ wu.
61003015	Nɔɔ zirɛ, Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi suukãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n'ɔɔ walɛ gbalang Laa wu ta yuu manɛ kati ɓɛɛ. Manzung ɓuru Bulu ɓɔɔ ruu kasɛ ruu ɓiɓɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, bee nɔɔ labeenang doo nɔngkɔ, nɛɛ zũnang ɓɔɔ Laa a wu ɓɛɛ, a kɔɔ nɔɔ doo naa weɓe kɔ.
61003016	Ka yeti rɛɛ labeenang ɓɔɔ wu beere nandon, kɔɔrɔ zɔ̃ng vuu keɓe kɔ. Ka rɛɛ labeenang ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, ruu ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ kpãa nyaa dɔli ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri zũng kpang, ɓɔɔ ri yiti vuu ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn kagn gbãnggbãng kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri risi ruu keɓe naa ɓɔɔgn naa ɓɔɔ ri risi ruu nimbang ɓɔɔ ka yeti labeenang Laa ɓɛɛ. Wee ri palɛ nɔngkɔ ɓee, ri sh'ing ɓarɛ nɛɛ Laa wu naa ningsi ri katɔ.
61003017	Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ manɛ nɔɔ zi vuu keɓe manɛ tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ gãng jìng waasɛ̃. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng nyaa Laa kpang, ri nɛ̀'ɛ shing nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓee. R'i nɛɛ ti wàl'ɛ gbalang ri shing nɔɔ, n'ɔɔ yaa nɔng tɔ̃ɔ kɔ nɔɔ shii kagn ɓɛɛ.
61003018	Nɔɔ dũng manɛ Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ jong, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ta yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kaa yuu zɔɔ, yuu zɔɔ. Zinang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi wu, wu ti daa ka tìng. Zang ri a wukɔ bannang dondong. Nɔngkɔ.
62001001	Ruu bè'e nɔɔ ruu ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ nwang ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ bɛɛ Laa gaayu koo mãanang gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ruu tãa ruu ɓiɓɛ, a ruu ti zi wu nɛɛ jìng ɓuru. Ruu pɛ̃ɛrɛ wu, a ruu ti lee wu nɛɛ naa ɓuru.
62001002	Ɓɔɔ Laa naa nwangsɛ wu yuu, ruu zi wu, a ruu ti kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zi nɛɛ jìng ɓuru, a ruu ti tãa nɛɛ shoo ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ ruu zang ɓɔɔ nw'ang nɛɛ Daa ka tìng, a Daa naa nwàngsɛ̀ ruu wu kati.
62001003	Vuu ɓɔɔ ruu zirɛ, ruu ti tãayi, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ wukɔ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ nwang kaa jong nɛɛ ruu ka nyaa zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Ruu nwàng ɓuru ka nyaa zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ Daa ɓuru Laa, nɛɛ Jaa ɓiɓɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi.
62001004	Ruu bè'e nɔɔ ruu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, tìnang tãanang ɓuru wu ɓee nyaa kati.
62001005	Yee ɓɔɔ ruu tãa ka nyaa ɓiɓɛ, ruu kɔɔ nɔɔ wukɔ. Laa kɔ nɔng yakɛnang, Ruu ɓiɓɛ hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang.
62001006	Naa ruu kɔɔyi nɛɛ, ruu nwàng nɛɛ wu ka nyaa zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a ruu ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ daa bii kpang, ruu suu sè'e, ruu p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kpang.
62001007	Ruu nɛɛ nwang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ naa wukɔ, ruu nwang katɔ nyaa zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ. Zìi Jaa ɓiɓɛ Yeesɔ sɔɔ ruu vuu shi kpang ɓuru katɔ nandon.
62001008	Naa ruu kɔɔyi nɛɛ, vuu shi kpang ɓi kagn bii ɓuru kpang, ruu nwaarɛ yuu ɓuru. Ruu nizang kagn yeti ɓuru kpang.
62001009	Ruu nɛɛ kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ nɛɛ, ruu p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang tɔ, Laa ta nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓi kpang, palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi kpang, yà'a ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓee katɔ. Wu ti sɔɔ ruu vuu shi kpang ɓuru nandon.
62001010	Naa ruu laa nyaa nɛɛ, ruu p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓuru gngn kpang, ruu ɓaa kaa Laa kɔ sè'e jong. Ruu ɓiɓɛ kagn yeti ɓuru kpang.
62002001	Wujɛ mɛɛ, n bè'e nɔɔ ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ nɛɛ pàl'ɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ palɛ vuu shi kpang, wu zirɛ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ rang ruu yee nɛɛ Daa ɓuru Laa kagn. Wukɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
62002002	Laa yàa ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓuru ka ruu vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ vɔ ɓɛɛ. Vɔ ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓuru kɔ shɛ̃ɛning kpang, ka ruu vuu shi kpang zang koo piti.
62002003	Naa ruu ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang kpang, ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ ruu zi wu tɔ.
62002004	Shɔnzang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N zi wu tɔ,” a ti shing jìng ka nyaa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ kpang, ɓi zang sè'e. Ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang.
62002005	Zang ɓɔɔ ɓaa shoo ka vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi, kasɛ Laa katɔ nizang. Wee naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang zi kagn nɛɛ wu zang Yeesɔ Kirisi kɔ.
62002006	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ, wu zang Yeesɔ Kirisi nwang doo naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nw'ang ɓɛɛ kɔ.
62002007	Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kɔ n bè'e nɔɔ ɓee, wu ɓɔɔ shɔɔ kpang. Ɓi doo ɓɔɔ gbaala ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ka diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayu ruu Laa tãanang ɓɛɛ.
62002008	Nyaa dannang kɔ n bè'e nɔɔ ɓee, ɓi kaa shɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nwannang Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ manɛ kɔ tùsù ruu nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi ɓi nizang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti zi tɔ ka yeti manɛ nɛɛ ruu keɓe ɓi nizang. Nɔng tɔɔnang koo keɓe ɓa kana, kaa nɔng yakɛnang ɓɔɔ nizang yakɛ nɔng. Ruu zi kaa nɛɛ nizang ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi nɛɛ ɓɔɔ manɛ.
62002009	Zang ɓɔɔ tɔɔ wu ka nɔng yakɛnang, a kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpang, ɓi doo ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
62002010	Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓeezung katɔ, nwàng ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ shing zang, zang palɛ vuu shi kpang, ɓi ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
62002011	Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpàng, nwàng ɓi doo ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ra ɓi ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zi nɔng ɓɔɔ wu daa ɓi kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ, tɔ̀ɔ wu jìng katɔ ɓɛɛ.
62002012	Wujɛ mɛɛ, n bè'e nɔɔ ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa yaa nɔɔ gbalang vuu shi kpang manɛ tɔ, ka ruu Yeesɔ Kirisi.
62002013	N bè'e nɔɔ ruu keɓe ɓɔɔ nɔɔ d'aa wujɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nw'ang doo ka tìng tɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ nw'ang nɛɛ Laa, bɛɛ Laa gaayu koo mãanang gn kpang. Jasang, n bè'e nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ ɓa Sheetang yuu tɔ ɓɛɛ. Wujɛ seseere, n bè'e nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi Daa ɓuru Laa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
62002014	Daa wujɛ, n bè'e nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ nw'ang ka tìng tɔ ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ nw'ang nɛɛ Laa, bɛɛ Laa gaayu koo mãanang gn kpang. Jasang, n bè'e nɔɔ ruu keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ lakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Yee Laa nwàng ka yeti manɛ kɔ, a nɔɔ ti ɓa Sheetang yuu tɔ.
62002015	Nɔɔ kasɛ koolaa keɓe kpang. Nɔɔ ti kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu koolaa keɓe piti, kasɛ Laa ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang.
62002016	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon naa rɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ bii shɔnzang kasɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ, zang ti kasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ jìng gbakɛnang ɓɔɔ zang gbakɛ ka ruu vuu naa zang ɓɛɛ. Vuu keɓe nandon ɓi ɓɔɔ Daa ɓuru Laa kpang, ɓi ɓɔɔ koolaa keɓe.
62002017	Diki ɓɔɔ koolaa keɓe naa waa nyaa, waa nyaa ɓi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ning. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti Laa kasɛ, wukɔ nwang ɓi gbinggbing.
62002018	Wujɛ mɛɛ, diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe waa nyaa ri a naabm tɔ. Nɔɔ tãayi nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ Yeesɔ kpang a ditɔ, kãntang keɓe, zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ Yeesɔ kpang, ri nwangsɛ yuu tɔ dɔli. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, diki ɓɔɔ koo keɓe waa nyaa gn keɓe kɔ.
62002019	Ri nw'ang nɛɛ teteng ɓuru, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ ri ɓarɛ zang ɓuru ɓɔɔ nizang kpang kɔ nwani ɓɛɛ. Naa ri nɛɛ zang ɓuru, ri nɛɛ nwàng doo nɛɛ ruu. Daanang ɓarɛ kɔ tusu zang nɛɛ, zang ɓuru kagn teteng ɓarɛ gbete kpang.
62002020	Kirisi a nɔɔ Suru Laa manɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ ti zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang manɛ tɔ nandon.
62002021	N bè'e nɔɔ wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. N bè'e nɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔɔ zi tɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti zi tɔ nɛɛ, sè'e ɓi ti kagn yeti ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kpang.
62002022	Ɓu wi, zang sè'e wiya? Zang ɓɔɔ laa nyaa nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kirisi, (Zang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ) kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang keɓe, wukɔ ti laa nyaa Jaa Laa, nɛɛ Daa ɓiɓɛ Laa nandon.
62002023	Zang ɓɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ Jaa, Daa ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ta Jaa, Daa ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kɔ doori.
62002024	Nɔɔ yaa yee Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ka diki ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gaayu yee Laa tanang wu nwang ka yeti manɛ. Ruu Laa keɓe nɛɛ nwang tɔ ka yeti manɛ, nɔɔ nwang ditɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ nɛɛ Jaa Laa nɛɛ Daa ɓiɓɛ Laa.
62002025	Vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu naa a ruu, wukɔ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
62002026	N bè'e nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka yuu zang ɓɔɔ ri kongso nɛɛ ri nwaarɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
62002027	Ɓɔɔ bii manɛ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ta nɛɛ bii Yeesɔ kagn yeti manɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ manɛ tɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔgn kɔɔ nɛɛ, wu tusu nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa tusu nɔɔ vuu piti ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa keɓe tusu, ɓi ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ, ɓi ɓɔɔ sè'e kpang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ nwang nɛɛ Kirisi ka nyaa zɔɔ naa ɓɔɔ Suru Laa tusu nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
62002028	Wujɛ seseere, nɔɔ nwang nɛɛ wu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nwang nyaa tɔ, ruu naa kaa vɔrɔ kpang ɓɛɛ. Yusɛ̃ɛ ti naa tuu ruu ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka diki ɓɔɔ wu gbãayu ɓɛɛ kpang.
62002029	Nɔɔ nɛɛ zi tɔ nɛɛ Kirisi ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ zi katɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ Laa yi ɓɛɛ kɔ.
62003001	Nɔɔ zi naa ɓɔɔ Daa kasɛ ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Kasɛ ruu ɓuru dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓaa ruu nɛɛ Wujɛ ɓiɓɛ. Ruu ti wujɛ ɓiɓɛ kɔ nizang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang, ri zi ruu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi Laa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
62003002	Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, ruu kaa wujɛ Laa. Naa ɓɔɔ ruu naa nwangnɛ, ruu zi gn kpang. Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, naa Yeesɔ nwang nyaa, ruu naa nwang kaa naa wukɔ doori. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu naa zi wu ka naa ɓɔɔ wu nwang ɓɛɛ.
62003003	Zang ɓɔɔ shing gn ka bii Yeesɔ Kirisi, a ti shing gn nɛɛ vuu keɓe naa nwang ditɔ nɔngkɔ, wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwàng ɓɛɛ.
