62003004	Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, ɓa nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ ɓanang, zang ɓaa wukɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɛɛ.
62003005	Nɔɔ zi tɔ nɛɛ, Yeesɔ arɛ nɛɛ wu naa kɔ̀s'ɔ zang vuu shi kpang. Vuu shi kpang ɓi kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
62003006	Zang ɓɔɔ nwàng nɛɛ Kirisi a ti dũng ruu ɓiɓɛ, huu shoo nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ huu shoo nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang, zi wu nung ɓi gn kpang.
62003007	Wujɛ mɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ wu nwaarɛ nɔɔ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ɓi zang tɔ̃ɔ, naa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
62003008	Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang sasak, ɓi jaa Sheetang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, sheetang p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi doo ka tìng ɓɛɛ. Jaa Laa arɛ nɛɛ wu naa jili vuu ɓɔɔ sheeetang p'al'ɛ kɔ.
62003009	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ jaa Laa piti, palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓi sasak kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, yeti ɓɔɔ Laa tarɛ kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. P'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang ɓi jong kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu ɓi kaa jaa Laa ɓɛɛ.
62003010	Zang ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu tɔ̃ɔ kpang, ɓi zang Laa kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ti kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpang, ɓi doo zang Laa kpang kɔ. Wee naa ɓɔɔ ruu zi zang ɓɔɔ ri wujɛ Laa nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri wujɛ sheetang kagn kɔ.
62003011	Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa ka tìng shɔɔnang kɔ, nɛɛ ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ.
62003012	R'uu nwàng naa Kayinu kpang. Kayinu zang Sheetang ɓɔɔ nyɔ jaa niiɓɛ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Nyɔ jaa niiɓɛ vɔrɔ ɓu ka ruu viya? Nyɔ wu ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓi vuu shi kpang, a ɓɔɔ ɓeezung ɓi kaa ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.
62003013	Manzung, zang ɓɔɔ koo keɓe nɛɛ kasɛ ruu manɛ kpang, nɔɔ mã naa ka danggn kpang.
62003014	Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ ruu ɓuru tɔ̀'ɔ ka naa vɔrɔ kpang. Ruu ɓuru kaa zang ningkãari, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ ɓuru katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpang, ɓi doo ka naa vɔrɔ.
62003015	Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpang, wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti zi tɔ nɛɛ, suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓi kagn bii zang ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
62003016	Yeesɔ Kirisi tusu ruu, ruu zang kasɛnang ka ɓɔɔ wu malɛ bii ɓiɓɛ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu malɛ bii ɓuru ta jong ka ruu manzung ɓuru.
62003017	Naa zang ɓɔɔ vuu naa ɓiɓɛ dɔli, zi ɓeezung ɓɔɔ dang jìng, a raa wu yuu knti, ruu zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa a shɔnzang, kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ ya?
62003018	Wujɛ mɛɛ, ruu kasɛ nɔɔ zang, wu nɛɛ nyaa waati kpang. Zang kasɛnang ɓuru wu nwang ɓɔɔ nizang, ka vuu ɓɔɔ ruu p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ ning.
62003019	Ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ, ruu ɓuru kaa zang Laa ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Rùu kaa vɔrɔ shiinang ka tìng Laa kpang.
62003020	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, naa rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru tusu ruu nɛɛ ruu palɛ vuu shi kpang, Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru katɔ, zi vuu piti ɓi tɔ.
62003021	Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, naa rɛ̃rɛnang ɓuru tusu ruu nɛɛ, ruu p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ shi kpang, kpàng, rùu kaa vɔrɔ ka tìng Laa kpang.
62003022	Laa a ruu vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu gaa ka naa ɓiɓɛ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ. Ruu ti p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ.
62003023	Laa dang nyaa tɔ nɛɛ ruu shing danggn ka bii Jaa ɓiɓɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi. Nɛɛ ruu ti kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ naa ɓɔɔ wu dang ruu nyaa ɓɛɛ.
62003024	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓaa shoo ka nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ wukɔ nwàng ɓi nɛɛ Laa. Laa ti nwàng nɛɛ wu. Ruu zirɛ nɛɛ Laa nwàng nɛɛ ruu, ka suru bii ɓɔɔ wu a ruu ɓɛɛ.
62004001	Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ shing gn ka zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, Suru Laa kagn bii ɓarɛ kpang. Nɔɔ gãsɛ ri katɔ, nɔɔ zi suru ɓɔɔ ka bii ɓarɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri suu sè'e nɛɛ ri zang nyaa shoonang Laa, ri nwangsɛ bii tɔ ka koolaa dɔli ɓɛɛ.
62004002	Wee naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zi suru Laa ɓɛɛ. Suru ɓɔɔ kasɛ katɔ nɛɛ, Yeesɔ Kirisi a ka koolaa keɓe, tuu bii shɔnzang ɓɛɛ, suru kaɓa kɔ Suru Laa.
62004003	Suru ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ Yeesɔ tuu bii shɔnzang kpang, ɓi Suru Laa kpang. Suru keɓe a ɓi nɛɛ bii zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ Kirisi kpang, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãa nyaa nɛɛ a ditɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang kaɓa a tɔ ka koo kãntang keɓe.
62004004	Wujɛ mɛɛ, nɔɔ manɛ zang Laa. Nɔɔ ɓa ri yuu manɛ tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru Laa ɓɔɔ ka yeti manɛ, ɓa suru Sheetang ɓɔɔ ka yeti zang ɓɔɔ ka koolaa keɓe katɔ ɓɛɛ.
62004005	Ri ɓarɛ zang koo keɓe, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri rang yee naa zang koolaa keɓe. zang koo keɓe, ri ɓaa shoo katɔ ka nyaa ɓarɛ.
62004006	Ruu ɓuru zang Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ zi Laa katɔ, ri ɓaa shoo ɓi katɔ nyaa ɓuru. Zang ɓɔɔ zang Laa kpang, ti ɓaa shoo ɓi ka nyaa ɓuru kpang. Ruu zi suru ɓɔɔ nizang, nɛɛ suru ɓɔɔ sè'e nung naa weɓe kɔ.
62004007	Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, ruu kasɛ nɔɔ ruu zɔɔ katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kasɛnang a ɓi nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang, ɓi zang Laa kɔ, ti zi Laa ɓi katɔ.
62004008	Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang kpang, zi Laa ɓi kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu piti ɓɔɔ Laa palɛ, palɛ ɓi ka ruu zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
62004009	Laa tusu ruu naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ruu ɓuru ka Jaa gbete ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu shong ka koolaa ɓɛɛ. Laa shong wu nɛɛ tɔɔ ruu walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ka bii ɓiɓɛ.
62004010	Zang kasɛnang nwàng ɓi hn. Wu rukɔ gaayu Laa kasɛnang kpang, Laa kɔ kasɛ ruu ɓuru jong, a shong Jaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu naa nwang kaa naa vuu vaa ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa, tɔ̀ɔ, Laa wu yaa ruu gbalang vuu shi kpang ɓuru kati.
62004011	Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, Laa nɛɛ kasɛ ruu ɓuru naa weɓe, ruu kasɛ nɔɔ ruu zɔɔ ta jong.
62004012	Zang ɓɔɔ zi Laa gngn nɛɛ jìng kpang. Ruu nɛɛ kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ, Laa kagn yeti ɓuru. Ruu zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa ti kagn yeti ɓuru nizang.
62004013	Suru ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu a ruu, wukɔ tusu ruu nɛɛ, ruu nwang nɛɛ Laa, a Laa ti ka yeti ɓuru.
62004014	Ruu zi ka wukɔ a ruu ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ Daa shong Jaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wu naa ta yuu zang koo keɓe.
62004015	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓi Jaa Laa, Laa nwang kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ, a ti nwàng ɓi nɛɛ Laa.
62004016	Ruu zi naa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ruu tɔ ka yeti ɓuru, a ruu ti shing gn ka ruu zang kasɛnang ɓiɓɛ keɓe katɔ. Kasɛ ruu zang ɓi katɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu zang katɔ sasak, nwàng ɓi nɛɛ Laa, a Laa ti nwàng ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ.
62004017	Ruu nɛɛ nwàng naa weɓe, r'uu zang kasɛnang Laa kagn yeti ɓuru nizang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, rùu naa kaa vɔrɔ ka diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang koo keɓe ruu ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwannang ɓuru ka koo keɓe nwàng naa nwannang Kirisi.
62004018	Mɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ zang katɔ mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang. Vɔrɔ kaanang ɓi kagn yeti zang kasɛnang kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang kasɛnang ɓɔɔ nizang nwangsɛ vɔrɔ kaanang ɓi katɔ kɔ jong ɓɛɛ. Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang kɔ kaa vɔrɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi tɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Laa naa dang wu jìng ɓi katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ r'uu zang kasɛnang Laa kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ, kaa vɔrɔ ɓi kpang.
62004019	Ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa kɔ kasɛ ruu ɓuru shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ.
62004020	Naa zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, wu kasɛ ruu Laa katɔ, a kasɛ ruu ɓeezung kpang, ɓi zang sè'e. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓeezung ɓɔɔ wu zi katɔ kpang, kàs'ɛ Laa ɓɔɔ wu zi nɛɛ jìng kpang, ɓi biya?
62004021	Laa dang ruu nyaa tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu Laa, wu ti kasɛ ruu ɓeezung jong.
62005001	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ tɔɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ wukɔ Kirisi ɓi jaa Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ Daa jaa, kàs'ɛ jaa ɓi doo ka tɔ kɔ.
62005002	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ruu nɛɛ kasɛ Laa katɔ, a ruu nɛɛ ti dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ wu dang ɓɛɛ katɔ, ruu zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ, ruu kasɛ wujɛ Laa katɔ.
62005003	Zang ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu Laa katɔ nizang, dũng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ katɔ. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ kpãa dũnnang ɓi kpang.
62005004	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zang Laa, Laa a wu naa ɓɔɔ wu ɓa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang ka koo keɓe tɔ ɓɛɛ. Danggn ɓɔɔ ruu shing ka bii Laa wukɔ 'a ruu naa, ruu ɓa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ.
62005005	Ɓu wi ɓa yuu vuu ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang ka koo keɓe yuu wiya? Zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn nɛɛ Yeesɔ Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ.
62005006	Vuu ziti ɓɔɔ ruu zi kagn nɛɛ Kirisi ɓi zang ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Ruu zi ka diki ɓɔɔ zang pàlɛ̀ wu batizima nɛɛ diki ɓɔɔ zìi ɓiɓɛ tɛ̃ɛ ka laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu naa kagn ɓɛɛ. Wu batizima kɔ tusu ruu gbete kpang. Zìi ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ tɛ̃ɛyi, wukɔ tusu ɓɔɔ ri. Suru Laa ti tusu ruu nɛɛ nɔngkɔ nizang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Suru Laa, tusu zang ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.
62005007	Vuu taati tusu ruu r'uu keɓe.
62005008	Suru Laa, nɛɛ batizima ɓɔɔ zang palɛ wu, nɛɛ zìi ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ ka ruu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Vuu taati keɓe, nyaa ɓarɛ ti daa gbete.
62005009	Ruu nɛɛ ta vuu ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ nizang, vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔyi ɓa ɓɔɔ zang katɔ. Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, Yeesɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ.
62005010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ shing danggn ka bii Jaa Laa, zi katɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ ruu keɓe ɓi nizang. Zang ɓɔɔ ta vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ kpang, ɓaa Laa sè'e tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ka yuu Jaa ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
62005011	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ keɓe kɔ. Laa a ruu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ. Suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang keɓe, ruu walɛ ka bii Jaa ɓiɓɛ.
62005012	Zang ɓɔɔ ta Jaa Laa ka yeti ɓiɓɛ, walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ ta Jaa Laa ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang, suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, kagn bii ɓiɓɛ kpang.
62005013	Zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka Jaa Laa ɓɛɛ, n b'ee nɔɔ vuu keɓe, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zi kati, nɛɛ nɔɔ walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang manɛ tɔ.
62005014	Ruu shing danggn ka Laa gaanang ɓɔɔ ruu gaayi, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, naa ruu gàa vuu ka gbalang ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ, a ruu katɔ ɓɛɛ.
62005015	Ruu nɛɛ zi tɔ nɛɛ, Laa tãa vuu piti ɓɔɔ ruu gaa wu katɔ, ruu zi katɔ nɛɛ ruu wàlɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ ruu gàa wu ɓɛɛ tɔ.
62005016	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zi ɓeezung ɓɔɔ dũng Laa kɔ doori, palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ naa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ kpang, wu gàa ɓeezung keɓe Laa, wu a wu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nyɔ zang vɔrɔ katɔ kagn, n kɔɔ nɛɛ zang wu gàa Laa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ kɔ kpang.
62005017	Vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ɓɔɔ daa bii kpang, zang ɓaa wukɔ nɛɛ vuu shi kpang. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ kagn nyɔ zang vɔrɔ kpang.
62005018	Ruu zì tɔ nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ Laa yirɛ, huu shoo ɓi nɛɛ vuu shi kpang palɛnang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Jaa Laa yiti wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. Sheetang p'alɛ̀ wu vuu ɓɔɔ ɓi kpang.
62005019	Ruu zi tɔ, ruu ɓuru wujɛ Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng Laa kpang, ri ɓarɛ ka naa Sheetang.
62005020	Ruu zi tɔ nɛɛ, Jaa Laa arɛ tùsù ruu gbalang ɓɔɔ ruu zi Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Ruu ɓuru ɓɔɔ Laa keɓe kɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu ɓuru ɓɔɔ Jaa ɓiɓɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Yeesɔ Kirisi keɓe wukɔ Laa nizang, wukɔ ti suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
62005021	Wujɛ mɛɛ, nɔɔ bang vaka kpang. Nɔɔ ti daa nɔng ɓiɓɛ kpang.
63001001	Jaa soro ɓɔɔ Laa zõ̀ng katɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu manɛ katɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ. Nkɔ zang bang, nkɔ bè'e nɔɔ labeenang keɓe. Wu nkɔ kasɛ ruu manɛ gbete kpang, zang ɓɔɔ ri zi ruu nizang katɔ, ri kasɛ nɔɔ doo katɔ kɔ.
63001002	Ka ruu ruu nizang ɓɔɔ ka yeti ɓuru, ɓɔɔ ti nwàng kaa nɛɛ ruu gbinggbing ɓɛɛ.
63001003	Daa Kpanti Laa nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi jaa Daa, r'i pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ jong. Gn ɓuru wu kɔng ri katɔ, ri ti a ruu nwannang tɔ̃ɔ, naa ɓɔɔ ruu dũng ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ nizang, a ruu ti kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ.
63001004	Ɓɔɔ n zi wujɛ ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔgn, ri dũng ruu ɓɔɔ nizang, naa ɓɔɔ Daa ɓuru dang ruu nyaa, n tãa tìnang dɔli.
63001005	N gaa mɔɔ katɔ jaa soro, n bè'e mɔɔ wu nyaa shɔɔ kpang, ɓi doo ɓɔɔ gbaala ɓɔɔ ruu tãa ka diki ɓɔɔ ruu gaayu ruu Laa tanang ɓɛɛ. Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ.
63001006	Naa ruu dñ̀ng nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ sasak, zang zi ka wukɔ nɛɛ ruu kasɛ Laa katɔ. Nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dangnɛ, ɓɔɔ ruu tãa tìng shɔɔnang kɔɔyi tɔɔ, ruu kasɛ ruu zɔɔ katɔ.
63001007	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwaarɛ zang, ri baa koolaa tɔ dɔli. Ri kɔɔrɔ zang nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ a ka koo keɓe, tuu ɓi bii shɔnzang kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔrɔ zang naa weɓe, wukɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ zang ɓɛɛ, wukɔ ti zang ɓɔɔ shing jìng nɛɛ Yeesɔ kpang ɓɛɛ.
63001008	Nɔɔ gãng jìng kagn, nɔɔ nɛ̀'ɛ loo vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ p'al'ɛ shoonang ka ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Laa wu naa a nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ wu shing nɔɔ katɔ nyaa kiiri.
63001009	Zang ɓɔɔ dñ̀ng vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu kpang, palɛ ɓi naa ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ, Laa ɓi kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu, Laa kagn yeti ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Jaa piti.
63001010	Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ alɛ ka bii manɛ, nɛɛ tusu nɔɔ wu vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu ɓɛɛ kpang, n'ɔɔ ta wu ka gãa manɛ kpang. N'ɔɔ ti jee wu nyaa kpang tingkiring.
63001011	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ jeere wu nyaa, kasɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa palɛ ɓi doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
63001012	Vuu ɓɔɔ n bè'e nɔɔ dɔli, n bèe nɔɔ takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kasɛ n tɔɔ n naa leng nɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. N naa kɔɔ nɔɔ kaa nɛɛ nyaa mɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ ruu tãa nɔɔ tìnang kaa nɛɛ zɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
63001013	Wujɛ jaa naaɓɛ ɓɔɔ Laa zɔ̃ng ri katɔ, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa.
64001001	Masang Gaayu, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ruu ɓaaɓɛ katɔ nizang ɓɛɛ, nkɔ zang bang, n bè'e mɔɔ labeenang keɓe.
64001002	Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ mɔɔ katɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, n gaa Laa nɛɛ, mɔɔ nwang waasɛ̃. Bii ɓaaɓɛ wu nwang tɔ̃ɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n zi tɔ, mɔɔ nwang ɓaa tɔ̃ɔ nɛɛ Kpanti Laa ɓɛɛ.
64001003	N tãa tìnang dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri arɛ, ri naa kɔɔ m naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yiti ruu Laa nɛɛ yeti gbete, a mɔɔ ti palɛ vuu naa ɓɔɔ ruu Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ.
64001004	Tìnang ɓɔɔ n tã̀'a kagn ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓɔɔ zang naa kɔɔ m nɛɛ, wujɛ mɛɛ dũng ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kagn, kpang.
64001005	Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ mɔɔ katɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, vuu kɔ mɔɔ p'alɛ̀ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ri nung katɔ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ri nung kpang, mɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ kɔ.
64001006	Zang ɓɔɔ kagn teteng zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ yì ri naa ka bii kaɓa, ri arɛ, ri naa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nihn, naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ kasɛ ruu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. P'al'ɛ nɔngkɔ, a ri vuu ɓɔɔ ri yiti naa zanti ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓɛɛ nɔngkɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ.
64001007	Ri nwang zanti ka ruu shoonang Yeesɔ palɛnang. Ri ta vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ka naa zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ kpang.
64001008	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ ruu zang Laa, ruu yi nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang tɔ̃ɔ naa weɓe, naa ka bii ning. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu nwang kaa gbete nɛɛ ri ka shoonang ruu ɓɔɔ nizang palɛnang.
64001009	N bèe nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng Laa labeenang ɓɔɔ kagn, a Diyotirifi ɓɔɔ tuu yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ wukɔ bang, kasɛ nɛɛ wu ɓaa shoo ka yee ɓɔɔ n bèe nɔɔ kpang.
64001010	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n nɛɛ a tɔ, n naa nwangsɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ ditɔ. Vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu kɔ̀ɔr'ɔ ka yuu ɓuru, nɛɛ sè'e ɓɔɔ suuru ka yuu ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Ti palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ɓa weɓe katɔ kagn tɔkn. Naa zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa arɛ, tà ri kpang. Ti zãa zang ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ zang kaɓa tanang ɓɛɛ katɔ. Wu ti nw'angs'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ta zang zanti kaɓa nɛɛ teteng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.
64001011	Masang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ mɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, m'ɔɔ màsɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang. Màsɛ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri p'alɛ̀ vuu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu tɔ̃ɔ wukɔ zang Laa. Zang ɓɔɔ p'alɛ̀ vuu shi kpang, zi Laa nung ɓi gn kpang.
64001012	Zang piti ri kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ka yuu Dimitiriyu. Vuu ɓɔɔ Dimitiriyu p'alɛ̀, wukɔ tusu zang nɛɛ wu zang tɔ̃ɔ nizang. Ruu ti kɔɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓiɓɛ doo nɔngkɔ. Mɔɔ ti zi tɔ, nɛɛ n suu sè'e kpang.
64001013	Vuu ɓɔɔ n tɔ̀ɔ, n bè'e mɔɔ dɔli, n bèe mɔɔ takpang,
64001014	ka ruu ɓɔɔ n kasɛ anang katɔ bii manɛ pati ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, ruu naa kɔɔ zɔɔ kaa nɛɛ nyaa.
64001015	Laa wu a nɔɔ nwannang tɔ̃ɔ katɔ. Rɛɛ masang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri ka nihn, ri jee mɔɔ nyaa. Jèe m rɛɛ masang ɓuru ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ mɔɔ nyaa jong gbete gbete.
65001001	Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ Yahuza, zang shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi, ɓɔɔ ti jaanaa Yakubu ɓɛɛ. N bè'e zang ɓɔɔ Laa ɓaa ri nyaa ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Daa, kasɛ ri katɔ, a Yeesɔ Kirisi ti gãng jìng ka ri ɓɛɛ.
65001002	N gaa Laa, gn manɛ wu kɔng wu, wu ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ, wu ti kasɛ ruu manɛ, gbãnggbãng.
65001003	Masang, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ nɔɔ dɔli ɓɛɛ, bɛɛ n wà'a doo diki ɓɔɔ n bè'e nɔɔ labeenang ka ruu yuu ɓuru ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ ta ɓɛɛ. A vuu ɓɔɔ shing m kãntang keɓe n bè'e nɔɔ labeenang, n kasɛ n kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ shii nɛɛ bang, ka ruu danggn shinnang kɔ Laa a zang ɓiɓɛ tɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓee.
65001004	Zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang, ɓɔɔ kagn ri hãa tɔ ka teteng manɛ nɛɛ nwiiri, ruu zi kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̃sɔ ruu tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ Laa ɓuru pàl'ɛ zang, nwang ri ɓarɛ kaa naa zang yaa ri gbalang dũndũng palɛnang, a ri bɛ̃ɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ wukɔ gbete, Kpanti nɛɛ dabang ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Labeenang Laa kɔɔ ruu ɓi tɔ ka yuu ruu kɔ zang dɔ̀ng ri ɓee.
65001005	Ruu kɔ n tɔɔ n kɔɔ nɔɔ ɓee, nɔɔ zi tɔ. N tɔɔ n kpaa nɔɔ m danggn kaa naa ɓɔɔ Laa ta yuu zang Isirela nɛɛ tipi Masar ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ knti naa ningsi zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ.
65001006	Danggn wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ɓɔɔ ri nw'ang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa a ri naa kagn ɓɛɛ kpang, ri y'aa nɔng nwannang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang mã ri doo nɛɛ saka ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ kɔngkɔng ka tipi dii, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa shing ri, gã diki bang kaɓa ɓɔɔ wu naa dɔng ri ruu kagn ɓɛɛ.
65001007	Danggn gari Sɔɔdɔm nɛɛ Gomora nɛɛ rɛɛ gari ɓɔɔ ri naabm ɓɛɛ, wu ning nɔɔ kpang. Ri p'al'ɛ dũndũng ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Laa dang ri jìng, ningsi ri nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ ning ɓi kpang dondong ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ zang piti ri zi kaa gn.
65001008	Zang kɔ n rang yee ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓee, doo nɔngkɔ. Ri rɔ̃kɔ rɔ̃kɔnang ɓɔɔ shing ri, ri pàl'ɛ bii ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang. Ri t'a nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa dang ɓɛɛ, a ri ti dãlɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
65001009	Naa doo Maakel ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ri laa zɔɔ nyaa nɛɛ Sheetang ka yuu vɔrɔ Musa, dãa Sheetang kpang. Kɔɔ wu katɔ waati nɛɛ “Laa wu dang mɔɔ jìng.”
65001010	A zang keɓe ri dãlɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ri zi dìiri ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ kagn ri zi katɔ, a ri zi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ ka rɛ̃rɛnang ɓɔɔ ri rɛ̃rɛ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kpang, ri tãa ɓarɛ nɛɛ bii naa ɓɔɔ yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ rang yee ɓi kpang tãa ɓɛɛ. Ti vuu keɓe kɔ ningsi ri.
65001011	Jìng dannang kagn yuu ɓarɛ. Ri sɔ̀ɔ gbalang Kayinu. Ka ruu saka ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ ɓɛɛ, ri p'al'ɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ Balamu p'al'ɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Ri taarɛ yuu naa Koora, a zang ti ningsi ri naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
65001012	Ri nwàng ɓarɛ naa vuu rìiti, ka teteng manɛ ka nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tusu zɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ kasɛ zɔɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri lasɛ nɔɔ nɔng nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri palɛ yusɛ̃ɛ tuu ri kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri gãng jìng ɓarɛ ka yuu ɓarɛ kɔ shɛ̃ɛning. Ri ɓarɛ naa sãmbong ɓɔɔ mii kagn kpang, jasung rãayi ɓɛɛ. Ri ɓarɛ naa laa ɓɔɔ ra jaa kpang, naa doo nɛɛ guusi ɓɛɛ. Ri nwàng naa laa ɓɔɔ zang ru katɔ nɛɛ dìiri, a vɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete ɓɛɛ.
65001013	Ri nwàng ɓarɛ naa mii waapo ɓɔɔ rãa dɔli, a vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ tusu bii ɓi kaa naa puru ɓɔɔ pu ka yuu mii waapo ɓɛɛ. Ri nwàng ɓarɛ naa sang ɓɔɔ jìli ka lapa ɓɛɛ. Laa shìng ri nɔng tɔ dondong, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ tɔ̀ɔ katɔ kɔngkɔng ɓɛɛ.
65001014	Enɔk, zɔ̃ng Adamu ɓɔɔ daa kaa manziti ɓɛɛ, kɔ kɔɔ ruu keɓe ka yuu ɓarɛ tɔɔ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, Kpanti Laa naa a ditɔ nɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ labang gaagaa.
65001015	Wu naa jɛ̃ɛ zang nandon ruu, wu dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa kpang ɓɛɛ ruu, ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ka gbalang ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ ti ka vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dñ̀ng Laa kpang keɓe ri kɔɔrɔ ka yuu Laa ɓɛɛ.”
65001016	Zang keɓe ri gɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ yee diki diki, a ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ kɔ, wu palɛ vuu. Ri dũng ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓarɛ, ri nyɔ zang nɛɛ nyaa nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri walɛ vuu.
65001017	Rɛɛ masang, danggn vuu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Yeesɔ Kirisi ri kɔɔ nɔɔ ka tìng, wu ning nɔɔ kpang.
65001018	Ri kɔɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ, “Diki ɓɔɔ koo waa nyaa kagn nɛɛ a tɔ, zang ri naa nwang nyaa, ri naa kpaa nɔɔ, ri naa dũng ɓarɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ zi Laa kpang kasɛ ɓɛɛ.”
65001019	Wee zang ɓɔɔ ri shing nɔɔ, nɔɔ basɛ zɔɔ kɔ, ɓɔɔ ri dũng ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ri tãa nɛɛ bii ɓɛɛ, a Suru Laa ɓi kaa tɔ̀'ɔ bii ɓarɛ kpang.
65001020	Rɛɛ masang ɓɔɔ manɛ, nɔɔ p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ shingnɛ nɔɔ daa manɛ nɛɛ tìng kɔ jong ka danggn kɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii Laa ɓee. Suru Laa wu a nɔɔ naa, nɔɔ gaa Laa.
65001021	Nɔɔ yiti yuu manɛ ka kasɛnang ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ka ɓɔɔ nɔɔ gã Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi wu pàlɛ̀ ruu tɔ̃ɔ, wu a ruu suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
65001022	Zang ɓɔɔ rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ nɛɛ vãarɛ ditɔ, gn ɓarɛ wu kɔng nɔɔ katɔ.
65001023	Nɔɔ zɔ̃ng ri nɛɛ yeti waa, nɔɔ ta yuu ɓarɛ. Gn zang ɓɔɔ wu kɔng nɔɔ katɔ, nɔɔ ɓakɛ nɛɛ vɔrɔ kaanang ning. Naa doo fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ bii ɓarɛ kasɛ ɓɛɛ nɛɛ mani, nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ katɔ.
65001024	Zang wu a Laa bannang. Laa ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu yiti nɔɔ, nɔɔ yaa gbalang ɓiɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Wu atɛ nɔɔ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, shi kpang kagn ka bii manɛ kpang, a nɔɔ ti tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ.
65001025	Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti, wukɔ ti gbete, wukɔ t'a yuu ɓuru nɛɛ bii Kpanti ɓuru Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɛɛ. Bannang nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ doo ka saa ɓɔɔ tɛɛrɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ kãntang keɓe, ti nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ gbinggbing. Nɔngkɔ.
66001001	Wee vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nwangsɛ zang, ɓɔɔ Laa a wu nɛɛ wu tusu zang ɓɔɔ ri pàl'ɛ Laa shoonang nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri zi vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ diki bee takpang ɓɛɛ. A Yeesɔ shong zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ka bii zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ Yɔhana nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu tusu wu rɛɛ vuu keɓe.
66001002	Yɔhana ɓɔɔ kɔɔ zang vuu piti ɓɔɔ wu zili ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ b'ee vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kɔɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi nwangsɛ wu ɓɛɛ.
66001003	Tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ gã ruu kɔ Laa nw'angsɛ̀ ɓee. Tìnang tãanang ɓi ti ɓɔɔ zang piti, ɓɔɔ ri tã̀a ruu keɓe, a ri dũng vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee kagn ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe naa palɛ a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.
66001004	Labeenang keɓe nɛɛ bii mɛɛ, nkɔ Yɔhana n bè'e nɔɔ zang Laa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ ka rɛɛ Gãa Laa manziti ɓɔɔ ka tipi Asiya ɓɛɛ. Laa wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, wu shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ. Laa ɓɔɔ ɓi ningkãari kãntang keɓe, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ɓi ningkãari, ka ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang mãa koo gn kpang, ɓɔɔ ti naa gbãayu ditɔ ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ suru Laa man ziti ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, ka ɓɔɔ wu nwang ka yuu laa kpanti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ jong, ri ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ.
66001005	Yeesɔ Kirisi ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang diki diki ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ Laa wisi wukɔ paa shɔɔnang nɛɛ sàa, a wukɔ ti nwang kpanti ka yuu rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, wu palɛ nɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ jong, wu ti shingnɛ yeti manɛ wu valɛ katɔ. Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ kasɛ ruu katɔ, a vɔ ka ruu ɓuru nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, zìi ɓiɓɛ wu ta ruu kaa nɛɛ naa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ruu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
66001006	A shing ruu, ruu nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔrɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa, ɓɔɔ Laa kɔ ɓi kpanti ɓuru ɓɛɛ, a Laa ti daa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Bannang nɛɛ kpanti roonang wu nwang ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ dondong. Nɔngkɔ.
66001007	Nɔɔ zirɛ, n'aa a ka yeti sãmbong, zang piti ri naa zi wu jìng ka bii. Zang ɓɔɔ ri shu wu nɛɛ shalang, ri ti naa zi wu jong. Zang tipi koolaa keɓe nandon, ri naa kaa ka ruu ɓiɓɛ. Vuu keɓe naa nwang ditɔ nɔngkɔ nizang. Nɔngkɔ.
66001008	Kpanti Laa kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “Nkɔ ka tìng shɔɔnang, nkɔ ti waa nyaa knti.” N nwàng ningkãari kãntang keɓe, n ti nwang ningkãari bɛɛ zang mãa koo gn kpang, n ti naa a ditɔ ka koo tɔkn. Nkɔ kpanti ka yuu vuu piti.
66001009	Nkɔ Yɔhana manzung manɛ, ɓɔɔ ruu ɓakɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ Yeesɔ ɓɛɛ. Ruu mã danggn nɛɛ zɔɔ ka jìng ɓɔɔ ruu dangnɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Yeesɔ kpanti ɓuru ɓɛɛ. Zang shing m ka tipi ɓɔɔ mii kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Patimu ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, n kɔɔ zang ruu Laa ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ kasɛ tɔ, nɛɛ ɓi nizang ɓɛɛ.
66001010	Ka nɔng kaɓa, ka lee Lahadi Suru Laa a ka bii mɛɛ, a n nwang kaa naa n rɔ̃kɔ katɔ. N tãa yee zang mɛɛ nyaa ka knti mɛɛ nabm naa gboo.
66001011	Kɔ̀'ɔ m nɛɛ, “Tuu labeenang mɔɔ bee vuu kɔ mɔɔ zili ɓee, m'ɔɔ shòng zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka Gãa Laa manziti kaɓa. Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Afisa nɛɛ gari Simina nɛɛ gari Pagamu, nɛɛ gari Tayatira nɛɛ gari Sadisu, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ gari Filadifiya a ɓɔɔ gari Lawodikiya ɓɛɛ.”
66001012	A n raa jìng, n tɔɔ, n zi zang ɓɔɔ rang m yee ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ n raa jìng, n zi vuu ɓɔɔ zang shìli waa zà'ang sɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ manziti.
66001013	Ka teteng rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang shìli waa zà'ang sɔɔ kagn kaɓa, n zi vuu shii ka nɔng nwang shɔnzang. Hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ beebang, à wu ka jìng doo, a mã vuu ɓɔɔ zang ti nɛɛ zinariya ka danggn.
66001014	Suuyuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ puru shãashãa naa ruutu, puru shãashãa naa zũng mii takong ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ sino ɓɛɛ. Jìng ɓiɓɛ yakɛ nɔng naa nyɛlɛ waa.
66001015	Doo ɓiɓɛ kɔlɔ naa saka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ tagula, ɓɔɔ zang mɔlɔ bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ waa ɓɛɛ, a yee ɓiɓɛ naa mii zɛ̃ɛ ka rang kɔpɔ.
66001016	Yiti sang manziti ka nakn ɓiɓɛ. Yere bang ɓɔɔ nyaa ziti nw'ang nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Waa nyaa tìng ɓiɓɛ, yakɛ naa laa yakɛ nɔng, bɛɛ kaa dãngdãng yuu.
66001017	Ɓɔɔ n zi wu, n watɛ ka tìng ɓiɓɛ naa zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. A arɛ shing nakn ɓiɓɛ ka bii mɛɛ, a kɔɔ m nɛɛ “Mɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ kpang, Nkɔ zang tìng shɔɔnang, nkɔ ti gɔɔ zang nyaa.
66001018	Nkɔ ti zang ɓɔɔ ningkãari ɓɛɛ. Bɛɛ n vɔ katɔ, a kãntang keɓe, n kaa ningkãari dondong. Saka ɓɔɔ zang puu nyaa gãa zang ɓɔɔ daa nɔng vɔrɔ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ koo rɛɛ suru, ka naa mɛɛ kɔ.
66001019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, b'ee vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zili ɓɛɛ ta, vuu ɓɔɔ palɛ kãntang keɓe, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ nɛɛ knti ɓɛɛ.
66001020	Zirɛ, rɛɛ sang manziti kɔ n yiti ka naa ɓee, nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu manziti ɓɔɔ zang shìli waa zà'ang sɔɔ kagn, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ri nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ. N kaa ɓi n nwangsɛ mɔɔ dìiri rɛɛ vuu keɓe. Rɛɛ sang manziti keɓe, ɓi rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, ɓɔɔ ri gãng jìng, ka rɛɛ Gãa Laa manziti kaɓa ɓɛɛ. Vuu manziti ɓɔɔ zang shìli waa zà'ang sɔɔ kagn kaɓa, ɓi kaa rɛɛ Gãa Laa bì'i nɛɛ yuu ɓarɛ.
66002001	“A zang ɓɔɔ n zi wu kaɓa, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Afisa ruu keɓe. Mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ yiti sang manziti ka nakn ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ rakɛ ka teteng rɛɛ vuu manziti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya zang shìli waa zà'ang sɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
66002002	N zi shoonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ ɓɛɛ tɔ, naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ shoonang nɛɛ kaka manɛ, a nɔɔ ti mã danggn ɓɛɛ. N ti zi naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, ri nwàng ka teteng manɛ kpang tɔ. Nɔɔ ti gãsɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri suu sè'e ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ naa ri zang shoonang Yeesɔ tɔ, a nɔɔ ti ìiyi, ri suu ɓarɛ sè'e waati.
66002003	N zi tɔ nɔɔ mã danggn tɔ, nɔɔ dang jìng tɔ dɔli, ka ruu nung mɛɛ, a nɔɔ ti yaa gn naa kpang.
66002004	A vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ p'alɛ̀ keɓe, nɔɔ kasɛ m tɔ̀'ɔ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ m tìng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ kpang.
66002005	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kpaa danggn zɔ̃ng nwannang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwang ka tìng ɓɛɛ ta, nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti, nɔɔ gaayu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ p'al'ɛ ka tìng ɓɛɛ palɛnang tɔkn. Naa nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ keɓe kpang, n a ditɔ ka bii manɛ. N naa tuu vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shìli waa zà'ang sɔɔ manɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, n daa nɛɛ mani.
66002006	A vuu kagn gbete ɓɔɔ n dɔɔ nɔɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ bɛ̃ɛ rɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ zang Nikola ri palɛ ɓɛɛ katɔ, naa ɓɔɔ n bɛ̃ɛ doo katɔ kɔ ɓɛɛ.
66002007	“Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu ɓaayi wu tãa vuu kɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ mã danggn nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, n naa yaa wukɔ, wu shaa jìng laa ɓɔɔ ra ka laa ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, ɓɔɔ ta ka yeti jaa ɓɔɔ Laa shìli ɓɛɛ.
66002008	“A kɔɔ m tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Simina ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ wukɔ ka tìng shɔɔnang wukɔ ti waa nyaa knti ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ vɔrɛ, a yupaa tɔkn ningkãari ɓɛɛ.
66002009	N zi jìng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dang ɓɛɛ tɔ. N ti zi tɔ, nɔɔ vuu ka naa kpang. A nizang nɔɔ wu vuu ka naa kpang, kpang, nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ ying. N ti zi naa ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ ri suu sè'e, ri tuu yuu ɓarɛ naa ri zang Yahudawa, ri rangkɛ ruu shi kpang ka yuu manɛ tɔ. Ri ɓarɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Sheetang ɓɛɛ.
66002010	N'ɔɔ kaa vɔrɔ jìng dannang ɓɔɔ yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng nɔɔ dǎng kaa tɔ kaɓa kpang. Nɔɔ ɓaa shoo, Sheetang naa gãsɛ nɔɔ ditɔ, naa shingnɛ zang wu mã zang ɓɔɔ ka teteng manɛ ka sãa. Zang naa dang nɔɔ jìng diki kopi kɔ nwani. N'ɔɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ kpang, naa zang nyɔ nɔɔ doo vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Tɔ̀ɔ, n a nɔɔ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, n'ɔɔ walɛ bannang kati.
66002011	Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu ɓaayi wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ shii gbãnggbãng nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang naa vɔ tɔkn, daa kaa doo ziti, naa palɛ wu vuu ɓɔɔ kpang tingkiring.
66002012	“A kɔɔ m tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Pagamu ɓɛɛ ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ yere bang ɓiɓɛ kagn nyaa ɓiɓɛ ziti, wɔng katɔ kɔ nandon ɓɛɛ.
66002013	N zi nɔng ɓɔɔ nɔɔ nwàng gn ɓɛɛ tɔ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Sheetang roo kpanti kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ yaa kɔɔnang kpang nɛɛ nkɔ kpanti manɛ kpang. Nɔɔ yaa danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ka bii mɛɛ kpang doo nɛɛ mani, ka laa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔ Antiba, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ dũng m nɛɛ yeti gbete vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ka teteng manɛ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Sheetang nwang ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔ ka shoo zang piti nɛɛ wu dũng ɓi nkɔ ɓɛɛ.
66002014	A vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ kaa gn, ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng manɛ ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Balamu tusu zang ɓɛɛ. Balamu ɓɔɔ kpɛ̃ɛrɛ Balak naa ɓɔɔ wu shing zang Isirela, ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, nɛɛ ri shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang a vaka, nɛɛ ri palɛ dũndũng.
66002015	Nɔɔ doo nɔngkɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ka teteng manɛ, ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Nikola ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
66002016	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ kɔ̃sɔ yeti ta. Naa nɔngkɔ kpang, n a ditɔ ka bii manɛ, n ta sìiri nɛɛ ri nɛɛ yere bang ɓɔɔ nw'ang nɛɛ nyaa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ.
66002017	Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu ɓaayi, wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, n a wu vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ maanaa ɓɔɔ zang waasɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ. N ti a wu tari ɓɔɔ kagn puru nɛɛ nung shɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang bee ka yuu tari bì'i. Zang ɓɔɔ zi nung bì'i kpang ɓi zang ɓɔɔ tarɛ kɔ zi shɛ̃ɛning.
66002018	“A kɔɔ m tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Tayatira ɓɛɛ ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ “Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa Jaa Laa, ɓɔɔ jìng ɓiɓɛ yakɛ nɔng naa nyɛlɛ waa ɓɛɛ, doo ɓiɓɛ kɔlɔ naa saka ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ tagula ɓɔɔ zang mɔlɔ bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ waa ɓɛɛ.
66002019	N zi shoonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ, nɛɛ naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ kasɛ zang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ danggn ɓɔɔ nɔɔ shing ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yi zɔɔ naa ka bii tɔ̃ɔ, nɔɔ ti mã danggn ɓɛɛ. N ti zi tɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ kãntang, ɓa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ p'al'ɛ ka tìng ɓɛɛ katɔ.
66002020	A vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ kaa gn gbete ɓɔɔ n kasɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ nɔɔ yaa jaa soro kaɓa, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Jezebel, nwàng ka teteng manɛ ɓɛɛ. A kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang mɛɛ, nwaarɛ ri nɛɛ ri palɛ dũndũng, nɛɛ ri ti shaa vuu shaanang ɓɔɔ zang a vaka ɓɛɛ.
66002021	N yaa wu gbalang wu kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ, a bɛ̃ɛ yeti kɔ̃sɔnang, wu yaa dũndũng palɛnang.
66002022	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n shing wu ditɔ, wu roo kɔnang, wu roo ka latãng wu dang jìng. Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng nɛɛ wu, ri roo kɔnang jong. N shingnɛ ri dang jìng gbãnggbãng, naa ri kõ̀sɔ̀ yeti, ri yaa zɔ̃ng vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ kaɓa kpang ɓɛɛ.
66002023	N naa nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu vɔrɔ nandon. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ka nɔng piti, ri zi kati nɛɛ nkɔ zang ɓɔɔ zi rɛ̃rɛnang zang tɔ nɛɛ yeti ɓarɛ piti ɓɛɛ. N a zang ɓu vuu ka doo shoonang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
66002024	“Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa ka Tayatira ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ nɔɔ dũng vuu ɓɔɔ Jezebel kpɛ̃ɛrɛ zang ɓɛɛ manɛ kpang, nɔɔ ti zi rɛɛ vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang ri ɓaa nɛɛ vuu Sheetang ɓɔɔ hãa bii dɔli ɓɛɛ manɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. N kɔɔ nɔɔ, wu vuu ɓɔɔgn nɛɛ nɔɔ palɛ kpang.
66002025	Nɔɔ yiti vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa manɛ gbãnggbãng, n gbãayu nɛɛ mani.
66002026	Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa yuu vuu gãsɛnang, nɛɛ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n tãa tìnang, diki ɓɔɔ n a kagn wu a nɛɛ mani. N naa a wu naa, wu roo kpanti ka yuu rɛɛ zang tipi ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe ɓɛɛ.
66002027	Naa ɓɔɔ Daa mɛɛ a m naa ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Naa tuu labalang kpanti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ saka ɓɛɛ, wu roo kpanti ka yuu rɛɛ tipi kaɓa. Wu naa sãlɛ ri pũusi pũusi naa ɓɔɔ zang sãlɛ ɓari tapɔng ɓɛɛ.
66002028	N ti naa a zang ɓɔɔ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, sang ɓɔɔ yakɛ nɔng nɛɛ yuu gãndi ɓɛɛ.
66002029	“Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu ɓaayi wu tãa ruu kɔ Suru kɔɔrɔ rɛɛ zang Laa ɓee.
66003001	“Zang kaɓa kɔɔ m tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Sadisu ɓɛɛ ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ yiti rɛɛ Suru Laa man ziti nɛɛ sang manziti ka naa ɓɛɛ. N zi shoonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Zang zi nɔɔ naa nɔɔ ningkãari, a ɓeekpang nɔɔ vɔlɔ manɛ katɔ.
66003002	Nɔɔ yupaa, nɔɔ t'a bii kagn, nɔɔ yì suru bii ɓɔɔ yaa doogn tɔkɔlɔng ɓɛɛ naa kagn, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ vɔ kaa tɔ̀'ɔ dɔ̃ɔ gbete kpang. N zirɛ shoonang manɛ daa gn teetee ka tìng Laa mɛɛ kpang.
66003003	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, danggn wu ning nɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ nɔɔ tãayi, a nɔɔ ti tarɛ ɓɛɛ kpang. Nɔɔ yiti katɔ, nɔɔ ti kɔ̃sɔ yeti manɛ. Naa nɔɔ yupaa kpang, n a ditɔ naa shɔngɓɔ, a nɔɔ zi laa ɓɔɔ n a kagn yuu manɛ kpang.
66003004	A zang ɓɔɔ kaa gn teteng manɛ, ka Sadisu ka nɔngkɔ, ɓɔɔ ri tɔ̀ɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang kaɓa ri naa hã̀l'ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru ri rakɛ nɛɛ n, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nwannang ɓarɛ daa naa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
66003005	Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, zang naa hãa wu fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru, n àlɛ̀ nung ɓiɓɛ ka labeenang ɓɔɔ zang beere nung zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ kpang. N naa kɔɔ ka tìng Daa mɛɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu ɓi ɓɔɔ mɛɛ.
66003006	Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ kagn wu ɓaayi wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.
66003007	“A kɔɔ m tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Filadifiya ɓɛɛ ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓi ka bii ɓiɓɛ kpang, zang ɓɔɔ wu ɓi nizang ɓɛɛ. Wukɔ yiti shong saka nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ bɛɛ Dawuda yiti ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ puu nyaa gãa tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zunung kunang kagn kpang, nɛɛ ti ku tɔ, zang ɓɔɔ zunung puunang kagn kpang.
66003008	N zi shoonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ zirɛ, n puu nɔɔ nyaa gãa tɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zunung kunang kpang ɓɛɛ. N zi tɔ kaka manɛ kagn dɔli kpang, a nɔɔ dũng nyaa mɛɛ doo nɛɛ mani, nɔɔ ti laa nyaa kpang nɛɛ nɔɔ zi nung mɛɛ kpang, kpang.
66003009	Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Sheetang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri suu sè'e nɛɛ ri zang Yahudawa ɓa, n naa shing zang sè'e kaɓa, ri arɛ, ri tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng manɛ. Ri zi kati nɛɛ n kasɛ nɔɔ katɔ.
66003010	Nɔɔ dũng ruu mɛɛ ɓɔɔ n kɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ mã danggn ɓɛɛ tɔ, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n naa shingnɛ, n'ɔɔ wɔ ka jìng dannang ɓɔɔ a kaatɔ ka koo piti ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka koo nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
66003011	N gbãayu katɔ pati. Nɔɔ yiti vuu ɓɔɔ ka naa manɛ waasɛ̃, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ nɔɔ, wu ta vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ nɛɛ wu a nɔɔ ɓɛɛ kpang.
66003012	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, naa nw'ang naa laajàa ɓɔɔ zang di sãa Gãa Laa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ri yaa Gãa Laa takpang. N bee nung Laa mɛɛ, ka bii ɓarɛ, nɛɛ nung nɔng nwannang Laa mɛɛ, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Urushalima ɓɔɔ shɔɔ ɓɔɔ shooro nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ nɔng Laa mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. N ti bee nung mɛɛ ɓɔɔ shɔɔ jong ka bii ɓarɛ.
66003013	“Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu ɓaayi wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.
66003014	“A zang kaɓa kɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ, “Bèe zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka zang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka gari Lawodikiya ɓɛɛ ruu keɓe, mɔɔ kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Wee ruu ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ nyaa zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ, Wu nwang ta nɔngkɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang diki diki, ɓɔɔ ti palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ Laa ti m'ãarɛ̀ vuu piti nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ kɔ.
66003015	N zi shoonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ. Nɔɔ nwaa katɔ kpang, nɔɔ ti valɛ katɔ kpang. Nɔɔ nɛɛ ti nwaa katɔ, kɔ nɔɔ nɛɛ valɛ katɔ.
66003016	Wee nɔɔ nwaa lulupu waati ɓee, n vang nɔɔ katɔ nɛɛ yeti nyaa mɛɛ.
66003017	Wee nɔɔ kɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ nɔɔ manɛ wujɛ ying, nɛɛ vuu naa manɛ kagn, rang vuu ɓɔɔ kpaa nɔɔ kpang ɓee. A nɔɔ zi kpang vuu ɓi ka naa manɛ kpang, zang vuu gn kɔnang. Nɔɔ nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɔɔ ri bii bɔ̃bɔ̃rɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ nwang naa zang ɓɔɔ jìng zuu ri katɔ ɓɛɛ.
66003018	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, n kɔɔ nɔɔ, nɔɔ arɛ n'ɔɔ hoo zɔ̃ng zinariya ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ nɛɛ waa nɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, bii ɓiɓɛ wu turɛ wu nwang kaa tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ nwang kaa zang ying ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ ti arɛ nɔɔ hooro fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru n'ɔɔ hãayi, tɔ̀ɔ, bii bɔ̃bɔ̃rɔ manɛ wu shing kaa tɔ̀'ɔ yusɛ̃ɛ wu tuu nɔɔ kpang. Nɔɔ hoo gãnang ɓɔɔ zang tɛ̃̀'ɛ nɔɔ ka jìng ɓɛɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, n'ɔɔ zi nɔng kati.
66003019	Zang ɓɔɔ n kasɛ ri katɔ, n mangkɛ rikɔ, n ti gɔ̃ ri shoo. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ ta bii ta kagn, nɔɔ yaa vuu shi kpang, nɔɔ dũng m kaa nɛɛ yeti gbete.
66003020	Nɔɔ zirɛ, n shii ka nyaa gãa, n waa nyaa gãa. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tãa yee mɛɛ, nɛɛ puu nyaa gãa, n shɛ̃ɛ ka yeti gãa ɓiɓɛ. Ruu shaa vuu shaanang nɛɛ zɔɔ nɔng gbete.
66003021	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ shii gbãnggbãng, nɛɛ ɓa yuu vuu gãsɛnang, n kasɛ tɔ, wu naa nwang nɛɛ n, ka laa kpanti roonang mɛɛ. Naa ɓɔɔ n ɓa yuu vuu gãsɛnang ka tìng, n naa nwàng nɛɛ Daa mɛɛ ka laa kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
66003022	“Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn, wu ɓaayi wu tãa vuu ɓɔɔ Suru Laa kɔɔ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ɓɛɛ.”
66004001	Ka knti rɛɛ vuu keɓe, n shing jìng, a n zirɛ nyaa gãa puu ka lapa. A n tãa yee naa gboo, ɓɔɔ ɓaasi rang m yee ɓɛɛ, ɓaa m nyaa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “A ka lapa ka nihn, tɔ̀ɔ, n tusu mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ naa palɛ katɔ nɛɛ knti ɓɛɛ.”
66004002	Nyaa kɔ doo naa ɓee, Suru Laa a ka bii mɛɛ. Ka lapa ka nɔng kaɓa, n zi laa nwannang kpanti, a zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
66004003	Zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa, kɔlɔ katɔ naa rɛɛ tari ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ Jasifa nɛɛ kaneliya ɓɛɛ. Sɔkɔ mii ti lurɛ kiiri laa nwannang kpanti ka teteng. Sɔkɔ bì'i ta bii naa tari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Emɛra ɓɛɛ.
66004004	L'aa nwannang kpanti ɓɔɔ ri ti kagn bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti, ri kiiri laa nwannang kpanti ɓɔɔ gbete keɓe nyaa ka teteng. Zang bang, ri bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti ri nwalɛ ka yuu rɛɛ laa kaɓa, zang ɓu hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru wu ti kãng lapoo kpanti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ ka yuu.
66004005	Ka nɔng laa kpanti kaɓa, shala mangkɛ a ti mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ. A n ti zi waa zà'ang sɔɔ manziti yàkɛ̀ nɔng gbayi gbayi ka tìng laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa. Rɛɛ waa zà'ang sɔɔ manziti kaɓa rikɔ rɛɛ Suru Laa ɓɔɔ manziti ɓɛɛ.
66004006	Ka tìng laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa, n ti zi vuu ɓɔɔ nwàng naa mii waapo kɔlɔ katɔ puru naa vìilaa. Vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn ri shiiri ka nɔng laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa, ri kiiri laa nyaa ka teteng, ka nakn ziti, ka nagang ziti. Ri takɛ jìng dɔli nɛɛ bii piti piti, ɓɔɔ ka tìng, ɓɔɔ ka knti.
66004007	Vuu ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang nwang zing, a ɓɔɔ ɓang wu nwang guu napoo, a ɓɔɔ ɓang weɓe, waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ, nwang ɓɔɔ shɔnzang, a ɓɔɔ gɔ̀ɔ nyaa nwang ɓi kaa gangong ɓɔɔ tãa katɔ ɓɛɛ.
66004008	Vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii kagn keɓe, vuu ɓu ta nasãng mangbete, bii ɓarɛ ɓi jìng kɔ shɛ̃ɛning, ka dakn nɛɛ yeti piti. Ri yaa soo g'aanang kpang, nɛɛ zìi nɛɛ laagɛ̃, ri gaa soo nɛɛ, “Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ kpanti ka yuu vuu piti ɓɛɛ, shi kpang ɓi kagn bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang Mɔkɔ nw'ang ɓaa ningkãari doo ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, mɔɔ ti ɓaa ningkãari kãntang keɓe, mɔkɔ ti naa gbãayu tɔkn ka koo keɓe.”
66004009	Vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn keɓe, ri nɛɛ dɔ̀ɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti ɓɔɔ nw'ang ɓi ningkãari dondong, ri nɛɛ ti a wu bannang, ri nɛɛ zã̀a wu tɔ naa weɓe,
66004010	rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ri tang zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ka laa kpanti ɓɔɔ nw'ang ɓi ningkãari dondong kaɓa nɛɛ gutu, ri bang wu. Ri ti tu lapoo ɓɔɔ ri kãng ka yuu, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ, ri shing ka tipi ka tìng zang kaɓa, ri ti gà'a wu soo nɛɛ,
66004011	“Laa ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ kpanti ɓuru ɓɛɛ, mɔkɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ zang bang mɔɔ, zang dɔɔ mɔɔ, a naa vuu palɛnang piti ka naa ɓaaɓɛ kɔ. Mɔkɔ m'ãarɛ̀ vuu piti ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ, a mɔkɔ ti kasɛ nɛɛ ri nwalɛ naa weɓe, a mɔɔ m'ãarɛ̀ ri kati.”
66005001	A n zi labeenang ɓɔɔ kagn, ka nakn zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti ɓɛɛ. Zang bèe vuu ka yeti nɛɛ biling piti a zang leng kati. Zang ɓang nyaa ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ lang nɔng man ziti.
66005002	A n zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa gbete ɓɔɔ lakɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ, mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Wi daa naa ɓɔɔ wu tãlɛ lang keɓe, wu kãlɛ labeenang keɓe wiya?”
66005003	A zang ɓɔɔ kaa tɔ̀'ɔ gn kpang, ka lapa nɛɛ koo, nɛɛ koo rɛɛ suru zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ, ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ wu puu labeenang kaɓa, wu gã vuu ɓɔɔ kagn kpang.
66005004	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ n kaa gbãnggbãng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɔɔ daa naa ɓɔɔ wu puu labeenang kaɓa, wu gã vuu ɓɔɔ zang bee gn kpang ɓɛɛ.
66005005	A zang bang gbete ka teteng rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ kaa kpang, zirɛ, yɔɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Zing, nwangnɛ teteng zang Yahuda ɓɔɔ ti zang bang zɔ̃ng Dawuda, ɓa yuu vuu piti tɔ. Daa naa ɓɔɔ wu tãlɛ lang ɓɔɔ zang ɓang labeenang kaɓa nɛɛ mani nɔng manziti kaɓa tɔ, wu puuyi.”
66005006	A n zi Jaa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ shii ka nɔng laa nwannang kpanti naabm, a rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa, nɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti ri kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng. Jaa mɛɛrɛ bì'i mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ bɛɛ zang y'ee katɔ ka tìng. Ta jee manziti, a jìng ɓiɓɛ ti manziti. Rɛɛ jìng manziti keɓe, ɓi rikɔ Suru Laa manziti ɓɔɔ zang shing ka dalɛ koo piti piti ɓɛɛ.
66005007	Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ kaɓa daayi daa ta labeenang kaɓa nɛɛ nakn zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti ɓɛɛ.
66005008	A ɓɔɔ daa ta labeenang kaɓa tɔ, rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ri tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ kaɓa. Zang kaɓa nandon, zang ɓu yiti vũngta ka naa, nɛɛ pii ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ kagn ka yeti pii ka nyaa gaagaa. Vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ keɓe, ɓi Laa gaanang rɛɛ zang Laa.
66005009	Ri gaa soo shɔɔ, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ daa naa tɔ, mɔɔ ta labeenang kaɓa, mɔɔ ti tãlɛ lang ɓɔɔ zang ɓang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ny'ɔ mɔɔ vɔrɔ ka tìng, a mɔɔ ta Laa yuu zang dɔli nɛɛ zìi ɓaaɓɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ta yuu ɓarɛ keɓe, ri nwangnɛ zɔ̃ng zang piti ka koo keɓe, nɛɛ nyaa ɓɔɔ ka koo piti, ri nwangnɛ tipi piti, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tipi rɛɛ kpanti ka bm bm.
66005010	Mɔɔ risi ri nɛɛ ri nw'ang zang ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ kpanti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, a ri ti nwang zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ vuu ka Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ri palɛ Laa ɓuru shoonang ɓɛɛ. Rikɔ roo kpanti ka koo keɓe.”
66005011	A n shing jìng n zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ri labang labang gaagaa daa ɓɔɔ zang gã ri kpang. A n ti tãa yee ɓarɛ. Ri shiiri, ri kiiri laa nwannang kpanti nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, nyaa ka teteng.
66005012	Ri gaa soo ri mɛɛ nyaa nabm nɛɛ, “Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang ny'ɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang a wu naa vuu palɛnang tɔ, nɛɛ vuu naa, nɛɛ zũnang, nɛɛ kaka, nɛɛ bannang, nɛɛ dɔɔnang a ɓɔɔ zɔ̃ɔrɔnang.”
66005013	A n tãa yee rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ningkãari, ka lapa nɛɛ koo keɓe, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ koo rɛɛ suru zang ɓɔɔ vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ ka yeti mii ɓɛɛ, ri gaa soo nandon, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ruu dɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka laa nwannang kpanti ta, a ɓɔɔ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ. Ruu a ri bannang, ruu ti zãa ri. Zang wu zɔ̃ɔrɔ ri, naa vuu palɛnang wu nwang ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ gbinggbing.”
66005014	A rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa, ri kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ, “Wu nwang nɔngkɔ.” Rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa ri tang jong ka tìng zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ka laa nwannang kpanti nɛɛ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ri bang ri.
66006001	A n zirɛ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ Laa, tãa lang ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang, a n tãayi vuu gbete ka teteng vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa, kɔɔyi, yee ɓiɓɛ naa shala mɛɛyi nɛɛ, “Arɛ.”
66006002	N shing jìng tɔkn a n zi gbantang puru a kana. Zang ɓɔɔ vang ka dakn gbantang kaɓa yiti taka ka naa, a zang kãng wu lapoo yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ka yuu. 'Arɛ, mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ shaarɛ zang ka nyaa sìiri diki diki ɓɛɛ, a daayi nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ wu daa shaa zang tɔkn ka nɔng sìiri.
66006003	A ɓɔɔ wu tãa lang ɓɔɔ ɓang doo ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang, n tãayi vuu ɓɔɔ ɓang doo ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang ka teteng vuu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, ɓaa nyaa nɛɛ, “Arɛ.”
66006004	A gbantang ɓɔɔgn nwɛɛri nwangnɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ vang ka dakn ɓiɓɛ, zang a wu naa wu shingnɛ zang koo ri nwàng tɔ̀'ɔ ka nyaa zɔɔ kpang, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ri nyɔkɔ zɔɔ vɔrɔ kati. A zang a wu yere bang ka naa.
66006005	A Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ Laa tãa lang ɓɔɔ daa kaa taati. A n ti tãa yee vuu gbete ka teteng vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa daa kaa taati, ɓaa nyaa nɛɛ, “Arɛ.” N shing jìng tɔkn, n zi gbantang vìiri nwangnɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ vang ka dakn ɓiɓɛ, yiti vuu ɓɔɔ zang ma vuu nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
66006006	N tãa yee mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ nwangnɛ teteng rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zang t'uu saka shoonang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka diki gbete zang hoo zee taasa gbete. Zang ti tuu saka shoonang ɓɔɔ zang palɛ ka diki gbete zang hoo nyɔngkɔ taasa taati. N'ɔɔ lasɛ nung kpang, n'ɔɔ ti lasɛ mii inabi kpang.”
66006007	A tãa lang ɓɔɔ tɔkn daa kaa dɛ̃ɛti, a n tãa yee vuu ɓɔɔ waa nyaa knti ka teteng rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa, ɓaa nyaa nɛɛ, “Arɛ.”
66006008	N shing jìng tɔkn, a n zi gbantang bii shànkalang. Zang ɓɔɔ vang ka dakn ɓiɓɛ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ vɔrɔ. A zang ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ koo rɛɛ suru zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, dũng wu ka knti naabm. A zang a ri naa nɛɛ ri roo kpanti ka koo dang gbete, naa zang basɛ koo keɓe nɔng dɛ̃ɛti ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ri nyɔ̀kɔ̀ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng kaɓa vɔrɔ nɛɛ yere bang, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyɔkɔ bang. Ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kɔnang, nɛɛ ri shing ɓɔɔ, yɔpɔ kpaasi ɓɔɔ shaa varɛ dɔli, ɓɔɔ ri ka koo keɓe, ri nyɔkɔ zang.
66006009	Ɓɔɔ tãa lang ɓɔɔ daa kaa maani ɓɛɛ, n zili suru bii zang ɓɔɔ zang nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ zang ruu Laa, a ri ti kɔɔ ruu nizang ka yuu danggn ɓɔɔ ri shing ɓɛɛ. N zi suru bii ɓarɛ ka dii nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɛɛ.
66006010	A ri mɛɛ nyaa nabm nɛɛ, “Laa ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ kpanti ɓɛɛ, shi kpang ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang. Mɔkɔ kɔɔ ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ, ruu nw'ang diki nɛya ka nihn, tɔ̀ɔ, mɔɔ dɔng zang koo ɓɔɔ ri nyɔkɔ ruu ruu, mɔɔ waa ruu pãng wiya?”
66006011	A zang a zang ɓu ka teteng ɓarɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru. A zang kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, ri gã ka gbongkarɛ tɔkɔlɔng, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri ɓee nyaa gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ ɓeezung ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri dũng doo Laa kɔ ɓɔɔ zang koo naa nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ ditɔ jong, naa ɓɔɔ ɓeleng zang nyɔkɔ nɔɔ vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
66006012	A ɓɔɔ Jaa Mɛɛrɛ tãa lang ɓɔɔ daa kaa mangbete, n zirɛ tipi ruutu gbãnggbãng, a làa risi kaa vìiri kɔngkɔng naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ vìiri ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ suuyuu ɓɛɛ, a shala raa kaa nwɛɛri naa zìi.
66006013	Sang ri shili nɛɛ lapa ka tipi naa ɓɔɔ jasung pũngku rãayi, kpàng gbãngko sìiri ɓɔɔ ra doo knti ka tipi ɓɛɛ.
66006014	Lapa leng naa ɓɔɔ zang leng siri ɓɛɛ, a yaa nɔng, rɛɛ kɔpɔ nandon, nɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ mii kiiri nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ, ri ti yaa nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri kagn ɓɛɛ.
66006015	A zang piti, rɛɛ kpanti nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang, nɛɛ rɛɛ, zang bang sɔɔja, rɛɛ zang ying, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ nandon rɛɛ jaafoo nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa gãa, ri yuu nandon, ri daa waa ka yeng puru, a ɓɔɔ ka teteng rɛɛ tari bang ka kɔpɔ.
66006016	Ri ɓaa rɛɛ kɔpɔ nyaa nɛɛ tari bang nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ watɛ ta ka yuu ɓuru, nɔɔ waasɛ ruu, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa, wu zi ruu kaa takpang, Ruu ti wɔrɛ, Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ Laa wu dang ruu jìng kaa takpang.
66006017	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓɔɔ gnvɔ ɓarɛ tusu bii kagn, a tɔ ɓɛɛ. Wi zunung ɓɔɔ wu shii ka tìng ɓarɛ wiya?”
66007001	A knti weɓe, n zi rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri kaa lapa ɓɛɛ dɛ̃ɛti, ri shiiri ka nyaa kãngkãng koo. Ri nɔɔ jasung ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu ra nɛɛ nɔng kaɓa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri rà kaa takpang ka tipi, nɛɛ yuu rɛɛ waapo, a ɓɔɔ ka yuu laa ɓɔɔ ka koo ɓɛɛ.
66007002	A n zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ gbete a nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Yiti vuu ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ɓi ningkãari ɓang ka bii vuu, zang zi vuu ɓiɓɛ nung kaa gn ɓɛɛ. A mɛɛ nyaa nabm, ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ Laa a ri naa tɔ nɛɛ ri dang tipi nɛɛ waapo jìng ɓɛɛ.
66007003	A kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “N'ɔɔ dang rɛɛ tipi nɛɛ waapo, nɛɛ laa, jìng gn kpang. Ruu ɓǎng rɛɛ zang shoonang Laa ɓuru vuu ɓiɓɛ doo ka nyaating ka gbongkarɛ.”
66007004	A n tãayi, zang gã rɛɛ zang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓang ri vuu ka nyaating ɓɛɛ. Zang ri nandon, labang dakn laa maani tu laa ziti tu dɛ̃ɛti. Ri nwangnɛ teteng zɔ̃ng zang Isirela nandon.
66007005	Zang ɓang zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Yahuda. Zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Rubeng, zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Gaadi.
66007006	Zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Ashaa, zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Nafitali, a zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Manase.
66007007	Zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Simiyon, zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Leevi, a zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Isaka.
66007008	Zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Zebuluna, zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Yusufu, a zang labang dakn kopi tu ziti ka teteng zɔ̃ng zang Biliyaminu.
66007009	Ka knti vuu keɓe, n shing jìng, a n zirɛ zang ri kpalɛ yuu zingkãng zingkãng, daa naa gãnang kpang. Ri nwangnɛ teteng zɔ̃ng zang piti, nɛɛ nɔng piti ka koo keɓe, a ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓɔɔ ka koo piti. Ri shiiri ka tìng laa nwannang kpanti ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ kagn ɓɛɛ. Ri hã̀lɛ̀ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru, a ri ti yiti nasãng laa nung manja ka naa.
66007010	Ri nandon, ri mɛɛ nyaa ka lapa nabm nɛɛ, “Ɓi Laa ɓuru ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti nɛɛ Jaa Mɛɛrɛ rikɔ ta yuu ɓuru.”
66007011	A rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa nandon, ɓɔɔ ri shiiyi ri kiiri rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti nɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ, ri tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng laa nwannang kpanti a ri bang Laa.
66007012	Ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ “Ruu kasɛ tɔ, dɔɔnang, nɛɛ bannang nɛɛ zũnang nɛɛ zã̀anang, nɛɛ zang sennang nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang, nɛɛ kpanti roonang ɓi ɓɔɔ Laa ɓuru gbinggbing, wu nwang nɔngkɔ”
66007013	A zang bang gbete hɛ̃ɛ m nɛɛ, “Zang kɔ ri hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru ɓee, mɔɔ zi ri nung tɔ ya? Mɔɔ ti zi nɔng ɓɔɔ ri alɛ nɛɛ mani tɔ ya?”
66007014	A n kasɛ wu nyaa nɛɛ, “Dabang, ɓi mɔkɔ zirɛ.” A kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Wee ɓi rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri wɔ nɛɛ jìng dannang bang kaɓa ɓɛɛ, a ri sɔɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓarɛ kaa nɛɛ zìi Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, a tu kaa puru shãa shãa.
66007015	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, ri shii ka tìng laa nwannang Kpanti Laa ri bang wu nɛɛ zìi nɛɛ laagɛ̃ ka yeti Gãa ɓɔɔ zang bang wu kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti yiti ri katɔ, wu gãng jìng ka ri, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ wu lee ri naa kaa tɔ̀'ɔ bii kpang.
66007016	Nyɔkɔ nyɔ ri takpang, sutu ti mãa ri takpang, a laa ɓɔɔ t'uu ɓɛɛ, nyɔ ri bii takpang.
66007017	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓɔɔ ka nɔng laa nwannang kpanti gãng jìng katɔ ka ri ɓɛɛ. Sɔɔ ri tìng, atɛ ri ka rang mii ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ. Laa ti naa àl'ɛ ri miiri nandon ka jìng ɓarɛ.”
66008001	Ka knti ruu keɓe, Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ tãa lang ɓɔɔ daa kaa manziti ɓɛɛ, a zang vɔ̃ nyaa kaa lapa selele, daa nung minti bmati tu kopi katɔ.
66008002	A n zi rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔ manziti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri shiiri ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ, a zang, a zang ɓu gboo ka naa.
66008003	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ gbete, arɛ naa shii ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔ̀ɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɛɛ. Yiti taasa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ka naa. A zang ɓɔɔ arɛ naa a wu vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ dɔli. Nɛɛ wu dɔɔyi nɛɛ gaanang rɛɛ zang Laa, ka tìng laa nwannang kpanti. Ka yuu nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ.
66008004	A dɔɔ waa ka vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ kaɓa, a zìiri ɓiɓɛ gaayu paa seenang, a daa kaa lapa nɛɛ Laa gaanang zang Laa, ka bii Laa.
66008005	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, see waa nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kaɓa, a tɛ̃ɛ ka taasa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ kaɓa, a tasɛ ka koo. Ɓɔɔ wu tasɛ, shala mɛɛyi, a shala ti mangnɛ, a tipi ruutu.
66008006	A ka knti vuu keɓe, rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa, manziti, ɓɔɔ zang ɓu yiti gboo ka naa kaɓa ɓɛɛ, ri kpalɛ bii gboo jeenang kati.
66008007	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang jee gboo ɓiɓɛ, a nyaa kɔ doo naa ɓee, mii takong nɛɛ waa ri nwɛɛtɛ zɔɔ nɛɛ zìi vuu a zang vang ri ka tipi. A tìng gbete ka teteng koo ɓɔɔ zang basɛ tìng taati ɓɛɛ, waa shaayi. A naa zang basɛ rɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ ri ka tipi tìng taati, waa shaa tìng gbete, a waa shaa wusi bɛbɛtɛ jong nandon.
66008008	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ɓang ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang, jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ tuu vuu ɓɔɔ nwang kɔpɔ bang ɓɔɔ waa shaa kana ɓɛɛ, a tasɛ ka yeti waapo.
66008009	Naa zang basɛ waapo tìng taati, mii tìng gbete raa zìi. Vuu ɓɔɔ ka yeti waapo nandon naa zang basɛ ri tìng taati, ɓɔɔ tìng gbete, ri vɔlɔ. A tìng gbete ka teteng rɛɛ laana ɓɔɔ nandon ri shaarɛ.
66008010	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa kaa taati ɓɛɛ, jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. A sang bang watɛ nɛɛ lapa, waa shaa kagn naa zang mang waa ka wusi. A watɛ ka rang, nɛɛ rɛɛ sɔlɔng mii dang gbete, naa zang basɛ ri tìng taati ɓɛɛ.
66008011	(Zang ɓaa sang bì'i nɛɛ Lanang). Mii tìng gbete la kaatɔ, a zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ri ɓoo mii, ri vɔlɔ ka ruu lanang ɓiɓɛ.
66008012	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ɓɔɔ daa kaa dɛ̃ɛti ɓɛɛ, jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. A tìng gbete ka teteng tìng taati ɓɔɔ zang basɛ làa, nɛɛ shala nɛɛ rɛɛ sang ɓɛɛ, ri tɔɔyi. Tìng gbete ɓɔɔ laagɛ̃ nɛɛ ɓɔɔ nɔng zìi yakɛ kpang.
66008013	N shing jìng a n zi gangong tãa ka lapa, n tãayi mɛɛ nyaa nabm kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ayìi rang, jìng dannang kagn yuu manɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka koo ɓɛɛ. Naa zang jee rɛɛ gboo ɓɔɔ yaa knti, kɔ̀ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɔɔ ri yaa taati, ri kpalɛ bii jeenang ɓa ɓɛɛ.”
66009001	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa kaa maani ɓɛɛ, jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. A n zi sang ɓɔɔ watɛ ka koo nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ. A zang a wu saka ɓɔɔ wu puu too ɓɔɔ dii ɓiɓɛ kagn kpang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
66009002	A puu nyaa too, nyaa kɔ doo naa ɓee, zìiri nwangnɛ mɔɔ kɔɔ nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ shaa bang. Zìiri kaɓa, zuu làa dɔ̃ɔ gbete, zang zi laa takpang, nɔng tɔ̀ɔ kaa nɛɛ laagɛ̃.
66009003	Zɔɔrɔ dɔli ri nwangnɛ yeti zìiri kaɓa, ri arɛ ri zuu tipi nandon. A zang a ri naa nɛɛ ri ta zang naa ɓɔɔ gbuuri ta zang ɓɛɛ.
66009004	Zang kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, ri p'alɛ̀ rɛɛ wusi nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ takɛ ka tipi nɛɛ rɛɛ laa vuu ɓɔɔ kpang. Zang nɛɛ ri ta ɓarɛ shɔnzang ɓɔɔ zang ɓang vuu ɓɔɔ zang zi nung kagn nɛɛ ri zang Laa ka nyaating ɓarɛ kpang kɔ shɛ̃ɛning.
66009005	Zang a ri naa nɛɛ ri nyɔkɔ zang kaɓa vɔrɔ kpang. Zang nɛɛ ri dang ri jìng shala maani kɔ nwani. Jìng dannang kaɓa kɔng naa ɓɔɔ gbuuri nɛɛ ta zang tɔ, kɔng zang ɓɛɛ.
66009006	Ka shala maani keɓe, shɔnzang ri kãa vɔrɔ nɛɛ tɔ̀ɔ, ri wɔ ka jìng dannang kaɓa, a ri ìi vɔrɔ kaa takpang. Zang ri wà'a vɔrɔ katɔ a vɔrɔ nyɔ ri kaa takpang
66009007	Zɔɔrɔ kaɓa ri ta bii naa gbantang ɓɔɔ zang kpalɛ ri bii nɛɛ ri daa ka nyaa sìiri ɓɛɛ. Vuu ɓɔɔ ri hãa ka yuu nwang lapoo yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ. Waa nyaating ɓarɛ nwàng ɓɔɔ shɔnzang.
66009008	Suuyuu ɓarɛ bee naa suuyuu zang soro, tãri ɓarɛ ti wɔng naa ɓɔɔ zing.
66009009	Ri zùu danggn ɓarɛ nɛɛ saka, a nasãng ɓarɛ kaa nyaa nabm naa keke sìiri tanang ɓɔɔ gbantang ri gɔ̃kɔ ri daa nɔng nyaa sìiri ɓɛɛ.
66009010	Ri takɛ dãng, shɔng kagn naa ɓɔɔ rɛɛ gbuuri. N'aa ɓɔɔ zang a ri nɛɛ ri dang zang jìng shala maani keɓe, ka dãng ɓarɛ keɓe kɔ.
66009011	Kpanti rɛɛ zɔɔrɔ keɓe, ɓi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka too ɓɔɔ dii kagn kpang kaɓa. Zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ nyaa zang Yahudawa nɛɛ Abadɔng, ka nyaa zang Heleni zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Apoliyɔng, dìiri nung keɓe ɓi, “Zang ɓɔɔ lasɛ vuu ɓɛɛ.”
66009012	Wee kɔ jìng dannang bang ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ, jìng dannang bang ɓɔɔ naa a ɓɛɛ yaa kaa ziti.
66009013	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa ka mangbete jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. A n tãa yee nwangnɛ yeti j'ee dɛ̃ɛti, ɓɔɔ ka yuu paa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ.
66009014	Yee kaɓa kɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ jee gboo ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Yaarɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ɓɔɔ dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa ɓɔɔ zang mãlɛ ri ka nyaa rang Yufireti ɓɛɛ naa ta.”
66009015	Rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa bɛɛ zang mã ri ka nɔng kaɓa nɛɛ ri gã là'a keɓe, nɛɛ diki keɓe, nɛɛ shala keɓe, nɛɛ saa keɓe. Tɔ̀ɔ, zang yaa ri naa kati ri nyɔkɔ zang tìng gbete vɔrɔ, naa zang basɛ zang koo tìng taati ɓɛɛ.
66009016	Zang sɔɔja ɓarɛ ɓɔɔ ri vang ɓarɛ gbantang ɓɛɛ, zang kɔɔ m nɛɛ ri labang labang, laa maani dakn ziti.
66009017	Wee naa ɓɔɔ n zi rɛɛ gbantang bì'i, ka vuu ɓɔɔ zang tusu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri vãlɛ gbantang bì'i ri hãa saka ɓɔɔ zuu ri danggn ɓɛɛ, ta bii nwɛɛri naa waa, a ɓɔɔ ta bii naa zargina, a ɓɔɔ ta bii naa mii rong. Rɛɛ gbantang, ri takɛ yuu naa ɓɔɔ zing. Waa nɛɛ zìiri nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ta bii naa mii rong, nwangkɛ nɛɛ nyaa ɓarɛ.
66009018	Rɛɛ kɔnang taati kɔ nwangkɛ nɛɛ nyaa rɛɛ gbantang ɓee, waa nɛɛ zìiri nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ ta bii naa mii rong ɓɛɛ, ri nyɔ̀kɔ̀ shɔnzang tìng gbete nɛɛ wukɔ, naa zang basɛ shɔnzang ɓɔɔ koo tìng taati ɓɛɛ.
66009019	Kaka rɛɛ gbantang kaɓa, ɓi ka nyaa ɓarɛ nɛɛ dãng ɓarɛ. Dãng ɓarɛ nwang naa sɔkɔ, ri ta yuu kagn. Ri shing zang nyaa vuu waa nɛɛ wukɔ.
66009020	A zang ɓɔɔ kɔnang kaɓa nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ kpang, ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ kpang. Ri yi tìng, ri bang ɓarɛ doo rɛɛ suru shi kpang nɛɛ rɛɛ vaka ɓɔɔ ri palɛ nɛɛ naa ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri palɛ vaka ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zinariya, ɓɔɔ nɛɛ azurufa, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tagula. Ri palɛ ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tari, a zang sèe ɓɔɔ laa zang palɛ nɛɛ mani. Vuu keɓe ri rang yee kpang, ri ti tãa nɔng kpang, a ri ti ra kpang.
66009021	Zang kaɓa ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ri yaa zang nyɔkɔnang vɔrɔ, nɛɛ nvaa shaanang nɛɛ dũndũng palɛnang a ɓɔɔ shɔngɓɔ ɓɔɔnang ɓarɛ kpang.
66010001	Ka knti vuu keɓe, n zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ lapa. Sãmbong zuu wu naa fɔ̃ɔrɔ, a sɔkɔ mii kãng ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Waa nyaating ɓiɓɛ kɔlɔ katɔ naa laa, a doo ɓiɓɛ naa nyɛlɛ waa ɓɔɔ kɔ nabm ɓɛɛ.
66010002	Yiti jaa labeenang tɔkɔlɔng ɓɔɔ zang puu katɔ ɓɛɛ ka naa. Arɛ naa n'aa doo nakn ɓiɓɛ ka yuu waapo a n'aa doo nagang ɓi ka tipi.
66010003	Ɓaa nyaa nabm, yee ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔɔ zing mɛɛ nyaa ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ wu ɓaa nyaa naa weɓe, rɛɛ shala mii manziti kaɓa ri mɛɛyi.
66010004	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ shala mii manziti kaɓa ri mɛɛyi, bɛɛ n tɔɔ n bee vuu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ɓɛɛ kaa tɔ. A n tãa yee nɛɛ lapa kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ nwangsɛ zang bii ruu kaɓa kpang, mɔɔ beere kpang.”
66010005	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ naa doo ka waapo nɛɛ tipi kaɓa, tuu nakn ɓiɓɛ ka lapa.
66010006	A tũng vuu nɛɛ nung Laa ɓɔɔ nwang ɓi ningkãari dondong, ɓɔɔ mãa lapa nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tipi nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. A ɓɔɔ waapo nɛɛ vuu piti ɓɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, kɔɔyi nɛɛ, laa ɓɔɔ zang suukãng ɓɛɛ takpang.
66010007	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ daa kaa manziti nɛɛ naa jee gboo ɓiɓɛ tɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ ri waasɛ bii katɔ, ri nwangsɛ bii kati, tɔ̀ɔ, wu hangsɛ nyaa ɓarɛ kati naa ɓɔɔ wu nwàngsɛ̀ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ zang ruu Laa ɓɛɛ.
66010008	A yee ɓaasi n tãayi a nɛɛ lapa ɓɛɛ, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Daayi, mɔɔ ta labeenang ɓɔɔ zang puu katɔ kaɓa. Ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ shii ka yuu waapo nɛɛ tipi, yiti ka naa ɓa.”
66010009	A n daayi, n daa kɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa kaɓa nɛɛ wu a m jaa labeenang bì'i. Kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Ta ta, mɔɔ shaayi. T'ìng katɔ ka nyaa ɓaaɓɛ naa nung warɛ, a nɛɛ daa tɔ yeti ɓaaɓɛ, daa la kaatɔ.”
66010010	A n ta jaa labeenang bì'i nɛɛ naa ɓiɓɛ n shaayi. T'ìng katɔ ka nyaa mɛɛ naa nung warɛ, a ɓɔɔ n mãrɛ, daa la kaatɔ ka yeti mɛɛ.
66010011	A zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Daa tɔkn mɔɔ daa kɔɔ ruu ka yuu zang koo laa ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓarɛ ka bm bm ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti ɓarɛ.”
66011001	Ka knti vuu keɓe, zang a m laa ɓɔɔ zang gãsɛ nɔng nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. A zang kɔɔ m nɛɛ “Yupaa mɔɔ daa gãsɛ Gãa Laa, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ wu vuu kagn ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ti gã zang ɓɔɔ ri bang Laa ka nɔng ɓɛɛ.
66011002	A mɔɔ gãsɛ dàbang ɓɔɔ ɓi ka biling ka nɔng Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang yàa ɓi zang tipi ɓɔɔgn, ɓɔɔ ri naa naalɛ Urushalima nɛɛ doo ɓarɛ shala laa ziti tu ziti ɓɛɛ.
66011003	N shong zang mɛɛ ziti ɓɔɔ ri daa kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu mɛɛ ɓɛɛ. Ri naa hã̀l'ɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa nyaavɔ ri hã̀l'ɛ ɓɛɛ. N a ri naa ri kɔɔ zang ruu ka yuu mɛɛ diki labang gbete tu laa maani dakn ziti, tu laa taati.”
66011004	Zang ziti ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔ ruu ɓiɓɛ keɓe, rikɔ laa zeetung ziti nɛɛ waa zà'ang sɔɔ ziti ɓɔɔ ka tìng Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti koo piti ɓɛɛ.
66011005	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tɔɔ wu palɛ ri vuu shi kpang, waa nwangnɛ nyaa ɓarɛ wu shaa zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ ri kpang kaɓa. Wee naa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔkɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ ri kpang kɔ, tɔɔ ri wɔ kaa takpang.
66011006	Zang a ri naa vuu palɛnang katɔ ɓɔɔ ri zãa mii lapa anang katɔ ka làa ɓɔɔ ri kɔ̀'ɔ zang ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri ti zunung katɔ ri risi mii ɓɔɔ ka koo nandon, wu raa zìi. Zang ti a ri naa ɓɔɔ ri atɛ jìng dannang ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng ka koo keɓe ka yuu zɔɔ yuu zɔɔ, ka laa ɓɔɔ ri kasɛ piti ɓɛɛ.
66011007	Ri nɛɛ hangsɛ ruu Laa kɔɔnang tɔ, yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ shaa varɛ dɔli, ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ yeti too ɓɔɔ dii kagn kpang, wu naa ta sìiri nɛɛ ri. Naa ɓa ri kaka, wu nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ.
66011008	Zang naa yaa vɔrɔ ɓarɛ ka gbalang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gari bang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa vuu jɛ̃ɛnang, zang ɓaa nɛɛ Saduma nɛɛ Masar ɓɛɛ. Nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓ'aa kpanti ɓarɛ naa ka laa kagn ɓɛɛ.
66011009	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwangnɛ zɔ̃ng zang piti, nɛɛ nɔng piti ka koo, ɓɔɔ nyaa ɓarɛ ka bm bm ɓɛɛ, ri naa pɛ̃ɛrɛ vɔrɔ ɓarɛ, diki ɓa katɔ taati nɛɛ nyaa gãasa. Ri zãa zang vɔrɔ rɛɛ zang keɓe gbãanang katɔ.
66011010	Zang koo keɓe ri naa gaarɛ zɔɔ, ri tãa tìnang ka ruu vɔrɔ zang ziti keɓe. Ri alɛ zɔɔ vuu waati ka ruu ɓɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa kaɓa, ri kɔɔ ruu Laa, ri dang zang ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka koo jìng dɔli ɓɛɛ.
66011011	Ɓɔɔ diki taati nɛɛ nyaa gãasa naa ɓarɛ, ɔ̃kɔnang ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ bii Laa, a daa ka yeti ɓarɛ, a ri shii doo paa. Ɓɔɔ ri shii paa, zang kaɓa nandon, ɓɔɔ ri zi ri, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ dɔli.
66011012	A zang ziti kaɓa, ri tãa yee nwangnɛ lapa, ɓaa ri nyaa nabm nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ a ta ka lapa ka nihn.” A ri daa lapa ka yeti sãmbong, zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ ri kpang nandon, ri zi ri jìng bii.
66011013	Nyaa kɔ doo naa ɓee, tipi ruutu nabm, a naa zang basɛ gari bang kaɓa tìng kopi, tìng gbete ka teteng ɓarɛ jirɛ. A tipi ɓɔɔ ruutu ɓee nyɔ shɔnzang labang manziti. A zang ɓɔɔ ri yaa knti, bii kaa ri vɔrɔ dɔli, a ri dɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kati.
66011014	Jìng dannang ɓɔɔ daa kaa ziti ɓa tɔ, ɓɔɔ ya gbete wu daa kaa taati a doo ka naa.
66011015	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ waa rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri manziti nyaa knti ɓɛɛ, jee gboo ɓiɓɛ. A n tãlɛ yee nwangnɛ lapa, ri rang yee nabm nɛɛ, “Kpanti roonang koo keɓe, raa ɓɔɔ kpanti ɓuru tɔ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Kirisi ɓiɓɛ. Laa kɔ naa roo kpanti gbinggbing.”
66011016	A rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti, ɓɔɔ zang ɓu nwang ka yuu laa kpanti ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ, ri tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng Laa, ri sòo yuu ka dii, ri bang Laa.
66011017	Ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Ruu zãa mɔɔ tɔ kpanti ɓuru Laa, ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang piti ka naa ɓaaɓɛ kɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ nw'ang ɓaa doo ka tìng, a mɔkɔ ti nwang kãntang keɓe. Ruu zãa mɔɔ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, mɔɔ tuu naa vuu palɛnang ɓaaɓɛ, ɓɔɔ bang, mɔɔ gaayu kpanti roonang kana nɛɛ mani ka koo ɓɛɛ.
66011018	Zang koo ɓɔ̀'ɔgn, ɓɔɔ ri ɓarɛ zang Laa kpang, ri lasɛ yeti tɔ nɛɛ mɔɔ gbãnggbãng, a diki ɓɔɔ mɔɔ lasɛ yeti jong nɛɛ ri ti a tɔ. Diki ɓɔɔ mɔɔ dɔng zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ruu kagn, mɔɔ ti sɔ̀ɔrɔ̀ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓaaɓɛ doo, ka ruu shoonang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ rɛɛ zang bang, nɛɛ wujɛ ɓɔɔ ri a nung ɓaaɓɛ bannang katɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ti ningsi zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri ningsi koo ɓɛɛ.”
66011019	A nyaa Gãa Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa puuyi, zang zǐ akpaati nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa mã nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ kagn ɓɛɛ katɔ, ka yeti Gãa Laa. A shala mangkɛ, zang mɛɛrɛ nyaa nabm, tipi ruutu, shala mɛɛrɛ, a mii takong a dɔli.
66012001	A vuu bang ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ, nwangsɛ bii ka lapa. Vuu keɓe ɓi Jaa soro zuu bii nɛɛ làa, a naa doo ɓiɓɛ ka yuu shala. A kãng lapoo yuu kpanti, zang palɛ nɛɛ sang kopi tu ziti ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.
66012002	Bɛɛ tuu jaa ka yeti, a laa jaa yinang ɓiɓɛ a tɔ, kaa nyaa ka ruu jaa ɓɔɔ kɔng wu ɓɛɛ.
66012003	A vuu bang ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn nwangsɛ bii ka lapa. Vuu keɓe ɓi sɔkɔ nwɛɛri bang baabi katɔ, ta yuu manziti nɛɛ jee kopi, ti kãng lapoo yuu kpanti ka yuu manziti nandon.
66012004	Naa zang basɛ sang kɔ ka lapa ɓee tìng taati. Sɔkɔ keɓe, waarɛ ɓɔɔ tìng gbete nɛɛ dãng ɓiɓɛ, vang ri ka tipi. A sɔkɔ bì'i daa shii ka tìng jaa soro ɓɔɔ nɛɛ wu yi kaa jaa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tɔɔ wu shaa jaa ɓɔɔ jaa soro yi ɓɛɛ kati.
66012005	A jaa soro yi jaa zang varɛ, ɓɔɔ naa roo kpanti ka yuu zang koo nandon ɓɛɛ, laa ɓɔɔ kpanti yiti ka naa, ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ zang palɛ nɛɛ saka. Ka ɓɔɔ jaa nwang hn, zang tantɛ wu tuunang raayi, zang daa nɛɛ wu ka bii Laa, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti ɓɛɛ.
66012006	A jaa soro bì'i ti yurɛ daa ka jìngti, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa gbàrɛ̀ wu ɓɛɛ. Zang gãng jìng ka wu diki labang gbete tu laa maani dakn ziti a tu laa taati ɓɛɛ.
66012007	A sìiri yupaa ka lapa. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔ bang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Maakel ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ wu ri ta sìiri nɛɛ sɔkɔ bang kaɓa. Sɔkɔ bang nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa, ɓɔɔ ri dũng ɓarɛ kaa sɔkɔ keɓe, ri taarɛ yuu gbãnggbãng.
66012008	A Maakel nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ ri shaa ri, a ri zãa rɛɛ sɔkɔ nɛɛ zang ɓiɓɛ nwannang ka lapa.
66012009	A ri nwangsɛ sɔkɔ bang nɛɛ lapa, ri tasɛ wu ka koo nɛɛ rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu nandon. Sɔkɔ bang kaɓa zang ɓaa nung ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ Sheetang, wukɔ kpanti rɛɛ suru shi kpang. Wukɔ ti nwaarɛ zang ka koo doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ.
66012010	A n tãa yee mɛɛ nɛɛ lapa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Kãntang keɓe Laa ta yuu ɓuru tɔ, zang ti zi naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ tɔ, nɛɛ kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ. A zang ti zi naa vuu palɛnang Kirisi ɓiɓɛ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ shii ka tìng Laa kɔɔrɔ ruu shi kpang, ka yuu rɛɛ manzung ɓuru diki diki nɛɛ zìi nɛɛ laagɛ̃, zang hing wu tɔ nɛɛ lapa zang tasɛ wu tɔ ka koo ɓɛɛ.
66012011	Ri ti ɓa wu yuu tɔ, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang zìi Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, a ɓɔɔ ka ruu ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ ɓi nizang ɓɛɛ. Ri ti kasɛ tɔ nɛɛ ri vɔrɛ ka ruu ɓiɓɛ.
66012012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang ri tãa tìnang ta ka lapa. Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka lapa piti ri tãa tìnang. A ɓɔɔ tipi nɛɛ waapo, jìng dannang ɓi kagn yuu ɓarɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Sheetang a tɔ, ka nɔng ɓarɛ ka tipi ɓɛɛ. Gnvɔ shaa wu dɔli, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zi tɔ nɛɛ diki ɓiɓɛ yaa kaa tɔkɔlɔng ɓɛɛ.”
66012013	Ka ɓɔɔ sɔkɔ bang zirɛ zang nwangsɛ wu tɔ nɛɛ lapa, gaayu ɓɔɔ wu hing jaa soro ɓɔɔ yi jaa zang varɛ ɓɛɛ.
66012014	A zang a jaa soro nasãng ziti naa ɓɔ̀'ɔ gangong, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, tãayi yaa sɔkɔ bang. Tãayi daa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang gbàrɛ̀ wu ka jìngti ɓɛɛ. Daa nwang ka nɔngkɔ, zang gãng jìng ka wu saa taati nɛɛ shala mangbete.
66012015	A sɔkɔ bang kaɓa, jeng mii nɛɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ naa rang, ka knti jaa soro bì'i nɛɛ mii wu tuu jaa soro kati.
66012016	A tipi yi jaa soro naa ka bii. Tipi puuyi a mii ɓɔɔ sɔkɔ bang jeng nɛɛ nyaa daa kagn nandon.
66012017	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, gnvɔ shaa sɔkɔ bang nɛɛ jaa soro kaɓa dɔli. Daayi nɛɛ wu daa ta sìiri nɛɛ rɛɛ zɔ̃ng jaa soro kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri nandon ri palɛ ɓarɛ vuu ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri ti shing danggn tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nizang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ Kirisi tùsù ri ɓɛɛ.
66012018	A sɔkɔ bang kaɓa daa shii ka yuu seseele, ka nyaa waapo.
66013001	Ka knti vuu keɓe, n zi yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ yeti waapo. Yuu ɓiɓɛ manziti, a takɛ jee kagn kopi. Kãng lapoo yuu kpanti ka jee ɓu, a zang ti bee wu nung shi kpang ɓɔɔ dãa Laa ka yuu ɓu.
66013002	Yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ n zirɛ ɓɛɛ, nwang gbɛ̃ɛ, doo ɓiɓɛ naa ɓɔ̀'ɔ vuu jìngti ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ biyaa ɓɛɛ, a nyaa ɓiɓɛ nwang ɓɔɔ zing. Sɔkɔ bang tuu bannang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kpanti ɓiɓɛ, a ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, a yɔpɔ kaɓa.
66013003	Yuu yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa gbete, nwàng naa ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang shing wu nyaa vuu waa bang kagn, a nyaa vuu waa bì'i zũng tɔ ɓɛɛ. Yɔpɔ kaɓa palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn dɔli, ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang koo nandon ri gaayu ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu ɓɛɛ.
66013004	Zang piti ri bang sɔkɔ bang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu a yɔpɔ kaɓa naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri bang yɔpɔ kaɓa, ri kɔɔrɔ nɛɛ, “Ɓu wi naa yɔpɔ keɓe wiya? Ɓu wi zunung ɓɔɔ wu gaa nyaa nɛɛ wu wiya?”
66013005	Zang a yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa naa, wu rangkɛ yee bang bang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a wu ti rangkɛ yee shi kpang ka yuu Laa. Zang a wu naa wu palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kasɛ ɓɛɛ, shala laa ziti tu ziti.
66013006	A gaayu ɓɔɔ wu rangkɛ yee shi kpang ka yuu Laa, nɛɛ nung Laa, ɓɔɔ nɔng nwannang Laa, a ɓɔɔ kaa zang piti ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
66013007	A zang ti yaa wu nɛɛ wu ta sìiri nɛɛ rɛɛ zang Laa wu ti shaa ri. A zang a wu naa wu roo kpanti ka yuu zɔ̃ng zang ka nɔng piti ka koo, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ nyaa ka bm bm ɓɛɛ.
66013008	Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka koo nandon ri naa bang wu. Rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang bee nung ɓarɛ doo tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ kpang, ka yeti labeenang Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ Laa, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ.
66013009	Zang ɓɔɔ shoo ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ kagn wu tãa ruu keɓe
66013010	Zang ɓɔɔ naa zang zɔ̃ng wu, nɛɛ zang naa yi wu katɔ ka nyaa sìiri, zang ti yi wu ɓi katɔ nizang. Zang ɓɔɔ naa zang zɔ̃ng wu nɛɛ zang nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓi nɛɛ yere bang, zang ti nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓi nɛɛ yere bang nizang. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang Laa ri mã danggn katɔ, ri ti yaa danggn shinnang ka bii Laa kpang.
66013011	Ka knti vuu keɓe, n zi yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ, shing baabi dɔli, nwangnɛ tipi. Ta jee ka yuu ziti, naa jaa mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, a ti r'ang yee naa sɔkɔ bang.
66013012	Tuu naa vuu palɛnang yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ nandon, palɛ vuu nɛɛ mani ka jìng ɓiɓɛ ka nɔngkɔ. A shing koo nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo nandon nɛɛ ri bang yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang, ɓɔɔ zang shing wu nyaa vuu waa bang, a zũng tɔ ɓɛɛ.
66013013	Yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ doo knti, palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ dɔli. Shingnɛ waa nwangnɛ lapa a ka tipi, ka jìng zang piti.
66013014	Tuu vuu ɓɔɔ zang a wu naa palɛnang ka tìng yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang kaɓa, a nwaarɛ zang piti, ɓɔɔ ri nwalɛ ka koo nandon nɛɛ mani. Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, ri p'al'ɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nwang yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang shing wu nyaa vuu waa ka bii nɛɛ yere bang a nwang doo ningkãari ɓɛɛ, ri a wu bannang nɛɛ mani.
66013015	A zang a yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ doo knti kaɓa naa, wu shingnɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nwang yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang, wu ɔ̃kɔ, tɔ̀ɔ, wu rang yee kati. Zang ti yaa wu nɛɛ, zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ kasɛ kpang nɛɛ ri bang vuu keɓe kpang, wu nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ.
66013016	Yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ doo knti ti shingnɛ nɛɛ zang piti, zang bang nɛɛ wujɛ, nɛɛ zang ying, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vuu ka naa ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ, jaafoo, nɛɛ jaa gãa, zang nɛɛ ɓang ri vuu ka nakn kpang, zang ɓang ri ka nyaating ɓarɛ.
66013017	Zang ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ ɓang wu vuu keɓe kpang, zang yaa wu, wu hoo vuu kpang, ti malɛ vuu kpang. Vuu kɔ zang ɓang zang ɓee ɓi nung yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa nɛɛ lamba ɓɔɔ wukɔ nwàng kaa naa nung ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.
66013018	Vuu keɓe, ɓi vuu zũnang. Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ zũng katɔ wu zi dìiri lamba yɔpɔ jìngti keɓe, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ɓi lamba shɔnzang ɓɛɛ. Lamba bì'i ɓi laa maani dakn mangbete tu laa taati tu mangbete.
66014001	A n shing jìng, n zi Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ Laa shii ka yuu kɔpɔ Sihiyona. Shɔnzang labang dakn laa maani tu laa ziti tu dɛ̃ɛti ri shii nɛɛ wu. Zang ɓɔɔ zang bee nung Daa ɓiɓɛ tɔ, nɛɛ nung ɓiɓɛ ka waa nyaating ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ.
66014002	A n tãa yee nwangnɛ lapa naa mii zɛ̃ɛyi ka rang kɔpɔ. Ti kaa nyaa naa shala mii mɛɛyi, a ti tìngnɛ naa zang ri w'aarɛ̀ vũngta.
66014003	Zang kaɓa nandon, ri shii ka tìng laa nwannang Kpanti Laa, nɛɛ tìng rɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ tìng rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, ri gaa soo shɔɔ. Zang ɓɔɔ zunung ɓɔɔ wu mantɛ soo kaɓa kagn kpang, ɓi zang labang dakn laa maani tu laa ziti tu dɛ̃ɛti kɔ zunung shɛ̃ɛning. Rikɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang tà yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ koo ɓɛɛ.
66014004	Zang keɓe nandon, ɓi rikɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng nɛɛ zang soro kpang, ri yiti yuu ɓarɛ waasɛ̃ ɓɛɛ. Rikɔ ti dũlu Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ka knti ka nɔng ɓɔɔ wu dà'a ɓɛɛ piti. Zang tà yuu ɓarɛ kɔ, nɛɛ teteng rɛɛ shɔnzang, a zang a Laa nɛɛ Jaa Mɛɛrɛ ɓiɓɛ ri.
66014005	Ri suu sè'e ɓarɛ gngn kpang, vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang kɔɔyi nɛɛ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓi ti kagn kpang.
66014006	A n zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔgn, tãa ka lapa. Atɛ Ruu Tɔ̃ɔ Laa ɓɔɔ di nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ wu naa daa kɔɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka koo ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang piti, nɛɛ nɔng piti ka koo, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri rangkɛ nyaa ka bm bm ɓɛɛ.
66014007	A mɛɛ nyaa nabm kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ dũng nyaa Laa ta, nɔɔ ti a wu bannang ka ruu ɓɔɔ, diki ɓɔɔ Laa naa jɛ̃ɛ zang piti ruu, a tɔ ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, nɔɔ bang Laa ta, ɓɔɔ wukɔ mãa lapa nɛɛ tipi, nɛɛ waapo nɛɛ sɔlɔng mii nandon ɓɛɛ.”
66014008	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔgn ti a tɔkn ka knti ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang ɓɛɛ, kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Shaarɛ tɔ, Gari bang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Babila, shaarɛ tɔ, gari ɓɔɔ ɓeleng shing zang tipi ɓɔɔgn ri ɓoo sàa ɓiɓɛ, ɓɔɔ wukɔ ɓi kaa nung sũnang nɛɛ dũndũng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ.”
66014009	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa kaa nɛɛ wukɔ taati ɓɛɛ, arɛ, a mɛɛ nyaa nabm, kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ bang yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nwang wu kaɓa, nɛɛ ti kasɛ, zang nɛɛ ɓang wu vuu ɓiɓɛ ka nakn kpang, zang ɓang wu ka nyaating.
66014010	Gnvɔ naa shaa Laa nɛɛ wu. Gnvɔ kaɓa, ɓi naa sàa ɓɔɔ la katɔ, zang tɛ̃ɛ mii kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. A zang naa dang wu jìng nɛɛ waa ɓɔɔ nwaa dɔli, nɛɛ mii takong, ka tìng rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ tìng Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ.
66014011	Zìiri waa ɓɔɔ zang dang ri jìng kagn shii paa ɓi sasak di nyaa kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri nɛɛ bang yɔpɔ jìngti nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nwang wu, a ri ti kasɛ zang ɓang ri vuu nung ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ri ɔ̃sɔ kpang nɛɛ zìi nɛɛ laagɛ̃ piti.”
66014012	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang Laa ri mã danggn katɔ, ri dũng nyaa Laa, ri ti yaa danggn shinnang ka bii Yeesɔ kpang.
66014013	A n ti tãa yee ɓɔɔ tɔkn nɛɛ lapa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “B'eer'e ruu keɓe, tìnang tãanang ɓi ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri naa vɔlɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ ka bii Laa ɓɛɛ.” A Suru Laa kasɛ nyaa tɔɔ, “N, nizang, ri tãa tìnang tɔ. Ri ɔ̃sɔ kaa tɔ nɛɛ shoonang bang ɓɔɔ ri ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ shoonang ɓarɛ nwàng ri, dũng ri ka knti ɓɛɛ.”
66014014	A n shing jìng, n zi sãmbong puru. A zang ɓɔɔ nwàng ka yuu sãmbong kaɓa, nwang Jaa shɔnzang. Kãng lapoo yuu kpanti ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ, ka yuu ɓiɓɛ, a yiti jangsi ɓɔɔ wɔng nyaa dɔli ɓɛɛ, ka naa ɓiɓɛ.
66014015	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, nwangnɛ yeti Gãa Laa, rang yee nabm. Kɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu sãmbong ɓɛɛ nɛɛ, “Tuu jangsi ɓaaɓɛ ta mɔɔ gaayu vuu shaanang kpaanang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ laa vuu shaanang kpalɛnang a tɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu shaanang zũng tɔ, gbayi gbayi.”
66014016	A zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu sãmbong tuu jangsi ɓiɓɛ, gɔ̃kɔ ka tipi, a kpaa vuu shaanang nandon.
66014017	A n zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔgn nwangnɛ yeti Gãa Laa, yiti jangsi ɓɔɔ wɔng nyaa dɔli jong ka naa.
66014018	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔgn nwangnɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang a wukɔ naa waa, ka nɔng kaɓa ɓɛɛ. Rang yee nabm kɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɔɔ yiti jangsi ɓɔɔ wɔng nyaa dɔli kaɓa nɛɛ, “Zirɛ shing jangsi ɓaaɓɛ ta, mɔɔ kpang jìng laa inabi ɓɔɔ ra ka laa ka koo ɓɛɛ, ri zũng tɔ.”
66014019	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, gɔ̃ jangsi ɓiɓɛ, a kpang jìng laa inabi, a vang ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang naa kãng ri kagn ɓɔɔ nwang kaa naa nɔng ɓɔɔ Laa dang zang jìng kagn ɓɛɛ.
66014020	Too ɓɔɔ zang kãng mii inabi kagn, ɓi ka yuu knti gari. Ri kãng mii jìng inabi, a zìi nwangnɛ nɔngkɔ, zɛ̃ɛyi daa naa nung mɛli laa maani dakn ziti naa mɔɔ shɛ̃ɛ kagn, a mɔɔ ka danggn.
66015001	Ka knti vuu keɓe, n zi vuu ɓɔɔgn ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ ka lapa, daa naa ɓɔɔ zang rang yee ɓiɓɛ kpang. N zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ri manziti, ri yiti kɔnang man ziti ka naa. Rɛɛ kɔnang keɓe, rikɔ kɔnang ɓɔɔ Laa di nyaa kɔnang atɛnang kaa gn ɓɛɛ kɔ. Laa hangsɛ nyaa gnvɔ ɓiɓɛ kaa nɛɛ rikɔ.
66015002	A n zi vuu ɓɔɔ nwang waapo ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ naa vìilaa, a waa ti shaa kagn ɓɛɛ. Zang kaɓa ɓɔɔ ri ɓa yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa yuu ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nwang wu, nɛɛ lamba nung ɓiɓɛ piti ɓɛɛ, ri shiiri ka nyaa waapo kaɓa. Ri yi vũngta ɓɔɔ Laa a ri ɓɛɛ kaa naa.
66015003	Ri gaa soo ɓɔɔ Musa zang nyaa shoonang Laa ri gaa ɓɛɛ, a Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ti g'aa jong ɓɛɛ, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Laa ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ kpanti ɓuru ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓa zang piti katɔ ɓɛɛ. Shoonang ɓaaɓɛ bang dɔli, ti shing zang, zang mã naa ka danggn. Mɔkɔ kpanti zang ɓɔɔ ri ka koo nandon Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ palɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓi tɔ̃ɔ, a mɔɔ ti zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nizang.
66015004	Ɓu wi kaa vɔrɔ ɓaaɓɛ, wu ti a mɔɔ bannang kpang wiya kpanti Laa? Ɓi mɔkɔ gbete ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓaaɓɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Zɔ̃ng zang tipi piti piti ri naa arɛ ri bang mɔɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri zi naa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ d'ɔng ruu tɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ.”
66015005	Ka knti vuu keɓe, n zirɛ, zang puu nɔng ɓɔɔ shi kpang ɓi kagn kpang ɓɛɛ, nɔng ɓɔɔ zang shìli vuu ɓɔɔ tusu nyaa ɓɔɔ Laa a ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ka Gãa Laa ka lapa ɓɛɛ.
66015006	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa manziti ɓɔɔ ri atɛ kɔnang manziti kaɓa, ri nwangnɛ yeti Gãa Laa. Ri hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ puru ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri ti mã guruji ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ, ka danggn ɓarɛ.
66015007	Vuu gbete ka teteng vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa, 'al'ɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔ ri manziti ɓɛɛ kaɓa, taasa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya gbete gbete. Laa ɓɔɔ nw'ang ɓi ningkãari dondong ɓɛɛ, gnvɔ ɓiɓɛ yiki nyaa taasa katɔ.
66015008	Zìiri ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ bannang Laa, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ, yi nyaa Gãa Laa. Kɔnang manziti ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ri atɛ kaɓa. Ri nɛɛ palɛ tɔ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, zang ɓɔɔ wu zunung ɓɔɔ wu shɛ̃ɛ yeti Gãa Laa kaɓa ɓɛɛ kati.
66016001	Ka knti vuu keɓe, n tãa yee a nɛɛ Gãa Laa, mɛɛ nyaa nabm. Kɔɔ zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri manziti kaɓa nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ daayi zang ɓu wu daa tuu taasa manziti ɓɔɔ gnvɔ Laa kagn kaɓa, gbete nɔɔ ɓàarɛ̀ ka koo.”
66016002	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang daayi daa ɓaa kɔnang ɓɔɔ ka yeti taasa ɓiɓɛ ka koo. Ɓu doo ɓɔɔ wu ɓaayi hn, nɔɔrɔ bang bang ɓɔɔ kɔng zang dɔli, gaayu ɓɔɔ wu yiki zang piti, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang ɓang ri vuu yɔpɔ jìngti ka bii, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri bang vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nwang yɔpɔ jìngti bì'i ɓɛɛ.
66016003	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ɓang ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang naa ɓaa kɔnang ɓɔɔ ka yeti taasa ɓiɓɛ ka waapo. A tantɛ raanang naa zìi zang ɓɔɔ vɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ. Vuu piti ɓɔɔ ka yeti waapo, ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn ɓɛɛ, ri vɔlɔ nandon.
66016004	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa kaa taati ti arɛ, naa ɓaa kɔnang ɓɔɔ ka yeti taasa ɓiɓɛ, ka rang nandon, nɛɛ sɔlɔng mii nandon, a ri raa zìi jong nandon.
66016005	N tãayi, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ gãng jìng ka mii kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Laa ɓɔɔ mɔkɔ shi kpang ka bii kpang gbete ɓɛɛ. Mɔkɔ kãntang keɓe, mɔkɔ nw'ang ka tìng. Mɔɔ palɛ vuu gn dang gbete ka ruu kɔ mɔɔ dɔ̀ng zang ɓee kpang.
66016006	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ri nyɔkɔ zang ɓaaɓɛ nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓaaɓɛ ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ zang ruu ɓaaɓɛ, a zìi ɓarɛ tɛ̃ɛ ka tipi ɓɛɛ, a mɔɔ a ri zìi kãntang keɓe nɛɛ ri ɓooyi. Daa ri tɔ teetee.”
66016007	A n tãayi yee nwangnɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ Laa vuu kagn ɓɛɛ, kasɛ nyaa nɛɛ, “Nizang, Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ mɔɔ ɓa zang piti katɔ ɓɛɛ. Mɔɔ ɓaa zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ ti dɔ̀ng zang ruu ɓaa gn dang gbete kpang.”
66016008	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa kaa dɛ̃ɛti ɓɛɛ, arɛ naa ɓaa kɔnang ɓɔɔ ka yeti taasa ɓiɓɛ ka yuu làa. A zang a laa naa, wu shaa zang naa waa.
66016009	A shɛ̃ɛnshɛ̃ɛn laa shaarɛ zang kati. Naa ɓɔɔ ri nɛ̀'ɛ kɔ̃sɔ yeti, ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ, ri 'a Laa bannang. Ri kasɛ kpang, ri rangkɛ ɓarɛ ruu shi kpang kɔ jong, ka nung Laa ɓɔɔ naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ kagn ka yuu rɛɛ kɔnang keɓe ɓɛɛ.
66016010	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa ka maani ɓɛɛ, arɛ naa ɓaa kɔnang ɓɔɔ ka taasa ɓiɓɛ ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti, ɓɔɔ yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa nwang kagn ɓɛɛ. A nɔng tɔɔnang zuu zang ɓɔɔ wu roo kpanti ka yuu ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang ri shaa rìiti ka ruu jìng ɓɔɔ ri dang ɓɛɛ.
66016011	Ri dãlɛ Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ka ruu jìng ɓɔɔ ri dang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ nɔɔrɔ ɓɔɔ ka bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. A ri kasɛ kaa takpang ri kɔ̃sɔ yeti ɓarɛ, ri yaa vuu shi kpang ɓarɛ kpang.
66016012	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ daa ka mangbete ɓɛɛ, arɛ naa ɓaa kɔnang ɓɔɔ ka taasa ɓiɓɛ, ka mii rang bang, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Yufireti. Mii rang keɓe ɔ̃ɔ nandon, tɔ̀ɔ, wu yàa rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ri a nɛɛ paa ɓɔɔ laa nwang ɓɛɛ gbalang kati.
66016013	A n zi suru shi kpang taati, ɓɔɔ ri nwang vɔ̃kɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri nwangkɛ nɛɛ nyaa sɔkɔ bang, nɛɛ nyaa yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa, a ɓɔɔ nɛɛ nyaa zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ sè'e kaɓa.
66016014	Ri ɓarɛ, suru shi kpang ɓɔ̀'ɔ Sheetang. Naa vuu palɛnang ɓarɛ kagn ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ɓɛɛ. Ri daarɛ ka bii rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ka koo nandon, nɛɛ ri kp'al'ɛ ri, ri ta sìiri ka diki bang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti katɔ naa tusu zang yuu ɓiɓɛ kagn ɓɛɛ.
66016015	A Yeesɔ kɔɔyi tɔɔ, “N naa a naa shɔngɓɔ. Tìnang tãanang ɓi zang ɓɔɔ nwang doo paa, gãng jìng, hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ ka bii ɓɛɛ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ nɛɛ yaa bii bɔ̃bɔ̃rɔ, yusɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ tuu wu ɓɛɛ.”
66016016	A rɛɛ suru shi kpang kaɓa, ri kpalɛ rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ka koo nandon, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Amagedɔng nɛɛ nyaa zang Yahudawa ɓɛɛ.
66016017	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔ daa ka manziti ɓɛɛ, arɛ ɓaa kɔnang ɓɔɔ ka taasa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ka jasung waati. A yee nwangnɛ laa nwannang kpanti ka yeti Gãa Laa, mɛɛ nabm kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zang hangsɛ vuu piti tɔ.”
66016018	Shala mangkɛ, a ti mɛɛyi, a tipi ti ruutu gbãnggbãng. Tipi ruutu gngn naa waɓa kpang ɓu doo ɓɔɔ zang ri gaayu nwannang katɔ ka koo ɓɛɛ.
66016019	Gari bang kaɓa puusu taati, a rɛɛ gari nandon, ɓɔɔ ka tipi piti ka koo ri ti jili. Laa kpaa danggn gari bang kaɓa ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Babila ɓɛɛ. A shingnɛ gnvɔ ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ jìng dannang a kaa gari kaɓa, a shing ri ri dang jìng, ri hangsɛ naa ɓɔɔ zang ɓoo waka saa ɓɔɔ gbang katɔ, zang kusu ɓɛɛ.
66016020	Tipi ɓɔɔ mii kiiri nyaa ka teteng ka koo keɓe nandon, ri ningki nɛɛ rɛɛ kɔpɔ piti. Zang zili ri takpang.
66016021	Mii a nɛɛ takong bang bang nɛɛ lapa ka yuu shɔnzang. Takong ɓɔɔ ri watɛ ɓɛɛ, ri kpiti naa tari bang. Vuu keɓe shing baabi dɔli. Zang ri dãlɛ Laa, ka ruu jìng ɓɔɔ wu dang ri nɛɛ mii takong keɓe ɓɛɛ.
