66017001	Vuu keɓe ɓa tɔ, a ka teteng zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ manziti ɓɔɔ ri yiti taasa ka naa ɓɛɛ. Gbete arɛ naa kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Arɛ, n tusu mɔɔ jìng ɓɔɔ Laa naa dang jaa soro ɓɔɔ rakɛ wà'azaa dɔli, ɓɔɔ wukɔ gari ɓɔɔ zang mãa ka nɔng ɓɔɔ mii kagn dɔli ɓɛɛ.
66017002	Ɓɔɔ rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ri ka koo ri palɛ dũndũng nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ, a zang koo nandon ri ɓoo sàa dũndũng ɓiɓɛ tɔ, sàa si ri kana ɓɛɛ.”
66017003	A Suru Laa a kaa bii mɛɛ, a zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, tuu m daa nɛɛ n ka jìngti. A n zi jaa soro ka nɔng, nw'ang kaa yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ ta bii nwɛɛri ɓɛɛ. Yɔpɔ bì'i zang beere nung shi kpang ɓɔɔ zang dãlɛ Laa nɛɛ mani ka bii ɓiɓɛ nandon. Yɔpɔ bì'i yuu ɓiɓɛ manziti, a takɛ jee kagn kopi.
66017004	Jaa soro kaɓa hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ nwɛɛri, ɓɔɔ shili dɔli ɓɛɛ. Gbarɛ bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ zinariya, nɛɛ rɛɛ tari tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Yiti juwa ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɛɛ ka naa. Sãnsãnrãng, nɛɛ dũndũng ɓɔɔ wu palɛ, yi nyaa juwa bii katɔ lɛɛri.
66017005	Ka nyaating jaa soro bì'i, zang bèe nung ɓɔɔ kagn, zang waasɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nung bì'i kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ. Zang bee nɛɛ, “Gari Babila ɓɔɔ bang dɔli ɓɛɛ, mɔɔ nwang nà'a rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ rakɛ wà'azaa ɓɛɛ tɔ nandon, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ vuu gn baanang ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe nandon.”
66017006	A n zirɛ jaa soro bì'i, ɓoo zìi rɛɛ zang Laa ɓɔɔ zang nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ Yeesɔ kɔ Kpanti ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, a zìi ɓarɛ si wu kana. Ɓɔɔ n zi jaa soro kaɓa, n mã naa ka danggn.
66017007	Ka ruu nɔngkɔ, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, hɛ̃ɛ m nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ mã naa ka danggn ka ruu viya? N kaa ɓi n nwangsɛ mɔɔ vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi kpang ka yuu jaa soro kaɓa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ tuu wu kaɓa, ɓɔɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ manziti, a takɛ jee kopi ɓa.
66017008	Yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa bɛɛ ningkãari, kãntang keɓe tɔ̀'ɔ ningkãari kpang. Naa nwang ditɔ nɛɛ too ɓɔɔ dii kagn kpang kaɓa, wu daa kaa nɔng ɓɔɔ zang daa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri nwang ka koo ɓɔɔ zang bee nung ɓarɛ ka labeenang ɓɔɔ zang beere nung zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, bɛɛ zang mãa koo gn kpang, kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri nɛɛ naa zi yɔpɔ jìngti bì'i tɔ, ri naa mã naa ka danggn. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa ningkãari, a kãntang keɓe tɔ̀'ɔ ningkãari kpang ɓɛɛ, a ti naa gbãayu ditɔ tɔkn ɓɛɛ.
66017009	“Vuu keɓe ɓi zang ɓɔɔ zũng katɔ a ti zi vuu dɔli ɓɛɛ zirɛ. Rɛɛ yuu manziti kaɓa, ɓi rɛɛ jaa kɔpɔ manziti ɓɔɔ jaa soro kaɓa nwang kagn ɓɛɛ.
66017010	Ri ɓarɛ rɛɛ kpanti manziti, kpanti ɓɔɔ maani, ri vɔlɔ tɔ, ɓɔɔ gbete doogn. Ɓɔɔ gbete a ditɔ. Nɛɛ a tɔ, roo kpanti diki bee kpang.
66017011	Yɔpɔ jìngti ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ningkãari kpang ɓɛɛ, wukɔ kaa kpanti ɓɔɔ daa kaa mantaati ɓɛɛ, a ɓi kaa doo teteng rɛɛ kpanti manziti kaɓa kɔ. Bɛɛ daa kaatɔ, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ zang daa nyɔ wu vɔrɔ gbinggbing ɓɛɛ.
66017012	“Rɛɛ jee kopi ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ, rikɔ rɛɛ kpanti kopi, ɓɔɔ zang a ri naa kpanti roonang gn kpang ɓɛɛ. Zang nɛɛ naa a ri naa kpanti roonang tɔ, ri naa roo kpanti nɛɛ yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa, làa bee ri kpang.
66017013	Rɛɛ kpanti kopi keɓe, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ gbete, ri naa tuu naa vuu palɛnang nɛɛ bannang ɓarɛ, ri a yɔpɔ jìngti bì'i.
66017014	Ri naa ta sìiri nɛɛ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ Laa, a Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ naa shaa ri katɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wukɔ kpanti ka yuu rɛɛ kpanti nandon. Kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ, ɓa ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ wu zɔ̃ngkɔ, a ɓaa ri nyaa katɔ, ɓɔɔ ri dũng wu nɛɛ yeti gbete, ri naa shaa zang jong ka nyaa sìiri nɛɛ wu.”
66017015	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Mii ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi jaa soro ɓɔɔ rakɛ wà'azaa dɔli nwang ka yuu ɓiɓɛ kaɓa, ɓi zang dɔli ɓɔɔ ka tipi piti, ka nɔng piti ka koo, ɓɔɔ ri ti rangkɛ nyaa ka bm bm ɓɛɛ.
66017016	Rɛɛ jee kopi ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi kaɓa, nɛɛ yɔpɔ jìngti, ri naa kàsɛ̀ jaa soro ɓɔɔ rakɛ wà'azaa ɓɛɛ takpang. Ri naa talɛ vuu ɓiɓɛ nandon ri y'aa wu bii bɔ̃bɔ̃rɔ. Ri naa shaa yɔpɔ bii ɓiɓɛ, ri ti dɔɔ wu nɛɛ waa.
66017017	Ɓi Laa kɔ shing rɛɛ kpanti kopi kaɓa, rɛ̃rɛnang ɓarɛ wu daa gbete, tɔ̀ɔ, ri palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu mang ɓɛɛ kati. Ɓi Laa kɔ shing ri, nɛɛ ri a yɔpɔ jìngti naa kpanti roonang ɓarɛ, tɔ̀ɔ, vuu piti wu naa nwang kaa naa ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔyi nɛɛ naa nwang ɓɛɛ.
66017018	“Jaa soro ɓɔɔ mɔɔ zi ɓɛɛ, wukɔ gari bang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ roo kpanti ka yuu rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ka koo ɓɛɛ.”
66018001	Vuu keɓe naa ɓa tɔ, a n zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ lapa a ka tipi. Naa vuu palɛnang ɓiɓɛ bang dɔli, a bii ɓiɓɛ yakɛ nɔng ka koo nandon.
66018002	Mɛɛ nyaa nɛɛ kaka nabm, kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Shàarɛ̀ tɔ, Babila gari bang kaɓa, shaarɛ tɔ. Raa nɔng nwannang rɛɛ raanang, nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ rɛɛ suru shi kpang, ɓɔɔ yeti ɓarɛ la dɔli, ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ tɔ. Zɔ̃ng rɛɛ jaaning ɓɔɔ ri baabi dɔli, ɓɔɔ zang kasɛ ri kpang ɓɛɛ piti, ri nwang kaa nɔngkɔ.
66018003	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang nandon ri ɓooro sà'a dũndũng ɓiɓɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ka koo, ri p'alɛ̀ dũndũng nɛɛ wu ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri hooro vuu, ri daa malɛ ka koo ɓɔɔgn, ri nwang zang ying tɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gari kaɓa kasɛ vuu koo dɔli ɓɛɛ.”
66018004	A n tãa yee ɓɔɔgn nwangnɛ lapa, kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ ɓɔɔ nɔɔ zang mɛɛ ɓɛɛ, nɔɔ nwang ta, nɔɔ yaa gari kaɓa, tɔ̀ɔ, nɔɔ kpalɛ yuu kaa tɔ̀'ɔ nɛɛ wu, nɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, kpang. Laa nɛ̀'ɛ ti dang nɔɔ jìng nɛɛ ri.
66018005	Laa kpaa danggn vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, shang dɔli ɓɛɛ. Pãngsɛ ka yuu zɔɔ, daa lee lapa naa ka bii.
66018006	Nɔɔ p'al'ɛ wu vuu doo naa ɓɔɔ wu p'al'ɛ zang ɓɛɛ kɔ. Nɔɔ dang wu jìng, wu ɓa ɓɔɔ wu dang zang katɔ dakn ziti. Juwa ɓɔɔ wu a zang Sàa ɓiɓɛ kagn, nɔɔ tɛ̃ɛ wu saa ɓɔɔ gbangnɛ, ɓa ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ katɔ dakn ziti ɓɛɛ. doo ka wukɔ, nɔɔ a wu, wu ɓooyi.
66018007	Naa ɓɔɔ ɓeleng wu a yuu ɓiɓɛ bannang, a ti nwangnɛ tãa tìnang ɓɛɛ, wu ti dang jìng ta, wu ti zaa doo nɔngkɔ teetee. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kɔɔrɔ yuu ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ, ‘N m kpanti, n m suvɔ kpang. N kaa nyavɔ m kpang dondong ɓɛɛ.’”
66018008	Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, wu kɔɔ nɔngkɔ. Ka diki gbete, jìng dannang ɓɔɔ bang dɔli ɓɔɔ daa wu katɔ, naa a ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Kɔnang naa yi wu, naa zaayi, nyɔkɔ naa nyɔ wu, waa ti naa shaa wu. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti, ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti, wukɔ dɔng wu ruu ɓɛɛ.
66018009	Rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri palɛ dũndũng nɛɛ wu, a ri ti tãa tìnang nɛɛ wu, ri nɛɛ zi zìiri waa, ɓɔɔ shaa gari kaɓa tɔ hn, ri naa zaayi ri kaayi.
66018010	Ri naa shii nɛɛ nɔng beebang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kaa vɔrɔ jìng dannang ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Ayìi rang, Babila gari bang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ɓa gari piti ɓɛɛ, làa gbete zang dang mɔɔ jìng tɔ, waa shaa mɔɔ tɔ, dɔ̃ɔ gbete.”
66018011	Zang ɓɔɔ ri hooro vuu, ri ti daa malɛ ka koo ɓɔɔgn, ri ti naa zaa ditɔ, ri kà'a wu nyavɔ. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, zang ɓɔɔ naa hòor'o ri vuu ɓarɛ takpang ɓɛɛ.
66018012	Ri malɛ rɛɛ vuu naa rɛɛ zinariya nɛɛ azurufa nɛɛ rɛɛ tari ɓɔɔ shili dɔli ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ liling ɓɔɔ yalɛyalɛ ɓɛɛ, ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Ɓɔɔ ta bii nwɛɛri, ɓɔɔ naa latɔ̀'ɔ, ɓɔɔ puru. Ɓɔɔ kaa laa ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ tãri bɔng ɓɛɛ, ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng. Wee vuu ɓɔɔ zang see nɛɛ laa ɓɔɔ shaa nyaa dɔli ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ saka tagula ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ saka waati ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ tari ɓɔɔ shì katɔ ɓɛɛ.
66018013	Rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, naa Kirifa, nɛɛ vuu yaaji. Nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang dɔɔ ka waa, a sɛ̃ɛ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ muru, a ɓɔɔ luuban ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ mii inabi, nɛɛ nung, nɛɛ zũng ɓɔɔ zang palɛ borodi nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ jìng alakama ɓɔɔ zang nang zũng keɓe nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ rɛɛ napoo, nɛɛ mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ nɛɛ gbantang, nɛɛ keke ɓɔɔ gbantang gɔ̃ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ɓɔɔ zang malɛ ri, ri nwang kaa jaafoo ɓɛɛ.
66018014	Zang ɓɔɔ ri malɛ vuu kaɓa, ri ti kɔɔ wu nɛɛ, “Vuu piti ɓɔɔ mɔɔ shing gn kagn ri daa tɔ. Vuu ɓɔɔ mɔɔ tãa tìnang nɛɛ mani, nɛɛ vuu naa ɓaaɓɛ nandon ri daa tɔ, mɔɔ zi ri takpang.”
66018015	Zang ɓɔɔ ri malɛ rɛɛ vuu kaɓa, a ri naa ràa zang ying ɓɛɛ, bii naa kaa ri vɔrɔ dɔli, ka ruu jìng dannang bang ɓɔɔ gari kaɓa dang ɓɛɛ. Ri naa shii nɛɛ nɔng beebang, ri naa zaayi, ri kaa nyavɔ, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ,
66018016	“Ayìi rang, gari bang kaɓa, raa vuu gn kɔnang tɔ. Bɛɛ nwang naa jaa soro ɓɔɔ hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ ka bii tɔ̃ɔ, fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ shili katɔ, ɓɔɔ ta bii puru, a ɓɔɔ nwɛɛri. Gbarɛ bii nɛɛ rɛɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya nɛɛ rɛɛ tari tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ ɓɛɛ, ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng.
66018017	Laa gbete vuu naa ɓiɓɛ zang lasɛ tɔ nandon,” Zang ɓɔɔ ri zaa laana ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri daa zanti nɛɛ laana ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri hooro vuu, ri ti malɛ ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ shoonang ɓarɛ ka waapo ɓɛɛ. Ri shii nɛɛ nɔng beebang,
66018018	ri goo nyaa ka lapa nabm, ka ɓɔɔ ri zi zìiri waa ɓɔɔ shaa gari bì'i ɓɛɛ, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Gari bang ɓɔɔ kagn naa weɓe kpang.”
66018019	A ri see tapuru, ri vang ka yuu ɓarɛ, ka ɓɔɔ ri zaayi, ri kaa nyavɔ ɓɛɛ. Ri kaa nabm nɛɛ, “Ayii rang, gari bang kaɓa, raa vuu gn kɔnang tɔ. Bɛɛ ɓeleng zang piti ɓɔɔ laana ɓarɛ kagn ka waapo, ri raa zang ying, nɛɛ vuu naa gari kaɓa, laa gbete zang lasɛ wu tɔ.
66018020	Zang ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ri tãa tìnang ta, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, gari Babila shaarɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Nɔɔ tãa tìnang jong, rɛɛ zang Laa, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, Laa dɔng wu ruu tɔ ka ruu vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ bɛɛ palɛ nɔɔ ɓɛɛ.”
66018021	Vuu keɓe ɓa tɔ, a zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ lakɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, arɛ naa tuu ree bang, tasɛ ka waapo, a kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ naa tuu Babila gari bang kaɓa ditɔ nɔngkɔ, wu lu nabm ka tipi. Zang naa zi gari Babila takpang.
66018022	Zang naa paasɛ vũngta ɓɔɔ zang tarɛ, tãanang tɔ̀'ɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang, nɛɛ soo gaarɛnang nɛɛ leere jeenang, a ɓɔɔ gboo jeenang. Zang ti paasɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ zɔ̃ng shoonang kiya zinang tɔ̀'ɔ yeti gari bì'i kpang. Zang ti paasɛ nyaa ree tãanang tɔ̀'ɔ yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang.
66018023	Waa zà'ang sɔɔ ti yakɛ yeti ɓiɓɛ takpang, zang ti paasɛ yè'e zang ɓɔɔ gee soro, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ sinyɛ tãanang takpang, ka yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang. Ɓeleng zang ɓɔɔ mɔɔ hooro vuu ɓarɛ rikɔ zang bang ka koo zang ti nwaarɛ zɔ̃ng zang ɓɔɔ ka koo, nɛɛ nvaa ɓaaɓɛ kɔ.
66018024	Zang ti 'ìi zìi rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Laa nɛɛ ɓɔɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ zang nyɔkɔ ri vɔrɔ ka koo ɓɛɛ, ka gari kaɓa kɔ.”
66019001	Vuu keɓe, ɓa tɔ, a n tãa vuu naa yee zang, ri kpalɛ ka lapa gaagaa, ri goo nyaa nabm, ri gaa soo nɛɛ, “Haliluyaa, ɓi Laa ɓuru kɔ tà yuu ɓuru. Bannang, nɛɛ naa vuu palɛnang ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓiɓɛ.
66019002	Ɓi zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ, ti dɔ̀ng zang ruu ɓi gn dang gbete kpang. Dɔ̀ng jaa soro ɓɔɔ rakɛ wà'azaa dɔli kaɓa, ɓɔɔ lasɛ koo nɛɛ dũndũng ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, ruu tɔ. Ti wàa zang shoonang ɓiɓɛ pãng zìi ɓarɛ tɔ ka yuu ɓiɓɛ.”
66019003	A ri mɛɛ nyaa tɔkn dɔ̃ɔ gbete nɛɛ, “Haliluyaa, zìiri ɓɔɔ yupaa nɛɛ bii ɓiɓɛ daa ka lapa nɔngkɔ sasak dondong.”
66019004	A rɛɛ zang bang bmati tu dɛ̃ɛti kaɓa, nɛɛ vuu dɛ̃ɛti ɓɔɔ suru bii ɓarɛ kagn kaɓa, ri tang jong ka tìng Laa, ɓɔɔ nwang ka yuu laa nwannang kpanti ɓɛɛ. Ri bang wu, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔngkɔ, Haliluyaa”
66019005	A n tãa yee nwangnɛ laa nwannang Laa kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ pàl'ɛ Laa shoonang ɓɔɔ nɔɔ a wu bannang, zang bang nɛɛ wujɛ nandon, nɔɔ dɔɔ Laa ɓuru.”
66019006	A n tãa vuu naa yee zang ɓɔɔ ri kpalɛ zɔɔ gaagaa ɓɛɛ. Yee ɓarɛ kaa nyaa naa mii zɛ̃ɛ ka rang kɔpɔ, a ɓɔɔ ti naa shala ɓɔɔ mɛɛ nabm ɓɛɛ. Yee bii kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Haliluyaa, Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ kpanti ɓuru, wukɔ ɓa zang piti, gaayu kpanti roonang tɔ.
66019007	Ruu dɔ̀ɔ nɔɔ bii, ruu tãa tìnang, ruu dɔɔ bannang ɓiɓɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓɔɔ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ gee soro ɓiɓɛ kagn a tɔ, a sinyɛ ɓiɓɛ ti kpalɛ bii tɔ ɓɛɛ.
66019008	Zang wu a sinyɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ liling ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ, a bii rìiti kagn kpang ɓɛɛ, wu hãayi.” Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, fɔ̃ɔrɔ liling ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ kaɓa, wukɔ ɓi shoonang tɔ̃ɔ ɓɔɔ rɛɛ zang Laa ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
66019009	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “B'ee ruu keɓe, Zang ɓɔɔ zang g'aarɛ̀ ri, nɛɛ ri naa shaa kn sinyɛ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ri tãa tìnang ɓarɛ tɔ.” A ti kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Ruu keɓe nwangnɛ, nɛɛ nyaa Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ.”
66019010	A n tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng ɓiɓɛ, n tɔɔ n bang wu kaa tɔ, a kɔɔ m tɔɔ, “M'ɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe kpang tingkiring, ruu ɓuru zang shoonang Laa nɛɛ mɔɔ, nɛɛ rɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tùsù ri ɓɛɛ. B'ang ɓaa Laa.” Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu nizang ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ nwangsɛ ruu, rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang Laa, ri walɛ ruu ɓɔɔ ri kɔɔrɔ zang ka wukɔ ɓɛɛ.
66019011	Vuu keɓe ɓa tɔ, a n zi nyaa gãa puu ka lapa. Gbantang puru nwangnɛ. Zang ɓaa nung zang ɓɔɔ vang kagn nɛɛ, “Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ wu kɔɔ ɓɛɛ katɔ ɓɛɛ” a ɓɔɔ “Zang ɓɔɔ kɔɔ ɓi ruu ɓɔɔ nizang diki diki ɓɛɛ.” Palɛ ɓi vuu tɔ̃ɔ, ka ɓɔɔ wu jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ wu ta sìiri ɓɛɛ.
66019012	Jìng ɓiɓɛ yakɛ nɔng naa nyɛlɛ waa. Ti kãngtɛ lapoo yuu kpanti ka yuu ɓiɓɛ gaagaa. Nung ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ kagn zang beeyi, ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zi dìiri ɓiɓɛ kpang, ɓi wukɔ zirɛ gbete ɓɛɛ.
66019013	Hãa fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang hãa ka zìi ɓɛɛ ka bii. Nung ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ mani ɓi, “Ruu Laa”
66019014	Zang sìiri tanang ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ nandon, ri v'ãl'ɛ jong ka gbantang puru, a ri hãlɛ fɔ̃ɔrɔ liling puru ɓɔɔ bii rìiti lee kagn kpang ɓɛɛ. Ri dũng wu.
66019015	Yere bang ɓɔɔ wɔng nyaa dɔli nwangnɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ. Yere ɓɔɔ wu k'ulù zang ɓɔɔ ri shing jìng nɛɛ wu kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ mani nandon. Naa roo kpanti ka yuu ɓarɛ nɛɛ laa naa yitinang kpanti, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ saka ɓɛɛ. Ti naa kãng jaa inabi ka too ɓɔɔ zang kãng kagn, ɓɔɔ ɓi wukɔ gnvɔ bang Laa, Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti katɔ ɓɛɛ.
66019016	Ka fɔ̃ɔrɔ ɓiɓɛ, nɛɛ doo sang ɓiɓɛ, zang bee nung ɓiɓɛ kagn nɛɛ, “Kpanti ɓɔɔ ka yuu rɛɛ kpanti nandon ɓɛɛ, kpanti roonang ɓiɓɛ ɓa ɓɔɔ kpanti piti.”
66019017	A n zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ sh'ii ka yuu laa. A ɓaa nyaa ka rɛɛ jaaning ɓɔɔ ri tãarɛ ka lapa ɓɛɛ nabm. Kɔɔ ri nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ arɛ nɔɔ shaa vuu shaanang bang ɓɔɔ Laa atɛ ɓɛɛ.
66019018	Nɔɔ arɛ nɔɔ shaarɛ yɔpɔ rɛɛ kpanti nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ rɛɛ zang bang rɛɛ zang sìiri, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri lakɛ dɔli ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ rɛɛ gbantang, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang piti, rɛɛ jaafoo nɛɛ rɛɛ jaa gãa, ɓɔ̀'ɔ rɛɛ zang bang nɛɛ wujɛ.”
66019019	A n zi yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa nɛɛ rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ka koo nɛɛ zang sìiri tanang ɓarɛ. Ri kpalɛ zɔɔ tɔ nɛɛ ri ta kaa sìiri nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ vang gbantang puru ɓɛɛ nɛɛ zang sìiri ɓiɓɛ.
66019020	A zang yi yɔpɔ jìngti kaɓa ka nyaa sìiri, nɛɛ yɔɔ ɓɔɔ suu sè'e nɛɛ wu kɔ̀'ɔ zang ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu ɓɔɔ zang zirɛ zang mã naa ka danggn ka tìng yɔpɔ jingti bì'i ɓɛɛ. (Nu nwaarɛ zang nɛɛ mani, a zang ɓang zang vuu yɔpɔ jìngti ka nyaating. A zang ɓɔɔ ri bang vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nwang wu ɓɛɛ). Zang ziti keɓe zang tasɛ ri ningkãari ka too waa kaɓa ɓɔɔ shaayi, tari ɓɔɔ shaa waa katɔ ti kagn ɓɛɛ.
66019021	A zang ɓɔɔ vang ka yuu gbantang nyɔkɔ zang nimbang kaa nɛɛ yere bang ɓɔɔ nwangnɛ nyaa ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, a rɛɛ jaaning nandon ri arɛ ri shaa yɔpɔ ɓarɛ, ri puuyi.
66020001	A n zi zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ lapa. Yiti shɔng saka ɓɔɔ zang puu nyaa too ɓɔɔ dii kagn kpang nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ s'aa yɔ̀ng bang ka naa.
66020002	Yi sɔkɔ bang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ nwang doo ka tìng tɛ̃ɛtɛ̃ɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa wu nɛɛ Sheetang, kpanti suru shi kpang ɓɛɛ. A mã wu nɛɛ s'aa yɔ̀ng bang nɛɛ wu nwang ka nɔngkɔ saa labang gbete.
66020003	A tasɛ wu ka too ɓɔɔ dii kagn kpang ɓɛɛ, mã nyaa nɛɛ shɔng saka tɔ̃ɔ tɔ̃ɔ, a ɓang lang, ɓɔɔ vuu kpanti kagn ɓɛɛ, ka nyaa too. Tɔ̀ɔ, wu nwaarɛ zang rɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ ka koo kpang, saa labang gbete wu ɓarɛ. Nɛɛ ɓa tɔ, zang naa yaa wu naa ditɔ tɔkɔlɔng.
66020004	A n ti zi rɛɛ laa nwannang kpanti gaagaa, zang ɓɔɔ zang a ri naa nɛɛ ri jɛ̃ɛ zang ruu ri nwalɛ kagn. N ti zi suru bii rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ zang dɔlɔ ri yuu, ka ruu ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn tɔ, ka vuu ɓɔɔ Yeesɔ tusu ri ɓɛɛ. A ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ri kɔɔ zang ruu Laa ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ ri bang yɔpɔ jìngti kpàng, ri ti bang vuu ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nwang wu katɔ kpàng ɓɛɛ. Ri ti kasɛ kpang nɛɛ zang ɓang ri vuu ɓiɓɛ ka nyaa tìng kpang, zang ti ɓang ri ka naa kpang. Ri nw'ang tɔkn nɛɛ sàa ningkãari, ri roo kpanti nɛɛ Yeesɔ Kirisi saa labang gbete. Wee paa yunang nɛɛ sàa ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang kɔ.
66020005	Zang ɓɔɔ yaa knti ɓɔɔ ri doo ka sàa ɓɛɛ, ri yupaa ɓarɛ kaa knti, ɓɔɔ s'aa labang gbete ɓa tɔ ɓɛɛ.
66020006	Tìnang ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri yupaa jong ka paa yunang ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang keɓe. Ri ɓarɛ ti zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang ka bii ɓarɛ kpang ɓɛɛ. Vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang naa vɔ tɔkn, ɓɔɔ daa kaa doo ziti naa palɛ ri vuu ɓɔɔ ɓarɛ kpang. Ri naa nwang ɓarɛ kaa zang ɓɔɔ ri dɔɔ Laa nɛɛ Kirisi vuu, ka Gãa Laa ɓɛɛ. A ri naa roo kpanti nɛɛ wu, saa labang gbete.
66020007	Saa labang gbete nɛɛ ɓa tɔ, zang naa yaa Sheetang naa nɛɛ sãa ɓɔɔ zang mã wu kagn ɓɛɛ.
66020008	Naa daarɛ ka rɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ ka koo keɓe, ka nɔng ɓɔɔ koo di nyaa ɓɛɛ nandon, nwaarɛ zang. Rɛɛ tipi ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa ri nɛɛ Gog nɛɛ Maagong ɓɛɛ. Naa kpalɛ ri ka nɔng gbete nɛɛ ri ta sìiri. Zang ɓɔɔ ri naa kpalɛ ɓɛɛ, ri shang dɔli naa seseele ka nyaa waapo.
66020009	Ri tantɛ ka dalɛ koo nandon, ri kiiri nɔng ɓɔɔ zang Laa ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ, ka teteng nɛɛ gari Laa ɓɔɔ Laa kasɛ wu katɔ ɓɛɛ. A waa a nɛɛ lapa, naa shaa zang Sheetang keɓe nandon.
66020010	A kpanti suru shi kpang ɓɔɔ nwaarɛ ri ɓɛɛ, zang tasɛ wu ka too waa kaɓa ɓɔɔ tari ɓɔɔ shaa waa katɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Nɔng ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang t'as'ɛ rɛɛ yɔpɔ jìngti kagn, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ suu sè'e nɛɛ wu zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ. Ri nwang ka nɔngkɔ, ri dang jìng nɛɛ zìi nɛɛ laagɛ̃ gbinggbing.
66020011	A n zi laa ɓɔɔ kpanti nw'ang kagn bang puru, a n ti zi zang nwàng ka yuu ɓiɓɛ. Tipi nɛɛ lapa ri yuku kana, ri yaa tìng ɓiɓɛ zang zi ri takpang.
66020012	N ti zi zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ. Zang bang nɛɛ wujɛ, ri shiiri ka tìng laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa. A zang atɛ rɛɛ labeenang ɓɔɔ, zang p'ulù ka tìng ɓarɛ. Zang ti puu labeenang ɓɔɔ zang beere nung zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. A zang jɛ̃ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ruu ka doo shoonang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang beere ka rɛɛ labeenang kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
66020013	A waapo nwangsɛ rɛɛ vɔrɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ ka yeti ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ. A vɔrɔ nɛɛ koo suru zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ, ri nwangsɛ vɔrɔ ɓarɛ jong, a zang jɛ̃ɛ ri ruu ka doo shoonang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ ɓɛɛ.
66020014	A zang tuu rɛɛ vɔrɔ nɛɛ koo suru zang ɓɔɔ ri vɔlɔ tɔ ɓɛɛ zang tasɛ ri ka too waa. Too waa kaɓa, wukɔ vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ daa kaa doo ziti ɓɛɛ.
66020015	A zang piti ɓɔɔ zang nɛɛ ìi nung ɓiɓɛ, zang bee ka yeti labeenang ɓɔɔ zang beere nung zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ, kagn kpang, zang tasɛ wu ka too waa kaɓa kɔ.
66021001	A n zi lapa ɓɔɔ shɔɔ nɛɛ koo ɓɔɔ shɔɔ. Lapa tìng shɔɔnang nɛɛ koo ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang ri ning tɔ, waapo ti tɔ̀'ɔ kagn kpang.
66021002	N zi Urushalima ɓɔɔ shɔɔ, ɓɔɔ wukɔ gari Laa ɓɛɛ, a nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ nɔng Laa. Zang gbarɛ wu bii tɔ, naa sinyɛ ɓɔɔ zang gbarɛ wu bii, ka ruu ɓeevɛ ɓɛɛ.
66021003	N tãa yee nabm nwangnɛ, nɔng laa nwannang kpanti, kɔɔyi nɛɛ “Zirɛ, Laa a tɔ, naa nwang kaa teteng shɔnzang. Naa nwang kaa nɛɛ ri, ri naa nwang kaa zang ɓiɓɛ jong. Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ naa nwang nɛɛ ri, ti naa nwang kaa Laa ɓarɛ.
66021004	Naa àl'ɛ ri miiri ɓɔɔ ka jìng ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ. Zang naa vɔlɔ takpang. Zang ri zàa takpang, ri kaa nyavɔ takpang, ri ti tãa kɔnang takpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, vuu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ ri nw'ang ka tìng, ri tɛɛ tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
66021005	A zang ɓɔɔ nwang ka laa nwannang kpanti kaɓa, kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, n rìs'i vuu piti wu nwang kaa shɔɔ.” A ti kɔɔ m nɛɛ “Beere vuu keɓe ta, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, ruu keɓe daa naa gn shinang katɔ, a ti ruu ɓɔɔ nizang ɓɛɛ.”
66021006	A ti kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Zang hangsɛ vuu piti tɔ. Nkɔ Alafa nɛɛ Omɛga, ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ waa nyaa knti ɓɛɛ. Zang ɓɔɔ sutu nɛɛ mãa wu, n a wu mii ɓɔɔ nwang nɛɛ sɔlɔng mii, ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ waati.
66021007	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ɓa vuu gãsɛnang yuu, zang naa alɛ wu vuu keɓe nandon. N ti naa nwang Laa ɓiɓɛ, wu nwang ɓi kaa jaa mɛɛ.
66021008	A ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri kaa vɔrɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shing danggn ka bii Laa kpang ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ shi kpang kagn bii ɓarɛ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔ zang vɔrɔ ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri shaa nvaa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri bang vaka, nɛɛ zang sè'e nandon, zang naa tasɛ ri ɓarɛ ka too waa, ɓɔɔ tari ɓɔɔ ri shaa waa katɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. Wee kɔ vɔrɔ ɓɔɔ zang vɔrɛ daa kaa doo ziti ɓɛɛ kɔ.”
66021009	A zang gbete, ka teteng zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ ri manziti kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri yiti taasa ka naa manziti, ɓɔɔ kɔnang manziti kagn ɓɛɛ. Kɔnang diki ɓɔɔ koo naa waa nyaa kagn ɓɛɛ. A ka bii mɛɛ, a kɔɔ m nɛɛ “Arɛ, n tusu mɔɔ sinyɛ, jaa soro Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ.”
66021010	A Suru Laa a ka bii mɛɛ, a zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, tuu m, daa nɛɛ n, ka yuu kɔpɔ ɓɔɔ bang, a ti bee lapa dɔli ɓɛɛ, a tusu m gari Laa ɓɔɔ wukɔ Urushalima ɓɛɛ, nwangnɛ a kana tipi nɛɛ lapa nɛɛ nɔng Laa.
66021011	Bannang Laa yakɛ kana nɔng, gari bì'i kɔlɔ naa tari ɓɔɔ tɔ̃ɔ, naa tari ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Jasifa ɓɛɛ, ti kɔlɔ katɔ kalang kalang naa vìilaa.
66021012	Zang mãa binting bang ka lapa kiiri wu nyaa ka teteng. Nyaa gãa ɓɔɔ zang daa yeti gari nɛɛ mani, kopi tu ziti. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ri ka lapa ɓɛɛ, kopi tu ziti, ri gã rɛɛ nyaa gãa bì'i. Ka bii rɛɛ nyaa gãa bì'i, zang beere nung rɛɛ zɔ̃ng zang Isirela kopi tu ziti kagn.
66021013	Zang shɔ nyaa gãa taati ka k'agǹ gari ɓu. Nyaa gãa taati ka paa ɓɔɔ laa nwangnɛ mani ɓɛɛ, nyaa gãa taati nɛɛ dii, nyaa gãa taati nɛɛ nakn, a ɓɔɔ taati kaa nɛɛ nagang.
66021014	Zang loo doo binting bì'i ka yuu tari kopi tu ziti. Zang beere nung rɛɛ zang shoonang Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, ɓɔɔ ri kopi tu ziti ka rɛɛ tari bì'i.
66021015	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ rang m yee kaɓa, yiti laa ɓɔɔ zang mà nɔng nɛɛ mani, ɓɔɔ zang palɛ nɛɛ Zinariya ɓɛɛ. Nɛɛ wu mà gari bì'i, wu mà rɛɛ nyaa gãa nɛɛ binting ɓɔɔ zang kiiri gari nyaa nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ.
66021016	Gari bì'i beenang nɛɛ dãsɛnang tɛɛtɛɛ. Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, tuu laa nɔng mànang ɓiɓɛ a mà gari bì'i nɛɛ mani. Beenang ɓiɓɛ ka tipi, mɛli labang gbete tu laa maani dakn maani. Dãsɛnang ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ beenang ɓiɓɛ ka lapa doo nɔngkɔ.
66021017	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa ti mà binting ɓɔɔ kiiri gari nyaa ka teteng ɓɛɛ jong. Beenang ɓiɓɛ ka lapa, naa zang naa doo, laa maani dakn ziti tu kopi tu mangbete. Naa ɓɔɔ shɔnzang ri mà nɔng, zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ keɓe mà doo nɔngkɔ.
66021018	Zang mãa binting ɓɔɔ kiiri gari ɓɛɛ ɓi nɛɛ tari ɓɔɔ kɔlɔ katɔ, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ Jasifa ɓɛɛ. A gari bì'i zang mãa ɓi kaa nɛɛ zinariya, ɓɔɔ kalang kalang, kɔlɔ katɔ naa vìilaa.
66021019	Ɓɔ̀'ɔ doo binting ɓɔɔ kiiri gari ka teteng ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ zang loo ɓɛɛ, zang loo nɛɛ rɛɛ tari ɓɔɔ ri shili dɔli ɓɛɛ, ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng, kopi tu ziti, ɓɔɔ zang gbarɛ bii ɓiɓɛ nɛɛ mani ɓɛɛ. Tari ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang zang ɓaa nɛɛ jasifa, ɓɔɔ ɓangnɛ zang ɓaa nɛɛ safiri, ɓɔɔ ɓangnɛ daa taati, zang ɓaa nɛɛ agati, ɓɔɔ ɓangnɛ daa dɛ̃ɛti, zang ɓaa nɛɛ emɛra.
66021020	Tari ɓɔɔ ɓangnɛ ɓɔɔ daa kaa maani, zang ɓaa nɛɛ onisi, ɓɔɔ ɓangnɛ daa kaa mangbete, zang ɓaa nɛɛ Kaneliya, ɓɔɔ ɓangnɛ ɓɔɔ daa kaa manziti, zang ɓaa nɛɛ kirisola, ɓɔɔ ɓangnɛ ɓɔɔ daa kaa mantaati, zang ɓaa nɛɛ beriyel, ɓɔɔ ɓangnɛ ɓɔɔ daa kaa mandɛ̃ɛti, zang ɓaa nɛɛ topazi, ɓɔɔ ɓangnɛ ɓɔɔ daa kaa kopi, zang ɓaa nɛɛ kirisofara, ɓɔɔ ɓangnɛ daa kaa kopi tu gbete, zang ɓaa nɛɛ yakinta, a ɓɔɔ gɔɔ nyaa daa kaa kopi tu ziti ɓɛɛ, zang ɓaa nɛɛ ametisi.
66021021	Rɛɛ nyaa gãa kopi tu ziti ɓu zang palɛ nɛɛ tari ɓɔɔ shi dɔli, ɓɔɔ zang ɓaa nɛɛ luwuluwu ɓɛɛ. Gbabang ɓɔɔ ka gari bì'i, zang palɛ nɛɛ zinariya ɓɔɔ kalang kalang ɓɛɛ, kɔlɔ katɔ naa vìilaa.
66021022	N zi Gãa Laa ka yeti gari bì'i kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti ɓuru Laa ɓɔɔ ɓa zang piti, a ɓɔɔ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ri ka nɔng ɓɛɛ.
66021023	Ruu zang gari kaɓa hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ laa nɛɛ shala kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, bannang Laa yakɛ nɔng ka nɔng kaɓa a Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ti nwang naa waa zà'ang sɔɔ ɓɔɔ yakɛ gari kaɓa ɓɛɛ.
66021024	Zɔ̃ng zang nandon ɓɔɔ ri ka koo ri naa zi nɔng ɓɔɔ ri daa ɓɛɛ nɛɛ nɔng ɓɔɔ yakɛ nɛɛ gari kaɓa kɔ. Rɛɛ kpanti ɓɔɔ ri ka koo ri naa atɛ vuu naa ɓarɛ ka nɔngkɔ.
66021025	Rɛɛ nyaa gãa gari kaɓa, zang yaa ri ɓarɛ bm diki diki, zang kulu kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, nɔng tɔɔ ɓi jong ka nɔng kaɓa kpang ɓɛɛ.
66021026	Zang naa atɛ vuu naa nɛɛ bannang zɔ̃ng zang nandon, ɓɔɔ ri ka koo ka nɔngkɔ.
66021027	A vuu shi kpang ɓɔɔ daa ka yeti gari kaɓa kpang. Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu baabi, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri suru sè'e ri ti daa yeti gari kaɓa kpang jong. Zang ɓɔɔ ri daa yeti gari kaɓa, ɓi zang ɓɔɔ zang b'eer'e nung ɓarɛ tɔ, ka yeti labeenang Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ, ɓɔɔ zang beere nung zang ɓɔɔ ri walɛ suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang tɔ kagn ɓɛɛ.
66022001	Zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, ti tusu m rang mii, ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang. Mii ɓiɓɛ kɔlɔ katɔ naa vìilaa. Nwangnɛ laa nwannang kpanti Laa, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ.
66022002	Zɛ̃ɛyi tɛɛ teteng gbabang ɓɔɔ ka yeti gari bì'i ɓɛɛ. Laa ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ, takɛ ka nyaa rang keɓe, ka z'ingz'ing. Ri ra jaa ka shala shala, ka saa gbete jaa ɓɔɔ ri ra ɓɛɛ ka zɔ̃ngzɔ̃ng kopi tu ziti. Gɔpɔ laa bì'i ɓi gãnang, vàl'ɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri ka nɔng piti piti ka koo, kɔnang ɓarɛ katɔ.
66022003	Vuu ɓɔɔ Laa ku wu nyaa ka bii, nwàng gari kaɓa kpang. Laa nwannang kpanti ɓɔ̀'ɔ Laa, nɛɛ ɓɔ̀'ɔ Jaa Mɛ̀ɛr'ɛ ɓi ka nɔngkɔ, a zang ɓiɓɛ ri bang wu ka nɔngkɔ.
66022004	Ri naa zi waa nyaating Laa, zang ti bee nung ɓiɓɛ ka nyaating ɓarɛ.
66022005	Nɔng zìi ɓi ka nɔng kaɓa kpang. Ruu zang gari kaɓa hãa ɓi kagn nɛɛ waa zà'ang sɔ̀ɔ nɛɛ làa tɔkn kpang, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, kpanti Laa nɛɛ yuu ɓiɓɛ wukɔ naa yakɛ ri nɔng ɓɛɛ. Ri naa roo kpanti jong gbinggbing.
66022006	A zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ kaɓa, kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Rɛɛ vuu keɓe, ri daa ɓɔɔ zang shing gn kagn ɓɛɛ katɔ, a ti ruu ɓɔɔ nizang kɔ nwani. Kpanti Laa ɓɔɔ a rɛɛ zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ naa, ri kɔɔ zang ruu ɓiɓɛ ɓɛɛ, shong zang nyaa shoonang ɓiɓɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, nɛɛ wu naa tusu rɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ palɛ wu shoonang ɓɛɛ, vuu ɓɔɔ bɛɛ zang palɛ kaa tɔ ɓɛɛ.”
66022007	Yeesɔ kɔ̀ɔyi nɛɛ “Nɔɔ zirɛ, diki bee kpang, n a kaa tɔ. Tìnang naa nwang ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang piti ɓɔɔ dũng ruu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka labeenang keɓe ɓɛɛ, ka ruu ɓɔɔ, a nɛɛ bii Laa ɓɛɛ.”
66022008	Nkɔ Yɔhana, n tãa vuu keɓe nandon, n ti zili nɛɛ jìng mɛɛ. Ɓɔɔ n tãa vuu keɓe tɔ, n ti zili ri tɔ, n tang nɛɛ gutu ka tìng zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ tusu m rɛɛ vuu keɓe ɓɛɛ. N tɔ̀ɔ, n b'ang wu,
66022009	a kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Mɔɔ palɛ vuu keɓe kpang tingkiring. Ruu ɓuru zang shoonang Laa nɛɛ mɔɔ, naa rɛɛ ɓaazung ɓɔɔ ri zang nyaa shoonang Laa ɓɛɛ, a ɓɔɔ zang kaɓa piti, ɓɔɔ ri dũng ruu ɓɔɔ zang bee ka labeenang keɓe ɓɛɛ. Bang ɓaa Laa.”
66022010	A ti kɔɔ m nɛɛ, “Ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa kɔ, zang bee ka labeenang keɓe ɓee, mɔɔ waasɛ zang kpang. Ka ruu ɓɔɔ, laa ɓɔɔ vuu keɓe ri palɛ kagn, a naabm tɔ ɓɛɛ.
66022011	Zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu shi kpang, wu yaa palɛnang kpang, zang ɓɔɔ palɛ vuu sãnsãnrãng, wu yaa palɛnang kpang. Ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ zang tɔ̃ɔ ka tìng Laa ɓɛɛ, wu yi tìng ɓi nɛɛ tɔ̃ɔ palɛnang. Zang ɓɔɔ ɓi ti zang Laa, wu yaa Laa dũnnang kpang.”
66022012	Yeesɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nɔɔ zirɛ, diki bee kpang. N a kaa tɔ. N naa atɛ vuu ɓɔɔ n a zang waati ɓɛɛ ka naa ning, n a zang ɓu ka doo shoonang ɓɔɔ wu palɛ ɓɛɛ.
66022013	Nkɔ Alafa, nkɔ Omɛga, ɓɔɔ tìng shɔɔnang nɛɛ ɓɔɔ waa nyaa knti ɓɛɛ, ɓɔɔ gaa vuu piti yuu, nɛɛ ɓɔɔ di ri nyaa ɓɛɛ.”
66022014	Tìnang naa nwang ɓi ɓɔ̀'ɔ zang kaɓa, ɓɔɔ ri sɔ̀'ɔ fɔ̃ɔrɔ, tu kalang kalang ɓɛɛ. Zang naa yaa rikɔ, ri shɛ̃ɛ nɛɛ nyaa gãa gari kaɓa, ri daa yeti gari. Ri ti shaa jaa laa, ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang ɓɛɛ.
66022015	Zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ vuu shi kpang, nɛɛ rɛɛ nvaa, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri palɛ dũndũng, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri nyɔkɔ zang vɔrɔ, nɛɛ zang ɓɔɔ ri bang vaka, a zang piti ɓɔɔ ri suru sè'e, ɓɔɔ ri ti tãa tìnnang sè'e suunang katɔ ɓɛɛ, ri naa nwang ɓarɛ ka yuu knti gari bì'i, ri daa yeti ɓiɓɛ kpang.
66022016	Yeesɔ ti kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nkɔ Yeesɔ, n shong zang nyaa shoonang mɛɛ ɓɔɔ ka lapa ɓɛɛ tɔ, ka nɔng manɛ nɛɛ wu kɔɔ nɔɔ vuu keɓe, ka rɛɛ gãa Laa ɓɔɔ zang ɓɔɔ ri dũng Laa ri kpalɛ zɔɔ kagn ɓɛɛ. N m zɔ̃ng zang kpanti Dawuda. Nkɔ ti sang ɓɔɔ yakɛ nɔng nɛɛ yuu gãndi ɓɛɛ.”
66022017	Suru Laa nɛɛ sinyɛ Jaa Mɛɛrɛ, ri kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Arɛ” Zang piti ɓɔɔ nɛɛ tãa ruu keɓe tɔ, wu kɔɔ jong nɛɛ, “Arɛ” Zang ɓɔɔ sutu nɛɛ maa wu, wu arɛ, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ kasɛ katɔ, wu naa zã mii ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang waati wu ɓooyi.
66022018	N shaarɛ zang piti ɓɔɔ tãa ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa kɔ zang bee ka labeenang keɓe ɓee nyaa, zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ gisi vuu ɓɔɔ kagn, Laa naa tuu kɔnang ɓɔɔ zang bee vuu ka yuu ɓarɛ ka labeenang keɓe, naa gisi wu ka yuu jìng ɓɔɔ wu naa dang ɓɛɛ.
66022019	Zang ɓɔɔ nɛɛ ti zɔ̃ng vuu ɓɔɔ ka ruu ɓɔɔ a nɛɛ bii Laa, ɓɔɔ ka labeenang keɓe, Laa ti naa y'aa wu, wu shaa jìng laa ɓɔɔ a zang suru bii ɓɔɔ waa nyaa kpang, kpang, ti daa yeti gari Laa kaɓa kpang. Wee rɛɛ vuu keɓe ɓɔɔ zang bee vuu ka yuu ɓarɛ ka labeenang keɓe ɓɛɛ kɔ.
66022020	Yeesɔ ɓɔɔ kasɛ tɔ, nɛɛ vuu keɓe, ri nizang ɓɛɛ, wukɔ kɔɔyi nɛɛ, “Nizang, diki bee kpang, n a kaa tɔ.” Nɔngkɔ. A ta kpanti Yeesɔ.
66022021	N gaayi, Kpanti Yeesɔ wu pàlɛ̀ zang Laa piti tɔ̃ɔ. Nɔngkɔ.
